T07yabhkvyu:4: mahābalo jñānasamādhidanto yaḥ pañjaraṃ janmamayaṃ vidārya |
T07yabhkvyu:5: viveśa nirvṛtyaṭavīṃ praśāntāṃ taṃ śāstṛnāgaṃ śirasā namāmi. ||
T07yabhkvyu:7: yaṃ buddhimatām agryaṃ dvitīyam iva buddham ity āhuḥ. ||
T07yabhkvyu:13: sukṛtā [Tib. 2a] sābhimatā me likhitā ca tathāyam artha iti. ||
T07yabhkvyu:14: siddhāntārthāpasṛtā kvacitkvacid yā tu taiḥ kṛtā vyākhyā |
T07yabhkvyu:15: tām udbhāvya yathāvad vihiteha mayānyathā vyākhyā. ||
T07yabhkvyu:17: pravicāryatām iyaṃ tair vyākhyā yuktā na vā yuktā. ||
T07yabhkvyu:18: yuktā ced grāhyeyaṃ na eed apohyānyathā vidhātavyā |
T07yabhkvyu:19: na hi viṣame 'rthe skhalituṃ na saṃbhaven mādṛśāṃ buddhiḥ. ||
T07yabhkvyu:20: yaḥ sarvathā sarvahatāndhakāraḥ saṃsārapaṃkāj jagad ujjahāra tasmai namaskṛtya yathārthaśāstre śāstraṃ pravakṣyāmy abhidharmakośam.
T07yabhkvyu:21: ity asya ślokasyārthaṃ vivṛṇvāna ācārya āha. śātraṃ praṇetukāmaḥ svasya
T07yabhkvyu:22: (Abhidh-k-vy 2) śāstur māhātmyajñāpanārthaṃ guṇākhyānapūrvakaṃ tasmai namaskāram ārabhata iti. śāstram abhidharmakośaṃ praṇetukāmaḥ kartukāmaḥ svasya ṣāstur ātmīyasya śāstuḥ. sa hi bhagavān ācāryasyātmīyaḥ śāstā.
T07yabhkvyu:23: tacchāsanapratipannatvāt. [Tib. 2b] tena vā śāstrā mahākaruṇāparatantreṇa sakalo lokaḥ svatvena parigṛhītaḥ. tasmād ācāryasyāpi svatvena gṛhītasya sa bhagavān svaḥ śāstā bhavati. māhātmyajñāpanārtham iti. mahātmatvaṃ māhātmyaṃ svaparārthapratipattisampat tajjñāpanārthaṃ tadavabodhārtham.
T07yabhkvyu:24: guṇākhyānapūrvakaṃ guṇakathanapūrvakaṃ tasmai namaskāram ārabhate tasmai praṇāmaṃ karotīty arthaḥ. atītakālatvād ārabdhavān iti vaktavye vartamānakāle padaprayogo 'dyāpi namaskārārambhābhiprāyāt. śiṣyaparaṃparayā vā namaskārāraṃbhāvirāmāt. śabdaśāstre 'pīdṛśa eva śabdaprayogo dṛśyate. atha
T07yabhkvyu:25: śabdānuśāsanam. athety ayaṃ śabdo 'dhikārārthaḥ prayujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:26: guṇākhyānamātreṇa māhātmyāvabodho na namaskāreṇeti cet. na. tasya
T07yabhkvyu:27: tatsūcakatvāt. namaskāreṇa hi māhātmyaṃ sūcyate. atha vā guṇākhyānenaiva
T07yabhkvyu:28: māhātmyaṃ jñāpyate na namaskāreṇa. namaskārārambhas tu svapuṇyaprasavārtham. sadācāranuvṛttipradarśanārthaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:29: kṛtābhimatadevatāpūjāstutinamaskārā hi santaḥ kriyām ārabhanta iti satām
T07yabhkvyu:30: ācārāt. tatra māhātmyajñāpanaṃ kimartham ity ācakṣmahe.
T07yabhkvyu:31: tadgauravotpādanārtham. gauravotpādanaṃ punas tatpravacanasatkṛtyaśravaṇārtham. satkṛtyaśravaṇaṃ krameṇa śrutacintābhāvanāmayaprajñotpādanārtham. tadutpād anaṃ kleśaprahāṇārtham. tat punaḥ sarvaduḥkhopaśamalakṣaṇanirvāṇaprāpaṇārtham [Tib. 3a] iti prayojananiṣṭhā.
T07yabhkvyu:32: māhātmyajñāpanaṃ tv ekam ācāryeṇa prayojanam uktaṃ sākṣātprayojanatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:33: taditarāṇi tv abhyūhituṃ śakyānīti noktāni. ya iti buddhaṃ bhagavaṃtam
T07yabhkvyu:35: bhavati. tadyathā ya eṣāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ gauraḥ śukravāsāḥ sa evaśarmeti.
T07yabhkvyu:37: yaḥ sarvathā sarvahatāndhakāraḥ saṃsārapaṅkāj jagad ujjahāra tasmai namaskṛtyeti buddha eva bhagavati yacchabdo vartate. na hi buddhād anya evaṃ guṇaviśiṣṭaḥ saṃbhavatīti ato vyācaṣṭe. ya iti buddhaṃ bhagavantam
T07yabhkvyu:38: adhikṛtyāheti. buddha iti kartari ktavidhānaṃ. buddher vikasanād buddhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:39: vibuddha ity arthaḥ. vibuddhaṃ padmam iti yathā. atha yāvidyānidrādvayāpagamād buddhaḥ prabuddha ity arthaḥ. prabuddhapuruṣa iti yathā. karmakartari ktavidhānam (Abhidh-k-vy 3) ity apare. svayaṃ budhyata iti buddha ity arthaḥ. karmaṇy api ktavidhānam apy adoṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:40: sarvaguṇasaṃpatsaṃpannatayā sarvadoṣavinirmuktatayā ca buddhair anyair vā buddho jñāta ity arthaḥ. bhagavantam iti dvitīyapadopādānam
T07yabhkvyu:41: anādarasaṃbhāvanānivṛttyarthaṃ. nirupapadānām abhidhānānāṃ hi loke anādaro dṛśyate. evadatta iti. vinayavibhāṣākārās tu catuṣkoṭikāṃ kurvanti. asti buddho na bhagavān. pratyekabuddhaḥ svayaṃbhutvād buddha iti śakyate vaktum. na tu bhagavān. aparipūrṇadānādisaṃbhāratvāt. yo hi māhātmyavān sa bhagavān ucyate. asti bhagavān na buddhaḥ. caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ paripūrṇadānādipāramitatvāt [Tib. 3b] anabhisaṃbuddhatvāc ca. asty ubhayathā buddho bhagavān. asti nobhayathā etān ākārān sthāpayitveti. ato buddhaṃ bhagavantam ity ubhayaviśeṣaṇam. hatam asyāndhakāram anena veti
T07yabhkvyu:42: hatāndhakāraḥ. ṣaṣṭhībahuvrīhau mārgeṇa hatam iti kartṛbhūto mārgo
T07yabhkvyu:43: adhyāhāryaḥ. tṛtīyābahuvrīhau tu mārgeṇeti karaṇam adhyāhāryam. apara āha.
T07yabhkvyu:45: hantyarthadvayaparigrahārtham. yadā hatam asyāndhakāram iti vigraham. tadā gatyartho hantir gṛhyate. gatam asyāndhakāram ity arthaḥ. yadā punas tṛtīyābahuvrīhiḥ. tadā hiṃsārtho hantir gṛhyate. hiṃsitam anenāndhakāram ity arthaḥ. evam uttarayoḥ padayor aikapadyaṃ kṛtvā paścāt
T07yabhkvyu:46: saptamītatpuruṣaṃ karoti. sarvasmin hatāndhakāraḥ sarvahatāndhakāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:47: tathā ca sati hataśabdo 'tra na pūrvaṃ nipatati. saptamīsamāsas tv iha
T07yabhkvyu:48: kena lakṣaṇena bhavatīti cintyam. saptamī śauṇḍair iti samāsaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:49: hatāndhakāraśabdaḥ śauṇdādiṣu paṭhyate. śauṇḍādīnām ākṛtīkṛtatvāt tatrāsyānupraveśo 'vagantavyaḥ. saptamīti yogavibhāgād vā. utsargeṇa vā samāsaḥ. saha supeti sub iti vartamāne subantaṃ subantena saha samasyate.
T07yabhkvyu:50: yatreṣṭam iti akṛtalakṣaṇo vā tatpuruṣo mayūravyaṃsakādiṣu draṣṭavya ity anena vā katham upasarjanībhūtam andhakāraṃ sarvasminn ity
T07yabhkvyu:52: andhakāraghātas tv anenābhisaṃbadhyate. yena hy andhakāraghātena yogād bhagavān hatāndhakāraḥ. sa tasyāndhakāraghātaḥ sarvādhāro 'vagantavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:53: yathā akṣeṣu dhūrta iti. yena dhaurtyalakṣaṇena guṇena yogāt. asau dhūrtaḥ so 'kṣādhāraḥ. evam ihāpy avagantavyam. anyathāpi ceha saṃbhavantaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:54: samāsaṃ paśyāmaḥ. sarvasmin hataṃ sarvahatam. sarveṇa prakāreṇa sarvahataṃ
T07yabhkvyu:55: sarvathā sarvahatam. sarvathā sarvahatam asyāndhakāram anena veti sarvathā
T07yabhkvyu:57: (Abhidh-k-vy 4). na ca pūrvanipāta iti. sarveṇa prakāreṇeti kliṣṭākliṣṭāndhakāravigamataḥ. sarvasmin jñeye dvādaśāyatanalakṣaṇe.
T07yabhkvyu:58: sarvaṃ sarvam iti brāhmaṇa yāvad eva dvādaśāyatanānīti sūtre vacanāt. kim atra śārvaraṃ tamo 'ndhakāraśabdenocyate. nety āha. ajñānaṃ hi bhūtārthadarśanapratibandhād andhakāram ity avagantavyam. andhakāraśabdo hi naiśe tamasi prasiddhaḥ. andham iva janaṃ karotīti andhakāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:61: tac ceti tad ajñānam. pratipakśalābheneti āryamārgalābhena. vipakṣaḥ kleśaḥ vipakṣapratighātāya pakṣaḥ pratipakṣa iti kṛtvā. atha vā jñānaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:62: anāsravam ajñānapratipakṣaḥ tasya lābhena. atyantaṃ sarvathā sarvatra
T07yabhkvyu:63: jñeye puṇaranutpattidhamatvāt hatam asamudācāraprahāṇīkṛtam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:64: ato 'sāv iti bhagavān. pratyekabuddhaśrāvakā apy abhyarhitavāt
T07yabhkvyu:65: pratyekabuddhaśabdaḥ pūrvanipātaḥ. kāmam ity anujñāyām. na tu sarvatheti.
T07yabhkvyu:66: akliṣṭasaṃmohānatyantavigamāt. nanu ca sarvaṃ sāsravavastu śrāvakapratyekabuddhānām api buddhavat prahīṇam. kim idam ueyate.
T07yabhkvyu:67: kliṣṭasaṃmohasya teṣām atyantavigama iti. tathā hy uktam. nāham ekadharmam apy anabhijñāya aparijñāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāṃ vadāmīti. tathā nāham ekadharmam apy aparijñāyāprahāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāṃ vadāmīti. tasmāc chrāvakapratyekabuddhānām api tad akliṣṭam ajñānaṃ cakṣurādivac chandarāgaprahāṇāt prahīṇam eva. anyathā hi śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:68: duḥkhāntakriyā na bhavet. satam asty etad evam. prahīṇam eva teṣāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:69: kliṣṭavad akliṣṭam apy ajñānaṃ. tat tu teṣāṃ cakṣurādivat prahīṇam api
T07yabhkvyu:70: samudācarati. buddhasya tu prahīṇaṃ san na samudācarati. ata eva ca
T07yabhkvyu:71: viśeṣitaṃ punaranutpattidharmatvāt hatam [Tib. 4b] iti. anyathā tat sarvathā sarvatra jñeye prahīṇam ity evāvakṣyat. ye tu vyācakṣate
T07yabhkvyu:73: tad apavyākhyānam eṣāṃ yathoktam iti pratyācakṣyate. tathā hy eṣām iti
T07yabhkvyu:74: vistaraḥ. tathā hīti yasmād ity arthaḥ. atha vā tatheti yathā na sarvathā
T07yabhkvyu:75: tatheti. hiśabdo hetau. eṣām iti śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ. buddhadharmeṣv
T07yabhkvyu:78: rūpādiṣv artheṣu. bhavaty evākliṣṭam ajñānaṃ samudācaraty eva tad ity
T07yabhkvyu:79: arthaḥ. tatra ye buddhadharmā āveṇikādayaḥ. teṣu svabhāvaparamasūkṣmagambhīratvād buddhād anyeṣām ajñānam. yathoktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:80: jānīṣe (Abhidh-k-vy 5) tvaṃ śāriputra tathāgatasya śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandham iti bhagavatā pṛṣṭena sthaviraśāradvatīputreṇoktam. no hīdaṃ bhagavann
T07yabhkvyu:81: iti. ye tv anye 'rthā rūpiṇaḥ paramāṇusaṃcitāḥ. te ativiprakṛṣṭadeśā yadi
T07yabhkvyu:82: bhavanti. ye 'py avijñaptyarūpiṇaḥ. te 'pi yady ativiprakṛṣṭadeśādhāratvāt ativiprakṛṣṭadeśā bhavanti. teṣv api teṣām ajñānam
T07yabhkvyu:85: ativiprakṛṣtakāleṣv apy atīteṣu anāgateṣu vā teṣv artheṣv atibahukalpāntarāntaritavināśaprādurbhāvatvāt [Tib. 5a] teṣāṃ bhavaty evājñānam. śrūyate hi sthaviraśāriputreṇa mokṣabhāgīyakuśalamūlādarśanāt
T07yabhkvyu:86: pravrajyāpekṣapuruṣapratyākhyānam. bhagavatā tu tasya mokṣabhāgīyaṃ dṛṣṭam uktaṃ ca
T07yabhkvyu:87: mokṣabījam ahaṃ hy asya susūkṣmam upalakṣaye dhātupāṣāṇavivare nilīnam iva kāṃcanam
T07yabhkvyu:88: iti. sa ca puruṣaḥ pravrājita iti. anantaprabhedeṣv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:89: dhātugatiyonyupapattyādiprabhede durbodheṣv artheṣu. teṣām ajñānaṃ bhavaty
T07yabhkvyu:91: sarvākāraṃ kāraṇam ekasya mayūracandrakasyāpi nāsarvajñair jñeyaṃ sarvajñabalaṃ hi tajjñānam
T07yabhkvyu:92: iti. tāny etāni catvāry ajñānakāraṇāni bhavanti. teṣāṃ kvacid ekaṃ kvacid dve kvacit trīṇi kvacit catvāsrīti saṃbhavato yojyāni. ity ātmahitapratipattisampad iti vistaraḥ. ātmahitāya pratipattiḥ ātmahitapratipattiḥ. ātmahitapratipatteḥ sampat ātmahitapratipattisampat
T07yabhkvyu:93: phalaniṣpattir ity arthaḥ. sā ceyaṃ saṃpat jñānaprahāṇasaṃpatsvabhāvā
T07yabhkvyu:94: veditavyā. parahitapratipattisaṃpad api tathaiva carcanīyā. apare
T07yabhkvyu:95: vyācakṣate. ātmahitapratipattir ātmahitapratipādanam. ātmahitopagraha ity arthaḥ. tasyāḥ sampat ātmahitapratipattisampat. evaṃ parahitapratipattisaṃpad api vyākhyeyā. sā punaḥ sarvaduḥkhopaśamanirvāṇapariprāpaṇasvabhāvā.
T07yabhkvyu:97: vacanāt. saṃsaraṇaṃ saṃsāra [Tib. 5b] ājavaṃjavībhāvaḥ janmamaraṇaparaṃparety arthaḥ. atha vā saṃsaranty asmin sattvā iti
T07yabhkvyu:98: saṃsāras traidhātukam. saṃsāraḥ paṅka iva saṃsārapaṅkaḥ paṃkasādharmyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:99: ata āha. saṃsāro hi jagadāsaṅgasthānatvād duruttaratvāc ca paṅkabhūta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:100: paṅko hi loke avasādātmakatvāt āsaṅgasya sthānam. ata eva ca duruttaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:102: saṃsāro 'pi hi tṛṣṇābhiṣyanditatvād āsaṅgasthānam. duruttaraś ca tasmād
T07yabhkvyu:104: tatrāvamagnaṃ tādātmyanupraveśataḥ samudāyāvayavarūpato vā. jagat sattvalokam atrāṇam anākrandam anukampamānaḥ karuṇāyamāno bhagavān
T07yabhkvyu:106: pradānāni. uttāraṇīyabahutvād bahuvacanaṃ. tair yathābhavyaṃ abhyuddhṛtavān. yathābhavyam iti anucyamānam api gamyate loke tathā
T07yabhkvyu:107: dṛṣṭatvāt. tadyathā brāhmaṇān ānīya bhojayāmāsety ukte. ye tatra bhojayituṃ śaktā grāme nagare vā saṃnihitāh. tān eva bhojayāmāseti
T07yabhkvyu:108: gamyate. sarvalokabrāhmaṇānāṃ bhojayitum aśakyatvāt. evam ihāpi yo jano bhavyo 'bhyuddhartum. tam evabhyuddhṛtavān iti. ato yathābhavyam iti
T07yabhkvyu:110: tasmai namaskṛtyeti śirasā praṇipatya kriyāspadībhūtatvān namaḥśabdasya praṇipatyārtho namaskṛtyaśabdo bhavati. praṇipātaś ca loke śirasā pratīta iti śirasety
T07yabhkvyu:111: āha. vāṅmanonamaskāro 'pi atranuktasiddho guṇākhyānapūrvakatvāt manaskarmapūrvakatvāc ca kāyakarmaṇaḥ. tasmai iti kiṃlakṣaṇeyaṃ caturthī.
T07yabhkvyu:112: atra bahavo vyākhyānakārā muhyanti. ācāryaguṇamatis tacchiṣyaś cācāryavasumitra āhatuḥ. namaḥśabdayoge caturthī.
T07yabhkvyu:113: namaḥsvastisvāhāsvadhālaṃvaṣaḍyogāc ceti. tad etad ayuktam. svatantrasya namaḥśabdasya yoge sā caturthī bhavati. asvatantraś cāyaṃ namaḥśabdaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:114: kriyāspadībhūtatvāt. ata eva cānenaivācāryeṇa vyākhyāyuktau namaskṛtya muniṃ mūrdhneti karmalakṣaṇā dvitīyā prayuktā. tasmān na namaḥśabdayoge caturthīti.
T07yabhkvyu:115: dvitīyāyāḥ sthāne caturthī prayuktety apare. tad idam eṣām icchāmātram. na hi lakṣaṇam asyāstīti. kena tarhīyaṃ caturthī. saṃpradānalakṣaṇeyaṃ caturthīti vyācakṣmahe. kathaṃ saṃpradānasaṃjñā. karmaṇā yam abhipraiti.
T07yabhkvyu:116: sa saṃpradānam iti. cūrṇikāreṇa karmaśabda ubhayathā varṇyate.
T07yabhkvyu:117: pāribhāṣikaṃ karma laukikaṃ ceti. tatra yadā kartur īpsitatamaṃ karmeti pāribhāṣikaṃ karmāśrīyate. tadā kartur īpsitatamena yam abhipraiti. sa saṃpradānasaṃjño bhavati. brāhmaṇāya gāṃ prayacchatīti. etat siddhaṃ bhavati. yadā tu karma kriyeti laukikaṃ karmāśrīyate. tadā kriyayā yam
T07yabhkvyu:118: abhipraiti. sa saṃpradānasaṃjño bhavatīti. tad etat siddhaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:119: yuddhāya saṃnahyati. patye śeta iti. saṃnahanakriyayā yuddham abhipraiti
T07yabhkvyu:120: kartā. śayanakriyayā patim iti. (Abhidh-k-vy 7) yuddhādīnām sampradānasaṃjñā siddhā bhavati. tathehapi namaskārakriyayā śāstāram
T07yabhkvyu:121: abhipraiti ācāryaḥ. tasmāc chāstari saṃpradānasaṃjñā. saṃpradānasaṃjñāyāṃ satyāṃ saṃpradāne caturthī 'ti caturthī bhavati. evaṃ ca kṛtvā
T07yabhkvyu:123: pramāṇabhūtāya jagaddhitaiṣiṇe praṇamya śāstre sugatāya tāyina. |
T07yabhkvyu:124: ityevamādīni kāvyaśāstrāntaroktāni śabdarūpāṇi sunītāni bhavanti. yadi tarhi saṃpradānasaṃjñaiveṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:126: atra dvitīyā na prāpnoti. naiṣa doṣaḥ. vivakṣātaḥ kārakāṇi bhavanti. yadā
T07yabhkvyu:127: karmavivakṣā. tadā dvitīyā. yadā saṃpradānavivakṣā. tadā caturthī 'ti
T07yabhkvyu:130: iti. śāstr iti auṇādikaḥ śabdaḥ. tṛntṛcau śaṃsikṣādibhyaḥ saṃjñāyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:131: cāniṭāv iti tṛnpratyayānto 'niṭ śāsteti bhavati. nanu ca saṃjñāyāṃ śāsteti
T07yabhkvyu:132: bhavati. na ceyaṃ saṃjñā. saṃjñaiveyam. dvividhā hi saṃjñā viśeṣasaṃjñā sāmānyasaṃjñā ca. viśeṣasanjñā evadatto yajñadatta iti. sāmānyasaṃjñā
T07yabhkvyu:133: mātāpitetyevamādikā. mātrādayo 'pi hi tatra saṃjñāyām eva nipātyante.
T07yabhkvyu:134: naptṛneṣṭṛtvaṣṭṛhotṛpotṛbhrātṛjāmātṛmātṛpitṛduhitṛ iti. tena yathā sarvāsāṃ mātṝṇām iyaṃ saṃjñā māteti. sarveṣāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ piteti. evaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca śāstṝṇām iyaṃ saṃjñā śāsteti. sa tu śāstā dvividho bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:135: ayathārtho yathārthaś ca. [Tib. 6a] ayathārthaś ca pūraṇādiḥ. yathārthaś ca tathāgata iti. ato viśinaṣṭi yathārtham aviparītaṃ śāstīti yathārthaśāstā. etac ca viśeṣaṇaṃ parahitapratipattyupāyasūcanārtham. ata
T07yabhkvyu:136: evāha. parahitapratipattyupāyam asyāviṣkarotītyevamādi. na tv ṛddhivarapradānaprabhāveneti prabhāvaśabdaḥ pratyekam abhisaṃbadhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:138: viśvarūpasaṃdarśanam. varapradānaprabhāvas tadyathā maheśvaro varaṃ prayacchatīti pravādaḥ. atha vā tripado dvaṃdvaḥ. ṛddhiś ca varapradānaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:139: ca prabhāvaś ceti. prabhāvaḥ śaktiviśeṣaḥ. nanu ca buddhā api kadācit ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vineyānām upadarśayanti. asty etad evam. api tv āvarjanamātraṃ tu teṣāṃ. anuśāsanīprātihāryeṇa tu rāgādipratipakṣabhāvanākrameṇa saṃsārottaraṇaṃ bhavati. kiṃ kariṣyatīti praśnaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:141: (Abhidh-k-vy 8) ktvāvidheḥ kriyāntarapekṣatvāt. samānakartṛkayor hi pūrvakāle ktvāvidhir
T07yabhkvyu:143: arthaviśeṣābhidyotako nāmasamūhaḥ śāstraṃ. kṣaṇikatvāt samuhānupapattir iti cet. na. tadgrāhakabuddhirūpasamūhakalpanāt. śiṣyaśāsanāc chāstram iti. [Tib. 6b] kiṃ śāstram iti kiṃ nāmadheyam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:144: (I.2ab) abhidharmakośam ity asya nirvacanaṃ vakṣyate. āstāṃ tāvad etat.
T07yabhkvyu:145: avayavārthāvabodhapūrvakaḥ samudāyārthāvabodhaḥ ity avayavārthaṃ tāvat pṛcchati. ko 'yam abhidharmo nāmeti. 1.
T07yabhkvyu:147: iti. dharmapravicayakāle prajñā pradhānam iti mukhyavṛttyā prajñāgrahaṇam.
T07yabhkvyu:151: saparivārā. rājñā samaṃ carann api bhṛtyo rājānucara ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:152: tadanuvṛttikāritvāt. tathehāpi samakālaṃ caranto 'pi tatsahabhuvo dharmā anucarā evocyante. ke punas te. cittacaittāḥ anāsravasaṃvaro jātyādayaś ca cittaviprayuktā iti. nanu ca cittaṃ caittebhyaḥ pradhānam. tathā hi cittasya ime citte vā bhavāś caittā iti. tena prajñaiva cittasya parivāro
T07yabhkvyu:153: 'rhati. na tu cittaṃ prajñāyāḥ caitasikatvāt asty etat. api tu dharmapravicayakāle prajñā caittasyāpi sarvasya kalāpasya rājāyate. kvacit kaścid dharmaḥ prādhānyam āskandati. tadyathā abhisaṃpratyayakāle śraddhetyevamādi. anāsravaḥ pañcaskandhaka iti. anāsravasaṃvaras tasmin kalāpe rūpaskandhaḥ. yā vedanā. sa vedanāskandhaḥ. yā saṃjñā. sa
T07yabhkvyu:154: saṃjñāskandhaḥ. cetanādijātyādayaḥ saṃskāraskandhaḥ. [Tib. 7a] vijñānaṃ cātra vijñānaskandhaḥ. eṣa tāvad iti. tāvacchabdaḥ kramārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:155: pāramārthika iti. paramārtha eva pāramārthikaḥ. paramārthe vā bhavaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:156: pāramārthikaḥ. paramārthena vā dīvyati caratīti vā pāramārthikaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:158: tadprāptaye yāpi ceti prajñā sānucarā so 'bhidharma iti cātrādhikṛtam. tasyā anāsravāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ prāptyarthaṃ sākṣāt pāraṃparyeṇa vā yā śrutamayī cintāmayī ca
T07yabhkvyu:159: bhāvanāmayī ca prajñā sāsravā yā copapattipratilambhikā sānucarā. sāpi sāṃketiko 'bhidharmaḥ. tatra śrutaprayogajā śrutamayī.
T07yabhkvyu:162: upapattipratilambho 'syāstīti. ata iniṭhanāv iti ṭhanvidhānān na vṛddhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:163: śrutacintāmayy upapattipratilambhikā bhāvanāmayī cārūpyāvacarī catuḥskandhako 'bhidharmaḥ anuparivartakarūpabhāvāt. rūpāvacarī tu dhyānasaṃvarasadbhāvāt paṃcaskandhako 'bhidharmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:164: yac ca śāstram iti abhidharmaśāstram abhipretaṃ. tat tu sānucaraṃ na sānucaram iti
T07yabhkvyu:167: iti nānuvartayanti. jātyādisaṃbhavāt kecid anuvartayanti. ekaskandhako hy asāv abhidharmaḥ. dviskandhako vā. tasya ca jātyādayaḥ santīti. anye tu vyācakṣate śāstram iti [Tib. 7b] jñānaprasthānaṃ. tasya śarīrabhūtasya ṣaṭ
T07yabhkvyu:168: pādāḥ. prakaraṇapādaḥ vijñānakāyaḥ harmaskandhaḥ prajñaptiśāstraṃ hātukāyaḥ saṃgītiparyāya ity atas tad api śāstraṃ sānucaram eva pāraṃparyeṇa pāramārthikābhidharmaprāptaye sāṃketiko 'bhidharma ity
T07yabhkvyu:169: ucyate. upapattipratilambhikā hi prajñā śāstraśravaṇāt tadartham anusarati. tasyāḥ śrutamayī śrutamayyāś cintāmayī cintāmayyāḥ sāsravā
T07yabhkvyu:170: bhāvanāmayī tasyā anāsravā prajñā jāyata iti anukramaḥ. tad ayam iti. tad iti vākyopanyāse. ayam iti svalakṣaṇadhāraṇatvena niruktaḥ pāramārthikaḥ sāṃketiko 'bhidharmaḥ. praramārthadharmam iti. paramasya jñānasyārthaḥ paramārthaḥ. paramo vārthaḥ paramārthaḥ sarvadharmāgratvāt paramārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:171: paramārthaś cāsau dharmaś ca paramārthadharmaḥ. dharmalakṣaṇaṃ veti.
T07yabhkvyu:172: svasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ khakkhaṭalakṣaṇaḥ pṛthivīdhātur anityaṃ duḥkham ityevamādi. tat pratyabhimukhaḥ pratilambhāya prativedhāya avabodhāya vā
T07yabhkvyu:173: abhimukho dharmaḥ abhidharmaḥ. kugatiprādaya iti tatpuruṣasamāsaḥ. nanu ca lakṣaṇenābhipratī ābhimukhya iti avyayībhāvaḥ prāpnoti. yadā hy abhir
T07yabhkvyu:174: lakṣaṇena saha samasyate. tadāvyayībhāvaḥ. tadyathā abhyagni śalabhāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:175: patanti. śalabhapatanaṃ agninā lakṣyate. so 'gnir asya lakṣaṇaṃ. na tv ayaṃ dharmo 'nyasya lakṣaṇam. kiṃ tarhi. lakṣyaḥ. svayam evābhimukhyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:177: dharmalakṣaṇaṃ vā praty upaniṣadbhāvenābhimukhaḥ. kimaṃga pāramārthika ity
T07yabhkvyu:179: (I.2cd) ukto 'bhidharma iti. svabhāvaprabhedanirvacanato avayavārtho 'vabuddhaḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy 10) samudāyārthas tu na tāvad ity ataḥ
T07yabhkvyu:180: samudāyārthaṃ pṛcchati. idaṃ tu śāstraṃ katham abhidharmakośam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:183: arthata iti na vyañjanata iti. arthato 'yam
T07yabhkvyu:185: [Tib. 8a] na sākalyena. tasmād yathāpradhānam ity avyayībhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:186: antarbhūtaḥ praviṣṭa iti. etac chāstraṃ madīyaṃ tasyārthasya kośasthānīyaṃ bhavati. kośasadṛśaṃ. etasminn arthe ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣasamāsaḥ. abhidharmasya kośo 'bhidharmakośa iti. yatra hy asiḥ praviśati. sa tasya kośaḥ. atha vā so 'bhidharmo jñānaprasthānādir etasya madīyasya śāstrasyāśrayabhūtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:187: tato hy ārṣād abhidharmād etan madīyaṃ śāstraṃ nirākṛṣṭam. arthata ity adhikṛtam. ataḥ sa evāsyābhidharmaḥ kośa iti. etasminn arthe bahuvrīhisamāsaḥ. abhidharmaḥ kośo 'syeti abhidarmakośaḥ. yato hy asir
T07yabhkvyu:188: nirākṛṣyate. sa tasya kośa iti. etac chāstram abhidharmakośam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:190: (I.3) kimarthaṃ punar abhidharmopadeśaḥ kiṃ prayojanam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:191: saprayojanasya hi śāstrasya pratyāsaḥ sādhur bhavet. na niḥprayojanasya.
T07yabhkvyu:192: kena cāyaṃ prathamata upadiṣṭaḥ. kena cāyam abhidharma ādito deśitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:193: āptopadiṣṭasya hi śāstrasya pratyāso 'rharūpaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:194: prathamata iti viśeṣaṇam. bhadantakātyāyanīputrādīnāṃ piṇḍīkaraṇena paścād
T07yabhkvyu:195: upadeśasya siddhatvāt. prathamata upadeśe hi vivādaḥ. yata iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:196: yataḥ kāraṇāt. ācāryaḥ śāstrakāraḥ. abhidharmakośaṃ pratyāsaśāstraṃ vaktuṃ
T07yabhkvyu:197: praṇetum ādriyate. ādaram karotīty arthaḥ. evaṃ kṛte praśnadvaye
T07yabhkvyu:198: abhidharmaśāstrasya saprayojanatām āptopadeśatāṃ ca pradarśayann āha. 2.
T07yabhkvyu:200: [Tib. 8b] yato vinā dharmapravicayena rūpaṃ vedanā anityaṃ duḥkham ityevamākāreṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:202: anya iti vākyaśeṣaḥ. sa eva tu kleśopaśamābhyupāya iti arthād āpannaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:203: bhavati. tadyathā nāhāreṇa vinā prāṇasaṃdhāraṇopāya ity ukte sa evāhāraḥ prāṇasaṃdhāraṇopāya ity arthād āpannaṃ bhavati. tadvad etat. yadi kleśopaśamo (Abhidh-k-vy 11) na syāt kiṃ syād iti. ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:205: iti. anena kleśopaśamasyāvaśyakartavyatāṃ darśayati. bhavaḥ saṃsāra ity
T07yabhkvyu:206: ekārthaḥ. bhava evārṇavo bhavārṇavaḥ. majjanasthānasādharmyāt samudrakalpo bhavaḥ. etasmin bhavārṇave atra.
T07yabhkvyu:208: atragrahaṇam. atra loko bhramati tādātmyāvasthānāt. tādātmyavasthānato 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:209: hi adhikaraṇanirdeśo dṛśyate. tadyathā anyapādapānupayogena palāśeṣv
T07yabhkvyu:210: ārāmaḥ sthita iti. vṛttau tu hetvarthatāṃ tṛtīyāyāḥ sūcayatā hetumaṇṇicā
T07yabhkvyu:211: hetvartha uktaḥ. kleśāś ca lokaṃ bhramayantīti. ata ity uddiṣṭahetupratyāmnāyaḥ. yata evam. ata uddiṣṭo 'bhidharma ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:212: dharmapravicayaḥ kleśopaśamopāyo nānyo dharma ity abhidharmopadeśakaḥ saṃbandha ity ata uktaṃ taddhetor
T07yabhkvyu:213: iti. sa eva hetus taddhetuḥ. tasya tasmād vā
T07yabhkvyu:216: kathaṃ nāme dharmapravicayaḥ syād ity abhidharma upadiṣṭaḥ śāstrā buddhena. [Tib. 9a] ata eva. na hi vinābhidharmopadeśena śiṣyaḥ śakto dharmān pravicayitum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:217: udita iti vader niṣṭhāyāṃ kṛtasaṃprasāraṇasyaitad rūpam. na tu iṇa utpūrvas
T07yabhkvyu:218: yārthāyogāt. udita ity uktaḥ upadiṣṭa ity ekārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:220: kilaśabdaḥ parābhiprāyaṃ dyotayati. ābhidhārmikāṇām etan mataṃ. na tv asmākaṃ sautrāntikānām iti bhāvaḥ. śrūyante hy abhidharmaśāstrāṇāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:225: sautrāntikārthaḥ. ye sūtraprāmāṇikā na śāstraprāmāṇikāḥ. te sautrāntikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:226: yadi na śāstraprāmāṇikāḥ kathaṃ teṣāṃ piṭakatrayavyavasthā. sūtrapiṭako vinayapiṭako 'bhidharmapiṭaka iti. sūtre 'pi hy abhidharmapiṭakaḥ paṭhyate. traipiṭako bhikṣur iti naiṣa doṣaḥ. sūtraviśeṣā eva hy
T07yabhkvyu:227: arthaviniścayādayo 'bhidharmasaṃjñāḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 12) yeṣu dharmalakṣaṇaṃ varṇyate. etadāśaṅkānivṛttyartham āhuḥ. sa tu prakīrṇa ukto bhagavateti vistaraḥ. yathā sthaviraharmatrātena udānā
T07yabhkvyu:228: anityā bata saṃskārā ityevamādikā vineyavaśāt tatratatra sūtra uktā vargīkṛtā ekasthīkṛtāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:230: bhagavatoktaḥ [Tib. 9b] sthavirakātyāyanīputraprabhṛtibhir jñānaprasthānādiṣu piṇḍīkṛtya sthāpita iti āhur vaibhāṣikāḥ. vibhāṣayā dīvyanti caranti vā vaibhāṣikāḥ. vibhāṣāṃ vā vidanti vaibhāṣikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:233: iti. saha āsravaiḥ sāsravāḥ. na santy āsravā eṣv iti anāsravāḥ. sāsravāś cānāsravāś ceti samāsaḥ. svasāmānyalakṣaṇadhāraṇād dharmaḥ. eṣa sarvadharmāṇāṃ samāsanirdeśa iti. etāvanto dharmā yad uta sāsravāś cānāsravāś ca. naitadvyatiriktā dharmāḥ santi. tasmād āha sarvadharmāṇām
T07yabhkvyu:234: iti. samāsanirdeśa iti saṃkṣepanirdeśaḥ. vistaranirdeśas tu paścād ā śāstraparisamāpter bhaviṣyati anye 'pi samāsanirdeśāḥ santi. saṃskṛtā asaṃskṛtā rūpyarūpiṇaḥ sanidarśanānidarśanā ityevamādayaḥ. kimartham ayam eva samāsanirdeśa uktaḥ. kasminn ukte na paryanuyogaḥ. atha vā sāṃkleśikavyāvadānikapakṣapradarśanārthaṃ tadarthatvāc chāstrasya.
T07yabhkvyu:235: tatpakṣadvayāvabodho hi saṃkleśapakṣam apahāya vyavadānapakṣāsevanān niḥśreyasāvāptir bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:236: saṃskṛtā mārgavarjitāḥ sāsravā iti saṃskṛtā eva nāsaṃskṛtāḥ. hetupratyayajanitā rūpādayaḥ saṃskṛtāḥ. kiṃ
T07yabhkvyu:238: mārgavarjitāḥ mārgasatyena varjitāḥ. mārgasatyasya saṃskṛtatvāt prasaṅga ity ata evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:239: viśinaṣṭi. etad uktaṃ bvhavati. mārgasatyaṃ varjayitvā sarve saṃskṛtāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:240: [Tib. 10a] sāsravā iti. kathaṃ punas te sāsravāḥ. yady āsravasaṃprayogāt kliṣṭā eva cittacaittāḥ sāsravāḥ syuḥ. nānye. athāsravasahotpādād ekasyāṃ saṃtatau samudācaratkleśasya sattvasya yathāsaṃbhavaṃ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ sāsravāḥ syuḥ. nāsamudācaratkleśasya. nāpi bāhyā dharmāḥ. athāsravāṇāṃ ye āśrayāḥ. te sāsravā iti. ṣaḍ evāyatanāni ādhyātmikāni sāsravāṇi syuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:241: athāsravāṇām ālambanāni sāsravāṇi. nirodhamārgasatyam api sāsravaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:242: prāpnoti. ūrdhvā ca bhūmir ūrdhvabhūmyālambanair āsravaiḥ sāsravā syād ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:245: iti. tasmāt sāsravā iti pūrvam evādhyāhāryas tasmācchabdaḥ. anuśerata iti puṣṭiṃ labhanta ity arthaḥ. pratiṣṭhāṃ labhanta ity artho vā. puṣṭilābhe pratiṣṭhālābhe vā te rāgādayaḥ saṃtāyante. apare vyācakṣate. yathānuśete mamāyam āhāra iti pathyo 'nuguṇībhavatīty arthaḥ. tathā rāgādayo 'pi teṣu dharmeṣu anuśerate. anuguṇībhavantīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:247: karmajaṃ lokavaicitryam iti vacanāt. pratyayānuguṇyenānuśerate puṣṭiṃ labhanta ity anuśayāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:248: anuśerate anuguṇā vartante pratyayā eṣv iti vā [Tib. 10b] anuśayāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:249: anuśayanaṃ caiṣām ālambanataḥ saṃprayogato vā draṣṭavyaṃ. guṇamatis tv ācārya iha vyācaṣṭe. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ yat sarvadharmeṣv āsravāṇām ālambanībhavatsu saṃskṛtā eva mārgavarjitāḥ sāsravā ucyante iti.
T07yabhkvyu:250: sarvadharmāḥ sāsravāṇām ālambanam ity anabhidhārmikīyam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:251: ākāśapratisaṃkhyānirodhayor āsravānālambanatvāt. ṣaḍ eva hy anuśayā anāsravālambanāḥ paṭhyante. te ca nirodhamārgālambanā evā.
T07yabhkvyu:252: mithyādṛgvimatī tābhyāṃ yuktāvidyātha kevalā nirodhamārgadṛggheyāḥ ṣaḍ anāsravagocarā iti vacanāt. tasmān na sulikhitam etad iti paśyāmaḥ. kāmam iti yady apīty
T07yabhkvyu:253: arthaḥ. atha vā kāmam iti nipāto 'bhyupagamārthaḥ. abhyupagamyata eva nirodhamārgasatyālambanā api āsravā upajāyanta ity arthaḥ. tatra
T07yabhkvyu:255: nānāsravordhvaviṣayā asvīkārād vipakṣata ity atra. yad dhi vastv ātmadṛṣṭitṛṣṇābhyāṃ svīkṛtaṃ bhavati. tatrānye 'py
T07yabhkvyu:256: anuśayā anuśayitum utsahante. ārdra iva paṭe rajāṃsi saṃsthātuṃ. na caivam anāsravam. nāpy ūrdhvā bhūmiḥ. ato na tadālambanās teṣv anuśerate.
T07yabhkvyu:257: vipakṣabhūtau ca nirvāṇamārgau tadālambanānāṃ kleśānām. ūrdhvā ca bhūmir
T07yabhkvyu:258: adharāṇām. ato 'pi na teṣu pratiṣṭhāṃ labhante. tapta ivopale talāni
T07yabhkvyu:261: ity arthāpattisiddhatvāt na sūtrayitavyam etad iti evaṃ codye ācāryaguṇamatis tāvad āha. vaktavyam evedaṃ. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. dvividho hi mārgo laukiko lokottaraś ca. ato viśeṣārthaṃ punar abhidhīyate. ata eva cātra mārgasatyagrahaṇam. (Abhidh-k-vy 14) prasiddhaṃ cārthāpattyā gamyate
T07yabhkvyu:262: nāprasiddhaṃ. aprasiddhaṃ cāsaṃskṛtam iti. apare vyācakṣate.
T07yabhkvyu:263: tṛtīyarāśyāśaṃkānivṛttyartham arthāpattisiddham apy etat punar ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:264: yathā hi tisro vedanā bhavanti. sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ceti. evaṃ dharmā api saṃbhāvyeran. sāsravā anāsravāḥ sāsravānāsravāś ceti. atha vā naiva sāsravā nānāsravaś ceti. tena ye 'rthāpattyā nirastāḥ. kiṃ te 'nāsravā eva utāho sāsravānāsravā eva. āhosvin nobhayatheti saṃdihyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:265: asti hi sāsravānāsravatvavikalpāvakāśaḥ. katham iti. vaibhāṣikaprakriyā tāvad
T07yabhkvyu:266: dvidhā sānuśayaṃ kliṣṭam akliṣṭam anuśāyakair iti vacanāt. ye cakṣurādayo bāhyā vā rūpādayo 'kliṣṭāḥ. te 'nuśayānair
T07yabhkvyu:267: evāsravaiḥ sāsravā nānanuśayānaiḥ. prahīṇais tair ananuśayānair āsravair na sāsravāḥ. aprahīṇais tv antataḥ parasaṃtānagatair api sāsravā [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:268: 11b] eveti. dārṣṭāntikaprakriyayāpi ca cakṣurādayo arhatsaṃtānagatā bāhyāś ca rūpādayo anāsravāḥ. āsravāṇām anāśrayatvāt. sāsravāś ca te āsravāṇām apratipakṣatvād iti. pāryāyikaṃ sāsravānāsravatvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ kalpyata iti saṃdehaḥ. tatsaṃdehavinivṛttyartham idam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:270: iti. niṣparyāyam anāsravā evāmī na sāsravā yathoktam iti punarvacanam. te tarhy arhaccakṣurādayo vaibhāṣikaiḥ kva pakṣe nikṣeptavyāḥ. kiṃ sāsravapakṣe athānāsravapakṣe iti. sāsravapakṣa iti ta āhuḥ kathaṃ prahīṇair āsravais te sāsravā vyavasthāpyante. yeṣv āsravā anuśerate
T07yabhkvyu:271: anuśayitavanto anuśayiṣyante vā. te sāsravāḥ. traikālikārthavivakṣayāpi hi loke vartamānākāle prayogo dṛśyate. yaḥ prajā rakṣati. sa rājeti. yo 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:272: rakṣitavān yo 'pi rakṣiṣyati. sa cāpi rājeti gamyata eveti. ata evaṃ vyākhyāyate. atha vā yady api te prahīṇair āsravair na sāsravāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:273: aprahīṇais tu aparimitair āsravair antataḥ parasaṃtānagatair api sāsravā eva bhavanti. nanu ca samāsanirdeśād eva sāsravānāsravā dharmā
T07yabhkvyu:275: sāsravāś cānāsravāś ca sāsravānāsravāś ceti. sāsravānāsravā iti ekaśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:276: asarūpāṇām apy ekaśeṣa iṣyate. guṇo yaṅlukor iti yathā. apare punar āhuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:277: arthāpattyā siddham evaitat. spaṣṭīkaraṇārthaṃ tu prapaṃca ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:278: tadyathā viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa bahulam ity anenaiva sarvasiddham.
T07yabhkvyu:279: pūrvakālaikasarvajaratpurāṇanavakevalāḥ samānādhikaraṇenetyevamādiprapaṃca ucyate. tadvad (Abhidh-k-vy 15) etat. katamaṃ trividham asaṃskṛtam ity apratītatvāt pṛcchati. trividhagrahaṇaṃ iyattāvadhāraṇārtham. santi hi kecid ekam evāsaṃskṛtaṃ nirvāṇam ity āhur yathā vātsīputrīyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:280: paramāṇvādayo bahavo asaṃskṛtā iti vaiśesikāḥ. tanmatapratiṣedhārtham
T07yabhkvyu:281: iyattāvadhāraṇam. katamau dvāv iti. pratisaṃkhyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhāv eva pṛcchati. nākāśam. ākāśasya loke prasiddhatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:282: tatrākāśam anāvṛtir iti tatreti nirdhāraṇe. vākyopanyāse vā. avakāśaṃ dadātīti ākāśam iti
T07yabhkvyu:283: nirvacanam. bhṛśam asyāntaḥ kāśante bhāvā ity ākāśam ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:285: anāvaraṇam. kartṛsādhanaṃ karmasādhanaṃ vā. yo dharmo 'nyān dharmān nāvṛṇoti anyair vā nāvriyate. tad anāvaraṇasvabhāvaṃ ākāśam. tad apratyakṣaviṣayatvāt anyadharmānāvṛtyā anumīyate. na tv āvaraṇābhāvamātram. ata eva ca vyākhyāyate. yatra rūpasya gatir iti. yadi yan nāvṛṇoti nāvriyate vā. tad ākāśam. apratighā api cittādayaḥ saṃskārās tathaiveti [Tib. 12b] ākāśaṃ prāpnuvanti. na prāpnuvanti. pareṣām
T07yabhkvyu:286: āvaraṇabhāvāt. ṛddhimanto hi cittacaittabalena pareṣāṃ gatiṃ cittādīnāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:287: vibadhnanti. pratisaṃkhyā-apratisaṃkhyānirodhau tarhi avibandhakatvād ākāśaṃ prāpnutaḥ. na. tayoḥ saṃyogadravyānutpattidharmāṇāṃ saṃyogaprāptiniyatarodhabhūtatvena utpattivighnarodhabhūtatvena cāvaraṇabhūtatvāt. atha vā yasyānāvaraṇam eva lakṣaṇaṃ nānyal lakṣaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:288: tad ākāśaṃ. tayoś cānyalakṣaṇam astīti na tau nirodhāv ākāśaṃ prāpnutaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:289: asarvagataṃ tarhy ākāśaṃ anityaṃ vā prāpnoti. āvaraṇābhāve bhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:290: tadbhāve cābhāvāt. kuḍyādiṣu hy anyasya rūpasyāvaraṇaṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:291: atrākāśalakṣaṇābhāvāt ākāśabhāvaprasaṃgaḥ. kuḍyādyapagame ca punas tad bhavatīti anityaṃ prāpnoti. nānityaṃ prāpnoti. tatrāpi kuḍyādyavakāśadānād ākāśam asty eva. yadi hi tatrākāśaṃ na syāt tasyaiva kuḍyāder anavakāśatvād avasthānaṃ na syāt. yat tu tatra rūpāntarasyānavasthānam.
T07yabhkvyu:292: tat kuḍyādyāvaraṇān nākāśābhāvāt. uktaṃ hi bhagavatā. pṛthivī bho gautama
T07yabhkvyu:293: kutra pratiṣṭhitā. pṛthivī brāhmaṇa apmaṇḍale pratiṣṭhitā. apmaṇḍalaṃ bho gautama kva pratiṣṭhitaṃ. vāyau pratiṣṭhitam. vāyur bho gautama kva
T07yabhkvyu:294: pratiṣṭhitaḥ. ākāśe pratiṣṭhitaḥ. ākāśaṃ bho gautama kutra pratiṣṭhitam.
T07yabhkvyu:295: atisarasi mahābrāhmaṇātisarasi mahābrāhmaṇa. ākāśaṃ brāhmaṇāpratiṣṭhitaṃ anālambanam iti vistaraḥ. tasmād asty ākāśam iti vaibhāṣikāḥ. 5.
T07yabhkvyu:298: ca vyudastau bhavataḥ. na hi visaṃyogalakṣaṇau tau nirodhau. visaṃyuktir visaṃyogaḥ kleśavisaṃyuktilakṣaṇaḥ. saṃyogaprāptiniyatarodhabhūto vā yo
T07yabhkvyu:299: dharmaḥ. sa pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ. duḥkḥādīnām āryasatyānām iti
T07yabhkvyu:304: śākapārthivādīnām upasaṃkhyānam. śākapriyāḥ pārthivāḥ śākapārthivā itīṣṭyā
T07yabhkvyu:305: madhyapadalopaḥ. yadi pratisaṃkhyā anāsravaiva prajñā gṛhyeta laukikamārgaprāpyo nirodho na gṛhīta ity avyāpilakṣaṇaṃ prāpnoti. nāvyāpi.
T07yabhkvyu:306: sarvo hi traidhātukasāsravavastunirodho 'nāsravayā prāpyate. na sa nirodho
T07yabhkvyu:307: 'sti. yo laukikyaiva prajñayā prāpyate nānāsravayeti. kiṃ laukikyā prajñayā prayojanam. yo hi laukikena mārgeṇa kaścin nirodhaḥ prāpyate. sa eva punar lokottareṇa prāpyata eveti. lokottaraiva prajñā tatra na
T07yabhkvyu:310: pṛthakpṛthag iti nānety arthaḥ. yāvanti hi saṃyogadravyāṇīti. saṃyuktiḥ saṃyogaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:311: saṃyogāya dravyāṇi saṃyogadravyāṇi. saṃprayujyante teṣv iti vā saṃyogāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:312: saṃyogāś ca te dravyāṇi ceti saṃyogadravyāṇi. sāsravadravyāṇīti yāvad uktaṃ bhavati. sāsravaṃ hi dravyaṃ stambhasthānīyaṃ saṃprayojanaṃ rajjusthānīyaṃ pudgalas tu balīvardasthānīya iti bhagavatoktam. anyatheti yady eka ity arthaḥ. sarvakleśanirodhasākṣātkriyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:315: śeṣakleśasamudayādidarśanabhāvanāprahātavyātmakapratipakṣamārgotpādanaṃ niṣprayojanam ity arthaḥ. yat tarhy uktaṃ asabhāgo nirodha iti. kvoktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:316: sūtre. pūrvabhartrā viśākhena gṛhapatinā pṛṣṭayā harmadinnayā bhikṣuṇyoktaṃ. kiṃ sabhāga ārye nirodhaḥ. asabhāga āyuṣman viśākheti.
T07yabhkvyu:317: apratisadṛśo nirodha ity artham abhisamīkṣya pṛcchati. asya ko 'rtha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:318: bahutve hi sati pratisadṛśo 'nyo bhaved iti parasyabhiprāyaḥ. nāsya kaścit sabhāgahetur iti. sabhāgahetuḥ sabhāga ity eko 'rtho hetuśabdalopāt.
T07yabhkvyu:319: dṛśyante hi padeṣu padaikadeśān prayuṃjānā vākyeṣu ca vākyaikadeśān.
T07yabhkvyu:320: tadyathā satyabhāmā (Abhidh-k-vy 17) bhāmā evadatto attaḥ praviśa piṇḍīṃ praviśa tarpaṇam [Tib. 14a] iti. nityaḥ khalu pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ. tasya kiṃ sabhāgahetunā prayojanam iti. asabhāgahetur asabhāgaḥ. nāsti sabhāgo 'syeti asabhāgo bahuvrīhisamāsaḥ. nāsau kasyacid iti. nāsau pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ kasyacid anyasya dharmasya sabhāgahetur iti
T07yabhkvyu:321: adhikṛtam. kiṃ kāraṇam. saṃskṛta eveti sabhāgahetur iṣyate. tatra na sabhāgo asabhāga iti tatpuruṣaḥ. na tu nāsya kaścid sabhāgo 'stīti. na tv asya nirodhasya kaścid anyo nirodhaḥ sadṛśo na bhavatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:323: anāgatānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ utpādasyātyantaṃ vighnaḥ atyantavighnaḥ atyantaniyatarodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:324: anya iti apratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ. sa hi pratisaṃkhyānirodhāt anantaroktāt anyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:326: prasajyapratiṣedhe ayam akāraḥ. na pratisaṃkhyayā prāpya ity arthaḥ. atha vā paryudāse. pratisaṃkhyāyā yad anyat pratyayavaikalyam. sāpratisaṃkhyā.
T07yabhkvyu:327: tayā prāpyo nirodho 'pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ. madhyapadalopāt. ayuktam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:328: pratyayavaikalyaṃ hy abhāvaḥ. katham abhāvena sa nirodhaḥ prāpyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:329: aupacārikatvād adoṣaḥ. atha vāpratisaṃkhyānirodha iti na
T07yabhkvyu:330: pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ. apratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhād anyatvamātram evocyate. na tu pratyayavaikalyasya vyāpāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:331: utpādagrahaṇam anityatānirodhavyudāsārthaṃ. [Tib. 14b] anityatānirodho dharmasthiter atyantavighno na dharmotpādasya. atyantagrahaṇaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:333: cittacaittānām utpādavighnaḥ. na tv atyantaṃ tāvatkālikatvāt
T07yabhkvyu:335: udāharaṇakathanaṃ. yathaikasmin nīlarūpe vyāsaktaṃ cakṣur manaś ca yasya.
T07yabhkvyu:336: sa ekarūpavyāsaktacakṣurmanāḥ. tasya. yāni rūpāntarāṇi gṛhyamāṇāt nīlād anyāni nīlāntarapītalohitāvadātādīni varṇarūpāṇi saṃsthānarūpāṇi ca
T07yabhkvyu:337: śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyāni ca sarvāṇi atyayante pratyutpannam adhvānaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:338: atikrāmanti. atītam adhvānaṃ pratipadyanta ity arthaḥ. tadālambanair iti.
T07yabhkvyu:339: tāni nīlantarādīni anantaroktāni ālambanāni eṣāṃ. te tadālambanāh. ke.
T07yabhkvyu:340: paṃca vijñānakāyāḥ. taiḥ. na ṣakyam utpattum iti bhāvasādhanam etat. na hi te samarthā iti vistaraḥ. na hi te paṃca vijñānakāyā atītaṃ viṣayaṃ svālambanam api śaktā grahītuṃ. vartamānālambanatvāt paṃcānāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ. athānyad idānīṃ nīlantarādikaṃ vartamānam (Abhidh-k-vy 18)
T07yabhkvyu:341: ālambya kasmān notpadyante. na śakyam evaṃ bhavituṃ. sarvadharmāṇāṃ catuṣke niyatatvāt. hetau phala āśraya ālambane ceti. yasya vijñānasya yad
T07yabhkvyu:342: ālambanaṃ. tad eva [Tib. 15a] tasyālambanaṃ bhavet. bhaven nānyad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:343: ālmbanapratyayavaikalyāt te paṃca vijñānakāyā na punar utpadyante. ata
T07yabhkvyu:344: āha. sa teṣāṃ apratisaṃkhyānirodha iti vistaraḥ. teṣāṃ paṃcānāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ pratyayavaikalyāt prāpyate ālambanapratyayavaikalyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:345: caturbhir eva hi pratyayair hetusamanantarālambanādhipatipratyayaiś cittacaittā utpadyamānā utpadyante. teṣām anyataravaikalye 'pi anutpattiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:346: samanantarapratyayavaikalyād ity apare. samanantarapratyayo hi tadānīṃ
T07yabhkvyu:347: cittacaittalakṣaṇa ekasyaiva tasya nīlavijñānasya utpattāv avakāśaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:349: udāharaṇamātraṃ caitat. evaṃ kṣāntilābhyādīnāṃ paṃcānām api āpāyikānāṃ anāgatānāṃ skandhānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:351: apratisaṃkhyānirodham eva cābhisaṃdhāya srotaāpannaṃ pudgalam adhikṛtyoktaṃ bhagavatā niruddhā asya narakās tiryaṃcaḥ pretā iti. tad evaṃjātīyakānāṃ anāgatānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratyayavaikalyāt. pratisaṃkhyām antareṇa utpādasya niyatarodhabhūto yo dharmaḥ. so 'pratisaṃkhyānirodha
T07yabhkvyu:352: ity ucyate. na hi pratyayavaikalyamātrād atyantaṃ tadanutpattir upapadyate. punas tajjātīyapratyayasāṃnidhye tadutpattiprasaṃgāt. ko hi tadā tadutpattau vibandhaḥ syād iti vaibhāṣikāḥ. [Tib. 15b] catuṣkoṭikaṃ cātreti vistaraḥ. atra pratisaṃkhyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhalakṣaṇanirdeśe catuṣkoṭikaṃ catuṣprakāraṃ praśnavisarjanaṃ. kim arthaṃ. vyutpādanārthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:353: tadyathātītapratyutpannotpattidharmāṇāṃ sāsravāṇāṃ iti. sāsravatvāt pratisaṃkhyānirodha eva labhyate. atītapratyutpannānām utpādasya kṛtatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:357: atyantavighnitotpādatvād eṣām anutpattidharmatvaṃ. ataś ca teṣām
T07yabhkvyu:358: apratisaṃkhyānirodho labhyate. tadyathā ṣaḍbhūmikānām anāgamyadhyānāntaradhyānabhūmikānāṃ śraddhānusārimārgāṇām ekasmiṃ
T07yabhkvyu:359: saṃmukhībhūte śeṣāṇāṃ paṃcānām apratisaṃkhyānirodho labhyate. na tu pratisaṃkhyānirodho 'nāsravatvāt. na hi nirdoṣaṃ prahāṇārhaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:363: 'nutpattidharmakaṃ. atas tatprasaṃgo mā bhūd iti tad viśeṣaṇaṃ. keṣāṃcid
T07yabhkvyu:364: (Abhidh-k-vy 19) evaṃ pāṭhaḥ. tadyathā anutpattidharmāṇām anāsravāṇām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:365: teṣāṃ katham asaṃskṛtānāṃ grahaṇaprasaṃgo na bhavati. yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodho 'pratisaṃkhyānirodhaś ca saṃbhavati. teṣām adhikāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:366: na cāsaṃskṛtānāṃ tau nirodhau saṃbhavataḥ. utpādātyantavighno hy apratisaṃkhyānirodho na cāsaṃskṛtānām utpādo 'sti. kiṃ canutpattidharmāṇām iti paryudāsena nañsamāsaḥ. utpattidharmebhyo ye 'nye tatsadṛśā dharmāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:367: te 'nutpattidharmāṇaḥ. ke ca tatsadṛśāḥ. saṃskṛtā eva nāsaṃskṛtā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:368: aprasaṃgo 'saṃskṛtānām iti bruvate. santi yeṣām ubhayam iti pratisaṃkhyānirodhaś ca apratisaṃkhyānirodhaś ca. tadyathā sāsravāṇām iti
T07yabhkvyu:370: anutpattidharmatvād apratisaṃkhyānirodho 'pi prāpyate. yadā tadānayoḥ prāptir abhiprīyate nāvaśyam anayor yugapatprāptir bhavati. keṣāṃcid dhi pūrvaṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ prāpyate. paścād apratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:371: tadyathārhata ekarūpavyāsaktacakṣurmanasas tadanyarūpādyālambanānāṃ paṃcānāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ. keṣāṃcit pūrvam apratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ prāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:373: 16b] keṣāṃcid yugapat. tadyathā dṛṣṭiprāptasyādhimātrādhimātrakleṣapratipakṣodaye teṣāṃ adhimātrāṇām anāgatānāṃ kleśānāṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaś cāpratisaṃkhyānirodhaś ca yugapat
T07yabhkvyu:374: prāpyate. evam anyeṣām api saṃbhavato yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:375: tadyathātītapratyutpannotpattidharmaṇāṃ anāsravāṇām iti. atītādīnām eṣām utpādasya vighnayitum aśakyatvāt apratisaṃkhyānirodho na labhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:376: anāsravatvāc caiṣāṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodho 'pi na labhyate. asaṃskṛtānāṃ tūtpādābhāvāt nāpratisaṃkhyānirodho 'sti. utpādātyantavighno hi apratisaṃkhyānirodha ity uktaṃ prāk. anāsravatvāc ca pratisaṃkhyānirodho
T07yabhkvyu:378: (I.7) evam asaṃskṛtasyālpavaktavyatvāt purastāt tatpraśnān parisamāpayya saṃskṛtān nirdeṣṭukāma upodghātam utthāpayati.
T07yabhkvyu:382: punaḥśabdaḥ prabhedāntarapradarśanārtha uktaḥ pūrvaprabhedaḥ sāsravānāsravā iti. ayaṃ tu punaḥprabheda
T07yabhkvyu:386: iti. tacchabdaḥ pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣaḥ. ke ca pūrvaprakṛtāḥ. avarjitāś ca ye
T07yabhkvyu:387: sāsravāḥ. varjitāś ca ye mārgasatyasvabhāvāḥ. ubhaye 'py apekṣitāḥ. kathaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:389: ye sāsravā upādānaskandhās ta iti anāsravebhyaḥ sāsravaniṣkarṣavacanāt. yad
T07yabhkvyu:391: vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇaṃ. te 'mī saṃskṛtā draṣṭavyāḥ. anyonyam eṣāṃ saṃgrahaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:392: rūpādigrahaṇaṃ śīlādiskandhanirāsārthaṃ. anye 'pi hi paṃca skandhās santi.
T07yabhkvyu:393: śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandhaḥ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaś ceti. skandhagrahaṇaṃ rūpādiviṣayanirāsārthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:394: sametya saṃbhūyeti paryāyāv etau. atha vā sametya samāgamyānyonyam apekṣyety arthaḥ. saṃbhūya saṃjanyety evaṃ saṃśabdasyārthaṃ darśayati. na hy ekapratyayajanitam iti. sarvālpapratyayatve 'pi avaśyaṃ dvau pratyayau
T07yabhkvyu:396: caturbhiś cittacaittā hi samāpattidvayaṃ tribhiḥ dvābhyām anye tu jāyanta iti vacanāt. dugdhavad iti. saṃskṛtaśabdasya niṣṭḥāntatvāt niṣṭhāntaśabdenaiva dṛṣṭāntaṃ darśayati. dugdhavad iti dugdhaṃ nāma
T07yabhkvyu:397: kṣīraṃ. yat stanān niṣkāsitaṃ tad dugdham iti nyāyyaṃ. yat tu niṣkāsiṣyate. yac ca naiva niṣkāsiṣyate dhenustham eva vartate. tad dugdham iti na prāptaṃ. ucyate ca loke dugdham iti. evam ihāpi ye
T07yabhkvyu:398: saṃskariṣyante utpattidharmāṇo 'nāgatā ye 'pi na saṃskariṣyante anutpattidharmāṇaḥ. te 'pi saṃskṛtā ity ucyante. tajjātīyatvāt
T07yabhkvyu:402: sūtravyākhyānam iti sūtroktānām api adhvādīnāṃ skandhaparyāyarūpāṇāṃ iha vacanaṃ gatagacchadgamiṣyadbhāvād iti. lokaprasiddham adhvānam apekṣyāyam
T07yabhkvyu:403: adhvā vyākhyātaḥ. tathā hi loke kathyate. ayam adhvā grāmaṃ gato 'yam
T07yabhkvyu:404: adhvā gacchati ayam adhvā gamiṣyatīti. evam ihāpi gato 'dhvā yo 'tītaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:405: gacchati yo vartamānaḥ gamiṣyati yo 'nāgata iti. adyante 'nityatayeti
T07yabhkvyu:406: vādhvāna ity adhikṛtaṃ. nairuktaṃ vidhānam apekṣyāyam artho darśitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:408: anityatayā bhakṣyanta iti adhvāna iti saṃskṛtā evādhvaśabdena bhagavatā deśitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:409: kathāvastu śabdenāpi ta eva saṃskṛtā bhagavatā deśitāḥ. trīṇīmāni bhikṣavaḥ kathāvastūni acaturthāny apaṃcamāni yāny āśrityāryāḥ kathāṃ kathayantaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:410: kathayanti. katamāni trīṇi. atītaṃ kathāvastu anāgataṃ kathāvastu pratyutpannam iti. kathā vākyam iti vistaraḥ. kathā vākyaṃ varṇātmakaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:411: śabda ity arthaḥ. tasyā vastu nāmaviṣaya ity arthaḥ. nāmnā punar artho
T07yabhkvyu:412: 'bhidheyaḥ. tathā hi vakṣyati. vāṇ nāmni pravartate. nāmārthaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:413: dyotayatīti. yadi nāmaiva kathāvastu nāma ca saṃskāraskandhaikadeśa eveti kathaṃ kṛtvā kathāvastuśabdena saṃskṛtā evoktā ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:414: sārthakavastugrahaṇāt tu saṃskṛtaṃ kathāvastūcyate iti. anyathā hīti vistaraḥ. yadi sārthakaṃ vastu na gṛhyeta prakaraṇagrantho virudhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:415: kathāvastūny [Tib. 18a] aṣṭādaśabhir dhātubhiḥ saṃgṛhītānīti. kayā punar yuktyā sārthakaṃ vastu gṛhyate. dvividhaḥ kathāyā viṣayaḥ. sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa ca. sākṣādviṣayo nāma. pāramparyeṇārthaḥ. sa hi svaviṣayabhūtasya nāmno viṣaya iti. atas tasyāpi viṣayo vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:416: asaṃskṛtaṃ kasmān na kathāvastutvenoktaṃ. adhvapatitasya nāmno 'nadhvapatitena sahārthāyogāt. viṣayo hetur iti vā arthadvayavācakavastuśabdaparigrahād vā. yad dhi kathāyā viṣayo hetupratyayaś ca bhavati. tat kathāvastu. asaṃskṛtaṃ tu na hetupratyayaḥ kathāyā iti na kathāvastu. atha vā atītādīnāṃ saṃskṛtānām
T07yabhkvyu:417: atibahurūpatvenākhyānakaraṇayogyatvāt. evaṃ caivaṃ ca īpaṃkaras tathāgato 'bhūt. evaṃ caivaṃ ca maitreyas tathāgato bhaviṣyati. evaṃ caivaṃ ca rājā kapphiṇo bhavatīty ataḥ saṃskṛtā eva kathāvastutvenoktā nāsaṃskṛtāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:418: sarvasya saṃskṛtasya nirvāṇam iti nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇaṃ. yady evaṃ sāsravasya tad astīti bhavati sāsravasya sanissāratvayogaḥ. mārgasatyasya tu kathaṃ. kolopamaṃ dharmaparyāyam ājānadbhir dharmā api prahātavyāḥ prāg evādharmā iti mārgasatyasyāpi niḥsaraṇaṃ kalpata eveti. sarva eva saṃskṛtāḥ saniḥsārā bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:420: iti. vasanty asmin prāk kāryāṇi paścāt tata utpattir iti. vastu hetur ity
T07yabhkvyu:421: arthaḥ. sa eṣām astīti savastukāḥ. pravacane hi vastuśabdaḥ paṃcasv artheṣu dṛśyate. svabhāve [Tib. 18b] ālambane saṃyojanīye hetau parigrahe
T07yabhkvyu:422: ca. svabhāve tāvat. yad vastu pratilabdhaṃ. samanvāgataḥ sa tena vastuneti tena svabhāveneti gamyate (Abhidh-k-vy 22). ālambane. jñeyā dharmāḥ katame. āha. sarvadharmā jñānena jñeyā yathāvastu yathālambanam ity
T07yabhkvyu:423: arthaḥ. saṃyojanīye. yasmiṃ vastuni anunayasaṃyojanena saṃyuktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:424: pratighasaṃyojanenāpi tasminn iti. hetau. savastukā dharmāḥ katame.
T07yabhkvyu:426: kṣetravastugṛhavastu-āpaṇavastudhanavastuparigrahaṃ prahāya tataḥ prativirato bhavatīti. iha hetau vastuśabdo veditavyaḥ hetuvacanaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:427: kileti. kilaśabdaḥ paramataṃ darśayati. svamataṃ tv asya lakṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:428: savastukāḥ sasvabhāvāḥ saṃskṛtāḥ. asaṃskṛtās tv avastukāḥ prajñaptisattvād
T07yabhkvyu:430: (I.8) ta eva punaḥ saṃskṛtā iti. ye sāsravā anāsravāḥ pūrvam uktā iti
T07yabhkvyu:433: iti. teṣām ity atrāhāryaṃ. kiṃ siddham iti. yad arthāpannaṃ. tad
T07yabhkvyu:434: vicārayati. upādānaskandhādayaḥ sūtreṣūktāḥ. teneha te vyākhyāyante. sarvo
T07yabhkvyu:435: 'bhidharmaḥ sūtrārtha iti vistareṇa uktam etat. tatsaṃbhūtatuād upādānaskandhā iti. upādānasaṃbhūtāḥ skandhā upādānaskandhāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:437: tuṣasaṃbhūto 'gnis tuṣāgnir iti. upādānānāṃ skandhā upādānaskandhā iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsenaiva madhyapadalopam akṛtvā anye sādhayanti. evaṃ ca nidarśayanti. yathā tṛṇānām agnis tṛṇāgnir iti yuktaṃ. ye
T07yabhkvyu:439: bāhyās tu bhāvāḥ katham upādānaskandhāḥ. te 'py upādānanirvṛttāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:440: karmajaṃ lokavaicitryam iti siddhāntāt. tadvidheyatvād vā rājapuruṣavad iti. yathā rājño vidheyaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:441: puruṣo rājapuruṣaḥ. evam upādānāṃ vidheyāḥ skandhāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:443: arthakathanamātram etat. padāni tv evaṃ vaktavyāni. upādānāṃ saṃbhavā hetavo vā skandhā upādānaskandhāḥ puṣpaphalavṛkṣavat. yathā puṣpāṇāṃ phalānāṃ vā saṃbhavo hetur vā vṛkṣaḥ. puṣpavṛkṣaḥ phalavṛkṣa iti vā.
T07yabhkvyu:445: tebhyo 'pi pārasāṃtānikāni upādānāni saṃbhavantīti aviruddham eṣām upādānaskandhatvaṃ. raṇā hi kleśāḥ ātmaparavyābādhanād iti. ye hy ātmānaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:446: parāṃś ca vyābādhante. te raṇā yuddhānīty arthaḥ. tathaiva ca kleśā [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:447: 19b] iti raṇā ucyante. tadanuśayitatvād iti. tair anuśayitā upasevitā ity
T07yabhkvyu:448: arthaḥ. atha vā (Abhidh-k-vy 23) 'nuśayinaḥ kṛtāḥ tair anuśayitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:449: tadbhāvas tadanuśayitatvaṃ. tasmāt. tadanuśayitatvāt. atha vā teṣām
T07yabhkvyu:450: anuśayitatvaṃ. tasmāt. saraṇāḥ sāsravavat. sāsravatve yad vyākhyānaṃ. tad evāsya vaktavyaṃ. āryāṇāṃ pratikūlatvāt duḥkham iti. saṃskāraduḥkhatayā āryāṇāṃ tat pratikūlaṃ. samudety asmād duḥkham iti samudaya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:451: hetubhūtāḥ skandhāḥ samudayaḥ. phalabhūtāḥ skandhā duḥkham iti varṇayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:452: lujyata iti loka iti. asminn eva rohitāśva vyāmamātre kalevare lokaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:453: prajñapayāmi lokasamudayaṃ ceti sūtraṃ. lujyate pralujyate tasmāl loka iti ca bhagavataivoktaṃ. lujyate vinaśyatīty arthaḥ. lujir iha gṛhīto na
T07yabhkvyu:454: lokaḥ. nairuktena tu vidhānena gakārasya sthāne kakāraḥ kṛtaḥ. tasmāl loka iti bhavati. dṛṣṭir asmiṃs tiṣṭhatīti. ye kecid bhikṣava ātmata ātmīyataś ca samanupaśyanti. ta imān eva paṃcopādānaskandhān ātmata ātmīyataś ca samanupaśyantīti vacanād upādānaskandhā dṛṣṭisthānaṃ bhavatīti. bhava iti sāsravā eva dharmāḥ bhavaśabdenoktāḥ. bhavaḥ katamaḥ. paṃcopādānaskandhā iti vacanād. ete ca duḥkhādayaḥ śabdā mārgasatye 'pi prasajyante.
T07yabhkvyu:456: samanantarapratyayādibhāvena cāsmāt sāsravaṃ vastu samudeti. lujyate ca.
T07yabhkvyu:457: dṛṣṭiś ca tad ālambate. bhavati ca tad utpadyate ity arthaḥ. naiṣa doṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:458: rūḍhiṃ hy apekṣate śabdapravṛttiḥ. ye dharmāḥ saṃskāraduḥkhatayā āryānām pratikūlā duḥkhā virodhinaḥ tadutpādakāḥ prasiddhāḥ dṛṣṭipuṣṭijanakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:459: anādimati ca saṃsāre vinaśyanti bhavanti. teṣv evāmī duḥkhādaya āryaiḥ saṃketitā na mārgasatye. tasmāt sāsravā eva dharmā duḥkhaśabdādyabhidheyā bhavanti nānāsravāḥ. na hi gacchatīti gaur ity ukte sarvo gantā gaur ity
T07yabhkvyu:460: ucyate. tasmāt sūktaṃ duḥkhaṃ samudaya ityevamādi. 8.
T07yabhkvyu:464: arthā viṣayāḥ aryante jñāyanta ity arthaḥ. punaḥ paṃceti
T07yabhkvyu:467: iti. tacchabdo 'rthān apekṣate. teṣv artheṣu teṣāṃ vā vijñānāni tadvijñānāni. (Abhidh-k-vy 24) teṣām āśrayās tadvijñānāśrayāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:469: iti. rūpāṇi ca tāni prasādāś ca ta iti rūpaprasādāḥ. anena viśeṣaṇena manaindriyaṃ nirastaṃ bhavati. mano 'pi hi tadvijñānāśrayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:470: paṃcānāṃ sahajāś ca tair iti siddhāntāt. [anuśayitās te.] na tu mano rūpasvabhāvam ity ato
T07yabhkvyu:472: tadvijñānāśrayā ity anena viśeṣaṇena śraddhāyā aprasaṃga iti cet. na.
T07yabhkvyu:474: nivartate. na hi rūpamayo 'sti prasādo yasya tadvijñānāny āśrayatvena
T07yabhkvyu:475: kalperan. prasādagrahaṇaṃ punar indriyagrāhyavastuvyatiriktarūpaprasādaviśeṣajñāpanārthaṃ. vaibhāṣikā hi bruvate. bhūtavikāraviśeṣā evendriyāṇīti. pravacane tu naivaṃ. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:476: rūpādiviṣayavyatiriktāni acchāni atīndriyāṇi svavijñānānumeyāni indriyāṇi yeṣāṃ cakṣurādīni adhiṣṭhānāni dṛśyante.
T07yabhkvyu:477: tadvijñānāśrayā iti ca viśeṣaṇam anyonyalakṣaṇasāṃkaryanivṛttyarthaṃ. yadi hi rūpaprasādāś
T07yabhkvyu:478: cakṣurādaya ity etāvad avakṣyat. cakṣur api śrotrādi vā cakṣuḥ. yatas tv evaṃ viśeṣyate. rūpavijñānāśrayo yo rūpaprasādaḥ. tac cakṣur iti. ato lakṣaṇasāṃkaryaṃ na bhavati. na hi śrotram anyad vā indriyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:479: rūpavijñānasyāśrayaḥ. evaṃ yāvat spraṣṭavyavijñānāśrayo yo rūpaprasādaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:480: tat kāyendriyam iti vaktavyaṃ. yathoktaṃ bhagavateti. etad vyākhyānaṃ sūtrānugatam ity abhiprāyaḥ. katham iti. ādhyātmikam iti vijñānāśraya ity
T07yabhkvyu:481: arthaḥ. ātmaśabdo hi cittam ātmety upacaryata iti vakṣyate. ātmani adhi adhyātmam. adhyātmam eva ādhyātmikaṃ. [Tib. 21a] ātmani cittalakṣaṇe kartavye hetur ity ayam artha ādhyātmikaśabdenocyate. vijñānāśraya iti yāvad uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:482: atha vā yānīti vistaraḥ. atha vā tac-
T07yabhkvyu:483: chabdena indriyāṇy abhisaṃbadhyante. cakṣurvijñānaṃ śrotravijñānam ityevamādi pravacanaprasiddham etat. na tu rūpavijñānaṃ śabdavijñānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:484: loke tu kadācid evaṃ bhavet. tasmād idaṃ vyākhyānāntaram āśrīyate. tasmād
T07yabhkvyu:485: āha. evaṃ ca kṛtvā prakaraṇagrantho 'py anuvṛtta iti vistaraḥ. katham ihāsiddham asiddhena sādhyate. cakṣur eva hy asiddhaṃ. tadasiddhau cakṣurvijñānam apy asiddhaṃ. kathaṃ tat tena tadāśrayatayā sādhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:487: parasparaviśeṣopalakṣaṇārthaṃ tu vayam etaiś cakṣurādibhis tān viśeṣayanto
T07yabhkvyu:488: darśayāmaḥ. etad uktaṃ bhavati. etasya prathamasyaikasya svasaṃvedyasya
T07yabhkvyu:489: vjñānaviśeṣasya ya āśrayo rūpaprasādaḥ. tac cakṣurindriyaṃ. evaṃ yāvad etasya paṃcamasya svasaṃvedyasya vijñānaviśeṣasya ya āśrayo rūpaprasādaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:492: cakṣuṣo 'rtho varṇasaṃsthānabhedād dviḥprakāraḥ. lokapratītatvāt tasya svalakṣaṇaṃ anuktvā prabheda eva kathyate. varṇaś caturvidho nīlādir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:493: nīlalohitapītāvadātā varṇāḥ. tadbhedā anya iti abhrādayaḥ. apare
T07yabhkvyu:495: 21b] kākāṇḍavarṇādayo 'pi jāyante. na kevalam abhrādya iti. saṃsthānam
T07yabhkvyu:496: ākṛtiviśeṣaḥ. punas tad evāntargaṇikena bhedena bhidyate.
T07yabhkvyu:498: tadyathā nīlapītādi. saṃsthānam aṣṭavidhaṃ dīrghādivisātāntaṃ. śeṣo dvādaśavidho varṇa iti viṃśatidhā. nabhaś caikavarṇam iti. yad dūrato vaiḍūryabhittyākāraṃ dṛśyate. vṛttaṃ vartulaṃ. parimaṇḍalaṃ cakralaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:499: unnataṃ sthūlādirūpaṃ. avanataṃ nimnarūpaṃ. yatra rūpāṇāṃ darśanam iti vacanaṃ chāyāndhakārayor nānākaraṇapradarśanārthaṃ. na vipaṃcitaṃ na
T07yabhkvyu:501: idam iha vicāryate. yadi nīlādivarṇacatuṣṭayabhedā eva abhrādayo na tadvyatiriktā bhavanti. yatheha kākāṇḍādivarṇā noktāḥ. tathābhrādayo 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:502: na vaktavyā iti. naitad vyākhyānakārair vicāritaṃ. śakyaṃ tv evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:503: bhaṇituṃ. māyārūpasadṛśatvāt nīlādibhedabhūtā api te abhrādayaḥ pṛthag
T07yabhkvyu:504: uktāḥ. tathā hi te dūrato bhittaya iva lakṣyante abhyāsagamane tu na
T07yabhkvyu:505: dṛśyante. mā kasyacid evaṃ bhūt. naitat kiṃcid asti. vimatir vā. kim asty etat. uta bhrāntimātram iti. tadviparyāsasaṃśayanivṛttyartham ime abhrādaya uktāḥ. saṃty evāmī rūpāyatanasvabhāvā iti. dīrghādīnāṃ pradeśa iti. dīrghādivisātānta [Tib. 22a] pradeśa ity arthaḥ. kataro 'sau pradeśa ity āha. kāyavijñaptisvabhāva iti. kāyavijñaptir hi kadācid dīrghā kadācid dhrasvā kadācid yāvad visāteti. kīdṛśī punaḥ sāvagantavyā. tad ālambanacittasamutthāpitaṃ yat kāyakarma. akāyakarmasvabhāvaṃ tu dīrghādivisātāntaṃ nirastaṃ boddhavyaṃ. asty ubhayathā. pariśiṣṭam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:509: nīlapītalohitāvadātacchāyāndhakārāṇāṃ dīrghādisaṃsthānagrahaṇaṃ. tasmād eṣām api tṛtīyāyāṃ koṭyām antarbhāva ity abhiprāyaḥ. kathaṃ punar ekaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:510: dravyam ubhayathā vidyata iti. katham ekaṃ dravyaṃ varṇasaṃsthānātmakaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:511: bhavati. varṇarūpād dhi saṃsthānarūpaṃ dravyāntaram iti vaḥ siddhāntaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:512: ubhayasya tatra prajñānāt. varṇasaṃsthānasya tatra grahaṇāt. jñānārtho hy eṣa vidir na sattārtha iti. vida jñāna ity etasya dhātor lugvikaraṇasya
T07yabhkvyu:513: etad rūpaṃ vidyata iti. na tu vida sattāyām ity etasya dhātoḥ śyanvikaraṇasyaitad rūpam ity arthaḥ. jñānaṃ tatrobhayākāraṃ pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:514: na dravyaṃ ekam ubhayalakṣaṇam iti vaibhāṣikaparihāraḥ. kāyavijñaptāv api tarhi prasaṃga ity ācāryaḥ. na hi kāyavijñaptau gṛhyamānāyāṃ varṇagrahaṇaṃ na pravartate. vaibhāṣikāṇām ayam abhiprāyaḥ. nīlādigrahaṇam ātapālokagrahaṇaṃ vā saṃsthānanirapekṣaṃ pravartate. kāyavijñaptigrahaṇaṃ tu varṇanirapekṣaṃ. pariśiṣṭarūpāyatanagrahaṇaṃ [Tib. 22b] tu varṇasaṃsthānāpekṣaṃ pravartata iti. sautrāntikapākṣikas tu ayam ācāryo nainam arthaṃ prayacchati. na hi cākṣuṣam etat saṃsthānagrahaṇaṃ. mānasaṃ tv etat parikalpitaṃ. varṇasaṃniveśaviśeṣa eva hi saṃsthānaṃ. na saṃsthānaṃ nāma dravyaṃ kiṃcid asti. varṇāgrahaṇe saṃsthānagrahaṇābhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:516: sattvāsattvākhyaś ceti. vāgvijñaptiśabdas tadvyatiriktaś cety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:517: sattvāsattvasaṃkhyātaś ceti kecit paṭhanti. ayam eva ca ihārtho
T07yabhkvyu:518: 'bhipretaḥ. yadi hi sattvāsattvasaṃtānaja iti ayam artho 'bhipreto bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:520: vivaraṇaṃ niḥprayojanam eva. tasmāt sattvāsattvākhyaś ceti pāṭhaḥ sphuṭaḥ paṭhitavyaḥ. upāttamahābhūtahetuka iti. pratyutpannānīndriyāvinirbhāgāni bhūtāny upāttāni. anyāni anupāttāni. upāttāni mahābhūtāni hetur asyeti
T07yabhkvyu:521: upāttamahābhūtahetukaḥ. yathā hastavācchabda iti. yadi sattvasaṃtānaja ity
T07yabhkvyu:522: abhipretaḥ. bāhyo 'pi hi nirmito mānuṣākāro hastavācchabdaṃ kuryāt. sa cānupāttamahābhūtahetukasvabhāvo 'vagantavya indriyavinirbhāgavartitvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:523: sa ca mānuṣīm api vācaṃ nirmātṛvaśād bhāṣet. vakṣyati hy
T07yabhkvyu:526: tasya ca bāhyanirmitaśabdasya anupāttamahābhūtahetuka ity atra grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:529: sattvākhyo vāgvijñaptisabdo 'sattvākhyo 'nya iti. sattvam ācaṣṭe sattvākhyaḥ. vāgvijñaptiśabdena hi sattvo 'yam iti vijñāyate. taṃ vāgvijñaptiśabdaṃ varjayitvā anyaḥ śabdo hastaśabdo 'pi yāvad asattvākhya eva. kim aṃga asattvasaṃtānaja iti vyākhyātaṃ bhavati. tad evam upāttamahābhūtahetukaḥ sattvākhyaś cāsattvākhyaś ca bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:531: tasyaiva hastaśabdo vāyuvanaspatyādiśabdaś cāsattvākhya iti. caturvidhaḥ śabdo manojñāmanojñabhedāt punar aṣṭavidho bhavati. yathaiko varṇaparamāṇur iti. na bhūtacatuṣkadvayam upādāya vartate śadbaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:534: ṣaṇmūlajātim adhikṛtyaivam uktaṃ. rasaṣaṭkasya anyonyasamparkaviśeṣāt tv
T07yabhkvyu:537: sugandhadurgandhayoḥ samaviṣamagandhatvād iti. anutkaṭotkaṭagandhatvād ity arthaḥ. asmin pakṣe dvividho gandha iṣṭaḥ. trividhas tu śāstra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:538: samagaṃdho 'nyas tṛtīya ity arthaḥ. [Tib. 23b] apare punar vyācakṣate.
T07yabhkvyu:539: samagandha iti tayor evaikadeśa iti sa evārtho bhavati. śabdamātraṃ tu bhidyate.
T07yabhkvyu:540: śītam uṣmābhilāṣakṛd iti. saṃbhavaṃ praty evam ucyate. yo dharma uṣmābhilāṣaṃ kuryāt. tac chītaṃ nāmopādāyarūpaṃ. grīṣme yady api tan na kuryāt tajjātīyatvāt tu śītam eva tad avagantavyaṃ. kāraṇe kāryopacārād iti. attumicchā jighatsā caitasiko dharmaḥ. tasya kāraṇaṃ. antar udare kāyendriyeṇa yaḥ spṛśyate. sā jighatsā nāmopādāyarūpaṃ. yathā buddhānāṃ sukham utpāda ityādi abhyudayaniḥśreyasasukhakāraṇatvāt buddhotpādasya sa sukham ity
T07yabhkvyu:541: ucyate. tadvat. evaṃ pipāsāpi vaktavyā. saṃcitāni punas tulyanta iti sūkṣmagurutvasadbhāvād ity abhiprāyaḥ. atrānumānaṃ. sagurutvaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ vastrādi. ādhārādheyabhāvāt. kuṇḍabadaravad iti. anugrāhakaṃ kilāstīti.
T07yabhkvyu:543: evātrānugrāhakaḥ. kim atra śītena parikalpiteneti. yadā tatprakāravyavaccheda iti. yadā nīlādiprakāranimittābhogaḥ. evaṃ śrotrādivijñānam iti. ya eṣa bahuvidhaḥ śabda uktaḥ. tatra kadācid ekena
T07yabhkvyu:544: dravyeṇa śrotravijñānam utpadyate yadā tatprakāravyavacchedo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:545: kadācid bahubhir yadā na vyavacchedaḥ. tadyathā [Tib. 24a]
T07yabhkvyu:546: tūryaśabdasamūham anekākāratāramandratādiśabdarūpaṃ śṛṇvataḥ. evaṃ ghrāṇajihvāvijñāne api svaviṣaye yojye. kāyavijñānaṃ tu (Abhidh-k-vy 28)
T07yabhkvyu:547: paraṃ paṃcabhir iti. kathaṃ. kadācid ekena dravyeṇotpadyate yadā tatprakāravyavacchedo bhavati. kadācid dvābhyāṃ yāvat paṃcabhir yadā na
T07yabhkvyu:548: vyavacchedaḥ. ekena ca ślakṣṇatvādineti. kim atra kāraṇaṃ. karkaśatvādīnām
T07yabhkvyu:549: anyabhūtacatuṣkāśritatvāt. nanu caivam iti vistaraḥ. yathā cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyavijñānālambanāny abhisamasya manovijñānaṃ gṛhṇātīti kṛtvā sāmānyalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ tad vyavasthāpyate. tathā nīlapītalohitāvadātālambanānāṃ caturṇāṃ cakṣurvijñānānāṃ tāni catvāri
T07yabhkvyu:550: bahutarāṇi cālambanāny abhisamasya cakṣurvijñānam ekaṃ gṛhṇātīti sāmānyalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ tat prāpnoti. rūpāyatanasāmānyalakṣaṇam asyālambanam iti kṛtvā. tathā śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyavijñānāny api svaviṣayeṣu yojyāni.
T07yabhkvyu:551: āyatanasvalakṣaṇaṃ pratīti. svaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ. āyatanānāṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ āyatanasvalakṣaṇaṃ. cakṣurvijñānavijñeyatvādi. rūpāyatanatvādi
T07yabhkvyu:552: vā. tat praty ete paṃca vijñānakāyāḥ svalakṣaṇaviṣayā iṣyante pravacane.
T07yabhkvyu:553: na dravyasvalakṣaṇaṃ prati svalakṣaṇaviṣayā iṣyante iti prakṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:555: [Tib. 24b] nīlākārādi vā. na tat praty ete paṃca vijñānakāyāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:556: svalakṣaṇaviṣayā iṣyaṃte ity adoṣaḥ. yugapadviṣayasaṃprāptāv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:557: kāyajihvendriyayor yugapadviṣayasaṃprāptiḥ saṃbhavati. dvayoś ca vijñānayor yugapatpravṛttir na saṃbhavati. ataḥ pṛcchati. katarad vijñānaṃ pūrvam utpadyata iti. yasya viṣayaḥ paṭīyān. yadi kāyendriyasya viṣayaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:558: paṭutaraḥ kāyavijñānaṃ pūrvam utpadyate. atha jihvendriyasya viṣayaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:559: paṭīyān jihvāvijñānaṃ pūrvam utpadyate. samaprāpte tu viṣaye tulya ity arthaḥ. jihvāvijñānaṃ pūrvam utpadyate. kasmāt. bhoktukāmatāvarjitatvāt
T07yabhkvyu:560: saṃtateḥ. bhojanecchāpravaṇatvāt ātmabhāvasyety arthaḥ. pūrvaṃ jihvāvijñānam utpadyata iti vacanāt paścāt kāyavijñānam utpatsyata ity
T07yabhkvyu:561: arthād uktaṃ bhavati. tenātra vicāryate. kiṃ yo 'sau jihvāviṣayakṣaṇena saha prāptaḥ kāyaviṣayaksaṇa āsīt. tatra tat kāyavijñānam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:562: āhosvid anyasmin kāyavijñānaviṣayakṣaṇa iti. anyasminn ity āha. katham ālambananiyamo na bhidyate. naiṣa doṣaḥ. yat tadviṣayālaṃbanaṃ vijñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:563: tad apratisaṃkhyānirodhaniruddhaṃ. anyat tu tatsadṛśaṃ kāyavijñānam utpadyata iti. ataḥ paścāt tad utpadyate ity ucyate
T07yabhkvyu:566: iti. ata idam upanyasyati. uktāḥ paṃcendriyārthā yathā ca teṣāṃ grahaṇam
T07yabhkvyu:567: iti. kadācid ekena dravyeṇa cakṣurvijñānam utpadyata ityevamādinā. [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:568: 25a] teṣāṃ tu grahaṇam iti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī. avijñaptir idānīṃ vaktavyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:570: rūpaṃ paṃcendriyāṇy arthāḥ paṃcāvijñaptir eva cety avijñaptir evāvaśiṣyate. tasyā lakṣaṇanirdeśāvasara iti vaktavyā.
T07yabhkvyu:572: kecid evaṃ vṛttiṃ paṭhanti. asmiṃ pāṭhe evaṃ sūtravigrahaḥ. vikṣiptaṃ nāsti vā cittam asyeti vikṣiptācittakaḥ. atha vā vikṣiptaṃ cittaṃ nāsti vā
T07yabhkvyu:573: cittam asyeti vikṣiptācittakaḥ. ekasya cittaśabdasya lopaḥ. kecid evaṃ paṭhanti. vikṣiptasyeti. asmin pāṭhe uttarapadadvayasya bahuvrīhiṃ kṛtvā paścād evaṃ vigrahaḥ. vikṣiptaś cācittakaś ca vikṣiptācittakaḥ. vikṣiptaḥ pudgalaḥ vikṣiptacitta ity arthaḥ. vikṣiptacittasyeti tadanyacittasyāpīti avikṣiptacittād anyacittasyety arthaḥ. tadyathā kuśalāyā avijñapteḥ
T07yabhkvyu:574: samutthāpakaṃ cittaṃ kuśalaṃ. tadanyacitto 'kuśalāvyākṛtacittaḥ. sa iha vikṣiptacitto 'bhipretaḥ. akuśalāyās tv avijñapter akuśalaṃ cittaṃ samutthāpakaṃ. tadanyacittaḥ kuśalāvyākṛtacittaḥ. sa cāpi vikṣiptacitto
T07yabhkvyu:576: asaṃjñinirodhasamāpattisamāpannasyāpi. apiśabdenāvikṣiptasacittakasyāpīti vijñāyata [Tib. 25b] iti. etatpudgaladvayavyatiriktasya tṛtīyasyāpy arthaḥ. yo 'nubandha iti pravāha iti. yo dharmo nityapravāhayukta ity
T07yabhkvyu:577: arthaḥ. pravāhena pravāhī nirdiśyate pravāhopalakṣyatvāt. atha vā anubadhnātīti anubandhaḥ. pravāha iti ca vyākhyāpadaṃ kṛtabahuvrīhikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:578: pravṛttaḥ prakṛṣṭo vā vāho 'syeti pravāho dharmaḥ. sa eva nirdiśyate. na tat srotaḥ. kuśalākuśala iti. kuśalākuṣala evety avadhāraṇaṃ. avyākṛto nastīty arthaḥ. etena cakṣurādayo vyadastā veditavyāḥ. prāptipravāho 'py
T07yabhkvyu:579: asti īdṛśa iti. tatprāptir api vikṣiptāvikṣiptacittasyāpi pravāhiṇī kuśalākuśalaiva ceti tadviśeṣaṇārtham ucyate. mahābhūtāny upādāyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:580: mahābhūtahetuka ity arthaḥ. yathendhanam upādāyāgnir bhavatīty ukte.
T07yabhkvyu:583: jananahetus tebhya utpatteḥ. niśrayahetur jātasya bhūtānuvidhāyitvād
T07yabhkvyu:586: katamāny mahābhūtāny upādāya. kim āśrayamahābhūtāni. utāho
T07yabhkvyu:588: iti. yasmād rūpakriyāsvabhāvāpi satī [Tib. 26a] vijñaptivat paraṃ na
T07yabhkvyu:590: rūpakriyāsvabhāvāpīty ubhayaviśāṣaṇaṃ. kim arthaṃ. yad dhi vastu
T07yabhkvyu:591: rūpasvabhāvam eva na kṛiyāsvabhāvaṃ. tan na paraṃ gamayati. tadyathā
T07yabhkvyu:592: cakṣurādayaḥ. yad api kriyāsvabhāvam eva na rūpasvabhāvaṃ. tad api paraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:593: na gamayati. tadyathā cetanā. yat tūbhayasvabhāvaṃ. tat paraṃ gamayati.
T07yabhkvyu:594: tadyathā vijñaptiḥ. vijñaptir hi svasamutthāpakaṃ cittaṃ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtaṃ saumyaṃ krūram anubhayam iti vā paraṃ vijñāpayati.
T07yabhkvyu:596: samāsatas tv iti vistaraḥ. śiṣyasukhāvabodhārthaṃ saṃkṣepato vākyena tad avijñaptirūpaṃ darśayaty ācāryaḥ. vijñaptisamādhisaṃbhūtaṃ kuśalākuśalaṃ rūpam avijñaptir iti. yathāsaṃbhavam etat yojyaṃ. kāyavākvijñaptisaṃbhūtaṃ kuśalaṃ prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ naivasaṃvaranāsaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:598: samādhisaṃbhūtaṃ tu kuśalam eva. tad dvividhaṃ. sāsravasamādhisaṃbhūtaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:601: avagantavyaṃ. nanu caivaṃ vijñaptir api avijñaptiḥ prāpnoti. sāpi uttarā sabhāgahetubhūtapūrvavijñaptisaṃbhūtā. kuśalākuśalam evety avadhāraṇāt
T07yabhkvyu:602: vijñaptāv aprasaṃgaḥ. vijñaptir hy avyākrtāpi saṃbhavati. ata eva divyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:603: cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca samādhisaṃbhūtam api sat vijñaptijaṃ ca vipākarūpaṃ nāvijñaptiḥ prasajatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:605: nyūnaṃ śāstrāpetaṃ hānir atasyāḥ prasajyate tattvaṃ apiśabdādhikavacanaṃ viśeṣyaṃ aviśeṣitaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:606: anubandho hi pravāhas tenaiva vyākhātaḥ. na cādyaḥ kṣaṇaḥ pravāho mā bhūd
T07yabhkvyu:607: atiprasaṃgaḥ. tasmāt tasyātra lakṣaṇenāsty avarodha iti nyūnaṃ pravāhasya cādravyatvāt adravyam avijñaptir iti śāstrāpetaṃ. samāhitāyāś ca nāsti
T07yabhkvyu:608: vikṣiptacittācittakasyānubandha iti sā cāvijñaptir na prasajyata iti
T07yabhkvyu:609: hāniḥ. avikṣiptacittakasya tadanubandhān naiṣa doṣa iti cet. śubhāśubhāyā vijñapter avijñaptilakṣaṇaprasaṃga ity atasyāḥ prasajyate tattvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:611: vikṣiptacittakasyāpīti anena hi sarvasacittakāvasthāgrahaṇaṃ. kā punar anyā avasthā. yā dvitīyenāpiśabdena saṃgṛhyeteti apiśabdādhikavacanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:612: acittakaṃ cādhikṛtya śubho [Tib. 27a] 'vijñaptyanubandho viśeṣaṇīyaḥ. na ca vyākhyāne 'pi viśeṣita iti viśeṣyam aviśeṣitam. (Abhidh-k-vy 31) idaṃ cāparaṃ viśeṣyam aviśeṣitam apratighaṃ rūpam iti. evam anekadoṣaduṣtatvāt na saṃbaddham etal laksaṇam iti. atra brūmaḥ. yat tāvad uktaṃ nyūnaṃ pravāhasyāvijñaptyupadeśād ādyaḥ kṣaṇo nāvijñaptiḥ syād iti. idaṃ tāvad asau praṣṭavyaḥ. ko 'yaṃ pravāho nāma. bahuṣu kṣaṇeṣu pravāha ity ākhyā.
T07yabhkvyu:613: yady evaṃ ādyo 'pi kṣaṇaḥ pravāhaḥ sidhyati. prathamakṣaṇaprabhṛtibahuṣu kṣaṇeṣu pravāha iti kṛtvā. tathā hy utsāt taḍāgād vā nirgacchatām udakānām ādyodakāvayavaprabhṛtiṣu pravāhasaṃjñeti. nāsty avyāpitā lakṣaṇasya. yadā cānubadhnātīti anubandha ity acpratyayāntena padena dravyam eva nirdiśyate. tadā nyūnatāśaṃkāpi nāsti. ata eva śāstrāpetatādoṣo 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:614: parihṛto bhavati. athāpy anubaṃdhanam anubaṃdha iti sroto 'bhidhīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:615: tathāpy adoṣo rūpādhikārāt. pravāhavartitvāt tu pravāhaśabdena
T07yabhkvyu:616: pradarśyate. samāhitāyā apy avijñapter agrahaṇaṃ na bhavati. sāpi hi yady
T07yabhkvyu:617: api vikṣiptacittācittakasaṃtānaṃ nānubadhnātīti avikṣiptakasacittasaṃtānaṃ tv anubadhnāty eva. avijñaptijātisāmānyena tu vikṣiptācittakasyāpi yo
T07yabhkvyu:618: 'nubandhaḥ. sāvijñaptir iti ucyate. yat punar etad uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:619: avikṣiptacittakasya tadanubandhān naiṣa doṣa iti ced iti. yady avikṣiptacittasya [Tib. 27b] kevalasya yo 'nubandhaḥ. sāpy avijñaptir iti
T07yabhkvyu:620: samāhitāyā avijñaptes tyāgo na bhavatīti bravīṣi. vijñaptir api kuśalākuśalā tathaiva bhavatīty avijñaptis te prāpnotīti. sa cāpy adoṣaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:621: śubhāśubha evety avadhāraṇāt. vijñaptir hy avyākṛtāpi saṃbhavatīti. na vijñaptir avijñaptiḥ prasajyate. atha vā prakarṣagater eṣa prasaṃgo na
T07yabhkvyu:622: bhaviṣyati. prakarṣeṇa hi yo 'nubandhaḥ. saivāvijñaptiḥ. na ca vijñaptir
T07yabhkvyu:624: tannirodhadarśanāt. yad apy uktam. apiśabdādhikavacanam iti. tad apy ayuktam uktaṃ. tathā hy eka eveha sūtre paṭhito 'piśabdaḥ. vṛttau tu tena
T07yabhkvyu:625: pudgaladvayena tadarthaḥ sambadhyata iti dviḥ punaḥ paṭhitaḥ. tenaikena sūtrapaṭhitenāpiśabdena vikṣiptaviparītam avikṣiptam acittakaviparītaṃ ca
T07yabhkvyu:626: tam eva sacittakaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pudgalam avijñaptyāśrayaṃ bruvann ācāryaḥ svanāmoktaṃ vikṣiptācittakapudgaladvayaṃ jātisāmānyenāvijñaptyāśrayaṃ pradarśayan vijñapticittacaittebhyo 'rthāntarabhūtām avijñaptim ācaṣṭe.
T07yabhkvyu:627: traya eva hi pudgalā bhavanti vijñapticittavisabhāgacitto vijñapticittasabhāgacitto acittakaś ca. tatra vijñapticittavisabhāgacitto vikṣiptacitta ihābhipretaḥ. tasya sā vākkāyavijñaptir [Tib. 28a] niruddhā
T07yabhkvyu:628: bhavati. acittakasya tu cittacaittā api niruddhā iti. tatra vijñapteś cittacaitasikakalāpāc cārthāntarabhūteyam avijñaptiḥ. yata ebhyo 'nubandhinītvena viśiṣyate. tam evārthaṃ darśayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:631: avikṣiptacittasyāvijñaptir vartata iti nātiśayaḥ. vijñaptir api hi tasya
T07yabhkvyu:632: vartate. vikṣiptacittasyāpi tu vartata ity atiṣayaḥ. vijñaptir hi tasya
T07yabhkvyu:633: nāsti. avijñaptis tv anubandhinīti vijñapter viśiṣyate. tathā vikṣiptacittakasyāvijñaptir vartata iti nātiśayaḥ. cittacaittā api hi
T07yabhkvyu:634: tasya vartanta eva. acittakasyāpi tu vartate iti atiśayaḥ. tasya hi cittacaittā niruddhāḥ. avijñaptis tv anubandhinīti cittacaittebhyo
T07yabhkvyu:635: viśiṣyate. tad evaṃ dharmāntaraviśeṣaṇārthaṃ avikṣiptacitto vikṣiptācittakatṛtīyabhūtas tenaikenāpy apiśabdenābhidhīyate. ata eva cāpiśabdenāvikṣiptasacittakasyāpīty uktam ācāryeṇa. tṛtīyabhūtatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:636: itarathā hy apiśabdenāvikṣiptacittakasyāpīty evāvakṣyat sacittakasyāpīti vā. tadyathā trayo loke manuṣyāḥ. eko dhanavān itarāv api
T07yabhkvyu:637: dhanamātravantau. tāv abhisamīkṣya viṣṇumitrasya dhanam astīty ekenokte
T07yabhkvyu:638: dvitīyo vaktā bhavet. evadattayajñadattayor [Tib. 28b] api dhanam astīti.
T07yabhkvyu:639: apiśabdena viṣṇumitrasyāpy astīti. evadattayajñadattagatena dvaitam ivāpannenāpiśabdena sa eva viṣṇumitro lakṣyate na tv avasṛjyate ity
T07yabhkvyu:640: arthaḥ. tena nātrāpiśabdo 'dhika eva. tadvad ihāpi draṣṭavyaṃ. yat punar etad uktaṃ. acittakaṃ cādhikṛtya śubho 'vijñaptyanubandho viśeṣaṇīya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:641: tad api na kiṃcit. avijñaptijātim adhikṛtyaital lakṣaṇaṃ praṇītaṃ. sā cāvijñaptijātir acittakasya bhavatīti etāvad vivakṣitaṃ. kim anena viśeṣitena. tvadīye 'py avijñaptilakṣaṇe śubho 'vijñaptyanubandho
T07yabhkvyu:643: kṛte 'pi visabhāge 'pi citte cittātyaye ca yat vyākṛtāpratighaṃ rūpaṃ sā hy avijñaptir iṣyata
T07yabhkvyu:644: iti. eṣā ca vijñaptisaṃbhūtā kuśalaivāvijñaptir acittakasya saṃbhavatīti
T07yabhkvyu:645: caturthe kośasthāne jñāpayiṣyate. yac cāpratigham iti aviśeṣitam iti. tad api paścād darśayiṣyāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:646: sapratighā daśa rūpiṇa ity atra. daśaiva dhātavaḥ sapratighā ity avadhāraṇāt. avijñaptir
T07yabhkvyu:647: dharmadhātuparipaṭhitā. sā tv apratigheti setsyati. tasmād idam āsmākīnam
T07yabhkvyu:648: evam adoṣaduṣṭam avijñaptilakṣaṇam iti. tad evāstu.
T07yabhkvyu:653: aṣṭādaśadhātavas tu svasāmānyalakṣaṇadhāraṇāt. gotrārtho vā dhātvarthaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:655: dhātvarthaḥ bhavaṃ puṣṇantīti kṛtvā. mahattvam eṣāṃ sarvānyarūpāśrayatvenaudārikatvād iti. sarvopādāyarūpāśrayatvena mahattvād ity arthaḥ. tadudbhūtavṛttiṣv iti. tair mahābhūtair udbhūtā vyaktā vṛttir dhṛtyādikā yeṣu. ta ime tadudbhūtavṛttayaḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyuskandhāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:656: teṣu. eṣāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ mahāsaṃniveśatvān mahāracanatvāt bhūtaṃ tanvantīti
T07yabhkvyu:659: iti. dhṛtyādikarmanirdeśaḥ pṛthivyādiṣu śeṣānumānārthaṃ. upalādike hi pṛthivīdravye saṃgrahapaktivyūhanadarśanāc cheṣāṇāṃ jalatejovāyūnām astitvam anumīyate. apsu nausaṃdhāraṇoṣṇateraṇakarmadarśanāt pṛthivītejovāyūnām astitvaṃ. agnijvālāyāṃ sthairyasampiṇḍanacalanadarśanāt pṛthivyudakavāyūnām astitvaṃ. vāyau saṃdhāraṇaśītoṣṇasparśadarśanāt pṛthivyaptejasām astitvam iti vaibhāṣikāḥ. vyūhanaṃ punar vṛddhiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:662: uṣṇateti svabhāvābhidhāne 'pi bhāvapratyayaḥ. uṣṇa eva uṣṇateti. [Tib. 29b]
T07yabhkvyu:663: deśantarotpādanāt pradīperaṇavad iti. kṣaṇikānāṃ nāsti deśāntaragamanaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:666: kṣaṇikāni ca bhūtāni. rūpatvāt. pradīpavat. pradīpaś ca kṣaṇikaḥ prasiddha ity udāharaṇaṃ. karmaṇāsya svabhāvo 'bhivyakta iti. īraṇākarmaṇā laghutvaṃ viśiṣyate. yad īraṇātmakaṃ laghutvaṃ. sa vāyudhātur iti. laghusamudīraṇo
T07yabhkvyu:667: vāyudhātuḥ. laghv eva tu yat. tad upādāyarūpaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:668: (I.13) pravacane pṛthivīdhātvādayaḥ pṛthivyādayaś coktā ity ataḥ pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:671: lokasaṃvyavahāreṇa. vātyeti vātānāṃ samūho vātyā. brāhmaṇādibhyo yann iti
T07yabhkvyu:673: tathā hy arthavargīyeṣūktam iti. arthavargīyāṇi sūtrāṇi kṣudrake paṭhante.
T07yabhkvyu:678: yadi kāmā viṣayā na samṛdhyante na sampadyante.
T07yabhkvyu:680: bādhyata ity arthaḥ. bādhanārthaparicchinnenānena rūpyateśabdena rūpyate
T07yabhkvyu:681: rūpyata iti bhikṣava ity atra sūtre rūpyateśabdo bādhanārtha eva
T07yabhkvyu:682: paricchidyate. śalyaviddhaḥ kāmayānaś ca [Tib. 30a] duḥkhavedayitṛtvād bādhyata iti yuktaṃ. rūpaṃ tu kathaṃ bādhyate. ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:683: vipariṇāmotpādaneti. vikriyotpādanety arthaḥ. tathā cehārthe sati
T07yabhkvyu:684: śalyaviddha iva rūpyate ity atrāpi yadi vikriyata ity artho gṛhyate. sutarām artho yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:685: pratighāta iti. svadeśe parasyotpattipratibandhaḥ. paramāṇurūpaṃ tarhīti.
T07yabhkvyu:686: dravyaparamāṇurūpaṃ na rūpaṃ prāpnoti. kasmāt. arūpaṇāt. niravayavatve sati arūpaṇād ity abhiprāyaḥ. pakṣadvaye 'py etac codyam upanyastaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:687: bādhanarūpaṇe pratighātarūpaṇe ca dravyaparamāṇur niravayavatvān na śakyate rūpayitum iti. na vai paramāṇurūpam ekaṃ pṛthagbhūtam astīti. ekam iti grahaṇaṃ dravyaparamāṇusaṃdarśanārthaṃ. pṛthagbhūtam asaṃghātastham ity arthaḥ. tad īdṛg nāsti. saṃghātasthaṃ nityaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:689: ityādivacanāt saṃghātasthaṃ tad rūpyata eveti. arthād etad abhīṣṭaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:690: bhavati. tad dravyaparamāṇurūpaṃ saṃghātasthaṃ rūpyate bādhyate pratihanyate ca. atītānāgataṃ tarhīti vistaraḥ. atītānāgatam adeśatvān na
T07yabhkvyu:691: rūpyate na bādhyate nāpi pratihanyate. tad apīti vistaraḥ. [Tib. 30b] tad api rūpitam ity atītabādhanapratighātanārthena. rūpayiṣyamāṇam ity utpattidharmakam anāgataṃ. tenaivārthadvayena. tajjātīyaṃ cety utpattidharmakajātīyam anutpattidharmakam (Abhidh-k-vy 35) anāgataṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:692: iṃdhanavat. yad apīddhaṃ yad apīndhiṣyamāṇaṃ tajjātīyaṃ ca. tad
T07yabhkvyu:693: apīndhanam. tajjātīyaṃ punar indhanaṃ yad indhanārthe kalpitam
T07yabhkvyu:694: aprāpyaivāgnim aṃtarā naṃkṣyati. avijñaptis tarhi na rūpaṃ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:695: kasmāt. apratighatvāt. apratighatvena hi sā na bādhyate nāpi pratihanyate.
T07yabhkvyu:696: sāpi vijñaptirūpaṇād iti vistaraḥ. vijñaptir avijñaptisamutthāpikā. tasyāḥ sapratighāyā rūpaṇāt avijñaptir api rūpyate. yathā chāyāsamutthāpakasya vṛkṣasya pracalanāt chāyā pracalati. tadvat. nāvikārād iti. anena pratijñādoṣa udgrāhyate. pareṇa hy evaṃ pratijñātaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:698: vṛkṣachāyāvad iti. seyaṃ pūrvābhyupagamavirodhinī pratijñā. abhyupagato hi vijñapter vikāre 'pi avijñapter avikāraḥ. tathā hy aṃjaliṃ bhaṃktvā kapotaṃ kurvataḥ kāyavijñaptir vikriyata ity abhyupagamyate na tv
T07yabhkvyu:699: avijñaptiḥ. tasmād asādhanam etat. vijñaptinivṛttau vāvijñaptinivṛttiḥ syād [Tib. 31a] ity anena dharmiviśeṣaviparyayo 'py asyāḥ pratijñāyā udgrāhyate. yadi vṛkṣachāyādharma iṣyate vṛkṣanivṛttau chāyānivṛttir dṛṣṭeti. tadvat syāt. atra kaścin nāvikārād iti na samyag etad uktam iti
T07yabhkvyu:701: mṛdumadhyādhimātratve hi vijñapter mṛdumadhyādhimātratā bhavaty avijñapter
T07yabhkvyu:702: iti. tad etad ayuktaṃ. kasmāt. utpattir evāvijñapter evaṃ bhavati. mṛdur madhyādhimātrā vā. na tu vikāraḥ. utpannasya hi dharmasya
T07yabhkvyu:703: punaranyathotpādanaṃ vikāraḥ. tac ca rūpaṇam abhipretam.
T07yabhkvyu:704: āśrayabhūtarūpaṇād iti apara iti. vṛddhācāryavasubandhuḥ. bhūtagrahaṇam
T07yabhkvyu:705: āśrayabhūtapradarśanārthaṃ. ataś cetaraḥ prasaṃjayati. evaṃ tarhi cakṣurvijñānādīnām apīti vistaraḥ. cakṣurādyāśrayarūpaṇāt tadvijñānānām api rūpatvaprasaṃgaḥ. viṣamo 'yam upanyāsa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:706: vṛddhācāryavasubandhudeśīyaḥ kaścit pariharati. avijñaptir hīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:707: chāyā vṛkṣam upaśliṣṭāśritya vartate. prabhāpi maṇiṃ tathaiva.
T07yabhkvyu:708: utpattinimittamātraṃ tāni teṣām iti. nopaśliṣṭānīti bhāvaḥ. tam itaraḥ itaraḥ. pratyāha. idaṃ tāvad avaibhāṣikīyam iti vistaraḥ. naitad
T07yabhkvyu:709: vaibhāṣikamataṃ. vaibhāṣikamataṃ tu chāyā varṇaparamāṇuḥ svabhūtacatuṣkam āśritya vartate [Tib. 31b] na vṛkṣaṃ. tathā prabhā varṇaparamāṇuḥ
T07yabhkvyu:710: svabhūtacatuṣkam āśritya vartate na maṇiṃ. pṛthagdravyatvāt. ity evam anāśrayakāraṇatvān maṇivṛkṣayoḥ na mahābhūtavijñaptivat upaśliṣṭe chāyāprabhe iti asāmānyaṃ dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayoḥ. saty api ca tadāśritatva iti vistaraḥ. athāpi pāraṃparyeṇa tadāśritatvam abhyupagamyate. chāyā
T07yabhkvyu:711: svabhūtāśritā. tāni tu bhūtāni vṛkṣam āśritāni. prabhāpi svabhūtāśritā.
T07yabhkvyu:712: tāni tu bhūtāni maṇim āśritāni. tadanuvidhāyitvāt. tathāpy asāmānyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:713: (Abhidh-k-vy 36) niruddheṣv apy avijñaptyāśrayeṣu mahābhūteṣu tasyā anirodhābhyupagamād
T07yabhkvyu:715: siddhāntāt. tasmān na bhavaty eṣa parihāra iti. ya ukto 'bhūd avijñaptir hi chāyeva vṛkṣam iti vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:716: anye punar atra parihāram āhur iti. ayam evācāryas tan mataṃ samarthayann āha. āśrayo bhedaṃ gata iti. dvividha ity arthaḥ. kaścid rūpyate cakṣurādiḥ sapratighatvāt. kaścin na rūpyate. manaḥ. viparyayāt. tasmād asamānaḥ prasaṃga iti. cakṣurvijñānādīnām apy āśrayabhūtarūpaṇād
T07yabhkvyu:717: rūpatvaprasaṃga iti. rūpaṇād rūpam ity āśrayarūpaṇād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:718: atra codayanti. vijñaptisaṃbhūtāyā avijñapter evaṃ parikareṇa rūpatvaṃ bhavad bhavet. samādhisaṃbhūtāyās tu kathaṃ rūpatvam iti. tajjātīyatvāt tad api rūpaṃ. [Tib. 32a] kiṃ punas tajjātīyatvaṃ. mahābhūtāny upādāyeti bhāvaḥ. teṣām upādāyarūpajananādihetubhūtatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:720: bhagavato vineyavaśāt tisro deśanāḥ skandhāyatanadhātudeśanāḥ. tāsu ca ye
T07yabhkvyu:721: skandheṣu deśitā dharmāḥ. ta eva āyatanadhātuṣu deśitāḥ. asaṃskṛtās tv atra kevalam atiriktāḥ. sarvaś cābhidharmaḥ sūtravyākhyānaṃ. ata idam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:723: vistaraḥ. lāghavikaś cāyam ācāryo vedanādiskandhalakṣaṇam anuktvaiva lāghavena rūpaskandhasvabhāvān dharmān āyatanadhātuṣu darśayati. indriyāṇi ca indriyārthāś ca
T07yabhkvyu:725: ta eveti viśeṣaṇam anyendriyanirāsārthaṃ anyārthanirāsārthaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:726: āyatanavyavasthāyāṃ tu yathāsaṃkhyena daśāyatanāni cakṣurāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ yāvat kāyāyatanaṃ spraṣṭavyāyatanam iti. dhātuvyavasthāyāṃ ta eva daśa dhātavaḥ cakṣurdhātū rūpadhātur yāvat kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyadhātur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:727: (I.14cd, 15) ukto rūpaskandhas tasya cāyatanadhātuvyavasthānam iti. na sakalasya rūpaskandhasyāyatanadhātuvyavasthānam uktaṃ. avijñaptirūpasya
T07yabhkvyu:728: vakṣyamāṇatvāt. katham idam ucyate. uktam iti. bāhuliko nirdeśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:731: trividho 'nubhava iti. [Tib. 32b] anubhūtir anubhava upabhogaḥ. kasya.
T07yabhkvyu:732: cittasya pudgalasya vā. sa ca trividhaḥ. sukho duḥkho 'duḥkhāsukhaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:734: hlādaparitāpatadubhayavinirmuktasvarūpasākṣātkaraṇasvabhāvaḥ. anubhūyate vānena viṣaya ity anubhavaḥ. anubhavatīti vānubhavaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:735: kāyacittopacayāpacayatadubhayavinirmuktāvasthāpravṛttaś caiasikaviśeṣaḥ sparśānubhava ity apare. anur lakṣaṇe sparśacihnaḥ. sparśanimittānubhava ity arthaḥ. sa vedanāskandhaḥ. nimittodgrahaṇātmiketi. nimittaṃ vastuno avasthāviśeṣo nīlatvādi. tasyodgrahaṇaṃ paricchedaḥ. tadātmikā
T07yabhkvyu:736: tatsvabhāvā. duḥkhādīty ādiśabdena lohitādīnāṃ grahaṇam. asau
T07yabhkvyu:737: saṃjñāskandhaḥ. yadi paricchedātmikā saṃjñā tatsaṃprayoge nimittam udgṛhṇantīti paṃcāpi vijñānakāyā vikalpakāḥ syuḥ. na syuḥ. na hi paṃcavijñānasaṃprayoginī saṃjñāpaṭvī. manovijñānakāyasaṃprayoginī tu paṭvīti tad eva vikalpakam uktaṃ. ṣaṭ saṃjñākāyā vedanāvad iti. yathā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedaneti vistareṇoktaṃ. tathā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā saṃjñeti
T07yabhkvyu:742: saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraskandhaḥ. sūtre ṣaṭ cetanākāyā ity uktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:743: saṃskāraskandhaḥ katamaḥ. ṣaṭ cetanākāyā iti. abhisaṃskaraṇe pradhāneti.
T07yabhkvyu:744: evaṃ caivaṃ ca syām ity abhisaṃskaraṇe pradhānā. karma hetur upapattaya
T07yabhkvyu:746: tadākārahetubhāvānuvidhānataḥ saṃskāraskandha eva veditavyāḥ. tad evaṃ sati saṃskaraṇe pravṛtto dharmarāśiḥ saṃskāra ity uktaṃ bhavati. apare punar āhuḥ. saṃskṛtābhisaṃskaraṇe cetanāyāḥ prādhānyam uktam. ataḥ sūtre cetanāgrahaṇaṃ. saṃprayuktaviprayuktasaṃskṛtadharmasaṃgraheṇa tu prādhānyād ayam eva skandhaḥ saṃskāraskandha uktaḥ. saṃskṛtarāśir iti kṛtvā. saṃskṛtam abhisaṃskarotīti bhāvinyā saṃjñayā anāgataṃ skandhapaṃcakaṃ saṃskṛtam ity uktam. anyathā hīti vistaraḥ. yadi yathāsūtranirdeśaṃ cetanaiva kevalā saṃskāraskandha iṣyate nānye. śeṣāṇāṃ chandādīnāṃ caitasikānāṃ prāptyādīnāṃ ca cittaviprayuktānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:748: saṃskāraskandhe caivaṃ. sūtre yathārutagrahaṇenāsaṃgrahāt. iti skandheṣv asaṃgrahād duḥkhasamudayasatyatvaṃ na syāt. iti parijñāprahāṇe na syātāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:749: [Tib. 33b] parijñā duḥkhasya prahāṇaṃ samudayasya. anabhijñāya laukikena mārgeṇa aparijñāya lokottareṇa. atha vānabhijñāya darśanamārgeṇa
T07yabhkvyu:750: aparijñāya bhāvanāmārgeṇā. evam aprahāyety uktam iti sūtrāntaraṃ. naham ekadharmam (Abhidh-k-vy 38) api aparijñāyāprahāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:751: vadāmīti. duḥkhanirodhaṃ vadāmīty arthaḥ. nanu cākāśāpratisaṃkhyānirodhau lokottareṇa mārgeṇa na parijñāyete. atha ca duḥkhasyāntakriyeṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:753: adoṣaḥ. na hi tau saṃkleśavastū. kim anayoḥ parijñeyatvena.
T07yabhkvyu:754: nirodhamārgasatye api tarhi na saṃkleśavastū iti na parijñeye syātāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:756: tathā hi yogina evaṃ vicārayanti. asya sahetukasya duḥkhasya ko nirodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:757: kena copāyena sa nirodhaḥ prāpyata iti. nirodhamārgasatye api parijānanti.
