T07yabhkvyu:758: na tv ākāśāpratisaṃkhyānirodhayor duḥkhena sambandha iti na tau parijānanti. prayogāvasthāyāṃ tu laukikena jñānena tāv api sāmānyarupeṇa sarvadharmā anātmāna iti bhāvayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:760: iti. āyatanaṃ ca dhātuś cāyatanadhātū. dharmaś cāsāv āyatanadhātuś ca
T07yabhkvyu:766: āyatanadeśanāyāṃ dharmāyatanam iti. dhātudeśanāyāṃ ca dharmadhātur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:770: iti. vijñānaskandhaḥ prativijñaptir ity arthaḥ skandhādhikārāt. pratir
T07yabhkvyu:771: vīpsārthaḥ. viṣayaṃviṣayaṃ pratīty arthaḥ. upalabdhir vastumātragrahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:772: vedanādayas tu caitasā viśeṣā viśeṣagrahaṇarūpāḥ. ṣaḍ vijñānakāyā iti ṣaḍ
T07yabhkvyu:775: iti. ṣaḍ vijñānadhātavo yāthāsaṃkhyena yaś cakṣurvijñānaṃ. sa
T07yabhkvyu:776: cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ. evaṃ yāvat yan manovijñānaṃ. sa manovijñānadhātuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:777: samastāni tv etāni ṣaṭ manodhātur iti veditavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:778: (I.17ab) ṣaṇṇām anantarātītaṃ vijñānaṃ yad dhi. tan mana
T07yabhkvyu:780: ṣaṇṇām iti nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī. teṣām eva madhye nānyad ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:781: anantaragrahaṇam (Abhidh-k-vy 39) anyavijñānavyavahitanivṛttyarthaṃ. yad dhi yasyānantaram anyavijñānāvyavahitaṃ. [Tib. 34b] tat tasyāśrayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:782: vyavahitaṃ tu na tasyāśrayaḥ. anyasyāsāv āśrayaḥ. yasya tadavyavahitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:783: ata evācittikāvasthāyāṃ cirātītam api samāpattipraveśacittaṃ vyutthānacittasyāśrayo bhavati. vijñānāntarāvyavadhānāt. atītagrahaṇaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:784: pratyutpannanirāsārthaṃ. manovijñānaṃ hi āśrayi tasyām avasthāyāṃ pratyutapannaṃ. atas tad atītam iṣyate. tad eva caitad ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:788: iti jātinirdeśān na vīpsāprayogaḥ. vṛttau tu dravyapadārthābhidhitsayā
T07yabhkvyu:789: vīpsāprayogaḥ. yadyat samanantaraniruddhaṃ vijñānaṃ tattan manodhātur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:790: tadyathā sa eveti vistaraḥ. tadyathā sa eva putro 'nyasya pitrākhyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:791: labhate. tad eva phalam anyasya bījākhyāṃ. tathehāpi sa eva
T07yabhkvyu:793: (I.17cd) saptadaśa dhātavo bhavanti dvādaśa veti. ya eva ṣaḍvijñānadhātavaḥ. sa eva manodhātuḥ. ya eva ca manodhātuḥ. ta eva ca
T07yabhkvyu:794: ṣaḍvijñānadhātava iti itaretarāntarbhāve yadi ṣaḍvijñānadhātavo gṛhyeran nārtho manodhātuneti saptadaśa dhātavo bhavanti. yadi manodhātur gṛhyeta
T07yabhkvyu:795: nārthaḥ sāḍvijñānadhātubhir iti dvādaśa dhātavo bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:798: cakṣurādisvāśrayasaṃbhavāt. manovijñānāśrayo nāstīti tadāśrayaprasiddhyarthaṃ [Tib. 35a] manodhātur vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:801: ālambanaṣaṭkaṃ rūpādidharmāntam iti. yogācāradarśanena tu ṣaḍvijñānavyatirikto 'py asti manodhātuḥ. tāmraparṇīyā api hṛdayavastu
T07yabhkvyu:802: manovijñānadhātor āśrayaṃ kalpayanti. tac cārūpyadhātāv api vidyata iti varṇayanti. ārūpyadhātāv api hi teṣāṃ rūpam abhipretaṃ. ārūpya iti ec
T07yabhkvyu:803: īṣadarthe āṅ āpiṃgalavad iti. caramaṃ cittam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:804: nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇakāle. na mano bhaviṣyatīti. na manodhātur bhaviṣyatīty
T07yabhkvyu:805: arthaḥ. na hi tad astīti. notpadyata ity arthaḥ. na. tasyāpi manobhāveneti vistaraḥ. naitad evaṃ. kasmāt. tasyāpi caramacittasya manobhāvenāśrayatvenāvasthitatvāt. anyakāraṇavaikalyād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:806: paunarbhavikakarmakleśakāraṇavaikalyāt. nottaravijñānasaṃbhūtir iti. na punarbhavapratisaṃdhivijñānam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:808: idam iha vicāryate. uktam etat. āśrayāśritālambanaṣaṭkavyavasthānād aṣṭādaśa dhātavo bhavantīti. āśritaṣaṭkaṃ tāvad vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:809: cakṣurvijñānadhātur yāvan manovijñānadhātur iti. kim asyāśritaṣaṭkasya yathāsaṃkhyaṃ āśrayaṣatkaṃ vyavasthāpyate. cakṣurvijñānadhātor āśrayaś cakṣurdhātur [Tib. 35b] yāvan manovijñanadhātor manodhātur āśraya iti. om ity āha. yadā tarhi cakṣus tatsabhāgaṃ bhavati. tat kasyāśrayaḥ. na
T07yabhkvyu:810: kasyacit. kathaṃ tarhīdam uktaṃ. cakṣurvijñānadhātoś cakṣurdhātur āśraya
T07yabhkvyu:811: ityādi. āśraya eva cakṣuḥ. yas tu kiṃcidanāśrayas tatsabhāgaṃ cakṣuḥ. tad api tajjātīyatvāt cakṣurdhātutvena vyavasthāpyata eva. evaṃ yāvat kāyadhātur vaktavyaḥ. manodhātur api kiṃ manovijñānadhātor evāśrayaḥ. nety
T07yabhkvyu:812: āha. cakṣurvijñānadhātvādīnām api hi sa āśraya iṣyate. tathā hi vakṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:816: iti. nānyeṣām āśrayaḥ sa iti kṛtvā ṣaṣṭhāśrayaprasiddhir na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:817: ṣaṣṭhasyāpy ayam āśrayo bhavati saṃbhavataḥ. ālambanaṣaṭkam api.
T07yabhkvyu:818: cakṣurvijñānadhātor ālambanaṃ rūpadhātur yāvan manovijñānadhātor dharmadhātur ālambanam iti. tad idaṃ vicāryate. kiṃ yathā cakṣurvijñānadhātor yāvanti rūpāṇi ālambanaṃ. sa rūpadhātuḥ. evaṃ yāvat kāyavijñānadhātor yāvanti spraṣṭavyāny ālambnaṃ. sa spraṣṭavyadhātuḥ. evaṃ manovijñānadhator yāvanto dharmā ālambanaṃ. sa dharmadhātur iti. atra sthavira āha. sarvadharmasvabhāvo dharmadhātur aṣṭādaśadhātusvabhāva ity
T07yabhkvyu:819: arthaḥ. katham asyādhyātmikabāhyadhātuvyavasthā sidhyati. cakṣurādayo hi dvādaśādhyātmikā iṣyante. ṣaḍ bāhyā iti. [Tib. 36a] yadi hi te 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:820: dharmadhātāv antarbhāvyeran sāṃkaryaṃ prāpnoti. sthavira āha. pāryāyikam eṣām ādhyātmikabāhyatvaṃ. vijñānānām āśrayās te cakṣurādaya ity ādhyātmikāḥ. manovijñānaviṣayatvāt tu bāhyā iti. tad evaṃ necchanti
T07yabhkvyu:821: vaibhāṣikāḥ. sūtravirodhāt. evaṃ hi sūtra uktaṃ. dharmā bhikṣo bāhyam
T07yabhkvyu:822: āyatanam ekādaśabhir āyatanair asaṃgṛhītam anidarśanam apratigham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:825: aparipūrṇas tarhi manovijñānadhātor ālambananirdeśaḥ. na ca cakṣurvijñānādīnām aparipūrṇa alambananirdeśa iṣyate. asty etad evaṃ. kiṃ tu cakṣurādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇām āśrayatvena nirdeśāc cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ cāśritatvena rūpādīnāṃ ca paṃcānāṃ paṃcavijñānakāyālambananirdeśān
T07yabhkvyu:826: (Abhidh-k-vy 41) na teśāṃ manovijñānaviṣayatve 'pi dharmadhātau prakṣepa iti varṇayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:828: iti. āyatanādibhir api sarvasaṃgrahaḥ. na tu samāsataḥ. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:829: vistarataḥ. ayaṃ tu deśanātrayān niṣkṛṣya samāsata uktaḥ. rūpaskandhena rūpaskandhaḥ saṃgṛhīto daśa cendriyārthasvabhāvāny āyatanāni dhātavaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:831: vijñānaskandhaḥ. tad eva ca manaāyatanaṃ saptacittadhātavaś ca saṃgṛhītāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:832: dharmadhātunā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāraskandhāḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ dharmāyatanaṃ dharmadhātuś ca. avijñaptir iha dviḥ saṃgṛhītā. tadyathā cakṣurindriyam iti. cakṣurindriyaṃ vedanādiskandhaśrotrādyāyatanadhātunirodhasatyamārgasatyasvabhāvena viyuktaṃ. ata etad uktaṃ. cakṣurindriyaṃ rūpaskandhena cakṣurāyatanadhātubhyāṃ duḥkhasamudayasatyābhyāṃ ca saṃgṛhītaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:834: mahatātrālpakaṃ saṃgṛhītaṃ. na tu mahad alpakena. katham iti. rūpaskandho mahān sarvarūpasaṃgrāhakatvāt. cakṣurindriyam alpakaṃ rūpaskandhaikadeśatvāt. rūpaskandhena cakṣurindriyaṃ saṃgṛhītaṃ. na tu cakṣurindriyeṇa rūpaskandhaḥ. cakṣurindriyavyatiriktarūpaskandhasadbhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:835: tadyathā hastipadena pakṣipadaṃ saṃgṛhītaṃ. na tu pakṣipadena hastipadaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:836: saṃgṛhītaṃ. tadvat. samena tu samam anyonyaṃ saṃgṛhītaṃ. tadyathā cakṣurindriyaṃ cakṣurāyatanena. cakṣurāyatanam api cakṣurindriyeṇety ayam abhidharmanayo veditavyaḥ. yathā saṃgrahavastubhiḥ parṣadām iti. catvāri
T07yabhkvyu:837: saṃgrahavastūni. dānaṃ priyavāditā arthacaryā samānārthatā ca. catasraḥ parṣadab bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ. [tip. 37a] tais tāsāṃ saṃgrahaḥ. sa tu kādācitkaḥ. kadācidbhavaḥ kādācitkaḥ. kadācid āsāṃ dīyate priyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:838: cocyate. na ce saṃgraha iti. sāṃketikaḥ sāṃvyavahārikaḥ. svabhāvasaṃgrahas tu pāramārthika ity uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:839: (I.19ab) jātigocaravijñānasāmānyād ekadhātutā dvitve 'pi cakṣurādīnām ity arthād etad uktaṃ bhavati. jātyādibhedād yathāsaṃbhavaṃ dhātubhedavyavasthānaṃ. na tv adhiṣṭhānabhedād iti. tatra cakṣurdhātvādīnām anyonyaṃ jātigocaravijñānabhedo bhavati. rūpadhātvādīnāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:840: jātivijñānabhedaḥ. vijñānadhātūnāṃ jātigocarabhedaḥ. manovijñānasyāpi hi dharmadhātur asādhāraṇo gocaraḥ. evaṃ śrotraghrāṇayor api yojyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:841: jātisāmānyam ubhayoḥ śrotrasvabhāvatvāt. gocarasāmānyam ubhayoḥ śabdaviṣayatvāt. (Abhidh-k-vy 42) vijñānasāmānyam ubhayor ekaśrotravijñānāśrayatvāt. tasmād eka eva śrotradhātuḥ. evaṃ ghrāṇasyāpi yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:842: (I.19cd) kāryāntarābhāvāt tarhi dvayānutpattiprasaṃgaḥ syād ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:844: iti. ekacakṣuḥśrotrādhiṣṭhānaikanāsikābilasaṃbhavān mahad vairūpyaṃ syād ity ekasya cakṣuḥśrotrādhiṣṭhānasya ekasya ca nāsikābilasya saṃbhavān mahad vairūpyaṃ syāt. nanu coṣṭramārjārolūkaprabhṛtīnāṃ cakṣurādidvayodbhave 'pi na bhavaty āśrayaśobhā. jātyantarāpekṣayā [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:845: 37b] na teṣām āśrayaśobhā. svajātyapeksayā tu yasya cakṣurādidvayam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:846: tasya tasyāṃ svajātāv āśrayaśobhā. yasya nāsti. tasya vairūpyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:847: adūṣyam etat. ācāryasaṃghabhadras tv asya sūtrasyārthaṃ vivavre.
T07yabhkvyu:848: śobhārtham ity ādhipatyārtham ity arthaḥ. ādhipatyasaṃpanno hi loke
T07yabhkvyu:849: śobhatīty apadiśyate. yeṣāṃ cendriyāṇāṃ amūny adhiṣṭhānāni. teṣāṃ pariśuddhadarśanaśravaṇaghrāṇāyādhipatyaṃ syāt. na hi yathā dvābhyāṃ cakṣurbhyāṃ pariśuddhaṃ darśanaṃ bhavati tathaikena. evam itarayor api.
T07yabhkvyu:850: evaṃ caiṣām indriyatvaṃ hīyeta. tadartham etad uktaṃ syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:851: sphuṭopalabdhyartham ity arthaḥ. ihāpi śakyam evaṃ vaktum. ekam eva parisphuṭopalabdhyāśrayabhūtaṃ vistīrṇaṃ karmaṇotpādyatāṃ. kim
T07yabhkvyu:852: āśrayavicchedeneti. vibhāṣāyāṃ tu likhitam etat pakṣadvayaṃ. śobhārthaṃ dvayodbhava ity eko vyaktyartham ity apara iti. alaṃ prasaṃgena. nanu ca karmavaśāt indriyadvayotpattiḥ. kim anyad evocyate śobhārthaṃ vyaktyarthaṃ ceti. karmavaśād evātrendriyadvayodbhava uktaḥ. katham iti. evaṃ vibhaktāvayavāśrayeṇānādikālābhyastaḥ śobhābhimānaḥ sattvānāṃ pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:853: atas tadabhilāṣapūrvakeṇa sphuṭopalabdhyabhilāṣapūrvakeṇa ca karmaṇā tad indriyadvayam [Tib. 38a] abhinirvartamānaṃ śobhārthaṃ vyaktyarthaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:856: iti. yathākramaṃ rāśiḥ āyadvāraṃ gotraṃ cārtha eṣāṃ. ta ime rāśyāyadvāragotrārthāḥ. ke. skandhāyatanadhātuśabdāḥ. atha vā rāśyāyadvāragotraśabdānām arthāḥ. ke. skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ. sūtre
T07yabhkvyu:857: vacanāt. sūtre rāśyarthaḥ skandhārtha iti. rāśer yo 'rthaḥ. sa
T07yabhkvyu:858: skandhasyārthaḥ. taṃ sūtreṇa darśayati. yat kiṃcid rūpam
T07yabhkvyu:859: atītānāgatapratyutpannam iti vistaraḥ. aikadhyam iti. ekadhaivaikadhyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:861: niruddham ity arthaḥ. anityatāgrahaṇaṃ anyanirodhanirāsārthaṃ. paṃcavidho hi nirodhaṃ. lakṣaṇanirodhaḥ samāpattinirodha upapattinirodhaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:862: pratisaṃkhyānirodho 'pratisaṃkhyānirodhaś ca. tad yady atītaṃ rūpaṃ niruddham ity eva brūyāt. aviśeṣitatvāt samāpattinirodhādīnām api
T07yabhkvyu:863: prasaṃgaḥ syāt. na ca tair atītārthateṣyate. samāpattinirodho hy anāgatānām eva cittacaittānām. upapattinirodho 'py eṣām eva.
T07yabhkvyu:866: lakṣaṇanirodhagrahaṇārtham idam anityatāgrahaṇaṃ. anāgatam anutpannam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:869: atītaviśeṣaṇārthaṃ. anāgataṃ yady apy aniruddhaṃ na tūtpannam. atītam api yady apy utpannaṃ na tv aniruddham iti. ādhyātmikaṃ svāsāṃtānikam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:870: cakṣurādikaṃ rūpādikaṃ ca. bāhyam anyad iti. tad eva pārasāṃtānikam
T07yabhkvyu:871: asattvasaṃkhyātaṃ ca. āyatanato veti. ādhyātmikaṃ cakṣurādipaṃcakaṃ svaparasaṃtatipatitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:872: dvādaśādhyātmikā iti vacanāt. bāhyam anyad rūpādikaṃ viṣayapaṃcakaṃ svaparasaṃtatipatitam.
T07yabhkvyu:873: asattvasaṃkhyātaṃ cāvijñaptiś ca. bāhyāyatanasvabhāvam iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:874: audārikaṃ sapratigham iti. paramāṇusaṃcayasvabhāvaṃ. sūkṣmam apratighaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:875: avijñaptirūpaṃ. āpekṣikaṃ veti. apekṣayā vā audārikaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:876: tadyathā likṣām apekṣya audārikī yūkā. yūkām apekṣya sukṣmā likṣeti. tad evaṃ sati sapratigham eva audārikaṃ ca sūkṣmaṃ bhavati. apratighaṃ tu sūkṣmam evāsaṃcitatvāt. āpekṣikatvād asiddham iti. saiva sūkṣmā likṣā
T07yabhkvyu:877: vātāyanarajo 'pekṣya audārikī. saiva ca audārikī yūkām apekṣya sūkṣmeti
T07yabhkvyu:878: avyavasthitam audārikasūkṣmatvaṃ pārāpāravat. kathaṃ hi nāma. audārikaṃ sūkṣmaṃ bhavati sūkṣmaṃ ca audārikam iti. na. apekṣābhedād [Tib. 39a] iti.
T07yabhkvyu:879: apekṣayā bhedo 'pekṣābhedaḥ. tasmān nāsiddhaṃ. yad evāpekṣya audārikaṃ na jātu tad apekṣya sūkṣmaṃ. na kadācit tad evāpekṣyam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:880: pitṛputravad iti. tadyathā evadattasya putro yajñadattaḥ. yajñadattasya putro viṣṇumitraḥ. sa yajñadatto viṣṇumitram apekṣya pitā. evadattam apekṣya putraḥ. na cāpekṣikatvād asya pitṛputrabhāvo na sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:881: apekṣābhedāt. na hi sa yajñadattas tam eva viṣṇumitram apekṣya putraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:882: nāpi tam eva devadattam apekṣya (Abhidh-k-vy 44) piteti. tadvat. hīnaṃ kliṣṭaṃ sadbhis tyaktam iti kṛtvā. praṇītam akliṣṭaṃ kleśadūṣitatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:883: dūram atītānāgataṃ saṃtānapracyutatvāt tadasaṃprāptatvāc ca. antikaṃ pratyutpannaṃ saṃtānasaṃnihitatvāt. evaṃ yāvad vijñānam iti. yā kācid vedanā atītānāgatapratyutpannā ādhyātmikī vā bāhyā vā audārikā vā sūkṣmā
T07yabhkvyu:884: yā vā dūre yā vā antike tāṃ sarvām aikadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya vedanāskandha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati. evaṃ yāvad vijñānaṃ vaktavyaṃ. yāvat sarvam aikadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya vijñānaskandha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:885: atītāditvam eṣāṃ vedanādīnāṃ yathā rūpasya. ayaṃ tu viśeṣo vedanādīnāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:886: audārikaṃ paṃcendriyāśrayaṃ vedanādicatuṣkaṃ. amūrtatvāt avagatam audārikatvaṃ [Tib. 39b] nāsti. sūkṣaṃ mānasam āśrayasyāpy amūrtatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:887: bhūmito veti. audārikaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca vedanādikaṃ. audārikī kāmāvacarī vedanā. sūkṣmā prathamadhyānabhūmikā. audārikī prathamadhyānabhūmikā.
T07yabhkvyu:888: sūkṣmā dvitīyadhyānabhūmikā. evaṃ yāvad audārikī ākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmikā.
T07yabhkvyu:889: sūkṣmā bhavāgrabhūmiketi. yathā vedanā. evaṃ yāvad vijñānaṃ vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:890: bhadanta iti sthaviraḥ. kaścit sautrāntikas tannāmā vā. bhagavadviśeṣas tv āha. sthaviraharmatāto 'sāv iti. atra vayaṃ brūmaḥ. yadi harmatrāto 'tītānāgatāstitvavādī. sa iti na sautrāntiko na ārṣṭāntika ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:891: tathā hi vakṣyati. bhāvānyatviko bhadantaharmatrātaḥ. sa kilāha.
T07yabhkvyu:892: dharmasyādhvasu pravartamānasya bhāvānyathātvaṃ bhavati na dravyasyānyathātvam iti. sautrāntikadarśanāvalaṃbī cāyaṃ bhadanto
T07yabhkvyu:894: svanāmnaiva vibhāṣāyāṃ likhitaḥ. bhadantaharmatrāta āhetyevamadi. tena lakṣyate bhadantaharmatrātād anyo 'yaṃ sautrāntikaḥ kaścit sthaviro
T07yabhkvyu:895: bhikṣur iti. paṃcendriyagrāhyam iti rūpādipaṃcakaṃ. sūkṣmam anyac cakṣurādipaṃcakaṃ. avijñaptiś ca. manāpam iti. mana āpnotīti manaāpaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:896: manojñam ity arthaḥ. punaḥsaṃdhikaraṇaṃ cātra draṣṭavyaṃ. pūrvatrāsiddham iti īṣadarthena ñaparigrahāt kiṃcit siddham ity ekasavarṇadīrghatvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:897: dūram adṛśyadeśam iti. ādhāradeśaṃ āśrayādhāradeśaṃ [Tib. 40a] cādhikṛtya.
T07yabhkvyu:898: draṣṭuṃ śakyo dṛśyaḥ. dṛśyo deśo 'syeti dṛśyadeśaṃ dṛśyādhāradeśaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:899: dṛśyāśrayādhāradeśaṃ vā. tadyathā kuṇḍe badaraṃ. cakṣurādi vā. tad
T07yabhkvyu:900: antikaṃ. adṛśyadeśaṃ tu tadviparītaṃ dūraṃ. dūram adṛśyam iti noktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:901: āsannam api hi kiṃcid atisūkṣmatvān na dṛśyate. na ca tad dūram iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:902: dṛśyadeśatvāt. kimarthaṃ punar evaṃ bhadantena vyākhyāyate. atītādīnāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:903: svaśabdenābhihitatvāt. anyathā hi punaruktadoṣaḥ syāt. dūrāntikatvaṃ tu teṣām āśrayavaśād (Abhidh-k-vy 45) iti. teṣāṃ vedanādīnām amūrtatvenādeśasthatvāt tasmād evaṃ vaktavyaṃ. dūre adṛśyamānāśrayā vedanādayaḥ. antike dṛśyamānāśrayā iti. audārikasūkṣmatvaṃ pūrvavad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:905: cittacaittānām āyam utpattiṃ tanvantīty āyatanāni. dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpattir iti sarveṣām āyatanatvasiddhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:906: ekasminn āśraye saṃtāne veti. āśraye samudāyalakṣaṇe śarīre. saṃtāne vā cittādīnāṃ pravāhalakṣaṇe. svasyā jāteḥ. kiṃ. ākarā iti prakṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:907: sabhāgahetutvāt. pūrvotpannaṃ cakṣuḥ paścimasya sabhāgabetur ity ākaro
T07yabhkvyu:908: dhātuḥ. yato hi suvarṇādyutpattiḥ. te teṣām ākarāḥ. asaṃskṛtaṃ na dhātuḥ
T07yabhkvyu:909: syāt. na hy asaṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtasyānyasya vā sabhāgahetuḥ. [Tib. 40b]
T07yabhkvyu:910: cittacaittānāṃ tarhīti. kiṃ. ākarā iti prakṛtaṃ. dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpattir iti sarvadhātavo vijñānasya sasaṃprayogasya pratyayo
T07yabhkvyu:913: dhānyarāśivat. pudgalavad vā. sa hi prajñaptisan pudgalaḥ rūpādiprajñaptikāraṇanirapekṣāgṛhyamāṇasvabhāvatvāt
T07yabhkvyu:914: kāryabhārodvahanārtha iti. kāryam eva bhāraḥ. kāryabhāraḥ. tad uhyate teneti udvahanaṃ. kāryabhārasyodvahanaṃ kāryabhārodvaḥanaṃ. śarīrapradeśaḥ sa loke skandha ity ucyate. anenāpi kāryabhāra uhyate nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam ityādivacanāt. tasmāt skandha iva skandha ity aupacārikaśabdaḥ. pracchedārtho vā. avadhyartho vety arthaḥ. rūpapracchedo yāvad vijñānapraccheda iti. tad etad utsūtram iti. tad etad ubhayaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:915: kāryabhārodvahanārthaḥ pracchedārthaś ceti. utkrāntaṃ sūtrād utsūtraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:916: sūtraṃ hīti vistareṇa tat pratipādayati. pratyekam iti vistaraḥ. katham ity āha. sarvam etad atītādirūpam ekaśaḥ ekaikaṃ rūpaskandha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:917: samudāyena samudāyidravyam uktaṃ. teṣāṃ hy atītādīnāṃ rūpāṇāṃ sa rāśir ity
T07yabhkvyu:918: abhiprāyaḥ. sūtre 'py evam evoktaṃ. pṛthivīdhātuḥ [Tib. 41a] katamaḥ. keśā romāṇīti vistaraḥ. ekaikaṃ keśādidravyaṃ pṛthivīdhātur iti vijñāyate. ayaṃ ca parihāraḥ kāryabhārodvahanārthapracchedārthapakṣayor spi śakyate
T07yabhkvyu:919: vaktuṃ. na śakyaṃ evam iti vistaraḥ. aikadhyam adhisaṃkṣipyeti vacanātirekāt. ekaikaṃ rūpaskandha iti na śakyate vijñātuṃ. yadi hy evam
T07yabhkvyu:920: artho 'bhaviṣyat. tat sarvaṃ rūpaskandha ity evāvakṣyat. nārtham aikadhyam abhisaṃkṣipyeti vacanena. tasmād rāśivad eva skandhāḥ prajñaptisanta iti
T07yabhkvyu:922: tatsamudāyitvād ity avagantavyaṃ. rūpīṇy apīti vistaraḥ. rūpigrahaṇam
T07yabhkvyu:923: arūpiviśeṣaṇārthaṃ. arūpi hi manaāyatanaṃ asaṃhatam api kāraṇabhāvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:924: bibharti. rūpīṇy api (Abhidh-k-vy 46) cakṣurādīni āyatanāni samuditāny eva cittacaittāyadvāratāṃ gacchanti nāsamuditānīti. samudāyalakṣaṇatvāt skandhavat prajñāptisanti syuḥ. saṃcitāśrayālambanā hi paṃcavijñānakāyā
T07yabhkvyu:925: iti. na. ekaśaḥ samagrāṇāṃ kāraṇabhāvād iti. naitad evaṃ. kasmāt. ekaśaḥ pratyekaṃ samagrāṇāṃ samuditānāṃ kāraṇatvāt. yasmād bahūnām eṣām
T07yabhkvyu:926: cakurādiparamāṇūnāṃ parasparam apekṣyamāṇānām ekaikaśaḥ kāraṇabhāvaḥ. na tv asaṃhatānāṃ. tadyathā dārvākarṣaṇe bahūnām ākraṣṭṝṇāṃ [Tib. 41b]
T07yabhkvyu:927: pratyekam asāmarthyaṃ. samuditānāṃ tu parasparam apekṣyamāṇānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:928: sāmarthyaṃ. yathā vā keśāḥ pṛthakpṛthag avasthitā na samarthās
T07yabhkvyu:929: taimirikacakṣurvijñānakaraṇe. samuditās tv asaṃyuktā api samarthāḥ. tadvac cakṣurādīndriyaparamāṇavo rūpādiviṣayaparamāṇavaś ca cakṣurādivijñānotpādane pratyekam asamarthāḥ. samuditās tu samarthāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:930: śaktiṛ hi bhāvānāṃ tādṛśy avagantavyā. viṣayasahakāritvād veti. yadi bahūnām āyadvārabhāva iti samudāyāyatanatvaṃ syān na dravyāyatanatvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:931: indriyaviṣayaparamāṇūnāṃ samuditānām āyadvārabhāva iti tat samudāyāyatanatvaṃ syāt. na pṛthagāyatanatvaṃ syāt. iṣyate ca pṛthagāyatanatvaṃ dvādaśāyatanānīti sūtrāt. sādhanaṃ cātropatiṣṭhate. ye
T07yabhkvyu:935: cakṣurāyatanasamudāyadravyaparamāṇavaḥ. evaṃ yāvat kāyāyatanasamudāyadravyaparamāṇavo yojyāḥ. vibhāṣāyāṃ tūcyata iti. anenāpi prajñaptisantaḥ skandhā iti vyācaṣṭe. ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ. adravyasanto 'pi te tatropacāreṇa pradarśyanta iti. viśeṣārthas tuśabdaḥ. skandhaprajñaptim apekṣate iti. skandha iti prajñaptim apekṣate. rāśir iti prajñaptim [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:936: 42a] apekṣata ity arthaḥ. paramāṇur ekasya dhātor iti. daśānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ rūpiṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ anyatamasya pradeśaḥ. evam āyatanānām eṣām
T07yabhkvyu:937: evānyatamasya rūpaskandhasya ca pradeśaḥ. kasamāt. na hi prajñaptāv
T07yabhkvyu:938: apekṣitāyāṃ pradeśini pravṛttaḥ śabdaḥ pradeśe vyavasthāpyate. atha
T07yabhkvyu:939: nāpekṣate. kiṃ. skandhaprajñaptim ity adhikṛtaṃ. sa āha. paramāṇur eko dhātur iti vistaraḥ. sa ekaikas teṣām āyatanadhātūnāṃ yo 'nyatama ukto rūpaskandhaś ca. bhavati hi pradeśe 'pi pradeśivad upacāra iti. pradeśe
T07yabhkvyu:940: 'pi paramāṇau anyatamarūpāyatanadhātuvad rūpaskandhavac copacāraḥ. tatra tasyeveti vatiḥ. yathā paṭaikadeśe dagdhe paṭo dagdha iti. yathā paṭaśabdaḥ samudāye pravṛttaḥ. pradeśe 'py upacaryate paṭaikadeśe. tadvat skandhaśabdo (Abhidh-k-vy 47) 'tītādirūpasamudāye pravṛttaḥ. pradeśe 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:941: paramāṇāv upacaryata iti. skandhā eva prajñaptisanto nāyatanadhātava iti.
T07yabhkvyu:942: rūpādīnāṃ skandhā iti kṛtvā. yadā tu rūpāṇy eva skandhā iti samāsaḥ. tadā dravyasantaḥ skandhā ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:943: idam iha vicāryate. kim atra kāraṇaṃ yad indriyaparamāṇūnāṃ viṣayaparamāṇūnāṃ ca vijñānotpattaye tulye 'py anyonyasāpekṣatve na dvayānām eṣāṃ kevalendriyaparamāṇuvad ekāyatanatvaṃ vyavasthāpyate. yasmāc
T07yabhkvyu:944: [Tib. 42b] cakṣurindriyādiparamāṇavaḥ sarve svavijñānotpattau sādhāraṇāni kāraṇāni bhavanti. na tu tathā viṣayaparamāṇavaḥ. tathā hi cakṣurindriyaparamāṇavo nīlaviṣayavijñānotpattāv api kāraṇaṃ bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:945: pītādivijñānotpattāv api. nīlaviṣayaparamāṇavas tu svavijñānotpattāv eva kāraṇaṃ bhavanti. na pītādivijñānotpattau. ity ataś cakṣurindriyaparamāṇubhis tadviṣayaparamāṇūnām atulyavartitvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:946: pṛthaksthānāvasthitatvāt. na cakṣūrūpaparamaṇūnām ekāyatanatvavyavasthānatvaṃ yujyate. evaṃ yāvat kāyendriyaspraṣṭavyaparamāṇūnāṃ ekāyatanatvavyavasthānaṃ na yujyata iti vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:948: iti. saṃmohaprajñādhimokṣatraidhād ity arthaḥ. trayaḥ prakārās traidham
T07yabhkvyu:949: iti. tridhaiva traidham iti svarthe 'ṇpratyaya ity eke. tridhābhāvas traidham iti bhāve 'ṇpratyaya ity apare. mohendriyarucīnāṃ traidhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:950: tasmād iti. piṇḍātmagrahaṇata iti. kecic caittān piṇḍato gṛhītvā tān evātmato gṛhṇanti. piṇḍagrāhe saty ātmagrāhapravṛtteḥ. teṣāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:951: skandhadeśanā. tasyāṃ hi vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārabhedena tridhā caittā deśitāḥ. nāyam ekaḥ pinḍaś caittaviśeṣā ihety ātmagrāhaḥ pratipakṣito
T07yabhkvyu:952: bhavati. atha vā piṇḍarūpo 'yam ātmabhāvaḥ. sa cātmā vedayitā saṃjñātā cetayiteti kecit saṃmūḍhāḥ. teṣāṃ skandhadeśanā. nāyam ātmarūpaḥ piṇḍaś
T07yabhkvyu:953: caittā iheme vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ [Tib. 43a] pravartante ity ātmagrāhaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:954: pratipakṣito bhavati. kecid rūpa eveti. piṇḍātmagrahaṇataḥ saṃmūḍhā ity
T07yabhkvyu:955: adhikṛtaṃ. teṣām āyatanadeśanā. tasyāṃ hi rūpaṃ cakṣurādibhedena bahudhā vibhaktaṃ. caittās tv aikadhyam eva dharmāyatanatvena cittaṃ ca
T07yabhkvyu:956: manaāyatanatveneti. kecid rūpacittayor iti. saṃmūḍhāḥ piṇḍātmagrahaṇata ity adhikṛtam eva. teṣāṃ dhātudeśanā. tasyāṃ hi rūpaṃ cakṣurādibhedena bahudhā vibhaktaṃ. cittaṃ cakṣurvijñānādidhātubhedena. na tu caittā
T07yabhkvyu:957: dharmadhātutvenaiva deśitatvād iti. tayā rūpacittapiṇḍagrāhasaṃmohaḥ pratipakṣito bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:958: indriyāṇy apīti vistaraḥ. trividhaḥ pudgalaḥ tīkṣṇamadhyamṛdvindriyatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:959: atha vā trividhaḥ pudgalaḥ udghaṭitajño vipaṃcitajñaḥ padaparama iti.
T07yabhkvyu:960: (Abhidh-k-vy 48) tatra tīkṣṇendriyāṇāṃ skandhadeśanā. te hi tīkṣṇendriyatvāt skandhabhedenaiva āyatanadhātubhedaṃ pratipattuṃ
T07yabhkvyu:961: śaknuvanti. yathoktaṃ yad bhikṣo na tvaṃ sa te dharmaḥ prahātavya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:962: ājñātaṃ bhagavann ity āha. yathā katham asya bhikṣo saṃkṣiptenoktasyārtham ājānāsi. rūpaṃ bhadanta nāhaṃ. sa me dharmaḥ prahātavya iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:965: śaknuvanti. na tu saṃkṣiptena skandhaprabhedena. mṛdvindriyāṇāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:966: dhātudeśanā. te hi mṛdvindriyatvāt nāvibhaktaṃ svabuddhisāmarthyena pratipattuṃ śaknuvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:967: rucir api trividheti. pūrvābhyāsayogād ruces traividhyaṃ. atha vā śamathacaritānāṃ saṃkṣiptā ruciḥ. śamathavipaśyanācaritānāṃ madhyā ruciḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:969: (I.21) kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇam iti vistaraḥ. nanu ca kāraṇam uktaṃ piṇḍātmagrahaṇataś caittasaṃmūḍhānāṃ skandhadeśaneti. satyam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:970: caittās teṣāṃ vibhaktā iti. vedanāsaṃjñe eva tu saṃskāraskandhāt pṛthak skandhīkṛtaḥ. na punar anya iti kim atra kāraṇaṃ. kāmādhyavasānam iti vistaraḥ. kāmeṣu ca dṛṣṭiṣu cābhiṣvaṃgaḥ. tayor vivādamūlayor adhyavasānayor vedanāsaṃjñe yathākramaṃ pradhānahetur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:971: pradhānagrahaṇād avidyādayo 'pradhānahetava ity arthata uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:972: vedanāsvādavaśād dhi kāmān abhiṣvajante gṛhiṇaḥ. viparītasaṃjñāvaśāc ca dṛṣṭīḥ. kim. abhiṣvajanta ity adhikṛtaṃ. adharme dharmasaṃjñino dharme
T07yabhkvyu:974: śīlavrataparāmarśādīr abhiṣvajante. ke te. prāyeṇa pravrajitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:975: vedanāgṛddho hīti [Tib. 44a] vistaraḥ. vedanāsaktaś caturbhir viparyāsair
T07yabhkvyu:976: viparyastaḥ saṃsāre janmaparaṃparāṃ karoti kramakāraṇād iti. catvāri kāraṇāni skandhānukrame
T07yabhkvyu:978: iti. rūpaṃ hi sapratighatvāt sarvaudārikaṃ. arūpiṇāṃ vedanā pracāraudārikatayā. tathā hi vyapadiśanti. haste me vedanā pāde me vedaneti. dvābhyām audārikatarā saṃjñā. vijñānāt saṃskārā ity ato yathaudārikaṃ tat pūrvam uktam ity prathamaṃ kāraṇaṃ. atha vānādimati saṃsāre strīpuruṣā anyonyaṃ rūpābhirāmāḥ. te ca vedanāsvādagardhāt.
T07yabhkvyu:979: tadgardhaḥ saṃjñāviparyāsāt. tadviparyāsaḥ kleśaiḥ. cittaṃ ca tatsaṃkliṣṭam iti yathāsaṃkleśaṃ krama iti dvitīyaṃ. bhājanādyarthena vā bhājanabhojanavyaṃjanapaktṛbhoktṛbhūtā hi (Abhidh-k-vy 49) rūpādayaḥ skandhā iti tṛtīyaṃ. dhātuto vā kāmarūpaprabhāvito hi kāmadhātuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:981: saṃskāramātraprabhāvitaṃ bhavāgram. etā vijñānasthitayas tāsu ca pratiṣṭhitaṃ vijñānam iti kṣetrabījasaṃdarśānārthaḥ skandhānukrama iti caturthaṃ kāraṇam. atha eva ca kramakāraṇāt vedanāsaṃjñe [Tib. 44b] pṛthak
T07yabhkvyu:982: skandhīkṛte. yata ete audārikatare saṃkleśānukramahetū bhojanavyaṃjanabhūte tatprabhāvitaṃ ca dhātudvayam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:983: (I.22ab) na tāvad eṣv evāntarnetuṃ śakyate arthāyogād iti. rūpaṇāder arthasyāyogād asaṃbhavāt. rūpasvabhāvaṃ yāvad vijñānasvabhāvam iti vā na
T07yabhkvyu:984: śakyam eṣv eva paṃcaskandheṣv antarnetum. atatsvābhāvyāt. na cāpi ṣaṣṭhaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:985: skandho vaktuṃ śakyate. kutaḥ. arthāyogāt. atītādyarthayogād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:986: nanu ca bahutvād asaṃskṛtānāṃ asaṃskṛtaskandho 'nyo yokṣyate. kim
T07yabhkvyu:988: deśasaṃnikarṣābhāvenābhisaṃkṣepāyogāt. saṃkleśavastujñāpanārtham iti vistaraḥ. na saṃkleśavastv anāsravatvāt. na vyavadānavastv asaṃskṛtatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:989: vyavadānahetur hi vyavadānavastv ity abhiprāyaḥ. atha vā rūpaskandha ity ukte yāvad vijñānaskandha ity ukte saṃkleśavastu vyavadānavastu ca
T07yabhkvyu:990: rūpaskandho yāvad vijñānaskandha iti vijñāyate. na tv asaṃskṛtaskandha ity ukte saṃkleśavyavadānavastu vijñāyata iti na saṃbhavati asaṃskṛtaskandha iti. teṣāṃ dhātvāyataneṣv apy eṣa prasaṃga iti. teṣām evaṃvādināṃ yathā
T07yabhkvyu:991: ghaṭoparamo na ghaṭaḥ. evaṃ dhātūparamo na dhātuḥ. āyatanoparamo nāyatanam iti dharmadhātvāyatanayor apy asaṃskṛtaṃ na vyavasthāpitaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:992: sarvadharmasaṃgrahaś ca dhātvāyataneṣv abhipreta ity ayuktam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:994: kramaḥ punar ity anyaprakāravacanāpekṣāḥ punaḥśabdopanyāsa iti darśayati. sarvaudārikam
T07yabhkvyu:999: sujñātatvāt. vijñānāt saṃskāra audārikaḥ sukhī syāṃ na duḥkhī syām ity
T07yabhkvyu:1001: upalabdhimātralakṣaṇatvāt. yathaudārikaṃ ca vineyānām arthapratipādanaṃ nyāyyam iti evaṃ skandhānukramaḥ. te ca vedanāsvādagardhāt. te ca strīpuruṣā vedanāsvādasakter anyonyaṃ rūpābhirāmā bhavanti. tadgardha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1004: bhājanabhojanam iti vistaraḥ. rūpaṃ bhājanabhūtaṃ vedanāśrayatvāt. vedanā bhojanabhūtā āsvādyatvāt. saṃjñā vyaṃjanabhūtā vedanāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1005: tannimittodgrahaṇena vyaṃjayatīti kṛtvā. saṃjñāvaśena vā vedanā rocata iti kṛtvā vyaṃjanabhūtā samjñā. cetanā paktṛbhūtā vipākavedanām abhisaṃskṛtya
T07yabhkvyu:1007: bhājanādyarthena vānukramaḥ. dhātuto veti vistaraḥ. kāmaguṇā eva rūpāṇi.
T07yabhkvyu:1008: taiḥ prabhāvitaḥ prakarṣitaḥ kāmadhātuḥ. vedanāprabhāvitāni dhyānāni.
T07yabhkvyu:1011: upekṣendriyapariśuddhiprabhāvitaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ. saṃjñāprabhāvitās traya ārūpyāḥ. ākāśasaṃjñāprabhāvitam
T07yabhkvyu:1013: ākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ. saṃskāramātraprabhāvitaṃ bhavāgraṃ. tatra hi cetanā
T07yabhkvyu:1014: aśītiṃ kalpasahasrāṇy āyur ākṣipati. vijñānaṃ kasmāt sarveṣāṃ paścād uktam ity ata āha etā vijñānasthitaya iti vistaraḥ. catasro vijñānasthitayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1015: rūpopagā vijñānasthitiḥ kāmadhātuḥ. vedanopagā catvāri dhyānāni.
T07yabhkvyu:1016: saṃjñopagā traya ārūpyāḥ. saṃskāropagā bhavāgraṃ. tāsu catasṛṣu vijñānasthitiṣu pratiṣṭhitaṃ vijñānaṃ tadāśritatvāt sarvapaścād uktaṃ. ity evaṃ kṣetrabījasaṃdarśanārthaḥ skandhānukrama ukto bhavati. ata eva ca
T07yabhkvyu:1017: paṃca skandhā nālpīyāṃso na bhūyāṃsa iti. yathaudārikādibhiḥ kāraṇair nālpīyāṃso na bhūyāṃsa ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1019: vartamānaviṣayāni. tāni parisphuṭaviṣayāṇi. parisphuṭaviṣayāṇi ca sugamānīti pūrvam uktāni. vartamānaviṣayāṇi ca pūrvavṛttīni bhavanty evaṃ ca pūrvam uktāni. manas tv aniyataviṣayam ity ākulaviṣayitvāt asugamaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1020: paścādvṛtti ca prāyeṇa. katham ity āha. kiṃcid vartamānaviṣayaṃ kiṃcid
T07yabhkvyu:1021: yāvat tryadhvānadhvaviṣayam iti. yāvacchabdena kiṃcid atītaviṣayaṃ kiṃcid anāgataviṣayaṃ kiṃcit tryadhvaviṣayaṃ. sarvadharmā anātmāna iti yathā.
T07yabhkvyu:1022: kiṃcid anadhvaviṣayam asaṃskṛtaviṣayam ity arthaḥ. evam aniyataviṣayaṃ manaḥ. tathā ca na tat sugamam iti paścād uktaṃ. sugamaṃ hi loke pūrvam upadiśyamānaṃ dṛśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1023: bhautikārthāc catuṣṭayam iti cakṣurādicatuṣṭayaṃ rūpādyupādāyarūpaviṣayaṃ. tasmāt. tat kāyāt
T07yabhkvyu:1024: uktaṃ. kāyasya tv aniyato viṣayaḥ. kadācid bhūtāni kadācid bhautikaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1026: avyavacchedagrahaṇaṃ. śeṣaṃ punar itarasmād yathāyogaṃ dūrāśutaravṛttyā pūrvam uktam iti. śeṣaṃ cakṣurādi. tad itarasmāt saṃbhavato
T07yabhkvyu:1027: dūrāśutaravṛttyā dūravṛttyā dūrataravṛttyā āśutaravṛttyeti vibhajya dvayaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1028: dvayāt. ekaṃ caikasmāt punar ekaṃ caikasmād iti yojyam ity arthaḥ. katham ity āha. cakṣuḥśrotraṃ hi dūraviṣayaṃ tat pūrvam uktaṃ dvayāt
T07yabhkvyu:1029: ghrāṇajihvātaḥ. tayor api cakṣuḥśrotrayoḥ [Tib. 46b] cakṣuṣo dūratare vṛttiḥ. paśyato 'pi dūrān nadīṃ tacchabdāśravaṇāt. atas tat pūrvam uktam iti vartate. cakṣuḥ śrotrāt pūrvam uktaṃ. tayor āśutaravṛttitvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1030: tayor ghrāṇajihvayor ghrāṇaṃ pūrvam uktaṃ jihvāyāḥ. katham ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:1032: idam iha vicāryate. ghrāṇajihve prāptaviṣayagrāhiṇyau. kathaṃ. bhojyastho gandhaḥ tena ghrāṇena gṛhate. na tv abhojyastho gṛhyate. vāyos tu gandhāntaram udbhavati bhojyāvayavena vā sūkṣmeṇa sahāgato gandho gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1033: niruchvāsasya gandhāgrahaṇāt. na tarhīdaṃ vaktavyaṃ. aprāptasyaiva jihvāṃ bhojyasya gandhagrahaṇād iti. yat tat piṇḍarūpaṃ bhojyaṃ. taj jihvām aprāptam ity abhisaṃdhāyavacaṇād adoṣaḥ. evaṃ hy āśutaravṛtti ghrāṇaṃ yad bhojyāvayavasahāgatam api gandhaṃ jighrati. jihvā tu bhojyāvayavasahāgataṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1034: rasaṃ nāsvādayati. piṇḍabhojyasahāgatam eva tu rasam āsvādayatīti na
T07yabhkvyu:1036: (I.24) kathaṃ viśeṣaṇārtham iti pratipādayann āha. yathā gamyeta pratyekam
T07yabhkvyu:1037: iti vistaraḥ. yathā vijñāyeta ekaikaśa eṣāṃ daśānāṃ āyatanatvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1038: cakṣurādīnāṃ paṃcānāṃ viṣayitvena. rūpādīnāṃ ca paṃcānāṃ viṣayatvena
T07yabhkvyu:1039: vyavasthānāt. na samastānām āyatanatvaṃ rūpāyatanam ity ekam eveti. tathā ca parasparato viśeṣaṇaṃ na syāt. yadi viśeṣaṇārthaṃ nāmantarāṇy ucyante navānāṃ cakṣurāyatanasya yāvat kāyāyatanasya śabdāyatanasya yāvat
T07yabhkvyu:1041: 47a] ata āha. cakṣurādibhiś ca viśeṣitair yan na cakṣursaṃjñakaṃ rūpaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:1042: tad rūpāyatanaṃ jñāsyata ity asya nāmāntaraṃ nocyate. tadyathā sarvāsu goṣv aṃkitāsu yā gaur nāṃkitā. tasyā anaṃkanam evāṃkanaṃ bhavati. tadvat.
T07yabhkvyu:1043: prādhānyād iti tribhiḥ kāraṇai rūpāyatanasya prādhānyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1044: pānyādisaṃsparśair bādhanālakṣaṇād rūpaṇāt. idam ihāmutreti deśanidarśanarūpaṇāt. idam eva rūpam iti lokapratītatvāc ca. viśeṣaṇārtham evaikaṃ dharmāyatanam uktam iti. kathaṃ viśeṣaṇārthaṃ. yathā gamyeta pratyekam eṣāṃ dvādaśānām āyatanatvaṃ viṣayiviṣayatvena vyavasthānāt
T07yabhkvyu:1045: (Abhidh-k-vy 52) na samastānām iti. cakṣurādibhiś ca viśeṣitair yan na cakṣurādisaṃjñakaṃ dharmaś ca. tad dharmāyatanaṃ jñāsyata iti tasya nāmāntaraṃ nocyate. vedanādīnām ity ādiśabdena
T07yabhkvyu:1048: vacanāt. cakṣustrayagocaratvāc ca. māṃsacakṣur asmadādīnāṃ. divyaṃ cakṣur devānāṃ. āryaṃ prajñācakṣur āryāṇām anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ satyacatuṣṭayālambanaṃ. ato rūpam eva cakṣustrayagocaraṃ. na cakṣurādayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1049: tasmāt. tad eva rūpāyatanam uktaṃ nānyāni.
T07yabhkvyu:1050: (I.25) yeṣām vāksvabhāvaṃ buddhavacanam iti. yeṣāṃ sautrāntikānāṃ [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:1052: śabdāyatanasya rūpaskandhasaṃgṛhītatvāt. yeṣāṃ nāmasvabhāvam iti. yeṣāṃ nikāyāntarīyāṇāṃ cittaviprayuktaṃ nāmāsti. teṣāṃ saṃskāraskandhena saṃgṛhītāni. saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītatvān nāmnaḥ. ābhidhārmikāṇāṃ tūbhayasvabhāvaṃ buddhavacanam iṣṭaṃ. tathā hi jñānaprasthāna uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1053: katamad buddhavacanaṃ. tathāgatasya yā vāg vacanaṃ vyāhāro gīr niruktir vākpatho vāgghośo vākkarma vāgvijñaptiḥ. buddhavacanaṃ kuśalaṃ vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1054: avyākṛtaṃ vaktavyaṃ. syāt kuśalaṃ. syād avyākṛtaṃ. katarat kuśalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1055: kuśalacittasya tathāgatasya vācaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya yā vāg yāvad vāgvijñaptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1056: katarad avyākṛtaṃ. avyākṛtacittasya tathāgatasyeti pūrvavat. punas tatraivānantaram uktaṃ buddhavacanaṃ nāma ka eṣa dharmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1057: nāmakāyapadakāyavyaṃjanakāyānāṃ yā anupūrvaracanā anupūrvasthāpanā anupūrvasamāyoga iti. teṣām ābhidhārmikāṇāṃ rūpaskandhena
T07yabhkvyu:1059: sātirekāṇi me aśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi bhagavato 'ntikāt saṃmukham udgṛhītānīti sūtravacanaṃ. caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇīti nikāyāntare sūtrapāṭhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1061: iti. śāstrasya pramāṇaṃ śāstrapramāṇaṃ. śāstrapramāṇaṃ [Tib. 48a] pramāṇam
T07yabhkvyu:1063: śāstrapramāṇa ity eke tāvad āhuḥ. tac ca ṣaṭsahasrāṇīti. tac ca śāstraṃ harmaskandhasaṃjñakaṃ granthaprāmāṇyena ṣaṭsahasrāṇīti. tāni tv aśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇy
T07yabhkvyu:1064: antarhitāni. ekaṃ tv etad avaśiṣyata iti kathayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:1066: (Abhidh-k-vy 53) apara āhur iti vākyādhyāhāraḥ. skandhādīnām ekaikā kathā
T07yabhkvyu:1067: dharmaskandhaḥ. te ca dharmaskandhā aśītisahasrasaṃkhyā vyākhyāyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:1068: pratītyasamutpādādīni ceha vyākhyāsyante. praṇidhijñānāraṇādīnām ity ādigrahaṇena saṃgrahavastukarmapathāśubhānapānasmṛtyādīni
T07yabhkvyu:1071: rāgadveṣamohamānādicaritabhedeneti. ādiśabdena dṛṣṭivicikitsādīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ. kecit sattvā rāgacaritāḥ. kecid dveṣacaritāḥ. kecin mohacaritāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1072: kecin mānacaritāḥ. kecid dṛṣṭicaritāḥ. kecid vicikitsācaritāḥ. kecid
T07yabhkvyu:1073: rāgadveṣacaritāḥ. kecid rāgadveṣamohacaritāḥ. kecid rāgāśayā dveṣaprayogāḥ. kecid dveśāśayā rāgaprayogāḥ. kecit kṛtrimarāgā nigṛhyadveṣāḥ. kecit kṛtrimadveṣā nigṛhyarāgā iti. teṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa bhagavatā tāny uktānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:1074: (I.27) ye 'py anye skandhāyatanadhātava iti vistaraḥ. [Tib. 48b] ye 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:1075: skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ. te 'py eṣv eva skandhāyatanadhātuṣu pratipādyāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:1076: praveśayitavyāḥ. svaṃsvaṃ svabhāvaṃ eṣāṃ yathā vyavasthāpitam asmin śāstre vimṛṣya skandhāḥ skandheṣu pratipādayitavyā āyatanāny āyataneṣu dhātavo dhātuṣu. śīlaskandho rūpaskandhasaṃgṛhīta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1079: vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ ca prajñāviśeṣa eveti. aṣṭāv alobhasvabhāvatvāt dharmāyataneneti. katamāny aṣṭau.
T07yabhkvyu:1082: iti. alobhaś ca dharmāyatane 'ntarbhavati. tena tatsaṃgrahaḥ. saparivārāṇi tu paṃcaskandhasvabhāvatvān manodharmāyatanābhyāṃ. kiṃ. saṃgṛhītāni.
T07yabhkvyu:1083: tasyālobhasya parivāro 'nuparivartirūpaṃ rūpaskandho vedanāsaṃjñe vedanāsaṃjñāskandhau cetanādayaḥ saṃprayuktā jātyādayaś ca viprayuktāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:1084: saṃskāraskandhaḥ. vijñānaṃ cātra kalāpe vijñānaskandha iti paṃcaskandhasvabhāvāni tāni bhavanti. navamadaśame tv ākāśānaṃtyāyatanavijñānānantyāyatanakṛtsne paścād vakṣyete. [Tib. tathābhibhvāyatanānīti tāny alobhasvabhāvatvāt dharmāyatanena.
T07yabhkvyu:1085: saparivārāṇi tu paṃcasvabhāvatvān manodharmāyatanena pūrvavat vyākhyātavyāni. ākāśavijñānānantyāyatanakṛtsne catvāri cākāśānantyāyatanādīni. ākāśavijñānākiṃcanyanaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanāni catuḥskandhasvabhāvatvān manodharmāyatanābhyāṃ saṃgṛhītāni. na hi tatra
T07yabhkvyu:1087: sūtra uktaṃ. paṃcemāni vimuktyāyatanāni. katamāni iha bhikṣo śāstā dharmaṃ deśayati. anyatarānyataro vā vijño gurusthānīyaḥ sabrahmacārī.
T07yabhkvyu:1088: yathāyathāsya śāstā anyatarānyataro vā vijño gurusthānīyaḥ sabrahmacārī dharmaṃ deśayati. tathātathā teṣu dharmeṣv arthapratisaṃvedī bhavati dharmapratisaṃvedī ca. tasyārthapratisaṃvedino dharmapratisaṃvedinaś cotpadyate prāmodyaṃ. pramuditasya prītir jāyate. prītamanasaḥ kāyaḥ praśrabhyate. praśrabdhakāyaḥ sukhaṃ vedayate. sukhitasya cittaṃ samādhīyate. samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yathābhūtaṃ paśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:1089: yathābhūtaṃ prajānan yathābhūtaṃ paśyan nirvidyate. nirviṇṇo virajyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1090: virakto vimucyate. [Tib. 49b] idaṃ prathamaṃ vimuktyāyatanaṃ. yatra sthitasya bhikṣor vā bhikṣuṇyā vā anupasthitā smṛtir upatiṣṭhate.
T07yabhkvyu:1091: asamāhitaṃ cittaṃ samādhīyate. aparikṣīṇāś cāsravāḥ parikṣīyante.
T07yabhkvyu:1092: ananuprāptaṃ cānuttaraṃ yogakṣemaṃ nirvāṇam anuprāpnoti. punar aparaṃ na
T07yabhkvyu:1093: haiva bhikṣo śāstā dharmaṃ deśayaty anyatarānyataro vā vijño gurusthānīyaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:1094: sabrahmacārī. api tu yathāśrutān dharmān yathopadiṣṭān yathāparyavāptān
T07yabhkvyu:1095: vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṃ karoti. yathāyathā tān yathāśrutān
T07yabhkvyu:1096: yathopadiṣṭān yathāparyavāptāṃ vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:1097: tathātathā teṣu arthapratisaṃvedī bhavati pūrvavat. idaṃ dvitīyaṃ vimuktyāyatanaṃ. yatra sthitasyeti pūrvavat. punar aparaṃ na haiva bhikṣo śāstā dharmaṃ deśayati anyatarānyataro vā vijño gurusthānīyaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:1098: sabrahmacārī. nāpi yathāśrutān dharmān yathopadiṣṭān yathāparyavāptān vistareṇa svādhyāyaṃ karoti. api tu yathāśrutān dharmān yathopadiṣṭān yathāparyavāptān vistareṇa parebhyaḥ saṃprakāśayati. yathāyathā yathāśrutān dharmān yathopadiṣṭān yathāparyavāptān vistareṇa parebhyaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:1099: saṃprakāśayati. tathātathā teṣu dharmeṣv arthapratisaṃvedī bhavatīti pūrvavat. idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vimuktyāyatanaṃ. yatra sthitasyeti pūrvavat. punar aparaṃ na haiva bhikṣo śāstā pūrvavat. nāpi svādhyāyaṃ nāpi parebhyaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:1100: saṃprakāśayati. api tu yathāśrutān yāvad yathāparyavāptān cintayati
T07yabhkvyu:1102: yathāparyavāptān cintayati yāvad upaparīkṣate. tathātathā teṣu dharmeṣv
T07yabhkvyu:1103: arthapratisaṃvedī pūrvavat. idaṃ caturthaṃ vimuktyāyatanaṃ. yatra sthitasyeti pūrvavat. punar aparaṃ na haiva bhikṣo śāsteti pūrvavat. nāpi svādhyāyaṃ nāpi parebhyaḥ saṃprakāśayati nāpi cintayati. api tv anenānyatamaṃ bhadrakaṃ samādhinimittaṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca sūdgṛhītaṃ bhavati sumanasikṛtaṃ subhāvitaṃ sujuṣṭaṃ supratividdhaṃ. tadyathā vinīlakaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 55) vā vipūyakaṃ vā vyādhmātakaṃ vā vipaṭumakaṃ vā vilohitakaṃ vā vikhāditakaṃ vā vikṣiptakaṃ vā asthi vā asthisaṃkalikā vā.
T07yabhkvyu:1104: yathāyathā khalv anenānyatamānyatamaṃ bhadrakaṃ samādhinimittaṃ pūrvavat yāvat supratividdham. tathātathā teṣu dharmeṣv arthaprativedī bhavati pūrvavat. idaṃ paṃcamaṃ vimuktyāyatanaṃ. yatra sthitasyeti pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:1105: vimukter āyadvāraṃ prajñāviśeṣaḥ. prajñā ca dharmāyatanena saṃgṛhītā.
T07yabhkvyu:1106: saparivārāṇi śabdamanodharmāyatanaiḥ. deśanāsvādhyāyaparasaṃprakāśaneṣu śabdagrahaṇāc chabdāyatanam asti. manodharmāyatane tu prajñāparivārabhūte
T07yabhkvyu:1107: sarvatrasthe iti tribhiḥ saṃgrahaḥ. dvayor āyatanayor iti. sūtra uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1108: rūpiṇaḥ santi sattvā [Tib. 50b] asaṃjñinaḥ apratisaṃjñinaḥ. tadyathā devā asaṃjñisattvāḥ. idaṃ prathamam āyatanaṃ. arūpiṇaḥ santi sattvāḥ sarvaśa ākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ samatikramya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharanti. tadyathā devā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāḥ. idaṃ dvitīyam āyatanam iti. anayor dvayor āyatanayor asaṃjñisattvā daśabhir āyatanaiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:1109: saṃgṛhītāḥ. gandharasāyatanayor eva tatrābhāvāt. bhavati hi cyutyupapattikālayos teṣāṃ manaāyatanam iti. naivasaṃjñānasaṃjñāyatanopagā manodharmāyatanābhyāṃ saṃgṛhītā ity adhikṛtaṃ. teṣām arūpitvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1110: bahudhātuke 'pi dvāṣaṣṭir dhātava iti. sūtra uktaṃ. āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat. kiyatā bhadanta paṇḍito dhātukuśalo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1111: bhagavān āha. paṇḍita ānanda aṣṭādaśa dhātūñ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1112: cakṣurdhātuṃ rūpadhātuṃ cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ. evaṃ yāvan manodhātuṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1113: dharmadhātuṃ manovijñānadhātum iti. itīmān ānandāṣṭādaśa dhātūñ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ. ṣaḍ api dhātūṃ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1114: pṛthivīdhātum abdhātuṃ tejodhātuṃ vāyudhātum ākāśadhātuṃ vijñānadhātum
T07yabhkvyu:1115: iti. aparān api ṣaḍ dhātūṃ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ. kāmadhātuṃ vyāpādadhātuṃ [Tib. 51a] vihiṃsādhātuṃ naiṣkramyadhātum avyāpādadhātum
T07yabhkvyu:1116: avihiṃsādhātum iti. aparān api ṣaḍ dhātūñ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1117: sukhadhātuṃ duḥkhadhātuṃ saumanasyadhātuṃ daurmanasyadhātum upekṣādhātum avidyādhātum iti. caturo 'pi dhātūñ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1118: vedanādhātuṃ saṃjñādhātuṃ saṃskāradhātuṃ vijñānadhātum iti. trīṇy api dhātūṃ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ. kāmadhātuṃ rūpadhātum ārūpyadhātum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1119: aparān api trīn dhātūṃ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ. rūpadhātuṃ ārūpyadhātuṃ nirodhadhātum iti. aparān api trīn dhātūṃ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1120: atītaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 56) dhātum anāgataṃ dhātuṃ pratyutpannaṃ dhātuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1121: aparān api trīn dhātūṃ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ. hīnaṃ dhātuṃ madhyamaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1122: dhātuṃ praṇītaṃ dhātum iti. aparān api trīn dhātūṃ jānāti paśyati
T07yabhkvyu:1123: yathābhūtaṃ. kuśalaṃ dhātum akuśalaṃ avyākṛtaṃ dhātum iti. aparān api trīn
T07yabhkvyu:1124: dhātūṃ jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ. śaikṣaṃ dhātum aśaikṣaṃ dhātuṃ naivaśaikṣaṃnāśaikṣaṃ dhātum iti. dvāv api dhātū jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ. sāsravaṃ [Tib. 51b] dhātum anāsravaṃ dhātum iti. aparāv api dvau dhātū jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ dhātum asaṃskṛtaṃ dhātum
T07yabhkvyu:1125: iti. imau dvau dhātū jānāti paśyati yathābhūtaṃ. iyatā cānanda paṇḍito
T07yabhkvyu:1126: dhātukuśalo bhavatīti. itīmāny atrābhisaṃbandhīni vākyāni pratyekaṃ madhye 'pi paṭhitavyāni. vistarabhayāt tu mayā na likhitānīti bodhavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1127: yathāyogaṃ saṃgraho veditavya iti. aṣṭādaśa tāvad dhātavas ta eva ta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1128: ebhis te saṃgṛhītā evāṣṭādaśasu dhātuṣu. yatra pṛthivīdhātvādayaḥ ṣaṭ.
T07yabhkvyu:1129: teṣām ādyānāṃ caturṇāṃ spraṣṭavyadhātau saṃgrahaḥ. ākāśadhāto rūpadhātāv ālokatamassvabhāvatvāt. vijñānadhātoḥ saptasu cittadhātuṣu saṃgrahaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1130: kāmadhātvādīnāṃ tu ṣaṇṇāṃ kāmadhātuḥ kāmarāga ihābhipretaḥ. sa ca caitasikaḥ. vyāpādadhātvādayo 'pi caitasikā eveti. teṣāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1131: dharmadhātusaṃgrahaḥ. sukhadhātvādīnām api ṣaṇṇāṃ tasminn eva saṃgrahaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1132: vedanādhātvādīnāṃ caturṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ dharmadhātau. vijñānadhātoḥ saptasu vijñānadhātuṣu. kāmadhātvādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ kāmadhātoḥ aṣṭādaśasu dhātuṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:1136: atītadhātvādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ pratyekam aṣṭādaśasu dhātuṣu saṃgrahaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1137: hīnādayas trayo dhātavaḥ kāmadhātvādaya eveti eṣām uktaḥ saṃgrahaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1138: kuśalādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ kuśalākuśaladhātvo rūpaśabdadharmadhātuṣu saptasu ca
T07yabhkvyu:1139: cittadhātuṣu. avyākṛtadhātor aṣṭādaśasu dhātuṣu. śaikṣāśaikṣadhātvādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ dvayor manodharmamanovijñānadhātuṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:1141: manodharmamanovijñānadhātuṣu. saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtadhātvor ādyasyāṣṭādaśasu dhātuṣu. dvitīyasya dharmadhātau saṃgrahaḥ. ta ete dvāṣaṣṭir dhātavaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1142: (I.28) ya ime tatreti bahudhātuke. eteṣāṃ dvayor lakṣaṇam anuktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1145: iti. nanu ca vijñānadhātor apy uktaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1146: vijñānaṃ prativijñaptir iti vacanāt. satyam uktaṃ sarveṣāṃ vijñānānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ. vijñānadhātus tu kim iha kiṃcid eva vijñānam ity abhipretaṃ. utāho sarvam iti na vivecitam.
T07yabhkvyu:1147: asaṃskṛtaṃ cākāśam uktalakṣaṇaṃ. na tv ākāśadhātuḥ. avaśyaṃ hy ayam [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:1148: 52b] anya ākāśāt. tathā hi ṣaḍdhātur ayaṃ bhikṣo puruṣa iti sūtrāntaram uktam. ity anayā buddhyābhihitaṃ dvayor lakṣaṇam anuktam iti. ata evāha.
T07yabhkvyu:1149: tat kim ākāśam evākāśadhātur veditavyaḥ. sarvaṃ ca vijñānaṃ vijñānadhātur
T07yabhkvyu:1150: iti. mukhanāsikādiṣv ity ādiśabdena śrotrādīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1153: ākāśam iti abhiprāyo lakṣyate. rātriṃdivasvabhāva iti. rātrivartinas tamaso bhāskarātapalakṣyasya cālokasyābhipretatvāt. bāhuliko vāyaṃ nirdeśaḥ. aghaṃ kila citasthaṃ rūpam iti. citasthaṃ saṃghātasthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1154: atyarthaṃ hanti hanyate ceti aghaṃ nairuktena vidhinā. atyarthaśabdasya akārādeśaḥ kṛto hanteś ca ghādeśaḥ. tasya taṭ sāmantakam iti. tasyāghasya kuḍyādikasya sāmantakaṃ samīpasthaṃ. tad apekṣya vyavasthāpitam ity
T07yabhkvyu:1156: svamataṃ tu yat tat paścād ucyate. tad āha. aghaṃ ca tat. anyasya rūpasya tatrāpratighātān na pratihanyate 'nyad rūpam asminn iti kṛtvā. sāmantakaṃ cānyasya rūpasyeti citasthasya. asmin pakṣe karmadhārayaḥ samāsaḥ. aghaṃ ca tat sāmantakaṃ ca tad iti aghasāmantakaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1158: [Tib. 53a] iti. janmano hetor vijñānasyābhipretatvāt. kuta iti cet. ata
T07yabhkvyu:1161: ṣaḍdhātur ayaṃ bhikṣo puruṣa iti. ṣaṭ khalu dhātūn pratītya mātuḥ kukṣau
T07yabhkvyu:1162: garbhasyāvakrāntir iti vacanāt. ete hi janmana iti vistaraḥ. ete hi janmano janakapoṣakasaṃvardhakatvād ādhārabhūtāḥ. janako hy atra
T07yabhkvyu:1164: saṃvardhaka (Abhidh-k-vy 58) ākāśadhātur avakāśadānāt. ata evaiṣāṃ dhātutvavacanaṃ. pratisaṃdhiṃ dadhata iti dhātavaḥ. anāsravās tu dharmā
T07yabhkvyu:1167: iti. kim idaṃ nidarśanaṃ nāma. yena viśeṣeṇa yogāt tad vastu tathā
T07yabhkvyu:1168: nidarśayituṃ śakyate. sa viśeṣo nidarśanam ity ucyate. vacanena parasya cakṣurvijñānām utpannaṃ vā nidarśanaṃ. tena saha vartate sanidarśana eko rūpadhātur atrāṣṭādaśasu dhātuṣu. rūpadhātur evaikaḥ sanidarśana ity avadhāraṇād uktaṃ bhavati. anidarśanāḥ śeṣā iti. anena cāsya sanidarśanatvena prādhānyam uktam iti. na punaruktadoṣaprasaṃga iti
T07yabhkvyu:1169: tatsiddheḥ. ete ca sanidarśanatvādayaḥ prabhedāḥ prāyeṇa sūtroktā eva
T07yabhkvyu:1170: pradarśyante. [Tib. 53b] tathā hi sūtra uktaṃ. cakṣur bhikṣo ādhyātmikam
T07yabhkvyu:1171: āyatanaṃ. catvāri mahābhūtāny upādāya rūpaprasādaḥ rūpy anidarśanaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1172: sapratighaṃ. yāvat kāyo bhikṣo ādhyātmikam āyatanaṃ pūrvavat. mano bhikṣo ādhyātmikam āyatanaṃ arūpy anidarśanam apratighaṃ. rūpāṇi bhikṣo bāhyam
T07yabhkvyu:1173: āyatanaṃ. catvāri mahābhūtāny upādāya rūpi sanidarśanaṃ sapratighaṃ. śabdā hi bhikṣo bāhyam āyatanaṃ. catvāri mahābhūtāny upādāya rūpy anidarśanaṃ sapratighaṃ. yāvat spraṣṭavyāni bhikṣo bāhyam āyatanaṃ. catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri ca mahābhūtāny upādāya rūpy anidarśanaṃ sapratighaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1174: dharmā bhikṣo bāhyam āyatanaṃ. ekādaśabhir āyatanair asaṃgṛhītaṃ arūpy anidarśanam apratigham iti. ete ca prabhedā dhātūnām eva ā
T07yabhkvyu:1177: iti. rūpigrahaṇam arūpinirāsārthaṃ. rūpaṇaṃ rūpaṃ. tad eṣām astīti
T07yabhkvyu:1178: rūpiṇaḥ. daśeti cakṣurdhātvādayaḥ paṃca tadviṣayadhātavaś ca paṃca ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:1179: dharmadhātor nirāsaḥ kathaṃ kṛtaḥ. sa cāpi hi rūpīti śakyate vaktuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1180: tatrāvijñaptirūpasadbhāvāt. rūpiṇa evety avadhāraṇāt tannirāsaḥ kṛto bhavati. ye hi dhātavo rūpisvabhāvā eva te grahītavyāḥ. dharmadhātus tu rūpyarūpisvabhāva [Tib. 54a] iti. svadeśe parasyotpattipratibandha iti
T07yabhkvyu:1181: vistaraḥ. yatraikaṃ sapratighaṃ vastu. tatra dvitīyasyotpattir na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1182: yathā hasto haste 'bhyāhataḥ pratihanyate. upale vā. hasto hastasthāne upalasthāne vā notpadyate. upalo 'pi. tayor hastopalayoḥ sthāne upalo 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:1183: notpadyate. jale pratihanyata iti. jale svaviṣaye pravartata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1184: prāyeṇa manuṣyāṇām (Abhidh-k-vy 59) iti prāyagrahaṇaṃ kaivartādinivṛttyarthaṃ. asti nobhayatreti. garbhe niyatamṛtyūnāṃ. etān ākārān iti. etāṃ prakārān ity arthaḥ. titīlā jatunyaḥ. mārjārādīnām ity ādigrahaṇena cauramanuṣyādīnāṃ vyāghrādīnāṃ ca grahaṇaṃ. yasmiṃ yasya kāritraṃ. sa tasya viṣaya iti. kāritraṃ puruṣakāraḥ. cakṣuḥśrotrādīnāṃ rūpaśabdādiṣv ālocanaśravaṇādikāritraṃ. tac ca svacittacaittān praty āśrayabhāvaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyaṃ. yac cittacaittair gṛhyate
T07yabhkvyu:1185: daṇḍāvaṣṭambhanayogena. tad ālambanaṃ rūpādi. tad evaṃ sati cittacaittānām
T07yabhkvyu:1186: evālambanaṃ. viṣayaḥ punaś cakṣurādīnām api na kevalaṃ cittacaittānāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1187: tasmāt pareṇāpravṛtter iti. yo hi loke yataḥ pareṇa na pravartate. sa tatra pratihanyate kāṣṭhe kuḍye vā. tathā cakṣurādi viṣayāt pareṇa na kāritraṃ karoti. viṣaya eva tu karoti tasmāt tatra pratihanyata ity ucyate. [Tib. 54b] nipāto vātra pratighāta iti vistaraḥ. atra viṣaye nipatanaṃ nipātaḥ. yā svaviṣaye pravṛttiḥ. kāritram ity arthaḥ. tad ihāvaraṇapratighāteneti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1188: sapratighā daśety atrāvaraṇapratighātena te daśa dhātavaḥ sapratighā abhipretāḥ. tatra viṣayālambanapratighātābhyāṃ cittacaittānām api sapratighatvaprasaṃgāt catuṣkoṭikaḥ praśnaś catuṣkoṇaś catuḥprakāra ity arthaḥ. paścātpādaka iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1189: yadi praśnasya paścādbhāgaṃ gṛhītvā visarjanāyottiṣṭhate sa paścātpādakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1190: yadi pūrvaṃ bhāgaṃ gṛhītvā sa pūrvapādakaḥ. viṣayapratighātenāpi ta iti
T07yabhkvyu:1191: cittacaittāḥ. te hi viṣayapratighātenālambanapratighātena ca sapratighāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1193: yatrotpitsor manasa iti vistaraḥ. yatrāśraye ālambane ca utpattukāmasya manasaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1199: tenāntarāvaraṇalakṣaṇena pratighena sapratighatvāt. svadeśe parasyotpattipratibandhanalakṣaṇena pratighātena sapratighatvād ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:1203: yatrotpitsor manasaḥ pratighāto na śakyate paraiḥ kartuṃ yathā manodhātor dharmadhātoś ca manovijñānotpattau [Tib. 55a] antarāvaraṇaṃ na śakyate
T07yabhkvyu:1207: iti. avyākṛtā evāṣṭāv ity avadhāraṇaṃ. kuśalākuśalabhāvenāvyākaraṇāt
T07yabhkvyu:1208: avyākṛtāḥ. ye kuśalākuśalavyatiriktāḥ. ta evāvyākṛtā ihābhipretāḥ. na tu kuśalāḥ akuśalāvyākṛtāvyākaraṇāt. nāpy akuśalāḥ kuśalāvyākṛtāvyākaraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1209: kuśalākuśalānāṃ kuśalākuśalabhāvena vyākṛtatvāt. saṃketarūḍhyapekṣā hi śabdapravṛttiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1211: iti. dhātava ity adhikṛtaṃ. traidhaivānye naikadhā na dvidheti
T07yabhkvyu:1215: apakrāntā iti kuśalāḥ. prajñā vā kuśa iva tīkṣṇeti kuśaḥ. taṃ lānti ādadata ity kuśalaḥ. tadviparītā akuśalāḥ. anye tv alobhādilobhādyasaṃprayuktā avyākṛtāḥ. dharmadhātur iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1218: pratisaṃkhyānirodhaś cāpara iti caturvidhaḥ kuśalaḥ. dharmadhātur lobhādisvabhāvasaṃprayuktasamuttho 'kuśalaḥ. anyo 'vyākṛto yo
T07yabhkvyu:1220: lobhādisvabhāvasaṃprayuktasamutthaḥ. ākāśam apratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ. teṣāṃ ca yathāśaṃbhavaṃ prāptijātyādayaḥ. eṣo 'vyākṛto dharmadhātuḥ. tadanyāv avyākṛtāv iti. tābhyāṃ kuśalākuśalacittasamutthābhyāṃ rūpaśabdadhātubhyām
T07yabhkvyu:1224: aṣṭādaśadhātutvamātrasaṃgrahāt. na tu pratyekaṃ sākalyataḥ. tata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:1226: tayoḥ kavaḍīkārāhāratvād iti. tayor gandharasayoḥ. gandho 'pi hi kavaḍīkārāhāraḥ sūkṣmaḥ. tatrābhāvaprasaṃga iti. tatra rūpadhātau spraṣṭavyadhātor abhāvaprasaṃgaḥ kavaḍīkārāhāratvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1229: [Tib. 56] iti siddhāntāt. gandharasayor apy eṣa prasaṃga iti. yau
T07yabhkvyu:1230: nāhārasvabhāvau. tau tatra syātām ity arthaḥ. asti tu spraṣṭavyasyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:1231: kiṃ. paribhoga indriyāśrayabhāvena ādhārabhāvena prāvaraṇabhāvena ca. anye punar āhur iti bhadantaśrīlātaḥ. praśrabdhisahagateneti.
T07yabhkvyu:1232: praśrabdhisahotpannena kāyakarmaṇyatāsahagatenety arthaḥ. atrācāryo bhadantaśrīlātamatam anādṛtya vaibhāṣikamataṃ sāvakāśaṃ dṛṣṭvā viniścayam
T07yabhkvyu:1233: ārabhate. evaṃ tarhīti vistaraḥ. vaibhāṣikair arthata etat pratijñātaṃ. na sto rūpadhātau gandharasau. niḥprayojanatvāt. strīpuruṣendriyaviṣayavad
T07yabhkvyu:1234: iti. taṃ pakṣam ācāryo dūṣayati. duṣṭo 'yaṃ pakṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1237: yathā hi strīpuruṣendriyaviṣayo niḥprayojanatvena avidyamānasvagrāhako bhavati. tathā gandharasākhyo 'pi viṣayaḥ prāpnoti. sphuṭam apy anumānam
T07yabhkvyu:1238: asti. yenaiṣa dharmiviśeṣaviparyayo vyajyate. na sto rūpadhātau
T07yabhkvyu:1240: vaibhāṣikadeśīyaḥ kaścit pratividhatte. asti prayojanam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1241: tābhyāṃ ghrāṇajihvendriyābhyāṃ [Tib. 56b] vinā śarīraśobhaiva na syāt vāgvijñaptiś ca. anena dṛṣṭabādhena prasaṃgaṃ nivartayati. anumānaṃ hy atra dṛṣṭaṃ bādhate. kiṃ ity ucyate. sto rūpadhātau ghrāṇajihvendriye.
T07yabhkvyu:1242: saprayojanatvāt. cakṣurindriyavad iti. ācārya āha. yady etat prayojanam
T07yabhkvyu:1243: iti vistaraḥ. adhiṣṭhānenaivāśrayaśobhā vacanaṃ ca bhavati nendriyeṇeti saprayojanatvasya hetor asiddhatāṃ darśayati. vaibhāśikadeśīya āha.
T07yabhkvyu:1244: nānindriyam adhiṣṭhānam iti vistaraḥ. na rūpadhātau saṃbhavaty anindriyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1247: sthāpayati. ācārya āha. yuktas tadasaṃbhava iti vistaraḥ. yuktas tatra puruṣendriyādhiṣṭhānasyāsaṃbhavo
T07yabhkvyu:1249: saprayojanaṃ. ato 'sya vināpīndriyeṇa yuktaḥ saṃbhavaḥ. sādhanaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1251: saprayojanatvāt. cakṣurindriyādhiṣṭhānavad iti. anena tām eva
T07yabhkvyu:1253: vaibhāṣikadeśīye kasmiṃścin niṣiddhe yad etad ādāv uktaṃ. evaṃ tarhi ghrāṇajihvendriyayor apy abhāvaprasaṃgaḥ niḥprayojanatvād iti taddūṣaṇābhāsatāṃ darśayanto vaibhāṣikā āhuḥ. niḥprayojanāpīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1255: (Abhidh-k-vy 62) na hi teṣāṃ rūpadarśanādir bhavati. evaṃ rūpadhātau ghrāṇajihvendriyābhinirvṛttir niḥprayojanāpi bhaviṣyatīti. tena na sto
T07yabhkvyu:1256: rūpadhātau ghrāṇajihvendriye. niḥprayojanatvāt. puruṣendriyavad iti niḥprayojanatvam anaikāntikaṃ pradarśyate. ācārya āha. syān nāma niḥprayojaneti vistaraḥ. bhaven niḥprayojanendriyābhinirvṛttiḥ. na tu nirhetukā saṃskṛtānāṃ sahetukatvāt. yaś ca viṣayād vitṛṣṇaḥ. sa niyatam indriyād apīti. anena hetvabhāvaḥ pradarśyate. tataś caivaṃ sādhanam
T07yabhkvyu:1257: ucyate. na sto rūpadhātau ghrāṇajihvendriye. nirhetukatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1258: nirhetukāṃkuravat puruṣendriyavad vā. puruṣendriyam api vā kiṃ nirvartata ity ācārya eva vikalpaṃ vāhayati. ko 'bhiprāyaḥ. yadi niḥprayojanā hetum
T07yabhkvyu:1259: antareṇāpi vā ghrāṇajihvendriyayor utpattiḥ puruṣendriyam api vā na nirvartate. vaibhāṣikānāṃ hy ayaṃ pakṣaḥ. saghrāṇajihvendriyo
T07yabhkvyu:1261: ācāryas tu puruṣendriyam api kiṃ na nirvartata ity anena tasya pakṣasya dharmiviśeṣaviparyayaṃ darśayati. avidyamānapuruṣendriyo rūpadhātusattvasaṃtāno dharmī. tasya viparyayo vidyamānapuruṣendriyatvam
T07yabhkvyu:1262: iti. vaibhāṣikāḥ [Tib. 57b] pariharaṃty aśobhākaratvād itil. katham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1263: na rūpadhātau puruṣendriyam asti. aśobhākaratvāt. kāṇakuṇṭhatvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:1264: tadanumānabādhanān na viparyety asmākam eṣā pratijñā. yadi dṛṣṭaṃ na
T07yabhkvyu:1265: bādhata iti naiyāyikasiddhāntād ity abhiprāyaḥ. ācārya āha.
T07yabhkvyu:1266: kośagatavastiguhyānāṃ kiṃ na śobhate. vastau guhyaṃ vastiguhyaṃ. vastir yena tat puruṣendriyaṃ veṣṭitaṃ. guhyaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ. kośo yatra tad
T07yabhkvyu:1267: vastiguhyaṃ tiṣṭhati. kośagataṃ vastiguhyaṃ. yeṣāṃ ta ime
T07yabhkvyu:1268: kośagatavastiguhyāḥ. teṣāṃ kiṃ na śobhate śobhata evety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1269: anenāśobhākaratvam asiddhaṃ darśayati. na ca prayojanavaśād utpattir iti vistaraḥ. vaibhāṣikair aśobhākaratvād iti bruvadbhir arthāpattyaitat pratijñātaṃ bhavati. prayojanavaśotpādyaṃ puruṣendriyam iti. sa ca pakṣo
T07yabhkvyu:1270: 'numānabādhito dharmisvarūpaviparyayāpakṣālatvāt. katham iti. ucyate. na prayojanavaśotpādyaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ. svakāraṇotpādyatvāt. kāṇakuṇṭhatvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:1271: vaibhāṣikā āhuḥ. sūtraṃ tarhi virudhyata iti vistaraḥ. yo 'yam
T07yabhkvyu:1273: sāpakṣālaḥ. prākpakṣavirodhāt. [Tib. 58a] tathā hi bhagavatā rūpāvacarāḥ sattvā avikalā ahīnendriyā iti uktāḥ. kāṇakuṇṭhatvābhāvatvāt. ahīnendriyāś cakṣurādibhir ahīnatvāt. ācārya āha. yāni tatreti vistaraḥ. yāni tatra rūpadhātau ghrāṇendriyādirahitāni cakṣurādīni tair ahīnendriyā iti
T07yabhkvyu:1274: sūtrārthaparigrahād avirodhaḥ. evaṃ tu varṇayanti vaibhāṣikāḥ. sta eveti vistaraḥ. bhavata. eva tatra (Abhidh-k-vy 63) rūpadhātau ghrāṇajihvendriye na tu gandharasau. ātmabhāvamukhena hi svasaṃtānamukhena ṣaḍāyatane cakṣurādike tṛṣṇāsamudācārḥ prāṇināṃ pravartate. tadabhiṣyanditaṃ ca karmeti. sahetuke rūpadhātau ghrāṇajihvendriye. tataś ca sahetukatvāt. sta eva te rūpadhātau. sahetukāṃkurādivad iti. anena ca na sto rūpadhātau ghrāṇajihvendriye nirhetukatvād iti yat sādhanam uktaṃ. tad asiddham iti
T07yabhkvyu:1276: tṛṣṇāsamudācāra iti prakṛtaṃ. maithunasparśavītarāgāś ca rūpāvacarāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:1277: sattvāḥ. tasmāt tasmāt tatra na tṛṣṇāpūrvakaṃ karma bhavati. tasmād
T07yabhkvyu:1278: ahetukatvāt. tatra puruṣendriyaṃ nāsti nirhetukāṃkurādivad iti siddhaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1282: [Tib. 58b] evārūpyāptā ity avadhāraṇād anye dhātavo na santīty uktaṃ bhavati. yasmād rūpavītarāgānāṃ tatropapattiḥ. ato daśa rūpasvabhāvā
T07yabhkvyu:1283: dhātavaś cakṣurādayaḥ paṃca rūpādayaś cāpi paṃca na santi.
T07yabhkvyu:1284: tadāśrayālambanāś ca paṃca vijñānadhātavo na santīti. te cakṣurādayo rūpādayaś ca yathākramam āśrayā ālambanāni ca yeṣāṃ. ta ime tadāśrayālambanāḥ. āśrayāṇāṃ cakṣurādīnām ālambanānāṃ ca rūpādīnāṃ abhāvāt
T07yabhkvyu:1287: iti. eta eva trayaḥ sāsravānāsravā ity avadhāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1289: iti. kim artham idam ucyate. nanv eta eva trayaḥ sāsravānāsravā ity
T07yabhkvyu:1290: avadhāraṇāt. śeṣāḥ sāsravā iti siddhaṃ. na siddhaṃ. kathaṃ. śeṣāṃ sāsravā evānāsravā eva vā syur ity āśaṃkāḥ. tannivṛttyartham idam ucyate. śeṣāḥ sāsravā eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:1294: iti. antyā eva triprakārā ity avadhāraṇaṃ. anyatra vitarkavicārābhyām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1295: vitarkavicārau saṃprayuktakadharmadhātusvabhāvau tayor atra grahaṇaprasaṃga iti parivarjyete. [Tib. 59a] vitarko hi dvitīyaprakārāntare 'ntarbhaviṣyati. vicāro 'pi dhyānāntarajas tṛtīye prakāre 'ntarbhavati. tadanyas tu (Abhidh-k-vy 64) triṣv api prakāreṣu
T07yabhkvyu:1297: saṃprayuktadharmadhātuparyantāḥ kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne sasāmantake maule savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ vitarkavicārasaṃprayogāt. ata eva dhyānāntare
T07yabhkvyu:1298: 'vitarkā vitarkābhāvāt. vicāramātrā vicārasaṃprayogāt. ata eva dvitīyāt
T07yabhkvyu:1299: prabhṛti yāvad bhavāgraṃ tayor abhāvād avitarkā avicārāḥ. sarvaś cāsaṃprayukto dharmadhātur iti. yathāsaṃbhavaṃ traidhātukarūpacittaviprayuktā asaṃskṛtāś ca dhyānāntare ca vicāraḥ
T07yabhkvyu:1300: avitarko. vitarkābhāvāt. avicāro dvitīyavicārābhāvāt. vicāra eṣu triṣu
T07yabhkvyu:1302: tāvat prakāre nāntarbhavati. savitarkaḥ savicāra iti. sa hi savitarkaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:1303: saṃbhavati na tu savicāro vicārasaṃprayogāt. dvitīye 'pi nāntarbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1304: avitarko vicāramātra iti. vitarkasaṃprayogāt. dvitīyavicārābhāvāc ca.
T07yabhkvyu:1305: tṛtīye 'pi nāntarbhavati. avitarkaḥ avicāra iti. sa hi yady api avicāro dvitīyavicārābhāvāt. na tv avitarko [Tib. 59b] vitarkasaṃprayogāt. sa kathaṃ vaktavya ity ata āha. avicāro vitarkamātra iti. dvitīyavicārābhāvāt
T07yabhkvyu:1306: avicāraḥ. vitarkasaṃprayogāt vitarkamātraḥ. ata eveti. yasmāt savitarkasavicārāṇāṃ bhūmau vicāra eva caturthaḥ prakāro bhavati. avicāro vitarkamātra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1308: iti. śesā daśa rūpiṇo dhātava uktāḥ. te 'vitarkā vicāramātrā vā avitarkā
T07yabhkvyu:1309: avicārāḥ syur iti āśaṃkāyām avadhārya tadubhayavarjitā eva śeṣā avitarkā avicārā evety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1310: (I.32) katham avikalpakā ity ucyanta iti. cakṣurvijñānasamaṃgī nīlaṃ vijānāti nohati nīlam iti vacanāt. trividhaḥ kila vikalpa iti. kilaśabdaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:1311: paramatadyotanārthaḥ. svābhiprāyas tu cetanāprajñāviśeṣa eva vitarka iti
T07yabhkvyu:1312: na svabhāvavikalpo 'nyo dharmo 'stīti. tathā hy anena paṃcaskandhaka
T07yabhkvyu:1313: uktaṃ. vitarkaḥ katamaḥ. paryeṣako manojalpaḥ cetanāprajñāviśeṣaḥ yā
T07yabhkvyu:1314: cittasyaudārikatā. vicāraḥ katamaḥ. pratyavekṣako manojalpas tathaiva yā cittasya sūkṣmatā. anabhyūhāvasthāyāṃ cetanā abhyūhāvasthāyāṃ prajñeti
T07yabhkvyu:1315: vyavasthāpyate. tad eṣāṃ svabhāvavikalpo 'stīti. tad iti vākyopanyāse
T07yabhkvyu:1317: audārikalakṣaṇatvāt. svabhāvavikalpo vitarkaḥ. sa eṣāṃ paṃcānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1318: vijñānakāyānāṃ saṃprayogato 'sti tasmāt savikalpā uktāḥ. netarāv abhinirūpaṇānusmaraṇavikalpāv eṣāṃ staḥ. tasmād avikalpakā ucyante. yathā ekapādako 'śvaḥ apādaka iti. pādatraye cchinne ekasminn api pāde saty
T07yabhkvyu:1319: (Abhidh-k-vy 65) apādaka ity ucyate. tadvad ekavikalpā avikalpakā iti. sā hy abhinirūpaṇāvikalpa iti. sā mānasy asamāhitā prajñā śrutacintāmayy upapattipratilaṃbhikā ca. sā hi manasi bhavā mānasī. vyagrā vividhāgrā vyagrā vividhālambanety arthaḥ. vigatapradhānā vā muhurmuhur
T07yabhkvyu:1320: ālambanāntarāśrayaṇāt. vyagrā kasmād abhinirūpaṇāvikalpa ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1321: tatratatrālambane nāmāpekṣayābhipravṛtteḥ. rūpaṃ vedanā anityaṃ duḥkham ityādyabhinirūpaṇāc ca. samāhitā tu bhāvanāmayī nāmanapekṣyālambane pravartata iti. naiṣābhinirūpaṇāvikalpa ity ucyate. mānasy eva sarvā
T07yabhkvyu:1322: smṛtir iti. samāhitā cāsamāhitā ca. sā kila nāmānapekṣā
T07yabhkvyu:1323: anubhūtārthamātrālambanā pravartate. smṛtiḥ katamā. cetaso 'bhilāṣa iti
T07yabhkvyu:1327: ity ubhayāvadhāraṇaṃ. saptaiva sālambanāḥ sālambanā eva ca sapteti.
T07yabhkvyu:1328: ardhaṃ ca dharmataḥ sālambanam iti. uktavyatirekeṇedam ucyate. atrāpy ubhayāvadhāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1329: dharmārdham eva sālambanaṃ. sālambanam eva ca dharmārdham iti. yasmāc ca saptaiva sālambanā dharmārdhaṃ caiva sālambanam iti avadhāraṇam asti tasmāc ccheṣā rūpiṇo dhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaś cāsaṃyukto 'nālambanā iti siddham ity uktaṃ. tathā hy anavadhāraṇe hy ayam artho na sidhyet.
T07yabhkvyu:1330: navānupāttā iti navānupāttā evety avadhāraṇaṃ. aṣṭamasyārdhena sārdham iti. saheti
T07yabhkvyu:1333: iti. te ca sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātuś ca yasyārdhaṃ sālambanam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1335: te cāṣṭau śabdaś cāpara iti navānupāttā ity uktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1337: cakṣurādayaḥ paṃca śabdavarjyāś ca rūpādayaś catvāra iti nava te
T07yabhkvyu:1338: dvidhaiva. upāttānupāttā ity arthaḥ. na tūpāttā eveti. etadarthaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:1339: anye nava dvidheti punaḥ sūtritaṃ. anugrahopaghātābhyām anyonyānuvidhānād [Tib. 61a] iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1341: (Abhidh-k-vy 66) cittacaittānām anugrahopaghātau bhavataḥ. cittacaittānāṃ cānugrahopaghātābhyāṃ saumanasyadaurmanasyalakṣaṇābhyāṃ cakṣurdhātvādīnām anugrahopaghātau bhavataḥ. atas te cittacaittair adhiṣṭhānabhāvenopagṛhītā ucyante svīkṛtā ity arthaḥ. yal loke sacetanam iti sajīvam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1343: ity ubhayāvadhāraṇaṃ. spraṣṭavyam eva dvividhaṃ dvividham eva spraṣṭavyam
T07yabhkvyu:1345: śeṣā rūpiṇo nava bhautikā ity atrāpy ubhayāvadhāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1346: dharmadhātvekadeśaś ca bhautika ity atrāpy ubhayāvadhāraṇaṃ. yasmāc caite ubhayāvadhāritāḥ. tasmāc cheṣāḥ sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātuś cāvijñaptivarjyo nobhayatheti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1347: bhūtānāṃ catuṣkakhakkhaṭādilakṣaṇāvadhāraṇād iti. catuṣkāvadhāraṇāt pṛthivyaptejovāyudhātavaḥ spraṣṭavyadhātau catvāri bhūtāni.
T07yabhkvyu:1348: ślakṣṇatvādayas tatra cakṣurādayaś ca na bhūtāni.
T07yabhkvyu:1349: khakkhaṭādilakṣaṇāvadhāraṇāc ca pṛthivyaptejovāyudhātuṣv anye dharmāś cakṣurādayo nāntarbhāvaṃ gacchanti. kathaṃ. catvāri mahābhūtāni pṛthivīdhātur [Tib. 61b] abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātuḥ. pṛthivīdhātuḥ katamaḥ khakkhaṭatvam iti vistaraḥ. teṣāṃ ca spraṣṭavyatvād iti. teṣāṃ ca khakkhaṭatvādīnāṃ spraṣṭavyatvāt. yasmāt tāni spraṣṭavyāni. varṇādayas tu draṣṭavyāḥ śrotavyā ghrātavyāḥ svādayitavyāḥ. kathaṃ gamyate spraṣṭavyāni
T07yabhkvyu:1350: tānīti. ata āha. na hi kāṭhinyādīni cakṣurādibhir gṛhyante. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:1351: kāyendriyeṇaivety ato 'vagamyate spraṣṭavyāni tānīti. syān mataṃ te 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:1352: varṇādayaḥ spraṣṭavyā ity ata āha. nāpi varṇādayaḥ kāyendriyeṇa. kiṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1353: gṛhyanta iti prakṛtaṃ. uktaṃ ca sūtra iti vistaraḥ. aparasminn api sūtre
T07yabhkvyu:1354: spaṣṭam ādarśitaṃ. katham iti vistareṇa yāvad idam uktaṃ. spraṣṭavyāni bhikṣo bāhyam āyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtāny upādāya
T07yabhkvyu:1355: rūpy anidarśanaṃ sapratigham iti. śeṣaṃ cakṣurādyāyatanaṃ na bhūtānīti spaṣṭam ādarśitaṃ. yat tarhi sūtra uktam iti vistaraḥ. yac cakṣuṣi māṃsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭakharagataṃ kharaprakāra ity arthaḥ. cakṣurindriyaṃ khakkhaṭasvabhāvam iti matvā codayanti. tenāvinirbhāgavartino māṃsapiṇḍasyaiṣa upadeśa iti. tena cakṣurindriyeṇāvinirbhāgavartino 'dhiṣṭhānasya etad vacanaṃ. bhavati hi cakṣuradhiṣṭhāne 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:1356: cakṣurupacāraḥ. ata eva māṃsapiṇḍa iti grahaṇaṃ. anyathā cakṣuṣīty evāvakṣyat yadīndriyam eveṣyate. [Tib. 62a] ṣaḍdhātur ayaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy
T07yabhkvyu:1357: 67) bhikṣo puruṣa iti vistaraḥ. garbhāvakrāntisūtre kalalādyavasthāyām iti
T07yabhkvyu:1358: bhūtamātropadeśān na bhautikam astīti codyam āśaṃkyāha.
T07yabhkvyu:1359: mūlasattvadravyasaṃdarśānārtham iti. mūlasya sattvadravyasya saṃdarśanārtham eva. pṛthivīdhātvādayaś catvāro mūlasattvaṃ. paṃcānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ sparśāyatanānāṃ tata utpatteḥ. manodhātur api mūlasattvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1360: manaḥsparśāyatanasya tata utpatteḥ. atha vā caturṇāṃ pṛthivīdhātvādīnām
T07yabhkvyu:1361: upādāyarūpāśrayatvāt. vijñānadhātoś ca caitasikānām āśrayatvāt ta eva
T07yabhkvyu:1362: mūlasattvaṃ. kathaṃ gamyate. punaḥ ṣaṭsparśāyatanavacanāt. tattraiva sūtre paścād uktaṃ. ṣaṭ sparśāyatanānīti cakṣuḥsprarśāyatanaṃ yāvan manaḥsparśāyatanam iti. ato vijñāyate mūlasattvadravyasaṃdarśanārthatvāt
T07yabhkvyu:1363: ṣaḍdhātur ayaṃ bhikṣo puruṣa iti vacanaṃ. na tu bhūtamātratvād iti. nanu ca yathā vijñānadhātor avyatiriktam api manaḥsparśāyatanaṃ punar ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1364: evaṃ cakṣurādīny api caturdhātvavyatiriktāni punar ucyerann iti. ato na punaḥ ṣaṭsparśāyatanavacanena tadvyatiriktabhautikāstitvasiddhiḥ. naitad
T07yabhkvyu:1365: evaṃ. yadi hi pṛthivīdhātvādaya eva sparśāyatanāni abhaviṣyan bhūtāny eva sparśāyatanānīty evāvakṣyat. na tv evaṃ. kiṃ tarhi. cakṣuḥsparśāyatanaṃ yāvan manaḥsparśāyatanam iti. ato 'vagamyate. pṛthivīdhātvādivyatiriktāni
T07yabhkvyu:1366: cakṣurādīnīti. [Tib. 62b] vijñānadhātus tu cakṣurādisparśāyatanavacanānuṣaṃgena punar ucyate. sparśāyatanam iti ko
T07yabhkvyu:1367: 'rthaḥ. sparśasya caitasikasyāśraya ity arthaḥ. cittabhāvaprasaṃgāc ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:1368: yadi ṣaḍdhātur ayaṃ bhikṣo puruṣa iti yathābhūtam eva dravyāṇi gṛhyeran nānyāni tadāśritāni dravyāṇi. tenaitat prāptaṃ. vijñānadhātumātragrahaṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1369: atra caitasikānāṃ tadāśritānām agrahaṇaprasaṃgaḥ. iṣṭatvād adoṣa iti cet.
T07yabhkvyu:1370: na. sapakṣālatvād asya pakṣasya. sāpakṣālo hy ayaṃ pakṣaḥ. cittaviśeṣā eva caitasikā iti svasiddhāntavirodhāt. tenāha. na ca yuktaṃ cittam eva caittā
T07yabhkvyu:1371: ity abhyupagantuṃ. kasmāt. saṃjñā vedanā ca caitasika eṣa dharmaś
T07yabhkvyu:1372: cittaniśrita iti sūtravacanāt. sādhanaṃ cātropatiṣṭhate. cittād arthāntarabhūte saṃjñāvedane. skandhadeśanāyāṃ pṛthag deśitatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1373: rūpaskandhavad iti. atha vā svāśrayād arthāntarabhūte saṃjñāvedane.
T07yabhkvyu:1374: tadāśritatvāt. yat svāśrayāśritaṃ tat svāśrayād arthāntarabhūtaṃ. tadyathā kuḍyāśritaṃ citraṃ. sarāgādicittavacanāc ceti. sarāgaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1375: cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. vigatarāgaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgaṃ cittaṃ iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. sadveṣaṃ cittaṃ sadveṣaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1376: prajānātīti vistaraḥ. [Tib. 63a] atra (Abhidh-k-vy 68) sādhanaṃ. sarāgaṃ cittam iti cittarāgayoḥ parasparato 'rthāntaratvaṃ. sahayoganirdiṣṭatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1379: paramāṇusaṃcayasvabhāvā daśaivety arthaḥ. anye tu dhātavo 'smād
T07yabhkvyu:1381: (I.35) tulayatīti kasya dhātor etad rūpaṃ. tathā hi tula unmāna ity asya
T07yabhkvyu:1382: dhātos tolayatīti rūpaṃ bhavati. naiṣa doṣaḥ. tulāṃ karoti tulayatīti
T07yabhkvyu:1383: prātipadikadhātor etad rūpam iṣyate. karmaṇi ca tulya iti rūpaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1384: bāhyaṃ dhātucatuṣṭayam iti rūpādikaṃ śabdavarjyaṃ. paraśudārvādisaṃjñakam iti. paraśvādisaṃjñakaṃ chinatti dārvādisaṃjñākaṃ chidyate. saṃbhavaṃ praty evam ucyate. kadācit paraśvādisaṃjñakaṃ chidyate. dārvādisaṃjñakam api cchinatti.
T07yabhkvyu:1385: saṃbandhotpādina iti vistaraḥ. saṃbandhenāvibhāgenotpattuṃ śīlam asyeti
T07yabhkvyu:1386: saṃbandhotpādi. saṃghātasroto rūpādisaṃghātasaṃtāna ity arthaḥ. tasya vibhaktotpādanaṃ vibhaktajananaṃ yat sa chedaḥ. kṣaṇikānāṃ hi bhāvānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1387: vināpi paraśvādinā cchedo bhavaty eva. saṃtānanirodhas tu paraśvādineti.
T07yabhkvyu:1388: paraśvādikaṃ chinattīty ucyate. kāraṇasāmagrīviśeṣavaśād vikāryaviśeṣotpattir bhavati. tatra dhātucatuṣṭayam avacchinatti chidyate vety avadhāryate. tathāvadhāraṇāc cānye dhātavo nobhayatheti siddhaṃ. ata eva cāha. na kāyendriyādīni chidyanta iti vistaraḥ. atra na cakṣurindriyādīnīti vaktavye kasmāt kāyendriyādīnīti vacanaṃ. yasmāt kāyendriye parisphuṭaś chedo bhavati yadi bhaved ity ataḥ [Tib. 63b]
T07yabhkvyu:1391: advaidhīkaraṇāt. kathaṃ punar gamyate tadadvaidhīkaraṇam iti. ataḥ punar āha. na hīndriyāṇi dvidhā bhavanti chinnasyāṃgasya kāyād apagatasya
T07yabhkvyu:1392: nirindriyatvāt. idam api kathaṃ gamyate. nirindriyaṃ tad aṃgaṃ yac chinnaṃ kāyād apagatam iti. yasmāt tat pratītya spraṣṭavyādikaṃ ca kāyādivijñānānupapattiḥ. kathaṃ tarhi chinnena punar lagnena nāsikāgreṇa
T07yabhkvyu:1394: katham iha gṛhagodhikādīnāṃ pucchāni chinnāni spandante yadi tatra kāyendriyaṃ nāsti. vāyadhātor eṣa vikāro naitat kāyendriyasya karmety
T07yabhkvyu:1395: avagantavyaṃ. na cāpi chindanti maṇiprabhāvad acchatvāt. yathā maṇiprabhā na chinatti acchatvāt. tadvad indriyāṇi.
T07yabhkvyu:1398: ity evaṃśabdena tad eva bāhyaṃ dhātucatuṣṭayaṃ tathātvena pradarśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1399: kāṣṭhādīnām agnikṛto vikāro dāhaḥ. ca cendriyānāṃ na bhavati maṇiprabhāvad acchatvāt. na hi tāni kāṣṭhādivac carmādivad vā vikriyante. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:1400: tatsaṃbandhāt pravāhachedo bhavati. tulādibhūtaṃ ca tad eva dhātucatuṣṭayaṃ tulayati nendriyāṇi tathaivācchatvāt. amūrtānāṃ tu dhātūnām amūrtatvād eva chedādyasaṃbhava iti. teṣāṃ chedādi na cintyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1401: na śabda uccheditvād iti. [Tib. 64a] kiṃ. chinatti chidyate dahyate
T07yabhkvyu:1403: vivādo dagdhṛtulyayor ity uttaratrāpīdam anuvartate na śabda uccheditvād iti. tad eva dhātucatuṣṭayaṃ dāhakaṃ tulyaṃ ceti. agnikṣārādi dāhakaṃ. samastasyātra dhātucatuṣṭayasya bhasmādivikārahetutvāt. lavaṇādi tulyaṃ. tatrāpi samastasya tulāvanatihetutvād ity ekeṣām abhiprāyaḥ. tejodhātūr eva dagdhā
T07yabhkvyu:1404: gurutvam eva ca tulyam iti. tejodhātur evāgnijvālādigata udbhūtavṛttir
T07yabhkvyu:1406: gurutvam eva copādāyarūpam udbhūtavṛtti tulyate. ātapādiṣu laghudravyeṣu rūpādīnām udbhūtavṛttitve 'py atulyatvadarśanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1409: rūpādinivṛttyarthaṃ. vipākajaupacayikā eva paṃcādhyātmikā na naiṣyandikā ity avadhāraṇaṃ. kasmāt. tadvyatiriktaniṣyandābhāvāt. vipākajā aupacayikāś ca yady api naiṣyandikā bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:1410: niṣyando hetusadṛśa iti kṛtvā. te tu vipākajaupacayikatvenaiva saṃgṛhītatvāt. na naiṣyandikā iti gṛhyante. ye tu svahetusadṛśā na ca vipākajā na caupacayikāḥ. ta iha naiṣyandikā [Tib. 64b] abhipretāḥ. na caivaṃvidhāś cakṣurādayo bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:1411: kiṃ tarhi vipākajā vā aupacayikā vā bhavantīty ata evam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1412: tadvyatiriktaniṣyandābhāvād iti. kathaṃ punar jñāyate naiṣyandikās te na
T07yabhkvyu:1413: santīti. mṛtasyānanuvṛtteḥ. na hi rūpādivan mṛtasya cakṣurdhātvādayo 'nuvartante. vipākahetor jātā iti. vipākasya phalasya hetur vipākahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1414: vipākahetor jātā vipākajāḥ. madhyapadalopāt hetuśabdalopāt gorathavat.
T07yabhkvyu:1415: yathā gobhir yukto ratho goratha iti. phalakālaprāptaṃ vā karmeti.
T07yabhkvyu:1416: vipākaphalotpattyanantarakṣaṇāvastham ity arthaḥ. vipacyata iti vipākaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1417: karmakartari ghañ. vipākāj jātā vipākajāḥ. phalaṃ tu vipaktir eveti vipāka iti. bhāve ghañ. bhavatu vā hetau phalopacāra iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1418: avipākasvabhāvo 'pi karmalakṣaṇo hetm vipāka ity (Abhidh-k-vy 70) ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1419: tadutpādakatvāt. yathā phale hetūpucāra iti vistaraḥ. ṣaḍ imāni sparśāyatanāni cakṣurādīni paurāṇaṃ karma purāṇe janmani bhavaṃ purāṇam eva vā paurāṇaṃ karma. tāni sparśāyatanāni apaurāṇakarmasvabhāvāny api paurāṇaṃ karmety ucyaṃte. tajjātatvāt. evam iha viparyayopacāro
T07yabhkvyu:1421: viśeṣaśabdaḥ pratyekam abhisaṃbadhyate. tatrāhārasvapnau loke pratītau.
T07yabhkvyu:1423: cittaikāgratālakṣaṇaḥ. samīpe caya upacayaḥ. upacaye bhavā aupacayikāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:1424: sainikavat. upacayā eva vā aupacayikāḥ vainayikavat. svārthe
T07yabhkvyu:1425: taddhitavidhānāt. brahmacaryeṇa cety eke iti. brahmacāriṇām upaśāntendriyāṇāṃ śarīropacayadarśanāt. anupaghātamātraṃ tu tena syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1426: abrahmacaryeṇa śarīrāpacayaḥ. brahmacaryeṇa tu śarīrāpacayo na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1427: tasmād āha. anupayghātamātraṃ tu tena brahmacaryeṇa syāt nopacayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1428: upacayas tv āhārādibhir eva. kasmāt tarhi pravrajitānāṃ keṣāṃcic charīrāpacayo bhavati. kāmaparidāhādiyogād asau bhavet. pratiprākāra
T07yabhkvyu:1430: śabda aupacayika ity anupacitakāyasya śabdasauṣṭhavādarśanāt. icchātaḥ pravṛtter iti. śabdo me syād iti icchayā śabdaḥ pravartate. anicchayā na pravartate. vipākajaś ca dharmo 'nicchato 'pi pravartate. tasmān na vipākajaḥ śabdaḥ. sādhanaṃ cātrocyate. na vipākajaḥ śabdaḥ. icchātaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:1431: pravṛtteḥ. yoniśomanasikāracaitasikavat. yat tu vipākajaṃ. na tasyecchayā pravṛttiḥ. tadyathā cakṣurindriyasyeti. yat tarhīti vistaraḥ. anena svasiddhāntaviruddhatāṃ pratijñāyā udgrāhayati. tṛtīyāsau paraṃparety eka
T07yabhkvyu:1432: iti vistaraḥ. bhūtāni pāruṣyavirateḥ karmapathasya kaṇṭhe vipākasvabhāvāni [Tib. 65b] nirvartante. tebhyaḥ śabdaḥ. dvitīye 'pi pakṣe karmebhyo vipākajāni bhūtāni. tebhya aupacayikāni āhāropacayataḥ samādhyupacayato vā bhūtāntarāṇi. tebhyo naiṣyandikāni pūrvabhūtavyatiriktāny āgantukāni
T07yabhkvyu:1433: bhūtāni. tebhyaḥ śabda iti. paraṃparābhinirvartanaṃ tv abhisaṃdhāya
T07yabhkvyu:1434: pāruṣyavirater brahmasvaratā nirvartata ity uktaṃ. anena svasiddhāntaviruddhatā tasyāḥ pratijñāyāḥ parihriyate. yadi śabdavad yuktivirodhaḥ syād iti. śabda icchātaḥ pravartata iti vipākayuktivirodhāt na vipākaja uktaḥ. tad yadi tadvac chārīriky api vedanā icchātaḥ pravartate na vipākajā syāt. na tv icchātaḥ sā pravartate. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:1435: anicchayāpi sā pravartate. cakṣurādivat. tasmād vipākajeti yujyata ity
T07yabhkvyu:1436: abhiprāyaḥ. kīdṛśī punaḥ sā. yā sukhaduḥkhapratyayopasaṃhāram antareṇāpi
T07yabhkvyu:1438: sabhāgasarvatragahetubhir eva janitā na vipākahetuneti avadhāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1439: (Abhidh-k-vy 71) vipākajā vipākahetujanitā iti. vipākahetunā janitā eva na tu vipākahetunaiva janitā ity avadhāraṇaṃ. sabhāgahetunāpi janitā vipākajā
T07yabhkvyu:1440: bhavanti. tatra cāṣṭāv apratighā naiṣyandikā vipākajā evety avadhāryate.
T07yabhkvyu:1444: iti. tridhānya evety avadhāryate. tartra vipākajā indriyāvinirbhāgina eva.
T07yabhkvyu:1446: iti vacanāt. naiṣyandikaupacayikās tu indriyavinirbhāgino 'pi. kathaṃ punar gamyate. indriyavinirbhāgino 'pi naiṣyandikāḥ santīti. mṛtasyāpi
T07yabhkvyu:1447: tadanuvṛttidarśanāt. na hy asattvasaṃkhyātā vipākajā iṣyante.
T07yabhkvyu:1449: iti. eka eva dravyavān ity avadhāraṇaṃ. sāratvād dravyam ity avināśāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1450: kṣaṇam ekam anaiṣyandikā bhavantīti. kṣaṇam ekam asabhāgahetunirvartitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1451: pūrvakṣaṇānāsravābhāvāt kṣaṇikā na tu kṣaṇāntaravināśina ity ayam artho 'bhipretaḥ. anyathā hi paścimā eva dhātavaḥ kṣaṇikā ity avadhāraṇāt taditareṣāṃ dhātūnām akṣaṇikatvaprasaṃgaḥ. kathaṃ punar duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntikalāpe manodhātur manovijñānadhātuś ca yugapad bhavataḥ. na hi vijñānadvayasamavadhānam iṣyate. nocyate yugapat tau
T07yabhkvyu:1452: bhavata iti. kiṃ tarhi. ekam atra vijñānaṃ dhātudvayatvena vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1453: nāmadvayena kathyate ity arthaḥ. tena vyācaṣṭe duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntisaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ manodhātur manovijñānadhātuś
T07yabhkvyu:1454: ceti. [Tib. 66b] śeṣās tatsahabhuvo dharmadhātur iti. tatra kṣāntikalāpe cittād anye dharmāḥ śeṣāḥ. tadsahabhuvas tayā kṣāntyā sahabhuvaḥ. tadyathā anāsravasaṃvaro rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñācetanādayaḥ saṃprayuktāḥ. teṣāṃ ca prāptijātyādayo dharmadhātur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1455: (I.37cd) samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhata iti. prāptim alabdhapūrvāṃ labhata ity
T07yabhkvyu:1456: arthaḥ. cakṣurvijñānadhātunāpi sa iti. kiṃ. samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhata ity
T07yabhkvyu:1458: pṛthag lābha ity anena prathamadvitīye koṭyau darśite.
T07yabhkvyu:1459: sahāpi cety anena tṛtīyā koṭir darśitā. caturthī tu uktanirmukteti sugamatvān na darśitā.
T07yabhkvyu:1461: śabdena vā sāpy uktā. apṛthag asaha ceti. kāmadhātau krameṇa cakṣurindriyaṃ pratilabhamāna iti. kāmadhātau sthitaḥ pudgalaḥ krameṇa kalalādikrameṇa (Abhidh-k-vy 72) mṛtyukrameṇa vā. cakṣurindriyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1462: kiṃpratisaṃyuktaṃ. kiṃ kāmadhātāv eva. nety ucyate. aviśeṣeṇa kāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ vā rūpapratisaṃyuktaṃ vā pratilabhamānaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1463: kalalādyavasthāyāṃ tathā krameṇa maraṇasyācakṣuṣmanmaraṇasya ca kāle cakṣurdhātunā asamanvāgataḥ. kalalādyavasthāyāṃ tathā maraṇāvasthāyāṃ vā
T07yabhkvyu:1464: tadabhāvāt. ṣaḍāyatanotpattyavasthāyāṃ bhavasyāntarāle vā tenedānīṃ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate. na tu cakṣurvijñānadhātunā asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate. yasmād asau kuśalakliṣṭenātītānāgatena
T07yabhkvyu:1465: samanvāgata eva pūrvam antarābhavapratisaṃdhikāle. viprakṛtāvasthā hy eṣādhikriyate na
T07yabhkvyu:1466: cakṣurvijñānadhātuneti [Tib. 67a] vistaraḥ. dvitīyādidhyānopapannas tatra tasya cakṣurvijñānadhātor abhāvāt tena pūrvam asamanvāgata idānīṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikam anivṛtāvyākṛtasvabhāvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1467: saṃmukhīkurvāṇaḥ. tena cakṣurvijñānadhātunā samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate. na tu cakṣurdhātunā asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:1469: dvitīyādidhyānapracyuto 'dhastāt prathame dhyāne kāmadhātau copapadyamānaś cakṣurvijñānadhātunā asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:1470: antarābhavapratisaṃdhāne kuśalakliṣṭena atītānāgatena. na tu cakṣurdhātunā
T07yabhkvyu:1472: syād ubhayeneti vistaraḥ. ārūpyadhātucyuta ubhābhyāṃ cakṣurdhātucakṣurvijñānadhātubhyāṃ pūrvam asamanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1473: antarābhavapratisaṃdhyavasthāyām eva cakṣurdhātunotpādābhimukhena cakṣurvijñānadhātunā kuśalakliṣṭenātītānāgatena samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:1474: avikalendriyā hy antarābhavikāḥ. nobhayena etān ākārān sthāpayitveti.
T07yabhkvyu:1475: koṭītrayoktān dharmaprakārān tyaktvety arthaḥ. ārūpyadhātucyutas tatraivotpadyamāno nobhābhyām asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:1477: dvitīyādidhyānopapannaś ca cakṣurvijñānam asaṃmukhīkurvāṇo nobhābhyām asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate. kathaṃ. cakṣurdhātunā yady api
T07yabhkvyu:1478: samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate na tu cakṣurdhātunāsāv asamanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1479: cakṣurvijñānadhātunā yady apy asau asamanvāgato na tu samanvāgamaṃ [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:1480: 67b] pratilabhate tadasaṃmukhīkurvāṇatvāt. cakṣuṣmān kāmadhātusthaḥ sakṛnmaraṇāt antarābhavapratisaṃdhau (Abhidh-k-vy 73) nobhābhyām asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate. tābhyāṃ samanvāgatatvāt. yaś cakṣurdhātunā samanvāgataś cakṣurvijñānadhātunāpi sa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1481: pṛthag lābhaḥ sahāpi cety anenaiva sūtreṇedam api catuḥkoṭikaṃ vartayati. lābho hi pratilambhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1482: prāptimātre 'pi vivakṣayā kadācid bhavati. prathame catuḥkoṭike pratilambho 'dhikṛto dvitīye tu prāptimātraṃ. prathamā koṭir iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1485: prathamadhyānabhūmikasya cakṣurvijñānasyāsaṃmukhīkriyamāṇatvāt. kāmadhātāv alabdhavihīnacakṣur iti. alabdhaṃ vihīnaṃ vā cakṣur
T07yabhkvyu:1487: vinaṣṭacakṣuḥ. sa kāmadhātau cakṣurvijñānadhātunā antarābhavapratisaṃdhau pratilabdhena kuśalakliṣṭena samanvāgataḥ. na cakṣurdhātunā tasyābhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1488: labdhāvihīnacakṣur iti. labdham avihīnaṃ cakṣur asya labdhāvihīnacakṣuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1489: sa kāmadhātau cakṣurdhātunā cakṣurvijñānadhātunā ca tathā pūrvaṃ pratilabdhenedānīṃ tv anena cāvyākṛtena samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1490: prathamadhyānopapannaś ca tenobhayena samanvāgataḥ. svabhūmikasya tatrāvaśyam astitvāt parabhūmikasya cakṣuṣaḥ sambhavāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1492: cakṣurvijñānaṃ saṃmukhīkurvāṇa ity arthaḥ. sa cāpy avaśyam anenobhayena
T07yabhkvyu:1493: samanvāgataḥ. caturthy etān ākārān sthāpayitveti. ārūpyopapannaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1494: yathāyogam abhyūhitavyāv iti. yaś cakṣurdhātunā asmanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate rūpadhātunāpi saḥ. yo vā rūpadhātunā cakṣurdhātunāpi saḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1495: cakṣurdhāturūpadhātvoḥ syāt pṛthag lābhaḥ sahāpi ca.
T07yabhkvyu:1496: pṛthak tāvat. syāc cakṣurdhātunā samanvāgataḥ. na rūpadhātunā. kāmadhātau krameṇa cakṣurindriyaṃ pratilabhamānaḥ. syād rūpadhātunā na
