T07yabhkvyu:1499: syāt ubhayenāsamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate. ārūpyadhātoś cyuto rūpadhātau kāmadhātau copapadyamānaḥ. nobhayena etān ākārān sthāpayitvā.
T07yabhkvyu:1500: yaś cakṣurdhātusamanvāgato rūpadhātunāpi sa iti pūrvapādakaḥ. yas tāvac cakṣurdhātunā samanvāgato rūpadhātunāpi saḥ. syāt rūpadhātunā na
T07yabhkvyu:1502: (Abhidh-k-vy 74) yaś cakṣurvijñānadhātunā asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate rūpadhātunāpi saḥ. yo vā rūpadhātunāsamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate cakṣurvijñānadhātunāpi saḥ. tathaiva tayoḥ syāt
T07yabhkvyu:1504: pṛthak tāvat. syāc cakṣurvijñānadhātunā na rūpadhātunā.
T07yabhkvyu:1505: dvitīyādidhyānopapannaś cakṣurvijñānaṃ saṃmukhīkurvāṇaḥ. syād rūpadhātunā na cakṣurvijñānadhātunā. [Tib. 68b] ārūpyadhātoś cyuto dvitīyādiṣu
T07yabhkvyu:1508: syād ubhavenāsamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate. ārūpyadhātucyutaḥ kāmadhātau brahmaloke copapadyamānaḥ. nobhayena. etān ākārān sthāpayitvā.
T07yabhkvyu:1509: yaś cakṣurvijñānadhātunā samanvāgato rūpadhātunāpi saḥ. yo vā rūpadhātunā
T07yabhkvyu:1510: cakṣurvijñānadhātunāpi saḥ. pūrvapādakaḥ. yas tāvac cakṣurvijñānadhātunā
T07yabhkvyu:1511: samanvāgato rūpadhātunāpi saḥ. syād rūpadhātunā na cakṣurvijñānadhātunāpi.
T07yabhkvyu:1512: dvitīyādidhyānopapannaś cakṣurvijñānam asaṃmukhīkurvāṇaḥ. yathā ceyaṃ cakṣurvijñānarūpadhātūnāṃ pratilambhasamanvāgamacintā. tathā śrotravijñānaśabdadhātvādīnām api pratilambhasamanvāgamacintā kartavyā.
T07yabhkvyu:1513: śrotravijñānadhātvoḥ syāt pṛthag lābhaḥ sahāpi cety
T07yabhkvyu:1516: iti. ubhayāvadhāraṇam. avadhāraṇād eva cānye rūpādayo bāhyā iti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1517: ātmany adhy adhyātmaṃ. adhy ātmānam iti vā adhyātmaṃ. adhyātmam eva ādhyātmikāḥ. adhyātme vā bhavāḥ ādhyātmikāḥ. ahaṃkārasaṃniśrayatvāc cittam ātmety upacaryata ity ahaṃkārasaṃniśraya ātmety ātmavādinaḥ saṃkalpayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:1518: cittaṃ cāhaṃkārasaṃniśraya ity ātmety upacaryate. katham ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:1519: ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍita ity uktaṃ gāthāyāṃ. kathaṃ punar gamyate cittam ātmaśabdenocyata iti. tata
T07yabhkvyu:1520: āha. cittasya cānyatra damanam uktaṃ bhagavateti. anyatra gāthāyām uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1521: [Tib. 69a] cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham
T07yabhkvyu:1522: iti. tenāyam arthaḥ. ātmani cittīkārye ātmānaṃ vā cittam adhikṛtya ye dharmāḥ pratyāsannabhāvāt āśrayabhāvena vartante. te ādhyātmikāḥ. ye tu viṣayabhāvena vartante. te bāhyā iti. kaḥ punaḥ pratyāsannabhāvaḥ. yena vijñānaṃ tadvikāram anuvidhatte. cakṣurādiṣv eva hi vijñānaṃ lakṣyate na
T07yabhkvyu:1523: rūpādiṣv (Abhidh-k-vy 75) iti. tathā hi cittam indriyasambaddhe śarīradeśe paricchidyate na viṣayadeśa iti. evaṃ tarhi ṣaḍ vijñānadhātava iti vistaraḥ. iha paṃca tāvad vijñānadhātavo vartamānā eva gṛhyante.
T07yabhkvyu:1524: indriyaviṣayasamānakālatvāt. vartanānaviṣayā hi paṃca vijñānakāyāḥ manovijñādhātur api vartamāna eveha vyavasthāpyate. yasmā manodhātur asyāśrayo 'nantarātīto vyavasthāpyate. kālabhedād eva hi
T07yabhkvyu:1525: manidhātumanovijñānadhātvoḥ pṛthagvyavasthānaṃ. tasmāt ta ādhyātmikā na
T07yabhkvyu:1526: prāpnuvanti. na hy ete manodhātutvam aprāptā atītatvam aprāptāś
T07yabhkvyu:1527: cittasyāśrayībhavanti. yadā tadā ta eva te bhavantīti lakṣaṇaṃ nātivartanta iti. kim anena vākyena sādhitaṃ. idam anena sādhitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1528: vartamānānām apy eṣām āśrayabhāvo bhaviṣyatīti bhaviṣyadāśrayabhāvenādhyātmikatvaṃ bhavatīti. yadi vānāgatapratyutpannasyeti vistaraḥ. atīte 'dhvani yan manodhātulakṣaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1529: tad anāgatapratyutpannayor apy adhvanor asty evety abhiprāyaḥ. na hi lakṣaṇasyādhvasu [Tib.69b] vyabhicāro 'sti. na hi svabhāvaparityāgo 'stīty
T07yabhkvyu:1532: iti. dharmasaṃjñakaḥ sabhāga evety avadhāryate. yo hi viṣayo yasya vijñānasya niyata iti. tadyathā cakṣurvijñānasya rūpaṃ niyato viṣayo yāvan
T07yabhkvyu:1533: manovijñānasya dharmāḥ. yadi tatra tac cakṣurvijñānam utpannam utpattidharmi vā. yāvad yadi tatra manovijñanam utpannam utpattidharmi vā.
T07yabhkvyu:1534: sa viṣayaḥ sabhāga ity ucyate. tasya ca svabhāvasahabhūnirmuktā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1535: svabhāvena sahabhūbhiś ca nirmuktāḥ svabhāvasahabhūnirmuktāḥ. sarvadharmās tasya vijñānasyālambanaṃ. na svabhāvaḥ. svātmani vṛttivirodhāt. na hi tad
T07yabhkvyu:1536: evāṃgulyagraṃ tenaivāṃgulyagreṇa spṛśyate. na saivāsidhārā tayaivāsidhārayā chidyate. na sahabhuvaḥ. saṃprayuktā viprayuktā vā.
T07yabhkvyu:1537: atisaṃnikṛṣṭatvāt. na hy akṣistham aṃjanaṃ tena gṛhyate. sa punaś cittakṣaṇo 'nyasya cittakṣaṇasya ālambanam iti. ye pūrvasmin kṣaṇe
T07yabhkvyu:1538: svabhāvasahabhuvo dharmā nālambitā abhūvan. te 'py ālambitā iti dvayoḥ
T07yabhkvyu:1539: kṣaṇayoḥ sarvadharmā ālaṃbanaṃ bhavanti. tasmād dharmadhātur nityaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1540: sabhāgaḥ. dharmadhātur hi niyato manasa eva.
T07yabhkvyu:1542: caśabdena sabhāgāś ceti. śeṣā eva sabhāgatatsabhāgā ity avadhāryate. nanu ca dharmadhātur [Tib. 70a] eva sabhāga evety avadhāraṇe śeṣā na sabhāgā iti sabhāgatatsabhāgāḥ setsyanti. na setsyanti. yady api na sabhāgā eveti bhaveyuḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy 76) tatsabhāgā eveti tu saṃbhaveyuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1543: tannivṛttyartham idam ārabhyate. sabhāgatatsabhāgā eva śeṣāḥ. na tu sabhāgā eva nāpi tatsabhāgā
T07yabhkvyu:1544: yo na svakarmakṛt sa tatsabhāga iti saṃbandhanīyaṃ tatsabhāgāś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:1545: anantaroktatvāt. uktaṃ bhavati. yaḥ svakarmakṛt sa sabhāga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1546: asvakarmakṛd eva tatsabhāgas tatsabhāga eva vāsvakarmakṛd ity avadhāraṇe 'rthāpattyā svakarmakṛt sabhāga iti. rūpāṇy apaśyad iti. adrākṣīd iti vaktavyaṃ. evaṃ hy adyatanātītaṃ hyastanātītaṃ ca parigṛhītaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1547: anyathā hy avyāpi lakṣaṇaṃ syāt. athaivam eva pāṭha udāharaṇamātraṃ tad draṣṭavyāṃ. adyatanātītam api vaktavyaṃ. evaṃ yāvan manaḥ svena viṣayakāritreṇa vaktavyam iti. svena viṣayapuruṣakāreṇa vaktavyaṃ. katham
T07yabhkvyu:1548: iti. yena śrotreṇa śabdān aśṛṇot śṛṇoti śroṣyati vā. tad ucyate sabhāgaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1549: śrotram iti sarvaṃ. vijñānasamāyuktam asamāyuktaṃ ceti vijñānasambaddham asambaddhaṃ cety arthaḥ. yad ekasya cakṣuḥ sabhāgaṃ tad [Tib. 70b]
T07yabhkvyu:1550: sarveṣāṃ kiṃ. sabhāgam iti vartate evaṃ tadsabhāgam apīti. yad ekasya cakṣus tadsabhāgaṃ. tat sarveṣāṃ tatsabhāgam ity arthaḥ. prāptagrahaṇād
T07yabhkvyu:1551: iti. gandhādayaḥ. ye evadattena ghrāṇādīndriyaprāptā gṛhyante. na te yajñadattena gṛhyante. svaghrāṇādikapraviṣṭatvāt. ity asādhāraṇatvād eṣāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1552: cakṣurādivad atideśo nyāyyaḥ. ya ekasya gandhaḥ sabhāgaḥ. sa sarveṣām.
T07yabhkvyu:1553: evaṃ tatsabhāgo 'pīti vaktavyaṃ. na tu vaktavyaṃ yathā rūpam evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1554: gandhādaya iti. asti hy eṣa saṃbhavo ya eva gandhādaya ekasya ghrāṇādivijñānam utpādayeyuḥ. ta evānyeṣām apīti. yadi te evadattaghrāṇādīndriyaprāptā bhaveyur evadattasya vijñānam utpādayeyuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1555: atha yajñadattaghrāṇādīndriyaprāptā yajñadattasya vijñānam utpādayeyur ity
T07yabhkvyu:1556: arthaḥ. atha vā ta evānyeṣām apīti. tatrāntargatasūkṣmakrimiprabhṛtīnām api vijñānam utpādayeyuḥ. na tasyaiva evadattasya yasya ghrāṇādīndriyaprāptās te gandhādaya iti. indriyaviṣayavijñānānām anyonyabhajanam iti. āśrayaviṣayāśrayibhāvenānyonyābhimukhyena pravṛttiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1557: tathā hīndriyadhātavo vijñānadhātūn āśrayabhāvena yathāyogaṃ bhajante.
T07yabhkvyu:1558: sevanta ity arthaḥ. viṣayadhātūṃś ca viṣayibhāvena. tathā viṣayadhātavaḥ svendriyadhātūn viṣayabhāvena bhajante. vijñānadhātūṃs tu viṣayabhāvena
T07yabhkvyu:1559: ālambanabhāvena vā bhajante. tathā [Tib. 71a] vijñānadhātavaḥ svendriyadhātūnām āśrayibhāvena bhajante. viṣayadhātūṃś ca viṣayibhāvenālambakabhāvena vā bhajanta. ity anyonyabhajanaṃ bhāgaḥ. bhāve
T07yabhkvyu:1560: ghañ. kāritrabhajanaṃ vā bhāgaḥ. kāritraṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 77) cakṣurādīnāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1562: tadviṣayālambanabhāvaḥ. tasya kāritrasya bhajanaṃ kāritrabhajanaṃ. sa eṣām astīty arthaḥ. pradarśanamātram etat. vigrahas tv evaṃ kartavyaḥ. saha bhāgena vartante sabhāgā iti. samāno vā bhāga eṣāṃ eṣāṃ ta ime sabhāgāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1563: samānārthasya sahaśabdasya sabhāva ādiṣṭaḥ. sparśasamānakāryatvād vā. kiṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1564: sabhāgā iti prakṛtam. atra karmaṇi ghañ. bhajyata iti bhāgaḥ. vigrahas tu pūrvavat. sparśaś caitasikaḥ. eṣām indriyaviṣayavijñānānāṃ samānaṃ kāryaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1565: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca utpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ. trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśa ityādivacanāt. ye punar asabhāgā iti vistaraḥ. ye punar anye
T07yabhkvyu:1566: cakṣurādaya ittham asabhāgāḥ. teṣāṃ sabhāgānām uktalakṣaṇānāṃ sabhāgāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:1567: sadṛśāḥ. te tatsabhāgāḥ. teṣāṃ tair vā sabhāgās te tatsabhāgāḥ. tulyārthe hy atra sabhāgaśabdo
T07yabhkvyu:1568: (I.39) darśanaheyā iti. darśanaṃ prathamataḥ satyadarśanam anāsravaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1572: rūpiṇo dhātavo daśa paṃca ca tadvijñānadhātava iti. [Tib. 71b] kathaṃ punar etad gamyate. eta eva ta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1574: vacanāt. antyatrayāt anye paṃcadaśa dhātava eva ta ucyanta iti. te bhāvanāheyā evety avadhāryante. triprakārā iti. darśanaheyā bhāvanāheyā aheyāś cety arthaḥ. eta eva tridhā aṣṭāśītyanuśayās tatsahabhuva iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1575: dhātuprakārākārabhinnāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭyādayo 'nuśayās tatsahabhuvo vijñānavedanādayaḥ saṃprayuktāḥ asaṃprayuktāni ca tallakṣaṇānulakṣaṇāni.
T07yabhkvyu:1576: tatprāptayaś ca sānucarā iti. tacchabdena anuśayādayaḥ saṃbadhyante. teṣām anuśayānāṃ tatsahabhuvāṃ ca prāptayas tatprāptayaḥ. yady apy anuśayasahabhuvo bhavanti. na tu sarvāḥ. kāścid dhi prāptayo
T07yabhkvyu:1577: 'nuśayādisahabhuvo bhavanti yāḥ sahajāḥ. kāścit tu pūrvaṃ paścāc ca tebhyo
T07yabhkvyu:1578: bhavanty ataḥ pṛthak prāptigrahaṇaṃ. sānucarā iti grahaṇena anuprāptayas tallakṣaṇāni ca saṃgṛhyante. śeṣāḥ sāsravā bhāvanāheyā iti. eta eva trayo
T07yabhkvyu:1579: 'ntyā dhātavo ye śeṣā darśanaheyebhyo 'nye sāsravāḥ. te bhāvanāheyāḥ. ke punas te. daśānuśayās tatsahabhuvas tatprāptayaś ca sānucarāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1580: kuśalasāsravāḥ. anivṛtāvyākṛtāś ca saṃskārāḥ. avijñaptirūpaṃ ca sāsravaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1581: sānucaraṃ. [Tib. 72a] anāsravā aheyā iti mārgasatyāsaṃskṛtasvabhāvāḥ. nanu cānyad apīti vistaraḥ. pṛthagjanatvam anivṛtāvyākṛtasaṃskārasvabhāvatvād bhāvanāheyamadhyagatam. apāyasaṃvartanīyaṃ ca (Abhidh-k-vy 78)
T07yabhkvyu:1582: kāyavākkarma rūpasvabhāvatvād bhāvanāheyam uktam. ity ataś codayanti
T07yabhkvyu:1583: vātsīputrīyāḥ. āryamārgavirodhitvād iti. pṛthagjanatvam āryamārgotpāde na
T07yabhkvyu:1584: bhavati. niyate cāpāyike karmaṇi sati āryamārgo notpadyate. āryamārgotpāde ca saty āpāyikaṃ karma notpadyate. tasmāt satkāyadṛṣṭyādivat tad ubhayaṃ darśanaheyam iti varṇayanti. tatpratiṣedhārtham uktam apy etad
T07yabhkvyu:1586: na dṛṣṭiheyam akliṣṭaṃ na rūpaṃ nāpy aṣaṣṭhajaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1587: dṛṣṭir darśanam. akliṣṭam anivṛtavyākṛtaṃ kuśalaṃ vā na darśanaheyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1588: rūpaṃ tu kliṣṭam api na darśanaheyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1589: aṣaṣṭhajaṃ paṃcendriyajaṃ paṃcavijñānaṃ tad arūpaṃ kliṣṭam api san na darśanaheyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1590: ato 'nyat tu darśanaheyaṃ saṃbhavati yathoktam. akliṣṭāvyākṛtaṃ ca pṛthagjanatvaṃ samucchinnakuśalamūlavītarāgāṇām api tatsamanvāgamād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1592: pṛthagjanatvena tu samanvāgatāḥ. [Tib. 72b] yasmāt te pṛthagjanā iṣyante.
T07yabhkvyu:1593: tasmān na kuśalaṃ pṛthagjanatvaṃ. kliṣṭam api tan na bhavati. vītarāgānām api tena samanvāgamāt. kliṣṭasya hi vastunaḥ svabhāvaprahāṇam iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1594: prāptichedaḥ prahāṇam ity arthaḥ. tad yadi pṛthagjanatvaṃ kliṣṭaṃ syāt laukikavītarāgāṇāṃ tasya prāpticheda iti tenasamanvāgamaḥ syāt. iṣyate ca teṣāṃ tena samanvāgamaḥ. tathā hi te laukikavītarāgāḥ pṛthagjanā eveṣyante. akliṣṭavyākṛtatvaikatve 'doṣaḥ. chandarāgaprahāṇaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1595: akliṣṭasyeṣyate. tadālambanakleśaprāpticheda ity arthaḥ. na tu tadātmīyaprāpticheda iṣyate. tathā hy uktaṃ bhagavatā yo bhikṣavo rūpe
T07yabhkvyu:1596: chandarāgaḥ. taṃ prajahīta. evaṃ vas tad rūpaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhavatīti
T07yabhkvyu:1597: vistaraḥ. tasmād akliṣṭāvyākṛtaṃ pṛthagjanatvaṃ teṣāṃ prahīṇam api

T07yabhkvyu:1639: paśyet tac ca paśyatīti siddhāntaḥ. yatrālokasyāpratibandha iti. āloke hi sati viṣaya ābhāsagato bhavatīti vijñānotpattisaṃbhavaḥ. evaṃ hi vijñānakāraṇaṃ paṭhyate. cakṣurindriyam anupahataṃ bhavati. viṣaya ābhāsagato bhavati. tajjaś ca manasāraḥ pratyupasthito bhavatīty ata āvṛte rūpe kācādibhis tatrotpadyate eva cakṣurvijñānaṃ yatra tu pratibandho

T07yabhkvyu:1682: tatrāvidyamānadevadattādivat. yathā cakṣuḥ. evaṃ śrotram api vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1684: ghrāṇendriyādivat. anenānumānena tatra pramāṇānupalabhyamānatvaṃ hetum asiddhaṃ darśayati. ācārya āha. sati ca prāptaviṣayatva iti vistaraḥ. yadi prāptaviṣayaṃ cakṣuḥśrotraṃ kalpyeta divyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotram iha manuṣyeṣu dhyāyināṃ nopajāyet. yadi hi cakṣuḥśrotram api viprakṛṣṭadeśasthaṃ vyavahitaṃ ca kuḍyādibhir yathāyogaṃ rūpaṃ śabdaṃ gṛhṇīyāt. evam asya divyatvaṃ saṃbhavet. tac ca prāptaviṣayatve na syāt. ghrāṇādivat. yathā ghrāṇajihvākāyāḥ prāptaviṣayatvāt divyā dhyāyināṃ nopajāyeran. tadvat.
T07yabhkvyu:1688: doṣaḥ anena doṣeṇānumānatvāt. tatpramāṇānupalabhyamānatvaṃ siddhaṃ vyavasthāpayati. tasmād aprāptaviṣayaṃ cakṣuḥśrotraṃ. yady aprāptaviṣayaṃ cakṣur iti vistaraḥ. āsannenātidūrasthena tiraskṛtena vā tulyā tadaprāptir iti [Tib. 78a] tatra darśanaṃ prasaṃjayati. kim idaṃ parasya sādhanam uta dūṣaṇam iti. yadi tāvad evaṃ sādhanam atidūraṃ tiraskṛtaṃ cakṣuḥśrotreṇa
T07yabhkvyu:1689: gṛhyate. aprāptatvāt. āsannaviṣayavad iti. tadasādhanaṃ hetoḥ svayam
T07yabhkvyu:1690: aniścitatvāt. pūrvābhyupagamavirodhād vā. atha dūṣaṇaṃ sarvaprāptagrāhakatvaṃ cakṣuḥśrotralakṣaṇasya dharmiṇaḥ prasajyate. tad adūṣaṇam anumānabādhanāt. katham ity āha. kathaṃ tāvad ayaskānto na sarvam aprāptam ayaḥ karṣayatīti praśnamukhenāyaskāntanidarśanam upanyasya sarvāprāptagrāhakatvaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrasya sādhayati. na sarvāprāptagrāhakaṃ cakṣuḥśrotraṃ. sarvāprāptagrahaṇaśaktihīnatvāt. ayaskāntavat. ayaskānto hy aprāptam ayo gṛhṇāti karṣatīty arthaḥ. na ca sarvam aprāptaṃ gṛhṇāti.
T07yabhkvyu:1691: tadvac cakṣuḥśrotraṃ. prāptaviṣayatve 'pi caitat samānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1693: saṃprāptāṃjanadaśalākāvat. atha vā na sarvasvagrāhyagrāhi cakṣuḥśrotram.
T07yabhkvyu:1694: indriyasvābhāvyāt. ghrāṇendriyādivat. ghrāṇādīnāṃ hi prāpto viṣayo na tu
T07yabhkvyu:1695: sarvaḥ. sahabhūgandhādyagrahaṇāt. ghrāṇādisahabhūni hi gandharasaspraṣṭavyāni ghrāṇādibhir na gṛhyante. śaktir hīndriyāṇām īdṛśīti. manas tv arūpitvād iti. prāptatvaṃ mūrtānām eva vyavasthāpyeta nāmūrtānām iti. mano 'prāptaviṣayam [Tib. 78b] iti na vicāraḥ kriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1697: prāptaviṣayam eva trayam iti iṣṭāvadhāraṇārtham ārambhaḥ. anyathā hi prāptāprāptaviṣayam ity api saṃbhāvyeta. nirucchvāsasya gandhāgrahaṇād iti. yad ucchvāsena sardhaṃ sūkṣmaṃ bhūtacatuṣkaṃ ghrāṇam āgataṃ. tasya gandho ghrāṇena ghrāyate. vāyau gandhāntaram utpannam ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:1698: miśṛībhaveyur ekadeśībhaveyuḥ. athaikadeśena. kiṃ. spṛśeyur iti vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:1699: kathaṃ śabdābhiniṣpattir iti. yadi na spṛśanti. anabhighāte śabdābhiniṣpattir na prāpnotīty abhiprāyaḥ. ata eveti kāśmīrāḥ. yadi hi spṛśeyuḥ. hasto haste 'bhyāhataḥ sajjeta jatuneva jatvantaraṃ. kathaṃ citaṃ pratyāhataṃ na viśīryata iti. anyonyam aspṛśatāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1700: saṃghātaḥ pratyāhataḥ pāṇyādibhiḥ kathaṃ na viśīryate. tad evaiṣāṃ nirantaratvaṃ yan madhye nāsti kiṃcid ity ālokādi madhye nāstīti
T07yabhkvyu:1701: nirantaratvam eṣāṃ vyavasthāpyate. tad eva ca prāptatvaṃ nānyatheti. api
T07yabhkvyu:1702: (Abhidh-k-vy 85) khalv iti. api cety arthaḥ. saṃghātāḥ sāvayavatvāt spṛśantīty adoṣaḥ. yo 'sau doṣa ukto yadi sarvātmanā spṛśeyur miśrībhaveyur dravyāṇy athaikadeśena sāvayavāḥ prasajyerann iti. kāraṇaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1703: pratīti. yasya yādṛśaṃ kāraṇaṃ. tasya tat kāraṇaṃ. spṛṣṭam aspṛṣṭaṃ vā
T07yabhkvyu:1704: pratīty āha. kadācid iti vistaraḥ. spṛṣṭahetukam iti. spṛṣṭam anyonyaṃ hetur asya spṛṣṭahetukaṃ. evam aspṛṣṭahetukaṃ. [Tib. 79a] yadā viśīryata iti. tadyathā śuṣkā mṛc cūrṇīkriyamāṇā. yadā cayaṃ gacchatīti. tadyathā
T07yabhkvyu:1705: himaṃ. tad dhi pūrvaṃ sūkṣmaṃ paścān mahad bhavati. cayavatāṃ caya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1706: tadyathā mṛtpiṇḍadvayasaṃnipāte. uttarakṣaṇāvasthānaṃ syād iti. utpadya
T07yabhkvyu:1707: spṛṣṭiyogāt. nirantare tu spṛṣṭasaṃjñeti bhadantaḥ. bhadantamataṃ caiṣṭavyam iti. vaibhāṣikamataṃ kasmān naiṣṭavyaṃ. nanu vaibhāṣikair apy
T07yabhkvyu:1708: evam uktaṃ. tad evaiṣāṃ nirantaratvaṃ yan madhye nāsti kiṃcid iti. asty
T07yabhkvyu:1709: evam. sāvakāśaṃ tu tad vacanam. yan madhye nāsti kiṃcid iti bruvāṇā
T07yabhkvyu:1710: vaibhāṣikā madhye ālokādi necchanti. anyaparamāṇupraveśānavakāśaṃ tu na
T07yabhkvyu:1711: bruvate. anyathā hi sāntarāṇāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ śūnyeṣv antareṣu gatiḥ kena pratibadhyeta gatimata iti vākyaśeṣaḥ. ayaṃ cāparo doṣaḥ. na ca paramāṇubhyo 'nye saṃghātāḥ yathā vaibhāṣikāḥ kalpayanti. ta eva te
T07yabhkvyu:1712: saṃghātāḥ paramāṇavaḥ spṛśyante. yathā rūpyanta iti. saṃghātā eva naika
T07yabhkvyu:1713: ity arthaḥ. yadi ca paramāṇor iti vistaraḥ. paramāṇvapariniṣpattiṃ vaktukāmaḥ ācāryo vicārayati. yadi paramāṇor ekasya pūrvādidigbhāgabhedaḥ kalpyeta spṛṣṭasyānyonyam aspṛṣṭasya vā sāvayavatvaprasaṃgaḥ. na cet. kim.
T07yabhkvyu:1714: digbhāgabheda iti vartate. spṛṣṭasyāpy aprasaṃgaḥ. kasya. sāvayavatvasya.
T07yabhkvyu:1715: [Tib. 79b] atra sādhanam. na niravayavaḥ paramāṇuḥ. digbhāgabhedavattvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1716: māṣarāśivad iti. tad etad digbhāgabhedavattvaṃ necchanti vaibhāṣikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1717: digbhāgabhedo hi saṃghātarūpāṇām eva kalpyate. evaṃ ca varṇayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:1718: dharmataiveyaṃ yat sapratighānāṃ bhinnadeśatvaṃ. teṣāṃ nairantaryeṇāvasthānāt abhinnadeśatvaṃ mā bhūd iti sāntarāṇām api sapratighatvena gatiḥ pratibadhyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1720: ātmaparimāṇatulyasyaivārthasya grahaṇa iṣyamāṇe kathaṃ parvatādīnāṃ mahatāṃ sakṛd iva grahaṇaṃ lakṣyate na krameṇety āśaṃkya yuktiṃ tathā grahaṇe kathayati. āśuvṛttyā cetyādi. yathā alātacakrādigrahaṇaṃ krameṇa
T07yabhkvyu:1721: vartamānaṃ sakṛd iva lakṣyate. tathā parvatanadīśabdādigrahaṇam āśuvṛttyā
T07yabhkvyu:1723: vālāgraparvatādidarśane atulyasyety abhiprāyaḥ. unmiṣitamātreṇeti na kramadarśananyāyena. evaṃ śrotreṇeti (Abhidh-k-vy 86) vistaraḥ. kadācid alpīyāṃso yadā maśakaśabdaṃ śṛṇoti. kadācit samāḥ yadā
T07yabhkvyu:1724: śrotraparamāṇusamapramāṇaṃ kasyacic chabdaṃ śṛṇoti. kadācid bhūyāṃso yadā
T07yabhkvyu:1726: avasthitāḥ ekatalāvasthitā ity arthaḥ. bhūrjābhyantarāvasthitā iti karṇābhyantare yad bhūrjapattravarṇākāraṃ. tad bhūrjam iveti bhūrjaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1728: ghāṭābhyantare ghāṭā nāsāpuṭī. mālāvad avasthitānīti. maṇḍalena
T07yabhkvyu:1730: kilaśabdaḥ. asphuṭam avyāptaṃ. sa kileti karmasāmarthyād evāviśaraṇaṃ syād iti. kilaśabdena aruciṃ sūcayati. saṃcitāśrayālambanatvād iti saṃcitāśrayatvāt saṃcitālambanatvāc ca.
T07yabhkvyu:1732: iti. atīta evety avadhāraṇaṃ. ata evocyata iti. yasmāt paṃca vijñānakāyā
T07yabhkvyu:1733: indriyadvayāśrayāḥ. cakṣurādīndriyāśrayā manaindriyāśrayāś ca. tasmāc catuḥkoṭika uttiṣṭhate. prathamā koṭiś cakṣur iti. cakṣurvijñānasya cakṣur āśrayabhāvena na samanantarapratyayabhāvena. na hi cakṣuś
T07yabhkvyu:1735: cittacaittā acaramā utpannāḥ samanantara iti ca samanantarapratyayalakṣaṇaṃ. dvitīyā koṭiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:1736: caitasiko dharmadhātus tasya samanantarabhāvena. ṣaḍ eva hy āśrayā vijñānasyeṣyante cakṣurādayo manaḥparyantā nānye. tṛtīyā samanantarātītaṃ manaḥ. ubhayalakṣaṇayuktatvāt. caturthī uktanirmuktā dharmāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1737: koṭitrayamuktā viprayuktā asaṃskṛtādayaḥ. [Tib. 80b] evaṃ yāvat kāyavijñānasya svam indriyaṃ vaktavyam iti. yaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:1739: catuḥkoṭikaḥ. prathamā koṭiḥ śrotraṃ. dvitīyā samanantarātītaś caitasiko
T07yabhkvyu:1740: dharmadhātuḥ. tṛtīyā samanantarātītaṃ manaḥ. caturthī koṭir uktanirmuktā
T07yabhkvyu:1741: dharmā. ity evam api vaktavyaṃ. manovijñānasya pūrvapādaka iti. yo
T07yabhkvyu:1743: pūrvapādakaḥ. yas tāvad āśrayabhāvena. samanantarapratyayabhāvenāpi sa iti. manas tāvad avaśyam asau samanantarapratyayaḥ. syāt samanantarapratyayabhāvena nāśrayabhāvena. samanantarātītaś caitasiko dharmadhātur acakṣurādyāśrayaṣaṭsvabhāvatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1744: (I.44ab) tadvikāravikāritvād iti vistaraḥ. teṣāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ vikāras tadvikāraḥ. tadvikāreṇa vikāras tadvikāravikāraḥ. sa eṣām astīti tadvikāravikārīṇi vijñānāni. tadbhāvas
T07yabhkvyu:1746: ity avadhāryate. anugrahopaghātapaṭumandatānuvidhānād iti. cakṣurādīnāṃ aṃjanādibhir anugrahaṃ reṇvādibhiś copaghātaṃ cakṣurādivijñānāny
T07yabhkvyu:1747: anuvidadhate. sasukhotpādāt saduḥkhotpādāc ca. yathākramaṃ paṭumandatāṃ ca
T07yabhkvyu:1749: cakṣurādivikāreṇa vijñānavikāro bhavatīti. nanu ca paṭuni rūpe paṭucakṣurvijñānam utpadyamānaṃ dṛśyate. mande maṃdam iti. [teṣāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1750: cakṣurādīnāṃ.] yady api rūpasya paṭumaṃdate cakṣurvijñānam anuvidadhīta.
T07yabhkvyu:1751: vidhurāvasthayos tu cakṣūrūpayoś cakṣuravasthām eva cakṣurvijñānam
T07yabhkvyu:1752: anuvidhatte. na rūpavasthāṃ. tathā hi cakṣuṣi anugṛhīte rūpe copahate
T07yabhkvyu:1753: tadvītarāgāṇāṃ madhyasthānāṃ ca cakṣurvijñānam avikāram utpadyate. na tu saduḥkham utpadyate. rūpe punar anugṛhīte 'parityakte cakṣuṣi copahate kāmalavyādhinā timiropaghātena vā pītadarśanaṃ bhrāntaṃ keśoṇḍukādidarśanaṃ vā pravartate. tathā paṭuni rūpe jarayā mande cakṣuṣi
T07yabhkvyu:1754: mandaṃ cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate. evaṃ mande rūpe cakṣur yady atipaṭu
T07yabhkvyu:1755: bhavet paṭu cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate. tathā hi jātisvabhāvena paṭuni gṛdhracakṣuṣi mande 'pi śavarūpe anekayojanaviprakṛṣṭe 'pi cakṣurvijñānam
T07yabhkvyu:1756: utpadyate. ity evaṃ śrotrādīny api yojyāni.
T07yabhkvyu:1758: ata āśrayabhāvāt. asādhāraṇatvāc ca. āśrayabhāvo vyākhyāta iti na taṃ praty ādriyate. asādhāraṇatvam eva tu vyācakṣāṇa āha. katham asādhāraṇatvam ityādi. anyacakṣurvijñānasyāpīti. anyasaṃtānavijñānasyāpīty
T07yabhkvyu:1759: arthaḥ. tair [Tib. 81b] eva nirdiśyata iti. cakṣurādibhiś cakṣurvijñānaṃ yāvan manovijñānaṃ. na rūpādibhiḥ rūpavijñānaṃ yāvad dharmavijñānaṃ. yathā bherīśabdo yavāṃkura iti. asādhāraṇatvāt tābhyāṃ bherīyavābhyāṃ yathā nirdeśo loke bherīśabdo yavāṃkura iti na tu daṇḍaśabdaḥ kṣetrāṃkura iti vā. daṇḍo hi paṭahādiśabdasyāpi kāraṇībhavet. kṣetraṃ ca śāligodhūmāṃkurasyāpīti sādhāraṇatvāt na tābhyāṃ nirdeśaḥ kriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1760: asādhāraṇābhyāṃ tu bherīyavābhyāṃ nirdeśaḥ. tadvad ihāpi draṣṭavyam. api khalu cakṣur iva vijñānam ubhayoḥ sattvasaṃkhyātatvāt. rūpaṃ tv asattvasaṃkhyātam api. cakṣuṣā vijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānam. tasya
T07yabhkvyu:1763: asādhāraṇatvena tataḥ pravṛtteḥ. cakṣuṣo vijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānam.
T07yabhkvyu:1765: tatsaṃprayoginyāḥ sukhāyā duḥkhāyā vā (Abhidh-k-vy 88) vedanāyāś cakṣuṣy eva paricchidyamānatvāt. evaṃ śrotrādiṣu yojyam. tad evaṃ cakṣurādibhir
T07yabhkvyu:1766: eva vijñānanirdeśo yujyate na rūpādibhiḥ. evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikena cakṣuṣā tadbhūmikādharabhūmikāni rūpāṇi paśyato [Tib. 82a] yojayitavyam iti. tasyaiva kāmadhātūpapannasya yojayitavyam. evaṃ tṛtīyādidhyānacakṣuṣā yojyam iti. tasyaiva prathamadhyānopapannasya tṛtīyacaturthadhyānacakṣuṣā paśyato yojyam.
T07yabhkvyu:1768: iti. adharabhūmikam ity arthaḥ. svabhūmikam ūrdhvabhūmikaṃ cābhyanujñātaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1769: bhavati. paṃcabhūmikāni hi kāyacakṣūrūpāṇi. kāyaḥ śarīraṃ. etāni kāyādīni paṃcabhūmikāni. kāmāvacarāṇi prathamadhyānabhūmikāni yāvac
T07yabhkvyu:1770: caturthadhyānabhūmikāny ārūpyadhātāv abhāvāt. dvibhūmikaṃ cakṣurvijñānam iti. kāmāvacaraṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ ca. tayor vitarkavicārasadbhāvāc cakṣurvijñānasya cāvaśyaṃ savitarkavicāratvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1772: iti. nordhvabhūmikaṃ rūpaṃ cakṣuṣo viṣayo bhavati. ūrdhvabhūmikasya rūpasya sūkṣmatvāt. svabhūmikam adharabhūmikaṃ cābhyanujñātaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1774: kim. ūrdhvaṃ na cakṣuṣa iti prakṛtaṃ. kāmāvacarasya cakṣuṣo 'dharabhūmikasya prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1775: svabhūmikam adharabhūmikaṃ vābhyanujñātaṃ bhavati. kāmāvacarasya cakṣuṣaḥ svabhūmikaṃ kāmāvacaram eva cakṣurvijñānaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1776: prathamadhyānabhūmikasya cakṣuṣaḥ prathamadhyānabhūmikam eva cakṣurvijñānaṃ bhavati. kāmāvacaraṃ tu cakṣurvijñānam asya na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1777: nanu coktam adharabhūmikam abhyanujñātam iti. satyam uktam etat. [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:1778: 82b] kiṃ tu. asaty ātmīye adharabhūmikam iṣyate. na satīti.
T07yabhkvyu:1779: dvitīyatṛtīyacaturthadhyānacakṣuṣo hy asaty ātmīye prathamadhyānabhūmikam evādharaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ bhavati. na tu kāmāvacaraṃ paramanihīnatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1780: saṃbhavatas tv evam uktam adharabhūmikam abhyanujñātam iti. asyety anantaroktasya cakṣurvijñānasyeti. cakṣurvijñānajāteḥ rūpaṃ sarvato
T07yabhkvyu:1781: viṣayaḥ. saṃbhavatas tu yojyam. kāmāvacarasya cakṣurvijñānasya svabhūmikam
T07yabhkvyu:1782: eva rūpam. prathamadhyānabhūmikasya tu prathamadhyānabhūmikacakṣurāśrayasya cakṣurvijñānasya
T07yabhkvyu:1783: adharabhūmikaṃ ca rūpaṃ viṣayaḥ. caturthadhyānabhūmikacakṣurāśrayasya tu caturthadhyānabhūmikaṃ rūpaṃ tataś cādharabhūmikaṃ sarvaṃ viṣayaḥ. evaṃ yāvat dvitīyadhyānabhūmikacakṣurāśrayasya dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ tataś (Abhidh-k-vy 89) cādharabhūmikaṃ rūpaṃ viṣayaḥ. evaṃ cakṣurvijñānajāter ūrdhvam adhaḥ svabhūmau ca rūpaṃ viṣayo bhavati. kāyasya cobhe rūpavijñāne
T07yabhkvyu:1784: sarvato bhavata iti. kāmāvacarasya kāyasya śarīrasya
T07yabhkvyu:1785: svabhūmikordhvabhūmike rūpavijñāne bhavataḥ. prathamadhyānabhūmikasya kāyasya prathamadhyānabhūmikam eva vijñānam. rūpaṃ tu svordhvādharabhūmikam. yathā svāśrayaṃ cakṣuḥ. dvitīyādidhyānabhūmikasya kāyasya vijñānam adharabhūmikam eva prathamadhyānabhūmikam evety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1787: 83a] yathā svāśrayaṃ cakṣuḥ. caturthadhyānabhūmikasya kāyasya rūpaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1790: iti. yathā cakṣur uktam. tathā śrotraṃ vyākhyātavyam. katham ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:1791: yatra kāye sthitaḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śṛṇoti. kiṃ tāni kāyaśrotraśabdavijñānāny ekabhūmikāny eva bhavanti. āhosvid anyabhūmikāny api. āha. sarveṣāṃ bhedaḥ. kāmadhātūpapannasya svena śrotreṇa svāṃ śabdāṃ śṛṇvataḥ sarvaṃ svabhūmikaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇa anayā diśātra grantho vaktavyaḥ. yāvad ayaṃ tu niyamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1792: na kāyasyādharaṃ śrotram ūrdhvaṃ śabdo na ca śruter vijñānaṃ cāsya śabdas tu kāyasyobhe ca sarvata iti vistareṇa yojyaṃ. katham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1794: paṃcabhūmikā hi kāyaśrotraśabdāḥ kāmāvacarā yāvac caturthadhyānabhūmikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1795: dvibhūmikaṃ ṣrotravijñānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ ca. tatra yadbhūmikaḥ kāyaḥ. tadbhūmikam ūrdhvabhūmikaṃ vā śrotraṃ bhavati. na tv adharabhūmikam. yadbhūmikaṃ śrotraṃ. tadbhūmiko 'dharabhūmiko vāsya śabdo viṣayo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1797: na hi kadācid ūrdhvabhūmikaḥ śabdo 'dharabhūmikena śrotreṇa śrotuṃ śakyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1798: vijñānaṃ ca ūrdhvaṃ na śrotrasya śabdavat.
T07yabhkvyu:1799: asya śabdas tu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1800: asyeti anantaroktasya śrotravijñānasya śabdaḥ sarvato viṣaya ūrdhvam adhaḥ svabhūmau ca. kāyasya cobhe śabdavijñāne sarvato bhavata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1803: iti. yathā cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vā niyamitaṃ na kāyasyādharaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1804: vety evamādinā. naivaṃ niyamitaṃ manaḥ. ata evāha. paṃcabhūmike 'pi kāye sarvabhūmikāni manaādīni bhavantīti [Tib. 83b] manodharmamanovijñānāni sarvabhūmikāni kāmāvacarāṇi yāvad bhāvāgrikāṇi. tadyathā kāmadhātūpapanno yadi kāmāvacarān manaso 'nantaraṃ kāmāvacaram eva kāmāvacaradharmālambanaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1805: manovijñānam utpādayati. sarvāṇi kāmāvacarāṇi. yadi prathamadhyānabhūmikād yāvad bhavāgrabhūmikād upapattikāle samāpattikāle vā saṃbhavataḥ
T07yabhkvyu:1806: kāmāvacaraṃ tathaiva manovijñānam utpādayati. manas tatastyam. śeṣāni
T07yabhkvyu:1807: kāmāvacarāṇi. atha tatraiva tadvijñānam utpādayati. dharmās tv ālambanaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1808: prathamadhyānabhūmikā yāvad bhavāgrabhūmikāḥ. dharmās tatastyāḥ. śeṣāṇi
T07yabhkvyu:1809: pūrvavat. evaṃ prathamadhyānopapanno yāvad bhavāgropapanno yathāyogaṃ vaktavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1812: cakṣuś ca dharmadhātoś ca pradeśo dṛṣṭir ity etad ādhikārikam. atha yatra kāye sthitaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyatīty evamādir ayam ānuṣaṃgikaḥ prasaṃgaḥ. darśanasambandhād āgatatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1815: cakṣurādinirāsārtham. bāhyā eva paṃca dvivijñeyā ity avadhāraṇād anye trayodaśa dhātava ekavijñānavijñeyā iti siddham. paṃcavijñānakāyānām
T07yabhkvyu:1818: iti. asaṃskṛtā eva nityā ity avadhāraṇam. adhvasaṃcārābhāvāt nityāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1819: dharmārdha indriyaṃ ye ca [Tib. 84a] dvādaśādhyātmikāḥ smṛtā
T07yabhkvyu:1820: iti. dhātava ity adhikāraḥ. dvāviṃśatīndriyāṇy uktāni sūtra iti. atha jātiśroṇo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ. upasaṃkramya bahagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisāryaikante nyaṣīdat. ekāntaniṣaṇṇo jātiśroṇo brāhmaṇo bhagavantam idam avocat. indriyāṇīndriyāṇīti bho gautama ucyante. kati bho gautama
T07yabhkvyu:1821: indriyāṇi. kiyatā cendriyāṇāṃ saṃgraho bhavati. dvāviṃśatir imāni brāhmaṇa
T07yabhkvyu:1822: indriyāṇi. katamāni dvāviṃśatiḥ. cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyaṃ manaindriyaṃ strīndriyaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ sukhendriyaṃ duḥkhendriyaṃ saumanasyendriyaṃ daurmanasyendriyam upekṣendriyaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 91) śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyam ājñendriyam ājñātāvīndriyam. itīmāni brāhmaṇa dvāviṃśatir indriyāṇi. iyatā indriyāṇām indriyasaṃgraho bhavati. atha jātiśroṇo brāhmaṇo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavato 'ntikāt
T07yabhkvyu:1825: dharmārdham iti napuṃsakanirdeśena kecit paṭhanti. teṣāṃ pāṭhe ardhadharma iti samapravibhāgaḥ prāpnoti. ardhaṃ napuṃsakam iti lakṣaṇāt. ardhapippalīti
T07yabhkvyu:1826: yathā. atha napuṃsakaliṃgo 'py ardhaśabda ekadeśārthe vartate tadaivaṃ samāsaḥ kriyate. dharmaś cāsāv ardhaṃ ca dharmārdham. dharme vārdhaṃ dharmārdham iti. ābhidhārmikās tu ṣaḍāyatanavyavasthām anādṛtyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:1827: cakṣurāyatanaṃ yāvat kāyāyatanaṃ [Tib. 84b] manaāyatanam iti ṣaḍāyatanam
T07yabhkvyu:1828: iti ṣaḍāyatanavyavasthāṃ yuktarūpām anādṛtya jīvitendriyānantaraṃ manaindriyaṃ paṭhanti. sālambanatvāt. vedanendriyādīni hi sālambanāni
T07yabhkvyu:1829: anantaraṃ paṭhanti. jīvitendriyādīny ekādaśeti. jīvitendriyaṃ vedanendriyāṇi paṃca śraddhādīni ceti. trayāṇāṃ ca bhāga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1831: dravyāṇi dharmadhātvekadeśaḥ. cakṣurādayaḥ paṃca svanāmoktā iti. paṃca cakṣurādayo dhātavaḥ paṃcendriyāṇi cakṣurindriyaṃ yāvat kāyendriyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:1832: strīpuruṣendriye ca kāyendriyaikadeśa eveti. paṃca cakṣurādidhātavaḥ saptendriyāṇi bhavanti. sapta cittadhātavo manaindriyam iti. evaṃ dvādaśādhyātmikā dhātavo 'ṣṭāv indriyāṇi bhavantīti. dvādaśādhyātmikā dhātava eva dharmārdha eva cendriyam iti avadhāraṇāt paṃca dhātavo rūpādayas tadanyadharmadhātupradeśo nendriyam iti siddham.
T07yabhkvyu:1833: ācāryayaśomitrakṛtau sphuṭārthāyām abhidharmakośavyākhyāyāṃ dhātunirdeśo nāma prathamaṃ kośasthānam.
T07yabhkvyu:1838: (II.1) uktānīndriyāṇīti. prathamasya dvitīyasya ca kośasthānasya sambandhopanipātatāṃ darśayann āha. uktānīndriyāṇīti.
T07yabhkvyu:1840: ity uktam. tasmād idam āyātam iti sambandhaḥ. [Tib. 85a] kaḥ punar indriyārtha iti. vaiyākaraṇair anyathā indriyaśabdārthavyutpattiḥ kṛteti.
T07yabhkvyu:1841: ataḥ praśnayati. kaḥ punar indriyārtha iti. idi paramaiśvarye iti
T07yabhkvyu:1842: paṭhyate. tasya dhātor indantītīndriyāṇīti rūpaṃ draṣṭavyam. kathaṃ kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:1843: indantīti indrāṇi rapratyaya auṇādikaḥ. indrāṇy evendriyāṇīti svārthe
T07yabhkvyu:1844: ghastaddhitaḥ. atha vā indantītīndriyam. bahutvāt tu bahuvacanena kṛto nirdeśa indantītīndriyāṇīti. tasmāt indantīty asya śabdasya indriyam ity
T07yabhkvyu:1845: ādeśaḥ. katham. avarṇasya rabhāvaḥ tiśabdasya ceyādeśaḥ. tena nairuktena vidhānena indriyam iti bhavati. tadyathā kuñjara iti. vaiyākaraṇair hi kuñjo 'syāstīti kuñjara iti matvarthīyena kuñjaraśabdo vyutpādyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1846: nairuktais tu tad anādṛtya kuñjaraḥ kuñjacāritvād iti nairuktena nyāyena
T07yabhkvyu:1847: sādhyate. tadvad ihāpi draṣṭavyam. yadi hi vaiyākaraṇanayena indrasya liṅgam indriyam iti vyutpādyeta. ādhipatyārtha indriyārtho hīyetādhipatyārthaś ceṣyate. tasmād ittham indriyaśabdasya vyutpattir
T07yabhkvyu:1848: naiṣṭavyeti. dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca viṣamaparivarjanād iti. dṛṣṭvā śvabhrādi śrutvā ca vyāghrādirutam.
T07yabhkvyu:1850: cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇotītyādi vaibhāṣikāṇāṃ siddhāntaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1851: tenālambanaviśeṣalakṣaṇayor darśanaśravaṇayor asādhāraṇakāraṇatve cakṣuḥśrotrayor ādhipatyam. (Abhidh-k-vy 94) ātmabhāvaśobhāyāṃ pūrvavad [Tib. 85b] iti. aghrāṇādīnāṃ sattvānām akāntarūpatvāt. akāntātmabhāvatvād ity arthaḥ. taiḥ kavaḍīkārāhāraparibhogād iti. tair ghrāṇādibhis tatparibhogād iti. kathaṃ gandhasya kavadīkārāhāratvam. nāsikayor gandhagrāsavyavacchedena kavaḍīkaraṇāt. kathaṃ spraṣṭavyasya kavaḍīkārāhāratvam. kāyena snānābhyaṅgādikaspraṣṭavyasya romakūpamukhagrāsavyavacchedena kavaḍīkaraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:1853: kilaśabdaḥ paramatadyotane. svamatam asya paścād vakṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1854: dvayor iti pratyekam abhisambandhaḥ. sattvabhedaḥ strīpuruṣa iti. strīty eko nikāyasabhāgaḥ. puruṣa ity aparaḥ. tayor bhedaḥ. sattvavikalpa iti stanādeḥ saṃsthānasya svarasyācārasya cānyathātvaṃ viśeṣa ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1855: saṃkleśavyavadānayor ity apara iti pūrvācāryaḥ. na sattvabhedavikalpayoḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1856: antareṇāpi puruṣendriyaṃ rūpāvacarāṇāṃ vikalpasiddheḥ. vikalpakṛtaś ca sattvabheda ity abhiprāyaḥ. tadviyuktavikalānām iti. viyuktāś ca te
T07yabhkvyu:1857: vikalāś ca viyuktavikalāḥ. tābhyāṃ strīpuruṣendriyābhyāṃ viyuktavikalās
T07yabhkvyu:1860: punaḥ kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ. ṣaṇḍhakāḥ svabhāvato niḥstrīpuruṣendriyāḥ. paṇḍakā
T07yabhkvyu:1861: upakrameṇopahatendriyāḥ. vinaye tu paṇḍakā eva paṃca paṭhyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:1863: ceti. tatra prakṛtipaṇḍakaḥ ṣaṇḍha ihābhipretaḥ. yasya hi prakṛtyā
T07yabhkvyu:1864: vyañjanaṃ nāsti. sa prakṛtipaṇḍakaḥ. śeṣā iha paṇḍakā iṣyante. lūnapaṇḍako hi tāvad indriyacchedāt indriyavikala iti sphuṭa eṣaḥ. pakṣapaṇḍakādayas tv indriyākarmaṇyatvena tadvikalā eva. indriyakarmaṇyatvakāle 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:1865: tadvikalā iti vyavasthāpyanta eva. tadindriyakarmaṇyatvasya puruṣasukhaviśeṣājanakatvāt prasavājanakatvāc
T07yabhkvyu:1866: indriyasadbhāvāśaṃkānivṛttyartham eva ceha ṣaṇḍhapaṇḍakā iti pṛthakpāṭhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1867: anyathā hi vinayavad ihāpy abhidharme paṇḍakā ity eva paṭhyeran.
T07yabhkvyu:1868: ubhayavyañjanās tadvikalāḥ. sthānabhraṃśavaikalyād alpasukhahetutvavaikalyāc ca. apare vyācakṣate. tadviyuktāḥ ṣaṇḍhāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1869: tadvikalāḥ paṇḍakāḥ. upakramavaikalyāt. ubhayavyañjanāś ca tadvikalāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1870: sthānabhraṃśavaikalyāt. alpasukhahetutvavaikalyāc ceti. teṣām asaṃvarādīni na bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:1875: [Tib. 86b] chinatti strī pumān dṛṣṭicarita iti vacanāt. strīpuruṣāṇāṃ tu tāni bhavanti. ataḥ saṃkleśe ādhipatyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:1876: strīpuruṣendriyayoḥ. saṃvaraphalaprāptivairāgyāṇi ceti. saṃvaras trividhaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaro dhyānasaṃvaro 'nāsravasaṃvaraś ca. teṣām eko 'pi saṃvaro na bhavati kim aṅga sarvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1877: saṃvaro 'py evam iti vacanāt. ata eva ca srotaāpattyādiphalaprāptiḥ kāmādivairāgyaṃ ca
T07yabhkvyu:1878: teṣāṃ na saṃbhavati. strīpuruṣāṇāṃ tu bhavatīti. ato vyavadāne 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:1880: iti. jīvitendriyasya nikāyasabhāgotpattau. nikāyasabhāgasambandhe tasyādhipatyaṃ vyavasthāpyate. nikāyasabhāgasaṃdhāraṇe cādhipatyam.
T07yabhkvyu:1881: jīvitendriyavaśena tadūrdhvamavasthānāt. manaindriyasya punarbhavasambandha iti. kliṣṭena punarbhavasambandhāt. jīvitendriyād asya ko viśeṣaḥ. jīvitendriyasya antarābhava eva sambandhanam. manaindriyasya tūpapattibhave 'pi. samānakālaṃ ca jīvitendriyaṃ nikāyasabhāgena tatsambandhanaṃ karoti. manaindriyaṃ tu bhinnakālam api punarbhave tatsambandhanaṃ karoti. vaśibhāvānuvartana iti. cittasya vaśibhāvam anuvartate loko dharmo vā yathoktam. cittenāyaṃ loko nīyata iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1883: cittena nīyate lokaś cittena parikṛṣyate ekadharmasya cittasya [Tib. 87a] sarvadharmā vaśānugā
T07yabhkvyu:1884: iti. rāgādīnāṃ tadanuśāyitvād iti. teṣu sukḥādiṣu anuśāyituṃ śīlam eṣām ālambanataḥ saṃprayogato vā. ta ime tadanuśāyino rāgādayaḥ. tadbhāvas
T07yabhkvyu:1885: tadanuśāyitvam. tasmād iti. yathoktaṃ sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśete.
T07yabhkvyu:1886: duḥkhāyāṃ dvesaḥ. aduḥkhasukhāyāṃ moha iti. tair hi vyavadāyata iti. tair viśudhyatīty arthaḥ. tad evaṃ kleśaviśuddhāv eśāṃ śraddhādīnām ādhipatyam
T07yabhkvyu:1888: vyavadāne 'pi sukhādīnām ādhipatyam ity apara iti. na kevalaṃ saṃkleśe
T07yabhkvyu:1889: sukhādīnām ādhipatyaṃ. kiṃ tarhi. vyavadāne 'pīty apiśabdasyārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:1890: ābhidhārmikāḥ kecid evam āhuḥ. vyavadāne 'pi teṣām ādhipatyam astīti
T07yabhkvyu:1891: āgamam (Abhidh-k-vy 96) ānayanti. yasmāt sukhitasya cittaṃ samādhīyata ity uktaṃ sūtre. duḥkhopaniṣac chraddhā. duḥkham upaniṣad asyāḥ. seyaṃ śraddhā duḥkhopaniṣat. duḥkhahetukety arthaḥ. duḥkhe sati kasyacid dharme ratnatraye vā śraddhā jāyate. pravrajyāṃ vābhilaṣati. ṣaṇ ṇaiṣkramyāśritāḥ saumanasyādaya iti. ṣaṇ ṇaiṣkramyāśritāni saumanasyāni. ṣaṇ ṇaiṣkramyāśritāni daurmanasyāni. ṣaṇ ṇaiṣkramyāśritā upekṣāḥ. [Tib. 87b]
T07yabhkvyu:1892: naiṣkramyaṃ sāsravo 'nāsravo mārgaḥ. dhātoḥ saṃsārād vā niṣkramaṇaṃ vairāgyam ity apare. yathoktaṃ sūtre. cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi pratītyotpadyate saumanasyaṃ naiṣkramyāśritaṃ naiṣkramyālambanam ity arthaḥ. naiṣkramyānukūlam iti vā. evaṃ yāvan manaḥ pratītya dharmāṃś ca
T07yabhkvyu:1893: utpadyate saumanasyaṃ naiṣkramyāśritam iti. tathā cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi
T07yabhkvyu:1894: pratītya utpadyate daurmanasyaṃ naiṣkramyāśritam. evaṃ yāvan manaḥ. tathā cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi pratītyotpadyate upekṣā naiṣkramyāśritā. evaṃ yāvan manaḥ. naiṣkramyaṃ prāpsyāmīti kasyacit saumanasyam. na naiṣkramyāya mayā
T07yabhkvyu:1895: yatnaḥ kriyate iti kasyacid daurmanasyam. kasyacit pratisaṃkhyāyopekṣā teṣu rūpādiṣu bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1896: (II.2-4) apare punar āhur iti sautrāntikāḥ. vijñāya viṣamaparihārād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1897: vijñānena viṣamaparihāraḥ kriyate. na cakṣuḥśrotreṇety abhiprāyaḥ. nāpi vijñānād anyad rūpadarśanaṃ śabdaśravaṇaṃ vāstīti. na rūpadarśanaśabdaśravaṇaṃ grahaṇavyatiriktaṃ vicāryamāṇaṃ labhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:1898: grahaṇaṃ ca vijñānam eveti nānyad bhavati. tasmāc cakṣuḥśrotravijñānayoḥ sasaṃprayogayor utpattau yad ādhipatyam uktam. tad eva tad bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:1899: nānyatrādhipatyam etad [Tib. 88a] ity abhiprāyaḥ. manasaḥ punaḥ sarvārthopalabdhāv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1900: svārthopalabdhyādhipatyād ity eva siddhe manasaḥ sarvārthopalabdhāv iti vacanaṃ dharmadhātor
T07yabhkvyu:1901: asarvadharmasvabhāvatvāt. vyākhyātaṃ caitat purastāt. nanu cārthānām apy
T07yabhkvyu:1902: atrādhipatyam iti. dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpattir iti vacanāt. adhikaṃ hi prabhutvam ādhipatyam iti. adhikaḥ prabhur adhipatis tadbhāva ādhipatyam iti. sarvarūpopalabdhau sāmānyakāraṇatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:1903: nīlapītādisarvarūpopalabdhau ekarūpasya cakṣuṣaḥ karaṇatvāt. na tu rūpasyaikarūpasya nīlapītadisarvarūpopalabdhau kāraṇatvam. na hi nīlarūpaṃ

T07yabhkvyu:2038: sūkṣmo [Tib. 94a] nipuṇaḥ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyaḥ. taṃ cāhaṃ pareṣām
T07yabhkvyu:2039: āvedayeyam. taṃ ca pare na vijānīyuḥ. sa mama syād vighātaḥ. syāt
T07yabhkvyu:2040: klamathaḥ. syāc cetaso 'nudayaḥ. yan nv aham ekākī araṇye pravaṇe
T07yabhkvyu:2041: dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāratāyogam anuyukto vihareyam. atha brahmaṇaḥ sahāpater
T07yabhkvyu:2042: brahmaloke sthitasyaitad abhavat. naśyati batāyaṃ lokaḥ. praṇaśyati batāyaṃ lokaḥ. yatredānīṃ kadācit karhicit tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke utpadyante. tadyathā udumbarapuṣpam. tasya cādya bhagavato 'lpotsukavihāritāyāṃ cittaṃ krāmati na dharmadeśanāyām. yan nv ahaṃ gatvādhyeṣayeyam. atha brahmā sahāpatiḥ tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2043: sammiṃjitaṃ bāhuṃ prasārayet. prasāritaṃ vā sammiṃjayet. evam eva brahmā
T07yabhkvyu:2044: sahāpatiḥ brahmaloke 'ntarhito bhagavataḥ purastāt pratyasthāt. atha brahmā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthām abhāṣata.
T07yabhkvyu:2045: prādurbabhūva magadheṣu pūrvaṃ dharmo hy aśuddhaḥ samalānubaddhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2046: apāvṛṇīṣva amṛtasya dvāraṃ vadasva dharmaṃ virajaṃ niraṃgaṇam.
T07yabhkvyu:2047: atha bhagavān tasyāṃ velāyām ime gāthe abhāṣat.
T07yabhkvyu:2048: kṛcchreṇa me adhigato brahman khilāṃ pravidālya.
T07yabhkvyu:2051: pratisrotopamaṃ mārgaṃ gabhīram atidurdṛśaṃ na drakṣyante rāgaraktās tamaḥskandhena cāvṛtāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2052: brahmāvocat. santi bhadanta [Tib. 94b] sattvā loke jātā loke vṛddhās tīkṣṇendriyā api madhyendriyā api mṛdvindriyā apīty apravartita eva dharmacakra iti vistaraḥ. indriyāṇi śraddhādīni. yais te bhavyā uktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2053: yasmād apravartite 'pi dharmacakre santi tīkṣṇendriyā ityādy uktam. tasmāt santy eva sāsravāṇi śraddhādīnīti. sadevakāl lokād iti vistaraḥ. na tāvad aham asmāt sadevakāl lokāt samārakāt sabrahmakāt saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāyā mukto niḥsṛto visaṃyukto viprayukto viparyāsāpagatena cetasā bahulaṃ vyahārṣam iti vistaravacanam. na cānāsravāṇām eṣa parīkṣāprakāra iti. na hy anāsravāṇām āsvāda ādīnavo niḥsaraṇaṃ vā yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2054: (II.10) arhann iti. nānāgāmī. kleśavimuktasaṃtānatvāt. ṛddhimān iti prāptābhijñaḥ. cetovaśitvaṃ prāpta iti. asamayavimuktaḥ. jīvitapariṣkāram
T07yabhkvyu:2055: iti. jīvitāya pariṣkāras tadanuguṇatvāt. dattvā tat praṇidhāyeti. tad āyuḥ praṇidhāya cetasi kṛtvety arthaḥ. katham ity āha. yan me bhogavipākaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2056: karma. tad āyurvipākaṃ bhavatv iti. prāntakoṭikam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2057: vṛddhiniṣṭhāgatam iti lakṣaṇam asya vakṣyate. cittam utpādayati vācaṃ ca bhāṣata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2058: cittavācāv api tatsiddhaye kuryāt naikakāraṇasādhyaṃ hi kāryaṃ. tad anena [Tib. 95a] vipāka eva jīvitendriyam iti darśayati. yan me bhogavipākaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2059: karma. tad āyurvipākadāyi bhavatv iti. dhyānabhāvanābalaṃ tu tasyākarṣakam
T07yabhkvyu:2061: vipākoccheṣaṃ vipacyata iti. akālamaraṇenāparisamāptaphalasya tyaktasya janmāntarakarmaṇo bhāvanābalena vipākoccheṣam ākṛṣya pratisaṃvedayate.
T07yabhkvyu:2063: pūrvakarmajaṃ sthitikālāvedham iti. pūrvasmin janmani karma pūrvakarma.
T07yabhkvyu:2064: tato jātaḥ pūrvakarmajaḥ. sthitir indriyamahābhūtānāṃ pravāhaḥ. sthiteḥ kālaḥ sthitikālaḥ. tasyāvedha ākṣepaḥ. sthitikālāvedhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2065: tāvatsaṃsārakṣaṇānubandhasāmartham ākṣepaḥ. tena hy asau sthitikāla
T07yabhkvyu:2066: āvidhyate. taṃ pūrvakarmajaṃ sthitikālāvedham indriyamahābhūtānāṃ vyāvartayanti yognaḥ. apūrvaṃ ca samādhijam āgantukam ākṣipanti.
T07yabhkvyu:2068: praśnāt praśnāntaram upajāyata iti. atha yad arhan bhikṣur āyuḥsaṃskārān sthāpayati. taj jīvitendriyaṃ kasya vipāka ity asmāt praśnāt kimartham āyuḥsaṃskārān adhitiṣṭhantīti praśnāntaram. parahitārthaṃ śāsanasthityarthaṃ ceti. parahitārthaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2069: śāsanasthityartham eva śrāvakaḥ. rogādibhūtaṃ cātmabhāvam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2070: rogagaṇḍaśalyādibhūtaṃ triduḥkhatāyogāt. kva kasya ceti. kvety asya praśnavisarjanaṃ manuṣyeṣv eva [Tib. 95b] triṣu dvīpeṣv iti. kasyety asya visarjanaṃ strīpuruṣayor asamayavimuktasyārhataḥ prāntakoṭidhyānalābhina
T07yabhkvyu:2071: iti. tasya hīti vistaraḥ. samādhau ca vaśitvaṃ prāntakoṭikadhyānalābhinaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2073: dṛṣṭiprāptasya yady api samādhau vaśitvam asti. na tu tasya kleśair anupastabdhā saṃtatiḥ. samayavimuktasya yady api kleśair anupastabdhā saṃtatiḥ. na tu samādhau vaśitvam. asamayavimuktasya tūbhayam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:2074: bahuvacanam iti. jīvitasaṃskārān iti yad vacanaṃ. tad bahuvacanam. kasmād ity āha. bahūnām iti vistaraḥ. bahūnāṃ saṃtānavartināṃ jīvitasaṃskārāṇām
T07yabhkvyu:2075: utsarjanādhiṣṭhānāt. na hy ekasya kṣaṇasya utsarjane 'dhiṣṭhāne vā proyojanam asti. pravāheṇa parakāryābhiniṣpādanāt. ekasya ca kṣaṇasyāpīḍākaratvāt. na ca kālantarasthāvaram iti. kālāntarasthānaśīlaṃ kālāntarasthāvaram akṣaṇikam. tac caitad āyur dravyaṃ na bhavatīti
T07yabhkvyu:2076: dyotanārthaṃ bahuvacanam ity eke. bahuṣv eva saṃskāreṣv iti sautrāntikānām ayaṃ pakṣaḥ. ekasminn api kṣaṇe bahavas te saṃskārāḥ. yeṣv āyur iti
T07yabhkvyu:2077: prajñaptiḥ. naikam āyur nāma dravyam asti. te ca saṃskārāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2078: paṃcaskandhasvabhāvāś catuḥskandhasvabhāvā vā draṣṭavyāḥ. anyathā hi naiva
T07yabhkvyu:2079: saṃskāragrahaṇam akariṣyata. evaṃ tu vaktavyam abhaviṣyat. bhagavān jīvitāny adhiṣṭhāya āyūṃṣy utsṛṣṭavān iti maraṇavaśitvajñāpanārtham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2080: maraṇe [Tib. 96a] vaśitvam astīti. traimāsyam eva nordhvam iti. trayo māsāḥ samāhṛtās trimāsam. trimāsam eva traimāsyam atra kālādhvanor atyantasaṃyoge dvitīyā bhavati. nordhvaṃ traimāsyād vineyakāryābhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2082: pratijñātasaṃpādanārtham. anyathā vacanamātraṃ syād iti. kalpāvaśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2083: kalpa ekaḥ sakalaḥ kalpādhikaḥ kalpaḥ sātireka ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2085: kleśamāraḥ skandhamāraḥ maraṇamāraś ca. tatra prathame yāme devaputramāro
T07yabhkvyu:2086: nirjitaḥ. dvitīye yāme divyena cakṣuṣā vyavalokya tṛtīye yāme kleśamāro nirjitaḥ. vaiśālyāṃ tu traimāsyaṃ jīvitasaṃskārān adhiṣṭhāya āyuḥsaṃskārān
T07yabhkvyu:2087: utsṛṣṭavān. skandhamāranirjayārtham utsṛṣṭāḥ skandhāḥ. teṣūtsṛṣṭeṣu martavyaṃ syāt. ato maraṇamāranirjayārtham adhiṣṭhitā iti vaibhāṣikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2088: niṣṭhitam ānuṣaṃgikaṃ yat praśnāt praśnāntaram upajātaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2093: jīvitendriyād ekantavipākād anyāni dvādaśendriyāṇi vipākaś cāvipākaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:2094: tatra cakṣurādīni puruṣendriyāvasānāni sapta svapnādyabhinirvṛttāny aupacayikāny avipākaḥ. [Tib. 96b] manoduḥkhasukham iti vistaraḥ. yāni manaādīni kuśalakliṣṭāni tāny avipākaḥ. yāni ca yathāyogam
T07yabhkvyu:2096: yathāyogam iti viśeṣaṇam. airyāpathikādīnāṃ mānasatvena duḥkhendriyasaṃbhavāt sukhasaumanasyayoś ca kvacid asaṃbhavāt. tatra kāmadhātāv airyāpathikaṃ manaindriyaṃ tatsaṃprayukte ca
T07yabhkvyu:2098: avipākaḥ. vedanendriyaṃ ca tatsaṃprayuktaṃ yathābhūmi. nairmāṇikaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2100: airyāpathikaśailpasthānikanairmāṇikāni nityam upekṣendriyeṇa saṃprayuktānīti bhadantānantavarmā. śeṣāṇi vipāka iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2101: kuśalakliṣṭairyāpathikaśailpasthānikanairmāṇikasvabhāvebhyo manaindriyādibhyo 'nyāni manaindriyādīni vipākajāni vipākaḥ. śeṣāṇy avipāka iti siddham iti. jīvitendriyaṃ dvādaśa cakṣurādīni hitvā tadavadhāraṇād eva śeṣāṇy avipāka iti siddham. katamāni punas tāni.
T07yabhkvyu:2102: daurmanasyendriyaṃ na vipākaḥ kuśalākuśalatvāt. tathā hi vakṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:2109: yadi daurmanasyendriyaṃ na vipāka ity anenāgamavirodhaṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:2110: saṃprayogavedanīyatām adhikṛtyeti. vedanīyaṃ vedanā. daurmanasyaṃ vedanīyam asminn iti daurmanasyavedanīyaṃ karma. saumanasyopekṣāvedanīye
T07yabhkvyu:2111: apīti. saṃprayogamātravacanād daurmanasyavat saumanasyopekṣe api na vipākaḥ prāpṇuta iti parasyābhiprāyaḥ. saṃprayoge 'pi na doṣo vipāke
T07yabhkvyu:2112: 'pīti. saumanasyaṃ vedanīyam asmin saumanasyavedanīyaṃ karma. tathā saumanasyaṃ vipākatvena vedanīyam asya saumanasyavedanīyaṃ karmeti. agatyā hy etad evaṃ gamyeteti. yadi daurmanasyaṃ yuktyā paricchinnaṃ na vipāka
T07yabhkvyu:2113: iti. tata evam agatyākhyāyeta saṃprayogavedanīyatām adhikṛtyoktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2114: tenāha kā punar atra yuktir daurmanasyaṃ na vipāka iti. atha vā agatyā hy etad evaṃ gamyeta. kvacit saṃprayogavedanīyatā. kvacid vipākavedanīyateti.
T07yabhkvyu:2115: brūyās tvaṃ sarvatraiva tarhi saṃprayogavedanīyateti. ata etad antarābhiprāyam abhisamīkṣyāha. kā punar atra yuktir daurmanasyaṃ na
T07yabhkvyu:2116: vipāka iti. daurmanasyaṃ hīty [Tib. 97b] aniṣṭacintanādikaiḥ parikalpaviśeṣair utpādyate ca [vyutpādyate ca] vyupaśāmyate ca.
T07yabhkvyu:2117: saumanasyam apy evam iti. parikalpaviśeṣair iṣṭacintanādibhir utpādyate ca vyupaśāmyate ca. vītarāgādīnāṃ tarhīti. yasmād vītarāgādīnāṃ daurmanasyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2118: vyāvartate. na hi cakṣurādiko vipākabhūto vītarāgādīnāṃ vyāvartate.
T07yabhkvyu:2119: daurmanasyaṃ tu vyāvartate. vacanād daurmanasyena kāmavītarāgo
T07yabhkvyu:2120: 'samanvāgata iti. sūtre 'py uktaṃ. avītarāgasya dviśalyā vedanoktā kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratisaṃvedayate caitasikaṃ ca daurmanasyam iti. vacanāt vītarāgasya ca ekaśalyā kāyikam eva duḥkhaṃ pratisaṃvedayata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2121: saumanasyam apy eṣām iti vistaraḥ. vītarāgāṇām avyākṛtaṃ vipākarūpaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2122: saumanasyaṃ kīdṛśaṃ syāt. samāpattisaṃgṛhītaṃ teṣāṃ saumanasyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2123: saṃbhavati. tac ca kuśalatvān na vipākaḥ. ato vaktavyam. kīdṛśaṃ teṣāṃ saumanasyaṃ vipāka iti. yādṛśaṃ tādṛśam astv iti. aparicchidyamānam api tad asty eveti darśayati. tasyāsti vipākāvakāśo na daurmanasyasya.
T07yabhkvyu:2124: sarvathāpy asamudācārāt samāpattyavasthāyām apy asamāpattyavasthāyām apīty ato na vipāka iti siddham. manaindriyam ubhayor ubhayasyeti. ubhayoḥ sugatidurgatyoḥ ubhayasya kuśalākuśalasya. vipāka ity adhikāraḥ. idam utsṛṣṭaṃ jīvitendriyāṣṭamāni sugatau kuśalasya [Tib. 98a] vipāka iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2125: tatra katham ubhayavyaṃjanam asādhusammataṃ kuśalasya vipāka ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:2126: sugatāv ubhayavyaṃjanasyākuśalena tatsthānapratilaṃbha iti. sthānam asya bhraṣṭam. ato 'syākuśalena (Abhidh-k-vy 108) pratilaṃbho viprayukto dharmaḥ. ubhayaṃ tu vyaṃjanaṃ kuśalasyaiva vipāka ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2128: iti. tad ekaṃ savipākam evety arthaḥ. tenāha. tuśabda evakārārtho bhinnakramaś ceti. bhinnasthāna ity arthaḥ. tad ekaṃ savipākaṃ tv iti hi
T07yabhkvyu:2129: kramo na bhinnaḥ syāt. ślokabandhānuguṇyena tv evam uktam. na hi tad
T07yabhkvyu:2130: avyākṛtam iti. savipākam evety avadhāraṇe yuktiṃ darśayati. dve hi vastunī
T07yabhkvyu:2131: avipāke iṣyete. avyākṛtam anāsravaṃ ca. vikalpaviśeṣotpādyatvān na tad
T07yabhkvyu:2132: avyākṛtam. asamāhitatvāc ca nānāsravam. avyākṛtaṃ hi pūtibījavan na vipākadānāya samartham. anāsravaṃ tu tṛṣṇānabhiṣyanditatvān nālaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2133: vipākadānāyānabhiṣyanditasārabījavat. pāriśeṣyād akuśalaṃ vā tad bhavet kuśalasāsravaṃ vā. ataḥ savipākam eva nāsty avipākaṃ daurmanasyam.
T07yabhkvyu:2135: daśaiva dvidhā dvidhaiva ca daśety avadhāraṇam. dvidheti savipākāvipākāni.
T07yabhkvyu:2137: manaś ca anyavittayaś ca śraddhādīni ceti. vittir vedanā. anyagrahaṇena daurmanasyavarjitaṃ gṛhyate daurmanasyasyoktatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2139: śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñā. gṛhyanta ity adhikṛtam anyad avipākam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2140: yathoktadaurmanasyādyavadhāraṇāt. jīvitaṃ rūpāṇi ca saptendriyāṇy ājñāsyāmīndriyādīni ca trīṇy avipākānīti siddham avyākṛtatvāt anāsravatvāc ca yathākramam.
T07yabhkvyu:2144: iti. dvidhaiva daurmanasyaṃ daurmanasyam eva dvidhety avadhāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2145: dvidheti kuśalaṃ cākuśalaṃ ca. anyad api dvaidham asti. kūśalaṃ cāvyākṛtaṃ ca akuśalaṃ cāvyākṛtaṃ ceti. tat katham idam avadhāryate. kuśalaṃ cākuśalaṃ ceti. vyākhyānato viśeṣapratipattiḥ. atha vā daurmanasyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2146: savipākam eveti nirdhāritam. tasmād idam eva dvaidhaṃ bhavati nānyat.
T07yabhkvyu:2147: anyā ca vittir iti daurmanasyavarjyaṃ vedanācatuṣṭayaṃ tasyoktatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2149: kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtāni. trayaḥ prakārās tredhā. dvitryoś ca dhamuñ. edhāc ceti (Abhidh-k-vy 109) tredhety edhāśabdavyutpattiḥ. alobhādisaṃprayuktāni
T07yabhkvyu:2153: jīvitāṣṭamam anyad ekadhaivety avadhāryate. avyākṛtam evety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2154: etadarthaṃ ca punar asya karaṇam. anyathā hy akuśalam eva kuśalāvyākṛtam evākuśalāvyākṛtam eva vā tat saṃbhāvyate. tasmād abhīpsitaikadhātvaprasiddhyarthaṃ punar ucyate. yasyaikadhātvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2155: saṃbhavati. tad bhavati. kiṃ ca saṃbhavaty avyākṛtatvam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2157: amalam eva hitvā kāmāptaṃ bhavati. tad dhy apratisaṃyuktam eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:2159: rūpāptaṃ strīpumindriye iti vistaraḥ. strī ca pumāṃś ca strīpumāṃsau. samāsānte vidhir anitya iti paribhāṣayā samāsānto na bhavati. tayor indriye strīpumindriye.
T07yabhkvyu:2160: duḥkhe ceti duḥkhavedanāsvabhāve indriye duḥkhadaurmanasye ity arthaḥ. te strīpumindriye duḥkhadaurmanasye amalāṃ cehānuvartamānaṃ hitvā. śeṣaṃ rūpāptam indriyaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:2161: kvocyanta iti pṛṣṭe sūtraṃ darśayati. asthānam anavakāśa iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2162: atra sūtra ity abhiprāyaḥ. anyaḥ puruṣabhāvo 'sti. yaḥ kāmadhātau puruṣāṇāṃ bhavatīti. stanādisaṃsthānasvarācārānyathātvam. duḥkhendriyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2163: nāstīti. āśrayasyācchatvāt tad abhighātajaṃ nāsti. akuśalabhāvāc ca vipākajaṃ ca nāsti. daurmanasyendriyaṃ nāsti śamathasnigdhasaṃtānatvād
T07yabhkvyu:2164: iti. yasmāc ca śamathena samādhinā [Tib. 99b] pratighavigamāt. raukṣyaṃ saṃtāne nāsti. tasmād daurmanasyendriyaṃ nāsti. āghātavastvabhāvāc ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:2165: āghātaḥ kopaḥ. tasya vastu viṣayaḥ āghātavastu. nava cāghātavastūni.
T07yabhkvyu:2166: anarthaṃ me akārṣīt karoti kariṣyati cety āghātavastutrayam. mitrasya me anartham akārṣīt karoti kariṣyatīty aparam āghātavastutrayam. amitrasya me artham akārṣīt karoti kariṣyati cety aparam āghātavastutrayam iti. eṣāṃ navānām āghātavastūnām abhāvāt viṣayakṛtam api daurmanasyaṃ nāsti. na kevalaṃ hetukṛtaṃ nastīti darśayati. hetukṛtaṃ hi tad yat
T07yabhkvyu:2167: svasaṃtānapratighakṛtam. pratyayakṛtaṃ ca tad yan navāghātavastukṛtam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2170: caśabdena pūrvoktam anukṛṣyate. tenāha. strīpumindriye duḥkhe cāmalaṃ ca hitveti vartata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2173: (II.14) vittitrayaṃ sukhasaumanasyopekṣā iti. sukhendriyaṃ yat tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ darśanaheyānuśayasaṃprayuktaṃ. tad darśanaheyam.
T07yabhkvyu:2174: tatraiva ato 'nyat sāsravam. pañcavijñānakāyikaṃ ca kāmāvacaram.
T07yabhkvyu:2175: prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ ca trivijñānakāyikaṃ bhāvanāprahātavyam. anāsravaṃ tu sukhendriyam aheyam. [Tib. 100a] saumanasyaṃ darśanaheyasaṃprayuktaṃ darśanaheyam. ato 'nyat sāsravaṃ bhāvanāheyam. anāsravam aheyam.
T07yabhkvyu:2178: daurmanasyayogād durmanaskaḥ. tadbhāvo durmanaskatā. daurmanasyam ity arthaḥ. yasya guṇasya hi bhāvād dravye śabdaniveṣaḥ. tadabhidhāne tvatalāv iti lakṣaṇāt. tad darśanaheyasaṃprayuktaṃ darśanaheyam. ato 'nyad
T07yabhkvyu:2181: iti. kāmapradhānatvāt kāmadhātuḥ kāma iti nirdiśyata iti vakṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2182: aṇḍajajarāyujasaṃsvedajais sattvaiḥ kāmadhātāv ādau prathamato dve indriye vipākātmake labhyete. kāyendriyaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ ca. kasmāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2184: upapattibhavaḥ kliṣṭaḥ sarvakleśaiḥ svabhūmikair iti vacanāt. cakṣurādīnāṃ ca tasyām avasthāyām
T07yabhkvyu:2185: nopapādukair iti apavādaḥ. aviśeṣitatvād dhy upapādukair api tathaiva dve eva labhyeyātām iti prasaṃgaḥ. tasmād ayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ. kim upapādukais te dve naiva labhyete. labhyete na tu dve eva. tenāha taiḥ ṣaḍ veti
T07yabhkvyu:2188: yugādyutpannāḥ prāg āsan rūpivat sattvā iti vacanāt. katamāni ṣaṭ. cakṣurādīni pañca jīvitaṃ ca ṣaṣṭham iti. yathā devādiṣv iti. ādiśabdena nārakādayo 'pi gṛhyante.
T07yabhkvyu:2189: antarābhavopapattibhavapratisaṃdhyavasthāyāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 111) tāni prathamato labhyante. kiṃ punar ubhayavyañjanā apy upapādukā bhavantīti.
T07yabhkvyu:2190: nihīnobhayavyañjanotpattiḥ. viśiṣṭā copapādukā yoniḥ. katham anayoḥ samāyoga iti codanābhiprāyaḥ. rūpapradhānatvād rupāṇīti rūpadhātur
T07yabhkvyu:2191: nirdiśyate. rūpapradhānatvād iti. rūpāṇāṃ svacchatvād bhāsvaratvād ity
T07yabhkvyu:2192: arthaḥ. atha vā na kāmaguṇapradhāno rūpadhātuḥ. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:2193: rūpamātrapradhānaḥ. nāpy ārūpyadhātuvad arūpapradhāna iti. sūtre 'py uktam
T07yabhkvyu:2194: iti. sūtre 'py evaṃ dṛṣṭam. na madupajñam evaitad iti darśayati. ye 'pi te śāntā vimokṣā atikramya rūpāṇy ārūpyāḥ. te 'py anityā adhruvā anāśvāśikā
T07yabhkvyu:2195: vipariṇāmadharmāṇa iti vistaraḥ. avyañjanair upapādukair iti
T07yabhkvyu:2196: prāthamakalpikaiḥ. samāpattitaś ca paratvād iti. yasmāt pūrvaṃ rūpasamāpattiḥ. paścād ārūpyasamāpattiḥ. tasmād rūpadhātor uttara
T07yabhkvyu:2197: ārūpyadhātuḥ. upapattitaś ca pradhānataratvād iti. yasmāc copapattitaḥ pradhānataraḥ [Tib. 101a] rūpadhātor ārūpyadhātuḥ. bahūni kalpasahasrāṇi tatrātipraśānto vipāko bhavati. ato 'py asāv uttaro na tūpapattideśataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2200: iti. mriyamāṇa ārūpyadhātāv etāny eva trīṇīndriyāṇi nirodhayati. sāpavādaṃ caitad veditavyam.
T07yabhkvyu:2204: iti. rūpadhātāv aṣṭāv etāny eva. saha pañcabhiś cakṣurādibhir nirodhayet.
T07yabhkvyu:2205: sakṛtsamagrendriyamaraṇāt. ata evāha. sarve hy upapādukāḥ samagrendriyā upapadyante mriyante
T07yabhkvyu:2207: ubhayavyañjano daśendriyāṇi nirodhayati. yadi samagrapañcendriyo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:2208: ekavyañjano nava. avyañjano 'ṣṭau. yadi tu vikalendriyo 'ndho badhiro vā bhavati. tadā tad indriyaṃ parihāryam. sāpavādaṃ caitat sarvakāmadhātāv
T07yabhkvyu:2211: na hy eṣāṃ pṛthagnirodha iti. na hy eṣāṃ kāmadhātāv anyonyaṃ virahayya
T07yabhkvyu:2215: sarvasya pūrvoktasya maraṇavidher nirodhayaty uparamann ārūpye jīvitaṃ mana ity evamāder apavādaḥ. trividhaṃ hi maraṇacittaṃ saṃbhavati. kliṣṭam avyākṛtaṃ kuśalaṃ ca. [Tib. 101b] tatra kliṣṭāvyākṛtacittasyotsarganyāyena maraṇavidhir uktaḥ. kuśalacittasya tu maraṇe śraddhādayaḥ pañcādhikāḥ prakṣeptavyāḥ. eṣāṃ hi śraddhādīnāṃ kuśale cetasy avaśyaṃ bhāvaḥ. tena yatra trīṇy uktāni tatrāṣṭau. yatrāṣṭau tatra trayodaśa. yatra daśa tatra
T07yabhkvyu:2216: pañcadaśa. yatra nava tatra caturdaśa. yatra punar aṣṭau tatra trayodaśa.
T07yabhkvyu:2217: yatra catvāri tatra naveti vistareṇa gaṇanīyam. rūpārūpyadhātvoṛ nāsti kramamaraṇam.
T07yabhkvyu:2219: indriyaprakaraṇe iha kriyamāṇe. sarva indriyadharmā indriyāvasthāviśeṣāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2220: kāritraviśeṣā vā vicāryanta ity eke vyācakṣate. apare tu vyācakṣate.
T07yabhkvyu:2221: indriyaprakaraṇe indriyaskandhake sarva indriyadharmā avasthāviśeṣāḥ kāritraviśeṣā vā vicāryante. tenehāpi te vicāryante. tatpratyāsatvāt asya śāstrasyety abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2227: ante bhave antye. antye phale antyaphale. tayoḥ. ke punar antye.
T07yabhkvyu:2228: srotaāpattiphalaṃ arhattvaphalaṃ ca. yathā daṇḍasya dvāv antau bhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2229: evaṃ paṅktyavasthitānāṃ caturṇāṃ phalānāṃ srotaāpattiphalam arhattvaphalaṃ cānte bhavataḥ. sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalaṃ ca madhye bhavataḥ. tayor antyayoḥ phalayor navabhir evendriyaiḥ prāptiḥ. katamair navabhir ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:2231: ceti. navabhir iti. tatraivam abhisamayakramaḥ. duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2237: mārge 'nvayajñānam. iti ṣoḍaśa kṣaṇā abhisamaya ity ucyante. tatra duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntir yāvan mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntir iti pañcadaśa (Abhidh-k-vy 113) kṣaṇā darśanamārgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2238: adṛṣṭadṛṣṭer dṛṅmārgas tatra pañcadaśa kṣaṇā iti vacanāt. tac cājñāsyāmīndriyam ity ucyate. mārge 'nvayajñānaṃ tu ṣoḍaśaḥ sa bhāvanāmārgaḥ. tataḥ prabhṛtyā vajropamasamādher yāvān anāsravo mārgaḥ sarvo 'sau bhāvanāmārgaḥ. tac cājñendriyam ity ucyate. kṣayajñānāt prabhṛti sarvo 'nāsravo mārgo 'śaikṣamārgaḥ. tac cājñātāvīndriyam ity
T07yabhkvyu:2240: prāpyate. śraddhādīni cātra pañcendiyāṇi avaśyaṃ bhavanti. tasyā avasthāyāḥ kuśalatvāt. ājñāsyāmīndriyasvabhāvā cāsau mārge
T07yabhkvyu:2242: upekṣendriyaṃ cāvaśyaṃ anāgamyāśrayatvāt. [Tib. 102b] anāgamyasya ca upekṣendriyasaṃprayuktatvāt. mārge 'nvayajñānaṃ tu asyām avasthāyām
T07yabhkvyu:2243: ājñendriyasvabhāvam utpādābhimukhaṃ vartate. tena śraddhādibhiḥ pañcabhir
T07yabhkvyu:2244: ājñāsyāmīndriyeṇājñendriyeṇa manaupekṣendriyābhyāṃ ceti tatphalaṃ navabhiḥ prāpyate. ubhābhyāṃ hi tasya prāptir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2245: ānantaryamārgeṇājñāsyāmīndriyasvabhāvena vimuktimārgeṇa cājñendriyasvabhāvena tasya prāptiḥ. visaṃyogaprāpter āvāhakasaṃniśrayatvāt yathākramaṃ. tasyā visaṃyogaprāter ānantaryamārgasyāvāhakatvāt. janakatvāt. vimuktimārgasya ca tasyāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2247: cauraniṣkāsanakapāṭapidhānavat. yathā hi dvayor manuṣyayoḥ ekena cauro
T07yabhkvyu:2248: niṣkāsyate. dvitīyenāsya kapāṭaṃ pidhīyate. tathānantaryamārgeṇa visaṃyogaprāptir āvāhyate kleśaprāptim ādāya nirodhāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2249: vimuktimārgeṇādhāryate. visaṃyogaprāptisahotpādāt. arhattvasya punaḥ śraddhādibhir ājñāsyāmīndriyavarjyair iti. vajropamasamādhyavasthāyām arhattvaphalaṃ prāpyate. śraddhādīni manaindriyaṃ ca pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:2250: vajropamasamādhikalāpas tasyām avasthāyām ānantaryamārga ājñendriyasvabhāvo vartamānaḥ. sukhasaumanasyopekṣendriyāṇāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2251: yadi tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ niśrityārhattvaṃ prāpyate. sukhendriyaṃ tatra vartamānaṃ. [Tib. 103a] atha prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya tatra
T07yabhkvyu:2253: athānāgamyadhyānāntaracaturthadhyānākāśavijñānākiṃcanyāyatanānāṃ anyatamaṃ niśritya tatropekṣendriyaṃ vartamānaṃ. kṣayajñānakalāpas tu asyām
T07yabhkvyu:2255: tena śraddhādibhiḥ paṃcabhir ājñendriyeṇājñātāvīndriyeṇa manaindriyeṇa sukhasaumanasyopekṣendriyāṇāṃ cānyatameneti tatphalaṃ navabhiḥ prāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2258: saptāṣṭanavabhir dvayoḥ prāptir iti vākyaśeṣaḥ. pratyekam iti vistaraḥ. sakṛdāgāmiphalasya saptabhir aṣṭābhir navabhir vā prāptiḥ. evam anāgāmiphalasya. tat pratipādayann āha. sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ tāvad yady ānupūrvakaḥ prāpṇoti sa ca laukikena mārgeṇeti. laukiko mārgaḥ śāntādyudārādyākāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2259: śāntādyudārādyākārā uttarādharagocarā iti vacanāt. tenottarāṃ bhūmiṃ śāntataḥ praṇītataḥ niḥsaraṇataś ceha yogī
T07yabhkvyu:2260: paśyati. adharām audārikato duḥkhilataḥ sthūlabhittikataś ca paśyati. sa cāyaṃ catuḥprakāro varṇyate. prayogamārga ānantaryamārgo vimuktimārgo
T07yabhkvyu:2261: viśeṣamārgaś ca. tatra prayogamārgo yata ānantaryamārga utpadyate. sa punar yena kleśān prajahāti. vimuktimārgo [Tib. 103b] 'py ānantaryamārgād anantaram utpadyate. kleśaprahāṇaprāpter ādhārakaḥ. viśeṣamārgas tata uccaṃ viśiṣṭo mārgaḥ. tena mārgeṇa navaprakārāḥ kleśāḥ praheyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2262: adhimātrādhimātro 'dhimātramadhyo 'dhimātramṛduḥ madhyādhimātro madhyamadhyo madhyamṛduḥ mṛdvadhimātro mṛdumadhyo mṛdumṛduś ceti. tad yadi pṛthagjanaḥ prajahāti darśanabhāvanāheyān kleśān miśrīkṛtya tena
T07yabhkvyu:2263: mṛdumadhyādhimātrādibhedena navadhā kṛtvā prajahāti. mṛdumṛdubhyām ānantaryavimuktimārgābhyām adhimātrādhimātraṃ kleśaprakāraṃ prajahāti.
T07yabhkvyu:2264: evaṃ yāvad adhimātrādhimātrābhyām ānantaryavimuktimārgābhyāṃ mṛdumṛdukleśaprakāraṃ prajahāti. āryas tu bhāvanāheyān eva kleśāṃs tathaiva navadhā kṛtvā prajahāti. darśanaheyānāṃ darśanamārgeṇa prākprahīṇatvāt. lokottaras tu bhāvanāmārgas tathaiva ṣoḍaśākāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2265: anityādyākārabhedāt. sa cāpi tathaiva prayogādimārgabhedāc caturbhedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2266: ihāpi mṛdumṛdubhyām ānantaryavimuktimārgābhyām adhimātrādhimātraṃ kleśaprakāraṃ prajahāti. evaṃ yāvad adhimātrādhimātrābhyām
T07yabhkvyu:2267: ānantaryavimuktimārgābhyāṃ mṛdumṛdukleśaprakāraṃ prajahāti. eṣa laukikalokottarayor mārgayor diṅmātranirdeśaḥ. tat sakṛdāgāmiphalam ānupūrvakeṇa vā labhyeta bhūyovītarāgeṇa vā. tatrānupūrviko yaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpya kramāt sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti. [Tib. 104a] kaś
T07yabhkvyu:2268: cāsau. yaḥ sakalabandhana ekaprakārādyupalikhito vā yadi na
T07yabhkvyu:2269: ṣaṣṭhaprakāropalikhito niyāmam avakrāmati. ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe sa
T07yabhkvyu:2270: srotaāpanno bhavati. sa bhāvanāheyasyaikasya yāvat ṣaṣṭhasyaiva vā prakārasya prahāṇāya śamathacaritatvāt laukikam api mārgam utpādayati. sa ṣaṣṭhaprakāre prahīṇe sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti. tasya phalasya saptabhir
T07yabhkvyu:2271: indriyaiḥ prāptiḥ śraddhādibhiḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 115) paṃcabhir manaindriyeṇa upekṣendriyeṇa ca saptamenānāgamyanirśrayatvāt. atha lokottareṇe mārgeṇa
T07yabhkvyu:2272: tasyāṣṭābhir indriyaiḥ prāptiḥ. tair evājñendriyeṇa cāṣṭhamena. tany eva hi śraddhādīni saptendriyāṇi ājñendriyākhyāṃ labhante. anāsravatvāt. atha bhūyovītarāga iti. yo laukikena mārgeṇa pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ ṣaṭprakāropalikhito 'bhūt. sa bhūyovītarāga ity ucyate. bhūyasā prakāreṇa vītarāga iti kṛtvā. sa yadi sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti. kathaṃ sa prāpnoti
T07yabhkvyu:2274: prāpnoti. tasya navabhir yathaiva srotaāpattiphalasya. śraddhādibhir
T07yabhkvyu:2276: ayaṃ hi srotaāpattiphalaṃ aprāpyaiva ṣoḍaśe kṣaṇe sakṛdāgāmī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:2277: anāgāmiphalaṃ yady ānupūrvakaḥ prāpnotīti. ihānupūrvako [Tib. 104b] yaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ ca prāpya anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti. yo vā bhūyovītarāgo bhūtvā srotaāpattiphalam alabdhvaiva sakṛdāgāmiphalam eva ca labdhvānāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti. sa ca yadi laukikena mārgeṇa prāpnoti. tasya saptabhir indriyaiḥ prāptiḥ. yathā sakṛdāgāmiphalasyānupūrvikīyasyety abhipretaṃ. śraddhādibhiḥ paṃcabhir manaupekṣendriyābhyāṃ cety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2278: atha lokottareṇa mārgeṇa tasyāṣṭābhis tathaiveti. yathā sakṛdāgāmiphalasyaivāṣṭābhir ity arthaḥ. ājñendriyam aṣṭamaṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:2279: atha vītarāga iti. kāmadhātumātravītarāgo laukikena mārgeṇa navame prakāre prahīṇe prathamād api vā dhyānād yāvad ākiṃcanyād api vā viṭarāgo yo 'nāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti. tasya navabhiḥ prāptiḥ. yathā srotaāpattiphalasya.
T07yabhkvyu:2280: srotaāpattiphalasya hi darśanamārgeṇa prāptiḥ. asya ca darśanamārgeṇaiva
T07yabhkvyu:2281: prāptir iti tulyatvam. ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ. sakhasaumanasyopekṣendriyāṇām anyatamaṃ bhavati. niśrayaviśeṣād iti. yadi tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya niyāmam avakrāmati. sukhendriyaṃ tatra bhavati. atha prathamadvitīye dhyāne niśritya saumanasyendriyaṃ tatra bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:2282: athānāgamyadhyānāntaracaturthadhyānānām anyatamaṃ niśritya upekṣendriyaṃ tatra bhavatīti. [Tib. 105a] yadāpy ayam ānupūrvika iti vistaraḥ. yadāpy ayam adhigatapūrvaphala ānupūrvikas tīkṣṇendriyaḥ. sa navame vimuktimārge
T07yabhkvyu:2283: dhyānaṃ praviśati maulaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa tadāpy aṣṭābhir indriyair anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti. tatra mauladhyānasaṃgṛhīto vimuktimārgo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:2284: tatra ca saumanasyendriyaṃ. ānantaryamārgas tv anāgamyasaṃgṛhīta eva. yadi na pṛaviśati tatra copekṣendriyam eva nānyathā. tasya prāptir aṣṭābhiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2285: śraddhādibhiḥ paṃcabhir manaupekṣāsaumanasyendriyaiś ceti. ubhābhyāṃ ca tasya prāptir iti. ānantaryavimuktimārgābhyāṃ. (Abhidh-k-vy 116)
T07yabhkvyu:2286: cauraniṣkāsanakapāṭapidhānavad iti vyākhyātam etat. atha lokottareṇa praviśatīti. sa eva ānupūrvikas tīkṣṇendriyo veditavyo 'dhikārānuvṛtteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2287: tasya navabhir indriyaiḥ prāptis tair evedānīm uktair indriyaiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2288: ājñendriyeṇa ca navamena. tāny eva hi indriyāṇi anāsravatvād ājñendriyākhyāṃ labhante. idam iha codyate. kasmād ānupūrvika evam ukto na punar vītarāgapūrvī. na hi vītarāgapūrvī anāgamyaniśrayeṇa darśanamārgam utpādya ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe maulaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ praviśati. tatrādhigate
T07yabhkvyu:2289: 'nādarāt. ānupūrviko hi mauladhyānarthī tasyānadhigatapūrvatvāt. tasmād asti saṃbhavo yad asau maulam eva praviśati. vītarāgapūrvī tu catuḥsatyadarśanaṃ prati kṛtādaro na dhyānaṃ pratīti [Tib. 105b] na tatra ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe maulaṃ dhyānaṃ praviśatīty abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2290: navāptir antyaphālayor ity uktaṃ. tad virodhayati yat tarhi abhidharma uktaṃ. jñānaprasthāne.
T07yabhkvyu:2291: katibhir indriyair arhattvaṃ prāpnotīti. āha. ekādaśabhir iti. tat kathaṃ na virudhyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2293: iti. kasyacid evaikasya pudgalasya saṃbhavo na sarvasya saṃbhavaḥ. yo hi mṛdvindriyaḥ parihāya parihāya sukhasaumanasyopekṣābhiḥ niśrayaviśeṣāt pāryāyikībhir arhattvaṃ prāpnuyāt. taṃ praty evam uktaṃ. ekādaśabhir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2294: na tu saṃbhavo 'sti sakhasaumanasyopekṣāṇāṃ ekasmiṃ kāle samavadhānam ity arthaḥ. cittacaittānām ekaikadravyotpatteḥ. yo hi kaścin mṛdvindriyaḥ pudgalo 'nāgamyaṃ anyaṃ vopekṣendriyaniśrayaṃ niśritya arhattvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2295: prāpnuyāt. tasya tatprāptir upekṣendriyeṇa. tataḥ punar api parihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2296: tataḥ prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ vā dhyānaṃ niśritya punar arhattvaṃ prāpnuyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2297: tasya tatprāptiḥ saumanasyendriyeṇa. tataḥ punar api parihīyate. tataḥ sa tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya punar arhattvaṃ prāpnuyāt. tasya tatprāptiḥ sukhendriyeṇa iti. pratyekaṃ tatra phalaprāptau avaśyaṃ navaivendriyāṇi vyāpriyante. śraddhādīni paṃca manaājñātāvīndriyāṇi
T07yabhkvyu:2298: sukhasaumanasyopekṣendriyāṇāṃ cānyatamad iti. punaḥpunaḥ prāptes tad
T07yabhkvyu:2299: ekādaśabhir ity uktaṃ. katham anāgāmino 'py eṣa prasaṃgo [Tib. 106a] na
T07yabhkvyu:2300: bhavatīti. kasmāt tatra śāstre 'rhatvaphalam eva ekādaśabhiḥ prāpnotīty
T07yabhkvyu:2301: uktaṃ. na tūktam anāgāmiphalam apīti. na hy asau parihīṇaḥ kadācit sukhendriyeṇa prāpnotīti. asāv anāgāmī tṛtīyadhyānordhvabhūmilābhāt
T07yabhkvyu:2302: parihīṇo bhavati. ūrdhvabhūmer eva parihīṇo bhavati. nasāv (Abhidh-k-vy
T07yabhkvyu:2303: 117) anāgāmiphalāt parihīṇa ity ucyate. evaṃ yāvat. dvitīyadhyānāt. yadā tu prathamāt parihīṇo bhavati. tadānāgāmiphalāt parihīṇa ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2304: paṃcāvarabhāgīyaprahāṇād dhi anāgāmiphalaṃ vyavasthāpyate. yadā ca sa
T07yabhkvyu:2305: kāmavairāgyāt parihīṇaḥ. tadā tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam asya nāsti. tat kathaṃ sukhendriyeṇānāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnuyāt. tata āha. na hy asau parihīṇaḥ kadācit sukhendriyeṇa prāpnotīti. kiṃ. saumanasyendriyeṇa prāpnuyāt. yata evaṃ sukhendriyasyaiva pratiṣedhaḥ. prāpnuyāt yadi navame vimuktimārge maulaṃ dhyānaṃ praviśet. naitad asti. yo hi parihīṇo bhavet. sa
T07yabhkvyu:2306: mṛdvindriyaḥ. yaś ca mṛdvindriyaḥ. sa na śaknoti navame vimuktimārge maulaṃ dhyānaṃ praveṣṭuṃ. tīkṣṇendriyas tu śaknoti. indriyasaṃcārasya
T07yabhkvyu:2307: duṣkaratvāt. asty etat. kiṃ tu yady asau mṛdvindriya ānupūrviko
T07yabhkvyu:2308: 'nāgāmiphalaṃ prāpya tataś ca parihīṇo bhūtvā indriyasaṃcāraṃ kuryāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2309: indriyasaṃcāreṇa ca tīkṣṇendriyo bhūtvā pūrvakeṇaiva krameṇānāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnuvan yadi navame vimuktimārge maulaṃ [Tib. 106b] praviśet. tasya tadānāgāmiphalaprāptir aṣṭābhir navabhir vā bhavati. śraddhādibhiḥ paṃcabhir manaindriyeṇa upekṣendriyeṇa cānantaryamārgasaṃgṛhītena saumanasyendriyeṇa ca mauladhyānavimuktimārgasaṃgṛhīteneti. lokottareṇa cen maulaṃ dhyānaṃ praviśet. ebhiś cāṣṭābhir ājñendyiyeṇa ca navamenety avagantavyaṃ. tasmāt sūktaṃ. na hy asau parihīṇaḥ kadācit sukhendriyeṇa
T07yabhkvyu:2310: prāpnotīti. vītarāgapūrvī tarhy ekādaśabhis tat prāpnuyāt. kathaṃ. yo mṛdvindriyaḥ pudgalas tṛtīyadhyānalābhī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya niyāmam avakrāmet. sa ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe anāgāmī bhavati. sā tatphalaprāptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2312: sa tato 'nāgāmiphalāt parihīṇa indriyottāpanena tīkṣṇendriyam ātmānaṃ kṛtvā anāgamyaniśrayeṇaivānāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnuvan navame vimuktimārge
T07yabhkvyu:2313: maulaṃ praviśet. tasya tatphalaprāptiḥ pūrvavad upekṣendriyeṇa saumanasyendriyeṇa ca śraddhādibhiś cāpi paṃcabhir manaindriyeṇa cāṣṭamena lokottaramārgatvāt ājñendriyeṇāpi navameneti. evaṃ dvayoḥ kālayor
T07yabhkvyu:2314: ekādaśabhir indriyais sa pudgalas tad anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnuyād iti. tatas tat pratiṣedhārtham idam āha. na ca vītarāgapūrvī parihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2315: tadvairāgyasya dvimāryaprāpaṇād iti. na ca kāmavītarāgaḥ kenacin niśrayeṇa niyāmam [Tib. 107a] avakrāntaḥ parihīyate. kasmāt. tadvairāgyasya kāmavairāgyasya dvimārgaprāpaṇāt. laukikalokottaramārgaprāpaṇāt. iha phalaṃ dvividhaṃ. saṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:2316: saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtaṃ phalam iti vacanāt. tatra yad asaṃskṛtaṃ visaṃyogalakṣaṇam anāgāmiphalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2317: (Abhidh-k-vy 118) pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa prāptaṃ. niyāmāvakrāntau ca lokottareṇa mārgeṇa punas tat prāptaṃ. dvividhā hi tasya prāptiḥ. laukikī lokottarā ca. tasmāt sthiraṃ tad vairāgyaṃ. tasmād ato na parihīyate. nanu ca
T07yabhkvyu:2319: darśanaheyānām avastukatvād ity etad api kāraṇāntaram asti. kasmāt tad iha
T07yabhkvyu:2320: noktam ity etad api vaktavyaṃ. api khalu para evaṃ brūyāt. mā bhūd darśanaheyakleśavairāgyaparihāṇiḥ. bhāvanāheyakleśamātravairāgyaparihāṇis tu kasmād asya parihīṇakasya na bhavet. paṃcāvarabhāgīyaprahāṇād dhi anāgāmiphalaṃ bhavati. tatra ca satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo vicikitsā ca darśanaheyāḥ. kāmacchando vyāpādaś ca bhāvanāheyau. tayoś ca tasya
T07yabhkvyu:2321: vītarāgapūrviṇo 'bhisamayānte ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe prahāṇasya laukikena mārgeṇa prāptasya tatsāmarthyāt punar anāsravā prāptir bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:2322: anāsravagotrāṇāṃ labdhatvāt. [Tib. 107b] anāsravaṃ hi navamavimuktimārgasvabhāvaṃ saṃskṛtam anagāmiphalam asaṃskṛtaṃ ca kāmacchandādiprahāṇaṃ tasyām avasthāyāṃ labhyate. tasmād idam eva kāraṇam
T07yabhkvyu:2323: uktaṃ. āryeṇa tad vairāgyasya dvimārgaprāpaṇād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2326: iti. upekṣayā jīvitena manasā vā yukto 'nvito 'vaśyaṃ trayeṇa samanvāgataḥ tenaivopekṣājīvitamanaḥsvabhāvena. na hy eṣām anyonyena rinā samanvāgama
T07yabhkvyu:2327: iti. yadaikasya samanvāgamaḥ. tadetarayor api samanvāgamaḥ. tenaiṣāṃ samanvāgamavyavasthānaṃ kriyate. cakṣurādīnāṃ tu na kriyate. tasmād āha.
T07yabhkvyu:2329: cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvendriyair ārūpyadhātūpapanno na samanvāgata ity atra
T07yabhkvyu:2331: asyopacayārthasya cakṣurādiṣv eva saṃbhavān na kāyendriye. anyathā hi rūpibhir indriyair ārūpyopapanno na samanvāgata ity evocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2332: apratilabdhāni kalalādyavasthāyāṃ. vihīnāni labdhavināśād andhatvādyavasthāyāṃ kramamaraṇe vā. pṛthagjanā na samanvgāgatā iti
T07yabhkvyu:2333: viśeṣaṇaṃ. āryasyāvaśyaṃ samanvāgatatvāt. na hi tasya bhūmisaṃcāreṇa
T07yabhkvyu:2334: anāsravasukhādityāgaḥ. daurmanasyena kāmavītarāga iti. ihastho dhātvantarastho vā pṛthagjano vāryo [Tib. 108a] vā na samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2337: aśaikṣamārgasthāḥ phalaprāptau vihīnatvāt asamanvāgatāḥ. apratiṣiddhāsv avasthāsu yathoktasamanvāgamo veditavya iti. yā apratiṣiddhā avasthāś
T07yabhkvyu:2338: cakṣurādibhir indriyaiḥ samanvāgamaṃ prati. tāsv avasthāsu yadyad indriyam
T07yabhkvyu:2339: uktaṃ. taistaiḥ samanvāgato veditavya ity arthaḥ. tadyathā kāmadhātāv apratilabdhavihīnāvasthāṃ hitvā cakṣurādhibhir jihvāntaiḥ samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2342: iti. yukta iti vartate. avaśyam iti ca. saṃkhyānukramavivakṣāyāṃ tu tadanantaraṃ tair ity evānantaraṃ sukhādigrahaṇaṃ. sukhendriyeṇa samanvāgata iti. caturthadhyānārūpyadhātūpapannaṃ pṛthagjanaṃ muktvā
T07yabhkvyu:2343: sarvaḥ sukhendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ. tasyānyair nāvaśyaṃ samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2344: cakṣurādibhir jihvendriyāntair ārūpyadhātau kāmadhātau ca apratilabdhavihīnāvasthāyām asamanvāgamaḥ. kāyendriyeṇa ca ārūpyadhātau.
T07yabhkvyu:2345: strīpuruṣendriyābhyāṃ rūpārūpyadhātvoś ca. kāmadhātau ca alabdhavihīnāvasthāyāṃ. duḥkhendriyeṇa
T07yabhkvyu:2350: ājñātāvīndriyeṇa pṛthagjanaśaikṣāvasthāyāṃ asamanvāgata iti. yaḥ kāyendriyeṇa so 'pi caturbhir iti. kāmadhātūpapannaḥ kāyendriyeṇa samanvāgatas tasya. nānyair avaśyaṃ samanvāgamaḥ. cakṣurādibhiḥ kāmādhātāv alabdhavihīnāvasthāyām asamanvāgamaḥ. strīpuruṣendriyābhyām etasyām evāvasthāyāṃ rūpadhātau cāsamanvāgamaḥ. duḥkhena cāsminn eva. sukhena ca pṛthagjanasya caturthadhyānopapattāv asamanvāgamaḥ. saumanasyena pṛthagjanas tṛtīyacaturthadhyānopapanno 'samanvāgataḥ. daurmanasyena śraddhādibhiś cānyaiḥ pūrvavad asamanvāgamo vaktavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2352: iti. cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvāvān ity arthaḥ. tena ceti. tena cakṣuṣā.
T07yabhkvyu:2353: cakṣuṣi saty avaśyaṃ kāyendriyaṃ. na tu śrotrādīni. kāmadhātāv
T07yabhkvyu:2355: vaktavyaḥ. evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvendriyair iti. yaḥ śrotrendriyeṇa. so
T07yabhkvyu:2356: 'vaśyaṃ paṃcabhir upekṣājīvitamanaḥkāyais tena cety evaṃ sarvaṃ neyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2359: kiṃ. paṃcabhir [Tib. 109a] avaśyaṃ samanvāgata ity adhikṛtaṃ. cakṣurādiṣv eva saumanasyaṃ kasmān na prakṣiptaṃ. anyasthānapāṭhāt. tathā hy ādiśabdena prakṣepa ākulaḥ syāt. dvitīyadhyānajas tṛtīyālābhī katamena
T07yabhkvyu:2360: sukhendriyeṇa samanvāgata iti. sukhendriyaṃ kāmadhātau paṃcavijñānakāyikaṃ. prathame ca dhyāne trivijñānakāyikam asti. tṛtīye tu dhyāne mānasaṃ. ato dvitīyadhyānajo nādhareṇa sukhendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2361: tasya bhūmisaṃcāreṇa tyaktatvāt. na ṭṛtīyadhyānabhūmikena tasyālābhitvād
T07yabhkvyu:2362: iti matvā codayati. katamena sukhendriyeṇa samanvāgata iti. āha. kliṣṭena
T07yabhkvyu:2363: tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikeneti. sarve hy adharabhūmyupapannāḥ sattvā uparibhūmikenāprahīṇena kliṣṭena samanvāgatā iti siddhāntaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2366: iti. kāmadhātūpapanno hy eṣa. tasmād avaśyaṃ kāyendriyeṇa caturbhiś ca vedanendriyair iti. daurmanasyavarjyaiḥ. tadvītarāgāvasthāyāṃ daurmanasyaṃ vyabhicarati. manojīvitendriye ca staḥ. ity avaśyaṃ saptabhir indriyaiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2370: ājñātāvīndriyādīnāṃ ca trayāṇāṃ vakṣyamāṇatvāt. [Tib. 109b] eṣām evāṣṭānām indriyāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ bhavati. yaḥ strīndriyeṇa samanvāgata iti. sa kāmadhātūpapanna eva strīndriyavattvāt. ataḥ so 'vaśyam aṣṭābhir indriyaiḥ samanvāgataḥ. katamair ity āha. taiś ca saptabhiḥ strīndriyeṇa ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:2371: kāyajīvitamanobhiś caturbhiś ca vedanendriyair iti saptabhiḥ strīndriyeṇa
T07yabhkvyu:2372: cāṣṭamena. śeṣair aniyamaḥ. yathoktaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ vaikalyasaṃbhavād
T07yabhkvyu:2373: ityādibhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ. strīndriyavat puruṣendriyavān api vaktavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2374: daurmanasyavān api kāmopapannaḥ kāmavītarāga iti tathaiva taiḥ saptabhir daurmanasyena ca. śraddhāvān api traidhātukaḥ sattva iti taiḥ paṃcabhiḥ śraddhādibhir avinābhāvibhir upekṣājīvitamanobhiś ca samanvāgataḥ. śeṣair aniyamaḥ pūrvavat. yathā śraddhāvān evaṃ yāvat prajñāvān. ājñāte indriyam ājñātendriyam iti. ājñāta eva indriyaṃ ājñātendriyaṃ. niravaśeṣājñāta indriyam ity arthaḥ. ājñendriyam api hi ājñāta indriyaṃ na tu niravaśeṣe sāvaśeṣatvāt praheyasya. atha vā padaikadeśagrahaṇena ājñātāvī pudgala ājñāta ity ucyate. tasyendriyaṃ ājñātendriyam iti. ya ājñendriyeṇa so
T07yabhkvyu:2376: śaikṣaḥ triṣv api dhātuṣu bhavati. sa caturthadhyānārūpyopapannaḥ kathaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2377: sukhasaumanasyendriyābhyāṃ samanvāgataḥ. [Tib. 110a] yasmād āryaḥ kāmavairāgye 'vaśyaṃ saumanasyendriyaṃ pratilabhate. dvitīyadhyānavairāgye ca sukhendriyaṃ. te ca bhūmisaṃcāre 'pi na tyajyete. tathā hi vakṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:2381: pratipannakamārgamṛdvindriyamārgasaṃgṛhīte tyajyete. tathāpy apare phalasthatīkṣṇendriyamārgasvabhāve labhyete. tasmāt tābhyāṃ sukhasaumanasyābhyāṃ bhūmisaṃcāre 'pi aparityaktābhyāṃ caturthadhyānārūpyopapanno 'pi āryaḥ samanvāgata eva bhavati. śeṣaiḥ pūrvavad aniyamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2383: iti vistaraḥ. ājñāsyāmīndriyasamanvāgataḥ kāmāvacaraḥ sattvaḥ kāmadhātāv
T07yabhkvyu:2385: asaṃvegād iha vidhā tatra niṣṭheti vācanād
T07yabhkvyu:2386: iti. tasmād avaśyaṃ kāyendriyam asyāsti. catasro vedanā daurmanasyavarjyāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2387: tasya vītarāgāvasthāyāṃ vyabhicārāt. tatrāvaśyam iti vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:2388: trayodaśabhir ebhir indriyair avaśyam eva samanvāgata ity avadhāryate. na tu trayodaśabhir eveti. śeṣair aniyamaḥ. andhādiṣv api darśanamārgasaṃbhavāt. strīpuruṣendriyayor vaikalye kathaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2389: darśanamārgotpattiḥ. strīpuruṣendriyaviyuktavikalānāṃ hi saṃvaraphalaprāptivairāgyāṇi [Tib. 110b] na santīti. kecit tāvad āhuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2390: pratilabdhasaṃvarāṇāṃ phalaprāptir bhavati. dvivyaṃjanodayād dhi prātimokṣasamvaratyāgo bhavati. na tadvaikalyāt. kramamaraṇād vā strīpuruṣendriye nirodhe 'py abhyastanirvedhabhāgīyasya darśanamārgotpattir bhavati. apare punar āhuḥ. pudgalasāmānyam
T07yabhkvyu:2393: upekṣājīvitamanoyukto 'vaśyaṃ trayānvita iti yāvat. upekṣāsamanvāgataḥ pudgalaḥ kāmadhātūpapanno vā yāvad bhavāgropapanno vā sarvo 'sāv avaśyaṃ trayeṇa samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2394: cakṣurādivyabhicāras tu saṃbhavato na sarvatra. kaścid eva hi rūpibhir indriyair asamanvāgato ya ārūpyadhātūpapannaḥ. na tu yo rūpadhātūpapannaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2395: vistareṇa yāvat kaścid eva śraddhādibhir asamanvāgato yaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2396: samucchinnakuśalamūlaḥ. na tu sa eva ārūpyadhātūpapannaḥ. tasthehāpi yāvān ājñāsyāmīndriyopetaḥ sarvo 'sāv ebhir yathoktais trayodaśabhir indriyair avaśyaṃ samanvāgataḥ. vyabhicāras tu saṃbhavataḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 122)
T07yabhkvyu:2397: kasyacid eva. tathā hi kasyacic cakṣurindriyeṇāsamanvāgamo yo 'ndhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2398: kasyacic chrotrendriyeṇa yo badhiraḥ. evaṃ ghrāṇādibhiḥ. yāvat kasyacit strīndriyeṇa yaḥ puruṣaḥ. kasyacit puruṣendriyeṇa yā strī. kasyacid daurmanasyena yo vītarāgaḥ. ity evam evāvagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2400: iti ekaḥ pudgalaḥ. sarvebhyo 'lpair [Tib. 111a] yaḥ samanvāgataḥ. sa kiyadbhir alpaiḥ samanvāgata ity āha. niḥśubho yaḥ samucchinnakuśalamūlaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2403: iti. kāmavairāgyaṃ cātra na saṃbhavati. tasmād asya paṃcāpi vedanendriyāṇi
T07yabhkvyu:2404: santi. kāyendriyaṃ ca jīvitamanasī ca sta eva sarvatra. cakṣurādīni tu na
T07yabhkvyu:2405: santi. kramamaraṇāvasthāyāṃ andhatvādyavasthāyāṃ ca teṣām abhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2406: vcdayata iti kṛtveti kartari kvip. vedanaṃ vā vid iti bhāvasādhana auṇādikaḥ kvip. jñāpakaṃ darśayati. yathā saṃpadanaṃ saṃpad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2407: tathārūpya iti saṃkhyāmātraṃ tathāśabdena saṃbadhyate. ekāntakuśalatvāt śraddhādīni śubhagrahaṇena gṛhyanta iti. śubhāny eva nākuśalāvyākṛtāni yāni tāni śubhānīty arthaḥ. ājñāsyāmīndriyādīnām api grahaṇaprasaṃga iti. tāny api ekāntakuśalāni. tasmāt tadgrahaṇaprasaṃga iti. na. aṣṭādhikārād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2410: upekṣāyurmanaḥśubhair aṣṭābhir ity ājñāsyāmīndriyādīnāṃ nirāsaḥ kṛto bhavati. aṣṭaśabdena
T07yabhkvyu:2412: bālas tathārūpya iti vacanāt. [Tib. 111b] ājñāsyāmīndriyādyabhāve ca pṛthagjano bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:2413: pṛthagjanatvaṃ katamat. āryadharmāṇām alābha iti vacanāt. tasmāt teṣv anāsraveṣu aprasaṃga
T07yabhkvyu:2414: (II.22) dvivyaṃjano yaḥ samagrendriya iti. dvivyaṃjano 'pi hi
T07yabhkvyu:2416: ājñātāvīndriyaṃ dvayoś cānyatarad iti. rāgitvād ājñātāvīndriyaṃ ekāntena
T07yabhkvyu:2418: samanvāgamāt. yadājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ. na tadājñendriyaṃ. yadājñendriyaṃ. na
