T07yabhkvyu:2419: tadājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ. (Abhidh-k-vy 123) ukta indriyāṇāṃ dhātuprabhedaprasaṃgenāgatānāṃ vistareṇa prabhcda iti. aṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ katīndriyaṃ kati nendriyam iti dhātuprabhedaprasaṃgena.
T07yabhkvyu:2420: dharmārdham indriyaṃ ye ca dvādaśādhyātmikāḥ smṛtā
T07yabhkvyu:2423: (II.23) kim ete saṃskṛtā dharmā iti. ye te skandhadhātvāyatanatvenābhihitāḥ pūrvaṃ. yathā bhinnalakṣaṇā iti. rūpyate iti rūpaṃ. anubhavo vedanā. nimittodgrahaṇaṃ saṃjñetyādi. saṃskṛtagrahaṇam
T07yabhkvyu:2424: utpattimattvāt. utāho niyatasahotpādā api. kecit santīti. santi hi kecit
T07yabhkvyu:2425: sahotpādā na tu niyatasahotpādāḥ. yathā cakṣurādisahotpādāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2426: tadvijñānādayaḥ cakṣurādīnāṃ sabhāgatatsabhāgabhāvāt. tasmād evaṃ pṛcchati. sarva ime dharmāḥ [Tib. 112a] paṃca bhavaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:2428: rūpādikalāpamukhena dharmanirdeśaḥ. sukhapratipattyarthaṃ. tatrāsaṃskṛtaṃ naivotpadyata iti. na tat prati sahotpādaniyamaś cintyate. sarvasūkṣmo rūpasaṃghātaḥ paramāṇur iti. saṃghātaparamāṇur na dravyaparamāṇuḥ. yatra hi pūrvaparabhāgo nāsti. tat sarvarūpāpacitaṃ dravyaṃ dravyaparamāṇur
T07yabhkvyu:2429: itīṣyate. tasmād viśinaṣṭi saṃghātaḥ paramāṇur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2431: iti. kāmadhātau yadā śabdo 'tra notpadyate. tadā niyatam aṣṭadravyaka eva bhavati nāto nyūnadravyakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2433: iti. aparam indriyam asminn ity aparendriyaḥ. cakṣurādimān ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2434: yatra hi cakṣuḥ śrotrādi vā tatra kāyendriyeṇa bhavitavyaṃ tatpratibaddhavṛttitvāc cakṣurādīnāṃ. saśabdāḥ punar ete paramāṇava ity aṣṭadravyakādayaḥ saṃghātaparamāṇavaḥ saśabdā utpadyamānā yathākramaṃ nava
T07yabhkvyu:2435: daśaikādaśadravyakā utpadyante. yo 'ṣṭadravyakaḥ. sa navadravyakaḥ. yo
T07yabhkvyu:2436: navadravyakaḥ. sa daśadravyakaḥ. yo daśadravyakaḥ. sa ekādaśadravyaka iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2437: asti hīndriyavinirbhāgī śabdo 'pīti. indriyād vinirbhaktuṃ yo na śakyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2438: sa indriyāvinirbhāgī śabdaḥ. indriyāpṛthagvartīty arthaḥ. avinirbhogīti kecid bhuji paṭhanti.
T07yabhkvyu:2439: katham avinirbhāge bhūtānāṃ kaścid eva saṃghātaḥ kaṭhina ityādi. kaṭhinaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2441: (Abhidh-k-vy 124) vāyudhātuḥ. tulyabhūtasadbhāvāt tulyarūpais tatsaṃghātair bhavitavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ. yad yatra paṭutamam iti
T07yabhkvyu:2442: vistaraḥ. yad dravyaṃ pṛthivyādilakṣaṇaṃ. yatra saṃghāte paṭutamaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2443: sphuṭatamaṃ prabhāvataḥ śaktito na tu dravyataḥ udbhūtam utpannaṃ. tasya
T07yabhkvyu:2444: tatropalabdhiḥ. tasya dravyasya tatra saṃghāta upalabdhir grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2445: sūcītūlīkulāpasparśavat. tatra sūcyo lohamayyaḥ pratītā loke. tūlyo
T07yabhkvyu:2446: vīraṇādipuṣpamūladaṇḍāḥ. yāḥ siṃkā iti prākṛtapratītāḥ. tāsāṃ sūcīnāṃ tūlīnāṃ ca kalāpaḥ. tasya sparśaḥ sūcītūlīkalāpasparśaḥ. tasya
T07yabhkvyu:2447: copalabdhiḥ. tasya paṭutamasya prabhāvata udbhūtasya bhūtasyeti. tatra
T07yabhkvyu:2448: tasyeveti. anena lakṣaṇena vatiḥ. etad uktaṃ bhavati. yathā tulye 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:2449: sūcīnāṃ tūlīnāṃ kalāpasadbhāve tīkṣṇatvāt sūcīnām eva sparśo vyaktam upalabhyate. na tūlīnām atīkṣṇatvāt. tathā kvacid eva saṃghāte kāṣṭhādike kaṭhinam upalabhyate. kvacid dravaḥ pānīye. kvacid uṣṇo 'gnau. kvacit samudīraṇā vāyau. na ca tatratatra saṃghāte catvāri mahābhūtāni na santi.
T07yabhkvyu:2450: saktulavaṇacūrṇarasavac ca. saktucūrṇānāṃ lavaṇacūrṇānāṃ ca yathā
T07yabhkvyu:2451: rasasyopalabdhiḥ. lavaṇacūrṇarasa eva vyaktam upalabhyate. na tu saktucūrṇarasaḥ. tadvad ihāpīti. saṃgrahadhṛtipaktivyūhanād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2452: saṃgrahakarmaṇābdhātor astitvaṃ gamyate kāṣṭhādike. anyathā pāṃsumuṣṭivat tad viśīryate. yadi tatrābdhātur na syāt. dhṛtikarmaṇāpsu nauprabhṛtīnāṃ [Tib. 113a] pṛthivīdhātor astitvaṃ gamyate. paktikarmaṇā tejodhātor astitvaṃ gamyate. yadi hi tan na syāt kāṣṭhādikaṃ na pūtībhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:2453: vyūhanakarmaṇā vāyudhātor astitvaṃ gamyate. prasarpaṇaṃ hi tasya na syād vṛddhir vā yadi vāyudhātus tatra na syāt. evam anyatrāpi yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2454: pratyayalābhe ca satīti vistaraḥ. pratyayānām agnyādīnāṃ lābhe sati kaṭhinādīnāṃ ca dravaṇādibhāvāt. dravaṇaghanatvādibhāvāt. tadyathāgnibhūte sati kkaṭhinasya lohasya dravaṇaṃ. tena jñāyate lohe 'bdhātur astīti.
T07yabhkvyu:2455: tathā dravasya śaityādipratyayalābhe kāṭhinyaṃ. tena jñāyate pṛthivīdhātor
T07yabhkvyu:2456: atrāstitvam iti. tathā kaṭhinasaṃgharṣād auṣṇyam upalabhyate. tena tejodhātor atrāstitvaṃ gamyate. iti evaṃ saṃbhavato 'nyatrāpi yojyaṃ. apsu śaityātiśayād auṣṇyaṃ gamyate ity apara iti bhadantaśrīlātaḥ. yasmād āpaḥ śītāḥ śītatarāḥ śītatamāś ca upalabhyante. tato jñāyate tejasas
T07yabhkvyu:2457: tatrānyataratamotpatteḥ śaityātiśayaḥ. tena ca tatra tejo 'stīti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2458: avyatibhede 'pīti vistaraḥ. taṃ matam ācāryo dūṣayati. yathā na ca
T07yabhkvyu:2460: atiśayaś ca bhavati svabhāvabhedāt paṭuḥ śabdaḥ paṭutaraḥ paṭutama iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2461: evam ihāpi bhavet. yathā ca vedanāyā na kenacid dravyāntareṇa vyatibhedo bhavatīti [Tib. 113b] svabhāvabhedāt tāratamyenātiśayaḥ. tathehapīti.
T07yabhkvyu:2462: nānena tejo'stitvaṃ gamyate. tā eva hy āpaḥ kāścic chītāḥ kāścic chītatarāḥ kāścic chītatamā iti. bījatas teṣu teṣāṃ bhāvo na svarūpata ity apara iti sautrāntikāḥ. bījataḥ śaktitaḥ sāmarthyata ity arthaḥ. na svarūpato na dravyata ity arthaḥ. śaktir eva hi nānāvidhāsti yayā yogibhir
T07yabhkvyu:2463: adhimokṣaviśeṣeṇa suvarṇadhātū rūpyadhātus tāmradhātur ity evamādayo dhātavaḥ kriyante. kasmād ity āha. saṃty asmiṃ dāruskandhe vividhā dhātava iti vacanāt. dhātuśaktayo hi tatraivaṃ bhagavatoktāḥ. na hi tatrātibahūnāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2465: kathaṃ vāyau varṇasadbhāva iti vaibhāṣikān evaṃ codayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:2467: iti niyame kathaṃ vāyau varṇo 'stīti nirdhāryate. na hi kathaṃcit tatra varṇa upalabhyate. śraddhānīya eṣo 'rtho nānumānīya iti vaibhāṣikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2468: paramāptair ayam ukto 'rtha iti pratyetavyo nārtho 'numānasādhya ity
T07yabhkvyu:2469: abhiprāyaḥ. saṃsargato gandhagrahaṇād veti. asti vānumānam iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:2470: gandhavatā tu dravyeṇa vāyoḥ saṃparkād gandha upalabhyate. sa ca gandho
T07yabhkvyu:2471: varṇaṃ na vyabhicarati. yatra hi gandhaḥ. tatra varṇena bhavitavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2472: atra ca sādhanavacanaṃ. varṇavān vāyur gandhavattvāj [Tib. 114a]
T07yabhkvyu:2475: vinā gandharasaghrāṇajihvāvijñānadhātubhir iti vacanāt. tena tatratyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ ṣaṭsaptāṣṭā dravyakā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2476: tatratyās tatra bhavāḥ. tatratyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ saṃghātaparamāṇavo
T07yabhkvyu:2477: 'dhikṛtāḥ. ya ihāṣṭadravyaka ukto nirindriyo 'śabdaḥ. sa tatra saḍdravyakaḥ. yo navadravyakaḥ kāyendriyā. sa saptadravyakaḥ. yo dasadravyako 'parendriyaḥ. so 'ṣṭadravyakaḥ. saśabdakāḥ punar ete
T07yabhkvyu:2478: saptāṣṭanavadravyakā ity avagantavyaṃ. uktarūpatvān na punar ucyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2479: uktakalpatvān na punaḥ sūtryanta ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2480: kiṃ punar atra dravyam eva dravyam iti vistaraḥ. mukhyavṛttyā yad dravyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2481: yasya svalakṣaṇam asti. tad dravyaṃ gṛhyate. āhosvid āyatanaṃ dravyam ity
T07yabhkvyu:2482: adhikṛtaṃ. āyatanam api hi dravyam iti śakyate vaktuṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2483: sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇasadbhāvāt. kiṃ cātaḥ. kaś cāto doṣa ity arthaḥ. yadi dravyam eva dravyaṃ gṛhyate. yadi rūpaparyantalakṣaṇaṃ pṛthivyādiparamāṇudravyaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 126) gṛhyate. atyalpam idam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2485: saṃsthānagurutvalaghutvaślakṣṇatvakarkaśatvaśītajighatsāpipāsānāṃ saṃbhavato dravyāntarāṇāṃ kvacitkvacit sadbhāvāt. tathā ca sati yo
T07yabhkvyu:2486: 'ṣṭadravyakaḥ. sa navadravyako yāvac caturdaśadravyaka ity aṣṭadravyakaniyamo bhidyate. evaṃ navadravyakādiṣu yojyaṃ. evaṃrūpadhātāv
T07yabhkvyu:2487: [Tib. 114b] api ṣaṭsaptāṣṭadravyaniyamabhedo vaktavyaḥ. caturdravyako hi vaktavya iti. yasmād bhūtāny api pṛthivyādīni spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2488: spraṣṭavyaṃ dvividham iti vacanāt. tasmāt kāme caturdravyako 'śabdaḥ. rūpaṃ gandho rasaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2489: spraṣṭavyam iti. saśabdas tu paṃcadravyaka iti vaktavyaṃ. yad āśrayabhūtam iti. pṛthivyādīni catvāri. yad āśrayibhūtam iti. rūpaṃ gandho rasaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2490: spraṣṭvyaikadeśaś ca. tad evaṃ saṃsthānasya rūpe 'ntarbhāvāt. gurutvādīnāṃ ca spraṣṭavya iti. nātyalpam idam ucyate. nāpy atibahu. āśrayabhūtānāṃ spraṣṭavyāyatanān niḥkṛṣya caturdhā nirdeśāt. evam api bhūyānsīti
T07yabhkvyu:2491: vistaraḥ. yad bhūtacatuṣkam āśraya ekasyopādāyarūpasya nīlasya pītasya vā.
T07yabhkvyu:2492: na tad evānyasyopādāyarūpasya gandhasya rasasya vāśrayaḥ. kiṃ tarhi. anyad eva bhūtacatuṣkaṃ tasyāśraya iti vaibhāṣikasiddhāntaḥ. tatra punar jātidravyam iti. bhūtacatuṣkajātir atra gṛhyate. yā hy ekasya
T07yabhkvyu:2493: bhūtacatuṣkasya jātiḥ. tām anyāni bhūtacatuṣkāni nātikrāmanti. evaṃ vikalpena vaktum iti. kiṃcid atra dravyam eva dravyaṃ gṛhyate yad
T07yabhkvyu:2494: āśrayabhūtaṃ. kiṃcid atrāyatanadravyaṃ gṛhyate yad āśrayibhūtaṃ. yac caitad āśrayabhūtaṃ. taj jātyā gṛhyata iti. chandato hi vācāṃ pravṛttiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2495: arthas tu parīkṣya iti. chandata icchātaḥ saṃkṣepavistaravidhānānuvidhāyinyo vācaḥ pravartante. arthas tu tāsāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2496: parīkṣyaḥ. kim evaṃ niyatasahotpādāni [Tib. 115a] tāni bhavanti. na
T07yabhkvyu:2497: bhavantīti. yogācāracittās tu saṃghātāvasthāne bhūtānāṃ bhautikānāṃ ca
T07yabhkvyu:2498: niyamaṃ varṇayanti. katham iti. ucyate. asti samudāya ekabhautikas
T07yabhkvyu:2499: tadyathā śuṣko mṛtpiṇḍaḥ. asti dvibhautikaḥ sa evārdraḥ. asti tribhautikaḥ sa evoṣṇaḥ. asti yāvat sarvabhautikaḥ sa evārdra uṣṇaś ca mṛtpiṇḍo gamanāvasthāyām iti. upādāyarūpe 'pi yad upādāyarūpaṃ yasmin samudāye
T07yabhkvyu:2500: upalabhyate. tat tatrāstīti veditavyaṃ. asti samudāya ekopādāyarūpikaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2501: tadyathā prabhā. asti dvyupādāyarūpikaḥ. tadyathā saśabdagandho vāyuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2505: paṃcopādāyarūpikaḥ. tadyathā sa eva saśabdaḥ. ity evamādy api (Abhidh-k-vy
T07yabhkvyu:2507: (II.24ab) śeṣāṇāṃ vaktavya iti cittacaittānāṃ viprayuktānāṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:2509: iti. na cittaṃ caittair vinā utpadyate. nāpi caittā vinā cittenety
T07yabhkvyu:2510: avadhāryate. na tu sarvaṃ cittaṃ sarvacaittaniyatasahotpādaṃ. nāpi sarvacaittāḥ sarvacittaniyatasahotpādā
T07yabhkvyu:2512: iti. saṃskṛtalakṣaṇair yad yuktaṃ. tat sarvaṃ taiḥ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇair jātyādibhir avaśyaṃ sahotpadyate. kiṃ punas tad ity āha. yatkiṃcid utpadyate rūpaṃ cittaṃ caitasikāś cittaviprayuktāś ceti. pūrvam eva hy
T07yabhkvyu:2513: asaṃskṛtaṃ bahiṣkṛtaṃ. tatrāsaṃskṛtaṃ naivotpadyate iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2514: vikalpārtho vāśabda iti. kiṃcit prāptyā sahotpadyate yat sattvasaṃkhyātaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2515: kiṃcin na yad asattvasaṃkhyātam iti vikalpaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2516: pratisaṃkhyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhayor yady api prāptir asti na tu tāv utpadyete iti na tayor grahaṇaṃ. sahotpādananiyamo hy ayam ārambha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2517: asattvasaṃkhyātasya prāptir nāstīti kim atra kāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2518: sarvasattvasādhāraṇatvāt. sahajayaiva ca prāptyā prāptyā prāptimān sahotpadyate. na pūrvapaścātkālajayety
T07yabhkvyu:2519: (II.24cd) gativiṣaya iti. utpattiviṣaya ity arthaḥ. mahābhūmikā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2521: (II.25) ime kileti. kilaśabdaḥ paramatadyotane. svamataṃ tu chandādayaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2522: sarvacetasi na bhavanti. tathā hy anenaivācāryeṇa paṃcaskandhake likhitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2523: chandaḥ katamaḥ. abhiprete vastuni abhilāṣaḥ. adhimokṣaḥ katamaḥ. niścite vastuni tathaivāvadhāraṇam ityādi. cetanā cittābhisaṃskāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2524: cittapraspandaḥ praspanda [Tib. 116a] iva praspanda ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2525: viṣayanimittagrāha iti. viṣayaviśeṣarūpagrāha ity arthaḥ. sparśa indriyaviṣayavijñānasaṃnipātajā spṛṣṭir iti. indriyaviṣayavijñānānāṃ saṃnipātāj jātā spṛṣṭiḥ. spṛṣṭir iva spṛsṭiḥ. yadyogād indriyaviṣayaviṣayavijñānāny anyonyaṃ spṛśantīva sa sparśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2526: dharmapravicaya iti. pravicinotīti pravicayaḥ. pravicīyante vā anena
T07yabhkvyu:2527: dharmā iti pravicayaḥ. yena saṃkīrṇā iva dharmāḥ puṣpāṇīva pravicīyante
T07yabhkvyu:2528: uccīyanta ity arthaḥ. ime sāsravā ime 'nāsravāḥ. ime rūpiṇaḥ ime 'rūpiṇa
T07yabhkvyu:2529: iti. dharmāṇāṃ pravicayaḥ dharmapravicayaḥ. pratītatvāt prajñeti vaktavye
T07yabhkvyu:2530: ślokabandhānuguṇyena matir iti kārikāyām uktaṃ. smṛtir ālambanasaṃpramoṣa iti. yadyogād ālambanaṃ na mano vismarati. tac cābhilapatīva. sā smṛtiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2531: manaskāraś (Abhidh-k-vy 128) cetasa ābhoga iti. ālambane cetasa āvarjanam.
T07yabhkvyu:2532: avadhāraṇam ity arthaḥ. manasaḥ kāro manaskāraḥ. mano vā karoti
T07yabhkvyu:2534: rucir ity anye. yathāniścayaṃ dhāraṇeti yogācāracittāḥ. samādhiś
T07yabhkvyu:2535: cittasyaikagrateti. agram ālambanam ity [Tib. 116b] eko 'rthaḥ. yadyogāc cittaṃ prabandhena ekatrālambane vartate. sa samādhiḥ. yadi samādhiḥ sarvacetasi bhavati. kim arthaṃ dhyāneṣu yatnaḥ kriyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2537: katham ekasmiṃś citte daśānāṃ bhinnalakṣaṇānāṃ caittānām astitvaṃ gamyata iti ata āha. sūkṣmo hi cittacaittānāṃ viśeṣa iti vistaraḥ. sa eṣa viśeṣaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2538: cittacaittānāṃ durlakṣyaḥ prabandheṣv api tāvat kiṃ punaḥ kṣaṇeṣu kālaparyantalakṣaṇeṣu. rūpiṇīnām api oṣadhīnāṃ mūrtānām api kāsāṃcit
T07yabhkvyu:2539: harītakīprabhṛtīnāṃ bahurasānāṃ ṣaḍrasānām indriyagrāhyā jihvendriyagrāhyāḥ duravadhārā duḥparicchedā bhavanti. kiṃ punaḥ ye dharmā amūrtā buddhigrāhyā manovijñānamātragrāhyāḥ. tasmād āptopadiṣṭā iti kṛtvā tathaiva te pratipattavyā ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2540: (II.26) śraddhā cetasaḥ prasāda iti. kleśopakleśakaluṣitaṃ cetaḥ śraddhāyogāt prasīdati. udakaprasādakamaṇiyogād ivodakaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2541: satyaratnakarmaphalābhisaṃpratyaya ity apare iti. ākāreṇa śraddhānirdeśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2542: satyeṣu caturṣu ratneṣu ca triṣu karmasu ca śubhāśubheṣu tatphaleṣu ca iṣṭāniṣṭeṣu saṃty evaitānīty abhisaṃpratyayo 'bhisaṃpratipattiḥ śraddheti.
T07yabhkvyu:2543: apramādaḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhāvaneti. bhāvanā nāma kuśalānāṃ [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:2545: pratilambhaniṣevākhye śubhasaṃskṛtabhāvane iti vacanāt sā katham apramādo nāma caitasiko bhaviṣyati. yasmin sati sā
T07yabhkvyu:2547: āha. yā teṣu avahitateti. tad evaṃ sati bhāvanāhetāv ayaṃ bhāvanopacāraḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2548: kṛta iti. cetasa ārakṣeti. yaḥ sāṃkleśikebhyaś cittam ārakṣate. so
T07yabhkvyu:2549: 'pramāda iti. cittakarmaṇyateti. yadyogāc cittaṃ karmaṇyaṃ bhavati. sā cittakarmaṇyatā cittalāghavam ity arthaḥ. nanu ca sūtre kāyapraśrabdhir apy ukteti. kaś ca paryāyo yat praśrabdhisaṃbodhyaṃgadvayaṃ bhavati. asti kāyapraśrabdhir asti cittapraśrabdhiḥ. tatra yāpi kāyapraśrabdhiḥ. tad api praśrabdhisaṃbodhyaṃgam abhijñāyai saṃbhodhaye nirvāṇāya saṃvartate. yāpi
T07yabhkvyu:2550: cittapraśrabdhiḥ. tad api praśrabdhisaṃbodhyaṃgam abhijñāyai saṃbodhaye nirvāṇāya saṃvartata (Abhidh-k-vy 129) iti. katham iyam ekaivocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2551: praśrabdhiś cittakarmaṇyateti. sā tu yathā kāyikī vedaneti. yathā cetasy api vedanā paramāṇusaṃcayātmakendriyāśrayatvāt kāyikīty ucyate tatheyam
T07yabhkvyu:2552: api praśrabdhir avagantavyā. kathaṃ sā bodhyaṃgeṣu yokṣyata iti asamāhitatvāt paṃcānāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ pṛcchati. tatra tarhīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2553: [Tib. 117b] tatra sūtre kāyavaiśāradyam eva kāyakarmaṇyatā bhūtaviśeṣalakṣaṇā prītyadhyākṛtā. prītamanasaḥ kāraḥ praśrabhyata iti
T07yabhkvyu:2554: vacanāt. kathaṃ sā bodhyaṃgam iti. pṛthakkalāpatvāt sāsravatvāc ca na yujyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. prītiḥ prītisthānīyāś ca dharmāḥ prītisaṃbodhyaṃgam iti vistaraḥ. tīrthikāḥ kila bhagavacchrāvakān evam
T07yabhkvyu:2555: āhuḥ. śramaṇo bhavanto gautama evam āha. evaṃ yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ paṃca nivaraṇāni prahāya cetasa upakleśakarāṇi prajñādaurbalyakarāṇi sapta bodhyaṃgāni bhāvayateti. vayam apy evaṃ brūmaḥ. tatrāsmākam śramaṇasya ca
T07yabhkvyu:2556: gautamasya ko viśeṣo dharmadeśanāyāḥ. tebhyo bhagavatā etad upadiṣṭaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2557: paṃca santi daśa bhavanti. daśa santi paṃca vyavasthāpyante. pratighaḥ pratighanimittaṃ ca navāghātavastūni vyāpādanivaraṇam uktaṃ bhagavatā.
T07yabhkvyu:2558: tadānukūlyāt. tathā sapta santi caturdaśa bhavanti. caturdaśa santi sapta
T07yabhkvyu:2559: vyavasthāpyante. prītiḥ prītinimittaṃ cety anena bhedena. tadānukūlyād
T07yabhkvyu:2560: iti. na ca saṃkalpavyāyāmau prajñāsvabhāvāv iti. tayor yathākramaṃ vitarkavīryasvabhāvatvāt. na tau prajñāsvabhāvau. yadā ca triskandho
T07yabhkvyu:2561: mārgaḥ kriyate śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandha iti. tatra prajñāskandhanirdeśa uktaṃ. prajñāskandhaḥ katamaḥ. samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyaksaṃkalpaḥ samyagvyāyāma iti. upekṣā [Tib. 118a] cittasamateti.
T07yabhkvyu:2562: yadyogāc cittaṃ samam anābhoge vartate. sopekṣā saṃskāropekṣā nāma.
T07yabhkvyu:2563: trividhā hi upekṣā. vedanopekṣā saṃskāropekṣā apramāṇopekṣā ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:2564: nanu coktaṃ durjñāna eṣāṃ viśeṣa iti. sūkṣmo hi cittacaittānāṃ viśeṣaḥ. sa eṣa duḥparicchedaḥ pravāheṣv api tāvad ityādi vacanāt. duḥkhena jñāyate durjñānaḥ. asti hi nāma durjñānam api jñāyate. yad aviruddhaṃ ekasmiṃś
T07yabhkvyu:2565: cittakṣaṇe dharmāntareṇa sparśādinā. idaṃ tu khalu atidurjñānaṃ yad virodhe 'py avirodha iti. ābhoganābhogayor ekasmiṃś cittakṣaṇe avirodho vyavasthāpyata iti vākyaśeṣaḥ. na hi viruddhayoḥ sukhaduḥkhayor ekasmiṃś cittakṣaṇe bhāvo dṛṣṭa iti. anyatrābhoga iti. anyatrālambane ābhogo 'nyatrānābhoga ity avirodhaḥ. evaṃjātīyakam atrānyad apy āyāsyatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:2566: virodhajātīyaṃ yathā vitarkavicārau. tayor hi lakṣaṇaṃ cittaudārikatā
T07yabhkvyu:2569: vitarkavicāraudāryasūkṣmate iti vacanāt. tayos tu ekatra citte virodha iti vakṣyate. yas tasya
T07yabhkvyu:2570: so 'syapīti. paryāyeṇānayor vṛttir ity abhiprāyaḥ. hrīr apatrāpyaṃ ca
T07yabhkvyu:2572: ahrīr agurutāvadye bhayadarśitvam atrapety atra viparyayagrahaṇāt. sa tu prajñātmaka iti. sa tv amohaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2574: matiḥ smṛtir iti vacanāt. nāsau kuśalamahābhūmika evocyate. kiṃ tarhi. akuśalādibhūmiko
T07yabhkvyu:2575: 'pīti. aviheṭhaneti. yadyogāt paro na viheṭhyate. sāvihiṃsā vihiṃsāpratipakṣaḥ caitasikaḥ. cetaso 'bhyutsāha iti. kuśalakriyāyāṃ yaś cetaso 'bhyutsāhaḥ. tad vīryaṃ. yas tv akuśalādikriyāyāṃ cetaso
T07yabhkvyu:2576: 'bhyutsāhaḥ. naitad vīryaṃ. kausīdyam eva tat. pravacane paṭhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2577: sīdanātmakatvāt. tathā hy uktaṃ bhagavatā. ito bāhyakānāṃ yad vīryaṃ kausīdyam eva tad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2580: paścād vyākhyāyate. bhāvanāvipakṣo dharma iti. bhāvanāyā abhāvamātrapratipattir mā bhūd iti bhāvanāvipakṣa ity āha. evaṃ kauśīdyādiṣv api vyākhyeyaṃ. kāyagurutācittaguruteti. praśrabdhipratipakṣo
T07yabhkvyu:2581: dharmaḥ. yathā kāyikī vedaneti. yathā vedanā rūpīndriyāśrayatvāt caitasiky api kāyikīti vyākhyātā. tathā kāyikaṃ styānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2582: paṃcavijñānakāyasaṃprayuktaṃ styānaṃ kāyikam ity ucyate. auddhatyaṃ cetaso 'vyupaśama iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2584: na cātra styānaṃ paṭhyate ity abhidharme. prāptijño devānāṃ priyo na tv iṣṭijña [Tib. 119a] iti. pāṭhaprāmāṇyamātreṇa daśa kleśamahābhūmikāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2585: prāptā ity etām eva prāptiṃ jānīte devānāṃ priyo na tv ācāryāṇām iṣṭim icchāṃ jānīte. ko 'yaṃ devānāṃ priyo nāma. rjukajātīyo devānāṃ priya ity eke vyācakṣate. aśaṭho hi devānāṃ priyo bhavati. mūrkho devānāṃ priya ity
T07yabhkvyu:2587: yo hīśvarāṇām iṣṭaḥ sa na tāḍanena śikṣata iti mūrkho bhavatīti. yathaivāmoha iti. yathaivamohaḥ kuśalamūlaṃ prajñāsvabhāvatvān mahābhūmika iti vyavasthāpito na kuśalamahābhūmika
T07yabhkvyu:2588: evety avadhāryate. tataś ca kuśalamahābhūmikeṣu na paṭhitaḥ. tathā muṣitasmṛtyādayo (Abhidh-k-vy 131) 'pi paṃca mahābhūmikatvāt na
T07yabhkvyu:2589: kleśamahābhūmikā evety avadhāryante. tataś ca ime na kleśamahābhūmikamadhye paṭhyante. katham ity āha. smṛtir eva hi kliṣṭā
T07yabhkvyu:2590: muṣitasmṛtitā. samādhir eva kliṣṭo vikṣepa ity evamādīti. ādiśabdena prajñaiva kliṣṭā asaṃprajanyaṃ. manaskāra eva kliṣṭo 'yoniśomanaskāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2591: adhimuktir eva kliṣṭā mithyādhimokṣa iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:2592: ata evocyata iti vistaraḥ. yata evaṃ smṛtyādayo muṣitasmṛtitādayo
T07yabhkvyu:2593: vyavasthāpyante. naitadvyatiriktā. ata evocyate catuṣkoṭika iti. ye mahābhūmikāḥ kleśamahābhūmikā api ta iti kākvāpṛcchati. catuṣkoṭikāḥ. syur mahābhūmikāḥ na kleśamahābhūmikāḥ. [Tib. 119b] syuḥ kleśamahābhūmikā na
T07yabhkvyu:2594: mahābhūmikāḥ. syur mahābhūmikāś ca kleśamahābhūmikāś ca. syur naiva mahābhūmikā na kleśamahābhūmikāḥ. tṛtīyā smṛtyādaya iti. ye muṣitasmṛtyādayaḥ paṃca yathoktāḥ. ete hi mahābhūmikāḥ kleśamahābhūmikāś
T07yabhkvyu:2595: ca. caturthī etān ākārāṃ sthāpayitveti. uktanirmuktā dharmāḥ kuśalamahābhūmikādayaś caitasikā rūpādayaś cānya iti. teṣām anyathā catuṣkoṭika iti. dvitīyāyāṃ koṭyāṃ vikṣepaḥ prakṣeptavyaḥ. na tu tṛtīyāyām. ata evaṃ vaktavyaṃ. prathamā koṭiḥ pūrvavat. dvitīyā āśraddhyaṃ kausīdyaṃ avidyā auddhatyaṃ pramādo vikṣepaś ca. tṛtīyā smṛtyādayaś catvāraḥ. muṣitāsmṛtyasaṃprajanyāyoniśomanaskāramithyādhimokṣā ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2596: caturthī pūrvavat. yat tūktaṃ na cātra styānaṃ paṭhyata iti. tān
T07yabhkvyu:2597: pratibravīti. styānaṃ punar iṣyata iti vistaraḥ. tasyāpāṭhe kasyāparādha iti. kim asya styānasya apāṭhe mamāparādhaḥ. kim ābhidhārmikasyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:2598: abhidharmakārasyāyam aparādho na mamety abhiprāyaḥ. styānasya
T07yabhkvyu:2599: sarvakleśasaṃyogitvenābhimatatvāt. evaṃ tv āhur iti. tatra śāstre styānasyāpāṭhe kāraṇam āhur ābhidhārmikāḥ. kṣiprataraṃ kileti. [Tib. 120a]
T07yabhkvyu:2600: kilaśabdo 'saṃbhāvanāyāṃ. kathaṃ hi nāma kliṣṭo dharmaḥ śuklasya samādher anuguṇo bhaviṣyati. layauddhatye hi samādhiparipaṃthinī. tat kathaṃ paripaṃthy evānuguṇe. na hy ete jātu sahacariṣṇutāṃ jahīta iti. na hy ete
T07yabhkvyu:2601: styānauddhatye kadācit sahacaradharmatāṃ tyajata ity arthaḥ. tathāpi yad yasyādhimātram iti. evam api ca styānam auddhatyaṃ vā yasya
T07yabhkvyu:2602: pudgalasyādhimātraṃ. sa pudgalas taccaritaḥ styānacarita auddhatyacārito vāvagantavyaḥ. kvacid dhi kalāpe kaścid dharma udbhūto bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:2606: tuśabdo viśeṣaṇe avadhāraṇe vā. akuśala eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:2608: iti. parītto 'lpakaḥ. ko 'sau. avidyāmātraṃ. avidyaiva kevalety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2609: tenāvidyāmātreṇeti. nānyena rāgādinā kleśena. bhāvanāheyeneti. na
T07yabhkvyu:2610: darśanaheyena. manobhūmikenaiveti. na paṃcavijñānakāyikena. yasmād ime krodhādaya upakleśā manobhūmikā eva bhavanti. ato manaḥsaṃprayogāt parīttakleśabhūmikā ucyante. rāgādikalāpe hy avaśyam avidyayā bhavitavyam iti na parītto rāgādikaḥ. tad evaṃ ye sarvatra caitasike. te mahābhūmikā.
T07yabhkvyu:2611: ye kuśala eva. te kuśalamahābhūmikāḥ. [Tib. 120b] ye kliṣṭe nivṛte
T07yabhkvyu:2612: cākuśale ca. te kleśamahābhūmikāḥ. yo tv akuśala eva. te
T07yabhkvyu:2614: parīttakleśabhūmikāḥ. eṣāṃ tu nirdeśa upakleśeṣu kariṣyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2616: (II.29-31) anye 'pi cāniyatā iti. ye kadācit kuśale kadācid akuśale kadācid avyākṛte cetasi bhavaṃti. middhādaya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2618: rāgādāyo 'py aniyatatvena gṛhyante. na hy ete rāgādayaḥ paṃcānāṃ prakārāṇām anyatamasmiṃ niyatā bhavanti. na mahābhūmikās sarvatra cetasy
T07yabhkvyu:2619: abhāvāt. na kuśalamahābhūmikāḥ kuśalatvayogāt. na kleśamahābhūmikāḥ sarvatra kliṣṭe tadabhāvāt. na hi sapratighe cetasi rāgo bhavati sarāge ca cetasi pratighaḥ. iti evam anye 'pi kleśā vaktavyāḥ. atrācāryavasumitraḥ saṃgrahaślokam āha.
T07yabhkvyu:2620: vitarkacārakaukṛtyamiddhapratighasaktayaḥ mānaś ca vicikitsā cety aṣṭāv aniyatāḥ smṛtā
T07yabhkvyu:2621: iti. tad idam aṣṭaniyamavacanaṃ na budhyāmahe. dṛṣṭayo 'pi kasmān nāniyatā iṣyante. na hi sapratighe savicikitse vā citte mithyādṛṣṭiḥ pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:2622: āveṇikatve 'kuśale dṛṣṭiyukte ca [Tib. 121a] viṃśatiḥ kleśaiś caturbhiḥ krodhādyaiḥ kaukṛtyenaikaviṃśatir
T07yabhkvyu:2623: iti vacanāt. tasmād yadvā tat vedam uktam iti paśyāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2624: kāmāvacaraṃ tāvat paṃcavidham iti. kuśalam ekaṃ. akuśalaṃ dvividham.
T07yabhkvyu:2625: āveṇikam avidyāmātrasaṃprayuktaṃ rāgādyanyakleśasaṃprayuktaṃ ca. avyākṛtam api dvividhaṃ. nivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2626: anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca vipākajādīni. kukṛtabhāvaḥ kaukṛtyam iti. arthasya kukṛtasya dharmaḥ. sa tu caitasika iti na saṃbadhyate. tasmād āha. iha tu (Abhidh-k-vy 133) punaḥ kaukṛtyālambano dharma iti. kiṃsvabhāva ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:2627: cetaso vipratisāra iti. yadi kaukṛtyālambano dharmaḥ kaukṛtyam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2628: tatsaṃprayuktā apy anye cittacaittāḥ kaukṛtyaṃ prāpnuvanti. na
T07yabhkvyu:2629: prāpnuvanti. teṣām aprādhānyāt. vipratisārāvasthāyāṃ hi kaukṛtylakṣaṇaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2630: caitasikaṃ kaukṛtyākāram udbhūtavṛttikam. anye cittacaittās tadākāreṇānuvartaṃte. kasyacid eva hi dharmasya kasmiṃścic cittakalāpe
T07yabhkvyu:2632: skandhānām antarvyāpārapuruṣarahitālambanaṃ vimokṣamukhaṃ samādhiviśeṣaḥ śūnyatety ucyate. vinīlakavyādhmātakādyaśubhālambanaḥ alobhaḥ aśubhety
T07yabhkvyu:2634: tathehāpi kaukṛtyālambanaś caitasiko dharmaḥ kaukṛtyam iti. [Tib. 121b]
T07yabhkvyu:2635: sthānena sthāninām atideśaḥ. sarvo grāma āgata iti. sabhūmikaḥ śālāsamudāyo grāmaḥ. sthāniṣu manuṣyeṣv āgateṣu vaktāro bhavaṃti sarvo
T07yabhkvyu:2636: grāma āgata iti. evaṃ sarvo deśa āgata iti. sthānabhūtaṃ ca kaukṛtyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2638: phale vā hetūpacāra iti. hetuḥ kaukṛtyaṃ. phalaṃ vipratisāraḥ. tasmiṃ phale hetur upacaryate. hetuvācakena śabdena phalam ucyata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2639: yathā ṣaḍ imāni sparśāyatanāni paurāṇaṃ karmeti. pūrvajanmakṛtasya paurāṇasya karmaṇaś cakṣurādīni ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni phalāni. teṣu yathā karmopacaryate. tadvat. yat tarhy akṛtālambanaṃ tat kathaṃ kaukṛtyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2640: yad akṛtaṃ. tan na kṛtam iti matvā codayati. akṛte 'pi kṛtākhyā bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:2641: akṛte 'py arthe kṛtaśabdaprayogo bhavati. katham ity āha. na sādhu mayā
T07yabhkvyu:2642: kṛtam yat. tan na kṛtam iti. kṛtam iva tad iti kṛtvā. yat kuśalam akṛtvā
T07yabhkvyu:2643: tapyata iti. yat kuśalaṃ dānādikaṃ akṛtvā tapyate paścāt tāpībhavati. tat
T07yabhkvyu:2644: kuśalaṃ. akuśalaṃ ca kṛtvā kiṃ. tapyata iti adhikṛtaṃ. yac cākuśalaṃ prāṇātipātādikaṃ kṛtvā tapyate. tad api kuśalaṃ. viparyayād akuśalaṃ. yad akuśalam akṛtvā tapyate kuśalaṃ ca kṛtveti. yat pāpam akṛtvā paścāt tāpībhavati na sādhu mayā kṛtaṃ yat. [Tib. 122a] tan na kṛtam iti. tad akuśalaṃ kaukṛtyaṃ. yac ca kuśalaṃ dānādikaṃ kṛtvā paścāt tāpībhavati na sādhu mayā kṛtaṃ yad dānādikaṃ kṛtam iti. tad apy akuśalaṃ. tad etad ubhayam apy ubhayādhiṣṭhānaṃ bhavatīti. tad etat kaukṛtyam ubhayam api kuśalaṃ cākuśalaṃ ca ubhayādhiṣṭhānaṃ bhavati yathoktena vidhānena.
T07yabhkvyu:2649: caśabdaḥ akuśala ity anukarṣaṇārthaḥ. mahābhūmika eva kaścit prajñāviśeṣo dṛṣṭir iti. saṃtīrikā yā prajñā. sā dṛṣṭiḥ. sā cehākuśalā gṛhyate. tasmād
T07yabhkvyu:2651: kaukṛtyenaikaviṃśatir iti kaukṛtyena ceti. luptanidṛṣṭaś cakāro draṣṭavyaḥ. kleśaiś caturbhir ityādiṣu pratyekaṃ vākyaparisamāptir veditavyā. na hi rāgādayaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2652: paraspareṇa saṃprayujyanta ity ābhidhārmikāḥ. sa ca kleśa āveṇikoktāś ca viṃśatir iti. daśa mahābhūmikāḥ ṣaṭ kleśamahābhūmikāḥ dvāv akuśalamahābhūmikau vitarko vicāraś ceti viṃśatiḥ. sa ca kleśo rāgaḥ pratigho māno vicikitsā cety ekaviṃśatiḥ. ekaviṃśatir bhavaty eveti
T07yabhkvyu:2655: [Tib. 122b] ebhir api saṃprayukte citte ekaviṃśatir eva caitasikāḥ. te cāveṇikoktāḥ pūrvavat. sa copakleśaḥ krodho vā yāvad vihiṃsā veti.
T07yabhkvyu:2656: kaukṛtyena ca saṃprayukte te ca pūrvoktāḥ tac ca kaukṛtyaṃ ity
T07yabhkvyu:2657: ekaviṃśatiḥ. kaukṛtyam api hy upakleśaḥ. svataṃtram iṣyate. samāsata āveṇika ity vistaraḥ. avidyāmātrasaṃprayukte cetasi akuśale
T07yabhkvyu:2658: dṛṣṭisaṃprayukte cākuśale viṃśatiḥ. anyakleśopakleśasaṃprayukte tv akuśala
T07yabhkvyu:2660: nivṛtāvyākṛtam iti. kleśācchāditaṃ kuśalākuśalatvena avyākṛtaṃ yat. tan
T07yabhkvyu:2662: vipākajairyāpathikaśailpasthānikanairmāṇikasvabhāvaṃ. bahirdeśakā avyākṛtam api kaukṛtyam icchantīti. kaśmīramaṇḍalād ye bahirdeśasthitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2663: te bahirdeśakāḥ. trayodaśeti kvacid anivṛtāvyākṛte kaukṛtyaṃ trayodaśamam adhikaṃ prakṣipya. middhaṃ pracalāyamānāvasthāyāṃ svapnadarśanāvasthāyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2664: vā kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtatvād iti. śāstre vacanāt. kathaṃ middhaṃ kuśalaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2665: vaktavyam akuśalaṃ vaktavyam avyākṛtaṃ vaktavyam iti. āha. kuśalaṃ vaktavyam akuśalaṃ vaktavyam avyākṛtaṃ vaktavyam iti. yatra [Tib. 123a]
T07yabhkvyu:2666: dvāviṃśatiḥ. tatra trayoviṃśatir iti vistaraḥ. yatra dvāviṃśatiś caitasikā
T07yabhkvyu:2667: ity uktaṃ. tatra tan middhaṃ trayoviṃśaṃ. trayoviṃśateḥ pūraṇam ity
T07yabhkvyu:2668: arthaḥ. yatra trayoviṃśatiḥ kaukṛtyam adhikaṃ kvacid iti. tatra tan middhaṃ caturviṃśam. evaṃ yāvad anyatra dvādaśavyākṛte matā middhaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2671: (II.32) ato yathoktād iti. ato yathāvarṇitāc caittasahotpādaniyamāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2672: kaukṛtyaṃ middhaṃ ca sarvathā nāstīti. na kuśalaṃ nāpy avyākṛtaṃ kuta evākuśalam iti. sarvathā middhaṃ kaukṛtyaṃ ca nāsti. śāṭhyamadamāyā varjyā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2674: styānauddhatyamadā dhātutraya iti vacanāt. etāni varjyante teṣāṃ tatra sadbhāvāt. anyat sarvaṃ tathaiveti. kuśale citte pūrvavat dvāviṃśatiḥ. āveṇike dṛṣṭiyukte ca
T07yabhkvyu:2675: nivṛtāvyākṛte 'ṣṭādaśa kāmadhātuvat. rāgamānavicikitsānyakleśasaṃprayukte māyāśāṭhyamadopakleśasaṃprayukte ca ekānnaviṃśatiḥ. te ca sa ca kleśa upakleśo vā tatraikānnaviṃśo bhavati. anivṛtāvyākṛte vipākajairyāpathikanairmāṇike pūrvavat dvādaśa.
T07yabhkvyu:2677: kaukṛtyamiddhākuśalāni ceti caśabdaḥ. kiṃ. na santīty [Tib. 123b]
T07yabhkvyu:2678: adhikṛtaṃ. śeṣaṃ tathaiva vitarkanyūnaṃ. yathāpratisiddhaṃ nāstīti.
T07yabhkvyu:2679: kaukṛtyamiddhākuśalavitarkā na santīty arthaḥ. vicāraś ca māyāśāṭhyaṃ cety apiśabdād iti. vicāraś ceti etāvati vaktavye vicāraś capīty
T07yabhkvyu:2680: apiśabdādhikyād arthādhikyam iti. māyāśāṭhyam api tatra nāstīty ayam aparārtho labhyate. madas tu nāpāsyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2681: styānauddhatyamadā dhātutraya iti vacanasāmarthyāt. śeṣaṃ tathaiveti. kuśale vitarkavicāranirmuktā viṃśatiḥ. āveṇike dṛṣṭiyukte ṣoḍaśa. rāgādikleśasaṃprayukte,
T07yabhkvyu:2682: madopakleśasaṃprayukte ca saptadaśa. daśa mahābhūmikāḥ ṣaṭ
T07yabhkvyu:2683: kleśamahābhūmikāḥ. sa ca kleśaḥ sa vopakleśaḥ. anivṛtāvyākṛte daśa mahābhūmikā eveti gamanīyaṃ. brahmaṇo hi yāvac chāṭhyam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2684: tatra śāṭhyapūrvakatvān māyāpi gṛhītā bhavati. parṣatsambandhān nordhvam iti. yeṣāṃ parṣad asti. teṣāṃ parṣadgrahaṇārthaṃ māyāśāṭhyaṃ pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:2685: aṣṭau parṣadaḥ paṭhyante. kṣatriyaparṣat brāhmaṇaparṣat gṛhapatiparṣat
T07yabhkvyu:2687: brahmaparṣat. tāsām anyatamo 'pi ūrdhvam ato nāstīti māyāśāṭhyabhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2688: brahmaṇas tu parṣad asti. tasmād āha. sa hi svasyāṃ parṣadi niṣaṇṇo 'śvajitā bhikṣuṇā brahmalokagatena praśnaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 136) pṛṣṭaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2689: kutremāni catvāri mahābhūtāni apariśeṣaṃ [Tib. 124a] nirudhyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2690: aprajānann ārūpyadhātau catvāri mahābhūtāni aśeṣaṃ nirudhyanta ity anavabudhyamānaḥ kṣepaṃ kathāprakaraṇam akārṣīt. aham asmi brahmeti
T07yabhkvyu:2691: vistaraḥ. brahmety uktvā mahābrahmeti vacanaṃ brahmāntarebhya ātmano
T07yabhkvyu:2692: viśiṣṭatvapradarśanārthaṃ. īśvara īśanaśīlaḥ. kartā nirmātā sraṣṭā sṛja iti paryāyā uttarottaravyākhyāyogo vā. piteva pitṛbhūtaḥ. keṣāṃ. bhāvānāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2693: (II.33) uktam etad iti vistaraḥ. yā bhūmir yac cittaṃ yāvantaś ca caittāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2694: sā bhūmis tac cittaṃ tāvantaś ca caittā ity uktam etat. tatra vihitam iti
T07yabhkvyu:2695: śāstre vihitaṃ. tatra vihitam iti kecit paṭhaṃti. sa eva cātrārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2696: guṇeṣu guṇavatsu ceti. svaparasāṃtānikeṣu maitrīkaruṇādiṣu guṇeṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:2697: guṇavatsu ca pudgaleṣu ācāragocaragauravādisaṃpanneṣu. yadyogād gauravaṃ na karoti. asāv agauravatā. nāsti gauravam asyety agauravaḥ. tadbhāvaḥ agauravatā caitasikaviśeṣaḥ. ko 'sāv iti. paryāyāv āhuḥ. apratīśatā
T07yabhkvyu:2698: abhayavaśavartiteti. śiṣyaṃ prati iṣṭa iti pratīśaḥ. gurusthānīyaḥ. nāsti pratīśo 'syeti apratīśaḥ. tadbhāvaḥ apratīśatā. bhāvābhidhānena caitto gṛhyate. bhayaṃ nāma mānasaś caitto dharmaḥ. bhayena vaśe vartituṃ śīlam asyeti bhayavaśavartī. na bhayavaśavartī [Tib. 124b] abhayavaśavartī tadbhāvo 'bhayavaśavartitā. tad eva cāhrīkyaṃ. nāsti hrīr asyety ahrīkaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2699: tadbhāva āhrīkyaṃ. sa ca gauravapratidvaṃdvo dharmaḥ. na tadabhāvamātraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2701: avācyam avadyam. ataś cāha. avadyaṃ nāma yad garhitaṃ sadbhir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2703: bhīyate 'smād ity atra bhayaśabdo 'pādānasādhanaḥ. tasmād bhayaśabdena aniṣṭaṃ phalam ucyate. abhayasya darśanaṃ abhayadarśiteti vistaraḥ. yadi tāvad evaṃ kriyeta na bhayam abhayaṃ. abhayaṃ draṣṭuṃ śīlam asyeti
T07yabhkvyu:2704: abhadyadarśī. tadbhāvo 'bhayadarśiteti. prajñā vijñāsyate. prajñayā hi abhayaṃ paśyati. atha punar evaṃ kriyate bhayaṃ draṣṭuṃ śīlam asyeti bhayadarśī. na bhayadarśī abhayadarśī. tadbhāvo 'bhayadarśitā.
T07yabhkvyu:2705: abhayadarśiteti avidyā vijñāsyate. tathā hy avidyāyogād bhayaṃ na paśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:2706: naiva hi darśanaṃ darśiteti vistaraḥ. na prajñā nāpy avidyā. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:2707: tayoḥ prajñāvidyayor yo nimittaṃ upakleśaḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy 137) tad
T07yabhkvyu:2709: apatrāpyaṃ. kṛtyalyuṭo bahulam iti karaṇe ṇyatpratyayaḥ. na apatrāpyaṃ anapatrāpyam iti. hṛī lajjāyāṃ trapūṣ lajjāyām ity ekārthayor anayor dhātvoḥ katham arthāṃtare vācakatvam iti aparituṣyaṃto 'nye punar āhuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2710: ātmāpekṣayeti vistaraḥ. evam api dve apekṣe yugapat kathaṃ setsyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2711: asminn api pakṣe yugapadapekṣādvayāsaṃbhava iti paśyaṃś codaka aha. evam
T07yabhkvyu:2712: apīti. apiśabdena ayam api pakṣo duṣyatīty abhiprāyaḥ. āhrīkyam anapatrāpyaṃ caikasmiṃś citte kathaṃ bhavata iti matvā codayati. dve apekṣe yugapat kathaṃ setsyata iti. na khalūcyate yugapad ātmānaṃ paraṃ cāpekṣata iti vistaraḥ. paryāyena vṛttim anayor darśayati. kasyacid dhi doṣair ātmānam apekṣamāṇasyāpi na pravartate lajjā. kasyacit param apekṣamāṇasyeti. viparyayeṇa hrīr apatrāpyaṃ ceti vistaraḥ. prathamena tāvat kalpena
T07yabhkvyu:2714: anena. sagauravateti vistareṇa bhayadarśitā apatrāpyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2715: bhayadarśitānimittam apatrāpyam ity arthaḥ. dvitīyena kalpena ātmāpekṣayā
T07yabhkvyu:2716: doṣair alajjanaṃ āhrīkyaṃ parapekṣayānapatrāpyam iti anena. ātmāpekṣayā doṣair lajjanaṃ hrīḥ. parāpekṣayāpatrāpyam iti. evam api dve apekṣe iti vistareṇa codyaparihārau vaktavyau. [Tib. 125b] premagauravayor ekatvaṃ manyaṃte kecit. tasmād anayor nānākaraṇapradarśanārtham āha.
T07yabhkvyu:2718: premaiva śraddhā na gauravaṃ. na tu śraddhaiva prema. tenāha. dvividhaṃ hi prema kliṣṭaṃ akliṣṭaṃ cetyādi. syāc chraddhā na premeti catuḥkoṭikaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2720: aspṛhaṇīyatvāt. syāt prema na śraddheti. priyatārūpā tṛṣṇā nābhisaṃpratyayarūpeti śraddhā na bhavati. ubhayaṃ śraddhā ca prema ca.
T07yabhkvyu:2721: abhisaṃpratyayarūpatvāt spṛhaṇīyatvāc ca nirodhamārgasatyayos tadubhayātmakaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ. nobhayam etān ākārān sthāpayitveti. anye caitasikā vedanādayaḥ viprayuktādayaś ca. evaṃ dharmālaṃbanasya premnaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2722: śraddhāyāś ca catuḥkoṭikaṃ kṛtvā pudgalālaṃbanasya catuṣkoṭikaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:2723: pudgaleṣv iti vistaraḥ. tatra sārdhaṃ viharaṃtīti sārdhavihāriṇaḥ śiṣyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2724: ye pravrajitāḥ guror aṃte vasaṃtīti aṃtevāsinaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2725: niśrayādhyayanasaṃbaṃdhinaḥ. teṣu putrādiṣu prema na gauravaṃ kliṣṭaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2726: akliṣṭaṃ ceti saṃbhavataḥ. gauravaṃ na prema
T07yabhkvyu:2728: gurutvaṃ hrīr iti vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇaṃ gauravaṃ na prema gauravasthānatvāt. ubhayaṃ prema gauravaṃ ca. tadubhayātmakaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ. [Tib. 126a] nobhayam etān ākārān sthāpayitvā yo 'nyo jano 'saṃbaddho nirguṇaḥ. tatra na prema na gauravam iti. tatpūrvikā ca priyatā premeti. guṇasaṃbhāvanāpūrvikā priyatā tac ca prema. tasmān na saiva śraddhā premety ācāryaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2730: iti. yathoktā hrīḥ sagauravatā sapratīśatā sabhayavaśavartitety uktā. yā
T07yabhkvyu:2731: hrīḥ. tad gauravaṃ. tad evaṃ prema śraddhālakṣaṇaṃ bhavati. hrīlakṣaṇaṃ tu gauravam ity uktaṃ tayor nānākaraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2732: evaṃ sapratīśatāpīti. evaṃ hrīr api dharmeṣu ca pudgaleṣu ca. ye pudgalālaṃbane śraddhāhriyau. te tatra na sta iti pudgalālaṃbane
T07yabhkvyu:2733: śraddhāhriyāv adhikriyete yayor aikyaṃ manyante. te ārūpyadhātau na staḥ kāmarūpadhātvor eva bhavata ity uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2734: (II.34) kathaṃ punar anayor ekatra citte yoga iti. na hi tad eva cittaṃ tadyogād audārikaṃ ca sūkṣmaṃ ca yujyate vipratiṣedhāt. niṣṭhyūtam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2735: niḥpūrvasya ṣṭhīvate niṣṭhāyām etad rūpaṃ niṣṭhyūtaṃ. nirastam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2736: nātiśyāyate nātighanībhavati. nātivilīyate nātidravībhavati. nātisūkṣmaṃ bhavati nātyaudārikam iti. madhyamāvastham ity arthaḥ. evaṃ tarhi nimittabhūtāv iti vistaraḥ. yathodakātapau sarpiṣaḥ śyānatvavilīnatvayor
T07yabhkvyu:2737: nimittabhūtau. na tu punas tatsvabhāvau śyānatvavilīnatvasvabhāvau. evaṃ vitarkavicārau cittasyaudārikatāsūkṣmatayor [Tib. 126b] nimittabhūtau na tu punar audārikasūkṣmatāsvabhāvāv iti. ata evaṃ vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2738: cittaudārikatāhetur vitarkaḥ. cittasūkṣmatāhetur vicāra iti. brūyās tvam abhyupagamād adoṣa eṣa iti. tata idaṃ doṣāntaram āhā. āpekṣikī caudārikasūkṣmateti vistaraḥ. bhūmiprakārabhedāt. bhūmibhedāt prakārabhedāc ca. bhūmibhedāt tāvat. prathamadhyānam apekṣya kāmadhātur
T07yabhkvyu:2739: audāriko mahābhisaṃskārataratvāt. kāmadhātum apekṣya prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ sūkṣmam alpābhisaṃskārataratvāt praśāntam iti. tad eva punar dvitīyaṃ dhyānam apekṣya audārikaṃ. evaṃ yāvad bhavāgraṃ sūkṣmaṃ. prakārabhedād api tasyām eva bhūmau āpekṣikyāv audārikasūkṣmate. tadyathā ya eva te trayaḥ kleśānāṃ mūlaprakārā mṛdumadhyādhimātrā guṇānāṃ ca. kāmadhātau yāvad bhavāgre teṣām adhimātraḥ kleśa audārikaḥ. mṛduḥ sūkṣmaḥ. kleśaviparyayeṇa guṇānām iti. evaṃ bhūmiprakārabhedenāpekṣikyāv (Abhidh-k-vy 139)
T07yabhkvyu:2740: audārikasūkṣmate ity ā bhavāgrād audārikasūkṣmate syātāṃ. aniṣṭaṃ caitat.
T07yabhkvyu:2741: vitarkavicārayoḥ kāmadhātuprathamadhyānabhūmikatvād iti. na caudārikasūkṣmatayā jātibhedo yukta iti. vitarkavicārayor jātibheda iṣyate. anyo vitarko 'nyo vicāra iti. na caudarikatvena sūkṣmatvena ca vitarkavicārayor yathākramaṃ svabhāvabhedo yuktaḥ. kiṃkāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2742: jātibhinnayor hi vedanāsaṃjñayor audārikasūkṣmatā bhavati. na ca punar
T07yabhkvyu:2745: tasmād apy anayor nāsti lakṣaṇaṃ. anye punar āhur iti sautrāntikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2746: vāksaṃskārā iti. vāksamutthāpakā ity arthaḥ. vitarkya vicārya vācaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2747: bhāṣate nāvitarkya nāvicāryeti. vitarkavicārair evaṃ caivaṃ ca bhāṣiṣya iti. tatra ye audārikāḥ. te vitarkā vāksaṃskārāḥ. karmaṇā svabhāvo dyotito
T07yabhkvyu:2748: na śakyam anyathā svalakṣaṇaṃ pradarśayitum iti. evaṃ sūkṣmās te vicārāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2749: etasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ samudāyarūpā vitarkavicārāḥ. paryāyabhāvinaś ca bhavaṃti. cittacaittakalāpasya vāksamutthāpakatvāt. kathaṃ punar anayor
T07yabhkvyu:2750: ekatra citte yoga ity uktaṃ. ato vaibhāṣika āha. yadi caikatra citte 'nyo
T07yabhkvyu:2751: dharma audārika iti vistaraḥ. ekatra citte vitarka audārikasvabhāvo 'nyo
T07yabhkvyu:2752: dharmo vicāras tu sūkṣmasvabhāvo 'paraḥ. tau ca yathākramaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2753: cittaudārikatāsūkṣmatāhetutvāc cittaudārikatāsūkṣmatety ucyate. atha vā cittasyaudārikaś cittaudārikaḥ. cittaudārikabhāvaḥ cittaudārikatā. evaṃ cittasūkṣmatāpi vaktavyeti ko 'tra virodhaḥ. na syād virodho yadi vitarkavicārayor jātibhedaḥ syād vedanāsaṃjñāvat. vedanā hy audārikī
T07yabhkvyu:2754: saṃjñā sūkṣmā. tayos tu jātibhedo 'stīti audārikasūkṣmatāyām apy ekatra
T07yabhkvyu:2755: citte na virodhaḥ. ekasyāṃ tu jātau anavadhṛtalakṣaṇāyāṃ aikyena ca
T07yabhkvyu:2757: yugapan na saṃbhavatety arthād ayugapat saṃbhavatīty uktaṃ. tathā hi vedanā anyo vā dharmaḥ paryāyeṇa mṛdutām adhimātratāṃ ca bhajate. naivaṃ vyakto bhavati. kiṃ. jātibhedaḥ. kasmāt. pratyekaṃ jātīnām mṛdvadhimātratvāt. vedanā hy audārikī bhavati. sūkṣmā vāpekṣābhedāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2758: katham iti. vedanā saṃjñām apekṣya audārikī. rūpam apekṣya sūkṣmā. tathā saṃjñā saṃskārān apekṣyaudārikī. vedanām apekṣya sūkṣmā. vitarkavicāravad eva vā. bhavato 'pi hi kāmāvacarau vitarkavicārāv audārikau prathamadhyānabhūmikau sūkṣmau. dhyānāntare ca vicāraḥ sūkṣmatara iti. tad evaṃ pratyekaṃ jātīnāṃ mṛdvadhimātratvāt. naivaṃ vyakto bhavati. na mṛdvadhimātratayā jātibhedo vyakto bhavatīty arthaḥ. atra (Abhidh-k-vy
T07yabhkvyu:2759: 140) saṃghabhadrācārya āha. ekatra ca citte audārikasūkṣmate bhavato na ca
T07yabhkvyu:2760: virodhaḥ. prabhāvakālānyatvāt. yadā hi cittacaittakalāpe vitarka udbhūtavṛttir bhavati. tadā cittam audārikaṃ bhavati. yadā vicāraḥ. tadā
T07yabhkvyu:2761: sūkṣmaṃ. rāgamohacaritavyapadeśavat. rāgamohayaugapadye 'pi hi tayor anyatarodbhūtavṛttiyogāt. rāgacarito mohacarita iti vā vyapadiśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2762: tadvad ihāpi draṣṭavyam iti. atra vayaṃ brūmaḥ. bhavati kasmiṃścit kalāpe
T07yabhkvyu:2763: kasyacid dharmasya udbhūtavṛttitvaṃ. kiṃ tv anayor na lakṣaṇaṃ vivecitam
T07yabhkvyu:2764: iti. na kiṃcid etat. nanu ca cittaudārikatāsūkṣmatālakṣaṇau vitarkavicārāv
T07yabhkvyu:2765: uktau. [Tib. 128a] satyam uktau. pratyekaṃ tu jātīnām audārikasūkṣmate iti tāv audārikasūkṣmatālakṣaṇau bhavitum arhato yathoktam iti naitad asmān ārādhayati. naiva hi vitarkavicārāv ekatra citte bhavata ity apara ity
T07yabhkvyu:2766: ācāryamatam. asmin mate yathoktadoṣaprasaṃgo na bhavati. kas tv anayoḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2767: paryāyavartinor viśeṣaḥ. atra pūrvācāryā āhuḥ. vitarkaḥ katamaḥ. cetanāṃ vā niśritya prajñāṃ vā paryeṣako manojalpo 'nabhyūhābhyūhāvasthayor
T07yabhkvyu:2768: yathākramaṃ sā ca cittasyaudārikatā. vicāraḥ katamaḥ. cetanāṃ vā niśritya
T07yabhkvyu:2769: prajñāṃ vā pratyavekṣako manojalpo 'nabhyūhābhyūhāvasthayor yathākramaṃ sā ca cittasūkṣmateti. asmin pakṣe vitarkavicārāv ekasvabhāvau samudāyarūpau paryāyavartinau paryeṣaṇapratyavekṣaṇākāramātreṇa bhinnāv iṣyete.
T07yabhkvyu:2770: tatrodāharaṇaṃ kecid ācakṣate. tadyathā bahuṣu ghaṭeṣv avasthiteṣu ko 'tra
T07yabhkvyu:2771: dṛḍhaḥ ko jarjara iti muṣṭinābhighnato ya ūhaḥ. sa vitarkaḥ. iyaṃto jarjarā dṛḍhā veti yad ante grahaṇaṃ. sa vicāra iti. katham idānīṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ paṃcāṅgam iti vistaraḥ. viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2772: pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīti sūtre paṃcāṃgam uktaṃ. tat
T07yabhkvyu:2773: kathaṃ. bhūmitas tat paṃcāṅgam uktaṃ na kṣaṇata iti. prathamadhyānabhūmiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2774: [Tib. 128b] kadācid vitarkeṇa vyavakīrṇā kadācid vicāreṇa. tad evaṃ saṃtānam adhikṛtya paṃcāṅgam uktaṃ na kṣaṇam adhikṛtyety adoṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2775: yena kenacit parato viśeṣaparikalpeneti. bhūtenābhūtena vā parata
T07yabhkvyu:2776: utkarṣaparikalpena śūro 'rthavān asmi śīlavān buddhisaṃpanna iti vā yā
T07yabhkvyu:2777: cetasa unnatiḥ sa māno nāma caitasiko dharmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2778: paryādānaṃ tu cetasa iti tuśabdo viśeṣaṇārtho bhinnakramaś cāvagantavyaḥ. ata evāha. madas tu svadharmeṣv eva raktasyeti vistaraḥ. cetasaḥ paryādānam iti. yena svadharmeṣv (Abhidh-k-vy 141) eva rūpaśauryādiṣu raktaṃ cetaḥ paryādīyate saṃnirudhyate. sa rāganiṣyando madaḥ. yaḥ svadharmeṣv eva raktasya darpacetasaḥ paryādānāt kuśaladharmakriyābhyaḥ pratisaṃhāraḥ mada iti
T07yabhkvyu:2780: abhipretaṃ. tad etan necchanti vaibhāṣikāḥ. yasmāt saumanasyaṃ ā dvitīyād
T07yabhkvyu:2783: (II.35) uktāḥ saha cittena caittāḥ caittāḥ prakāreṇa iti. cittaṃ tāvat prakāreṇa uktaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2784: vijñānaṃ prativijñaptir ity evamādinā svalakṣaṇaskandhadhātvāyatanakuśalādiprabhedena. caittā api svalakṣaṇaparasparaviśeṣeṇa [Tib. 129a]
T07yabhkvyu:2787: iti. yac cittaṃ. tad eva manas tad eva vijñānam ity eko 'rtho 'syety
T07yabhkvyu:2788: ekārthaṃ. nirvacanabhedas tūcyate. cinotīti cittam iti. kuśalam akuśalaṃ vā cinotīty arthaḥ. nairuktena vidhinaivaṃ siddhaṃ. manuta iti manaḥ. mana jñāna ity asya auṇādikapratyayāt tasyaitad rūpaṃ mana iti. vijānāty ālambanam iti vijñānaṃ kartari lyuṭ. citaṃ śubhāśubhair dhātubhir iti
T07yabhkvyu:2790: āśrayabhūtaṃ manaḥ āśritabhūtaṃ vijñānam iti āśrayabhāvāpekṣaṃ manaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2791: ṣaṇṇām anantarātītaṃ vijñānaṃ yad dhi. tan mana
T07yabhkvyu:2792: ity arthaparigrahāt. āśritabhāvāpekṣaṃ vijñānaṃ. dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpattir iti
T07yabhkvyu:2794: caśabda ekānukarṣaṇārthaḥ. ya eva hi cittacaittā ity anena
T07yabhkvyu:2795: śabdenābhihitāḥ. ta eva sāśrayā ity anenāpi śabdenābhidhīyante. evaṃ sālambanāḥ sākārāḥ saṃprayuktāś ca. tatra sāśrayā indriyāśritatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2796: ṣaḍāyatanāśritatvād ity arthaḥ. sālambanā viṣayagrahaṇāt. na hi vinālambanena cittacaittā utpadyante. [Tib. 129b] sākārāḥ tasyaivālambanasya prakāreṇa ākāraṇāt. yena te sālambanāḥ (Abhidh-k-vy
T07yabhkvyu:2797: 142) tasyaivālaṃbanasya prakāreṇa grahaṇāt. kathaṃ. vijñānaṃ hi nīlaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2798: pītaṃ vā vastu vijānāti upalabhata ity arthaḥ. tad eva tathālambanaṃ vastu
T07yabhkvyu:2799: vedanānubhavati. saṃjñā paricchinatti. cetanābhisaṃskarotīty evamādi. atha vā tasyaivālambanasya vijñānaṃ sāmānyarūpeṇa upalabhyatārūpaṃ gṛhṇāti.
T07yabhkvyu:2800: viśeṣarūpeṇa tu vedanānubhavanīyatārūpaṃ gṛhṇāti. saṃjñā paricchedyatārūpaṃ gṛhṇātīty evamādi. saṃprayuktāḥ samaṃ prayuktatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2803: tenaivāśrayeṇa vedanāsaṃjñācetanādaya utpadyante. tathā yenālambanena cittaṃ. tenaiva vedanādayaḥ. yenākāreṇa cittaṃ. tenaiva vedanādayaḥ. yadi hi nīlākāraṃ cittaṃ nīlākārā eva tatsaṃprayuktā vedanādaya utpadyante.
T07yabhkvyu:2804: yasmiṃś ca kāle cittaṃ tasminn eva vedanādayaḥ. yathā ca cittadravyam ekam evotpadyate na dve trīṇi vā. tathā vedanādravyaṃ ekam evotpadyate na dve
T07yabhkvyu:2805: trīṇi vā. tathā saṃjñādravyaṃ cetanādravyaṃ ity evamādi. tenedam evāntyaṃ durgamam iti vyācaṣṭe. yathaiva hy ekaṃ cittaṃ evaṃ caittā api ekaikā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2806: (II.36) viprayuktān vaktukāma ācārya upodghātaṃ karoti nirdiṣṭāś
T07yabhkvyu:2807: cittacaittāḥ savistaraprabhedā viprayuktās tv [Tib. 130a] avasaraprāptā idānīm ucyanta ity abhiprāyaḥ. savistaraprabhedā iti. vistaraś ca prabhedaś ca vistaraprabhedau. saha vistaraprabhedābhyāṃ savistaraprabhedāḥ. atha vā vistareṇa prabhedaḥ vistaraprabhedaḥ. saha vistaraprabhedena savistaraprabhedāḥ. tatra cittaṃ tāvat
T07yabhkvyu:2811: vedanānubhava ity ārabhya yāvat pañcadhā caittā iti vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:2813: caśabda evaṃjātīyakānuktaviprayuktapradarśanārthaḥ. saṃghabhedaprabhṛtayo hi dravyataś cittaviprayuktā iṣyante iti ye 'py evaṃjātīyakā iti śāstre
T07yabhkvyu:2815: cittasamānajātīyapradarśanārthaṃ. cittam iva cittena ca viprayuktā ity
T07yabhkvyu:2816: arthaḥ. kiṃ ca teṣāṃ cittena samānajātīyatvaṃ. (Abhidh-k-vy 143) yad arūpiṇo 'mī bhavanti. rūpitvād eva hi viprayuktatve 'pi rūpaṃ na viprayuktatve nāma labhate. yad vāmīṣāṃ nāmarūpam iti nāmatvaṃ tat teṣāṃ cittena samānajātīyatvaṃ. caittā api cittena tulyajātīyāḥ. te tu cittena
T07yabhkvyu:2817: sahālambane saṃprayuktās tadviśeṣaṇārthaṃ viprayuktagrahaṇaṃ asaṃskṛtam api tatsamānajātīyam anālaṃbanatveneti tatparihārārthaṃ saṃskāragrahaṇaṃ [Tib. 130b] ata evāha. ime saṃskārā na cittena saṃprayuktā na ca rūpasvabhāvā iti cittaviprayuktā ucyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2818: (II.37) tatreti. vākyopanyāse nidhāraṇe vā. tāvacchabdaḥ krame.
T07yabhkvyu:2820: iti. prāptir iti sāmānyasaṃjñā. lābhaḥ samanvaya iti viśeṣasaṃjñā. lābhaḥ pratilambha ity eko 'rthaḥ. samanvayaḥ samanvāgama ity anarthāntaraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2821: pratilambha ity ukte samanvāgamasyāgrahaṇaṃ. samanvāgama ity ukte
T07yabhkvyu:2822: pratilambhasyāgrahaṇaṃ. prāptir ity ukte tūbhayodgrahaṇaṃ. ata evāha.
T07yabhkvyu:2823: dvividhā hi prāptiḥ. aprāptavihīnasya ca pratilambhaḥ. pratilabdhena ca samanvāgama iti. aprāptaṃ ca vihīnaṃ cāprāptavihīnaṃ. tasyāprāptavihīnasya
T07yabhkvyu:2824: pratilambhaḥ. aprāptasya tadyathā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteḥ. vihīnasya tadyathā kāmāvacarasya kāmavairāgyeṇa tyaktasya dhātupratyāgamanāt
T07yabhkvyu:2825: parihāṇyā vā punaḥpratilambhaḥ. pratilabdhena ca dvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣu
T07yabhkvyu:2826: samanvāgamaḥ. tasyāḥ samanuvartanāt. yaś ca pratilambhaḥ yaś ca samanvāgamaḥ. sā dvidhā prāptir iti pratilambhe samanvāgame ca prāptiśabdo vartate. abhedavivakṣāyāṃ tu prāptiḥ pratilambhaḥ samanvāgama ity eka
T07yabhkvyu:2827: evārthaḥ. tathā hi prathame kṣaṇe duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteḥ prāptiḥ pratilambha iṣyate. sāpi samanvāgama ity ucyate. prathamakṣaṇastha [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:2828: 131a] āryapudgalo duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntyā samanvāgata ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:2830: ityādivacanāt. katham ayaṃ lakṣaṇanirdeśaḥ. na hi bhedavivakṣāyām api paryāyavacanena lakṣaṇanirdeśaḥ kalpate. prāptiḥ katamā. yaḥ pratilambho yaḥ samanvāgama iti. paryāyavacanam api kadācit lakṣaṇāya kalpate. analo jātavedā agnir iti. sūtre 'py uktam avidyā katamā. pūrvānte ajñānam aparānta ajñānam iti vistaraḥ. viparyayād evāprāptir iti siddham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2831: viparyayād evāprāptir iti siddhe naitadarthaṃ sūtraṃ kartavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ. aprāptir apratilambho 'samanvāgama iti viparyayād etat trayaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2832: gamyate. tathaiva cāpratilambhāsamanvāgamayor aprāptir iti sāmānyasaṃjñā.
T07yabhkvyu:2833: tasmād evaṃ ca vaktavyaṃ. dvividhā aprāptir aprāptapūrvāṇām apratilambhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2834: prāptavihīnānām asamanvāgama (Abhidh-k-vy 144) iti. atha vāpratilabdhasya vihīnaspa cādyāprāptir apratilambhaḥ. apratilabdhena vihīnena ca
T07yabhkvyu:2837: iti. saṃskṛtānāṃ prāptyaprāptī svasaṃtānapatitānām evety avadhāryate. na parasaṃtānapatitānām iti. na parasattvasaṃtatipatitānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2838: svasaṃtatau prāptyaprāptī bhavata ity arthaḥ. tenāha. na hi parakīyaiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2839: kaścit samanvāgata iti. nāpy asaṃtatipatitānām iti
T07yabhkvyu:2840: nāsattvasaṃtatipatitānām ity arthaḥ. tasmād āha. na hy asattvasaṃkhyātaiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2841: [Tib. 131b] kaścit samanvāgata iti. mālyābharaṇādayaḥ kāṣṭhakuḍyādigatāś ca rūpādayo 'sattvasaṃkhyātāḥ. cakṣurādayaḥ sattvasaṃkhyātāḥ keśādayo
T07yabhkvyu:2844: pālityādivikāraḥ keśādīnāṃ dṛśyate. rasāyanopayogena cānugrahāt pālityādipratyāpattir iti sarveṣāṃ sattvasaṃkhyātānāṃ prāptir bhavatīti
T07yabhkvyu:2846: nirodhayor iti pratisaṃkhyānirodhāpratisaṃkhyānirodhayor asattvasaṃkhyātayor api prāptyaprāptī bhavataḥ. sarvasattvā apratisaṃkhyānirodhena yathāpratyayavaikalyaṃ samanvāgatāḥ. sakalabandhanādikṣaṇasthavarjyā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2847: ādau kṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntikṣaṇaḥ. tatra sthitā ādikṣaṇasthāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2848: sakalāni bandhanāny eṣām iti sakalabandhanā. aprahīṇasarvaprakārakleśāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2849: sakalabandhanāś cādikṣaṇasthāś ca ta iti sakalabandhanādikṣaṇasthāḥ. te varjyā eṣāṃ tair vā varjyāḥ sakalabandhanādikṣaṇasthavarjyāḥ. ke. sarva
T07yabhkvyu:2850: āryāḥ. te pratisaṃkhyānirodhena samanvāgatāḥ. sakalabandhanādikṣaṇasthās tv āryā na samanvāgataḥ. tasyāṃ hy avasthāyāṃ kṣāṃtivadhyāḥ [Tib. 132a]
T07yabhkvyu:2851: kleśāś chidyante na chinnāḥ. tannirodho 'pi prāpyate na prāpto
T07yabhkvyu:2852: nirudhyamāno mārgas tu prajahāti tadāvṛtim iti siddhāntāt. ekaprakāropalikhitādayas tv āryā laukikamārgaprāptena nirodhena tasyām avasthāyāṃ samanvāgatāḥ. ata ūrdhvaṃ dvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣu samanvāgatā eva anāsravamārgaprāptenāpi nirodhena. pṛthagjanāś ca kecit
T07yabhkvyu:2853: samanvāgatā ity ekaprakāropalikhitādayaḥ. ākāśena tu nāsti kaścit samanvāgata iti asaṃbaṃdhāt. nirodhābhyāṃ tv asti sambandhaḥ. tasmād ākāśasya prāptir nāsti. yasya ca nāsti prāptis tasyāprāptir api nāstīti siddhānta eṣa vaibhāṣikāṇāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2855: (Abhidh-k-vy 145) sūtrād iti. vyākhyānam eva vaibhāṣikaḥ sādhayati.
T07yabhkvyu:2856: daśānām aśaikṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇām iti vistaraḥ. daśāśaikṣā dharmāḥ. aṣṭāv aśaikṣāṇy āryamārgāṃgāni samyagvimuktiḥ samyagjñānaṃ ca. teṣām utpādāt saṃmukhībhāvāt. pratilaṃbhād āditaḥ prāpteḥ. samanvāgamāt paścāt prāpteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2857: paṃcāṅgaṃ viprahīṇaḥ. prahīṇapaṃcāṅga ity arthaḥ. paṃcāṃgāni satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo vicikitsā kāmacchando vyāpāda iti. etāny anāgāmiphalaprāptau prahīṇānīti na yujyante. imāni tu prayujyamānāni
T07yabhkvyu:2858: paṃcāṃgāni paśyāmo yad utordhvabhāgīyāni rūparāga ārūpyarāga auddhatyaṃ māno 'vidyā ceti. pratinidhibhūtāyāḥ prāpter yogāt prakṛtistho 'py arhann ārya ity ucyate. [Tib. 132b] sādhanaṃ cātra. dravyato 'sti samanvāgamaḥ sūtroktatvād āyatanadravyavad iti. ācaryas taṃ pratyāha. tena tarhy asattvākhyair api cakraratnādibhiḥ parasattvair api strīratnādibhiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2859: samanvāgamo dravyasan prāpnoti. sūtre vadanāt. katham iti sūtraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2860: darśayati. rājā yāvad vistara iti. rājā bhikṣavaś cakravartī saptabhī ratnaiḥ samanvāgataḥ. tasyemāni sapta ratnāni. tadyathā cakraratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam eva saptamam iti vistaraḥ. ebhis saptabhī ratnais
T07yabhkvyu:2861: samanvāgamaḥ sūtra ukto na ca dvavyato 'stīti anaikāntikatāṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:2862: pratijñādoṣam cāyam udgrāhayati. anumānavirodhāt. katham ity ucyate. na dravyasan daśāśaikṣadharmasamanvāgamaḥ samanvāgamasvābhāvyāc cakravartisaptaratnasamanvāgamavad iti. anena pratijñāyā dharmasvarūpaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2863: viparyāsayati. vaśitvaṃ kāmacāra iti. icchānuvidhāyitvaṃ. tatra vaśitvam iti cakravartisūtre. anyatra punar dravyāntaram iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2864: aśāśaikṣasamanvāgamasūtre. kaḥ punar evam ayoga iti. pravacane hi dvividham iṣyate dravyasac ca vastu prajñaptisac ceti katham ayuktir iti
T07yabhkvyu:2865: vaibhāṣikāḥ. ācārya āha. ayam ayoga iti vistaraḥ. iha yad dravyasad vastu tat pratyakṣagrāhyaṃ [Tib. 133a] vā bhaved anumānagrāhyaṃ vā. tatra pratyakṣagrāhyaṃ rūpaśabdādi paṃcendriyagrāhyatvāt. manovijñānagrāhyam api kiṃcit pratyakṣaṃ. rāgadveṣādi svasaṃvedyatvāt. cakṣuḥśrotrādi tv anumānagrāhyaṃ cakṣurvijñānādikṛtyānumeyatvāt. tadbhāvābhāvayos
T07yabhkvyu:2866: tadbhāvābhāvāt. prāptiḥ punar na pratyakṣagrāhyā na cānumānagrāhyā
T07yabhkvyu:2867: tatsiddhau niravadyānumānādarśanāt. tasmād dravyadharmāsambhavād ayoga iti sthitam etat. idānīm ācāryas tatpakṣam utthāpyotthāpya dūṣayati.
T07yabhkvyu:2868: utpattihetur iti vistaraḥ. yasya prāptir asti sa utpadyate hetusadbhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2869: asaṃskṛtasya na syāt prāptir yasmād asaṃskṛtam anutpādyaṃ. ye ca dharmā
T07yabhkvyu:2870: aprāptā duḥkhe (Abhidh-k-vy 146) dharmajñānakṣāntyādayaḥ. ye ca tyaktāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2871: bhūmisaṃcāravairāgyataḥ. tadyathā kāmāvacarā akliṣṭā ūrdhvabhūmyupapattyā kliṣṭāś ca vairāgyeṇa tyaktāḥ. teṣāṃ dhātupratyāgamataḥ parihāṇyā vā katham utpattiḥ syāt. na hi teṣāṃ prāptir asti. anutpannaniruddhatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2872: sahajaprāptihetukā cet. kā. teṣām utpattir adhikṛtā. sahajā yā prāptir
T07yabhkvyu:2873: idānīm utpadyate. sā teṣāṃ janiketi. āha. jātir idānīṃ kiṃkarī jātijātir
T07yabhkvyu:2874: veti. kiṃkaraṇaśīlā kiṃkarī. jātir lakṣyaṃ dharmaṃ janayati. [Tib. 133b]
T07yabhkvyu:2875: jātijātis tu tallakṣaṇaṃ jātiṃ janayati. tena yadi lakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām utpattiḥ prāptihetukocyeta tatra jātiḥ kiṃkarī. atha lakṣaṇānām. utpattis
T07yabhkvyu:2876: taddhetukocyeta. tata āha. jātijātir vā kiṃkarīti vikalpaḥ. atha vā yadi
T07yabhkvyu:2877: bhavataivaṃ kalpyeta. jātir dharmaṃ janayati. prāptiḥ punar jātiṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2878: janayatīti. tatra ucyate. jātijātir vā kiṃkarīti. sakalabandhanānāṃ khalv apīti vistaraḥ. yeṣām eko 'pi kleśaprakāro na prahīṇaḥ. te
T07yabhkvyu:2879: sakalabandhanāḥ. teṣāṃ sakalabandhanānāṃ khalv api mṛdumadhyādhimātrakleśotpattiprakārabhedo na syāt. kasmāt. prāptyabhedāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2880: vikalabandhanānāṃ hi prāptivaikalyān mṛdumadhyādhimātrakleśotpattibhedaḥ parikalpyeta na tu sakalabaṃdhanānāṃ. prāptināṃ tulyatvāt. yato vā sa
T07yabhkvyu:2881: bheda iti. yato vā kāraṇād abhyāsato 'nyato vā sa bhedaḥ. kasyacit
T07yabhkvyu:2882: sakalabandhanasyādhimātraḥ. kasyacin madhyaḥ. kasyacin mṛduḥ. tata eva bhedakāraṇāt tadutpattir astu. teṣāṃ mṛdvādīnāṃ kleśānām utpattiḥ. tasmān notpattihetuḥ prāptir iti. vaibhāṣika āha. kaś caivam āheti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2883: vyavasthāhetuḥ prāptiḥ. asatyāṃ hi prāptau laukikamānasānām iti. loke bhavo laukikaṃ. mana eva mānasaṃ. laukikaṃ mānasam eṣāṃ te ime laukikamānasāḥ. āryapṛthagjanāḥ. āryāś ca pṛthagjanāś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:2884: laukikamānasagrahaṇam āryaviśeṣaṇaṃ. [Tib. 134a] pṛthagjanā hi nityam eva
T07yabhkvyu:2886: api saṃbhavati. teṣāṃ āryapṛthagjanānāṃ. teṣām iti nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī.
T07yabhkvyu:2887: sambandhalakṣaṇā vā. teṣāṃ na syād vyavasthānam iti paricchedaḥ. yat kṛtaṃ vyavasthānaṃ. sā prāptiḥ. prahīṇāprahiṇakleśatāviśeṣād iti. prahīṇakleśā
T07yabhkvyu:2888: āryāḥ. aprahīṇakleśāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ. tadbhāvāḥ. sa eva viśeṣaḥ. iti
T07yabhkvyu:2889: prahīṇāprahīṇakleśataviśeṣaḥ. tasmād. etad vyavasthānaṃ bhavitum arhati.
T07yabhkvyu:2890: nanu ca pṛthagjanā api kecit prahīṇakleśā bhavanti. katham avadhāryate.
T07yabhkvyu:2891: āryā eva prahīṇakleśā iti. atyaṃtasamudghātavacanād evam uktaṃ. etac caiva katham iti. eṣāṃ prahīṇaḥ kleśa eṣām aprahīṇa iti yad etad vyavasthānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2892: tat kathaṃ bhaviṣyati. prāptau tu satyāṃ kleśaprāptyā etat sidhyati
T07yabhkvyu:2894: (Abhidh-k-vy 147) ity arthaḥ. yeṣāṃ tatprāptivigamāḥ. te āryāḥ. yeṣām
T07yabhkvyu:2895: avigamāḥ. te pṛthagjanā iti. nanu ca pṛthagjanānām api keṣāṃcit kleśaprāptir vigatā. vigatā. na tu lokottareṇa mārgeṇa. sa tarhi lokottaramārgakṛto [Tib. 134b] viśeṣaḥ kathaṃ paricchidyate lokottareṇeyaṃ kleśaprāptir vigatā laukikeneyam iti. sāsravānāsravavisaṃyogaprāptibhedāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2896: āśryaviśeṣād etat sidhyatīti. ātmabhāvaviśeṣād etad vyavasthānaṃ eṣāṃ prahīṇaḥ kleśa eṣām aprahīṇaḥ kleśa iti sidhyati. tathā parāvṛtta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2898: agnidagdhavrīhivad iti. yathāgnidagdho vrīhir abījībhūto bhavati. evaṃ yathoktena nyāyenābījībhūtaḥ āśrayaḥ kleśānāṃ prahīṇakleśa ity ucgate.
T07yabhkvyu:2899: upahatabījabhāve vā. āśraya ity adhikṛtaṃ. tena laukikena mārgeṇa prahīṇa iti śakyate vaktuṃ. bījasyopaghātamātrabhāvāt. viparyayād aprahīṇa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2900: anirdagdhabīja āśraye 'nupahatabījabhāve vā. yaś cāprahīṇa iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2901: yaś cāprahīṇo 'nantaroktena vidhinā darśanaprahātavyaḥ kāmāvacaro yāvad bhāvāgrikaḥ bhāvanāprahātavyo vā kāmāvacaro yāvad bhāvāgrikaḥ. tena
T07yabhkvyu:2902: samanvāgataḥ. yaś ca prahīṇas tathaiva yāvad bhāvāgrikaḥ. tenasamanvāgata iti prajñapyate. prajñaptidharmo 'yam iti darśayati. kuśalā api dviprakārā
T07yabhkvyu:2903: iti vistaraḥ. yathā kliṣṭā dviprakārā ity apiśabdārthaḥ. samuccaye vā kuśalāś cety arthaḥ. tadbījabhāvānupaghātād iti. teṣām utpattilābhikānāṃ kuśalānāṃ bījaṃ tadbījaṃ. tadbījasya bhāvas tadbījabhāvaḥ [Tib. 135a].
T07yabhkvyu:2906: kuśalaiḥ. upaghātād asamanvāgata ucyate. ko 'sāv ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:2907: samucchinnakuśalamūlaḥ. tasya tv iti. tasyāśrayasya tadbījabhāvasya upaghāto mithyādṛṣṭyā veditavyo nānyathā. tenāha. na tu khalu kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bījabhāvasyātyantaṃ saṃtatau samudghāto yathā kleśānām āryamārgeṇātyantaṃ saṃtatau samudghāta ity abhiprāyaḥ. ye punar iti
T07yabhkvyu:2908: vistaraḥ. ye prāyogikāḥ. tair utpannaiḥ. teṣām utpattis tadutpattiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2909: tadutpattau vaśitvaṃ sāmarthyaviśeṣaḥ. tasyāvighātāt. kasya. saṃtateḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2910: samanvāgama ucyate. kaiḥ. tair yatnabhāvibhiḥ kuśulaiḥ. yasmād evaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2911: tasmād bījam eva śaktiviśeṣa evātra samanvāgamāvasthāyām anapoddhṛtaṃ kliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇām āryamārgeṇānupahataṃ laukikena mārgeṇa. ayatnabhāvināṃ ca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyā. paripuṣṭaṃ ca vaśitvakāle
T07yabhkvyu:2912: yatnabhāvināṃ kuśalānāṃ bījam iti prakṛtaṃ. samanvāgamākhyāṃ labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:2913: nānyad dravyaṃ. yad vaibhāṣikaiḥ kalpitaṃ. kiṃ punar idaṃ bījaṃ nāmeti.
T07yabhkvyu:2915: samarthaṃ. yat paṃcaskandhātmakaṃ rūpaṃ phalotpattisamarthaṃ sākṣād anantaraṃ [Tib. 135b] pāraṃparyeṇa dūrataḥ. ko 'yaṃ pariṇāmo nāmeti.
T07yabhkvyu:2916: sāṃkhyānāṃ pariṇāmāśaṃkayā pṛcchati. saṃtater anyathātvam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2917: anyathotpādaḥ. kā ceyaṃ saṃtatir iti. kiṃ yathā sāṃkhyānām
T07yabhkvyu:2918: avasthitadravyasya dharmāntaranivṛttau dharmāṃtaraprādurbhāvaḥ tathāvasthāyinyāḥ saṃtater anyathātvam iti. nety ucyate. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:2919: hetuphalabhūtā. hetuś ca phalaṃ ca hetuphalaṃ. hetuphalam iti nairantaryeṇa pravṛttās traiyadhvikāḥ saṃskārāḥ saṃtatir iti
T07yabhkvyu:2920: vyavasthāpyante. yatra tūktam iti vistaraḥ. yatra tu sūtra uktaṃ. kim ity āha. lobhena samanvāgataḥ abhavyaḥ ayogyaś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni
T07yabhkvyu:2921: kāyasmṛtyupasthānādīni utpādayitum iti. yadi bījaṃ prāptiḥ. bījaṃ nityam astīti smṛtyupasthānotpattir na syāt. bhavadīyāyām api prāptau tadutpattir na syād iti tulyam etat. tasmād ubhābhyām api vaktavyaṃ. tatrādhivāsanaṃ lobhasyāvinodanaṃ vā samanvāgama iti. adhivāsanam abhyanujñānam.
T07yabhkvyu:2922: avinodanam avyupaśamanaṃ. sarvathā prajñaptidharmo na dravyadharma iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2923: sarvaprakāreṇa yady utpattihetur yadi vyavasthāhetur yady āśrayaviśeṣaḥ yady adhivāsanam avinodanaṃ vā sarvathā prajñaptidharmaḥ prajñaptyā saṃvṛtyā vyavahāreṇa dharmaḥ prajñaptidharmo na dravyadharmaḥ na dravyato dharmaḥ svabhāva ity arthaḥ. atha vā dravyaṃ ca tad dharmaś ca sa dravyadharmo [Tib. 136a] na rūpādivat vidyamānasvalakṣaṇo dharma ity arthaḥ. tasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ tasya ca prajñaptidharmasya pratiṣedho
T07yabhkvyu:2925: idam asyeti jñānacihnaṃ pratilabdhadharmāvipraṇāśakāraṇaṃ ca prāptir ity
T07yabhkvyu:2926: ācāryasaṃghabhadraḥ. idam asyeti jñānacihnaṃ ity asiddham etat.
T07yabhkvyu:2927: āśrayaviśeṣeṇa tajjñānam iti brūmaḥ. yadi ca pratilabdhadharmavipraṇāśakāraṇaṃ prāptir iṣyate. prāptaparityāgo naiva syāt. bhavati ca. tasmād akāraṇam etat. sa eva ca śaktiviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ bījabhāvam ācāryena vyavasthāpitaṃ dūṣayati. kim ayaṃ śaktiviśeṣaś cittād arthāntaram ato 'narthāntaraṃ. kiṃ cātaḥ. arthāntaraṃ cet. siddhaṃ prāptir astīti. saṃjñāmātre tu vivādaḥ. anarthāntaraṃ cet. nanv akuśalaṃ kuśalasya
T07yabhkvyu:2928: bījaṃ abhyupagataṃ bhavati. akuśalasya ca kuśalaṃ. ko hi nāma auṣṇyasya tejaso 'narthāntaratve saty auṣṇyam eva dāhakam adhyavasyen na tejaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2929: kuśalabījaṃ hy akuśale cetasy avyākṛte vā vartate. evam akuśalabījaṃ kuśale cetasy avyākṛte vā vartate. tathaiva cāvyākṛtabījam api kuśale
T07yabhkvyu:2930: (Abhidh-k-vy 149) cākuśale ca vartate. sāsravabījaṃ cānāsrave 'nāsravabījaṃ ca sāsrave cetasi vartata iti sāṃkaryadoṣaḥ prasajyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:2931: atra vayaṃ brūmaḥ. anarthāntarabhāve sāṃkaryadoṣa bhavet. tat tu bījaṃ na cittād arthāntaraṃ vaktavyaṃ. nāpy anarthāntaram.
T07yabhkvyu:2933: adośaḥ. kuśalena hi cittenotpannena svajātīye 'nyajātīye vā svasaṃtānacitte bījam ādhīyeta. tataḥ kāraṇaviśeṣāt kāryaviśeṣa iti
T07yabhkvyu:2934: viśiṣṭaṃ. tena tac cittam utpadyeta. tad viśiṣṭaṃ cittaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2935: kuśalabījakāryakriyāyāṃ samartham utpadyeta. evam akuśalenāpi svajātīye
T07yabhkvyu:2936: 'nyajātīye vā svasaṃtānacitte bījam ādhīyeta. tac ca tena viśiṣṭaṃ cittam akuśalabījakāryakriyāyāṃ samartham utpadyeta. evam avyākṛtenāpi cittena
T07yabhkvyu:2937: svajātīye 'nyajātīye vā svasaṃtānacitte bījam ādhīyeta. tac cāpi tena
T07yabhkvyu:2938: viśiṣṭam avyākṛtabījakāryakriyāyāṃ samartham utpadyeta. sāsraveṇāpy anāsrave citte bījam ādhīyeta. anāsraveṇāpi sāsrava ity evam anyonyabījādhāyakam anyonyajanakaṃ ca cittaṃ cittāntarād utpadyamāmaṃ anyonyavāsyavasakatvena pravartate. na ca kuśalenākuśale citte śaktiviśeṣa āhita iti tad akuśalaṃ kuśalatām āpadyate. kuśalaṃ vā tad akuśalatāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:2939: śaktiviśeṣamātratvāt. śaktir bījaṃ vāsanety eko 'yam arthaḥ. evam akuśalādivāsanāpi vaktavyā. yāvat sāsraveṇānāsrave śaktiviśeṣādhāne 'pi.
T07yabhkvyu:2940: anāsraveṇāpi sāsrave śaktiviśeṣādhāne. na tat sāsravaṃ anāsravaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2941: saṃpadyate. anāsravaṃ vā sāsravam iti. bhavatām api vaibhāṣikāṇām idaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2942: ciṃtyate. yadā sāsravacittasamanaṃtaraṃ [Tib. 137a] anāsravaṃ anāsravacittasamanantaraṃ vā sāsravacittam utpadyate. tadā kiṃ pūrvakaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2943: sāsravakalāpo 'nāsravakalāpo vā śaktimān samanantarapratyayādibhāvenottarakalāpotpattāv utāśaktimān. kiṃ cātaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:2944: yady aśaktimān samanantarapratyayādibhāvo 'py asya hīyeta. atha śaktimān.
T07yabhkvyu:2945: sā śaktiḥ kiṃ sāsrave cetasi sāsravā āhosvid anāsravā. tac cittaṃ sāsravasyānāsravasya ca cittāntarasya samanantarapratyayādibhāvaṃ kuryāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2946: tat kiṃ yayaiva śaktyā sāsravasya samanantarapratyayādibhāvaṃ kuryāt
T07yabhkvyu:2947: tayaivānāsravasya. yadi tayaiva kathaṃ śaktikāryasāṃkaryaṃ na bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:2949: kuryāt. katham anayor ekatra śaktyos tasmāc cittād ananyayor bhinnarūpatā bhinnakāryatā ca yujyate. yujyate cet. asmākam api cittād ananyāsāṃ śaktīnāṃ tatrāvasthānaṃ kāryabhedaś ca bhaviṣyati. evam anāsravasyāpi cittasya sāsravānāsravacittasamanantarapratyayādibhāvena saṃbhavataḥ
T07yabhkvyu:2950: tathaiva śaktyor bhinnarūpatā kāryabhedaś ca vaktavyaḥ. tena yad uktaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2951: nanv akuśalaṃ kuśalasya bījam (Abhidh-k-vy 150) abhyupagataṃ bhavatītyādi tad ayuktaṃ. na hi kuśalāhitena śaktiviśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭaṃ samartham akuśalam akuśalabījakāryaṃ karoti. [Tib. 137b] kiṃ tarhi. kuśalabījakāryam eva karoti. svāhitena tu śaktiviśeṣeṇa tad akuśalaṃ svabījakāryaṃ karoti. tat katham idam ucyate. kuśalasyākuśalaṃ bījam iti. brūyās tvam akuśalacitte
T07yabhkvyu:2952: tat kuśalabījam āhitaṃ kathaṃ akuśalaṃ na bhavatīti. na bhavanto bījārthaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2953: jānate. kuśalena cittena nirudhyamānena. tathā śaktiviśiṣṭam akuśalaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2954: cittaṃ janyeta yathā tac cittaṃ svotpattiyogyaṃ bhaviṣyati sākṣāt pāraṃparyeṇa veti śaktiviśeṣa eva bījaṃ. na bījaṃ nāma kiṃcid asti.
T07yabhkvyu:2955: prajñaptisattvāt. ata eva prāptyaprāptī prajñaptisatyāv ucyete.
T07yabhkvyu:2957: (II.38, 39ab) atītānāṃ dharmāṇām atītāpi prāptir iti vistaraḥ. atītānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tadyathā kliṣṭānām atītā prāptir yā utpannaniruddhā sāgrajāpi
T07yabhkvyu:2958: saṃbhavati. sahajāpi. paścātkālajāpi. teṣām evānāgatā prāptir anutpannā.
T07yabhkvyu:2959: pratyutpannā yā paścātkālajā utpannaniruddhā. anāgatānām api prāptir atītā
T07yabhkvyu:2961: pratyutpannāgrajotpannāniruddhā. tathā pratyutpannānām apy atītā prāptir yāgrajotpannaniruddhā. anāgatā yānutpannā. pratyutpannā yā sahajā.
T07yabhkvyu:2962: atītādijātisāmānyaṃ ca gṛhītvaivam uktam. na tv ekasyātītasyāvaśyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:2963: trividhā prāptir asti. na hi vipākajasyānāgatātītā vā prāptiḥ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:2965: vacanāt. [Tib. 138a] yadi tu pratidravyaṃ prāptivyavasthā kriyeta saṃbhavaṃ praty etad evaṃ bhavet. kliṣṭānām utpattipratilaṃbhikānāṃ ca
T07yabhkvyu:2966: kuśalānām atītādīnām atītādayaḥ prāptayo 'vaśyaṃ bhavanti. na hi pṛthagjanasyānutpannasya anāsravasya mārgasyātītā pratyutpannā ca prāptir
T07yabhkvyu:2970: utpannāniruddhā pratyutpannā. sugamatvāt tu na sūtritam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:2972: kāmadhātūpapannasya kāmāvacarāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kāmāvacarī prāptiḥ. tasyaiva rūpāvacarāṇāṃ rūpāvacarī. tasyaivārūpyāvacarāṇām ārūpyāvacarī.
T07yabhkvyu:2973: rūpadhātūpapannasya ca kāmāvacarāṇāṃ. tadyathā nirmāṇacittānāṃ kāmāvacarī.
T07yabhkvyu:2978: kāmarūpārūpyāvacarī cānāsravā ca. samāsena sarvān anāptān abhisamasyety
T07yabhkvyu:2979: arthaḥ. pratyekaṃ tu na caturvidhā. tata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:2983: ārūpyadhātūpapannasyārūpyāvacarādīnām apratisaṃkhyānirodhaprāptir ārūpyāvacarī. sattvasaṃtānavaśenaiva hi tatprāptir vyavasthāpyate. na tu teṣāṃ vaśena yeṣām apratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ. yadi hy evaṃ syāt mārgasatyasyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhaprāptir anāsravā syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:2984: pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya rūpārūpyāvacarī cānāsravā ceti. na kāmāvacarī.
T07yabhkvyu:2985: kāmadhātor apratipakṣatvāt. rūpāvacareṇa tu mārgeṇa prāptasya rūpāvacarī prāptiḥ. ārūpyāvacareṇārūpyāvacarī. anāsraveṇa mārgeṇānāsravā. āryasya tu rūpāvacareṇa mārgeṇa prāptasya rūpāvacarī cānāsravā cārūpyāvacareṇārūpyāvacarī cānāsravā ca.
T07yabhkvyu:2987: vacanāt. mārgasatyasyānāsravaiveti. laukikīm asya prāptiṃ pratiṣedhayati.
T07yabhkvyu:2988: seyaṃ samasya caturvidheti. samāsena traidhātukī cānāsravā ceti uktam arthaṃ nigamayati. śaikṣāṇām iti. śaikṣā dharmāḥ śaikṣasyānāsravā dharmā.
T07yabhkvyu:2990: śaikṣāśaikṣebhyas tv anye naiva śaikṣā nāśaikṣāḥ. asaṃskṛtā api yāvan
T07yabhkvyu:2991: naiva śaikṣā nāśaikṣā iṣyante. teṣāṃ tridhā
T07yabhkvyu:2992: prāptiḥ śaikṣādibhedena. śaikṣī aśaikṣī naiva śaikṣī nāśaikṣī ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:2993: anāryeṇa prāptasyeti. pṛthagjanena prāptasya. tasyaiva śaikṣeṇeti.
T07yabhkvyu:2994: tasyaiva pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya śaikṣeṇa mārgeṇa prāptasya śaikṣī.
T07yabhkvyu:2996: visaṃyogaprāptisaṃniśrayatvāt kṣayajñānasya. yady api sā vajropamena śaikṣeṇa prāpyate tadāvāhakatvāt. tatprāptatvavacane tu śaikṣyāḥ prāpteḥ aśaikṣī prāptir viśeṣitā syād iti na tena śaikṣeṇa (Abhidh-k-vy 152)
T07yabhkvyu:2997: aśaikṣīty uktaṃ. tasyaivāryamārgaprāptasyānāsraveti. tasyaiva pratisaṃkhyā nirodhasya āryamārgaprāptasya anāsravā. mārgasatyasya cānāsravā prāptir
T07yabhkvyu:2998: ity adhikṛtaṃ. āryeṇa laukikamārgaprāptasya pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya prāptiḥ kiṃ sāsravā utāho 'nāsravā. ubhayathety āha. sā kasmān noktā. sāvaśeṣaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3001: nocyate. yā tv asaṃkīrṇā prāptiḥ saivehocyate iti veditavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3006: saṃbandhanīyaṃ. teṣāṃ hi balavattvād iti vistaraḥ. teṣāṃ hi divyacakṣurabhijñādīnāṃ balavattvāt. kiṃ. pūrvaṃpaścātsahajā prāptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3007: prayogaviśeṣaniṣpatter iti. prayogaviśeṣeṇa niṣpattir divyacakṣurabhijñādīnāṃ. tasyāḥ. prayogaviśeṣaniṣpatter balavattvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3009: śailpasthānikasyāpi kasyacit tadyathā viśvakarmaṇaḥ. airyāpathikasya ca tadyathā sthavirasyāśvajitasya. atyartham abhyastasya bhṛśam
T07yabhkvyu:3010: ātmasātkṛtasyecchanti vaibhāṣikāḥ. kiṃ. pūrvaṃpaścātsahajā prāptir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3012: caśabdaḥ samuccayārthaḥ. prāptiḥ sahajeti samuccīyate. tac ca kliṣṭaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3013: rūpaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikam eva vijñaptirūpaṃ veditavyaṃ. tato 'nyāsu
T07yabhkvyu:3014: bhūmiṣu tadutthāpakābhāvāt. adhimātreṇāpīti vistaraḥ. adhimātreṇāpi cittena nivṛtā vijñaptir utthāpitā. tad eva cādhimātraṃ vijñapticittaṃ avijñaptiṃ notthāpayati. ato daurbalyasiddhiḥ. tasyā daurbalyasiddheḥ sahajaiva prāptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3015: prāptibheda iti. vipākajādīnām anivṛtāvyākṛtānāṃ sahajā prāptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3016: abhijñādvayādīnāṃ tu pūrvaṃpaścātsahajā prāptir iti tadbhedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3018: [Tib. 140a] kāmāvacarasya kuśalākuśalasya vijñaptyavjñaptirūpasyāgrajāprāptiḥ sarvathā nāsti. yadi kuśalasya yady
T07yabhkvyu:3019: akuśalasya nāsty eva sarvathety arthaḥ. sahajā cāsti paścātkālajā ceti
T07yabhkvyu:3020: saṃbhavataḥ. tadyathā prathamasya vijñaptyavijñaptikṣaṇasya ādau sahajā prāptir bhavati. dvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣu tasyaivādyasya kṣaṇasya paścātkālajā bhavati. evam anyeṣām api dvitīyādīnāṃ kṣaṇānāṃ sahajā paścātkālajā prāptir veditavyā. kāmāvacarasyaiva rūpasyāgrajā (Abhidh-k-vy prāptipratiṣedhād dhyānānāsravasaṃvararūpasyāgrajā prāptir asty evety utsṛṣṭā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:3022: yady aprāptiḥ kleśānāṃ kliṣṭā bhavet. prahīṇakleśasya kleśavad eva na
T07yabhkvyu:3023: syāt. yadi kuśalā syāt samucchinnakuśalamūlasya na syāt. anāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇām aprāptir anāsravā syāt. kiṃ syāt. pṛthagjano na syān nityam
T07yabhkvyu:3026: pratyutpannasya dharmasya prāptir vartate. tasmād asyāprāptir nāsti
T07yabhkvyu:3027: pratyutpannā. tasya prāptyaprāptyoḥ samavadhānāsaṃbhavāt. atītānāgatayos tu traiyadhvikīti. aprāptānāṃ prāptavihīnānāṃ ca prāyogikānāṃ guṇānām anāgatānāṃ ca cakṣurādīnām api ca yeṣāṃ [Tib. 140b] prāptir nāsti atītāpy
T07yabhkvyu:3028: asty aprāptir anāgatāpi pratyutpannāpi. srotonyāyena hi teṣām aprāptir utpadyate nirudhyate
T07yabhkvyu:3030: tridhety anukarṣaṇārthaś cakāraḥ. kāmādiṣu dhātuṣu āptā aviyuktāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:3032: upapattyāśrayavaśena tadvyavasthāpanāt. dharmasahāvyavasthāpinī hy aprāptiḥ. na prāptivad dharmavaśena vyavasthāpyate. tasmāt kāmadhātūpapannasya kāmarūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ anāsravāṇāṃ ca dharmāṇām
T07yabhkvyu:3034: ārūpyāvacarī. tadyathā kāmadhātūpapannasya prāyogikānāṃ guṇānām upapattilābhikānām api kuśalasamucchedāvasthāyām aprāptir avītarāgatvāc ca rūpārūpyāvacarāṇām akliṣṭānām aprāptiḥ pṛthagjanatvāc cānāsravāṇām
T07yabhkvyu:3036: bhūmisaṃcāratyaktānāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ ca prāyogikānāṃ guṇānāṃ pṛthagjanatvāc cānāsravāṇām aprāptī rūpāvacarī. tathaiva cārūpyadhātūpapannasya kāmarūpāvacarāṇāṃ bhūmisaṃcāratyaktānām ārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ ca prāyogikāṇāṃ [Tib. 141a] guṇānāṃ pṛthagjanatvād eva
T07yabhkvyu:3038: pṛthagjanatvaṃ katamat. āryadharmāṇām alābha ity anena śāstrapāṭhenānāsravatvābhāvam aprāpter darśayati. katameṣām āryadharmāṇām alābha iti. āryadharmā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntim ārabhya sarvo 'nāsravo
T07yabhkvyu:3039: mārga iti ata evaṃ pṛcchati. sarveṣām aviśeṣavacanād iti. sarveṣāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntyādīnāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣajñānānām alābhaḥ. kasmāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3040: aviśeṣtatvāt. yady (Abhidh-k-vy 154) evam utpannāyām api duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntau pariśiṣṭānām āryadharmāṇām alābho 'syāstīti anāryaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:3041: syāt. tasmād idam āha. sa tu yo vinā lābheneti. yo vinā lābhenālābhaḥ. tat pṛthagjanatvam iti. anyathā hīti vistaraḥ. yady āryadharmāṇāṃ lābhe 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:3042: sati anyeṣām api dharmāṇām alābhaḥ pṛthagjanatvam iṣyate buddho 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:3044: kevalālābhagrahaṇāt tv aprasaṃgaḥ. evaśabdas tarhi paṭhitavya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3045: āryadharmāṇām alābha eveti. ekapadāny api hy avadhāraṇānīti. kevalapadāny apīty arthaḥ. abbhakṣo vāyubhakṣa iti. abbhakṣa eva vāyubhakṣa eveti
T07yabhkvyu:3046: nocyate. evaśabdasya cārtho gamyate. tadvad ihāpīti. [Tib. 141b] atha vā apa eva yo bhakṣayati so 'bbhakṣaḥ. yo vāyum eva bhakṣayati sa vāyubhakṣa
T07yabhkvyu:3047: iti. yathātra luptanirdiṣṭasya evakārasyāvadhāraṇārtho gamyate. tadvad ihāpy alābha eveti. duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntitatsahabhuvāṃ ity apara iti vistaraḥ. duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntes tatsahabhuvāṃ ca vedanādīnāṃ dharmāṇām
T07yabhkvyu:3048: alābhaḥ pṛthagjanatvam. asmiṃ pakṣe utpannāyām api duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntau pariśiṣṭānām āryadharmāṇām alābho 'stīty anāryaḥ syād iti yo doṣa uktaḥ. sa na saṃbhavati. yadā tarhi phalaprāptiḥ. tadā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntitatsahabhuvāṃ vihānir iti phalaprāptāv anāryaḥ syād iti doṣaparihārārtham āha. na ca tattyāgāt. na ca teṣāṃ kṣāṃtisahabhuvāṃ tyāgād anāryatvaprasaṃgaḥ. tadalābhasyātyantaṃ hatatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3049: tasyālābhasyātyantavihīnatvāt. katham. asāv atyantaṃ hatas tatsaṃtāne punar anutpatteḥ. te tarhi trigotrā iti. śrāvakapratyekabuddhabuddhagotrā
T07yabhkvyu:3050: iti. katameṣām alābhaḥ. sarveṣām iti. śrāvakādigotrāṇām. evaṃ tarhi sa eva doṣa iti. buddho 'pi trigotrālābhād anāryaḥ syād ity arthaḥ. punaḥ sa eva
T07yabhkvyu:3051: parihāra iti. sa tu yo vinālābheneti pūrvavat prapaṃco yāvat tadyathā abbhakṣo vāyubhakṣa iti. yatnas tarhi vyartha [Tib. 142a] iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3052: kṣāṃtipariśiṣṭāryadharmālābhasadbhāvād anāryaḥ syād ity asya doṣasya parihārāya kṣāntitatsahabhuvām alābhaḥ pṛthagjanatvam iti yo yatnas sa vyarthaḥ syāt. pūrvapakṣadoṣaparihāra evāyam āsthīyate. anutpannāryadharmā saṃtatir iti. anutpannā āryadharmā asyām ity anutpannāryadharmā saṃtatiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:3053: pṛthagjanatvaṃ. anutpannāryamārgā skandhasaṃtatir ity arthaḥ. arthād utpannāryadharmā saṃtatir āryatvam ity uktaṃ bhavati āśrayaparāvṛtteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3054: atheyam aprāptir iti. sarvadharmāprāptiś codyate. nāryadharmaprāptir eva.
T07yabhkvyu:3055: yathā tāvad iti. udāharaṇam etat. tasya lābhāt tad vihīyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3056: tasyāryamārgasya lābhāt tat pṛthagjanatvam alābhalakṣaṇaṃ vihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:3058: kiṃdhātukaṃ tat pṛthagjanatvaṃ. tridhātukam ity eke. nanu copapattyāśrayavaśenālābho vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:3059: cālābhasvabhāvaṃ. tasmād asya kāmāvacarasya sattvasya kāmāvacaram eva
T07yabhkvyu:3060: pṛthagjanatvam asti. na rūpārūpyāvacaram. atas traidhātukaṃ vihīyata iti ayujyamānam etat paśyāmaḥ. atha punar anutpattidharmatāṃ tad āpannam iti
T07yabhkvyu:3061: kṛtvā traidhātukaṃ tad vihīyata iti upacārakalpanā. bhavatv eṣā. naiṣā
T07yabhkvyu:3062: vāryate. kāmāvacarasyaiva tv ekasya pṛthagjanatvasya prāptir asti. tal laukikāgrabharmāvasthāyāṃ vihīyata [Tib. 142b] iti vedayāmaḥ. tac ca kāmavairāgye navame vimuktimārge prahīyate. rūpārūpyadhātvor utpadyamānasya tv āryasya pratibhūmyavasthitānāṃ pṛthagjanatvānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3063: āryamārgaprāptisāmarthyān naiva prāptir utpadyate. pratibhūmi tu navame
T07yabhkvyu:3065: bhūmisaṃcārāc ceti. yadā ca kāmadhātor vairāgyaṃ kṛtvā prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3066: saṃcarati. tadā ca tat kāmāvacaraṃ pṛthagjanatvaṃ vihīyate. na cāryo bhavati. prathamadhyānabhūmikapṛthagjanatvaprādurbhāvāt. evam ārūpyadhātusaṃcārād rūpāvacaraṃ pṛthagjanatvaṃ vihīyate. ūrdhvabhūmeś cādharāṃ bhūmiṃ saṃcarate ūrdhvabhūmikaṃ pṛthagjanatvaṃ vihīyata iti vaktavyam. evam anyeṣām api yojyam iti. yathāryamārgasya prāptyā pṛthagjanatvam aprāptir vihīyata iti yojitaṃ. evam anyeṣām api
T07yabhkvyu:3067: śrutacintāmayādikānāṃ dharmāṇām aprāptir vihīyata iti yojyaṃ. kathaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3068: kāmāvacarāṇāṃ tāvac chrutacintāmayādikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prāptilābhād aprāptir
T07yabhkvyu:3069: vihīyate. upapattilābhikānāṃ ca kuśalānāṃ prāptyā samucchinnakuśalasyāprāptir vihīyate. bhūmisaṃcārāc ca. yadā cāyaṃ kāmadhātoś cyutvā prathamaṃ dhyānam upapattyā saṃcarati. tadā ca tadbhūmikānāṃ gatisaṃgṛhītānāṃ skaṃdhānām aprāptir vihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:3072: coktam. evaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ prāyogikāṇāṃ guṇānāṃ prāpter aprāptir vihīyate. bhūmisaṃcārāc ca. ūrdhvabhūmikānāṃ gatisaṃgṛhītānāṃ skandhānāṃ tadbhūmisaṃcārād vihīyata iti. idam ekeṣāṃ bhūmi
T07yabhkvyu:3073: saṃcāravyākhyānodāharaṇaṃ tatra aviviktaṃ paśyāmaḥ. ūrdhvabhūmikānāṃ gatisaṃgṛhītānāṃ skandhānām aprāptir na kevalaṃ bhūmisaṃcārād vibīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:3074: kiṃ tarhi. tatprāptito 'pīti. idaṃ tv asaṃkīrṇam udāharaṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3075: tadyathā dvitīyādidhyānabhūmikānāṃ prāyogikāṇāṃ guṇānāṃ tadalābhinaḥ kāmāvacarasya sattvasyāprāptir asti. sa yadi kāmavairāgyaṃ kṛtvā prathamadhyāna upapadyate (Abhidh-k-vy 156). sā teṣām aprāptir
T07yabhkvyu:3076: bhūmisaṃcārād vihīyate. prathamadhyānabhūmikā tu teṣām aprāptir
T07yabhkvyu:3078: nanu caivam anavasthāprasaṃgaḥ prāptīnām iti. prāpter api prāptiḥ. asyā apy anyā. tasyā apy anyā ity anavasthā. parasparasamanvāgamād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3079: prāptiprāptiyogāt prāptyā samanvāgataḥ. prāptiyogāt prāptiprāptyā samanvāgata ity arthaḥ. prāptyutpādād iti vistaraḥ. prāptyutpādāt tena dharmeṇa cittena vā samanvāgato bhavati. prāptiprāptyā ca samanvāgata iti
T07yabhkvyu:3080: vartate. prāptiprāptyutpatteḥ prāptyaiva samanvāgato bhavatīti. evaṃ prāptir ubhayatra vyāpriyate. prāptiprāptis tv ekatreti ato nānavasthā.
T07yabhkvyu:3081: kuśalasya kliṣṭasya ceti. anayor agrajapaścātkālajaprāptitvād grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3082: avyākṛtasya [Tib. 143b] hi sahajaiva prāptir iti. dvitīye kṣaṇa iti
T07yabhkvyu:3083: vistaraḥ. dvitīye kṣaṇe tasya dharmasya tatprāpteḥ prāptiprāpteś ca prāptaya iti tisraḥ prāptayaḥ. prāptiyogād dhi taiḥ samanvāgato bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:3084: tābhis tisṛbhiḥ prāptibhiḥ samanvāgamārthaṃ punas tisro 'nuprāptaya
T07yabhkvyu:3085: udbhavantīti ṣaḍ bhavanti prāptayaḥ. prathamadvitīyakṣaṇotpannānāṃ dravyāṇām iti. dharmeṇa sārdhaṃ navānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ nava prāptayaḥ sārdham anuprāptibhir aṣṭādaśa bhavanti. evam uttarottaravṛddhiprasaṃgeneti vistaraḥ. uttarottarasya kṣaṇasya vṛddhiḥ prāptibhiḥ. uttarottare vā kṣaṇe
T07yabhkvyu:3086: vṛddhiḥ prāptīnāṃ. tasyāḥ prasaṃgaḥ uttarottaravṛddhiprasaṃgaḥ. tena.
T07yabhkvyu:3087: uttarottaravṛddhiprasaṃgena. etāḥ prāptayo visarpantya iti. diṅmātraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3088: darśayiṣyāmaḥ. caturthe kṣaṇe prathamakṣaṇotpannais tribhir dharmaiḥ prāptyanuprāptimadbhir bhavitavyaṃ. dvitīyakṣaṇotpannābhir api ṣaḍbhiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:3089: prāptyanuprāptibhiḥ punaḥ prāptyanuprāptimatībhir bhavitavyam. evaṃ tṛtīyakṣaṇotpannābhir aṣṭādaśabhiḥ prāptyanuprāptibhiḥ punar api
T07yabhkvyu:3090: prāptyanuprāptimatībhir bhavitavyam iti prathamadvitīyatṛtīyakṣaṇotpannānāṃ saptaviṃśatiḥ prāptayaḥ sārdham anuprāptibhis tāvatībhir iti catuḥpaṃcāśat prāptayaś caturthe kṣaṇe bhavanti. paṃcame tu kṣaṇe prathamadvitīyatṛtīyakṣaṇotpannāḥ prāptyanuprāptayaḥ punaś catuḥpaṃcāśac caturthakṣaṇotpannaprāptyanuprāptayaś ca dviścatuḥpaṃcāśad bhavanti. trīṇi catuḥpaṃcāśatkāni dvāṣaṣtyuttaraśataṃ prāptīnāṃ jāyate. evam uttarottaravṛddhiprasaṃgo vaktavyaḥ. atītānāgatānām ity atra
T07yabhkvyu:3092: atra prāyogikāgrahaṇam anāvaśyakatvād eva. sasaṃprayogasahabhuvām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3093: savedanādisajātyādīnām. anādyantasaṃsāraparyāpannānām anādāv anante ca saṃsāre saṃgṛhītānāṃ. anantā aprameyā ekasya prāṇinaḥ. kiṃ aṅga bahūnāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3094: kṣaṇe kṣaṇe upajāyaṃte prāptaya iti. anantadravyā eva. anantaprāptidravyā ity arthaḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy 157) atyutsavo batāyaṃ prāptīnām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3095: parihāsavacanam etat. kevalaṃ na pratighātinyaḥ arūpiṇītvāt yato 'vakāśaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3098: iti vistaraḥ. samāno bhāgo bhajanam eṣām iti sabhāgāḥ. tadbhāvaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:3099: sabhāgatā. samāno vā bhāgo bhajanaṃ sabhāgaḥ. sabhāga eva sabhāgatā.
T07yabhkvyu:3100: yadyogāt sabhāgo bhavati. tad dravyaṃ. sattvānāṃ sāmyaṃ sāmānyaṃ sādṛśyam ity arthaḥ. sattvagrahaṇam asattvanirāsārthaṃ. sattvānāṃ sattvasaṃkhyātānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ sādṛśyaṃ sabhāgatā. asattvasaṃkhyātānāṃ śāliyavādīnāṃ neṣyate. nikāyasabhāga ity asyāḥ śāstre saṃjñeti.
