T07yabhkvyu:3706: api nirvāṇādīnām avighnabhāvāvasthānāt kāraṇahetubhāvaḥ siddhaḥ. kasmāt punar asattulyānāṃ nirvāṇādīnāṃ kāraṇahetutvam [Tib. 176b] iṣyate. na punar asatāṃ śaśaviṣāṇādīnāṃ. asaddṛṣṭāṃtābhāvāt. na hy asantaṃ bhojakam adhikṛtya grāmīṇā bhavaṃti vaktāraḥ. svāminā smaḥ sukhitā iti. na vā śaśaviṣāṇena smaḥ sukhitā iti. acodyam etat. sāmānyena eva nirdeśaḥ iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3707: yaś ca pradhānaḥ kāraṇahetur yaś cāpradhānaḥ sarvam adhikṛtyoktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3709: iti. yo hi pradhāno janakaḥ. sa kāraṇahetuḥ. sa sutarām avighnabhāvenāvatiṣṭhate na kevalam itaraḥ. āhāraḥ śarīrasyotpādane 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:3710: samartha ity adhikṛtaṃ. āhārasamudayāt kāyasamudaya iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3713: yas tv evaṃ codayatīti vistaraḥ. kāraṇe sati kāryeṇa bhavitavyam iti matvā
T07yabhkvyu:3714: codayati. kasmān na sarvasyotpādo yugapad bhavati. yathā ca prāṇātipātakārakaḥ prāṇātipātabhāg bhavati. tathā sarve 'pi kasmān na tadbhājo bhavaṃtīti. (Abhidh-k-vy 191) na kārakabhāveneti. na mukhyavṛttyāsya kāraṇatvam iti darśayati. tena sarvasya tāvad yugapad utpādo na prāpnoti. pratyayasāmagryabhāvenānutpādyamānatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3715: prāṇātipātayogaś ca na bhavaty akārakatvāt. yas tu kārakaḥ. sa prāṇātipātabhāg eva bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:3716: manovijñānam utpadyate kuśalākuśalam iti. kuśalaṃ manovijñanam iti
T07yabhkvyu:3718: manovijñānam utpadyate. tataś cakṣurvijñānam iti. evaṃ paraṃparayā tasyāpi
T07yabhkvyu:3719: nirvāṇasya pratyayībhāvād asti sāmarthyaṃ. kva. cakṣurvijñāna ity adhikṛtaṃ. evam anyasyāpi pratipattavyam iti. nārakādīnām apy ārūpyaskaṃdhotpattau sāmarthyaṃ. katham. amī bata nārakapretādayaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:3720: paramaduḥkhitā iti nārakādyālaṃbanaṃ manovijñānaṃ kuśalam utpadyate. yataḥ krameṇa śīle vyavasthitasya bhāvanāyāṃ prayogāt ārūpyasamāpattir upapattiś copayadyata. iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3722: iti. hetur iti vartate. sahabhūr hetus te dharmā bhavaṃti. ye dharmā mithaḥphalā ye parasparaphalā ity arthaḥ. sahabhūhetuḥ sahabhuva iti
T07yabhkvyu:3723: noktaṃ. kasmāt. saṃti hi dharmāḥ kecit sahabhuvo na tu sahabhūhetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3724: tadyathā nīlādyupādāyarūpaṃ bhūtaiḥ sahabhūr bhavati. na cānyonyaṃ sahabhūhetuḥ. ato mithaḥphalā
T07yabhkvyu:3725: ity arthaparigrahaḥ. idaṃ ca sāvaśeṣaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ. ato vakṣyati. vināpi cānyonyaphalatvena dharmo 'nulakṣaṇānāṃ sababhūhetuḥ. na tāni tasyety
T07yabhkvyu:3729: iti. tadyathārthe vatipratyayaḥ. evaṃ ca kṛtvā sarvam eva saṃskṛtaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3730: sahabhūhetur yathāyogam iti. [Tib. 177b] yasmāt saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni lakṣyasya sahabhūhetuḥ. so 'pi teṣām. ato yathāyogaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ sahabhūhetuḥ saṃskṛtasya lakṣaṇavattvāt. lakṣyalakṣayoś ca sahabhūhetutvāt. na tu sarvaṃ sarvasya. anyalakṣaṇair asahabhūhetutvād iti
T07yabhkvyu:3732: (II.52a-c) teṣāṃ ca ye jātyādayaś cittasya ceti. teṣāṃ ca cittasaṃprayuktānāṃ cetanādīnāṃ dhyānasaṃvarasyānāsravasaṃvarasya ye jātyādayaś catvāro dharmāś cittānuparivartina ucyante.
T07yabhkvyu:3735: iti. kālena ca phalādibhiś ca śubhatādibhiś ceti
T07yabhkvyu:3737: kālatas tāvad iti vistaraḥ. cittena sahaite ekotpādā ekasthitaya ekanirodhāś ca. tadbhāvaḥ. tayaikotpādasthitinirodhatayeti. ekam adhvānaṃ patitā ekādhvapatitāḥ. tadbhāvaḥ. tenaikādhvapatitatvena caturtheneti.
T07yabhkvyu:3738: kālataś cittam anuparivartante. ekaphalatayaikavipākatayaikaniṣyaṃdatayā ca cittam anuparivartante. phalam iha puruṣakāraphalaṃ visaṃyogaphalaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:3739: vipākaphalaniṣyaṃdayoḥ pṛthaggṛhītatvāt. adhipatiphalaṃ tu sarvasādhāraṇatvāt. na gaṇyate. ayaṃ caikaśabdaḥ saṃkhyāne sādhāraṇe vā ekaphalatayetyādi [Tib. 178a]. pūrvakas tv ekaśabdaḥ sahārthe cittena sahotpādasthitinirodhatayety arthaḥ. na hy atra saṃkhyānārthaḥ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:3740: na hi yaś cittasyotpādaḥ. sa eva cittānuparivartināṃ. yo vā teṣāṃ. sa
T07yabhkvyu:3741: cittasyeti. evaṃ daśabhiḥ kāraṇair iti. kālataś caturbhir ekotpādatayaikasthititayaikanirodhatayaikādhvapatitatvena ceti. nanu caikotpādasthitinirodhatayeti etenaiva ekādhvapatitam uktaṃ. na sarvam uktaṃ. anutpattikadharmiṇi hi citte te cittānuparivartina ekādhvapatitā
T07yabhkvyu:3742: bhavaṃti. naikotpādanirodhā iti. tasmād ekādhvapatitatvaṃ caturthaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3744: kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtatayā ceti punas tribhir iti daśabhiḥ. paryāyavṛttiṃ jātiṃ vā praty evam uktaṃ daśabhir iti. na hy ekatra citte daśa kāraṇāni
T07yabhkvyu:3745: bhavaṃti. na hi kuśale cetasi akuśalāvyākṛte kāraṇe bhavataḥ. na cākuśalāvyākṛte citte anutpattidharmiṇi. avyākṛte citte anutpattidharmiṇi
T07yabhkvyu:3747: utpattidharmiṇi tv ebhir eva caturbhir ekotpādasthitinirodhatābhiś ceti
T07yabhkvyu:3748: saptabhiḥ. anāsrave 'py evaṃ. avyākṛtatāṃ tu kevalam apanīya kuśalatā [Tib. 178b] prakṣeptavyā. akuśale tu kuśalasāsrave cānutpattikadharmiṇi akuśalatayā kuśalatayā ca yathāvastu ekādhvapatitatvena
T07yabhkvyu:3749: ekaphalavipākaniṣyandatābhis ceti paṃcabhiḥ. utpattidharmiṇi tu tasminn
T07yabhkvyu:3750: ebhir eva paṃcabhir ekotpādasthitinirodhatābhiś cety aṣṭābhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3751: sarvālpaṃ cittam iti. sarvebhyo yad alpaparivāraṃ cittaṃ. tat sarvālpam ity ucyate. tat punaḥ katamat. dvitīyadhyānāt prabhṛti ūrdhvam
T07yabhkvyu:3752: anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ cittaṃ. tatra vitarkavicārau na staḥ. na cāpi kuśalādimahābhūmikāḥ. kevalamahābhūmikā eva daśa bhavanti. tallakṣaṇānām
T07yabhkvyu:3754: svānulakṣaṇānāṃ tu bhavati (Abhidh-k-vy 193) saṃnikṛṣṭatvāt. ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:3755: aṣṭānāṃ ca svalakṣaṇānulakṣaṇānām iti. svāny anulakṣaṇāni sthāpayitveti.
T07yabhkvyu:3756: lakṣaṇeṣu anulakṣaṇānāṃ vyāpāraḥ. na viśiṣte ca citte. nyūnāni tāni.
T07yabhkvyu:3757: rājāyate hi cittaṃ lakṣaṇānulakṣaṇānām. atas cittam anulakṣaṇānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3758: sahabhūhetuḥ. na tu tāni cittasya. lakṣaṇānāṃ tu citte 'sti vyāpāra iti tāni cittasya sahabhūhetur
T07yabhkvyu:3759: caturdaśety apara iti. yathānulakṣaṇānāṃ nāsti dharme vyāpāraḥ. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:3760: dharmasya lakṣaṇeṣu. ato na teṣāṃ hetubhāvo dharma iṣyate. tathā saṃprayukteṣv eva tallakṣaṇānāṃ vyāpāraḥ. [Tib. 179a] na citta iti na tāni cittasya sahabhūhetuḥ. cittaṃ tu teṣāṃ rājakalpam iti sahabhūhetur
T07yabhkvyu:3761: bhavatīty apareṣām abhiprāyaḥ. prakaraṇagrantho hy evaṃ virudhyeta daśānāṃ mahābhūmikānāṃ yāni catvāriṃśal lakṣaṇāni. tāni yadi cittasya sahabhūhetur
T07yabhkvyu:3762: neṣyeran. yasmāt prakaraṇeṣūktaṃ. catvāry āryasatyāni duḥkhasatyaṃ yāvan
T07yabhkvyu:3763: mārgasatyaṃ. eṣāṃ kati satkāyadṛṣṭihetukāni na satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ. kati satkāyadṛṣṭer hetur na saktkāyadṛṣṭihetukāni. kati satkāyadṛṣṭihetukāni satkāyadṛṣṭeś ca hetuḥ. kati naiva satkāyadṛṣṭihetukāni na satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ iti praśne kṛte visarjanaṃ karoti. dve naiva satkāyadṛṣṭihetuke na satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ. nirodhasatyaṃ mārgasatyaṃ ca. dvayor bhedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3764: duḥkhasamudayasatyayor vibhaṃgaḥ. katham iti. duḥkhasatyaṃ syāt satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ. syāt satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭeś ca hetuḥ. syān naiva satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyaḍṛṣṭer hetur iti trikoṭikaṃ. dvitīyā koṭir nāsti. tatra satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na
T07yabhkvyu:3767: atītapratyutpannān samudayadarśanaprahātavyān sarvatragān anuśayān tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvā. anāgataṃ ca satkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvā. satkāyadṛṣṭes tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitim anityatāṃ ca
T07yabhkvyu:3768: sthāpayitvā yat tad anyat kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ. satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭeś ca hetur yad etat sthāpitam iti. naiva satkāyahetukaṃ na
T07yabhkvyu:3769: satkāyadṛṣṭer hetur akliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ. yathā duḥkhasatyaṃ evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3770: samudayasatyam iti prakaraṇagranthaḥ. tasyārthaṃ vivṛṇmahe. ye
T07yabhkvyu:3772: te sthāpitāḥ. tair daśabhir anuśayaiḥ saṃprayuktaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ vedanādikaṃ sthāpitaṃ. kim atrāsthāpitaṃ. eta evānāgatā daśānuśayās
T07yabhkvyu:3773: tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca vedanādikaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ varjayitvānāgatasatkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ. tad dhi (Abhidh-k-vy 194) sthāpayiṣyate. anāgataṃ ca satkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3774: duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitveti vacanāt. tatprāptijātyādayaś cāsthāpitā varjayitvā satkāyadṛṣṭes tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ [Tib. 180a] ca dharmāṇāṃ jātyādīn. te hi sthāpayiṣyante. satkāyadṛṣṭes tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca
T07yabhkvyu:3775: dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitim anityatāṃ ca sthāpayitveti vacanāt. tad evaṃ tāvad anāgato 'nuśayas tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca sthāpitād anyat. tad anyat kliṣṭam ity ucyate satkāyadṛṣṭihetukam. satkāyadṛṣṭihetur asyeti satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ. sabhāgahetunā sarvatragahetunā cātītapratyutpannasatkāyadṛṣṭihetukatvāt. na tu satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ na hy
T07yabhkvyu:3776: anāgato dharmaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ sarvatragahetur vā vyavasthāpyate. na ca sahabhūhetuḥ saṃprayuktakahetur vātra saṃbhavati. na hi satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:3777: satkāyadṛṣṭyā saha bhavati saṃprayujyate vā. ekasmiṃ kalāpe dvitīyasatkāyadṛṣṭyabhāvāt. na cāpy antagrāhadṛṣṭyādibhiḥ saha bhavati saṃprayujyate vā. pṛthakkalāpatvāt. viprayuktās teṣām atītapratyutpannānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3778: duḥkhadarśanaheyānāṃ prāptayo jātyādayaś cāsthāpitāḥ. te sthāpitakād anye
T07yabhkvyu:3779: kliṣṭāś ca. te 'pi sarvatragahetunā pūrvotpannasatkāyadṛṣṭihetukā. na tu te satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ. kasmāt. prāptayas tāvad vṛkṣaprapāṭikāvat
T07yabhkvyu:3780: svasarvatragebhyo bahir avasthitatvān na sarvatragā vyavasthāpyante.
T07yabhkvyu:3783: prāptivarjyāḥ sahabhuvo ye 'py ebhis te 'pi sarvagā iti siddhāntavacanāt. na tu te cittacaittavat paścimānāṃ cittacaittānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3785: cittacaittāntareṣu sarvatragapuruṣakārābhāvāt. sarvatragavyavasthānaṃ tu teṣāṃ jātyādīnāṃ svasaṃtānasarvatragahetutvāt. tasmān na te satkāyadṛṣṭer hetur iti śāstrārtho lakṣyate. sabhāgahetus tarhi kasmān na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:3786: sabhāgahetuvyavasthā hi puruṣakārāpekṣayāpi. yasya hi dharmasya janane yaḥ puruṣakāravān dharmaḥ. sa tasya sabhāgahetuḥ. idam eva ca jñāpakaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ sabhāgahetuvyavastheti. vibhāṣāyām apy evam uktaṃ. cakṣuś ca cakṣuṣaḥ sabhāgahetur devadattacakṣuṣo devadattacakṣuḥ sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3787: dakṣiṇaṃ dakṣiṇasya vāmaṃ vāmasya yāvac cakṣurdravyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3788: cakṣurdravyāntarasya. bāhyeṣv api yavo yavasya śāliḥ śāler iti. yadi hi sarvacakṣuḥ sarvasya cakṣuṣaḥ sabhāgahetur iṣyetāvyākṛtatvaṃ tulyam iti kṛtvā naivaṃ viśeṣaṇam ucyeta. tasmān na te satkāyadṛṣṭeḥ sabhāgahetur ity
T07yabhkvyu:3789: avagantavyaṃ. apare tv āhuḥ. sāvaśeṣam etad bhāṣyaṃ. tasmāt [Tib. 181a]
T07yabhkvyu:3791: sthāpitā veditavyā. ye hi dharmasya tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca jātyādayaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:3792: sahabhūhetur bhavanti. taiḥ sārdhaṃ te dharmāḥ pūrvotpannāḥ sarvatragahetuḥ sabhāgahetur vā bhavanto bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:3793: prāptivarjyāḥ sahabhuvo ye 'py ebhis ta 'pi sarvagā iti siddhāntāt. ata evoktaṃ. satkāyasaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitim anityatāṃ ca sthāpayitveti. tasmāj jātyādayo 'pi kecit
T07yabhkvyu:3794: sthāpitāḥ. ato 'nyad asthāpitam ity avagantavyaṃ. yuktir iha draṣṭavyā.
T07yabhkvyu:3795: yato yuktiḥ. tato 'vagantavyaṃ. samudayadarśanaprahātavyā api ye
T07yabhkvyu:3796: sarvatragā atītapratyutpannās tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca duḥkhasatyaṃ vedanādikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3797: tat sthāpitaṃ. kim anyat samudayadarśanaprahātavyam asthāpitaṃ. ye sarvatragā anāgatās tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca duḥkhasatyaṃ vedanādikaṃ. tad
T07yabhkvyu:3798: asthāpitaṃ. ye 'py asarvatragā rāgādayas traiyadhvikā api. yāś ca teṣāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3799: sarveṣāṃ prāptayaḥ. na te sthāpitāḥ. jātyādayas tv ekasmiṃ pakṣe naiva sthāpitāḥ. pakṣāntare tu kecit sthāpitāḥ. kecin na sthāpitāḥ. tad etat sarvam asthāpitaṃ samudayadarśanaprahātavyaṃ [Tib. 181b] sarvatragahetunā satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ bhavati. pūrvotpannasatkāyadṛṣṭihetukatvāt. na tu satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ. sarvatragāṇāṃ tatsahabhuvāṃ cānāgatatvenāsarvatragahetutvāt. asarvatragāṇāṃ ca rāgādīnāṃ tatsahabhuvāṃ ca vedanādīnāṃ jātyādīnāṃ caikasmin pakṣe sarvaprāptīnāṃ cāsarvatragatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3800: nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyā bhāvanāprahātavyāś ca kliṣṭā anuśayatatsaṃprayuktatatsamutthajātyādisvabhāvā asthāpitāḥ. te sarvatragahetunā satkāyadṛṣṭihetukāḥ. na tu te satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3801: sarvatragahetutvāsaṃbhavād itarahetvayogāc ca. satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭeś ca hetur yad etat sthāpitam iti. ye 'tītapratyutpannā
T07yabhkvyu:3802: duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyā daśānuśayās tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca duḥkhasatyaṃ yac ca pakṣāntare jātyādikaṃ. tat sabhāgahetunā sarvatragahetunā ca
T07yabhkvyu:3804: tatsaṃprayuktajātyādayaś ca. te sahabhūhetunā pūrvoktābhyāṃ ca hetubhyāṃ taddhetukāḥ. ye punaḥ satkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktāḥ. te saṃprayuktahetunā ca
T07yabhkvyu:3805: pūrvoktaiś ca hetubhis taddhetukāḥ. satkāyadṛṣṭeś ca tathaiva hetuḥ. ye
T07yabhkvyu:3807: tatsahabhuvaś ca vedanādayo jātyādayaś ca pakṣāntare. te sarvatragahetunaiva satkāyadṛṣṭihetukāḥ. satkāyadṛṣṭeś ca hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3808: pūrvotpannā hi satkāyadṛṣṭis teṣāṃ hetuḥ. te ca pūrvotpannāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭer
T07yabhkvyu:3809: iti. asaṃkliṣṭaṃ tu duḥkhasatyaṃ kuśalam anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca na satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na ca satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ. paṃcavidhahetutvasambhavāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3810: janako (Abhidh-k-vy 196) hy atra hetur adhikriyate. na kāraṇahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3812: nivṛtāvyākṛtatvenāvipākatvāt. tatra yad etad uktaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭes tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitim anityatāṃ ca sthāpayitveti tad virudhyeta. yadi hi satkāyadṛṣtisaṃprayuktadharmajātyādayo na sahabhūhetur bhaveyuḥ. na te sthāpyeran. ye hi sthāpitāḥ. te satkāyadṛṣṭihetukāḥ. satkāyadṛṣṭeś ca hetur iti. ye tarhi tatsaṃprayuktānām ity etan na paṭhanti. teṣāṃ kathaṃ prakaraṇagrantho virudhyetety adhyāhāryaṃ. te hi satkāyadṛṣṭer jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitim anityatāṃ ca sthāpayitvety evaṃ paṭhanti. tatsaṃprayukteṣv eva tallakṣaṇāni vyāpriyante. na satkāyadṛṣṭau. [Tib. 182b] atas tāni tasyā na sahabhūhetur iti teṣām evaṃvādinām abhiprāyaḥ. tair apy etat paṭhitavyam
T07yabhkvyu:3813: iti. evam apāṭhe doṣa ity atas tair etat paraṃ paṭhitavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3814: tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ceti. tatsaṃprayuktā hi satkāyadṛṣṭer ātmakalpā
T07yabhkvyu:3815: ekālambanakṛtyādyarthatvāt. tasmād yathā teṣu tatsaṃprayukteṣv etāni lakṣaṇāni sahabhūhetuḥ. tathā satkāyadṛṣṭāv apīti vaibhāṣikābhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3816: arthato vaivaṃ boddhavyam iti. satkāyadṛṣṭigrahaṇena satkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktānām api grahaṇam adhikārānuvṛtter vā tair evaṃ boddhavyaṃ. tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ceti. kāśmīrā na bahirdeśakā iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:3817: sahabhv api tad iti. caittādi. cittasya hi caittās tāni ca lakṣaṇāni
T07yabhkvyu:3818: sahabhūhetuḥ sahabhūni ca tāni bhavanti. dharmasyānulakṣaṇānīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3819: dharmasya jātijātyādīni sahabhūni. na sahabhūhetunā hetur viprakṛṣṭatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3820: jātyādiṣu hi teṣāṃ vyāpāro na dharme. tāni cānyonyaṃ tāni cānulakṣaṇāni anyonyaṃ sahabhūni jātyādiṣu vyāpārāt. na sahabhūhetunā hetuḥ. dharmas tu teṣāṃ sahabhūhetur bhavati. prādhānyāt. sa hi rājeva yātrāyāṃ sabhṛtyaḥ tad bhṛtyavargaṃ sarvaṃ svakalāpam ākarṣann iva pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:3821: cittānuparivartyanulakṣanāni ceti. cittānuparivartināṃ caittadhyānānāsravasaṃvarāṇām [Tib. 183a] teṣāṃ ca lakṣaṇānām anulakṣaṇāni ca tathaiva cittasya sahabhūni. na tu sahabhūhetunā hetuḥ. evaśabdo
T07yabhkvyu:3823: na tu sahabhūhetunā hetuḥ. sapratighaṃ copādāyarūpam anyonyam
T07yabhkvyu:3825: na tu sahabhūhetunā hetuḥ. sapratighagrahaṇam apratighanirāsārthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3826: apratighaṃ hi dhyānānāsravaṃ saṃvararūpaṃ saptavidhavijñaptisvabhāvaṃ parasparaṃ sahabhūḥ. sahabhūhetunā ca hetur iti. sarvaṃ ca bhūtair iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3827: sapratighaṃ cāpratighaṃ copādāyarūpaṃ yathāsvabhūtaiḥ sahabhūḥ. na tu sahabhūhetunā hetuḥ. prāptayaś ca sahajāḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 197) prāptimato dharmasya sahotpāde 'pi na sahabhūhetuḥ pūrvaṃpaścātkālajāt prāptīnāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3828: asahabhūtvād eva sahabhūhetutvāprasaṃga iti. sahaja iti viśeṣaṇaṃ. kasmād ity āha. anekaphalavipākaniṣyandatvād iti. yasmāt tāsāṃ prāptimatā saha naikaṃ phalaṃ puruṣakāraphalaṃ vṛkṣaprapāṭikāvat pṛthaksrotatvāt. nāpy ekaṃ vipākaphalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3829: nākṣepike samāpattī acitte prāptayo na ca iti vacanāt. [Tib. 183b] na cāpy ekaniṣyandaphalaṃ prāptīnāṃ hi prātaya
T07yabhkvyu:3830: eva niṣyandaphalaṃ pṛthaksaṃtānatvāt. cittānuparivartinām evaikaṃ phalaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3831: vipākaniṣyandaphalaṃ ceṣyate. na prāptīnāṃ. na tāś cittaiḥ sahacariṣṇavaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:3833: sarvam apy etat syād iti. yat tāvat sahabhūhetunā hetur iti vistareṇa yad
T07yabhkvyu:3834: uktaṃ. bījādīnām iti. ādiśabdenāṃkuranālakāṇḍādīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ. eṣa nyāyo na
T07yabhkvyu:3835: dṛṣṭa iti. sahotpannayor hetuphalabhāvalakṣaṇo nyāyo na dṛṣṭaḥ. pūrvaṃ hi bījaṃ paścād aṃkuraḥ. pūrvam abhighātaḥ paścāc chabda iti. tadyathā pradīpaprabhayor aṃkurachāyayoś ca. kiṃ. hetuphalabhāva iti vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:3836: pradīpaḥ saprabha evotpadyate. na niṣprabhaḥ. aṃkurasyātape utpadyamānasyaiva chāyā bhavati. atha ca pradīpaḥ prabhāyāḥ sahotpannāyā hetur bhavati chāyāyāś cāṃkuraḥ. tadvat. saṃpradhāryaṃ tāvad iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3837: asiddho dṛṣṭānta iti parasyābhiprāyaḥ. yasmāt pūrvotpannaiva vartisnehādikā sāmagrī saprabhasya pradīpasyotpattau hetuḥ. pradīpasya prabhāyāś ca saiva sāmagrī hetuḥ. na tu pradīpaḥ prabhāyā hetur iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:3838: evaṃ sacchāyasyāṃkurasyotpattau pūrvotpannaiva sāmagrī bījātapādikā vācyā.
T07yabhkvyu:3839: niyamata iti. yasya dharmasya bhāve yasya dharmasya bhāvo niyamena na yadṛcchayā. sa hetuḥ. itaro hetumān kāryadharma [Tib. 184a] ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3840: sahabhuvāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ. tadyathā bhūtānāṃ caturṇāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3841: cittacaittānuparivartināṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇānāṃ caikasya bhāve sarveṣāṃ bhāva ekasya cābhāve sarveṣām abhāva iti yukto hetuphalabhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3842: syāt tāvat sahotpannānām iti vistaraḥ. sahotpannānāṃ hetuphalabhāva iṣyate. tadyathā cakṣuḥ sahotpannam api cakṣurvijñānena tadutpattau hetur
T07yabhkvyu:3843: bhavati. parasparaṃ tu kathaṃ. na hi cakṣurvijñānaṃ tasya cakṣuṣo hetur
T07yabhkvyu:3844: bhavatīti. āha. ata eva kāraṇād bhāvābhāvayos tadvattvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3845: caittādīnāṃ bhāve cittasya bhāvād abhāve cābhāvāt te 'pi cittasya hetavo bhavantīti. evaṃ tarhīti vistaraḥ. yady ekasya bhāve sarveṣāṃ bhāvaḥ sarveṣāṃ cābhāva ekasyety ato 'nyonyaṃ hetuphalabhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3850: anyonyasahabhūhetuprasaṃga ity arthaḥ. bhūtaiś ca sārdham upādāyarūpasya
T07yabhkvyu:3851: sahabhūhetutvaprasaṃgaḥ. cittānulakṣaṇādīnāṃ ceti. ādiśabdena cittānuparivartyanulakṣaṇānāṃ ca. cittādibhir iti. atrāpy ādiśabdena cittānuparivartyanulakṣaṇānāṃ ca. cittādibhir iti. atrāpy ādiśabdena cittānuparivartibhiś cānyonyahetuprasaṃgaḥ. tenaiva cādiśabdena prāptibhiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:3852: sahajābhiḥ [Tib. 184b] prāptimatām eṣa prasaṃga iti vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3855: tridaṇḍānyonyabalāvasthānaṃ. tadvat. yathā tridanḍasya daṇḍatrayasyānyonyabalenāvasthānaṃ. evaṃ sahabhuvāṃ cittacaittādīnāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3856: hetuphalabhāvaḥ sidhyati. mīmāṃsyaṃ tāvad etad iti vistaraḥ. parīkṣyam
T07yabhkvyu:3857: etat. na siddho 'yaṃ dṛṣṭānta ity abhiprāyaḥ. sahotpannās trayo daṇḍās
T07yabhkvyu:3858: teṣāṃ balaṃ. tena sahotpannabalena kim eṣāṃ daṇḍānām avasthānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3860: pūrvabhūtabhautikasamudāyalakṣaṇasāmagrīvaśāt sahabhāvaḥ. tathaiva paścād api parasparāśritānām utpāda iti. anyad api ca tatra kiṃcid bhavati
T07yabhkvyu:3861: nānyonyabalam eveti darśayati. kiṃ tad ity āha. sūtrakaṃ daṇḍatrayaṃ niveśitaṃ. śaṃkuko vā kīlako vety arthaḥ. pṛthivī vā dhārikādhastāt. eṣām api nāmeti. eṣām api sahabhuvām anye 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:3864: (II.53, 54ab) kliṣṭāḥ kliṣṭānām iti. kliṣṭā akuśalā nivṛtāvyākṛtāś ca kliṣṭatvasāmānyena sabhāgahetutvam eṣāṃ. tenākuśalā akuśalānāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ. nivṛtāvyākṛtā [Tib. 185a] nivṛtāvyākṛtānāṃ. akuśalā
T07yabhkvyu:3865: nivṛtāvyākṛtānāṃ. nivṛtāvyākṛtāś cākuśalānāṃ sabhāgahetur iti darśitaṃ bhavati, avyākṛtā avyākṛtānām iti. anivṛtāvyākṛtā anivṛtāvyākṛtānām ity
T07yabhkvyu:3867: rūpam avyākṛtam avyākṛto rūpaskandhaḥ paṃcānāṃ skandhānāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3868: catvāras tu skandhā vedanādayo na rūpasya sabhāgahetur viśiṣṭatvāt. na hi viśiṣṭo nyūnasya sabhāgahetur iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:3869: samaviśiṣṭayor iti vacanāt. kuśalākuśalaṃ tu rūpam ābhisaṃskārikatvāt samaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ ceti catvāras tasya sabhāgahetur bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:3870: kalalaṃ kalalādīnām iti. paṃcagarbhāvasthāḥ kalalārbudapeśīghanapraśākhāvasthāḥ paṃca jātāvasthāḥ bālakumārayuvamadhyavṛddhāvasthā ity ete daśa daśānām avasthānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3872: arbudam arbudasya yāvad vārddhasya. evaṃ yāvad vārddhaṃ vārddhasyaiva.
T07yabhkvyu:3873: ekaikāpahrāsena ekaikāparihāreṇaikasmin nikāyasabhāge vaktavyaṃ. anyeṣu samānajātīyeṣu nikāyasabhāgeṣu yadā manuṣyajanmano manuṣyajanmaivotpadyate. tadā daśāpy avasthā daśānām apy avasthānāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3874: vṛddhāvasthāpi yāvad avasthāntarāṇāṃ. sā hi vṛddhāvasthā [Tib. 185b]
T07yabhkvyu:3875: kṣaṇāntare tajjanmavṛddhāvasthāyāḥ. sabhāgahetuḥ. aṃtyā tu janmāntarakalalādīnāṃ daśānām apy avasthānāṃ sabhāgahetur ity
T07yabhkvyu:3876: avagantavyaṃ. bāhyeṣv api yavo yavasyeti vistaraḥ. yavo yavasya sabhāgahetur na śāleḥ. śāliḥ śāler eva na yavasyety anena tulye 'py
T07yabhkvyu:3877: avyākṛtatve svasaṃtāna eva sabhāgahetutvaṃ. nānyasaṃtāne jananaśaktyabhāvād iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:3878: atītāni mahābhūtāni anāgatānāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ hetur adhipatir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3879: hetupratyayo 'dhipatipratyayaś cety arthaḥ. ayugapadbhāvān na sahabhūhetuḥ. ata evācittacaittatvāc ca na saṃprayuktakahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3880: asarvatragatvān na sarvatragahetuḥ. avyākṛtatvān na vipākahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3881: pāriśeṣyāt sabhāgahetur evety avagamyate. yadi sadṛśāḥ sadṛśānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3882: sabhāgahetuḥ. evaṃ paścādutpanno 'pi pūrvotpannasya sabhāgahetuḥ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:3883: sahotpanno 'pi sahotpannasya. anutpanno 'py anutpannasyety ata āha. te 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:3886: agre jātā atītāḥ pratyutpannā vā sabhāgahetuḥ. anāgatā na sabhāgahetur ity arthād uktaṃ bhavati. evam atītāny atītapratyutpannānām iti. pūrvotpannāny
T07yabhkvyu:3888: atītapratyutpannāny anāgatānāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ. na tu anāgatāny anāgatānām ity uktam. ato gamyate nāsty anāgataḥ sabhāgahetur iti. na kadācid iti. na kadācin na hetur ity adhikṛtaṃ. hetur evety arthaḥ. tasmād asty anāgataḥ
T07yabhkvyu:3889: sabhāgahetur ity abhiprāyaḥ. sahabhv iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3891: tasmāt sahabhūsaṃprayuktakavipāka hetvabhisaṃdhivacanād adoṣo na kadācin na hetur iti vacane. bāhuliko hy eṣa nirdeśa iṣyate. caramām avasthām abhisaṃdhāyeti. antyām anāgatāvasthām abhipretyety arthaḥ. adhvatraye 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:3892: hetur bhavatīti tasyābhiprāyaḥ. tasyāyam aparihāra iti vistaraḥ. tasya vādino 'yam aparihāraḥ. kasmāt. yasmāt sa dharma utpadyamānāvasthāyāḥ pūrvaṃ sabhāgahetur abhūtvā paścād bhavati. na nityaṃ sabhāgahetur ity
T07yabhkvyu:3893: arthaḥ. bhavīnām anāgatāvasthānām ekā caramāvasthā sabhāgahetutve niyatībhūtā. tadanyā bahvyas tatrāniyatībhūtāḥ santi. tatra ca sāmānyenoktaṃ na hetur iti. evaṃ kṛtvāyam aparihāraḥ. ekāsyām (Abhidh-k-vy
T07yabhkvyu:3894: 200) api hy avasthāyāṃ [Tib. 186b] sa na sabhāgahetur iti śakyam evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:3895: vaktuṃ syāt. yo dharmo yasya dharmasya samanantara iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3896: samanantarapratyaya ity arthaḥ. śakyam anayā kalpanayeti. sa dharma utpadyamānāvasthāyāṃ samanantarapratyayatve niyatībhūto bhavati. ataḥ śakyaṃ tāṃ caramāvasthām abhisaṃdhāyety anayā kalpanayā vaktuṃ syān na kadācin na samanantara iti. kasmād evam āha. yadi sa dharmo notpanno
T07yabhkvyu:3897: bhavatīti. yadi sa dharmo 'nāgato bhavati nāsau samanantarapratyayo
T07yabhkvyu:3898: bhavatīty arthaḥ. caramāvasthāvādy āha. dvimukhasaṃdarśanārtham iti vistaraḥ. yathā tatra yo dharmo yasya dharmasya hetuḥ. kadācit sa dharmas
T07yabhkvyu:3899: tasya dharmasya na hetuḥ. āha. na kadācid iti. tathehāpi kartavyaṃ. yo dharmo yasya dharmasya samanantaraḥ. kadācit sa dharmas tasya dharmasya na
T07yabhkvyu:3900: samanantara iti. āha. na kadācid iti kartavyaṃ. (yadi sa dharmo notpanno
T07yabhkvyu:3901: bhavatīti) yathā ceha tathā tatreti. kathaṃ. yo dharmo yasya dharmasya
T07yabhkvyu:3902: samanantaraḥ. kadācit sa dharmas tasya dharmasya na samanantaraḥ. āha.
T07yabhkvyu:3903: yadi sa dharmo notpanno bhavatīti. evaṃ tatra kartavyaṃ. kathaṃ. yo dharmo yasya dharmasya hetuḥ. kadācit sa dharmas tasya dharmasya na hetuḥ. āha.
T07yabhkvyu:3904: yadi sa dharmo notpanno bhavatīti. yadi sa dharmo 'nāgato bhavati nāsau hetupratyayo bhavatīty
T07yabhkvyu:3905: atrācārya āha. evaṃ sati ko guṇa iti vistaraḥ. iti dvimukhasaṃdarśanena kaścid guṇo labhyate. [Tib. 187a] naiva hy utpadyamānāvasthāyāṃ sa dharmo hetuḥ samanantaro vā mukhyavṛttyā bhavatīty akauśalam evātra śāstrakārasyaivaṃ saṃbhāvyate. kvacit sāvakāśaṃ bruvataḥ. kvacin
T07yabhkvyu:3906: niravakāśaṃ. sāvakāśaṃ tāvad yad idam uktaṃ. yo dharmo yasya dharmasya
T07yabhkvyu:3907: hetuḥ. kadācit sa dharmas tasya dharmasya na hetuḥ. āha. na kadācid iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3908: kathaṃ na kadācin na hetur ity evam uktvā punar varṇayati. caramāvasthāyāṃ sabhāgahetur iti. niravakāśaṃ yadi sa dharmo notpanno bhavati na
T07yabhkvyu:3909: samanantaraḥ. utpannas tu samanantara iti. ayam atrābhiprāyārtha aikāntikam arthaṃ vyavasthāpya punar anyathākarotīti. tasmāt pūrvaka evaiṣa parihāraḥ sādhur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3911: yat tarhīdam uktam iti vistaraḥ. kuta etad āyātaṃ. anāgato naiva sabhāgahetur ity uktaṃ. tad yadi anāgato naiva sabhāgahetuḥ kasmād anāgatā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ sthāpitā. yad dhi sthāpitaṃ. tat satkāyadṛṣṭihetuṃ satkāyadṛṣṭeś ca hetur iti vyākhyātaṃ. tatra katham anāgatā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ. na tāvat sahabhūhetuḥ saṃprayuktakahetur vā saṃbhavaty asahabhūtvāt. na vipākahetur avyākṛtatvāt. na kāraṇahetuḥ sādhāraṇatvenāgaṇyamānatvāt. [Tib. 187b] (Abhidh-k-vy 201) pāriśeṣyāt sabhāgahetuḥ sarvatragahetur vā bhavatīti bhavet. iha ca sabhāgahetur eva
T07yabhkvyu:3912: sarvatragahetuḥ. ato yady anāgatā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭer na
T07yabhkvyu:3913: sabhāgahetuḥ kasmād asau tṛtīyakoṭyarthaṃ sthāpiteti. vaibhāṣika āha.
T07yabhkvyu:3914: anāgatasatkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktakaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvety evam etad kartavyam iti. satkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktakam eva sthāpayitavyaṃ. na tu satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ. tad dhi vedanādikaṃ sahabhūhetunā saṃprayuktakahetuuā vā
T07yabhkvyu:3915: satkāyadṛṣṭihetukam satkāyadṛṣṭeś ca hetuḥ. na sabhāgahetunā. vinaṣṭako hy ayam anāgatāṃ satkāyadṛṣṭim iti pāṭhaḥ. paścātpadasthena tacchabdena saha
T07yabhkvyu:3917: padadvayaṃ paṭhitavyaṃ. anāgatasatkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktakam iti. arthato vaivaṃ boddhavyaṃ yady evaṃ na kriyate pāṭhaḥ. bhāṣyākṣepanirvṛttaḥ pāṭho na tantram ity abhiprāyaḥ. prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate sarvadharmāś catuṣke niyatā iti. hetau niyatā yasya dharmasya yo dharmo hetuḥ. sa dharmas tasya dharmasya na kadācin na hetuḥ. triṣv api kāleṣu hetur ity arthaḥ. evaṃ phale niyatā yasya dharmasya yo dharmaḥ phalaṃ puruṣakārādi
T07yabhkvyu:3918: yojyaṃ. evam āśraye niyatā yasya dharmasya [Tib. 188a] cakṣurvijñānāder yo dharma āśrayaś cakṣurādir iti yojyaṃ. evam ālambane niyatā yasya dharmasya cakṣurvijñānāder yo dharma ālambanaṃ rūpādir iti yojyaṃ. tena dharmāṇāṃ hetau niyatatvāt triṣv api kāleṣu sabhāgahetur bhavatīti codakābhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3919: sarvahetvanabhisaṃdher adoṣa iti darśayan vaibhāṣika āha. hetur atra saṃprayuktakahetuḥ sahabhūhetuś ca na sabhāgahetuḥ sarvatragahetur vā.
T07yabhkvyu:3920: anāgatāvasthāyām avyavasthāpitatvāt. na vipākahetuḥ. anāniṃjyasya karmaṇah kasyacid gatyantare 'pi vipākādānāt. phalaṃ puruśakāraphalaṃ adhipatiphalaṃ ca. tayoḥ sahabhūsaṃprayuktakahetvoḥ phalatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3921: vaibhāsikāṇām etan matam. anāgataṃ vidyamānam utpadyata iti. tasmād ayaṃ prasaṃjayati. nanu caivaṃ sati sabhāgahetur abhūtvā anāgatāvasthāyāṃ hetur bhavati vartamānāvasthāyām iti prāptaṃ prasaktam ity arthaḥ. iṣyata evāvasthāṃ prati na dravyam iti. iṣyata eva sabhāgahetoḥ
T07yabhkvyu:3922: sabhāgahetutvāvasthā pūrvaṃ nāsīd idānīṃ bhavatīti. na tu dravyasvalakṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ nāsīd idānīṃ bhavatīti. avasthāphalaṃ hi sāmagryaṃ na dravyaphalam iti. hetupratyayasāmagryā vartamānāvasthāphalaṃ na dravyaṃ. yasmād anāgato 'pi sa dharmo [Tib. 188b] dravyato 'sti. na punaḥ pratyutpanna eveti. codaka āha. kiṃ punaḥ syād iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3923: vaibhāṣika āha. śāstre tasya grahaṇaṃ syād iti. tasyānāgatasya
T07yabhkvyu:3924: sabhāgahetoḥ. na cāsti grahaṇaṃ. na hi tatra śāstre uktaṃ. anāgatāni kuśalamūlāni anāgatānāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 202) sabhāgahetur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3925: codaka āha. ya eva hīti vistaraḥ. codakasyāyam abhiprāyaḥ. yady apy anāgato 'sti sabhāgahetur na tv asau phaladānagrahaṇakriyāyāṃ samarthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3926: ya eva hi phaladānagrahaṇakriyāsamarthaḥ phalākṣepakriyāsamarthaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:3927: tasyaiva sabhāgahetoḥ atītasya vartamānasya ca grahaṇāt. adoṣo 'nāgatasya
T07yabhkvyu:3928: sabhāgahetor agrahaṇaṃ. tasya phaladānagrahaṇakriyāyām asāmarthyāt. tasmād asty anāgataḥ sabhāgahetuḥ. atha ca śāstre nokta iti. vaibhāṣika āha.
T07yabhkvyu:3929: naitad astīti vistaraḥ. naitad yujyate. niṣyandaphalena hi saphalaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:3932: niṣyando hetusadṛśa iti vacanāt. tac cānāgatasyāyuktaṃ. tan niṣyandaphalam ayuktaṃ. kasmāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3933: pūrvapaścimatābhāvāt. anāgatāvasthāyām idaṃ pūrvam idaṃ paścimam iti na paricchidyate viprakīrṇatvāt. na cāsati pūrvāparabhāve sadṛśaḥ sadṛśasya niṣyando yujyate. atha matam. utpannam atītaṃ vartamānaṃ vā anāgatasya niṣyanda iti. ata āha. na cotpannam anāgatasya niṣyando yujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:3934: yathātītaṃ [Tib. 189a] vartamānasya niṣyando na bhavati. tathānāgatasyāpy utpanno na niṣyando bhavitum arhati. kasmād ity āha. mā bhūd dhetoḥ pūrvaṃ phalam iti doṣāṭ. vipākaphalasya pūrvaṃ saha cāyogād iti. mā bhūd dhetoḥ
T07yabhkvyu:3935: pūrvaṃ phalam iti pūrvam ayogaḥ. saha cāyogo 'nāgatāvasthāyāṃ. na hi pratyutpannāvasthāyāṃ sahabhūhetor iva vipākahetoḥ sahotpannaṃ phalam
T07yabhkvyu:3936: upalabhyate. tasmāt. anāgate cādhvani pūrvapaścimatābhāvāt. viprakīrṇatvād anāgatasyādhvano na pūrvaṃ vipākahetuḥ paścād vipākaphalaṃ yujyate. tasmāc ca sabhāgahetuvad vipākahetur apy anāgato na prāpnoti. vaibhāṣika āha.
T07yabhkvyu:3937: naitad asti yad uktaṃ vipākahetur apy evam iti. na cānyonyaniṣyandatā yuktimatīti. yasya yaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ sadṛśo dharmaḥ. tasya sa eva dharmas tadānīṃ eva kathaṃ niṣyando yokṣyate. na hi putraḥ svasyaiva pitus tadānīm
T07yabhkvyu:3938: eva pitā bhavatīti. na tv evaṃ vipākahetuḥ. kim. anyonyahetuphalatā na paurvāparyeṇa vinā saṃprasajyate prāpnoti. kasmāt bhinnalakṣaṇatvād dhetuphalayoḥ. hetor anyal lakṣaṇaṃ svabhāva ity arthaḥ. akuśalatā kuśalasāsravatā vā tasya lakṣaṇaṃ. phalasya [Tib. 189b] cānyal lakṣaṇam anivṛtavyākṛtatvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:3939: vipākahetur aśubhāḥ kuśalāś caiva sāsravāḥ vipāko 'vyākṛto dharma
T07yabhkvyu:3941: iti vacanāt. tasmād iti vistaraḥ. avasthāvyavasthita eva sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3942: avasthāyāṃ vyavasthitaḥ. atītāvasthaḥ pratyutpannāvasthaś ca sabhāgahetur
T07yabhkvyu:3943: nānāgatāvasthaḥ. lakṣaṇavyavasthitas tu vipākahetuḥ. lakṣaṇena vyavasthitas triṣv api kāleṣu yathoktalakṣaṇa ity anāgato 'pi vipākahetur na vāryate na pratiṣidhyate. idam iha vicāryate. kim anāgate 'dhvani
T07yabhkvyu:3944: sadṛśā dharmā viprakīrṇā iti na śakyate paricchetuṃ ayaṃ hetur idam idam asya niṣyandaphalam iti. ato nānāgataḥ sabhāgahetur vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:3945: āhosvit yo dharmo yasya dharmasya sabhāgahetur bhavet. sa dharmas tasya
T07yabhkvyu:3946: hetupratyayavaśān niṣyandaphalaṃ bhaved iti. ato 'nāgatas sabhāgahetur na vyavasthāpyate. naitad vyākhyānakārair vicāritaṃ. mama tu pūrvaka evāyaṃ pakṣaḥ pratibhātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:3947: kim eṣa niyama iti. kiṃ svabhūmika evety avadhāryate. nānyathāpy astīty abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3949: iti. tuśabdo viśeṣaṇe. mārga iti mārgasatyaṃ vivakṣitaṃ. sāsravān mārgasatyaṃ viśiṣyate. sāsravo hi dharmaḥ svabhūmika eva sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3950: nānyabhūmikaḥ mārgas tv anyabhūmiko 'pi sabhāgahetuḥ. iha bhūmigrahaṇe sāravānāsravagrahaṇaṃ. dhātugrahaṇe tu sāsravasyaivety [Tib. 190a] ata
T07yabhkvyu:3951: āha. yat sāsravāṇāṃ mārgasya ca tulye bhūmibhede mārga eva navabhūmiko
T07yabhkvyu:3952: 'nyonyaṃ sabhāgahetur na sāsrava iti. kuta ity āha. āgantuko hy asau tāsu bhūmiṣu na taddhātupatitaḥ. tadbhūmikābhis tṛṣṇābhir asvīkṛtatvād iti. na hi kāmarūpārūpya(navabhūmisaṃniśrayādhigamyatvāt navabhūmiko na tadbhūmisaṃgṛhītatvāt) caryas tṛṣṇāḥ sāsravān ivānāsravān dharmān svīkurvanti. yadā tarhi nirvāṇaṃ mārgaṃ vābhilaṣati kuśalo 'sau
T07yabhkvyu:3953: dharmacchandaḥ. na rāgaḥ. tasya varjyatvād iti vacanāt. samānajātīyasyety
T07yabhkvyu:3954: anāsravajātīyasya. evaṃ tarhi sarvaḥ sarvasya sabhāgahetuḥ prāpnoti. ata
T07yabhkvyu:3959: grahaṇaṃ tarhi kim arthaṃ. ūrdhvabhūmikādharabhūmikayor anyonyam ity evam
T07yabhkvyu:3961: bhavati. adharabhūmiko 'py ūrdhvabhūmikayor iti. tadyatheti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3962: duḥkhe dharmajñānakśāntis tasyā evānāgatāyāḥ sameti kṛtvā sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3963: viśiṣṭasya ca duḥkhe dharmajñānasya duḥkhe 'nbvayajñānakṣānter yāvad anutpādajñānasya (Abhidh-k-vy 204). na tu nyūnasya. na hi duḥkhe
T07yabhkvyu:3964: dharmajñānam anāgatāyāḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteḥ sabhāgahetur bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:3965: darśanabhāvanāśaikṣamārgās tridvyekeṣām iti. darśanamārgo darśanamārgāntarasya bhāvanāmārgasyāśaikṣamārgasya ca sabhāgahetur iti
T07yabhkvyu:3968: na darśanamārgabhāvanāmārgayor ity ekasya sabhāgahetuḥ. tatrāpīti. tatra darśanamārgādiṣu mṛdvindriyamārgo darśanamārgasvabhāvo mṛdutīkṣṇendriyamārgasya tatsvabhāvasyaiva. tikṣṇendriyamārgas
T07yabhkvyu:3969: tīkṣṇdriyamārgasyaiva. na mṛdvindriyamārgasya nyūnatvāt. evaṃ bhāvanāmārgo 'śaikṣamārgaś ca vaktavyaḥ. tad darśayann āha. tadyatheti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3970: ekasyāpi mṛdvindriyasya pudgalasya ṣaṇmārgāḥ santi. prakṛtitīkṣṇendriyasya
T07yabhkvyu:3972: sabhāgahetuḥ. dharmānusārimārgasya cātmīyasyānāgatāvasthasya śraddhādhimuktadṛṣṭiprāptasamayavimuktāsamayavimuktamārgāṇāṃ cātmīyāṇāṃ yathāyogam utpattyanutpattidharmāṇāṃ ceti ṣaṇṇāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3973: śraddhādhimuktamārgaḥ śraddhādhimuktamārgāntarasya dṛṣṭiprāptasamayavimuktāsamayavimuktamārgāṇāṃ cāpareṣām api trayāṇām iti caturṇāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ. samayavimuktamārgaḥ samayavimuktamārgāntarasyāsamayavimuktamārgasya ceti dvayoḥ sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3974: na tu śraddhādhimuktamārgaḥ śraddhānusāridharmānusārimārgayor hetuḥ pūrvakālīnatvāt darśanamārgasya. bhāvanāmārgasya ca viśiṣṭatvāt. evam anyatrāpi yojyaṃ. [Tib. 191a] dharmānusārimārgaḥ dharmānusārimārgāntarasya dṛṣṭiprāptāsamayavimuktamārgayoś ceti trayāṇāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3977: sabhāgahetuḥ. na tu dhamānusārimārgaḥ śraddhānusārimārgasya sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3978: dharmānusārimārgasyendriyato viśiṣtatvāt. nāpi śraddhādhimuktamārgasyendriyato viśiṣṭatvāt. nāpi samayavimuktamārgasyendriyato viśiṣṭatvāt. samayavimuktamārgas tarhīndriyato viśiṣṭasya dṛṣṭiprāptamārgasya sabhāgahetuḥ prāpnoti. na
T07yabhkvyu:3979: prāpnoti. aśaikṣamārgasaṃgṛhītatvāt. na hi pūrvakālīnaṃ phalaṃ paścātkālīno hetur iti. dṛṣṭiprāptamārgaḥ punaḥ samayavimuktamārgasya na sabhāgahetur indriyato nyūnatvāt. kathaṃ punar iti vistaraḥ. kathaṃ punar ūrdhvabkūmikasya dvitīyadhyānāt prabhṛti yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmikasya darśanamārgasya bhāvanāmārgasya vā aśaikṣamārgasya vā yathāyogam
T07yabhkvyu:3980: adhobhūmiko mārgo vijñānānamtyāyatanāt (Abhidh-k-vy 205) prabhṛti yāvad anāgamyabhūmiko yathāyogaṃ darśanamārgo bhāvanāmārgo vā aśaikṣamārgo vā samo vā viśiṣṭo vā bhavati. kathaṃcana bhavitavyaṃ. hīnatvād adharāyā bhūmeḥ. [Tib. 191b] indriyato hetūpacayataś ca. indriyatas tāvat samo
T07yabhkvyu:3981: bhavati viśiṣṭo vā. darśanamārge śraddhānusārimārgaś caturthadhyānabhūmiko
T07yabhkvyu:3986: śraddhānusāridharmānusārimārgau caturthadhyānabhūmikāv adharabhūmikayor bhāvanāśaikṣamārgayoḥ pratyekaṃ bhūmīndriyabhedabhinnayoḥ samau vā viśiṣṭau veti saṃbhavato yojyau. tathā bhāvanāmārge ākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmikasya śraddhādhimuktamārgasyādharabhūmikaḥ śraddhādhimuktamārgaḥ samaḥ. ubhayor mṛdvindriyatvāt. tasyaivādharabhūmiko dṛṣṭiprāptamārgo viśiṣṭaḥ. tīkṣṇendriyatvāt. tathā tasyaiva samayavimuktamārgo 'dharabhūmikaḥ samaḥ. ubhayor mṛdvindriyatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3987: tasyaivāsamayavimuktamārgo 'dharabhūmiko viśiṣṭaḥ. tīkṣṇendriyatvāt. evam aśaikṣamārge ākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmikasyāśaikṣamārgasyādharabhūmikaḥ samo viśiṣṭo veti yathāyogaṃ yojyam. anayā diśā sarvabhūmayo yojyāḥ kathaṃ hetūpacayataḥ. ūrdhvabhūmikasyādharabhūmiko mārgaḥ samo viśiṣṭo vā bhavatīty ata idam ucyate. tatra [Tib. 192a] darśanādimārgāṇām iti vistaraḥ. ādigrahaṇena bhāvanāśaikṣamārgopasaṃgrahaḥ. ūrdhvabhūmikāyā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteḥ adhobhūmikaṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ hetūpacayato viśiṣṭaṃ bhavati. duḥkhe dharmajñānād apy ūrdhvabhūmikād adharabhūmikā duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntir yāvad ūrdhvabhūmikān mārge dharmajñānād adharabhūmikā mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntir hetūpacayato viśiṣṭā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:3989: bhāvanāmārgo hetūpacayato viśiṣṭo bhavati. darśanamārgo hi darśanamārgahetūpacito bhāvanāmārgas tu darśanabhāvanāmārgahetūpacitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:3992: ūrdhvabhūmikasya darśanamārgasyādhobhūmiko darśanamārgo hetūpacayataḥ samānakṣaṇāpekṣayā samo bhavati. evaṃ bhāvanāmārgasya bhāvanāmārgo
T07yabhkvyu:3993: 'śaikṣamārgasyāśaikṣamārga iti. tad evaṃ kaścid indriyataḥ samo bhavati
T07yabhkvyu:3994: hetūpacayato viśiṣṭaḥ saty apy adharabhūmikatve. tadyathā prathamadhyānabhūmikāc chraddhānusārimārgād
T07yabhkvyu:3995: śraddhādhimuktasamayavimuktamārgau. kaścid dhetūpacayataḥ samo bhavati indriyato viśiṣṭaḥ. tadyathā (Abhidh-k-vy 206) caturthadhyānabhūmikāc chraddhānusāryādimārgād adhobhūmikadharmānusāryādimārgaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:3998: adharabhūmikau dṛṣṭiprāptasamayavimuktamārgau. mṛdumṛdvādīnāṃ cottarottare hetūpacitatarā iti. darśanamārgavarjyāḥ. tasmin mṛdumṛdvādyasaṃbhavāt.
T07yabhkvyu:3999: tatra mṛdumṛdoḥ prakārād ūrdhvabhūmikād adharabhūmiko 'pi mṛdumadhyo yāvad adhimātramadhyād adhimātrādhimātraḥ samānāsamānakṣaṇāpekṣayā hetūpacayataḥ samo viśiṣṭo vā bhavati. ekaikādhikaprakārahetūpacitatvāt. yad uktaṃ śraddhānusārimārgaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ sabhāgahetur iti kathaṃ śraddhānusārimārgo
T07yabhkvyu:4000: dharmānusārimārgasya sabhāgahetur bhavati. na hi tayor ekasaṃtāne saṃmukhībhāvo 'sti. tenāha. yady apy ekasaṃtāne
T07yabhkvyu:4001: śraddhādharmānusārimārgayor asaṃbhavaḥ. utpannas tv anāgatasya hetur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4002: asaṃbhavo hy atrāsaṃmukhībhāvaḥ. na tv abhāvaḥ. santi hi mṛdvindriyāṇāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4004: dṛṣṭiprāptasamayavimuktamārgās tu tatsaṃtāne saṃmukhībhaveyur api yadīndriyasaṃcāraḥ kriyeta. tasmād utpannaḥ śraddhānusārimārgo
T07yabhkvyu:4005: 'nutpattidharmiṇo dharmānusārimārgasya śraddhādhimuktadṛṣṭiprāptasamayavimuktāsamayavimuktamārgāṇāṃ ca yathāyogam anāgatānām utpattidharmāṇām anutpattidharmāṇāṃ vā samaviśiṣṭānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4006: sabhāgahetur iti. ācāryavasumitras tv āha. [Tib. 193a] utpannaḥ śraddhānusārimārgo 'nutpannasya dharmānusārimārgasya dṛṣṭiprāptamārgasya vā hetur yadā śraddhānusāryādaya indriyāṇi saṃcaranto dharmānusārimārgādīn
T07yabhkvyu:4007: saṃmukhīkurvanti. tad ayuktaṃ. na hi śraddhānusārīndriyāṇi saṃcarati.
T07yabhkvyu:4009: prāyogikā iti. prayogena nirvṛttāḥ prāyogikāḥ. prāyogikagrahaṇam
T07yabhkvyu:4010: upapattipratilaṃbhikanirāsārthaṃ. kāmāvacarāḥ śrutamayā iti. ye buddhavacanaśrutena niryātāḥ. te śrutamayāḥ. cintāmayāś cintāmayānām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4012: tayor eva samaviśiṣṭayor iti vacanāt. bhāvanāmayabhāvād iti. kāmadhātor asamāhitatvāt bhāvanāmayā
T07yabhkvyu:4013: na santi. cintāmayābhāvād iti. yadā hi cintayitum ārabhante. tadaiṣāṃ samādhir evopatiṣṭhata iti cintāmayābhāvakāraṇaṃ. teṣām apīti.
T07yabhkvyu:4014: śrutamayādīnāṃ. mṛdumṛdavaḥ sarveṣām iti. mṛdumṛdavo mṛdumṛdvantarāṇāṃ samānāṃ mṛdumadhyādīnāṃ cānyeṣām aṣṭānāṃ viśiṣṭānām iti sarveṣāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4015: sabhāgahetuḥ. mṛdumadhyā aṣṭānāṃ mṛdumṛduprakāram apāsyate 'sya nyūnatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4016: [Tib. 173b] (Abhidh-k-vy 207) eṣā nītir iti. tadyathā mṛdvadhimātrāḥ saptānāṃ madhyamṛdavaḥ saṇṇāṃ yāvad adhimātrādhimātrā adhimātrādhimātrāntarāṇāṃ ekarūpāṇāṃ sabhāgahetur iti. pūrvān pūrvān apāsya teṣāṃ teṣāṃ nyūnatvāt. upapattipratilaṃbhikās tu kuśalā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4017: upapattyā pratilaṃbha upapattipratilaṃbhaḥ. sa eśām astīty
T07yabhkvyu:4018: upapattipratilaṃbhikāḥ. ata iniṭhanāv iti ṭhan. sarve te nava prakārāḥ parasparaṃ sabhāgahetuḥ. mṛdumṛdūnāṃ yāvad adhimātrādhimātrāṇām eva.
T07yabhkvyu:4019: adhimātrādhimātrā mṛdumṛdūnāṃ yāvad adhimātrādhimātrāṇāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ. na samaviśiṣṭānām eva. anābhisaṃskārikatvāt. ābhisaṃskārikasya hi sabhāgahetor nyūnaṃ phalaṃ neṣyate. nānābhisaṃskārikasya. kliṣṭā apy evam
T07yabhkvyu:4020: iti. sarve navaprakārāḥ parasparaṃ sabhāgahetur aprāyatnikatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4021: pūrvotpannāḥ sarve samānabhūmikānāṃ paścādvartināṃ sarveṣāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4022: nātra samaviśiṣṭate apekṣyete. te yathākramaṃ catustridvyekeṣāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4023: sabhāgahetur iti. vipākajā vipākājādīnāṃ caturṇāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4024: airyāpathikā airyāpathikādīnāṃ eva trayāṇāṃ. va vipākajānāṃ. teṣām anābhisaṃskārikatvena nyūnatvāt. śailpasthānikā dvayoḥ śailpasthānikanairmāṇikayoḥ. nairmāṇikā nairmāṇikānām eva. [Tib. 194a] na
T07yabhkvyu:4025: pūrveṣām. uttareṣām uttareṣām ābhisaṃskārikatvāt. nirmāṇacittam api kāmāvacaraṃ caturdhyānaphalam iti. caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ phalaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4027: nirmāṇacittaṃ. tad yathākramaṃ catustridvyekeṣāṃ ca sabhāgahetur iti
T07yabhkvyu:4032: kā punar atra yuktir yayaivaṃ niyama iti tāṃ yuktiṃ nirdikṣur āha.
T07yabhkvyu:4033: nottaradhyānaphalaṃ adharadhyānaphalasyeti vistaraḥ. na caturthadhyānaphalaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ prathamadhyānaphalasya kāmāvacarasya nirmāṇacittasya yāvat tṛtīyadhyānadhyānaphalasya kāmāvacarasya nirmāṇacittasya sabhāgahetuḥ. kasmād ity āha. na hy ābhisaṃskārikasya mahāyatnasādhyasya sabhāgahetor hīyamānam amahāyatnasādhyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati. yādṛśena hi yatnaviśeṣeṇa prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvat tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ niṣpādyate. na tādṛśenaiva caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4034: niṣpādyate. [Tib. 194b] kiṃ tarhi. utkṛṣṭatareṇa yatnaviśeṣeṇa niṣpādyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4035: tasmāt phalam asyotkṛṣṭatareṇaiva yatnaviśeṣeṇa niṣpādyate ity avagamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4036: tena adharadhyānaphalaṃ uttaradhyānaphalasya sabhāgahetuḥ. na tūttaradhyānaphalaṃ adharadhyānaphalasya (Abhidh-k-vy 208). yathā ca caturthadhyānaphalaṃ yojitaṃ. evaṃ tṛtīyadvitīyadhyānaphalam api yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4037: ata evāhur iti. yasmād ābhisaṃskārikasya sabhāgahetor hīyamānaṃ phalaṃ na
T07yabhkvyu:4038: bhavati. tasmād āhur ity arthaḥ. kim āhur ity āhuḥ. syād utpanna iti
T07yabhkvyu:4039: vistaraḥ. duḥkhe dharmajñānam anāsravam utpannam anutpattidharmāṇām anāsravāṇāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntināṃ na hetuḥ. duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntibhyo duḥkhe dharmajñānasyābhisaṃskārikatvena viśiṣṭatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4040: evaṃ hi tad viśiṣṭaṃ. yat kleśavisaṃyogaprāptyā saha utpadyate. viśiṣṭaṃ ca nyūnasya na hetuḥ. tadyathārhattvāt parihīṇasya aśaikṣo mārgaḥ pūrvotpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmimārgayoḥ paścādutpadyamānayor na sabhāgahetuḥ. syād ekasaṃtānaniyataḥ pūrvapratilabdha iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4041: anāgatā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntayaḥ prathama eva kṣaṇe pratilabdhā
T07yabhkvyu:4042: ekasaṃtānagatāḥ. duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ dvītiyakṣaṇotpannaṃ. tasya tā na
T07yabhkvyu:4043: hetuḥ. [Tib. 195a] yasmān na pūrvataraṃ phalaṃ. pūrvataraṃ hi duḥkhe
T07yabhkvyu:4045: cānutpannatvāt. anāgato vā dharmaḥ yasmān na sabhāgahetuḥ. anāgatā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntayaḥ aparimitāḥ pratilabdhā eva na tūtpannāḥ. syāt pūrvotpanna iti vistaraḥ. pūrvaṃ pratilabdhamātro dharmaḥ pṛṣṭo na tūtpannaḥ anutpannaś ca na sabhāgahetur bhavatīti. idānīṃ pūrvotpanno 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:4046: kim asti na sabhāgahetur iti atiśayarūpeṇa pṛcchyate. adhimātro
T07yabhkvyu:4047: nyūnasyeti. viśiṣṭo nyūnasyety arthaḥ. tadyathottaraphalaparihīṇasya arhattvaphalaparihīṇasyānāgāmiphalaparihīṇasya vā adharaphalasaṃmukhībhāve
T07yabhkvyu:4049: 'rhattvamārgo 'dhimātraḥ pūrvotpannaḥ. sa paścādutpannasyānāgāmiphalasya sakṛdāgāmiphalasya vā na sabhāgahetuḥ. nyūnatvāt. evam anāgāmiphalaparihīṇasya yo 'nāgāmiphalamārgaḥ. sa pūrvotpannaḥ paścādutpannasya sakṛdāgāmiphalasya na sabhāgahetuḥ. nyūnatvāt. duḥkhe dharmajñānaprāptiś ceti vistaraḥ. duḥkhe dharmajñānaprāptir yā
T07yabhkvyu:4050: pūrvotpannā. sā uttarakṣaṇasahotpannānāṃ uttaraiḥ kṣaṇair duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇādibhir ā mārge 'nvayajñānakṣānteḥ sahotpannānāṃ duḥkhe [Tib. 195b] dharmajñānakṣāntiprāptīnāṃ na sabhāgahetuḥ. kiṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4051: kāraṇaṃ. tāsāṃ nyūnatvāt. tasyāś ca viśiṣṭatvāt. kathaṃ punas tāsāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4052: nyūnatvaṃ tasyāś ca viśiṣṭatvaṃ. duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānter duḥkhe
T07yabhkvyu:4054: hetūpacitataratvāc ca. tasmād dhetūpacitatarābhyo 'pi duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāniprāptibhyo duḥkhe dharmajñānaprāptir viśiṣṭā tāś ca nyūnās tatprāptitvāt. kiṃ ca prathamakṣaṇotpannāyā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiprāpter duḥkhe dharmajñānaprāptis tasmād eva hetudvayād
T07yabhkvyu:4055: (Abhidh-k-vy 209) viśiṣṭā. nyūnā ca sā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiprāptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4056: atas tatpūrvikā apy anyā uttarakṣaṇasahotpannā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiprāptayo hetūpacitataratve 'pi nyūnā eveti. tasmān na sā
T07yabhkvyu:4059: iti. tuśabdo 'vadhāraṇe bhinnakramaś ca. cittacaittā eva saṃprayuktakahetur iti. evaṃ satīti vistaraḥ. yadi cittacaittā eva
T07yabhkvyu:4060: saṃprayuktasahetur ity etāvad ucyate bhinnakālajā api bhinnakālajaiḥ saha bhinnasaṃtānajā api ca bhinnasaṃtānajaiḥ saha saṃprayuktakahetuḥ [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:4061: 196a] saṃprasajyate. na hi te kālasaṃtānabhinnā na cittacaittā bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:4062: ekākārālambanās tarhīti. yadi cittacaittā ekākārā ekanīlādyākārā ekālambanāś ca ekanīlādyālambanā evaṃ te saṃprayuktakahetur nānyatheti.
T07yabhkvyu:4063: evaṃ bhinnakālajatvaṃ bhinnasaṃtānajatvaṃ ca vyāvartitaṃ bhavatīty
T07yabhkvyu:4064: abhiprāyaḥ. evam api sa eva prasaṃgaḥ. bhinnakālasaṃtānajānāṃ anyonyaṃ saṃprayuktakahetutvaprasaṃga iti arthaḥ. saṃbhavati hi bhinnakālasaṃtānajānām api cittacaittānām ekākārālambanatvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4065: bhinnasaṃtānajānām api prasaṃga iti. bhinnakālajatvam ekaṃ parikṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4066: navacandrādīni hi paśyatāṃ bahūnāṃ ekākārālambanāś cittacaittā vartante.
T07yabhkvyu:4068: iti. samaḥ abhinna āśraya eṣām iti
T07yabhkvyu:4070: tulyārthe samaśabdagrahaṇe hi jātitulyatvāt sa eva prasaṃgaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4072: mārgaprayāṇaṃ. evaṃ cittaṃ caittasya phalaṃ. caitto 'pi cittasyety anyonyaphalam iti tenārthena sahabhūhetuḥ. paṃcabhir iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4075: yathā teṣām eva sārthikānām anyonyabalena mārgaṃ gacchatāṃ samo 'nnapānasnānaśayanādiparibhogakriyāyāṃ prayogaḥ. tadvat samaprayogatvam eṣām anyonyaṃ bhavati. ata evāha. ekenāpi hi vinā na sarve saṃprayujyanta
T07yabhkvyu:4078: iti. pūrve ca te sarvagāś ca sarvapūrvagāḥ. pūrvotpannāḥ sarvagā ity
T07yabhkvyu:4079: arthaḥ. svabhūmikāḥ pūrvotpannā atītāḥ pratyutpannā vā sarvatragā anuśayāḥ kliṣṭānāṃ kleśasvabhāvasaṃprayuktasamutthānāṃ paścimānāṃ paścādatītapratyutpannānāṃ anāgatānāṃ ca sarvatragahetuḥ. vyākhyāsyāma
T07yabhkvyu:4082: sarvatragā duḥkhahetudṛggheyā dṛṣṭayas tathā vimatiḥ saha tābhiś ca yāvidyāveṇikī ca yety atra paṃcame kośasthāne nirdekṣyāmaḥ. kliṣṭadharmasāmānyakāraṇatveneti
T07yabhkvyu:4083: vistaraḥ. yasmād ayaṃ sarvatragahetuḥ kliṣṭānām eva sāmānyena
T07yabhkvyu:4084: paṃcanikāyānām api bhavati. sabhāgahetus tu kliṣṭānāṃ cākliṣṭānāṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:4085: tasmāt pṛthag vyavasthāpyate. kathaṃ kliṣṭadharmasāmānyakāraṇatvam asyeti
T07yabhkvyu:4086: pratipādayann āha. nikāyāntarīyāṇām api hetutvād iti. eṣāṃ hi prabhāveneti. eṣāṃ hi sarvatragāṇāṃ prabhāvena anyanaikāyikā anyanikāyabhavāḥ kleśā rāgādaya upajāyante. ke punas te.
T07yabhkvyu:4089: samudayadarśanaprahātavyasya sarvatragahetor duḥkhanirodhamārgadarśanabhāvanāprahātavyā nikāyāntarīyā bhavanti. sarvān kleśanikāyān gacchanti bhajante ālambane. sarveṣāṃ vā kleśanikāyānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4090: hetubhāvaṃ gacchantīti sarvatragāḥ. ata evoktaṃ. satkāyadṛṣṭimūlakāḥ sarvakleśāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭiprabhavāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭisamudayā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4092: sarvatragā āryapudgalasya sarva eva prahīṇā darśanaprahātavyatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4093: rāgādayaś ca śaikṣānāṃ samudācaranti. te rāgādayas teṣāṃ na sarvatragahetukā iti manyamāna evaṃ pṛcchati. kliṣṭā dharmā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4094: aviśeṣitatvāt pṛthagjanāryasaṃtānajā iti gamyate. yaś ca darśanaprahātavyānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vipāka iti. arthaparisamāptyartham etad uktaṃ. naitad udāharaṇaṃ. avyākṛtāḥ saṃskṛtā dharmā iti. nivṛtāvyākṛtā anivṛtāvyākṛtāś ca gṛhyante. nivṛtāvyākṛtāḥ kāmadhātau satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭitatsaṃprayuktasamutthā dharmā rūpārūpyāvacarās [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:4097: paramavyākṛte dhruve iti tayor avyākṛtatvāt. tatra kāmāvacarāḥ kliṣṭā dharmā yathāyogaṃ sabhāgasarvatragasahabhūsaṃprayuktakahetubhūtais tair eva
T07yabhkvyu:4098: satkāyadṛṣṭyādibhir avyākṛtahetukāḥ. nānyai rāgādibhiḥ. ūrdhvabhūmikās tv anyair apīti sugamam etat. anivṛtāvyākṛtāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:4099: sabhāgahetunānivṛtāvyākṛtahetukāḥ. akuśalāḥ kāmāvacarā rāgādayaḥ. te ca sarvatragahetunā satkāyadṛṣṭyādihetukāḥ. idam atrodāharaṇaṃ. akuśalāś ceti hy aviśeṣitatvāt darśanaprahātavyā bhāvanāprahātavyāś ca gṛhyante. idam atra dvitīyajñāpakaṃ. yat tad anyat kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhaṃ satyam iti tṛtīyaṃ jñāpakaṃ. tadanyad dhi kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ ca aviśeṣitatvāt gṛhyate. sarvatragahetunā (Abhidh-k-vy
T07yabhkvyu:4100: 211) hi bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ pṛthagjanānām ivāryāṇām api satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4101: na satkāyadṛṣṭer hetur iti vyākhyātam etat. idaṃ tarhi prajñaptibhāṣyam
T07yabhkvyu:4102: iti. yady akuśalā avyākṛtahetukā api bhavanti na kevalam akuśalahetukāḥ prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate. syāt. āryapudgalaḥ kāmavairāgyāt [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:4103: 198a] parihīyamāṇo yas tatprathamataḥ kliṣṭāṃ cetanāṃ saṃmukhīkarotīti.kāmavairāgyaparihāṇikāle hi sā āryapudgalasya cetanā sahabhūhetunā ca saṃprayuktakahetunā ca akuśalahetukaiva. nāvyākṛtahetukā satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭyoḥ prahīṇatvāt. iti prajñaptibhāṣyārtho lakṣyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4104: anenābhiprāyeṇa codayati. vaibhāṣika āha. aprahīṇaṃ hetum etat
T07yabhkvyu:4105: saṃdhāyoktam iti. aprahīṇaṃ sahabhūhetuṃ saṃprayuktakahetuṃ ca saṃdhāya abhipretya etat prajñaptibhāṣyam uktaṃ. darśanaprahātavyo hi satkāyadṛṣṭyādikaḥ tasyāś cetanāyā hetuḥ. prahīṇatvāt darśanamārgeṇa noktaḥ prajñaptibhāṣya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4107: akuśalā avaśyaṃ sāsravā eveti na viśeṣyante. kuśalās tu dviprakārāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:4108: sāsravā anāsravāś ceti. ato viśeṣyante. ye sāsravāḥ kuśalāḥ. te vipākahetur nānāsravā iti. vipākadharmatvād iti. vipaktiprakṛtitvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4109: durbalatvāt pūtibījavad iti vistaraḥ. yathā pūtīni bījāni abhiṣyanditāny api durbalatvān nāṃkurotpattihetur bhavati. evam avyākṛtā dharmās
T07yabhkvyu:4110: tṛṣṇābhiṣyanditā api na vipākotpattihetur bhavanti durbalatvāt. anāsravā balavanto 'pi tṛṣṇānabhiṣyanditatvād vipākaṃ [Tib. 198b] na nirvartayaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:4111: yathādbhir anabhiṣyanditavāc chuṣkāṇi balavaṃty api sārabījāni nāṃkuraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4114: pratisaṃyuktam. kiṃpratisaṃyuktaṃ vipākam apratisaṃyuktāḥ kāmādiṣv apratisaṃyuktā anāsravā abhinirvartayeṣu. pratisaṃyuktena vipākena bhavitavyaṃ. nāpratisaṃyuktena.
T07yabhkvyu:4116: akuśalāḥ kuśalasāsravāś ca śeṣā ubhayavidhatvāt ubhayaprakāratvāt balavadabhiṣyaṃditaprakāratvād ity arthaḥ. nirvartayaṃti vipākaṃ yathā
T07yabhkvyu:4118: vipākasya hetur iti vistaraḥ. yadi vipāka iti bhāvasādhano ghañ. vipaktir vipāka iti tatra ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ. vipākasya hetur iti. atha vipacyate svayam
T07yabhkvyu:4119: iti karmasādhano ghañ. tatra karmasādhano vipāka eva hetur vipākahetur
T07yabhkvyu:4120: iti. kiṃ cātaḥ kaś cāto doṣaḥ. yadi vipākasya hetur iti
T07yabhkvyu:4121: bhāvasādhanaparigrahaḥ. vipākajaṃ cakṣur ity etan na prāpnoti. na hi cakṣur vipakter jātaṃ. kiṃ tarhi. vipaktihetoḥ karmaṇa ity arghaḥ. na hi vipāko hetuh. atha vipāka eva (Abhidh-k-vy 212) hetur iti karmasādhanaparigrahaḥ. sidhyate tad vipākajaṃ cakṣur iti. karmaiva hi [Tib. 199] vipāko vipacyata iti kṛtvā. kiṃ tu karmaṇo vipāka ity etan na
T07yabhkvyu:4122: prāpnoti. vipāko hi karmaivocyate na vipaktiḥ. karmaṇo vipāka iti cātra bhāvasādhanārtha iṣṭe na karmasādhanārtha iti. tasmāt karmaṇo vipāka ity etan na prāpnoti. ubhayathāpi yoga ity uktaṃ prāg iti
T07yabhkvyu:4123: vipākajaupacayikāḥ. paṃcādhyātmam iti atroktaṃ vipākahetor jātā vipākajāḥ. madhyapadalopād gorathavad iti
T07yabhkvyu:4124: bhāvasādhanaparigrahaḥ. phalakālaprāptaṃ vā karma vipāka ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4125: vipacyata iti kṛtvā. tasmāj jātā vipākajā iti karmasādhanaparigrahaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4126: phalaṃ tu vipaktir eveti vipākaḥ. phalavivakṣyāyāṃ bhāvasādhana evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4127: parigṛhyata ity arthaḥ. tasmād vipākajaṃ cakṣur iti madhyapadalopāt karmasādhanaparigrahād vā sidhyati. karmaṇo vipāka iti ca sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:4129: visadṛśaḥ pāko vipāka iti. hetor visadṛśaṃ phalam ity arthaḥ. hetur hi vyākṛta eva. phalaṃ tu avyākṛtam eveti. sahabhūhetvādīnāṃ tu sadṛśa eva pāka iti viśeṣaṇaṃ. [Tib. 199b] abhidharmaśāstra evaṃ vyutpādyate tenedaṃ praty ādiśyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4130: ekaskaṃdhako vipākahetur ekaphala iti vistaraḥ. iha prāptayo vṛkṣaprapāṭikāvac cittādibhyaḥ pṛthag avasthitāḥ. tāsāṃ paripūrakanyāyena pṛthak phalaṃ varṇyate. ekaḥ skaṃdho 'syety ekaskaṃdhako vipākahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4132: yatra skaṃdhe prāptayaḥ. tatraiva ca tajjātyādaya ity ekaskaṃdhakaḥ. yad eva ca prāptīnāṃ phalaṃ tad eva tajjātyādīnām iti. sādhāraṇaphalatvāt
T07yabhkvyu:4133: ekaphalaḥ. dviskaṃdhaka ekaphalo vipākahetuḥ. kāyavākkarma tajjātyādayaś ca. kāyavākkarmaṇo rūpaskaṃdhasaṃgṛhītatvāt tajjātyādīnāṃ ca caṃskāraskaṃdhasaṃgṛhītatvāt dviskaṃdhakaḥ. ekaphalaś ca. teṣām
T07yabhkvyu:4134: apṛthakphalatvāt. catuḥskaṃdhaka ekaphalaḥ kuśalākuśalāś cittacaittā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4135: te saha jātyādibhir iti. teṣāṃ cittacaittānāṃ yathāyogaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4136: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaskaṃdhasaṃgṛhītatvāt. jātyādīnaṃ ca saṃskāraskaṃdhasaṃgṛhītatvāc catuḥskaṃdhako vipākahetur ekaphalaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:4137: sādhāraṇaphalatvāt. na hi cittasyānyat phalam anyac caittādīnām iti
T07yabhkvyu:4138: asamāhitatvāt. kāmadhātau paṃcaskaṃdhako vipākahetur nāsti. na hy atra
T07yabhkvyu:4140: bhavati. pṛthakkalāpatvāt. triskaṃdhakas tu triṣv api dhātuṣu nāsti
T07yabhkvyu:4142: (Abhidh-k-vy 213) rūpadhātāv ekaskaṃdhaka iti vistaraḥ. prāptiḥ saha jātyādibhiḥ saṃskāraskaṃdhasaṃgṛhītety ekaskaṃdhakaḥ. tathaiva sādhāraṇaphalatvāt ekaphalaḥ. asaṃjñisamāpattir api saha jātyādibhiḥ tathaiva vaktavyā. vijñapte rūpaskaṃdhasaṃgṛhītatvāt. jātyādīnāṃ ca saṃskāraskaṃdhasvabhāvatvāt. dviskaṃdhaka ekaphalaḥ pūrvavat. kuśale cetasy asamāhite 'nuparivartirūpaṃ nāstīti rūpaskaṃdhavarjitavedanādiskaṃdhasaṃgṛhītatvāt catuḥskaṃdhakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4143: paṃcaskaṃdhakaḥ samāhite cetasi. anuparivartirūpasya cittādibhir ekavartitvāt. ārūpyadhātāv iti vistaraḥ. tatra sarvam eva rūpaṃ nāstīty ekaskaṃdhakaś catuḥskaṃdhakaś ca vipākahetuḥ. prāptir iti. tatra saha svajātyādibhir ekaskaṃdhakaḥ pūrvavat. nirodhasamāpattir api saha
T07yabhkvyu:4144: svajātyādibhir ekaskaṃdhako vipākahetur ekaphala iti sugamaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4145: asti karmeti vistaraḥ. yasya jīvitendriyaṃ vipākaḥ. tasya karmaṇo 'vaśyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4146: tajjīvitendriyaṃ tajjātyādayaś ca viprayuktā vipākaḥ. [Tib. 200b] tac caitat sarvaṃ dharmāyatanasaṃgṛhītam ity ekam āyatanaṃ vipāko vipacyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4147: yasya manaāyatanaṃ. tasya dve manodharmāyatane. tasya hi manaāyatanasya
T07yabhkvyu:4148: kalāpe avaśyaṃ vedanādayaḥ sahabhuvo jātyādayaś ca vipākarūpā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:4149: vedanādijātyādayo dharmāyatanasaṃgṛhītā iti te dve manodharmāyatane vipāko
T07yabhkvyu:4150: vipacyate. evaṃ yasya spraṣṭavyāyatanam iti. tasya spraṣṭavyasyāvaśyaṃ jātyādayas saṃtīti dharmāyatanam api vipacyate. na kevalaṃ spraṣṭavyāyatanam iti dve āyatane tasya vipacyete. yasya kāyāyatanaṃ tasya
T07yabhkvyu:4151: tṛīṇi. tad eva kāyāyatanaṃ spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ ca tadāśrayabhūtacatuṣkaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4152: tasyāvaśyaṃ bhūtacatuṣkāśritatvāt. tasya ca jātyādibhir bhavitavyam iti dharmāyatanam api tatra tṛtīyaṃ vipacyate. evam iti vistaraḥ. evaṃ yasya rūpagaṃdharasāyatanānām anyatamad vipākaḥ. tasya trīṇy āyatanāni vipākaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4153: tad evāyatanaṃ rūpādīnām anyatamat spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ ca tadāśrayabhūtasvabhāvaṃ dharmāyatanaṃ ca tajjātyādisvabhāvam iti. yasya
T07yabhkvyu:4154: cakṣurāyatanaṃ. tasya catvāri. tad eva cakṣuḥ kāyāyatanaṃ cāvaśyaṃ cakṣuḥkāyapratibaddhavṛttivāt. spraṣṭavyadharmāyatane ca pūrvavat. evaṃ yasyeti vistaraḥ. evaṃ yasya śrotrādīnām [Tib. 201a] anyatamad vipākaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4155: tasyāpi catvāry āyatanāni vipākaḥ. tad eva śrotrādīnām anyatamad āyatanaṃ kāyaspraṣṭavyadharmāyatanāni ca pūrvavat. asti tat karmeti vistaraḥ. paṃca yāvad ekādaśāyatanānīti saṃbhavataḥ. na tu dvādaśāyatanāni vipākaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4157: atrācāryavasumitro vyākhyāpayati. asti karma yasyaikam eva dharmāyatanaṃ vipāko vipacyata iti nopapadyate. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. ākṣepakakarmaphalatvāj
T07yabhkvyu:4158: (Abhidh-k-vy 214) jīviteṃdriyasya. yadi tāvat kāmadhātau jīvitaṃ vipāko vipacyate. karmaṇas tatrāvaśyaṃ kāyajīviteṃdriye bhavataḥ kalalādyavasthāsu anutpanne ṣaḍāyatane. utpanne tu ṣaḍāyatane saptabhir āyatanair bhavitavyaṃ. cakṣurādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhir manaāyatanena ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:4159: rūpadhātāv api saptabhir ārūpyadhātāv api manodharmaāyatanābhyām avaśyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4160: bhavitavyaṃ. sakalajanmākṣepakaphalatvāj jīviteṃdriyasya. ko vātra dhātur
T07yabhkvyu:4161: abhipreta iti brūmaḥ. ārūpyadhātuḥ. nanu ca tatrākṣepakakarmaphalatvāj
T07yabhkvyu:4162: jīviteṃdriyasya avaśyaṃ manaāyatanenāpi bhavitavyaṃ. na ca jīviteṃdriyam
T07yabhkvyu:4163: eva vipāko vipacyate. vedanāprabhāvitatvād vipākasyeti. vedanayā 'pi tatra bhavitavyam iti. atrocyate. kṣaṇotpattim etat saṃdhāyoktaṃ. yasmiṃ kṣaṇe ārūpyopapannasya [Tib. 201b] vipākajaṃ cittaṃ na samudācarati. tasmin kṣaṇe jīviteṃdriyam eva vipāko vipacyate. vipākasya jīviteṃdriyasyaivotpādān manaāyatanasya cāsamudācārād iti kim arthaṃ tatsamudācāre manaāyatanam aparaṃ na bhavatīti tasya dve manodharmāyatane
T07yabhkvyu:4164: iti. tad idaṃ vicāryate. bhavaty evaṃ cāksepakasya karmaṇo jīviteṃdriyaṃ vipāka iti. jīviteṃdriye ca vipacyamāne manaāyatanādīny api vipacyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:4165: nāyatanāṃtaravipākaḥ pratiṣidhyate. vipākahetur iha ciṃtyate. asti tat karma yasyaikam eva dharmāyatanaṃ vipacyate. nānyad āyatanam ity etāvad
T07yabhkvyu:4166: vivakṣitaṃ. atha mataṃ jīviteṃdriyākṣepakasyaiva karmaṇo manaāyatanādīny api vipacyaṃte. naikam āyatanam iti. atra brūmaḥ. tasyaiva karmaṇo 'nye
T07yabhkvyu:4167: 'pi manaāyatanādayas tatra vartamānā vipāko na punar anyasya karmaṇa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4168: kiṃ kṛto 'yaṃ niyamaḥ. asti hi saṃbhavo yad ekasya karmaṇo nikāyasabhāgo
T07yabhkvyu:4169: vipākaḥ. 'nyasya jīviteṃdriyaṃ. anyasyaiva ca manaāyatanādīni iti. brūyās tvaṃ yathā yasya cakṣurāyatanaṃ. tasya cakṣuḥkāyaspraṣṭavyadharmāyatanānīti vacane yasya cakṣurāyatanaṃ vipākaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4170: tasya kāyāyatanam āvaśyakatvāt. evaṃ manaāyatanādīny api tasyaiva karmaṇo vipāka iti. [Tib. 202a] tan na. kvacid eva kasyacit pratibaddhavṛttitvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4171: na hi vinā kāyeṃdriyeṇa cakṣuriṃdriyaprādurbhāvo 'sti. asaty api tu vipāke manasi jīviteṃdriyaprādurbhāvo 'stīti asamam etat. ācāryasaṃghabhadras tv āha. asti karma yasya dharmāyatanam eva vipāko vipacyate. yasya
T07yabhkvyu:4175: rūpāvinābhāvitvāt rūpāyatanam api tasyaiva cakṣurnirvartakasya (Abhidh-k-vy 215) karmaṇo vipāka iti samayāntaram icchati. ayaṃ tv ācāryo
T07yabhkvyu:4176: na rūpāyatanam avaśyaṃ tasyaiva karmaṇo vipāka ity aparaṃ pakṣam
T07yabhkvyu:4177: avalaṃbate. yasya kāyāyatanaṃ. tasya trīṇi. yasya cakṣurāyatanaṃ. tasya
T07yabhkvyu:4178: catvārīti. na hy anyonyamavinābhāvino jīvitanikāyasabhāgādīny āvaśyakam ekasyaiva karmaṇo vipāka ity abhiprāyaḥ. tāv etau pakṣau vibhāṣyakārair
T07yabhkvyu:4179: likhitau. tayor yo yasmai rocate. sa tena parigṛhyate. ity alaṃ prasaṃgena.
T07yabhkvyu:4180: atha kathaṃ kasyacit karmaṇa ekam āyatanaṃ vipāko vipacyate. kasyacid yāvad ekādaśety ata āha. vicitrāvicitraphalatvāt karmaṇo bāhyabījavad iti
T07yabhkvyu:4183: anekaskaṃdhaśākhāviṭapapattrapallavāṃkurapuṣpaphalasamṛddhāś ca nyagrodhādayaḥ pādapā jaladharāyamāṇā dṛśyaṃte. kānicid avicitraphalāni.
T07yabhkvyu:4186: atītapratyutpannānāgataḥ. na tu dvaiyadhvikasyāpy atītasya pratyutpannasya caikādhviko 'nāgataḥ. na tu viparyayād iti. bahukṣaṇikasya karmaṇa ekakṣaṇikaḥ. mā bhūd atinyūnaṃ hetoḥ phalam iti vartate. na ca karmaṇā
T07yabhkvyu:4187: saha vipāko vipacyate. sahotpanne sahabhūsaṃprayuktakahetvor vyāpārāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4188: vipākahetoś ca visadṛśapākāpekṣatvāt. nāpy anaṃtaraṃ vipāko vipacyate. kiṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4189: kāraṇaṃ. samanaṃtarapratyayaākṛṣṭatvāt samanaṃtarakṣaṇasya. yasmāt samanaṃtarakṣaṇaḥ samanaṃtarapratyayabalenākṛṣṭo na vipākahetubalena. yady apy asau samanaṃtarapratyayo vipākahetuḥ itthaṃ caitad eva. yasmāt samanaṃtarakṣaṇo vipākahetoḥ samanaṃtarapratyayāt kadācit kuṣalaḥ kadācid akuśalaḥ kadācid avyākṛtaḥ. [Tib. 203a] anyathā hi avyākṛta eva syāt. atha vā samanaṃtarakṣaṇasya avipākasvabhāvasya samanaṃtarapratyayākṛṣṭatvād ity
T07yabhkvyu:4190: abhiprāyaḥ. pravāhāpekṣo hi vipākahetuḥ cittacaittādipravāhe sati atikrāṃte vipākahetur vipākaṃ dadyāt. dharmataiṣety abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4191: (II.56ab) uktam eṣām arthato 'dhvaniyama iti. arthata ukto na śabdata ity arthaḥ. dvividhaṃ hi vacanaṃ svaśabdābhitaṃ arthoktaṃ ca. kathaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4195: iti vacanāt. sabhāgasarvatragahetū atītapratyutpannāv eva sto nānāgatau.
T07yabhkvyu:4196: aviśeṣavacanād eva sahabhūsaṃprayuktakavipākahetavas traiyadhvikā ity arthata uktāḥ. sabhāgasarvatragahetū eva hi pūrvotpannau. pūrvotpannāv eva ca tāv ity avadhāraṇāt. parasparaphalatvavacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4198: iti. sūtraṃ sūtrī vā kriyate sūtryate. uktaṃ cātra kāraṇam iti. katham
T07yabhkvyu:4199: uktaṃ. [Tib. 203b] niṣyaṃdaphalena hi saphalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ. tac cānāgatasyāyuktaṃ pūrvapaścimatābhāvād iti evamādi. yac caitat kāraṇam
T07yabhkvyu:4200: uktaṃ sabhāgahetoḥ. sarvatragahetor apy uktarūpaṃ veditavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4201: sabhāgahetukalpo hi sarvatragahetuḥ. sabhāgahetur hi kliṣṭaḥ kliṣṭānāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4202: sarvatragahetur api kliṣṭaḥ kliṣṭānām eva. kliṣṭadharmasāmānyakāraṇatvena tv ayaṃ sabhāgahetuḥ pṛthag vyavasthāpyata ity uktam etat. sabhāgahetuvad eva cāyaṃ nānāgataḥ. niṣyaṃdaphalena ca saphala iti. tadvad evāsya vārttā.
T07yabhkvyu:4204: iti. tryadhvakā eva trayas traya eva tryadhvakā iti avadhāraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4205: kāraṇahetur anyathā bhavati. kathaṃ cānyathā. sarvādhvagaś cadhvavinirmuktaś ceti. svato 'nye hi svabhāvavarjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:4206: kāraṇahetur iti. ata evam eva bhavati nānyathā.
T07yabhkvyu:4207: (II.56cd) hetuḥ phalam iti anyonyāpekṣayaitat dvayam ity ataḥ pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:4208: kiṃ punas tat phalaṃ yasyaitaddhetavaḥ iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4210: iti. ākāśāpratisaṃkhyānirodhavarjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ phalam ity uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4211: evaṃ tarhīti vistaraḥ. phalatvād asaṃskṛtasya phalam asaṃskṛtam iti kṛtvā
T07yabhkvyu:4212: [Tib. 204a] hetunā svato 'nyenāsya bhavitavyaṃ. yasya hetos tad asaṃskṛta
T07yabhkvyu:4213: phalaṃ. hetutvāc cāsaṃskṛtasya svato 'nyenāsya phalena bhavitavyaṃ. yasya phalasya tad asaṃskṛtaṃ hetuḥ. nsaṃskṛtasya te hetuphale. asaṃskṛtaṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhalakṣaṇaṃ visaṃyogaphalaṃ bhavati. na ca tasya hetur
T07yabhkvyu:4214: ajanyatvāt. hetuś ca bhavati saṃskṛtotpādāvighnabhāvāvasthānāt. na ca tasya phalaṃ vyavasthāpyate. phalapratigrahaṇadānāsamarthatvāc ca. ata eva ca ṣaḍvidhahetvasaṃbhavād iti vistaraḥ. na sahabhūhetur asya
T07yabhkvyu:4215: saṃprayuktakahetur vā saṃbhavati. tena kasyacid dharmasyāsahabhavatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4216: asaṃprayogāc ca. na sabhāgahetur asya kaścid bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4217: asaṃskṛtasyāsadṛśatvāt. samānabhūmitvāyogāc ca. ata eva cāsya na
T07yabhkvyu:4218: sarvatragahetuḥ. asya cākliṣṭatvāt. (Abhidh-k-vy 217) na cāsya vipākahetuḥ. asaṃskṛtasyāvipākasvabhāvatvāt. vipāko hi sattvasaṃkhyāto
T07yabhkvyu:4219: dhātupatito dharmaḥ. anutpādyatvād eva cāsyaite hetavo na bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:4220: anutpādyatvād eva cāsya kāraṇahetur na bhavati. ata evocyate. kasmān mārgo visaṃyogasya kāraṇahetur neṣyate. yasmāt sa utpādāvighnabhāvena
T07yabhkvyu:4221: vyavasthāpitaḥ. na cāsaṃskṛtam utpattimad iti. anadhvapatitatvāc cāsya hetavo na bhavanti. adhvapatitasya hi dharmasya hetur vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4223: paṃcavidhaphalāsaṃbhavāc ca nāsaṃskṛtasya phalaṃ. kasmāt. sāmānyatas tāvad adhvavinirmuktasya phalapratigrahaṇadānāsamarthatvāt. tathā hy uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4224: vartamānāḥ phalaṃ paṃca gṛhṇanti. dvau prayacchataḥ ity evamādi. kiṃ ca na tāvad adhipatiphalaṃ bhavati. tad dhi sahotpannaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4227: iti. tac cānutpattimad iti nāsya sahajaṃ paścājjātaṃ vā phalaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4228: anutpattimattvād eva. na ca niṣyandaphalam. utpattimato hi sadṛśo dharma utpattimān niṣyandaphalam. ata eva ca na puruṣakāraphalaṃ asaṃskṛtasya
T07yabhkvyu:4229: puruṣakārābhāvāt. yasya hi balena ya utpadyate prāpyate vā. sa tasya puruṣakāraphalaṃ. ata eva ca na visaṃyogaphalaṃ. mārgasyaiva hi balena
T07yabhkvyu:4230: visaṃyogaḥ prāpyaḥ. na cāsaṃskṛto mārga iti. na cāpi vipākaphalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4231: vipākahetuvaidharmyāt. sāsravo hi vipākahetuḥ. na cāsaṃskṛtaṃ sāsravam
T07yabhkvyu:4232: iti. atha vā paṃcavidhahetuvaidharmyāt paṃcavidhaphalāsaṃbhava iti nāsaṃskṛtasya phalaṃ sambhavati. yad mārgo visaṃyogasya kāraṇahetur neṣyate kasyedānīṃ tat phalaṃ. hetumatā hi phalena bhavitavyaṃ kathaṃ vā
T07yabhkvyu:4233: kena vā prakāreṇa tat phalaṃ. āha. yat tāvad uktaṃ kasyedānīṃ tat phalam
T07yabhkvyu:4234: iti [Tib. 205a] mārgasya. yad apy uktaṃ kathaṃ vā tat phalam iti phalaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4235: tadbalena mārgabalena prāpter ity arthaḥ. atha vaivaṃ padasaṃbandhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4236: kasya tat phalam iti. mārgasya tat phalaṃ. katham vā tat phalam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4237: tadbalena prāpter iti. prāptir eva tarhi mārgasya phalaṃ prāpnoti. tasyām eva prāptau tasya mārgasya sāmarthyāt na visaṃyogaḥ. kiṃ. mārgasya phalam ity adhikṛtaṃ. tatrāsāmarthyād iti. evaṃ tatra visaṃyoge
T07yabhkvyu:4238: mārgasyāsāmarthyād ity arthaḥ. tasmān na ca tāvad asya mārgaḥ kathaṃcid api hetuḥ. ṣaṇṇāṃ hetūnām anyatamo 'pi hetur asya mārgo na bhavati. phalaṃ cāsya visaṃyogaḥ. prāpyaṃ phalaṃ na janyam ity abhiprāyaḥ. paṃcavidho hi hetur iti kecid icchaṃti. kārako jñāpako vyaṃjako dhvaṃsakaḥ prāpakaś ceti. kārako hetur bījam aṃkurasya. jñāpako dhūmo (Abhidh-k-vy 218) 'gneḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4239: vyaṃjako dīpo ghaṭasya. dhvaṃsako mudgaro ghaṭasya. prāpako ratho deśāṃtaraprāpaṇīyasyeti. tad evaṃ mārgaḥ prāpako 'sya. na janako hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4240: prāpyaṃ ca visaṃyogaphalaṃ na janyam iti darśitaṃ bhavati. athāsaty adhipatiphala iti vistaraḥ. asaṃskṛtasya yadi phalaṃ syāt adhipatiphalaṃ syāt. tasya kāraṇahetutvena vyavasthāpanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4241: nāsaṃskṛtasya te iti vacanāt tad apy asya [Tib. 205b] nivāritam iti paricchinne codakaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:4242: pṛcchati. athāsaty adhipatiphale katham asaṃskṛtaṃ kāraṇahetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4244: saṃskṛtam eva pratīdam asaṃskṛtam kāraṇahetur vyavasthāpyate. nāsaṃskṛtaṃ pratīti darśitaṃ bhavati. kasmād asya saṃskṛtavat phalaṃ na vyavasthāpyata
T07yabhkvyu:4245: ity ata āha. na cāsya phalam asti. adhvavinirmuktasya phalapratigrahaṇadānāsamarthatvād iti. adhvasaṃgṛhītasyaiva hi dharmasya
T07yabhkvyu:4247: vartamānāḥ phalaṃ paṃca gṛhṇanti dvau prayacchata
T07yabhkvyu:4248: iti. uktaṃ tu paryāyeṇa hetur iti. paryāyeṇoktaṃ na svaśabdenety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4249: te 'py anityā iti. te 'py anityā evety avadhāraṇād arthān na nityo hetur ity uktaṃ bhavati. ālaṃbanapratyayo 'pīti. yathā hetavo 'trānityā uktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4250: evaṃ pratyayā apy anityā evoktāḥ ye hetavo ye pratyayā iti vacanāt. tasmād asaṃskṛtam ālaṃbanapratyayo na prāpnoti. utpādāyety avadhāraṇād iti. ye hetavo ye pratyayā rūpasyotpādāya. te 'py anityāḥ. na tu ye 'nutpādāya.
T07yabhkvyu:4251: dvividhā hi pratyayāḥ. janakāś cājanakāś ca. ālambanapratyayaś cājanakaḥ ālambanamātratvāt. ālambanapratyayo hi nirudhyamāne dharme kāritraṃ karoti. vartamānaiś cittacaittair grahaṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4253: iti vacanāt. nanu ca hetavo 'pīti vistaraḥ. hetur api janakaś cājanakaś
T07yabhkvyu:4255: asaṃskṛtasyānāvaraṇabhāvamātreṇājanakasyāpikāraṇahetutvāpratiṣedhaḥ. ukta ālambanapratyayaḥ sūtra iti. catasraḥ pratyayatā ity atra sūtre. na tu pratiṣiddhaḥ. dharmatāyā avirodhān na doṣa ity abhiprāyaḥ. sūtrāṇi ca bahūny antarhitāni. mūlasaṃgītibhraṃśāt. atrācāryo na nirbaṃdhaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:4256: dharmatāvirodho nāstīti. kiṃ tu asaṃskṛtam eva vicāryate 'sti vā na veti.
T07yabhkvyu:4257: sarvam evāsaṃskṛtam iti. na kevalaṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ. rūpavedanādivad
T07yabhkvyu:4258: iti. ādiśabdena saṃjñādīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ. yathā rūpād vedanābhāvāntaraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4259: vedanāyāś ca saṃjñā yāvat saṃskārebhyo vijñānaṃ. tathā na rūpādibhyaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:4260: paṃcabhyo (Abhidh-k-vy 219) 'saṃskṛtaṃ bhāvāntaram asti. ato nāsaṃskṛtaṃ dravyam iti sautrāntikāḥ. spraṣṭavyābhāvamātram iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4261: sapratighadravyābhāvamātram ity arthaḥ. avindanta ity alabhamānāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4262: utpannānuśayajanmanirodhe utpannānām anuśayānāṃ janmanaś ca nirodhe pratisaṃkhyābalena prajñābalena anyasyānuśayasya janmanaś ca anutpādaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ [Tib. 206b]. tad evaṃ anuśayanirodhaḥ samudayasatya nirodho janmanirodho duḥkhasatyanirodha ity uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4264: sautrāntikanayena ke '; nuśayāḥ. kathaṃ ca teṣāṃ janmanaś ca pratisaṃkhyābalena nirodhaḥ. aṣṭānavater anuśayānāṃ vāsanā 'nuśayaḥ. yasya cānuśayasya yaḥ pratipakṣo mārgaḥ pratisaṃkhyā. tena saha prathame kṣaṇe so 'nuśaya utpadyate. tadbalād dvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣu tasya nirodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4265: tadbalād eva ca paunarbhavikasya janmanaḥ apratisaṃdhiko nirodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4267: manuṣyatvādilakṣaṇaḥ. ātmabhāvo vā paṃcaskandhalakṣaṇaḥ. tasya śeṣas tallakṣaṇa evotpadyamānaḥ. tasya nikāyasabhāgaśeṣayāntarāmaraṇe āyuṣyaparisamāpta eva pratyayavaikalyād yo 'nutpādaḥ. so
T07yabhkvyu:4268: 'pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ. pratyayavaikalyaṃ punar aṃtyānāṃ skaṃdhānāṃ maraṇabhavākhyānāṃ nikāyasabhāgasaṃbandhane yad asāmarthyaṃ upakaraṇādipratyayāsāmagryāt. ato 'sau pratisaṃkhyānirodha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4269: sopadhiśeṣo nirvāṇadhātuḥ. duḥkhasyānutpāda iti nirvupadhiśeṣaḥ. so 'pi tu
T07yabhkvyu:4270: duḥkhasyānutpādaḥ. yo 'pratisaṃkhyānirodha ity uktaḥ. nāntareṇa pratisaṃkhyāṃ sidhyati. utpattikāraṇānuśayavaikalyasya [Tib. 207a]
T07yabhkvyu:4271: pratisaṃkhyānakṛtatvāt. ataḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodha evāsau. svarasaṃ nirodhād iti. svātmanā nirodhān na prajñāsāmarthyenety arthaḥ. avinaṣṭe tadabhāvād iti. avinaṣṭe tasmiṃ anuśaye tasyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhasyābhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:4272: akṛtotpattipratibandhānām iti. akṛte utpattau pratibandha eṣām iti akṛtotpattipratibandhāḥ. teṣāṃ. ya utpattipratibandhabhāvaḥ. etad atra pratisaṃkhyāyāḥ sāmarthyaṃ. yadi tarhy anutpāda eveti vistaraḥ. prahāṇaṃ hi nirvāṇam abhipretaṃ. anāgatasyaiva cānutpāda iti yadi nirvāṇam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:4273: atītapratyutpannasyotpannatvāt nāsty anutpāda iti katham idam uktaṃ sūtre.
T07yabhkvyu:4274: atītānāgatapratyutpannasya duḥkhasya prahāṇāya saṃvartante iti tat sūtrapadaṃ kathaṃ nīyate. yasya punar dravyāntaraṃ nirvāṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4275: tasyātītapratyutpannayor api tadāsevanādibhir nirvāṇaṃ prāpyata iti sunītam idaṃ sūtraṃ bhavatīti. tadālambanakleśaprahāṇād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4277: iti. chando 'nāgate 'rthe prārthanā. rāgas tu prāpte 'rthe 'dhyavasānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4278: vistareṇa yāvad vijñānam iti. yo vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne (Abhidh-k-vy 220)([Tib. 207b] chandarāgaḥ. taṃ prajahīta. chandarāge prahīṇe evaṃ vas tad vijñānaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhaviṣyate. evaṃ triyadhvikasyāpi duḥkhasyeti. chandarāgaprahāṇam eva rūpādiduḥkhaprahāṇaṃ. tasya cānāgatasya chandarāgasyānutpādo bhavati. atas triyadhvikasyāpi duḥkhasya
T07yabhkvyu:4279: prahāṇaṃ yujyata iti darśayati. eṣa eva naya iti. yady atītānāgatapratyutpannasya kleśasya prahāṇāyeti pāṭhaḥ. tatrāpy eṣa eva
T07yabhkvyu:4280: naya iti. yaḥ kleśe rāge dveṣe vā chandarāgaḥ. taṃ prajahīteti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4281: tadālambanakleśaprahāṇād api kleśasya prahāṇaṃ. na svabhāvata eveti
T07yabhkvyu:4282: traiyadhvikasyāpi kleśasya prahāṇaṃ yujyate ity arthaḥ. atha veti vistaraḥ. pūrvajanmani bhavaḥ paurvajanmikaḥ. ihajanmani bhava aihajanmikaḥ. tad evam aikakṣaṇikaḥ kleśaḥ paryudasto bhavati. katham etat pratyetavyaṃ. paurvajanmikaḥ sarvakleśaḥ sambadhyate aihajanmikaś ca. na punar aikakṣaṇika ity ata āha. yathā tṛṣṇā vicariteṣv iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4283: anyatrāpy evaṃ darśanāt evaṃ pratyetavyaṃ. aṣṭādaśa tṛṣṇāvicaritāni katham
T07yabhkvyu:4284: atīte 'dhvani ekasmiṃ kṣaṇe yojyaṃta iti ato 'tītaṃ janmādhikṛtyoktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4285: aṣṭādaśa tṛṣṇāvicaritāni. asmīti bhikṣavaḥ satīttham asmīti [Tib. 208a]
T07yabhkvyu:4286: bhavati. evam asmīti anyathāsmīti sad asmīti asad asmīti bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4287: bhaviṣyāmīty asya bhavati. na bhaviṣyāmītthaṃ bhaviṣyāmi evaṃ bhaviṣyāmi anyathā bhaviṣyāmīty asya bhavati. syām ity asya bhavati. itthaṃ syām evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4288: syāṃ anyathā syām ity asya bhavati. api syām ity asya bhavati. apītthaṃ syām apy evaṃ syām apy anyathā syām ity asya bhavati. evaṃ yāvat pratyutpannaṃ. tathehāpi paurvajanmikaḥ kṛtsnaḥ kleśapravāhaḥ ajhajanmikaś ca saṃbadhyate naikakṣaṇika iti. tad evaṃ prasādhyatābhiprāyaṃ bravīti.
T07yabhkvyu:4289: tena ca kleśadvayeneti vistaraḥ. paurvajanmikenaihajanmikena ceti kleśadvayenāsyāṃ saṃtatau pratyutpannāyāṃ bījabhāvo vāsanālakṣaṇaṃ sāmarthyam āhito 'nāgate 'syotpattaye. tasya bījabhāvasya prahāṇāt tad api kleśadvayaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhavati. yathā vipākakṣayād vipākopabhogāt karma kṣīṇaṃ bhavatīty upacaryate. tadvat. [Tib. 208b] anāgatasya tarhi kathaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:4290: prahāṇaṃ vyavasthāpyate. na hi tena saṃtatau bījabhāva āhito yasya prahāṇāt prahāṇaṃ bhaved ity ata āha. anāgatasya punar duḥkhasya kleśasya vā bījabhāvād atyantam anutpḍaḥ prahāṇam iti. bījabhāvaś ca pratisaṃkhyābalena bhavati. na hi niruddhe 'tīte nirodhābhimukhe ca pratyutpanne yatnaḥ pratipakṣotpādane yatnaḥ sārthakaḥ saprayojanam ity
T07yabhkvyu:4291: arthaḥ. virāgas teṣām agra iti. rāgakṣayo virāgaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodha ity
T07yabhkvyu:4292: arthaḥ. katham asatām asann agro bhavitum arhatīti. katham asatām ākāśādīnām asaṃskṛtānām asann asaṃskṛto virāgo 'gro bhavitum arhatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:4293: asyottaraṃ bravīti. abhāvo 'pi kaścid iti vistaraḥ. dvitīyasya ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:4294: dvitīyasya samudayasatyasyānaṃtaraṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 221) dṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃ prajñayā uddiṣṭaṃ parebhyo
T07yabhkvyu:4295: trayāṇāṃ pūraṇaṃ tṛtīyaṃ bhavati. kiṃ syād iti. ko dośaḥ syād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4296: kiṃ ca punaḥ syād iti. ko guṇaḥ syād ity arthaḥ. kiṃ ca punaḥ syād iti guṇaparipraśna āha. vaibhāṣikapakṣaḥ pālitaḥ syād iti. yat tūktaṃ kiṃ syāt ko doṣaḥ syād iti atrocyate. abhūtaṃ tu parikalpitaṃ syād iti. doṣaḥ syād ity arthaḥ. rūpavedanādivad iti. pratyakṣataḥ. [Tib. 209a] cakṣurādivad
T07yabhkvyu:4297: iti. karmato numānata ity arthaḥ. asakṛdvyākhyātam etat. vastuna iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4298: rāgādivastunaḥ. hetuphalādibhāvasaṃbhavād iti. ādiśabdena svasvāmyavayavāvayavisambandhādayo gṛhyante. na hi vastuno nirodhe hetuḥ phalam avayavāvayavītyevamādi. tasyaitarhi prāptiniyama iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4299: tasya nirodhasya yo 'yaṃ prāter niyamaḥ. asyaiva nirodhasya prāptir
T07yabhkvyu:4300: nānyasyeti tasmiṃ prāptiniyame ko hetuḥ. na hi nirodhasya prāptyā sardhaṃ kaścit saṃbandho 'sti hetuphalādibhāvāsaṃbhavāt. dṛṣtadharmanirvāṇaprāpta
T07yabhkvyu:4301: iti. sopadhiśeṣanirvāṇastha ity arthaḥ. yady abhāvaḥ katham asya prāptiḥ syāt. pratipakṣalābheneti vistaraḥ. āryamārgalābhena kleśasya punarbhavasya cotpāde 'tyantaviruddhasyāśrayasya lābhāt prāptaṃ nirvāṇam
T07yabhkvyu:4302: ity ucyate. abhāvamātratvam iti. mātraśabdo dravyāntaratvanivṛttyarthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4303: yat khalv asyeti vistaraḥ. prahāṇaṃ yāvad aprādurbhāva iti paryāyaśabdā ete. aprādurbhāva ity etat sphuṭam ity udāharaṇam uktaṃ. nāsmiṃ prādurbhāva ity ato 'prādurbhāvā ity adhikaraṇasādhanam [Tib. 209b] iti
T07yabhkvyu:4304: darśayanti. na tu aprādurbhūtir aprādurbhāva iti bhāvasādhanam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4305: yata eva tatprāptiḥ parikalpyate yato mārgāt prahāṇaḥ prāptaḥ parikalpyate. tasmiṃ sati mārge prāpte vā duḥkhasyeṣyatām aprādurbhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4306: kim anyena nirvāṇena parikalpitena. vimokṣas tasya cetasa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4307: nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇakāle bhagavataḥ. yathāvastu yathālambanaṃ. saṃyogasya vastu yatra kleśena saṃyujyate. sa vastukā dharmā iti sahetukāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4308: parigrahavastu parigṛhyata iti parigrahaḥ. sa eva vastu parigrahavastu.
T07yabhkvyu:4309: (II.57) ante 'bhihitatvād iti. kārikāyā ante vipākahetuḥ paṭhitaḥ. tasya vipākaphalam eva.
T07yabhkvyu:4312: adhipatir adhipaḥ. tasmāj jātaṃ adhipajaṃ adhipatiphalam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4313: pūrvasyādhipatam iti kecit paṭhanti. adhipater idaṃ phalaṃ ādhipatam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4314: ādhipatyam iti tu prāpnoti. dityadityādityapatyuttarapadāṇ ṇya ity
T07yabhkvyu:4315: apavādāt. (Abhidh-k-vy 222) athāpavādaviṣaye 'py utsargasamāveśa iti bhavet. bhavec ca tadrūpaṃ. etad evādhipatyam iti. yad
T07yabhkvyu:4317: janakabhāvo 'pīty arthaḥ. tad anena dvividhasyāpi kāraṇahetoḥ kārakasya vādhyupekṣakasya vādhipatiphalam [Tib. 210a] astīti darśitaṃ bhavati
T07yabhkvyu:4320: iti. daśānām āyatanānām iti. cakṣūrūpāyatanayor yāvat kāyaspraṣṭavyāya
T07yabhkvyu:4321: tanayoḥ. cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ yāvat kāyaṃ pratītya spraṣṭavyāni cotpadyate kāyavijñānam iti vacanāt. kāraṇahetur eva cāyaṃ. na hi cakṣurādīny āyatanāni cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ sahabhūhetvādayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4322: paṃca hetavaḥ saṃbhavaṃti. manaāyatanaṃ tu manovijñānasya sabhāgahetvādi
T07yabhkvyu:4323: saṃbhavati. dharmāyatanam api sahabhūsaṃprayuktakahetvādi saṃbhavatīti na kāraṇahetur evety avadhāryate. tasmād daśānām ity uktaṃ na dvādaśānām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4324: bhājanaloke ca karmaṇāṃ. kim. aṃgībhāvo 'sti kāraṇahetor ity adhikṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4325: bhājanaloko hi kuśalākuśalakarmajanito 'py avyākṛto 'pi na vipākaphalam iṣyate. sattvākhyo vipāka iti lakṣaṇāt. tasmāt kāraṇahetor etad
T07yabhkvyu:4326: adhipatiphalaṃ. śrotrādīnām api na kevalaṃ cakṣuṣo 'sti. kiṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4327: cakṣurvijñānasyotpattau pāraṃparyeṇādhipatyaṃ. na sākṣāt yathā cakṣuṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4328: kathaṃ jñāyata iti āha. śrutvā draṣṭukāmatotpatteḥ. draṣṭukāmatāyāṃ ca cakṣurvijñānam utpadyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. [Tib. 210b] evamādi yojyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4330: sabhāgasarvatragayor niṣyandaḥ phalam iti vartate. sabhāgasarvatragahetvor eva niṣyandaphalam
T07yabhkvyu:4331: avadhāryate. puruṣakāraphalam api hi tayor anantaraṃ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:4333: iti. puruṣakāraphalam eva sahabhūsaṃprayuktakahetvor ity avadhāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4334: puruṣakārasya phalaṃ paurusaṃ. puruṣakāraphalam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:4336: puruṣakarmaiva hi puruṣakāro na puruṣād anyaḥ. na hi karma karmavadbhyo
T07yabhkvyu:4337: 'nyad iṣyate bauddhaiḥ. tasmāt puruṣakārasya yat phalaṃ. tat puruṣasyaiveti pauruṣam ity ucyate. yasya dharmasya yat kāritram iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4338: yasya dharmasya yat karma yā kriyā. sā tasya puruṣakāra ity arthaḥ. nanu cāntarvyāpārapuruṣābhāve dharmamātraṃ puruṣa iti ato dharmakāra iti prāpnoti. na puruṣakāra ity ata āha. puruṣakāra iva hi puruṣakāraḥ. yathā loke kalpitasya puruṣasya puruṣakāraḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy 223) evaṃ dharmasyāpīti puruṣakāra iva puruṣakāraḥ. dṛṣṭāntaṃ kathayati. kākajaṃghā oṣadhir ityādi. kākajaṃghākārā oṣadhiḥ kākajaṃghety ucyate. mattahastīva yo dṛṣṭaḥ śūro vā. sa manuṣyo mattahastīti. kim anyeṣām [Tib. 211a] iti.
T07yabhkvyu:4339: hetūnāṃ. anyeṣām apy astīti. sabhāgasarvatragakāraṇahetūnāṃ. anyatra
T07yabhkvyu:4340: vipākahetoḥ. kasmād ity āha. yasmāt sahotpannaṃ samanantarotpannam vā puruṣakāraphalam iti. sahabhūsaṃprayuktakahetvor hi sahotpannaṃ phalam
T07yabhkvyu:4341: uktaṃ. tac ca puruṣakāraphalam eva. na hy anyat phalaṃ sahotpannam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:4343: tūbhayathā. kiṃ punar niṣyandaphalād adhipatiphalād vānyat puruṣakāraphalaṃ. nety ucyate. tad eva hi phalaṃ tattan nāma labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:4345: puruṣakāraphalaṃ. avighnabhāvāvasthānenotpatteś cādhipatiphalam iti. na caiva vipākaḥ. kiṃ. sahotpanno vā samanantarotpanno vety adhikṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:4349: avyākṛta iti anivṛtāvyākṛto vivakṣitaḥ. sattva iti ākhyā yasya. sa
T07yabhkvyu:4353: aupacayikanaiṣyandikau tu na vyākṛtād udbhavataḥ. [Tib. 211b] nanu ca indriyamahābhūtopacayo dhyānaviśeṣasamāpannasya bhavati. asāv api vyākṛtād
T07yabhkvyu:4354: udbhavati. sa vipākaḥ prāpnoti. nirmāṇacittaṃ cāpi. tathaiva
T07yabhkvyu:4356: vyākṛtodbhava ity ucchabda uttarakālārthaḥ. vyākṛtāt kuśalād akuśalād vā ya uttarakālam
