T07yabhkvyu:5730: nirdiśyante. keśādayaḥ katame pṛthivīdhātur iti. yata eṣāṃ keśādīnāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:5731: aparipūrṇo nirdeśaḥ syāt. santi hi tatrānye 'pi rūpādaya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5732: rūpādisvabhāvā api keśādayo na kevalaṃ pṛthivīdhātusvabhāvā iti. api tu keśādibhir eva pṛthivīdhātur nirdiśyate. pṛthivīdhātuḥ katamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5733: keśaromāṇīti. na ca keśādīn abhyatītyāpy atikramyāpy asti pṛthivīdhātur ādhyātmika iti. saṃpūrṇa evāsya pṛthivīdhātor nirdeśaḥ. evam ihāpy avidyādīnāṃ evam ihāpi sūtre 'vidyāsaṃskāravijñānādīnāṃ paripūrṇa eva nirdeśo na sāvaśeṣaḥ. aśrusiṃghāṇakādiṣv iti. aśrusiṃghāṇakādīni na tatra
T07yabhkvyu:5734: sūtre paṭhyante. tasmān na tadgataḥ pṛthivīdhātur ukta iti sāvaśeṣaḥ evety [Tib. 282a] darśayati. bhavatu vā tathaiveti vistaraḥ. yathā pṛthivīdhātor aśrusiṃghāṇakādiṣv avaśeṣam anuktatvāt. tathaivāvidyāvaśeṣam astu yadi
T07yabhkvyu:5735: śakyate (Abhidh-k-vy 293) darśayitum. na śakyate darśayitum iti manyamāno yadiśabdaṃ prayuṃkte. pūrvānte 'jñānam aparānte 'jñānaṃ madhyānte 'jñānaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:5736: buddhe 'jñānaṃ dharme 'jñānaṃ saṃghe 'jñānam ity evamādīnāṃ sarveṣām
T07yabhkvyu:5737: ajñānasthānānām uktatvāt. jātyaṃtarasya tu vedanāder avidyāyāṃ kiṃ kṛtaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:5738: prakṣepaḥ paṃcaskaṃdhikāvasthāvidyeti. na hi vedanādīnāṃ avidyātvaṃ yujyata iti. bhāvābhāvaniyama iti. yasya bhāvābhāvayor yasya bhāvābhāvau yathāsaṃkhyena niyatau tad evāṃgaṃ. avidyābhāve saṃskārāṇāṃ bhāvas
T07yabhkvyu:5739: tadabhāve teṣām abhāva ity avidyaivāṃgaṃ. na vedanādi. na hi vedanādisadbhāve 'rhatāṃ saṃskārā bhavaṃti. ye vijñānāṃgajanakā ity
T07yabhkvyu:5740: arthaḥ. tasmād āha. saty api ca paṃcaskaṃdhake saṃskārā na bhavaṃtīti
T07yabhkvyu:5741: vistaraḥ. saty api ca paṃcaskaṃdhake 'rhattvāvasthāyāṃ. puṇyopagaṃ yāvad āniṃjyopagaṃ ca vijñānaṃ na bhavati. pratisaṃdhivijñānaṃ na bhavatīty
T07yabhkvyu:5742: arthaḥ. tāṃtām upapattiṃ gacchatīty upagaṃ. puṇyopagaṃ vijñānaṃ puṇyopagaṃ. [Tib. 282b] evaṃ yāvad āniṃjyopagaṃ. tathā saty api
T07yabhkvyu:5743: paṃcaskaṃdhake niravidyāvasthāyāṃ tṛṣṇopādānādayaś ca na bhavantīti.
T07yabhkvyu:5744: yathānirdeśa eva sūtrārthaḥ. yathāsaṃkīrtitānām evāvidyādīnāṃ grahaṇam ity
T07yabhkvyu:5745: arthaḥ. ato vidyamānā anye skaṃdhā na pratyayāḥ saṃskārādīnām iti na te
T07yabhkvyu:5746: 'ṃgaṃ. evaṃ mayā śrutam ityādi. bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati gṛdhrakūṭe parvate bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham ardhatrayodaśabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5747: saṃbahulaiś ca bodhisattvair iti. āyuṣamāṃ cchāriputro maitreyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:5748: bodhisattvam etad avocat. śālistambham avalokya bhikṣubhyaḥ sūtram idam uktaṃ. yo bhikṣavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati. sa dharmaṃ paśyati. yo dharmaṃ paśyati. sa buddhaṃ paśyatīty uktvā bhagavāṃs tūṣṇīṃbabhūva. tad asya bhagavatā bhāṣitasya sūtrasya ko 'rthaḥ. pratītyasamutpādaḥ katamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5749: dharmaḥ katamaḥ. buddhaḥ katamaḥ. kathaṃ ca pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyan dharmaṃ paśyatītyādi. tatra pratītyasamutpādo nāma idam avidyetyādi. idaṃ cābhisaṃdhāyedam uktaṃ tatra sūtre. utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaiveyaṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:5750: 283a] tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā bhūtatā satyatā tattvam
T07yabhkvyu:5751: aviparītatāviparyastatety evamādi bhagavanmaitreyavacanaṃ. yady anāgatā na
T07yabhkvyu:5752: pratītyasamutpannā iti. yad uktaṃ prathamā koṭir anāgatā dharmā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5753: sūtraṃ virudhyata iti. jātijarāmaraṇayoḥ pratītyasamutpannatvaṃ na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:5754: uktaṃ ca avidyā yāvaj jātijarāmaraṇam iti. atha veti vistaraḥ. atha jātijarāmaraṇāṃge 'pi pratītyasamutpanne iṣṭe. tayor (Abhidh-k-vy 294)
T07yabhkvyu:5755: anāgatādhvavyavasthānaṃ naiṣṭavyam iti kṛtvā. trikāṇḍavyavasthā bhidyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5758: nikāyāntarīyā ity āryamahīśāsakāḥ. utpādasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvād iti. yo
T07yabhkvyu:5759: 'yam utpādaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti nikāyāntarīyair nityaḥ parikalpyate. sa saṃskṛtalakṣaṇam uktaṃ. trīṇīmāni saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni.
T07yabhkvyu:5761: saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvāc cānityam ity abhiprāyaḥ. brūyās tvaṃ lakṣaṇam api nityaṃ bhavatīti. ata āha. na ca nityaṃ bhāvāṃtaram anityasya lakṣaṇaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:5762: yujyata iti. na hi nirvāṇam [Tib. 283b] ākāśaṃ vā kasyacid anityasya lakṣaṇaṃ bhavati. prāg utpatter hi lakṣyasya tad astīti kasya laskṣaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:5763: vinaṣṭe ca lakṣye kasyeti na yujyate. utpādaś ceti vistaraḥ. utpādaś ca nāmābhūtvābhāvalakṣaṇaḥ. sautrāntikanayenotpattir dharmasya tadānīṃtanaiva
T07yabhkvyu:5765: yathaudanena pākasyāsti sambandhaḥ kartṛkriyālakṣaṇa ity odanasya pāka ity ucyate. na hy ākāśarūpayor abhisambandha utpattyutpattṛlakṣaṇo 'sti. yena rūpasyākāśam ity ucyate. evaṃ ko 'syavidyādibhir abhisaṃbandhaḥ. yatas teṣām avidyādīnāṃ pratītyasamutpāda ity ucyate. padārthaś cāsambandho bhavatīti. pratyayaṃ prāpya samudbhavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ iti padārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5766: sa kathaṃ nityaś ca nāma pratītyasamutpādaś ceit.
T07yabhkvyu:5767: pratiḥ prāptyartha iti. prāptidyotaka ity arthaḥ. itir gatāv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5768: dhātvarthaḥ. pariṇāmād iti. anekārthā hi dhātavaḥ. pratiś copasargaḥ prāptidyotaka ity ayam itir gatyartham ujjhitvā prāptyartham āpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5769: padiḥ sattārtha iti. padiḥ sattāyām iti. teneti kāraṇena. pūrvakālāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ ktvāvidher iti. samānakartṛkayoḥ pūrvakāla iti vacanāt. na cāsau pūrvam utpādāt [Tib. 284a] kaścid astīti sautrāṃtikamatena. na cāpy akartṛkāsti kriyeti. kartari sati kriyāyā vyavasthāpanāt. āha cātreti.
T07yabhkvyu:5771: yadi pūrvam utpādāt pratyeti prāpnoty asattvān na yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5772: na hy avidyamānaḥ kartā snānādikriyāṃ kurvan dṛṣṭa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5774: saha ced atha manyase pratītyakriyāṃ samutpādakriyāṃ ca saha karotīty evaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:5777: pūrvakālavidhānataḥ pūrvasmiṃ kāle vidhānaṃ ktvāpratyayasya. samānakartṛkayoḥ pūrvakāla iti
T07yabhkvyu:5778: vacanāt ktvāpratyayo na siddho bhavet. punar utpattāv iti. utpannasya punar utpattau kalpyamānāyām anavasthāprasaṃgaḥ. dvitīye tṛtīye kṣaṇe
T07yabhkvyu:5779: punaḥpunar utpadyata ity aniṣṭhāprasaṃgaḥ. athānāgata iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5781: sidhyati. akartṛkā vā kriyā kathaṃ sidhyati. yata evam ato yadavastha utpadyate śābdikasya śabdavidaḥ. tadavastha eva mama pratyeti. kimavasthaś
T07yabhkvyu:5782: ceti. kāvasthāsyeti kimavasthaḥ. utpādābhimukho 'nāgata iti. na sarvo 'nāgata utpadyate. kiṃ tarhi. utpādābhimukhaḥ. utpāde 'bhimukhaḥ. utpitsur ity arthaḥ. tadavastha eva [Tib. 284b] utpādābimukhāvastha eva. pratyetīty
T07yabhkvyu:5783: ucyate. aniṣpannaṃ cedam iti vistaraḥ. śābdikānām idam śābdakīyaṃ kartuḥ kriyāyāś ca vyavasthānaṃ. kasmāt. bhavituḥ kartṛrūpakalpitād arthāt
T07yabhkvyu:5784: kriyārūpakalpitāyā bhūter anyatvadarśanāt. tasmād acchalaṃ bhavaty
T07yabhkvyu:5787: asann utpadyate yadvad iti vistaraḥ. asann abhāvaḥ alabdhātmakaḥ utpadyate yathā.
T07yabhkvyu:5790: atha san atha labdhātmaka utpadyata iti kalpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5792: utpanno 'pi punar utpadyate ity anavasthānād anyadaniṣṭhā prāpnoti. tathā hi sāṃkhyamatānusāreṇa sata evotpādā nāsata iti tad etad adhikṛtya
T07yabhkvyu:5795: vāśabdo matavikalpārthaḥ. yadi bhavatāṃ sann utpadyata iti pakṣaḥ. asmākam api sann utpadyate. vaibhāṣikanayenānāgatānām astitvāt. sautrāntikanayena ca janakadharmabījasadbhāvāt. tataḥ kim idam ucyate. na cāsau pūrvam
T07yabhkvyu:5796: utpādāt kaścid asti. yaḥ pratītyottarakālam utpadyata iti. atha vā yadi
T07yabhkvyu:5797: tarhi sann evotpadyate. pūrvam eva ghaṭo mṛtpiṇḍādīn anapekṣya svataḥ
T07yabhkvyu:5800: atha mā bhūd aniṣṭheti. asann utpadyate iti pratipadyate. punas tad evopatiṣṭhate.
T07yabhkvyu:5801: asann utpadyate yadvat pratyety api tatheti siddho naḥ pakṣa iti pūrvavad vācyaṃ. yad apy uktam ekasya hi kartur
T07yabhkvyu:5802: dvayoḥ kriyayoḥ pūrvakālāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ ktvāvidhir bhavatīti tad vyabhicārayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:5804: vistaraḥ. samānakālāyām api kriyāyāṃ ktvāvidhir dṛṣṭaḥ. tadyathā dīpaṃ prāpya tamo gatam
T07yabhkvyu:5805: iti. atra na pūrvaṃ tamo dīpaṃ prāpnoti paścād gacchati vinaśyati ity
T07yabhkvyu:5806: arthaḥ. kiṃ tarhi. tasminn eva kāle tamo dīpaṃ prāpnuvad vinaśyati. atha
T07yabhkvyu:5807: mataṃ. samanaṃtaram eva tan na yugapad iti. ataḥ punar idam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5809: na hy asau pūrvaṃ mukhaṃ vyādadāti vidārayati paścāc chete. kiṃ tarhi. yo mukhaṃ vyādadac chete. sa mukhaṃ vyādāya śeta ity ucyate. atha mataṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:5810: pūrvam asau mukhaṃ vyādadāti. paścāc chete iti. ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:5812: yaḥ kaścin mukhaṃ vyādāpānaṃtaraṃ ca saṃvṛtya śete. sa mukhaṃ vyādāya śeta ity ucyeta na cocyate. tena jñāyate. yo mukhaṃ vyādadac chete. sa mukhaṃ vyādāya śete ity ucyate iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5813: anye punar iti. bhadantaśrīlātaḥ pratir vīpsārtha iti. nānāvācinām adhikaraṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ kriyāguṇābhyāṃ vyāptum icchā vīpsā. tām ayaṃ pratir
T07yabhkvyu:5814: dyotayati. [Tib. 285b] itau gatau sādhava ityāḥ. tatra sādhur iti
T07yabhkvyu:5815: yatpratyayaḥ. itau vinaṣṭau sādhavaḥ. anavasthāyina ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5816: samupasargaḥ samavāyārthaṃ dyotayati. utpūrvaḥ padiḥ prādurbhāvārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5817: dhātvarthapariṇāmāt. tāṃ tāṃ sāmagrīṃ pratīti. prater vīpsārthatāṃ darśayati. ityānāṃ vinaśvarāṇāṃ samavāyenotpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ. na kaścid dharma eka utpadyate sahotpādaniyamāt. rūpādīnāṃ kāme 'ṣṭadravyako 'śabdaḥ paramāṇuḥ yāvac
T07yabhkvyu:5818: cittacaittāḥ sahavaśyam iti niyamāt. eṣā tu kalpaneti vistaraḥ. pratir vīpsārtha ity evamādikā kalpanātraiva (Abhidh-k-vy 297) pratītyasamutpādasūtre yujyate. iha kathaṃ bhaviṣyati cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānam iti. na hi pratītyānāṃ cakṣūṃṣi pratītyacakṣūṃṣīti samāsaḥ saṃbhavaty arthāyogāt.
T07yabhkvyu:5819: cākṣur hi pratītya prāpya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānam ity ayam artho
T07yabhkvyu:5820: gamyate. tena tadavastham eva tac codyaṃ na yukta eṣa padārtha iti vistareṇa yad uktaṃ. katham. ekasya hi kartur dvayoḥ kriyayoḥ pūrvakālāyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:5821: kriyāyāṃ ktvāvidhir bhavati. snātvā bhuṃkte iti. na ca pūrvam utpādāc cakṣurvijñānam asti. yac cakṣuḥ pūrvaṃ pratītya rūpāṇi cottarakālam
T07yabhkvyu:5823: avadhāraṇārthaṃ paryāyadvayam āha. asmin satīty etāvaty [Tib. 286a]
T07yabhkvyu:5824: ucyamāne. na kevalam avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ saṃskārā bhavaṃti. anyasminn api satīti gamyeta. yathā cakṣuṣi sati cakṣurvijñānaṃ bhavatīti. na cakṣuṣy eva satīty avadhāryate. tena rūpe 'pi satīti gamyate. dvitīyena tu paryāyeṇasyotpādād idam utpadyate ity anena pūrvaparyāyam evāvadhārayati.
T07yabhkvyu:5825: asyaivotpādād idam utpadyate. nānyasmād iti. aṃgaparaṃparāṃ vā darśayitum
T07yabhkvyu:5826: iti. asminn aṃge sati. avidyāṃge satīdaṃ saṃskārāṃgaṃ bhavati. asya punar aṃgasya saṃskārāṃgasyotpādād idaṃ vijñānāṃgam utpadyata iti. evam itareṣām apy aṃgānāṃ paraṃparā vaktavyā. janmaparaṃparāṃ vā. kiṃ. darśayituṃ paryāyadvayam āheti vartate. sākṣād iti vistaraḥ. sākṣāt pāraṃparyeṇa saṃtatyāvidyādīnāṃ pratyayabhāvaṃ darśayituṃ paryāyadvayam āha. asmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti sākṣāt pratyayabhāvaṃ darśayati. asyotpādād idam utpadyata iti pāraṃparyeṇa. tatra sākṣād yadāvidyāyāḥ samanaṃtaraṃ kliṣṭāḥ saṃskārā utpadyante. pāraṃparyeṇa tu yadā kuśalā utpadyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:5827: kuśalāvasthāyām avidyāyā abhāvāt. kiṃ ca. avidyā saṃskārāṇāṃ sākṣāt
T07yabhkvyu:5828: pratyayo vijñānādīnāṃ pāraṃparyeṇa. tad uktaṃ bhavati. avidyāṃge sati saṃskārāṃgaṃ bhavaty asya saṃskārāṃgasyotpādād idam utpadyate vijñānāṃgaṃ sākṣād avidyāpratyayaṃ pāraṃparyeṇeti. [Tib. 286b] etat sarvam ācāryamataṃ. pratiṣedhārtham ity apara iti sthaviravasuvarmā. nāsati hetau bhāvo bhavatīty ahetuvādapratiṣedhārthaṃ prathamena paryāyeṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:5829: nityahetuvādapratiṣedhārthaṃ na cānutpattimato nityāt prakṛtipuruṣādikāt kiṃcid utpadyata iti dvitīyena. ācārya āha. asyāṃ tu kalpanāyām iti
T07yabhkvyu:5830: vistaraḥ. pūrvapadasya grahaṇam anarthakam iti. asmin satīdaṃ bhavatīty
T07yabhkvyu:5831: asya. ubhayavādapratiṣedhasiddher iti. asyotpādād idam utpadyate ity anenaiva paryāyeṇa. hetor astitvam utpattimataś ca hetutvam ity
T07yabhkvyu:5832: ubhayasyāhetutvanityahetutvalakṣaṇasya vādasya pratiṣedhasiddhitaḥ pūrvaparyāyasyānarthakyaṃ prāpnoti. saṃti tarhi kecid iti vistaraḥ. santi kecid (Abhidh-k-vy 298) vādinaḥ. ya ātmani saty āśrayabhūte avidyāyā āśrayabhūte saṃskārādīnāṃ saṃskāravijñānanāmarūpādīnāṃ bhāvam utpādaṃ kalpayaṃti. avidyādīnāṃ cāvidyāsaṃskārādīnāṃ utpādāt tadutpattiṃ saṃskārādyutpattiṃ kalpayantīty adhikṛtaṃ. ataḥ kāraṇāt teṣāṃ vādināṃ kalpanāṃ paryudāsayituṃ pratiṣeddhum idaṃ nirdhārayāṃ babhūvāmredayāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:5833: babhūva. kim ity āha. yasyaivotpādāt yāvat skaṃdhasya samudayo bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:5834: yasyaivotpādād yad utpadyate. tasminn eva sati tad bhavati. nānyasminn
T07yabhkvyu:5835: ātmani. yad utāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ. [Tib. 287a] avidyāyām eva satyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:5836: saṃskārā bhavaṃti. nānyasmin yāvad evam asya kevalasya mahato
T07yabhkvyu:5837: duḥkhaskaṃdhasya samudayo bhavati. kathaṃ. jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ saṃbhavaṃti. evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati. jātyām eva satyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:5838: jarāmaraṇādayaḥ saṃbhavaṃti. nānyasminn ātmani. anyathā hy asmin satīdaṃ bhavatīty ucyamāne vaktāras syuḥ. ātmani saty āśrayabhūte avidyādiṣu satsu saṃskārādayo bhavantīti. atha punar dvitīyam eva paryāyaṃ brūyād
T07yabhkvyu:5839: asyotpādād idam utpadyata iti. evam api tathaiva kalpeyuḥ. satyam avidyādīnām utpādāt saṃskārādaya utpadyante. ātmani tu saty āśrayabhūta
T07yabhkvyu:5840: iti. ataḥ paryāyadvayena nirdhārayati. yasyotpādād yad utpadyate. tasminn eva sati tad bhavati. nānyasmin ātmani saty āśrayabhūta iti. ācāryā iti pūrvācāryāḥ. aprahīṇajñāpanārtham utpattijñāpanārthaṃ ca. avidyāyāṃ satyām aprahīṇāyāṃ saṃskārā bhavaṃti. na prahīyanta iti prathamena paryāyeṇa darśayati. tasyā evotpādād utpadyanta iti dvitīyena darśayati. evaṃ yāvaj jātyāṃ satyāṃ aprahīṇāyāṃ jarāmaranādayo bhavaṃti. na prahīyaṃte. tasyā evotpādād utpadyanta iti. sthityutpattisaṃdarśanārtham ity apara [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:5841: 287b] iti bhadantaśrīlātaḥ. tadarthaṃ paryāyadvayam āheti. yāvat kāraṇasrotas tāvat kāryasroto bhavatīti prathamena paryāyeṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:5842: kāraṇasyaivotpādāt kāryam utpadyata iti dvitīyena. utpāde tv adhikṛta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5843: pratītyasamutpādaṃ vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmīty adhikṛte. kaḥ prasaṃgaḥ kaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:5844: prastāvaḥ sthitivacanasya. asmin satīdaṃ bhavatīty anena yāvat kāraṇasrotas tiṣṭhati tāvat kāryasrotas tiṣṭhatīti evam asya sthityartho varṇyata iti. bhinnakramaṃ ca bhagavān kim arthaṃ ācakṣīt. utpattir hi prathamaṃ bhavati. paścāt sthitiḥ. utpattipratibaddhā sthitir iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:5845: asyotpādād idam utpadyata iti pūrvaṃ vaktavyaṃ syāt. paścād idam asmin
T07yabhkvyu:5846: satīdaṃ bhavati. na tv evam. ato nāyam artha iti. punar āheti. sa eva bhadantaśrīlātaḥ. ācāryaḥ pratyāha. eṣa ced iti vistaraḥ. asmin satīdaṃ na
T07yabhkvyu:5847: bhavatīty evāvakṣyad iti. nātraivābhāvanirdeśo yuktarūpa iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:5848: pūrvaṃ ca kāryasyotpādam iti. asyotpādād idam utpadyata iti pūrvam avakṣyat. utpādapūrvakatvād (Abhidh-k-vy 299) vināśasya.
T07yabhkvyu:5849: sūtra uktaṃ jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ saṃbhavantīti jarāmaraṇasaṃgṛhītā evaṃ te. nāṃgāṃtaram ity avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:5850: [Tib. 288a] tatra sattvāsattvasaṃkhyātasya viṣayasya pariṇāmād ātmabhāvapariṇāmāc caite bhavaṃti. daurmanasyasaṃprayukto vitarkaḥ śokaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5852: vicchinnavegaṃ daurmanasyam upāyāsaḥ. śokaparidevapūrvakaḥ śrama upāyāsa
T07yabhkvyu:5853: ity apare. bālo hīti vistaraḥ. bālaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ saṃskāramātram iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5854: mātragrahaṇam ātmapratiṣedhārtham. aprajānann ity āveṇikīm avidyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:5855: darśayati. ātmadṛṣṭy asmimānābhiniviṣṭaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ kāyādibhiḥ kāyavāṅmanobhis trividhaṃ karma puṇyāpuṇyāniṃjyalakṣaṇam ārabhate.
T07yabhkvyu:5856: āniṃjyam iti. igiḥ prakṛtyantaraṃ tasyaivaitad rūpaṃ. ejater etat rūpam
T07yabhkvyu:5857: āneṃjyam iti vā pāṭhaḥ. āyatisukhārthaṃ puṇyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5859: sukhaduḥkhāsukhārtham āniṃjyam iti. rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ. sukhārtham ā tṛtīyād dhyānāt. tasmād ūrdhvam aduḥkāsukhārthaṃ. aihikasukhārtham apuṇyam iti. ihasukhāpekṣayā tat kṛtaṃ nāyatisukhāpekṣayety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5860: karmākṣepavaśād yathoktaṃ karmāvedhavaśāt. tāṃtāṃ gatiṃ narakādikāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:5861: gacchati. jvālāgamanayogena. yathā dīrghā tṛṇānusaktā jvālā [Tib. 288b]
T07yabhkvyu:5863: antarābhavasaṃbandhenātiviprakṛṭadeśām api tāṃtāṃ gatiṃ gacchati. evaṃ ca kṛtveti. yadi saṃskārapratyayaṃ antarābhavapratisaṃdhicittam upādāya yāvad upapattikṣaṇaḥ sarvāsau vijñānasaṃtatiḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam abhipretaṃ tad upapannaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:5864: vijñānāṃganirdeśe vijñānāṃgasya tṛtīyasya nirdeśe. vijñānaṃ katamat. ṣaḍ vijñānakāyā iti. anyathā hi yadi ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ saṃtatir nābhipretā
T07yabhkvyu:5865: syāt. saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ pratisaṃdhicittam evābhipretaṃ syāt. atra ṣaḍ vijñānakāyā iti noktaṃ syāt. evaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ syāt. vijñānaṃ katmat.
T07yabhkvyu:5866: manovijñānam iti. na hi pratisaṃdhikṣaṇe paṃcavijñānakāyasaṃbhavo 'sti.
T07yabhkvyu:5868: chedasaṃdhānavairāgyahānicyutyupapattayaḥ manovijñṇa eveṣṭā iti vacanāt. vibhaṃga evaṃ nirdeśād iti. pratītyasmutpādasūtre nāmarūpavibhaṃga evaṃ nirdeśāt. nāma katamat. catvāro 'rūpiṇaḥ skandhā
T07yabhkvyu:5869: iti. rūpaṃ katamat. yatkimcid rūpam iti vistareṇa. yāvad yac cedaṃ rūpaṃ yac ca nāma. (Abhidh-k-vy 300) tad ubhayaṃ nāmarūpam ity ucyata [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:5870: 289a] iti. kāmatṛṣṇeti. kāmāvacarī tṛṣṇā. rūpatṛṣṇeti. yā sukhāyāṃ triṣu
T07yabhkvyu:5872: ārūpyāvacarī. kāmādīnām upādānam iti. kāmyanta iti kāmāḥ. guṇyanta iti guṇāḥ. kāmā eva guṇāḥ kāmaguṇāḥ. ke punas te.
T07yabhkvyu:5873: rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyāni. dṛṣṭayo dvāṣaṣṭi yathā brahmajāla iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5875: ādiśabdena mṛgavratādīni gṛhyante. nirgranthādīnām iti. ādiśabdena pāṇḍarabhikṣvādīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ. brāhṃaṇetyādivistaraḥ. brāhmaṇānāṃ daṇḍājinaṃ pāśupatānāṃ jaṭābhasma. parivrājakānāṃ tridaṇḍamauṇḍyaṃ ādiśabdadvayena kāpālikādīnāṃ kapāladhāraṇādīni gṛhyante. tatsamādānaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:5876: śīlavratopādānaṃ. ātmeti vādo 'sminn ity ātmavādaḥ. yathoktaṃ. ye kecic chramaṇā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ. [Tib. 289b] samanupśyaṃti sarve ta imān eva paṃcopādānaskandhān iti vistaraḥ. ātmadṛṣṭyasmimānāv ity apara ātmavādam āhuḥ. ātmano hy asattvād ātmavādopādānām iti vādaśabdopanyāse prayojanaṃ darśayati. bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjana iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5877: yasya pūrvābhyāsavāsanānirjātopapattilābhikā prajñā nāsti. sa bālaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5878: yasyāgamajā nāsti. so 'śrutavān. yasyādhigamajā satyābhisamayajā nāsti. sa
T07yabhkvyu:5879: pṛthagjanaḥ. prajñaptim anupatita iti. yathā saṃjñā yathā ca vyavahāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5880: tathānugata ity arthaḥ. teṣām iti kāmādīnāṃ. chandarāga iti. aprāpteṣu viṣayeṣu prārthanā chandaḥ. prāpteṣu rāgaḥ. teṣu kāmādiṣu yaḥ chandarāgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5882: yathoktā eva sāvidyā dvidhā dṛṣṭivivecanād upādānānīty
T07yabhkvyu:5883: abhiprāyaḥ. paunarbhavikam iti punarbhavaphalaṃ. idam atra bhavasyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:5884: idam atra bhavasya svalakṣaṇaṃ svabhāva ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5885: vijñānāvakrāntiyogeneti. jvālāgamanayogenāntarābhavasaṃbandhād anāgataṃ janma jātiḥ paṃcaskaṃdhikā nāmarūpasvabhāvatvāt. jarāmaraṇaṃ yathā nirdiṣṭaṃ sūtra iti. jarā katamā. yat tat khālityaṃ [Tib. 290a] pālityaṃ iti vistaraḥ. maraṇaṃ katamat. yā teṣāṃteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmāttasmāc cyutiś cyavanam iti vistaraḥ. kevalasyātmarahitasyety arthaṃ darśayati. mahata ity anādyantasya. duḥkhaskandhasyeti duḥkhasamūhasya. sa eva tu
T07yabhkvyu:5886: vaibhāṣikanyāyo yaḥ pūrvam ukta (Abhidh-k-vy 301) iti. dvādaśa paṃcaskaṃdhikā avasthā dvādaśaṃgānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:5887: (III.28cd) yā na vidyā. cakṣurādiṣv api prasaṃga iti. cakṣuḥśrotrādīny avidyā prasajyante. tāny api hi na vidyeti kṛtvā. na kiṃcid syād iti. yadi vidyāyā abhāvo 'vidyā adravyaṃ syād ity arthaḥ. na caitad yuktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5888: pratyayabhāvenopadeśāt. tadvipakṣa iti. virodhe nañ iti darśayati. na tu yaḥ kaścid anyo mitrād iti. na paryudāsamātra iti darśayati. nāpi mitrabhāva iti. nābhāvārtha iti darśayati. adharmānārthakāryādayaś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:5891: kecid anye dharmādibhyaś [Tib. 290b] cakṣurādayaḥ. nāpi dharmādyabhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5892: evam avidyāpīti vistaraḥ. kuta etat. pratyayabhāvenopadeśāt.
T07yabhkvyu:5893: avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti. na cāvidyāyā anyeṣāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ pratyayabhāvenopadeśo yuktaḥ. arhatāṃ saṃskārasaṃbhavāt. na cābhavasya.
T07yabhkvyu:5895: (III.29) saṃyojanaṃ yāvad yogaś cāvidyocyata iti. avidyāsaṃyojanaṃ yāvad avidyāyoga iti sūtreṣūcyate. na cābhāvamātraṃ tathā bhavitum arhatīti. na saṃyojanādi bhavitum arhatīty arthaḥ. na cāpi cakṣurādayas tathā bhavitum arhaṃtīty adhikṛtaṃ. sā ca dṛṣṭisvabhāveti nāvidyā yujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5896: dṛṣṭyavidyayoḥ saṃyojanāditvena pṛthakpāṭhāt. yā tarhi na dṛṣṭir iti. yā kliṣṭā prajñā rāgādisaṃprayuktā.
T07yabhkvyu:5898: iti. avidyāsaṃprayuktatvād ity arthaḥ. kathaṃ ca dṛṣṭir avidyayā
T07yabhkvyu:5899: saṃprayuktā. yasmād avidyālakṣaṇo mohaḥ kleśamahābhūmau paṭhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5900: kleśamahābhūmikāś ca sarve 'pi mahābhūmikaiḥ saha saṃprayujyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5901: dṛṣṭyā satkāyadṛṣṭyādikayā prajñāsvabhāvayā avidyā saṃprayujyata iti
T07yabhkvyu:5902: gamyate. tasmān nāvidyā prajñā. dvayoḥ prajñādravyayor [Tib. 291a]
T07yabhkvyu:5903: asaṃprayogāt. avidyopakliṣṭā prajñā na viśudhyatīti. etad udāharaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:5904: yenāvidyā prajñāyā arthāntarabhūteti. na ca saiva prajñā tasyāḥ prajñāyā
T07yabhkvyu:5905: upakleśo yukta iti. prajñopakleśadeśanāyāṃ prajñāyā arthāntarabhūtā
T07yabhkvyu:5906: avidyā. upakleśatvena nirdiṣṭatvāt. rāgavat. ata āha. yathā cittasyānya iti vistaraḥ. vyavakīryamāṇā na viśudhyatīti. antarāntarotpadyamānayā kliṣṭayā prajñayā vyavakīryamāṇā kṣaṇāntarotpannā kuśalā prajñā na viśudhyatīty arthaḥ. kiṃ tad avaśyaṃ rāgaparyavasthitam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5907: rāgasaṃprayuktam ity arthaḥ. upahataṃ tu tat tathā rāgeṇeti. na samudācaratā rāgeṇa. vāsanādhānena tad upahataṃ bhavati. tāṃ vāsanāṃ tad
T07yabhkvyu:5908: dauṣṭhulyaṃ vyāvartayato yoginaḥ tac cittaṃ vimucyate. evam avidyopahatā kliṣṭā prajñā na śudhyatīti. ataḥ prajñā cāvidyā ca na doṣa iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:5909: ko hi parikalpayan (Abhidh-k-vy 302) vāryata iti. parikalpanāmātram etad āgamanirapekṣam iti kathayati.
T07yabhkvyu:5910: yo 'pi manyate sarvakleśā avidyeti. bhadantaśrīlātaḥ. evaṃ manyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5911: avidyeti sarvakleśānām iyaṃ sāmānyasaṃjñā. [Tib. 291b] na rāgādikleśavyatiriktāvidyā nāmāstīti. kasmāt evaṃ manyate. buddhasūtrāt.
T07yabhkvyu:5912: na ca prajānāti na ca prajānātīty āyuṣman mahākauṣṭhila tasmād avidyocyata
T07yabhkvyu:5913: iti. satkāyadṛṣṭyādayo 'pi kleśā ajñānasvarūpā viparītagrahaṇata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5914: tasyāpy ata eveti vistaraḥ. tasya bhadantasyāta eva pratiṣedhavacanād
T07yabhkvyu:5915: vyudāsaḥ. pratiṣedhas tanmatasyety adhyāhāryaṃ. katham ity āhā.
T07yabhkvyu:5916: sarvakleśasvabhāvā hi satī saṃyojanādiṣu pṛthaṅ nocyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:5918: śeṣasaṃyojanāvyatirekāt. rāgo baṃdhanaṃ dveṣo bandhanam ity uktvā moho bandhanam iti. kāmarāgānuśaya ityādi uktvā avidyānuśaya iti. ogheṣv avidyaugha iti. yogeṣv avidyāyoga iti pṛthaṅ naivocyeta. kasmāt.
T07yabhkvyu:5919: parasparāsaṃprayogāt. na hi dṛṣṭir dṛṣṭyā saṃprayujyate. rāgo vā rāgeṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:5921: mahābhūmikasaṃprayoganiyamāt. cittam api cāvidyopakliṣṭam evoktaṃ bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:5922: [Tib. 292a] rāgopakliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ na vimucyata iti noktaṃ bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:5923: avidyopakliṣṭatvavacanenaiva rāgādyupakliṣṭatvasiddheḥ. atha mataṃ viśeṣaṇārthaṃ tathoktam iti. rāgalakṣaṇayāvidyayopakliṣṭacittaṃ na vimucyata iti. prajñāyām api viśeṣaṇaṃ kartavyaṃ syāt. rāgeṇa pratighena mānena veti mā bhūt sarvakleśagrahaṇaprasaṃga iti. iṣṭa iti cet. citte 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:5924: na viśeṣaṇaṃ kartavyaṃ syāt. avidyopakliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ na vimucyata ity evam
T07yabhkvyu:5926: saṃprakhyānaṃ prajñā jñānam ity eko 'rthaḥ. tathaiva dośo yathāvidyāyām
T07yabhkvyu:5927: iti. athāsaṃprakhyānam iti ko 'rthaḥ. yan va saṃprakhyānaṃ. cakṣurādiṣv api prasaṃgaḥ. saṃprakhyānābhāvas tarhi. evaṃ sati na kiṃ cit syāt. na caitad yuktam iti. atha saṃprakhyānavipakṣabhūtaṃ dharmāntaraṃ. tad idaṃ tathaiva na jñāyate. yathaivāvidyā. kiṃ tad iti. evaṃjātīyako 'pīti
T07yabhkvyu:5928: vistaraḥ. evaṃjātīyakaḥ karmaprabhāvita ity arthaḥ. tasmād avidyāyāḥ karmaṇaḥ kāritreṇa svabhāvo vijñātavyaḥ. asty asau kaścid dharma yo vidyāvipakṣa iti vidyāvipakṣatvaṃ tasyāḥ karmeti. [Tib. 292b] tadyathā cakṣuḥ katamat. yo rūpaprasādaś cakṣurvijñānasyāśraya iti. nanu ca rūpaprasāda iti svabhāvaprabhāvito 'sya nirdeśa iti. na. apratyakṣatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:5929: nityaṃ cakṣurvijñānānumeyatvāc ca. asmīti sattvamayateti. avijñātārtham
T07yabhkvyu:5930: etat. na tena sthavireṇāsyābhidheyam avadhāritaṃ. mayatā punaḥ sautrāṃtikair avidyā prakārabhinnā varṇyate. māno vā. yāsau sūtra ukteti
T07yabhkvyu:5933: bhadantadharmatrātasyābhiprāyaḥ. ācārya āha. asty eṣā mayatā. asti sūtre uktā mayatā. tatra jātinirdeśād ekavacanaṃ. sā tv avidyeti. kutaḥ kāraṇād etat paricchidyate. sāvidyeti. bhadantadharmatrātaḥ svābhiprāyaṃ vivṛṇoti.
T07yabhkvyu:5934: yata eṣā nānyaḥ kleśaḥ śakyate vaktum iti. kasmān na śakyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5935: tṛṣṇādṛṣṭyasmimānānāṃ pṛthagukteḥ. ācārya āha. nanu cānyo māna eva syād iti. asmimānād anyaḥ ṣaṇṇām anyatamaḥ sa ca mayatā. navidyety abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5936: atra tu punar vicāryamāṇe bahu vaktavyaṃ jāyata iti. atra punar vicāryamāṇe 'vidyāṃge [Tib. 293a] bahur ayaṃ grantho jāyate. yathoktam
T07yabhkvyu:5937: iti. tasmāt tiṣṭhatv etad etāvad evāstv iti. atha vānyo māṇa eva syāt. na punar avidyeti. kuta etad ity evamādike punar vicāre kriyamāṇe.
T07yabhkvyu:5938: uttarapratyuttaravacanena bahu vaktavyaṃ jāyate. tasmāt tiṣṭhatv etad alaṃ vicārāntareṇety
T07yabhkvyu:5939: (III.30a) atha nāmarūpam iti. avidyāṃganirdeśānantaraṃ saṃskārāṃgaṃ nirdeṣṭavyaṃ. tadanu vijñānāṃgaṃ. kim ity etad atikramyopanyaste. etad artham atra vakṣyaty ācāryaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5942: rūpaṃ paṃcendriyāṇy arthāḥ paṃcavijñaptir eva cety
T07yabhkvyu:5943: atra. nāmendriyārthavaśeneti vistaraḥ. nāmavaśena indriyavaśena arthavaśena cārtheṣu rūpādiṣu namatīti nāma. katamasya nāmno vaśeneti.
T07yabhkvyu:5944: nāmadvaividhyāt pṛcchati. ācāryas tv ācaṣṭe. yad idaṃ loke pratītim iti vistaraḥ. gaur aśva iti. samudāyapratyāyakam. rūpaṃ rasa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5946: yasmāt tannāmavaśena saṃjñākaraṇavaśenārtheṣv apratyakṣeṣv api vā namati
T07yabhkvyu:5947: pravartate. asya nāmno 'yam artha iti. indriyārthavaśena tu pratyakṣeṣu
T07yabhkvyu:5948: rupādiṣu namati utpadyate ity arthaḥ. [Tib. 293b] nāmni cāpy arthavaśena
T07yabhkvyu:5949: namati. asyārthasyedaṃ nāmeti. etasya punaḥ kena nāmatvam iti. etasya saṃjñākaraṇalakṣaṇasya nāmnaḥ kena kāraṇena nāmatvaṃ. teṣu teṣv artheṣu
T07yabhkvyu:5950: tasya nāmno namanād iti. yasmāt teṣv artheṣu catuḥskandhalakṣaṇaṃ nāma tan
T07yabhkvyu:5951: nāma namayati pravartayati. tasmād etasya nāmatvaṃ. namayatīti nāmeti kṛtvā. iha nikṣipta iti vistaraḥ. maraṇakāle nikṣipte kāye upapattyantare namanād gamanād arūpiṇo vedanādayaḥ skandhā nāmety ucyante. yathoktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:5952: mṛtasya khalu kālaṃ gatasya jñātaya imaṃ pūtikāyam agninā vā dahaṃti udake vā plāvayanti bhūmau vā nikhananti vātātapābhyāṃ vā pariśoṣaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānāṃ gacchati. yat punar idam ucyate. cittam iti (Abhidh-k-vy 304)
T07yabhkvyu:5953: vā mana iti vā vijñānam iti vā śraddhāparibhāvitaṃ śīlatyāgaśrutaprajñāparibhāvitaṃ. tad ūrdhvagāmi bhavati viśeṣagāmy āyatyāṃ svargopagam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5956: vijñānaṃ prativijñaptir manaāyatanaṃ ca tad ity atra. manaindriyasya punar niruddhasya anāgatena dharmeṇa rūpādinā
T07yabhkvyu:5957: utpatsyamānena vartamānena manovijñānena kathaṃ saṃnipātaḥ. yaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:5958: kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ. kāryaṃ manovijñānaṃ. kāraṇaṃ manaindriyaṃ. dharmaś ca rūpādiḥ. [Tib. 294a] ekakāryārtho veti. ekakāryam evārtha ekakāryārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5959: ekakāryatvam ity arthaḥ. katham ekakāryārtha ity āha. sarve ca te trayo
T07yabhkvyu:5961: ṣaṭṣaṭko dharmaparyāya iti. ṣaṭṣaṭkāny asminn iti ṣaṭṣatkaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5963: jñāpakaṃ. ananyatve hi satīndriyārthavijñāneṣūkteṣu sparśakāyavacanaṃ punar uktaṃ syāt. tataś ca ṣaṭṣaṭkatvaṃ hīyate. mā bhūd dharmāyatanād
T07yabhkvyu:5964: vedanātṛṣṇayoḥ. pṛthagbhāva iti. yadi pṛthaṅnirdeśāt pṛthagbhāvo bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:5965: vedanātṛṣṇe api dharmāyatanāt pṛthaṅ nirdiṣṭe. tayor api vedanātṛṣṇayor
T07yabhkvyu:5966: dharmāyatanāt pṛthagbhāvaḥ syāt. na ca tayoḥ pṛthagbhāva iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5967: dharmāyatanāntarbhāvāt. naiṣa doṣa iti vistaraḥ. naiṣa doṣa iti yathoktas tadvyatiriktasyāpi vedanātṛṣṇāvyatiriktasyāpi dharmāyatanasya saṃjñādisvabhāvasya bhāvād astitvāt. na caivam iti vistaraḥ. na caivaṃ bhavatas trayānāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśa ity evaṃ bruvāṇasya [Tib. 294b]
T07yabhkvyu:5968: sparśabhūtād indriyārthavijñānatrayād anyad asparśabhūtaṃ trayam indriyārthavijñānatrayam asti. yasya śeṣasyātra sūtre grahaṇaṃ syāt. ṣaṭ sparśakāyā iti prayojanavaśād apṛthagbhāve 'pi sparśabhūtāt trayāt. tasmād apṛthagbhāve 'pi vedanātṛṣṇayoḥ pṛthaṅnirdeśo yukto vineyakāryavaśāt. na tu bhavataḥ saṃnipātamātrasparśavādinaḥ kenacid api prayojanena ṣaṭ sparśakāyā iti pṛthaṅnirdeśo yuktaḥ. yasmāt ṣaṭ sparśakāyā iti vacanenendriyārthavijñānatrayam uktam iti tadavacanaṃ prāptam ity ataḥ ṣaṭṣaṭko dharmaparyāyā iti na sidhyet. mama tu sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:5970: tadvyatiriktadharmāyatanādyarthendriyavijñānaṣaṭkasaṃbhavāt. tasmāt ṣaṭ sparśakāyā iti pṛthaṅnirdeśād asti cittasaṃprayuktaṃ sparśākhyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:5971: dharmāntaram iti siddhaṃ. atha brūyād asau. indriyārthāv avijñānakau nirdiṣṭāv asmin sūtre. ṣaḍ ādhyātmikāni ṣaṭ bāhyānīti vacanāt. ata indriyaviṣayavijñanatrayaṃ sparśabhūtam ity asya śeṣasya jñāpanārtham atra grahaṇaṃ syāt. ṣaṭ (Abhidh-k-vy 305) sparśakāyā iti. asya samādheḥ pratiṣedhārtham idam ārabhyate. yady apīndriyārthau syātām avijñānakau.
T07yabhkvyu:5972: tatsabhāgāv ity arthaḥ. na tu punar vijñānam anindriyārthakaṃ. avaśyaṃ hi vijñānaṃ sendriyārthakaṃ bhavati. tac ca vijñānam apadiṣṭam atra ṣaḍ
T07yabhkvyu:5973: vijñānakāyā iti. [Tib. 295a] tasmāt triṣu nirdiṣṭeṣu indriyārthavijñāneṣu ṣaḍvijñānakāyavacanena punaḥ sparśagrahaṇam anarthakaṃ prāpnoti. ṣaṭ sparśakāyā iti. ataḥ saṃnipātād anyaḥ sparśa iti siddhaṃ. atra bhadantaśrīlāta āha. na khalv iti vistaraḥ. pūrvotpanne cakṣūrūpe kāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:5974: na tu vijñānasahotpanne. nāpi sarvacakṣurvijñānam iti. paścād utpannaṃ pūrvayoś cakṣūrūpayoḥ. na sahotpannayoḥ. ato yeṣāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ. te vijñānendriyaviṣayāḥ sparśabhāvena vyavasthitāḥ. ṣaṭ sparśakāyā ity asmin
T07yabhkvyu:5975: sūtre. tad idam anyathā na jñāpitaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:5976: na vā evaṃ pathanti. vai iti nipātaḥ. na vai evaṃ paṭhantīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5977: kathaṃ punaḥ paṭhanti. ya eṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃgateḥ saṃnipātāt samavāyād
T07yabhkvyu:5978: utpannaḥ. sa sparśa iti paṭhanti. kāraṇe vā kāryopacāro 'yam iti. saṃgatau saṃnipāte samavāye kāraṇe kāryopacāraḥ sparśa iti. yathā sukho buddhānām utpāda
T07yabhkvyu:5979: iti. atibahuvistaeṇa prakāreṇa visartuṃ śīlam asyā iti
T07yabhkvyu:5981: (III.30cd) adhivacanam ucyate nāmeti. adhyucyate 'nenety adhivacanaṃ. vāṅ nāmni pravartate. nāmārthaṃ [Tib. 295b] dyotayatīty adhivacanaṃ nāma. tad kila nāmasya manovijñanasaṃprayuktasyādhikaṃ bāhulyenālambanam. ato
T07yabhkvyu:5982: 'dhivacanasaṃsparśa iti. sparśaḥ saṃsparśa ity eko 'rthaḥ. manovijñānena nīlaṃ vijānātīti. abhidheyaṃ vijānātīty arthaḥ. nīlam iti ca vijānātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:5983: asyārthasyedaṃ nāmeti vijānāti. eka āśrayaprabhāvita iti. prathama āśrayeṇa prabhāvitaḥ pratighāśrayaḥ saṃsparśaḥ pratighasya vā saṃsparśaḥ pratighasaṃsparśaḥ. ālaṃbanaprabhāvita iti. adhivacanād ālambanasaṃsparśaḥ adhivacane vā saṃsparśaḥ adhivacanasaṃsparśa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:5984: vacanam adhikṛtya vacanam avadhāryārtheṣu rūpādiṣu manovijñānasya
T07yabhkvyu:5985: pravṛttiḥ. na paṃcānāṃ cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ vacanam adhikṛtyārtheṣu pravṛttiḥ. atas tad evādhivacanaṃ manovijñānaṃ vacane pravartate
T07yabhkvyu:5987: saṃsparśasyādhivacanasaṃsparśaḥ. tena cāyaṃ dvitīyaḥ saṃsparśaḥ saṃprayogaprabhāvita ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:5990: iti. vidyāvidyetaraś ca vidyāvidyetare. te eva sparśā
T07yabhkvyu:5992: vidyāhvaḥ avidyāhvaḥ tābhyām itaraś cety arthaḥ. vidyety anāsravā prajñā.
T07yabhkvyu:5993: avidyā kliṣṭam ajñānam. naivavidyānāvidyā yā kuśalasāsravā yā cānivṛtāvyākṛtā prajñā. [Tib. 296a] tatsaṃprayuktā ete yathākramaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:5995: avidyāsaṃsparśasya sarvakleśasaṃprayuktasyābhīkṣṇasamudācārī nityasamudācārī ekadeśaḥ. tasya grahaṇād dvau sparśau bhavato
T07yabhkvyu:5997: iti. sukhasya vedaḥ sukhavedaḥ. sukhavede sādhuḥ sukhavedyaḥ. sukhaṃ yā vedyam asminn iti sukhavedyaḥ. sa ādir eṣām iti sukhavedyādayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:5998: sukhavedanādihitatvād iti. sukhavedanāyai hitaḥ sukhavedanīyaḥ. prāk krītāc chaḥ. vedyate tad vedayituṃ vā śakyam iti. vedyata iti karmamātre
T07yabhkvyu:5999: kṛtya iti darśayati. vedayituṃ śakyam ity arhe kṛtyatṛcaś cety asminn arthe kṛtya iti darśayati. ta ete ṣoḍaśeti. cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo yāvan manaḥsaṃsparśa iti ṣaṭ. punaḥ pratighasaṃsparśo 'dhivacanasaṃsparśo
T07yabhkvyu:6000: vidyāsaṃsparśo 'vidyāsaṃsparśo naivavidyānāvidyāsaṃsparśo vyāpādasaṃsparśo 'nunayasaṃsparśaḥ sukhavedanīyo duḥkhavedanīyo 'duḥkhāsukhavedanīyaś ca sparśa iti ṣoḍaśa.
T07yabhkvyu:6003: iti. athoktam apy ucyate. na tarhīdaṃ vaktavyaṃ. yac coktaṃ yac ca
T07yabhkvyu:6006: [Tib. 296b] iti vācanāt. prakāranirdeśād adoṣaḥ. pūrvaṃ laksaṇam uktam
T07yabhkvyu:6008: jāte hīti vistaraḥ. jāte hi janye dharme dharmasya janakasya nāsti sāmarthyam sahotpannatvāt. pratijñāviśiṣṭam iti. pratijñāyā aviśiṣṭam etat
T07yabhkvyu:6009: sādhanam ity arthaḥ. yadi pratijñāviśiṣṭaṃ sādhanaṃ neṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6010: anyonyajanakaprasaṃgāt (Abhidh-k-vy 307) tarhi. kiṃ. kathaṃ sahotpannayor janyajanakabhāvaḥ sidhyatīty adhikṛtam. anena pratijñādoṣa udgrāhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6011: asti sahotpannayor janyajanakabhāva iti pratijñā pūrvābhyupagamavirodhinīti. iṣṭatvād adoṣa iti. purvābhyupagamaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:6012: darśayati. iṣtam idaṃ. sūtre tv aniṣṭam iti. iṣṭam idam abhidharme
T07yabhkvyu:6014: iti. sūtre tv aniṣṭaṃ. tat pratipādayann āha. cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaṃ pratītyotpadyate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā
T07yabhkvyu:6015: sūtraprāmāṇyenānyonyaphalatvaṃ bhaṃktvā sahotpannakāryakāraṇabhāvabibhaṃkṣayā āha. janakadharmātikramāc cāyuktam iti. janakasyāyaṃ dharmaḥ prasiddho yā bhinnakālatā. tadyathā pūrvaṃ bījaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:6016: paścād aṃkura ityādi. tatrāpi [Tib. 297a] pūrvam indriyārthau paścād
T07yabhkvyu:6017: vijñānam iti. prathamakṣaṇotpannāv indriyārthau vijñānaṃ tu dvitīye kṣaṇa
T07yabhkvyu:6018: iti. yathā tarhi chāyāṃkurayor iti. kiṃ. sahotpannayor janyajanakabhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6019: utpanna eva hy aṃkuraś chāyāṃ janayati. na prathame kṣaṇe 'ṃkuro niśchāyo bhavati dvitīye sacchāya iti. evaṃ sparśavedanayor apīti. anayor api chāyāṃukurayoḥ pūrvasāmagrī hetur iti śakyaṃ vaktuṃ. sahabhūhetunirdeśe tv ayam artha ukta iti na punar ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6020: sparśād uttarakālaṃ vedanety apara iti bhadantaśrīlātaḥ. so 'sau trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśa iti. yo 'yaṃ janakajanitabhāvaḥ. vedanā tṛtīye kṣaṇe
T07yabhkvyu:6021: iti. indriyārthakṣaṇaḥ prathamaḥ vijñānotpattikṣaṇo dvitīyo vedanotpattikṣaṇas tṛtīya iti. na sarvatra vijñāne vedanā prāpnotīti.
T07yabhkvyu:6022: vijñānakṣaṇe dvitīye vedanāyā abhāvāt. na ca sarvavijñānaṃ sparśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6023: vedanākṣaṇe tṛtīye vijñānaṃ na sparśaḥ. pūrvadvitīyakṣaṇayoḥ sparśa eva
T07yabhkvyu:6024: vidhīyate. pūrvasparśahetukā hy uttarasparśe vedanā. yo 'yam idānīṃ dvitīyaḥ kṣaṇaḥ sparśabhāvenoktaḥ. tatra pūrvasparśahetukā prathamakṣaṇavijñānahetukā [Tib. 297b] vedanotpadyate. tatsparśapūrvikāpy anyasminn ity evaṃ sarvatra vijñāne vedanā prāpnoti. sarvaṃ ca vijñānaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:6025: sparśa iti. te ca sparśāḥ savedanakā iti bhinnālambanayor iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6026: bhinnam ālambanam anayoḥ. tau bhinnālambanau. pūrvasya rūpam ālambanam
T07yabhkvyu:6027: uttarasya śabdaḥ tayor bhinnālambanayoḥ pūrvasparśahetukā rūpālambanasparśahetukā uttaratra sparśe śabdālambane yad vedanotpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6028: ity etad ayuktaṃ. kathaṃ hi nāmeti doṣam āviṣkaroti.
T07yabhkvyu:6029: anyajātīyālambanasparśasaṃbhūtā rūpaprakārālambanāt sparśāt saṃbhūtā vedanā anyālambanā bhaviṣyati. śabdālaṃbanā bhaviṣyati. vidhurakāraṇatvāt
T07yabhkvyu:6030: kāryasyāsaṃbhāvanā. yadā hi rūpālambanāt sparśāt saṃbhūtā vedanā
T07yabhkvyu:6031: rūpālambanaiva vedanā bhaviṣyati. tadā pūrvasparśahetukottaratra sparśe
T07yabhkvyu:6032: vedaneti yuktaṃ. yadā tu rūpālambanāt (Abhidh-k-vy 308) sparśāc chabdālambanā vedanotpadyate. tadā katham etad yokṣyate. kāraṇānurūpaṃ hi loke kāryaṃ dṛśyate. atha mataṃ rūpālambanāt sparśāt saṃbhūtā vedanā
T07yabhkvyu:6033: śabdālambanasparśasaṃprayuktāpi rūpālambanā bhavatīti. ata idam āha. yena vā cittena saṃprayuktā. tato bhinnālambaneti. tataḥ śabdālambanāc cittād
T07yabhkvyu:6034: bhinnālambanā. [Tib. 298a] yata utpannā rūpālambanā. tena samālambanety arthaḥ. kathaṃ cāsau tena saṃprayuktety ucyate. samaṃ prayuktā hi
T07yabhkvyu:6035: saṃprayuktā. yady abhinnāśrayatvāt kathaṃ śrotrāśrayotpannā satī rūpālambanā bhaviṣyati. kathaṃ na bhaviṣyati. cittacaittānām
T07yabhkvyu:6037: doṣaḥ. sa doṣaḥ pradarśyate. yadi tāvad rūpālambanāt sparśād utpannā vedanā śabdādyālambanāntaram ālambate. sa rūpālambanaḥ sparśaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:6038: sukhavedanīyo yāvad aduḥkhāsukhavedanīya iti na prāpnoti. ekālambanayā tu vedanayā tathā nirdeśo yukta iti. astu tarhīti vistaraḥ. yady evaṃ doṣo
T07yabhkvyu:6039: 'stu tarhi. tasmiṃ kāle. kasmiṃ kāle. śabdālaṃbanakāle. sparśabhūtaṃ vijñānam avedanakaṃ. tasmāc ca śabdālambanād yat pūrvaṃ vijñānaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:6040: savedanakaṃ tan na sparśaḥ. evaṃ hi nirdoṣaṃ bhavatīti. anyathā hi yadi
T07yabhkvyu:6041: pūrvotpannaṃ savedanakaṃ vijñānaṃ sparśaḥ syāt. tadaivaṃ sparśapratyayā vedaneti yathokto doṣaḥ syāt. punaḥ kāraṇaṃ. kiṃcid vijñānam avedanakaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6042: kiṃcic ca na sparśaḥ pratyayavaidhuryāt. vidhurā hi pratyatā
T07yabhkvyu:6043: vipratibhandhenāvasthitāḥ. na hi sarvaḥ samanantarapratyayo vedanāpratyayaṃ sparśabhūtaṃ vijñānaṃ [Tib. 298b] janayituṃ samartha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6044: tad evaṃ tasya bhinnālambanaṃ vijñānam ekāntenāvedanakaṃ. tadutpādakaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:6045: cāsparśabhūtaṃ. yadi tu rūpālambanāc cakṣurvijñānād anantaraṃ rūpālambanam
T07yabhkvyu:6046: eva cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate. manovijñānaṃ vā. tat savedanakaṃ pūrvotpannaṃ sparśa iti. evaṃ satīti. mahābhūmikaniyamo bhidyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6047: sparśavedanayoḥ paryāyeṇa niyamāt. tisrā bhūmaya iti. savitarkā savicārā kāmadhātuḥ prathamaṃ ca dhyānam. avitarkā vicāramātrā dhyānāntaram.
T07yabhkvyu:6048: avitarkā avicārā dvitīyād dhyānāt prabhṛti yāvad bhavāgraṃ. kuśalā bhūmiḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ. evam akuśalā avyākṛtāḥ. śaikṣī bhūmiḥ śaikṣasyānāsravā
T07yabhkvyu:6049: dharmāḥ. aśaikṣī aśaikṣasyānāsravā dharmāḥ. naiva śaikṣīnāśaikṣī bhūmiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:6050: sāsravā dharmāḥ. asaṃskṛtā iha nocyante. caittasambandhāt. tad ya etasyām
T07yabhkvyu:6051: iti vistaraḥ. tad iti vākyopanyāse. ya iti ye caitasikāḥ. etasyāṃ sarvasyāṃ bhūmāv iti. savitarkasavicārāyāṃ bhūmau. yāvan naivaśaikṣīnāśaikṣyāṃ bhūmau. te mahābhūmikāḥ vedanācetanādayo yathoktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6052: (Abhidh-k-vy 309) ye kuśalāyām eva bhūmau. [Tib. 299a] te kuśalamahābhūmikāḥ śraddhādayaḥ. ye kliṣtāyām eva. te kleśamahābhūmikāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6053: avidyādayo yathoktā eva. te punar yathāsaṃbhavam iti vistaraḥ. te punar mahābhūmikādayaḥ. ye yasyāṃ saṃbhavanti. te tasyāṃ paryāyeṇa. na tu sarve
T07yabhkvyu:6054: yugapat. ity apare. tadyathā vedanā sarvāsu bhūmiṣu bhavaty api na yugapat saṃjñācetanāsparśamanaskārādibhir bhavati. tathā sparśo vedanādibhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6055: tathā kuśalāyāṃ vitarkādaya ityevamādikaṃ. apare punar evaṃ vyācakṣate.
T07yabhkvyu:6056: yathā paṃcaskaṃdhake likhitaṃ. tathedaṃ grahītavyam iti. tadyathā chandaḥ katamaḥ. abhipretavastuny abhilāṣaḥ. anabhiprete nāsti chanda ity
T07yabhkvyu:6057: abhiprāyaḥ. adhimokṣaḥ katamaḥ. niścite vastuni tathaivāvadhāraṇaṃ. smṛtiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:6058: katamā. saṃstute vastuny asaṃpramoṣaḥ. cetaso 'bhilapanatā. samādhiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:6059: katamaḥ. upaparīkṣye vastuni cittasyaikāgratā. prajñā katamā. tatraiva pravicayo yogāyogavihito 'nyathā cety evamādiḥ paṃcaskaṃdhakagrantho
T07yabhkvyu:6060: draṣṭavyaḥ. tatra hy uktaṃ paṃca sarvatragāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6063: akuśalamahābhūmikās tu pāṭhaprasaṃgenāsaṃhitā iti. sūtrādiṣu pāṭhāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6064: kuśalam akuśalam avyākṛtam ity evaṃ pāṭhaprasaṃgenāsaṃhitāḥ. adhyāropitāḥ paścād ity arthaḥ. pūrvaṃ na paṭhyaṃte sma. prakaraṇapāde mahābhūmikāḥ kuśalamahābhūmikāḥ kleśamahābhūmikāḥ parīttakleśamahābhūmikāś ceti caturvidhā paṭhyante. sahajātā ity ucyante. na sparśasahajātā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6065: aviśeṣitatvād ete vedanādayaḥ parasparasahajātāḥ. na tu sparśenety
T07yabhkvyu:6066: arthaparigraheṇa parihartavyaṃ sūtram ity arthaḥ. maitrīsahagatam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6067: ayaṃ sahaśabdo nāvaśyaṃ yugapadbhāve samanaṃtare 'pi dṛṣṭaḥ. na hi maitryāḥ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṃgasya ca samavadhānam asti. naitryā
T07yabhkvyu:6068: ekāntasāsravatvāt. smṛtisaṃbodhyaṃgasya caikāntānāsravatvāt. tasmād ajñāpakam etat. saṃdṛṣṭā iti. sahotpannā ity abhiprāyaḥ. tatra hi sūtra
T07yabhkvyu:6069: iti. yatraivoktaṃ. yā vedanā yā cetanā yā ca saṃjñeti vistareṇa. tatra sūtra ity arthaḥ. tan na vijñāyata iti vistaraḥ. kiṃ tāvad ayam eṣāṃ vedanādīnāṃ ālambananiyamaḥ ālambane niyamaḥ. yad evālambanaṃ vedayate.
T07yabhkvyu:6070: tad eva cetayate yāvad vijñānaṃ vijānātīti. [Tib. 300a] utāho kṣaṇaniyamaḥ yasminn eva kṣaṇe vedayate. tasminn eva yāvad vijānātīti. vayaṃ brūmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6071: ālambananiyamo 'yam iti. tasmān na sūtravirodha ity abhiprāyaḥ. ācārya
T07yabhkvyu:6072: āha. tatraiva sūtre āyuruṣmaṇoḥ sāhabhāvye saṃsṛṣṭavacanāt siddhaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:6073: kṣaṇaniyama iti. āyur uṣmā ca saṃsṛṣṭau. imau dharmau na visaṃsṛṣṭāv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6075: anālambanatvāt. tad evaṃ sādhitaṃ bhavati. avaśyaṃ sahotpannāni vedanāsaṃjñācetanāvijñānāni. tatra sūtre saṃsṛṣṭavacanenoktatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6076: āyuruṣmavad iti. tad katham iti vistaraḥ. tat kathaṃ vijñānaṃ cāsti. na ca trayāṇām indriyaviṣayavijñānānāṃ saṃnipātaḥ. tasmād avaśyaṃ vijñānāstitve
T07yabhkvyu:6077: saṃnipāto 'bhyupagantavyaḥ. saṃnipātaś ca te sparśa iti. tenedaṃ te virudhyate. na sarvavijñānaṃ sparśa iti. saṃnipāto vā na sparśa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6078: punaḥsaṃdhikaraṇaṃ cātra draṣṭavyam iti. pūrvatrāsiddham iti sakāralopasyāsiddhatvād guṇo na prāpnoti. parihāras tu. īṣadarthe 'yaṃ nañ
T07yabhkvyu:6079: draṣṭavyaḥ. īṣatsiddham asiddham ity ataḥ siddhatvāt sakāralopasya guṇo
T07yabhkvyu:6080: bhavati. saiṣa dāśarathī rāma iti yathā.
T07yabhkvyu:6081: (III.32cd) ṣaṭ saumanasyopavicārā iti vistaraḥ. cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā
T07yabhkvyu:6082: saunanasyasthānīyāni rūpāṇi upavicarati. śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā
T07yabhkvyu:6083: saumnanasyasthānīyāṃ śabdān upavicarati. evaṃ yāvan manasā dharmān vijñāya saumanasyasthānīyān [Tib. 300b] dharmān upavicarati. evaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi
T07yabhkvyu:6084: dṛṣṭvā daurmanasyasthānīyāny upekṣāsthānīyāni ceti vistareṇa yojyaṃ. trayo
T07yabhkvyu:6086: manovijñānamātrasaṃprayogāt. ṣaḍ iti. rūpādiviśayaṣaṭkabhedāt. tribhir api sthāpaneti. yad vedanādravyaṃ manovijñānamātrasaṃprayuktam ekaṃ. tat saumanasyādisvabhāvatrayabhedāt tridhā bhidyate. tat punaḥ pratyekaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:6087: viṣayaṣaṭkabhedāt ṣoḍhā bhidyate. ity aṣṭādaśa bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:6089: syāt. saṃprayogavyavasthāpanāyām asatyāṃ manopavicārā ity eva na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6090: aṣṭādaśavyatiriktāś ca syuḥ. rūpādiviṣayaṣaṭkālambanavyavasthāpanāyām asatyāṃ pratyekaṃ saumanasyādiṣodhābhedenāṣṭādaśa manopavicārā iti na
T07yabhkvyu:6091: syāt. tasmāt tribhir api vyavasthāpaneti siddhaṃ. asaṃbhinnālambanā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6093: rūpādiviṣayapaṃcakavyatiriktadharmālambanāḥ. te dharmopavicārā asaṃbhinnālambanāḥ. ye tu rūpādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ dvau tṛīn [Tib. 301a]
T07yabhkvyu:6094: yāvat ṣaḍ api viṣayān ālambante. te saṃbhinnālambanāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6095: manaḥ kileti. kilaśabdaḥ paramatadyotakaḥ. manaḥ kila pratītyāśritya
T07yabhkvyu:6096: viṣayān upavicaranty ālambanta ity arthaḥ. upavicārayantīti pravartayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:6097: katham ity āha. vedanāvaśena manaso viṣayeṣu punaḥpunar vicāraṇād iti
T07yabhkvyu:6099: nāpy upavicāriketi. asantīrikety arthaḥ. ayoga ity asaṃbhavaḥ. yadi mana evāśritā vedanā manopavicāraḥ. tṛīye dhyāne yat sukhaṃ. tan mana evāśritaṃ. (Abhidh-k-vy 311) na cakṣurindriyādyāśritam iti. tasya kasmān manopavicāreṣv agrahaṇaṃ. āditaḥ kileti viṣtaraḥ. ādāv āditaḥ. kileti
T07yabhkvyu:6100: paramate. kāmadhātau manobhūmikaṃ sukḥaṃ nāsti. tasmān na tan
T07yabhkvyu:6101: manopavicāraḥ. ataḥ paścād api tṛtīye dhyāne sukhendriyasya manaāśritatve
T07yabhkvyu:6103: daurmanasyopavicāraḥ. naivaṃ. sukhopavicārasya pratidvaṃdvena duḥkhopavicāro 'sti. manovijñānanāśritatvād duḥkhasya. ataḥ sarvatra tat
T07yabhkvyu:6106: paṃcabhir vijñānakāyair abhinirhṛtatvam utpāditatvam abhisaṃdhāya cetasikṛtvā etad uktaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇīti vistareṇa. manobhūmikās tv ete.
T07yabhkvyu:6107: tadyathā aśubhā. cakṣurvijñānābhinirhṛtā ca pūrvaṃ vinīlakādidarśanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6108: manobhūmikā ca samāhitatvāt. api tv iti. cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā yāvat kāyena spraṣṭavyāni spṛṣṭveti vacanād acodyam etat. yadi cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi
T07yabhkvyu:6109: paśyan saumanasyasthānīyāni rūpāṇy upavicaratīty uktaṃ syāt. yāvat kāyena spraṣṭavyāni spṛśann iti. syāc codyaṃ. na tv evam uktam ity acodyam
T07yabhkvyu:6110: evaitat. yo 'py adṛṣṭveti vistaraḥ. yo 'pi śrutvā parato manasopavicaraty
T07yabhkvyu:6111: ālambate. te 'pi tasya manopavicārāḥ. itarathā hīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6112: rūpadhātvālambanā rūpādyupavicārā na syuḥ. kāmadhātūpapannena rūpāvacarāṇāṃ rūpādīnām apratyakṣīkṛtatvāt. kāmadhātvālambanāś ca gandharasaspraṣṭavyopavicārā rūpadhātūpannasya na syuḥ. tasya gaṃdhādīnām aviṣayatvāt. yathā tu vyaktataraṃ. tathoktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6114: rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā tatsahacarāṃ chandān upavicarati. so 'pi tasya
T07yabhkvyu:6115: manopavicāraḥ. yathā tv anākulaṃ. tathoktaṃ. kathaṃ cānākulam ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:6117: rūpādyarthavyavacchedena coktam iti. anyathā hy ākulaṃ syāt. eakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāṃ chandān upavicaratīty evamādi.
T07yabhkvyu:6118: asti saṃtānaṃ niyamyeti. kasyacit sattvasya saṃtānam avekṣya. yad asya kiṃcitsaumanasyasthānīyam eva. yāvad upekṣāsthānīyam eva. na tv ālambanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6119: kiṃ. niyamya. kiṃkāraṇaṃ. tad eva hy ālambanaṃ kasyacit saumanasyasthānīyaṃ. kasyacin neti.
T07yabhkvyu:6120: (III.33-35ab) evaṃ yāvad ārūpapratisaṃyuktā iti kati rūpapratisaṃyuktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6121: teṣāṃ ca kati kimālambanāḥ. katy ārūpyapratisaṃyuktāḥ. teṣāṃ ca kati
T07yabhkvyu:6125: iti. kāme kāmāvacarāṇāṃ manopavicārāḥ sarve 'ṣṭādaśa santi. sa eva ca
T07yabhkvyu:6126: kāmadhātuḥ teṣāṃ sarveṣām ālambanaṃ. svo dhātur ālambanam eṣām iti svālambanā iti kārikāpadavigrahaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:6127: rūpī dvādaśagocara iti. rūpī dhātuḥ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ dvādaśānāṃ manopavicārāṇāṃ gocaraḥ. ṣaḍ gandharasopavicārān apāsyeti. dvau gandharasāv ālambanau
T07yabhkvyu:6128: saumanasyopavicārau hitvā dvau gandharasālambanau daurmanasyopavicārau hitvā dvau tadālambanāv eva copekṣopavicārau hitveti. [Tib. 302b] kasmāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6133: uttaro dhātur ārūpyadhātur ālambanaṃ. tatra rūpādyabhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6137: iti. aṣṭānām ālambanam aṣṭālambanaṃ. gandharasopavicārāṃś caturo hitveti.
T07yabhkvyu:6138: saumanasyopekṣopavicārau gandhālambanau dvau rasālambanau ca dvau hitvety
T07yabhkvyu:6141: iti. saumanasyopekṣādharmopavicārayoḥ prathamadvitīyadhyānabhūmikayor ārūpyadhātur ālambanaṃ. rūpādyabhāvāt. ṣaḍ upekṣopavicārā eva santi nānya iti. rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmālambanā upekṣopavicārā eva santi.
T07yabhkvyu:6142: saumanasyopavicārāṇām api tṛtīye caturthe cābhāvāt. gandharasālambanau tu tatra kāmāvacaragandharasālambanāv ity avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6145: yeṣāṃ tad vyavacchinnālambanam astīti. yeṣām ācāryāṇāṃ matena tad ākāśānaṃtyāyatanasāmaṃtakaṃ [Tib. 303a] vyavacchinnālambanaṃ pṛthakpṛthag rūpādyālambanam asamastālambanam ity arthaḥ. audārikādibhir ākārais tac
T07yabhkvyu:6146: caturthadhyānam ālambata iti ekeṣām ācāryāṇāṃ matam. yeṣām ācāryāṇāṃ matena paripiṇḍitālambanam eva tad ākāśānaṃtyāyatanasāmantakaṃ caturthadhyānabhūmikaskandhapaṃcakālambanam iti mataṃ. teṣām ācāryāṇāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6150: iti pakṣaḥ. na hi maulānām iti vistaraḥ. maulānām ārūpyāṇām adharo dhātur nālambanam adharabhūmikaṃ sāsravaṃ vastu nālambanam ity arthaḥ. paścāt
T07yabhkvyu:6154: (III.35c) prathameti vistaraḥ. prathamadvitīyadhyānabhūmikair aṣṭābhiḥ samanvāgataḥ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikaiś caturbhiḥ. katamair ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:6155: kliṣṭaiḥ. gandharasālaṃbanān paryudasya. tatra gandharasābhāvāt. kathaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6157: saumanasyopekṣopavicārāṇāṃ ṣaḍviṣayālambanavyavasthāpanāt. tatra svabhūmyālambanā rūpaśabdaspraṣṭavyadharmālambanāḥ saumanasyopavicārāś catvāraḥ kliṣṭāḥ. ye copekṣopavicārāḥ kliṣṭā eva catvāraḥ. taiḥ kāmadhātūpapanno rūpāvacarakuśalalābhī [Tib. 303]b samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6158: adharabhūmyupapanno hy ūrdhvabhūmikaiḥ kliṣṭaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati. na tu viśiṣṭaiś caturbhir gandharasālambanaiḥ. teṣām akliṣṭatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6159: rūpāvacarakuśalālābhitvāt. ca. nāsty akliṣṭarūpāvacaradharmalābha iti. na taiḥ samanvāgataḥ. tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikā api ṣaḍ evopekṣopavicārā
T07yabhkvyu:6160: uktāḥ. teṣāṃ ye svabhūmyālambanāḥ kliṣṭāḥ. taiḥ samanvāgatas tathā. yau tu gaṃdharasālambanau. na tau kliṣṭau. ataḥ pūrvoktenaiva nyāyena na tābhyāṃ samanvāgataḥ. kliṣṭenaiveti. nākliṣṭena kuśalasyābhāvāt. lābhī rūpāvacarasyeti vistaraḥ. kāmadhātūpapanna eva lābhī rūpāvacarasya kuśalasya cittasyānāgamyasaṃgṛhītasyāvītarāgaḥ kāmadhātoḥ sarvaiḥ kāmāvacarair aṣṭādaśabhir api samanvāgataḥ. prathamadhyānabhūmikair daśabhir iti. kathaṃ daśabhir ity āha. saumanasyopavicāraiḥ kliṣṭair gaṃdharasālambanāv apāsyeti. saumanasyopavicārāḥ sāmaṃtakeṣu na bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:6163: na tu gandharasālambanābhyāṃ. maulakuśalālābhenākliṣṭalābhābhāvāt. na hi kliṣṭaṃ dhyānam adharālambanam asti. ṣaḍbhir upekṣopavicārair anāgamyabhūmikair iti. atrāviśeṣābhidhānād upekṣopavicāraiḥ [Tib. 304a]
T07yabhkvyu:6164: kliṣṭair api caturbhiḥ samanvāgataḥ sāmantakasaṃgṛhītaiḥ. ṣaḍbhiś copekṣopavicāraiḥ kuśalaiḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 314) kāmadhātvālambanaiḥ svabhūmyālambanair api. dvitīyatṛtīyacaturthadhyānārūpyajaiḥ pūrvavad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6165: kathaṃ. sa eva kāmadhātāv upapanno lābhī rūpāvacarasya kuśalasya cittasyāvītarāgo dvitīyadhyānabhūmikair aṣṭābhiḥ. yair eva. alābhī gandharasālambanān apāsya. trtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikaiś caturbhiḥ kliṣṭair eva. gandharasālambanau paryudasya. ārūpyāvacareṇaikena
T07yabhkvyu:6166: kliṣṭenaiva. anayā vartanyā mārgeṇa śeṣam anugantavyaṃ. kathaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6167: prathamadhyānopapanno dvitīyadhyānabhūmikasya kuśalasya cittasyālābhī prathamadhyānabhūmikaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvāgataḥ. dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaiḥ kliṣṭair aṣṭābhiḥ. tṛtīyacaturthadhyānārūpyajaiḥ pūrvavat. lābhī dvitīyadhyānabhūmikasya kuśalacittasya tadbhūmyavītarāgaḥ sarvaiḥ prathamadhyānabhūmikaiḥ. dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaiṛ aṣṭābhiḥ. caturbhiḥ saumanasyopavicāraiḥ kliṣṭaiḥ. gandharasālambnāv apāsya. caturbhiś copekṣopavicārair dvitīyadhyānasāmantakasaṃgṛhītaiḥ. tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikais caturbhiḥ kliṣṭaiḥ. gandharasālambanau paryudasya. evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:6170: 304a] dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvāgataḥ. tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikaiś caturbhiḥ kliṣṭaiḥ. caturthadhyānārūpyajaiḥ pūrvavat. lābhī tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikasya kuśalacittasya tadbhūmyavītarāgaḥ sarvair dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaiḥ. tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikaiś caturbhir upekṣopavicāraiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:6171: kliṣṭair gandharasālambanāv apāsya. caturbhiś copekṣopavicārais tṛtīyadhyānasāmantakasaṃgṛhītaiḥ. caturthadhyānārūpyajaiḥ pūrvavat. eṣā
T07yabhkvyu:6172: dik. anayā diśā tṛtīyādiṣv api dhyāneṣūpapannasya svabhūmyūrdhvabhūmikair
T07yabhkvyu:6173: upekṣopavicārair eva kliṣṭaiḥ kuśalaiś ca samanvāgamo yathāsaṃbhavaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:6176: apara āheti. ayam eva śāstrakāraḥ. na hi yo yasmād iti vistaraḥ. yaḥ pudgalaḥ yasmād rūpāder vītarāgaḥ. na sa tad rūpādy ālambanam upavicarati.
T07yabhkvyu:6177: katham upavicarati. tatrānunīyate vā. pratihanyate vā. apratisaṃkhyāya vopekṣata ity evaṃ. yadāpratisaṃkhyāyopekṣate nābhujati. tadā 'kuśalatvam.
T07yabhkvyu:6178: ato 'pratisaṃkhyāyeti viśeṣaṇam. ataḥ sāsravā api na sarve. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:6179: sāṃkleśikāḥ. saṃkleśe bhavāḥ sāṃkleśikāḥ. saṃkleśānukūlāḥ. yaiḥ saumanasyādibhir mano viṣayān upavicarati. yeṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa ṣaṭ sātatā vihārā iti. yeṣāṃ sāṃkleśikānāṃ prativyūhena. satataṃbhavāḥ sātatāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6180: vihārā yogaviśeṣā bhavaṃti. te ca ṣaṭ. katham ity āha. cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā naiva sumanā [Tib. 305a] bhavati. nānunīyate. na durmanā na
T07yabhkvyu:6182: nābhujati. kim apratisaṃkhyāyāho svit pratisaṃkhyāyeti. viśeṣayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:6183: smṛtimān saṃprajānann iti. smṛtisaṃprayuktayā prajñayā pratisamīkṣamāṇa
T07yabhkvyu:6184: ity arthaḥ. evaṃ yāvan manasā dharmān vijñāyeti. viṣayaṣaṭkabhedāt ṣaṭ sātatā iti. na hy arhata iti vistaraḥ. arhato laukikaṃ kuśalaṃ sāsravaṃ dharmālambanaṃ dharmāyatanālambanam adhigamadharmālaṃbanaṃ vā saumanasyam
T07yabhkvyu:6185: asti. tasya hi buddhasāṃtānikāṃ guṇān saṃmukhīkurvataḥ kuśalam saumanasyam
T07yabhkvyu:6186: utpadyate. na tasyaiṣa pratiṣedho yujyate. kasya tarhi. yat tu tatsāṃkleśikaṃ manasa upavicārabhūtaṃ. tasyaiṣa pratiṣedho lakṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6187: tasmāt sāsravā api na sarve saumanasyādaya upavicārā iti. atra bhadantānaṃtavarmā āha. ayuktam etat. kasmāt. sūtre 'nyathānirdeśāt. sūtre hi bhagavatā na sāṃkleśikā evopavicārā uktāḥ. evaṃ hy āha. tatra bhikṣavo ya ime ṣaṭ saumanasyopavicārāḥ. tān āśritya tān pratiṣṭhāya. ya ime ṣaṭ
T07yabhkvyu:6188: saumanasyopavicārāḥ. tān prajahīta. tatra bhikṣavo ya ime ṣaḍ upekṣopavicārāḥ. tān āśritya tān pratiṣṭhāya. ya ime ṣaḍ upekṣopavicārāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6189: tān prajahīta. dve bhikṣavo upekṣe. nānātvasaṃniśritā ekatvasaṃniśritā ca.
T07yabhkvyu:6190: tatra bhikṣavo yeyam ekatvasaṃniśritā upekṣā. tām āśritya tām adhiṣṭhāya.
T07yabhkvyu:6191: yeyaṃ nānātvasaṃniśritā upekṣā. tāṃ [Tib. 305b] prajahīteti. etasmāt sūtrāj jñāyate. na sāṃkleśikā eva saumanasyādaya upavicārā iti. tad etad ajñāpakaṃ. prahāṇavacane 'pi sāṃkleśikatvavinivṛtteḥ. na hītareṇetarasya saṃniśrayaprahāṇavacane 'pi saty eṣāṃ manopavicārāṇāṃ sāṃkleśikatvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:6192: vinivartate. anyathāsaṃbhavāt. evaṃ āha. mānaṃ niśritya māna eva prahātavya iti. na tu jātu kvacin māno vyavadānikaḥ saṃbhavati. tasmāt kleśānāṃ parasparavirodhena vṛtter vṛttyantarasya cāpekṣayā guṇavattvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6193: gurulāghavaṃ abhisaṃdhāya sūtre vacanād adoṣaḥ. nandādayo 'tra nidarśanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6194: ataś caitad evaṃ. yad upekṣopavicārāṇām upekṣopavicārān eva prahāṇāya saṃniśrayatvena dideśa bhagavān. dve bhikṣava upekṣe ityādivacanāt. nanu ca gardhāśritanaiṣkramyāśritabhedena ṣaṭtriṃśac chāstṛpadānīti vacanāt
T07yabhkvyu:6196: ācāryasyāpi manopavicāravyatiriktās tatra saumanasyādayas saṃti. punas ta eveti vistaraḥ. ta evāṣṭādaśopavicārāḥ kecid bhavāśritā adhiṣvaṃgāśritāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6198: saṃsāraduḥkhād vā. gardhanaiṣkramyāśritabhedena. dvāv aṣṭādaśakau ṣaṭtriṃṣac chāstṛpadāni. tadbhedasya teṣāṃ manopavicārānāṃ dvidhābhedasya
T07yabhkvyu:6201: kleśās trīṇi dvayaṃ karma sapta vastv iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6202: evaṃ karmāṇi vipākotpattāv iti. āsannaṃ kāraṇam ity adhikṛtaṃ. kleśo 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:6203: hi kāraṇaṃ vipākasya. tat tu viprakṛṣṭaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6207: iti. vacanāt vyākhyātāḥ. na paryavasthānaiḥ svataṃtrair iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6208: īrṣyāmātsaryakrodhamrakṣaiḥ. svātantryam eṣām. avidyānirmuktair anyakleśair asaṃprayogāt. avidyā hi sarvatraiva vidyata iti. na
T07yabhkvyu:6210: pratisaṃdhibaṃdho na pratiṣidhyate. yady api sāvasthā mandiketi vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6212: upekṣāyāṃ cyutodbhavāv iti vedanāmāndyāt. yas tu pudgalo yatra kleśe 'bhīkṣṇaṃ satataṃ caritaḥ pravṛttaḥ āsannaś ca maraṇakālasya pudgalasya. tadānīṃ maraṇakāle sa eva kleśaḥ samudācarati samutthāya mithyāḍrṣṭyādir api. pūrvāvedhāt
T07yabhkvyu:6213: pūrvākṣepāt. pūrvābhyāsād ity arthaḥ. atha vā yo 'sau tadānīṃ kleśa upatiṣṭhate. tasya pūrvaṃ phalabhāvena parigrahāvedhāt ākṣepāt. sa tadānīm upatiṣṭhata iti. kāmarūpadhātvor [Tib. 306b] aparisaṃkhyānāt. sarva eva catvāro bhavāḥ santīti. traya evārūpyeṣu
T07yabhkvyu:6214: ārūpyeṣv eva ca traya iti avadhāraṇāt. anayor itarayor dhātvor bhavacatuṣṭayaṃ tu jñātaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:6216: (III.39-41) niṣyandābhāvād iti. mūtrapurīṣābhāvād ity arthaḥ. sūkṣmāṇāṃ vā sūkṣmā iti. sūkṣmāṇāṃ sa sūkṣma āhāraḥ. bālakā jātamātrāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6217: svedajantukādayo yūkādayaḥ. ādiśabdena garbhasthāḥ. kavaḍīkārāhārāḥ kāma
T07yabhkvyu:6218: iti. kāmadhātāv eva kavaḍīkārāhāra ity avadhāraṇaṃ. kasmād ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:6221: kavaḍīkṛtyābhyavaharaṇaṃ punar mukhena nāsikayā grāsavyavacchedād iti gandharasaspraṣṭavyāyatanāni sarvāṇy eva kavaḍīkāra ity ukte pṛcchati chāyātapajvālāprabhāsu (Abhidh-k-vy 317) teṣāṃ gandhādīnāṃ katham
T07yabhkvyu:6222: āhāratvaṃ. na hi tatratyānāṃ gaṃdhādīnāṃ kavaḍīkṛtyābhyavaharaṇam astīti.
T07yabhkvyu:6223: bāhulyena kila eṣa nirdeśa iti. na tatratyānāṃ gandhādīnāṃ kavaḍīkāratvam iti pratipadyate. bāhulikas tu nirdeśaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:6225: iti. kilaśabdaḥ paramatena svābhiprāyo 'dhikriyate. yāny api tv iti
T07yabhkvyu:6226: vistaraḥ. yāny api tu nābhyavahriyaṃte chāyādiṣu sthitiṃ cāharaṃti yāpanāṃ cāharaṃtī. tāny api sūkṣma āhāraḥ. snānābhyaṃgavat. yathā snānaṃ cābhyaṃgaś ca na kavaḍīkṛtyābhyavahriyate. āhāraś ca. tadvad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6228: iti. svākṣasya svendriyasya tenānanugrahāt. muktānāṃ ca. kāmadhātor anāgāmyarhatām ananugrahāt. na rūpāyatanam āhāraḥ. rūpāyatanaṃ cābhyavahārakāla iti. yasmin kāle antarmukhapraviṣṭa āhāro bhujyate cakṣurviṣayātītaḥ. tasmiṃ kāle svam indriyaṃ cakṣurindriyaṃ tanmahābhūtāni
T07yabhkvyu:6229: ca tasyendriyasya. yāni mahābhūtāni āśrayaḥ. tāni nānugṛhṇāti tad
T07yabhkvyu:6230: rūpāyatanaṃ. kuta evānyānīndriyāṇi śrotrādīny anugrahīṣyati. aviṣayatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6231: aviṣayo hi śrotrādīnāṃ rūpāyatanaṃ. dṛśyamānaṃ tarhi bhojanakāle
T07yabhkvyu:6232: 'nugrahīṣyatīty ata āha. yadāpi ca dṛśyamāna iti vistaraḥ. atha katham idaṃ gamyate. tadāpi tadālambanaḥ sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśa āhāro na rūpam
T07yabhkvyu:6233: iti. ata āha. muktānām iti vistaraḥ. yadi tad dṛṣyamānam āhārakṛtyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:6234: kuryāt. muktānām anāgāmyarhatāṃ kavaḍīkārāhāravītarāgāṇāṃ sumanojñam apy āhāraṃ paśyatāṃ anugrahaṃ kuryāt. yathā gandharasaspraṣṭavyāyatanāni indriyamahābhūtānām anugrahaṃ kurvanty abhyavahārakāle. tasmāt tadālambanaḥ sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśa āhāro bhavatīti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6235: sparśasaṃcetanāvijñā iti vijñety ādantam etat. prajñeti yathā. vijñānam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6237: trayas tu sparśādayaḥ sāsravā anāsravāś ca saṃbhavantīti atas ta eva viśeṣitāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:6240: na caivam anāsravā dharmā iti. na caivaṃ te bhūtānāṃ sthitaye yāpanāyai
T07yabhkvyu:6241: [Tib. 307b] sambhavaiṣiṇāṃ cānugrahāyeti. manonirjātatvād iti. nirvṛtter iti na tūpapatteḥ. mana ity avadhāraṇaṃ. ata eva bravīti. śuklaśoṇitādikaṃ kiṃcid bāhyam anupādāya bhāvād iti. ādiśabdena kardamapuṣpādīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6243: upapattyabhimukhī nirvṛttir janmāsyeti abhinirvṛttiḥ. savyābādham iti saduḥkhaṃ. savyābādham abhinirvartyeti. idam atra jñāpakaṃ. antarābhavo
T07yabhkvyu:6244: 'bhinirvṛttir iti. tathāsti pudgala iti vistaraḥ. asmāt sūtrāc catuṣkoṭikād abhinirvṛttir antarābhava iti. asti pudgalo yasyābhinirvṛttisaṃyojanaṃ prahīṇaṃ nopapattisaṃyojanaṃ prahīṇaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:6246: nābhinirvṛttisaṃyojanaṃ. asti yasyābhinirvṛttisaṃyojanaṃ ca prahīṇaṃ upapattisaṃyojanaṃ ca. asti yasya naivābhinirvṛttisaṃyojanaṃ prahīṇaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:6249: antarābhavasaṃyojanasyātyantāprahāṇāt. tad dhi bhikṣavaḥ prahīṇaṃ yad āryayā prajñayā prahīṇam iti vacanāt. tasya ca punarbhāvitvāt. tatra prathamā koṭir dvidhātuvītarāgasyānāgāminaḥ. dvitīyāntarāparinirvāyiṇaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6250: tṛtīyārhataḥ. caturthī tadanyeṣām asmadādeḥ. [Tib. 308a] pṛthagjanasya āryasya cāvītarāgasya kāmadhātuvītarāgasya rūpadhātāv upapadyamānasya
T07yabhkvyu:6251: ceti. bhūtā vārhanta iti. pūrvam evoktaḥ paryāyaḥ. bhūtā utpannāḥ saṃbhavaiṣiṇo 'ntarābhavikā iti. idānīm ayam aparaḥ paryāyaḥ. bhūtā arhantas traidhātukavītarāgatvāt. saṃbhavaiṣiṇaḥ satṛṣṇāḥ. traidhātuke
T07yabhkvyu:6253: sthitaya iti. avasthāpanāya. anugrahāyeti. punarbhavāya saṃbhavāyety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6254: sarve 'py ubhayatheti. sarve 'pi catvāra āhārāḥ. bhūtānāṃ sattvānāṃ sthitaye 'nugrahāya ca. tathā saṃbhavaiṣiṇām iti. yuktaṃ tāvan manaḥsaṃcetanā karmasvabhāvatvāt. tatprabhāvitaṃ ca vijñānaṃ bījaṃ. sparśo
T07yabhkvyu:6255: 'pi tatsaṃprayukto bhavaty anugrahāyeti. kavaḍīkāras tu kathaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:6256: saṃbhavaiṣinām anugrahāyeti. ata ucyate. kavaḍīkāro 'pi hīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6257: tadrāgiṇām iti. kavaḍīkārarāgiṇāṃ. punarbhavāya saṃvartata iti asya jñāpanārtham idaṃ sūtrapadam upanyasyate. uktaṃ hi bhagavateti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6258: tatra rogādibhiḥ paṃca upādānaskaṃdhā uktāḥ. tasya rogasya catvāra āhārā
T07yabhkvyu:6259: mūlaṃ. mūlaṃ ca hetur iti anena kavaḍīkāro 'pi tadrāgiṇāṃ punarbhavāya saṃvartata iti siddhaṃ. anye punar jarāmaraṇasya pratyaya ity etad
T07yabhkvyu:6260: evodāharaṇaṃ bruvate. asmāj janmanaḥ pareṇa jarāmaraṇaṃ vyavasthāpitam ity
T07yabhkvyu:6261: abhiprāyaḥ. kavaḍīkāro 'pi bhūtānāṃ sattvānām ihasthitaya iti yuktaṃ pratyakṣatvāt. [Tib. 308b] tathā sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśo vijñānaṃ cānugrāhakam ity uktaṃ. atha manaḥsaṃcetanā katham iti. ata idam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6262: manaḥsaṃcetanāpi ceti vistaraḥ. ata eva manaḥsaṃcetanāgrahaṇena
T07yabhkvyu:6263: sparśavijñāne api gṛhīte bhavataḥ. tatsaṃprayogitvāt. pradrutā iti prasṛtāḥ. saṃgītiparyāya ity abhidharmaśāstre.
T07yabhkvyu:6265: teṣāṃ puṣṭaye sparśa iti. sukhavedanīyenānugrahāt. yaḥ kaścid vedanāskaṃdhaḥ saṃjñāskaṃdhaḥ. sarvaḥ sa sparśaṃ pratītyeti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6266: manaḥsaṃcetanāyāḥ punarbhavasyākṣepa iti. tasyāḥ karmasvabhāvatvāt. kathaṃ ca punas tayā punarbhava
T07yabhkvyu:6267: tadutpattipratyayaparasparānukūlyāvasthānāt. karmaparibhāvitād vijñānabījād abhinirvṛttir iti. bījād ivāṃkurasya punarbhavasyotpāda ity
T07yabhkvyu:6269: yaḥ kavaḍīkāraḥ sa āhāra iti praśne āha. syāt kavaḍīkāro nāhāraḥ. syād āhāro na kavaḍīkāraḥ. syād ubhayaṃ. syān nobhayam iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6270: dvitīyā koṭis traya āhārā iti. manaḥsaṃcetanāsparśavijñānāni. caturthī etān ākārān sthāpayitveti. śabdo duḥkhavedanāsaṃprayuktāś ca sarve
T07yabhkvyu:6271: cittacaittāḥ. evaṃ sparśādibhir api yathāyogaṃ catuṣkoṭikāni kartavyānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:6272: yaḥ kaścit sparśaḥ. sarvaḥ sa āhāraḥ. syāt sparśo nāhāra iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6273: evaṃ yā kācin manaḥsaṃcetanā. sarvā sā āhāraḥ. syāt manaḥsaṃcetanā nāhāra
T07yabhkvyu:6274: iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ. tathā [Tib. 309a] yat kiṃcid vijñānaṃ. sarvaṃ tad āhāraḥ. syād vijñānaṃ nāhāra iti catuṣkoṭikam. sparśasya tāvat prathamā
T07yabhkvyu:6275: koṭiḥ. yaṃ sparśaṃ pratītyendriyāṇām apacayo bhavati. mahābhūtānāṃ ca paribhedaḥ. dvitīyā traya āhārāḥ. tṛtīyā yaṃ sparśaṃ pratītya indriyāṇām upacayo bhavati. mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhiḥ. caturthī etān ākārān
T07yabhkvyu:6276: sthāpayitveti. evaṃ yāvad vijñānaṃ catuṣkoṭikaṃ. prathamā koṭiḥ yad
T07yabhkvyu:6277: vijñānaṃ pratītyendriyāṇām apacayo bhavati mahābhūtānāṃ paribhedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6278: dvitīyā koṭis traya āhārāḥ vijñānavarjyāḥ. tṛtīyā yad vijñānaṃ pratītya indriyāṇām upacayo bhavati. mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhiḥ. caturthy etān akārān
T07yabhkvyu:6280: syāt sparśādīn pratītyeti vistareṇa aparaḥ praśnaḥ. sparśādīn iti sparśacetanāvijñānadharmān iti evaṃ netavyaṃ. evaṃ ca granthaḥ kartavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6281: syāt sparśādīn pratītyendrīyāṇām upacayo bhavati. mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6282: na ca te āhārāḥ. syāt. anyabhūmikān anāsravāṃś ca. pratītyety abhisaṃbaṃdhāt dvitīyāprayogaḥ. yo 'pi paribhukta iti vistaraḥ. kena saṃbandhenedam uktaṃ. anyabhūmikān anāsravāṃś ca pratītyānāhāra ity ukte
T07yabhkvyu:6283: 'rthād etad uktaṃ bhavati. svabhūmikān sāsravāṃ pratītya āhāra iti. yaṃ ceha paribhukta iti. kavaḍīkāro bhoktur bādhām ādadhāti. sa kim āhāraḥ. so
T07yabhkvyu:6285: sarvāsu sarvaḥ. evaṃ yoniṣv iti. kāmadhātau [Tib. 309b] paṃcānāṃ gatīnāṃ catasṛṇāṃ ca yonīnāṃ sadbhāvāt. catuḥkoṭikaṃ bādhyate. prakaraṇagranthaś
T07yabhkvyu:6286: ceti. prathame catuṣkoṭike yeyaṃ tṛtīyā koṭiḥ. yaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇām upacayo bhavati. mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhir iti asyā bādhāc
T07yabhkvyu:6287: catuṣkoṭikaṃ bādhyate. na kevalam upacayakaraḥ. kiṃ tarhi. apacayakaro 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:6288: kavaḍīkārāhāra (Abhidh-k-vy 320) iti. prakaraṇagranthaś ca kiṃ bādhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6289: kīdṛśaḥ prakaraṇagrantha iti. tad darśayann āha. kavaḍīikārāhāraḥ katamaḥ yam kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇām upacayo bhavati vistareṇa yāvad vijñānam iti. upacayāhārābhisaṃdhivacanād avirodha iti. upacayāhārābhiprāyeṇa catuṣkoṭikavacanaṃ prakaraṇagranthavacanaṃ ca. tasmāt. tayor avirodhaḥ. yo hy upacayāya. sa mukhyaḥ. āhāralakṣaṇaprāptatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6290: kavaḍīkārāhāralakṣaṇaprāptatvāt. katham ity āha. so 'pi hi jighatsāṃ pipāsāṃ ca pratihantuṃ samartha iti. pradīptāyasaguḍalakṣaṇa āhāro jighatsāpratighāte samarthaḥ. kvathitatāmralakṣaṇaḥ pipāsāpratighāte iti
T07yabhkvyu:6292: kavaḍīkārāhāraprasaṃgenedam ucyate. uktaṃ bhagavatā yaś ca bāhyakānām iti
T07yabhkvyu:6293: vistaraḥ. jaṃbudvīpo jambuṣaṇḍaḥ. tathā hy uktaṃ bhagavatā. yāḥ kāścij jambuṣaṇḍāt sravaṃtyaḥ. sarvāḥ samudranimnāḥ samudrapravaṇāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:6294: samudraprāgbhārā iti. tannivāsino jambuṣaṇḍagatāḥ. kukṣimanto bhojanaśaktyupetā akalalādyavasthā ity abhiprāyaḥ. tad etad ayuktam. ekam iti vacanād iti. yadi jaṃbūdvīpanivāsinaḥ kukṣimanto jaṃbuṣaṇḍagatā [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:6295: 310a] iśyeran. yaś ca jambuṣaṇḍagatān pṛthagjanān iti vaktavyaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6296: uktaṃ ca yaś caikaṃ jaṃbuṣaṇḍagatam iti. tasmād ayam artho na ghaṭate. kaś cātra viśeṣa iti. kim atrāścaryaṃ yad bahūṃ bhojayitvā bahu puṇyaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6297: na tv alpīyasaḥ śatamātrān vītarāgān ity arthaḥ. saṃnikṛṣto bodhisattva iti. āsannābhisambodhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6299: ity abhiprāyaḥ. na tv iyam anvarthā saṃjñeti. nārthānugatā. nārthavācakaṃ padam ity arthaḥ. nāpi paribhāṣitā artham anapekṣya. bodhisattva eva tv
T07yabhkvyu:6300: eṣa jaṃbuṣaṇḍagata iti. kṛṣigrāmakaṃ vyavalokanāya nirgataḥ
T07yabhkvyu:6301: sarvārthasiddho bodhisattvo jaṃbūvṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānam
T07yabhkvyu:6302: utpāditavān. ata āha. sa hi pṛthagjanaḥ kāmavairāgyasambandheneti. sa cāpi hi bodhisattvaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ kāmavītarāgaś ca. bāhyakāś ca tathaiva
T07yabhkvyu:6303: kāmavītarāgāḥ pṛthagjanāś ca. anena sambandhena tebhyo bāhyakebhyo bahutareṇa dānaphalena viśiṣyamāṇa ity evam uktaḥ. sa tebhyo bāhyakebhyo
T07yabhkvyu:6304: 'nantebhyo viśiṣyamāṇo bodhisattvāya cāmeyā anāryebhyo 'pi dakṣiṇā iti vacanāt. śatagrahaṇaṃ tu pūrvādhikārād iti. tatraiva sūtre śatādhikāro
T07yabhkvyu:6305: 'dhikṛtaḥ. yaś ca tiryagyonigatānāṃ śatāya dānaṃ dadyāt. yaś caikasmai duḥśīlāya manuṣyabhūtāya [Tib. 310b] dānaṃ dadyāt. tataḥ śataguṇo vipākaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:6306: (Abhidh-k-vy 321) pratikāṃkṣitavyaḥ. yāvad yaś ca bāhyakānām iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6307: itthaṃ caitad evam iti. itthaṃ caitad evaṃ bodhisattva eva tv eṣa jambuṣaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo yujyata iti. yad enaṃ bodhisattvam apāsya. bāhyakebhya eva srotaāpattiphalapratipannakaṃ viśeṣayāṃ babhūveti. bāhyakebhyo vītarāgebhyaḥ srotaāpattiphalapratipannakāya dānam aprameyataraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:6309: vistaraḥ. yadi nirvedhabhāgī jaṃbuṣaṇḍagato 'bhaviṣyat. jaṃbuṣaṇḍagatād eva vyaśeṣayiṣyat. kathaṃ. yaś ca jaṃbuṣaṇḍagatānāṃ śataṃ bhojayet. yaś caikaṃ srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakaṃ. ato dānād idaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:6310: mahāphalataram iti. na tv evaṃ. srotaāpattiphalapratipannakādibhyo viśiṣṭataratvād ato bodhisattva eva tv eṣa jaṃbuṣaṇḍagato yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6311: (III.42-44ab) āyuḥkṣayādibhir iti. asty āyuḥkṣayān maraṇaṃ na puṇyakṣayāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6313: chedasaṃdhānavairāgya iti vistaraḥ. kuśalamūlasamucchedo mithyādṛṣṭyā. sā ca mānasy eva.
T07yabhkvyu:6314: saṃtīrakatvāt. kuśalamūlapratisaṃdhānaṃ samyagdṛṣṭyā vicikitsayā vā. te ca mānasyau. dhātubhūmivairāgyaṃ dhātuto bhūmito vā [Tib. 311a] vairāgyaṃ manovijñāna eva. samāhita eva citte labhyatvāt. parihāṇir
T07yabhkvyu:6317: upapattir api viparyastamater bhavatīti manovijñāna eva yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6318: antarābhavapratisaṃdhir apy uktarūpa iti. pratisaṃdhisāmānyād anukto 'py
T07yabhkvyu:6319: uktakalpa iti nocyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. cyutir eva
T07yabhkvyu:6321: ekārthatāṃ darśayati. bhāve ktotpannatvāt. itare hi vadane paṭvyāv iti sukhaduḥkhe.
T07yabhkvyu:6322: visabhāgabhūmikatvād iti. samāhitaṃ cittaṃ samāhitabhūmikatvāt visabhāgaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:6323: kāmadhātoḥ. ataś cyuticittam upapatticittam vā na yujyate. yadā tarhi rūpadhātāv eva mriyate upapadyate vā. tadā samāhitabhūmikaṃ cittaṃ tad bhaviṣyatīty ata āha. ābhisaṃskārikatvād iti. abhisaṃskāro yatnaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6324: abhisaṃskāreṇa nirvṛttam ābhisaṃskārikaṃ. tadbhāvaḥ. tasmāt. na tad ābhisaṃskārikaṃ cyuticittam upapatticittaṃ vā yujyate. maraṇāvasthāyā
T07yabhkvyu:6325: apaṭutvāt. anugrāhakatvāc ca. yasmāc ca samāhitaṃ cittam auugrāhakaṃ. na
T07yabhkvyu:6326: cchedānukūlaṃ. ato 'pi samāhitacittasya cyutir nāsti. nāpy acittakasyeti vistaraḥ. nāpy acittakasya. [Tib. 311b] kiṃ. cyutiḥ. upapattir veti prakṛtaṃ. acittako nirodhasamāpattisamāpanno (Abhidh-k-vy 322)
T07yabhkvyu:6327: 'saṃjñisamāpattisamāpannaḥ tadvipāke vāvasthitaḥ. so 'cittaka upakrantuṃ mārayituṃ na śakyate śastrādibhiḥ. ato nācittakasyāsti cyutiḥ. yadā cāsyāśrayo vipariṇantum ārabheteti. śastreṇāgninā vopakramān nirodhasamāpattiṃ asaṃjñisamāpattiṃ vā samāpannasya asaṃjñisamāpatter vipāke sthitasya vipākāvedhaparisamāpter avaśyam asya tadānīm
T07yabhkvyu:6328: āśrayapratibaddhaṃ cittaṃ āśraye bījabhāvenāsti. tat sammukhībhūya paścāt
T07yabhkvyu:6329: pracyaveta. kaḥ pracyaveta. pudgalaḥ. yadi pudgalo 'dhikriyet.
T07yabhkvyu:6330: asamānakartṛkatvāt ktvāvidhir na prāpnoti. cittaṃ tarhi pracyaveta. atha vaivam abhisaṃbandhaḥ. yadā cāśrayo vipariṇaṃtum anyathātvam āpattum ārabheta. avaśyam asya pudgalasya tadāśrayapratibaddhaṃ bījabhāvenāvasthitaṃ cittaṃ sammukhībhūya samudācarya pariṇantum ārabheta.
T07yabhkvyu:6331: paścāt pracyaveta pudgala iti. atha vā saṃmukhībhūyeti saṃmukhībhāvyety arthe ṇilopāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6333: iti yathā. upapattau cāyuktaṃ acittakatvaṃ. kasmāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6335: nirodhasamāpattyādyasaṃbhavāt. vinā ca kleśenānupapatteḥ. sarvakleśair hi tadbhūmikair upapattipratisaṃdhibandho bhavati. na ca cittam antareṇa kleśāḥ kadācid api bhavantīti. ato 'pi nāsti acittakasyopattih.
T07yabhkvyu:6338: iti. upapattibhava eva [Tib. 312a] kliṣṭa ity avadhāraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6339: maraṇapūrvāṃtakālāntarābhavās triprakārāḥ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtā uktāḥ. atha vā
T07yabhkvyu:6340: nirodhayaty uparamann ārūpye jīvitaṃ manaḥ upekṣāṃ ceti
T07yabhkvyu:6341: vistareṇa yāvac chubho sarvatra paṃca cety
T07yabhkvyu:6342: uktaṃ. ato maraṇabhavas triprakāra ity utsargaḥ. arhaṃs tu
T07yabhkvyu:6343: nirvāty avyākṛtadvaye ity evam apavādaḥ. asti cet kāmadhātau vipāka upekṣeti.
T07yabhkvyu:6346: ataḥ param aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vedyam ity aparamatena. airyāpathika eveti. airyāpathikajātīyaṃ tad
T07yabhkvyu:6350: iti. na etāvad evāvyākṛtam iṣyata iti vyākhyātam etat. tad dhi cittacchedānukūlam iti. apratisaṃdhikacittacchedānukūlaṃ. durbalatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:6351: paramāpaṭutvād ity arthaḥ. sapratisaṃdhikacittacchede kuśalākuśalam api
T07yabhkvyu:6353: teṣāṃ yathāsaṃkhyam iti. pādayor apāyagāmināṃ vijñānaṃ saṃnirudhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:6354: nābhyāṃ manuṣyagāmināṃ. hṛdaye devagāmināṃ. arūpitvād adeśasthaṃ vijñānaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:6355: kathaṃ teṣu nirudhyata iti. ata āha. kāyendriyasya teṣu nirodhād iti. teṣu pādādiṣu kāyendriyapratibaddhavṛtti hi kāmadhātau rūpadhātau ca vijñānam iti. [Tib. 312b] teṣām api hṛdaye vijñānaṃ nirudhyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6356: yathāsaṃkhyanirdeśād evāyam artho labhyate. kathaṃ. hṛdayaṃ ca hṛdayaṃ ca
T07yabhkvyu:6357: hṛdaye. pādaś ca nābhiś ca hṛdaye ceti
T07yabhkvyu:6358: pādanābhihṛdayānīti catvāro 'rthāḥ. adhogaś ca nṛgaś ca suragaś ca ajagaś cety eto 'pi catvāro
T07yabhkvyu:6360: prāyeṇeti grahaṇam devādīnāṃ sukhamṛtyutvāt. na tu punas tāni kāṣṭhānīva cchidyante. kiṃ tarhīti. tīvrābhir vedanābhiś chidyanta iveti. chinnavad vā na punaś ceṣṭanta iti chinnānīty ucyaṃte iti. chinnāṃgapratyaṃgavat na punaś ceṣṭaṃta iti chinnānīty ucyante. saiṣā kālpanikī chedavṛttiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6361: marmaṇāṃ dvidhābhāvakaraṇāt. aptejovāyunāṃ anyatamenety ukte pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:6362: kasmāt na pṛthivīdhātuneti. aptejovāyudhātupradhānā yathāyogam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:6364: vāyudhātupradhāno vāyuśeṣa iti. bhājanalokasaṃvratanīsādharmyeṇety apara iti. tisro bhājanasaṃvartanyaḥ tejaḥsaṃvartanī apsaṃvartanī vāyusaṃvartanī ca. tāsāṃ ca sādharmyeṇa aptejovāyudhātūnām anyatameneti vistareṇoktam
T07yabhkvyu:6366: (III.44cd) katham ārād yātā. ātyantikavisaṃyogaprāptilābhāt. pṛthagjanānāṃ tv asti visaṃyogaprāptilābhaḥ. na tv ātyaṃtika iti te na ārād yātā eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:6367: te hi mithyātve 'pi niyatā bhaveyur iti. yady ānantaryāṇi kuryur ity
T07yabhkvyu:6368: arthaḥ. na ca ta iti vistaraḥ. [Tib. 313a] na ca te mokṣabhāgīyalābhinaḥ kālaniyamena samyaktve niyatāḥ. yathā saptakṛtvaḥparamādayaḥ. ādiśabdena kulaṃkulaikavīcikādayo gṛhyante. kālaniyamaś caiṣāṃ pudgalanirdeśe
T07yabhkvyu:6369: vakṣyate. niyatebhyo dvayebhya ebhyo 'nye 'niyatāḥ. pratyayāpekṣaṃ hīti vistaraḥ. yadi samyaktve pratyayaṃ labhante. samyaktve niyatāḥ. atha
T07yabhkvyu:6370: mithyātve. mithyātve niyatāḥ. athobhayasmiṃ na pratyayaṃ labhante.
T07yabhkvyu:6375: lakṣaṣoḍaśakodvedham asaṃkhyaṃ vāyumaṇḍalaṃ lakṣaṣoḍaśakaṃ vedhanabhāvana. pariṇāhenāsaṃkhyam
T07yabhkvyu:6377: tatra nidarśanaṃ. yathā bhuktaṃ pītaṃ cānnaṃ ca yathāsaṃkhyena nāpakvaṃ pakvāśayaṃ patati. pakvam eva pakvasthānaṃ gacchatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:6378: kusūlanyāyena koṣṭhanyāyena. samantāt prākāravad āsthitam ity arthaḥ.

T07yabhkvyu:6445: 315b]. tasyedānīṃ karmaṇaḥ kva vipāka iti. narakapālānāṃ narakakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ kva vipākaḥ. teṣv eveti vistaraḥ. yeṣv ānaṃtaryakāriṇāṃ vipākāvakāśaḥ. teṣu narakeṣu teṣāṃ narakapālānāṃ ko vipratibandhaḥ. etad uktaṃ bhavati. teṣām api tāvad ānantaryakāriṇāṃ mahadānantaryakarmaṇo vipākasyātimahato narakeṣv avakāśo 'sti. kim aṃga punar narakapālānāṃ yat karma tatkāraṇāḥ kārayatām iti. kṛtāvadhitvāt kṛtamaryādatvāt narakapālān
