T07yabhkvyu:7248: aṣṭavidhatve tu sāṃkaryasaṃbhavaḥ. ya eva hi bhikṣusamvaraḥ. sa eva bhikṣuṇīsamvara ity evamādi. śrāmaṇerī ca punaḥ śikṣamāṇā ceti. śrāmaṇerī parivṛttavyaṃjanā śramaṇero bhavati. śikṣamāṇā cāpi parivṛttavyaṃjanā
T07yabhkvyu:7249: śrāmaṇera eva bhavati. kim evaṃ neṣyate. parivṛttavyaṃjano bhikṣur bhikṣusaṃvaraṃ ca tyajati. bhikṣuṇīsaṃvaraṃ ca pratilabhata ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:7250: na ca vyaṃjanaparivṛttāv iti vistaraḥ. na bhikṣubhikṣuṇīvyaṃjanaprādurbhāve pārvasaṃvaratyāgakāraṇam
T07yabhkvyu:7252: ubhayavyaṃjanotpatter mūlacchedān niśātyayād ity atra yat kāraṇam uktaṃ. nāpy apūrvasaṃvarapratilaṃbhe kāraṇam astīti
T07yabhkvyu:7255: iti. ato vijñāyate na bhikṣusaṃvarād anyo bhikṣuṇīsaṃvara iti. evaṃ śrāmaṇerādīnām api vaktavyaṃ. tasmād abhinno 'nanyaś caturṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīśikṣamāṇāśrāmaṇeryupāsikāsaṃvarāṇāṃ tribhyo
T07yabhkvyu:7257: kiṃ te saṃvarā iti vistaraḥ. yathā paṃcasaṃkhyāyām anyāni paṃca prakṣipya paṃcavṛddhiyogād daśa bhavanti. paṃcadaśasaṃkhyāyāṃ cānyāni paṃca
T07yabhkvyu:7258: prakṣipya viṃśatir bhavaṃti. dīnārasateravac ca. yathā pūrvako dīnāro
T07yabhkvyu:7259: dvitīyena saha satero bhavati. tathā hi loke ekadīnāramūlyena dvitīyaṃ dīnāraṃ dīnāramūlyaṃ vā tena pūrvakeṇa dīnāramūlyena sahādhikam apekṣya kaścid vaktā bhavet. dīnārasatero mayā labdha iti. dīnāradvayaṃ mayā labdham ity arthaḥ. kim evam eta upāsakaśrāmaṇerabhikṣusaṃvarāḥ virativṛddhiyogāt prāṇātipātādiviratiṣu tathaivāvasthitāsu punar nṛtyagītaviratyādīnām apūrvāṇāṃ viratīnāṃ [Tib. 28b] vṛddhiyogād anyonya ucyaṃte. anya upāsakasaṃvarāc chrāmaṇerasaṃvaraḥ śrāmaṇerasaṃvarāc cānyo bhikṣusaṃvara iti ekadeśaviśeṣayogād anyonyavyavasthety arthaḥ. āho svit pṛthag eva te sakalā upajāyante. anyāḥ prāṇātipātādivirataya upāsakasya.
T07yabhkvyu:7260: tato 'nyāḥ śrāmaṇerasya. tato 'nyāś ca bhikṣoḥ. ity ekasmiṃ bhikṣusaṃtāne
T07yabhkvyu:7261: tisraḥ prāṇātipātādiviratayaḥ. evam adattādānaviratayaḥ. ity evamādi. evaṃ śeṣā iti. nṛtyagītaviratyādayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7263: (Abhidh-k-vy 369) prāṇātipātādīnāṃ nidānebhya iti. upāsakāc chrāmaṇero bahutarebhyaḥ prāṇātipātādinidānebhyo nivartate. tadyathā vikālabhojanaṃ prāṇātipātanidānaṃ bhavet. tasmāc chrāmaṇero nivartate. nopāsaka ity evamādi yojyaṃ. evaṃ cāsati. evaṃ ca yadi na syād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7264: bhikṣusaṃvaraṃ pratyācakṣāṇas tyajaṃs trīn api upāsakasaṃvarādīn vijahyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7268: (IV.18) samāpādanād iti. pratisaṃsthāpanād ity arthaḥ. pāpakarmaṇo hi sattveṣu viṣamaṃ saṃpravartate. sāpi tu vijñapticittābhyāṃ kriyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7269: vijñaptyā ca kriyate prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītā avijñaptiś cittena ca kriyate dhyānānāsravasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītā avijñaptiḥ. samādhinā kriyata ity
T07yabhkvyu:7270: arthaḥ. tad evaṃ kriyata iti kriyeti karmasādhanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7271: kriyāhetutvād iti. kriyāyā hetutvāt. saṃvarastho hy saṃvaraparirakṣaṇārthaṃ kriyāṃ vijñaptilakṣaṇām ārabhate. kriyāphalatvāc
T07yabhkvyu:7272: ceti. vijñaptilakṣaṇāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ phalatvād ity arthaḥ. samādhisaṃbhūtā kathaṃ kriyā bhavati. samādhijāyāś cetanāyāḥ phalatvāt sāpi kriyā.
T07yabhkvyu:7274: evaṃ tāvad aviśeṣeṇa prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ saṃśabdyata iti. ādyo 'pi kṣaṇo dvitīyādayo 'pi ca kṣaṇāḥ prātimokṣasaṃvara ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7275: prātimokṣasvabhāvas tv ādyakṣaṇa eva. tadartham āha. punaḥ ādye vijñaptyavjñaptī prātimokṣa ity ucyate. pāpasya tena pratimokṣaṇād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7276: prathamenaiva kṣaṇena pāpaṃ pratimokṣate. [Tib. 29b] utsṛjyate tyajata ity
T07yabhkvyu:7277: arthaḥ. pratimokṣa iti prāpte prātimokṣa iti vacanaṃ svārthe
T07yabhkvyu:7278: vṛddhividhānāt. svārthe pratyaye kṛte vṛddhikaraṇād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7279: vaikṛtavaiśasavat. yathā vikṛtam eva vaikṛtam. viśasam eva māraṇaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7280: vaiśasaṃ. evaṃ pratimokṣa eva prātimokṣa iti. prātimokṣasaṃvara ity apīti.
T07yabhkvyu:7281: prātimokṣaś cāsau saṃvaraś ca. kāyavācoḥ saṃvaraṇārtha ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7282: karmapatha ity apy ucyata iti. maulaḥ karmapatha ity arthaḥ. dvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣu prātimokṣasaṃvara eva. prātimokṣajātīyaḥ prātimokṣād vā jātaḥ saṃvaraḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ. na prātimokṣaḥ. yasmāt na tena pāpaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7284: (IV.19) aṣṭāv eva nikāyā ity avadhāraṇe pṛcchati. kiṃ khalu bāhyakānām iti
T07yabhkvyu:7285: vistaraḥ. samādānaśīlam iti viśeṣaṇaṃ. śīladvaividhyāt. dvividhaṃ hi śīlaṃ. samādānaśīlaṃ dharmatāpratilaṃbhikaṃ ca. tatra samādānśīlaṃ yad
T07yabhkvyu:7286: gṛhyate. (Abhidh-k-vy 370) idaṃ cedaṃ ca na kariṣyāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:7288: bhavasaṃniśritatvād iti. mokṣārthinām api teṣāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādyupahatatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7289: bhavaviśeṣa eva ca teṣāṃ keṣāṃcin mokṣa iti. bhavasaṃniśritam eva śīlaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7290: tato 'sti teṣāṃ samādānaśīlaṃ. na prātimokṣasaṃvara iti. sāmantakam apy atra dhyānaṃ kṛtvocyata iti. yasmāt sāṃantake 'pi dhyānasaṃvaro
T07yabhkvyu:7291: 'nāsravasaṃvaraś [Tib. 30a] ceṣyate. tasmād dhyānasāmantakam apy atra dhyānaśabdenocyata itīṣyate. apiśabdān maulam api gṛhyata eva.
T07yabhkvyu:7293: caittā dvau saṃvarau teṣām ity atra. trayāṇām iti. prātimokṣasaṃvaradhyānasaṃvarānāsravasaṃvarāṇāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7297: (IV.20ab) anāgamya iti grahaṇaṃ kāmāvacarasyaiva dauḥśīlyasya pratipakṣatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7298: ānaṃtaryamārgeṣv iti. teṣāṃ prahāṇamārgatvāt. tatsamutthāpakānām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7299: dauḥśīlyasamutthāpakānām. ata eveti. yasmād anāgamyānantaryamārgeṣv eva
T07yabhkvyu:7300: tadvyavasthānaṃ. tasmāc catuḥkoṭikaṃ kriyate. prathamā koṭir anāgamyānantaryamārgavarjyo dhyānasaṃvaraḥ. anāgamyabhūmikeṣu vimuktiprayogaviśeṣamārgeṣu maulaprathamadhyānādiṣu vā caturthād dhyānād
T07yabhkvyu:7301: ānantaryavimuktiprayogaviśeṣamārgeṣu yo dhyānasaṃvaraḥ. ayaṃ dhyānasaṃvaro na prahāṇasaṃvaraḥ. [Tib. 30b] tena dauḥśīlyasya tatsamutthāpakānāṃ ca kleśānām aprahāṇāt. dvitīyānāgamyānantaryamārgeṣv anāsravasaṃvaraḥ. ayaṃ prahāṇasaṃvaraḥ tenaiva dauḥśīlyādiprahāṇāt. na dhyānasaṃvaro 'nāsravatvāt. tṛtīyānāgamyānantaryamārgeṣu sāsravasaṃvaraḥ ayaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7302: prahāṇasaṃvaraś ca tena dauḥśīlyādiprahāṇāt. dhyānasaṃvaraś ca sāsravasamādhijatvāt. caturthī anāgamyānantaryamārgavarjyo 'nāsravasaṃvaraḥ. ayaṃ na dhyānasaṃvaro 'nāsravatvāt. nāpi prahāṇasaṃvaras tena dauḥśīlyādyaprahāṇāt. sa punas tathaivānāgamyabhūmikeṣu
T07yabhkvyu:7304: saṃvaraniyamenaivam uktam. anyathāpy anye dharmā vaktavyāḥ syuḥ. evaṃ syād anāsravasaṃvaro na prahāṇasaṃvara iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ. prathamā koṭir anāgamyānantaryamārgavarjyo 'nāsravasaṃvaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7308: kathaṃ punar gamyate. etāv evaṃsvabhāvād iti. āgamāt. anyatarā kila devatā
T07yabhkvyu:7309: bhikṣuṃ viṣayeṣv indriyāṇi vicārayantam avocat. bhikṣo bhikṣo vraṇaṃ mā kārṣīd iti. bhikṣur āha. pidhāsyāmi devate. devatāha. kuṃbhamātraṃ bhikṣo vraṇaṃ kṛtvā kena pidhāsyasi. bhikṣur āha. smṛtyā devate pidhāsyāmi.
T07yabhkvyu:7311: (IV.21, 22) sa yāvat tām avijñaptiṃ na tyajatīti. śikṣānikṣepādi.
T07yabhkvyu:7313: prathame kṣaṇe vartamānasyaiva samanvāgato bhavatīty uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:7315: dhyānasaṃvaravān kiṃ pṛthagjano 'thāryaḥ. ubhaya ity āha. aviśeṣitatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7317: dhyānasaṃvarādhikārād dhyānasaṃvaralakṣaṇayeti gamyate. sa janmāntaratyaktam iti. udāharaṇapradarśanaparam etat. idaṃ janma tyaktam
T07yabhkvyu:7321: anāsravayā. āryādhikārāt. ata evāha. āryapudgalo 'py evam anāsravayeti.
T07yabhkvyu:7322: ayaṃ tu viśeṣa iti. tuśabdārthaṃ darśayati. sa ca bhinnakramaḥ. prathame tu kṣaṇe duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntikṣaṇe nābhyatītayā avijñaptyā samanvāgata ity arthaḥ. kasmāt. anādimati saṃsāre mārgasya pūrvam anutpāditatvāt. nanu ca phalaprāptikāla indriyasaṃcārakāle 'pi vā pūrvamārgatyāge naivātītayā
T07yabhkvyu:7323: avijñaptyā samanvāgama iṣyate. evaṃ tarhi sa cāpi phalamārgasya prathamakṣaṇo bhavati. tatra nātītayāvijñaptyā samanvāgato bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:7324: phalamārgasya pūrvam anutpāditatvād iti vyākhyātavyaṃ. ācāryavasumitras tv asya codyasya parihāram āha. anāsravasaṃvaro 'tra prakṛtaḥ. sa ca duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntikāla eva labdhaḥ. atas tena prathame kṣaṇe nātītena samanvāgato dvitīyādiṣv atītānāgateneti. ūrdhvaṃ tu yo mārgāntaralābhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7325: tatrānāsravasaṃvarasādṛśyam astīti na tad ucyata iti. tad iha sādṛśyam
T07yabhkvyu:7326: astīti na budhyāmahe. kiṃ sāsravasaṃvaro 'stīty apekṣyedam ucyate. āho svid anāsravo 'stīti. yadi sāsravo 'stīty abhiprīyate. [Tib. 32a]
T07yabhkvyu:7329: abhiprīyate. vihīnaḥ sa katham astīti śakyaṃ vaktum iti cintyo 'syābhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7331: iti. samāhitamārgasthaś ca laukikasamāhitamārgasthaḥ āryamārgasthaś ca
T07yabhkvyu:7334: dhyānānāsravasaṃvarānvitāv ity arthaḥ. atra cāryamārgābhirūḍha āryamārgastho veditavyo nausthanāyena. tadyathā yo nāvam abhirūḍhaḥ. sa
T07yabhkvyu:7335: nausthaḥ. evaṃ ya āryamārgam abhirūḍhaḥ samāpannaḥ. sa āryamārgasthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7336: anyathā hy āryamārgasamanvito 'py āryamārgastha iti kṛtvā. prakṛtistho 'py
T07yabhkvyu:7337: āryo vartamānayā anāsravayā avijñaptyā samanvāgata iti prāpnoti. anyaḥ punar evaṃprasaṃgaṃ pariharan vyācaṣṭe. ekaśeṣo 'tra kriyate. samāhitaś ca samāhitāryamārgaś ca mārgau samāhitāryamārgau. tayoḥ sthitau
T07yabhkvyu:7340: saṃvarāvijñaptyā ca samanvāgatau. na tu vyutthitau. na tu tanmārgavyutthitau tayā vartamānayā samanvāgatau. tasyāś
T07yabhkvyu:7341: cittānuparivartanīyatvāt. evaṃ vyākhyāyate. yac coditam ācāryasaṃghabhadreṇa. katham avijñapteḥ
T07yabhkvyu:7342: āryamārgasthavacanād eva gamyate. tatsamāpanna evāyaṃ. na punas tatsamanvāgamavacanaprasaṃga iti cet. na. dhyānādhikārāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7344: (IV.23ab) yo naivasaṃvaraṇāsaṃvare sthitas sa madhyastha iti. yo na bhikṣvādiḥ. na ca kaivartādiḥ. sa madhyasthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7347: (IV.23cd,24ab) asaṃvarasaṃvarasthau pudgalāv akuśalakuśaladharmapratiṣṭhitāv ity anayor viparyayam asaṃbhāvayan pṛcchati. kim asaṃvarastha iti vistaraḥ. tau yāvad anuvartete iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7350: (IV.24cd, 25ab) kṣaṇād ūrdhvam ā tyāgād [Tib. 33a] iti. yo yasyās tyāgas
T07yabhkvyu:7351: tasmād ā tyāgāt tayātītayā vijñaptyā samanvāgataḥ. kathaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7352: saṃvaralakṣaṇāyās tāvad vijñaptes tyāgaḥ śikṣānikṣepādibhiḥ. tasmād ā tyāgād anayātītayā vijñaptyā samanvāgataḥ. asaṃvaralakṣaṇāyāḥ saṃvarasamādānādibhis tyāgaḥ. tesmād ā tyāgād anayā samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7354: tasmād ā tyāgād anayā samanvāgata iti. yo hi saṃvarādyavijñaptisamanvāgataḥ. so 'vaśyaṃ maulakarmapathasvabhāvayā kṣaṇād ūrdhvam atītayāvijñaptyā samanvāgataḥ. anāgatayā tu vijñaptyā na kaścit (Abhidh-k-vy 373) samanvāgata iti. cittānanuparivartanīyatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7355: cittasyāpīti. cittasyāpi tarhi nivṛtāvyākṛtasya mā bhūt prāptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7356: anubandhinī mā bhūd ity arthaḥ. kasmād ity āha. jaḍā hi vijñaptir
T07yabhkvyu:7357: anālambanatvāt. parataṃtra ca cittaparatantratvāt. na caivaṃ cittam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7358: na jaḍaṃ. na parataṃtraṃ cety arthaḥ. kasmāt. tadviparyayāt sā durbalena
T07yabhkvyu:7362: iti. madhyasthagrahaṇaṃ saṃvarāsaṃvarasthanirāsārthaṃ. saṃvarāsaṃvarasthā hi vijñaptyavijñaptibhyām avaśyaṃ samanvāgatāḥ. mṛducetanagrahaṇaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7363: tīvracetananirāsārthaṃ. tīvracetanā hi vijñaptiṃ kurvann avijñaptiṃ samutthāpayet. prāg evāvyākṛtam iti. mṛdvyā cetanayā prāg evāvyākṛtaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7364: kurvan. yatra hi mṛdvyā cetanayā kuśalam akuśalaṃ vā kurvan naivasaṃvaranāsaṃvare sthito vijñaptyaiva samanvāgato bhavati avijñapter
T07yabhkvyu:7365: anutpādāt. prāg evāvyākṛtaṃ kurvan sutarāṃ vijñaptyaivāsau samanvāgato
T07yabhkvyu:7366: nāvijñaptyā. avijñaptyutpādāśaṃkāyā abhāvāt. anyatreti vistaraḥ. anyatra saptabhya aupadhikebhyaḥ puṇyakriyāvastubhyaḥ. karmapathebhyaś ca prāṇātipātādibhyaḥ. tatra hy avyākṛtam api kurvann avijñaptyā samanvāgato
T07yabhkvyu:7367: bhavati. satatasamitaṃ carato vā tiṣṭhato vā vistareṇa yāvad upajāyata eva
T07yabhkvyu:7368: puṇyam iti sūtre vacanāt. prāṇātipātādīṃś ca karmapathāṃ mṛducetanayāpi kurvan avijñaptyā samanvāgato bhavati. [Tib. 34a] yenāryapudgaleneti
T07yabhkvyu:7369: vistaraḥ. parivṛttajanmanāryapudgalena yadā na tāvad vijñaptaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:7370: kalalādyavasthāyām ārūpyopapattau ca. vijñaptaṃ vā punar vihīnam avyākṛtacittotthāpitavijñaptivihīnāc ca. na hi tasyāḥ prāptir anubandhinī bhavati. kṛtastūpādikasya vā. tadvastucchedāt. sa hi tadānīm avijñaptim api parityajati prāg eva vijñaptim iti. āsv avasthāsu janmāntaraparivṛttāv
T07yabhkvyu:7372: vijñaptyā. nanu ca pṛthagjanasyāpy ayaṃ vidhiḥ saṃbhavati. saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:7373: anāvaśyakatvāt tu pṛthagjano noktaḥ. yo hi dhyānalābhī
T07yabhkvyu:7374: parivṛttajanmāntaraḥ rūpadhātāv akṛtavijñaptiḥ kṛtavijñaptivihīno vā. sa eva tathā saṃbhavati nānya iti. kāmāvacarasattvābhisaṃdhivacanād vā. atha vā udāharaṇarūpa āryapudgala uktas tena pṛthagjano 'pi tathā grahītavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7375: ata eva vijñaptyaivānvitaḥ kurvan madhyastho mṛducetana
T07yabhkvyu:7377: ity atrokto 'nyatraupadhikapuṇyakriyāvastukarmapathebhya iti. sāvaśeṣam etad vacanam iti kṛtvā. evaṃ dve koṭī sūtrite prathamadvitīye [Tib. 34b]
T07yabhkvyu:7378: tṛtīyacaturthyau tu yojye. tṛtīyā saṃvarāsaṃvaramadhyasthās tīvrayā
T07yabhkvyu:7379: cetanayā kuśalam akuśalaṃ vā kurvantaḥ. caturthī yena janmāntaraparivṛttau
T07yabhkvyu:7380: pṛthagjanena na tāvad vijñaptaṃ bhavati. vijñaptaṃ vā vihīnam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7381: (IV.27) sahabhūtatvād iti. yasmād dhyānacittena saha bhavati
T07yabhkvyu:7382: dhyānasaṃvaraḥ. paro vijñāpayatīti pratyāpayati. pudgalād anya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7384: āryamārgāvatāraṇena. paṃcakānām ājñātakauṇḍinyādīnāṃ. ehibhikṣukayeti ehi bhikṣo cara brahmacaryam iti bhagavato vacane. ehīti coktaḥ sugatena
T07yabhkvyu:7385: tāyinā muṇḍaś ca kāṣāyadharo babhūveti. śāstur abhyupagamān mahākāśyapasyeti. mahākāśyapaḥ kila yāṃyāṃ devatāpratimāṃ vandate. sāsā
T07yabhkvyu:7386: sphuṭati. tasya mahānubhāvāt. sa bhagavantam upasaṃkramya na vandate.
T07yabhkvyu:7387: māsya rūpavināśo bhūd iti. tam abhiprāyaṃ viditvā bhagavāṃś codayati sma.
T07yabhkvyu:7388: vandasva kāśyapa tathāgatam iti. tena bhagavān vanditaḥ. tataḥ sa bhagavato rūpam avikopitaṃ dṛṣṭvā ayaṃ me śāsteti sa bhagavantam
T07yabhkvyu:7389: abhyupagatād [Tib. 35]a asyopasaṃpad iti. praśnārādhanena sodāyina iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7390: sodāyinā praśnavisarjanena bhagavān ārādhitas tenārādhanena tasyopasaṃpat.
T07yabhkvyu:7391: gurudharmābhyupagameneti. aṣṭau gurudharmāḥ. bhikṣor antikād bhikṣuṇīnām
T07yabhkvyu:7392: upasaṃpat bhikṣuṇībhāvaḥ. anvardhamāsam avavādo grāhyo bhikṣor antikāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7393: abhikṣuke āvāse varṣā nopagantavyā. pravāraṇāyām ubhayasaṃghas tribhiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:7394: sthānaiḥ pravārayitavyaḥ. na codayitavyo bhikṣur āpattim āpannaḥ nākroṣṭavyaḥ. gurudharmāpattau mānāpyam ardhamāsaṃ caritavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7395: varṣaśatopasaṃpannayāpy bhikṣuṇyā tatkṣaṇopasaṃpanno bhikṣur vandyaḥ. na ca bhikṣuṇyā kvacid bhikṣuś codayitavyaḥ. ity evamādayaḥ. eṣām abhyupagamena tasyā upasaṃpat. dūtena dharmadinnāyā iti. tayā kilāntaḥpuragatayaiva pravrajyārthaṃ buddhāya dūtaḥ preṣita iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7396: vinayadharapañcameneti. catvāro bhikṣavaḥ saṃghaḥ. tatra jñaptivācakena paṃcamenopasaṃpādyate pratyantikeṣu janapadeṣu. madhyameṣu tu janapadeṣu
T07yabhkvyu:7398: [Tib. 35b] iti. bhadro varga eṣām iti. bhadravargāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭiḥ kulaputrāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7399: teṣāṃ pūgena samūhenopasaṃpāditānāṃ. śaraṇagamanatraivācikena buddhaśaraṇaṃ gacchāma iti trirvacanenopasaṃpat. teṣāṃ nāvaśyaṃ vijñaptyadhīna iti. teṣāṃ vinayadharāṇām idam mataṃ. nāvaśyaṃ vijñaptyadhīnaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvara (Abhidh-k-vy 375) iti. buddhaprabhṛtīnām
T07yabhkvyu:7400: avijñaptidhīnatvāt. atha vā teṣām iti yeṣāṃ vijñaptir nāsty
T07yabhkvyu:7402: (IV.28ab) saṃvṛter iti saṃvarasya. kālo nityaḥ padārtho 'stīty eke. tadāśaṃkayā pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:7403: kālo nāma ka eṣa dharma iti. kāla ity asyābhidhānasya kim abhidheyam ity
T07yabhkvyu:7404: arthaḥ. saṃskāraparidīpanādhivacanam etad iti. saṃskārāṇām atītānāgatapratyutpannānām abhidyotakaṃ nāmeti. tadyathātītaḥ kālo yāvat
T07yabhkvyu:7405: pratyutpanna iti traiyadhvikāḥ saṃskārā eva gamyaṃte. tena ca tatrāprayogād iti. tena visabhāgenāśrayeṇa tatra samādāne aprayogāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7406: asmaraṇāc ca tenāśrayeṇa tatsamādānaṃ na samarati. vaibhāṣika āha. kutas tv etad evaṃ tarkyate. yathānantaram uktaṃ. ācārya āha. pareṇāpi saṃvarotpattau yuktyavirodhād iti. nātra yuktir virudhyate. yathā jīvitād ūrdhvaṃ saty api samādāne [Tib. 36a] saṃvarotpattau yuktivirodho visabhāgāśrayatvād ity evamādi. na kālāntaravipannam eti
T07yabhkvyu:7408: (IV.28cd) avijñaptivad asaṃvaro 'pi nāsti dravyata iti. yathā nāsty avijñaptir dravyata iti pratipāditaṃ. tathā asaṃvaro 'pi na dravyato 'sti.
T07yabhkvyu:7410: pāpakriyābhiprāya ity arthaḥ. sānubandha iti savāsana ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7411: savāsanaś cetanāviśeṣo 'saṃvara ity arthaḥ. yato 'nubandhāt tadvān asaṃvaravān ity ucyate. asaṃvarika ity arthaḥ. tasyānirākṛtatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7412: tasyābhisaṃdheḥ sānubandhasyānirākṛtatvāt. tadviruddhayā cetanayānupahatatvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7413: (IV.29) sa bhuktvāpi gṛhṇīyād iti. sūryodaya eva saṃvara uttiṣṭhate.
T07yabhkvyu:7417: vratam iti niyamaḥ. tadabhāvād ity akālabhojanāt. ubhayaṃ na syād iti. smṛtiḥ saṃvegaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:7418: na tu teṣām iti vistareṇācāryo vaibhāṣikamataṃ yuktyā [Tib. 36b]
T07yabhkvyu:7419: virodhayati. na tu teṣām eva samyagdṛṣṭyādīnāṃ samyagdṛṣṭidharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṃgasamādhīnāṃ. ta eva samyagdṛṣṭyādayo
T07yabhkvyu:7420: 'ṅgatvāga kalpaṃte. yujyanta ity arthaḥ. kasmāt. yuktivirodhāt. pūrvakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭyādaya (Abhidh-k-vy 376) uttareṣāṃ samyagdṛṣṭyādīnām aṅgaṃ yadi syur iti vyavasthāpyate. evam asyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ prathamakṣaṇotpanna āryamārgo nāṣṭāṃgaḥ syāt. na hi tatra pūrvotpannā samyagdṛṣṭir aṅgam
T07yabhkvyu:7421: astīti. saptāṅgaḥ syāt. bodhyaṃgeṣv api paścimaḥ kṣaṇo na bodhyaṃgaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7422: na hy anyā pareṇa bodhir asti yasyās tad aṅgaṃ syāt. atha matam anāgatāyā
T07yabhkvyu:7423: bodhes tad aṃgam iti. anāgatabodhir na syāt. evaṃ samādhir yojyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7424: (IV.31ab) anyatrājñānād iti. dātur grahītur vā vismaraṇād avyutpatteś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:7425: saṃdigdhasya vipannāśayasya vānādarapūrvakaṃ śaraṇam avagacchataḥ saṃvaro notpadyata iti. gṛhīti. uddeśapadam. avadātavasana iti. nirdeśapadaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7426: puruṣa iti. uddeśapadaṃ. puruṣendriyeṇa samanvāgata iti. tannirdeśapadaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7427: yadi na vinā saṃvareṇopāsako bhavati. yat tarhi sūtra uktaṃ. tad uktam iyatopāsako bhavatīti. tat katham iti vākyaśeṣaḥ. āha. nāsty atra sūtravirodha iti. [Tib. 37a mahānāmasūtrasya.
T07yabhkvyu:7429: iti. upāsakaśikṣāpadoktiḥ bhikṣur iva. yathaiva hi bhikṣur labdhasaṃvaro
T07yabhkvyu:7430: 'pi jñapticaturthena karmaṇā śikṣāpadāni yathāsthūlaṃ grāhyate pratyāyyate
T07yabhkvyu:7431: itaś cāmutaś ca pārājikādibhyas tava saṃvaraḥ. anyāni ca te
T07yabhkvyu:7432: sabrahmacāriṇaḥ kathayiṣyantīti. śrāmaṇeraś ca. kiṃ. śikṣāpadāni grāhyate labdhasaṃvaro 'pi pūrvaṃ. yadaiva hi tenābhyupagatam aham evaṃnāmā taṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7433: bhagavantaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha śākyamuniṃ śākyādhirājaṃ pravrajitam anupravrajāmi. gṛhasthaliṃgaṃ parityajāmi. pravrajyāliṃgaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7434: samādadāmi. śramaṇoddeśaṃ māṃ dhāraya. evaṃ yāvat trir apīti. tathopāsako
T07yabhkvyu:7435: 'pi buddhaśaraṇaṃ gacchāmi. yāvat saṃghaśaraṇaṃ gacchāmi. dvir api trir
T07yabhkvyu:7436: api. ity anena labdhasaṃvaro 'pi punaḥ śikṣāpadāni grāhyate. prāṇātipātaṃ prahāya prāṇātipātāt prativiramāmīti vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:7437: (IV.32abc) ekadeśakārī. ya ekaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ rakṣati. pradeśakārī. yo dve rakṣati. yadbhūyaskārī. yas trīṇi catvāri vā rakṣati. paripūrṇakārī. yaḥ paṃcāpi rakṣati. sa tatkārīty ukta iti. ekadeśakārī yāvat paripūrṇakārīty
T07yabhkvyu:7438: [Tib. 37b] arthaḥ. na hy evaṃ sūtrapāṭha iti. na hy evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7439: mahānāmasūtrapāṭho yāvajjīvaprāṇāpetam ity uktaḥ. yathā mahānāmasūtrapāṭha iti. kiyatā bhadanta upāsako bhavati. yataś ca mahānāman gṛhī vistareṇa yāvad upāsakaṃ māṃ dhārayeti. iyatopāsako bhavatīti. yatra tv eṣa pāṭha
T07yabhkvyu:7440: iti. yatra sūtrāntare eṣa pāṭhaḥ. yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇāpetaṃ śaraṇagatam
T07yabhkvyu:7441: abhiprasannam iti. tatas te dṛṣṭasatyāḥ pudgalāḥ avetyaprasādānvayam avetyaprasādahetukaṃ prāṇair api (Abhidh-k-vy 377) jīvitahetor api saddharmopagamanaṃ darśayati. abhavyā vayam enaṃ dharmaṃ parityaktum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7442: na tv eṣa lakṣaṇāpadeśaḥ saṃvarasya. na tv anena sūtreṇa lakṣaṇam apadiśyata ity arthaḥ. prāṇāpetaṃ tu na kvacit paṭhyata iti. nāpi
T07yabhkvyu:7443: mahānāmasūtre. nāpi dṛṣṭasatyasūtre. kaś caitad aparisphuṭārthaṃ paṭhed
T07yabhkvyu:7444: iti. madhyapadalopavikalpān na jñāyate. kiṃ prāṇebhyo 'petaṃ prāṇair vā 'petaṃ prāṇapetaṃ. utāho prāṇātipātādibhyo 'petaṃ prāṇāpetam iti. praśna eva na yujyata iti. yo 'yaṃ praśnaḥ kiyatā bhadantopāsaka ekadeśakārī
T07yabhkvyu:7445: bhavati. yāvat paripūrṇakārīti. eṣa praśno na yujyate. kuto visarjanam iti. iha mahānāmann upāsakaḥ [Tib. 38a] prāṇātipātaṃ prahāya prāṇātipātāt
T07yabhkvyu:7446: prativirato bhavati. iyatā mahānāmann upāsakaḥ śikṣāyām ekadeśakārī bhavati. viśtareṇa dvābhyāṃ śikṣāpadābhyāṃ prativirataḥ pradeśakārī bhavati. tribhyaḥ prativirataḥ caturbhyo vā yadbhūyaskārī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:7447: paṃcabhyaḥ prativirataḥ paripūrṇakārī bhavatīty etad visarjanaṃ suṣṭhu na yujyate. tanmātraśikṣāksamāṃ praty eṣa praśno yujyate iti. ekasya śikṣāpadasya dvayos tataḥ pareṇa vā kṣamām iti. vināpi saṃvareṇopāsakaḥ prajñapita iti. mahānāmasūtre. yataḥ khalu mahānāmaṃ gṛhī avadātavasana ity evamādinā.
T07yabhkvyu:7448: (IV.32d) arhato 'pi mṛduḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ syād iti. yadi samutthāpakam asya cittaṃ mṛdu syāt. pṛthagjanasyādhimātra iti. yady asyādhimātraṃ cittam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7449: anyatrājñānād iti. dātur grahītuś ca. tadanādaratas tu śaraṇagamanair vinā na syād upāsaka
T07yabhkvyu:7450: (IV.33) buddhakarakān iti. buddhaprajñaptihetūn. ata evāha. yeṣāṃ prādhānyena sa ātmabhāvo buddha ity ucyate. anye 'pi hi guṇā aprādhānyenāśritā bhavati. yeṣāṃ vā lābheneti. kṣayajñānādayaḥ saparivārā iti. ādiśabdenānutpādajñānam aśaikṣī ca samyagdṛṣṭir gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7451: saparivāragrahaṇenānāsravāḥ paṃca skaṃdhā gṛhyante. rūpakāyasya pūrvaṃ paścāc cāviśeṣād iti. kiṃ. na rūpakāyaṃ [Tib. 38b] śaraṇaṃ gacchatīti saṃbandhaḥ. yādṛśo bodhisattvāvasthāyāṃ rūpakāyas tādṛśaḥ paścād apīti.
T07yabhkvyu:7452: lakṣaṇataḥ sarvabuddhān iti. na kaṇṭhoktita ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7453: mārgasyāvilakṣaṇatvād iti. laukikasya mārgasya puṇyajñānasaṃbhāralakṣaṇasya lokottarasya
T07yabhkvyu:7456: saṃghībhavanty abhedyatvād iti. sadevakenāpi lokena mārgaṃ praty abhedyatvāt saṃghībhavaṃti. samagrarūpā bhavantīti. lakṣaṇata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7458: tatra bhagavāṃs trapusabhallikau vaṇijāv āmaṃtrayate sma. etaṃ yuvāṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchataṃ. dharmaṃ ca. yo 'sau bhaviṣyaty anāgate 'dhvani
T07yabhkvyu:7459: saṃgho nāma tam api śaraṇaṃ gacchatam iti. yadā saṃgho nāsti tadaivam uktam anāgatam eva saṃgham adhikṛtya. tat kathaṃ sarvasaṃghān asau śaraṇaṃ gacchatīty anena virudhyate. tatpratyakṣabhāvina iti. yat saṃgharatnaṃ tayos bhallikayor dharmacakrapravartanānantaraṃ pratyakṣībhaviṣyatti.
T07yabhkvyu:7462: śāṃtyekalakṣaṇatvād iti. svaparasāṃtānikānāṃ kleśānāṃ duḥkhasya ca yā śāntiḥ. tal lakṣaṇam asyeti śāntyekalakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ. tadbhāvaḥ. tasmāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7464: āśrayavipādanād iti. teṣām aśaikṣāṇāṃ ya āśrayo rūpaskandhaḥ. tasya vipādanād vikopanāt tadāśrayiṇo 'pi te buddhakarakā dharmā vipāditā
T07yabhkvyu:7465: bhavaṃti. śāstraṃ tu naivam iti vistaraḥ. abhidharmaśāstraṃ naivaṃ vācakaṃ. naivaṃ darśakaṃ. aśaikṣā dharmā eva buddha iti. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:7466: buddhakarakā iti. ke te buddhakarakāḥ ye buddhatvasya buddhaprajñapteś ca hetavo laukikalokottarā dharmāḥ. te buddha iti. ata āśrayasya laukikapaṃcaskandhalakṣaṇasya buddhatvāpratiṣedhād acodyam evaitat. yad uktaṃ yady aśaikṣā dharmā eva buddhaḥ kathaṃ tathāgatasyāntike
T07yabhkvyu:7467: duṣṭacittarudhirotpādanād ānantaryaṃ bhavatīti. anyathā hīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7468: yady aśaikṣā dharmā buddhaḥ. [Tib. 39b] śaikṣāśaikṣā eva dharmāḥ saṃghaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7469: laukikacittastho na buddhaḥ syān na saṃghaḥ. kasmāt. na hi laukikaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7470: aśaikṣā dharmāḥ śaikṣāśaikṣāś ceti. yadi vā śaikṣā dharmā eva buddhakarakā
T07yabhkvyu:7471: budddhaḥ syāt nāśrayo 'pi. śīlam eva sa bhikṣusaṃvarākhyaṃ bhikṣukarakaṃ bhikṣuḥ syāt. nāśrayaḥ. āha. yady āśrayasyāpi buddhatvaṃ kasmād evam āha
T07yabhkvyu:7472: śāstre. yo buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati. aśaikṣān asau buddhakarakān dharmān śaraṇaṃ gacchatīty aśaikṣadharmān evāvadhārayati. evaṃ vaibhāṣikeṇokte ācāryo dṛṣṭāntena samādhim āha. yathā tu yo bhikṣuṃ pūjayatīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7473: yathā tu yo bhikṣuṃ pūjayati śīlamukhena. bhikṣukarakam asau śīlaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7474: pūjayati. na ca punaḥ śīlam eva bhikṣuḥ. evaṃ yo buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchaty aśaikṣamukhena. aśaikṣān asau buddhakarakān dharmāṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati. na punaḥ svasaṃtānikā aśaikṣā eva dharmā buddhaḥ. tasmād adoṣa eṣaḥ. yo buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati. aśaikṣān asau buddhakarakān dharmāṃś charaṇaṃ gacchatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:7476: so 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān iti. teṣām asādhāraṇatvād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7479: caityakalpitā vṛkṣāś caityavṛkṣāḥ. tān iti. ata eveti. yasmād etac charaṇam āgamya sarvaduḥkhāt
T07yabhkvyu:7482: (IV.34ab) āpāyikatvāc ca. yasmāc ca kāmamithyācāra ekāṃtenāpāyikaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:7483: apāyasaṃvartanīyaḥ. na tathābrahmacaryaṃ. akriyāniyamo hy akaraṇasaṃvara
T07yabhkvyu:7484: iti. akriyāyām akaraṇe niyama ekāṃtatā akriyāniyamaḥ. so 'karaṇasaṃvaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7485: akaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ saṃvaraḥ. na samādānikasaṃvara ity arthaḥ. sa ca sautrāṃtikanayenāvasthāviśeṣa eva. vaibhāṣikanayena tu śīlāṃgam avijñaptir
T07yabhkvyu:7487: (IV.34cd) ya upāsakāḥ saṃta iti vistaraḥ. ye gṛhītapaṃcaśikṣāpadāḥ saṃto
T07yabhkvyu:7488: bhāryāḥ pariṇayanti vivāhayaṃti. kiṃ tair upāsakais tābhyo 'pi strībhyaḥ saṃvaraḥ pratilabdhaḥ. pratilabdhapūrvaka ity arthaḥ. atha na pratilabdha
T07yabhkvyu:7489: ity adhikṛtaṃ. vaibhāṣika āha. pratilabdha iti. mā bhūt prādeśika iti sarvāgamyāt prativirateḥ. kāmamithyācārāt prativiramāmīti agamyācārāt
T07yabhkvyu:7490: prativiramāmi. na tv asmāt saṃtānāgamyācarāt prativiramāmīty abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7492: na tv atra saṃtāna iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7494: [Tib. 40b] iti. pratiṣedhasāvadyaṃ. bhagavatpratiṣiddhaṃ karmācarataḥ pāpaṃ bhavati. bhagavacchāsanānādarāt. na tat kliṣṭaṃ yad amadanīyamātrāṃ viditvā pibatīty ābhidhārmikeṇokte. prakṛtisāvadyaṃ madyam iti
T07yabhkvyu:7496: prakṛtisāvadyena karmaṇā na cikitsyaḥ. prajñaptisavadyena tu cikitsanīya
T07yabhkvyu:7497: ity abhiprāyaḥ. śākyeṣu glāneṣu madyapānaṃ nābhyanujñātam. ato gamyate prakṛtisāvadyaṃ tad iti. yadi hi hat prajñaptisāvadyaṃ syāt glānaśākyopasthānāya tad anujñāyate. na cānujñāyate. tena tat prakṛtisāvadyam iti. idaṃ coktaṃ māṃ śāstāram uddiśadbhiḥ śākyamunir naḥ śāstety upadiśadbhiḥ kuśāgreṇāpi madyaṃ na pātavyam iti. prakṛtisāvadyaṃ tad iti bhagavatā tat pratiṣiddhaṃ. na tu madanīyam ity avetya.
T07yabhkvyu:7500: anadhyācārāt. prāṇivadhādivad iti sādhanaṃ. kāyaduścaritavacanāc cety [Tib. 41a] aparaṃ sādhanaṃ. prakṛtisāvadyaṃ madyaṃ. kāyaduścaritavacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7501: prāṇivadhādivat. caturvidhaṃ hi nandikasūtrādiṣu kāyaduścaritam uktam.
T07yabhkvyu:7503: iti. utsargavihitasyāpīti vistaraḥ. anena bhagavadvacanasya pūrvāparavirodhaṃ pariharaṃti. kathaṃ. bhadaṃteti vistareṇa madyapānasya
T07yabhkvyu:7504: sāmānyavacanam utsargaḥ. śākyeṣu glāneṣu madyapānaṃ nābhyanujñātam ity apavāda iti. madyapānaṃ glānāvasthāyām api nānujñātam iti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7505: apavādaḥ punaḥ prasaṃgaparihārārthaṃ. sakṛtpītaṃ hi madyaṃ vyasanībhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:7506: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā. trīṇi sthānāni pratiṣedhamāṇasya nāsti tṛptir vā.
T07yabhkvyu:7507: alaṃtā vā. paryāptir vā. madyam abrahmacaryaṃ styānamiddhaṃ ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:7508: prasaṃgaparihāraḥ kasmād ity āha. madanīyamātrāniyamāt. saiva hi mātrā
T07yabhkvyu:7509: dravyakālaprakṛtiśarīrāvasthā apekṣya madanīyā cāmadanīyā ca bhavati. ata eva ca kuśāgrapānapratiṣedha ity atiśayavacanaṃ. tad evaṃ na
T07yabhkvyu:7510: prakṛtisāvadyam iti manasikṛtvā bhagavatā tatpariharaṇīyam uktaṃ. [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:7511: 41b] kiṃ tarhi. prasaṃgadoṣād iti darśitaṃ. āryair anadhyācaraṇaṃ hrīmattvād iti. paṃca śaikṣāṇi balāni sūtre paṭhyaṃte. katamāni paṃca.
T07yabhkvyu:7512: śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalaṃ hrībalam apatrāpyabalaṃ prajñābalaṃ ceti. ato hrīmattvān na pibaṃti. na tu prakṛtisāvadyatvāt. yadi hrīmattvāt tad
T07yabhkvyu:7513: anadhyācaraṇam ajñātam udakādivat kasmān na pibaṃtīty ata āha. tena ca smṛtināśād iti. madyaṃ hi pibataḥ kāryākāryasmṛtir naśyatīti. yady evam alpakaṃ tu pibaṃtu. yāvatyā mātrayā smṛtir naśyatīty ata āha. alpakasyāpy
T07yabhkvyu:7514: apānam. aniyamāt. viṣavad iti. yathā kālaprakṛtiśaktiyogād alpam api viṣaṃ kadācin mārayati. evaṃ madyam api madayatīti. duścaritavacanaṃ pramādasthānatvād iti. madenākuśalaparihārāt. kuśalakaraṇāc ca. atra pramādasthānagrahaṇaṃ nānyeṣv iti. atraiva śikṣāpade pramādasthānagrahaṇaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7515: surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānaṃ prahāya surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānāt prativiramāmīti vacanāt. nānyeṣu śikṣāpadeṣu prāṇātipātaviratyādiṣu
T07yabhkvyu:7516: pramādasthānagrahaṇaṃ. prāṇātipātapramādasthānaṃ prahāya prāṇātipātapramādasthānāt prativiramāmīti [Tib. 42a] pramādasthānaṃ na paṭhyate. kiṃ tarhi. prāṇātipātaṃ prahāya prāṇātipātāt prativiramāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:7517: evam adattādānādi yojyaṃ. kasmād ity āha. teṣāṃ prakṛtisāvadyatvāt. teṣāṃ prāṇātipātaviratyādīnāṃ śikṣāpadānāṃ prakṛtisāvadyatvāt. tad uktaṃ bhavati. pramādasthānam etad iti madyapānāt prativirantavyaṃ. na tu prakṛtisāvadyam etad iti. atyāseviteneti vistaraḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānenāsevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena kāyasya bhedān narakeṣūpapadyata iti nandikasūtre vacanāt. atyāsevitena madyapānena durgatigamanābhidhānaṃ tatprasaṃgena madyapānaprasaṃgena abhīkṣṇam ajasram akuśalasaṃtatipravṛtteḥ. akuśalānāṃ yā saṃtatiḥ. tasyāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:7519: yataḥ. vṛttilābhād vā phaladānāya vā pūrvopacitasya karmaṇo
T07yabhkvyu:7520: maraṇāvasthāyāṃ vṛttilābhaḥ. yataḥ. tasmād ākṣepāt vṛttilābhād vā durgatigamanābhidhānam iti saṃbandhanīyaṃ. annāsava iti. taṇḍulakṛtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7521: dravāsava iti. ikṣurasādikṛtaḥ. te veti vistaraḥ. surāmaireye kadācid aprāptamadyabhāve [Tib. 42b] . yadā nave bhavataḥ. kadācit
T07yabhkvyu:7522: pracyutamadyabhāve. yadā atipurāṇe bhavataḥ. ity ato madyagrahaṇaṃ. yadi
T07yabhkvyu:7523: madanīyaṃ. tato doṣa ity abhiprāyaḥ. pūgaphalakodravādayo 'pīti.
T07yabhkvyu:7524: ādiśabdena niṣpāvādayo gṛhyaṃte. madyapāne nāmadyatve 'py adoṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7525: surāmaireye na bhavata iti. surāmaireyasvabhāvasya madyasya pāne doṣa ity arthaḥ. sarvapramādāspadatvād iti. sarvapramādānāṃ sarvasmṛtipramoṣāṇāṃ prāṇātipātādyakuśalānāṃ hetubhūtānāṃ sthānam āspadaṃ pratiṣṭheti pramādasthānaṃ madyapānam.
T07yabhkvyu:7526: (IV.36) yata eko labhyate iti. yato maulādibhyaḥ sattvāsattvākhyebhyaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:7533: prāṇātipātavanaspatibhaṃgādilakṣaṇebhyaḥ. tad etad ubhayam apy ubhayādhiṣṭhānaṃ bhavati. prakṛtisāvadyam api sattvādhiṣṭhānam
T07yabhkvyu:7535: asattvādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca. [Tib. 43a] na punar evaṃ grahītavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7537: iti. tatra tāvat prakṛtisāvadyaṃ sattvādhiṣṭhānaṃ prāṇivadhādi.
T07yabhkvyu:7539: sahāgāraśayyādi ca. prakṛtisāvadyam asattvādhiṣṭhānaṃ jātarūpādyapaharaṇaṃ. prajñaptisāvadyam asattvādhiṣṭhānaṃ vṛkṣapattrādicchedo bhikṣoḥ. āhārādiṣu ca vinayokta upadeśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7540: sattvādhiṣṭhānapravṛttatvād iti. sattvaprajñaptyadhiṣṭhānapravṛttatvād ity abhiprāyaḥ. vartamānā eva hi dharmāḥ sattvaprajñaptyadhiṣṭhānā nātītā
T07yabhkvyu:7542: nātītānāgatehyaḥ. teṣām asattvasaṃkhyātatvād iti. nanu cāsattvaprajñaptiadhiṣṭhhānapravṛtto 'pi prātimokṣasaṃvaro bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:7543: sattvāsattvākhyebhyaḥ prāpyata iti vacanāt. sa cāpy evaṃ na pratiṣidhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7544: yathaiva hi sattvākhyebhyo vartamānebhye eva labhyata ity ucyate. tathā vartamānebhya evāsattvākhyebhyo 'pi labhyata iti vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7545: vartamānādhiṣṭhanatām eva hy anena vacanenātidiṣati. na prayogapṛṣṭhebhya iti. samāhitāvasthāyām ekāṃtamaulatvāt. asamāhitāvasthāyāṃ ca na
T07yabhkvyu:7546: saṃvarābhāvāt. kuta eva prajñaptisāvadebhya iti. abhyupagamābhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7547: sarvakālebhyaś ceti. atītānāgatayor api saṃvarayor lābhāt
T07yabhkvyu:7549: ata eveti. yasmād [Tib. 43b] ete saṃvarā evaṃ labhyaṃte. yathā
T07yabhkvyu:7550: vistareṇoktam. ataś catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate. vistara iti. saṃti tāni skandhadhātvāyatanāni. yebhyo dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau labhyete. na
T07yabhkvyu:7551: prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ. saṃti tāni. yebhyaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaro na
T07yabhkvyu:7552: dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau. saṃti tāni. yebhya ubhayaṃ labhyate. saṃti tāni.
T07yabhkvyu:7553: yebhyo nobhayaṃ labhyata iti. vistarārthaḥ. prathamā koṭiḥ. vartamānebhyaḥ prāṇātipātādikarmapathaprayogapṛṣthebhyaḥ pratikṣepaṇasāvadyāc ca vṛkṣabhaṃgādikād yaḥ saṃvaraḥ. sa prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7554: sarvobhayebhya iti vacanāt. prayogapṛṣṭhatvāt tu na dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau. dvitīya.
T07yabhkvyu:7555: atītānāgatebhyo maulebhyaḥ karmapathebhyaḥ prāṇātipātādibhyaḥ kāyavācikebhyaḥ saptabhyaḥ saṃvaro yaḥ. tau dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau.
T07yabhkvyu:7556: maulebhyaḥ sarvakālebhya ity vacanāt. na prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ. atītānāgatatvāt. tṛtīyā.
T07yabhkvyu:7558: pratyutpannakarmapathatvāt prātimokṣasaṃvaro bhavati. maulakarmapathatvāc ca dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau. caturthī atītanāgatebhyaḥ sāmaṃtakapṛṣṭhebhya
T07yabhkvyu:7559: iti. atītānāgatatvān na prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ. sāmaṃtakapṛṣṭhatvān na dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau [Tib. 44b] svasaṃtāne vartamānebhyaḥ karmapathebhyaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:7560: saṃvaro na yujyata iti paśyann āha. na tu saṃvaralābhakāle vartamānāḥ karmapathāḥ saṃtīti. vartamānādhiṣṭhānebhyas tebhyaḥ karmapathebhya iti vaktavyam iti śikṣayaty ācāryaḥ. yato vastunaḥ prativiramati. tasya
T07yabhkvyu:7561: vartamānatvāsaṃbhavāt. nātītavartamānānām iti. utpannatvād eṣāṃ saṃvaraṇaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7562: na yujyate. na hy utpannānām anutpattiḥ śakyate kartuṃ. anāgatānāṃ tu śakyata iti. teṣām eva saṃvaraṇaṃ yujyata ity ācāryābhiprāyaḥ (Abhidh-k-vy
T07yabhkvyu:7564: prāṇātipātādiprayogamaulapṛṣṭhānāṃ yathākramaṃ saṃvaraṇāya prātimokṣasaṃvaraprayogamaulapṛṣṭhāni pravartaṃte. naitāni pravartiṣyaṃta iti. arthata evaitāni pratipakṣabhūtāni tāni rundhantīvotpadyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:7565: prayogaḥ prayogam evaṃ bhavītīva tvām ahaṃ saṃvṛṇomi. mā tvam utthā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7566: evaṃ yāvat. pṛṣṭhaḥ pṛṣṭham evaṃ bravītīveti yojyaṃ. tathā skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ karmapathaprayogamaulapṛṣṭhasvabhāvānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7567: vartamānānāṃ rundhāno vartamānebhyas tebhyo labhyate. prātimokṣasaṃvara ity ucyata iti. tasmān naivaṃ vaktavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7568: (IV.37) kaścit sarvebhya iti vistaraḥ. bhikṣusaṃvaraḥ sarvebhyaḥ karmapathebhyo labhyate. sarvakarmapathā varjanīyā ity arthaḥ. kaścic
T07yabhkvyu:7569: caturbhyaḥ. tato 'nyaḥ. [Tib. 44b] tato bhikṣusaṃvarād anyaḥ. saṃvaraḥ śrāmaṇerādisaṃvaraś caturbhya evāṃgebhyo labhyate. kāyikebhyaḥ prāṇātipātādibhyas tribhyo vācikāc ca mṛṣāvādāt. yady alobhādveṣāmohāḥ kāraṇānīti. saṃvarakāraṇāni dvihdā iṣyaṃte. alobhādveṣāmohā vā kāraṇāni.
T07yabhkvyu:7570: mṛdumadhyādhimātrāṇi vā cittānīti. yadi pūrvaḥ paryāyo 'bhiprīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7571: sarvaiḥ kāraṇair alobhādisvabhāvair labhyate saṃvaraḥ. kuśale samutthāpake cetasi teṣāṃ yugapat bhāvāt. yadi mṛdvādīni cittāni kāraṇānīṣyaṃte. ekena kāraṇena labhyate. teṣām ayugapat bhāvāt. paścimaṃ paryāyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7572: mṛdvādikāraṇapakṣaṃ. asti saṃvarasthāyīti vistaraḥ. sarvasattveṣu saṃvṛtaḥ sarvasattvānugate kalyāṇāśaye sati saṃvarotpatteḥ. na sarvāṃgair upāsakādisaṃvarasya sarvāṃgāprativiratatvāt. na sarvakāraṇair mṛdvādīnāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7573: kāraṇatvena yugapad asaṃbhavāt. bhikṣusaṃvaras tu sarvāṃgair api.
T07yabhkvyu:7574: sarvāṃgaprativiratatvāt. yas trividhena cittena trīn saṃvarān samādatta
T07yabhkvyu:7575: iti. tadyathā mṛdunā cittena upāsakasaṃvaraṃ samādatte. madhyena
T07yabhkvyu:7577: sarvakāraṇaiś ca na tu sarvāṃgair iti. upāsakādisaṃvarāṇām ekaikasya mṛdvādyekaikakāraṇatvāt. tathā gṛhṇata iti. paṃcaniyamakriyayā gṛhṇataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7578: katham aśakyebhya iti. ye haṃtum eva na śakyāḥ. tebhyo 'śakyebhyaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:7579: sattvebhyaḥ kathaṃ saṃvaralābhaḥ. atrācāryaḥ samādhim āha.
T07yabhkvyu:7580: sarvasattvajīvitānupaghātādhyāśayenābhyupagamād iti. sarvasattvānāṃ jīvitasyānupaghātenādhyāśayena saṃvarābhyupagamāt. vaibhāṣikā apy asyaiva
T07yabhkvyu:7581: praśnasya parihārāṃtaram āhuḥ. yadi punaḥ śakyebhya eveti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7582: cayāpacayayuktaḥ syāt. śakyatām āgateṣu satteṣu saṃvaraś cīyeta. asakyatām āgateṣv apacīyeta. (Abhidh-k-vy 384) śakyāśakyānāṃ manuṣyādidevādīnām itaretarasaṃcārāt. devādayo manuṣyādīn saṃcaraṃti. manuṣyādayaś devādīn iti. imaṃ vaibhāṣikaparihāraṃ sāvakāśaṃ paśyann ācārya āha. naivaṃ bhaviṣyatīti vistaraḥ. naivaṃ cayāpacayayuktaḥ saṃvaro bhaviṣyati. kathaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7583: kṛtvā. yathā hy apūrvatṛṇādyutpattau. śoṣe vā tṛṇādīnāṃ. yady api tṛṇādibhyo 'pi saṃvaro labhyate. tathāpi saṃvarasya vṛddhihrāsau na
T07yabhkvyu:7584: bhavataḥ. [Tib. 45b] evaṃ śakyāśakyasaṃcāre 'pi na syātāṃ vṛddhihrāsau
T07yabhkvyu:7585: cayāpacayāv ity arthaḥ. tasmāc chakyebhya eva saṃvaro labhyate. na cāyaṃ doṣaḥ syād iti. vaibhāṣikā āhuḥ. na sattvānām iti vistaraḥ. na tad evaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7586: yathā hy apūrvatṛṇādyutpattāv iti vistareṇa yad uktaṃ. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7587: sattvānāṃ pūrvaṃ saṃcārāt paścāc ca bhāvāt. tṛṇagulmalatādīnāṃ pūrvaṃ paścāc cābhāvāt. ato na tṛṇādidṛṣṭāṃtena cayāpacayadoṣo nivāryate. evaṃ vaidharmyamātram uktaṃ. na sādhyasādhanārtha iti. ācāryaḥ punar āha. yadā parinirvṛtā na saṃty eveti vistaraḥ. tasmāt pūrvaka eva hetuḥ sādhur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7588: sarvasattvajīvitānupaghātādhyāśayenābhyupagamād iti. ata śakyāśakyebhyaḥ saṃvaro labhyata iti siddhaṃ. evaṃ tarhi yadi sarvasattvebhyo labhyate prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ. pūrvabuddhaparinirvṛtebhyas tasyālābhāc chīlanyūnatā
T07yabhkvyu:7589: syāt. sattvānāṃ pūrvebhyo nyūnatvāt. ācārya āha. sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ pūrvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7590: paścāc cotpannānām aviśeṣeṇa sarvasattvebhyo lābhāt. yadi hi te py aparinirvṛtā abhaviṣyan. saṃprati tebhyo 'pi te 'lapsyaṃta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7591: sarvakarmapathebhya iti. kāyikavācikebhyaḥ. nāsti hi vikalenāsaṃvareṇeti.
T07yabhkvyu:7592: prāṇātipātenaiva [tib 46a] nādattādānenety evamādi. mṛdunaivāsaṃvareṇa samanvāgata iti. pūrvapratilabdhatvāt. adhimātrayā tu prāṇātipātavijñaptyā. kiṃ. samanvāgata iti vartate. na vipākaphalaviśeṣa iti. evaṃ madhyādhimātreṇa yojyam iti. yo madhyena cittenāsaṃvaraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7593: pratilabhate. so 'dhimātreṇāpi cittena prāṇino jīvitād vyavaropayan madhyenaivāsaṃvareṇa samanvāgato bhavati. adhimātrayā tu prāṇātipātavijñaptyā. evaṃ yo 'dhimātreṇa yāvad adhimātreṇaivāsaṃvareṇa samanvāgato bhavati. adhimātrayā ca prāṇātipātavijñaptyā. ittham api ca
T07yabhkvyu:7594: yojyaṃ. yo 'dhimātracittenāsaṃvaraṃ pratilabhate. sa mṛdunāpi cittena
T07yabhkvyu:7595: prāṇino jīvitād vyavaropayan adhimātrenaivāsaṃvareṇa samanvāgato bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:7597: nāgabaṃdhā hastipakāḥ. vāgurikā iti. paṃpā nāma prāṇijātir vāgurākhyā. tāṃ ghnantīti vāgurikāḥ. arthata āsaṃvarikā iti. rājānaś cādhikaraṇasthāś ca
T07yabhkvyu:7598: (Abhidh-k-vy 385) daṇḍanetṛtvād ihāpaṭhitā api āsaṃvarikā eva draṣṭavyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7599: evam anye 'pi yojyā iti. kurkuṭāṃ ghnaṃtīti. kaurkuṭikā ity evamādīni.
T07yabhkvyu:7600: yuktas tāvad iti vistareṇoktvā yāvat katham asaṃvaraḥ sarvasattvedhyo yujyata iti praśnite. vaibhāṣikaḥ parihāram āha. mātrādīn api hīti
T07yabhkvyu:7601: vistaraḥ. ācārya āha. na hi tāvat [Tib. 46b] ta eva ta iti. te mātrādaya iti jānānā hanyur ity aghātyebhyas tebhyo 'saṃvaraḥ kathaṃ yujyate. kiṃ cāryībhūtānāṃ punaḥ paśūbhavituṃ nāsty avakāśaḥ. teṣām
T07yabhkvyu:7602: urabhrādyupapattyasaṃbhavāt. tebhyaḥ katham asaṃvaraḥ syāt. yadi vānāgatātmabhāvāpekṣayā urabhrādayo bhaviṣyaṃtīti vartamānān mātrāder
T07yabhkvyu:7603: asaṃvaraḥ syāt. urabhrān api te aurabhrikāḥ putrībhūtān anāgate janmani sarvathā na hanyur iti. na syāt tebhya urabhrebhyo 'saṃvaraḥ. vaibhāṣika
T07yabhkvyu:7604: āha. kathaṃ hi nāma jighāṃsatām iti vistaraḥ. ācārya āha. etan mātrādiṣu samānam iti vistaraḥ. kathaṃ hi nāmājighāṃsatāṃ putrādibhūtānām aurabhrikādīnāṃ tebhyo mātrādibhyaḥ syād asaṃvara iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7605: vikalaḥ karmapathāṃgataḥ. prādeśiko 'pi syāt. ekasyāpy aṃgasya aviramāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7607: vikalo 'pi prādeśiko 'pi syāt. anyatrāṣṭavidhāt pūrvoktāt prātimokṣasaṃvarāt. kasmād ity āha. tanmātraśīladauḥśīlyapratibandhād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7608: asaṃvaras tanmātraṃ śīlaṃ pratibadhnāti. saṃvaraś ca tanmātraṃ dauḥśīlyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7612: iti. ādareṇa īhanaṃ kriyāraṃbhaḥ. kṣetraṃ cādānaṃ cādarehanaṃ ceti
T07yabhkvyu:7613: samāsaḥ. tasmād avijñaptir utpadyate. tithīti vistaraḥ. tithibhaktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7614: yāvad ardhamāsabhaktam ity arthagatiḥ. ādiśabdena maṇḍalakaraṇādi gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7615: ādareṇa vā tadrūpeṇeti.tīvrakleśatayā. tīvraprasādatayā cety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7616: (IV.39, 40) samādānaviruddhavijñaptyutpādād iti. yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātādibhyaḥ prativiramāmīti yat samādānaṃ. tena viruddhāyā vijñapter utpādāt. iti prathamena kāraṇena prātimokṣasaṃvaratyāgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7617: āśrayatyāgād iti. yenāśrayeṇa saṃvaro gṛhītaḥ. tasya tyāgān maraṇād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7618: dvitīyena kāraṇena tattyāgaḥ. āśrayavikopanād iti. yādṛśenāśrayeṇa saṃvara upāttaḥ. tādṛśo na bhavati. vikopanāt. iti tṛtīyena kāraṇena tattyāgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7619: nidānacchedād iti. nidānaṃ kuśalamūlāni. tasya cchedāt. caturthena kāraṇena tattyāgaḥ. tāvad evākṣepāc ceti. upavāsasaṃvarasyāhorātram
T07yabhkvyu:7620: ākṣepaḥ. iti paṃcamena kāraṇena tasyopavāsasaṃvarasya tyāgaḥ. pūrvoktaiś ca caturbhiḥ kāraṇair
T07yabhkvyu:7621: patanīyena ceti. ebhiś ca yathoktaiḥ paṃcabhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ patanīyena ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:7626: āgamād yuktitaś ca. tatrāyam āgamaḥ. vinaya uktaṃ. duḥśīlaś cet bhikṣur
T07yabhkvyu:7627: bhikṣuṇīm anuśāsti. saṃghāvaśeṣam āpadyata iti. āpannapārājiko hi bhikṣur
T07yabhkvyu:7629: viparyayeṇa vacanād ato 'vagamyate. asty asya duḥśīlasyāpi sato
T07yabhkvyu:7630: bhikṣubhāvaḥ. yasmāt saṃghāvaśeṣam āpadyata ity uktam iti. yuktir api na
T07yabhkvyu:7631: hy ekadeśakṣobhāt sakalasaṃvaratyāgo yukta iti. na maulīm apy āpattim
T07yabhkvyu:7632: āpannasyeti. patanīyām apy āpattim āpannasyety arthaḥ. naiva cānyāpattim iti. saṃghāvaśeṣādikaṃ. āviṣkṛtāyām iti. deśitāyāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7633: yat tarhi bhagavatoktam iti vistareṇa yāvat parājitam iti. tat katham iti
T07yabhkvyu:7636: bahukleśebhyo nandaprabhṛtibhyaḥ. maulyāpy āpattyā na bhikṣutvaṃ naśyatīti viditvā tāṃ kuryur iti vākyārthaḥ [Tib. 48a] saṃjñābhikṣur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7637: yasyānupasaṃpannasya bhikṣur iti nāma. pratijñābhikṣur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7638: abrahmacaryādipravṛttau duḥśīlaḥ. bhikṣata iti bhikṣur iti. yācanakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7639: bhinnakleśatvād bhikṣur iti. arhan. asmiṃs tv artha iti. yat yat bhagavatoktam abhikṣur bhavaty aśramaṇa iti vistareṇa. etasminn arthe.
T07yabhkvyu:7640: yathoktebhyaś caturbhyo bhikṣubhyo 'nya evāyaṃ paṃcamo jñapticaturthopasaṃpanno bhikṣur iti. yad apy uktaṃ paramārthabhikṣutvaṃ saṃdhāyaitad uktaṃ. tat pratyāha. na cāsau pūrvaṃ paramārthabhikṣur āsīt.
T07yabhkvyu:7641: yataḥ paścād abhikṣur bhavet. abhikṣur bhavaty aśramaṇa iti vacanāt. ity upamāṃ kurvateti. mastakacchinnatālopamāṃ kurvatā śāstraiva datto 'nuyoga
T07yabhkvyu:7642: iti saṃbaṃdhanīyaṃ. parihṛtaḥ praśna ity arthaḥ. ekagrāsaparibhoga
T07yabhkvyu:7644: sarvabhikṣusaṃbhogabahiṣkṛtaś ca śāstreti. sarvasmāt bhikṣubhis saha
T07yabhkvyu:7645: saṃbhogād ekapaṃktibhojanādikād bahiṣkṛto buddhena. nāśayata kāraṇḍavakam iti. kāraṇḍavako yavākṛtitvād yavas tṛṇaviśeṣaḥ. yo yavadūṣīty ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7646: evam asāv abhikṣur bhikṣvākṛtir [Tib. 48b] iti. kaśaṃbakam nāma pūtikāṣṭham. evam asau pūtibhūto bhikṣuḥ. taṃ śīlavatsaṃghād yūyam
T07yabhkvyu:7649: vṛīhir eva. tathāsau śīlasārahīno bhikṣvākṛtiḥ. taṃ pravāhayata.
T07yabhkvyu:7650: niṣkrāmayatety arthaḥ. mārgajinaḥ śaikṣo 'śaikṣaḥ. mārgadaiśiko buddhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7651: mārge jīvati śīlavāṃ bhikṣur mārganimittaṃ jīvanāt. mārgadūṣī duḥśīlaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7652: idam atrodāharaṇaṃ. dagdhakāṣṭheti vistaraḥ. yathā yad dagdhaṃ. na tat kāṣṭhaṃ. pūrvakāṣṭhākṛtimātrāvaśeṣasādharmyāt. tad dagdhaṃ kāṣṭham ity
T07yabhkvyu:7653: ucyate. hradaś ca śuṣko 'pi hrada ity ucyate. śukanāsā gṛhādiṣu rūpakārakṛtā. śukanāsākṛtitvāc chukanāsety ucyate. evam asau bhikṣvākṛtisāmānyamātrāvaśeṣāc chramaṇa uktaḥ. pūtibījam aṃkurājanakatvād abījam api bījam ity ucyate. tadākāramātrāvaśeṣatvād alātacakraṃ cakram
T07yabhkvyu:7654: iti. cakrākṛtitvāt. mṛtasattvaś cāsattvo 'pi sattva ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7655: sattvākṛtimātrāvaśeṣatvāt. tadvad eṣa draṣṭavyaḥ. śikṣādattako nāma bhikṣur adhimātrarāgatayā [Tib. 49a] striyā abhrahmacaryaṃ kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:7656: tadanaṃtaram eva jātasaṃvegaḥ kaṣṭaṃ mayā kṛtam ity ekasminn api praticchādanacitte 'nutpanne bhikṣusaṃgham upagamyāviṣkarotīdaṃ mayā pāpaṃ kṛtam iti. sa āryasaṃghopadeśāt sarvabhikṣunavakāṃtikatvādi daṇḍakarma kurvāṇaḥ śikṣādattaka ity ucyate. tad yadi dauḥśīlyād abhikṣur eva syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7657: sa na syāt. na hi tasya punar upasaṃpādanaṃ kriyate. bhikṣuś ca sa
T07yabhkvyu:7658: vyavasthāpyate. tasmān na dauḥśīlyād abhikṣutvam iti. na brūma iti
T07yabhkvyu:7659: vistaraḥ. na vayaṃ brūmaḥ. sahādhyāpattyā abrahmacaryād eva sarvaḥ pārājiko bhavati. kiṃ tarhi. praticchādanacittena. kiṃ na punaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:7661: tīvreṇānapatrāpyeṇa vipāditāsya saṃtatiḥ. tasyāḥ saṃtater evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7662: vipāditatvāt saṃvarasyābhavyatvaṃ. tasmān na punaḥ pravrājyata ity adhikāraḥ. na tu khalu bhikṣubhāvāpekṣayā. na tu khalu tasya bhikṣubhāvo 'stīty apekṣayā na pravrājyate. tathā hy asau parājayiko nikṣiptaśikṣo pi
T07yabhkvyu:7665: iti. rūpasvabhāvaṃ kuśalam arūpasvabhāvaṃ cābhipretaṃ. ata eva ca sarvam eveti vyācaṣṭe. dvābhyām iti. upapattito vā. parihāṇito vā. [Tib. 49b]
T07yabhkvyu:7666: tenāha upapattito veti vistaraḥ. ūrdhvam upapadyamāno 'dharaṃ parityajati.
T07yabhkvyu:7667: adhaś copapadyamāna uparibhūmikam iti. parihāṇito vā samāpatteḥ
T07yabhkvyu:7668: tatsamāpattisaṃgṛhītaṃ kuśalaṃ tyajyate. nikāyasabhāgatyāgāc ca kiṃcid
T07yabhkvyu:7669: iti. nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ yat pṛthagjanāvasthāyām utpāditaṃ yāvat kṣāṃtir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7670: tad asaty api bhūmisaṃcāre nikāyasabhāgatyāgena tyajyate. yadā kāmadhātau mṛtvā tatraivopapadyate (Abhidh-k-vy 388). vakṣyati hi
T07yabhkvyu:7671: bhūmityāgāt tyajaty āryas tāny anāryas tu mṛtyuta
T07yabhkvyu:7673: pratipannakamārgaḥ. phalaṃ phalaviśiṣṭo veti. uttaro mārgo 'dhikṛtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7674: tadyathā 'nāgāmī yady anāgāmiphalāt parihīyate. tenānāgāmiphalam uttaro mārgas tyajyate. yadi tv anāgāmī dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ labhate. tasmāc ca parihīyate. sa tasya phalaviśiṣṭo mārgo dvitīyadhyānabhūmikas tyajyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7676: arthaḥ. dhyānasaṃvaraṃ vā labhata iti. anāsravasaṃvaraṃ vā labhata iti
T07yabhkvyu:7677: nocyate. dhyānasaṃvarapūrvotpādenaiva tattyāgāt. akaraṇāśnyata iti. etat karma na kariṣyāmīty āśayato 'pi śastrajālatyāge vinā saṃvaragrahaṇenāsaṃvaracchedo na bhavati. tadyathā roganidānaparihāre 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:7678: tasya pravṛddhasya rogasyauṣadhena vinā [Tib. 50a] vinivṛttir na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:7679: tadvat. tad uktaṃ bhavati. asaṃvaratyāgecchāyāṃ saṃvaro grahītavyo
T07yabhkvyu:7681: (IV.42cd) katham avijñaptir iti. vijñaptir apīti vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7682: svasamutthāpitāyā atītāyā vijñaptes tatkāla eva prāpticchedāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7683: vegādānakriyārthāyurmūlacchedais tu madhyama iti ca paṭhitavyaṃ. naivasaṃvaranāsaṃvara ity arthaḥ. athāpy avijñaptir api kevalocyate. tatra vijñapter avacane kāraṇaṃ vaktavyam ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7687: anye tv āhuḥ. na niruddhāyā naivasaṃvaranāsaṃvarasaṃgṛhītāyā vijñapter anubaṃdhinī prāptir ity ata etadavijñapter eva tyāgakāraṇam ucyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7688: kuṃbhakāracakreṣugativad iti. yathā kuṃbhakāracakrasya iṣoś ca gatiḥ. yena kāraṇena saṃskāraviśeṣeṇa ākṣipto bhavati. tasya cchedāt sāpi cchidyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7689: tadvat. alaṃ samādāneneti pratyākhyānavacanena. yathāsamāttam akurvata iti. tadyathā buddham avanditvā. maṇḍalakam akṛtvā vā [Tib. 50b] na bhokṣya iti. tad akṛtvā bhuṃjānasya sā madhyamā avijñaptiś chidyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7690: yaṃtrajālādīti ādiśabdena śastraviṣādi gṛhyate. kuśalamūlāni samucchettum (Abhidh-k-vy 389) ārabhata iti. kuśalamūlasamucchedaprāraṃbhāvasthāyām eva cchidyate. na samucchedāvasthayām iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:7694: iti. atra vairāgyataś ca kiṃcid iti vaktavyaṃ. yathā kuśalaṃ daurmanasyendriyam iti. sarvam eveti. kāmarūpārūpyāvacaraṃ. yaḥ prahāṇamārga iti. darśanamārgo bhāvanāmārgaś ca. laukiko vā lokottaro vā
T07yabhkvyu:7695: yathāsaṃbhavaṃ. asau saparivāra iti. asāv upakleśaprakāraḥ satatsahabhūprāptyanucaraḥ upakleśaprakārasyeti grahaṇaṃ kleśasyāpy upakleśatvena sarvasaṃgrahārthaṃ. tathā hi śāstra uktaṃ. ye yāvat kleśā
T07yabhkvyu:7696: upakleśā api te syur upakleśā na kleśa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7699: tatpratipakṣabhāvanālakṣaṇasyākṣamatvāt. tīvrasya ca hrīvyapatrāpyasyābhāvād eṣāṃ saṃvaro nāstīti. pratidvaṃdvabhāvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7700: yasmāt saṃvarasyāsaṃvaraḥ [Tib. 51a] pratidvaṃdvabhūtaḥ. tasmāt yatraiva saṃvaraḥ. tatraivasaṃvara iti. teṣāṃ ṣaṇḍhādīnām asaṃvarābhāvo dvitīyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7701: kāraṇaṃ. samādānasamādhyabhāvād iti. samādānabhāvāt prātimokṣasaṃvaro nāsti. samādhyabhāvāc ca dhyānānāsravaṣaṃvarau na staḥ. tadabhāvas tu māṃdyena kuśaleṣv avyutpatteḥ. pāpakriyāśayābhāvāc cāsaṃvaro nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:7702: yadyogād yadvipādanāc ceti. yena hrīvyapatrāpyeṇa yogād yasya hrīvyapatrāpyasya vipādanāc ca. yathākramaṃ saṃvarasaṃvarau syātāṃ. tat tīvraṃ hrīvyapatrāpyam āpāyikānāṃ nāstīti. yady āpāyikānāṃ saṃvarāsaṃvarau
T07yabhkvyu:7703: na staḥ. yat tarhi sūtra uktam iti yistaraḥ. tat kathaṃ. prātimokṣasaṃvaro manuṣyāṇām eva. na devānām. asaṃvegāt. dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau tu hetukarmadharmabhāvanād yathāsaṃbhavaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7704: (IV.46ab) tatkālam atyaṃtaṃ ceti. yad iṣṭavipākaṃ. tat tatkālaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7705: duḥkhaparitrāṇāt kṣemaṃ. yan nirvāṇaprāpakaṃ. tad atyaṃtaṃ duḥkhaparitrāṇāt kṣemaṃ. parinirvṛtasya yan nityakālaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:7706: (IV.46cd, 47) nanu ca trīṇi dhyānāni seṃjitāny uktāni bhagavatā. yad atra vitarkitam vicāritam ity evam ādi. idam atrāryā iṃjitam ity āhur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7707: ādiśabdena dvitīya uktaṃ. yad atra prītir avigatā. idam atrāryā iṃjitam
T07yabhkvyu:7708: āhuḥ. tṛtīye 'pi yad atra sukhaṃ [Tib. 51b] sukham iti cetasa ābhogaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7709: idam atrāryā iṃjitam ity āhur iti. atha kasmāt sarvam eva rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ karmāniṃjyam (Abhidh-k-vy 390) uktam ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:7710: āniṃjyapratyayagāminam iti. āniṃjyānukūlabhāginaṃ. akaṃpyānukūlabhāginaṃ mārgam ārabhyety arthaḥ. kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ samādhisapakṣālatayā seṃjitam evānyatrāniṃjyam uktam ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:7711: tadbhūmiṣu yataḥ karma vipākaṃ prati neṃjatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:7712: bhogādi saṃvartanīyam iti. bhogo dravyasaṃpat. ādiśabdena saurūpyasausvaryādi gṛhyate. tad eveti vistaraḥ. yat tad deveṣu vipacyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:7713: tat bahulīkṛtam evaṃ śīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ. tasya caivaṃ bhavati. aho batāhaṃ devasubhagānāṃ manuṣyasubhagānāṃ vā sabhāgatāyām upapadyeyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:7716: 52a] kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ caitasikaṃ ca saumanasyaṃ sukhā vedanā. dvitīye dhyāne saumanasyaṃ sukhā vedanā. tṛtīye dhyāne caitasikaṃ sukham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7717: tadbhāvajñāpanārtham iti. tacchabdena duḥkham abhisaṃbadhyate. tasya duḥkhasya kāmadhātāv evāstitvajñāpanārtham ihagrahaṇaṃ. sasaṃbhārair iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7718: saṃbhriyate utpādyate 'neneti saṃbhāraḥ. indriyaviṣayāśrayalakṣaṇaḥ. tena sasaṃbhārā vedanā
T07yabhkvyu:7720: iti. dhyānāṃtarakarmaṇo dhyānāṃtarotpattau vipākena veditena bhavitavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7721: tatra sukhā duḥkhā vā vedanā nāsti. nāsti. tasmād asyāduḥkhāsukhā vedanā
T07yabhkvyu:7722: vipāka iti. caturthād dhyānād adho 'py aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ karmāstīti.
T07yabhkvyu:7723: dhyānāṃtare vā kasyacit karmaṇo 'nyasya vipāko vedanā na syān na saṃbhavati. na hi sukhavedanīyasya maulaprathamadhyānabhūmikasya karmaṇo dhyānāṃtare sa vipāka iti yujyate vaktuṃ. savitarkatvena dhyānāṃtarato maulasya nihīnatvāt. nāpi kāmāvacarasya duḥkhavedanīyasya karmaṇo
T07yabhkvyu:7724: bhūmyaṃtaratvāt. ata eva caturthadhyānādibhūmikasya. tato vītarāgatvāc ca.
T07yabhkvyu:7726: etaddoṣaparijihīrṣayā dhyānāṃtarakarmaṇo dhyāna eva sukhendriyaṃ vipāka ity eke bruvate.
T07yabhkvyu:7727: [Tib. 52b] naiva tasya dhyānāṃtarakarmaṇo vedanā vipākaḥ. kiṃ tarhi rūpādīty apare. kiṃ teṣāṃ dhyānāṃtaropapattau vedanā nāsti. asti. na tu sā
T07yabhkvyu:7729: atrācārya āha. tadetad ucchāstraṃ. yad etad uktaṃ. dhyānāṃtarakarmaṇo dhyāna eva sukhendriyaṃ vipāka iti. yac coktaṃ. naiva tasya vedanā vipāka
T07yabhkvyu:7730: iti. tad etad ubhayam apy ucchāstraṃ. tat pratipādayann āha. śāstre hi paṭhitam iti vistaraḥ. avitarkasya karmaṇa iti. dhyānāṃtarakarmaṇa ity arthah. ataḥ kuśalasyāvitarkasya karmaṇaś caitasiky eva vedanā vipāko vipacyata ity avadhāraṇān na tasya karmaṇo dhyāna eva sukhendriyaṃ vipāko nāpi vedanāto 'nya iti gamyate. avitarkaṃ hi karma dhyānāṃtarāt prabhṛty ūrdhvam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7732: iti. na pūrvaṃ na paścāt. yugapad ity arthaḥ. sukhavedanīyasya rūpam iti
T07yabhkvyu:7735: jīvitendriyādayaḥ [Tib. 53a] na hi kāmadhātor anyatreti. duḥkhavedanīyasya karmaṇo 'nyatrabhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7736: kim idānīṃ tad iti. aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ. evaṃ tarhīti vistaraḥ. yady adho 'pi caturthād dhyānād aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ karmāsti kuśalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7737: sukhavedyaṃ śubhaṃ dhyānād ā tṛtīyād ity asya virodhaḥ. na hi kevalaṃ sukhavedanīyaṃ kuśalam ā tṛtīyād dhyānāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7738: kiṃ tarhi. aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyam apy astīti. iṣṭavipākaṃ ca kuśalam ity asya virodhaḥ. na hi kevalam iṣṭavipākaṃ kuśalam iṣṭāniṣṭaviparītavipākam
T07yabhkvyu:7739: api kuśalam astīti. bāhulika eṣa nirdeśa iti. bāhulyenaivaṃ nirdiṣṭam ity
T07yabhkvyu:7743: katham punar avedanāsvabhāvam iti. sukham anubhūyate. na karmety evam
T07yabhkvyu:7745: sukhavedanotpattyanukūlam ity arthaḥ. sukho 'sya vedanīya iti veti. sukho
T07yabhkvyu:7747: yathā yena snāti. sa snānīyaḥ kaṣāyaḥ. evaṃ yena sukhaṃ vipākaṃ vedayate.
T07yabhkvyu:7748: tat karma (Abhidh-k-vy 392) vedanīyaṃ. sukhasya vipākasya vedanīyaṃ karma
T07yabhkvyu:7749: sukhavedanīyaṃ. karaṇe 'pi kṛtyavidhānāt. etad evaṃ duḥkhavedanīyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7750: duḥkhavedanāhitaṃ duḥkhavedanīyam iti vistarṇa pūrvavad yojyaṃ. evam aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyam
T07yabhkvyu:7752: evaṃ yāvat saṃmukhībhāvena vedanīyateti yojyaṃ. sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7753: sukhavedanāhitaṃ sukhaṃ vedanīyam asminn iti sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7754: ālambanavedanīyateti. vedanīyā viṣayāḥ. ālambanīyā ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7755: rūpapratisaṃvedī no tu rūparāgapratisaṃvadīti. rūpaṃ pratyanubhavati. no tu rūparāgaṃ pratyanubhavatīty arthaḥ. atha vā no tu sa rūpaṃ rāgeṇa pratyanubhavaty ālaṃbata iti. dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyam iti. dṛṣṭe janmani vedanīyaṃ vipākalakṣaṇam asyeti dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karmeti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7756: yasmin samaya iti vistaraḥ. yasmin samaye sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate anubhavati. dve asya vedanā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca tasmin samaye [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:7758: (IV.51) āraṃbhavaśād iti. dṛṣṭa eva janmani vipākāraṃbhād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7759: tannāmavyavasthānam iti. dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyam ity evaṃnāmavyavasthānam ity
T07yabhkvyu:7761: asti hīti vistaraḥ. saṃnikṛṣṭaphalasya karmaṇaḥ suvarcalādṛṣṭāṃtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7763: dārṣṭāṃtikāḥ sautrāṃtikāḥ. teṣām evaṃ prathamadvitīye koṭyau varṇayatāṃ karmāṣṭavidhaṃ. dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ niyatam aniyataṃ ca vipākaṃ prati.
T07yabhkvyu:7764: evaṃ yāvad aniyatavedanīyam iti. upapadyavedanīyaṃ niyatam aniyataṃ ca vipākaṃ prati. aparaparyāyavedanīyam api niyatam aniyataṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:7765: aniyatavedanīyam api yo dṛṣṭadharmādyaniyatavedanīyaṃ. tan niyatam aniyataṃ ca. ity aṣṭavidhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7766: (IV.52, 53) caturvidhaṃ karmākṣiped iti. dṛṣṭadharmādivedanīyaṃ caturvidhaṃ karmākṣiped ity arthaḥ. katham ity āha. syāt triṣu prāṇātipātādattādānamṛṣāvādeṣu paraṃ prayojya kāmamithyācāre svayam ātmanā
T07yabhkvyu:7767: prayuktaḥ. teṣāṃ karmanāṃ yugapatparisamāptau. ekaṃ dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyam aparam upapadyavedanīyam aparaṃ cāparaparyāyavedanīyam anyac cāniyatavedanīyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7768: kuśalānām akuśalānāṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavam iti. yatrākuśalasya saṃbhavaḥ kāmadhātāv eva nānyatra.
T07yabhkvyu:7771: ity [Tib. 54b] asyotsargasyāyam apavādaḥ. śubhasya narake trividheti.
T07yabhkvyu:7772: tridhaivety avadhāraṇaṃ. narakeṣu kuśalasya karmaṇas trividhasyaivākṣepaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7773: na caturvidhasya. dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ sthāpayitvā. atra narakeṣv iṣṭavipākābhāvāt. śubhagrahaṇam aśubhanirāsārthaṃ. akuśalasya hi caturvidhasyāpi narakeṣv ākṣepaḥ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:7776: yato virakto yadvirakta iti samāsaḥ. sthiragrahaṇaṃ parihāṇadharmaṇo nirāsārthaṃ. tasya hi tasyāṃ bhūmāv upapadyavedanīyaṃ karma saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:7779: nāryo 'nyavedyakṛd apīti nāparaparyāyavedanīyakṛd api. nopapadyavedanīyakṛd apīty arthaḥ. tatra yuktiṃ darśayann āha. na hy asau bhavyaḥ punar ādhastīṃ bhūmim āyātum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7780: na hy asāv āryo 'parihāṇadharmā yato vītarāgaḥ. tata ādhastīm adhastātbhavāṃ bhūmim āyātuṃ bhavyaḥ. parihāṇadharmā tu bhavyaḥ. tadyathā.
T07yabhkvyu:7781: āryo bhavāgralābhī parihāṇadharmā yaḥ parihāya rūpadhātāv upapadyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:7782: tasyopapadyavedanīyam aparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ cāpi saṃbhavati yathoktam udāyisūtre. aniyataṃ kuryād iti. aniyatavedanīyam aparihāṇadharmāpy āryo
T07yabhkvyu:7783: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ ca yatropapannaḥ. [Tib. 55a] tatra kuryāt. kāmadhātor bhavāgrād vā vītarāga iti. kāmavītarāgo 'nāgāmī. bhavāgravītarāgo 'rhan.
T07yabhkvyu:7784: tayor iti kāmadhātubhavāgrayoḥ. paścāt pravedayiṣyāma iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7787: (IV.54) aṃtarābhavavedanīyaṃ ca. kiṃ. niyatam aniyataṃ ceti. yan niyatam ekādaśavidham uktaṃ. dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ yat tad iti. kalalavedanīyaṃ niyataṃ yāvad aṃtarābhavavedanīyaṃ niyatam iti. yāś ca tadanvayā
T07yabhkvyu:7788: daśāvasthā iti. aṃtarābhavapūrvikā ity arthaḥ. ata evānyad aṃtarābhavavedanīyaṃ karma noktam iti. caturvidhaṃ karma.
T07yabhkvyu:7789: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyam upapadyavedanīyam aparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ aniyatavedanīyaṃ cety atra noktam.
T07yabhkvyu:7791: (IV.55) niyatāniyataṃ karmety uktam ato bravīti. kīdṛśaṃ punaḥ karma
T07yabhkvyu:7796: tadanyalaukikasamāpattiviśeṣaṇārthaṃ. yathā tathā ceti. yadi puṇyabuddhyā yadi dveṣādinā. yo 'pi hi pārasikaḥ puṇyabuddhyā mātaraṃ mārayati. pitaraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7797: vā. tad akuśalam ānaṃtaryaṃ karma niyataṃ saṃpadyate. nānyad iti. yad ato viparītaṃ mandakleśaprasādakṛtam
T07yabhkvyu:7799: vyavahāraparājitena saṃghaḥ striyo yūyam iti samudācaritaḥ. tasya dṛṣṭa eva dharme puruṣavyaṃjanam aṃtarhitaṃ. strīvyaṃjanaṃ ca prādurbhūtam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7800: tad idaṃ kṣetraviśeṣād dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ bhavati. āśayaviśeṣād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7801: śaṃṭhena gavām apuṃstvaṃ kariṣyamāṇam abhivīkṣya mamedṛśam apuṃstve duḥkham iti tīvreṇāśayena teṣāṃ gavām apuṃstvaṃ pratimokṣitaṃ. tasya dṛṣṭa eva dharme puruṣendriyaṃ prādurbhūtam. idam āśayaviśeṣād dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma saṃvṛttaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7803: iti. tato bhūmer atyaṃtavairāgyāt tad adṛṣṭadharmavedanīyam api karma dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ saṃpadyate. yathānāgāmyarhatām avītarāgāvasthākṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7804: punar adharabhūmyanāgamanād anupādāya ca parinirvāṇāt. na tv avasthāyām
T07yabhkvyu:7805: iti. yad aniyataṃ dṛṣṭadharmādyavasthāsu. na cāniyataṃ vipāke. niyatatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7806: tad eva dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ bhavati. ata evāha. yat punar avasthāṃtare
T07yabhkvyu:7808: tadvato 'tyaṃtavairāgyāsaṃbhavād iti. evam avasthāṃtaraniyatavipākena karmaṇā tadvatpudgalasyātyaṃtaṃ tasyā bhūmer vairāgyāsaṃbhavād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7809: (IV.57) kṣetraviśeṣād ity uktam ataḥ pṛcchati. kīdṛśaṃ punaḥ kṣetram iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7810: araṇāvyutthitasyeti vistaraḥ. apramāṇeṣu sattveṣu araṇayā hito 'dhyāśayo
T07yabhkvyu:7811: 'bhiprāyaḥ. tenānugatā. atyudagreṇa tīkṣṇena. apramāṇena puṇyena paribhāvitānugatā ca saṃtatir vartate. araṇām uttaratra vakṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:7812: araṇāpraṇidhijñānam ity atra. maitrīvyutthitasyeti vistaraḥ. apramāṇeṣu sattveṣu sukham
T07yabhkvyu:7813: utpadyatām (Abhidh-k-vy 395) ity adhyāśayaḥ. tenānugatā. atyudagreti sarvaṃ pūrvavat. pratyagrāśrayaparivṛttinirmaleti.
T07yabhkvyu:7815: saṃtatiḥ. eteṣu pudgaleṣu kṛtānāṃ karāpakārāṇām upakārāpakārāṇāṃ kuśalākuśalānāṃ. phalaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharma ihaiva janmani prāpyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7816: sadyo'rthaṃ darśayati. sadya iveti kṛtvā. śeṣasya tv iti vistaraḥ. śeṣo bhāvanāmārgaḥ sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmiphalaprāpakaḥ. aparipūrṇaḥ svabhāvaḥ phalaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7818: aparipūrṇasvabhāvaphalatvāt. kā punas tasya paripūrṇasvabhāvatā paripūrṇaphalatā ca. aśaikṣatvaṃ paripūrṇasvabhāvatā. sa hi mārgo
T07yabhkvyu:7820: arthattvaprāptiḥ. sa hi phalamārgas tribhiḥ phalaiḥ phalavān iti. atha vā kṣayajñānasaṃgṛhīto mārgaḥ paripūrṇasvabhāvaphalaḥ. paripūrṇasvabhāvo yasmād aśaikṣamārgaḥ. paripūrṇaphalo niravaśeṣaphalatvāt. tadvyutthitānām
T07yabhkvyu:7821: iti. śeṣabhāvanāmārgavyutthitānāṃ. na te tadvyutthitās tathā puṇyakṣetraṃ bhavaṃti. yathārhattvavyutthitāḥ. prāg eva laukikamārgavyutthitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7822: bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ hi kleśānāṃ sāvaśeṣaniravaśeṣaprahāṇād ayaṃ viśeṣa ukta ity avagaṃtavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7824: savitarkavicārā hi paṃca vijñānadhātava iti niyamāt. vitarkavicārayoś cādhyānāṃtarādisvabhāvāt. na cāvitarkasya karmaṇaḥ savitarka vicāro 'dharabhūmiko vipāko yujyata iti. tasya hi duḥkhā vedanā vipāka iti vistaraḥ. tasyākuśalasya duḥkhā vedanā vipāka
T07yabhkvyu:7825: iṣyate. tasyāniṣṭaphalatvāt. [Tib. 57a] caitasikī ca duḥkhā vedanā daurmanasyaṃ nānyad asti. na ca daurmanasyaṃ vipāka iti vyākhyātam etad
T07yabhkvyu:7826: iti. indriyanirdeśe vipāko jīvitaṃ dvedhā dvādaśāṃtyāṣṭakād ṛte
T07yabhkvyu:7828: (IV.59) daurmanasyaṃ na vipāka ity etad amṛṣyann āha. yat tarhīti vistaraḥ. yadi daurmanasyaṃ na vipākaḥ. yat tarhi sattvānāṃ cittakṣepo
T07yabhkvyu:7829: bhavati. katamasminn asau citte bhavati kena vā kāraṇeneti. tasyāyam
T07yabhkvyu:7830: abhiprāyaḥ. cittakṣepo na paṃcasu vijñānakāyeṣu. teṣām avikalpakatvāt. sa cākuśalaketuko 'niṣṭatvāt. ity ato vipākena daurmanasyena bhavitavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7831: avikalpakatvād iti. abhinirūpaṇānusmaraṇavikalpābhyām avikalpakatvāt paṃcānāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 396). cittakṣepasya
T07yabhkvyu:7832: cāsadvikalpalakṣaṇatvāt. agniṃ vā dāveṣūtsṛjaṃtīti. dāvas tṛṇādigahanāṃvito deśaviśeṣaḥ. anyena vā kenacid iti. aniṣṭavedanādinā.
T07yabhkvyu:7833: vāsiṣṭhīprabhṛtīnām iti. bhagavān mithilikāyāṃ viharati sma.
T07yabhkvyu:7834: mithilāmravaṇe. tena khalu punaḥ samayena vasiṣṭhasagotrāyā brāhmaṇyāḥ ṣaṭ putrāḥ kālagatāḥ. sā teṣāṃ kālakriyayā nagnonmattā kṣiptacittā tenatenānuhiṇḍaṃtī yena mithilāmravaṇaṃ tenopasaṃkrāṃtā. tena khalu punaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:7835: samayena bhagavān anekaśatāyā bhikṣuparṣadaḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayati sma. adrākṣīd vasiṣṭhasagotrā [Tib. 57b] brāhmaṇī bhagavaṃtaṃ dūrād eva. dṛṣṭvā ca punar jehrīyamāṇarūpā utkuṭakāsthāt. smṛtiṃ ca labdhavatī. adrākṣīt bhagavān vasiṣṭhasagotrāṃ brāhmaṇīṃ dūrād eva. dṛṣṭvā ca punar āyuṣmaṃtam ānandam āmaṃtrayate sma. anuprayacchānanda vasiṣṭhasagotrāyai brāhmaṇyai uttarāsaṃgaṃ. dharmam asyai deśayiṣyāmi.
T07yabhkvyu:7836: āyuṣmān ānando vasiṣṭhasagotrāyai brāhmaṇyai uttarāsaṃgam adāt. atha vasiṣṭhasagotrā brāhmaṇī uttarāsaṃgaṃ prāvṛtya yena bhagavāṃs
T07yabhkvyu:7837: tenopasaṃkrāṃtā. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikaṃte niṣaṇṇā. ekāṃtaniṣaṇṇāṃ vasiṣṭhasagotrāṃ brāhmaṇīṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati. samādāpayati. samuttejayati. saṃpraharṣayatīty evamādi.
T07yabhkvyu:7838: vistaragraṃthabhayāt sarvasūtraṃ na likhitaṃ. ayaṃ tatrārthaḥ bhagavāṃs
T07yabhkvyu:7839: tasyai dānakathādi kṛtvā. catvāry āryasatyāni deśitavān. yāvat tayā srotaāpattiphalam adhigatam. adhigamya ca bhagavato 'ṃtikāt prakrāntā.
T07yabhkvyu:7840: tasyā apareṇa samayena saptamaḥ putraḥ kālagataḥ. sā tatkālakriyayā na
T07yabhkvyu:7841: śocati. tām aśocaṃtīṃ svabhartābravīt. tvaṃ pūrvaṃ putramaraṇena
T07yabhkvyu:7842: paritaptāsi. idānīṃ nāsi paritaptā. nūnaṃ te putrās tvayā bhakṣitāḥ. yato na paritapyasa iti. sā taṃ pratyuvāca.
T07yabhkvyu:7843: putrapautrasahasrāṇi jñātisaṃghaśatāni ca dīrghe 'dhvani mayā brahmaṃ khāditāni tathā tvayā.
T07yabhkvyu:7844: putrapautrasahsrāṇāṃ parimāṇaṃ na vidyate anyonyaṃ khādyamānānāṃ [Tib. 58a] tāsutāsūpapattiṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:7845: kaḥ śocet paritapyeta parideveta vā punaḥ jñātvā niḥsaraṇaṃ loke jāteś ca maraṇasya ca.
T07yabhkvyu:7846: sāhaṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ jñātvā jāteś ca maraṇasya ca na śocāmi na tapyāmi kṛte buddhasya śāsana ity evamādi. kathaṃ na caitasikī vedanā vipākaḥ prāpnoti. tasyākuśalasya karmaṇa iti vākyaśeṣaḥ. mahābhūtānāṃ prakopo vipāka iti. vipaktir vipākaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7847: tasmāj jātam ato vipākajaṃ cittam. ata eva sa ca karmavipākaja ity uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7848: (Abhidh-k-vy 397) na tūktaṃ. sa ca karmaja iti. evaṃ cedaṃ iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7849: yasmāt karmajena yāvat bhraṣṭasmṛtikaṃ cittaṃ vartate. tasmād idaṃ catuṣkoṭikaṃ yujyata iti. ubhayaṃ kṣiptacittasya kliṣṭaṃ cittam ity eva
T07yabhkvyu:7850: tatrodāharaṇaṃ. na hi kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ vipāko yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7851: vipāko 'vyākṛto dharma iti vacanāt. abhinunnā abhipīḍitāḥ. hācittaparidevakaś cātra nāraka
T07yabhkvyu:7852: ihodāhāryaḥ. kṣiptacittā nārakā bhavaṃtīti. anyatra buddhād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7853: mahāpuṇyasaṃbhāratvān na buddhasya. tadvat bhūtavaiṣamyenāpi cittaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7854: kṣipyate. na karmaṇeti. kiṃ. āryāṇāṃ kṣipyate cittaṃ anyatra bhūtavaiṣamyād eva. kiṃ kāraṇam ity āha. niyatasya karmaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7856: āryāvasthāyāṃ. ata eva caitad aniyatam ity ucyate. paṃcabhayasamatikramād
T07yabhkvyu:7857: iti. paṃca bhayāni. ājīvikābhayam aślokabhayaṃ pariṣacchāradyabhayaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7860: aprasadanīyasya karmaṇaḥ. dharmatābhijñatvād iti. sarvaṃ sāsravaṃ duḥkhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7861: sarve saṃskārā anityāḥ. sarvā dharmā anātmāna iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7863: (IV.60ab) kuṭilānvayatvād iti. kuṭilahetukatvāt. sādhyam hi kauṭilyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7864: raṃjanānvayatvād iti yathā kaṣāyo raṃjanahetuḥ. tathāpīty atas tatsādharmyād evam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7866: anena śubhaṃ viśeṣyate. nāśubhaṃ. tasyāvaśyaṃ kāmāptatvāt. ārūpyāptaṃ kasmān nocyata iti. tad api hy akuśalena na vyatibhidyate. na vyatimiśryata ity arthaḥ. yatra kileti vistaraḥ. kilaśabdaḥ paramate.
T07yabhkvyu:7867: yatra kilāṃtarābhaviko aṃtarābhave bhavo vipākaḥ. evam aupapattibhaviko 'pi. trividhasya ca kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇo vipāko dhyānasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītayoḥ kāyavākkarmaṇoḥ dvitīyādiṣv api dhyāneṣu sadbhāvād asti. tatraivoktaṃ śuklaṃ śuklavipākam [Tib. 59a] iti. tad api tūktaṃ sātrāṃtara iti. tad apy ārūpyāptaṃ. asti karma śuklaṃ śuklavipākaṃ. tadyathā prathame dhyāne. evaṃ yāvat bhavāgra iti. anena svābhiprāyaṃ darśayati. yena kilaśabdaṃ prayuktavān. saṃtānata etad vyavasthāpitam iti. ekasmin saṃtāne kuśalaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7868: cākuśalaṃ ca samudācaratīti kṛtvā kuśalam akuśalena vyavakīryate.
T07yabhkvyu:7869: anyonyavirodhād iti. kuśalam akuśalena virudhyate. akuśalaṃ ca kuśaleneti.
T07yabhkvyu:7871: nāvaśyam akuśalaṃ kuśalena vyavakīryata iti vistaraḥ. vyavakīryate na tv
T07yabhkvyu:7872: avaśyaṃ. yasmāt kāmadhātau pratipakṣabhūtasya samādher abhāvād akuśalasya
T07yabhkvyu:7873: balavattvaṃ. ata eva ca kuśalasya durbalatvaṃ. tathā hi kāmadhātau
T07yabhkvyu:7874: mithyādṛṣṭyā kuśalamūlasamucchedo bhavati. na tu samyagdṛṣṭyā
T07yabhkvyu:7876: ābhiprāyiko hy eṣo 'śuklaśabda iti. vipākaśuklatābhāvād aśuklaṃ. na tu naiva śuklam ity arthaḥ. api ca yac chuklam uktaṃ. tan na bhavatīty
T07yabhkvyu:7877: aśuklaṃ. mahatyāṃ śūnyatāyām iti. mahāśūnyatārthasūtre. anivṛtāvyākṛtāś ca śuklāḥ. akliṣṭatvāt. avipākaṃ dhātvapatitatvād [Tib. 59b] iti. anāsravā dharmāḥ na dhātupatitāḥ. dhātupatitaś ca vijpāka ity ato 'nāsravaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7878: karmavipākaṃ. kasmād ity āha. pravṛttivirodhata iti. anāsravaṃ hi karma
T07yabhkvyu:7879: dhātupatitānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravṛttiṃ viruṇaddhi. na tu janayatīty avipākaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7880: (IV.62, 63) karmakarmakṣayāyeti. dviḥ karmagrahaṇaṃ yat tat karmāstīty apadiṣṭaṃ. tat karma sat saṃvidyamānam apracyutasvabhāvaṃ karmakṣayāya
T07yabhkvyu:7881: saṃvartata ity asya caturthasya karmaṇo dyotanārthaṃ. atha vā.
T07yabhkvyu:7882: vīpsāprayoga eṣaḥ. karmaṇaḥ karmaṇaḥ kṣayāya saṃvartata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7883: eatasṛṣv iti vistaraḥ. dharmakṣāṃtigrahaṇaṃ kāmavairāgye cānaṃtaryamārgagrahaṇaṃ kāmāvacarasya kṛṣṇasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇamārgatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7884: anāsravamārgasyaivehādhikṛtatvāl laukikā ānaṃtaryamārgās tatprahāṇabhūtā api na gṛhyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:7886: iti. kuśalasyaivety avadhāryate. tatra kṛṣṇābhāvāt. kliṣṭasaṃskāraprahāṇam
T07yabhkvyu:7888: na hi tasya svabhāvaprahāṇam iti. prāpticchedaprahāṇaṃ. prahīṇasyāpi kuśalasya saṃmukhībhāvāt. tadālambanakleśaprahāṇād iti. tadālaṃbanasya kleśasya prahāṇāt tasya kuśalasya prahāṇaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:7889: tadālaṃbanakleśaprahānaṃ ca navamasya tadālaṃbanakleśaprakārasya prahāṇe sati bhavatīti. navamānaṃtaryamārgacetanaiva kṛṣṇaśuklasya [Tib. 60a]
T07yabhkvyu:7890: karmaṇaḥ kṣayāya bhavati. tadā hi navamasya kleśaprakārasya prāpticchede visaṃyogaprāptir utpadyate. tasya ca kṛṣṇaśuklasya karmaṇo 'nyasyāpi
T07yabhkvyu:7891: cānivṛtavyākṛtasya sāsravasya dharmasya visaṃyogaprāptir utpadyata iti
T07yabhkvyu:7893: tena tadvedanīyam iti. tena narakagatinaiyamyakāraṇena. tadvedanīyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7894: (Abhidh-k-vy 399) narakavedanīyam arthaḥ. ato 'nyatreti vistaraḥ. tato narakagater anyatra kāmadhātau manuṣyādigatau akuśalasya kuśalasya ca karmaṇo vipākas tena gatinaiyamyakāraṇena. tadanyakāmadhātuvedanīyam ubhayam apy aviśeṣya miśrīkṛtya kṛṣṇaśuklam ity uktaṃ. na punar evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7895: grahītavyaṃ. kuśalam api kṛṣṇaśuklam. evam akuśalam apīti.
T07yabhkvyu:7896: kuśalenāmiśratvād iti. na hi kuśalaṃ darśanaprahātavyam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:7897: na dṛṣṭiheyam akliṣṭam iti niyamāt. atra codyate. kāmāvacaraṃ dṛggheyaṃ kṛṣṇam
T07yabhkvyu:7898: iti viśeṣyaṃ vaktavyam. itarathā hi rūpārūpyāvacarasyāpi darśanaheyasya kṛṣṇavipākatvavacanaprasaṃga iti. na vaktavyam.
T07yabhkvyu:7900: iti. kāmajam ity asyobhayaviśeṣaṇatvāt. kāmajaṃ dṛggheyaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ. kāmajam anyat kṛṣṇaśuklam [Tib. 60b] iti. tad dhīti vistaraḥ. tad dhi kāmāvacaraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7901: bhavanāprahātavyaṃ. kuśalaṃ cākuśalaṃ ca saṃbhavati. tan miśrīkṛtyobhayam api kṛṣṇaśuklam ity uktaṃ. na punaḥ pratyekaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7902: (IV.65) trīṇi mauneyānīti. munitā vā munikarma vā mauneyaṃ kāpeyavat.
T07yabhkvyu:7904: iti. muner idam maunaṃ. aśaikṣa iti vistaraḥ. aśaikṣaṃ kāyakarmāvijñaptisvabhāvaṃ kāyamaunam. evaṃ vāṅmaunaṃ. atha kasmād avijñaptir eva gṛhyate. na punar vijñaptir api. vijñapteḥ
T07yabhkvyu:7905: sāsravatvenāśaikṣatvāsaṃbhavāt. mana eva manomaunam iti. svārthe
T07yabhkvyu:7906: vṛddhividhānāt. cittaṃ hi paramārthamunir iti. sarvakleśajalpoparater iti kāraṇaṃ vakṣyate. tat kilakāyavākkarmabhyām aśaikṣābhyām anumīyate aśaikṣām iti. kathaṃ tathāgato 'numātavyaḥ. praśāṃtena kāyakarmaṇā praśāṃtena vākkarmaṇeti sūtre vacanāt. kilaśabdena vaibhāṣikamataṃ dyotayitvācāryaḥ svamataṃ āha. api khalv iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7907: cittāvijñaptyabhāvād iti. yasmāc cittasyavijñaptir nāsty ato na manaskarma
T07yabhkvyu:7908: viratisvabhāvaṃ. viramārthena ca maunam iti. viramo viratiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7909: sarvākuśalaviramārthena [Tib. 61a] maunam ity abhiprāyaḥ. ato mano eva
T07yabhkvyu:7910: sarvākuśalebhyo virataṃ maunam ity ucyate. sarvakleśajalpoparater iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7911: vitathālaṃbanajalpanāt kleśā jalpā ity ucyaṃte. te cārhata uparatā ity arhan paramārthamuniḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7918: anāsraveṇa. tad dhi bhikṣavaḥ prahīṇaṃ yad āryayā prajñayeti sūtrāt.
T07yabhkvyu:7919: mithyāmaunaśaucādhimuktānāṃ vivecanārtham iti. tūṣṇīṃbhāvamātreṇa śuddhidarśino mithyāmaunādhimuktāḥ. kāyamalāpakarṣaṇamātreṇa śuddhidarśino mithyāśaucādhimuktāḥ. teṣāṃ vivecanaṃ tato darśanāt pracyāvanaṃ. tadartham etānīti
T07yabhkvyu:7920: (IV.66) saṃcetanīyasūtre vacanād iti. saṃcetanīyaṃ karma kṛtvopacitya
T07yabhkvyu:7921: narakeṣūpapadyate. kathaṃ ca bhikṣavaḥ saṃcetanīyaṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhavaty
T07yabhkvyu:7922: upacitaṃ. iha bhikṣava ekatyaḥ saṃciṃtya trividhaṃ karma kāyena karma karoty upacinoti caturvidhaṃ vācā trividhaṃ manaseti vistareṇoktvāha [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:7923: 61b]. kathaṃ bhikṣavas trividhaṃ manasā saṃcetanīyaṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhavaty upacitaṃ. yathāpīhaikatyo 'bhidhyālur bhavati. vyāpannacittaḥ. yāvan
T07yabhkvyu:7924: mithyādṛṣṭiḥ. khalu bhikṣava ihaikatyo bhavati viparītadarśīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7925: na cānyad abhidhyādivyatiriktaṃ tatra manaskarmoktam ity abhidyādaya eva manaskarmeti dārṣṭāṃtikāḥ sautrāṃtikaviśeṣā ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7926: evaṃ tu sati karmakleśayor aikyaṃ syād iti. abhidhyāvyāpādamithyādṛṣṭayaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:7927: kleśāḥ. ta eva karmeti. tad aikyaṃ syāt. naitad asti. kaścit kleśo 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:7928: karma syād iti. cetanā karma cetayitvā ceti vacanāt. yady evaṃ saṃcetanīyasūtraṃ kathaṃ nīyata ity āha. sūtre tv iti vistaraḥ. sūtre tu cetanāyās tanmukhenābhidhyādimukhena pravṛttes tair abhidhyādibhis tāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7929: cetanāṃ darśayati. abhidhyāluḥ khalu bhikṣavo bhavatīti vistareṇa. anyathā cetanāmataṃ bhikṣavaḥ karma vadāmi cetayitvā cety etad virudhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:7931: parānugrahopaghābhisaṃdhyabhāva iti vistaraḥ. pareṣām anugrahopaghātayor abhisaṃdhyabhāve kathaṃ samyagdṛṣṭimithyādṛṣṭyor yathākramaṃ [Tib. 62a]
T07yabhkvyu:7932: kuśalākuśalatvam iti. ato bravīti. tanmūlatvād iti. yasmāt parānugrahābhisaṃdheḥ paropaghātābhisaṃdheś ca samyagdṛṣṭimithyādṛṣṭī mūlaṃ kāraṇam ity arthaḥ. atas tayoḥ kuśalākuśalatvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7933: (IV.67) yathāyogam iti yathāsaṃbhavaṃ. katham ity āha. kuśalāḥ sucaritedhyaḥ akuśalā duścaritebhyaś ceti. kliṣṭaś cānyo 'pīti.
T07yabhkvyu:7934: vadhabaṃdhanādi. tasya nātyaudārikatvād iti. tasya prayogapṛṣṭhabhūtasya klṣṭasyānyasyāpi (Abhidh-k-vy 401) anatyaudārikatvāt. manoduścaritasya ca pradeśaś cetanā. na saṃgṛhīteti vartate. madyādiviratidānejyādika iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7935: prathamenādiśabdena tāḍanabaṃdhanādiviratir gṛhyate. dvitīyenāpi snapanodvartanaviṣamahastapradānādir gṛhyate. priyavacanādika ity.
T07yabhkvyu:7936: ādiśabdena dharmadeśanāmārgakathanādir gṛhyate. manaḥsucaritasya cetanā na
T07yabhkvyu:7939: iti. ṣaḍ avijñaptir avaśyaṃ. na tv avijñaptir eva ṣaḍ ity avadhāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7940: maulavijñaptyabhāvād iti. yasmān maulī karmapathasaṃgṛhītā vijñaptir
T07yabhkvyu:7941: nāsti. ājñāpanavijñaptis tv asti prayogasamgṛhīteti vaibhāṣikasiddhāṃtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7943: iti. dvidhaivaika ity avadhāraṇārtha āraṃbhaḥ. tatkālamaraṇa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7944: vijñaptikālamaraṇe. kālāṃtaramaraṇe tv avijñaptir eva bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:7946: iti. dvividhā evety avadhāraṇaṃ. vijñaptyadhīnatvāt samādānaśīlasyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:7947: śīlaṃ hi dvividhaṃ. samādānaśīlaṃ prātimokṣasaṃvaro dharmatāśīlaṃ ca
T07yabhkvyu:7948: dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau. samādānaśīlaṃ vijñaptyadhīnaṃ. tad dhi parasmād
T07yabhkvyu:7949: ādīyate. dharmatāśīlaṃ tu na vijñaptyadhīnaṃ. cittamātradhīnatvāt. ata
T07yabhkvyu:7954: iti. kāmāvacarakarmapathaprayogā avaśyaṃ vijñaptiḥ. na tv avaśyam
T07yabhkvyu:7958: ceṣṭeteti. tasya karmapathasyānudharmam anu sadṛśaṃ karma. tadyathā mṛte 'pi prāṇini punaḥ prahāradānaṃ koṣaṇaṃ mānsacchedanam ity evamādi. dvau kṣiṇātīti śabdau. parasya carmāpanayanam arthaḥ. pūrvasyārthāṃtaraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7959: draṣṭavyaṃ. phalaparipūritaś ceti. prayogasya maulaḥ karmapathaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:7960: phalaparipūriḥ. yo hy prayujyate maulaṃ karmapathaṃ [Tib. 63a] na
T07yabhkvyu:7961: janayati. tasya prayogaphalam asti na tu phalaparipūriḥ. evam anyeṣv apīti. yathā tāvad iha kaścit parasvaṃ hartukāmo maṃcād utthiṣṭhati śastraṃ gṛhṇāti. paragṛhaṃ gacchati. supto na vety ākarṇayati. parasvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7962: spṛśati. yāvan (Abhidh-k-vy 402) na sthānāt pracyāvayati. tāvat prayogaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7963: yasmiṃs tu kṣaṇe sthānāt pracyāvayati. tatra yā vijñaptis tatkṣaṇikā cāvijñaptir ayaṃ maulaḥ karmapathaḥ. dvābhyām hi kāraṇābhyām
T07yabhkvyu:7964: adattādānāvadyena spṛśyate prayogataḥ phalaparipūritaś ca. tataḥ param avijñaptikṣaṇāḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavaṃti. yāvat tatparasvaṃ vibhajate. vikrīṇīte.
T07yabhkvyu:7965: gopāyati. anukīrtayati vā tāvad asya vijñaptikṣaṇā api pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:7966: evam anyeṣv api paṃcasu yathāsaṃbhavaṃ yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7967: maraṇabhavastha iti. amṛta eva. na caiṣa siddhāṃta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:7968: samaṃ prāk ca mṛtasyāsti na maulo 'nyāśrayodayād
T07yabhkvyu:7969: iti siddhāṃtāt. tan na vaktavyam iti. vyaparopayatīti. viprakṛtāvasthāyām
T07yabhkvyu:7970: ayogāt. evaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ syāt. mṛte prāṇini yā vijñaptis tatkṣaṇikā cāvijñaptiḥ. syaṃ maulaḥ karmapatha iti. yac cāpīdam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7971: vaibhāṣikair asya śāstravākyasyaivam artho vyākhyātaḥ. atra śāstre prayogaśabdena pṛṣṭham uktam iti. prayoga iva prayogaḥ. prayogasadṛśī kriyety arthaḥ. asyārthasya virodhaḥ. [Tib. 63b] kasmāt. maulasyaiva tadānīm aniruddhāt. mṛte prāṇini maulakarmapathavyavasthāpanād ity
T07yabhkvyu:7972: atrābhiprāyaḥ. vaibhāṣika āha. yathā na doṣas tathāstv iti. kathaṃ ca na
T07yabhkvyu:7973: doṣa ity ācāryaḥ. vaibhāṣikaḥ punar āha. maula evātra prayogaśabdenokta
T07yabhkvyu:7974: iti. kutra. yo 'yaṃ praśnaḥ syāt prāṇī hataḥ prānātipātaś cāniruddha ity
T07yabhkvyu:7975: atra. pṛṣṭhaṃ prayogaśabdenoktam iti kim ayaṃ pakṣaḥ parityakta eva. sa ca na parityakta eva. ubhayam api hi saṃbhavati. yadi maraṇabhavānaṃtarakṣaṇavartī prāṇī bhavaty atra prayogaśabdena maula ukta itīṣyate. tataḥ pareṇa tu pṛṣṭha iti. ācārya āha. vijñaptis tarhi tadā
T07yabhkvyu:7976: kathaṃ maulaḥ karmapatho bhavatīti. mṛte hi prāṇini vijñaptir akiṃcitkarī.
T07yabhkvyu:7977: na hi tena vijñaptiprahāreṇa mṛtasya māraṇaṃ punar astīti manyāmāno 'yaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7978: pṛcchati. kasmād avjñaptiṃ na pṛcchati. yasmād asāv anidarśanatvād
T07yabhkvyu:7979: apratighatvāc ca prahārākhyā na bhavati. kathaṃ ca na bhavitavyam iti vaibhāṣikeṇokte. svābhiprāyam ācāryo vivṛṇoti. asāmarthyād iti. prāṇini mṛte tasyāḥ sāmarthyaṃ na dṛśyata iti vaibhāṣika āha. avijñaptir idānīṃ kathaṃ bhavaty asati sāmarthye maulaḥ karmapatha iti. yasmād evam avijñaptir asāmarthye 'pi maulaḥ karmapatho bhavati. tasmāt prayogaphalaparipūrikāle maulakarmapathaparisamāptikāle prāṇino
T07yabhkvyu:7982: evam anyeṣv api yathāyogaṃ yojyam iti. yathā parasvaṃ hartukāmaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:7983: kāryasiddhaye parakīyaṃ hṛtvā tena paśunā baliṃ kuryāt. dāreṣu cāsya vipratipadyeta (Abhidh-k-vy 403) tair eva tadapahārārthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:7984: anṛtapiśunaparuṣasāṃtvabhedaiś cāsya mitrabhedaṃ kuryāt. yāny asya paritrāṇāya kalperan. abhidhyāṃ ca tatsve kuryāt. taddravyasvāmini ca vyāpādaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiṃ bṛṃhayet. evaṃ kāmamithyācārādiṣu yathāsaṃbhavaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7986: (IV.69d, 70ab) nātra sarveṣāṃ karmapathānām lobhādibhir niṣṭeti. na ca sarveṣāṃ lobhena. kiṃ tarhi. keṣāṃcid eva kāmamithyācārādīnāṃ. nāpi sarveṣāṃ vyāpādena. kiṃ tarhi. keṣāṃcid eva prāṇātipātādīnāṃ. evaṃ na sarveṣāṃ mohena. kiṃ tarhi. keṣāṃcid eva mithyādṛṣṭyādīnām eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:7987: tryaṃbukāḥ varatāḥ. ādiśabdena vyāghrādayaḥ. yaś ca mithyādṛṣṭipravartita
T07yabhkvyu:7988: iti. nāsti paraloka iti kṛtvā nirapekṣo haṃti. ayam api mohajaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7990: yathāśvahārikaḥ. satkārasya yaśavo vārthaṃ harati. idam api lobhajam
T07yabhkvyu:7991: adattādānaṃ. [Tib. 64b] yac ca mithyādṛṣṭipravartitaṃ. tad api mohajam
T07yabhkvyu:7992: adattādānaṃ. tatra mohaprādhānyāt. upaiti mātaram abrahmacaryārthe.
T07yabhkvyu:7993: upasvasāram upaitīti vartate. upasvasāraṃ bhaginīm ity arthaḥ. upasagotrām
T07yabhkvyu:7994: upaiti. samānagotrām ity arthaḥ. upahāyajamānaḥ. ye cāhur iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:7995: udūkhalāditulyo mātṛgrāmaḥ. yathodūkhalādayaḥ sādhāraṇā upabhogyāḥ. evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:7996: strījanaḥ. tasmān na doṣo 'sty abhigacchatām iti. mṛṣāvādādayo lobhajāḥ dveṣajāś ca pūrvavad iti. mṛṣāvādapaiśunyapāruṣyasaṃbhinnapralāpāḥ lobhajāḥ anyalābhasatkārayaśo'rthaṃ vā. ātmasuhṛtparitrāṇārthaṃ vā.
T07yabhkvyu:7999: na parihāsayuktaṃ. mithyādṛṣṭipravartita iti. nāsti paraloka iti
T07yabhkvyu:8000: nirmaryādaya yo mṛṣāvādo 'yaṃ mohajaḥ. paiśunyādayas tu.
T07yabhkvyu:8001: paiśunyapāruṣyābaddhapralāpāḥ mṛṣāvādavan modhajāḥ. yaś ceti vistaraḥ. yaś ca vedasāṃkhyavaiśeṣikādyasatpralāpaḥ. sa cāpi mohajaḥ saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8003: maṇḍalaṃ praviśatīty arthaḥ. nānāvāsā hi tasmin mahāsīmāmaṇḍale bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:8004: tṛtīye karmavācana iti. jñapticaturthena karmaṇā śrāmaṇera upasaṃpādyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8005: tatra jñaptyā idaṃnāmānam upasaṃpādayet saṃgha iti. liṅṅartha ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8006: karmavācanena laḍartha ucyate. imaṃ saṃgha upasaṃpādayatīti. tatra karmavācanaṃ trir ucyate. tṛtīyasya karmavācanasyāparisamāpteḥ prayogaḥ
