T07yabhkvyu:8007: karmapathasyāvagaṃtavyaḥ. tasyāvasāne tu yā vijñaptis tatkṣaṇikā vāvijñaptir (Abhidh-k-vy 404) ayaṃ maulaḥ karmapathaḥ. tata ūrdhvaṃ yāvan
T07yabhkvyu:8008: niśrayā ārocyaṃta iti. catvāro niśrayāś cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayyāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyalakṣaṇā yathoktena vidhinā
T07yabhkvyu:8010: niśrayādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca vijñaptiṃ karotīty arthaḥ. avijñaptiś ca yāvad
T07yabhkvyu:8011: anuvartate. yāvat saṃvaro na tyajyata ity arthaḥ. idaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8016: [Tib. 65b] (72cd) caturbhiḥ kāṇḍair uktā iti. caturbhir bhāgair uktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8022: śeṣāṇāṃ tribhir iṣyata iti caturthaḥ kāṇḍaḥ. bhogādhiṣṭhānā iti. viṣayādhiṣṭhānāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8023: nāmarūpādhiṣṭhāneti. paṃcaskandhādhiṣṭhānety arthaḥ. nāma hi vedanādayaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:8024: skaṃdhāḥ rūpaṃ rūpaskaṃdhaḥ. adhiṣṭhānam adhikaraṇaṃ viṣaya ity
T07yabhkvyu:8025: anarthāṃtaraṃ. nāmakāyādhiṣṭhānā mṛṣāvādādayo vāgnāmni pravartata iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:8027: iti pratiṣedhāt pṛṣṭham api na bhavatīti gamyate. maulapūrvatvāt
T07yabhkvyu:8028: pṛṣṭhasya. na ca prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyata iti. na maulenety abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8031: (IV.73cd) arthato hi te 'nyonyaṃ prayoktāra iti. na vācā te 'nyonyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8032: prayoktāraḥ. kiṃ tarhi. prāṇātipātakaraṇābhyupagamād [Tib. 66a] arthata iti ekakāryatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8033: (IV.74ab) saṃjñāya paricchidyety arthaḥ. nānyaṃ bhramitveti. na bhrāṃtyānyaṃ mārayatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8034: kṣaṇikeṣu skaṃdheṣv iti. svarasenaiva vinaśvarāṇāṃ skaṃdhānāṃ katham
T07yabhkvyu:8035: (Abhidh-k-vy 405) anyenaiṣāṃ nirodhaḥ kriyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. prāṇo nāma vāyuḥ. kāyacittasaṃniśrito vartata iti. kathaṃ cittasaṃniśrito vāyuḥ
T07yabhkvyu:8036: pravartate. cittapratibaddhavṛttitvāt. tathā hi nirodhāsaṃjñisamāpattisamāpannasya mṛtasya ca na pravartate. śāstre 'py
T07yabhkvyu:8037: uktaṃ. ya ime āśvāsapraśvāsāḥ. kiṃ te kāyasaṃniśritā vartaṃta iti vaktavyaṃ. cittasaṃniśritā vartaṃta iti vaktavyaṃ. naiva kāyacittasaṃniśritā vartaṃta iti vaktavyaṃ. kāyacittasaṃniśritā vartanta iti vaktavyam. āha. kāyacittasaṃniśritā vartaṃta iti vaktavyam iti vistaraḥ. tam api pātayatīti. taṃ prāṇaṃ vināśayatīty arthaḥ. utpannasya svarasanirodhād anāgatasyotpattiṃ pratibadhnan nirodhayatīty ucyate. yathā pradīpaṃ nirodhayati. ghaṇṭāsvanaṃ vā. kṣaṇikam api saṃtaṃ. kathaṃ ca sa
T07yabhkvyu:8038: nirodhayati. anāgatasyotpattipratibaṃdhāt. jīvitendriyaṃ vā prāṇa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8040: kasya taj jīvitaṃ. yas tadabhāvān mṛta iti. yaḥ prāṇī jīvitasyābhāvān mṛto
T07yabhkvyu:8041: bhavati. sa bauddhānāṃ nāsti nairātmyavāditvāt. [Tib. 66b] ata evaṃ pṛcchati. kasyeti ṣaṣṭhīṃ. pudgalavāde pudgalapratiṣedhaprakaraṇe. asaty ātmani kasyeyaṃ smṛtiḥ. kim athaiṣā ṣaṣṭhīty atra pradeśe ciṃtayiṣyāmi.
T07yabhkvyu:8042: āstāṃ tāvad etat sāmānyāsikam ity abhiprāyaḥ. tasmāt sendriyaḥ kāyo
T07yabhkvyu:8043: jīvatīti. sendriyasyaiva kāyasya taj jīvitaṃ. nātmana iti darśayati. sa eva cānindriyo mṛta
T07yabhkvyu:8044: abuddhipūrvād iti vistaraḥ. asaṃcintyakṛtād api prāṇipātāt kartur adharmo yathāgnisaṃsparśād abuddhipūrvād asaṃciṃtyakṛtād dāha iti. nirgraṃthā
T07yabhkvyu:8045: nagnāṭakāḥ. teṣāṃ nirgraṃthānām evaṃ vādināṃ abuddhipūrve 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:8046: parastrīdarśanasaṃsparśana eṣa prasaṃgaḥ. pāpaprasaṃga ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8050: parasya duḥkhotpādanam adharmāya bhavatīti kṛtvā. tadviṣūcikāmaraṇe ca.
T07yabhkvyu:8051: nirgraṃthānāṃ viṣūcikayā ajīrṇena maraṇe. dātur annadātur adharmaprasaṃgaḥ. annadānena maraṇakāraṇāt. abuddhipūrvo 'pi hi prāṇivadhaḥ kāraṇam adharmasyeti. mātṛgarbhasthayoś ca. mātur garbhasthasya cānyonyaduḥkhanimittatvād adharmapraṣaṃgaḥ. tata
T07yabhkvyu:8054: prāṇātipātakriyā vadhakasya bhavati. agnisvāśrayadāhavat. agnir hi na
T07yabhkvyu:8055: kevalam anyajanaṃ dahati. kiṃ tarhi. svāśrayam api indhanaṃ dahatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:8056: tadvat. na hi teṣāṃ cetanāviśeṣo 'pekṣyate. kārayataś ca pareṇa vadhādi
T07yabhkvyu:8060: pāpaprasaṃgaḥ. na hi buddhiviśeṣaḥ pramāṇīkriyate. na vā dṛṣṭāṃtamātrād
T07yabhkvyu:8062: (IV.74cd) anyatra saṃjñāvibhramād iti. yadi devadattadravyaṃ harāmīty
T07yabhkvyu:8063: abhiprāyamāṇo yajñadattadravyaṃ harati. nādattādānam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8064: parinirvāṇakāle parigṛhītam iti. dātṛjanapuṇyānugrahārthaṃ. aparigrahe hi stūpe dānam aphalaṃ syāt. pratigrāhakābhāvāt. parivartakaṃ mṛtasya bhikṣoś
T07yabhkvyu:8066: (IV.75ab) garbhiṇīgamane garbhoparodhaḥ. pāyayaṃtī stanyopabhogāvasthāputrikā strī. abrahmacaryakaraṇe hi tasyāḥ stanyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8067: kṣīyate. bālakasya vā puṣṭaye tat stanyaṃ na bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:8068: [Tib. 67b] prāṇātipātavad iti. yathā devadattaṃ mārayāmīty abhiprāyeṇa yajñadattaṃ mārayato na prāṇātipāto bhavati. tadvad. ihānyasmiṃ vastuni prayogo 'bhipreto 'nyac ca vastu paribhuktam iti. na syāt kāmamithyācāra
T07yabhkvyu:8070: aṃtato rājña iti. yady anyaḥ kaścid rakṣitā nāsti. aṃtataḥ sarvapaścād rājño 'ṃtikāt sa kāmamithyācāraḥ. tasya hi tan na marṣaṇīyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8071: (IV.75cd) āhosvid abhijñātuṃ samartha iti. yo 'pi hy artham abhijñātuṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8072: samarthaḥ. so 'py arthābhijña iti śakyate vaktum. artham abhijānīta iti
T07yabhkvyu:8074: nāsty atra devadatto 'sti vety ucyamāne śabdaḥ śrotrā vijñāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8075: tadanaṃtaraṃ tu cakṣurādisamūho devadatto vākyārtho vikalpena manovijñānena vijñāyate. tenāvijñaptir eva maulaḥ karmapathaḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8076: vāgvijñapteḥ śrotravijñānena saha nirodhāt. iṣyate ca vijñaptyavijñaptisvabhāvo maulaḥ karmapatha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8077: (IV.76) mṛtakalpāni. ata eteṣu matākhyeti. nairuktaṃ vidhim ālaṃbhya
T07yabhkvyu:8078: vaibhāṣikā vyācakṣate. svendriyaiḥ prāptā matā ity ācāryasaṃghabhadraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8079: vistareṇa yāvan manasā dharmā iti. ye tvayā ghrāṇena gandhā na ghrātāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8080: jihvayā rasā nāsvāditāḥ. kāyena spraṣṭavyāni [Tib. 68b] na spṛṣṭāni. yāvad ye tvayā manasā dharmā na vijñātā iti. triṣu viṣayeṣu rūpaśabdadharmeṣu
T07yabhkvyu:8081: dṛṣṭaśrutavijñātāpadeśād yathākramaṃ. gandhādiṣu gaṃdharasaspraṣṭavyeṣu matākhyā gamyate. te mataśabdenocyaṃte. evaṃ cāniṣyamāṇe gaṃdhādiṣu
T07yabhkvyu:8082: matākhyety aniṣyamāṇe. dṛṣṭādibhāvabāhyatvāt. gandhādīnām arūpalakṣaṇatvena (Abhidh-k-vy 407) dṛṣṭabhāvabāhyatvād aśabdadharmāyatanalakṣaṇatvena ca śrutavijñātabhāvabāhyatvāt. gaṃdhādiṣu vyavahāro na syāt. dṛṣṭa iti vā yāvad vijñāta iti vety eṣā yuktiḥ. teṣu
T07yabhkvyu:8083: matākhyeti. ācārya āha. sūtraṃ tāvad iti vistaraḥ. anyārthatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8084: yasmāt sūtrasyānya evārthaḥ. sūtrārthaṃ bravīti. atra ca te tava ṣaḍvidhe viṣaye rūpādau. caturṣu dṛṣṭādivyavahāreṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:8086: rūpe dṛṣṭam iti vyavahāro bhaviṣyati. yāvad vijñātam iti. evaṃ śabdāḍiṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:8087: atra ca te mālakīmātar dṛṣṭe viṣayaṣaṭke dṛṣṭamātraṃ bhaviṣyati. śrute
T07yabhkvyu:8088: viṣayaṣaṭke. mate vijñāte viṣayaṣaṭke eva vijñātamātram ity evaṃ tat sūtrapadaṃ vyākhyāyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. na hi priyāpriyanimittādhyāropas
T07yabhkvyu:8089: tava bhaviṣyatīti sūtrārthaḥ. [Tib. 68b] nanu ca yāni tvayā cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi
T07yabhkvyu:8090: na dṛṣṭānīty evoktāni. na tu na śrutāni yāvan na vijñātānīty evoktāni.
T07yabhkvyu:8091: evaṃ śabdā na śrutā ity evoktāḥ. na tu na dṛṣṭā yāvan na vijñātā ity uktāḥ. evaṃ yāvad dharmā na vijñātā ity evoktāḥ. na tu na dṛṣṭā yāvan na
T07yabhkvyu:8092: spṛṣṭā iti. naiṣa doṣaḥ. udāharaṇarūpam etad uktaṃ bhagavatā. yathā hi rūpāṇi na dṛṣṭānīty uktāni. tathā na śrutāni. yāvan na vijñātānīti
T07yabhkvyu:8093: vaktavyāni. evaṃ śabdādiṣu vaktavyaṃ. tenaiva lakṣaṇam ucyate. yat paṃcabhir indriyair iti vistaraḥ. yat paṃcabhir indriyaiḥ pratyakṣaṃ rūpādi tad dṛṣṭaṃ. yat parata āgamitaṃ viṣayaṣaṭkaṃ tac chrutaṃ. yad yuktyanumānato rucitam abhipretaṃ tan mataṃ yuktyanumānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8094: avyabhicāryanumānaṃ. tac ca ṣaḍviṣayagocaraṃ. ṣaṣṭho 'nyatra dṛṣṭād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8095: ṣaṣṭho viṣayo dharmāḥ. sa dṛṣṭavyavahāraṃ varjayitvā tribhiḥ śrutādibhir vyavahārair vyavahriyate. ato nāsti gandhādiṣu vyavahārābhāvaprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8096: tasmād yuktir apy eṣā na yuktir bhavati. yā vaibhāṣikair [Tib. 69a] uktāḥ evaṃ cāniṣyamāṇa ity evamādikā. yasmād anyathāpi gaṃdhādiṣu vyavahāro
T07yabhkvyu:8098: yat pratyakṣīkṛtaṃ cakṣuṣeti. na paṃcabhir indriyaiḥ. yac chrotreṇa śrutaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8099: parataś cāgamitam iti ubhayam apy abhīṣṭaṃ. pratyātmaṃ pratisaṃveditaṃ sukhādy asamāhitena cittena. adhigataṃ tu samāhitena. laukikenaiva. na
T07yabhkvyu:8100: lokottareṇa. laukikaṃ vyavahārādhikārāt. tad evaṃ yogācāranayenāpi ṣaḍ apy ete viṣayāḥ pratyekaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ dṛṣṭā iti vā vyavahriyaṃte. śrutāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8101: matāḥ. vijñātā ity evety ato nāsti gaṃdhādiṣu vyavahārābhāvaprasaṃga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8103: yaḥ kāyenānyatheti. kāyasaṃjñayā yo 'rthaṃ gamayati. tasyāpi mṛṣāvādaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8104: parākrameta vyāyaccheta. vācā parākrameteti. vācā paraṃ mārayed ity
T07yabhkvyu:8105: arthaḥ. iha tu prāṇātipātasya kāyikatvāt kāyiky evāvijñaptir
T07yabhkvyu:8106: maulasaṃgṛhītā. na vācikī. nāpy atra kāyikī vijñaptiḥ syāt. kāyena
T07yabhkvyu:8107: parākrameteti. atra mṛṣāvādasya vācikatvād vāciky evāvijñaptir maulasaṃgṛhītety avagaṃtavyaṃ. ubhayāvadyena veti. [Tib. 69b]
T07yabhkvyu:8108: kāyavāgavadyena. ṛṣīṇāṃ manaḥpradoṣeṇa kāyāvadyena yogo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:8109: poṣadhanidarśanaṃ cātreti. vāgavadyena yogo bhavati. bhikṣupoṣadhe hi kacci 'ttha pariśuddhā iti vinayadhareṇānuśrāvite. yadi kaścit bhikṣuḥ
T07yabhkvyu:8110: satīm āpattiṃ nāviṣkuryāt. tūṣṇīṃbhāvenaivādhivāsayet sa mṛṣāvādī bhaved
T07yabhkvyu:8111: iti. kathaṃ tayoḥ karmapathaḥ sidhyatīti. kathaṃ tayo ṛṣibhikṣvoḥ
T07yabhkvyu:8112: kāyavāgbhyām aparākramamāṇayoḥ prāṇātipāto mṛṣāvādaś ca yathākramaṃ karmapathaḥ sidhyatīti. kartavyo 'tra yatnaḥ. vaibhāṣikaiḥ kartavyaḥ samādhir ity arthaḥ. atrācāryasaṃghabhadraḥ samādhim āha. ṛṣayo 'rthata
T07yabhkvyu:8113: ājñāpayitāro bhavaṃti. teṣāṃ hi sattvaparityāgapravṛttaṃ pāpāśayam avetyāmanuṣyās tadabhiprasannāḥ kāyena parākramaṃte. yena teṣāṃ ṛṣīṇāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8114: karmaptha utpadyate. kathaṃ. paravijñaptyeti. avaśyaṃ tathāvidhasya kāyavāgvikārā bhavaṃti. api ca śapaṃti te tathā. tatra cāvaśyaṃ kāyavākceṣṭayā bhavitavyaṃ anye tv āhuḥ. na kāmadhātāv avaśyam avijñaptiḥ sarvaiva vijñaptyadhīnā bhavati. phalaprāptyaiva saha paṃcakādīnāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8115: prātimokṣasaṃvarotpattisaṃbhāvāt. ity akuśalāpy evaṃjātīyā kācid vijñaptim aṃtareṇāpi syāt. pūrvavijñaptaṃ tair iti [Tib. 70a] avaśyam itaratrāpi bhaviṣyati. ṛṣīṇāṃ tāvad uktaṃ poṣadhamṛṣāvāde 'pi. yad apariśuddhaḥ saṃghamadhyaṃ praviśait. niṣīdati. svam īryāpathaṃkalpayati. tatsaṃbaddhaṃ vā yatkiṃcid bhāṣate. sāsya pūrvavijñaptir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8117: mṛṣāvādāditrayam api. na kevalam anyaṃ kliṣṭaṃ. saiva ca saṃbhinnapralāpiteti. yasya guṇasya hi bhāvād dravye śabdaniveśaḥ. tasya.
T07yabhkvyu:8118: tadabhidhāne tvatalāv iti. tatpratyayena kliṣṭavacanalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbhinnapralāpa ucyate. tadyogena hi. saṃbhinnapralāpayogena hi. sa pudgalaḥ saṃbhinnapralāpī bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:8119: mṛṣāvādāditrayād yad anyakliṣṭaṃ vacanaṃ. sa saṃbhinnapralāpa ity
T07yabhkvyu:8122: lapanāṃ karotīti. lābhayaśaskāmatayā sevābhidyotikāṃ vācaṃ niścārayatīty
T07yabhkvyu:8123: (Abhidh-k-vy 409) arthaḥ. paridevasaṃgaṇikādikam iti. ādiśabdena paridevasaṃgaṇikābhyāṃ yo 'nyaḥ kliṣṭacittānāṃ kaścid ālāpaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8125: vivāho dārakasya dārikāgṛhāgamanaṃ. āvāhaḥ praveśanakaḥ. vivāhaḥ pariṇayanam ity apare. ādiśabdena raktacittānām ālāpaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8127: tathā hīti vistaraḥ. yasmāt paṃcānāṃ nivaraṇānām adhikāreṇa. kāmacchandaṃ kāmatṛṣṇāsvabhāvam adhikṛtyoktaṃ. so 'bhidhyāṃ loke prahāya vigatābhidhyena cetasā bahulaṃ viharati. vyāpādaṃ styānamiddham auddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsāṃ loke prahāya tīrṇakāṃkṣo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:8128: tīrṇavicikitsaḥ. akathaṃkathī kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu. sa paṃca nivaraṇāni
T07yabhkvyu:8129: prahāyety evamādi. ato jñāyate sarvaiva kāmāvacarī tṛṣṇābhidhyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:8130: audārikaduścaritasaṃgrahād iti. daśasv akuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu yad audārikam duścaritaṃ. tat saṃgṛhītaṃ. na sarvam. evaṃ kuśaleṣu. ato na sarvābhidhyā karmapathaḥ. kiṃ tarhi. yā parasve viṣamaspṛhā. sā karmapatha ity apareṣām abhiprāyaḥ. mā bhūc cakravartināṃ uttarakauravāṇāṃ cābhidhyā karmapatha iti. na hi tatra kāmāvacarī tṛṣṇā nāsti. na ca tatrākuśalāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:8132: saiṣā sākalyena karmaphalāryāpavādiketi. tathā hy eṣā paṭhyate. nāsti
T07yabhkvyu:8133: dattam. nāstīṣṭaṃ. nāsti hutaṃ. nāsti sucaritaṃ. nāsti duścaritaṃ. nāsti sucaritaduścaritānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipākaḥ. nāsty ayaṃ lokaḥ. nāsti
T07yabhkvyu:8134: paralokaḥ. nāsti mātā. [Tib. 71a] nāsti pitā. nāsti sattva
T07yabhkvyu:8135: upapādukaḥ. na saṃti loke 'rhaṃta iti. tatra nāsti dattaṃ. yāvan nāsti duṣcaritam iti karmāpavādikā. tathā nāsti mātā. nāsti piteti karmāpavādikaiva. nāsti sucaritaduścaritānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipākaḥ. nāsty ayaṃ lokaḥ. nāsti paralokaḥ. tathā nāsti sattva upapāduka iti phalāpavādikā. na saṃti loke 'rhaṃta ity āryāpavādikā. ādimātraṃ tu śloke
T07yabhkvyu:8138: (IV.79cd) karmaṇaḥ paṃthāna iti. cetanākhyasya karmaṇaḥ paṃthānaḥ. katham ity āha. tatsaṃprayogiṇī hi cetanā. abhidhyādisaṃprayogiṇī teṣām abhidhyādīnāṃ vāhena gatyā vahati. gacchatīty arthaḥ. tadvaśena
T07yabhkvyu:8141: cetanābhisaṃskaroti. cetayata ity arthaḥ. atas teṣāṃ vāhena vahati. karma
T07yabhkvyu:8142: ca. kāyavākkarmasvabhāvatvāt. karmaṇaś ca cetanākhyasya paṃthāna iti karmapathāḥ. tatsamutthānacetanāyāḥ [Tib. 71b]
T07yabhkvyu:8143: kāyavākkarmasamutthānacetanāyāḥ. tān adhiṣṭhāya tān prāṇātipātādīn adhiṣṭhāya pravṛtteḥ. asarūpāṇām apy ekaśeṣasiddher iti. śabdasarūpāṇām arthasarūpāṇāṃ vā ekaśeṣa iṣyate. yathā vṛkṣaś ca vṛkṣaś ca vṛkṣau. vakraṣ ca kuṭilaś ca vakrāv iti. iha tu karma ca karmapathāś ceti na karmaśabdasya karmapathaśabdasya ca sārūpyaṃ śabdataḥ nāpy arthataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8144: karmārthasya karmapathārthasya ca bhinnatvād ekaśeṣo na prāpnoti. yasmāt tv asarūpāṇāṃ sākalyenaikadeśena tu sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ sidhyati. iṣyata ity arthaḥ. tadyathā guṇo yaṅlukor iti. yaṅ ca yaṅluk yaṅlukau. tayor iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8145: na śakyate vaktuṃ. yaṅ ca luk ca yaṅlukāv iti ayaṃ luko 'niṣṭatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8146: ekadeśasārūpyāt tu. yaṅo yaṅlugekadeśasya ca yaṅ iti sārūpyāt sidhyaty ekaśeṣo yaṅlukor iti. ato jñāpakād ayam api sidhyati. karma ca karmapathāś
T07yabhkvyu:8147: ca karmapathā iti. paścāt punaḥ sarūpaikaśeṣaḥ. karmapathāś cābhidhyaḥ karmapathāś ca prāṇātipātādaya iti karmapathāḥ. atha vaivaṃ yojanā.
T07yabhkvyu:8148: karmaṇaḥ paṃthānaḥ karmapathāḥ. karma ca te karmapathāś ca karmakarmapathāḥ. karmapathāś cābhidhyādayaḥ. karmakarmapathāś ca prāṇātipātādayaḥ. [Tib. 72a] karmapathā iti. evam anabhidhyādaya iti
T07yabhkvyu:8149: vistaraḥ. kuśalā api karmapathā evam eva yojyāḥ. anabhidhyādayo hi karmaṇaḥ paṃthāna eva. prāṇātipātaviratyādayaś ca karma ca karmaṇaś ca
T07yabhkvyu:8151: yasmāt tadartha iti vistaraḥ yasmān maulakarmapathārthaṃ teṣaṃ tatprayogāṇāṃ pravṛttiḥ. yasmāc ca maulakarmapathamūlikā teṣāṃ tatpṛṣṭhānāṃ pravṛttiḥ. ato na tāni karmapathāḥ. yady api karmapatho 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:8152: karmapathasya prayoga uktaḥ. sa tu maulatvāt karmapathaḥ. na tu prayogapṛṣṭhabhūtatvād iti. yathaudārikasaṃgrahād ity uktaṃ prāg iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8153: tadaudārikasaṃgrahād daśakarmapathā uktā iti vacanāt. yāni prayogapṛṣṭhāni. tāni na saṃgṛhītāni. yeṣāṃ ceti vistaraḥ. yeṣāṃ maulānām utkarṣāpakarṣeṇādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ bhāvānām utkarṣāpkarṣau loke bhavataḥ. na tu prayogapṛṣṭhānāṃ. atas ta eva
T07yabhkvyu:8156: ity atra. ato na tāni prayogapṛṣṭhāni karmapathāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8158: teṣāṃ te kathaṃ karmapathā iti. na hi teṣām abhidhyādibhyo 'nyan
T07yabhkvyu:8159: manaskarmāsti cetanā. yasya karmaṇas te 'bhidhyādayaḥ paṃthāna iti karmapathāḥ syuḥ. [Tib. 72b] ta eva praṣṭavyā iti. tair eva parihāro
T07yabhkvyu:8160: vaktavyaḥ. ya evaṃ manyaṃte. api tu śakyam iti vistaraḥ. svamatena tatpakṣaṃ samarthayati. itaretarāvāhanād veti. kiṃ. te 'bhidhyādayaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:8161: karmapathā iti prakṛtaṃ. abhidhyā vyāpādamithyādṛṣṭī āvāhayati. te ca tām
T07yabhkvyu:8162: iti. karma ca te. karmaṇaś caiṣām ekatarasya panthāna iti karmapathāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8163: (IV.80, 81) mithyādṛṣṭyā kuśalamūlasamuccheda ity etam arthaṃ vaktukāma
T07yabhkvyu:8164: upodghātaṃ bravīti. sarva ete 'kuśalānām iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8165: adhimātraparipūrṇayeti. adhimātrādhimātrayety arthaḥ. kiṃ tarhi śāstra
T07yabhkvyu:8166: uktam iti. yadi mithyādṛṣṭyā kuśalamūlasamucchedo nākuśalamūlaiḥ. yat tac chāstra uktaṃ. yair akuśalamūlaiḥ kuśalamūlāni samucchinattītyādi. tāni hi lobhādisvabhāvāni. na mithyādṛṣṭisvabhāvānīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8167: akuśalamūlādhyāhṛtatvād iti vistaraḥ. akuśalamūlair lobhādibhir adhimātrair mithyādṛṣṭir adhyāhṛtāpanītā. tasmāt. akuśalamūlādhyāhṛtatvān
T07yabhkvyu:8168: mithyādṛṣṭeḥ. teṣv eva tatkarmopadeśaḥ. teṣv evākuśalamūleṣu. mithyādṛṣṭeḥ kuśalamūlasamucchedakaṃ yat karma. tasyopadeśaḥ [Tib. 73a].
T07yabhkvyu:8169: prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ tarhi kathaṃ nīyate. yadi kāmāvacarāṇi kuśalamūlāni
T07yabhkvyu:8172: abhipretya tasya pudgalasya. etad uktaṃ traidhātukāni kuśalamūlāni
T07yabhkvyu:8173: samucchinnānīti. kathaṃ ca punas tatprāptidūrīkaraṇaṃ. saṃtates
T07yabhkvyu:8174: tadabhājanatvāpādanāt. yasmād asau tatsaṃtatiḥ pūrvaṃ bhājanabhūtā tatprāptīnāṃ. kuśalamūlasamucchedād idānīṃ tatprāptīnām abhājanam
T07yabhkvyu:8176: prāyogikebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ parihīṇatvād iti. śrutaciṃtābhāvanāmayebhyaḥ prāyogikebhyaḥ pūrvam evāsau mṛdumṛdvyavasthāyāṃ tebhyaḥ parihīṇaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8179: phalāpavādinī vimuktimārgasthānīyā. tad uktaṃ bhavati. ubhe apy ete
T07yabhkvyu:8185: kuśalamūlāni samucchidyaṃta ity adhikṛtaṃ kasmād ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:8186: saṃprayogamātrānuśāyitvena durbalatvād iti. anāsravālaṃbanā visabhāgadhātvālaṃbanā ca yā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ. sā saṃprayogamātreṇa saṃprayukteṣu dharmeṣv anuśete nālaṃbanataḥ. tasmād asau durbalā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:8188: evaṃ tu varṇayaṃti vaibhāṣikāḥ. sarvayeti. yā ca hetum apavadate yā ca
T07yabhkvyu:8189: phalaṃ. yā ca sabhāgaṃ dhātum ālaṃbate yā ca visabhāgaṃ. yā ca sāsravaṃ yā cānāsravam ālaṃbate. sarvayaiva tayā samucchidyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:8190: darśanaprahātavyā iveti. yathā duḥkhādidarśanaheyāḥ kleśā nava prakārā api
T07yabhkvyu:8191: duḥkhādisatyadarśanāt sakṛt prahīyaṃte. tadvan nava prakārāṇy api kuśalamūlāni sakṛt samucchidyaṃta ity ete.
T07yabhkvyu:8192: bhāvanāheyakleśavad iti. yathā navaprakāreṇa mārgeṇa navaprakāraḥ kleśaḥ prahīyate. mṛdumṛdunā mārgeṇa adhimātrādhimātrakleśaprakāraḥ prahīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8193: yāvad [Tib. 74a] adhimātrādhimātreṇa mṛdumṛduḥ. evaṃ navaprakārayāpi mithyādṛṣṭyā navaprakārāṇi kuśalamūlāni samucchidyaṃte. ṛdumṛdvyā mithyādṛṣṭyā adhimātrādhimātraḥ kuśalamūlaprakāraḥ samucchidyate. yāvad adhimātrādhimātrayā mṛdumṛduḥ kuśalamūlaprakāra iti. evam ayaṃ graṃthaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:8194: paripālito bhavati. yadi bhāvanāheyakleśavad yathoktaṃ tāni
T07yabhkvyu:8195: samucchidyaṃte. aṇusahagatāni mṛdumṛdūni. yair akuśalamūlaiḥ kuśalamūlāni
T07yabhkvyu:8197: uktaḥ. na mṛdumṛdvādibhir ity abhiprāyaḥ. yadi kramaśaḥ samucchidyaṃte
T07yabhkvyu:8198: 'sya tarhītyādi. kathaṃ. samāptim etat saṃdhāyoktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8199: kuśalamūlasamucchedasamāptiṃ saṃdhāya katamāny adhimātrāṇīti vistareṇa etad uktaṃ. mṛdumṛdvādisamucchedas tv anukto 'pi grahītavyaḥ. tasmāt samāptim eva saṃdhāyaitad uktaṃ. tair niravaśeṣacchedāt. yasmāt tair navabhir mithyādṛṣṭiprakāraiḥ kuśalamūlānāṃ niravaśeṣacchedo bhavati. eko
T07yabhkvyu:8200: 'pi hi prakāras teṣām asamucchinna iti. mṛdumṛdunavamaḥ prakāraḥ sarveṣāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8201: navānām api prakārāṇāṃ punarutpattau hetuḥ syād iti. ataḥ samāptim etat
T07yabhkvyu:8204: tattyāgāt [Tib. 74b] tasya tyāga iti. yo mṛdumṛdunā cittena saṃvaraḥ samātta āsīt. tasya mṛdumṛdoś cittasya mṛdumṛdukuśalamūlasaṃprayuktasya
T07yabhkvyu:8205: (Abhidh-k-vy 413) tyāge samucchede tasya saṃvarasya tyāgo bhavati. evaṃ yāvad yo 'dhimātrādhimātreṇa cittena samāttaḥ saṃvaraḥ. tattyāgāt tasya tyāga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8206: karmaphale pratyakṣatvād iti. aciropapannasya devaputrasya trīṇi cittāni
T07yabhkvyu:8207: samudācaraṃti. kuto 'haṃ cyutaḥ. kutropapannaḥ. kena karmaṇety evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8208: karmaphalapratyakṣatvān na deveṣu kuśalamūlāni samucchidyaṃte. jaṃbūdvīpa
T07yabhkvyu:8209: eveti. tatra viśeṣeṇa tārkikatvād ity abhiprāyaḥ. sarvālpair aṣṭābhir indriyaiḥ samanvāgataḥ paṃcabhir vedanendriyaiḥ kāyajīvitamanaindriyaiś ca. samucchinnakuśalamūla eva. tasya hi śraddhādīni samucchinnāni.
T07yabhkvyu:8210: pṛthagjanatvāc ca nājñāsyāmīndriyādīni saṃti. cakṣurādīny api na saṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:8211: vaikalyayoge. kramamaraṇāvasthāyāṃ vā. evaṃ paurvavidehako gaudānīyaka
T07yabhkvyu:8212: iti. atideśād asty anayor api kuśalamūlasamuccheda iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:8214: iti. strī pumāṃś ceti caśabdo luptanirdiṣṭaḥ. yaḥ strīndriyeṇa samanvāgato
T07yabhkvyu:8215: niyatam asāv aṣṭābhir indriyaiḥ samanvāgataḥ. caturbhir vedanendriyais tribhiś ca kāyajīvitamanaindriyaiḥ [Tib. 75a] strīndriyeṇāṣṭamena.
T07yabhkvyu:8217: ayam eva cātrārtho virudhyate. cakṣurādīny api vyabhicāryaṃte pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:8218: teṣām apīti. teṣām api samucchettṝṇām uktānāṃ. tṛṣṇācarito na samucchinatti. dṛḍhagūḍhapāpāśayatvād iti. dṛḍho gūḍhaḥ pāpaś cāśayo
T07yabhkvyu:8219: 'bhiprāyo 'syeti samāsaḥ. dṛḍhaḥ sthiraḥ. gūḍhaḥ pracchannaḥ. pāpo
T07yabhkvyu:8221: yathā tṛṣṇācaritaś calāśayaḥ. tadvat te ṣaṇḍhādaya iti. āpāyikavac ca.
T07yabhkvyu:8222: yathāpāyikāḥ kliṣṭākliṣṭayoḥ prajñayor adṛḍhatvān na kuśalamūlāni
T07yabhkvyu:8225: pratisaṃhitānīty apare paṭhaṃti. ārogyabalalābhavad iti. yathārogyaṃ pūrvaṃ bhavati. krameṇa tu balalābho bhavati. tadvat.
T07yabhkvyu:8227: iti. ānaṃtaryakāriṇa eva neha pratisaṃdhir bhavatīti. arthata etad uktaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8228: bhavaty anānaṃtaryakāriṇa iha pratisaṃdhir bhavatīti. aṃtarābhavastha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8230: cyutyabhimukhaḥ. hetubaleneti. sabhāgahetubalena. yasmād yeṣāṃ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ svayaṃ rocate. pratyayabaleneti. parato ghoṣabalena. yasmād yeṣāṃ mithyādṛṣṭī rocate. hetubalasya sāratvāt. evaṃ yaḥ svabaleneti. yaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:8231: svatarkabalena. sa cyavamānaḥ. yaḥ parabalena. parataḥ śrutabalena. sa
T07yabhkvyu:8233: mithyādṛṣṭisaṃmukhībhāvena vipanno vinaṣṭaḥ. sa dṛṣṭe dharme janmani
T07yabhkvyu:8234: pratisaṃdadhāti. ya āśayaprayogavipannaḥ. yo mithyādṛṣṭisaṃmukhībhāvenānaṃtaryakṛiyayā ca vipannaḥ. sa bhedāt kāyasya
T07yabhkvyu:8235: pratisaṃdadhāti. atra ca yaḥ svabalena parabaleneti pūrvoktasyaivāyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8236: paryāyaḥ. evaṃ yo dṛṣṭivipanno yo dṛṣṭiśīlavipanna iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8238: pūraṇādaya iti. ādiśabdena ṣaṭ śāstāro gṛhyaṃte. tadyathā pūraṇakāśyapaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8239: maskarī gośālīputraḥ. saṃjayī vairaṭīputraḥ. ajitaḥ keśakaṃbalaḥ. kakudaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:8240: kātyāyanaḥ. nirgrantho jñātiputra iti. te samucchinnakuśalamūlāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8245: saṃghabhedakatvāt tathāgataduṣṭacittarudhirotpādakatvāc ca. caturthy etān ākārān sthāpayitvety
T07yabhkvyu:8246: (IV.82) vinānyenābhidhyādīsaṃmukhībhāva iti. vinānyena karmapathena prāṇātipātādinābhidhyādīnām anyatamasaṃmukhībhāve. sā cetanā ekena
T07yabhkvyu:8247: karmapathena saha vartate. abhidhyayā vā vyāpādena vā mithyādṛṣṭyā vā.
T07yabhkvyu:8248: akliṣṭacetaso veti. kuśalāvyākṛtacittasya. tasya prayoktuḥ prayogeṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:8250: tenaikena saha cetanā vartate. abhidhyādivyatiriktakliṣṭacittasya veti vaktavyaṃ. tasyāpi hy ayaṃ ayaṃ vidhiḥ saṃbhavati. vyāpannacittasya prāṇivadha iti vistaraḥ. vyāpādena prāṇātipātena ceti dvābhyāṃ saha vartate. kāmamithyācāre. saṃbhinnapralāpe ca. dvābhyāṃ saha vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:8251: abhidhyayā kāmamithyācāreṇa ceti dvābhyāṃ. saṃbhinnapralāpenābhidhyādīnāṃ cānyatamena ceti. [Tib. 76b] dvābhyām eva. idaṃ codyate. vyāpannacittasya prāṇivadha ity abhidhyāviṣṭasya cādattādāna iti. kim idaṃ svayaṃ kurvata
T07yabhkvyu:8252: ucyate. utāho pareṇa kāṛayataḥ. yadi svayaṃ kurvataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8253: vyāpannacittasyābhidhyāviṣṭasya ceti viśeṣaṇaṃ na yujyate. prāṇivadhe
T07yabhkvyu:8254: vyāpādasyāvaśyakatvāt. adattādāne cābhidhyāyāḥ. vyabhicāre hi viśeṣaṇam
T07yabhkvyu:8257: ucyate svayaṃ kurvata iti. nanu coktaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ na yujyata iti. naiṣa
T07yabhkvyu:8258: doṣaḥ. na hīdaṃ viśeṣaṇam ucyate. kiṃ tarhi. svarūpākhyānam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:8259: vyāpādābhidhyayor dvitīyabhūtayos tatrāstitvaṃ kathyata iti. evam apy abhidhyādyanyataracittasya tān prāṇātipātādīn kārayato (Abhidh-k-vy 415)
T07yabhkvyu:8260: dvābhyāṃ saha cetanā vartata iti saṃbhavet. tasmāt tad api vaktavyaṃ.

T07yabhkvyu:8265: iti. anyacittasya tu māraṇacittasya nāyaṃ niyamaḥ.

T07yabhkvyu:8283: kṛtvābhidhyāgatasya svayaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ kurvataḥ samaṃ niṣṭhāgamane.

T07yabhkvyu:8287: iti. naikenaiva mānasena. kuśale cetasya anabhidhyāvyāpādayor avaśyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8288: bhāvāt. nāpi rūpīnaikena saṃvarasaṃgṛhītena karmapathena saha cetanā

T07yabhkvyu:8292: tatra dvābhyāṃ saha vartate. kuśaleṣu paṃcasu vijñāneṣv anabhidhyā cāvyāpādaś ca staḥ na samyagdṛṣṭiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8293: paṃcavijñānasahajā dhīr na dṛṣṭir atīṛaṇād iti siddhāṃtāt. ato 'nabhidhyāvyāpdābhyāṃ dvābhyām evātra saha vartate.

T07yabhkvyu:8295: kṣayānutpādadhīr na dṛg iti tatra samyagdṛṣṭyabhāvāt. ārūpyasamāpattigrahaṇaṃ dhyānasamāpattisaṃgṛhītayoḥ

T07yabhkvyu:8305: samyagdṛṣṭir [Tib. 79a] astīti. akuśalāvyākṛtacittasya ca bhikṣusaṃvarasamādāne saptabhir eva rūpibhiḥ. na mānasaiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8306: akuśalāvyākṛtacittatvāt. navabhiḥ kuśaleṣu paṃcasu vijñāneṣu tatsamādāne.

T07yabhkvyu:8309: vartate. tatrāpi samyagdṛṣṭyabhāvāt. tasminn eva ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:8311: eva. dhyānasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītai rūpibhiḥ saptabhir anabhidhyāvyāpādābhyāṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:8313: bhikṣusaṃvarasamādāna eva. sarvā ceti vistaraḥ. sarvā ca dhyānānāsravasaṃvarasahavartinī kṣayānutpādajñānasaṃprayuktā cetanā

T07yabhkvyu:8394: śaṃkhaśabde. bherīśabde. āḍaṃbaraśabde. nṛttaśabde. gītaśabde. śayyāśabde.
T07yabhkvyu:8396: citrākṣare. citrapadavyaṃjane. lokāyatapratisaṃyukte. ākhyāyikā vā śrotum
T07yabhkvyu:8397: icchanty eke. ity apy evaṃrūpāc chramaṇo vividhaśabdaśravaṇasamāraṃbhānuyogāt prativirato bhavatīty evamādi.
T07yabhkvyu:8399: (IV.88, 89) yāni pūrvaṃ paṃca phalāny uktānīti. adhipatiphalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8401: prahāṇārthaṃ mārga iti. bhāvasādhanaṃ. prahāṇāya mārgaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:8403: iti. prahīyate 'neneti karaṇasādhanaṃ. prahāṇo mārga iti ca vigrahaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8404: samādhijā uttare sadṛśā dharmā iti. samādhijagrahaṇam
T07yabhkvyu:8406: anāsravāvyākṛtanirāsārthaṃ. sahabhuva iti. saṃprayuktāś ca tatra
T07yabhkvyu:8407: vedanādayaḥ. viprayuktāś ca jātyādayaḥ. yac cānāgataṃ bhāvyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8408: anāgato dharmas tadbalena prāpyata iti. tasya tat puruṣakāraphalam ata eva tac ca prahāṇaṃ puruṣakāraphalaṃ vyavasthāpyate. na kevalaṃ visaṃyogaphalam iti. pūrvotpannavarjyā iti pūrvotpannaṃ phalaṃ na yujyata
T07yabhkvyu:8411: iti. vipākaphalaṃ hitveti. anāsravasyāvipākatvāt. tasya hi niṣyandaphalaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8412: samādhijā uttare sadṛśā dharmāḥ. visaṃyogaphalaṃ visaṃyoga eva yat tat prahāṇaṃ. puruṣakāraphalaṃ tadākṛṣṭā dharmāḥ. tadyathā vimuktimārgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8413: sahabhuvaḥ. yac cānāgataṃ bhāvyate. tac ca prahāṇaṃ. adhipatiphalaṃ svabhāvād anye sarve saṃskrtāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:8415: iti. prahāṇamārgād yad anyasāsravaṃ karma samāhitam asamāhitaṃ ca. tad api caturbhiḥ phalaiḥ saphalaṃ visaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā. aprahāṇamārgatvād asya visaṃyogaphalaṃ nāsti. tasya hi vipākaphalaṃ svabhūmāv iṣṭo 'niṣṭo vā
T07yabhkvyu:8416: vipākaḥ. [Tib. 83b] niṣyandaphalaṃ uttare sadṛśā dharmāḥ. puruṣakāraphalaṃ tadākṛṣṭā dharmāḥ sahabhuvo 'naṃtarabhuvo vā. adhipatiphalaṃ śeṣaṃ pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:8418: iti. śeṣagrahaṇaṃ prahāṇamārganirāsārthaṃ. tat punaḥ kathaṃ. śeṣaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8420: (Abhidh-k-vy 422) anāsravatvāc ca na vipākaphalaṃ. śeṣaṃ pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:8421: avyākṛtaṃ ca yan nivṛtāvyākṛtam anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca. tad api tribhiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:8422: saphalaṃ. saprahāṇamārgatvān na tasya visaṃyogaphalam. avyākṛtatvāc ca na
T07yabhkvyu:8425: yathākramam etat. kathaṃ. kuśalasya kuśalā dharmāś catvāri phalāni.
T07yabhkvyu:8426: tasyaivākuśalā dve phale. tasyaivāvyākṛtās trīṇi phalānīti. vipākaphalaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8427: hitveti. vipākasyāvyākṛtvāt. akuśalā dve iti. purūṣakārādhipatiphale. na
T07yabhkvyu:8428: niṣyandaphalaṃ. yasmāt kuśalā dharmā akuśalānāṃ na sabhāgahetur iti. na
T07yabhkvyu:8429: vipākaphalaṃ. avyākṛtatvād vipākasya. yasmāc cākuśalā vipākaṃ prati
T07yabhkvyu:8430: vyākriyaṃte. na visaṃyogaphalaṃ. akuśalatvāt. [Tib. 84a] pāriśeṣyāt puruṣakārādhipatiphale eva. te ca pūrvavad vyākhyātavye. avyākṛtāś
T07yabhkvyu:8431: catvārīti. katham akuśalasyāvyākṛtā dharmā niṣyandaphalaṃ. kathaṃ ca na
T07yabhkvyu:8432: bhavitavyaṃ. visadṛśatvāt. visadṛśā hy akuśālayākṛtā dharmāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8433: savipākāvipākatvāt. naiṣa doṣaḥ. akūśalanivṛtāvyākṛtānāṃ hi dharmāṇāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8435: nivṛtāvyākṛtānāṃ cākuśalāḥ niṣyandaphalaṃ yujyaṃte. tenāha. avyākṛte hīti vistaraḥ. akuśalānāṃ sarvatragāṇāṃ duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyānāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8437: sabhāgasarvatragayor niṣyandaphalam iti. akuśalā hīti vistaraḥ. akuśalā duḥkhādidarśanaheyāḥ paṃcanaikāyikāḥ. avyākṛtayoḥ satkāyāṃtagrāhadṛṣṭyoḥ niṣyandaphalaṃ. etāny eva trīṇi vipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā.
T07yabhkvyu:8439: pratyekaṃ catvāri phalāni. visaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā. tasyānadhvapatitavāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8440: kathaṃ kṛtvā. atītasya karmaṇaḥ paścād atītas tadvipāko vipākaphalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8442: svabhāvavarjyāḥ tena sahotpannāḥ paścādutpannāś cātītāḥ adhipatiphalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8443: paścādutpannātītāḥ sadṛśā dharmā niṣyandaphalaṃ. atītasyānāgatas tadvipāko vipākaphalaṃ. yadbalena prāpyate 'nāgato dharmaḥ. tat puruṣakāraphalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8444: adhipatiphalaṃ yad anāgataṃ. tasya phalaṃ. niṣyandaphalaṃ tatsadṛśam anāgataṃ. evaṃ pratyutpannā api tasyātītasya catvāri phalāni yojyāni.
T07yabhkvyu:8446: iti. pratyutpannasyāpy anāgatā dharmāś catvāri phalāni. etāny eva visaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvety arthaḥ. tāny apy evam eva yojyāni. pratyutpannā dharmāḥ pratyutpannasya dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale iti. tasya hi sahotpannaṃ tadbalāj (Abhidh-k-vy 423) jātam iti puruṣakāraphalam
T07yabhkvyu:8447: adhipatiphalaṃ ca bhavaty eva. avisaṃyogasvabhāvān na visaṃyogaphalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8448: pūrvottaratābhāvān na niṣyandaphalaṃ. pravāhāpekṣatvād vipākasya na
T07yabhkvyu:8450: anāgato 'nāgatasya na niṣyandaphalaṃ. yasmāt sabhāgasarvatragahetū nānāgatau bhavataḥ. tasya viprakīrṇatvāt. sādṛśyena cāsyedaṃ phalam iti paricchettum aśakyatvāt. na visaṃyogaphalaṃ. yasmād anāgato visaṃyogo na
T07yabhkvyu:8451: bhavati. vipākaphalaṃ tu bhaved anāgatasya hy akuśalasya kuśalasāsravasya vānāgataṃ paścādutpatsyamānaṃ ca vipākaphalaṃ. puruṣakāraphalaṃ [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:8452: 85a]. sahajam anāgatam anaṃtarabhāvi cānāgataṃ. adhipatiphalaṃ tu sugamam
T07yabhkvyu:8455: na visaṃyogaphalaṃ. visaṃyogasyābhūmisvabhāvatvāt. anāsravāś cet trīṇi
T07yabhkvyu:8457: anyonyaṃ navabhūmis tu mārga iti hi siddhāṃtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8458: (IV.92cd, 93ab) śaikṣasya karmaṇaḥ śaikṣā dharmās trīṇīti. yasmād vipākaphalaṃ na śaikṣaṃ. visaṃyogaś cāpi na śaikṣaḥ. naivaśaikṣanāśaikṣā api trīṇi. na vipākaphalam asyāsti. śaikṣasyāvipākatvāt. na
T07yabhkvyu:8459: niṣyandaphalaṃ. naivaśaikṣanāśaikṣasya śaikṣeṇāsadṛśatvāt. visaṃyogaphalaṃ tu bhavati. visaṃyogasya naivaśaikṣanāśaikṣasvabhāvatvāt. puruṣakāraphalam api bhavati. śaikṣeṇa naivaśaikṣanāśaikṣākṛṣṭisaṃbhavāt. adhipatiphalaṃ cāsty eva. iti trīṇi saṃbhavaṃti. aśaikṣasya tv iti vistaraḥ. aśaikṣasya śaikṣā dharmā ekam adhipatiphalaṃ. na niṣyandaphalaṃ. nyūnatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8460: samaviśiṣṭayor iti vacanāt. na puruṣakāraphalaṃ. sahānaṃtarotpādābhāvāt. na hy aśaikṣānaṃtaraṃ śaikṣam utpadyate. ca naivaśaikṣanāśaikṣasvabhāvam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8461: [Tib. 85b] na cāśaikṣasya vipāko bhavatīty ato na vipākaphalaṃ. aśaikṣās
T07yabhkvyu:8462: trīṇīti. puruṣakārādhipatiniṣyandaphalāni. na vipākavisaṃyogaphale. tayor naiva śaikṣanāśaikṣasvabhāvatvāt. yac cāśaikṣasvabhāvaṃ. tad iha ciṃtyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8464: tadyathā. tadākṛṣṭā aṇaṃtarabhāvino dharmāḥ. adhipatiphalaṃ. pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:8465: yathoktakāraṇatvān na phalatrayaṃ. aśaikṣā apy evam ity. dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale (Abhidh-k-vy 424) ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8469: iti. darśanaheyādayaḥ. bhāvanāheyā dve iti. anāsravamārgavyutthāne bhāvanāheyāḥ kuśalāḥ puruṣakāraphalaṃ. ādyaṃtavad iti vistaraḥ. ādyaṃtayor
T07yabhkvyu:8470: ivādyaṃtavat. madhye 'pi jñāpanārthaṃ punar yathākramagrahaṇaṃ. katham.
T07yabhkvyu:8472: aśubhasya śubhādyā dve trīṇi catvāry anukramam iti vacanāt. aṃte 'pi prayuktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8473: apraheyasya te tv ekaṃ dve catvāri yathākramam
T07yabhkvyu:8474: iti. yathaivam ādyaṃtayor yathākramārtha uktaḥ. [Tib. 86a] tathā madhye 'pi avagaṃtavyaḥ. eṣa hi peyāladharma iti. eṣo 'bhisaṃkṣepanyāyaḥ. anyathā hy
T07yabhkvyu:8475: avyākṛtasya dve tṛīṇi caite śubhādaya ity evamādiṣu yathākramam iti sarvatra vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8476: (IV.95) ayoniśomanaskārasaṃbhūtatvād iti. ayonyā anyāyena kleśayogena. yaḥ pravṛtto manaskāraḥ. tatra saṃbhūtaḥ. tadbhāvaḥ. tasmād iti. yena yathā gaṃtavyaṃ. yena pudgalena yathā gaṃtavyaṃ. tathā na gacchatīty
T07yabhkvyu:8480: tadubhābhyām anyan nobhayatheti. na yogavihitaḥ. nāyogavihitaḥ. kiṃ ca tadanyad avyākṛtaṃ karma vidhibhraṣṭavidhibhraṣṭābhyām anyad avyākṛtam
T07yabhkvyu:8483: na tu jāter ity abhiprāyaḥ. yat tarhīti. yady ekam eva karmaikam eva janmākṣipati. yat sthaviraniruddhenoktaṃ so 'haṃ tasyeti vistareṇa. tat kathaṃ na virudhyata iti vākyārthaḥ. tena janmāntare tagaraśikhine
T07yabhkvyu:8484: pratyekabuddhāya [Tib. 86b] piṇḍapāto dattaḥ. tenaivam uktaṃ. so 'haṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8485: tasyeti vistareṇa. nirvartyeti. viṭhapitvety arthaḥ. tulye 'pi mānuṣye kaścit sakalendriyo bhavati kaścid vikalendriyaḥ. paripūrakasya karmaṇo bhedāt tad anupapanmam. (Abhidh-k-vy 425) ākṣepakarmaphalatvāc
T07yabhkvyu:8486: cakṣurādīnāṃ. ṣaḍāyatanaṃ hy ākṣipyata iti. varṇādayas tu paripūrakasya
T07yabhkvyu:8487: karmaṇaḥ phalam iti. yuktaṃ vaktuṃ. tulye 'pi mānuṣye kaścid varṇavān
T07yabhkvyu:8488: kaścin neti. tadutpattivirodhipratyayaparihāre paripūrakakarmasāmarthyān na virodhaḥ. anyathā hi na kaścid vikalendriyaḥ syāt sati janmākṣepa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8489: (IV.96cd) anyad api savipākam iti. vedanādikaṃ. karmasahabhūtvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8490: yasmāt karmaṇā cetanākhyena saha te samāpattī na bhavataḥ. nāpi kāyavākkarmabhyām acittikatvāt. prāptibhiś ca nākṣipyate savipākābhir api.
T07yabhkvyu:8491: karmaṇānekaphalatvāt. tadākṣepakeṇa karmaṇā saha bhavaṃtyo 'pi prāptayo na tena sahaikaphalā iti. vṛkṣaprapāṭikā iva hi prāptayo bahiravasthāyino bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:8492: (IV.97) karmāvaraṇam iti. karmaivāvaraṇaṃ. kleśa evāvaraṇaṃ. vipāka evāvaraṇam iti. āryāmārgaprāyogikāṇāṃ ca kuśalamūlānām iti. uṣmagatādīnāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8496: tathāṇḍajasaṃsvedajastrītvāṣṭamabhavaniyatāni karmāṇi vaktavyāni. āryā hi narakādiṣu nopapadyaṃte. aṇḍajāṃ saṃsvedajāṃ ca yoniṃ na pratipadyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:8497: strītvam aṣṭamaṃ ca bhavaṃ na nirvartayiṣyaṃti. saptakṛtvo
T07yabhkvyu:8498: bhavaparamatvāt. sudarśakānīti. sukhena dṛśyaṃte parebhyā iti sudarśāni.
T07yabhkvyu:8499: sudarśāny eva sudarśakāni. evaṃ sukhena prajñapyaṃte ātmaneti
T07yabhkvyu:8500: suprajñeyāni. suprajñeyāny eva suprajñapakāni. svārthe kaḥ. paryāye dvayaṃ caitat. sudarśakāni suprajñapakānīti. adhiṣṭhānata iti. karmapatho
T07yabhkvyu:8502: ekasya mṛṣāvādaḥ karmapatho 'dhiṣṭhānaṃ. paṃcamasya prāṇātipātaprayogo 'dhiṣṭhānaṃ. evam adhiṣṭhānataḥ sudarśakāni. suprajñapakāni. phalataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8504: upapadyavedanīyatvāt. pudgalataḥ. gariṣṭhakleśasamudācārāt suprajñātaḥ pudgalaḥ. ayaṃ pitṛghātakaḥ. yāvad ayaṃ tathāgataśarīre
T07yabhkvyu:8510: strīpuṃsau. na ṣaṇḍhaḥ paṇḍako vā. ity evaṃ paṃcabhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sudarśakāni suprajñapakāni. na tu punas tāny apāyādiniyatāni karmāṇi paṃcabhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sudarśakāni suprajñapakānīti. na tāny uktāni. uttarottarāvāhanād
T07yabhkvyu:8513: sarvapāpiṣṭhaṃ. tataḥ karmāvaraṇaṃ laghu. tato vipākāvaraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8514: vipākāvaraṇasya hi dṛṣṭa eva dharme vyāpāraḥ. na dvitīya iti. yasya dharmasya yogāt pitṛvadhādeḥ so 'naṃtaro bhavati. tasyābhidhāne
T07yabhkvyu:8515: bhāvapratyayaḥ. ānaṃtaryam iti. śrāmaṇyavat. yathā yenānāsraveṇa mārgeṇa
T07yabhkvyu:8519: (IV.98) nottarakurāv iti. niyatāyuṣkatvāt. prakṛtiśīlatvāt. tatra śāsanabhāvāc ca. yad evāsaṃvarabhāve kāraṇam iti. pāpe 'py
T07yabhkvyu:8522: ṣaṇḍhādīnāṃ na bhavatīti. [Tib. 88a] yadvipādanād iti. yasya hrīvyapatrāpyasya vipādanād vikopanād ānaṃtaryeṇa spṛśyeran ṣaṇḍhādayaḥ. tat teṣāṃ mātāpitror aṃtike na tīvraṃ bhavati. ity atas teṣām ānaṃtaryaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8524: yadi vikalātmabhāvahetutvād alpopakāratvam iti. atas teṣām ānaṃtaryaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8525: neṣyate. jātyandhādīnām api strīpuṃsānāṃ mātrādivadhād ānaṃtaryaṃ na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8526: na. adhigamadharmaviruddhasyātmabhāvavaikalyasya vivakṣitatvāt. yad vaikalyam adhigamadharmavirodhi. tad adhikṛtaṃ tenaiva ca
T07yabhkvyu:8527: mātrālpasnehatvaṃ. na jātyandhādivaikalyena. ata eva tiryakpretānām api
T07yabhkvyu:8530: eva. aśvājāneyavad iti. paṭubuddhīnāṃ syād ānaṃtaryaṃ tiryakpretānām apīty adhikṛtaṃ. aśvājāneyavad iti. śrūyate yathā kaścid eva viśiṣṭāśva ājāneyo
T07yabhkvyu:8531: mātaraṃ na gacchatīti. vāsasā mukhaṃ pracchādya mātaraṃ gamitas tena
T07yabhkvyu:8532: paścāt jñātvā svam aṃgajātam utpāṭitam iti. evam ājāneyo 'śvaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:8533: paṭubuddhiḥ. asyānaṃtaryaṃ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ. manuṣyasyāpy amānuṣaṃ mātāpitaraṃ mārayato na syād ānaṃtaryaṃ. naiva bhaved ānaṃtaryam ity
T07yabhkvyu:8536: eva. na hi manuṣyānurūpam upakāram amanuṣyaḥ kartuṃ samarthaḥ [Tib. 88b]
T07yabhkvyu:8537: na ca manuṣyasyāmanuṣyayor mātāpitror aṃtike tīvraṃ hrīvyapatrāpyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8539: (IV.99) catvāri kāyakarmeti. mātṛvadhādīni. ekaṃ vākkarmeti. saṃghabhedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8540: trīṇi prāṇātipāta iti. mātṛvadhādīni. ekaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ. saṃghabhedaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:8541: (Abhidh-k-vy 427). ekaṃ prāṇātipātaprayogaḥ. tathāgataśarīre duṣṭacittarudhirotpādanaṃ kasmān na prāṇātipāta ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:8542: anupakramadharmāṇo hi tathāgatā iti. aparopakramamaraṇadharmāṇa ity arthaḥ. hetau phalopacārād iti. mṛṣāvādo hetuḥ saṃghabhedasya
T07yabhkvyu:8543: cittaviprayuktalakṣaṇasya. tasmin hetau phalopacāraḥ. cittaviprayukto dharmaḥ phalam upacaryate. saṃghabheda iti. bhidyate. vāneneti.
T07yabhkvyu:8544: karaṇasādhanaparigrahād vā mṛṣāvādaḥ saṃghabheda ity ucyate. mṛṣāvādena hi saṃgho bhidyate. na tu saṃghabheda iti bhāvasādhanaparigrahaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8548: iti. sa kim ānaṃtaryaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. naivāsāv evaṃlakṣaṇam ānaṃtaryaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8549: bhavatīty arthaḥ. naiva ca tena viprayuktena dharmeṇa bhettā samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8551: (IV.101) [Tib. 89a] sa punar mṛṣāvādaḥ saṃghabhedasahajo viprayuktadharmasahajo vāgvijñaptyavijñaptisvabhāva ity arthaḥ.

T07yabhkvyu:8600: abhiṣicya pravrajitaḥ. pravrajyārhattvaṃ adhigatavān. sa raurukābhyāśam āgatavān. punā rājyam ākāṃkṣatīti. amātyaprakrāmitena tena śikhaṇḍinā

T07yabhkvyu:8699: iti. paṃca skaṃdhāḥ. kāyavāgvijñaptis tad avijñaptir api vā rūpaskaṃdho
T07yabhkvyu:8700: draṣṭavyaḥ. svabhāve caiṣa mayad iti. na vikārādiṣu. tadyathā tṛṇamayaṃ gṛham iti. na tṛṇānāṃ vikāro 'sti. tais tu nirvikārair eva tat kṛtam ity atas tṛṇamayaṃ tṛṇasvabhāvaṃ tad iti gamyate. tatsvābhāvye 'pi sati.
T07yabhkvyu:8701: tadvikāratāṃ parikalpya mayat kriyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. tatprakṛtivacane mayad ity anena vā lakṣaṇena mayad vidhīyate. evaṃ parṇamayaṃ bhājanam ity etad api vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8702: (IV.118ab) sthāpayitvā dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyam iti. tad ubhayārtham iti kṛtvā
T07yabhkvyu:8703: sthāpyate. tad vipākabhūmer [Tib. 95b] atyaṃtasamatikrāṃtatvāt. kāmadhātor atyaṃtasamatikrāṃtatvād ity arthaḥ. kāmadhātur hi dānasya vipākabhūmir
T07yabhkvyu:8706: tyāgaprajñālpecchatādiguṇayuktaḥ. satkṛtyādi dadātīti. satkṛtyety ādir asyeti satkṛtyādi. kriyāviśeṣaṇam etat. yathākramaṃ catvāro viśeṣā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8707: sātkṛtyadātā satkāralābhī bhavati. svahastadātā udārebhyo bhogebhyo ruciṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8708: labhate. kāladātā kāle bhogāl labhate. nātikrāṃtakālāt. yān na bhoktum
T07yabhkvyu:8710: (IV.120) ṛtusukhasparśāni cāsyāṃgānīti. śīte uṣṇāni. uṣṇe śītāni.
T07yabhkvyu:8713: yathāsūtram uktam etat. yathā mātāpitror iti. upakāritvaviśeṣāt kārāpakārau mahāphalau tayor bhavata ity artho 'vagaṃtavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8714: ṛkṣamṛgajātakādyudāharaṇāt vipāka iti. evaṃ ṛkṣamṛgayor guhāṃ praveśya gātroṣmaśītopanayenohyamānanadyuttāraṇena vopakāriṇor apakārakaraṇena sadyo 'ṃgapātāt. [Tib. 96a] ādiśabdena kapijātakādy udāhāryaṃ. śīlavate dattvā śatasahasraguṇo vipāka ity evamādīti. ādiśabdena srotaāpattiphalapratipannakāya dattvā aprameyo bhavati vipākas tato
T07yabhkvyu:8716: (IV.121cd) tat sthāpayitveti. anaṃtaroktaṃ bodhisattvadānaṃ. tad dhi samyaksaṃbodhyarthaṃ sarvasattvārthaṃ ca. śeṣaṃ sugamatvān na vibhaktam
T07yabhkvyu:8717: iti. yad etad adān me dānam ity evamādikaṃ. adān me dānam iti. dattam anena me (Abhidh-k-vy 435) pūrvam iti dānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ. dāsyati me dānam iti
T07yabhkvyu:8718: caturthaṃ. dattapūrvaṃ me pitṛbhiś ca pitāmahaiś ceti dānam iti paṃcamaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8719: svargārthaṃ dānam ṣaṣṭhaṃ. kīrtyarthaṃ saptamaṃ. cittālaṃkārārthaṃ yāvad uttamārthasya prāptaye dānam ity aṣṭamaṃ. cittālaṃkārārthaṃ ṛddhyarthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8722: nirvāṇasya vā prāptiḥ. tasmai prāptaye dānaṃ. caturbhedam apy ekam aṣṭamaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8723: bhavati. nirvāṇaprāpakam evaitad iti kṛtvā. sugamam uktam ācāryeṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:8725: gatiduḥkhopakāriguṇakṣetre katamasmin pakṣa iti. yasmād asya gatikṣetratā
T07yabhkvyu:8726: guṇakṣetratā ca na saṃbhavati tasmāt pṛcchati. samaviṣamasya prakāśayiteti dharmadharmasya.
T07yabhkvyu:8727: (IV.123) vipākanaiyamyāvasthānād iti. niyatavipākadānāvasthānād ity arthaḥ. kasyacit kṣetravaśenaiveti. tadyathā. sāmānyapuruṣavadhāt
T07yabhkvyu:8728: pitṛvadhaḥ. tatraiva kṣetre punar adhiṣṭhānavaśād iti. karmapathavaśāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8729: katham ity āha. mātāpitroḥ prāṇātipātanāt guru karma na tv evam adattādikāt guru. na hi mātāpitror dravyāpaharaṇakarma tadvadhavat guru
T07yabhkvyu:8730: bhavati. tadvadhasyānaṃtaryasvabhāvatvād ādiśabdena mṛṣāvādapaiśunyādigrahaṇaṃ. evam anyad api yojyam iti. kasyacit prayogaviśeṣeṇa guru sampadyate vipākanaiyamyāvasthānāt. kasyacic
T07yabhkvyu:8732: (IV.124) nābuddhipūrvaṃ na sahasā kṛtam iti. atha vā nābuddhipūrvaṃ kṛtam idaṃ kuryām ity asaṃciṃtya kṛtaṃ. tan nopacitam. avyākṛtaṃ hi tat karma.
T07yabhkvyu:8733: na sahasā kṛtam iti. buddhipūrvam api na sahasā kṛtaṃ. yad abhyāsena bhāṣyākṣepān mṛṣāvādādyanuṣṭhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tad akuśalaṃ [Tib. 97a] na punar upacitaṃ. yāvat tribhir iti. kāyavāṅmanoduścaritaiḥ. niṣpratipakṣaṃ ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:8734: pratideśanādipratipakṣābhāvataḥ. akuśalaṃ cākuśalaparicāraṃ ceti. yaḥ kṛtvāpy anumodata iti. vipākadāne niyatam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8735: puṣṭākuśalalakṣaṇasamutpādāt. evaṃ kuśalam api yojyam iti. kathaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8736: saṃcetanataḥ saṃciṃtya kṛtaṃ bhavati. nābuddhipūrvakṛtaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:8737: tadyathā. avyākṛtena cittena pāṣāṇaṃ dadāmīti suvarṇapiṇḍaṃ dadyāt. kṛtaṃ tan na punar upacitaṃ. avyākṛtaṃ hi tat karma. na sahasā kṛtaṃ. yathā bhāṣyākṣepāt satyavacanaṃ kṛtaṃ tat kuśalaṃ na punar upacitaṃ. kaścid ekena sucaritena sugatiṃ yāti. kaścid yāvat tribhiḥ. kaścid ekena karmapathena. kaścid yāvad daśabhiḥ. tatra yo yāvatā gacchati. tasminn asamāpte kṛtaṃ karma nopacitaṃ. samāpte tūpacitaṃ. evaṃ yāvad vipākadāne
T07yabhkvyu:8742: atra. puṇyam eva tyāgānvayam apaśyann āha. kasyacid apy anugrahābhāvād.
T07yabhkvyu:8743: iti. sati hi pratigrahītari yuktaṃ tyāgānvayaṃ puṇyaṃ. tatra hi prītyanugraheṇa [Tib. 97b] grahītā yujyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8745: maitryādiṣv iva maitryādivat. agṛhṇati asati pratigrāhake puṇyaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:8746: asaty api parānugrahe. kuśalamūlādibalādhānāt. tathā hy atīte pi puṇavati tathāgatādau. tad bhaktikṛtaṃ caityadānaṃ puṇyaṃ bhavati. dānamānakriyā tarhi vyarthā prāpnotīti. yadi svacittād eva puṇyaṃ bhavec cittenaiva
T07yabhkvyu:8747: dānamānāv anuṣṭheyau. tata eva puṇyaprāpteḥ. na. tatkarmasamutthāpikāyā bhakteḥ prakṛṣṭataratvāt. naitad evaṃ. kasmāt. yasmād dānamānau bhagavataś
T07yabhkvyu:8748: cittamātreṇa ciṃtayato yā bhaktiḥ. tata iyaṃ dānamānau kurvato bhaktiḥ prakṛṣṭatarā. kāyavākkarmaṇor api pravartanāt. cittamātreṇa hi cintayato
T07yabhkvyu:8749: bhaktiḥ kāyavākkarmaṇī na pravartayataḥ. yathā hīti vistaraḥ. yathā hi śatruṃ hanmīti kṛtābhiprāyasya kasyacit tatsamutthitaṃ tadabhiprāyasamutthitaṃ kāyavākkarma śatrusaṃjñayā śatrur ayaṃ na tāvan mriyata ity anayā saṃjñayā tasmin mṛte 'pi kurvato bahutaram apuṇyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8750: jāyate cetanānubaṃdhāt. nābhiprāyamātreṇa kriyāśūnyena. tathā hy atīte 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:8752: dānamānakriyāṃ pṛṣṭhabhūtām iva kurvato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ jāyate. na bhaktimātreṇa kriyāśūnyeneti.
T07yabhkvyu:8754: taskarādibhyo dānam āniṣṭaphalam iti nirgraṃthāḥ. sukṣetre hīṣṭaphalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8755: kukṣetre tu viparītam ity ato bravīti.
T07yabhkvyu:8757: iti. na kṣetraviśeṣād iṣṭaṃ phalam iti brūmaḥ. kiṃ tarhi. viśiṣṭam iti. na hi sukṣetre prāṇatipātādibījasyeṣṭaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti. kukṣetre 'pi hi phalasya mṛdvīkāphalasya bījāt mṛdvīkābījād. aviparyayo dṛṣṭaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8758: mṛdvīkāphalam eva madhuraṃ dṛṣṭam ity arthaḥ. na tu niṃbaphalam evaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8759: niṃbabījān niṃbaphalam eveti. tiktam iti. mṛdvīkābījaṃ kuśalasyodāharaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8765: prajñaptisāvadyatvāt. samāttaśikṣasya tu tadadhyācārād dauḥśīlyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8766: gṛhītatadviramaṇasya bhagavadvacanānādarād dauḥśīlyaṃ jāyate. arthād uktaṃ bhavati. asamāttaśikṣasya na duḥśīlyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8768: iti. catvāro guṇā asyeti caturguṇaṃ. dauḥśīlyena yathokteneti.
T07yabhkvyu:8769: dauḥśīlyam aśubhaṃ rūpam ity anena. [Tib. 98b] lobhādibhir iti. na tair dauḥśīlyahetubhiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:8770: samudācaradbhir upahataṃ bhavati. dauḥśīlyavipakṣāśritam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8771: maulaiḥ karmapathair viśuddham iti. prāṇatipātādibhir maulair akhaṇḍitam
T07yabhkvyu:8772: ity arthaḥ. sāmaṃtakair viśuddham iti. prāṇātipātādiprayogair adūṣitam ity
T07yabhkvyu:8773: arthaḥ. vitarkair iti. kāmavitarkādibhiḥ. smṛtyānuparigṛhītam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8775: āśāstiśīlam iti. āśāstiḥ prārthanā. yad bhavabhogasatkāratṛṣṇākṛtam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8776: bhave bhoge ca satkāre ca yā tṛṣṇā. tayā yat samāttam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8777: samyagdṛṣṭikānām iti. buddhaśāsanapratipannānāṃ. anyatīrthikānāṃ hi na
T07yabhkvyu:8781: samāhitāsvādanāsaṃprayuktakliṣṭadhyānanivṛttyarthaṃ. tat samāhitakuśalasadṛśam utpadyate. samādhisvabhāvasahabhū yad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8782: samādhisvabhāvaṃ tena ca saha bhavati yad ity arthaḥ. tad dhi samāhitam
T07yabhkvyu:8783: [Tib. 99a] iti vistaraḥ. tat samāhitaṃ kuśalam atyarthaṃ cittaṃ saṃvāsayati. bhāvayati. asamāhitam api vāsayati. na tv evam atyartham iti darśayati. katham ity āha. guṇais tanmayīkaraṇāt saṃtateḥ. yasmāt samādhiguṇais tanmayī kriyate cittasaṃtatiḥ. atra dṛṣṭāṃtam āha. puṣpais tilavāsanāvad iti. yathā puṣpais tilā bhāvyaṃte. puṣpagaṃdhamayīkaraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8784: tadvat. tad idam uktaṃ bhavati. bhāvanā vāsanā. tatsvabhāvaṃ puṇyaṃ bhāvanāmayam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8785: (IV.127cd) atha śīlaṃ bhāvanā ca kasmai saṃvartata iti vākyaśeṣato 'rthaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8788: iti. śīlaṃ prādhānyena svargāya bhavati. anyat tu na prādhānyena svargāya bhavati. kim anyat. dānaṃ. dānam api hi svargāya saṃbhavati. śīlam api (Abhidh-k-vy 438) visaṃyogāya saṃbhavati. śamathavipaśyanayoḥ
T07yabhkvyu:8792: (IV.128ab) sūtra uktaṃ. catvāraḥ pudgalāḥ brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:8793: apratiṣṭhite pṛthivīpradeśe tathāgatasya śārīraṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati.
T07yabhkvyu:8794: ayaṃ prathamaḥ pudgalo brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. cāturdeśe bhikṣusaṃghe ārāmaṃ niryātayati tatraiva cārāme vihāraṃ [Tib. 99b] pratiṣṭhāpayati.
T07yabhkvyu:8795: ayaṃ dvitīyaḥ pudgalo brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. bhinnaṃ tathāgataśrāvakasaṃghaṃ pratisaṃdadhāti. ayaṃ tṛtīyaḥ pudgalo brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. maitrīsahagatena cittenāvaireṇāsaṃspardhenāvyābādhena vipulena mahadgatenāpramāṇena subhāvitenaikāṃ diśam adhimucya spharitvopasaṃpadya viharati. tathā dvitīyāṃ. tathā tṛtīyāṃ. tathā
T07yabhkvyu:8796: caturthīm. ity ūrdhvam adhas tiryak sarvataḥ sarvam imaṃ lokaṃ spharitvopasaṃpadya viharati. ayaṃ caturthaḥ pudgalo brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavatīti. yal lakṣaṇavipākasya karmaṇaḥ parimāṇajñāpanāyoktam iti. yad uktaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭaṃ bodhisattvaṃ sthāpayitvā. yāvatsarvasattvānāṃ bhogaphalam ity evamādi.
T07yabhkvyu:8797: idaṃ brāhmaṃ puṇyam iti. brahmaṇām idaṃ brāhmaṃ. brahmapurohitāś cātra brahmaśabdenocyate. kasmāt. brahmapurohitānāṃ kalpāyuṣkatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8798: brahmapurohitānāṃ hi kalpam āyur uktaṃ. anena ca karmaṇā kalpaṃ svargeṣu modate.
T07yabhkvyu:8799: brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. kalpaṃ svargeṣu modata
T07yabhkvyu:8800: iti. nikāyāṃtarapāṭhavacanāt. tatsādharmyād etad brāhmaṃ puṇyam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8801: nanu ca kāmadhātau nāsti kuśalasya karṃaṇaḥ kalpaṃ vipāka iti. satyam ekasya nāsti. [Tib. 100a] ekādhiṣṭhānās tu bahvyaś cātanā bhavaṃti. yāsāṃ krameṇa kalpapramāṇaṃ svārgikaṃ phalam abhinirvartate. cyutasya punas tatraiva janmasaṃdhānāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8807: (IV.129) puṇyabhāgīyam iti. puṇyasya bhāgaḥ prāptir iti puṇyabhāgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8808: iṣṭaphalaprāptir (Abhidh-k-vy 439) ity arthaḥ. tasmai hitaṃ puṇyabhāgīyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8809: ata evoktaṃ yad iṣṭavipākam iti. tatprāptyanukūlam iti. atha vā trayo
T07yabhkvyu:8810: bhāgāḥ. puṇyo bhāgaḥ apuṇyo bhāgaḥ aniṃjyo bhāgaḥ. tasmai hitaṃ puṇyabhāgīyaṃ. atha vā puṇyaṃ bhajata iti puṇyabhāk. puṇyabhāg eva puṇyabhāgīyaṃ. svārthe kapratyayaḥ. evaṃ mokṣabhāgīyaṃ. atha vā saṃsārabhāgo mokṣabhāgaś ceti dvau bhāgau. [Tib. 100b] tatra yan mokṣabhāgāya hitaṃ. tan mokṣabhāgīyaṃ. mokṣaprāptir vā mokṣabhāgaḥ. tasmai
T07yabhkvyu:8811: hitaṃ. tatprāptyanukūlam iti mokṣabhāgīyaṃ. tasya lakṣaṇaṃ paścād
T07yabhkvyu:8812: vakṣyate. evaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyam api yojyaṃ. paścād vyākhyāsyāma iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8813: tata uṣmagatotpattir ity atra. karmādhikāreṇaiṣāṃ karmasvabhāvānāṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8816: iti. sacittacaitasikakalāpaṃ. yena tat kāyakarmotthāpyate. tat kāyakarma sasamutthānaṃ yogapravartitaṃ. lipir mudrā ca. kāraṇe kāryopacārāt. yena hi kāyakarmaṇā lipir likhyate mudrā vā khanyate. sā lipir mudrā sa śāstre 'bhiprete. na yathā loke. hy akṣaracihnaṃ pustakādau lipir iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:8817: akṣarānakṣaracihnaṃ ca mudreti. gaṇanā kāvyaṃ ca vākkarma. yogapravartitaṃ sasamutthānam iti vartate. paṃcaskaṃdhasvabhāvānīti. lipimudrayoḥ kāyakarma rūpaskaṃdhaḥ. gaṇanākāvyayor vākkarma rūpaskaṃdhaḥ. vedanādayas tūbhayatrāpi samutthānabhūtāś catvāraḥ skaṃdhā iti. paṃcaskaṃdhasvabhāvāny etāni bhavaṃti. yan manasā saṃkalanaṃ dharmāṇām iti. ekaṃ dve trīṇīty
T07yabhkvyu:8818: evamādi sā saṃkhyā. [Tib. 101a] yat tu vācā na manasā sā gaṇanety
T07yabhkvyu:8819: ābhidhārmikāḥ. iyaṃ ca saṃkhyā saparivāragrahaṇāc catuskaṃdhasvabhāvā.
T07yabhkvyu:8822: tatpratyāsanneyam iti. ime paryāyā upanyasyaṃta ity aparaḥ saṃbaṃdhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8826: kleśā api hi saṃprayogiṇā kleśāṃtareṇa nivṛtāḥ. niṣkṛṣṭatvād āryais tyaktatvād vā
T07yabhkvyu:8833: śuddhiprakarṣagatatvāt. hīnapraṇītebhyo 'nye madhyā iti siddham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8834: kliṣṭā eva hīnāḥ. śubhāmalā eva ca praṇītā ity avadhāraṇād ato 'nye na
T07yabhkvyu:8835: hīnāḥ. na praṇītā iti madhyāḥ siddhāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8837: iti. aviśeṣeṇa sāsravā anāsravā vā sevitavyāḥ. paryupāsitavyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8838: saṃtānādhyā ropaṇataḥ. śeṣā asevitavyā iti. ke śeṣā. asaṃskṛtāś ca. ye ca na kuśalāḥ. kliṣṭā [Tib. 101b] nivṛtāvyākṛtā ity arthaḥ. anabhyasanīyatvād
T07yabhkvyu:8839: iti. paunaḥpunyena kartum aśakyatvād ity arthaḥ. anutpādyatvād ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:8840: aphalatvāc ceti. saṃskṛtasya hi hetuphale. nāsaṃskṛtasya te iti. sottarā iti sātiśayāḥ. akuśalāḥ nivṛtāvyākṛtaiḥ sottarāḥ. nivṛtāvyākṛtānām
T07yabhkvyu:8842: teṣām akliṣṭatvāt. te 'pi kuśalasāsravaiḥ sottarāḥ kuśalasāsravāṇām
T07yabhkvyu:8843: iṣṭaphalatvāt. te 'py anāsravais sottarāḥ. nihkleśatvāt. anāsravā api saṃskṛtā asaṃskṛtaiḥ sottarāḥ. asaṃskṛtānāṃ nityatvāt. asaṃskṛtāv apy ākāśapratisaṃkhyānirodhau pratisaṃkhyānirodhena sottarau.
T07yabhkvyu:8846: na hi nirvāṇād viśiṣṭatamam asti. tathā hy uktaṃ ye kecid bhikṣavo dharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā virāgas teṣāṃ agra ākhyāyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8847: pratisaṃkhyānirodho hi nityatvāt sarvasaṃskṛtebhya utkṛṣṭaḥ. kuśalatvāc cāsaṃskṛtābhyām ākāśapratisaṃkhyānirodhābhyām [Tib. 102a] utkṛṣṭatara iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8852: ity uktam iti. caturthasyādāv uktaṃ. ato 'nena saṃbaṃdhenānuśayopanyāsa iti saṃbandhaṃ darśayati. tāni ca karmāṇi yathoktalakṣaṇaprabhedāni anuśayavaśād upacayaṃ gacchaṃti. vipākanaiyamyenātra uttiṣṭhaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:8853: vipākadānāya niyatībhavaṃtīty arthaḥ. aṃtareṇa cānuśayān vinānuśayair
T07yabhkvyu:8854: bhavasya janmano 'bhinirvartane utpādane na samarthāni bhavaṃti kuśalāny akuśalāni vā karmāṇi. na hy arhataḥ paunarbhavikāni karmāṇy aniyatāni na
T07yabhkvyu:8855: saṃti. anuśayābhāvāt tu punarbhavābhinirvartane na samarthāni bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:8856: ata evaiṣām aniyatatvaṃ sidhyati. hy arthe cāyaṃ caḥ paṭhitavyaḥ. yasmād aṃtareṇānuśayān bhavābhinirvartane na samarthāni bhavaṃti. tasmād anuśayavaśād upacayaṃ gacchaṃtīty abhiprāyaḥ. apare punar etad vākyadvayam evaṃ vyācakṣate. tāni ca karmāṇy anuśayavaśād upacayaṃ gacchaṃti. yāny akṛtāni karmāṇi. tāny anuśayavaśāt punarbhavābhinirvartana upacīyaṃta ity arthaḥ. na hy arhatāṃ karmāṇi punarbhavābhinirvartana upacīyaṃte. aṃtareṇa cānuśayāṃ bhavābhinirvartane na samarthāni bhavaṃtīti. yāni ca kṛtāni.
T07yabhkvyu:8857: tāny apy aṃtareṇānuśayāṃ bhavābhinirvartane na śaktāni bhavaṃti. na hy arhatāṃ pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ kṛtāni [Tib. 102b] kuśalākuśalāni paunarbhavikāny aniyatāni karmāṇi na saṃti. anuśayavaikalyāt tu tāni
T07yabhkvyu:8858: bhavābhinirvartane na samarthāni. ity evaṃ pṛthagarthābhidhānāt. samuccaye
T07yabhkvyu:8861: iti. punarbhavasya karmabhavasya vā mūlam anuśayāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8862: tadupacayasamutthānahetutvād ity abhiprāyaḥ. mūlaṃ dṛḍhīkarotīti. prāptir hi mūlaṃ. tām anucchedārthena dṛḍhīkarotīty arthaḥ. saṃtatim
T07yabhkvyu:8863: avasthāpayatīti. paraṃparayā kleśaprabaṃdhaṃ sthāpayatīty arthaḥ. kṣetraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8865: niṣyandaṃ nirvartayatīti. svaniṣyandam upakleśaṃ janayati. tadyathā rāga āhrīkyauddhatyamatsarān janayati. dveṣaḥ krodherṣye ityādi. karmabhavam
T07yabhkvyu:8866: abhinirharatīti. karmaiva bhavaḥ karmabhavaḥ. taṃ punarbhavābhinirvṛttaye janayatīty arthaḥ. idam asya
T07yabhkvyu:8867: mūlaṃ bhavasyānuśayā ity arthasaṃdarśanaṃ. svasaṃbhāraṃ parigṛhṇātīti. svasaṃbhāraḥ
T07yabhkvyu:8868: kleśasyāyoniśomanaskāraḥ. taṃ parigṛhṇāti. tasyānāgatasya hetubhāvenāvatiṣṭhata ity arthaḥ. ālaṃbane saṃmohayatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:8870: namayatīti. vijñānasaṃtatim [Tib. 103a] ālaṃbane punarbhave vā namayati.
T07yabhkvyu:8871: yadi mūlaṃ bhavasyeti punarbhavagrahaṇam idam asyodāharaṇaṃ. kuśalapakṣād vyutkramayatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:8872: kuśalapakṣāt parihāpayati. bandhanārthaṃ ca spharati. bandhanakāryaṃ vyāpnoti tanotīty arthaḥ. katham ity āha. dhātvanatikramaṇayogena dhātvanatikamaṇaprakāreṇety arthaḥ. tad idam uktaṃ bhavati. yaḥ kleśo yaddhātukaḥ sa taṃ dhātuṃ nātikrāmayatīti. ṣoḍaśety anyaḥ. eṣu ṣaṭ prakṣipya. āśrayadauṣṭhulyaṃ janayaty akarmaṇyatāpādanāt. guṇān dveṭti tadvirodhitvāt. apavādānām āspadīkaroti vidvadvigarhitakāyakarmotthāpanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8875: ādhipatyaphalena ca lokasyāniṣṭam upasaṃharati tadvegena bāhyabhāvavikārāpatteḥ. rāgavaśenānyeṣām apīti. yatra rāgaḥ. tatrālaṃbane
T07yabhkvyu:8876: 'nye pratighādayo 'py anuśerate. premād dveṣo jāyate mānādayo 'pīti
T07yabhkvyu:8877: sūtraṃ. ata eva ca rāgānuśayanābhāvād anāsravavisabhāgadhātvoḥ kleśā
T07yabhkvyu:8878: nānuśerata iti. etac ca paścāt pravedayiṣyāma iti. yad dhi vastv
T07yabhkvyu:8879: ātmadṛṣṭitṛṣṇābhyāṃ svīkṛtaṃ. tatrānye 'py anuśayā anuśayitum utahaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:8880: ārdra iva paṭe rajāṃsi saṃsthātum ity etat jñāpayiṣyāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8881: (V.2) āhosvit kāmarāga evānuśaya iti. vaibhāṣikanayena paryavasthānam evānuśayaḥ. vātsīputrīyanayena prāptir anuśayaḥ. sautrāṃtikanayena bījam.
T07yabhkvyu:8882: uttaraniḥsaraṇam iti. paścānniḥsaraṇam ity arthaḥ. sthāmaśaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:8883: susamavahataṃ. (Abhidh-k-vy 443) balaśaḥ suṣṭhu samyag avahatam ity arthaḥ. sānuśayaṃ prahīyata iti. idam atrodāharaṇaṃ. [Tib. 103b] idam atra virudhyate. sahayogasamāse hy anyatvam dṛṣṭaṃ. tadyathā saputro devadatta
T07yabhkvyu:8884: iti. tathā ca sati sūtravirodhaḥ. abhidharmavirodha iti. kāmarāgānuśayas tribhir indriyaiḥ saṃprayuktaḥ. katamais tribhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8885: sukhasaumanasyopekṣendriyaiḥ saṃprayukta iti. na hi viprayuktasya
T07yabhkvyu:8886: prāptilakṣaṇasya ebhir indriyaiḥ saṃprayogo yujyata iti śāstravirodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8887: sānuśyaṃ sānubandham ity arthād iti. kāmarāgasyānubandho
T07yabhkvyu:8889: anuvṛttir vā anuśayaḥ. sānuśayaṃ prahīyate. na punar anuvartate saṃkleśa ity arthaḥ. aupacāriko vā sūtre 'nuśayaśabdaḥ upacāre bhava aupacārikaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8890: kutr'; aupacārika ity āha. prāptau. mukhyavṛttyā paryavasthāne 'nuśayaśabdo vartate. upācāreṇa tu prāptau. tasyānuśayahetubhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8891: tadyathā duḥkhavedanāhetutvāt agnir duḥkha ity ucyate. tadvat. lākṣaṇikas tv abhidharme 'nuśayaśabdaḥ. lakṣaṇe bhavo lakṣaṇena vā dīpyati [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:8892: 104a] lākṣaṇikaḥ. lākṣaṇika ity āha. kleśa eveti. ālaṃbnasaṃprayogataś cānuśerata ity anuśayā iti. tasmāt saṃprayuktā evānuśayāḥ. atra cārthe ślokam udāharaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:8893: cittakleśakaratvād āvaraṇatvāc chubhair viruddhatvāt kuśalasya copalaṃbhād aviprayuktā ihānuśayā
T07yabhkvyu:8894: iti. cittakleśakaratvād iti. asya vivaraṇaṃ. yasmād anuśayaiḥ kliṣṭaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8895: cittaṃ bhavati. na viprayuktaiḥ kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ bhavati. āvaraṇatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8896: asya padasya vivaraṇaṃ. apūrvaṃ kuśalaṃ notpadyata iti. sānuśaye citte kuśalam apūrvaṃ notpadyate. śubhair viruddhatvād iti. asya padasya vivaraṇaṃ. utpannāc ca parihīyata iti. anuśayāḥ śubhair viruddhāḥ. yasmād utpannāt kuśalāt parihīyate. tasmāt kuśalair viruddhā anuśayāḥ. tasmān na viprayuktā iti. yasmāc cetasy avidyamānais tair yathoktakliṣṭādi na
T07yabhkvyu:8897: saṃbhavati. saṃprayuktaiḥ punaḥ sarvam etad yujyata iti. atha viprayuktair apy evaṃ syād iti. viprayuktaiḥ kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ bhavati. apūrvaṃ kuśalaṃ notpadyate. utpannāc ca parihīyata iti. yady evaṃ kuśalaṃ na kadācid apy
T07yabhkvyu:8898: upalabhyeta. teṣāṃ viprayuktānāṃ nityasaṃnihitatvāt. [Tib. 104b] yasmāt kliṣṭāvasthāyāṃ kuśalāvasthāyāṃ anyasyāṃ vā te viprayuktā vartaṃta iti
T07yabhkvyu:8899: upalabhyeta ca kuśalam. ataḥ kuśalasya copalaṃbhād aviprayuktā ihānuśayā
T07yabhkvyu:8902: ācārya āha: tad idam ajñāpakaṃ. yad idaṃ vaibhāṣikair uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8903: cittakleśakaratvād ityādi. yo hi viprayuktam anuśayam icchatīti vātsīputrīyaḥ. sarvam etad iti. cittakleśādi. kleśakṛtam evecchatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:8904: paryavasthānakṛtam evety arthaḥ. paryavasthānaṃ ca na nityasaṃnihitaṃ bhavatīti kuśalopalaṃbhasiddhiḥ. kāmarāgasyānuśaya iti pakṣaparigrahe
T07yabhkvyu:8905: sānuśayaṃ prahīyata iti nāsti sūtravirodhaḥ. kiṃ tu viprayukto 'nuśaya iti
T07yabhkvyu:8906: prāpnoti. ata āha. na cānuśayaḥ saṃprayukto na viprayukta iti. katham ity āha. tasyādravyāntaratvād iti. śaktirūpasya bījasya rāgādibhyo
T07yabhkvyu:8908: kleśotpādanaśaktiḥ kleśotpādanāya [Tib. 105a] śaktiḥ. yathānubhavajñānajā sṃṛtyutpādanaśaktir na dravyāṃtarabhūtā. tadvat. smṛtyutpādanahetur dravyāṃtarabhūtaḥ kaścid viprayukta ity āśaṃkya dṛṣṭāntāṃtaram
T07yabhkvyu:8909: upanyasyati. yathā cāṃkurādīnām iti vistaraḥ. yathā cāṃkurādīnāṃ pūrvotpannā śāliphalajā śāliphalāṃtarotpādanāya śaktir na dravyāṃtarabhūtā. tadvat. yas tv iti. vātsīputrīyaḥ. yadi kleśasyānuśaya itīsyate. yat tarhi sūtra eva kleśo 'nuśaya uktaḥ ṣaṭṣaṭke sūtre. 'sya
T07yabhkvyu:8910: pudgalasya bhavati sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśaya iti. rāga evānuśayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8911: sukhavedanāvasthāyāṃ hi rāgaḥ samudācaraṃn evam uktaḥ. na tu tasya bījam ity abhiprāyaḥ. bhavatīti vacanān nāsau tadaivānuśaya iti. anuśaya eva rāgasyāyam uktaḥ. na rāgaḥ. bhavatīti vacanāt. tasyām avasthāyām utpadyamānasya rāgasyānuśayo bhavatīti. bījam utpadyate. na tūtpannam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8912: bījaprakṛtāvasthātra kathyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. kadā tarhi bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:8913: kadānuśayo 'stīty arthaḥ. yadā prasupto bhavati. yadoparato bhavatīty arthaḥ. hetau vā tadupacāra iti. hetau rāge anuśayopacāraḥ. rāgo hi rāgānuśayasya hetuḥ. tathā hi [Tib. 105b] rāgajā rāgotpādanaśaktī rāgānuśaya ity uktam iti. tad idam uktaṃ bhavati. kvacid anuśayaśabdena bījam ucyate. kvacit paryavasthānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:8914: samāpattirāgo hi teṣāṃ prāyeṇeti. āsvādanāsaṃprayukte dhyāne prāyeṇa teṣāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8915: rāgaḥ. vimānādiṣv api teṣāṃ rāgo 'stīty ataḥ prāyeṇeti grahaṇaṃ. sa cāṃtarmukhapravṛttaḥ samāhitarūpatvāt. tathā ca sati
T07yabhkvyu:8916: mokṣasaṃjñopatiṣṭhate. tadvicchandanārthaṃ bhagavān deśayāmāsa kāmarāgo bhavarāga ity evamādi. (Abhidh-k-vy 445) bhave rāga eṣaḥ. naiṣa mokṣe.
T07yabhkvyu:8917: mokṣe kuśalo dharmacchanda iti. ātmabhāva eva tu bhava ity ācāryamataṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8918: samāpattiṃ sāśrayām iti. samāpāttiṃ sātmabhāvām. āsvādayanta ātmabhāvam evāsvādayaṃti. na kāmaguṇān. kāmavītarāgatvāt. ataḥ sa rāgo bhavarāga ity ukto na kāmarāga iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:8919: (V.3) abhidharma iti. na sūtra ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8920: (V.4, 5) sapta samudayadarśanaheyā iti. satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ phalabhūtān paṃcopādānaskandhān ālaṃbata iti duḥkhadarśanaheyaiva. evam aṃtagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ [Tib. 106a] teṣām eva skandhānāṃ śāśvatocchedāṃtagrahaṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8921: śīlavrataparāmarśo 'pi tān eva skandhāṃ śuddhito muktito nairyāṇikataś
T07yabhkvyu:8922: cālaṃbata iti na samudayadarśanaheyaḥ. evaṃ nirodhadarśanaheyā api yojyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8923: aṣṭau mārgadarśanaheyā iti. śīlavrataparāmarśam adhikaṃ prakṣipya. mārgeṇa
T07yabhkvyu:8924: śudhyati. tam apāsyānyena śīlavratena śuddhiṃ pratyetīti vipratipannatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8925: mārgadarśanaprahātavyo bhavati. yo hi kleśo yasya satyasyāpavādāya pravṛttaḥ. sa tasmin dṛṣṭe prahīyate. sarpabhrāṃtir iva rajjudarśanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8926: satyānāṃ darśanamātreṇa prahāṇād iti. nābhyāsena prahāṇād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8927: dṛṣṭasatyasya paścān mārgābhyāsena prahāṇāt. kim ete bhāvanāheyā ity
T07yabhkvyu:8928: adhikāraḥ. tad evam abhyāso bhāvanā punaḥpunarutpādanam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8930: duḥkhadarśanaheyaiva. evam aṃtagrāhadṛṣṭir iti. asāv apy ātmābhimatasya
T07yabhkvyu:8931: vastunaḥ śāśvatocchedāṃtāropād duḥkha eva vipratipanneti duḥkhadarśanaheyaiva. mithyādṛṣṭiś
T07yabhkvyu:8933: catuḥsatyadarśanaheyā. evaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśo 'pi catuṣprakāra eva. sa hi hīne 'gradarśanaṃ. tatra samudayanirodhamārgapraheyālaṃbanaḥ samudayanirodhamārgadarśanaheyaḥ. śeṣo duḥkhadarśanaheyaḥ. evaṃ vicikitsā sarvatrasaṃśayākāreti sarvatravipratipannatvāc catuḥsatyadarśanaheyā.
T07yabhkvyu:8934: śīlavrataparāmarśo dviṣprakāra iti. īśvarādiṣv ahetuṣu hetugraho
T07yabhkvyu:8935: nityātmaviparyāsāt pravartata iti duḥkhadarśanaheyaḥ. amārge mārgadarśanaṃ mārgadarśanaheyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8936: kīdṛśā eta iti. rāgādayaś catvāraḥ kleśāḥ. paryanuyujyaṃte hi rāgapratighamānāvidyā ity anaṃtarādhikṛtāḥ. te ceme darśanaheyāḥ. ime bhāvanāheyā iti duḥparicchedāḥ. na tu satkāyadṛṣṭyādayaś cityaṃte. ye hi duḥkhasatyavipratipannāḥ. te duḥkhadarśanaheyā iti. evaṃ yāvad ye
T07yabhkvyu:8938: etat. tatra (Abhidh-k-vy 446) ya iti rāgādayaḥ. yasya satyasya darśanaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8939: yaddarśanam. yaddarśanena heyāḥ. ta ālaṃbanam eṣāṃ. ta ime yaddarśanaheyālaṃbanāḥ. te taddarśanaheyāḥ. te rāgādayaḥ. tasya satyasya darśanaṃ taddarśanaṃ. taddarśanena heyās taddarśanaheyāḥ. etad uktaṃ bhavati. ye rāgādayo duḥkhadarśanaheyaṃ yāvan mārgadarśanaheyaṃ kleśam
T07yabhkvyu:8940: ālaṃbaṃte. te taddarśanaheyā iti. yadālaṃbanā yaddarśanaheyālaṃbanāś ceti
T07yabhkvyu:8941: vaktavyaṃ. caturāryasatyālaṃbano 'py avidyānuśayo bhavatīti. na vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:8942: ekaśeṣavidhānasiddheḥ. yac ca satyaṃ yaddaraśanaheyāś ca kleśā ālaṃbanam
T07yabhkvyu:8943: eṣāṃ. ta ime yaddarśaheyālaṃbanāḥ. te taddarśanaheyā iti. nanu ca samudayadarśanaprahātavyaḥ sarvatrago 'vidyānuśayo
T07yabhkvyu:8945: paṃcanikāyālaṃbanatvāt. tataś cāsya duḥkhanirodhādisatyadarśanaheyatvaprasaṃgaḥ syād iti. na doṣaḥ. yady api hi sa paṃcanikāyālaṃbanaḥ samudayarūpākāratas [Tib. 107a] tu tān nikāyān
T07yabhkvyu:8946: ālaṃbate. tena tathālaṃbanataḥ samudayadarśanaprahātavya eva sa iti. evaṃ duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo 'pi saṃyojyaḥ. evaṃ ca sati ye 'pi vyācakṣate. ye yaddarśanaheyālaṃbanā iti sarva eva darśanaheyā adhikriyaṃte na kevalā
T07yabhkvyu:8947: rāgādaya iti. teṣām api vyākhyāne imāv eva codyaparihārau vaktavyau.
T07yabhkvyu:8948: rūpārūpyadhātvor duḥkhābhāvāt pratighābhāvaḥ. duḥkhāyāṃ hi vedanāyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8949: pratigho 'nuśete. sā copari nāstīti. dveṣaś ca rūkṣo vātavyādhivat. te ca sattvāḥ śamathasnigdhasaṃtataya iti. vipākābhāvāc ca. aniṣṭo hy asya
T07yabhkvyu:8950: vipākaḥ. tau dhātau vigatāniṣṭavipākau. āghātavastvabhāvāc ca. na hi tatra
T07yabhkvyu:8954: ātmātmīyadhruvocchedanāstihīnagradṛṣṭaya ity evamādikaḥ. prakārabhedo duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo nikāyo yāvad bhāvanāprahātavya iti. dhātubhedaḥ kāmāvacaraḥ. rūpāvacaraḥ. ārūpyāvacara
T07yabhkvyu:8955: iti. tatra rāgānuśayaḥ prakāradhātubhedābhyāṃ paṃcadaśavidha iti. tasya parasparam ākārabhedo nāsti. sarvo hi rāgaḥ saktyākāraḥ. tasmān nākārabhedena vyavasthāpyate. pratighānuśayaḥ prakārabhedāt paṃcavidhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8961: dvādaśavidhā. tābhyām eva. nākārabhedaḥ. sarvasyāḥ saṃśayākāratvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8962: dṛṣṭyanuśaya ākāraprakāradhātubhedaiḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadvidhaḥ. [evam ete ṣaḍ anuśayā iti vistaraḥ.]
T07yabhkvyu:8965: tadanyabhūmikaviśeṣaṇārthaṃ. na hi laukiko 'sti bhavāgrapratipakṣabhūto bhāvanāmārga iti. śeṣāsu bhūmiṣv iti. kāmadhātau yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmau. yathāyogam iti. kāmadhātau dharmajñānakṣāṃtiheyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8966: tata ūrdhvam avaśiṣṭāsu bhūmiṣv anvayajñānakṣāṃtiheyāḥ. ta ete āryāṇāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8967: darśanaheyās ta eva ca pṛthagjanānāṃ bhāvanāheyāḥ. dvividho hi bhāvanāmārgaḥ. laukiko lokottaraś ca. tathā hi śāstra uktaṃ. bhagavataḥ śrāvako darśanena jahāti. pṛthagjano bhāvanayā jahātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:8970: kāmadhātau yāvad bhavāgre. ye rāgapratighamānāvidyānuśayā yathāyogaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8971: bhavaṃti akṣāṃtivadhyā jñānavadhyāḥ. [Tib. 108a] te ubhayeṣām āryāṇāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8972: pṛthagjanānām ca nityaṃ bhāvanāheyā eva. laukikena lokottareṇa vā
T07yabhkvyu:8973: bhāvanāmārgeṇa. bhavāgre tu lokottareṇaiva. ūrdhvabhūmikasya laukikasya mārgasyābhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8974: naiva hi bāhyakānāṃ darśanaprahātavyāḥ prahīyaṃta iti. bhāvanāprahātavyā eva teṣāṃ viṣkabhyaṃte. darśanaheyās tu sarvāsv api bhūmiṣu lokottaramārgavadhyā eva. tathā hi mahākarmavibhāgasūtre. vītarāgāṇāṃ kāmadhātvālaṃbanānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ. ihānanda ekatyaḥ prāṇātipātāt prativirato bhavati. yāvan mithyādṛṣṭeḥ. ihācārataḥ
T07yabhkvyu:8976: apāyadurgativinipātanarakeṣūpapadyate. tam evaṃ yaḥ paśyati śramaṇo vā
T07yabhkvyu:8977: brāhmaṇo vā bāhyatīrthika ṛddhimān divyacakṣuḥ paracittavit. tasyaivaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8978: bhavati. nāsti kāyasucaritaṃ nāsti kāyasucaritasya vipākaḥ. nāsti
T07yabhkvyu:8980: vistaraḥ. iyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ kāmadhātvālaṃbanā. tasya karmaṇaḥ kāmāvacaratvāt. tatraiva ca narakasaṃbhavād iti. pūrvāṃtakalpakānāṃ ca śāśvatavādināṃ. [Tib. 108b] brahmajālasūtre vītarāgāṇāṃ kāmadhātvālaṃbanānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ. pūrvajanmadarśanānusāreṇa ya evam utpannadṛṣṭikāḥ. te pūrvāṃtakalpakāḥ. śāśvatavādino bahavas tatroktāḥ. teṣām udāhraṇam ekaṃ darśayiṣyāmaḥ. ihaikatyaḥ śramaṇo vā
T07yabhkvyu:8981: brāhmaṇo vāraṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūla gato vā śūnyāgāragato vā ātaptānvayāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8983: tadrūpaṃ śāṃtaṃ cetaḥsamādhiṃ spṛśati. yathā samāhite citte viṃśatiṃ saṃvartavivartakalpān samanusmarati. tasyaivaṃ bhavati. śāśvato 'yam ātmā lokaś ceti. tad evaṃ sarva eva ete pūrvāṃtakalpakāḥ śāśvatavādinaḥ. anayā śāśvatadṛṣṭyātmānaṃ lokaṃ cālaṃbamānāḥ kāmadhātum apy ālaṃbaṃte. ity evaṃ kāmadhātvālaṃbanānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ. tathā tasminn eva
T07yabhkvyu:8984: brahmajālasūtre pūrvāṃtakalpakānāṃ ekatyaśāśvatikānāṃ vītarāgāṇāṃ kāmadhātvālaṃbanānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ. kathaṃ. bhavati bhikṣavaḥ sa samayo yad ayaṃ lokaḥ saṃvartate. saṃvartamāne loke yadbhūyasā sattvā ābhāsvare devanikāya upapadyaṃte. te tatra bhavaṃti rūpiṇo manomayā avikalā ahīnendriyāḥ sarvāṃgapratyaṃgopetāḥ śubhā varṇasthāyinaḥ [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:8985: 109a] svayaṃprabhā vihāyasaṃgamāḥ prītibhakṣāḥb prītyāhārā dīrghāyuṣā dīrgham adhvānaṃ tiṣṭhaṃti. bhavati bhikṣavaḥ sa samayo yad ayaṃ loko
T07yabhkvyu:8986: vivartate. vivartamāne loke ākāśe śūnyaṃ brāhmaṃ vimānam abhinirvartate.
T07yabhkvyu:8987: athānyataraḥ sattva āyuḥkṣayāt puṇyakṣayāt karmakṣayāt ābhāsvarād devanikāyāc cyutvā śūnye brāhme vimāna upapadyate. sa tatraikāky advitīyo
T07yabhkvyu:8988: 'nupasthāyako dīrghāyur dīrgham adhvānaṃ tiṣṭhati. atha tasya sattvasya
T07yabhkvyu:8989: dīrghasyādhvano 'tyayāt tṛṣṇotpannā aratiḥ saṃjātā. aho batānye 'pi sattvā ihopapadyeran mama sabhāgatāyāṃ. evaṃ ca tasya sattvasya cetaḥpraṇidhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:8990: anye ca sattvā āyuḥkṣayāt puṇyakṣayāt karmakṣayāt ābhāsvarād devanikāyāc cyutvā tasya sattvasya sabhāgatāyām upapannaḥ. atha tasya sattvasyaitad
T07yabhkvyu:8991: abhavat. aham asmy ekāky advitīyo 'nupasthāyako dīrghāyur yāvad anye 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:8992: sattvā ihopapadyeran mama sabhāgatāyām. evaṃ cetaḥpraṇidhiḥ. ime ca sattvā
T07yabhkvyu:8993: ihopapannā mama sabhāgatāyāṃ. mayaite sattvā nirmitāḥ. aham eṣāṃ sattvānām
T07yabhkvyu:8994: īśvaraḥ kartā nirmātā sraṣṭā sṛjaḥ pitṛbhūto bhāvānām iti. teṣām api sattvānām evaṃ bhavati. imaṃ vayaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 449) sattvam adrākṣma ekākinam advitīyam [Tib. 109b] anupasthāyakaṃ dīrghāyuṣaṃ dīrgham adhvānaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:8995: tiṣṭhaṃtaṃ. tasyāsya sattvasya dīrghasyādhvano 'tyayāt tṛṣṇotpannā aratiḥ saṃjātā. aho batānye 'pi sattvā ihopapadyeran mama sabhāgatāyām. evaṃ cāsya sattvasya cetasaḥpraṇidhiḥ. vayaṃ cehopapannā asya sattvasya
T07yabhkvyu:8996: sabhāgatāyām. anena vayaṃ sattvena nirmitāḥ. eṣo 'smākaṃ sattva īśvaro yāvat pitṛbhūto bhāvānāṃ. athānyataraḥ sattva āyuḥkṣayāt puṇyakṣayāt.
T07yabhkvyu:8997: karmakṣayāt tasmāt sthānāc cyutvā teṣām itthaṃtvam āgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyāṃ. sa vṛddher anvayād indriyāṇāṃ paripākāt keśaśmaśrūṇy
T07yabhkvyu:8998: avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyaga eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajyāṃ pravrajati. so 'raṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā
T07yabhkvyu:8999: vistareṇa yāvat tadrūpaṃ śāṃtaṃ cetaḥsamādhiṃ spṛśati. yathā samāhite citte pūrvakam ātmabhāvaṃ samanusmarati. tasyaivaṃ bhavati. yo 'sau brahmā yena vayaṃ nirmitāḥ. sa nityo dhruvaḥ śāśvataḥ avipariṇāmadharmā. ye tu vayaṃ tena brahmaṇā nirmitāḥ. te vayaṃ anityā adhruvā āśāśvatā vipariṇāmadharmāṇa iti. tad evaṃ kāmadhātur api tayāṃtagrāhadṛṣṭyālaṃbito bhavati. ataḥ kāmadhātvālaṃbanānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ. [Tib. 110a]
T07yabhkvyu:9000: tathā tatraiva brahmajālasūtre ahetusamutpattikānāṃ pūrvāntakalpānām iti
T07yabhkvyu:9001: prakṛtaṃ. vītarāgāṇāṃ kāmadhātvālaṃbanānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9002: kathaṃ. saṃti rūpadhātāv asaṃjñisattvā nāma devāḥ. saṃjñotpādāt teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmāt sthānāt cyutir bhavati. ato 'nyatamaḥ sattvas tasmāt sthānāc cyutvā itthaṃtvam āgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyāṃ. pūrvavad yāvat pūrvakam ātmabhāvaṃ samanusmarati. tasyaivaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:9003: ahetusamutpanna ātmā lokaś ca. tad anenaivam eva bhavati. ahetusamutpanna ātmā lokaś ca. aham asmi pūrvaṃ nābhūvan so 'smy etarhi saṃbhūta ity
T07yabhkvyu:9004: ahetusamutpanna ātmā lokaś ca. ity evam ātmānaṃ lokaṃ cālaṃbamānās tayā
T07yabhkvyu:9005: mithyādṛṣṭyā kāmadhātum apy ālambanta ity eteṣāṃ kāmadhātvālaṃbānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ. kathaṃ ca punar eṣām ātmā lokaś
T07yabhkvyu:9006: cāhetusamutpanna ity evaṃ mithyādṛṣṭir bhavati. pūrvakṛtaṃ kuśalasāsravam akuśalaṃ vā na hetur ātmano lokasyety evam apavadati. iti kāmadhātuvītarāgāṇāṃ teṣāṃ rūpāvacaryas tā dṛṣṭayo bhaviṣyaṃtīti vacanāvakāśaṃ matvāha. na ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ kāmadhātur ālaṃbanaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:9007: vītarāgatvād [Tib. 110b] iti. naitāḥ kāmāvacaryo dṛṣṭayaḥ. mithyājñānāni punar etāni. iti kecit pariharaṃti tad eṣāṃ ayuktaṃ. taddṛṣṭirūpatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:9009: parihīṇāḥ [kathaṃ tarhi vītarāgāṇāṃ kāmālaṃbanadṛṣṭisamudācāra ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:9010: dṛṣṭyutpādetyādi.] devadatta iveti vaibhāṣikāḥ. yathā devadatto bhagavato
T07yabhkvyu:9011: 'lpotsukavihāritāśayasya bhikṣusaṃghaparikarṣaṇāya pāpakecchāsamutpādād ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ. sūtre vacanāt. evaṃ hi sūtre paṭhyate. atha devadattasya lābhasatkāreṇābhibhūtasya idam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgataṃ utpannam aho bata me bhagavān bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pratiniḥsṛjet. ahaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ parikarṣayaṃ bhagavān alpotsuko viharet dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārayogam anuyuktaḥ. sahacittotpādād devadattas tasyā ṛddheḥ parihīṇa iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9013: (V.7) etatpūrvako hi teṣv ātmagrāha iti. nityapiṇḍasaṃjñāpūrvakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9014: sarvaiveti. paṃcaprakārāpi. satkāya iti. paṃcasūpādānaskandheṣu. sarvaiva hi viparītadṛṣṭisvabhāvapravṛttā dṛṣṭiḥ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭyādikā
T07yabhkvyu:9015: mithyopanidhyānāt. anyās tu samāropikā iti. katham ucchedadṛṣṭiḥ samāropikā. bāhulika eṣa nirdeṣaḥ. āryaḥ prahīṇatvād iti. tyaktatvāt. ohāk tyāga ity etasya dhātor grahaṇāt. ādiśabdalopaḥ kṛta iti. dṛṣṭyādīnām upādānaskaṃdhānāṃ paratvena pradhānatvenāmarśo dṛṣṭiparāmarśa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9016: paraśabdaprayogeṇa cāyam atiśayārtho [Tib. 111a] labhyata ity ācāryasaṃghabhadraḥ. ahetau hetudṛṣṭir iti. duḥkhadarśanaprahātavya
T07yabhkvyu:9017: ucyate. amārge ca mārgadṛṣṭir iti. mārgadarśanaprahātavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9018: śīlavratamātrakam iti. śīlavratam api bauddhānāṃ mokṣaprāptaye bhavati. na tu tanmātrakam ity atas tadanyeṣāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ. atrāpi kila ādiśabda iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9019: śīlavratādiparāmarśaḥ. śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. śīlavrataṃ hi rūpaskaṃdhasaṃgṛhītam. ato 'nyaskandhagrahaṇārtham ādiśabda iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9020: (V.8) kasmād ayaṃ na samudayadarśanaprahātavya iti. hetau vipratipannatvād ity abhiprāyaḥ. tatkṛto 'pi kāraṇābhiniveśa iti. nityaikātmakartṛgrāhakṛto
T07yabhkvyu:9021: 'pīty arthaḥ. tata eva prahīyata iti. duḥkhadarśanād eva prahīyate. yas tarhi jalāgnipraveśādibhiḥ svargopapattiṃ paśyati. śīlavratena vā śuddhim
T07yabhkvyu:9022: iti. nāyaṃ tatkṛtaḥ kāraṇābhiniveśaḥ. kathaṃ duḥkhadarśanāt prahīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9024: vaibhāṣika āha. so 'pi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavya iti vistaraḥ duḥkhe vipratipannatvād iti vaibhāṣikāḥ. kathaṃ ca punar duḥkhe vipratipannaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9025: [Tib. 111b] tena svargagamanāc chuddhidarśanād vā. atiprasaṃga iti vistareṇācāryaḥ. sarveṣāṃ sāsravālaṃbanānāṃ adṛṣṭisvabhāvānāṃ ca duḥkhādidarśanaprahātavyānāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 451) duḥkhe vipratipannatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:9026: sarvaṃ hi sāsravaṃ vastu duḥkham iti duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9027: tathā ca sati na kaścit samudayādidarśanaprahātavyaḥ syāt. idaṃ cāparaṃ vaktavyaṃ. kīdṛśo vānyaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo mārgadarśanaprahātavyaḥ sa vaktavyaḥ. yo 'pi hi gośīlādinā śudhyati yāvat sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnotīti paśyati. tasyāpy ayam akāraṇaṃ kāraṇataḥ pratyetīti duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśa iti paṭhyeta. vaibhāṣika āha.
T07yabhkvyu:9028: yo mārgadarśanaprahātavyālaṃbana iti. yo mārgadarśanaheyān aṣṭau
T07yabhkvyu:9030: iti. so 'pi hi nāma duḥkhe vipratipanna ity ācāryaḥ. mithyādṛṣṭyādayo hi mārgadarśanaprahātavyā aṣṭāv anuśayaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśasyālambanaṃ. te ca sāsravatvād duḥkhasatyasaṃgṛhītāḥ. tatra ca sa vipratipanna iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9031: duḥkhadarśanaprahātavya eva syād [Tib. 112a] ity abhiprāyaḥ. yasya ceti vistaraḥ. yasya ca pudgalasya nāsti mārga iti mārgālaṃbanā mithyādṛṣṭirasti vicikitsā vā. sa pudgalo nāsti mokṣamārga iti paśyan.
T07yabhkvyu:9032: vicikitsan vā. kim asti mārgaḥ. nāstīti saṃdihyan. kathaṃ tayā mithyādṛṣṭyā śuddhiṃ pratyeṣyati pratipatsyate etayā mithyādṛṣṭyā etayā vā vicikitsayeti. mithyādṛṣṭivicikitsāyogād eva hi tasya śuddhipratipattir nāsti. athānyam iti vistaraḥ. athānyaṃ sāṃkhyādiparikalpitaṃ mokṣamārgaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:9033: parāmṛśya gṛhītvā. eṣa mokṣamārgo bauddhīyo nāstīty āha. so 'pīti.
T07yabhkvyu:9034: tīrthikaḥ. tenaivānyena sāṃkhyādiparikalpitena śuddhiṃ pratyeti. na tayā mithyādṛṣṭyeti kṛtvā. tasyāpy asau śīlavrataparāmarśo
T07yabhkvyu:9036: sāṃkhyādiparikalpitamārgālaṃbana eveti ayaṃ cānyo doṣaḥ. yaś cāpīti vistaraḥ. yaś cāpi mithyādṛṣṭikaḥ samudayanirodhadarśanaprahātavyayā mithyādṛṣṭyā śuddhiṃ pratyeti. sa kasmān na taddarśanaheyaḥ. sa śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ kasmān na samudayanirodhadarśanaheya ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9037: tasmāt parīkṣya eṣo 'rtha iti. yasmād ayaṃ duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:9041: tad idam ācāryeṇa saṃśayāvadyaṃ kṛtaṃ. na svamataṃ darśitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9042: anya āhur yogācāramatim apekṣyaivaṃ kṛtaṃ. yogācārā hy aṣṭāviṃśatyuttaraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:9043: kleśaśataṃ varṇayaṃti. yathaiva hi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyā ime daśānuśayā bhavaṃti. satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ. aṃtagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ. mithyādṛṣṭiḥ. dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9045: avidyā ceti. tathaiveme daśa samudayadarśanaprahātavyāḥ. tathaiva ca daśa
T07yabhkvyu:9046: nirodhadarśanaprahātavyāḥ. daśa mārgadarśanaprahātavyā iti. catvāriṃśat kāmāvacarā darśanaheyā bhavaṃti. bhāvanāheyās tu ṣaṭ. akalpikā
T07yabhkvyu:9047: satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ. ucchedadṛṣṭiḥ. sahajo rāgaḥ. pratighaḥ. mānaḥ. avidyā ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:9048: ṣaṭcatvāriṃśat kāmavācarā anuśayā bhavaṃti. rūpāvacarās tv ekacatvāriṃśad
T07yabhkvyu:9049: eta eva pratighavarjyāḥ. yathā rūpāvacarāḥ. evam ārūpyāvacarā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9050: atra kaścit samādhim āha. yad uktam atiprasaṃgaḥ sarveṣāṃ sāsravālaṃbanānāṃ duḥkhe vipratipannatvād iti. atra brūmaḥ nātiprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9052: duḥkhasatyavipratipannāḥ. tathāpi tu kecid duḥkhamukhena vipratipannāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9055: vipratipannāḥ. te duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyāḥ. śīlavrataparāmarśaś ca duḥkhamukhena duḥkhe vipratipanno nityātmagrahaṇāt. tasmād
T07yabhkvyu:9056: duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaḥ. yas tu mārgavipratipannavipratipannaḥ. tadyathā sāṃkhyanirgraṃthādayaḥ svaparikalpitaṃ mārgaṃ gṛhītvā nāsti bauddhānāṃ mokṣamārga iti mithyādṛṣṭim utpādayaṃti. tāṃ ca mithyādṛṣṭiṃ
T07yabhkvyu:9059: śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ yaḥ samudayamukhena vipratipadyeta. nāpi yo nirodhamukhena vipratipannavipratipannaḥ syāt. tasmād duḥkhamārgadarśanaprahātavya eva śīlavrataparāmarśa iti. kathaṃ punaḥ samudayanirodhamukhena na vipratipadyate. atrācāryasaṃghabhadra āha. [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:9061: taccharīrānupapatteḥ. akāraṇe hi kāraṇabhiniveśaḥ. amārge ca mārgābhiniveśeḥ. śīlavrataparāmarśaśarīraṃ. samudayāpavādikāyāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyāṃ śuddhyabhiniveśe nanv ākasmikāj janmadarśanam asya syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:9062: kvacid api kāraṇabuddhyabhāvāt. duḥkhasamudayayor hi dravyato 'vyatirekāt.
T07yabhkvyu:9063: īśvarādiskandhā api tenāpoditāḥ syuḥ. nirodhāpavādikāyāṃ tu mithyādṛṣṭau
T07yabhkvyu:9064: śuddhipratyāgamanān nirodhopāyakalpanaiva na saṃbhavati. kathaṃ nāsti nirodha iti taddarśanapṛṣṭhena tadupāyakalpanā vyarthā bhavet. evaṃ ca śīlavrataparāmarśaśarīrānupapattiḥ. mārgadarśanaprahātavyo 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:9065: śīlavrataparāmarśa evaṃ na saṃbhavet. nāsti (Abhidh-k-vy 453) mārga iti darśanapṛṣṭhena mārgaparikalpanānupapatteḥ. yasya hi mārgālaṃbanā
T07yabhkvyu:9066: mithyādṛṣṭir vicikitsā vāsti. sa nāsti mokṣamārga iti paśyan vicikitsan vā kathaṃ tayā śuddhiṃ pratyeṣyatīti. upapadyata evasyāryamārgāpavādikāyāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyāṃ śuddhyabhiniveśaḥ. nyāyatas tatgrahaṇāt. anyā hi tena
T07yabhkvyu:9067: mokṣamārgo hṛdi niveśito bhavati. yato 'sya sadbhūtamārgāpavādikāyāṃ mithyādṛṣṭau nyāyabuddhir utpadyate. eṣa nyāyo yad anyo mokṣamārgo nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:9068: yac ca syān na vety anyaṃ mokṣamārgaṃ vicikitsatīti. nyāyato hi śuddhyupāyagrahaṇam upapadyate. yaś cāsāv anyo mokṣamārgas tena hṛdi
T07yabhkvyu:9069: niveśitaḥ. [Tib. 114a] sa naiva tasya mārgadarśanaheyasya śīlavrataparāmarśasya viṣayaḥ. svanaikāyikamātrālaṃbanatavāt. atha mataṃ nirodhadarśanaheyo 'pi prayujyate. tatkalpanāsāmarthyāt. anyad dhi tena
T07yabhkvyu:9070: mokṣasthānaṃ hṛdi niveśitaṃ bhavati. yato 'sya sadbhūtamokṣāpavādikāyāṃ mithyādṛṣṭau nyāyato grahaṇaṃ. ataḥ samānam etad iti. tan na.
T07yabhkvyu:9072: dravyādravyasaṃpratipattibhede hi kaścin mokṣopāyam anveṣate. dhruvaṃ tasyāsti mokṣa iti niścayaḥ. yasya cāsti mokṣaniścayo dhruvaṃ. tasya tatra nityaśāṃtagrahaṇam. anyathā tatra prārthanānupapatteḥ. tatra yathehadhārmikāṇāṃ nivāṇe dravyādravyasaṃpratipattibhedo 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:9073: nityaśāṃtagrahaṇasāmānyāt tadapavāde doṣo darśanam eva. yenapi kiṃcin mokṣasthānaṃ hṛdi niveśitaṃ syāt. tasyāpi nityaśāṃtagrahaṇasāmānyān mokṣāpavāde nyāyagrahaṇam upapadyate. bhinnā hi śīlavratādayaḥ svabhāvataś cākārataś cāryamārgāt. nāsti tu nityaśāṃtagrahaṇabheda iti. nāsti
T07yabhkvyu:9076: sīlavrataparāmarśo dviprakāra iṣyate ābhidharmikaiḥ. tatra kīdṛśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo vyavasthāpyate. kīdṛo
T07yabhkvyu:9077: mārgadarśanaprahātavyaḥ. yo 'pihi gośīlādinā śudbhiṃ pratyeti. so 'py
