(Abhidh-k-vy 491) yasya punar daśeti. yasya vaibhāṣikasya daśa paryavasthānāni. tasya krodhamrakṣāv apy ubhayaprakārāv ekāṃtākuśalau svataṃtrau ceti. tasmān na bhavaty ayaṃ parihāra iti. kas tarhi parihāras
T07yabhkvyu:9796: tasya iti. atrācāryasaṃghabhadra āha. abhīkṣṇasamudācāritvād īrṣyāmātsaryayoḥ pṛthaksaṃyojanam iti. ata eva ca ṣaṭtriṃśatsaṃyojanatve
T07yabhkvyu:9797: 'pi kāmadhātūpapannānāṃ īrṣyāmātsaryasaṃyojanāḥ kauśika devamanuṣyā ity uktam. ādhikyena hi sugatāv etat kleśadvayaṃ bandhanam iti. atha vā.
T07yabhkvyu:9798: alpeśākhyālpabhogakāraṇatvāt sarvasūcanāt dvipakṣasaṃkleśatvāc ca. mātsaryerṣye pṛthak kṛte.
T07yabhkvyu:9799: yad ayaṃ sugatāv apy upapannaḥ pragāḍhaṃ paribhavam udvahati.
T07yabhkvyu:9801: alpeśākhyo 'lpabhogaś ca bandhanāv apy ubhayān mata
T07yabhkvyu:9802: iti. dvividhāś copakleśāḥ saṃtāpasahagatāḥ. āmodasahagatāś ca. ta ābhyāṃ sarve sūcitā bhavaṃti. gṛhipakṣaś cābhyāṃ bhogādhiṣṭhānābhyām atīva
T07yabhkvyu:9803: kliśyate. pravrajitapakṣo 'pi dharmādhiṣṭhānābhyāṃ. devāsurapakṣau vā bhinnodarahetor atyarthaṃ kliśyataḥ. ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā.
T07yabhkvyu:9804: īrṣyāmātsaryasaṃyojanāḥ kauśika devamanuṣyā iti. [Tib. 152a] tasmād daśabhyaḥ paryavasthānebhya etad eva dvayaṃ saṃyojanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9805: (V.43-44) avaro hi bhāgaḥ kāmadhātur iti. traidhātukasamudāyāpekṣayā kāmadhātur avaro nihīno dhātur ekāṃtasamāhitatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:9811: satkāyadṛṣṭyādayaḥ. yathā hi dauvārikapramāde bandhanāgārāt puruṣo niṣkrāṃto 'pi dauvārikānucarair nivartyate. tathehāpy amībhir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9812: tribhiḥ. sattvāvaratām iti. pṛthagjanatvalakṣaṇāṃ sattvāvaratāṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśīlavrataparāmarśavicikitsāsaṃyojanair nātikrāmati. dvābhyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:9814: nātivartate. āryebhyo hy avarāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ. dhātuṣu ca kāmadhātur avaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9815: tasmād eva tāny avarabhāgīyāni (Abhidh-k-vy 492) apare yogācārāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9816: paryādāya trisaṃyojanaprahāṇād iti. niravaśeṣataḥ satkāyadṛṣṭiśīlavrataparāmarśavicikitsāsamyojanaprahāṇād ity arthaḥ. ṣaṭ kleśāḥ [Tib. 152b] prahīṇā iti. paṃca dṛṣṭayo vicikitsā ca. na tu rāgādaya
T07yabhkvyu:9820: tathā hi sūtre paṭhyate. kiyatā bhadaṃta srotaāpanno bhavati. yataś ca mahānāmann āryaśrāvakaḥ idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:9821: ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ. ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ. iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti yathabhūtaṃ prajānāti. trīṇi cāsya saṃyojanāni
T07yabhkvyu:9822: prahīṇāni bhavaṃti parijñātāni. tadyathā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo
T07yabhkvyu:9823: vivcikitsā ca. sa eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpanno bhavaty avinipātadharmā saṃbodhiparāyaṇaḥ saptakṛdbhavaparamaḥ saptakṛtvo devāṃś
T07yabhkvyu:9824: ca manuṣyāṃś ca saṃsṛtya saṃdhāvya duḥkhasyāṃtaṃ kariṣyatīti. sarvam etad vaktavyaṃ syāt. bhaved ity arthaḥ. triprakārāḥ kila kleśā iti. darśanaheyā
T07yabhkvyu:9827: ekaprakārāṇāṃ. ataḥ satkāyadṛṣṭigrahaṇād antagrāhadṛṣṭir [Tib. 153a] api gṛhītā bhavati. vicikitsā mukhaṃ catuḥprakārāṇāṃ. atas tadgrahaṇān mithyādṛṣṭiparāmarśānāṃ grahaṇaṃ bhavati. śīlavrataparāmarśas tu sākṣād
T07yabhkvyu:9828: eva gṛhītaḥ. ye tu rāgādayo darśanaheyāḥ. te 'pi tadālaṃbanatvāt gṛhītā eveti śakyate vaktum iti. aṃtagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭipravartiteti.
T07yabhkvyu:9829: ātmanaḥ śāśvatocchedānugrahaṇāt. dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśapravartita iti. yena śuddhiṃ pratyeti. tasyāgrato
T07yabhkvyu:9830: grahaṇāt. mithyādṛṣṭir vicikitsāpravartiteti. saṃśayitasya mithyāśravaṇacintanān mithyāniścayotpatteḥ. ato mūlagrahaṇān mūlasaṃbhūtagrahaṇasiddhir ity aṃtagrāhadṛṣṭyādayo 'py uktarūpā
T07yabhkvyu:9832: apare punar āhur ity ayam evācāryaḥ. mārgavibhramaḥ katham ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:9834: (V.45) avarabhāgīyasaṃyojanavacanād anyabhāgīyam apy astīty arthād uktaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:9840: ity anena saṃbaṃdhena saṃyojananirdeśānaṃtaraṃ baṃdhananirdeśāvasaro 'paraparyāyaḥ. rāgo bandhanaṃ sarva iti. sarva iti prakārato dhātutaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:9841: sarvadveṣaḥ. kiṃ sarvaḥ. prakārata eva [Tib. 153b] mohaḥ sarvaḥ prakārato
T07yabhkvyu:9842: dhātutaś ca. ālaṃbanasaṃprayogābhyām iti. svaparasāṃtānikyāṃ sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ yathāyogaṃ rāgo 'nuśete. duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ dveṣaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:9843: ālaṃbanasaṃprayogābhyām ity eva. aduḥkhāsukhāyāṃ mohaḥ tābhyām ity eva.
T07yabhkvyu:9844: nanu ca rāgadveṣāv apy aduḥkhāsukhāyāṃ yathāyogaṃ tathaivānuśayāte. kasmān moha evocyata iti āha. na tathā rāgadveṣāv iti. rāgadveṣāv apy anuśayāte.
T07yabhkvyu:9845: na tu tathā yathā mohaḥ. moho hy apaṭutvād apaṭvyām aduḥkhāsukhāyāṃ vedanāyām anukūlatvāt sutarām anuśeta iti. svāsāṃtānikālaṃbanato vā niyama
T07yabhkvyu:9847: svasaṃtānavedanāyāṃ hi sukhāyāṃ rāgo duḥkhāyāṃ dveṣo 'duḥkhāsukhāyāṃ mohaḥ saṃprayogata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9848: apare tu vyācakṣate. na tathā rāgadveṣāv iti. sukhāyāṃ yathā rāgo 'nuśete
T07yabhkvyu:9849: na tathā dveṣaḥ. kiṃ punaḥ sukhāyām api dveṣo 'nuśete. anuśete śatrusukhe ālaṃbanataḥ. yathā ca duḥkhāyāṃ dveśo 'nuśete [Tib. 154a] na tathā rāgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9850: kiṃ punar duḥkhāyām api rāgo 'nuśete. anuśete śatruduḥkhe ālaṃbanataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9851: svāsāṃtānikālaṃbanato vā niyama iti. atha vā svāsāṃtānike sukhe ālaṃbanataḥ saṃprayogato vā rāgo 'nuśete. na parasāṃtānike śatrusukhe.
T07yabhkvyu:9852: evaṃ duḥkhe svāsāṃtānike dveśo 'nuśete ālaṃbanataḥ saṃprayogato vā. na pārasāṃtānike śatruduḥkhe. ity evaṃ svāsāṃtānikālaṃbanato niyamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9853: sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśeto. ālaṃbanasaṃprayogābhyāṃ duḥkhāyāṃ dveṣa
T07yabhkvyu:9857: iti. kleśebhyo 'nya ity arthaḥ. ta upakleśā eveti. kleśasamīparūpāḥ. kleśo vā samīpavarty eṣām iti. kleśapravṛttyanuvṛtter aparipūrṇakleśalakṣaṇatvāc copakleśāḥ. upakleśāś caitasā eva te na cittaviprayuktāḥ. ye kṣudravastuke paṭhitā iti. kṣudravastuke pravacanabhāge ye paṭhitāḥ. na tu cetanādaya
T07yabhkvyu:9858: evety abhiprāyaḥ. tadyathā aratir [Tib. 154b] vijṛṃbhikā cetaso līnatvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:9859: tandrī bhakṣe 'samatā nānātvasaṃjñā amanasikāraḥ kāyadauṣṭhulyaṃ śṛṃgī bhittirīkā anārdavatā anārdavatā asvabhāvānuvartitā kāmavitarko
T07yabhkvyu:9861: 'vamanyanāpratisaṃyukto vitarkaḥ kulodayatāpratisaṃyukto vitarkaḥ śokaḥ duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyam (Abhidh-k-vy 494) upāyāsa iti. [tandrīti jaḍatā.]
T07yabhkvyu:9864: dharmāmiṣeti vistaraḥ. dharmasyāmiṣasya kauśalasya ca pradāne virodhī cittasyāgraho mātsaryaṃ. mā mattaḥ saratv ity ākāro matsaraḥ. matsara eva mātsaryaṃ. matsariṇo vā bhāvo mātsaryaṃ. kaukṛtyaṃ styānaṃ ca vyākhyāte
T07yabhkvyu:9865: iti. kukṛtabhāvaḥ kaukṛtyaṃ. iha tu tadālaṃbano dharmaḥ kaukṛtyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9866: kāyacittākarmaṇyatā styānam iti. cittābhisaṃkṣepo middham ity etāvaty ucyamāne samāpattāv api prasaṃga ity ato viśeṣyate. kāyasaṃdhāraṇāsamartha
T07yabhkvyu:9867: iti. tat tu kliṣṭam eva paryavasthānaṃ. kaukṛtyaṃ ceti. yat kliṣṭaṃ middhaṃ. tat paryavasthānaṃ. yat tu kuśalam avyākṛtaṃ vā na tat [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:9868: 155a] paryavasthānaṃ. trividhaṃ hi middham iṣyate. kaukṛtyaṃ ca. yat
T07yabhkvyu:9869: kliṣṭaṃ. tat paryavasthānaṃ. na kuśalaṃ. kuśalākusalaṃ hi tad iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9870: vyāpādavihiṃsāvarjitaḥ sattvāsattvayor āghātaḥ krodha iti. sattvaviṣaye āghātaviśeṣo vyāpādaḥ. amī bhavaṃtaḥ sattvā hanyaṃtāṃ vā badhyaṃtāṃ vā śīryaṃtāṃ vā anayena vyasanam āpadyaṃtām ity ākārapravṛtto vyāpādaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9871: sattvākarṣaṇasaṃtrāsanatarjanādikarmapravṛttā vihiṃsā. tābhyām anyaḥ sattvāsattvayor āghātaḥ krodhaḥ. tadyathā śikṣākāmasya bhikṣoś
T07yabhkvyu:9872: cittaprakopaḥ. kaṃṭakādiṣu ca prakopa iti. yathākramaṃ jñātājñātānām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9873: rājādibhir jñātānāṃ mrakṣavatāṃ pudgalānāṃ mrakṣas tṛṣṇāniṣyandaḥ. mā me lābhasatkāro na bhavaiṣyatīti. ajñātānām avidyāniṣyandaḥ karmasvakatām
T07yabhkvyu:9874: aśraddadhānaḥ tad avadyaṃ pracchādayati. na parasyāṃtike viśuddhyarthaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:9875: deśayatīty evam ubhayaniṣyando mrakṣa ity eke. katham anapatrāpyam avidyāniṣyandaḥ. yasmād avadye bhayādarśitvam atrapeti.
T07yabhkvyu:9877: iti. yat kliṣṭaṃ. tad eva paryavasthānādhikārāt.
T07yabhkvyu:9879: iti. yathā śarīrān malā jāyaṃte evam ime māyādayo malā iva kleśebhya
T07yabhkvyu:9881: madaḥ svadharme raktasya paryādānaṃ tu cetasa
T07yabhkvyu:9884: (V.51) yaś ca yaddarśanaheyasaṃprayukta iti. yasya satyasya darśanaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:9885: yaddarśanaṃ. yaddarśanena heyo yaddarśanaheyaḥ. tena saṃprayukto yaddarśanaheyasaṃprayuktaḥ. sa taddarśanaheyaḥ. sa tasya satyasya
T07yabhkvyu:9886: darśanena heyaḥ. kaḥ. āhrīkyādiḥ. tadanye bhāvanāheyā eva.
T07yabhkvyu:9888: iti. āhrīkyādibhyo 'nye īrṣyādayo bhāvanāheyā eva. na darśanaheyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9891: (V.52) styānauddhatyamiddhāny akuśalāvyākṛtānīti. paryavasthānādhikārān middhaṃ kuśalam apīti
T07yabhkvyu:9893: iti. yathāsaṃbhavam iti. kāmadhātoḥ pareṇa yāvaṃtaḥ saṃbhavaṃti. te punar māyāśāṭhyādayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9894: (V.52) vitathātmasaṃdarśanatayeti. vitathasyātmanaḥ saṃdarśanatayā mahābrahmā āyuṣmaṃtam aśvajitaṃ vaṃcayituṃ pravṛttaḥ. kutremāni brahman mahābhūtāny apariśeṣaṃ nirudhyaṃta iti pṛṣṭo [Tib. 156a] 'prajānan kṣepam
T07yabhkvyu:9895: akārṣīt. aham asmi brahmā mahābrahmā īśvaraḥ kartā nirmātā sraṣṭā sṛjaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:9896: pitṛbhūto bhāvānām iti māyayā vaṃcayitum ārabdhaḥ. atha sa mahābrahmā
T07yabhkvyu:9897: āyuṣmaṃtam aśvajitaṃ kare gṛhītvā ekāṃte asthād ekāṃtasthitaś cedam uktavān. vidyamāne tathāgate māṃ praṣṭavyaṃ manyasaitīdam asya śāṭhyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:9898: dṛśyate. svapariṣallajjayā hy ātmīyajñānatāṃ nigūhamānaḥ sa tathā kṛtavān
T07yabhkvyu:9899: iti. uktam api śāṭhyam iti tathā hi
T07yabhkvyu:9900: kaukṛtyamiddhākuśalāny ādye dhyāne na saṃty ata
T07yabhkvyu:9902: pareṇāvyākṛtās tata iti prasaṃgeneti. paṃcāpanīyeti māyāśāṭhyastyānauddhatyamadān.
T07yabhkvyu:9905: īrṣyāmātsaryādayaḥ. ye ca kleśamahābhūmikeṣūktā ity āśraddhyakausīdyapramādā eva. nānye styānauddhatyayor ihaiva pūrvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:9910: harṣadainyākāravartitvād iti. harṣākāravartī rāgo dainyākāravartī dveṣa iti yathāsaṃkhyena. [Tib. 156b] ṣaḍvijñānabhūmikatvāc ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:9911: paṃcavijñānabhūmikatvād rāgaḥ sukhendriyeṇa saṃprayuktaḥ. dveṣaś ca duḥkhendriyeṇa. manovijñānabhūmikatvāt tu rāgaḥ saumanasyendriyeṇa. dveṣaś ca daurmanasyendriyeṇa saṃprayuktaḥ. puṇyakarmaṇāṃ pāpakarmaṇāṃ ca
T07yabhkvyu:9912: yathākramaṃ iti. puṇyakarmaṇāṃ mithyādṛṣṭir daurmanasyena saṃprayuktā.
T07yabhkvyu:9916: katham ucchedadṛṣṭiḥ saumanasyena saṃprayuktā. tasyābhinatatvāt. upekṣā saṃtiṣṭhata iti vināśāvasthāyāṃ mandatvāt. yasyāṃ bhūmau yāvantīndriyāṇīti.
T07yabhkvyu:9918: sukhopekṣe upekṣā ca vido dhyānopapattiṣu iti avagaṃtavyaṃ. tatrapy ūrdhvabhūmiṣu. caturvijñānakāyikāḥ prathama eva
T07yabhkvyu:9921: saumanasyendriyaṃ. cāturvijñānakāyikaṃ upekṣendriyaṃ. tata ūrdhvaṃ manobhūmikam eva. dvitīye dhyāne saumanasyopekṣendriye. tṛtīye
T07yabhkvyu:9922: sukhopekṣendriye. caturthe dhyāne ārūpyeṣu copekṣendriyam eva. tatra sarve 'py anuśayā yathāyathaṃ vedanendriyeṇa saṃprayuktāḥ. tatra śamathasnigdhasaṃtānatvāt harṣadainyākāravyavasthā nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:9923: dainyākāravartitvād eṣāṃ kaukṛtyādīnāṃ na saumanasyena saṃprayogaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9927: iti. sukhasaumanasyābhyāṃ. tṛtīye dhyāne sukheneti. madasya mānasattvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:9928: yathā avidyāyā iti. yathā avidyāyāḥ na kvacit kleśe upakleśe vā saṃprayogapratiṣedho 'sti. evam upekṣāyā apīti. akuśalamahābhūmikatvāt
T07yabhkvyu:9931: vacanāt. kleśamahābhūmikatvāc ca styānauddhatyayoḥ. ṣaḍ vijñānakāyā akuśalāḥ kliṣṭāḥ saṃbhavaṃtīty ataḥ paṃcabhir apīndriyaiḥ saṃprayoga eṣāṃ [Tib.157b] saṃbhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:9933: (V.58) kiṃ traidhātukyastyānauddhatyavicikitsā gṛhyaṃta iti. āsāṃ traidhātukatvāt tā eva niṣkṛṣya pṛcchyaṃte. kevalo 'yam iti vistaraḥ akuśalā rāśir iti bhikṣavo yad uta paṃca nivaraṇānīti te samyag vadamānā vadyuḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ. kevalo 'yaṃ bhikṣavaḥ paripūrṇākuśalarāśir yad
T07yabhkvyu:9934: uta paṃca nivaraṇānīti vistareṇaikāṃtākuśalatvavacanāt. kāme nivaraṇāni nānyatreti. vṛttisūtrapadayor ekavākyatā. nivaraṇānīti dhyānasamāpattyādīnām āvaraṇānīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9936: iti. ekavipakṣāhārakṛtyatvād ity arthaḥ. aṃtareṇāpi hi bhāvapratyayaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:9937: bhāvapradhāne nirdeśo bhavet. atha vā ekaṃ vipakṣāhārakṛtyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:9938: ekavipakṣāhārakṛtyaṃ. tata iti. vipakṣaḥ pratipakṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9939: ślokabandhānuguṇyena pratipakṣa iha vipakṣo 'bhipretaḥ. kleśaviruddhaḥ pakṣo vipakṣa iti kṛtvā. abhidharme tu kṛṣṇaḥ pakṣo vipakṣaḥ śuklaviruddhaḥ pakṣo vipakṣaḥ. śuklapakṣaḥ pratipakṣa iti pratītaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9940: bhakte asamateti. atibahubhuktvāhārasya yaḥ kāyoparodhaḥ. anāhāra iti pratipakṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9941: styānamiddhena prajñāskandhasya. kiṃ. vighāta iti prakṛtaṃ. [Tib. 158a]
T07yabhkvyu:9942: etasyāṃ tu kalpanāyām iti vistaraḥ. śīlaskaṃdhaḥ samādhiskaṃdhaḥ prajñāskandha iti. yayānupūrvyā skandhā vyavasthitāḥ. tayaivānupūrvyā tadvipakṣabhūtāni nivaraṇāni paṭhyeran. kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ auddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ styānamiddhaṃ vicikitsā ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:9943: auddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇasya pūrvaṃ grahaṇaṃ prāpnoti. samādhiskaṃdhasya prajñāskaṃdhāt pūrvam uktatvāt. na caivam ato naitat kāraṇam ity
T07yabhkvyu:9944: abhiprāyaḥ. kiṃ punar atra kāraṇam ity āha. ato yathāsaṃkhyam etābhyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:9945: styānamiddhena auddhatyakaukṛtyena ca nivaraṇābhyāṃ samādhiprajñāskaṃdhayor upaghāta iti. katham ity āha. samādhiprayuktasya hi styānamiddhād bhayaṃ samānarūpakalpatvāt. evaṃ dharmapravicayaprayuktasyauddhatyakaukṛtyād bhayam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9946: anye tv anyathā varṇayaṃtīti pūrvācāryaḥ. [Tib. 158] cāragatasyeti piṇḍapātārthaṃ paribhramataḥ. nimittagrāhāt. strīrūpam iti strīśabda iti vā grahaṇāt. vihāragatasya pratisaṃlīnasya sthitasya vā niṣaṇṇasya vā
T07yabhkvyu:9947: caṃkramyamāṇasya vā. tatpūrvakau priyāpriyaviṣayanimittagrāhapūrvakau priyāpriyaviṣayapūrvakau vā. yathākramaṃ śamathavipaśyanayor aṃtarāyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:9948: kuruta iti. śamathasya styānamiddham aṃtarāyaṃ karoti. pratyāsannarūpatayā
T07yabhkvyu:9950: (Abhidh-k-vy 498) kurutaḥ. auddhatyakaukṛtyasya kṛtadvaṃdvaikavadbhāvasya vicikitsayā saha punar dvaṃdvaḥ. auddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ ca vicikitsā ca auddhatyakaukṛtyavicikitse iti. vicikitsā tu punar vyutthitasyāpi tasya dharmanidhyānakāle 'ṃtarāyaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:9951: apare punar evaṃ pāṭhaṃ paṭhaṃti. styānamiddham auddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ceti. evaṃ ca vyācakṣate. styānamiddhaṃ śamathasyāṃtarāyaṃ karoti. auddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vipaśyanāyāḥ. vicikitsā ca vyutthitasya
T07yabhkvyu:9957: na te tadā prahīyaṃte. duḥkhadharmajñānena samudayadharmajñānena ca
T07yabhkvyu:9958: yathāyogaṃ pūrvam eva prahīṇatvāt. dharmajñānavadhyā hi te kāmāvacaratvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:9960: dṛṣṭiparāmarśādīnāṃ yadālaṃbanaṃ nirodhamārgadṛgdṛggheyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādikaṃ duḥkhasamudayasatyasvabhāvaṃ duḥkhasamudayadharmajñānapakṣeṇānvayajñānapakṣeṇa vā yathādhātu
T07yabhkvyu:9961: parijñāyate. na te tadā prahīyaṃte. nirodhamārgadarśanapraheyatvād iti. na ca tathā teṣām ālaṃbanaṃ parijñāyate pūrvam eva jñātatvāt. katham eṣāṃ prahāṇam ālaṃbanaparijñānāt tatprahāṇaṃ na yujyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9962: tatrālaṃbanaparijñānāt kāmāvacarāḥ svadhātvalaṃbanā rūpārūpyāvacarāś ca duḥkhasamudayadṛggheyāḥ prahīyaṃte. tatra visabhāgadhātvālaṃbanānām ālaṃbanaṃ parijñayā paśyataḥ prahāṇāṃ duḥkhasamudayānvayajñānakṣāṃtyor yugapad dvidhātvālaṃbanatvāt. svabhūmyālaṃbanānām iti viśeṣaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:9965: tadālaṃbanāḥ sabhāgadhātusarvatragāḥ. teṣāṃ kṣayāt prahāṇāt. te visabhāgadhātusarvatragāḥ prahīyaṃte. [taddhetutvenopastaṃbhaprahāṇād
T07yabhkvyu:9967: iti. dṛṣṭiparāmarśādyālaṃbanānāṃ nirodhamārgadarśanaheyānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādīnāṃ prahāṇāt. te 'pi dṛṣṭiparāmarśādayaḥ sāsravālaṃbanāḥ prahīyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:9969: iti. bhāvanāheyānāṃ pratipakṣodayād eva kṣayaḥ nālaṃbanaparijñānādibhya (Abhidh-k-vy 499) iti darśayati. paścāt pravedayiṣyāma iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9970: navaprakārā doṣā hi bhūmaubhūmau tathā guṇā ity atra vakṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:9972: vipakṣapratidvaṃdvī pakṣaḥ pratipakṣaḥ. prahāṇāya pratipakṣaḥ prahāṇapratipakṣaḥ. vimuktimārgo 'pi hi pratipakṣo na tu prahāṇāyety ata
T07yabhkvyu:9973: itthaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ. prahīyate vāneneti prahāṇaṃ. prahāṇaś cāsau pratipakṣaś
T07yabhkvyu:9975: ādhārapratipakṣas tasmāt pareṇeti. tasmād ānaṃtaryamārgāt pareṇa. yo mārgo vimuktimārgaḥ. sa hy ādhāraḥ prahāṇasya tatprāptyādhāraṇāt. ādhāryate
T07yabhkvyu:9976: 'nenety ādhāraḥ. sa eva pratipakṣaḥ ādhārapratipakṣaḥ. tadyathā duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāṃteḥ paraṃ duḥkhadharmajñānam iti tenocyate. yena tatprāpitam iti vistaraḥ. yena mārgeṇa tatprāpitam ānaṃtaryamārgaprāpitaṃ prahāṇam ādhāryate. tatprāptyanucchedātma ādhārapratipakṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:9977: dūrībhāvapratipakṣa iti vistaraḥ. kleśaprāptir dūrībhavati yena sa
T07yabhkvyu:9978: dūrībhāvaḥ. sa eva pratipakṣo dūrībhāvapratipakṣaḥ. dūrībhavanaṃ vā dūrībhāvaḥ. tasmai pratipakṣo dūrībhāvapratipakṣaḥ. vimuktimārgāt pareṇa yo mārga iti. yo 'sau vimuktimārgo duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ. tasmāt pareṇa yo
T07yabhkvyu:9979: mārgo duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāṃtyādi. sa dūrībhāvapratipakṣa iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:9980: vimuktimārgo 'pīty apara iti. [Tib. 160a] sa cāpy ādyo vimuktimārgo dūrībhāvapratipakṣa ity ucyate. so 'pi hi tāṃ kleśaprāptiṃ dūrīkaroti.
T07yabhkvyu:9981: evaṃ ca sati vimuktimārga ādhārapratipakṣo dūrībhāvapratipakṣa iti vaca nāmadvayaṃ labhata ity uktaṃ bhavati. taṃ dhātuṃ doṣato darśanād
T07yabhkvyu:9982: vidūṣayatīti. anityādibhir ākārair yena taṃ dhātuṃ vidūṣayatīty arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:9983: tad evaṃ sati yo 'pi duḥkhasamudayālaṃbanaḥ prahāṇapratipakṣādiḥ. sa cāpi vidūṣaṇāpratipakṣa iti darśitaṃ bhavatīti. api tv iyam ānupūrvī sādhvī bhaved ity ācāryaḥ. sopānanyāyasamāśrayāt lakṣaṇāsāṃkaryāc ceyam ānupūrvī sādhvīti darśayati. duḥkhasamudayālaṃbanaḥ prayogamārga iti. prayogamārga evoṣmagatādi gṛhyate. nānaṃtaryamārgādi. prahāṇapratipakṣāditvena
T07yabhkvyu:9985: vimuktimārgaḥ sarva ity eva cādhikriyate. viśeṣamārgas tu ya
T07yabhkvyu:9987: (V.60cd) na hi saṃprayogāt kleśo vivecayituṃ śakyata iti. svakalāpāt
T07yabhkvyu:9990: (Abhidh-k-vy 500) tasya na punas tad vastv ālaṃbyotpattir ity ataḥ kāraṇāt. atītas tu kathaṃ yad vastvālaṃbyotpannaḥ. na hy ālaṃbitaṃ vastv anālaṃbinīkartuṃ śakyate. eṣo 'pi naikāṃta iti. caturbhiḥ prakāraiḥ kleśānāṃ kṣaya iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:9991: ālaṃbanaparijñānāt tadālaṃbanasaṃkṣayāt ālaṃbanaprahāṇāc ca pratipakṣodayāt kṣaya
T07yabhkvyu:9992: iti. tasmād ālaṃbanaparijñānād iti nāyam ekāṃtaḥ. tasmād vaktavyam etad
T07yabhkvyu:9993: iti parihartavyam etad ity arthaḥ. atrācāryasaṃghabhadraḥ pariharati.
T07yabhkvyu:9994: ālaṃbanāt kleśāḥ prahātavyāḥ. ālaṃbanaparijñānabalena hi kleśāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:9995: prahīyaṃte. dvividhaṃ cānuśayālaṃbanaṃ. saṃyogavastu asaṃyogavastu ca.
T07yabhkvyu:9996: tatra saṃyogavastuviṣayāṇām anuśayānāṃ tadanuśayabalotpāditānām atadviṣayāṇām api pudgalasya saṃtāne prāptir akliṣṭacittasyāpy avicchedena pravartate. anāgatātītakleśahetuphalabhūtā. evam asaṃyogavastuviṣayāṇām atadviṣayāṇām api ca tadviṣayakleśapṛṣṭhasamudācariṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prāptir
T07yabhkvyu:9997: veditavyā. sā hy anāgatānām utpattau pratyayagamanād dhetubhūtā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:9998: atītānāṃ ca niṣyandabhāvāt [Tib. 161a] phalabhūtā. sā ca tatprahāṇapratipakṣaniṣyandaprāptisamavadhānaviruddhā.
T07yabhkvyu:9999: kleśānām. ato yenālaṃbanenotpannāḥ kleśā anyālaṃbanān api kleśān
T07yabhkvyu:10000: pravartayaṃti. tadālaṃbanaprahāṇapratipakṣaniṣyandotpattau tatprāptivigame te kleśās tadālaṃbanā api saṃto hetuphalāpakrāṃtāḥ prahīṇā ity ucyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:10001: tad yasmād aparijñāte kasmiṃścit kleśaviṣaye atadviṣayāṇām api kleśānāṃ tadviṣayakleśabalenaprāptir anāgatātītakleśahetuphalabhūtā saṃtatau pravartate yathā vastu. tasmād ālaṃbanāt kleśāḥ prahātavyā ity abhimataṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10003: nanu ca tadālaṃbanaprahāṇādibhir api kleśāḥ prahīyaṃta ity abhipretaṃ. kim idam uktam ālaṃbanaparijñānabalena kleśāḥ prahīyaṃta iti. te 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:10005: tadbhāvābhāvayogāt. yeṣām api hi pratipakṣodayāt prahāṇam ucyate. te 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:10007: avagaṃtavyaṃ. vyavasthāmātraṃ tu tad yad uktaṃ. tadālaṃbanaprahāṇādibhir
T07yabhkvyu:10008: [Tib. 161b] api kleśāḥ prahīyanta ity abhiprāyo lakṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10009: svāsāṃtānikaḥ prāpticchedād iti vistaraḥ. svasaṃtānakleśaḥ prāptivigamāt prahīṇo vaktavyaḥ. parasaṃtānakleśas tu na prāpticchedāt. svasaṃtāne
T07yabhkvyu:10012: (Abhidh-k-vy 501) rūpaṃ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtaṃ. akliṣṭaś ca dharma ity arūpī kuśalasāsravaṃ anivṛtavyākṛtaś ca. tathaiva tadālaṃbanasvāsāṃtānikakleśaprahāṇāt prahīṇo vaktavya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10015: lakṣaṇadūratā. tadyathā bhūtānāṃ. bhinnalakṣaṇo hi pṛthivīdhātor abdhātus tasmāt pṛthivīdhātor abdhātur dūre bhavati. vipakṣatvād vipakṣadūratā.
T07yabhkvyu:10016: tadyathā śīlasya dauḥśīlyaṃ. deśavicchedāt deśadūratā. tadyathā pradeśasya paścimasamudrasya pūrvasamudrāt. kālataḥ kāladūratā.
T07yabhkvyu:10018: dūram ucyate. kvocyate. abhidharme. evaṃ hy āha. dūre dharmāḥ katame.
T07yabhkvyu:10019: atītānāgatā dharmāḥ. aṃtike dharmāḥ katame. pratyutpannā dharmāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10020: asaṃskṛtaṃ ceti. tad dūram iti. tad atītānāgatam.
T07yabhkvyu:10021: utpadyamānaṃ ceti. utpādābhimukham anāgataṃ cety arthaḥ. na
T07yabhkvyu:10022: cirabhūtabhāvitveneti. na cirabhūtatvenātītaṃ nāpi cirabhāvitvenānāgataṃ dūram ity arthaḥ. vartamānam apy evaṃ dūraṃ prāpnotīti. adhvanānātvena pratyutpanno 'dhvatayā vartamānam api dūraṃ prāpnoti. yathātītānāgatam
T07yabhkvyu:10023: atītānāgatādhvatayā. akāritrāt tarhi tad dūram iti. uparatakāritram atītam aprāptakāritram anāgatam iti. tad atītānāgataṃ dūram ucyate. asaṃskṛtasya katham aṃtikatvam iti. tasya kāritrābhāvād aṃtikatvaṃ na syāt. tac ceṣyate aṃtike dharmāḥ katame. pratyutpannā dharmāḥ. asaṃskṛtaṃ ceti śāstrapāṭhāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10024: sarvatra tatprāpter iti. sarvatra deśe tasyāsaṃskṛtasya
T07yabhkvyu:10026: 162b] prasaṃga iti kuśalāder atītānāgatasya sarvatra deśe prāptiḥ saṃbhavatīty atītānāgate 'py aṃtikatvaprasaṃgaḥ. ākāśaṃ ca katham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10027: ākāśaṃ ca katham aṃtikaṃ. na hi tasya prāptir astīti. atītānāgatam anyonyam iti. atītād anāgataṃ dūram anāgatāc cātītam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10028: asaṃskṛtaṃ cāvyavahitatvād iti. na kenacid vyavahitaṃ. yathā vartamānenātītānāgatam iti. evaṃ tasyāṃtikatvaṃ. evam apīti. asyām api kalpanāyāṃ. yad anaṃtaram atītānāgataṃ. tad vartamānasyāṃtikatvād ubhayaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10029: prāpnoti. dūram āsannaṃ ceti. tad dhy atītaṃ vartamānāṃtaritatvād anāgatād dūraṃ. vartamānāc cāvyavahitatvād aṃtikam iti prāpnoti. ity evam anāgatam
T07yabhkvyu:10031: evaṃ tu yuktaṃ syād iti. svamatam ācāryasya. dharmasvalakṣaṇād anāgataṃ dūraṃ. kasmāt. asaṃprāptatvāt. yasmād anāgatena svalakṣaṇaṃ na saṃprāptam (Abhidh-k-vy 502) iti. atha vā yasmāt tatsvalakṣaṇam asaṃprāptam anupasthitam iti. atītaṃ ca. kiṃ dharmasvalakṣaṇād dūraṃ. tatpracyutatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10032: yasmāt tad dharmasvalakṣaṇaṃ. tasmād atītāt pracyutaṃ. tad dhy atītaṃ yad dharmasvalakṣaṇāt pracyutam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10034: ity uktam. ataḥ pṛcchati. kiṃ mārgaviśeṣagamanād iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10035: prahāṇaviśeṣa [Tib. 163a] iti. viśiṣyate prahāṇam ity arthaḥ. pratipakṣo vimuktimārga etasminn abhipreta iti. tasya visaṃyogaprāptisahotpādād ānaṃtaryamārge hi na tāvad visaṃyogaprāptir asti. utpādābhimukhatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10036: vimuktimārgo 'pi hi pratipakṣa iti śakyate vyavasthāpayituṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10038: ubhābhyāṃ hi tasya prāptiḥ visaṃyogaprāpter āvāhakasaṃniśrayatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10040: puruṣakārādipaṃcaphalapratipattinirāsārthaṃ vā. phalaprāptir api vimuktimārgāvasthāyām eva gṛhyate. visaṃyogalābhāstitvayogād indriyavivṛddhiḥ indriyasaṃcāra iti. indriyādhikyapratipattinirāsārtham etad arthapradarśanaṃ indriyavivṛddhir ity ucyate. phalaprāptivacanenaiva siddher ity ācāryasaṃghabhadraḥ. atra brūmaḥ. satyaṃ phalaprāptir evendriyavivṛddhiḥ. phalaprāptiviśeṣas tu pradarśayitavyo yatra punar visaṃyogaphalalābho bhavati. anyathā hi phalaprāptivacanam api na kartavyaṃ syāt. pratipakṣodayavacanenaiva tatsiddheḥ. [Tib. 163b] ity alam anayātikhalinikayā. keṣāṃcid yāvad dvayor iti. keṣāṃcit kleśānāṃ ṣaṭsu
T07yabhkvyu:10041: kāleṣu viaṃyogalābhaḥ. yāvacchabdena keṣāṃcit paṃcasu. keṣāṃcic caturṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:10042: keṣāṃcit triṣu. keṣāṃcid dvayor iti. keṣāṃcid dvayor iti. keṣāṃcid ekāsmin kāla iti noktaṃ. punaḥprāptasya visaṃyogasyādhikṛtatvāt. saṃbhavati hi bhāvāgrikasya navamasya prakārasyaikasminn eva kāle tīkṣṇendriyasya
T07yabhkvyu:10043: visaṃyogalābhaḥ. sa tu na punarlābha iti nocyate. tatra tāvan mṛdvindriyasya ṣaṭsu kāleṣu
T07yabhkvyu:10045: pratipakṣodayakāle. srotaāpattiphalakāle sakṛdāgāmiphalakāle 'nāgāmiphalakāle 'rhattvaphalakāle indriyasaṃcārakāle ceti ṣaṭsu kāleṣu
T07yabhkvyu:10046: visaṃyogalābhaḥ. saṃbhavaṃ ca praty evam ucyate. na hi mṛdvindriyo 'vaśyam
T07yabhkvyu:10048: mārgadarśanaheyānāṃ mārgānvayajñānakāle pratipakṣodayakāla iti vā phalaprāptikāla iti vā gṛhīte prathamato visaṃyogalābhaḥ. punaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaprāptikāle (Abhidh-k-vy 503) yāvad indriyasaṃcārakāla iti
T07yabhkvyu:10049: paṃcasu kāleṣu. bhāvanāheyānām api tasyaive kāmāvacarāṇāṃ paṃcaprakārāṇāṃ adhimātrādhimātrasya yāvan madhyamadhyasya. [Tib. 164a] teṣv eva srotaāpattiphalakālavarjyeṣu paṃcasu kāleṣu visaṃyogalābhaḥ. madhyamṛdos tu ṣaṣṭhasya prakārasya tasyaiva caturṣu kāleṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:10052: tasyaiva mṛdvadhimātrasya mṛdumadhyasya ca saptamāṣṭamayoḥ prakārayoḥ pratipakṣodayakāle 'nāgāmiphalakāle yāvad indriyasaṃcārakāle veti caturṣv eva kāleṣu visaṃyogalābhaḥ. tasyaiva mṛdumṛdor aṃtyasya prakārasya pratipakṣodayakāla iti vā phalaprāptikāla iti vaikatarasmin.
T07yabhkvyu:10053: arhattvaphalakāle. indriyasaṃcārakāle ceti triṣu kāleṣu visaṃyogalābhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10054: tasyaivārhattvaphalaṃ prāpnuvato ye navaprakārā rūpārūpyāvacarāḥ kleśā bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ prahīṇāḥ adhimātradhimātro yāvan mṛdumṛdur iti. teṣāṃ bhāvāgrikaṃ mṛdumṛduprakāram aṃtyaṃ hitvā sarveṣāṃ triṣv eva kāleṣu
T07yabhkvyu:10056: ceti. yas tv asyaivārūpyāvacaro mṛdumṛdur aṃtyaḥ kleśaprakāraḥ. tasya
T07yabhkvyu:10057: pratipakṣodayārhattvaphalaprāptikālaikatvāt. pratipakṣodayakāla iti vārhattvaphalakāla iti vā anyatarasminn indriyasaṃcārakāle ceti. [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:10058: 164b] dvayoḥ kālayor visaṃyogalābha iti. evaṃ tāvan mṛdvindriyasyoktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10059: tīkṣṇendriyasya punaḥ keṣāṃcit kleśānāṃ paṃcasu kāleṣu. keṣāṃcid yāvad dvayor iti vaktavyaṃ. indriyasaṃcārakālam ekam apāsya. tasya hi sarvatrendriyasaṃcāro nāsti. tasyaikasminn eva kāle kleśānāṃ visaṃyogalābho 'sti. bhāvāgrikasya bhāvanāheyasya mṛdumṛdoḥ prakārasya. sa tu punarlābho na bhavatīti na vaktavya iti paśyāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10060: (V.63, 64) phale hetūpacārād iti. prahāṇaṃ phalaṃ parijñā jñānasvabhāvo hetuḥ tasmin prahāṇe. phale hetūpacāraḥ. prahāṇaṃ parijñeti. tadyathā ṣaḍ imāni sparśāyatanāni pūrvam abhisaṃskṛtāny abhisaṃcetitāni paurāṇaṃ karma veditavyaṃ iti. kaḥ punaḥ prahāṇaṃ parijñāśabdenāpadiśate. sūtre evaṃ hi
T07yabhkvyu:10061: paṭhyate. parijñeyāṃś ca vo bhikṣavo dharmān deśayiṣyāmi. parijñāṃ ca parijñāvantaṃ ca pudgalaṃ. parijñeyā dharmāḥ katame. paṃcopādānaskandhāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10062: parijñā katamā. yad atra cchandarāgaprahāṇaṃ. chandarāgasamatikramaḥ. iyam ucyate parijñeti
T07yabhkvyu:10067: ity atra parijñāvyavasthāpane kāraṇaṃ vakṣyate. avarabhāgīyaprahāṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10068: kāmadhātvāsravaprahāṇam ity arthaḥ. iyam eva cāsyāḥ saṃjñā.
T07yabhkvyu:10070: rūparāgakṣayaparijñety asyā nāma. yady apy anyeṣāṃ kleśopakleśānāṃ mānādīnāṃ rūpāvacarāṇāṃ prahāṇam iyaṃ parijñā vyavasthāpyate. rāgasya tu tatra prādhānyād ūrdhvabhāgīyasya saṃyojanasya prahāṇaṃ rūparāgakṣayaparijñety uktaṃ. sarvasaṃyojanaparyādāna [kun tu sbyor ba
T07yabhkvyu:10071: thams cad yoṅs su grugs paḥi] yoṅs su śes paḥo. ṣes bya ba ḥdi ni zag pa thams cad spaṅs paḥi miṅ yin no. yoṅs su śes pa ni tha dad par bstan la.
T07yabhkvyu:10072: ṣes bya ba ni bsgroms pas spaṅ bar bya ba gzugs na spyod pa rnams spaṅs pa ni gzugs kyi ḥdod chags zad paḥi yoṅs su śes pa yin no. gzugs med par nams kyi ni kun tu sbyor ba thams cad yoṅs su grugs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa yin no.
T07yabhkvyu:10073: ṣes ḥbyuṅ baḥi phyir ro. mthoṅ baḥi spaṅ bar bya bar nams kyi ni ma yin te. ṣes bya ba ni ciḥi phyir gzugs daṅ gzugs med pa na spyod paḥi mthoṅ
T07yabhkvyu:10074: bas spaṅ bar bya bar nams kyi yoṇs su śes pa so sor mi bstan te. de bṣin du gzugs daṅ gzugs med pa na spyod pa mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya bar nams spaṅs pa yaṅ yoṅs su śes pa gsum yin te. ṣe ḥbyuṅ baḥi phyir ro. bsgom pa spaṅ bar bya bar nams kyi gñen po mi ḥdra baḥi phyir ro ṣes bya ba ni ḥdi
T07yabhkvyu:10075: ltar sa daṅ sa na gzugs na spyod [Tib. 165b] paḥi bsgom pas spaṅ bar bya
T07yabhkvyu:10076: ba rnam pa dguḥi gñen po bar chad med pa daṅ rnam par grol baḥi lam zag pa med pa mi lcogs pa med pa la sogs paḥi sa daṅ zag pa daṅ bcas pa bsam gtan gñis paḥi ñer ba stogs kyis bsdus pa nas nam mkhaḥ mthaḥ yas skye mched kyi ñer bsdogs kyis bsdus paḥi bar rnam pa dgu yod la gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams kyi gñen po bar chad med paḥi lam daṅ. rnam par grol baḥi lam in ci rigs par zug pa med paḥi sa ḥog ma pa ḥam. ci rigs par zag pa daṅ bcas pa goṅ maḥi ñer bsdogs kyis bsdus pa dag yod de. gṣan kho na yin pas gñen po mi ḥdra baḥi phyir ḥdi dag gis yoṅs su 'śes pa tha dad par stan to. mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba rnams kyi gñen po ni ḥdra ste. rjes su śes paḥi bzod pa la sogs pa gzugs na spyod par nams kyi gñen po de dag ñid
T07yabhkvyu:10077: gzugs med par nams kyi yaṅ yin pas yoṅs su śes pa tha tad du rnam par mi bṣag go.
T07yabhkvyu:10079: (V.64-66) tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs pa la sogs pa yoṅs su śes pa ste ṣes bya ba ni tha maḥi cha daṅ ṃthun pa spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa daṅ.
T07yabhkvyu:10080: gzugs kyi ḥdod chags zad paḥi yoṅs su śes pa daṅ. kuntu sbyor ba thams cad yoṅs su gtugs paḥi yoṅs su śes paḥo. ḥdi dag ni bsgom paḥi lam gyi ḥbras bu yin paḥi phyir śes paḥi ḥbras bu yin te. bsgom paḥi lam la bzod pa dag ni med do.
T07yabhkvyu:10081: ji ltar yoṅs su śes pa bzod paḥi ḥbras bu yin ṣes bya ba ni yoṅs su śes pa daṅ śes pa ṣes bya ba don gcig ste. śes pa daṅ yoṅs su śes pa ni zag pa med paḥi ye śes yin no ṣes ḥbyuṅ baḥi phyir ro. bam po bṣi bcu rtsa bṣi
T07yabhkvyu:10083: dri med bzod rnams śes pa med.
T07yabhkvyu:10084: ṣas ḥbyuṅ bas bzod pa ni śes paḥi ṅo bo [Tib. 166a] ñid yin par yaṅ mi ruṅ
T07yabhkvyu:10085: na. de ji ltar yoṅs su śes pa bzod paḥi ḥbras bu yin te. ḥbras bu la rgyu btags byas na yaṅ mi ruṅ ṅo sñam du bsam pa yin no. ḥdir bzod pa rnams ni śes paḥi ḥkhor can yin paḥi phyir ṣes bya ba smos te. ḥdi dag la ḥkhor śes pa yod pas na śes paḥi ḥkhor can te. bzod par nams so. deḥi phyir śes paḥi ḥbras bu yaṅ bzod par nams kyi ḥbras bu ṣes byaḥo. rgyal baḥi ḥkhor la rgyal po ñe bar btags pa bṣin te dper na rgyal poḥi ḥkhor la rgyal po ñe
T07yabhkvyu:10086: bar btags paḥi phyir ḥkhor gyis byas pa la yaṅ rgyal pos byas pa ṣes byaa daṅ ḥdra ḥo. śes pa daṅ ḥbras bu gcig phyir ro ṣes bya ba ni bzod pa dag
T07yabhkvyu:10087: ni śes pa daṅ lhan cig ḥbras bu gcig pa yin te. bzod pa dag gi ḥbras bu
T07yabhkvyu:10088: gaṅ yin pa de ñid śes rnams kyi yin pas bzod paḥi ḥbras bu yaṅ yoṅs su śes par ruṅ ṅo.
T07yabhkvyu:10089: mi lcogs med ḥbras thams cad do ṣes bya ba ni ḥdi ltar mi lcogs paḥi sa paḥi lam gyis khams gsum paḥi mthoṅ ba daṅ bsgom pas spaṅ bar bya baḥi zag pa rnams spaṅ ba srid de.
T07yabhkvyu:10090: zag med mi lcogs med pa yis. thams cad las ni ḥdod chags bral.
T07yabhkvyu:10091: ṣes ḥbyuṅ baḥi phyir ro. gzugs daṅ gzugs med pa na ñon moṅs pa spaṅs paḥi raṅ bṣin gaṅ dag yin paḥo. ṣes bya ba ni bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re
T07yabhkvyu:10092: gzugs daṅ gzugs med pa na spyod paḥi mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba rnams spaṅs pa ji skad bśad paḥi yoṅs su śes pa gsum daṅ. bsgom pas spaṅ bar bya ba
T07yabhkvyu:10093: gzugs na spyod pa rnams spaṅs pa gzugs kyi ḥdod chags zad paḥi yoṅs su śes pa daṅ gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams spaṅs pa kun tu sbyor ba thams cad yoṅs su gtugs paḥi [Tib. 166b] yoṅs su śes pa ṣes bya ba lṅa ste. bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣi la brten nas gzugs daṅ gzugs med pa na spyod paḥi ñon moṅs pa spoṅ ba srid paḥi phyir ro. ḥdod pa na spyod paḥi ñon moṅs pa spaṅs pa ni bsam gtan gi dṅos gṣiḥi ḥbras bu ma yin te. bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣi rnams ni ḥdod paḥi (Abhidh-k-vy 506) khams kyi gñen po ma yin paḥi phyir ro. de lta bas na ḥdod chags daṅ bral ba rnams la bral baḥi thob pa
T07yabhkvyu:10094: zag pa med pa yod du zin kyaṅ tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa bṣin du ḥdod pa na spyod pa mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba spaṅs pa ni bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣiḥi ḥbras bu ma yin no ṣes zer ro. btsun pa dbyaṅs
T07yabhkvyu:10095: sgrogs kyi lugs kyis ni brgyad de. ṣes bya ba ni btsun pa dbyaṅs sgrogs de
T07yabhkvyu:10096: ni ḥdod paḥi ḥdod chags daṅ bral baḥi gaṅ zag gi yaṅ ḥdod pa na spyod pa mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba rnams spaṅ spa yoṅs su śes pa gsum gyi ṅo bo ñid ḥphag paḥi lam gyi ḥbras bu yin par ḥdod do. ciḥi phyir ṣe na. bral baḥi thob pa zag pa med pa rñed paḥi phyir te. bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣi la rten nas ṅes pa ḥjug pa na yaṅ ma thoṅ bas spaṅ bas spaṅ bar bya baḥi zag pa sṅon ḥjig rten paḥi lam gyis spaṅs pa rnams kyis bral baḥi thob pa zag pa med pa yaṅ ḥthob la de la na mthoṅ baḥi lam gyis nus pa yod pas gzugs daṅ
T07yabhkvyu:10097: gzugs med pa ba spyod paḥi mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba spaṅs pa bṣin du.
T07yabhkvyu:10098: ḥdod pa na spyod paḥi mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba sṅon spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa yaṅ dṅos gṣi bsam gtan gyi ḥbras buḥo ṣes bya bar rnam pa bṣag go.
T07yabhkvyu:10099: de lta ba sna ḥdod pa na spyod paḥi mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa gsum po ḥdi dga daṅ sṅar bśad pa gzugs daṅ gzugs med paḥi yoṅs su śes pa daṅ bcas pa yoṅs su śes pa brgyad bsam gtan gyi ḥbras bu yin [Tib. 167a] no. śes bya ba ni btsun pa dbyaṅs sgrogs kyi gṣuṅ lugs yin
T07yabhkvyu:10100: no. tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa ni mi lcogs pa med paḥi ḥbras bu kho na yin no. ṣes bya ba ni ḥdod pa las ḥdod chags ma bral ba ni mi lcogs pa med pa kho nas tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spoṅ bar byed
T07yabhkvyu:10101: kyi dṅos gṣis ni ma yin te. de na ma thob paḥi phyir ro. ḥdod chags daṅ
T07yabhkvyu:10102: bral ba ston du ḥgro ba yaṅ gaṅ gi tshe bsam gtan la brten nas ñes pa la des kyaṅ so soḥi skye boḥi snas skabs na ḥjig rten paḥi lam gyis ḥdod pa na spyad paḥi ñon moṅs pa thams cad spaṅs pas de bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣiḥi ḥbras bu ma yin no. sems kyi skad cig ma bcu drug la deḥi tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs pa yoṅs su śes pa bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣi la brten par yaṅ
T07yabhkvyu:10103: rnam par bṣag mod kyi deḥi ḥbras bu ṣes bya bar rnam par bṣag pa ni ma yin
T07yabhkvyu:10104: no. ḥo na ci ṣe na. gnas skabs de na tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs pa
T07yabhkvyu:10105: ḥjig rten paḥi lam gyis thob paḥi bral baḥi thob pa zag pa med pa yaṅ ḥthob pas de spaṅ spaḥi yoṅs su śes par rnam par bṣag ste. deḥi tshe ni
T07yabhkvyu:10106: mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba sṅa ma spaṅs pas sṅar mthoṅ baḥi lam gyis spaṅ bar bya ba spaṅs pa gaṅ yin pa daṅ. sṅar spaṅs pa tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs pa bsdoms nas tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa gcig tu rnam par bṣag ste.
T07yabhkvyu:10108: khams las ḥdod chags bral ba daṅ ḥbras bu thob phyir de dag bsdoms ṣes thams cad bsdoms paḥi gtan tshigs yod paḥi phyir ro. de lta bas na tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa de ni mi lcogs pa med paḥi
T07yabhkvyu:10109: ḥbras bu kho nar rnam pa bṣag gi. dṅos gṣiḥi ḥbras bu ni ma [Tib. 167b]
T07yabhkvyu:10110: yin te. ḥdi la ni bye brag tu smra ba daṅ. btsun pa dbyaṅs sgrogs kyi gṣuṅ
T07yabhkvyu:10112: bsam gtan khyad par can yaṅ bsams bṣin du blta bar byaḥo ṣes bya ba ni bsam gtan khyad par can gyi zag pa med pas kyaṅ ñon moṅs pa spoṅ bar ḥgyur
T07yabhkvyu:10113: te. de lta bas na mi lcogs pa med pa daṅ. dṅos gṣiḥi bsam gtan rnams kho
T07yabhkvyu:10114: naḥi ḥbras bu kho na bśad kyi. bsam gtan khyad par can gyi ni ma yin no.
T07yabhkvyu:10115: deḥi phyir bsam gtan khyad par can yaṅ bsam gtan bṣin du blta bar byaḥo ṣes bya ba smos te. bsam gtan khyad par can ni bsam gtan daṅ po kho na
T07yabhkvyu:10116: rtog pa daṅ bral bas khyad par du ḥphags paḥi phyir ro. [nam mkhaḥ mthaḥ yas skye mched kyi ñer bsdogs kyi ṣes ba ba ni.] dhyānāṃtaraṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10127: dharmajñānaṃ nirodhe yan mārge vā bhāvanāpathe tridhātupratipakṣas tad
T07yabhkvyu:10131: tayor dharmajñānānvayajñānayoḥ pakṣasya. ṣaṭ paṃca ca yathāyogaṃ pakṣagrahaṇena kṣāṃtijñānayor grahaṇaṃ. yā eva dharmajñānakṣāṃtijñānānām
T07yabhkvyu:10133: dharmajñānakṣāṃtīnāṃ kāmāvacaradarśanaheyaprahāṇasvabhāvā yathoktas tisraḥ parijñāḥ phalaṃ. dharmajñānānām iti bhāvanāmārge.
T07yabhkvyu:10136: avarabhāgīyaprahāṇarūparāgakṣayasarvasaṃyojanaparyādānaparijñāḥ. yā evānvayakṣāṃtijñānānām iti. anvayajñānakṣāṃtīnāṃ anvayajñānānāṃ ca. tāś ca rūpārūpyāvacaradarśanaheyaprahāṇasvabhāvā yathoktās tisraḥ parijñāḥ dve ca
T07yabhkvyu:10139: duḥkhadarśanaheyaprahāṇasamudayadarśanaheyaprahāṇaṃ vistareṇa yāvad bhāvāgrikasya mṛdumṛdoḥ prakārasya prahāṇam iti kasmān na gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10148: ebhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ prakṛṣṭaṃ tatprahāṇam ity atra parijñeti vyavasthāpyata ity
T07yabhkvyu:10149: abhiprāyaḥ. anyeṣu dharmānvayajñāneṣv iti. samudayadharmajñānam ārabhya yāvat kṣayajñānam ity eteṣu dharmajñānānvayajñāneṣu. jñānaphalaṃ tu prahāṇam iti. bhāvanāmārge. tad dhi na kṣāṃtiphalam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10151: iti. caśabdo luptanirdiṣṭaḥ. dhātvatikramāc ceti. ata eva vivriyate
T07yabhkvyu:10152: caturthāc ceti. yadā dhātuṃ samatikrāmatīti. kāmadhātuṃ rūpadhātum ārūpyadhātuṃ vā samatikrāmati. tadā parijñākhyāṃ labhata iti vākyaśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10153: kasmāt. kṛtsnadhātuvairāgyāt. kṛtsnasya dhātor vairāgyāt. na
T07yabhkvyu:10154: vikalīkaraṇamātratvāt. tadā hi suṣṭhu prahāṇam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10155: ubhayasaṃyogavisaṃyogam iti. ālaṃbyālaṃbakakleśalakṣaṇaḥ saṃyoga ubhayasaṃyogaḥ. tasmād visaṃyoga ubhayasaṃyogavisaṃyogaḥ. tat paṃcamaṃ kāraṇam āhur ābhidhārmikāḥ. [Tib. 169a] anena ca kāraṇena prahāṇaṃ parijñety ucyata iti. yaḥ prakāraḥ prahīṇa iti duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo yāvaṃ mārgadarśanaprahātavyo bhāvanāprahātavyaś ca. yadi tatra prahīṇe
T07yabhkvyu:10156: (Abhidh-k-vy 509) prakāre anyena tadālaṃbanena kleśena darśanaprahātavyena bhāvanāprahātavyena visaṃyukto bhavati. evam idam api paṃcamaṃ kāraṇaṃ prahāṇasya parijñāvidhāne āhur apare. sa tu nānyad iti vistaraḥ. sa tūbhayasaṃyoga ubhayahetusamudghātāt duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyasya samudayadarśanaprahātavyasya ca sarvatragahetoḥ samudghātād dhātusamatikramāc ca nānyaḥ. tathā hi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyeṣu prahīṇeṣv api na tāvad asti hetudvayasamudghāto yāvat tadālaṃbanaḥ samudayadarśanaprahātavyaḥ sarvatragahetur aprahīṇo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10157: bhāvanāprahātavyeṣu ca prahīṇeṣv api yāvad aṣṭāsu prakāreṣu na tāvad dhātvatikramo 'sti yāvan na navamasyāpi prakārasya prahāṇam ity ato na punar brūmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10160: anāsravavisaṃyogaprāptyabhāvāt. āryo 'pi darśanamārgastho yāvat samudayadharmajñānakṣāṃtau. yāvacchabdena duḥkhadharmānvayajñānakṣāṃtijñāneṣu samudayadharmajñānakṣāṃtau ca naiva samanvāgataḥ. hetudvayasyāprahīṇatvāt. samudayadharmajñāna ekayā samanvāgataḥ samudayānvayajñānakṣāṃtāv apy ekayaiva samanvāgata ity
T07yabhkvyu:10161: avagaṃtavyaṃ. samudayānvayajñāne dvābhāṃ pūrvoktayā ekayā kāmāvacaraduḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyaprahāṇaparijñayā rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahāṇaparijñayā ca.
T07yabhkvyu:10162: nirodhadharmajñānakṣāṃtāv api dvābhyām eva. nirodhadharmajñāne tisṛbhir iti neyaṃ. yāvat paṃcabhir darśanāsthaḥ samanvāgato na ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣoḍaśasya kṣaṇasya bhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhītatvāt. mārgānvayajñāne ṣaḍbhir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10163: pūrvoktābhiś ca rūpārūpyāvacaramārgadarśanaprahāṇaparijñayā ca. nanu ca paścād vakṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:10164: catuḥphalavyavasthā tu paṃca kāraṇasaṃbhavāt pūrvatyāgo 'nyamārgāptiḥ kṣayasaṃkalaṇaṃ phale jñānāṣṭakasya lābho 'tha ṣoḍaśākārabhāvaneti.
T07yabhkvyu:10165: bhavati prahāṇasaṃkalanaṃ. na tu parijñāsaṃkalanam ity avirodhaḥ. yāvat kāmavairāgyaṃ na prāpta iti. yāvacchabdena bhāvanāheyakleśaprathamaprakāraprahāṇe [Tib. 170a] yāvad aṣṭamaprakāraprahāṇe 'pi ṣaḍbhir eva samanvāgataḥ. parihīṇo 'pi tata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10166: kāmavairāgyaparihāṇyā hi tatsaṃkalanavigataḥ. kāmavairāgyaṃ prāptaḥ pūrvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10167: paścād veti. abhisamayāt pūrvaṃ paścād vā. kathaṃ. laukikena mārgeṇa kāmavītarāgo bhūtvā niyāmam avakrāṃto mārge 'nvayajñāne
T07yabhkvyu:10169: ṣoḍaśakṣaṇaṃ prāpto 'nāgāmy eva bhavati. na srotaāpannaḥ. sakṛdāgāmī
T07yabhkvyu:10171: tasmād darśanaheyaprahāṇānāṃ paṃcāvarabhāgīyaprahāṇasya ca saṃkalanād ekayaivāvarabhagīyaprahāṇaparijñayā samanvāgataḥ. paścād vābhisamayād ānupūrvikaḥ kāmavairāgyaprāpta ekayaivāvarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñayā
T07yabhkvyu:10172: samanvāgataḥ. arhattvaprāpta ekayaiveti. tadā parijñāsaṃkalanāt. parihīṇo
T07yabhkvyu:10174: ṣaṭparijñāsamanvāgamaparihārārtham ārūpyāvacareṇa ca parihāṇau dviparijñāsamanvāgamaparihārārtham iti. rūpavairāgyaṃ [Tib. 170b] prāpto dvābhyām iti. anāgāmī rūpavītarāga ity arthaḥ. dhātuvairāgyeṇa kasmān na
T07yabhkvyu:10175: saṃkalanaṃ bhavati. phalaprāptyabhāvāt. dhātuvairāgyaphalaprāptibhyāṃ samastābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ parijñāsaṃkalanam iṣyate. na kevalena parihīṇo
T07yabhkvyu:10177: parihāṇau punarlābhāt. rūpāvacareṇa tu parihāṇāv ekayā samanvāgataḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10178: kāmāvacareṇa ca ṣaḍhiḥ samanvāgataḥ syād ity
T07yabhkvyu:10181: rūpavītarāgānāgāminaḥ parijñādvayasamanvāgamavacanāt. na bhūyasya iti. na
T07yabhkvyu:10182: bahutarāḥ. ānupūrvikasrotaāpannavad ity abhiprāyaḥ. dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām iti vyākhyātaṃ. saṃkalanam iti ko 'rthaḥ ekatvena vyavasthāpanam iti yo
T07yabhkvyu:10183: 'rthaḥ. tayoś cāvasthayor iti. kāmavītarāgānāgāmyarhattvāvasthayor etad ubhayaṃ. dhātuvairāgyaṃ phalaprāptiś ceti. ekaparijñocyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10192: kaścid ekāṃ kaścid dve kaścit ṣaṭ. kaścit paṃcāpnotīty etan nāsti. ata
T07yabhkvyu:10195: paṃca naiva kaścid āpnoti. iti sūtrārthanayaḥ. vṛttis tu vivriyate
T07yabhkvyu:10196: arhattvāt parihīyamāṇo yena kenacit cittena sarvasaṃyojanaparyādānaparijñām ekāṃ tyajati. saṃkalane tasyā ekaikasyā
T07yabhkvyu:10197: arhattvāvasthāyām astitvāt. evaṃ kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇo rūpavītarāgo
T07yabhkvyu:10199: avarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñāṃ. rūparāgakṣayaparijñāṃ ca. ko 'sāv ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:10200: anāgāmī rūpavītarāgaḥ kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇa iti. paṃca tyajati vītarāgapūrvī mārgānvayajñāna [tib 171b] iti. abhisamayacitte ṣoḍaśe. sa hy avarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñālābhe. laukikamārgaprāptasya tasyānāsravavisaṃyogaprāptyā pūrvikāḥ paṃca parijñāḥ paṃcadaśakṣaṇalabdhās
T07yabhkvyu:10203: saṃkaliteti naṣṭarūpeva sā nopanyasyate. ānupūrviko yo na vītarāgapūrvī kāmavairāgyāt kāraṇāt ṣaṭ tyajati. yās traidhātukānāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10205: lābho 'py evam iti. kaścid ekāṃ labhate. paṃceti muktvā. yāvat ṣaṭ labhate. yaḥ kaścid apūrvaṃ labhata iti. darśanamārgastho bhāvanāmārgastho vā navānāṃ parijñānāṃ yo pratilabdhapūrvāṃ pratilabhate prathamataḥ. sa tām ekāṃ labhate. bhāvanāmārge 'pi hi vītarāgapūrvī darśanamārgāṃte
T07yabhkvyu:10206: avarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñām ekāṃ labhate. ānupārviko 'pi kāmavairāgye navame vimuktimārge tām eva labhate. arhann apy anyām labhata iti. kevalād ārūpyavairāgyāt parihīyata iti. nānyavairāgyād iti darśayati. sa hy avarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñāṃ [Tib. 172a] rūparāgakṣayaparijñāṃ ca labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:10207: kaścit ṣaḍ yo 'nāgāmiphalāt parihīyata iti. ānupūrviko 'nāgāmī. na hi vītarāgapūrviṇaḥ parihāṇir asti. tadvairāgyasya dvimārgaprāpaṇāt. ata eva ca naiva kaścit paṃca labhate. vītarāgapūrviṇo hi yadi parihāṇir
T07yabhkvyu:10208: abhaviṣyat. sa eva yugapat paṃca parijñā alapsyateti.
T07yabhkvyu:10209: ācāryayaśomitrakṛtāyām abhidharmakośavyākyāyām anuśayanirdeśo nāma paṃcamaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10213: (VI.1) paṃcamasya ṣaṣṭhasya ca kośasthānayoḥ saṃbaṃdham upadarśayann idam
T07yabhkvyu:10214: upanyasyati. uktaṃ yathāprahāṇam ityadi. yathāprahāṇaṃ parijñā labhata
T07yabhkvyu:10215: iti. phale hetūpacārād iti vacanāt. tad api ca
T07yabhkvyu:10219: iti. dvaṃdvaikavadbhāvanirdeśaḥ. satyānāṃ darśanād bhāvanāc ca bhāvanāyā iti vā. satyadarśanabhāvanāt kāraṇād darśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāś ca kleśā iti vistareṇoktaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10220: daśaita sapta saptaṣṭau tridvidṛṣṭivivarjitāḥ yathākramaṃ prahīyaṃte kāme duḥkhādidarśanaiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10221: catvāro bhāvanāheyā ity ādinā. [Tib. 172b] satyadarśanaṃ ca darśanamārgeṇa satyabhāvanaṃ ca bhāvanāmārgeṇety ata idam ucyate. tāv idānīṃ darśanabhāvanāmārgau kim anāsravau sāsravāv iti. mārganirdeśopanyāsa iti saṃbandhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10222: traidhātukapratipakṣatvād iti darśanamārgasya. laukikatve sati bhavāgrapratipakṣo na syād iti. kiṃ ca navaprakārāṇāṃ darśanaheyānāṃ sakṛtprahāṇāc ca. na bhāvanāmārgavat. na hi laukikasyaiṣā śaktir asti.
T07yabhkvyu:10223: traidhātukaprahāṇe ca prakāraprahāṇe ca. yadi lokottarasya navaprakārasakṛtprahāṇe śaktiḥ. bhāvanāheyānām api lokottareṇa
T07yabhkvyu:10224: sakṛtprahāṇaprasaṃgaḥ. lokottareṇaiva sakṛtprahāṇam ity avadhāryate. na tu sakṛtprahāṇam eva lokottareṇeti ato na tatprasaṃgaḥ. bhāvanāheyā hi kleśā
T07yabhkvyu:10225: dṛḍhāḥ savastukatvāt. ato lokottareṇāpy eṣāṃ na sakṛtprahāṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10227: (VI.2) itarathā hīti. yadi yathābhisamayaṃ nirdeśo nābhiprīyeta. pūrvaṃ hetunirdeśaḥ samudayasatyanirdeśaḥ. hetūnāṃ loke pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭatvāt. yathā smṛtyupasthānadhyānādīnām iti. tadyathā smṛtyupasthānādīnām upapattyanukūlā deśanā. kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ hi pūrvam utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10228: yathaudārikālaṃbanataḥ [Tib. 173a] sūkṣmaudārikapracārato vā pūrvottarahetuphalabhāvato vā. tato vedanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ. tataś cittasmṛtyupasthānam ity eṣām upapattyanukūlā deśanā evaṃ dhyānānām.
T07yabhkvyu:10230: deśanā. keṣāṃcit prarūpaṇānukūleti. pradarśanānukūlā avabodhānukūlety arthaḥ. yathā samyakprahāṇānām iti. kṛṣṇaśuklapakṣayoḥ pratyekam utpannānutpannabhedataḥ. utpannaṃ hi sukhāvabadhaṃ nānutpannaṃ. kṛṣṇapakṣo vā vineyajanena sukham avabudhyate. katham utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate. vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10231: pragṛhṇāti praṇidadhāti. anutpannānām anutpādāya chandaṃ janayatīti
T07yabhkvyu:10232: pūrvavat. anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya chandaṃ janayatīti
T07yabhkvyu:10233: pūrvavat. utpannānāṃ sthitaye asaṃmoṣatāyai chandaṃ janayatīti pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:10234: na hy eṣa niyamo yat pūrvam utpannānāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati. paścād anutpannānām anutpādāyeti. kiṃ tarhi. pūrvaṃ cānutpannānām anutpādāya
T07yabhkvyu:10235: chandaṃ janayati. [Tib. 173b] paścāc cotpannānāṃ prahāṇāyety etad
T07yabhkvyu:10236: udāharaṇaṃ. evaṃ śuklapakṣo 'pi yojyaḥ. satyānāṃ tv abhisamayānukūleti
T07yabhkvyu:10237: hetuphalayoḥ pūrvapaścādbhāvena duḥkhasamudayasatyayoḥ paścātpūrvanirdeśaprasaṃga iti darśayati. yatra hi sakta iti. duḥkhasatye.
T07yabhkvyu:10238: yena bādhyata iti tenaivaṃ. yataś ca mokṣam iti. tata eva duḥkhasatyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10239: tad evādau payogāvasthāyāṃ. kasmād ity āha. vyavacāraṇāvasthāyāṃ parīkṣāvasthāyāṃ nirvedhabhāgīyāvasthāyām ity arthaḥ. vyādhiṃ dṛṣṭveti.
T07yabhkvyu:10241: nirodhasatyasya. tadbheṣajaṃ mārgasatyasyopamānaṃ. sūtre 'py eṣa satyānāṃ dṛṣṭāṃta iti. vyādhyādisūtre. kathaṃ. caturbhir aṃgaiḥ samanvāgato bhiṣak śalyāpahartā rājārhaś ca bhavati rājayogyaś ca rājāṃgatve ca saṃkhyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10243: ābādhasamutthānakuśalaḥ. ābādhaprahāṇakuśalaḥ. prahīṇasya cābādhasyāyatyām anutpādakuśalaḥ. evam eva caturbhir aṃgaiḥ samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhan
T07yabhkvyu:10244: samyaksaṃbuddho 'nuttaro bhiṣak śalyāpahartety ucyate. katamaiś caturbhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10245: iha bhikṣavas [Tib. 174a] tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha idaṃ duḥkham
T07yabhkvyu:10246: āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ. ayaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10248: āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti. pūrvāvedhād iti. pūrvākṣepāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10249: dṛṣṭabhūminiḥsaṃgāśvaprasaraṇavad iti. yathā bhūmau dṛṣṭāyāṃ niḥsaṃgam aśvasya prasaraṇaṃ. tadvat. aśvadhāvanavad iti kecit paṭhaṃti. dhāvi prakṛtyaṃtaraṃ vyācakṣate. iṇo bodhanārthatvād iti. sarvo gatyartho bodhanārtho 'pi bhavatīti. dravyato 'pīty apiśabdān nāmato 'pīti darśitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10250: aviparītatvād iti. yasmāt tad āryāṇām anyeṣāṃ cāviparītaṃ. duḥkham eva nānyathā. āryais tu yathaitāni satyāni. tathā dṛṣṭāni. duḥkhasatyaṃ duḥkhata anityataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataś ca. evaṃ yāvan mārgo mārgataḥ nyāyataḥ pratipattito nairyāṇikataś ca. nānyair anāryaiḥ evaṃ dṛṣṭāni. ata āryāṇām etāni satyāny ucyaṃte. na tv anāryāṇāṃ satyāny ucyaṃte. kasmāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10251: viparītadarśanāt. te hi duḥkham aduḥkhata [Tib. 174b] ity evamādibhir ākārair duḥkhasatyaṃ paśyaṃti. samdayam asamudayata ity evamādibhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10252: nirodham anirodhata ity evamādibhiḥ. mārgam amārgata ity evamādibhir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10254: iti. tadyathā nirodhasatyaṃ vyathaṃte 'punarbhavāt prapātād iva bāliśā
T07yabhkvyu:10256: āryās tu duḥkhato vidur ity upādānaskaṃdhapaṃcakaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10257: dve āryāṇāṃ satye iti. duḥkhasamdayasatye aviparītadarśanāt. dve ārye.
T07yabhkvyu:10258: kuśalatayānāsravatayā ca. āryāṇāṃ ca satye. aviparītadarśanāt. evam ekaśeṣanirdeśāc cāryasatye iti bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10262: iti. manaāpā api vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā saṃskāraduḥkhatayā ca duḥkhā.
T07yabhkvyu:10263: amanaāpā duḥkhaduḥkhatayā saṃskāraduḥkhatayā ca. tadanye duḥkhāḥ saṃskāraduḥkhatayaiveti yathāyogārthaḥ. mana āpnuvaṃtīti manaāpāḥ. punaḥ saṃdhikaraṇaṃ cātreti vyākhyātaṃ. tebhyo 'nya iti manaāpāmanaāpebhyo 'nya
T07yabhkvyu:10265: tisro vedanā yathākramam iti. sukhā vedanā [Tib. 175a] manaāpā duḥkhā amanaāpā aduḥkhasukhā naiva manaāpā nāmanaāpety arthaḥ. tadvaśeneti.
T07yabhkvyu:10266: vedanāvaśena. avedanāsvabhāvā api rūpaśabdādayas tadanukūlatvān manaāpādisaṃjñāṃ labhaṃte. vipariṇāmena duḥkhateti. anityatāvipariṇāmenety
T07yabhkvyu:10268: hā caitraratha hā vāpi hā maṃdākini hā priye ity ārttā vilapaṃto 'pi gāṃ pataṃti divokasa
T07yabhkvyu:10269: iti. duḥkhasvabhāvenaiveti. upaghātasvabhāvenety arthaḥ. duḥkhā vedanā utpādaduḥkhā sthitiduḥkheti. nanv eṣā arthāpattito vipariṇāmasukhā
T07yabhkvyu:10270: prāpnoti. tathā ca sati lakṣaṇasaṃkaraḥ syāt. nedam asyā lakṣaṇaṃ. kiṃ tarhi vidūṣaṇārtham ayam upadeśa iti. atha vā bhavatv eva sāttra. yena rūpeṇa vidūṣyate. tad evāpekṣate iti. duḥkhaiva bhavati. yathā sukhā vedanā utpādasthitisukhatvāt sukhāpi satī vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā duḥkhety
T07yabhkvyu:10272: duḥkhateti. saṃskaraṇenaiva jananenaivety arthaḥ. yad anityaṃ. tad
T07yabhkvyu:10273: duḥkhaṃ. yan na niyatasthitaṃ. tad duḥkhaṃ. yaj yāyate vinaśyati ca. tad duḥkham [Tib. 175b] ity arthaḥ. tenoktaṃ. pratyayābhisaṃskaraṇād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10274: pratyayair abhisaṃskriyate yasmāt. tasmāt tad duḥkham iti. vedanāvat tadvedanīyā api saṃskārā veditavyā iti. sukhavedanīyānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ vipariṇāmena duḥkhatā. sukhavedanīyāḥ saṃskārā utpādasukhāḥ sthitisukhā vipariṇāmaduḥkhā iti. duḥkhavedanīyānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ duḥkhavedanīyasvabhāvenaiva duḥkhatā. duḥkhavedanīyāḥ saṃskārā utpādaduḥkhā sthitiduḥkhā iti. aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ saṃskāreṇaiva duḥkhatā. pratyayābhisaṃskaraṇāt. yad anityam. tad duḥkham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10275: duḥkham eva duḥkhatā duḥkhaduḥkhatā. yāvad iti vacanāt vipariṇāma eva duḥkhatā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā saṃskāra eva duḥkhatā saṃskāraduḥkhateti
T07yabhkvyu:10276: vācyam. ayaṃ paryāyo vigraheṇaiva viśiṣṭo nārthena. sa eva hy atrārtho
T07yabhkvyu:10277: grahītavyaḥ. asādhāraṇatvād iti vistaraḥ. manaāpāḥ saṃskārāḥ asādhāraṇā
T07yabhkvyu:10279: amanaāpāś cāsādhāraṇā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāyāḥ. atas teṣām asādhāraṇatvād
T07yabhkvyu:10280: duḥkhaduḥkhatokteti. [Tib. 176a] sarve tu manaāpādayaḥ saṃskāraduḥkhatayā duḥkhāḥ tasyā vyāpinītvāt. yadi sarve 'pi tathā duḥkhāḥ kasmāt sarve
T07yabhkvyu:10281: (vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā) na paśyaṃtīti ata āha. tāṃ tv āryā eva paśyaṃti nānye. katham itīdam upanyasyate āha cātreti sarvam.
T07yabhkvyu:10282: evaṃ tarhīti yadi saṃskāraduḥkhatayā sarve 'pi saṃskārā duḥkhāḥ mārge 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:10284: (Abhidh-k-vy 517) pratikūlaṃ hi duḥkham iti lakṣaṇān mārgo na duḥkham iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10285: kim idam anyad evocyate. pūrvam uktaṃ pratyayābhisaṃskaraṇāt sarvasaṃskārā
T07yabhkvyu:10286: anityāḥ. yac cānityaṃ. tad duḥkham iti. mārgaś ca pratyayābhisaṃskṛtatvād
T07yabhkvyu:10287: anityaḥ. tasmād duḥkham iti prasajyet. yadi hi pratikūlataiva
T07yabhkvyu:10288: duḥkhalakṣaṇam iṣyet. tat pūrvoktam alakṣaṇaṃ syāt. tac ced duḥkhatālakṣaṇam. idam alakṣaṇam iti. naiṣa doṣaḥ. kathaṃ. yad anityam āryāṇāṃ pratikūlaṃ. tad duḥkham ity ayam atrābhipreto 'rthaḥ. kiṃ cānityam āryāṇāṃ pratikūlaṃ yat sāsravaṃ vastu. kasmāt punar anāsravo mārgas tathaivānityo 'pi na cāryāṇāṃ pratikūla [Tib. 176b] ity ata āha. na hi tasyotpāda āryāṇāṃ pratikūlaḥ sarvaduḥkhakṣayāvāhanād iti. aviśeṣābhidhāne
T07yabhkvyu:10289: 'pi hi loke viśeṣapratipattir dṛṣṭā. tadyathā gamanād gauḥ na ca gamanān
T07yabhkvyu:10290: mahiṣo 'pi gaur bhavati. evaṃ hy arthe niyate gauḥ [kāsmiṃcid bhavati.]
T07yabhkvyu:10291: kasmād bhavati. yasmāt gacchatīti. evam ihāpi yat sāsravaṃ vastu. tat pratikūlam āryāṇāṃ. kasmāt. anityatvād iti. yad eva duḥkhato dṛṣṭam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10292: sāsravaṃ vastu. tasyaiva nirodhaṃ śāṃtataḥ paśyaṃti. na mārgasyety avagaṃtavyaṃ. mudgādibhāve 'pi māṣarāśyapadeśavad iti. māṣarāśau mudgamasūrakalāyādisadbhāve 'py alpatvān mudgādīnāṃ māṣarāśir iti loke vyapadeśo dṛśyate. tadvat. pariṣekasukhāṇukeneti. sukhaṃ ca tad aṇukaṃ ca sukhāṇukaṃ. pariṣekeṇa sukhāṇukaṃ pariṣekasukhāṇukaṃ. tenāha khalv apīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10295: iti. sukhaṃ duḥkhasya hetur duḥkhavedanīyena karmaṇā saṃprayuktatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10297: yasmāc cātibahubhir duḥkhaiḥ parasevākṛtyādikṛtaiḥ samuditaṃ sukham [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:10300: yasmāc ca kṣutpipāsādikṛte duḥkhe sati. bhojanapānādikṛtaṃ sukhaṃ iṣṭaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10304: saṃskāraduḥkhataikarasatvād iti. saṃskāṛaduḥkhataikaprakāratvāt. katham idānīṃ sukhasvabhāvām iti. katham aduḥkhasvabhāvāṃ vedanāṃ duḥkhataḥ
T07yabhkvyu:10305: paśyaṃti. anityatayā pratikūlatvād iti. anityatvāt pratikūlaṃ pratikūlatvād duḥkhataḥ paśyaṃtīty (Abhidh-k-vy 518) arthaḥ. yathā rūpasaṃjñādīny apīti. yathā rūpasaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāny api duḥkhataḥ
T07yabhkvyu:10306: paśyaṃti. na ca tāny evaṃ duḥkhāni. yathā duḥkhā vedanā. tasyā
T07yabhkvyu:10307: upaghātakasvabhāvatvāt. teṣāṃ vā tallakṣaṇatvāt. yas tu manyata iti
T07yabhkvyu:10308: bhadantakumāralātaḥ. tasya bhadantasyāsau samudayākāraḥ syān na duḥkhākāraḥ. duḥkhahetuto darśanāt. kiṃ cāryāṇāṃ cānāgāmināṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10309: rūpārūpyopapattau kathaṃ duḥkhasaṃjñā pravartate. naiva pravartate ity
T07yabhkvyu:10310: arthaḥ. na hi teṣām anāgāmināṃ duḥkhavedanāhetuḥ duḥkhāyā vedanāyā hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10311: [Tib. 177b] ke. skaṃdhā rūpārūpyāvacarāḥ. kasmān na hetuḥ. punar
T07yabhkvyu:10312: duḥkhasthānānāgamanāt. saṃskāraduḥkhata ca sūtre kim artham uktā bhaved
T07yabhkvyu:10313: iti. yadi duḥkhahetutvāt sukham api duḥkhataḥ paśyaṃti. yeyaṃ saṃskāraduḥkhatoktā yad anityaṃ. tad duḥkham iti. sā kiṃprayojanā duḥkhahetutvenaiva tatprayojanasiddheḥ. duḥkhahetuvādy āha. yadi tarhīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10314: yadi yad anityaṃ. tad duḥkham ity anityatvād duḥkhataḥ paśyaṃti na duḥkhahetutvād anityaduḥkhākārayoḥ kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10315: atrācārya āha. udayavyayadharmitvād iti vistaraḥ. yathā pratikūlatvād duḥkhaṃ. tathā tat pratipādayann āha. anityaṃ tu dṛśyamānaṃ pratikūlaṃ bhavatīty anityākāro duḥkhākāram ākarṣatīti. tad uktaṃ bhavati. yad idam uktaṃ yad anityaṃ. tad duḥkham iti. nākāraikatvād evam uktaṃ. apy tv anityaṃ tat sukhaṃ paśyatāṃ pratikūlaṃ bhavati. pratikūlatvād duḥkhataḥ paśyaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10316: ekīyā iti bhadaṃtaśrīlātādayaḥ. idam atra duḥkhasyeti. idam atra duḥkhasya
T07yabhkvyu:10317: lakṣaṇam ity arthaḥ. sukhā vedanā duḥkhato draṣṭavyeti. aparaṃ sūtrapadaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10319: atyupayuktā atiparibhuktāḥ. akālopayuktāś ceti. tadyathā śītā hemaṃte uṣṇā
T07yabhkvyu:10320: gṛīṣme. samena veti. sukhahetunā. evam īryāpathavikalpe 'pi vaktavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10321: ya eva hi śayanādaya iṣyaṃte sukhahetavaḥ. ta eveti sarvaṃ yāvad vyaktim āpadayaṃta iti vaktavyaṃ. duḥkhapratīkāre ca sukhabuddheḥ. kiṃ. nāsti sukhā vedaneti prakṛtaṃ. duḥkhavikalpe ca. kiṃ. sukhabuddheḥ. tathaiva nāsti sukhā vedaneti. duḥkhapratīkāre sukhabuddhiṃ pratipādayann āha. na hi tāvat sukham iti vistaraḥ. duḥkhavikalpeneti pratipādayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:10322: duḥkhavikalpe ca bālā iti vistaraḥ. aṃsād aṃsaṃ bhāraṃ saṃcārayaṃto bhāravāhakā duḥkha evāvasthite bhārātikrāmaṇe sukham iti buddhim utpādayaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:10323: eṣa eva ca nyāya ity ācāryaḥ. anabhiprītaṃ bhavaty āryāṇām iti kāmasukhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10325: pramādapadatvādinākārāṃtareṇa. tadarthaṃ darśayann āha. yā hi vedaneti
T07yabhkvyu:10326: vistaraḥ. pramādapadam iti. kuśalapracyutikāraṇam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10328: samanaṃtaraduḥkhotpādinīm aduḥkhāsukhotpādinīṃ cety arthaḥ. nyūnarūpatvam āpannām iti vā. anityāṃ ca vināśinīṃ cety arthaḥ. na tu khalu
T07yabhkvyu:10329: svalakṣaṇākāreṇeti. anugrāhakasvalakṣaṇākāreṇa āryāṇām api hi sukhavedanānugrāhakebhya visaṃvādaḥ. yadi cāsau sukhā vedanā svenātmanānugrāhakātmanānabhipretā bhavet naiva tasyāṃ sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ kasyacid rāgo bhavet. duḥkhavedanāvad ity abhiprāyaḥ. yato vairāgyārtham iti. yataḥ kāraṇāt vairāgyārtham ākārāṃtareṇāpi doṣavatīṃ paśyeyuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10331: syāt. uktaṃ cedaṃ bhagavateti sthavirānandavacanam evaitat sūtrapadaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10332: evaṃ hi so 'prakṣyad iti. yatkiṃcid veditam. idam atra duḥkhasyeti etad ayuktarūpaṃ vacanam iti paśyaṃ sthavirānandas tad eva pṛṣṭavān. yatkiṃcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti viruddham eveti kṛtvā. yadi tu tisro vedanā ity etad ayuktarūpam adrakṣyat. tad evāprakṣyat kiṃ nu saṃdhāya bhagavatā
T07yabhkvyu:10333: bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā ity etad viruddham eveti kṛtvā. bhagavān [Tib. 179a]
T07yabhkvyu:10334: api caivaṃ vyākariṣyad idaṃ mayā saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā iti. na tv evaṃ vyākariṣyat. saṃskārānityatām ānanda saṃdhāya mayā bhāṣitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10335: saṃskāravipariṇāmatāṃ. yatkiṃcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti. na tv evam
T07yabhkvyu:10336: āha. punaś ca tisṛṇāṃ vedanānāṃ vacanāt tasmāt saṃty eva svbhāvatas tisro
T07yabhkvyu:10337: vedanāḥ. idaṃ tu saṃdhāya mayā bhāṣitaṃ yatkiṃcid veditam idam atra
T07yabhkvyu:10338: duḥkhasyeti vedanād ābhiprāyikam etad vākyaṃ darśayati bhagavān. yatkiṃcid veditam atra duḥkhasyeti
T07yabhkvyu:10340: vipariṇāmaḥ punar anyathātvaṃ. kāmaguṇā iti. iṣṭānāṃ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyānām iyaṃ saṃjñā. upapatter apīṣṭasya janmanaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:10341: saṃjñā. evam upapattiṃ alpasukhāṃ bahuduḥkhām ekāṃtasukhāṃ paśyato
T07yabhkvyu:10343: lokānuvṛttyeti. cet. atha mataṃ lokasya vedanāṃ vyavasyato 'nuvṛttyā tisro vedanā iti vacanaṃ. tan na bhavati. sarvaveditaduḥkhatvasya saṃdhāya bhāṣitam iti bhagavato vacanāt. saṃskārānityatām ānanda mayā saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ saṃskāravipariṇāmatāṃ. yatkiṃcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyety [Tib. 179b] ato na lokānuvṛttyā tisro vedanā iti vacanaṃ. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:10345: ca. na lokānuvṛttyā tisro vedanā iti vacanaṃ. katham ity āha. yac ca sukhendriyaṃ yac ca saumanasyendriyaṃ. sukhaiṣā vedanā draṣṭavyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:10346: vistareṇoktveti. yac ca duḥkhendriyaṃ yac ca daurmanasyendriyaṃ. duḥkhaiṣā
T07yabhkvyu:10347: vedanā. yad upakṣendriyam. aduḥkhāsukhaiṣā vedanā ity evaṃādinā vistareṇoktvā yenemāni paṃcendriyāṇy evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā
T07yabhkvyu:10348: dṛṣṭānīti. idam atra vedanātrayasadbhāve jñāpakaṃ. yathābhūtam ity adhyāropāpavādābhāvāt. loko 'pi ca kathaṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ trividhāṃ sukhāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10349: duḥkhām aduḥkhāsukhāṃ vyavasyed duḥkhasvābhāvyena duḥkhavyavasāyasyaiva prāpteḥ. mṛdvadhimātramadhyāsv iti vistaraḥ. atha mataṃ mṛduni duḥkhe sukhabuddhir adhimātre duḥkhabuddhiḥ madhya aduḥkhāsukhabuddhir iti. atra
T07yabhkvyu:10352: adhimātrādisukhabuddhiḥ syād adhimātramadhyamṛduḥ sukhabuddhiḥ syād ity
T07yabhkvyu:10353: arthaḥ. kathaṃ. mṛduni duḥkhe adhimātrasukhabuddhiḥ. madhye
T07yabhkvyu:10354: madhyasukhabuddhiḥ. adhimātre mṛdusukhabuddhir iti. na cādhimātre duḥkhe
T07yabhkvyu:10355: mṛdusukhabuddhir yuktā. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. adhimātram eva tad duḥkhaṃ na syād
T07yabhkvyu:10356: yadi tatra mṛdusukhabuddhiḥ syāt. mṛduni ca duḥkhe yady adhimātrasukhabuddhiḥ kathaṃ tasya duḥkhasya mṛdutvaṃ. na hi tathā
T07yabhkvyu:10357: vyaktasyānubhavasya mṛdutvaṃ yujyata iti. aduḥkhāsukhānaṃtaraṃ sukhānubhavaṃ paśyann āha. yadā gaṃdharasaspraṣṭavyaviśeṣajam iti. madhyaṃ hi duḥkham aduḥkhāsukhaṃ bhavatāṃ. na mṛduprakāram. ato vaktavyaṃ. tadā katamad duḥkhaṃ mṛdubhūtaṃ yatrāsya sukhabuddhir bhavatīti. viṣayabalād eva hi tat sukham utpadyate. mṛduduḥkhasamanaṃtarapratyayabalād adhimātraduḥkhasamanaṃtarapratyayabalād veti. kiṃ ca yadi mṛduni duḥkhe sukhabuddhir iti manyase. anutpannavinaṣṭe ca tasmin mṛduni duḥkha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10358: [Tib. 180b] anutpanne vinaṣṭe ca tasmin mṛduni duḥkhe. sutarāṃ sukhabuddhiḥ syāt aśeṣaduḥkhāpagamāt. yasmād aśeṣaṃ duḥkham apagataṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10359: saśeṣāpagate 'pi hi duḥkhe sukhabuddhim icchasi. kim aṃgāśeṣāpagata ity
T07yabhkvyu:10360: abhiprāyaḥ. evaṃ kāmasukhasaṃmukhībhāve 'pi vaktavyam iti. yathā gandharasaspraṣṭavyaviśeṣajaṃ sukham uktam. evaṃ kāmasukhasaṃmukhībhāve 'pi vaktavyaṃ. katham. mṛduni rāgaduḥkhe kāmasukhabuddhir bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10361: anutpanne vinaṣṭe ca tasmin rāgaduḥkhe sutarāṃ kāmasukhaṃ syāt. na caivaṃ dṛṣṭam iti. kathaṃ ca nāmeti vistaraḥ. kathaṃ ca nāmaitad yokṣyate. yan mṛduni (Abhidh-k-vy 521) vedite yan mṛduni duḥkha ity arthaḥ. tīvrānubhavo gṛhyata iti vaktavyaṃ. sukhaṃ gṛhyate. madhye punar avyakta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10362: madhyaduḥkhe aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā gṛhyate ity arthaḥ. mṛduni duḥkhe tenāvyaktena bhavitavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ. triṣu ceti vistaraḥ. triṣu ca dhyāneṣu prathamadvitīyatṛtīyeṣu sukhavacanāt. sukhā vedanā tatreti sūtre
T07yabhkvyu:10363: vacanāt. mṛduduḥkhaṃ syāt. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. mṛduni duḥkhe sukhabuddhir iti
T07yabhkvyu:10364: tavābhiprāyāt. ūrdhvaṃ caturthe dhyāne ārūpyeṣu cāduḥkhāsukhavacanāt [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:10365: 181a] sūtre. madhyaṃ duḥkhaṃ syāt. kasmāt. madhye duḥkhe aduḥkhāsukham iti
T07yabhkvyu:10366: tavaivābhiprāyāt. ity ato na yujyate mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣu
T07yabhkvyu:10367: sukhādivedanāvyavasthānaṃ. kathaṃ hi nāmādhodhyāneṣu mṛdu duḥkham. ūrdhve punar madhyam iti yujyate. rūpaṃ cen mahānāmann iti. rūpaṃ cen mahānāmann
T07yabhkvyu:10368: ekāṃtaduḥkham abhaviṣyat na sukhaṃ na sukhānugataṃ na saumanasyaṃ na saumanasyānugataṃ na sukhaveditaṃ hetur api na prajñāyate rūpe saṃrāgāya.
T07yabhkvyu:10369: yasmāt tarhi asti rūpaṃ sukhaṃ sukhānugataṃ pūrvavad ato rūpe hetuḥ prajñāyate yad uta saṃrāgāyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:10370: sukhahetvavyavasthānād ity atra brūmaḥ. yadi sukhahetvavyavasthānān na
T07yabhkvyu:10371: sukham asti vaḥ. duḥkham apy asat syāt duḥkhahetvavyavasthānāt. api ca vyavasthita eva sukhahetuḥ. katham ity āha. āśrayaviśeṣāpekṣo hīti vistaraḥ. yadi hi kevala eva viṣayo hetuḥ syāt syād evāvyavasthito hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10372: na tu kevalo viṣayo hetuḥ. yasmād āśrayaviśeṣo 'pi hetur iti. sa evāgnir iti. tadyathā sa evāgniḥ pākyabhūtaviśeṣa [Tib. 181b] īṣatpakvāvasthe taṇḍulasamūhe svādupākahetur bhavati. abhimataudanapākahetutvāt. sa
T07yabhkvyu:10373: evāsvādupākahetuḥ. taddāhahetutvād ity arthaḥ. na tu yā pākyabhūtāvasthāṃ prāpya svādupākahetur āsīt. tāṃ punaḥ prāpya paścān na hetuḥ svādupākasya tādṛśasyety arthaḥ. eṣa dṛṣṭāṃtaḥ tasya pūrvoktasya dārṣṭāṃtikasyārthasya.
T07yabhkvyu:10374: dhyāneṣu ca kathaṃ na vyavasthitaḥ sukhahetur iti. na hi tad eva dhyānaṃ prathamaṃ yāvat tṛtīyaṃ cirakālam api samāpannānāṃ duḥkhahetur bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10375: dhyānaje ca sukhe kasya pratītkāra iti. na hi dhyāneṣu duḥkham astīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10376: ādiśabdenedam api vaktavyaṃ. yadi duḥkhapratīkāreṣu sukhabuddhiḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10377: rūpaṃ cen mahānāmann ekāṃtaduḥkham abhaviṣyat na sukhaṃ na sukhānugatam ity evamādi noktaṃ syād iti. sukham evotpadyata iti. sukhaiva sā vedanotpadyate. na sā duḥkhā vedanā sukhatvena kalpiteti. yāvad asau tādṛśī kāyāvastheti. sukhotpattyanukūlā. anyathā hi yady avasthāṃtarajaṃ sukham eva notpadyate yāvad asau (Abhidh-k-vy 522) tādṛśī kāyāvasthā nāṃtarīyate. anyathā paścād bhūyasī sukhabuddhiḥ syāt. aṃte kuta iti
T07yabhkvyu:10378: vistaraḥ. atha mataṃ pānabhojanādyaṃte kuto duḥkhabuddhiḥ syāt yadi tasyāditatprāraṃbho nāsīd iti. atra brūmaḥ. kāyapariṇāmaviśeṣāt. [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:10379: 182a] kāyasya tādṛśaḥ pariṇāmaviśeṣāḥ paścād utpadyate pānādyāsevanāt yat sukhotpattyavasthāyāṃ duḥkhaṃ notpadyate. aṃte tūtpadyata iti. kim evety āha. madyādīnām aṃte mādhuryaśuktatāvad iti. yathā madyakṣīrādīnāṃ tādṛśaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:10381: mādhuryasyāvidyamānā śuktatā amlatā aṃte utpadyate. atha vā yathā
T07yabhkvyu:10382: madyādīnāṃ parīṇāmavīśeṣān mādhuryam eṣām ādau bhavati. āmlaṃ vā. tac cikitsauṣadhakṛtāt pariṇāmaviśeṣān mādhuryaṃ bhavati. pariṇāmaviśeṣād eva ca paścāc chuktatā. mādhuryam iha sukhasyodāharaṇaṃ. śuktatā duḥkhasyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:10383: yat tu samudayasatyaṃ. tad evocyata iti. hetubhūtāḥ śamudayasatyam iti
T07yabhkvyu:10385: duḥkhaṃsamudayo loka iti vacanāt. śūtre hi tṛṣṇaivokteti. samudayasatyaṃ katamat. yāsau tṛṣṇā nandīrāgasahagatā tatratarābhinandinīti. vaibhāṣika āha. prādhānyād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10386: anyatrānyasyāpi vacanāt. [Tib. 182b] anyatra sūtre anyasyāpi karmāvidyāder vacanād anye 'pi samudaya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10387: abhisaṃparāye āyatyāṃ paraloka ity arthaḥ. punaś coktam anyatra śūtre. yataś ca bhikṣavaḥ paṃca bījajātāny akhaṇḍāni acchidrāṇī apūtīni avātātapahatāni navāni sārāṇi sukhaśayitāni. pṛthivīdhātuś ca bhavaty abdhātuś ca. evaṃ tāni bījāni vṛddhiṃ virūḍhin vipulatām āpadyaṃte. iti hi bhikṣava upameyaṃ kṛtā yāvad evāsyārthasya vijñaptaya itīmaṃ dṛṣṭāṃtam upanyasyedam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10388: paṃca bījajātānīti bhikṣavaḥ sopādānasya vijñānasyaitad adhivacanaṃ pṛthivīdhātur iti catasṛṇāṃ vijñānasthitīnām etad adhivacanam iti. bījaṃ punar hetuḥ. yaś ca hetuḥ. sa samudayaḥ vijñānasthitayo 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:10389: pratiṣṭhāhetuḥ. tasmād iti. yataḥ karmādīnām api hetutvavacanāt samudayasatyatvaṃ siddhaṃ. tasmād ābhiprāyikaḥ. abhiprāye bhavaḥ abhiprāyeṇa vā dīvyatīty ābhiprāyikaḥ sūtre nirdeśaḥ tṛṣṇādhikṛtaṃ pudgalam adhikṛtya kṛta ity abhiprāyaḥ. lākṣaṇikas tv abhidharme lakṣaṇe bhavo lākṣaṇiko nirdeśo 'bhidharme. sarvaṃ sāsravaṃ vastu samudaya iti sāsravasya skaṃdhapaṃcakasya samudayasatyatvalakṣaṇayogāt. sa eva vaibhāṣikas tṛṣṇādīnām ābhiprāyikaṃ samudayasatyatvaṃ vivakṣur [Tib. 183a]
T07yabhkvyu:10390: (Abhidh-k-vy 523) āha. api tv iti vistareṇa. abhinirvṛttihetuṃ bruvatā samudayasatyaṃ tṛṣṇaivoktā sūtre. upapattyabhinirvṛttihetuṃ sahetukaṃ bruvatā yāvat karma ca tṛṣṇā cāvidyā coktā. upapattihetuḥ karma.
T07yabhkvyu:10391: abhinirvṛttihetus tṛṣṇā bhaveṣu. tayoḥ punas taddhetvoḥ karmatṛṣṇayor avidyā hetur ity āha. katham etad gamyate. gāthāyām upapattihetuḥ karmābhinirvṛttihetus tṛṣṇeti. karma hetur upapattaye tṛṣṇā hetur abhinirvṛttaya iti sūtrāt. sūtrāṃtare vacanād iti. sahetusapratyaya iti vistaraḥ. atra sūtre krameṇa vā. kāraṇaparaṃparākrameṇa vā. gāthāyām eṣa nirdeśaḥ. karmatṛṣṇāvidyā saṃkārāṇāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ hetur abhisaṃparāya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10392: tad etad uktaṃ bhavati. karma hetur upapattaya iti. ato vā sūtrāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10393: sahetusapratyayakramasūtrād vā. ayaṃ īdṛśaḥ gāthārtha iti. kathaṃ cakṣur bhikṣavaḥ sahetu sapratyayaṃ sanidānaṃ. kaś ca bhikṣavaś cakṣuṣo hetuḥ kaḥ. pratyayaḥ. kiṃ nidanaṃ. cakṣuṣo bhikṣavaḥ karma hetuḥ. karma pratyayaḥ karma nidānaṃ. karmāpi bhikṣavaḥ sahetu sapratyayaṃ sanidānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10394: kaś ca bhikṣavaḥ karmaṇo hetuḥ. kaḥ pratyayaḥ. kiṃ nidānaṃ. [Tib. 183b]
T07yabhkvyu:10395: karmaṇo bhikṣavas tṛṣṇā hetuḥ. tṛṣṇā pratyayaḥ. tṛṣṇā nidānaṃ. tṛṣṇā bhikṣavaḥ sahetukā sapratyayā sanidānā. kaś ca bhikṣavas tṛṣṇāyā hetuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10396: kaḥ pratyayaḥ. kiṃ nidānaṃ. tṛṣṇāyā bhikṣavo 'vidyā hetuḥ. avidyā
T07yabhkvyu:10397: pratyayḥ. avidyā nidānaṃ. avidyāpi bhikṣavaḥ sahetukā sapratyayā sanidānā.
T07yabhkvyu:10398: kaś ca bhikṣavo 'vidyāyā hetuḥ. kaḥ pratyayaḥ kiṃ nidanaṃ. avidyāyā bhikṣavaḥ ayoniśomanaskāro hetuḥ. ayoniśomanaskāraḥ pratyayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10399: ayoniśomanaskāro nidānam iti. bījakṣetrabhāvaṃ pratipādayatā vijñānādayo
T07yabhkvyu:10400: 'py uktā vijñānaṃ bījaṃ. tasya kṣetraṃ vedanādayaḥ skandhāḥ. te 'py uktaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:10401: samudayasatyaṃ. na kevalaṃ tṛṣṇādaya ity ābhiprāyikaḥ sūtre nirdeśa iti sādhitaṃ. sarvasya ca duḥkhasya lākṣaṇikaḥ samudayabhāva iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10402: yonyādiprakārabhedeneti. ādiśabdena jātistrīpuruṣādiprakārabhedeneti gṛhyate. abhedeneti. dhātugatyyonyādīnāṃ. tayor yathākramam iti. upapatteḥ karma hetur abhinirvṛttes tṛṣṇeti. tadyathā bījam iti vistaraḥ. śālibījaṃ śālyaṃkuropapādanasya hetuḥ yavabījaṃ yavāṃkuropapādanasyetyādi. āpaḥ punar abhedena. yathā śālyaṃkuraprarohasya hetuḥ. evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10403: yavāṃkurasyāpītyādi. atas tāḥ sarvāṃkuraprarohamātrasya hetur iti vinā
T07yabhkvyu:10404: tṛṣṇayā janmābhāvād iti. atra sādhanaṃ. hetur janmanas [Tib. 184a] tṛṣṇā.
T07yabhkvyu:10405: tadbhāvābhāvabhāvyabhāvitvāt. takyathā bījam aṃkurasya. saṃtatināmanāc cety asyārthaṃ vivṛṇvann āha. yatra ca satṛṣṇeti vistaraḥ. yatra viṣaye rūpādau satṛṣṇā. kā. cittasaṃtatiḥ. tatrābhīkṣṇaṃ cittasaṃtatiṃ namaṃtīṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10406: paśyāmaḥ. tasnāt punarbhave 'py evam iti. punarbhave 'py evaṃ satṛṣṇā cittasaṃtatiḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy 524) tasmāt tan namatīti. yatra ca namati.
T07yabhkvyu:10407: tatra ca pravartata iti vyavasyāmaḥ. sādhanaṃ cātra pravartate. punarbhave
T07yabhkvyu:10409: śuṣkamasūropasnānalepāṃgavad iti. masūra upasnānaṃ. tasya lepaḥ śuṣkaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10410: masūropasnānalepo 'syeti śuṣkamasūropasnānalepam aṃgaṃ. tadvad. yathā śuṣkeṇa masūropasnānalepenāgṛhītam aṃgaṃ. evaṃ tṛṣṇayātmabhāva iti
T07yabhkvyu:10411: darśitaṃ bhavati. eṣā yuktir iti. tṛṣṇābhinirvṛttihetur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10412: (VI.4) atrārthe dve api satya iti satyaprasaṃgenedam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10414: iti. dṛṣṭāṃṭadvayopanyāso bhedadvayopapradarśanārthaḥ. upakramabhedinaś ca ghāṭādayaḥ. buddhibhedinaś ca jalādaya iti. jalādiṣūpakrameṇa
T07yabhkvyu:10416: saṃvṛtyaṃtaravyapāśrayā dravyāṃtaravyapāśrayā ca. tatra yāsau saṃvṛtyaṃtaravyapāśrayā. tasyāṃ bhedo 'pi saṃbhavati anyāpoho 'pi. yā tv asau dravyāṃtaravyapāśrayā. tasyām anyāpoha eva saṃbhavati na bhedaḥ. na hi paramāṇor aṣṭadravyakasyāvayavaviśleṣaḥ śakyate kartum iti. saṃvṛtisad
T07yabhkvyu:10417: iti. saṃvyavahāreṇa sat. paramārthasad iti. paramārthena sat. svalakṣaṇa sad ity arthaḥ. evaṃ vedanādyo 'pi draṣṭavyā iti. vedanācetanāsaṃjñādayo
T07yabhkvyu:10418: 'pi dravyasaṃta eva draṣṭavyāḥ. kathaṃ. vedanādīn dharmān apohya buddhyā vedanāsvabhāve buddhir bhavatīti. dravyasatī vedanā. evaṃ saṃjñācetanādayo 'pi yojyāḥ. ghaṭaś cāṃbu cāstīti bruvaṃtaḥ satyam evāhuḥ. na mṛṣeti.
T07yabhkvyu:10419: saṃvṛtisatyasya vacane prayojanaṃ darśayati. uktaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:10422: iti. tathā paramārthasatyam iti. paramasya jñānasyārthaḥ paranārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10423: paramārthaś ca satyaṃ ca tat paranārthasatyaṃ yathānyena jñānena laukikena
T07yabhkvyu:10424: gṛhyate. tathā saṃvṛtisatyaṃ. saṃvṛtyā saṃvyavahārena jñānena vā kliṣṭenākliṣṭena vā gṛhyata iti saṃvṛtisatyaṃ. trividhaṃ hi yogācārāṇāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10425: sat. [Tib. 185a] paramārthasaṃvṛtisat dravyasac ca. dravyataḥ svalakṣaṇataḥ sad dravyasad
T07yabhkvyu:10426: (VI.5) vṛttastha iti vistaraḥ. vṛttaṃ śīlaṃ. tad avyāsaṃgakāraṇam avikṣepakāraṇam
T07yabhkvyu:10427: ācārakāraṇaṃ ca. satyadarśanasyānulomam iti. yac chrutaṃ satyadarśanādhikārikaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 525) tac chrutam udgṛhṇāti paṭhati.
T07yabhkvyu:10428: arthaṃ vā śṛṇoti tadarthaṃ śrotradvāreṇa vijānāti. katham. ubhayālaṃbanā cintāmayīti darśayann āha. kadācid vyaṃjanenārgham ākarṣati.
T07yabhkvyu:10429: vyaṃjananirvṛttena nāmnārtham ākarṣaty ayam asya nāmno 'rtha iti. kadācid arthena vyaṃjanam ākarṣati. idam asyābhidheyasyārthasya vyaṃjanaṃ nāmety
T07yabhkvyu:10430: arthaḥ. ayaṃ hi vyaṃjanaśabdo nāmni prayuktaḥ. sūtre 'pi coktaṃ. svarthaṃ suvyaṃjanam iti. asyāṃ tu kalpanāyām iti vistareṇācāryaḥ. cintāmayī prajñā na sidhyatīti. śrutabhāvanāmayīlakṣaṇasaṃkīrṇaṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10431: nāsaṃkīrṇam iti na sidhyati. yuktinidhyānaja iti. yuktyā nidhyānaṃ nitīraṇaṃ. tato jāta iti. hetau mayaḍvidhānād iti. āptavacanaṃ śrutaṃ sahetu śrutamayyāḥ prajñāyāḥ. atra mayaḍvidhānaṃ. śrutahetukā prajñā śrutamayīti. evaṃ yuktinidhyānaṃ cintā sahetuś cintāmayyāḥ. atra
T07yabhkvyu:10432: mayaḍvidhānāt. samādhir bhāvanā sahetur bhāvanāmayyāḥ. atra mayaḍvidhānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10433: tatprakṛtivacane mayaḍ iti lakṣaṇāt. tasya vikāra iti vā lakṣaṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10434: aupacārikas tu vikāraḥ. śrutavikāra iva śrutamayīti lakṣaṇāṃtaraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10435: copasaṃkhyātavyaṃ. annamayāḥ prāṇās tṛṇamayyo gāva iti loke
T07yabhkvyu:10437: (VI.6-8) saṃsargākuśalavitarkadūrīkaraṇād iti. saṃsargadūrīkaraṇaṃ yad advitīyavihāritvaṃ. tasmāt kāyena [Tib. 185b] vyapakṛṣṭo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10438: akuśalavitarkadūrīkaraṇaṃ yat kliṣṭavitarkavivarjanaṃ. tasmāc cittena vyapakṛṣṭo bhavati. labdhenāpraṇītenāprabhūtena paritāsa iti. paritāso
T07yabhkvyu:10439: daurmanasyaṃ. tena hi paritasyati. upakṣīyata ity arthaḥ. apraṇītatvād aprabhūtatvād vā. tena labdhena paritāso 'saṃtuṣṭiḥ. alabdhe tu praṇīte
T07yabhkvyu:10440: 'pi vā prabhūte 'pi vā icchābhilāṣā mahecchatety ācāryamataṃ. kāmāvacaryāv
T07yabhkvyu:10442: prahāṇabhāvanārāmatā nirodhamārgāramatā. sā na saṃtuṣṭisvabhāveti. kathaṃ caturtho 'py ayam āryavaṃśo bhavaty alobhasvabhāva ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:10445: parityaktasvavṛttibhyaḥ parityaktasvakarmāṃtebhyaś ca. tatra vṛttijīvikā yayā jīvyate annapānādinā. karmāṃtaḥ kṛṣiśilpādiḥ. iti bhavavibhavahetor iti. itiśabdo bhavavibhavaprakārābhidyotakaḥ. tatra bhavaprakāre tṛṣṇā aho batāhaṃ indraḥ syāṃ cakravartī syām iti evamādi. [Tib. 186a]
T07yabhkvyu:10446: vibhavatṛṣṇāpi viṇāśatṛṣṇā. aho batocchidyeyaṃ na bhaveyaṃ paraṃ maraṇād
T07yabhkvyu:10449: (VI.9) smṛtir eva smṛtam iti. bhāve ktavidhānam iti darśayati. avatāras tīrthaṃ yenāvatarati. pratyāsannam atyarthaṃ rāgacarita iti. yasyālpena rāgaḥ śīghram upatiṣṭhate. sa pratyāsannaṃ rāgacaritaḥ. yasyādhimātro
T07yabhkvyu:10452: abahirmukhatvād aṃtarmukhatvāt. eṣā vitarkopacchedāya saṃvartata iti
T07yabhkvyu:10453: prakṛtaṃ. tadviṣayopanidhyānād iti. cakṣurviṣayanirūpaṇād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10455: vipaṭumakam iti yad utpannakrimikaṃ. caturvidhaṃ rāgavastu nāstīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10458: adhimuktipradhāno 'yaṃ manasikāraḥ. prādeśikaś cāyam avyāpīty arthaḥ. na hy aśubhā paṃcaskandhālaṃbanā. sakalabhūmyālambanā vā. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:10459: rūpaskandhaikadeśālaṃbanā [Tib. 186b] tadbhāvāt. nāśubhayā kleśaprahāṇaṃ viṣkaṃbhaṇāmātraṃ tu bhavatīty arthaḥ. svāṃgāvayave cittam upanibadhnātīti
T07yabhkvyu:10460: vacanāt na tāvat stryaṃgāvayave prayogakāla eva saṃrāgahetuparihārāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10461: asthi viśodhayann iti. asthino māṃsam apanayan sakalām asthiśaṃkalāṃ paśyati. yathoktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10463: gacched asau śivipathikāṃ haṃtuṃ rāgaṃ yadīcchati tato vinīlakaṃ paśyet tataḥ paśyed vipūyakaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10465: atra samāsato 'śubhāyāṃ vartamāno yogācāras trividhaḥ. ādikarmikaḥ kṛtaparijayaḥ atikrāṃtamanasikāraś ca. tatra saṃkṣepacitta ādikarmiko
T07yabhkvyu:10466: yogācāra ekasmin pādāṃguṣṭhe mana upanibadhya pādāṃguṣṭhaṃ klidyamānaṃ paśyaty etan māṃsam evaṃ yāvat sarvaṃ śarīram asthiśaṃkalām adhimucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10467: kṛtaparijayas tu tathaiva yāvat kapālārdhaṃ. atikrāṃtamanasikāras tathaiva yāvad bhruvor madhye cittaṃ dhārayati. vistaracittas tu āsamudrāsthivistāraḥ saṃkṣepād ādikarmika ity evamāditrividha iti. evaṃ ca kṛtvā catuṣkoṭikaḥ praśno bhavatīti. jitājitamanaskārayor iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10468: [Tib. 187a] prathamā koṭir jitamanaskārasya svakāyālaṃbanā aśubhā ālaṃbanaparīttatayā parīttā kāyasyālpatvāt. (Abhidh-k-vy 527) na vaśitāparīttatayā jitamanaskāratvād atikrāṃtamanasikāratvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10474: aśubhā. nāpy ālaṃbanaparīttatayā parīttā samudraparyaṃtālaṃbanatvāt. nāpi vaśitāparīttatayā
T07yabhkvyu:10475: (VI.12) sa sāmāṃtakadhyānāṃtareṣv iti. sāmaṃtakeṣu dhyānāṃtare catuḥṣu
T07yabhkvyu:10476: dhyāneṣu kāmadhātau ceti daśa bhūmikā. dhyānasāmaṃtakānāṃ catuṣṭvāt. ata
T07yabhkvyu:10477: evārthālaṃbaneti. varṇasaṃsthānālaṃbanatvād arthālaṃbanā. na tu nāmālaṃbanety abhiprāyaḥ. nāmnaiva siddham aśubhākārety ākārārthaṃ na sūtrayitavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ. yadadhvikā tadadhvikālaṃbaneti.
T07yabhkvyu:10478: cakṣurvijñānavad atītāyā atītam ālaṃbanam evaṃ yāvat pratyutpannāyāḥ pratyutpannam iti. svālaṃbananiyatatvāt. adhimuktimanasikāratvān na sūtritaṃ. ucitānucitatvād iti. anādim atisaṃsāre ucitatvād
T07yabhkvyu:10481: tadbalādhānavṛttitvāt. tasyāḥ smṛter balasyādhānena vṛttir eṣām iti
T07yabhkvyu:10482: smṛtibalādhānavṛttīni kāyasmṛtyupasthānādīni kāyaprajñādravyādīni smṛtyupathānīty ucyaṃte. tadvad ānāpānaprajñā smṛtibalādhānavṛttitvād
T07yabhkvyu:10483: ānāpānasmṛtir ity ucyate. paṃcasu bhūmiṣv iti. triṣu sāmaṃtakeṣu caturthasāmaṃtakavarjyeṣu. dhyānāṃtare. kāmadhātau ceti paṃcasu bhūmiṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:10484: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. upekṣāsaṃprayogitvāt. yasmāt prathamadhyāne sāmaṃtakādiṣūpekṣāvedanā bhavati. caturthadhyāne sāmaṃtake tu yady apy upekṣāsti. sā tv abhūmir āśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ. atha kim artham eṣopekṣā saṃprayogiṇy evāvadhāryata iti. ato bravīti vitarkānuguṇatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10487: ābhogapratyanīkatvāt. tasyāś cānāpānasmṛter avadhānasādhyatvāt tābhyām asaṃprayoga iti. vitarkānuguṇatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10488: kileti. kilaśabdaḥ paramatadyotakaḥ. tenedaṃ pakṣāṃtaram upanyasyate ye tu mauleṣv iti vistaraḥ. pareṇeti. caturthād dhyānād ārabhya. [Tib. 188a]
T07yabhkvyu:10490: vairāgyalābhikī ucitatvāt. idaṃdharmāṇām iti. ayaṃ dharmo bauddha eṣām
T07yabhkvyu:10491: (Abhidh-k-vy 528) iti idaṃdharmāṇaḥ. teṣām eva bauddhānām ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10492: upadeśābhāvād iti. bāhyānāṃ hi prāṇāyāmopadeśo 'sti nānāpānasmṛtyupadeśa
T07yabhkvyu:10493: tit. svayaṃ ca sūkṣmadharmānabhisaṃbodhād iti. upadeśam aṃtareṇa yasmād
T07yabhkvyu:10494: bāhyānāṃ nāsti svayaṃ sūkṣmadharmābhisaṃbodhaḥ. sūkṣmatvaṃ punar asyāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:10495: ṣaṭkāraṇayuktatvāt. kāyaṃ cittaṃ vādhyupekṣyety anāsajyety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10497: yāvad vāyumaṇḍalam ity adhastād anugacchati. vairaṃbhāś ca vāyava ity
T07yabhkvyu:10498: upariṣṭhāt. tattvamanasikāratvān na yuktam etat. yāvad vāyumaṇḍalaṃ vairaṃbhāś ca vāyava iti. adhimuktimanaskārasyaiṣā kalpanā yujyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:10499: kim anugrāhakā ete yāvad uṣṇā iti. sthāpanaiveyaṃ draṣṭavyā. kāyapradeśa
T07yabhkvyu:10501: tatpratibaddhavṛttaya ity arthaḥ. [Tib. 188b] uttarottareṣu kuśalamūleṣv iti. smṛtyupasthānoṣmagatādiṣv iti. darśanamārgādiṣv ity ādiśabdena
T07yabhkvyu:10506: iti. ānāpānasmṛtisaṃbaṃdhena sarvabhūmikāv ānāpānau nirdiśyate. yadbhūmiko hi kāya iti. kāmāvacaraḥ yāvat tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikas tadbhūmikāv etau.
T07yabhkvyu:10507: nānyabhūmikau. kāyacittaviśeṣasaṃniśritā iti. kāyaviśeṣasaṃniśritāḥ cittaviśeṣasaṃniśritāś cāśvāsapraśvāśāḥ. kasmād ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:10508: ārūpoyakalalādigatānām abhāvād iti. kāyābhāvād ārūpyagatānāṃ na bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:10509: kalalādigatānāṃ ca. kalalārbudapeśyādigatānāṃ ca na bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:10510: kāyaviśeṣābhāvāt suṣirakāyābhāvād ity arthaḥ. acittānāṃ ca na bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:10512: āśvāsapraśvāsabhūmicittaviśeṣābhāvāt. ata evāha. yadi kāyaḥ suṣira iti
T07yabhkvyu:10513: vistaraḥ. indriyavinirbhāgitvād iti. indriyapṛthagvṛttitvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10514: kāyopacayenāpacayān naupacayikau. [Tib. 189a] ucchinnānāṃ cāśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ punaḥpratisaṃdhānān na vipākajau. na hy etad
T07yabhkvyu:10515: vipākarūpasyāsti vipākātmakasya rūpasya cakṣurāder etat punaḥpratisaṃdhānaṃ nāsti. arūpasya tu cittacaittasya punaḥpratisaṃdhānaṃ na vāryate. nādhareṇairyāpathikanairmāṇikeneti. airyāpathikaṃ nairnāṇikaṃ ca cittam adharabhūmikaṃ saṃmukhībhavati yāvac caturthadhyānopapannasyety
T07yabhkvyu:10516: (Abhidh-k-vy 529) ata āśaṃkyocyate. nādhgarabhūmikābhyāṃ tābhyām upalakṣaṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10517: (VI.15, 16) vipaśyanāyāḥ saṃpādanārtham iti. prajñāyāḥ saṃpādanārtham ity
T07yabhkvyu:10518: arthaḥ. niṣpannasamādher api hi prajñām aṃtareṇa kleśā na prahīyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:10519: jñānavadhyāḥ kleśā iti vacānāt. kutaḥ prnar etat smṛtyupasthānabhāvanayā vipaśyanā saṃpadyata iti. sūtrāt. ekāyano 'yaṃ bhikṣavo mārgo yad uta
T07yabhkvyu:10520: smṛtyupasthānāni. kevalo 'yaṃ kuśalarāśiḥ yad uat catvāri smṛtyupasthānānīti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10521: kāyavid iti vedanā vit. svabhāva evaiṣāṃ svalakṣaṇam iti. kaḥ svabhāvaḥ. kāyasya
T07yabhkvyu:10522: bhūtabhautikatvaṃ. vedanāyā anubhavatvaṃ. cittasyopalabdhitvam. ebhuas tribhyo 'nyeṣāṃ yathāsvaṃ svabhāvaḥ. duḥkhatā sāsravāṇām iti. [Tib. 189b]
T07yabhkvyu:10523: āryapratikūlalakṣaṇaṃ duḥkham iti vyākhyātam etat. dharmās tribhyo 'nya
T07yabhkvyu:10524: iti asaṃbhinnavyavasthām abhisaṃdhāyaivam ucyate. sṃbhinnavyavasthāyāṃ tu kāyādayo 'pi nigṛhyaṃte. punaḥ sarve saṃskṛtā asaṃskṛtāś ca dharmā
T07yabhkvyu:10528: yasmāt saṃsargālaṃbanam apekṣyeyaṃ prajñopatiṣṭhate. tasmāt smṛtyupasthānam ity ucyate.
