T07yabhkvyu:10531: kasmāt prajñāsvabhāvam ity ucyate. kim anyathāpi smṛtyupasthānam astīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10534: iti. anye tatsahabhuvo vedanādayaḥ. saṃsargeṇa smṛtyupasthānaṃ saṃsargasmṛtyupasthānam. svabhāvasmṛtyupasthānasaṃsargāt. tadālaṃbanād
T07yabhkvyu:10536: tadālaṃbanā ālaṃbanasmṛtyupasthānam ity apare paṭhaṃti. ālaṃbyaṃta ity ālaṃbanāḥ. ke. kāyavedanācittadharmāḥ. tad evaṃ sati tad ālaṃbanasmṛtyupasthānaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvaṃ bhavati. uktaṃ ca bhagavatā.
T07yabhkvyu:10537: [Tib. 190a] sarvadharmā iti bhikṣavaś caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānām etad
T07yabhkvyu:10539: tayā hi prajñayā tadvān prajñāvān. anupaśyaḥ kriyata iti. anupaśyatīty
T07yabhkvyu:10541: anupaśyaṃ pudgalaṃ karotīty anupaśyayati. prajñāsvabhāve tv evaṃ vigrahaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10542: anupaśyasya karaṇam anupaśyaneti. tayā hi prajñayā tadvān prajñāvān anupaśyaḥ kriyate. yathā prajñāyogāt prājñaḥ pudgala ucyate. evam anupaśyanāyogād anupaśya ity ato 'nupaśyanā prajñeti siddhaṃ. yataś coktaṃ bhagavatā. adhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ kāye kāyānupaśyī kāyānudarśī viharatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10543: tenāpi jñāyate 'nupaśyanā prajñeti. katham iti sādhayaty anupaśyam
T07yabhkvyu:10544: asyāsti. kiṃ tad darśanaṃ. darśanalakṣaṇaṃ hy anupaśyam. ato 'nupaśyī
T07yabhkvyu:10545: pudgalo daṇḍivat. tataḥ saptamītatpuruṣaḥ. kāye 'nupaśyī kāyānupaśyīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10546: kāyam anupaśayituṃ śīlam asyeti kāyānupaśyīti ṇinir api yadi vidhīyeta tathāpy etadrūpaṃ sidhyatīti
T07yabhkvyu:10548: smṛtibalādhānavṛttitvād iti. balasyādhānaṃ. smṛter balādhānaṃ smṛtibalādhānaṃ. smṛtibalādhānena vṛttir asyā iti smṛtibalādhānavṛttiḥ prajñā. tadbhāvaḥ. tasmāt. dārupāṭakīlasaṃdhāraṇavad yathā dārupāṭena
T07yabhkvyu:10549: tīkṣṇakīlena dārupāṭasya saṃdhāraṇam. evam asyāḥ prajñāyāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:10550: smṛtibalādhānenālaṃbane vṛttir iti. yadi hi smṛtir ālaṃbanaṃ dharayaty evaṃ prajñā prajānātīti. tad evaṃ smṛtyopatiṣṭhata iti smṛtyupasthānaṃ prajñeti vaibhāṣikīyo 'rthaḥ kṛtyalyuṭo bahulam iti kartary api lyuḍ
T07yabhkvyu:10552: evaṃ tu yujyata ity ācāryaḥ. karaṇasādhanam etat. smṛtir anayopatiṣṭhata iti. arthapradarśanamātram etat. vigrahas tv evaṃ kartavyaḥ. upatiṣṭhate
T07yabhkvyu:10553: 'nenety upasthānaṃ. smṛte upasthānaṃ smṛtyupasthānam iti. kathaṃ smṛtir anayopatiṣṭhata ity āha. yathādṛṣṭasyābhilapanād iti. yasmād yathādṛṣṭo 'rthaḥ prajñayā. tathaivābhilapyate. smṛtyodgṛhyata ity arthaḥ. kva punar upatiṣṭhate. kāye yāvad dharmeṣu. kāye smṛtyupasthānaṃ kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ. evaṃ yāvad dharmeṣu smṛtyupasthānaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānam iti. yathā ca svabhāvasmṛtyupasthānasya. evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10554: saṃsargasmṛtyupasthānasyāpi. yathaiva hi prajñayā smṛtir upatiṣṭhate kāyādiṣu. evaṃ tatsaṃprayuktair
T07yabhkvyu:10555: idānīṃ sūtroktāṃ smṛtyupashānānāṃ karṇasādhanatvam asaṃbadhyamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā kārakāṃtareṇārthaṃ vivakṣur [Tib. 191a] āha. yatra tūktam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10556: yathā kāyasya samudayāstaṃgatāv uktau. evaṃ vedanādīnām api vaktavyau.
T07yabhkvyu:10557: kathaṃ. sparśasamudayāt vedanāyāḥ samudayo bhavati. sparśanirodhād
T07yabhkvyu:10559: bhavati. nānarūpanirodhāc cittasyāstaṃgamāḥ. manasikārasamudayād dharmāṇāṃ samudayo bhavati. manasikāranirodhād dharmāṇām astaṃgama iti. atra sūtre ālaṃbanam eva kāyavedanācittadharmāḥ smṛtyupasthānaṃ. smṛtir atra kāyādiṣūpatiṣṭhata iti kṛtvā. tad evam adhikaraṇasādhanaṃ darśitaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10560: bhavati. upatiṣṭhate smṛtir asminn ity upasthānam. smṛter upasthānaṃ smṛtyupasthānaṃ. evaṃ yāvad dharmā eva smṛtyupasthānaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānam iti vigrahaḥ. yadi cātra sūtre ālaṃbanaṃ smṛtyupasthānaṃ nābhipretam abhaviṣyat. na bhagavān evam avakṣyat. kathaṃ ca bhikṣavaś caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ samudayaś ca bhavaty astaṃgamaś
T07yabhkvyu:10561: ca. āhārasamudayāt kāyasya samudayo bhavati. āhāranirodhāt kāyasyāstaṃgama iti vistaraḥ. kāyādīnāṃ hi smṛtyupasthānatve sati tathā vacanaṃ yujyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:10564: ālaṃbanāpekṣayā kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ yāvad dharmasmṛtyupasthānam iti nāma
T07yabhkvyu:10566: ubhayasaṃtatyālaṃbanatvāc ca pratyekam ekaikaśaḥ eṣāṃ kāyasmṛtyupasthānādīnāṃ traividhyaṃ bhavati. sūtre vacanāt. katham.
T07yabhkvyu:10567: adhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānupaśyī viharati. ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke 'bhidhyādaurmanasye. bahirdhā ye kāyanupaśyī viharati ātāpīti pūrvavat. adhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānupaśyī viharatīti pūrvavat. evaṃ tāvat kāyasmṛtyupasthānasya traividhyaṃ. vedanāsmṛtyupasthānādīnām apy adhyātmaṃ vedanānāṃ vedanānupaśyī viharatīti vistareṇa traividhyaṃ yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10568: audārikasya pūrvaṃ darśanād iti. kāyas tribhya audārikaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10569: ṣaḍvijñānavijñeyatvād iti. tasya pūrvaṃ darśanaṃ. dvābhyāṃ vedanā prakāraudārikatayeti tadanaṃtaraṃ tasyā darśanaṃ. sūkṣmapracāratvād durvijñatayā dharmāḥ sūkṣmā ity atas tebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ cittasya darśanam.
T07yabhkvyu:10570: aṃte dharmāṇām iti. sa ceti kāmarāgaḥ. sa ca cittasyeti sa vedanābhilāṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10572: śuciviparyāsasya pratipakṣeṇa kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ. sukhaviparyāsasya pratipakṣeṇa vedanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ. yatkiṃcid veditam idam atra
T07yabhkvyu:10574: cittasya laghuparivartitvāt. ātmaviparyāsasya pratipakṣeṇa dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ. piṇḍavibhāgato dharmāṇām anātmakāritvād
T07yabhkvyu:10575: dharmamātraṃ rahitam ātmaneti (Abhidh-k-vy 532) dharmanirvacanataḥ. dharmā ime pṛthagpṛthag avasthitāḥ. na ca kaścit svataṃtra ātmeti. taddarśanād
T07yabhkvyu:10576: vā. caturtham ubhayatheti. dharmasmṛtyupasthānam asaṃbhinnālaṃbanam amiśrālaṃbanaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10577: kāyavedanācittavyatiriktadharmālaṃbanatvasaṃbhavāt. saṃbhinnālaṃbanam api bhavati. kāyādīnāṃ dve trīṇi catvāri vā samastāni paśyatīti. yadi kāyaṃ vedanāṃ ca dve paśyati dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ. tat saṃbhinnālaṃbanaṃ. yadi kāyam yāvad dharmāṃś ca paśyati. tad api tathaiva. yad api kāyaṃ vedanāṃ cittaṃ dharmāṃś ca samastān paśyati. tad api saṃbhinnālaṃbanaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10581: (VI.18-20) uṣmagatam ity uṣmaprakāraṃ kuśalamūlaṃ. pūrvarūpatvād iti. prathamanimittatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10582: pūrvasvabhāvatvād vā. prākarṣakatvād iti. [Tib. 192b] prābaṃdhikatvād ity arthaḥ. eṣāṃ tu viśeṣaṇaṃ paścād vakṣyāma iti saptame kośasthāne
T07yabhkvyu:10583: dravyataḥ ṣoḍaśākārā iti atra. yadi te 'pi tādṛśāḥ. atha kim artham upadiśyaṃta ity ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:10584: utkṛṣṭataratvāt tu nāmāṃtaram iti. atha kasmān mūrdhāna ity ucyaṃta ity
T07yabhkvyu:10586: tathā hi loke vaktāro bhavaṃti. mūrdhagatā khalv asya śrīr iti. dve hi kuśalamūle cale. uṣmagatamūrdhalakṣaṇe parihāṇisaṃbhavāt. dve acale kṣāṃtilaukikāgradharmalakṣaṇe viparyayāt. tatra tayor yan mṛdu. tad
T07yabhkvyu:10587: uṣmagataṃ. yad adhimātraṃ. te mūrdhānaḥ. acalayor api yan mṛdu. sā
T07yabhkvyu:10588: kṣāṃtiḥ. yad adhimātraṃ. te laukikāgradharmāḥ. ebhyo hi pāto 'tikramo
T07yabhkvyu:10589: veti. mūrdhabhyaḥ pātaḥ parihāṇiḥ. atikramo vā kṣāṃtisaṃmukhībhāvo vā.
T07yabhkvyu:10590: mūrdhnāṃ calatvāt. vṛkṣādimūrdhebhyo hi loke pāto vā bhaved atipāto vā.
T07yabhkvyu:10591: upariṣṭhānuprāptir iti mūrdhasādharmyaṃ. satyeṣv ākārāṇāṃ prathamato
T07yabhkvyu:10592: vinyasanam iti. satyeṣv anityādyākārāṇām ādita upanipātanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10597: abhyāsenottoptīkaraṇaṃ. vivardhayata iti vistaraḥ. vivardhayato yogino vardhanena (Abhidh-k-vy 533) viśiṣṭānāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10598: pūrvapratilabdhānām iti. aviśiṣṭānām asaṃmukhībhāvaḥ. kasmāt. abahumānāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10600: uṣmagatāvasthāyāṃ mṛdu satyaṃ kṣamate rocate. mūrdhāvasthāyāṃ madhyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10601: tadanaṃtaram idānīm adhimātrasatyakṣamaṇāt kṣāṃtir utpadyate. katham ity ata āha. aparihāṇita iti. yasmāt kṣāṃtir na parihīyate. mūrdhabhyas tu parihīyata ity asti saṃbhavaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10603: iti. mṛdumadhye kṣāṃtī tathaiva. yathā mūrdhāna uktāḥ. tathaivākaraṇāt
T07yabhkvyu:10604: dharmasmṛtyupasthānena. satyeṣv ākārāṇām ākaraṇād ity arthaḥ. sarvasyā
T07yabhkvyu:10612: pratiniyamāvacanāt. adhimātrakṣāṃtyavadhāraṇenaiva hi traidhātukaduḥkhādyālaṃbanatvam eṣām uṣmagatādīnāṃ sidhyati. kathaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10613: kāmāptam eva duḥkhaṃ viṣayo 'syām. seyaṃ kāmāptaduḥkhaviṣayā adhimātrā
T07yabhkvyu:10614: kṣāṃtiḥ. kṣāṃter evety avadhāraṇāt anyāny uṣmagatādīni traidhātukaduḥkhādyālaṃbanānīti siddhaṃ. yadā kileti vistaraḥ. yadā kila rūpārūpyapratipakṣādīnām. adiśabdena rūpārūpyanirodhasamudayaduḥkhānāṃ kāmāvacarapratipakṣādīnāṃ ca grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10615: ekaikasatyākārālaṃbanāpahrāsenaikaikasya satyākārasya ekaikasya satyālaṃbanasya cāpahrāsena yāvat kāmāvacaram eva duḥkhaṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣaṇābhyāṃ manasikaroti. eṣā sarvaiva rūpārāpyapratipakṣākārahrāsāt
T07yabhkvyu:10616: prabhṛti madhyā kṣāṃtiḥ. katham. anvayajñānapakṣaṃ tāvan mārgaṃ mārgato nyāyataḥ pratipattito nairyāṇikataś ceti [Tib. 194a] taiś caturbhir ākārair ākārayati. tatas tribhir ekaṃ hitvā. tato dvābhyāṃ dvau hitvā.
T07yabhkvyu:10617: tata ekena. tato mārgasatyaṃ hitvā. rūpārūpyanirodhaṃ caturbhiḥ svair
T07yabhkvyu:10618: ākārair ākārayati. tatas tribhiḥ dvābhyām ekenaiva cākārya nirodhasatyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10619: cāpāsya. samudayasatyaṃ caturbhiḥ svair ākāraiḥ. tribhiḥ dvābhyām ekena
T07yabhkvyu:10620: cākārya. tathaiva tad apāsya. duḥkhasatyaṃ svair ākārair yāvad ekenākārya.
T07yabhkvyu:10621: tad api satyam apāsya. kāmāvacarapratipakṣaṃ svaiś caturbhir ākāraiḥ tribhiḥ dvābhyām ekena cākārayati. tad apāsya. (Abhidh-k-vy 534)
T07yabhkvyu:10623: kāmāvacaraṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ caturbhir ākārair ākārayati. tatas tribhiḥ tato
T07yabhkvyu:10624: dvābhyām ākārayatīti. evaṃ hi hrāsāraṃbhāt prabhṛti sarva ete kṣaṇā madhyā kṣāṃtir ity uktaṃ bhavati. tṛtīye kṣaṇe tadālaṃbanaivādhimātrā kṣāṃtiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10625: caturthe agradharmās tadālaṃbanā eva. mrdvī tu kṣāṃtir yā purastād adhimātrebhyo mūrdhabhyo 'naṃtaraṃ kāmāvacaraṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ yāvan
T07yabhkvyu:10626: mārgasatyaṃ. rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ ca. svaiḥsvaiḥ sarvair ākārair anapahrāsaṃ manasikurvata ity
T07yabhkvyu:10627: [Tib. 194b] evaṃ tāvad eke vyācakṣate. ākārāpahrāsapūrvaka ālaṃbanāpahrāsa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10628: apare punar vyācakṣate. ekaikasatyākārālaṃbanāpahrāseneti. naivaṃ grahītavyaṃ ekaikasatyākārālaṃbanāpahrāsene ceti. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:10629: rūpārūpyapratipakṣādīnām ekaikeṣāṃ satyānāṃ ye ākārāḥ. teṣām ālaṃbanahrāseneti vyākhyātavyam
T07yabhkvyu:10630: ekānnaviṃśatikṣaṇaśataṃ madhyā kṣāṃtir iti varṇayaṃti. ākārāpahrāsa.
T07yabhkvyu:10631: pūrvake hy ālaṃbanāpahrāse sati atibahavaś cittakṣaṇā visarpaṃti. na caitan nyāyyaṃ. na hi satyeṣu vidyamāneṣu ākāratyāgo yujyate. yadā tu satyāni tyaktāni bhavaṃti. tadākāratyāga iti yuktaṃ. evaṃ ca sati pūrvaṃ satyālaṃbanahrāsaṃ karoti paścād ākārahrāsaṃ. na hi maule viṣaye 'napākṛte
T07yabhkvyu:10632: tadālaṃbanāpākaraṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ. samāhitāsamāhitaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgā aṣṭau vyavasthāpyaṃte. eṣām ākārā dvātriṃśad bhavaṃtīty etad adhunā
T07yabhkvyu:10633: nyāyāṃtaram upadiśyate. kathaṃ kṛtvā. yadā kāmāvacaraṃ duḥkhaṃ caturbhir ākārair manasikaroti. evaṃ yāvad rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ pratipakṣaṃ caturbhir ākārair manasikarotīyaṃ mṛdvī kṣāṃtiḥ. yadā punaḥ kāmāvacaraduḥkhaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10634: caturbhir ākārair manasikarotīty evaṃ yāvat kāmāvacarāṇāṃ [Tib. 195a]
T07yabhkvyu:10635: saṃskārāṇāṃ pratipakṣaṃ manasikaroti caturbhir ākāraiḥ. rūpārūkyāvacarāṇāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ pratipakṣaṃ parityajataḥ prabhṛti madhyā kṣāṃtir ārabdhā.
T07yabhkvyu:10641: catvāraḥ. kāmāvacaraṃ duḥkhaṃ caturbhir ākārair manasikaroti. tasya bhavaṃty ākārāś catvāraḥ. sa ca yogācāro dvividhaḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy 535)
T07yabhkvyu:10642: dṛṣṭicaritaḥ. tṛṣṇācaritaś ca. dṛṣṭicarito 'pi dvividhaḥ. ātmadṛṣṭi
T07yabhkvyu:10643: caritaḥ. ātmīyadṛṣṭicaritaś ca. yo hy ātmadṛṣṭicarito bhavati. so
T07yabhkvyu:10644: 'nātmākāreṇa niyāmam avakrāmati. yas tv ātmīyadṛṣṭicaritaḥ. sa
T07yabhkvyu:10646: ca. tatra yo 'smimānophataḥ. so 'nityākāreṇa niyāmam avakrāmati. yaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:10647: kausīdyādhikaḥ. sa duḥkhākāreṇa. tatrātmadṛṣṭicarito yogācāraḥ punas tat kāmāvacaraṃ duḥkhaṃ tribhir ākārair manasikaroti. ekam ākāraṃ hitvā. tato dvābhyām anātmaśūnyatākārābhyāṃ. tata ekam anātmākāraṃ dviḥ
T07yabhkvyu:10649: 195b] iti. eṣā madhyā kṣāṃtir ity evam ekānnaviṃśaṃ cittaśataṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10650: evam ātmīyādhimuktasya tu śūnyānātmākārābhyām ākārayataḥ śūnyākāraṃ dviḥ
T07yabhkvyu:10651: saṃmukhīkaroti. eṣāsya madhyā kṣāṃtiḥ evam ekānnaviṃśakṣaṇaśatam. evaṃ tṛṣṇācarito dviprakāraḥ. asmimānopahataḥ. kausīdyādhikaś ca vaktavyā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10652: adhimātrā tu kṣāṃtir ekam eva kṣaṇaṃ. sā yathāpudgalacaritam anityākāreṇa
T07yabhkvyu:10653: vā duḥkhākāreṇa vā śūnyākāreṇa vā anātmākāreṇa vā saṃprayukteti. atha kim artham ekaikasatyākārālaṃbanahrāsaḥ kriyate. pūrvaṃ hi tena traidhātukaṃ vidūṣayatā samastaḥ pratipakṣa ālaṃbitaḥ. paścāt kāmadhātoḥ pūrvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10658: sarve tu paṃca skaṃdhāḥ saparivāragrahaṇād iti. samāhitabhūmidatvād uṣmagatādīnām avijñaptilakṣaṇo rūpaskaṃdho 'stīti [Tib. 196a] paṃca skaṃdhā uṣmagatādayaḥ saparivāragrahaṇāt saparivārā gṛhyaṃte iti. mā bhūd āryasyeti. prāptisaṃmukhībhāvāt āryapudgalasyoṣmagatādīnāṃ phalaprāptiprayogabhūtānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvo mā bhūd iti prāptayo
T07yabhkvyu:10662: dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratyutpannaṃ. yatnajanyasya kāryasyākaraṇe samastālaṃbanatvena dharmasmṛtyupasthānasyaiva
T07yabhkvyu:10663: pratiniyatālaṃbanatvena hi kāyasmṛtyupasthānādīny asamarthānīti anāgatāni catvāri (Abhidh-k-vy 536) bhāvyaṃta iti. yasmāt smṛtyupasthānena kāyavedanādayo 'pi duḥkhasatyādisaṃgṛhītā gṛhyaṃte. kāyasmṛtyupasthānādīni ca pūrvapratilabdhāni bhavaṃtīty ataś catvāry api bhāvyaṃte prāptyutpādād
T07yabhkvyu:10665: uṣmagatākaraṇe. dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratyutpannaṃ. tad eva cānāgataṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10667: 196b] sarvatrākārāḥ sabhāgā iti. trisatyālaṃbanasya nirodhasatyālaṃbanasya coṣmagatasyākaraṇe sadṛśā evākārā bhāvyaṃte. duḥkhasatyālaṃbane duḥkhasatyākārā eva catvāro bhāvyaṃte. na samudayasatyādyākārāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10669: nānya ityādi. vivardhana iti. trisatyālaṃbane. kāyasmṛtyupasthānādīnām anyatamat pratyutpannaṃ saṃbhavati. mirodhasatyālaṃbane 'ntyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10670: pratyutpannaṃ. ubhayatrānāgatāni catvāri. ākāraḥ sarve 'pi ṣoḍaśāpi
T07yabhkvyu:10671: bhāvyaṃte. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. labdhatvāt gotrāṇāṃ saṃbhavastaś
T07yabhkvyu:10673: mūrdhākaraṇa iti vistaraḥ. mūrdhākaraṇe sarvatrāpi dharmasmṛtyupasthānam
T07yabhkvyu:10676: itareṣām ayogāt. trisatyālaṃbanavivardhane tu caturṇām anyatamat
T07yabhkvyu:10677: pratyutpannam. anāgatāni sarvatra catvāri. ākārā api sarve. labdhatvāt gotrāṇām ity avagaṃtavyaṃ. [Tib. 197a] kṣāṃtīnāṃ sarvatrāṃtyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10678: ākaraṇe vivardhane cāṃtyaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratyutpannaṃ. tathā hy uktaṃ. sarvasyāḥ kṣāṃtyā dharmeṇa vardhanam iti. agradharmeṣv aṃtyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10680: pratyutpannam. anāgatāni catvāri anutpattidharmāny eva prāpyaṃte. ākāraś catvāri eveti. anityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmākārāḥ. anyābhāvād iti. yasmād anyasamudayādyākārā agradharmā na saṃti duḥkhamātrālaṃbanatvāt. yathā tarhy agradharmāsvabhāvakāyasmṛtyupasthānādyasaṃmukhībhāve 'py
T07yabhkvyu:10682: evam agradharmāsvabhāvasamudayādyādyākārā ānagatā bhāvyaṃta iti kiṃ neṣyata ity ataḥ punar āha. darśanamārgasādṛśyāc ceti. duḥkhākārā eva catvāro bhāvyaṃte. kasmāt. darśanamārgasādṛśyāt. darśanamārge hi yasya
T07yabhkvyu:10683: satyasya darśanaṃ bhavati. tadākārā eva bhāvyaṃte. darśanamārgasadṛśyā hy agradharmāḥ. kiṃ punar (Abhidh-k-vy 537) eṣāṃ darśanamārgeṇa sādṛśyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10685: tulyabhūmikatvaṃ vā. tathā hi darśanamārgam adhikṛtya vakṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:10687: iti . yad vā pṛthagjanatvaghātāya duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāṃter ānaṃtaryamārgabhūtā agradharmā bhavaṃti. tad eṣāṃ darśanamārgeṇa sādṛśyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10689: (VI.21-23) vidha vibhāga iti vistaraḥ. tasya dhātor etad yañirūpaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10690: niścita iti. niḥśabdasyārthaṃ darśayati. kathaṃ punar niścito vedha ity āha. tena vicikitsāprahāṇāt niścitaḥ. satyānāṃ ca vibhajanāt. idaṃ duḥkham ayaṃ yāvan mārga iti. nirvedha āryamārgaḥ. tasya bhāgo darśanamārgaikadeśaḥ. tasyāvāhakatvenākarṣakatvena hitatvāt tasmai hitam iti chaḥ. tena nirvedhabhāgīyam iti bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10692: iti. anāgamyaṃ cāṃtaraṃ ca dhyānāni ca bhūmayo 'syety
T07yabhkvyu:10694: nordhvam iti. nārūpyeṣu nirvedhabhāgīyam asti. darśanaparivāratvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10695: darśanamārgaprayogatvād ity arthaḥ. tadabhāvaḥ. dāmadhātvālaṃbanatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10696: tasya darśanamārgasyābhāvas tadabhāvaḥ. kva. ūrdhvam iti vartate. ārūpyeṣv ity arthaḥ. kasmāt. kāma dhātvanālaṃbanāt. yasmād ārūpyāḥ kāmadhātuṃ [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:10697: 198a] nālaṃbaṃte. āha. kiṃ kāmadhātvālaṇbanena darśanamārgeṇa prayojanam
T07yabhkvyu:10698: iti. ata ucyate. tasya pūrvaṃ parijñeyapraheyatvād iti. tasya kāmadhātor duḥkharūpasya pūrvaṃ parijñeyatvāt. samudayarūpasya ca praheyatvāt. atra ca hetur yasmāt sa yogī kāmāvacareṇa duḥkhena vihanyate. tena sa pūrvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10699: tato mokṣam anveṣata iti. teṣāṃ rūpadhātau paṃcaskaṃdhako vipāka iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10700: teṣāṃ nirvedhabhāgīyānāṃ rūpāvacaratvāt yadi ca yogī rūpadhātāv
T07yabhkvyu:10701: upapadyeta. tatas tasya tatra paṃca skaṃdhako vipāko 'bhinirvartate.
T07yabhkvyu:10702: paripūrikāṇy eva ca tānīṣṭavedanīyajananāt. nākṣepakāṇi nikāyasabhāgasya.
T07yabhkvyu:10707: yasmād ihaiva satyābhisamayao nānyadhātau. nordhvaṃ hi dṛkpathaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:10708: asaṃvegāt. iha vidhā tatra niṣṭheti cāgamād iti. triṣu dvīpeṣūttarakuruvarjyeṣv iti vyākhyāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10709: mṛdvindriyatvāt. deveṣu saṃmukhībhāva iti. kāmāvacareṣu. caturthaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ [Tib. 198b] deveṣv api. teṣv eva ca nānyatra.
T07yabhkvyu:10710: tṛīṇi nirvedhabhāgīyāny anyatra agradharmebhyaḥ. ihaiva janmani strīpuruṣendriyaparāvṛttau ubhayāśrayāṇi strīpuruṣendriyāśrayāṇi striyaḥ puruṣāś ca labhaṃte. striyo hy etāny utpādya janmāṃtarastrībhāvaprādurbhāve stryāśrayāṇi saṃmukhīkurvaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:10711: janmāṃtarapuruṣabhāvaprādurbhāve tu puruṣāśrayāṇi saṃmukhīkurvaṃti. na hi tallābhinīnāṃ strīṇāṃ janmāṃtare strībhāvo na saṃbhavati. puruṣā api tathaiva strībhāve janmāṃtare sati stryāśrayāṇi saṃmukhīkurvaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:10714: stry evobhayāśrayān agradharmān labhate. na puruṣaḥ. tathā hi strī tān labdhvā stryāśrayais tais tadānīṃtanaiḥ samanvāgatā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10715: janmāṃtaraparāvṛttau ca kāmadhātau puruṣāśrayaprādurbhāve puruṣāśrayaiḥ sa puruṣaḥ samanvāgata iti. puruṣas tu puruṣāśrayān eva labhate. kasmād ity āha. strītvasyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhalābhād iti. tasmiṃ janmani strītvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10716: janmāṃtare 'pi punar nāstīty asyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhalābhaḥ. yo hy agradharmān utpādayati. so 'vaśyam anaṃtaraṃ darśanamārgam utapādayen
T07yabhkvyu:10717: [Tib. 199a] na ca dṛṣṭasatyasya punaḥ strītvaprādurbhāva iti siddhāṃtaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10718: bhūmityāgād iti vistaraḥ. yadbhūmikāni nirvedhabhāgīyāni pratilabdhāni
T07yabhkvyu:10719: prathamadhyānabhūmikāni yāvac caturthadhyānabhūmikāni. tāṃ bhūmiṃ tyajan
T07yabhkvyu:10720: prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yavac caturthaṃ tyajann āryas tāny api yathāsvaṃ prathamadhyānadhūmikāni yāvac caturthadhyānabhūmikāni tyajati. nānyathā na mṛtyunā parihāṇyā vā. yathā pṛthagjana ity arthaḥ. bhūmityāgaḥ punar bhūmisaṃcārād iti. na vairāgyata iti darśayati. pṛthagjanas tv iti
T07yabhkvyu:10721: vistaraḥ. pṛthagjanas tu nikāyasabhāgatyāgenaiva tyajati nirvedhabhāgīyāni saty asati vā bhūmisaṃcāre. tathā hi pṛthagjano
T07yabhkvyu:10722: yadbhūmikanirvedhabhāgīyalābhī bhavati. tata ūrdhvam upapadyamānas tāni bhūmisaṃcāre 'pi mṛtyunaiva tyajati. avītarāgas tv asati bhūmi saṃcāre mṛtyunā tyajati. kāmadhātāv evopadyate. na tv evam (Abhidh-k-vy 539)
T07yabhkvyu:10723: āryapudgalas tat kuśalamūlasaṃtater darśanamārgopabṛṃhitatvāt. pṛthagjana eva tathā tyajatīti kathaṃ gamyate. aṇḍakalalādigataḥ pṛthagjanaḥ kāyena
T07yabhkvyu:10725: ācaryavasumitras tu vyācaṣṭe. pṛthagjanas tu nikāyasabhāgatyāgenaiva
T07yabhkvyu:10726: tyajati. saty asati vā bhūmisaṃcāra iti. sakalaṃ dhyānam atra
T07yabhkvyu:10728: brāhmakāyikebhyaś cyutvā brahmapurohiteṣūpapadyate. tadā nikāyasabhāgatyāgena tyajati. yadā tu prathamāt dhyānāc cyutvā dvitīya
T07yabhkvyu:10729: upapadyate. tadā bhūmityāganikāyasabhāgatyāgābhyām iti. tad ayuktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10730: brahmalokopapannānāṃ nirvedhabhāgīyābhāvāt. kāmadhātau hi nirvedhabhāgīyāny utpadyaṃte. kāmadhātucyavanād eva ca teṣāṃ nirvedhabhāgīyatyāga iti. ācāryasaṃghabhadreṇāpi darśitam etat. nanu ca pṛthagjano 'pi yadbhūmikanirvedhabhāgīyalābhī bhavati. tata ūrdhvam upapadyamāno nirvedhabhāgīyāni vijahyād iti. nāsty etat.
T07yabhkvyu:10731: nikāyasabhāgatyāgād eva tyaktatvāt. maraṇabhavāsthito hi tāni tyajati.
T07yabhkvyu:10732: aṃtarābhavasthitena tu tyaktāni. ata ūrdhvam upapadyamānasya tan masti yad
T07yabhkvyu:10733: vijahyād iti. mṛtyunaivety ucyata iti. prātimokṣasaṃvaravad iti. yathā prātimokṣasaṃvaras tyaktaḥ punar ādīyamāno 'pūrva eva labhyate. kasmāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10734: anucitayatnasādhyatvāt. anucitatvāt yatnasādhyatvāc ca. yasmād anādim atisaṃsāre nocitāni bhavaṃti. āryamārgaparivāratvāt. tasmān na vairāgyalabhyāni. yasmād yatnasādhyāni. tasmān na pūrvatyaktāni labhyaṃta
T07yabhkvyu:10735: iti. sati pratisīmādaiśika iti. sīmā nāma [Tib. 200a] maryādā. tasyā daiśiko deśayitā praṇidhijñānalābhī. tasmin sati labdhavihīnāt
T07yabhkvyu:10736: pareṇotpādayati. yad anutpāditaṃ. tad utpādayatīty arthaḥ. asati pratisīmadaiśike mūlād evoṣmagatāt prabhṛtīty arthaḥ. ete punar vihāniparihāṇī iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10737: bhūmityāgāt tyajaty ārya ityādivacanād vihānir uktā.
T07yabhkvyu:10738: ādye dve parihāṇyā ceti vacanāt praihāṇir apy uktā. tenaite iti nirdiśati.
T07yabhkvyu:10739: hānī iti vihāniparihāṇyoḥ sāmānyarūpaparigrahād ubhayor grahaṇaṃ. parihāṇis tu doṣakṛtā. kleśakṛtety arthaḥ. nāvaśyaṃ vihānir iti. sā hi guṇakṛtāpi
T07yabhkvyu:10740: bhavati na kevalaṃ doṣakṛtā. guṇakṛtā tadyathā darśanamārgotpattau
T07yabhkvyu:10742: mithyādṛṣṭyā kuśalamūlavihāniḥ. pratisaṃdhicittena vā keṣāṃcid dharmāṇāṃ vihānir iti. tad evaṃ yā parihāṇiḥ. vihānir api sā. yā tu vihāniḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10743: nāvaśyam asau parihāṇiḥ. guṇaviśeṣebhya eva hi parihāṇir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10744: (VI.24) anutpattidharmatāṃ pratilabhata iti. apratisaṃkhyānirodhaṃ teṣāṃ gatyādīnāṃ pratilabhata [Tib. 200b] ity arthaḥ. tāṃ tu yathāyogam iti. tāṃ tv anutpattidharmatāṃ. yathāsaṃbhavaṃ mṛdvyām adhimātrāyāṃ ca kṣāṃtau pratilabhata iti vartate. kathaṃ kṛtvā. mṛdvyāṃ kṣāṃtyām apāyagatīnām
T07yabhkvyu:10749: (VI.25) tasyaiva tu gotrasyeti. kṣāṃtiparibhāvitasya śrāvakagotrasyety ācāryamataṃ. tasya kṣāṃtiparibhāvitatvenāvivartyatvād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10751: iti. pratyekabuddhaḥ kṣāṃtim api śrāvakagotrād vivartya syāt. na hi te
T07yabhkvyu:10752: parārtham apāyān avagāhanta ity abhiprāyaḥ. āniṃjyapaṭusamādhitvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10753: aṣṭapakṣālmuktatvād āniṃjyaḥ samādhiḥ. ata eva paṭur
T07yabhkvyu:10755: yeṣāṃ tu khaḍgād anyo 'pīti. yeṣām ābhidhārmikāṇāṃ matena khaḍgād anyo 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:10756: pratyekabuddho 'sti. utpāditanirvedhabhāgīyamātro 'pi vargacārī pratyekabuddha ity abhiprāyaḥ. teṣām uṣmagatamūrdhabhyāṃ tadgotrāṇāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10759: iti. yaḥ kṣipraṃ mokṣaṃ prāpnoti. sa ekasmiṃ janmani mokṣabhāgīyam
T07yabhkvyu:10760: utpādayet. dvitīye nirvedhabhāgīyāni. tṛtīye āryamārga iti. yas tu pūrvasmin janmani saṃbhṛtamokṣabhāgīyo bhavati. sa ekasminn api janmani nirvedhabhāgīyāny āryamārgaṃ cotpādayatīty avagaṃtavyaṃ bījāvaropaṇetyādi
T07yabhkvyu:10762: nirvedhabhāgīyotpattiḥ. phalotpattir āryamārgaḥ. asyāṃ dharmatāyām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10766: manaḥpraṇidhānaparigrahāt. praṇidhānaṃ punaś cetanāviśeśaḥ. ekabhikṣām api dattveti kāyakarma. ekaśikṣām api cādāyeti vākkarma. tac ca manaskarmotthānam iti. trikarmasvabhāvam alpakam apy etat mokṣābhilāṣabalādhānān mokṣabhāgīyam ākṣipati. mokṣasya bhāgaḥ prāptir
T07yabhkvyu:10767: mokṣabhāgaḥ. [Tib. 201b] tasmai hitaṃ mokṣabhāgīyam iti. nānyatra prajñānirvedayor abhāvād yathāyogam iti. kuruṣu tāvad ubhayaṃ nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:10768: apāyeṣu nirvedo 'sti prajñā nāsti. deveṣu prajñāsti nirvedo nāstīti. ato manuṣyeṣv eva triṣu dvīpeṣv ākṣipyate. nānyatra.
T07yabhkvyu:10770: vṛttasthaḥ śrutaciṃtāvān bhāvanāyāṃ prayujyata ity ārabhya nirvedhabhāgīyānukramaḥ. tatprasaṃgena mokṣabhāgīyopanyāsa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10772: nirvedhabhāgīyair api dharmakṣamaṇam. ato niṣyandena viśeṣaṇaṃ. yasyā dharmajñānaṃ niṣyaṃdaḥ. sā dharmajñānakṣāṃtiḥ. dharmajñānārthaṃ kṣāṃtir dharmajñānakṣāṃtiḥ. puṣpaphalavṛkṣavad yathā puṣpārthaṃ vṛkṣaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:10773: puṣpavṛkṣaḥ. phalārthaṃ vṛkṣaḥ phalavṛkṣaḥ. kārikāyāṃ tu dharmakṣāṃtir iti vacanam ekadeśagrahaṇato devadatto datta iti yathā. samyaktvaṃ nirvāṇam ity uktam iti. samyaktavaṃ katamat. yat tat paryādāya rāgaprahāṇam iti vistaraḥ. tatra niyamo niyāma iti. tatra samyaktve niyama ekāṃtībhāvo niyāma iti ghañi rūpaṃ. api tu niyama iti yamaḥ samupaniviṣu cety appratyayasya vibhāṣitatvāt. tasyāhigamanam avakramaṇam iti. [Tib. 202a]
T07yabhkvyu:10775: niyāmāvakrāṃtir ity ucyate. tasyāṃ ceti dharmajñānakṣāṃtau. pradīpajātivad
T07yabhkvyu:10776: iti. pradīpasyeva jāter iva cety arthaḥ. yathā pradīpasyānāgatasya tamovināśane sāmarthyaṃ. jāteś cānāgatāyā janyajanane. tathā pṛthagjanatvavyāvartane sāmarthyam anāgatāyā dharmajñānakṣāṃter abhyupagamyate. nānyad iti. kleśaprahāṇāṃ kāritraṃ. laukikair agradharmair iti apara iti. pṛthagjanatvaṃ vyāvartata iti prakṛtaṃ. na. taddharmatvād
T07yabhkvyu:10777: iti. na yuktam etal laukikair agradharmais tadvyāvartana iti. kasmāt. te
T07yabhkvyu:10779: vyāvartiṣyaṃta iti. tadvirodhitvād adoṣaḥ. agradharmāṇāṃ pṛthagjanantvavirodhitvāt adoṣa eṣaḥ. kiṃ. (Abhidh-k-vy 542) yathety āha.
T07yabhkvyu:10780: śatruskandhārūḍhatadghātanavad iti. yathā śatruskandhārūḍha eva kaścic chatruṃ ghātayet. evaṃ kilāgradharmāḥ pṛthagjanatvaśatruskandhārūḍhās tad eva pṛthagjanatvaṃ ghātayeyur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10781: ubhayair iti. laukikair agradharmaiḥ [Tib. 202b] kṣāṃtyā ca pṛthagjanatvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10782: vyāvartyate. katham ity āha. ānaṃtaryavimuktimārgasādharmyād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10784: vimuktimārgeṇa. yathā hy ānaṃtaryamārgeṇa kleśaḥ prahīyate. vimuktimārgeṇa prahīṇaḥ evaṃ laukikair agradharmaiḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ vihīyate. kṣāṃtyā vihīnam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10785: anāsravādhikāraḥ sarvatreti. tena tato 'traiva dharmajñānam anāsravam iti
T07yabhkvyu:10786: gamyate. tad duḥkhe dharmajñānam ity ucyate iti. śāstre tena nāmnā
T07yabhkvyu:10788: prathamato dharmatattvajñānād iti. ādito duḥkhādidharmatattvajñānād ity
T07yabhkvyu:10789: arthaḥ. tadanvayatvād iti. taddhetukatvād ity arthaḥ. tathaivānugamād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10790: yathaiva dharmajñānenānugataṃ parijñātaṃ duḥkhādisatyaṃ duḥkhādibhir ākāraiḥ. tathaiva rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhādyanugamād anvayajñānam etad iti vistaraḥ. evaṃ samanaṃtarotpattikrameṇa śeṣe samudaye rūpārūpyāvacare 'nvayajñānakṣāṃtir [Tib. 203a] iti vistareṇa yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10791: nikāyāṃtarīyā āryadharmaguptaprabhṛtayaḥ. abhedena hy abhisamaya ucyata
T07yabhkvyu:10792: iti. ṣoḍaśa citto 'yaṃ satyābhisamaya iti. darśanābhisamaya ālaṃbanābhisamayaḥ kāryābhisamayaś caivaṃ ṣoḍaśacittaka ity abhedaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10793: darśanābhisamaya iti. darśanam evābhisamayaḥ. evam ālaṃbanābhisamayaḥ kāryābhisamayaś ca. darśanābhisamayo 'nāsravayā prajñayā. tad dhi bhikṣavo
T07yabhkvyu:10794: dṛṣṭaṃ. yad anāsravayā prajñayā dṛṣṭam iti vacanāt. prajñaiva darśanam iti
T07yabhkvyu:10795: vyavasthāpyate. ālaṃbanaṃ grahaṇaṃ tatsaṃprayuktair api vedanādibhir bhavati. apiśabdāt prajñayāpi. yasmāc cittacaittaiḥ satyāny ālaṃbyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:10796: kāryaṃ yasya satyasya yat kartavyaṃ. tadyathā duḥkhasya parijñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10797: samudayasya prahāṇaṃ. nirodhasya sākṣātkaraṇaṃ. mārgasya bhāvanaṃ. tad viprayuktair api śīlajātyādibhir bhavati. apiśabdāt prajñātatsaṃprayuktair api. prajñāsaṃprayuktaviprayuktair hi tatkāryacatuṣṭayaṃ [Tib. 203b]
T07yabhkvyu:10798: kriyate. jātyādibhir ity ādiśabdāl lakṣaṇāṃtarāṇi prāptayaś ca gṛhyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:10799: duḥkhe hīti vistaraḥ. duḥkhe hi dṛśyamāne prajñayā. tasyābhisamayitur duḥkhasya vā trividho (Abhidh-k-vy 543) 'bhiṣamayo yathoktaḥ. katham ity āha. samudayādīnāṃ samudayanirodhamārgāṇām abhisamayaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:10801: kleśaprāpticchedāt. sākṣātkaraṇaṃ nirodhasya tatprāptyutpādāt. bhāvanaṃ mārgasya saṃmukhībhāvāt. ākārabhedād iti. pratyekam eṣāṃ duḥkhādīnām
T07yabhkvyu:10802: ākārabhedāt. na ca duḥkhākāreṇa samudayādīnāṃ darśanaṃ yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10803: tadākārārthabhedataḥ. athāpy anātmākāreṇa sarveṣāṃ satyānāṃ darśanam iti
T07yabhkvyu:10804: brūyāt nikāyāṃtarīyaḥ. śūnyatānātmate sarvasatyānāṃ sāmānyaṃ lakṣaṇam iti kṛtvā. na tarhi satyānāṃ duḥkhādito darśanaṃ syāt. duḥkhataḥ samudayato nirodhato mārgata iti. tathā ca saty anātmākāreṇa sarveṣāṃ darśanam iti bruvan sūtravirodhaḥ. yasmāt sūtra evam uktam āryaśrāvakasyeti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10805: atha manyase nāsti sūtravirodho yasmād abhisamayāvasthāyāh pūrvaṃ prayogāvasthāyām [Tib. 204a] āryaśrāvakasya duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasikurvata ity evamādi. ato 'nātmākāreṇa sarveṣāṃ darśanād ekābhisamaya
T07yabhkvyu:10806: eveti. tac cāyuktam. anāsraveṇa manasikāreṇa saṃprayukto dharmāṇāṃ vicaya iti vacanāt. na hi prayogāvasthāyām anāsravamanasikāraḥ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10807: bhāvanāmārga evam iti ced ya āryaśrāvakasya duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasikurvata iti vistareṇa. na. yathā darśanaṃ bhāvanāt. naitad evaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10808: yathaiva hi pūrvaṃ satyānāṃ darśanaṃ. tathaiva teṣāṃ paścād bhāvanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10809: bhāvanāmārgo bhavatīty arthaḥ. śeṣeṣu vaśitvalābhād iti. aṃtareṇa prayogaṃ samudayādidarśanasaṃmukhībhāvaśaktilābho vaśitvalābhaḥ. tasmād iti. aṃtarā tu vyutthānām asti nāstīti vicāryaṃ syād iti. śeṣeṣu vaśitvalābhād aṃtarā
T07yabhkvyu:10810: vyutthānaṃ prāpnotīti doṣaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ. ubhayathāpi ca vicāryamāṇe bahūnāṃ sūtrāṇāṃ virodhaḥ. yathā ca teṣāṃ virodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10811: tathāgameṣu śrotavyaḥ. ekasya darśane śeṣāṇāṃ kāryābhisamayavacanād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10812: yasmād asty etat vacanaṃ. duḥkhe hi dṛśyamāne tasya trividho 'bhisamayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10814: ato 'smābhir apy evam abhyupagamān nāsti doṣaḥ. āha. yady apy abhyupagamyata ity abhisamayaḥ. sūtre satyānāṃ krameṇābhisamayo
T07yabhkvyu:10815: virudhyate. ata ucyate. darśanābhiśamayaṃ tu pratīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10816: sadṛṣṭāṃtāni trīṇi sūtrāṇīti. saṃyuktāgame paṭhyaṃte. kathaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10817: anāthapiṇḍada āha. kiṃ nu bhadaṃta caturṇām āryasatyānām anupūrvābhisamayaḥ. āhosvid ekābhisamaya iti. caturṇāṃ gṛhapate āryasatyānām anupūrvābhisamayo na tv ekābhisamayaḥ. yo gṛhapate evaṃ vaded ahaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 544) duḥkhaṃ āryasatyam anabhisametya samudayam āryasatyam abhisameṣyāmīti vistareṇa yāvad duḥkhanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadam āryasatyam abhisameṣyāmīti. maivaṃ voca iti syād vacanīyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ. asthānam anavakāśo yad duḥkham āryasatyam anabhisametya samudayam āryasatyam abhisameṣyati pūrvavat. yāvan nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. sthānam etad iti pūrvavat. tadyathā gṛhapate ya evaṃ vaded ahaṃ kūṭāgārasya vā kūṭāgāraśālāyā vā vā mūlapādam apratiṣṭhāpya bhittiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi.
T07yabhkvyu:10818: bhittim apratiṣṭhāpya talakaṃ. [Tib. 205a] talakam apratiṣṭhāpya cchadanaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10819: pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti. maivaṃ voca iti syād vacanīyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10820: asthānam anavakāśo yat kūṭāgārasyeti pūrvavat. yāvat sthānam etad vidyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10821: yan mūlapādaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya bhittiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti pūrvavat. yāvad evam eva gṛhapate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. yad duḥkhasatyam adṛṣṭvā
T07yabhkvyu:10822: samudayasatyaṃ drakṣyatīti vistaraḥ. athānyataro bhikṣur āha. kiṃ nu bhadaṃta caturṇām āryasatyānām anupūrvābhisamayaḥ. āhosvid ekābhisamaya iti. bhagavān āha. caturṇāṃ bhikṣo satyānām iti. pūrvavad yāvat tadyathā
T07yabhkvyu:10823: bhikṣo ya evaṃ vaded ahaṃ catuṣkaḍevarasya sopānasya prathamasopānakaḍevaram anabhiruhya dvitīyam abhirokṣyāmīti. dvitīyam anabhiruhya tṛtīyaṃ. tṛtīyam anabhiruhya caturtham abhirokṣyāmīti. maivaṃ voca iti syād vacanīyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ. asthānam anavakāśo yac
T07yabhkvyu:10824: catuṣkaḍevarasya sopānasya prathamasopānakaḍevaram anabhiruhya dvitīyakaḍevaram abhirokṣyati. evaṃ yāvat tṛtīyam anabhiruhya caturtham abhirokṣyati. evam ihāpi nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. yad duḥkhasatyam adṛṣṭvā
T07yabhkvyu:10825: samudayasatyaṃ drakṣyatītyādi. [Tib. 205b] tathāryānanda āha. kiṃ nu bhadaṃta caturṇām āryasatyānām anupūrvābhisamayaḥ. utāho ekābhisamaya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10826: pūrvasūtravat. yāvat. tadyathānanda ya evaṃ vaded ahaṃ catuṣpadikāyā
T07yabhkvyu:10827: niḥśreṇyāḥ prathamaṃ niḥśreṇīpadam anabhiruhya prāsādam abhirokṣyāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10828: maivaṃ voca iti syād vacanīyaḥ. vistareṇa yāvad evam evānanda ya evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10829: vaded ahaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam anabhisametya samudayasatyam abhisameṣyāmīti vistareṇa yāvan nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata iti. etāni trīṇi sūtrāṇi. yo duḥkha iti vistaraḥ. atha mataṃ syād yo duḥke niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso buddhe 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:10830: sa iti sūtrād ekābhisamaya iti. katham. aśaikṣā hi dharmā buddhaḥ. ta evāśaikṣā dharmā mārgaḥ. tasmād duḥkhābhisamayān mārgo 'pi tenābhisamito yasmād duḥkhavad buddhe 'pi niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitsa iti. kāṃkṣā vicikitsety anarthāṃtaraḥ. atha vāniścayābhilāṣaḥ kāṃkṣā vimatir vicikitsā (Abhidh-k-vy 545) yathoktalakṣaṇā.
T07yabhkvyu:10834: 'vaśyaṃprahāṇaṃ ca bhavati. ato yo duḥkhe niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso buddhe
T07yabhkvyu:10836: (VI.30ab) te punaḥ ṣaḍbhūmikā ity uktaṃ prāg iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10838: (VI.30cd) anaṃtaryaśakyatvād iti. kṛtyāś ca śaki liṅ ceti śakyārthe
T07yabhkvyu:10839: kṛtyapratyayaḥ aṃtarayituṃ śakyā aṃtaryāḥ. nāṃtaryāḥ anaṃtaryāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10840: kleśaprāptiṃ te vicchindaṃti. viprakṛtāvasthā sā teṣām iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10841: ānaṃtaryamārgeṇeti bhāve svarthe vṛddhividhānaṃ. anantarabhāvo anaṃtaramārgo vā ānaṃtaryaṃ. tasya mārgā ānaṃtaryamārgāḥ. vimuktimārgāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10842: vimuktimārgā iti. vimuktau mārgā vimuktimārgāḥ. kleśavimuktyavasthāmārgā ity arthaḥ. dvābhyāṃ cauraniṣkāsanakapāṭapidhānavad iti. yathā dvābhyām ekena cauro niṣkāsyate. dvitīyena tadapraveśāya kapāṭaḥ pidhīyate. evam ānaṃtaryamārgeṇa kleśacauro niṣkāsyate. tatprāpticchedataḥ. vimukitmārgeṇa ca visaṃyogaprāptikapāṭaṃ pidhīyate. vartamānīkaraṇataḥ. yadi punar iti
T07yabhkvyu:10844: 'nvayajñānakṣāṃtyā saha visaṃyogaprāptir utpadyeta. naiva duḥkhe dharmajñānam utpadyate. yad anena kartavyaṃ. tad duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāṃtyaiva kriyetety abhiprāyaḥ. prahīṇavicikitsaṃ jñānaṃ tatraivālaṃbane kāmāvacaraduḥkhe prahīṇavicikitsaṃ jñānaṃ notpannaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10845: tatra hi duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāṃtiḥ savicikitsaiva vartate vicikitsāyā
T07yabhkvyu:10846: aprahīṇatvāt. na ca tatra duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāṃtiḥ prahīṇavicikitseti śakyate vyavasthāpayituṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10847: kṣāṃtibhir iti vistaraḥ. kṣāṃtibhiḥ kleśaprahāṇād yo 'yaṃ sāstrapāṭhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10849: samudayadharmajñānaprahatavyo nirodhadharmajñānaprahātavyo mārgadharmajñānaprahātavyaḥ duḥkhānvayajñānaprahātavyaḥ samudayānvayajñānaprahātavyo nirodhānvayajñānaprahātavyo mārgānvayajñānaprahātavyo bhāvanāprahātavyaś ca saṃyojananikāya iti. sūtre
T07yabhkvyu:10850: 'py uktam. iti hi bhikṣavo jñānavadhyāḥ kleśāḥ. vidyudupamaṃ cittam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10851: tasya virodhaḥ. na hi tatra (Abhidh-k-vy 546) kṣāṃtiprahātavyaḥ saṃyojananikāya ity uktaṃ. na kṣāṃtīnām iti [Tib. 207a] vistaraḥ. naitad
T07yabhkvyu:10852: evaṃ. kasmāt. kṣāṃtīnāṃ jñānaparivāratvāt. kṣāṃtayo jñānasya parivārā ity ataḥ kṣāṃtiprahātavyaḥ saṃyojananikāyo jñānaprahātavya ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10853: rājaparivārakṛtasya rājakṛtavyapadeśavat. yathā rājaparivārakṛtasya kasyacid arthasya rājakṛta iti vyapadeśo bhavati. tadvad bhāvanāprahātavyas tu saṃyojananikāyo jñānaprahātavya eva. tatra ānaṃtaryamārgo 'pi jñānasvabhāva iti. kleśaprahāṇe hy ānaṃtaryamārga eva
T07yabhkvyu:10855: (VI.31ab) adṛṣṭasatyadarśanād iti jñānena katham adṛṣṭasatyadarśanaṃ bhavati. tad apy adṛṣṭe satyāṃtare sati bhavatīti
T07yabhkvyu:10857: tenāpy adṛṣṭam iva paśyatīti. atha vā adṛṣṭadṛṣṭer aḍṛṣṭadarśanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10858: paṃcadaśakṣaṇā darśanamārgo yāvad asya pudgalasyādṛṣṭadarśanaṃ pravartate.
T07yabhkvyu:10859: tāvad asya kṣaṇā darśanamārgaḥ. tasya dṛṣṭe 'pi duḥkhe adṛṣṭadarśanam asya
T07yabhkvyu:10860: samudaye pravartata evety āha. bhāvanāmārga eva ṣoḍaśa kṣaṇa iti vākyādhyāhāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10861: nanu ca tenāpy adṛṣṭaṃ paśyati kiṃ tad adṛṣṭam ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:10862: mārgānvayajñānakṣāṃtim iti. mārgānvayajñānakṣāṃtir ātmānaṃ virahayya śeṣam anvayajñānapakṣyaṃ mārgam ālaṃbate. svātmani [Tib.207b] vṛttivirodhāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10863: tenocyate. mārgānvayajñānakṣāṃtim adṛṣṭāṃ paśyatīti. satyaṃ prati ciṃteti
T07yabhkvyu:10864: vistaraḥ. satyaṃ prati cintā dṛṣṭaṃ na dṛṣṭam iti. na tu kṣaṇaṃ prati dṛṣṭaḥ kṣaṇo na veti. kasmāt. paṃcadaśena kṣaṇena yad
T07yabhkvyu:10865: anvayajñānapakṣalakṣaṇaṃ satyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ. tad eva ṣoḍaśenāpīti. nāsty apūrvadṛṣṭasatyadarśanam iti. na ṣoḍaśakṣaṇo darśanamārga iti
T07yabhkvyu:10866: vyavasthāpyate. na hy ekakṣaṇenādṛṣṭena mārgānvayajñānakṣāṃtilakṣaṇena satyaṃ tanmārgasatyam aḍṛṣṭaṃ bhavati. laukikaṃ dṛṣṭāṃtam āha. yathā naikaluṅgena ekasasyaśalākayā dātreṇālūnenācchinnena kedāram alūnaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10867: bhavati. kiṃ tarhi. lūnam evety arthaḥ. tathā hi kecit pramādād alūne 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:10868: ekaluṃge vaktāro bhavaṃti lūnam asmābhiḥ kedāram iti. phalatvād iti vistaraḥ. phalatvād ityadihetubhir bhāvanāmārgam eva ṣoḍaśakṣaṇaṃ sādhayati. bhāvanāmārgaḥ ṣoḍaśaḥ kṣaṇaḥ. saṃskṛtaśrāmaṇyaphalatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10869: sakṛdāgāmiphalavat yāvad arhattvaphalavad vā. tathā bhāvitāṣṭajñānaṣoḍasākāratvād vihīnapratipannakamārgatvāt
T07yabhkvyu:10870: ca. [Tib. 208a] phalāṃtaravad eva bhāvanāmārgaḥ. ṣoḍaśe hi kṣaṇe 'ṣṭau
T07yabhkvyu:10871: jñānāni bhāvyaṃte. duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ duḥkhe 'nvayajñānaṃ yāvan
T07yabhkvyu:10873: bhāvyaṃte. tadvad eva ca darśanamārge 'ṣṭajñānaṣoḍaśākārabhāvanā nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:10874: tatra hi sabhāgajñānākārabhāvanaiva yathotpannāni bhāvyaṃte kṣāṃtijñānāni darśana iti vacanāt. mārgānvayajñāne ca pūrvamārgasya pratipannakamārgasya
T07yabhkvyu:10875: vihāniḥ. na ca darśanamārge pūrvamārgavihānir iti. prābaṃdhikaṃ cedaṃ mārgānvayajñānaṃ. na ca darśanamārge kṣāṃtir jñānaṃ vā kiṃcit prābaṃdhikam astīty ato 'pi mārgānvayajñānaṃ bhāvanāmārga iti. itaraḥ pratyavasthānaṃ karoti. darśanamārgaḥ ṣoḍaśaḥ kṣaṇaḥ. avaśyakāparihāṇitvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10878: 'pi sādhyamāne tad aparihāṇitvam anenānumānenāpatatīti. tad idam aṃtarnītam abhisamīkṣya punar āha. aparihāṇis tv iti vistaraḥ. yasmād darśanaheyānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇaṃ mārgānvayajñānenādhārapratipakṣeṇa [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:10879: 208b] saṃdhāryate. yadi ca tasmāt phalamārgāt ṣoḍaśāt kṣaṇāt parihāṇiḥ syāt srotaāpattiphalāt parihāṇiḥ syāt. na ca srotaāpattiphalāt parihāṇir ity ato na tasmāt parihīyate. itara āha. ata eveti. kim ayam.
T07yabhkvyu:10880: aparihāṇihetur evocyate. vayam apy etam artham abhidadhmahe. kim ayam upalabdhisamam iti cottaram udgrāhyate. ācārya āha. ata eva darśanamārga
T07yabhkvyu:10881: iti cet. yadi manyase yata eva darśanaheyaprahāṇasaṃdhāraṇaṃ mārgānvayajñānena. ata eva darśanamārga iti. tan na. atiprasaṃgāt. yadi mārgānvayajñānena darśanaheyaprahāṇasaṃdhāraṇam ity ato darśanamārgaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:10882: syāt. evaṃ saty atiprasaṃgaḥ syāt. tasmān mārgānvayajñānāt pareṇa sarveṇa bhāvanāmārgeṇa darśanaheyaprahāṇasaṃdhāraṇam iti sarva eva darśanamārgaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:10883: syāt. aniṣṭaṃ caitat. ṣoḍaśa eva hi kṣaṇo darśanamārgo bhavadhir iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10884: na saptadaśāṣṭadaśa ityādikaḥ kṣaṇaḥ pravāhanyāyenotpadyate. dvitīye tṛtīye vā divase ya utpadyate tajjātīyo viśeṣamārgasaṃgṛhītaḥ. tan nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:10885: tato 'pi hi nāsti parihāṇiḥ. tad evaṃ saty āvaśyakāparihāṇitvaṃ yo hetur
T07yabhkvyu:10886: uktaḥ. so 'naikāṃtika iti darśitaṃ bhavati. [Tib. 209a] tadanaikāṃtikatvāc cāpratisādhanaṃ tat. na pūrvapakṣadūṣaṇaṃ ceti. āha. sapta jñānāni duḥkhe
T07yabhkvyu:10887: dharmajñānaṃ yāvan mārge dharmajñānaṃ kasmād durśanamārgo na punar aṣṭamaṃ mārge 'nvayajñānam (Abhidh-k-vy 548) ity abhiprāyaḥ. darśanasyāsamāptatvād
T07yabhkvyu:10888: iti. mārgānvayajñānakṣāṃtau darśanaṃ samāptaṃ. sarveṣāṃ satyānāṃ tadānīṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10889: dṛṣṭatvāt. duḥkhe dharmajñāna utpanne yady api kāmāvacaraṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10890: rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhādi tu na tāvad dṛṣṭam. evaṃ yāvat. mārge dharmajñāna utpanne rūpārūpyapratipakṣo na tāvad dṛṣṭa iti. sāvaśeṣaṃ darśanaṃ na
T07yabhkvyu:10891: samāptam iti. tadaṃtarālatvād iti. darśanamārgāṃtarālatvāt. tayor vā dvayoḥ kṣāṃtyor aṃtarālatvāt. tāny api sapta jñānāni darśanamārgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10893: (VI.31cd, 32) pūrvaṃ parapratyayena paroditena arthānusaraṇād duḥkhādisatyapratipatter ity arthaḥ. pūrvam iti viśeṣaṇena bhāvanākāle paropadeśanirapekṣam arthānusaraṇam iti kathitaṃ bhavati. evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10894: dharmānusārīti. dharmair anusāro dharmānusāraḥ. so 'syāstīti dharmānusārī.
T07yabhkvyu:10895: dharmair anusartuṃ śīlam asyeti vā. [Tib. 209b] pūrvaṃ svayam eva
T07yabhkvyu:10896: sūtrādibhir dharmair dvādaśāṃgaiḥ pravacanair arthānusaraṇāt. pūrvavad
T07yabhkvyu:10897: vyākhyānaṃ. yāvat paṃca prakārāḥ prahīṇā bhavaṃtīti. yāvacchabdena yady eko dvau trayaś catvāraḥ paṃca prahīṇāḥ prakārā bhavaṃti. tathaiva prathamaphalapratipannakāv ucyete. yathā sakalabandhanau.
T07yabhkvyu:10899: iti. dvitīye iti dvitīyanimittam ity arthaḥ. carmaṇi dvīpinaṃ haṃtīti
T07yabhkvyu:10900: yathā. arvāṅ navakṣayāt. navaprakāraprahāṇād adharataḥ navaprakāraprahāṇaparihāreṇārthād uktaṃ bhavati. yadi tayoḥ pudgalayos
T07yabhkvyu:10901: tasmāt paṃcaprakāraprahāṇāt pareṇa ṣaṭ saptaṣṭau vā prakārāḥ pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa prahīṇā bhavaṃti. tau dvitīyaphalapratipannakāv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10902: dvitīya iti vacanāt. pratipannakāv iti cādhikārād evaṃ padārthavyavasthā labhyate. ūrdhvaṃ ceti prathamadhyānavītarāgau. yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanād vītarāgau.
T07yabhkvyu:10903: (VI.33) arhattvaṃ tu na śakyam āditaḥ prāptum iti. anāgāmiphalam aprāpyādita evārhattvaṃ prāptuṃ na śakyate. kasmād ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:10904: bhāvanāheyaprahāṇāt. na hi darśanamārgeṇa bhāvāgrikāṇāṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ prahāṇam astīti. yathā darśanamārgasvabhāveṣu paṃcadaśasu kṣaṇeṣu vartamānaḥ aditas tṛtīyaphalapratipannakād [Tib. 210a]
T07yabhkvyu:10905: arhattvaphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakaḥ syāt. ṣoḍaśe tu citta utpanne ādito 'nāgāmino 'rhan syāt. bhāvāgrikabhāvanāheyaprahāṇād dhy arhattvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10906: pratisthāpyate. āha. yadi darśanamārgeṇa bhāvāgrikāṇāṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ nāstīti ato 'rhattvaṃ aśakyaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 549) pūrvam eva. tarhi pṛthagjanāvasthāyām eva bhāvanāmārgeṇa bhavāgravairāgyāt tatphalapratipannakaḥ. teṣu vartamāno 'rhattvaphalasākṣātkriyāyai
T07yabhkvyu:10907: pratipannako bhaviṣyati. ṣoḍaśe tu cittakṣaṇa ādito 'rhann iti. ata
T07yabhkvyu:10908: ucyate. pūrvaṃ ca bhavāgravairāgyasaṃbhavād iti. na hi pūrvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10910: uparibhūmyabhāvāt. tasmād āditaḥ pratipannako 'rhaṃś ca na syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10912: śraddhādhikatvenādhimokṣaprabhāvitatvāc chraddhādhimuktaḥ. śraddhādhiko muktaḥ śraddhādhimukta iti kṛtvā. na tu tasya prajñā naivāsti. tayā na tu
T07yabhkvyu:10913: prabhāvita iti. na tan nāma labhate. prajñādhikatvena dṛṣṭiprabhāvitatvāt dṛṣṭiprāptaḥ. na tu tasya śraddhā nāsīti pūrvavad vācyaṃ. apare tu punaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10914: [Tib. 210b] nairuktavidhim ālaṃbya vyācakṣate. śraddhādhipatyena darśanaheyebhyo muktaḥ śraddhādhimuktaḥ. dṛṣṭyādhipatyena prāptaphalo prāptaphalāḥ dṛṣṭiprāpta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10916: iti uktam. ataḥ pṛcchati kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇam iti vistaraḥ. phalaviśiṣṭo mārgo na labhyata iti. phalād viśiṣṭo mārgaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:10918: prathamādiprakārabhāvanāheyapratipakṣamārgo na bhāvyata ity arthaḥ. yāvan na viśeṣāya prayujyata iti. yāvan nāprahīṇakleśaprahāṇāya phalāṃtaraprāptinimittaṃ prayogaṃ karoti. tāvat pratipannako nocyate. yadā
T07yabhkvyu:10919: prayujyate. tadā pratipannaka ity arthād uktaṃ bhavati. tadā hi pūrvaprahīṇakleśapratipakṣasyāpratilabdhapūrvasya tatprahāṇasya cānāsravā
T07yabhkvyu:10920: prāptir utpadyata iti siddhāṃtaḥ. evam anyatrāpi phale veditavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10921: ṣoḍaśe citte srotaāpanna evocyata iti vacanāt. srotaāpanna ukta ity ato
T07yabhkvyu:10922: 'nyatrāpi. sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale ca veditavyaṃ. laukikena mārgeṇa prahīṇāṣṭaprakāro 'pi ṣoḍaśe citte sakṛdāgāmy evocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10923: nānāgāmiphalapratipannakaḥ. yasmāt phale phalaviśiṣṭasya mārgasya lābho nāstīti. evaṃ kāmavītarāga ūrdhvaṃ vā ṣoḍaśe citte
T07yabhkvyu:10925: 211a] pūrvavat. yas tu tṛtīyadhyānavītarāga iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10926: tṛtīyadhyānavītarāgaḥ adharāṃ bhūmiṃ niśrityānāgamyaṃ dhyānāṃtaraṃ prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ vā dhyānaṃ niśritya niyāmam avakrāmatīty asti saṃbhavaḥ. so 'vaśyaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti
T07yabhkvyu:10928: sukhendriyaṃ labhyate. asti hi sambhāvanā yad asau phalaviśiṣṭamārgaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10929: saṃmukhīkuryāt. yasmād asya tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikaḥ kleśaḥ prahīṇa iti. tena so 'vaśyaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ mārgaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 550) saṃmukhīkarotīti
T07yabhkvyu:10930: niyamyate. anyathā hi yadi na saṃmukhīkarotīty arthaḥ. sa tasmād ūrdhvopapannaḥ. sa āryaḥ. tasmāt tṛtīyadhyānād ūrdhvaṃ caturthe dhyāne ārūpyeṣu vā sukhendriyeṇāsamanvāgataḥ syāt. yad dhi sāsravaṃ sukhendriyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10931: tad bhūmisaṃcārāt tyaktaṃ. yad api cānāsravaṃ. tad api. yadi na saṃmukhīkṛtaṃ syād ubhayenāpi sukhendriyenāsamanvāgataḥ syād āryāṇāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10932: cordhvopapannānām avaśyaṃ sukhendriyeṇāsamanvāgama uktaḥ. sukhendriyeṇa caturthadhyānārūpyopannaḥ pṛthagjano na samanvāgataḥ. āryas tu samanvāgata
T07yabhkvyu:10933: iti vacanāt. yaś cāpi saumanasyendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ. so 'vaśyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10935: [Tib. 211b] atra brūmaḥ. asty eṣa vibhāṣāyāṃ likhitapakṣaḥ. sa tu na
T07yabhkvyu:10936: sthāpanāpakṣo lakṣyate. apara āhur iti vacanāt. yo hi caturthadhyānalābhī
T07yabhkvyu:10937: ṣaṇṇāṃ bhūmīnām anyatamāṃ bhūmiṃ niśritya niyāmam avakrāmati. sa ṣaḍbhūmikenānāgāmiphalenānāgamyabhūmikena yāvac caturthadhyānabhūmikena ṣoḍaśe citte samanvāgato bhavati. tathā vītarāgatvāt. yas
T07yabhkvyu:10938: tṛtīyadhyānalābhī. sa paṃcabhūmikena. caturthadhyānabhūmikaṃ hitvā. evaṃ yo dvitīyadhyānalābhī. sa caturbhūmikena. tṛtīyacaturthabhūmike hitvā. yas tu vītarāgaḥ prathamadhyānalābhī vā dvitīyālābhī. sa yady anāgāmiphalaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10940: anāgamyadhyānāṃtaraprathamadhyānabhūmikena. sarvajaghanyo 'pi hy anāgāmy avaśyam eva tribhūmikenānāgāmiphalena samanvāgata iti varṇayaṃti. tasmād aparapakṣāpekṣayaivam uktam ācāryeṇeti yuktaṃ syāt.

T07yabhkvyu:10943: dvitīye 'rvāṅ navakṣayād iti vacanāt. kāmavītarāgāṇāṃ kāmād viraktād ūrdhvaṃ ceti
T07yabhkvyu:10946: kāmād viraktāv iti vacanāt. kāmadhātau nava prakārāḥ kleśā upadiṣṭāḥ. celād iti vastrāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10947: eṣa dṛṣṭāṃtayoga iti. drstāṃtayuktir dṛṣṭāṃtayogo dṛṣṭāṃtaprakāra ity
T07yabhkvyu:10948: apare. (Abhidh-k-vy 551) tad evam anayā yuktyānena vā prakāreṇānyo 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:10949: dṛṣṭāṃto vaktavya iti sūcayati. anyathā hy eṣa dṛṣṭāṃta ity eva brūyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:10950: anādisaṃsāra iti. anādau saṃsāre. svahetuparaṃparayā dhyāpitā abhivardhitās tataś cādhimātrapramāṇam eteṣām ity abhiprāyaḥ. teṣāṃ kleśānām unmūlanāt prāpticchedataḥ. mūlasadharmiṇyo hi prāptayas
T07yabhkvyu:10951: tatprabaṃdhatvāt kleśānāṃ tṛvṛtkarṣaniṣkarṣaṇavad iti. yathā trivṛtkarṣeṇa dharaṇena subahukāle saṃvardhitānāṃ vātapittādīnāṃ doṣāṇāṃ niṣkarṣaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10952: evaṃ kṣāṇikamṛdukenāpy āryamārgeṇa kleśānāṃ. yathā ca kṣaṇikenālpena
T07yabhkvyu:10953: pradīpena [Tib. 212b] mahatas tamaso ghātaḥ. tadvat kleśānām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:10955: nātaḥ param ity arthaḥ. tena mārgeṇa nirvāṇagamanād ity arthaḥ. srotasā hi loke gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10956: ādyamārgalābhāc cet. ādyo 'nāsravo mārgo darśanamārgas tasya lābhāc cet srotaāpannaḥ. aṣṭamako 'pi syāt. srotaāpattiphalapratipannako 'pi syād ity arthaḥ. tathā hi pratilomakrameṇārhata ārabhyāṣṭānāṃ puruṣapudgalānām arhatpratipannakādīnāṃ srotaāpattiphalapratipanno 'ṣṭamako bhavati śraddhānusārī dharmānusārī vā tasyāpy ādyamārgalābhāt so 'pi srotaāpannaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:10957: syāt. ādyaphalalābhāc cet. atha mataṃ apūrvaphalasya lābhāt srotaāpanna iti. bhūyovītarāgo 'pi syāt. yaḥ prahīṇaṣaṭkleśaprakāraḥ ṣoḍaśe kṣaṇe
T07yabhkvyu:10958: sakṛdāgāmī. so 'pi srotaāpannaḥ syāt. tasyāpy apūrvaphalalābhāt. evaṃ kāmavītarāgo 'pi syāt. tasyāpi tad ādyaṃ phalam iti. idānīṃ parihāra [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:10960: iti. srotaāpattiphalādīni catvāri. tatprāptuṃ śīlam asyeti
T07yabhkvyu:10961: sarvaphalaprāpī. sarvaphalaprāpti asyāsīti vā sarvaphalaprāpī. tam adhikṛtya tam abhisaṃdhāyādyaphalalābhād apūrvaphalalābhāt srotaāpanna
T07yabhkvyu:10962: ucyate. kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇam iti vistaraḥ. kasmāt sa eva srotaāpanna ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10963: nāṣṭamakaḥ sa cāpi hy āryamārgasrotaāpanna iti.

T07yabhkvyu:10966: labdhaḥ. aṣṭamakena tu pratipannakaḥ mārga eva labdha iti. itaś ca darśanabhāvanāmārgalābhāt. yasmāc ca tena darśanamārgaś ca sa eva bhāvanāmārgaś ca sa eva labdhaḥ. aṣṭamakena tu darśanamārga eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:10967: sakalasroto'bhisamayāc ca mārgānvayajñāne. yasmāc cānena sakalaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10969: aṣṭamakena. tasmād (Abhidh-k-vy 552) ebhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sarvaphalaprāpy eva srotaāpanna ity ucyate nāṣṭamakaḥ. prakarṣagater hi tathā vacanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:10970: tadyathā loke yaḥ prakarṣeṇa bhāsaṃ karoti. sa bhāskara ucyate. na
T07yabhkvyu:10971: khadyotakaḥ. [Tib. 213b] tadvat. tasmād anyān iti. tasmāt sāṃpratikād bhavād anyān. saptasthānakauśalasaptaparṇavad iti. yathā saptakasāmānyāt saptasthānakuśalo bhikṣur uktaḥ sūtre. kathaṃ. vistaram uktvāha. kathaṃ ca bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ saptasthānakuśalo bhavati. rūpaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:10972: rūpasamudayaṃ rūpanirodhaṃ rūpanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadaṃ rūpasyāsvādam ādīnavaṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. evaṃ vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. vijñānasamudayaṃ vistareṇa yāvan
T07yabhkvyu:10973: niḥsaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti. evam anena nyāyena paṃcasaptakāni paṃcatriṃśad iti. paṃcatriṃśat kuśalaḥ prāpnoti. saptaparṇavac ca. yathā ca pattrikāyāṃ pattrikāyāṃ saptaparṇasādṛśyād anekaśatapattro 'pi san sa vṛkṣaḥ saptaparṇa ity ucyate. tadvat. prathamo dṛṣṭāṃtaḥ pravacane
T07yabhkvyu:10974: siddhaḥ. dvitīyo loka iti dṛṣṭāṃtadvayopanyāse prayojanam. yadi saptakasāmānyāt saptakṛtvaḥ parama iti vyākhyāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:10975: yat tarhi sūtra uktaṃ. tad virudhyata ity ato 'pavyākhyānam etad ity abhiprāyaḥ. ekasyāṃ gatāv aṣṭamaṃ bhavaṃ nābhinirvartayatīty avirodhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10976: yathārutaṃ vā kalpyamāna iti. saptakṛtvo devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ca saṃsṛtya
T07yabhkvyu:10978: aṃtarābhavo 'pi na syāt. iṣyate ca devamanuṣyagatyoḥ
T07yabhkvyu:10979: saptabhavābhinirvartanam. aṃtarābhavās tu na gaṇyāṃta iti. yadi aṃtarābhavaiḥ saha saptabhavā gaṇyeran janmacatuṣṭayam evāsya syāt. tad evānenāniṣṭāpattivacanena tadātmīyaṃ vyākhyānam ekasyāṃ gatāv iti
T07yabhkvyu:10980: samarthayati. itara āha. evam apy ūrdhvaṃsrotasa iti vistaraḥ. yady ekasyāṃ gatāv aṣṭamaṃ bhavaṃ nābhinirvartayatīti vyākhyāpayasi. kathaṃ tarhi ūrdhvasrotaso 'ṣṭamabhavābhinirvṛttir ekasyāṃ gatau bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10981: bhavāgraparamasyeti viśeṣaṇaṃ kim artham. akaniṣṭhaparamasyāpi aṣṭamabhavābhinirvṛttiḥ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:10982: sa pluto 'rdhaplutaḥ sarvaś cyutaś cānyo bhavāgraga iti vacanāt. sa cāpi vaktavyaḥ. bhavaprakarṣavivakṣāyāṃ tu bhavāgraparamagrahaṇam ity abhiprāyaṃ lakṣayāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10983: kāmadhātvabhisaṃdhivacanād iti. kāmadhātau caikā gatir manuṣyagatiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10984: devagatir vā. tasyām aṣṭamabhavaṃ nābhinirvartayati. na tu rūpārūpyadhātvor iti. kim atra jñāpakaṃ. sūtraṃ yuktir vā. kāmadhātum adhikṛtyedam uktam iti. [Tib. 214b] sūtram āgamaḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy 553)
T07yabhkvyu:10985: yuktir atrānumānaṃ. yena codakenaivaṃ coditaṃ kim atra jñāpakaṃ sūtraṃ yuktir veti. sa eva punar āha. iha caiva kiṃ jñāpakaṃ pratyekaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu iti vistaraḥ. pratyekaṃ devamanyuṣyeṣu saptakṛtvaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:10986: saṃsṛtyeti. na punar ubhayeṣv eva devamanuṣyeṣu saptakṛtva iti. tad uktaṃ bhavati. yo manuṣyeṣu dṛṣṭasatyaḥ. sa deveṣu triṣkṛtvaḥ saṃsṛtya manuṣyeṣu ca triṣkṛtva eva tato devān āgamya parinirvātīti. yo vā deveṣu
T07yabhkvyu:10987: dṛṣṭasatyaḥ. sa tathaiva. sa manuṣyeṣu triṣkṛtvo deveṣu ca triṣkṛtva eva saṃsṛtya tato manuṣyān āgamya parinirvātīti. evaṃ hi paṭhyate saptakṛtvo devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ceti. sāmānyarūpeṇa hi paṭhyate. na pratyekam iti
T07yabhkvyu:10988: viśiṣya paṭhyata ity arthaḥ. evaṃ vaibhāṣikapakṣe saṃśayāvasthe kṛte ācāryaḥ samarthayann āha. pratyekam api tu kāśyapīyā iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:10989: kāśyapīyā nikāyāṃtarīyāḥ. ta evaṃ paṭhanti. saptakṛtvo devān saptakṛtvo
T07yabhkvyu:10990: manuṣyān iti. evaṃ pratyekamartho labhyate. tad anenobhayam api parihṛtaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:10991: bhavati. yad uktaṃ kim atra jñāpakaṃ sūtraṃ yuktir vā kāmadhātum
T07yabhkvyu:10992: adhikṛtyedam uktam iti. yac coktam iha caiva kiṃ jñāpakaṃ. pratyekaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu saptakṛtva iti. [Tib. 215a] pratyekamarthaparigraheṇaiva hi kāmadhātvabhisaṃdhir api sūcito bhavati. na hi rūpārūpyadhātvoḥ saptakṛtvo devamanuṣyeṣu saṃsaraṇaṃ yujyate. tatropapannānām anāgāmināṃ manuṣyānāgamanāt. yuktir apy ata eva gamyate. yatraiva saptakṛtvobhavaparama uktaḥ. tatraiva bhūmāv aṣṭamabhavapratiṣedha
T07yabhkvyu:10993: upapadyate nānyatreti. nātrābhiniveṣṭavyam iti. iha caiva kiṃ jñāpakam
T07yabhkvyu:10994: iti. tajjātīya iti. tatprakāraḥ. yena tāvatā kālenāvaśyaṃ saṃtatiparipākān nāṣṭamaṃ bhavam abhinirvartayati. saptapadāśīrviṣadaṣṭavat.
T07yabhkvyu:10995: saptapadāśīrviṣeṇa tena daṣṭo yathā saptapadāni gatvā mriyate. na pareṇa nārvāk. viṣajātiḥ sā tādṛśī. cāturthakajvaravac ca. yathā cāturthako jvaraś caturtha evāhani bhavati. na pareṇa nārvāk. rogajātiḥ sā tādṛśī.
T07yabhkvyu:10996: tadvat. dve avarabhāgīye iti. kāmacchandavyāpādau. kāmāvītarāgatvād etau bhavataḥ. paṃcordhvabhāgīyānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10998: yato 'rvāṇ nirvāṇaṃ ca na prāpnoti. na cāṣṭamaṃ bhavam abhinirvartayatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:10999: [Tib. 215b] saptasaṃyojanāvaśeṣatvād ity ahetur eṣa ity ācāryasaṃghabhadraḥ. na hy ūrdhvabhāgīyāni kāmadhātau janmābhinirvartayituṃ samarthāny ūrdhvabhūmikatvād iti. etad dhetuvādinaḥ punar āhuḥ. yady api tāny ūrdhvabhūmikāni. tatprāptisāmarthyāt tu tāvatāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11000: bhavānām abhinirvṛttir bhavati. (Abhidh-k-vy 554) na hi tāni ūrdhvam api vipākahetutvena vyavasthāpyaṃte. avyākṛtatvād iti. aṃtareṇety aṃtarārvāg ity arthaḥ. dharmatāpratilaṃbhikam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11001: aśaikṣamārgasāmarthyapratilaṃbhikam ity arthaḥ. sa hi tasya svabhāvo yad bhikṣuliṃgena
T07yabhkvyu:11002: avinipātadharmeti. sūtre paṭhyate. srotaāpanno bhavann avinipātakadharmā
T07yabhkvyu:11003: niyataṃ saṃbodhiparāyaṇaḥ saptakṛtvaḥparamaḥ saptakṛtvo devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ca saṃdhāvya saṃsṛtya duḥkhasyāṃtaṃ karotīti. kasmād evaṃ bhavatīty āha. tadgāmikakarmānupacayād iti. vinipāto 'pāyo narakādiḥ. taṃ gacchatīti tadgāmi. tadgāmy eva tadgāmikaṃ. kiṃ. karma.

T07yabhkvyu:11005: karmaṇo vipākadānavaiguṇyāt saṃtateḥ. avinipātadharmā bhavatīty ucyate.

T07yabhkvyu:11007: karmaṇa upacitasya vipākadānavaiguṇyenāvasthiteti. kasmāt punaḥ sā
T07yabhkvyu:11009: ucyate. balavatkuśalamūlādhivāsanād iti. yasmād asau skaṃdhasaṃtatir

T07yabhkvyu:11011: balavatkuśalamūlādhivāsitā. prayogāśayaśuddhitaḥ. prayogaśuddhita āśayaśuddhitaś ca. tatra prayogaśuddhir āryakāṃtāni śīlāni. āśayaśuddhir buddhādiṣv avetyaprasāda iti. kṣāṃtim api notpādayed iti. kṣamaṇam api notpādayet. cittam api notpādayet. prāg eva prayogam ity abhiprāyaḥ. atha
T07yabhkvyu:11012: vā. apāyaniyate tu karmaṇi saty asau pudgalaḥ kṣāṃtim api nirvedhabhāgīyalakṣaṇāṃ notpādayati. kim aṃgānāsravaṃ mārgam iti. yathā balavatkuśalamūlādhivāsitā upacitākuśalavipākadānaviguṇā bhavati. tac
T07yabhkvyu:11023: apāyaṃ. tad arthadvayaṃ yathākramaṃ [Tib. 216b] dṛṣṭāṃtadvayena sādhayati.
T07yabhkvyu:11024: loham alpam api saṃhataṃ piṇḍarūpāvasthitam udake majjaty
T07yabhkvyu:11029: tarati. tadabhisaṃskāraguṇāt. evam abudho guṇair apātrīkṛtatvān majjati.
T07yabhkvyu:11030: na tu budho guṇaiḥ pātrīkṛtatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11031: yasmāt pareṇa duḥkhaṃ nāstīti. yasmād duḥkhāt pareṇa duḥkhaṃ nāsti bhavāṃtarasaṃgṛhītaṃ. sa duḥkhasyāṃto duḥkhāvasānam ity arthaḥ. anyathā hi maraṇakāle duḥkhasyāṃto bhavati. sapratisaṃdhikaṃ tu tad duḥkham. ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:11032: apratisaṃdhikaṃ duḥkhaṃ karotīty artha iti. kathaṃ nirvāṇaṃ karotīti.
T07yabhkvyu:11033: nityatvāt karaṇaṃ na yujyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. tatprāptivibaṃdhāpanayanād
T07yabhkvyu:11035: upadhir vā tadapanayanān nirvāṇaṃ karoti. tadyathākāśaṃ maṇḍapāvasthāne na
T07yabhkvyu:11036: lakṣyate. sati tasya vibaṃdhe. tadapanayanān nityam apy ākāśaṃ karotīty ucyate. tenāha. yathākāśaṃ kuru maṇḍapaṃ pātayeti bhavaṃti vaktāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11037: anyo 'pi veti pṛthagjanaḥ paripakvasaṃtānaḥ na tu niyata iti. kadācid ihaiva parinirvāyāt aṃtarābhaveṣu cety ato nocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11039: dve vā trīṇi vā janmāny asyeti [Tib. 217a] dvitrijanmā. kecid evaṃ paṭhaṃti. dvitrajanmeti. dve vā trīṇi vā dvitrāṇi.
T07yabhkvyu:11040: saṃkhyayāvyayāsannādūrādhikasaṃkhyāḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 556) saṃkhyeya iti samāsaḥ. bahuvrīhau saṃkhyeye ḍaj iti samāsāṃtaḥ. dvitrānyajanmāny asyeti dvitrajanmeti. śloke tu dvayor grahaṇam iti. kleśaprahāṇajanmanoḥ. kasmād ity āha. srotaāpannasyānupūrvikasya darśanaprahātavyeṣu prahīṇeṣu
T07yabhkvyu:11041: bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ kleśānām ekasya prakārasya yāvac caturṇāṃ paścāt prahāṇe sati.
T07yabhkvyu:11042: tatpratipakṣasyaikadvitryādikleśaprakārapratipakṣasyānāsravasyendrigasya lābhas tasyānuktasiddhatvāt ślokena tasyāgrahaṇaṃ. na hi vinā pratipakṣeṇa kleśaprakāraprahāṇam asti. laukikenāpi hi mārgeṇa tasyāryasya kleśaprakāraprahāṇe 'nāsravasya tatpratipakṣasyendriyasya lābho bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11043: janma tu kadācid alpīyaḥ syāt. yadīhaiva parinirvāyāt aṃtarābhave upapadya
T07yabhkvyu:11044: vā. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. pareṇa bhavyatvāt. srotaāpattiphalāt pareṇa sakṛdāgāmitvasya yāvad arhattvasya bhavyatvāt. ato 'sya janmano grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11047: niyamārtham idam iha vicāryate. ya ekadvividhamuktaḥ. sa kiṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11050: grahaṇaṃ tu udāharaṇārthaḥ. parimāṇārthaṃ vā nātaḥ pareṇeti.
T07yabhkvyu:11051: ekadvividhamuktaḥ paṃcaṣaṭjanmety apare. [Tib. 217b] tricaturvidhamukta iti viśeṣaparigrahāt. naitad vyākhyānakārair vicāritam iti vicāryam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:11052: kasmān na paṃcaprakāraprahāṇāt. kiṃ. kulaṃkulo bhavatīty adhikāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11053: tatprahāṇa iti vistaraḥ. paṃcaprakāraprahāṇe ṣaṣṭhayāpi prakārasyāvaśyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11054: prahāṇāt. kasmād ity āha. na hi tasyaikaḥ prakāraḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ phalaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11057: vighnayituṃ samarthaḥ. naivam asya srotaāpannasya ṣaṣṭhaḥ prakāraḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vighnayituṃ samartha iti. kasmād ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:11058: dhātvanatikramād iti. ekavīciko hi kāmadhātum atikrāmati. ato 'syaiko 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:11059: prakāro navamaḥ phalaṃ vighnayituṃ samartho dhātvatikramasya duṣkaratvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11060: sakṛdāgāmī tu dhātuṃ nātikrāmatīti. na tasyaikaḥ kleśaḥ prakāraḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ phalaṃ vighnayituṃ samartha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11061: tatra vānyatra vā devanikāya iti. tadyathā trāyastriṃśeṣu satyāni dṛṣṭvā dve trīṇi vā kulāni saṃsṛtya. tatraiva trāyastriṃśeṣu parinirvāti. anyatra
T07yabhkvyu:11062: vā. (Abhidh-k-vy 557) cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu yāmeṣu vā parinirvāti. evam anyatrāpi yojyaṃ. rāgadveṣamohānāṃ tanutvād ity ucyata iti sūtre. kathaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11063: trayāṇāṃ samyojanānāṃ [Tib. 218a] prahāṇāt rāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca tanutvāt
T07yabhkvyu:11064: sakṛdāgāmībhavatīti. mṛduprakārāvaśeṣatvād iti. mṛdvadhimātro mṛdumadhyo mṛdumṛdur ity
T07yabhkvyu:11066: iti. doṣāṃśo doṣāvayavaḥ saptāṣṭaprakāralakṣaṇaḥ. indriyata iti cātra
T07yabhkvyu:11067: tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ na sūtritaṃ tathaiva vyākhyeyaṃ. katham asyeti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11068: katham asyaikavīcikasyaikaprakāro navamaḥ phalaṃ vighnayituṃ samartho na hi kulaṃkulasyaikaḥ prakāraḥ phalaṃ vighnayituṃ samartha iti. ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11069: dhātvatikramāt. yasmād asau navame prakāre prahīṇe kāmadhātusamatikrāṃto
T07yabhkvyu:11070: bhavati. na punas tatropapadyate. sa ca navamaḥ prakāraḥ karmaṇā saha
T07yabhkvyu:11071: tatropapadyavedanīya ity atas tadvipākaniṣyandaphalabhūmyatikramāt phalaṃ vighnayituṃ samartho bhavati. avasthātraye hi karmāṇi vighnāyopatiṣṭhaṃta ity uktaṃ prāk.
T07yabhkvyu:11073: iti. iha tu kleśeṣu yojayitavyaṃ. ata evāha. yathā karmāṇi. evaṃ kleśā ityādi. tasyavaikajanmavyavahitatvād iti. tasya kṣīṇasaptāṣṭaprakārasya sakṛdāgāminaḥ. ekena janmanā vāvahitatvān nirvāṇasya. ekena vā kleśaprakāreṇa vyavahitam asyānāgāmiphalam ity [Tib. 218b] ekavīcikaḥ. na tāvat kulaṃkulo bhavaty ekavīciko veti. laukikena mārgeṇa pūrvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11074: tricaturvidhamukto 'pi na tāvat kulaṃkulo bhavati. kṣīṇasaptāṣṭaprakāro
T07yabhkvyu:11076: ata evāha. yāvat phalaviśiṣṭo mārgo na saṃmukhīkṛta iti. phalaviśiṣṭe tu tatpratipakṣe tadūrdhvaprakārapratipakṣe vā saṃmukhīkṛte
T07yabhkvyu:11077: tadānāsravendriyalābhāt. kulaṃkulo bhavaty ekavīciko vety arthād uktaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11078: bhavati. paṃcānām iti vistaraḥ. paṃcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11079: prahāṇāt anāgāmīty ucyate sūtre. prahāṇasaṃkalanāt. satkāyadṛṣṭyādīnāṃ prahāṇaikatvavyavasthāpanāt dve trīṇi vā pūrvaṃ prahīṇānīti. yadi tāvat kāmavītarāgo niyāmam avakrāmati. dve pūrvaṃ prahīṇe laukikena mārgeṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:11080: kāmacchando vyāpādaś ca. satkāyadṛṣṭyādīnām aparyādāya prahāṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11081: athānupūrvikaḥ. trīṇi pūrvaṃ prahīṇāni. kena. darśanamārgeṇa satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo vicikitsā ca. tasmāt sākalyena paṃcānāṃ prahāṇād ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11085: parinirvṛtir asyeti aṃtarotpannasaṃskārāsaṃskāraparinirvṛtiḥ. yat tūktam evam utpannasyeti. tan na budhyāmahe. katham utpannasyānāgāminaḥ parinirvṛtir asyeti bahuvrīhiḥ samāso bhavati. anyapadārthe hi bahuvrīhir
T07yabhkvyu:11086: ucyate. na svapadārthe. tenaivam iha pāṭhaṃ paśyāmaḥ evam utpanne 'syeti.
T07yabhkvyu:11087: lekhakenaikāro 'tra vināśita iti. tathāpāṭhe hy ayam arthaḥ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11088: utpanne janmani parinirvṛtir asyeti utpannaparinirvṛtiḥ. athaivam eva pāṭhaḥ syāt. evaṃ vyākhyāyeta. anādare ṣaṣṭhī. tayaivaṃ samāsaḥ kriyeta.
T07yabhkvyu:11089: utpannasya janmanaḥ parinirvṛtir asyānāgāmina ity utpannaparinirvṛtir
T07yabhkvyu:11090: anāgāmīti. atha vā utpannasyety utpannajātir ucyate. utpannānām iti yo
T07yabhkvyu:11091: 'rthaḥ. so 'rtha utpannasyeti. tenotpannānāṃ yā parinirvrṭiḥ. sā asyety utpannaparinirvṛtiḥ. atha parinirvṛtyarthād eva kevalād
T07yabhkvyu:11093: anāgāmisamānādhikaraṇasyotpannaśabdasya parinirvṛtiśabdena saha bahuvrīhiḥ samāsa itīccheyuḥ. subhaṇitam etat syāt. sa evānāgāmī punaḥ paṃcadhā
T07yabhkvyu:11096: abhiyuktavāhimārgatvād iti. abhiyukto vīryavān ārabdhavīrya ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11097: vāhī mārgo asyeti vāhimārgaḥ. kathaṃ mārgo vāhī. vinābhisaṃskāreṇa
T07yabhkvyu:11099: tadbhāvaḥ. tasmāt. utpannamātro nacirāt parinirvāti. sopadhiśeṣeṇa
T07yabhkvyu:11104: upapadyaparinirvāyy [Tib. 219b] api tatsadṛśa ity apare. na.
T07yabhkvyu:11106: kasmāt. āyurutsargāvaśitvāt. āyuṣa utsarge tasyāvaśitvāt. kasmāt punar asyātrāvaśitvaṃ. yat prāṃtakoṭikacaturthadhyānalābhina āyurutsargavaśitvaṃ. tac ca prāṃtakoṭikaṃ dhyānaṃ manuṣyeṣv eva triṣu
T07yabhkvyu:11107: dvīpeṣūtpādyate. sa ca rūpadhātūpapanna iti. kim aṃtarāparinirvāyiṇo 'sty
T07yabhkvyu:11110: 559) tu tādṛśaṃ karma nāsti. yādṛśam upapadyaparinirvāyiṇa iti. ato
T07yabhkvyu:11112: sthitvā parinirvātīty upapadyaparinirvāyy eva sopadhiśeṣanirvāṇena parinirvātīty ucyate. sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī kileti. kileti kilaśabdo vaibhāṣikamatadyotakaḥ. svamataṃ hi sūtrānusāreṇa paścād vakṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11113: apratiprasrabdhaprayoga iti. pūrvaprayogāvedhenānirākṛtaprayoga ity arthaḥ. sābhisaṃskāraṃ saprayatnaṃ. abhiyuktāvāhimārgatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11114: abhiyuktatvāt avāhimārgatvāc ca tasya yoginaḥ. [Tib. 220a] ata evāsau sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī sidhyati. anabhisaṃskāreṇeti. pūrvaviparyayeṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:11116: vīryasyābhāvāt. vāhimārgasya cābhāvād ity arthaḥ. tad evam abhiyogādinānātvāt parinirvāṇaviśeṣa ukto bhavati. upapadyaparinirvāyiṇo hy ubhayam asti. abhigogaś ca vāhī ca mārga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11117: sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyiṇo 'bhjyogo 'sti. na tv asya vāhī mārgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11118: anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyiṇas tūbhayam api nāsti. nābhiyogo na ca vāhī mārga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11119: saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtālaṃbanamārgaparinirvāṇād iti. saṃskṛtaṃ saṃskāra ity eko
T07yabhkvyu:11120: 'rthaḥ. evam asaṃskṛtaṃ asaṃskāra iti. saṃskārālaṃbanena mārgeṇa duḥkhasamudayamārgālaṃbanena mārgeṇa yaḥ kleśān prajahāti. sa
T07yabhkvyu:11123: tat tu na. atiprasaṃgād [Tib. 220b] iti. tat tu naivaṃ. kasmāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11124: atiprasaṃgāt. aṃtaropapadyaparinirvāyiṇor api saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtālaṃbanamārgaparinirvāṇāt pratyekaṃ sābhisaṃskārānabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyitvaprasaṃgaḥ. tatrasthau dvāv eva
T07yabhkvyu:11125: pudgalau syātāṃ. na paṃceti. anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī pūrvaṃ paṭhyata
T07yabhkvyu:11129: vāhyavāhimārgayoḥ pudgalayoḥ parinirvāṇasyānabhisaṃskārasādhyatvāt pūrvasyābhisaṃskārasādhyatvāc cetarasya. kathaṃ tathā sādhyatvam ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:11131: atha vāhyavāhimārgayor iti. mārgayor eva grahaṇaṃ na pudgalayor abhisaṃbaṃdhaḥ. vāhino mārgasyānabhisaṃskārasādhyatvād avāhinaś
T07yabhkvyu:11133: pūrvamārgasya. yatnaprāptita itarasyeti. [Tib. 221a] tad evam anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī pūrvaṃ yujyate. āha. yady anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyiṇo vāhī (Abhidh-k-vy 560) mārgo
T07yabhkvyu:11134: 'nabhisaṃskāraśādhyatvāt upapadyaparinirvāyiṇo 'pi vāhī mārga iti. kas tayor viśeṣa iti. ata ucyate. upapadyaparinirvāyiṇas tu mārgo vāhitaro
T07yabhkvyu:11137: ūrdhvasrotā iti. ūrdhvasroto gatir asyeti ūrdhvasrotāḥ. yatra ūrdhvam iti
T07yabhkvyu:11140: ūrdhvaṃdamikaḥ ūrdhvaṃdehika iti. tatpratyayasaṃniyogenordhvaśabdasya māṃtato 'pi nipātyata iti veditavyaṃ. yathā ciraśabdasya ciraṃtanam ity ūrdhvam iti nipāto 'stīty apare. akārāṃto 'pi tūrdhvaśabdo 'sty eveti na vāryate. vyavakīrṇāvyavakīrṇadhyānatvād iti. miśritāmiśritadhyānatvād ity arthaḥ. anāsraveṇa sāsravasya dhyānasya miśritatvāt. iha dhyānāni vyavakīrya dhyānatrayāt parihīyata iti. dhyānavyavakiraṇaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11142: ākīryate caturthaṃ prāg iti vacanāt. caturtham eva hi dhyānam ādito vyavakiraṇe samarthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11143: caturthāc ca dhyānād aparihīṇasya prathamādiṣu dhyāneṣūpapattir nāstīty ata ucyate. dhyānatrayāt [Tib. 221b] parihīṇa iti. kathaṃ ca parihīṇa ity
T07yabhkvyu:11144: āha. prathamaṃ dhyānam āsvādyeti. madhyānimajjanāt madhye 'nimajjanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11145: ardhapluto nāmeti vistaraḥ. ya ekam api sthānāṃtaraṃ vilaṃghya śuddhāvāseṣūpapadyākaniṣṭhān praviśatīty evaṃ vākyābhisaṃbaṃdhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11146: dṛṣṭisthānatvād iti. mahābrahmaṇāṃ prathamopapannānāṃ ca mahābahmaṇi
T07yabhkvyu:11147: nirmāyakābhimānataḥ. ekamāyakatvāc ceti. kiṃ. mahābrahmasv āryo nopapadyate. āryasya hi prabhāvavatas tatrotpāde saty ubhayanāyakatvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11148: syāt. niḥsapatnena ca karmaṇā tatrādhipatim. ataḥ sasapatnaṃ na bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:11151: yatropapannas tatas tatra cātyaṃtam anāgamanād iti. yatropapannas
T07yabhkvyu:11152: tadyathā. prathamadhyāne. tato 'tyaṃtam anāgamanāt kāmadhātau. tathā yatropapannas tatra cātyaṃtam anāgamanāt. tatra ca punaḥ prathame dhyāne 'tyaṃtam anāgamanāt. paripūrṇam anāgāmitvaṃ punas tatra
T07yabhkvyu:11153: dvitīyajanmākaraṇāt. śamathacarito hy eṣa iti. ya eṣa bhavāgraparamaḥ sa
T07yabhkvyu:11154: samādhipriyaḥ. ārūpyeṣu ca samādhir atipraśāṃtaḥ. tasmād ayam ārūpyān
T07yabhkvyu:11155: praviśati. pūrvakas tu vipaśyanācarita iti. yo 'sāv akaniṣṭhaparama
T07yabhkvyu:11157: praviśati. aṃtarāparinirvāṇam iti vistaraḥ. naitat prati śāstrakārair
T07yabhkvyu:11158: niścitaṃ. na ca pratiṣiddham ato 'pratiṣedhād ūrdhvasrotaso
T07yabhkvyu:11159: 'kaniṣṭhaparamasya bhavāgraparamasya cāṃtarā akaniṣṭhāṃ bhavāgraṃ ca praviśya parinirvāṇaṃ yujyamānaṃ paśyāmaḥ. saṃbhavaṃ tu paśyāma ity
T07yabhkvyu:11160: arthaḥ. nanu cākaniṣṭhaparamo bhavāgraparama iti coktam ata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:11161: akaniṣṭhabhavāgraparamatvaṃ tu pareṇa gatyabhāvād akaniṣṭhebhyo bhavāgrāc cordhvaṃ gatyabhāvāt. tadyathā srotaāpannasya saptakṛtvaḥ paramatvaṃ. na hi tasya dvau trīn vā bhavān abhinirvartya parinirvāṇaṃ na saṃbhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:11162: tataḥ pareṇa tv aṣṭamaṃ bhavaṃ nābhinirvartayatīti. saptakṛtvaḥ parama ukta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11163: sa punaś caturvidha ity aṃtarāparinirvāyyabhāvān na paṃcavidhaḥ. ete ṣaḍ anāgāmino bhavaṃtīti. aṃtarāparinirvāyī upapadyaparinirvāyī sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī ūrdhvasrotāḥ ārūpyagaś
T07yabhkvyu:11166: (VI.40) katham eṣāṃ trayāṇām iti [Tib. 222b] vistaraḥ. trayo 'nāgāmina iti nirbhidya noktā ity anavabudhyamāna itaraḥ pṛcchati. ācāryo 'py
T07yabhkvyu:11167: arthāpattyoktā eta iti paśyan vivṛṇoti. aṃtaropapadyaparinirvāyiṇor aṃtarāparinirvāyiṇaḥ upapadyaparinirvāyiṇaś cety arthaḥ. ūrdhvasrotasaś ca tṛtīyasyeti. āśvanāśuciraparinirvāṇāt dṛṣṭāṃtatrayeṇeti. āśuparinirvāyī anāśuparinirvāyī ciraparinirvāyī ca dṛṣṭāṃtatrayeṇa yojayyitavyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11168: tadyathā parīttaḥ śakalikāgnir abhinirvartamāna eva nirvāyāt. evaṃ prathamo ya āśuparinirvāyī. tadyathāyoguḍānāṃ vāyasphālānāṃ vādīptāgnisaṃprataptānāṃ ayoghanena hanyamānānāṃ ayaḥprapāṭikotpataty eva nirvāyāt. evaṃ dvitīyo yo 'nāśuparinirvāyī. tadyathāyoguḍānām iti pūrvavad
T07yabhkvyu:11169: yāvad ayaḥprapāṭikotplutya pṛthivyām apatitaiva nirvāyāt. evaṃ tṛtīyo yaś
T07yabhkvyu:11170: ciraparinirvāyī. etac ca sūtraṃ vistareṇa purastāl likhitam iti na punar
T07yabhkvyu:11171: likhyate. upapadyābhisaṃskārānabhisaṃskāraparinirvāṇād iti. upapadya parinirvāṇād abhisaṃskāreṇānabhisaṃskāreṇa parinirvāṇāt [Tib. 223a]
T07yabhkvyu:11172: tridhābhedān navānāgāmino bhavaṃtīti saṃbaṃdhaḥ. upapadyaparinirvāyī ya upapannamātraḥ parinirvāti. na tv abhisaṃskāreṇānabhisaṃskāreṇa vā
T07yabhkvyu:11173: parinirvāti. sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī tu nopapadyaiva parinirvāti. kiṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11175: parinirvāti. asya hi yady api vāhī mārgo 'sti abhiyogena tu parinirvāti.
T07yabhkvyu:11178: anaṃtareṇa parinirvātīty ayam eva eṣāṃ viśeṣo 'vagaṃtavyaḥ. yathā tu sābhisaṃskārānabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyiṇāv apy upapadyaparinirvāyyākhyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11179: labhete. tathā darśayann āha. sarve hy eta upapadyaparinirvāṇād upapadyaparinirvāyiṇa iti. plutādibhedād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11180: plutārdhaplutasarvacyutabhedād ity arthaḥ. sarveṣāṃ vā trayāṇām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11183: kaścid anāśuciraparinirvāyī. evam upapadyaparinirvāyī. ūrdhvasrotāś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:11184: asmāc ca tridhābhedān navānāgāmino bhavaṃtīti sa eva saṃbaṃdho vācyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11185: tadviśeṣaḥ punar iti vistaraḥ. teṣāṃ punas trayāṇām
T07yabhkvyu:11186: aṃtaropapadyaparinirvāyiṇoḥ ūrdhvasrotasaś ca. navānāṃ caiṣām eva
T07yabhkvyu:11187: pratyekaṃ tridhābhedād yathā varṇitād viśeṣaḥ. karmakleśendriyaviśeṣāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11188: karmaṇaḥ kleśasyendriyasya ca viśeṣād bhavati. katham ity āha. trayāṇām iti vistaraḥ. abhinirvṛttir aṃtarābhāvaḥ abhinirvṛttivedanīyasya karmaṇa upacitatvād aṃtarāparinirvāyī. upapadyavedanīyasya karmaṇa upacitatvād
T07yabhkvyu:11190: ūrdhvaṃsrotā ity evaṃ tāvat teṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ karmaviśeṣād viśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11191: mṛdumadhyādhimātrakleśasamudācāratvād yathākramam eṣām eva kleśaviśeṣād viśeṣaḥ. adhimātramadhyamṛdvindriyatvāc ca yathākramam eṣām evendriyaviśeṣād viśeṣa iti. teṣām api pratyekam ata eva yathāyogaṃ viśeṣa
T07yabhkvyu:11192: iti. teṣām api pratyekaṃ bhinnānāṃ navānām ity arthaḥ. ata eva karmādiviśeṣāt [Tib. 224a] yathāyogaṃ na yathākramaṃ. viśeṣo 'vagaṃtavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11193: katham ity āha. prathamayos trikayor iti vistaraḥ. yac cāṃtarāparinirvāyiṇāṃ trikaṃ. yac copapadyaparinirvāyiṇāṃ. tayos trikayoḥ kleśendriyaviśeṣāt. mṛdumadhyādhimātrakleśasamudācāratvāt adhimātramadhyamṛdvindriyatvāc ca. yathākramaṃ viśeṣaḥ. na tu karmaviśeṣāt. yasmāt prathamasya trikasyābhinirvṛttivedanīyaṃ karma
T07yabhkvyu:11194: tulyaṃ. dvitīyasya copapadyavedanīyaṃ karma tulyam iti. paścimasya trikasyāparaparyāyavedanīyakarmaviśeṣāc ca viśeṣaḥ. plutādīnāṃ hy aparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ karma bhinnam iti. ato
T07yabhkvyu:11196: adhimātramadhyamṛdvindriyatvāc ca. yathākramam ity arthaḥ. ta ete navaprakārakleśendrigatvād iti. ta ete navānāgāmino navaprakārakleśatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11198: avyapitvāt. na hi prathamayos (Abhidh-k-vy 563) trikayoḥ karmaviśeṣād [Tib. 224b] viśeṣo 'stīti. kathaṃ punar ete navaprakārakleśā bhavaṃti. iha kleśas triprakāro mṛdumadhyādhimātra iti. mṛdur aṃtarāparinirvāyiṇāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11199: madhya upapadyaparinirvāyiṇāṃ. adhimātra ūrdhvasrotasāṃ. tatra prathamo 'ntarāparinirvāyī mṛdumṛdukleśaḥ. dvitīyo mṛdumadhyakleśaḥ tṛtīyo
T07yabhkvyu:11202: tṛtīyo 'nabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī madhyādhimātrakleśaḥ. ūrdhvasrotasām api pluto 'dhimātramṛdukleśaḥ ardhapluto 'dhimātramadhyakleśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11203: sarvasthānacyuto 'dhimātrādhimātrakleśa iti. kathaṃ navaprakārendriyā bhavaṃti. tathaivendriyam api triprakāram adhimātraṃ mṛdu ceti. adhimātram
T07yabhkvyu:11207: upapadyaparinirvāyiṇāṃ [Tib. 225a] prathamaṃ upapadyaparinirvāyī madhyādhimātrendriyaḥ. sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī madyamadhyendriyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11209: mṛdvadhimātrendriyaḥ. ardhapluto mṛdumadhyendriyaḥ. sarvasthānacyuto mṛdumṛdvindriya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11210: (VI.41) kathaṃ tarhi sūtre sapta satpuruṣagatayo deśitā iti. sapta vo 'haṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11211: bhikṣavaḥ satpuruṣagatīr deśayiṣyāmi. anupādāya ca parinirvāṇam. ity etat sarvaṃ sūtraṃ gatisūtrata ity atra pradeśe likhitam iti na punar likhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11212: atra ca sūtre sapta satpuruṣagatayo deśitāḥ. trayo 'ṃtarāparinirvāyiṇāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11213: traya upapadyaparinirvāyiṇa iti ṣaṭ gatayaḥ. ūrdhvaṃsroto gatiś ca
T07yabhkvyu:11214: saptamīti. ūrdhvasravaṇadharmeti. kṛdaṃtam etac chabdarūpam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11215: vidhārtham etac chabdarūpam iti darśayati. ūrdhvam iti ca kriyāviśeṣaṇam
T07yabhkvyu:11216: iti. tasyābhedanirdeśād iti. tasyordhvaṃsrotasaḥ plutādibhedānirdeśād ity
T07yabhkvyu:11217: arthaḥ. vineyāśayāpekṣo hi sūtranirdeśaḥ. nānyāḥ śaikṣā gataya iti. na srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmigataya ity arthaḥ. gatir utpattiḥ saṃparāya ity ete sūtre paryāyā ucyaṃte. teṣām ity anāgāmināṃ. sati ca karmaṇi vṛttiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:11219: akuśalena hi cittenābrahmacaryādikaraṇam iti. teṣāṃ tu vītarāgāṇāṃ saty eva karmaṇi vṛttir nāsati prahīṇakuśalatvāt. na punaḥ pratyāgatir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11220: yāsu gatiṣūpapannāḥ. tatratatra caiṣām atyaṃtam anāgamanam ity arthaḥ. na tv etad yathoktam anyatrāstīty. yad etat saty eva vṛttir asati cāvṛttir evāpunaḥpratyāgamanaṃ ca. tad etat (Abhidh-k-vy 564) srotaāpanne sakṛdāgāmini ca nāstīti.
T07yabhkvyu:11221: anyeṣām apīti. srotaāpannasakṛdāgaminām apīty arthaḥ. pāryāyikam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11222: paryāye bhavaṃ pāryāyikaṃ. kenacit prakāreṇa bhavatīty arthaḥ. katham ity āha. paṃcavidhasya pāpasyātyaṃtamakaraṇasaṃvarapratilaṃbhād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11223: paṃcavidhasya pāpasya prāṇātipātādattādānakāmamithyācāramṛṣāvādamadyapānalakṣaṇasyākaraṇenākriyayā saṃvaraḥ saṃvaraṇam. tasya pratilaṃbhāt. na hy āryā janmāṃtare 'py etat paṃcavidhaṃ pāpam adhyācaraṃti. akaraṇasaṃvaravacanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11224: samādānasaṃvarasyānāvaśyakatvāt. prāyeṇeti. darśanagrahātavyānām akuśalānāṃ sarveṣām atyaṃtaprahāṇāt. bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ ca kāmāvacarāṇāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11225: keśāṃcit saṃbhavataḥ. yeṣām iti vistaraḥ. yeṣāṃ tu niḥparyāyeṇa na prakārāṃtareṇa srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmivat satpuruṣatvaṃ. [Tib. 226a] kiṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11226: tarhi. sarvasya pāpasyātyaṃtamakaraṇasaṃvarapratilaṃbhāt. sarveṣāṃ cākuśalānāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāt. bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ ca kāmāvacarāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ navaprakārāṇām api prahāṇāt. teṣāṃ satpuruṣāṇām anāgāminām iha sūtre 'dhikāraḥ. sapta satpuruṣagataya ity ato 'nyeṣāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11228: (VI.42) kiṃ punaḥ parivṛttajanmano 'py anāgāmina eśa bhedo 'sti.
T07yabhkvyu:11230: srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā prāpya dvitīye janmany anāgāmī
T07yabhkvyu:11231: bhavati. kāma iti viśeṣaṇaṃ. yasmāt rūpadhātau parivṛttajanmā kadācid ārūpyān praviśatīti. tatraiva janmani parinirvāṇād iti. kāmadhātau duḥkhabahulatvenāsya tīvrasaṃvegatvāt. yat tarhīti vistaraḥ. śakreṇoktam itaś cyuto 'haṃ manuṣyeṣūpapanno yady arhattvaṃ prāpya na parinirvāmi. ye te devā akaniṣṭhā iti viśrutāḥ. aṃte me hīyamānasya tatropapattir
T07yabhkvyu:11232: bhaviṣyatīti. sa hi deveṣv eva srotaāpanno manuṣyāṃś cāgatya parinirvāsyāmīti vacanāt parivṛttajanmā bhavet. aṃte nikāyasabhāgāvasāne mama hīyamānasyārhattvād [Tib. 226b] aprāptiparihāṇyā parihīyamāṇasya.
T07yabhkvyu:11233: tatrākaniṣṭheṣūpapattir bhaviṣyatīti prārthanāvacanād dhātvaṃtaragamanam astīti darśitaṃ bhavatīti gamyate. tat kathaṃ kāmadhātau
T07yabhkvyu:11234: parivṛttajanmāṃtara āryo dhātvāṃtaraṃ na gacchatīty ucyata iti. sūtrārtho
T07yabhkvyu:11235: dṛśyate. brūyās tvaṃ. dharmalakṣaṇānabhijñatvāc chakreṇaivam uktaṃ. tasmād adoṣa iti. bhagavatā tarhy evaṃ śṛṇvatā kasmād asau na nivārito mā tvam eva voca ity ata ucyate. bhagavatāpy anivāraṇaṃ. saṃharṣaṇīyatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11239: indriyāṇāṃ paripakvataratvād iti. prajñādīnām indriyāṇāṃ niṣyandaphalapuṣṭiviśeṣād ity arthaḥ. āśrayaviśeṣalābhāc ca. yasmāc cāśrayaviśeṣam anupahataṃ mārgasaṃmukhībhāvānukūlaṃ pratilabhate. dṛṣyaṃte hi tīkṣṇendriyā api saṃta āśrayavaiguṇyāt guṇebhyaḥ parihīyamāṇā ity ato janmāṇtaraparivāsenendriyāṇāṃ paripakvataratvād indriyasaṃcāro nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:11240: āśrayaviśeṣalābhāc ca parihāṇir nāsty anenaiva janmāṃtaraparivāsena dhātvaṃtaragamanaṃ na
T07yabhkvyu:11241: mārgasyājitatvād asaṃmukhībhāvata iti. [Tib. 227a] yasmān mārgasyājitatvād asaṃmukhībhāvaḥ. tasmāt kāraṇād avītarāgaḥ śaikṣaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī
T07yabhkvyu:11242: ca nāṃtarāparinirvāyī bhavati. anuśayānāṃ ca nātimandatvāt. yasmāc cānuśayās tasya nātimandāḥ. ato nāṃtarāparinirvāyī bhavatīty ayam ācāryasya parihāraḥ. vaibhāṣikāṇāṃ kaḥ parihāra ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:11243: dussamatikramatvāt kāmadhātor iti vaibhāṣikā iti. katham ity ucyate. bahu hy anena kartavyaṃ bhavati. akuśalāvyākṛtakleśaprahāṇam akuśalānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ avyākṛtānāṃ ca rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇam anena
T07yabhkvyu:11244: kartavyaṃ. vītarāgeṇa punaḥ śaikṣeṇāvyākṛtānām eva prahāṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11245: dvitriśrāmaṇyaphalaprāptir iti. dve vā trīṇi vā śrāmaṇyāni phalāni
T07yabhkvyu:11246: prāptavyāni. sakṛdāgāminā dve śrāmaṇyaphale prāptavye. anāgāmiphalam arhattvaphalaṃ ca. srotaāpannena trīṇi sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ anāgāmiphalam arhattvaphalaṃ ca. vītarāgeṇa punar ekam evārhattvaphalaṃ prāptavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11247: tridhātusamatikramaś cāvītarāgeṇa kartavyaḥ. vītarāgeṇa tu rūpāvītarāgeṇāṃtarāparinirvāyinā bhavatā dvidhātusamatikramaḥ [Tib. 227b]
T07yabhkvyu:11249: (VI.43) ākīryata iti. vyavakīryate vyatibhidyate. anāsravābhyāṃ sāsravaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ miśrīkriyata ity arthaḥ. sukhapratipadām agratvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11252: vacanāt. tāsāṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam agram aṣṭāpakṣālamuktatvāt. yadā kileti.
T07yabhkvyu:11253: kilaśabdo vaibhāṣikamatadyotakaḥ. svamataṃ tu paścād darśayiṣyati. aśakyaṃ tu kṣaṇavyavakiraṇam iti vistareṇa dvau hi kṣaṇāv ānaṃtaryamārgasadṛśāv
T07yabhkvyu:11254: iti. anāsravasāsravau. tṛtīyo vimuktimārgasadṛśa ity anāsravaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11255: mṛdvindriyāḥ kleśabhīrutayā ca vyavakiraṃti. caśabdāc chuddhāvāsopapattyarthaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārārthaṃ ca vyavakiraṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:11257: dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārārtham eva ca vyavakiraṃti. na kleśabhīrutayā. teṣāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11258: parihāṇyasaṃbhavāt. kathaṃ punaḥ kleśabhīrutayā aparihāṇyarthaṃ vyavakiraṃtīty āha. āsvādanāsaṃprayuktasamādhidūrīkaraṇāt aparihāṇyartham iti. phalān na parihīyeyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11259: (VI.44ab) paṃcaprakāreti vistaraḥ. mṛdvī madhyādhimātrādhimātratarā adhimātratameti. [Tib. 228a] prathamāyāṃ trīṇi cittānīti. tasya pudgalasya tāvatī śaktir ity evam upariṣṭhād api vaktavyaṃ. dvitīyāyāṃ ṣaḍ iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11260: anāsravaṃ sāsravam anāsravam iti trīṇi. punar anāsravaṃ sāsravam anāsravam ity aparāṇi trīṇīti ṣaḍ bhavaṃti. evam eva ca tṛtīyāyāṃ nava caturthyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11261: dvādaśa paṃcamyāṃ paṃcadaśeti yojyaṃ. tāsāṃ yathāsaṃkhyam iti. tāsāṃ vyavakīrṇabhāvanānāṃ yathākramaṃ paṃca śuddhāvāsāḥ phalaṃ. mṛdvyā bhāvanāyā avṛhāḥ phalam evaṃ yāvad adhimātratamāyā bhāvanāyā akaniṣṭhāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:11263: śraddhādhikāyā bhāvanāyā avṛhāḥ phalaṃ. evaṃ yāvat prajñādhikāyā bhāvanāyā akaniṣṭhāḥ phalam
T07yabhkvyu:11264: (VI.44cd) yo hi kaścid anāgāmīti. śraddhādhimukto vā dṛṣṭiprāpto vā.
T07yabhkvyu:11265: kāyena sākṣātkaraṇam iti. cittābhāvāt kāyenaiva sākṣātkaroti. kathaṃ kāyenaivety āha. kāyāśrayotpatteḥ. evaṃ tu bhavitavyam iti svamatam ācāryasya. prāpti jñānasākṣātkriyābhyām iti. samādhikāle
T07yabhkvyu:11266: tadanukūlāśrayaprāptisākṣātkaraṇāt. vyutthānakāle ca tatpratisaṃvedanājñānasākṣātkaraṇāt. pratyakṣīkāro [Tib. 228b] hi
T07yabhkvyu:11268: ity abhiprāyaḥ. savijñānakakāyaśāṃtipratilaṃbhena vā avijñānakakāyaśāṃtyavasthāyāṃ tatprāptir gamyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11269: aṣṭādaśa śaikṣā ity atra sūtra iti. anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavaṃtam
T07yabhkvyu:11270: apṛcchat. kati bhadaṃta dakṣiṇīyā iti. bhagavān āha. aṣṭādaśa gṛhapate śaikṣā navāśaikṣā dakṣiṇīyā iti. aṣṭādaśa śaikṣāḥ katame.
T07yabhkvyu:11277: ūrdhvasrotāḥ. itīme gṛhapate 'ṣṭādasa śaikṣāḥ. navāśaikṣāḥ katame.
