T07yabhkvyu:11280: prājñāvimuktaḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy 567) ubhayatobhāgavimuktaḥ. itīme gṛhapate navāśaikṣā iti. tisraḥ śikṣās tatphalaṃ ceti. adhiśīlam adhicittam adhiprajñam iti tisraḥ śikṣā āryamārgalakṣaṇāḥ. tāsāṃ phalaṃ visaṃyogaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11281: tadviśeṣeṇa hi śaikṣāṇāṃ vyavasthānam iti. śikṣāviśeṣeṇa tatphalaviśeṣeṇa cety arthaḥ. kathaṃ punas tadviśeṣaḥ. anyādṛsyo 'nyādṛśyo 'ṣṭādaśānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11282: śaikṣāṇāṃ śikṣāḥ visaṃyogaphalaṃ ceti. nirodhasamāpattiś ca na śaikṣā
T07yabhkvyu:11283: aprahāṇamārgasvābhāvyāt. na śikṣā phalam avisaṃyogaphalasvābhāvyāt. ato na tadyogān nirodhasamāpattiyogāt śaikṣaviśeṣa uktaḥ. yathaite 'ṣṭādaśa
T07yabhkvyu:11284: śaikṣāḥ. na punar asau na śaikṣaḥ. tatra yad idam ucyate. aṣṭādaśa śaikṣā ity atra sūtre kiṃ kāraṇaṃ kāyasākṣī noktaḥ śaikṣa ity evaṃ noktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11287: ity evamādi. sūkṣmaṃ tu bhidyamānā iti vistaraḥ. atrācāryo gaṇanopāyapradarśanārthaṃ [Tib. 229b] prathamam aṃtarāparinirvāyiṇa indriyabhūmigotrādibhedaṃ vyutpādayati. kiṃ kāraṇam. tadbhede hi gaṇite
T07yabhkvyu:11288: yathāṃtarāparinirvāyiṇa indriyādibhedād bhedaḥ. evaṃ yāvad ūrdhvasrotasa
T07yabhkvyu:11289: iti sukham atideśaṃ kariṣyāmīti. bhūmibhedāś catvāra iti. te
T07yabhkvyu:11290: evāṃtarāparinirvāyiṇaḥ. bhūmayaś catvāri dhyānāni. rūpopagānām anāgāmināṃ vivakṣitatvāt. tatra prathame dhyāne 'ṃtarāparinirvāyī yāvac caturtha iti
T07yabhkvyu:11291: catvāraḥ. parihāṇadharmādigotrabhedāt ṣaḍ iti. ta eva parihāṇadharmā
T07yabhkvyu:11292: cetanādharmā anurakṣaṇādharmā sthitākaṃpyaḥ prativedhanābhavyaḥ akopyadharmā ceti. sthānāṃtarabhedāt ṣoḍaśeti. brahmakāyikādīny
T07yabhkvyu:11294: bahirdeśakanayenāpi sthānāṃtaratve tatrāryo notpadyata ity agaṇanaṃ. tad evaṃ sthānāṃtarabhedāt ṣoḍaśāṃtarāparinirvāyiṇaḥ. bhūmivairāgyabhedāt ṣaṭtriṃśad iti. bhūmibhedāt tadvairāgyabhedāc ca ṣaṭtriṃśad
T07yabhkvyu:11296: sakalabandhana iti vistaraḥ. rūpadhātau prathame dhyāne sakalabandhana ekaprakāravītarāgo yāvad aṣṭaprakāravītarāga iti nava. dvitīye 'pi nava sakalabandhano yāvad aṣṭaprakāravītarāga iti. tathā tṛtīye nava. tathā caturthe naveti. catvāro navakāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśad bhavaṃti. yāvac caturthadhyānāṣṭaprakāravītarāga iti. yāvacchabdenāyam arthavistaro labhyate. caturthadhyānanavamaprakāravītarāgo nocyate. yasmād asāv ārūpye
T07yabhkvyu:11297: sakalabandhano bhavati. na cehārūpyago 'dhikriyate. rūpopagānām iha vivakṣitatvāt. aṃtarābhavasaṃbandhād (Abhidh-k-vy 568) iti. tathā ca sati
T07yabhkvyu:11298: sthānāṃtaragotravairāgyendriyabhedād iti vistaraḥ. sthānāṃtarāṇāṃ gotrāṇāṃ vairāgyāṇām indriyāṇāṃ ca bhedāt. dvānavatīni dvānavatyadhikāni paṃcaviṃśatiśatāni bhavaṃti teṣām aṃtarāparinirvāyiṇāṃ. kathaṃ kṛtvā tatha
T07yabhkvyu:11299: bhavaṃtīty āha. ekasmiṃ sthāne. tadyathā brahmapurohite ṣaṭ gotrāṇi
T07yabhkvyu:11300: parihāṇadharmādibhedāt. gotragotra iti vīpsā nava pudgalāḥ. sakalabandhano yāvad aṣṭaprakāravītarāgaḥ svasmāt sthānāt. tadyathā brahmapurohitāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11303: catuḥṣaṣṭyadhikāni aṣṭau śatāni. indriyabhedāt tu triguṇū
T07yabhkvyu:11304: mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhedāt. ity evaṃ kṛtvā. kiṃ dvānavatīni paṃcaviṃśatiśatāni bhavaṃti. yena nyāyena sakalabandhano yāvad aṣṭaprakāravītarāga iti nava pudgalā vyavasthāpitāḥ. taṃ nyāyaṃ darśayann
T07yabhkvyu:11305: āhayo hy adhare dhyāna iti vistaraḥ. yo hy adhare dhyāne prathame yāvat
T07yabhkvyu:11306: tṛtīye navaprakāravītarāgaḥ. sa uttare dhyāne dvitīye yāvac caturthe
T07yabhkvyu:11307: sakalabandhana ity uktaḥ. kasmād ity āha. samagaṇanārtham iti. caturṣu dhyāneṣu navanava yathā syur iti. anyathā hi viṣamā gaṇanā syāt. prathame dhyāne daśa syuḥ sakalabandhano yāvan navaprakāravītarāga iti. dvitīye nava ekaprakāravītarāgo yāvan navaprakāravītarāga iti. evaṃ tṛtīye nava
T07yabhkvyu:11308: caturthe tv aṣṭau syuḥ. ekaprakāravītarāgo yāvad aṣṭaprakāravītarāga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11309: navaprakāravītarāgasyārūpyasakalabandhanatvād ity uktaṃ evaṃ yāvad ūrdhvasrotasa iti. evam upapadyasābhisaṃskārānabhisaṃskārordhvasrotasām api. sthānāṃtaragotravairāgyendriyabhedāt [Tib. 231a] pratyekaṃ dvānavatīni paṃcaviṃśatiśatāni bhavaṃtīty abhisamasya punaḥ paṃcābhedāṃś catvāriṃśadūnāni trayodaśasahasrāṇy anāgāmināṃ bhavaṃti. ārūpyagais tu sahopapadyādicaturbhedabhinnair atitarāṃ bahavo bhavaṃti. anayā tu vartanyā gamyata eveti na likhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11311: iti. ābhavāgrād āṣṭau prakārān kṣiṇotīty ābhavāgrāṣṭabhāgakṣid ābhavāgrāṣṭaprakārakṣayakṛd ity arthaḥ. ayam anāgāmī prathamadhyānaikaprakāravairāgyāt prabhṛtīti. yasmāt kāmavairāgyād anāgāmī
T07yabhkvyu:11312: vyavasthāpyate. tasmāttataḥ pareṇārhattvaphalapratipannako bhavati. yathā vajraḥ sarvaṃ bhinatti. evam ayaṃ samādhiḥ sarvam anuśayaṃ bhinattīti
T07yabhkvyu:11313: sāmarthyāt vajra upamā asyeti vajropamaḥ. bhinnatvād asau na sarvāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11314: bhinattīti. traidhātukān (Abhidh-k-vy 569) darśanaprahātavyān bhāvanāprahatavyāṃś ca kāmāvacarān yāvad bhāvāgrikān aṣṭau prakārān. yadi sarvān na bhinatti kasmāt sarvānuśayabhedīty ucyata ity āha. sarvāṃs tu bhettuṃ samartha iti. saṃbhavam adhikṛtyoktam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11315: anāgamyasaṃgṛhītā iti vistaraḥ. nava bhūmīḥ anāgamyaṃ dhyānāṃtaraṃ [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:11316: 231b] catvāri dhyānāni trīṃś cārūpyān bhavāgravarjyān niśrityārhattvaprāptir ity ata evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11318: bhāvāgrikaduḥkhālaṃbanānvayajñānākāraiś caturbhiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāro bhāvāgrikasamudayālaṃbanānvayajñānākaraiḥ caturbhir aparaiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāra ity aṣṭau. evam eva nirodhamārgadharmajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā aṣṭāv iti vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11319: dharmajñānaṃ nirodhe yan mārge vā bhāvanāpathe tridhātupratipakṣas tad iti siddhāṃtāt tayor evehopanyāso na duḥkhasamudayadharmajñānayor
T07yabhkvyu:11320: grahaṇaṃ. evaṃ yāvad iti. yāvacchabdena yathā prathamadhyānanirodhālaṃbanākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāraḥ. evaṃ dvitīyatṛtīyacaturthadhyānākāśavijñānākiṃcanyāyatanabhavāgranirodhālaṃbanāḥ pratyekaṃ catvāraś catvāro vaktavyāḥ. mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāra ity atra pratibhūmimārgālaṃbanānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāraḥ catvāra iti nocyate. kasmād ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:11322: mārgaḥ pratipakṣabhāvenānyonyahetukaś ca mārga iti samastam evālaṃbyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11323: [Tib. 232a] na nirodhavad ity ataś catvāra eva mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā iti. ta ime jñānākārālaṃbanabhedabhinnā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11324: jñānākārabhedenālaṃbanabhedena ca bhinnāḥ. atha vā jñānānām ākārāṇām ālaṃbanānāṃ ca tribhedena bhinnāḥ. jñānākārabhedabhinnās tāvat.
T07yabhkvyu:11327: ādito dvyaṣṭāv iti ṣoḍaśa. prathamadhyānanirodhālaṃbanāś catvāro yāvan
T07yabhkvyu:11328: mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāra iti navacatuṣkāṇi ṣaṭtriṃśat.
T07yabhkvyu:11329: ṣoḍaśa ca ṣaṭtriṃśac ca dvāpaṃcāśad bhavaṃti. yathānāgamyasaṃgṛhīta iti vistaraḥ. maulaṃ dhyānam anāgamyapraviśyotpadyata ity anāgamyaṃ. yena prakāreṇānaṃtaroktenānāgamyasaṃgṛhītā dvāpaṃcāśad vajropamā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:11330: tenaiva prakāreṇa dhyānāṃtarasaṃgṛhītā dvāpaṃcāśad bhavaṃti. kathaṃ kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:11333: saṃprayuktā aṣṭau. nirodhānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāḥ prathamadhyānanirodhālaṃbanāś catvāraḥ. evaṃ yāvad bhavāgranirodhālaṃbanāś
T07yabhkvyu:11337: prathamadhyānasaṃgṛhītā dvāpaṃcāśāt. yāvac caturthadhyānasaṃgṛhītā dvāpaṃcāśad iti. yathāsaṃkhyam iti vistaraḥ. ākāśānaṃtyāyatanasaṃgṛhītā
T07yabhkvyu:11339: ākiṃcanyāyatanasaṃgṛhītā viṃśatiḥ. bhavāgra āryamārgo nāstīti tatsaṃgṛhītā na saṃtīti na ciṃtyaṃte. teṣu dharmajñānasyābhāvād iti. teṣv ākāśānaṃtyāyatanādiṣu dharmajñānasyābhāvāt. dharmajñānasya ṣaḍbhūmikatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11340: tasmān nirodhamārgadharmajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā aṣṭau na bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:11341: adhobhūminirodhālaṃbanasya cānvayajñānasyābhāvāt. nirodhānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś caturdhyānanirodhālaṃbanāḥ ṣoḍaśa punar na bhavaṃtīty aṣṭāviṃśatir bhavaṃti. dvāpaṃcāśato 'ṣṭau ṣoḍaśa caivāpanīyeti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:11343: nirodhānvayajñānākāraiḥ [Tib. 233a] saṃprayuktā ākāśānaṃtyāyatanādinirodhālaṃbanāḥ ṣoḍaśa. mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāra iti. ta ime jñānākārālaṃbanabhedabhinnā aṣṭāviṃśatir
T07yabhkvyu:11345: caturviṃśatir yojyāḥ. ākiṃcanyāyatanasaṃgṛhītā vijñānānaṃtyāyatananirodhālaṃbanān apy aparān apanīya viṃśatir iti. kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ svabhūmyūrdhvabhūmikanirodham evālaṃbaṃta ārūpyā
T07yabhkvyu:11346: nādhobhūmikaṃ dhyānavat. na hy adhobhūmikaṃ duḥkham anālaṃbya tannirodhaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:11347: śakyam ālaṃbituṃ. duḥkhaṃ ca sarvaṃ sāsravam eva. eṣa ca niyamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11348: na maulāḥ kuśalārūpyāḥ sāsravādharagocarā ity etat kāraṇaṃ. dhyānānāṃ tu samastālocanatvān na pratiṣedhaḥ. vakṣyati hi
T07yabhkvyu:11350: iti. atha kasmān nirodham evālaṃbaṃte na punar duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ vā.
T07yabhkvyu:11351: bhavāgrād adhobhūmer vītarāgatvāt. tasya hi bhāvāgrika eva navamaḥ prakāro
T07yabhkvyu:11353: anvayajñānam adhikṛtaṃ. tac ca vajropamasamādhisaṃprayuktaṃ veditavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11357: iti vacanāt. sarvaṃ hi mārgānvayajñānaṃ navabhūmikānvayajñānapakṣālaṃbanam
T07yabhkvyu:11359: yeṣāṃ tv iti vistaraḥ. yeṣām ābhidhārmikānāṃ mārgānvayajñānam api na kevalanirodhānvayajñānam ekaikabhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanam iṣṭaṃ. teṣām aṣṭāviṃśatim adhikān prakṣipya anāgamyasaṃgṛhītā aśītir vajropamā
T07yabhkvyu:11360: bhavaṃti. kathaṃ kṛtvā. pūrvakāḥ kṛtsnasyānvayajñānapakṣyasyālaṃbanā mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāraḥ. idānīm ekīyamatenaikaikabhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanā api vyavasthāpyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:11361: anāgamyasaṃgṛhītāḥ prathamadhyānapratipakṣālaṃbanā mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāraḥ. evaṃ yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanā
T07yabhkvyu:11362: mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāra ity evam aṣṭāviṃśatir adhikā
T07yabhkvyu:11363: bhavaṃti. evam aṣṭāviṃśatim adhikān prakṣipya dvāpaṃcāśad aśītir bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:11364: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavāgrapratipakṣālaṃbanā mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāro na gaṇyaṃte. āha. na bhavāgrasaṃgṛhīto 'nāsravo mārgo bhavāgrapratipakṣo 'sti. prathamadhyānabhūmikas tv asti. yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmika iti. tasmāt tadbhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanā evoktāḥ. na bhavāgrapratipakṣālaṃbanā iti. apare punar vyācakṣate. yeṣāṃ tu mārgānvayajñānam apy ekaikabhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanam [Tib. 234a] iṣṭaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11365: yathā nirodhānvayajñānam iṣṭam ity abhiprāyaḥ. teṣāṃ bhāvāgrikaduḥkhasamudayānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā aṣṭau.
T07yabhkvyu:11366: nirodhamārgadharmajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā aṣṭau. nirodhānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāḥ prathaṃadhyānanirodhālaṃbanāś catvāraḥ. evaṃ yāvad bhavāgranirodhālaṃbanāś catvāra iti dvātriṃśad bhavaṃti. evaṃ mārgānvayajñānākārair api saṃprayuktās tathaiva dvātriṃśad iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:11367: aṣṭāviṃśatim adhikān prakṣipyānāmyasaṃgṛhītā aśītir vajropamā bhavaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:11368: teṣāṃ hi ye hi kṛtsnasyānvayajñānapakṣasyālaṃbanān mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāras te na saṃti. bhavāgrapratipakṣālaṃbanās tu tatsthāne
T07yabhkvyu:11369: bhavaṃtīty ato aśītir vajropamā bhavaṃtīti. evaṃ yāvac caturthadhyānasaṃgṛhītāḥ katham. aṣṭāviṃśatim adhikān prakṣipya
T07yabhkvyu:11371: dhyānāṃtarasaṃgṛhītāḥ. evaṃ prathamadvitīyatṛtīyacaturthadhyānasaṃgṛhītā pratidhyānam aśītir vajropamā bhavaṃti. ākāśānaṃtyāyatanādiṣv iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11372: bhavāgravarjyeṣu triṣv ārūpyeṣu yathākramaṃ catvāriṃśat dvātriṃśac caturviṃśatiś ca bhavaṃti. kathaṃ kṛtvā. [Tib. 234b] ākāśānaṃtyāyatane tāvad aṣṭāviṃśatyāṃ vajropameṣv ākāśānaṃtyāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanān (Abhidh-k-vy 572) mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāṃś caturaḥ prakṣipya yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanāṃś catura iti. dvādaśa prakṣipya catvāriṃśad bhavaṃti. evaṃ caturviṃśatyāṃ vijñānāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanāṃś
T07yabhkvyu:11373: caturaḥ prakṣipyākiṃcanyāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanāṃś caturaḥ prakṣipya dvātriṃśad bhavaṃti. evaṃ viṃśatyām ākiṃcanyāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanāṃś
T07yabhkvyu:11374: caturaḥ prakṣipya caturviṃśatir bhavaṃti. āha. nanv apadiṣṭam adhobhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanaṃ tu bhavati. tasyānyonyahetutvād iti. atha kasmāt svabhūmyūrdhvabhūmipratipakṣālambanā evoktā
T07yabhkvyu:11376: aviśeṣya navabhūmikam anvayajñānapakṣaṃ mārgam adhobhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanaṃ bhavatīty uktaṃ. na punar ākāśānantyāyatanādisaṃgṛhītasyādhobhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanaṃ. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:11379: svabhūmyūrdhvabhūmyālaṃbanaṃ tu viśeṣarūpeṇāpi bhavatīti. eṣa tu pūrvako
T07yabhkvyu:11382: sarvaṃ hi mārgānvayajñānaṃ navabhūmikānvayajñānapakṣālaṃbanam iti. apare tv evaṃ vyācakṣate. bhāvāgrikaduḥkhasamudayānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā aṣṭāu. nirodhānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā ākāśānaṃtyāyatananirodhālaṃbanāś catvāraḥ. evaṃ yāvad bhāvāgrikanirodhālaṃbanāś catvāra iti ṣoḍaśa. mārgānvayajñanākārair api saṃprayuktā ākāśānaṃtyāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanāś catvāraḥ. evaṃ yāvad bhavāgrapratipakṣālaṃbanāś catvāra iti ṣoḍaśa. ta ete dviṣoḍaśa pūrvoktāś cāṣṭāv iti. catvāriṃśad ākāśānaṃtyāyatanasaṃgṛhītā vajropamā bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:11387: bhavāgrasyāpi hi te 'dhobhūmikaṃ pratipakṣamārgam ācakṣata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11388: punar gotrendriyabhedād bhūyāṃso bhavaṃtīti. kathaṃ. ye tāvad aṣṭau
T07yabhkvyu:11389: sarvaprathamā uktāḥ. teṣāṃ. yo bhāvāgrikaduḥkhālaṃbano 'nityākārasaṃprayukto [Tib. 235b] vajropamaḥ. tasya ṣaḍgotrabhedāt ṣoḍhābhedaḥ. evaṃ duḥkhādyākārasaṃprayuktānāṃ trayāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11390: ṣoḍhābhedaḥ. teṣām (Abhidh-k-vy 573) api pratyekaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrendriyabhedād bhedaḥ. yathā caiṣāṃ pratyekaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11391: gotrendriyabhedāḥ. evaṃ bhāvāgrikasamudayālaṃbanānāṃ caturṇāṃ pratyekaṃ ṣaḍgotrabhedāt ṣoḍhābhedaḥ. indriyabhedāc ca tridhābhedaḥ. yathā caiṣām aṣṭānāṃ gotrendriyabhedāt pratyekaṃ ṣoḍhā tridhā ca bhedaḥ. evaṃ sarveṣām anāgāmyasaṃgṛhītānāṃ jñānākārālaṃbanabhedabhinnānāṃ yāvad
T07yabhkvyu:11392: ākiṃcanyāyatanasaṃgṛhītānāṃ gotrendriyabhedād bhedaḥ. anayā vartanyā yojyaḥ. evaṃ vā yojyaḥ. prathame pakṣe dvāpaṃcāśad anāgāmyasaṃgṛhītāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11393: yāvad viṃśatir ākiṃcanyāyatanasaṃgṛhītā ity abhisamasya caturaśītir uttarāṇi trīṇi śatāni vajropamānāṃ bhavaṃti. tāni ṣaḍguṇīkṛtya triguṇīkṛtya ca ṣaṭsahasrāṇi navaśatāni dvādaśottarāṇi bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:11394: dvitīyapakṣe yatrādito 'śītiḥ. yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatane caturviṃśatir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11395: ekapiṇḍataḥ ṣaṭsaptatyuttarāṇi paṃcaśatāni bhavaṃti. gotrendriyabhedāt ṣaṭguṇīkṛtya triguṇīkṛtya ca. daśasahasrāṇi aṣṭaṣaṣṭyuttarāṇi ca trīṇi śatāni vajropamānāṃ [Tib. 236a] bhavaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:11396: ata eva tat kṣayajñānam iti. kuta ity āha. sarvāsravakṣayaprāptisahajatvāt prathamata iti. yasmāt sarvāsravakṣayaprāptyā saha jātaṃ tatprathamato jñānaṃ. tasmāt kṣayajñānam ity ucyate. madhyapadalopāt. nairuktividhānato
T07yabhkvyu:11398: anutpādajñānādiviśeṣaṇārthaṃ. saṃketāpekṣayā hiśabdapravṛttiḥ. ata eva sa
T07yabhkvyu:11400: parārthakaraṇayogyatvād ity arthaḥ. sarvasarāgapūjārhattvāc ceti. sarāgāḥ pṛthagjanaśaikṣāḥ teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ pūjām arhatīty arhan. siddhaṃ bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:11401: kiṃ siddhaṃ bhavatīty āha. anye sapta pūrvoktāḥ pudgalāḥ śaikṣā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11402: trayaḥ phalasthāś catvāraś ca pratipannakā uktāḥ. asāv evāśaikṣa ity
T07yabhkvyu:11403: avadhāraṇād etadanye āryāḥ śaikṣā iti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11404: kena te śaikṣā iti. kena kāraṇena te sapta pudgalāḥ śaikṣā ity ucyaṃta ity
T07yabhkvyu:11405: āha. āsravakṣayāya nityaṃ śikṣaṇaśīlatvād iti. śikṣā śīlam eṣām iti
T07yabhkvyu:11406: śaikṣāḥ. śīlaṃ. chattrādibhyo ṇa iti lakṣaṇāt. kva śikṣaṇaśīlāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11407: śikṣātraye. [Tib. 236b] kiṃ śikṣātrayam. adhiśīlam adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11408: ca. kiṃsvabhāvās tā ity āha. tāḥ punaḥ śīlasamādhiprajñāsvabhāvā iti. śīle śīkṣā adhiśīlam evaṃ yāvat prajñāyāṃ śikṣety adhiprajñam iti. avyayaṃ vibhaktāv ity avyayībhāvasamāsaḥ. śikṣākriyāṇāṃ tv avyatirekāc
T07yabhkvyu:11409: chīlādisvabhāvāḥ śikṣā iti vyācaṣṭe. pṛthagjano 'pi śaikṣaḥ prāpnotīti.
T07yabhkvyu:11410: pṛthagjano 'pi vinayoktāsu śikṣāsu śikṣata iti. na.
T07yabhkvyu:11411: yathābhūtaṃsatyāprajñānāt. naitad evaṃ. kasmāt. yathābhūtaṃ satyānāṃ duḥkhādīnāṃ aprajñānād anavabodhāt. tad dhi bhikṣavo (Abhidh-k-vy 574)
T07yabhkvyu:11412: dṛṣṭaṃ yad āryayā prajñayeti vacanāt. tathā hi sūtre adhiśīlam adhicittaṃ vā śikṣāṃ vistareṇoktvāha. adhiprajñaṃ śikṣā katamā. idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ. ayaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11413: duḥkhanirodhaḥ. iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11414: yathābhūtasatyaprajñānāt. yatra ca śikṣitāḥ śīlādiṣu. tatra punar aparaśikṣaṇāt. prātimokṣasaṃvaraparityāgataḥ uṣmagatādiparihāṇitaś cāryaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:11415: punar yady api kiṃcit parityajati. na tu sarvaṃ. [Tib. 237a] na hy āryasya
T07yabhkvyu:11416: kadācid api śikṣātrayaṃ nāstīti. prakṛtistha ārya iti. asamāhitāvasthā sattvānāṃ prakṛtiḥ. tatrastha āryaḥ piṇḍapātacārādigataḥ. na śikṣaṇaśīla iti. na śaikṣaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ. āśayata iti chandataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11417: sthitādhvagavat. adhvaga ucyate yo 'dhvānaṃ gacchati. saṃsthito 'py
T07yabhkvyu:11418: adhvaga ity ucyate. gamanāśasyāparityāgāt. tadvat. prāptyanuṣaṃgataś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:11419: śīlasamādhiprajñānāṃ ca prāptayaḥ prakṛtisthasyāpy anuṣajyaṃte. tasmāt prakṛtistho 'pi nāśikṣaṇaśīla
T07yabhkvyu:11420: śaikṣāśaikṣanirdeśapraśaṃgenedam ucyate. atha śaikṣā dharmāḥ katamā
T07yabhkvyu:11421: ityādi. śaikṣasyānāsravā dharmāḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāvāḥ. evam aśaikṣasyāśaikṣā dharmāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11422: nirvāṇaṃ kasmān na śaikṣaṃ. yac chaikṣeṇa prāptam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11423: aśaikṣapṛthagjanayor api tadyogād iti. pṛthagjano 'pi laukikamārgaprāptena nirvāṇena yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11424: prathamaḥ pratipannaka iti. darśanamārgasthaḥ. śeṣāṇām iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11429: anupūrvādhigamaṃ praty evam ucyata iti. anupūrveṇa catuḥphalaprāptiṃ praty
T07yabhkvyu:11430: ucyate. dravyata paṃceti. bhūgaḥkāmavītarāgau tu syātāṃ. bhūyovītarāgaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:11431: kṣīṇaṣaṭprakāraḥ. kāmavītarāgaḥ kṣīṇanavaprakāraḥ. darśanamārge darśanamārgāvasthāyāṃ yathākramaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11432: syātāṃ. na ca srotaāpannasakṛdāgāminau. kiṃ tarhi. tadvyatiriktau. tathā ca sati dravyataḥ sapta bhavaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:11433: srotaāpattisakṛdāgāmyanāgāmiphalapratipannakās trayaś catvāraś ca phalasthā ity arhattvaphalapratipannaka eko 'nāgāmiphalasthān na vyatirikta ity avagaṃtavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11435: dvividho bhāvanāmārgo darśanākhyas tv anāsrava iti vacanāt. tatkleśānuśayitatvād iti yasmāt tadbhūmikaḥ kleśas tatra
T07yabhkvyu:11436: laukike (Abhidh-k-vy 575) mārge ālaṃbanato 'nuśayitaḥ. yo hi kleśa iti vistareṇa sādharmyavaidharmyadṛṣṭāṃtaṃ darśayati. yo yadbhūmiko mārgaḥ. na sa tadbhūmikakleśapratipakṣaḥ. [Tib. 238a] tatkleśānuśayitatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11437: asamāhitatadbhūmikadharmāṃtaravat. vaidharmyeṇa tūparisāmaṃtakamārgavad anāsravavat pratipakṣamārgavad vā. laukikenāpi vairāgyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11440: iti. tadyathā srotaāpannaḥ śamathacaritaḥ. laukikena mārgeṇa vairāgyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11442: dhyānaṃ niśrityeti. yasmāc chaikṣaḥ ṣaḍ bhūmīr niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati.
T07yabhkvyu:11444: aśaikṣo nava niśritya bhūmīḥ śaikṣas tu ṣaḍ iti vacanāt tenāha. yo dhyānaṃ niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati. sa kṛtsnapūrvamārgatyāgād ārūpyamārgāṇāṃ mṛdvindriyasaṃgṛhītānāṃ pūrvalabdhānāṃ tyāgāt. kevaphalamārgalābhāc ca kevalasyānāgāmiphalasya
T07yabhkvyu:11446: sa viśeṣaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā phalm āproti vardhayann iti vacanāt. ūrdhvabhūmikakleśavisaṃyogena ārūpyāvacarakleśavisaṃyogenāsamanvāgataḥ syāt. ayaṃ cāparo doṣaḥ. tyakte ca tasminn ūrdhvabhūmikleśavisaṃyoge [Tib. 238b] taiḥ kleśair ūrdhvabhūmikaiḥ samanvāgataḥ syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11447: bhavāgrārdhavimuktordhvajātavat tv asamanvaya ity ardhena vimukto 'rdhavimuktaḥ. bhavāgrād ardhavimukto bhavāgrārdhavimuktaḥ. ūrdhvaṃ jāta ūrdhvajātaḥ. bhavāgrārdhavimuktaś cordhvajātaś ca bhavāgrārdhavimuktordhvajātau. tayor iveti.
T07yabhkvyu:11449: tuśabdaḥ pūrvadoṣavyāvartanārthaḥ. tam arthaṃ vivṛṇvann āha. asatyām iti vistaraḥ. asatyām api tasya pudgalasya laukikyāṃ visaṃyogaprāptau. na taiḥ kleśaiḥ samanvāgamaḥ syāt tadyathā bhavāgrārdhaprakāravimuktasyeti vistaraḥ. tasya hi laukikī bhavāgrārdhaprakāravisaṃyogaprāptir nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:11450: tatpratipakṣalaukikamārgābhāvāt. lokottarā ca tadvisaṃyogaprāptir dhyānaṃ niśrityendriyasaṃcāreṇa tyaktā syāt. na ca punas tair bhāvāgrikakleśaprakāraiḥ samanvāgamo bhavatīty abhyupagamyate bhavadbhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11451: tadvad asya syāt. yathā ca pṛthagjanasya prathamadhyānabhūmer ūrdhvaṃ jātasya dvitīyadhyānādyupapannasya.
T07yabhkvyu:11455: tathārūpyāptam iti niyamāt tyāgo bhavati. tasmān na punas taiḥ kāmāvacaraiḥ [Tib. 239a]
T07yabhkvyu:11456: kleśaiḥ samanvāgamo bhavatīty abhyupagamyate. tadvad asyāpi pudgalasya
T07yabhkvyu:11457: syāt. pṛthagjanasyetigrahaṇaṃ. yasmād āryasya laukikena mārgeṇa kāmadhātor ūrdhvaṃ vā vairagyaṃ gacchataḥ kleśavisaṃyogaprāptir laukikī lokottarā ca bhavati. tatra yā laukikī kāmāvacarakleśavisaṃyogaprāptiḥ. tasyāḥ prathamadhyānabhūmer ūrdhvajātasya bhūmisaṃcāreṇa tyāgo bhavati na
T07yabhkvyu:11459: ārye tu phalāptyuttaptihānibhir iti tyāganiyamāt. tasyāṃ ca satyāṃ lokottarāyāṃ prathamadhyānād
T07yabhkvyu:11460: jātasyāpy āryasya na punas taiḥ samanvāgamaḥ saṃbhavati. na tv evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11461: pṛthagjanasyeti pṛthagjanagrahaṇaṃ. tasmād ajñāpakam etat. tyakte kleśāsamanvayād iti yad
T07yabhkvyu:11464: (VI.49) upekṣendriyasāmānyād iti. caturthadhyānādisamāpattitatsāmaṃtakayor upekṣendriyaṃ tulyam iti. kaścin na śaknotīti mṛdvindriyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11465: indriyasaṃcārasya duṣkaratvād iti. upekṣendriyānaṃtaraṃ sukhendriyasya saumanasyendriyasya vā duṣkaratvāt. maulasāmaṃtakayor upekṣendriyasāmānye sati kim arthaṃ maulād evāṃtyaṃ vimuktimārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti. na
T07yabhkvyu:11466: sāmaṃtakāt. vītarāgabhūmibāhumānyāt. [Tib. 239b] nādharāyā vītarāgatvād iti. tatsāmaṃtakena vādhovairāgyasya kṛtatvāt. satyākārapravṛttā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11468: (VI.50) saṃbhavata iti. yady adharāṃ bhūmim audārikataḥ paśyaṃty ūrdhvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11469: tadviparyayeṇa śāṃtata ity eke. apare vyācakṣate. śāṃtādyākārāṇāṃ kadācid ekenāpy ākāreṇākārayaṃti. nāvaśyaṃ samastair iti. audārikata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11470: audārikam ity audārikataḥ. aśāṃtatvād audārikataḥ. katham aśāṃtādharā bhūmiḥ. mahābhisaṃskārataratvāt. idaṃ mahābhisaṃskāraṃ yatnasādhyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11471: mārgeṇa sahādharaṃ sthānaṃ. idam api mahābhisaṃskāraṃ saha mārgeṇordhvaṃ sthānam. idam anayor atiśayeneti mahābhisaṃskārataraṃ. tadbhāvaḥ. tasmāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11472: khilaṃ durbhedaṃ. kutsitaṃ khilaṃ duḥkhilam iti duḥkhilataḥ. katham apraṇītādharā bhūmir ity āha. bahudauṣṭhulyataratvena pratikūlabhāvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11474: bahudauṣṭhulyam (Abhidh-k-vy 577) asyeti. bahudauṣṭhulyam. idam api bahudauṣṭhulyaṃ samārgam adharaṃ sthānaṃ. idam api bahudauṣṭhulyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11475: samārgam ūrdhvaṃ sthānam. idam anayor atiśayeneti bahudauṣṭhulyataraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11477: tayaivatadbhūmyaniḥsaraṇāt. tayaiva bhūmyā tasyā eva bhūmer aniḥsaraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11478: bhittyaniḥśaraṇavat. yathā tayaiva bhittyā tasyā eva bhitter aniḥsaraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11479: tadavaṣṭabdhākāśadeśāt. teṣāṃ viparyayeṇeti. alpābhisaṃskāratvāt alpadauṣṭhulyataratvenāpratikūlabhāvāt tayā bhūmyā tadbhūminiḥsaraṇād yathākramaṃ śāṃtapraṇītaniḥsaraṇākārāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11480: (VI.51) gatam ānuṣaṃgikaṃ. idaṃ vaktavyam iti. kṣayajñānāṃtarābhāvi
T07yabhkvyu:11483: iti. apunaḥkartavyatājñānaṃ. tad asya tadānīm utpadyate. parihāṇisaṃbhavād
T07yabhkvyu:11484: iti. kleśotpādāvakāśo 'stīti nāsyānutpādajñānam utpadyate. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11485: parihāṇisaṃbhavāt. yasmād asya parihāṇiḥ saṃbhavati. yasya punar anutpādajñānaṃ. na tasya parihāṇir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11486: (VI.52) tena hi śramaṇo bhavatīti. śrāmaṇyayogāc chramaṇo bhavati. yathā śauklyayogāc chuklaḥ paṭa iti. śamayati kleśān iti śramaṇaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11487: tanniṣyandapuruṣakāraphalatvād iti. tasya śrāmaṇyasyānaṃtaryamārgalakṣaṇasya yathāyogaṃ vimuktimārgā asaṃskṛtāni ca
T07yabhkvyu:11488: [Tib. 240b] niṣyandaphalatvāt puruṣakāraphalatvāc ca. vimuktimārgās tasya niṣyandaphalaṃ puruṣakāraphalaṃ ca. asaṃskṛtāni puruṣakāraphalam eva.
T07yabhkvyu:11489: yadbalāj jāyate yat tat phalaṃ puruṣakārajaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11490: yadbalāt prāpyate ca yat tac ca puruṣakāraphalam iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:11491: (VI.53) evaṃ tarhīti vistaraḥ. yathā pṛthagjanasya pāṇineḥ pravacane upasaṃkhyānaṃ kriyate. evaṃ sarvajñasyāpi buddhasyopasaṃkhyānaṃ kartavyam upajāyata iti vākyārthaḥ. pūrvamārgatyāga iti vistaraḥ. pūrvamārgatyāgaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:11493: sarvasyaikaprāptilābhād iti. sarvasya darśanaheyaprahāṇasyaikā bhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhītā prāptiḥ srotaāpattiphalaprāptikāle labhyate. tathā sakṛdāgāmiphalaprāptikāle darśanaheyaprahāṇasya
T07yabhkvyu:11494: ṣaḍvidhabhāvanāmārgaheyaprahāṇasya ca sarvasyaikā sakṛdāgāmiphalasaṃgṛhītā prāptir labhyate. evam anāgāmyarhattvaphalayor api yojyaṃ. caturvidhānāṃ dharmānvayajñānānāṃ iti. satyabhedāc caturvidhānāṃ dharmajñānānām
T07yabhkvyu:11498: anāgāmiphalaṃ ca. tad dhi laukikenāpi mārgeṇa prāptaṃ saṃbhavati. tat kathaṃ śrāmaṇyasyānāsravamārgalakṣaṇasya phalaṃ yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11499: darśanamārgaphalam api prahāṇam iti. apiśabdād bhāvanāmārgaphalam api
T07yabhkvyu:11502: tasmād darśanamārgaphalaprahāṇayogād asaṃskṛtaṃ sakṛdāgaṃiphalam anāgāmiphalaṃ vā śrāmaṇyaphalaṃ bhavati. yat trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11506: kiṃ. kṛtaḥ prakṣepaḥ. tena jñāyate. prahāṇamiśrīkaraṇād evam uktaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11508: laukikenāryavairāgye visaṃyogāptayo dvidhā iti tatranāsravayā visaṃyogaprāptyā tat prahāṇaṃ yal laukikamārgasaṃprāptaṃ saṃdhāryate. prāptiyogenāvaśyam upatiṣṭhata ity
T07yabhkvyu:11509: arthaḥ. mriyate na phalabhraṣṭa iti. tadabhāve hi laukikasyeva parihīṇasya maraṇaṃ syāt. tadbalenety anāsravavisaṃyogaprāptibalenety [Tib. 241b]
T07yabhkvyu:11510: arthaḥ. saiva ca vartamānalaukikamārgopajanitānāsravā prātir anāgataś cāṣṭāṃga āryamārgo laukikabalena prāpyamāṇaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11511: vyavasthāpyamānaṃ na virudhyate. sūtre tv asaṃskṛtaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalam
T07yabhkvyu:11512: udgrāhyate. prādhānyāt. saṃskṛtam apy atraiṣṭavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11513: (VI.55, 56) kleśānāṃ vāhanād brāhmaṇyam iti. vāhitā anenānekavidhāḥ pāpakā
T07yabhkvyu:11514: akuśalā dharmā iti brāhmaṇaḥ. tadbhāvo brāhmaṇyam anāsravo mārgaḥ. kathaṃ brahmacakram ity āha. brahmacakraṃ tu brahmavartanād iti. yasmād brahmaṇā pravartitaṃ. tasmāt brahmacakram iti. anuttarabrāhmaṇyayogād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11515: anuttarānāsravamārgayogād ity arthaḥ. eṣa hi bhagavān brāhmety etad udāharaṇaṃ jīvakenoktam
T07yabhkvyu:11517: iti. āśugatvādibhir arādibhiś cety arthaḥ. āśugatvād iti vistaraḥ. idaṃ mārgasya cakraratnena sādharmyam ucyate. yathā cakraratnam āśugam. evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11518: (Abhidh-k-vy 579) darśanamārgaḥ. paṃcadaśabhiś cittakṣaṇaiḥ satyābhisamayād āśuga iti. tyajanakramaṇāt. yathā tad anyaṃ deśaṃ tyajaty anyaṃ deśaṃ krāmati. [Tib. 242a] evam ayam ānaṃtaryamārgaṃ tyajati vimuktimārgaṃ krāmati saṃmukhībhāvataḥ. satyāṃtaratyajanakramaṇād vā.
T07yabhkvyu:11519: ajitajayajitādhyāvasanāt. yathā tad ajitāni grāmanigamādīni jayati. jitāni
T07yabhkvyu:11520: cādhyāvasati. evam ayam ānaṃtaryamārgeṇājitān satkāyadṛṣṭyādīn kleśāṃ jayati tatprāticchedāt. jitāṃś cādhyāvasati vimuktimārgeṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:11521: kleśavisaṃyogaprāptisahotpādāt. utpatananipatanāc ca. yathā ca tat kvacid utpatati kvacin nipatati. evam ayam ānaṃtaryavimuktimārgāṇāṃ punaḥpunaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:11522: saṃmukhībhāvāt. kāmādiduḥkhādisatyālaṃbanato vā yathāyogam utpatati ca.
T07yabhkvyu:11524: samyagdṛṣṭir iti vistaraḥ. iha śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya samādhilābhaḥ samādhilābhāt prajñā yathābhūtaṃ bhāvyata ity ataḥ samyagvākkarmāṃtājivā nābhisthānīyāḥ. samyagdṛṣṭyādīnāṃ tatpratibaddhavṛttitvāt śīlam
T07yabhkvyu:11525: ādhārabhūtam iti kṛtvā. samādhir nemisthāṇīyas tenetareṣām upagrahāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11527: pravṛttatvāt. kuta etad iti. kiṃ svamatam etad vaibhāṣikāṇāṃ darśanamārgo dharmacakram ity āhodvid āgamata iti. tadutpattau pravartitam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11528: darśanamārgotpattau pravartitaṃ dharmacakram iti sūtre vacanāt. kathaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11529: bhagavān bārāṇāsyāṃ viharati sma ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve. tatra bhagavān paṃcakāṃ bhikṣūn āmaṃtrayate sma. idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśomanasikurvataś cakṣur udapādi jñānaṃ vidyā buddhir udapādi. ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ. ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ. iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti. pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu
T07yabhkvyu:11530: yoniśomanasikurvataś cakṣur udapādi jñānaṃ vidyā buddhir udapādi. tat khalu duḥkham āryasatyam abhijñayā parijñātavyaṃ mayeti pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśomanasikurvataś cakṣur udapādīti pūrvavat. tat khalu duḥkhasamudaya āryasatyam abhijñayā prahātavyaṃ mayeti pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu pūrvavat. tat khalu duḥkhanirodha āryasatyam abhijñayā sākṣātkartavyaṃ mayeti pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:11531: tat khalu duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam abhijñayā bhāvayitavyaṃ mayeti pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu pūrvavat. [Tib. 243a] tat khalu duḥkham āryasatyam abhijñayā parijñātaṃ mayeti pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu pūrvavat. tat khalu duḥkhasamudaya āryasatyam abhijñayā prahīṇaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11532: mayeti pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu pūrvavat. tat khalu (Abhidh-k-vy 580)
T07yabhkvyu:11533: duḥkhanirodha āryasatyam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtaṃ mayeti pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu pūrvavat. tat khalu punar duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam
T07yabhkvyu:11534: abhijñayā bhāvitaṃ mayeti pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu pūrvavat. yāvac ca mama bhikṣava eṣu caturṣv āryasatyeṣv evaṃ triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ na
T07yabhkvyu:11535: cakṣur udapādi. na jñānaṃ na vidyā na buddhir udapādi. na tāvad aham asmāt sadevakāl lokāt samārakāt sabrahmakāt saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāsurāyā mukto niḥsṛto visaṃyukto viprayukto viparyāsāpagatena cetasā bahulaṃ vyahārṣaṃ. na tāvad aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddho 'smīty adhyajñāsiṣaṃ. yataś ca mama bhikṣava eṣu caturṣv
T07yabhkvyu:11536: āryasatyeṣv evaṃ triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ cakṣur udapādi yāvad buddhir udapādi. tato 'ham asmāt sadevakād yāvat viprayukto viparyāsāpagatena cetasā [Tib. 243b] bahulaṃ vyahārṣaṃ. tato 'ham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddho 'smīti adhyajñāsiṣaṃ. asmin khalu punar dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe āyuṣmataḥ kauṇḍinyasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam aśīteś ca devatāsahasrāṇāṃ. tatra bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ kauṇḍinyam āmaṃtrayate sma. ājñātas te kauṇḍinya dharmaḥ. ājñāto me bhagavan. ājñātas te kauṇḍinya dharmaḥ. ājñāto me sugata. ājñāta āyuṣmatā kauṇḍinyena dharma iti bhaumā yakṣāḥ śabdam udīrayaṃti ghoṣam anuśrāvayaṃti. etan mārṣā bhagavatā bārāṇasyām ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve triparivartadvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartitaṃ. apravartitapūrvaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā. kenacit punar loke sahadharmeṇa bahujanahitāyeti vistaraḥ. tad evam āryasya kauṇḍinyasya darśanamārga utpanne devatābhir uktaṃ bhagavatā pravartitaṃ dharmacakram iti
T07yabhkvyu:11538: kathaṃ triparivartam iti vistaraḥ. idaṃ duḥkham ārgasatyam ity ekaḥ parivartaḥ. tat khalu parijñātavyam iti dvitīyaḥ. tat khalu parijñātam iti
T07yabhkvyu:11539: tṛtīyaḥ. ity ete trayaḥ parivartāḥ. ekaikasmin parivarte idaṃ duḥkham ity asmiṃś cakṣur udapādi jñānaṃ [Tib. 244a] vidyā buddhir udapādīti catvāra
T07yabhkvyu:11540: ākārāḥ. parijñātavyam ity asmin punaś catvāraḥ. parijñātam ity asmin punar api catvāraḥ. ity ete dvādaśākārāḥ. tatra pratyakṣārthatvād anāsravā
T07yabhkvyu:11541: prajñā cakṣuḥ. niḥsaṃśayatvāj jñānaṃ. bhūtārthatvāt vidyā. viśuddhatvād
T07yabhkvyu:11542: buddhiḥ. viśuddhā dhīr buddhir iti nirukteḥ. punar bāhyakānāṃ satyeṣu
T07yabhkvyu:11543: darśanaṃ kudṛṣṭivicikitsāvidyānām apratipakṣaḥ sāsravaṃ ceti tato viśeṣaṇārthaṃ cakṣurādigrahaṇaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 581) punas triṣu parivarteṣu
T07yabhkvyu:11544: prathamaṃ darśanaṃ cakṣuḥ. yathādṛṣṭavyavacāraṇaṃ jñānaṃ. yāvadbhāvikatām upādāya vidyā. yāvadvidyamānagrahaṇāt. yathāvadbhāvikatām upādāya buddhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11548: vidyeti. sāsravapratiṣedhārthaṃ buddhir iti. prati satyam evaṃ bhavaṃtīti.
T07yabhkvyu:11549: ayaṃ duḥkhasamudaya āryasatyaṃ. tat khalu prahātavyaṃ. tat khalu prahīṇam
T07yabhkvyu:11550: ity ete trayaḥ parivartāḥ. ekaikasmiṃ parivarte cakṣur udapādi jñānaṃ vidyā buddhir ity ete dvādaśākārāḥ. evaṃ nirodhamārgasatye api yojye. āha.
T07yabhkvyu:11551: yadi prati satyam evaṃ bhavaṃti. trayaḥ parivartā dvādaśa cākārāḥ [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:11552: 244b] dvādaśa parivartāḥ aṣṭacatvāriṃśac cākārāḥ prāpnuvaṃti. kasmāt triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāram ity uktam. ata ucyate. trikadvādaśakasādharmyāt tu triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāram uktam iti. dvayasaptasthānakauśaladeśanāvad
T07yabhkvyu:11553: iti. dvayadeśanāvat. saptasthānakauśaladeśanāvac ca. tadyathā vistaram uktvā tena hi bhikṣo dvayaṃ te deśayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye. dvayaṃ katamat. cakṣūrūpāṇi yāvan manodharmāś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:11554: yatheha dvayasādharmyād dvayam ity uktam. evaṃ trikadvādaśakasādharmyāt triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāram uktaṃ. yathā ca saptasthānakuśalo bhikṣuḥ rūpaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. rūpasamudayaṃ. rūpanirodhaṃ. rūpanirodhagāminīṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11555: pratipadaṃ. rūpasyāsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca. niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11556: prajānātīti. saptasthānakuśalo bhikṣuḥ trividhārthopaparīkṣī kṣipram evāsmin dharmavinaye duḥkhasyāṃtaṃ prajānātīti. pratyekaṃ skaṃdheṣu saptasthānakauśalasādharmyāt. evam ihāpi trikadvādaśakasādharmyāt
T07yabhkvyu:11557: triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāram uktam iti. ebhiś ceti vistaraḥ. ebhiś ca parivartair yathāsūtranirdiṣṭair darśanabhāvanāśaikṣamārgā [Tib. 245a]
T07yabhkvyu:11558: yathāsaṃkhyaṃ darśitāḥ. idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam ity ārabhya yāvad iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti darśanamārgo darśitaḥ. tat khalu duḥkham āryasatyam abhijñayā parijñātavyam ity ārabhya yāvat tat khalu duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam abhijñayā bhāvayitavyam iti bhāvanāmārgo darśitaḥ. tat khalu duḥkham āryasatyam abhijñayā parijñātam
T07yabhkvyu:11559: ity ārabhya yāvat tat khalu duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam abhijñayā bhāvitam ity aśaikṣamārgo darśita iti. atrācārya āha. yady evam iti vistaraḥ. yady evam ebhiḥ parivartair darśanādimārgā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11560: darśitāḥ. na tarhi darśanamārga eva triparivarto dvādaśākāraḥ. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:11561: ekaparivartaś caturākāra iti. katham asau darśanamārgo dharmacakraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11562: vyavasthāpyate. triparivartābhāve (Abhidh-k-vy 582) cakrasādharmyābhāvān na cakraṃ yujyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. tasmāt sa eva dharmaparyāyo
T07yabhkvyu:11563: dharmacakraṃ. tad eva sūtraṃ dharmacakraṃ. dharmacakraprakāśanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11565: triḥparivartanād iti. duḥkhaṃ yāvan mārga ity ekaṃ parivartanaṃ. [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:11566: 245b] parijñātavyaṃ yāvad bhāvayitavyam iti dvitīyaṃ. parijñātaṃ yāvad bhāvitam iti tṛtīyaṃ. caturṇāṃ satyānāṃ tridhākaraṇād iti. duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārga iti satyasvarūpaṃ praty eka ākaraṇaprakāraś
T07yabhkvyu:11567: caturākāraḥ. parijñātavyaṃ prahātavyaṃ sākṣātkartavyaṃ bhāvayitavyaṃ iti kartavyarūpāṃ parijñānakriyāṃ prati dvitīya ākaraṇaprakāraś caturākāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11568: parijñātaṃ prahīṇaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ bhāvitam iti pariniṣṭhitāṃ parijñānādikriyāṃ prati tṛtīya ākaraṇaprakāraś caturākāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11569: dvādaśākāraṃ bhavati. tasya punar iti. dharmaparyāyasya. pravartanaṃ parasaṃtānme gamanaṃ vineyajanasaṃtāne preraṇaṃ. kathaṃ gamanam.
T07yabhkvyu:11570: arthajñāpanāt. atha vā sarva evāryamārgo darśanabhāvanāśaikṣamārgo dharmacakraṃ. vineyajanasaṃtāne kramaṇāt. kramaṇāc cakram iti kṛtvā. yadi sarva evāryamārgo dharmacakraṃ. katham āryājñātakauṇḍinyasya darśanamārgamātrotpāde tat pravartitam ity uktaṃ. ata ucyate. tat tu parasaṃtāne āryakauṇḍinyasaṃtāne. darśanamārgotpādanād vartayitum ārabdham
T07yabhkvyu:11571: ādau vartitam ity etat pravartitam ity ucyate. ādikarmaṇi praśabdo vartate. prabhukta odana iti yathā.
T07yabhkvyu:11572: (VI.57) tṛtīyasya tu kasmād aprāptir iti. rūpadhātūpapanno [Tib. 246a]
T07yabhkvyu:11573: yadi niyāmam avakrāmet. ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe kasmād anāgāmiphalaprāptir na syād ity abhiprāyaḥ. parihāra ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11575: iti. śravaṇābhāvād iti. ārūpyeṣu śrāvakabodhir eva bhavaṃtī bhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:11576: svayaṃbhubodher asaṃbhavāt. śrāvakābhisamayaś ca parato ghoṣam aṃtareṇa na
T07yabhkvyu:11579: iti. traidhātukālaṃbanena ca darśanamārgeṇa bhavitavyam ity ataḥ. sa tatra na bhavatīti. vidhānaṃ vidhā upāya ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11581: cetanādharmā ātmamāraṇadharmā. anurakṣaṇādharmā yas tāṃ vimuktim anurakṣituṃ śaknoti. sthitākaṃpyaḥ yasyāṃ viomuktau sthitaḥ. tasyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11583: 'nivāryo dharmo 'syety akopyadharmā. sa ca dvividhaḥ. svabhāvatas
T07yabhkvyu:11585: paṃca śraddhādhimuktajāḥ evety avadhāraṇaṃ. śraddhādhimuktā bhūtvā ete jātā ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11586: śraddhādhimuktapūrvakā iti yāvad uktaṃ bhavati. ṣaṣṭhas [Tib. 246b] tv anyathāpi bhavatīti vyākhyātaṃ sāmayikīti. samaye upakaraṇārogyadeśaviśeṣādilakṣaṇe bhavā sāmayikī. kāṃtā ca. kāṃtā
T07yabhkvyu:11587: cetovimuktiḥ. kasmāt kāṃteti. nityānurakṣyatvāt. kāṃtaṃ hi nityam
T07yabhkvyu:11588: anurakṣyam iti loke dṛśyate. sūtre 'py uktaṃ. tadyathā nāmaikākṣasya puruṣasya jñātaya ekam akṣi sādhu ca suṣṭhu cānurakṣitavyaṃ manyeran.
T07yabhkvyu:11589: māsya śītaṃ māsyoṣṇaṃ māsya rajo'ṃśavaś cakṣuṣi nipateyur māsya yad apy ekaṃ cakṣur avinaṣṭaṃ tad api vinaśyed iti. evam eva samayavimuktasyārhato
T07yabhkvyu:11591: sādhu ca suṣṭhu cānurakṣitavyaṃ manyate. kaccid aham etasmād dharmān na parihīyeyeti. sa tasmān na parihīyata iti. ghṛtaghaṭavad iti. yathā ghṛtasya pūrṇo ghaṭo ghṛtaghaṭa iti bhavati. madhyagatasya pūrṇaśabdasya lopāt. yathā vā ghṛtāpekṣo ghaṭo ghṛtaghaṭo yatra ghṛtaṃ prakṣepsyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11592: apekṣaśabdalopāt ghṛtaghaṭa iti bhavati. evam ihāpi madhyagatasyāpekṣaśabdasya lopāt samayāapekṣāś caite vimuktāś ceti
T07yabhkvyu:11593: samayavimuktāḥ. samayaḥ punar upakaraṇādir ity [Tib. 247a] uktaṃ. kathaṃ kopayitum aśakyatvād ity āha. aparihāṇita iti. kālāṃtarātyaṃtavimuktito
T07yabhkvyu:11595: 'samayavimuktitvam ity arthaḥ. katham evam ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:11596: parihāṇisaṃbhavāsaṃbhavataḥ. parihāṇisaṃbhavāt kālāṃtaravimuktyā samayavimukta ity ucyate. parihāṇyasaṃbhavād atyaṃtavimuktyāsamayavimukta ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11598: iti. yadā śaikṣo bhūtvendriyāṇi saṃcarati. sa dṛṣṭiprāptatām āpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11599: atha svabhāvatas tīkṣṇendriyaḥ sa ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe dṛṣṭiprāpta eva.
T07yabhkvyu:11600: tasmād asāv akopyadharmā dṛṣṭiprāptapūrvaka ity ucyate. yas tv arhattvāvasthāyām indriyāṇi saṃcarati. nāsāv akopyadharmā dṛṣṭiprāptapūrvaka ity avagaṃtavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11602: iti. parihāṇadharmā nocyate. yasmād uttāpanāgato na bhavatīti. tadgotrā āditaḥ kecid ity apadiṣṭaṃ. tat kim idaṃ parihāṇadharmagotraṃ nāma yāvad
T07yabhkvyu:11604: apadiṣṭaṃ. tatra kecid evaṃ varṇayaṃti kuśalamūlāni gotram iti. kasyacid dhi tādṛśāni kuśalāni bhavaṃti. yaḥ parihāṇadharmā yāvad akopyadharmā.
T07yabhkvyu:11605: anye (Abhidh-k-vy 584) punar āhuḥ pṛthagjanāvasthām ārabhyendriyabhedo gotram iti. sautrāṃtikāḥ punar varṇayaṃti bījaṃ sāmarthyaṃ cetaso gotram
T07yabhkvyu:11606: iti. pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ śaikṣāvasthāyāṃ ca parihāṇadharmabīje sati hetau
T07yabhkvyu:11607: parihāṇadharmagotraka ity ucyate. evam aśaikṣāvasthāyāṃ tadbījavṛttilābhāt
T07yabhkvyu:11608: parihāṇadharmety ucyate. evaṃ yāvad akopyadharmeti. tatra parihāṇadharmeti vistaraḥ. parihāṇadharmā yaḥ parihātuṃ bhavya iti. yady etāvad brūyāt. na ca cetanādidharmety etan na brūyāt. sarva evaite cetanādharmādayaś
T07yabhkvyu:11609: catvāraḥ parihātuṃ bhavyā ity eṣām evānyataraḥ parihāṇadharmā syāt. na tebhyo 'nyaḥ paṃcamaḥ. atas tebhyo 'nya evāyaṃ paṃcama iti viśeṣayan na ca
T07yabhkvyu:11610: cetanādidharmety āha. cetanādharmādīnāṃ punaś caturṇāṃ parihāṇadharmakatve
T07yabhkvyu:11611: 'sati [Tib. 248a] ekaikasya viśeṣalakṣaṇāpadeśād eva punar idaṃ vaktavyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11612: jāyate. cetanādharmā cetayituṃ bhavyo na cānurakṣaṇādharmā yāvat
T07yabhkvyu:11613: prativedhanābhavya iti. evam anurakṣaṇādharmā parihāṇipratyayaṃ balavaṃtam
T07yabhkvyu:11614: aṃtareṇeti. yadi parihāṇipratyayo balavān syāt parihīyeta sa ity
T07yabhkvyu:11616: viśinaṣṭi. parihāṇadharmā hy abalavatāpi parihāṇipratyayena parihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11617: parihāṇipratyayāḥ punar yathā sūtraṃ. paṃca hetavaḥ paṃcapratyayāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:11619: karmāṃtaprasṛto bhavati. bhāṣyaprasṛto bhavati. adhikaraṇaprasṛto bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11620: dīrghacārikāyogam anuyukto bhavati. dīrgheṇa ca rogajātena spṛṣṭo
T07yabhkvyu:11621: bhavatīti. ananurakṣann apīty anenānurakṣaṇādharmaṇo viśinaṣṭi. sa hy anurakṣann eva na parihīyeta. ayaṃ tv ananurakṣann apīti. ananurakṣayann api tatphalaṃ sthātuṃ bhavyas tatphale. na hātuṃ tatphalāt. nāpi vardhayituṃ prativedhanābhavyatāprāptyā. vinābhiyogena vinā vīryeṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:11622: anenārthād uktaṃ bhavati. yady abhiyogaṃ kuryād bhavyaḥ syād iti
T07yabhkvyu:11623: prativedhanābhavyāc cāyam evaṃ viśeṣito bhavati. [Tib. 248b] sa hi vinā
T07yabhkvyu:11625: prathamau dvāv iti vistaraḥ. parihāṇadharmā sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogavikalaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11626: cetanādharmāpi sātatyaprayogeṇa vikalaḥ. viśeṣeṇa tu satkṛtyaprayogeṇa
T07yabhkvyu:11627: vikala ity anayor viśeṣaḥ. mṛdvindriyas tv iti ṣaṣṭhād viśinaṣṭi. ṣaṣṭho hi tīkṣṇendriyaḥ. indriyakṛto hy anayor viśeṣo na prayogakṛta iti. evaṃ ca kṛtveti vistaraḥ. yasmān nāvaśyam evaṃ bhavati. tasmād rūpārūpyadhātvor api ṣaḍ arhaṃto na kevalaṃ kāmadhātāv eva ṣaḍ ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11628: rūpārūpyadhātvor dvau sthitākaṃpya ekaḥ. akopyadharmā ca dvitīyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11629: sthitākaṃpyas (Abhidh-k-vy 585) tāvad baddhābhiruciḥ syān na prativedhanābhavyatākriyādaravān iti. na kāmadhātau sthitākaṃpyaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:11631: balavān nāstīti. nāsau parihīyate. na cendriyāṇi saṃcaraṃtīti
T07yabhkvyu:11632: sthitākaṃpyagotraka eva saṃ tatra bhavati. akopyavimuktiyogāc cākopyadharmāpi bhavati. eveti dvāv eva tau bhavataḥ. nāto 'nye. tayo rūpārūpyadhātvoḥ parihāṇicetanendriyasaṃcārābhāvāt. parihāṇadharmā tāvat tatra nāsti. parihāṇyabhāvāt. anurakṣaṇādharmāpi nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:11633: parihāṇyabhāvenānurakṣitavyāyogāt. [Tib. 249a] ata eva cendriyasaṃcārābhāvāt prativedhanābhavyo 'pi na bhavati. tathā coktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11635: iti. tatra ca nātmasaṃcetanā na parasaṃcetanāstīti cetanādharmāpi na
T07yabhkvyu:11638: cetanānurakṣaṇādharmasthitākaṃpyaprativedhanābhavyānāṃ. na hi parihāṇadharmā punaḥ svagotrāt parihīyata iti. tasya gotrasyākṛtrimatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11639: parihāṇadharmādīnāṃ paṃcānām iti. yasmāt parihāṇadharmaṇo 'pi phalāt parihāṇiḥ saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11641: iti. gotrāt phalāc ca. sa tasmān na parihīyata ity arhan. kasmād ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:11642: śaikṣāśaikṣamārgābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvād iti. yac chaikṣāvasthāyāṃ gotram
T07yabhkvyu:11643: asti. tac chaikṣeṇa mārgeṇa bhāvitaṃ. aśaikṣāvasthāyāṃ ca punar bhāvitam
T07yabhkvyu:11644: iti. tābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvān na tasmāt so 'rhan parihīyate. śaikṣas tu katham ity āha. śikṣas tu laukikalokottarābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvāt prathamāt gotrān na parihīyate. yat tad ātmīyaṃ prathamaṃ gotraṃ tal laukikena mārgeṇa pūrvaṃ bhāvitaṃ. śaikṣeṇa ca mārgeṇa punar bhāvitam iti. tato
T07yabhkvyu:11646: atra kaścid āha. yad ucyate. yasya yat prathamaṃ gotraṃ. sa tasmān na
T07yabhkvyu:11647: parihīyate śaikṣāśaikṣamārgābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvād iti. tad etad akāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11648: yasmād yo 'pi cetanādharmā uttāpanāgatas tasmāt gotrāt parihīyate. tad gotraṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ mārgābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtam iti. parihāṇir na prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:11649: tasmāt gotram eva tat tādṛśaṃ yasmād ādyān na parihīyate. uttāpanāgatāt tu parihīyata iti. yad apy uktaṃ śaikṣas tu laukikalokottarābhyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11650: dṛḍhīkṛtatvān na parihīyata ity etad apy akāraṇaṃ. srotaāpannasya
T07yabhkvyu:11651: parihāṇiprasaṃgāt. na hi srotaāpattiphalaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa dṛḍhīkṛtam
T07yabhkvyu:11654: atra vayam ācāryasyābhiprāyaṃ darśayāmo yenaivam uktaṃ. katham iti. yat tāvad uktaṃ cetanādharmā uttāpanāgatas tasmāt gotrāt parihīyata iti. tad
T07yabhkvyu:11655: ayuktaṃ. yad dhi cetanādharmagotraṃ śaikṣāvasthāyāṃ bhāvitaṃ punaś
T07yabhkvyu:11656: cāśaikṣāvasthāyām api bhāvitam iti dṛḍhīkṛtaṃ. naiva sa tasmād arhattvāt parihīyamāṇaḥ parihīyate. śaikṣāvasthāyāṃ prathamībhūtatvāt. uktaṃ cācāryasaṃghabhadreṇa yaḥ śaikṣāvasthāyāṃ gotrāṃtaram adhigamyārhattvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11657: prāpnoti. asāv [Tib. 250a] api taṃ mārgaṃ parityajati. na cottāpanāgata eva gotre nāvatiṣṭhata iti. yat tu cetanādharmagotram aśaikṣāvasthāyām idānīm evādhigataṃ na śaikṣāvasthāyām adhigataṃ. sa tasmāt parihīyamāṇaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:11658: parihīyate. tadavasthādvayādṛḍhīkṛtatvāt. iti na kāraṇam evaitad bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11659: yad apy uktaṃ śaikṣas tu laukikalokottarābhyāṃ mārgābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvān na parihīyeta ity etad apy akāraṇaṃ. srotaāpannasya parihāṇiprasaṃgāt. na hi srotaāpattiphalaṃ laukikena lokottareṇa dṛḍhīkṛtam iti. tad apy anavabuddhyābhihitaṃ. tad gotraṃ prati kāraṇam ucyate. na phalaṃ prati.
T07yabhkvyu:11660: tatra hi kāraṇāṃtaraṃ vakṣyate. yena prathamāt phalān na parihīyate. na hi kiṃcid apy asti phalaṃ yad yugapad ubhābhyāṃ laukikalokottarābhyāṃ prāpyate. gotraṃ tu laukikalokottarābhyāṃ mārgābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11661: aihajanmikenoṣmagatādinā pārajanmikena vā prahāṇamārgeṇānyena vā laukikena mārgeṇa lokottareṇa śaikṣāvasthāyāṃ bhāvitatvāt. yat tu paścātpratilabdham
T07yabhkvyu:11662: uttāpanayeti. yad āgaṃtukaṃ gotraṃ paścād eva na dvayor avasthayor adhigataṃ tasmāt [Tib. 250b] parihīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11663: gotraṃ nirdiśya phalaṃ nirdiśyate. yasya ca yat prathamaṃ phalam iti
T07yabhkvyu:11664: vistaraḥ. ata eva ca srotaāpattiphalān nāsti parihāṇir iti. yasmāt srotaāpattiphalaṃ yadi prāpyate 'vaśyaṃ prathamaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11665: sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmiphale tu kadācit tu prathame bhavato yadi
T07yabhkvyu:11666: bhūyovītarāgakāmavītarāgayoḥ. kadācid aprathame yady ānupūrvikasya. tatra yadyat phalaṃ prathamaṃ bhavati srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ anāgāmiphalaṃ vā. na tasmāt parihīyate. yat tu paścāt sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalaṃ arhattvaphalaṃ vā. tataḥ parihīyate. evaṃ ca kṛtveti. yasya ca yat prathamaṃ gotraṃ phalaṃ ca. sa tasmān na parihīyata iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:11667: yathākramaṃ paṃca ṣaṭ sapta prakārā iti. anurakṣaṇādharmaṇaḥ paṃca prakārā
T07yabhkvyu:11668: bhavaṃti. tadavasthasya parinirvāṇam indriyasaṃcāraḥ parihāya vā śaikṣatvaṃ cetanādharmagotrapratyāgamanaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11669: ca. sthitākaṃpyasya ṣaṭ prakārā bhavaṃti. (Abhidh-k-vy 587) ta eva ca
T07yabhkvyu:11670: paṃca anurakṣaṇādharmagotrapratyāgamanaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ. prativedhanābhavyasya sapta prakārā bhavaṃti. eta eva ca ṣaṭ sthitākaṃpyagotrapratyāgamanaṃ ca
T07yabhkvyu:11671: saptamam iti. yasya ca yat [Tib. 251a] prathamaṃ gotraṃ śaikṣāvasthāyām
T07yabhkvyu:11672: āsīt. sa śaikṣībhūtaḥ. punar iti vākyādhyāhāraḥ. tatraivāvatiṣṭhate
T07yabhkvyu:11673: nānyasmin. anyathā hi gotraviśeṣalābhāc chaikṣāvasthād gotrād viśiṣṭaṃ tad gotraṃ bhavatīti. ato viśiṣṭagotralābhāt vṛddhir evāsya pudgalasya syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11674: na parihāṇir iti. kathaṃ kṛtvā. yathā tāvat parihāṇadharmā
T07yabhkvyu:11676: parihīyate. śaikṣībhūtas tadgotrād api parihīyamāṇo na sthitākaṃpyagotre
T07yabhkvyu:11677: tiṣṭhati. pratilomato yāvan na cetanādharmagotre. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:11678: parihāṇadharmagotra eva tiṣṭhatīti. anyathā hīti yady anyagotre
T07yabhkvyu:11680: tasmād avaśyam arhattvāt parihīyamāṇa indriyottāpanād api gotrāt parihīyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11681: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prathamāt phalān nāsti parihāṇir iti. yasya yat prathamaṃ phalaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11682: vā. darśanaheyānām avastukatvād anadhiṣṭhānatvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11683: ātmādhiṣṭhānapravṛttā hy eta iti vistaraḥ. ātmano 'dhiṣṭhānena pravṛttā ete darśanaheyāḥ. kasmād ity āha. satkāyadṛṣṭimūlatvāt. yasmād [Tib. 251b]
T07yabhkvyu:11684: ātmadarśanavaśena darśanaheyānāṃ samudācāraḥ. uktaṃ ca yāni vā punaḥ pṛthag loke dṛṣṭigatāni. tāni satkāyadṛṣṭimūlakāni satkāyadṛṣṭisamudayāni
T07yabhkvyu:11686: avastukatvān nāsti parihāṇir iti. satyālaṃbanatvād iti. satyānāṃ nityādito grahanāt. katamaś ca kleśo naivaṃ. bhāvanāprahātavyo 'pi hi rāgādir vitathālaṃbanaḥ. śucisukhanityātmākāraiḥ satyāditattvālaṃbanāt. ātmatvam abhūtam adhyāropayaṃtīti. yathoktaṃ. ye kecid bhikṣava ātmeti ātmīya iti
T07yabhkvyu:11687: samanupaśyaṃtaḥ samanupaśyaṃti. imān eva te paṃcopādānaskandhān ātmata ātmīyataś ca samanupaśyaṃtīti. tadadhiṣṭhānānupravṛttāś cāṃtagrāhādaya iti. ātmādhiṣṭhānānupravṛttāḥ. śāśvata ātmā. ucchedīti vā. nāsty ātmā.
T07yabhkvyu:11688: ayam evāgraḥ. iyam eva śuddhiḥ. kim asāv asti nāstītyevamādyākārapravṛttās tadanyaddarśanaheyā avastukā ucyaṃte. niradhiṣṭhānā ucyaṃta ity arthaḥ. na tv ātmādileśo 'stīti. ādigrahaṇenātmīyagrahaṇaṃ īśvarādigrahaṇaṃ vā. [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:11689: 252a] pratiniyataṃ manaāpāmanaāpādilakṣaṇam iti. rāgasya bhāvanāheyasya manaāpaṃ keśadaṃtaśubhādilakṣaṇaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 588) vastu.
T07yabhkvyu:11690: pratighasyāmanaāpaṃ tadaśubhatādilakṣaṇaṃ. mānasyāpi manaāpaṃ avidyāyā api tad eva dvayaṃ saṃmohanīyaṃ kiṃcid iti. na tu darśanaheyānām
T07yabhkvyu:11691: ātmādilakṣaṇam iti. na tu darśanaheyānām ātmātmīyalakṣaṇaṃ pratiniyataṃ vastu kiṃcid asti. anyatra tadālaṃbanebhyo rāgādibhyaḥ. tasmād avastukā ucyaṃte. tasmān na pratiniyatavastukā ucyaṃta ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11692: api khalv iti vistareṇācāryaḥ. āryasya śaikṣasyānupanidhyāyato 'saṃtīrayataḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣāt kliṣṭasmṛtiyogāt kleśa utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11693: rāgādikaḥ. nopanidhyāyataḥ. rajjvām iva sarpasaṃjñā kasyacid anupanidhyāyataḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣāj jāyate. nopanidhyāyataḥ. tadvat.
T07yabhkvyu:11694: ātmadṛṣṭyādīnām iti. aṃtagrāhadṛṣṭyādīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ. kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ. na cānupanidhyāyata ātmadṛṣṭyādīnām utpattir yujyate. saṃtīrakatvāt. keṣām.
T07yabhkvyu:11695: ātmadṛṣṭyādīnāṃ kleśānāṃ. ato 'nupanidhyānād āryasyātmadṛṣṭyādīnām utpattir na yujyata iti. parihāṇikāraṇābhāvān nāsti darśanaheyaprahāṇāt
T07yabhkvyu:11697: arhattvād api nāstīti. na kevalaṃ darśanaheyaprahāṇān nāsti parihāṇir arhattvād api nāsti parihāṇir ity apiśabdena darśayati. aprathamābhyāṃ tu sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmiphalābhyāṃ parihāṇiḥ saṃbhavati. laukikena mārgeṇa tatprāptisaṃbhavād ity abhiprāyaḥ. eṣa eva ca nyāya ity ācāryaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:11698: samarthayati. tad dhi bhikṣavaḥ prahīṇam iti. tad eva prahīṇaṃ. yad āryaprajñayā prahīṇaṃ. tad dhi na punar utpadyate. laukikyā tu yat
T07yabhkvyu:11699: prahīṇaṃ. tat punar utpadyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. śaikṣasya cāpramāda iti
T07yabhkvyu:11700: vistareṇa dvitīyaṃ sūtrapadaṃ jñāpakam arhattvān nāsti parihāṇir iti. ayaṃ cāsyārthaḥ śaikṣasyāpramādanimittam apramādakarma pravedayāmy apramādaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:11702: nanu ca śaikṣasyāpy āryayā prajñayā prahāṇam asti. kathaṃ tasyāpramādakaraṇīyaṃ śāstīti. yasmād anadhigatam anena phalāṃtaram
T07yabhkvyu:11703: adhigaṃtavyaṃ. laukikamārgagataṃ ca tasya prahāṇam astīti. atra vaibhāṣiko brūyād arhato 'py aham ānanda lābhasatkāram aṃtarāyakaraṃ vadāmīti sūtre
T07yabhkvyu:11704: vacanād asty arhato 'pi parihāṇir ity ata idam ucyate. arhato 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:11705: vistareṇa yāvad atra sūtre dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāramātrād eva parihāṇir
T07yabhkvyu:11706: ukteti. [Tib. 253a] kathaṃ. yatra bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtam ānandam āmaṃtrayate sma. arhato 'py aham ānanda lābhasatkāram aṃtarāyakaraṃ vadāmīti. āyuṣmān ānanda āha. tat kasmād bhagavān evam āha. arhato 'py aham ānanda lābhasatkāram aṃtarāyakaraṃ vadāmīti. bhagavān āha. na haivānandāprāptasya prāptaye. anadhigatasyādhigamāya. asākṣātkṛtasya sākṣātkriyāyai. api tu ye
T07yabhkvyu:11707: 'nena catvāra (Abhidh-k-vy 589) ādhicaitasikā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārā adhigatāḥ. tato 'ham asyānyatamasmāt parihāṇiṃ vadāmi. tac cākīrṇasya viharataḥ. yā tv anenaikākināvyapakṛṣṭenāpramattenātāpinā prahitātmanā viharatā akopyā cetovimuktiḥ kāyena sākṣātkṛtā. tato 'syāhaṃ na kenacit paryāyeṇa parihāṇiṃ vadāmi. tasmāt tarhy ānandaivaṃ te śikṣitavyaṃ. yal lābbasatkāram abhibhaviṣyāṇo na cātyantair lābhasatkārakaiś cittaṃ paryādāya sthāsyati. evaṃ te ānanda śikṣitavyam iti. yadi vaibhāṣika evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11708: brūyāt. akopyā iti viśeṣaṇāt sāmayikyā asti parihāṇir iti. tata āha.
T07yabhkvyu:11709: sāmayikyā astīti ced iti. vayam apy evaṃ brūmaḥ. sāmayikyā asti parihāṇir
T07yabhkvyu:11710: iti. sā tu vicāryā sā tu sāmayikī vimuktir vicāryā. katham ity āha. kim arhattvaṃ sāmayikī vimuktir asti. [Tib. 253b] āhosvid dhyānāny eva
T07yabhkvyu:11711: laukikāni sāmayikī vimuktir iti. kasmād evam āśaṃkyata ity āha. maulo hi dhyānasamādhir iti. dhyānam eva samādhir dhyānasamādhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11713: kasmiṃścit kāle niḥśabdādike saṃmukhībhāvāt. samaye bhavā samāyikī
T07yabhkvyu:11714: vimuktir ity ucyate. punaḥpunar eṣaṇīyatvāt kāṃteti. parihāṇau parihāṇau kamanīyatvāt prārthanīyatvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11715: āsvādanīyatvād ity apara iti bhadaṃtarāmaḥ. sāsravatvād āsvādanāsaṃprayuktadhyānayogāt kāṃtety abhiprāyaḥ. arhattvavimuktis tv iti
T07yabhkvyu:11716: vistaraḥ. arhattvam eva vimuktir arhattvavimuktiḥ. nityānugatatvāt
T07yabhkvyu:11717: prāptiyogena. na yujyate sāmayikīty anena sāmayikyā vimukter
T07yabhkvyu:11719: anena kāṃtaviparyaye 'rhattvavimuktir na kāṃteti. nityānugatatvenāstitvād aprārthanīyatvān na kāṃtety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11721: dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāḥ. tebhya eva. kim arthaṃ parihāṇim avakṣyad iti. ye te caitasikā drṣṭadharmasukhavihārā adhigatāḥ. tato 'ham asyānyatamasmāt parihāṇiṃ vadāmīti vacanāt. yady arhattvāt sāmayikī vimuktilakṣaṇāt parihāṇisaṃbhavo 'bhaviṣyat. kim arthaṃ tebhya eva parihāṇim avakṣyat. na tebhya eva parihāṇim avakṣyad ity arthaḥ. vaśitvabhraṃśād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11726: akopyadharmā. (Abhidh-k-vy 590) prajñāvimuktaḥ. ubhayatobhāgavimuktaḥ. ima ucyaṃte navaśaikṣā iti. yaḥ parihīyate dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ. sa
T07yabhkvyu:11727: parihāṇadharmā. yo na parihīyate tata eva. so 'parihāṇadharmā. evaṃ [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:11728: 254b] cetanādharmādayo 'pi yojyāḥ. kathaṃ. yaḥ samādhibhraṃśabhayād ātmānaṃ cetayate. sa cetanādharmā. yo 'nurakṣati kathaṃcid guṇaviśeṣaṃ. so
T07yabhkvyu:11729: 'nurakṣaṇādharmā. yo yasminn eva guṇe sthitaḥ. tasmād ananurakṣann api na
T07yabhkvyu:11730: kaṃpyate. sa sthitākaṃpyaḥ. yaḥ pareṇa pratividhyati. guṇaviśeṣam utpādayatīty arthaḥ. sa prativedhanābhavyaḥ. yo na kupyati utpannebhyo na parihīyate. so 'kopyadharmā.
T07yabhkvyu:11731: ko viśeṣa iti. aparihāṇadharmādīnāṃ trayāṇām aparihāṇiyogād viśeṣam apaśyan praśnayati. anuttāpanāgata iti. svabhāvatas tīkṣṇendriyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11732: neṃdriyottāpanāṃ prāpta ity arthaḥ. tasmān na kaṃpyata iti. tasmāt guṇaviśeṣād ity arthaḥ. eṣa viśeṣo lakṣyata iti. ācāryaḥ svamataṃ darśayati. nanu cāyuṣmān gautiko 'rhattvāt parihīṇa ity evaṃ yadi vaibhāṣiko brūyād ity asya pratividhānam ārabhyate. āyuṣmān gautika iti
T07yabhkvyu:11733: vistaraḥ. śaikṣībhūta iti na tāvad arhan. śastram ādhārayann iti. śastraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11734: vāhayan. kāyajīvitanirapekṣatvāt kāraṇān maraṇakāla evārhattvaṃ prāptaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11735: śastrādhārād uttarakāla ity arthaḥ. [Tib. 255a] parinirvṛttaś ca tenaiva
T07yabhkvyu:11737: daśottare ceti. daśottaranāmasūtre. kim uktam ity āha. eko dharma utpādayitavyaḥ. katama ity āha. sāmayikī kāṃtā cetovimuktir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11738: dṛṣṭadhārmasukhavihāra ity abhiprāyaḥ. eko dharmaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ. katama ity āha. akopyā cetovimuktir iti. arhattvam ity abhiprāyaḥ. pṛthagvacanād dhy akopyavimuktilakṣaṇād arhattvād arhattvasvabhāvā na kāṃtā cetovimuktir uktety abhiprāyaḥ. dviprakāratvād arhattvasya pṛthagvacanam iti vaibhāṣikavacanāvakāśaṃ paśyan punar āha. yadi cārhattvam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11739: yady arhattvam eva sāmayikī kāṃtā cetovimuktir abhaviṣyat. kim arthaṃ tatraiva daśake na sūtrāṃtare arhattvasya dvigrahaṇam akariṣyat. eko dharmaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ. akopyā cetovimuktir iti. naivākariṣyad ity arthaḥ. evaṃ hy avakṣyat. eko dharmaḥ sākṣātkartavyaś cetovimuktir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11740: brūyās tv arhattvaṃ dviprakāram. ato vacanavibhāgenocyate. ekam utpādayitavyaṃ dvitīyaṃ sākṣātkartavyam iti. atra brūmaḥ. na ca kvacid
T07yabhkvyu:11741: arhattvam utpādayitavyam uktaṃ. [Tib. 255b] kiṃ tarhi. sākṣātkartavyam
T07yabhkvyu:11742: iti. tatratatra sūtre. abhyupetyāpi brūmaḥ. mṛdvindriyasaṃgṛhītaṃ cotpādayitavyam iti. kim anena jñāpanena jñāpitaṃ kathitaṃ bhavati. yadi tāvad utpādayituṃ śakyam ity etaj jñāpitaṃ bhavati. (Abhidh-k-vy 591) śaki liṅ ceti kṛtyapratyayalakṣaṇāt. anyad api śakyaṃ yat tīkṣṇendriyasaṃgṛhītam arhattvaṃ. tathā ca saty evaṃ sūtre vaktavyaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11743: eko dharma utpādayitavyaḥ. cetovimuktir iti. athotpādanam arhatīty etaj
T07yabhkvyu:11744: jñāpitaṃ bhavati. arhe kṛtyatṛcaś ceti lakṣaṇaparigrahāt. anyat sutarām arhati yat tīkṣṇendriyasaṃgṛhītam arhattvaṃ. tad dhy akopyatvāt
T07yabhkvyu:11745: suṣṭhūtpādayitum arhatīty abhiprāyaḥ. kathaṃ tarhīti vistaraḥ. yadi sāmayikī vimuktir arhattvaṃ bhavati. evaṃ tadyogāt samaya vimukto 'rhann
T07yabhkvyu:11746: iti yujyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. samayāpekṣaḥ samādhisaṃmukhībhāva iti. yasmād asya samādhiḥ sāsravo 'nāsravo 'pi vā samayam ārogyadeśaviśeṣādilakṣaṇam
T07yabhkvyu:11747: apekṣate. abhidharme 'pi coktam iti vistaraḥ. kāmarāgānuśayo 'prahīṇo
T07yabhkvyu:11748: bhavatīty etad udāharaṇam. idaṃ cāpy udāharaṇaṃ. tatra cāyoniśomanaskāra iti. paripūrṇotpattir evam iti cet. syān matā paripūrṇakāraṇasya
T07yabhkvyu:11749: kleśasyaivam utpattiḥ. aparipūrṇakāraṇasya tu kleśasya viṣayabalād eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:11750: [Tib. 256a] tad ayuktaṃ. kasmād ity āha. kasya vāparipūrṇakāraṇasyotpattir iti. kasyotpattiḥ. yataḥ aparipūrṇakāraṇasyotpattir asti. yāvatī hi hetupratyayasāmagrī kāryasyotpattaye prasiddhā. sā tadekadeśavikalā satī
T07yabhkvyu:11751: tasyotpattaye na bhavati. tadyathā cakṣū rūpālokamanaskārasāmagrī
T07yabhkvyu:11752: cakṣurvijñānasyotpattaye prasiddhā. sa tadanyetaravikalā satī tadutpattaye na bhavatīti. tasmān na kiṃcid etat.
T07yabhkvyu:11753: tadrūpa iti tatprakāraḥ. tatsvabhāva iti vā. atha notpanna iti pratipakṣaḥ tadbījadharmatāyām iti. kleśabījasvabhāva ity arthaḥ. tasyām anapoddhṛtāyām anunmūlitāyāṃ kathaṃ kṣīṇāsravo bhavatīti. brūyās tvaṃ na
T07yabhkvyu:11754: bhavatīti. ata āha. akṣīṇāsravo vā katham arhan bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:11755: evaṃcarata iti. smṛtimataś carata ity arthaḥ anaṃtaraṃ smṛtivacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11756: śaikṣas sa ity asya vacanasya parihārārthaṃ sa eva parihāṇivādy āha. sa hi tatrārhann eva jñāpita iti. kathaṃ kṛtvā jñāpita ity āha. dīrgharātram iti vistaraḥ. aparihāṇivādinaḥ syād evaṃ vacanāvakāśaḥ. śaikṣasyedaṃ vivekanimnacittam ucyate yāvan nirvāṇaprāgbhāram iti. asya parihārārthaṃ parihāṇivādī punar āha. arhato hy etad balam anyatroktam iti sūtre.
T07yabhkvyu:11757: kathaṃ. kati bhadaṃtārhato bhikṣoḥ kṣīṇāsravasya balāni. [Tib. 256b] aṣṭau śāriputrārhato bhikṣor dīrgharātraṃ vivekanimnaṃ cittaṃ yāvan
T07yabhkvyu:11758: nirvāṇaprāgbhāraṃ. aṃgārakarṣūpamāś cānena kāmā dṛṣṭā bhavaṃti. yathāsya kāmān jānataḥ kāmān paśyato yaḥ kāmeṣu kāmacchandaḥ kāmasnehaḥ vistareṇa yāvat kāmādhyavasānaṃ. tatrāsya cittaṃ na paryādāya tiṣṭhatīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11759: kiṃ ca śītībhūtaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 592) vāṃtībhūtam iti cābhidhānāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11761: asty etad evam iti. aṃgārakarṣūpame yad uktam arhann eva jñāpita iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11762: yāvat tu cāro na supratividdha iti. piṇḍapātādicāraḥ. śaikṣāvasthām adhikṛtyaivaṃvacanād adoṣa iti. yad etad uktaṃ. kadācit smṛtisaṃpramoṣād utpadyaṃte pāpakā akuśalā vitarkā iti. tac chaikṣām adhikṛtyoktaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11763: nārhattvāvasthāṃ. yat tūktaṃ dīrgharātraṃ vivekanimnaṃ iti. tac chaikṣasyāpi saṃbhavati. arhatas tu prakarṣeṇa bhavatīti viśeṣāḥ. yac cāpy uktaṃ sāsravasthānīyair dharmaiḥ śītībhūtaṃ vāṃtībhūtam iti. tad api śaikṣāvasthām adhikṛtya saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11765: arhattvāvasthāṃ cādhikṛtya tathābhidhānād adoṣa iti ācāryasyābhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11767: darśanamārgaḥ. tatrendriyasaṃcāre prayogāvakāśo nāsti. kaścit pṛthagjanāvasthāyām indriyāṇi saṃcaratīti. [kim anityādyākārapatitena mārgeṇendriyāṇi saṃcarati.] kim audārikādyākāreṇa mārgeṇendriyāṇi
T07yabhkvyu:11768: saṃcarati. utāho śāṃtādyākāreṇeti. aviśeṣitatvād ubhayathāpi saṃbhavatīti
T07yabhkvyu:11769: paśyāmaḥ. tathā hy enam artham ācāryaḥ sūcayiṣyati. na hi sāsraveṇa
T07yabhkvyu:11770: mārgeṇāryāṇām indriyasaṃcāra ity āryāṇām iti viśeṣaṇāt. api nāma mamendriyāṇi tīkṣṇāni syur iti prayogam abhisaṃdhāya. mārgaṃ laukikaṃ lokottaraṃ cānyasyānaṃtaryavimuktimārgakrameṇendriyāṇi saṃcaratīti
T07yabhkvyu:11772: śaikṣapṛthagjanādhikārāt. aśaikṣo 'pi tv iṃdriyāṇi saṃcaratīti boddhavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11774: tīkṣnendriyatvād asya dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇir na saṃbhavet.
T07yabhkvyu:11775: kim utākopyāyā vimukter ity asaṃbhāvayan pṛcchati.
T07yabhkvyu:11777: dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārān nopabhuṃkte. na saṃmukhīkarotīty arthaḥ. sā cāprāptaparihāṇiś ceti. akopyadharmaṇaḥ sā copabhogaparihāṇiḥ kutaścid
T07yabhkvyu:11778: vyāsaṃgāt. aprāptiparihāṇiś ca pudgalaviśeṣadharmaprāpaṇāt. yasmād akopyadharmāpi kaścin mahāśrāvakāṇām āryaśāriputramaudgalyāyanādīnāṃ prāṃtakoṭikādīn dharmān. svayaṃbhuvāṃ ca kāṃścid dharmān na prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:11779: mahāśrāvakā api svayaṃbhuvāṃ kāṃścid viśeṣadharmān na prāpnuvaṃtītyādi.
T07yabhkvyu:11780: anyasyārhata iti parihāṇadharmāder mṛdvindriyasya prāptaparihāṇir apy
T07yabhkvyu:11781: asti. apiśabdāt pūrvokta api (Abhidh-k-vy 593) parihāṇī sta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11782: akopyadharmaṇa upabhogaparihāṇivacanāt sūtravirodha iti. yad etad uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11783: ye 'nena catvāra iti vistareṇa. yāvat tato 'ham asyānyatamasmāt parihāṇiṃ vadāmīti. tasya sutrasyāvirodhaḥ. ṣaṇṇām apy arhatām akopyā vimuktir ity
T07yabhkvyu:11784: ukte vaibhāṣiko brūyāt. yadi sarvasyaivārhato 'nāsravā vimuktir akopyā.
T07yabhkvyu:11785: kasmād asamayavimukta evākopyadharmā vyavasthāpito nānya iti. ata idam ucyate. sarvasyānāsravā vimuktir [Tib. 258a] akopyeti. satyam asty etat.
T07yabhkvyu:11787: dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyas tu kaścil lābhasatkāravyākṣepadoṣāt parihīyate vaśitvabhraṃśāt. yo mṛdvindriyaḥ. kaścin na parihīyate. yas tīkṣṇendriyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11788: sa evākopyadharmā vyavasthāpitaḥ. yata eva ca dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyo lābhasatkāravyākṣepadoṣāt parihīyate. mṛdvindriyo na tīkṣṇendriyaḥ. ata etad acodyaṃ. katham. akopyadharmaṇo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt parihāṇir ity
T07yabhkvyu:11789: aparihāṇivādī. atha vā ayam anyaḥ saṃbaṃdhaḥ. pūrvam akopyadharmaṇo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇir nāstīty uktaṃ. sūtre ca. yasyākopyā
T07yabhkvyu:11790: vimuktiḥ. tasya dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt parihāṇir uktā. aviśeṣyābhidhānād ata idam ucyate. sarvasyānāsravā vimuktir akopyeti. na tayaivākopyadharmā vyavasthāpyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. ata evocyate akopyadharmavyavasthānaṃ tu yathā tathoktam iti. ata etad acodyam iti. yad uktaṃ sūtram āśritya katham akopyadharmaṇo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇi iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11791: (VI.62) dhandhā iti mandāḥ. anyathā hy [Tib. 258b] anāśvāsikam iti. yady arhattvāt parihīṇaḥ punar jāyeta sucīrṇabrahmacarye 'smin mārge cāpi subhāvite tuṣṭa āyuḥkṣayād bhavati rogasyāpagame yathety āśvāsaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11792: evaṃvidho na syād iti. tad akāryam abrahmacaryādilakṣaṇaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11793: śūrapraskhalanāpatanavad iti. yathā śūrasya praskhalane apatanaṃ bhavati śaktita ātmadhāraṇāt. tadvad āryaḥ phalāt parihīṇo 'pi tatphalam alabdhvā na mriyate. śūragrahaṇam avihvalatvāt. balavāṃ chūra ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:11794: (VI.63, 64) katham abhyastam ity āha. śaikṣāśaikṣamārgābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvād iti prayogamārgas tu sarvatraika eveti. akopyaprativedhe dṛṣṭiprāptatāyāṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:11795: na hi sāsraveṇeti. āryendriyasaṃcārasya vivakṣitatvāt. anyathā hi kaścit
T07yabhkvyu:11797: nānyatra parihāṇyasaṃbhavād iti. parihāṇibhayād dhīndriyasaṃcāra iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11798: anyatra ṣaṭsu kāmāvacareṣu devanikāyeṣu rūpārūpyadhātvoś ca parihāṇir nāstīty āha. ūrdhavdhātūpapanna āryo naivendriyāṇi saṃcarati. nāpi kathaṃcit (Abhidh-k-vy 594) parihīyate [Tib. 259a] iti. uktam atra kāraṇaṃ. kālāntaraparivāsenendriyāṇāṃ paripakvataratvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11799: āśrayaviśeṣalābhāc ceti. atha kasmāt kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu parihāṇir nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:11800: ye pūrvam abhyudārebhyo 'pi viṣayebhyaḥ saṃvijaṃto niyataṃ satyāni
T07yabhkvyu:11801: paśyaṃti. te kathaṃ tān evālaṃbya parihāsyaṃte. avaśyaṃ hi te tīkṣṇendriyā bhavantīty abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11807: iti. paṃcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāmīti sūtre vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11808: darśanamārgasya ca tatrābhāvāt. tadabhāvaḥ kāmadhātvanālaṃbanād iti
T07yabhkvyu:11810: (VI.65ab) akopyadharmā ca dvividha iti. sūtre paṭhitatvāt akopyabheda eva dvau buddhāv
T07yabhkvyu:11811: iti. akopyadharmā mṛdumadhyādhimātrendriyabhedāt tridhā bhidyate. śrāvako hy akopyadharmādhimātramṛdvindriyaḥ. [Tib. 259b] pratyekabuddho
T07yabhkvyu:11813: mṛdumṛdvādinavaprakārendriyabhedād iti. parihāṇidharmā mṛdumṛdvindriyo yāvad bhagavān adhimātrādhimātrendriya
T07yabhkvyu:11814: (VI.65cd, 66ab) sapta bhavaṃtīti. pratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhāv ubhayatobhāgavimuktasaṃgṛhītāv eveti kṛtvā. pūrvam eveti vistaraḥ. pūrvam eva pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ parapratyayena parataḥ śrutvā smṛtyupasthānādīn
T07yabhkvyu:11815: dharmān. paścād artheṣu prayogāt. cintābhāvanāsevanād ity arthaḥ. tathā pūrvam eva pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ prajñayā dvādaśāṃgapravacanadharmānusāreṇa
T07yabhkvyu:11816: svayam evaṃ bodhipakṣādīn dharmān anusarann artheṣu prayogāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11817: cintābhāvanāsevanāt. ity evaṃ prayogataḥ śraddhādharmānusāriṇau bhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11818: śraddhādhimokṣaprajñādhikyata iti. śraddhādhimokṣādhikyataḥ prajñādhikyataś ca. śraddhayādhimokṣaḥ śraddhādhimokṣaḥ. tasyādhikyān
T07yabhkvyu:11820: kleśavimuktitaḥ prajñayā kleśād vimuktaḥ prajñāvimukta iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:11822: tatrendriyata [Tib. 260a] iti vistaraḥ. yathaite śraddhānusāriṇo gaṇyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:11825: avagantavyaṃ. yady api śraddhānusāriṇaḥ sarva eva mṛdvindriyāḥ. tathāpi tāratamyenāvasthānād eṣāṃ punas tridhābhedaḥ mṛdumadhyādhimātrendriyā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11826: gotrataḥ paṃca. kathaṃ. parihāṇadharmagotrako yāvat prativedhanābhavyagotraka iti paṃca bhavaṃti. punar eṣāṃ gotrendriyabhedāt
T07yabhkvyu:11827: paṃcadaśānām ekaiko mārgataḥ paṃcadaśa bhavaṃti. katham ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11828: aṣṭakṣāntisaptajñānasthā iti. darśanamārgo hi paṃcadaśakṣaṇāḥ. aṣṭau
T07yabhkvyu:11829: kṣāntayaḥ. duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāṃtir yāvan mārge anvayajñānakṣāntiḥ. sapta
T07yabhkvyu:11830: jñānāni. duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ yāvan mārge dharmajñānaṃ. mārge
T07yabhkvyu:11831: 'nvayajñānasya bhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhītatvāt. aṣṭau ca sapta ca paṃcadaśa bhavanti. ta evaṃ tatrasthāḥ paṃcadaśa bhavaṃti. evam eṣāṃ mārgataḥ
T07yabhkvyu:11832: paṃcadaśadhābhinnānāṃ punar ekaiko vairāgyatas trisaptatiḥ. kathaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11833: sakalabandhanas tāvat kāmadhātāv ekaḥ. kāmavairāgyān nava.
T07yabhkvyu:11834: ekaprakāravītarāgo yāvan navaprakāravītarāgaḥ. evaṃ yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanavairāgyān naveti. bhavāgravairāgyān naveti na saṃbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11835: laukikasya mārgasya bhavāgrapratipakṣasyābhāvāt. ta ete 'ṣṭau navakā
T07yabhkvyu:11837: bhavaṃti. punar ete vairāgyataḥ pratyekaṃ trisaptatibhinnāḥ. pratyekam āśrayato nava. katham ity āha. tridvīpaṣaḍdevanikāyajā iti. trayo dvīpā uttarakuruvarjyāḥ. uttarakurau mārgābhāvāt. ṣaḍ devanikāyāḥ kāmāvacarāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11838: tata ūrdhvaṃ darśanamārgābhāvāt. teṣu jātā iti. pratyekam ete navaguṇā
T07yabhkvyu:11839: bhavaṃti. indriyagotramārgavairāgyāśrayataḥ piṇḍitā iti. nigamana ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11840: iyanta iti vṛttau likhitāḥ. evam anye 'pi pudgalāḥ saṃbhavataḥ saṃkhyeyā
T07yabhkvyu:11841: iti. dharmānusāriprabhṛtayaḥ. yathendriyagotramārgavairāgyāśrayataḥ śraddhānusāriṇaḥ saṃkhyātāḥ. tathaiva saṃkhyeyāḥ saṃbhavata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11843: śraddhādhimuktasamayavimuktayos tu gotrabhedo 'py astīti. saṃbhavata ity ucyate. tatrendriyatas trayo dharmānusāriṇaḥ. gotrata eka eveti bhedo
T07yabhkvyu:11845: trisaptatiḥ. sakalabandhanaḥ. kāmavairāgyān nava. evaṃ yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanavairāgyāt. [Tib. 261a] āśrayato nava.
T07yabhkvyu:11847: sahasrāṇy ekānnatriṃśat saṃpadyaṃte. śatāni ca paṃca paṃcaṣaṣṭiś ca. evam indriyatas trayaḥ śraddhādhimuktāḥ. gotrataḥ paṃca pratyekaṃ. vairāgyatas trisaptatiḥ pratyekameva pūrvavat. āśrayato nava. tridvīpaṣaḍdevanikāyajā
T07yabhkvyu:11848: iti. evam indriyagotravairāgyāśrayataḥ piṇḍitāḥ. nava sahasrāṇi saṃpadyante. (Abhidh-k-vy 596) śatāni cāṣṭau paṃca paṃcāśac ca.
T07yabhkvyu:11850: śraddhādhimuktadṛṣṭyāptau mṛdutīkṣṇendriyau tadety anayo iha vivakṣitatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11851: bhagavadviśeṣas tv āha. mārgato nava bhavaṃti. bhāvanāmārgasthatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11852: tan na budhyāmahe kenābhiprāyeṇaivam uktam iti. yady ayam abhiprāyo
T07yabhkvyu:11853: bhavet. mārgato bhūmaubhūmau nava bhavantīti. vairāgyatas trisaptatir iti
T07yabhkvyu:11854: sa evārtho darśito bhavet. tatavyatirekād iti. yuktaṃ syāt. tad eva hi
T07yabhkvyu:11855: parimāṇaṃ syāt. atha navabhūmikānāsravabhāvanāmārgasthatvān navatvam eṣāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11856: vyavasthāpyeta. tathā sati. tatparimāṇaṃ punar navaguṇīkriyeta. etāvantaś ca bhaveyur aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi. śatāni ca ṣaṭ. paṃcanavatiś cety evam
T07yabhkvyu:11857: uttaratrāpi vaktavyaṃ. yadi tu śraddhādhimukta ā vajropamāt samādher
T07yabhkvyu:11858: gṛhyeta. tato 'nyathā gaṇayitavyaṃ. indriyatas trayaḥ śraddhādhimuktāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11859: [Tib. 261b] gotrataḥ paṃca pratyekaṃ. vairāgyata ekāśītiḥ trisaptattau
T07yabhkvyu:11861: ekānnatriṃśat. kathaṃ kāmadhātau navopapattisthānāni. rūpadhātau ṣoḍaśa sthānāni. catvāraś cārūpyā iti. evam indriyagotravairāgyāśrayataḥ piṇḍitāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:11862: sahasrāṇi paṃcatriṃśat. śate ca dve. paṃcatriṃśac ceti. dṛṣṭiprāptasya gotrabhedo nāsti. indriyavairāgyāśrayataḥ piṇḍitāḥ sahasraṃ saṃpadyante.
T07yabhkvyu:11863: śatāni ca nava. ekā saptatiś ca. yadi tv ā vajropamāt samādher dṛṣṭiprāpto
T07yabhkvyu:11864: gṛhyate. tata evaṃ saṃkhyātavyāḥ. indriyavairāgyāśrayataḥ piṇḍitāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11865: saptacatvāriṃśad adhikāni sapta sahasrāṇi saṃpadyante. kāyasākṣī śraddhādhimuktadṛṣṭiprāptayor antarbhūta iti na gaṇyate. yadi punar gaṇyate indriyatas trayaḥ. yadi śraddhādhimuktaḥ sa kāyasākṣī gotrataḥ paṃca. yadi dṛṣṭiprāpto nāsti gotrabhedaḥ. mārgata ubhayor api nāsti
T07yabhkvyu:11866: bhedaḥ. ākiṃcanyāyatanavītarāgatvāt vairāgyato 'pi nāsti bhedaḥ. yady api bhavāgre sakalabandanaḥ ekaprakāravītarāgo yāvad aṣṭaprakāravītarāga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11867: mārgato vairāgyato vāsti bhedaḥ. na tu mārgavairāgyakṛtaṃ kāyasākṣitvam
T07yabhkvyu:11868: iti. nāsya tatkṛtas tadbhedo vyavasthāpyate. [Tib. 262a] āśrayato vā bahudhābhedaḥ. kāmāvacarāśrayatvāt yāvad bhavāgrāśrayatvād iti
T07yabhkvyu:11869: bhagavadviśeṣaḥ. katham ākāśānaṃtyāyatanādyāśrayaḥ kāyasākṣī bhavati. evaṃ tu yuktaṃ paśyāmaḥ. āśrayataḥ paṃcaviṃśatiḥ. kāmadhātau
T07yabhkvyu:11870: navopapattisthānāni. rūpadhātau ca ṣoḍaśa sthānāniti. tatra hy āryo
T07yabhkvyu:11871: nirodhasamāpattim utpādayet. yadi tu kāmarūpāśrayotpāditanirodhasamāpattiyogāt kāyasākṣībhūtasyānāgāminaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11873: kāyasākṣitvam iṣyeta. bhavāgraṃ ṣaḍviṃśatitama āśrayaḥ syād ity avagantavyaṃ. evam indriyagotrāśrayataḥ parigaṇya gaṇayitavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11874: prajñāvimuktasyāpi bhedaḥ. indriyatas trayaḥ prajñāvimuktaḥ. gotrataḥ
T07yabhkvyu:11875: paṃca. yadi samayavimuktāḥ. athāsamayavimuktā nāsti bhedaḥ. evam ubhayatobhāgavimukto 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:11877: prajñābalena kleśāvaraṇavimuktatvāt. samādhibalena ca vimokṣāvaraṇavimuktatvāt. vimokṣāḥ punar aṣṭau vakṣyante rūpī rūpāṇi
T07yabhkvyu:11878: paśyatīti vistaraḥ. tatra kleśāvaraṇam [Tib. 262b] iti. kleśā evāvaraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11879: vimokṣāvaraṇaṃ iti. vimokṣāṇām āvaraṇaṃ. tat punaḥ kāyacittayor
T07yabhkvyu:11880: akarmaṇyatā. yayā vimokṣān utpādayituṃ na śaknotīti.
T07yabhkvyu:11881: (VI.67) kleśān prahāyeha hi yas tu paṃceti. paṃcāvarabhāgīyāni saṃyojanāni satkāyadṛṣṭyādīny uktāni. ahāryadharmety aparihāṇidharmety arthaḥ. phalata eveti vistaraḥ. śraddhādhimuktatvān nendriyataḥ paripūrṇatvam.
T07yabhkvyu:11882: akāyasākṣitvān na samāpattitaḥ. anāgāmitvāt tu phalataḥ paripūrṇatvam
T07yabhkvyu:11883: asti. indriyata eveti. dṛṣṭiprāptatvād indriyataḥ paripūrṇatvam.
T07yabhkvyu:11884: avītarāgatvāt tu na phalato nāpi samāpattitaḥ. anāgāmiphalasamāpattyor abhāvāt evam anyeṣām api saṃbhavato yojyaṃ. samāpattita eveti. samāpattita eva paripūrṇatvaṃ nendriyaphalābhyām iti nāsty etat. kasmāt. na hy asatyām
T07yabhkvyu:11885: anāgāmiphalaprāptau nirodhasamāpattir asti. samāpattīndriyataś ca vinā
T07yabhkvyu:11886: phaleneti. samāpattīndriyata eva ca paripūrṇatvaṃ na phalata ity etad api
T07yabhkvyu:11887: nāsti. yasmād anāgāmiphalam aprāptasya nirodhasamāpattir nāstīti.
T07yabhkvyu:11888: indriyataḥ samāpattitaś ceti. [Tib. 263a] tīkṣṇendriyatayā nirodhasamāpattilābhatayā cety arthaḥ. indriyata eveti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11891: anirodhasamāpattilābhī hi prajñāvimukta ity uktaṃ. samāpattita eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:11892: samayavimuktasyeti vacanāt. nendriyataḥ paripūrṇatvam asya bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11895: indriyasamāpattibhyāṃ. kiṃ. paripūrṇatvaṃ. asamayavimuktatvād indriyataḥ ubhayatobhāgavimuktatvāt samāpattita iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:11897: asti sa ānantaryamārgo yenāvaraṇaṃ na prajahāti. indriyasaṃcārādiṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:11898: (Abhidh-k-vy 598) yas tatpraheyāvaraṇanirmuktaḥ prathamata iti. ya ānantaryamārgapraheyeṇāvaraṇena nirmuktaḥ. prathamata iti viśeṣaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11899: yasmāt tṛtīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣu tajjātīyo [Tib. 263b] mārgo viśeṣamārga itīṣyate. tena eva cāha. viśeṣamārgo ya ebhyo 'nyo mārga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11900: prayogamārgādibhyo 'nya ity arthaḥ. kiṃ ca yadi prathamata iti na brūyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11901: vimuktimārgo yas tatpraheyāvaraṇanirmukta ity etāvad brūyāt. evaṃ sati duḥkhadharmajñānāt pareṇa sarve ānantaryamārgādayas tatpraheyāvaraṇanirmuktā utpadyanta iti. sarve vimuktimārgāḥ syuḥ. aniṣṭaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11902: caitat. ānantaryamārgādiṣv api vimuktimārgaprasaṃgāt. tasmād ānantaryamārgasya duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntyāder yatpraheyam āvaraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11903: duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo nikāyo yāvad bhāvanāprahātavyaḥ. tena praheyāvaraṇena nirmukto yaḥ prathamata utpadyate. sa vimuktimārgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11904: nānyas tat praheyāvaraṇanirmuktatve 'pīti. ya ebhyaḥ prayogamārgādibhyas
T07yabhkvyu:11905: tribhyo 'nyaḥ. sa viśeṣamārgaḥ. ṣoḍaśān mārgānvayajñānakṣaṇāt pareṇa
T07yabhkvyu:11906: saptadaśādayas tajjātīyā ye 'nāsravāḥ kṣaṇāḥ. te viśeṣamārgasvabhāvā ity
T07yabhkvyu:11907: avagantavyaṃ. evam anyad api vimuktijñānaṃ. yat prākarṣikaṃ kṣayajñānādi.
T07yabhkvyu:11908: tad api vaktavyaṃ. yaś ca dṛṣṭadharmasakhavihārāya
T07yabhkvyu:11909: vaiśeṣikaguṇābhinirhārāya vā mārgaḥ. so 'pi viśeṣamārga [Tib. 264a] eva prayogamārgo yasmād ānantaryamārgotpattir ity uktaṃ. ato laukikā agradharmāḥ prayogamārga iti gamyate. yas tu pratilomataḥ kṣāntyādimārgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11910: sa kasminn antarbhavatīti vaktavyam. āha. prayogamārga evāntarbhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:11911: viprakṛṣṭas tv asau prayogamārga ity ayaṃ tasyāgradharmebhyo viśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11912: udāharaṇārthatvāc cācāryeṇa saṃnikṛṣṭa eva prayogamārga ukta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11913: eṣa hi nirvāṇasya panthāḥ. tena tadgamanād iti. loke yena gamyate. sa mārga iti pratītaḥ. anena ca nirvāṇaṃ gamyate prāpyate. tasmān mārga iti
T07yabhkvyu:11914: darśayati. mārgayaṃty anena veti. mārgo 'nveṣaṇa iti dhātuḥ paṭhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:11915: tasyaitad ghañi rūpaṃ mārga iti. yena nirvāṇam anviṣyate. sa mārga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11916: vimuktiviśeṣamārgayoḥ kathaṃ mārgatvam iti. na hi tābhyāṃ nirvāṇaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11917: prāpyate. prayogānantaryamārgayor eva tatprāptau sāmarthyān na tayor iti
T07yabhkvyu:11919: cālaṃbanākārānāsravatvasādṛsyāt. adhimātratarau ca hetūpacayataḥ. yathā hy ānantaryamārgaś catuḥsatyālaṃbanaṣoḍaśākāro 'nāsravaś ca. evaṃ vimuktiviśeṣamārgāv api. adhimātrataratvenaiva tu tasmād viśeṣa iti. [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:11920: 264b] uttarottaraprāpaṇāt. nirupadhiśeṣapraveśād veti. yasmād vimuktimārgeṇa viśeṣamārgeṇa ca uttarottaro (Abhidh-k-vy 599) mārgaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:11921: prāpyate. tasmāt anayor mārgatvam ity arthaḥ. yasmād vā tābhyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11922: nirupadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇaṃ praviśati. yadutpattau nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇapraveśa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11923: apare punar evaṃ vyācakṣate. uttarottaraprāpaṇān nirupadhiśeṣapraveśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11925: (VI.69) nirvāṇapratipādanād iti. yasmād anena nirvāṇaṃ pratipadyata ity arthaḥ. evaṃ sukhāpi dvividheti. asti pratipat sukhā dhandhābhijñā. asti sukhā kṣiprābhijñeti. aṃgaparigrahaṇaśamathavipaśyanāsamatābhyām ayatnavāhitvād ity aṃgaiḥ parigrahaḥ. śamathavipaśyanayoḥ samatvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11926: aṃgaparigrahaś ca śamathavipaśyanāsamatvaṃ ca. tābhyām ayatnavāhitvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11927: tasmāt sukhā pratipat. yasmād aṃgaparigṛhītāni dhyānāni
T07yabhkvyu:11928: śamathavipaśyanābhyāṃ samāni ca. tasmād ayatnavāhīni. ataś ca sukhāsau
T07yabhkvyu:11929: pratipad iti. aṃgāparigrahād iti vistaraḥ. aṃgāparigrahād anāgamyadhyānāṃtarārūpyā yatnavāhinaḥ. śamathavipaśyanānyūnatvāc ca saṃbhavatas te [Tib. 265a] yatnavāhinaḥ. śamathanyūnatvād anāgamyadhyānāṃtare yathavāhinī. vipaśyanānyūnatvāc cārūpyā yatnavāhinaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11930: tadbhāvāt. te 'nāgamyādayo duḥkhā pratipad iti. dhandhābhijñeti.
T07yabhkvyu:11931: dhandhābhijñāsyām iti. dhandhābhijñā mandaprajñety arthaḥ. kṣiprābhijñeti
T07yabhkvyu:11932: tīkṣṇaprajñā. dhandhasya mandasya pudgalasyeyam abhijñā dhandhābhijñeti.
T07yabhkvyu:11933: ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣeṇāpy etat sidhyatīti darśayati. evaṃ kṣiprasya tīkṣṇasya
T07yabhkvyu:11936: yathoktāni. catvāri samyakprahāṇāni. utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11937: dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati. vyāyacchate. vīryam ārabhate. cittaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11938: pragṛhṇāti. pradadhāti. anutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāya chandaṃ janayatīti pūrvavat. anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām
T07yabhkvyu:11939: utpādāya chandaṃ janayatīti pūrvavat. utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11940: sthitaye asaṃmoṣāya bhāvanāparipūraye bhūyobhāvāya vṛddhivipulatājñānasākṣātkriyāyai chandaṃ janayatīti pūrvavat. catvāra
T07yabhkvyu:11941: ṛddhipādāḥ. chandasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgata ṛddhipādaḥ. evaṃ vīryacittamīmāṃsāsamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgata ṛddhipādaḥ. ṛddhipādā ṛddhihetava ity arthaḥ. [Tib. 265b] paṃcendriyāṇi.
T07yabhkvyu:11944: smṛtidharmapravicayavīryaprītipraśrabdhisamādhyupekṣābodhyaṃgāni. smṛtir eva saṃbodhyaṃgaṃ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṃgam. evaṃ yāvad upekṣaiva saṃbodhyaṃgaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11947: samyagvyāyāmaḥ. samyaksmṛtiḥ. samyaksamādhir iti. aśeṣavidyāprahanād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11948: yasmād aśeṣatraidhātukyavidyāprahāṇaṃ. tasmād ubhayaṃ bodhiḥ. anena śaikṣapṛthagjanānāṃ prajñā na bodhir vyavasthāpyata iti darśayati. kiṃ ca yathākramaṃ. tābhyāṃ svārthasya yathābhūtaṃ kṛtāpunaḥkartavyatāvabodhāc
T07yabhkvyu:11949: ca. kṣayajñānena yathābhūtaṃ kṛtāvabodhāt tat kṣayajñānaṃ bodhiḥ. duḥkhaṃ me parijñātam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. samudayo me prahīṇa iti. nirodho me sākṣātkṛta iti. mārgo me bhāvita iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:11950: anutpādajñānena yathābhūtam apunaḥkartavyam iti. [mārgo me bhāvito na
T07yabhkvyu:11951: punar bhāvayitavya] tad anutpādajñānam api bodhiḥ. duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:11952: na punaḥ parijñātavyam. [Tib. 266a] iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. samudayo me prahīṇo na punaḥ prahātavya iti. nirodho me sākṣātkṛto na punaḥ sākṣātkartavya iti. mārgo me bhāvito na punar bhāvayitavya iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti. duḥkhaṃ me parijñātam ity anena kṣayajñānaṃ. na punaḥ parijñātavyam ity anenānutpādajñānam. ity ubhayam api tīkṣṇendriyasya pudgalasya darśayatīti sarvaṃ neyaṃ. tad evaṃ kṣayajñānam anutpādajñānaṃ ca bodhir ity avayavārthaṃ prasādhya samudayārthaṃ prasādhayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:11954: iti. tasyā bodher anulomas tadanulomaḥ. tadbhāvas tādanulomyaṃ. tasmāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11955: tādanulomyato bodhipakṣā. bodhipakṣe sādhavo 'nulomā iti bodhipakṣāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11957: (VI.71) daśa dravyāṇīti. keṣāṃcin matena. vakṣyati hi vaibhāṣikāṇām
T07yabhkvyu:11960: iti. prajñā smṛtyupasthānam ity arthaḥ. smṛtir upatiṣṭhate 'nayeti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:11961: tathā hi sūtra uktaṃ. kāye [Tib. 266b] kāyanupaśyī vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11963: iti. yasmād uktam utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati. vyāyacchate. vīryam ārabhata iti sarvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11966: (Abhidh-k-vy 601) bhāvayatīti sarvaṃ prahāṇasaṃskārāḥ punar atrāṣṭau sūtre
T07yabhkvyu:11967: paṭhyante. kathaṃ. tathābhūtasya yaś chandaḥ. yo vyāyāmaḥ. yā śraddhā. yā
T07yabhkvyu:11968: praśrabdhiḥ. yā smṛtiḥ. yat saṃprajanyaṃ. yā cetanā. yopekṣā. ima ucyante prahāṇasaṃskārā iti. indriyāṇi tāvad iti vistaraḥ. svanāmagrahaṇena yānīndriyabalasvabhāvāni śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñā dravyāṇi paṃca.
T07yabhkvyu:11969: teṣāṃ prajñaiva sā yāni catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni. yac ca bodhyaṃgeṣu
T07yabhkvyu:11970: dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṃgaṃ. yā ca mārgāṃgeṣu samyagdṛṣṭiḥ. na
