T07yabhkvyu:11971: dravyāntaraṃ. vīryam eva tad yāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni. yac ca bodhyaṃgeṣu vīryasaṃbodhyaṃgaṃ. yaś ca mārgāṃgeṣu samyagvyāyāmaḥ. samādhir eva ca sa ye catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ. yac ca bodhyaṃgeṣu samādhisaṃbodhyaṃgaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11972: [Tib. 267a] yac ca mārgāṃgeṣu samyaksamādhiḥ. kim avaśiṣyate yan na
T07yabhkvyu:11973: prajñendriyādisvabhāvaṃ. bodhyaṃgeṣu prītipraśrabdhyupekṣāsaṃbodhyaṃgāny avaśiṣyante. mārgāṃgeṣu samyaksaṃkalpāḥ. śīlāṃgāni ca trīṇi. samyagvāk samyakkarmāntaḥ samyagājīva iti. daśa dravyāṇīti. śraddhādīni paṃca.
T07yabhkvyu:11974: prītisaṃbodyaṃgādīni ca paṃceti. śīlāṃgāni trīṇy avijñaptisvabhāvānīti
T07yabhkvyu:11976: vaibhāṣikāṇām ekādaśa dravyāṇi. kāyavākkarmaṇor asaṃbhinnatvāt dve dravyaṃ iti kṛtvā. abhiprāyavaśāt pakṣadvaye 'py adoṣaḥ. yadi tu mukhyavṛttyā
T07yabhkvyu:11977: tasmin kalāpe yāvaṃti dravyāṇi saṃti. tāvaṃti gaṇyeran. naiva tāni daśa
T07yabhkvyu:11978: dravyāṇi samāhitavijñaptirūpāṇāṃ saptadravyatvāt. ṣoḍaśa dravyāṇīti vaktavyaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:11979: (VI.72) pradhānagrahaṇenaivam uklaṃ. prajñādisvabhāvāḥ smṛtyupasthānādaya iti. sarve tu prāyogikaguṇāḥ sāsravānāsravāḥ śrutacintābhāvanāmayā yathāyogaṃ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādāḥ. prādhānyaṃ punas tadbalenānyeṣāṃ [Tib. 267b] vṛtteḥ. na punas te na santi. prajñāpradhānāni hi smṛtyupasthānānīty ataḥ prajñāgrahaṇaṃ. na tu prajñaiva
T07yabhkvyu:11982: prāyogikagrahaṇam upapattilabhyaśraddhādinirāsārthaṃ. evaṃ vīryapradhānāni samyakpradhānāni. samādhipradhānā ṛddhipādā iti vistareṇa vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:11983: ṛddhipādāḥ samādhaya iti kuta etat. sūtrāt. uktaṃ hi chandaṃ cāpi bhikṣavo bhikṣur adhipatiṃ kṛtvā labhate samādhiṃ. so 'sya bhavati chandasamādhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11984: (Abhidh-k-vy 602) cittaṃ vīryaṃ mīmāṃsāṃ cāpi bhikṣavo bhikṣur adhipatiṃ kṛtvā labhate samādhiṃ. so 'sya bhavati mīmāṃsāsamādhir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11985: tena hi samyak kāyavāṅmanāṃsi pradhīyaṃta iti. pradhīyaṃte dhāryaṃte niyamyante pravartyante vā kadācid aneneti pradhānaṃ. tatpratiṣṭhitatvād
T07yabhkvyu:11986: iti. yasmāt sarvaguṇasaṃpattilakṣaṇā ṛddhis tasmin samādhau pratiṣṭhitā.
T07yabhkvyu:11988: ye tv āhuḥ samādhir eva ṛddhiḥ. pādāś chaṃdādayaḥ. chandacittavīryamīmānsā
T07yabhkvyu:11989: iti. teṣām evaṃvādināṃ vaibhāṣikāṇāṃ trayodaśa bodhipakṣāḥ prāpnuvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:11990: chandacittayor ādhikyād ekādaśasu [Tib. 268a] prakṣepe. vīryaprajñe tv atra nādhike. samyakpradhānasmṛtyupasthāneṣv antarbhāvāt. bahudhā bhavatīti vistara iti. bahudhābhūtvaiko bhavati. āvirbhavaṃ. tirobhāvaṃ jñānadarśanena pratyanubhavati. tiraḥ kuḍyaṃ tiraḥ prākāram asajjamānaḥ kāyena gacchati. tadyathākāśe. pṛthivyām unmajjananimajjanaṃ karoti.
T07yabhkvyu:11991: tadyathodake. udake 'bhidyamānena srotasā gacchati. tadyathā pṛthivyām.
T07yabhkvyu:11992: ākāśe paryaṃkeṇa krāmati. tadyathā śakuniḥ pakṣī. imau vā punaḥ bhūyo candramasāv evaṃ mahardhikāv evaṃ mahānubhāvau pāṇinā āmārṣṭi parimārṣṭi.
T07yabhkvyu:11993: yāvad brahmalokaṃ kāyena vaśe vartayata iti. iyam ucyate ṛddhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:11995: mīmānsāsamādhiḥ. ima ucyante ṛddhipādā iti. evaṃlakṣaṇaḥ samādhiḥ. tasmān na samādhir eva rudhir iti. atrācāryasaṃghabhadra āha. na bhavaty eṣa
T07yabhkvyu:11996: teṣāṃ doṣaḥ. samādhiṃ hi te ṛddhipādam icchanti. ṛddhir apīti. chandādayas tūcyante samādheś catustvajñāpanārthaṃ. kaścid dhi samādhiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:11998: kuśalamūlaniṣpannāvasthāyāṃ. pūrvo 'tra rddhipādaḥ. uttara rddhir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:11999: sūtravirodho 'pi caiṣāṃ na bhavati. ṛddhipādaphalam ṛddhiśabdenoktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12001: mṛdvadhimātrabhedād iti. mṛdūnīndriyāṇi adhimātrāṇi balāni. katham eṣāṃ mṛdvadhimātrabheda iti hetum āha. avamardanīyānavamardanīyatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12002: tadvipakṣabhūtair āśraddhyakausīdyamuṣitasmṛtitāvikṣepāsaṃprajanyair antarāsamudācārād indriyāṇy avamṛdyante na tv cvaṃ balānīti. punas tāny uktani.
T07yabhkvyu:12007: sapta vargā yathākramaṃ prabhāvyaṃte vyavasthāpyante pradhānīkriyante vā. ādikarmikāvasthāyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12011: iti. viśeṣādhigamahetur vīryasaṃvardhanaṃ. tasmād uṣmagateṣu samyakpradhānāni. [Tib. 269a] aparihāṇīyakuśalamūlapraveśatvāt. mūrdheṣv
T07yabhkvyu:12013: mūrdhalābhī na mūlacchid iti vacanāt. praviśaty ebhir iti kṛtvā praveśaḥ. aparihāṇir hi kṣāntiṣu
T07yabhkvyu:12014: bhavati. tadavasthāḥ. samādhayaḥ samṛddher āśrayībhavaṃtīti. mūrdhasv ṛddhipādā vyavasthāpyaṃte. apunaḥparihāṇita iti vistaraḥ. yasmāt kṣāntiṣu punaḥparihāṇir nāsti. ādyayor eva hi parihāṇisaṃbhavaḥ. tasmād ādhipatyaprāptāni śraddhādīni bhavaṃti. tadbhāvāt kṣāntiṣv indriyāṇi
T07yabhkvyu:12015: vyavasthāpyaṃte. kleśānavamardanīyatvād iti. yasmāt kleśair nāvamṛdyante.
T07yabhkvyu:12017: atha vā laukikair anyair dharmair anavamardanīyatvād agradharmāvasthāyāṃ śraddhādīni balānīti prabhāvyante. bodhyāsannatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12018: kṣayānutpādajñānāsannatvād ity arthaḥ. bhāvanāmārgo hi kṣayānutpādajñānāsannaḥ. darśanamārgas tu dūro
T07yabhkvyu:12019: tadantarālabhāvanāmārgavyavahitatvāt. gamanaprabhāvitatvād iti. mārgo hi loke gamanaprabhāvitaḥ. gacchaṃty aneneti mārgaḥ. gacchatīti vā mārgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12020: pāṭaliputram ayaṃ panthā gacchatīti loke vacanāt. darśanamārgaś cātiśayena gamanaprabhāvito na bhāvanāmārgaḥ. katham ity āha. tasyāśugāmitvād [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:12021: 269b] iti. tadvān api tenāśu gacchati. bhāvanāmārgeṇa tu bhūmibhedena
T07yabhkvyu:12023: apare punar āhur ity ācāryaḥ. asmadādaya ity abhiprāyāt. yathā vaibhāṣikair bhinnaḥ kramaḥ. tathā tam abhittvā bodhipakṣāṇām ānupūrvīṃ varṇayaṃti. darśanamārge bodhyaṃgānīti kṛtvā. bahuvidheti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12024: bahuprakāro viṣayo rūpādibhedāt. nīlādibhedāc ca. tasmin vyāseko vikṣepaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12026: bahuvidhaviṣayavyāsekavisāriṇyo (Abhidh-k-vy 604) buddhayaḥ. tāsāṃ nigrahārthaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni. gardhāśritānāṃ tṛṣṇāśritānām ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12028: kāmasaṃkalpānām iti vā. tadbaleneti. catuḥsmṛtyupasthānabalenety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12029: caturvidhakāryasaṃpādanāyeti. caturvidhaṃ kāryam utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇam. anutpannānām anutpādaḥ. tathānutpannānāṃ kuśalānām utpādaḥ. utpannānāṃ sthityādīni. tataḥ samādhiviśodhanād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12031: 270a] prabhāvyaṃte. lokottaradharmādhipatibhūtānīti. tadāvāhakatvād adhipatibhūtāni veditavyāni. tāny evendriyāṇi. yadā
T07yabhkvyu:12033: balāni. indriyāvasthāyāṃ hi kleśasamudācāraḥ saṃbhavati. kṣāntyavasthāyāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12034: prākarṣakatvāt. darśanamārge bodhyaṃgānīti. anāsravā prajñā bodhir iti
T07yabhkvyu:12035: kṛtvā. ubhayor mārgāṃgānīti. darśanabhāvanāmārgayoḥ. katham ity āha. tathā hy uktam iti vistaraḥ. bhāvanayā paripūrir bhāvanāparipūriḥ tāṃ gacchaty āryāṣṭāṃgo mārgaḥ. tasmin gacchati catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvanāparipūriṃ yacchaṃti. yācat sapta bodhyaṃgānīti. bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchaṃtīti vacanāt bhāvanāmārge 'pi āryāṣṭāṃgo mārgo bhavatīti gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12036: na hi darśanamārge bhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati. kiṃ tarhi bhāvanāmārga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12037: punaś coktam ubhayor mārgāṃgāni vyavasthāpyaṃta iti. caturṇām āryasatyānām etad adhivacanam iti darśanamārgaṃ darśayati. yathāgatena mārgeṇa prakramaṇam iti vistareṇa yāvan mārgasyaitad [Tib. 270b] adhivacanam iti bhāvanāmārgaṃ darśayati. yathāgatena yathāprāptena mārgeṇa prakramaṇaṃ yāvad bodhir iti. tad evaṃ darśanamārge bhāvanāmārge ca mārgāṃgāni
T07yabhkvyu:12038: vyavasthāpyanta iti. ata ubhayor āryāṣṭāṃgo mārga eṣṭavya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12039: (VI.74) siddho 'nukramaḥ. pūrvaṃ bodhyaṃgāni paścād āryāṣṭāṃgo mārga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12045: anāgamye prītyabhāvaḥ. sukhādhigamyaṃ cittaṃ prīṇāti. netarad iti. kiṃ cādharabhūmisāśaṃkatvāc ca. parihāṇiṃ prati sāśaṃka iti. ataś ca tatra
T07yabhkvyu:12046: prītyabhāvaḥ. sāśaṃkatāyāṃ hi cittaṃ na prīyate. saṃkalpavarjyā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12049: iti. kathaṃ bhavāgre kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhavati. na hi tatra kāyo
T07yabhkvyu:12050: vidyate. kāyālambanā hi prajñā kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ. na ca bhavāgraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12052: na maulāḥ kuśalārūpyāḥ sāsravādharagocarā iti siddhāntāt. naitat kenacid vyākhyākāreṇa likhitaṃ. tad idam atra
T07yabhkvyu:12053: vyavasthāpayāmaḥ. kāyasya kaḥ svabhāvaḥ. bhautikatvam ity uktaṃ. bhūtaṃ bhautikaṃ ca kāya ity arthaḥ. tatra yadi kevalabhūtālaṃbanā
T07yabhkvyu:12055: kāyasmṛtyupasthānam eva tad bhavet. bhavāgre ca kuśalasāsravā prajñā mārgata iti nyāyata iti vānāsravasaṃvaramārgālaṃbanata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12056: sāsravadharālaṃbanā hi maulāḥ kuśalārūpyā neṣyaṃte. na tv anāsravadharālaṃbanā iti. atas tad atra kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12057: (VI.77, 78) catvāro 'vetyaprasādāḥ buddhe 'vetyaprasādo dharme saṃghe cāryakāntāni ca śīlānīti. tatra duḥkhasatyādīnāṃ dharmatvād
T07yabhkvyu:12058: abuddhasaṃghasvabhāvatvāc ca. yathākramaṃ satyatrayam abhisamayan paśyan dharme cāvetyaprasādam āryakāntāni cāśīlāni anāsravāṇi pratilabhate. na buddhe na saṃghe vā avetyaprasādaṃ. [duḥkhasatyādīnāṃ dharmatvād.
T07yabhkvyu:12059: abuddhasaṃghasvabhāvatvāc ca. yathā] mārgasatyam abhisamayato buddhe tasya ca srāvakasaṃghe 'vetyaprasādaṃ pratilabhate. mārgasatyasya
T07yabhkvyu:12061: bahavo dharmāḥ kuśalā dharmā ity evamādayaḥ. tat ko 'yam iha dharmo 'bhipretaḥ. yad uktaṃ dharme cāvetyaprasādaṃ pratilabhata iti. atha vā buddharatnaṃ saṃgharatnaṃ cedam ucyate. tasmād idam api dharmarātnam ihābhipretaṃ bhavet. ratnatrayasya hy ayaṃ svabhāva uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12062: buddhasaṃghakarāṃ dharmān aśaikṣān ubhayāṃś ca saḥ nirvāṇaṃ ceti śaraṇaṃ yo yāti śaraṇatrayam
T07yabhkvyu:12063: iti. tat kim ayaṃ nirvāṇadharmo 'bhipreta ity ataḥ pṛcchati. ko 'yam iha dharmo 'bhipreta
T07yabhkvyu:12064: dharmaḥ satyatrayam iti vistaraḥ. duḥkhasamudayanirodhasatyāni. bodhisattvasya ca śaikṣāvasthāyāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 606) anāsravo mārgaḥ. pratyekabuddhasya ca śaikṣāśaikṣalakṣaṇo mārgo dharma ihābhipreta iti. ataś catvāry apīti
T07yabhkvyu:12065: vistaraḥ. mārgasatyam apy abhisamayan dharmam api bodhisattvapratyekabuddhamārgalakṣaṇam abhisamayati. tasmāc catvāry api
T07yabhkvyu:12066: satyāny abhisamayato dharme 'vetyaprasādalābha ity uktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12067: buddhasaṃghayor mārgo dharma iti nocyate. yasmāt tadabhisamayato buddhe
T07yabhkvyu:12068: saṃghe cāvetyaprasādalābha iti. kathaṃ punar mārgasatyābhisamayataḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12070: saṃmukhībhāvaḥ. saiva śraddhādhiṣṭhānabhedāpekṣayā [Tib. 272a] nāmatrayaṃ labhata ity adoṣaḥ. atha vā dharme 'vetyaprasādo vartamānaḥ. anāgatās tu trayo bhāvyaṃte. tenocyate lābho mārgābhisamaye buddhatatsaṃghayor apīti.
T07yabhkvyu:12071: yady adhiṣṭhānāpekṣayāvetyaprasādavyavasthānaṃ dharmāvetyaprasādaḥ pūrvaṃ paṭhitavyaḥ syād ity ata āha. yathā tu vyutthitaḥ saṃmukhīkaroti.
T07yabhkvyu:12073: vaidyabhūto bhagavān anuttaro viṣak śalyaharteti sūtrāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12074: dharmabhaiṣajyadaiśikatvāc ca. bhaiṣajyabhūto dharmaḥ kleśavyādhibhaiṣajyatvāt. nirvāṇārogyasaṃprāpakatvāc copasthāyakabhūtaḥ saṃgho nirvāṇārogyaprāptaye parasparopasthānāt. cittaprasādakṛtaḥ śīlaprasāda iti. trividhaś cittaprasādaḥ. samyaksaṃbuddho bata bhagavān.
T07yabhkvyu:12075: svākhyāto 'sya dharmavinayaḥ. supratipanno 'sya śrāvakasaṃgha iti. tena kṛtaḥ śīlaprasādaḥ. śīlam eva prasādaḥ. śīlasya vā prasādo 'nāsravatvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12076: śīlaprasādaḥ. ante trayāṇāṃ prasādānāṃ caturtha uktaḥ śīlaprasādaḥ. kasmād ity āha. evaṃ prasannasya samyaksaṃbuddho bata bhagavān iti vistareṇaiṣā
T07yabhkvyu:12078: ārogyabhūtatvād vā. kim ante śīlaprasāda uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12080: kim. ante caturtha ukta ity adhikṛtaṃ. daiśikabhūto bhagavān. mārgabhūto
T07yabhkvyu:12081: dharmaḥ. sārthikabhūtaḥ saṃghaḥ. yānabhūtāny āryakāntāni śīlānīti. āryāṇaṃ kāntāni prayāṇīty
T07yabhkvyu:12082: (VI.79, 80) aṣṭābhir iti. aṣṭābhir aṃgaiḥ samanvāgataḥ śaikṣaḥ. katamair
T07yabhkvyu:12083: aṣṭabhiḥ. śaikṣyā samyagdṛṣṭyā yāvac chaikṣeṇa samyaksamādhineti. daśabhir aṃgaiḥ samanvāgato 'śaikṣaḥ. katamair daśabhiḥ. aśaikṣyā samyagdṛṣṭyā yāvad aśaikṣeṇa samyaksamādhinā aśaikṣyā samyagvimuktyā aśaikṣeṇa ca
T07yabhkvyu:12085: (Abhidh-k-vy 607) vimuktau pratyātmajñānaṃ tatpratyātmajñānaṃ vimuktiś ca tatpratyātmajñānaṃ ca. vimuktitatpratyātmajñānaṃ. tābhyāṃ prabhāvitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12087: prabhāvitaḥ. prakarṣita ity arthaḥ. tasyaivāśaikṣasya tadvacanaṃ vimuktivacanaṃ vimuktijñānavacanaṃ ca. nyāyyaṃ na śaikṣasyeti. adhimokṣaḥ saṃskṛtā vimuktir [Tib. 273a] iti. dhātvarthaikatvāt aṃgānāṃ saṃskṛtatvād
T07yabhkvyu:12088: iti. yathā samyagdṛṣṭyādīni saṃskṛtāni. tathā vimuktir api saṃskṛtaiva gṛhyate nāsaṃskṛtā. visabhāgatvād visadṛśatvāt. dve vimuktī sūtra ukte
T07yabhkvyu:12089: iti. rāgavirāgāc cetovimuktiḥ. avidyāvirāgāt prajñāvimuktir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12090: cetovimuktiḥ prajñāvimuktiś cety arthaḥ. vimuktiskaṃdho 'pi sa eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:12093: yat tarhi sūtra uktam iti. catvārīmāni vyāghrabodhyāyanāḥ pariśuddhipradhānāni. katamāni catvāri. śīlapariśuddhipradhānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12095: vimuktipariśuddhipradhānaṃ ceti vistareṇoktvāha. katamac ca vyāghrabodhyāyanā vimuktipariśuddhipradhānaṃ. yāvad yaś chando vīryam iti vistaraḥ. vyāghrabodhyāyanā iti bahuvacanaṃ. teṣāṃ bahutvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12097: tasyai pradhānaṃ vīryavimuktipariśuddhipradhānaṃ. [Tib. 273b] tad evam atra vimuktipariśuddhipradhāna iti praśnatrayaṃ. tatra iha bhikṣo rāgāc cittaṃ viraktaṃ bhavati vimuktaṃ. dveṣāt. mohād viraktaṃ bhavati vimuktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12098: vimuktir uktā. ity aparipūrṇasya vā vimuktiskandhasya paripūraye.
T07yabhkvyu:12100: paripūryanugrahalakṣaṇoktā. yaś chando vīryam iti vistareṇa pradhānam
T07yabhkvyu:12101: uktaṃ. yata evaṃ rāgādibhyo vimuktiḥ prahāṇam ity evaṃlakṣaṇā vimuktir uktā sūtre nādhimuktiḥ. tasmān nādhimokṣa eva vimuktiḥ. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:12102: tattvajñānāpanīteṣu rāgādiṣu cetaso vaimalyam anāsravatvam anarthāntarabhūtaṃ ghṛtamaṇḍasvacchatāvad iti apara ity ācāryaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12103: (VI.81ab) tadutpattivibandhatvād iti. tasyāśaikṣasya cittasyotpattau vibandhatvāt. kleśaprāptir hi vibandhaḥ. yat tarhi notpadyamānam iti. yad anāgataṃ vajropamāt samādher anantaraṃ na bhavaty aśaikṣam eva. laukikaṃ vety aśaikṣasaṃtāna eva yal laukikaṃ. yat tu niyatam utpattau. tad evoktam iti. yad utpādābhimukham anāgataṃ. tad evoktaṃ śāstre vimucyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12105: tata evotpattyāvaraṇād iti. tata eva kleśaprāptitaḥ. tadutpattivibaṃdhād
T07yabhkvyu:12106: (Abhidh-k-vy 608) iti tad evātra kāraṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ. yady aśaikṣasaṃtānalaukikam api vimucyata ity abhyupagamyate. śaikṣasyāpi laukikam utpadyate. kasmān na vimucyata ity abhyupagamyate. ata āha. na tat tādṛśam ityādi. kleśaprāptisahitaṃ tacchaikṣasya laukikaṃ. na tv aśaikṣasya laukikam evaṃ bhavatīty asāmyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12110: (VI.82) yā cāsaṃskṛtā vimuktir uktā śāstre ihaiva vā asaṃskṛtā kleśahānam
T07yabhkvyu:12111: iti. ye ca trayo dhātava ucyaṃte. kvocyaṃte. sūtre śāstre 'pi vā.
T07yabhkvyu:12113: iti. bhedavivakṣāyām evam ucyate. abhedavivakṣāyāṃ tu yo virāgaḥ. tat prahāṇam apy ucyate. nirodho 'pītyādi.
T07yabhkvyu:12114: (VI.83) vastuna iti. sāsravasya rūpādeḥ. catuṣkoṭika iti. syān nirvidyate na virajyate. syād virajyate na nirvidyate. syād ubhayaṃ. syān nobhayam [Tib. 274b] iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12117: virajyate sarvair jahāti yair iti prahāṇakriyāhetukaṃ virāgaṃ darśayati. evaṃ catuṣkoṭikaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12118: evaṃ nirvedavirāgakāraṇaṃ paricchidya yojyam. anena catuṣkoṭikaṃ sidhyatīty abhiprāyaḥ. katham ity āha. nirvidyata eveti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12119: nirvidyata eva duḥkhasamudayakṣāṃtibhir duḥkhasamudayajñānaiś ca nirvedavastvālaṃbanatvāt. duḥkhasamudayau hi nirvedasya vastunī ālaṃbanam iti. na virajyate. kleśān aprajahad iti vacanena prahāṇakriyāyā asaṃbhavāt. virajyata eva nirodhamārgakṣāntibhir darśanamārge.
T07yabhkvyu:12122: nirvāṇamārgau hi prāmodyavastunī ālaṃbanam iti. ubhayapūrvaiḥ kleśān prajahad iti nirvidyate ca virājyate ca pūrvair
T07yabhkvyu:12124: virajyate. kleśān prajahad [Tib. 275a] iti vacanena prahāṇakriyāsadbhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12125: nobhayam (Abhidh-k-vy 609) uttaraiḥ kleśān aprajahad iti. na ca nirvidyate. na ca virajyate. uttarair nirodhamārgakṣāntijñānaiḥ prāmodyavastvālaṃbanatvāt na nirvidyate. kleśān aprajahad iti vacanena prahāṇakriyāyā abhāvāt na virajyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12126: āha. apadiṣṭaṃ prathamāyāṃ koṭyaṃ caturthyāṃ ca kleśāṃ aprajahad iti. kaḥ kān kleśān na prajahāti. tatra vītarāga iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12127: tatrārthopakṣepārthaṃ. vītarāgaḥ kāmadhātor yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanād api.
T07yabhkvyu:12128: satyāni paśyann abhisamayan. dharmajñānakṣāṃtibhir dharmajñānair dharmajñānakṣāntibhiś ca kleśān na prajahāti. laukikena bhāvanāmārgeṇa pūrvaṃ prahīṇatvāt. anāsravā tu kevalaṃ visaṃyogaprāptir utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12129: anvayajñānakṣāntibhis tv avaśyaṃ kleśān prajahāti. na hi laukikena mārgeṇa bhavāgravairāgyam asti. jñānais tu bhāvanāmārga.
T07yabhkvyu:12130: prayogavimuktiviśeṣamārgair ānantaryamārgair ap iva kaiścid indriyasaṃcārādyāvasthāsu na kleśān prajahāti. [Tib. 275b] ke 'vaśiṣyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:12131: tadanya ānantaryamārgās taiḥ kleśān prajahātīti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12132: ācāryayaśomitrakṛtāyāṃ sphuṭārthāyām abhidharmakośavyākhyāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12136: (VII.1) ṣaṣṭhāt kośasthānād anantaraṃ saptamasyopanyāse saṃbaṃdhaṃ darśayann āha. kṣāntayaś cocyante. jñānāni ceti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12141: cet kṣayajñānam aśaikṣī vā dṛṣṭir ity atra samyagdṛṣṭiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12142: saiva vimuktī dve jñānaṃ bodhir yathoditety atra samyagjñānaṃ. ihaiva vā ṣaṣṭhakośasthānāvasāna etat sarvam uktam.
T07yabhkvyu:12143: nirvidyate duḥkhahetukṣāntijñānair virajyate sarvair jahāti yair
T07yabhkvyu:12144: iti. śāstrasaṃbandhena vāyam upanyasyate. śāstre hi kṣāntayaś cocyante.
T07yabhkvyu:12145: jñānāni ca samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyagjñānaṃ ca. tatpratyāyanāya cāyam ārabhyata
T07yabhkvyu:12146: ity ataḥ pṛcchati. kiṃ punaḥ kṣāntayo na jñānam iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12148: iti. amalā eva kṣāntayo na jñānam ity [Tib. 276a] avadhāraṇāt sāsravāḥ kṣāntayo jñānam ity uktaṃ bhavati. saṃvṛtijñānaṃ hi tad iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12149: tatpraheyasyety. kṣāntipraheyasya vicikitsānuśayasyāprahīṇatvāt. prahīyate hi tāsv avasthāsv anuśayaḥ. na prahīṇo viprakṛtāvasthatvāt. niścitaṃ ca jñānam iṣyate. nāniścitam. iti na kṣāntayo jñānaṃ. kṣamaṇarūpeṇa ca kṣāntaya utpadyante. na niścayarūpeṇeti na jñānam iti varṇayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:12151: tatpraheyasyeti viśeṣaṇaṃ kim arthaṃ. dvitīye hi kṣaṇe
T07yabhkvyu:12152: prathamakṣāntipraheyo vicikitsānuśayaḥ prahīṇo bhavatīti prathamaiva kṣāntir na jñānam iti gamyeta. na tv anyāḥ kṣāntayaḥ. ity atas tatpraheyasyeti viśeṣaṇaṃ. [yad vā duḥkhadharmajñānādīnāṃ jñānatvapratipādanārthaṃ. yadi vicikitsānuśayāprahīṇatvād ity etāvad
T07yabhkvyu:12153: ucyate. evaṃ] saṃtīraṇātmakatvād iti. upanidhyānasvabhāvatvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12154: asaṃtīraṇāparimārgaṇāśayatvād iti. nāsti saṃtīraṇam asyety asaṃtīraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12155: parimārgaṇe āśayo 'bhiprāyaḥ parimārgaṇāśayaḥ. nāsya parimārgaṇāśaya ity
T07yabhkvyu:12156: aparimārgaṇāśayaṃ. asaṃtīraṇaṃ ca tad aparimārgaṇāśayaṃ ca asaṃtīraṇāparimārgaṇāśayaṃ. tadbhāvaḥ. tasmāt. kṣayajñānam anutpādajñānaṃ ca na dṛṣṭir ity [Tib. 276b] arthaḥ. yāvad ayam akṛtakṛtyaḥ. tāvad duḥkhādīni satyāny upanidhyāyati parimārgayati cāśayato yathoktair anityādibhir ākāraiḥ. kṛtakṛtyasya punar yathā dṛṣṭiṣv eva duḥkhādiṣv
T07yabhkvyu:12157: āryasatyeṣu pratyavekṣaṇamātraṃ tābhyāṃ bhavatīti duḥkhaṃ mayā parijñātaṃ na punaḥ parijñeyam ityādi. tasmān na te dṛṣṭisvabhāve.
T07yabhkvyu:12159: iti. duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ yāvan mārge 'nvayajñānaṃ. sā prajñopanidhyānapravṛttā prahīṇatadviṣayavicikitsā
T07yabhkvyu:12161: laukikī. sā sarvaiva jñānam ity avadhāraṇaṃ. na sā prajñāsti. yan na jñānam ity arthaḥ. kā punar asau prajñā. paṃcavijñānakāyikā kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtā mānasī yā dṛṣṭisvabhāvakleśasaṃprayuktā anivṛtāvyākṛtā
T07yabhkvyu:12162: ca. yā punar dṛṣṭisvabhāvā yā ca mānasī kuśalā. sā kiṃ bhavatīty āha.
T07yabhkvyu:12164: iti. eṣā ṣaḍvidhā laukikī prajñā dṛṣṭiḥ. anyā na dṛṣṭiḥ. ṣaḍ evety avadhāraṇāt. kā punar anyā. yā pūrvam uktā laukikī. jñānaṃ tv eṣā cānyā
T07yabhkvyu:12165: ceti. eṣā ca ṣaḍvidhā dṛṣṭisvabhāvā prajñā. tato 'nyā ca pūrvoktā jñānam
T07yabhkvyu:12167: dṛśaś ca ṣaḍ iti cakāraḥ paṭhyate. yasmād etāḥ ṣaṭ jñānāni cocyante dṛṣṭayaś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:12169: dharmānvayasaṃvṛtiparacittaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgakṣayānutpādajñānair avadhāraṇārtho 'yam ārambho daśaiva jñānāni. cyutyupapādapudgalajñānādīnām eṣām evāntarbhāvāt. (Abhidh-k-vy 613) samāsena tu dve eva sāsravam anāsravaṃ ceti. prāyeṇeti viśeṣaṇaṃ. ghaṭapaṭādikaṃ saṃvṛtisadvastu saṃvṛtijñānam ālaṃbate. svasāmānyalakṣaṇam api tu kadācid gṛhṇāti.
T07yabhkvyu:12171: anāsravam api saṃkṣipyamāṇaṃ dvidhā dharmajñānam anvayajñāna ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:12172: duḥkhajñānādīnām anayor evāntarbhāvāt. ālaṃbanaṃ saṃbhavata iti. yasya yad ālaṃbanaṃ. tasya tad bhavati. na hi cakṣurvijñānasya śabdālaṃbanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12175: iti. ete eva dharmānvayajñāne dve duḥkhādyālaṃbanabhedāc caturvidhe.
T07yabhkvyu:12178: te punaḥ kṣayānutpādajñāne prathamotpanne satī duḥkhahetvanvayajñāne bhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12179: duḥkhasamudayālaṃbane avaśyaṃ bhavata ity arthaḥ. kasmād ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:12180: duḥkhasamudayākārair bhāvāgrikaskaṃdhālaṃbanatvād iti. [tasya hi sarvapaścād bhavāgram eva prahīyate. tasmād yena ca pīḍyate yena ca
T07yabhkvyu:12181: baddhaṃ tata eva mokṣaṃ bahu manyamāno 'nantaraṃ kṣīṇaṃ bhavāgram ālaṃbate. tac ca duḥkhaṃ yā samudayā cityato duḥkhasamudayākārair bhavāgram ālaṃbate.] yasmād avaśyaṃ te prathamotpannakṣayānutpādajñāne
T07yabhkvyu:12182: [Tib. 277b] duḥkhākārair anityādibhiḥ samudayākārair vā hetvādibhir bhāvāgrikān skaṃdhān ālaṃbate. aprathamotpanne tv anyasatyālaṃbane api te bhavata ity arthād uktaṃ bhavati. vajropamānantaraṃ kṣayajñānaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:12183: tadanantaraṃ cānutpādajñānam ity ataḥ pṛcchati. kiṃ vajropamo 'pi tābhyām ekālaṃbano bhavatīti. tābhyām iti prathamotpannābhyām ity arthaḥ. yathā kṣayānutpādajñāne ekālaṃbane kiṃ vajropamo 'pi tābhyām ekālaṃbana ity
T07yabhkvyu:12184: apiśabdasyārthaḥ. yadi duḥkhasamudayālaṃbano bhavati. kiṃ. tābhyām ekālaṃbano bbhavatīti saṃbhavaḥ. atha nirodhamārgālaṃbano bhavati
T07yabhkvyu:12185: naikālaṃbanaḥ. tayor niyamena bhāvāgrikaskaṃdhālaṃbanatvāt. yathā hi viṣakāṇḍaviddhasya mṛtasya viṣaṃ sarvam aṃgam abhivyāpya vraṇadeśa eva maraṇakāle 'vatiṣṭhate nānyatra. tadvad asya yoginaḥ praheya eva bhāvāgrikaskaṃdhalakṣaṇe jñānam avatiṣṭhate.
T07yabhkvyu:12188: iti. caturbhya eva dharmajñānādibhyas tatsaṃgṛhītatvāt. na
T07yabhkvyu:12189: duḥkhajñānādibhyaḥ. anyākāratvāt. anāsravaṃ hi paracittajñānaṃ mārgākāram eva mārgajñānatvāt. yat tu sāsravaṃ. tal laukikākāraṃ sarāgam [Tib. 278a]
T07yabhkvyu:12190: vigatarāgam ityādi. śraddhādhimuktasamayavimuktamārgeṇeti. yathāsaṃkhyaṃ śraddhādhimuktamārgena dṛṣṭiprāptamārgaṃ na jānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:12192: anāgāmimārgeṇārhanmārgaṃ na jānāti. arhanmārgeṇa pratyekabuddhamārgam ityādi. kāmadhātūrdhvadhātupratipakṣālaṃbanatvāt tayor iti. tayor
T07yabhkvyu:12193: dharmajñānapakṣānvayajñānapakṣayoḥ. dharmajñānapakṣasya kāmadhātupratipakṣa ālaṃbanam. anvayajñānapakṣasya ūrdhvadhātupratipakṣa ālaṃbanam iti niyamaḥ. darśanamārge paracittajñānaṃ nāstīty avyāpāratvāt
T07yabhkvyu:12194: darśanamārgasya. duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiṃ dharmajñānaṃ ceti saṃbhavaṃ praty evam ucyate. kadācid dhi prayogavaśād duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12195: duḥkhe 'nvayajñānaṃ ca jñātuṃ saṃbhavati. aṣṭamaṃ ca samudayānvayajñānam
T07yabhkvyu:12196: iti. dharmajñānapakṣau dvau kṣaṇau jñātvānvayajñānapakṣaṃ pareṇa cittaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12197: jñāsyāmīti prayogaṃ kṛtvā samudayānvayajñānam aṣṭamaṃ saṃbhāvayati.
T07yabhkvyu:12198: mṛduprayogatvād iti alpaprayogatvād ity arthaḥ. śrāvakasya hi mahāprayogasādhyaṃ tad anvayajñānapakṣālaṃbanaṃ [Tib. 278b] paracittam.
T07yabhkvyu:12199: ato yāvat sa tatra prayogam ārabhate. tāvad ayaṃ ṣoḍaśaṃ cittam anuprāpto bhavatīti. aṃtarā na jānāti. prathamadvitīyapaṃcadaśān iti etān eva trīn jānāti. kathaṃ. duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiṃ dharmajñānaṃ ca jñātvā prayogāntaraṃ ca kṛtvā paṃcadaśakṣaṇaṃ mārgānvayajñānakṣāntiṃ jānātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:12201: duḥkhādyākāratvat. idaṃ ca saṃvṛtyākāraṃ duḥkhaṃ me parijñātam ity evamādyākāratvād ataḥ pṛcchati. tadviśeṣeṇa tayor viśeṣa iti. tasya saṃvṛtijñānadvayasya tatpṛṣṭhalabdhasya viśeṣeṇa duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ yāvan me mārgo bhāvita iti jānāti. duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na punaḥ parijñeyaṃ. yāvan mārgo me bhāvito na punar bhāvayitavyaḥ iti ca jānātīty evaṃrūpeṇa tayor anāsravayoḥ kṣayānutpādajñānayor viśeṣaḥ śāstre jñāpito darśitaḥ. ata eva tad upādāyety uktaṃ. tad upādāyeti pūrvīkṛtya tat puraskṛtyety arthaḥ. niṣyaṃdane tayor nirvikalpayor viśeṣo 'numīyata ity
T07yabhkvyu:12203: anāsraveṇāpy evaṃ jānātīti. ṣoḍaśākāravyatirikto 'sty anāsrava ākāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12204: (Abhidh-k-vy 615) tenaivaṃ jānātīty apare. yadi tad upādāya yaj jñānaṃ darśanam iti śāstravacanena duḥkhaparijñānādisaṃvṛtijñānaphalam [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:12205: 279a] amāsravaṃ kṣayānutpādajñānam ucyate. yad idam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12206: kṣayānutpādadhīr na dṛk iti na dṛṣṭir iti. tad virudhyate. tenāha. darśanavacanaṃ tu bhāṣyākṣepād
T07yabhkvyu:12207: iti. yad etac chāstre vacanaṃ yaj jñānaṃ darśanam iti. bhāṣyākṣepād
T07yabhkvyu:12208: bhavati. duḥkhajñānādiṣu hi jñānaṃ darśanaṃ vidyā buddhir bodhir iti paṭhyate. tatpāṭhākṣepeṇāyam upatiṣṭhate tatpāṭhināṃ pāṭhaḥ. na tu te
T07yabhkvyu:12209: kṣayānutpādajñāne darśanasvabhāve. na dṛṣṭisvabhāve ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12210: pratyakṣavṛttitvād veti. pratyakṣā vṛttir asya jñānadvayasya. tad iyaṃ pratyakṣavṛttiḥ. tadbhāvat. anayor darśanavacanaṃ. na hy etajjñānadvaye
T07yabhkvyu:12211: ānumānikavad āgāmikavad vā parokṣavṛttiḥ. pratyakṣavṛttiś ca darśanam
T07yabhkvyu:12212: iṣyate. tadyathā cakṣurvijñānaṃ. tadsādharmyād etad api jñānadvayaṃ darśanam ity uktam. ata evoktam iti. ata eva pratyakṣavṛttitvād uktaṃ śāstre yat tāvaj jñānaṃ. darśanam api tat. syāt tu darśanaṃ na jñānam aṣṭāv ābhisamayāntikāḥ kṣāntayaḥ. tad idam uktaṃ bhavati darśanatvam anayor iṣyate. na dṛṣṭitvam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12213: tatreti teṣu daśasu jñāneṣu saṃvṛtijñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānam eva
T07yabhkvyu:12214: svabhāvasaṃgrahataḥ. ekasya ca paracittajñānasya bhāga ekadeśaḥ. tasya hi sāsravānāsravasya [Tib. 279b] sāsrava eva bhāgaḥ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ. nānāsravo bhāga iti. dharmajñānaṃ daśasu jñāneṣv ekaṃ jñānaṃ dharmajñānam eva.
T07yabhkvyu:12216: kathaṃ. duḥkhajñānaṃ hi dharmānvayajñānasvabhāvaṃ. tasya yo dharmajñānabhāgaḥ. tad dharmajñānam. evaṃ samudayajñāsya yāvad
T07yabhkvyu:12218: dharmajñānaṃ. na tv anvayajñānabhāga iti. paracittajñānasya tu dharmānvayamārgasaṃvṛtijñānasvabhāvasya dharmajñānabhāgo dharmajñānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12219: evam anvayajñānam ekam anvayajñānam eva. saptānāṃ ca bhāgaḥ. teṣām eva duḥkhajñānādīnām yo 'nvayajñānabhāgaḥ. tad anvayajñānam iti yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12220: duḥkhajñānaṃ daśasu jñāneṣv ekaṃ jñānaṃ. tad eva duḥkhajñānaṃ. caturṇāṃ ca bhāgo dharmānvayakṣayānutpādajñānānām. etāni hi dharmajñānādīni catvāri catuḥsatyālaṃbanāni bhavanti. ya eṣāṃ duḥkhasatyālambano bhāgaḥ. tad
T07yabhkvyu:12221: duḥkhajñānaṃ. nānyo bhāgaḥ. ity evaṃ samudayanirodhajñāne (Abhidh-k-vy
T07yabhkvyu:12222: 616) yojye pratyekam. ekaṃ jñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ vā.
T07yabhkvyu:12223: caturṇāṃ ca bhāgo dharmānvayakṣayānutpādajñānānāṃ yaḥ samudayālaṃbanabhāgo nirodhālaṃbanabhāgo vā. tat samudayajñānaṃ nirodhājñānaṃ ca. mārgajñānaṃ daśasu jñāneṣv [Tib. 280a] ekaṃ jñānaṃ tad eva mārgajñānaṃ. paṃcānāṃ ca bhāgaḥ. dharmānvayakṣayānutpādaparacittajñānānaṃ. etāni paṃca mārgajñānāni
T07yabhkvyu:12224: mārgajñānasvabhāvāni bhavanti. ya eṣāṃ mārgajñānabhāgaḥ. tan mārgajñānaṃ netara iti. paravittajñānaṃ daśasu jñāneṣv ekaṃ jñānaṃ. caturṇāṃ ca bhāgo
T07yabhkvyu:12225: dharmānvayamārgasaṃvṛtijñānānāṃ. etāni hi catvāri jñānāni paracittāparacittajñānaṃ svabhāvāni bhāvaṃti. ya eṣāṃ paracittajñānabhāgaḥ. tat paracittajñānaṃ. netara iti. kṣayajñānaṃ daśasu jñāneṣv ekaṃ jñānaṃ tad eva kṣayajñānaṃ svabhāvasaṃgrahataḥ. ṣaṇṇāṃ ca bhāgo dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānānāṃ. kṣayajñānaṃ duḥkhaṃ me parijñātam ity evamādyākārajñānaniṣyandaṃ. tatra yat kāmāvacaraduḥkhādyālaṃbanaṃ. tad dharmajñane 'ntarbhavati. yad
T07yabhkvyu:12226: rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhādyālaṃbanaṃ. tad anvayajñāne 'ntarbhavati. yat pratyekaṃ duḥkhādyālaṃbanaṃ. tad duḥkhajñānaṃ yāvan mārgajñānaṃ vā bhavati. tatra ya eṣām evaṃlakṣaṇo bhāgaḥ. tat kṣayajñānaṃ netara iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12227: ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāga ity ucyate. [Tib. 280b] evam anutpādajñānaṃ daśasu jñāneṣv ekaṃ jñānaṃ tad evānutpādajñānaṃ. ṣaṇṇāṃ ca bhago
T07yabhkvyu:12228: dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānānāṃ yo bhāgaḥ. duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na punaḥ parijñeyam ity evamādyākāraniṣyandaṃ. tad
T07yabhkvyu:12229: anutpādajñānaṃ. rūpārūpyāvacraduḥkhādyālaṃbanam. tad anvayajñānaṃ. netaro bhāga iti. ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāga ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12231: iti. ākāraś ca gocaraś cākāragocaraṃ. ākāraś cākāragocaraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12232: ākārākāragocaram. tasmāt. svabhāvataḥ saṃvṛtijñānam iti. svabhāvena
T07yabhkvyu:12233: svabhāvataḥ. saṃvṛtijñānaṃ. kasmād ity āha. apramārthajñānatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12235: tathā hi śāstra uktaṃ. dharmajñānaṃ katamat. kāmapratisaṃyukteṣu saṃskāreṣu yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ. kāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 617)
T07yabhkvyu:12236: saṃskārāṇāṃ hetau yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ. kāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nirodhe yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ kāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇāya mārge yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ. idam ucyate dharmajñānam. api khalu dharmajñāne dharmajñānabhūmau ca yad anāsravaṃ. idam ucyate dharmajñānam.
T07yabhkvyu:12237: anvayajñānaṃ katamat. rūpārūpyapratisaṃyukteṣu saṃskāreṣu yad anāsravaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12238: jñānam. rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ [Tib. 281a] hetau yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ. rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nirodhe yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ. rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇāya mārge yad anāsravaṃ jñānam. idam ucyate anvayajñānaṃ. api khalv anvayajñāne
T07yabhkvyu:12239: anvayajñānabhūmau ca yad anāsravaṃ jñānam. idam ucyate 'nvayajñānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12240: ākārato duḥkhasamudayajñāne iti. ākārata eva nālaṃbanataḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12241: paṃcopādānaskaṃdhalakṣaṇatvena tayor abhedāt. tathā hi śāstra uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12242: duḥkhajñānaṃ katamat. paṃcopādānaskaṃdhān anityato duḥkhataḥ śunyato
T07yabhkvyu:12243: 'nātmataś ca manasikurvato yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ. idam ucyate duḥkhajñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12244: samudayajñānaṃ katamat. sāsravaṃ hetukaṃ hetutaḥ samudayataḥ prabhavataḥ pratyayataś ca manasikurvato yad anāsravaṃ jñānam. idam ucyate samudayajñānaṃ. ākārālaṃbanato nirodhamārgajñāne iti. ākārataś cālaṃbanataś ca nirodhamārgajñāne vyavasthāpyete. tathā hi śāstra uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12245: nirodhajñānaṃ katamat. nirodhaṃ nirodhataḥ śāntataḥ. praṇītato niḥsaraṇataś ca manasikurvato yad anāsravaṃ jñānam. idam ucyate nirodhajñānam iti. mārgajñānaṃ katamat. mārgaṃ mārgato nyāyataḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12246: pratipattito nairyāṇikataś ca manasikurvato yad anāsravaṃ jñānam. idam ucyate mārgajñānam iti. prathamata [Tib. 281b] iti grahaṇam anutpādajñānaviśeṣaṇārthaṃ. tad api hi kṛtakṛtyasaṃtāna utpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12247: sarvānāsravahetukatvād iti. prathamotpannāni daśa jñānāny adhikṛtya sabhāgahetunā sarvānāsravahetukam anutpādajñānaṃ. kṣayajñānaṃ tu na
T07yabhkvyu:12248: sarvānāsravahetukaṃ. na hy anutpādajñānam asya hetur bhavati viśiṣṭatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12249: (VII.9) sakalasya sakalapratipakṣatvād iti. sakalasya kāmadhātor darśanabhāvanāprahātavyasaṃgṛhītasya paṃcaprakārasya sakalaṃ dhārmajñānaṃ darśanabhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhītaṃ caturāryasatyālaṃbanaṃ pratipakṣa iti kṛtvā
T07yabhkvyu:12250: kāmadhātor eva pratipakṣo dharmajñānam ity uktam. api tv asti saṃbhavo yad rūpārūpyadhātor api dharmajñānaṃ pratipakṣaḥ. katamat tad dharmajñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12251: yan nirodhe mārge ca dharmajñānaṃ. nirodhamārgau hy adhātupatitau. tāv adharāv api na hinau vyavasthāpyete. duḥkhasamudayasatve tv (Abhidh-k-vy
T07yabhkvyu:12252: 618) adharabhūmike nihīne. na tad ālambanaṃ dharmajñānaṃ rūpārūpyadhātupratipakṣa ity avagaṃtavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12255: anvayajñānaṃ tarhi nirodhamārgālaṃbanabhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhītaṃ kasmāt tridhātupratipakṣo na bhavati. kāmadhātor jitatvāt. dharmajñānenaiva kāmadhātuḥ [Tib. 282a] pūrvatarajito bhavati. tataḥ paścād anvayam
T07yabhkvyu:12256: utpadyate. tataḥ kāmadhātor jitatvān na tat kāmadhātupratipakṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12257: dharmajñānaṃ tu rūpārūpyadhātor ajitatvāt pratipakṣo yujyate. [karmān
T07yabhkvyu:12258: nirodhamārgadharmajñānābhyām eva traidhātukabhāvanāprahātavyakleśaprahāṇaṃ na pūrvābhyāṃ. śāntanairyāṇikatāsābhāgāt. na hi kāmāvacarasaṃskārāṇāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12259: nirodhāt pratipakṣād vā rūpārūpyāvacarasaṃskārāṇāṃ nirodhasya pratipakṣasya vāsti kaścid viśeṣaḥ. sarvo hi nirodhaḥ kuśalo 'saṃskṛto
T07yabhkvyu:12260: mārgaś ca nairyāṇikaḥ.] anvayam ity anvetīty anvayaṃ jñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12261: (VII.10-12ab) sarvatheti. bhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhītam api. tān purastād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12262: tān anityādīn ākārān ūrdhvaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ. ṣoḍaśākāram uṣmagatādiṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:12263: svasāmānyalakṣaṇādigrahaṇād iti. svalakṣaṇagrahaṇāt sāmānyalakṣaṇagrahaṇāc ca. ādiśabdena bhuṃkṣva tiṣṭha gacchety evam ākāraṃ ca. na hy ete
T07yabhkvyu:12265: ubhayam api tv iti. sāsravānāsravaṃ. yat tarhīti vistaraḥ. rāgasya ca cittasya ca yugapadgrahaṇam ity abhiprāyaḥ. sūtraṃ punar evaṃ paṭhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12266: sarāgaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. vigatarāgaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. yathā sarāgaṃ vigatarāgam. evaṃ sadveṣaṃ vigatadveṣaṃ samohaṃ vigatamohaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12267: vikṣiptaṃ līnaṃ pragṛhītam uddhatam [Tib. 282b] anuddhatam avyupaśāntaṃ bhāvitam avimuktaṃ vimuktam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:12268: vastramalāyugapadgrahaṇavad iti. yathā vastramalayor na yugapadgrahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12269: tadvat. kathaṃ. yathā yadā vastram iti paricchinnākāraṃ vijñānam utpadyate na tadā malaṃ gṛhṇāti. yadā ca malam iti paricchinnākāraṃ vijñānam
T07yabhkvyu:12272: saṃyuktasarāgatā rāgaprāptyanubaṃdhād ity eke. anuśayānarāgālaṃbanatvād ity apare. dvābhyām iti. saṃsṛṣṭasarāgatayā saṃyuktasarāgatayā ceti. tato
T07yabhkvyu:12273: (Abhidh-k-vy 619) 'nyat sāsravam iti. yat kliṣṭam avyākṛtaṃ kuśalaṃ ca laukikaṃ. tat saṃyogasarāgatayā
T07yabhkvyu:12274: tad evam ubhayam apy etat sarāgam evoktaṃ. āha. kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇam
T07yabhkvyu:12275: ekīyamatena rāgapratipakṣo vigatarāgam ity ucyate. yatas ta āhuḥ. yadi hi rāgeṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgaṃ syād anyakleśasaṃprayuktam api.
T07yabhkvyu:12276: dveṣādisaṃprayuktam api. syāt vigatarāgaṃ. [Tib. 283a] tad api hi
T07yabhkvyu:12277: rāgeṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ saṃprayuktam api. na ca sūtre dveṣādisaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgam ity uktaṃ. sadveṣaṃ samoham ityādivacanāt. yeṣāṃ punā rāgapratipakṣo vigatarāgam iti. teṣām ayam adoṣaḥ. na hi rāgapratipakṣo
T07yabhkvyu:12279: evaṃ tarhīti vistaraḥ. yadi rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ rāgapratipakṣo vigatarāgaṃ. tadapratipakṣaḥ sarāgacittasyāpratipakṣaḥ. cittam akliṣṭam anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ. naiva sarāgaṃ rāgeṇāsaṃprayogāt. na viyatarāgaṃ rāgasyāpratipakeṣatvāt. evamādīti. ādiśabdena sadveṣaṃ samoham iti tulyaprasaṃgo yojyaḥ. katham. atra tu sūtre dveṣasaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ sadveṣaṃ dveṣapratipakṣo vigatadveṣam iti. yadi hi dveṣeṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12280: vigatadveṣaṃ syāt. anyakleśasaṃprayuktam iti syād ity eke. evaṃ tarhi tad
T07yabhkvyu:12281: [Tib. 283b] apratipakṣaś cittam akliṣṭaṃ naiva sadveṣaṃ syāt na
T07yabhkvyu:12282: vigatadveṣam. ity evaṃ samohaṃ cittaṃ vigatamoham iti vaktavyaṃ. tasmād rāgasaṃyuktatayāpi sarāgaṃ cittam atreṣṭavyaṃ. apiśabdād rāgasaṃprayuktatayāpīty apare. ābhidhārmikāḥ. evaṃ yāvat samohaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12283: vigatamohaṃ ceti. tasmād dveṣasaṃyuktatayāpi sadveṣaṃ mohasaṃyuktatayāpi samoham atra sūtre eṣṭavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12284: ālaṃbanābhisaṃkṣepād iti. kuśalaṃ cittaṃ vikṣepeṇa na saṃprayujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12286: saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptaṃ ca syāt. kliṣṭamiddhasaṃprayogād iti. dvividhaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12287: middhaṃ. kliṣṭam akliṣṭaṃ ca. tad eva hi cittaṃ kliṣṭaṃ middhasaṃprayuktam
T07yabhkvyu:12288: iti saṃkṣiptaṃ syād iti. kliṣṭam iti ca vikṣiptaṃ syād iti sāṃkaryadoṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12289: sāstravirodhaś ceti. kathaṃ. saṃkṣiptaṃ cittaṃ yathābhūtaṃ saṃprajānāti vistareṇa yathā vṛttau. teṣām anvayajñānaṃ tāvat saṃkṣiptacittālaṃbanaṃ na saṃbhavati. kāmadhātor ūrdhvaṃ middhabhāvād anvayajñānasya [Tib. 284a]
T07yabhkvyu:12290: (Abhidh-k-vy 620) ca kāmadhātvanālaṃbanatvāt. mārgajñānam api saṃkṣiptacittālaṃbanaṃ na saṃbhavati. mārgajñānaṃ hi mārgālaṃbanaṃ. na ca mārgasaṃgṛhītaṃ cittaṃ middhasaṃprayogīti. tenaivaṃ vaktavyaṃ abhaviṣyat
T07yabhkvyu:12291: tajjñānaṃ dve [jñāne]. dharmajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ ceti. ye tu varṇayanti
T07yabhkvyu:12292: saṃkṣiptaṃ cittaṃ kuśam ālaṃbanābhisaṃkṣepād iti. teṣām etad doṣadvayaṃ na
T07yabhkvyu:12293: bhavati. tad akliṣṭena middhena na saṃprayujyata iti saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptaṃ ca na prāpnoti. nāpi śāstravirodhaḥ. kuśalaṃ traidhātukasaṃgṛhītam asaṃgṛhītaṃ ca saṃkṣiptaṃ cittaṃ tajjñānaṃ catvāri jñānānīti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12296: vyavadānaparīttair niṣevitatvād iti. alpakuśalamūlair niṣevitatvād ity
T07yabhkvyu:12297: arthaḥ. tadviparyayād iti. vyavadānamahadbhir niṣevitatvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12298: mūlādīnaṃ balāntānāṃ alpabahutvam ekaikasya mūlasyālpabahutvād yathākramaṃ parīttaṃ ca veditavyaṃ. katham ity āha. kliṣṭaṃ hi [Tib. 284b] dvābhyām akuśalamūlābhyāṃ samūlaṃ mohena lobhadveṣayoś cānyatareṇa. ekasmin kalāpe 'nayor asamavadhānāt. kuśalaṃ tribhir alobhādveṣāmohair eṣām avinābhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12299: tajjātīyānāgatabhāvanābhāvād iti. kliṣṭajātīyasyānāgatasya bhāvanāyāḥ pratilaṃbhasyābhāvāt kuśalasaṃskṛtā dharmā bhāvayitavyā iti nyāyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12300: tribhiś ca skaṃdhaiḥ sānuparivartaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāraskaṃdhaiḥ. na
T07yabhkvyu:12301: vijñānaskandhena. ekasmin kalāpe dvitīyavijñānābhāvāt. na ca svātmanā
T07yabhkvyu:12304: taiś ca vedanādibhis tribhiḥ. rūpaskaṃdhena ca dhyānānāsravasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītena cittānuparivartanāsaṃbhavayogataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12305: alpabalaṃ khalv api kliṣṭam iti. nanu ca kuśalam api durbalam ekena
T07yabhkvyu:12307: ucchidyate punaḥ pratisaṃdhānāt. duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāṃtya tu daśānām
T07yabhkvyu:12308: anuśayānām atyaṃtasamuccheda iti tasād apīty apiśabdena pūrvoktād apīti.
T07yabhkvyu:12309: tatpratipakṣatvād iti. auddhatyapratipakṣatvād ity arthaḥ. evam avyupaśāntaṃ vyupaśāntaṃ ceti. avyupaśāṃtaṃ [Tib. 285a] kliṣṭam
T07yabhkvyu:12310: auddhatyasaṃprayogāt. vyupaśāntaṃ kuśalaṃ tatpratipakṣatvād iti kleśasaṃprayogāsaṃprayogato vā tad avyupaśāntaṃ vyupaśāntaṃ ca bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:12313: saṃmukhībhāvo (Abhidh-k-vy 621) niṣevaṇaṃ. te eva bhāvane. tābhyām abhāvitatvāt abhāvitaṃ. na hi kliṣṭaṃ kuśalavad anāgataṃ bhāvyate. na ca niṣevaṇārhaṃ bhavati nihīnatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12315: iti. tābhyām iti pratilambhaniṣevaṇābhyām ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12316: svabhāvasaṃtānavimuktibhyām avimuktatvād iti. kleśaiḥ saṃprayogān na
T07yabhkvyu:12318: saṃtānavimuktyā ca vimuktaṃ. kuśalaṃ tu kleśāsaṃprayogāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12320: styānamiddhasahagatam iti. styānamiddhasaṃprayuktaṃ adhyātmaṃ saṃnirodhasahagatam iti. etad eva nigamayati na tu vipaśyanayā
T07yabhkvyu:12321: samanvāgatam iti. anuvikṣiptam ity asya nirdeśaṃ karoty anuvisṛtam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12322: middhasahagatasya kliṣṭasya vikṣiptatvāpratijñānād [Tib. 285b] iti. kim iti kṛtvā vikṣiptatvam atra na pratijñāyate. kiṃ middhasahagate kliṣṭe
T07yabhkvyu:12323: citte vikṣiptatvaṃ nāstīti na pratijñāyate. āhosvid vidyamānam apy atra
T07yabhkvyu:12324: vikṣiptatvam. saṃkṣiptatvenaiva sthāpitatvān na pratijñāyate. ubhayathāpi
T07yabhkvyu:12325: vyācakṣate. kecid vyācakṣate. middhasahagatād dhi kliṣṭād yad anyat kliṣṭaṃ. tad vikṣiptaṃ pratijñāyate. middhasahagataṃ tu kliṣṭam akliṣṭaṃ cāviśeṣeṇa saṃkṣiptam eveti. apare punar vyācakṣate. yan
T07yabhkvyu:12326: middhasaṃprayuktaṃ. tat saṃkṣiptam eva na vikṣiptaṃ. yat tu viṣayeṣu
T07yabhkvyu:12327: visṛtaṃ. tad eva vikṣiptam ity ato 'tra middhasaṃprayukte citte. na pratijñāyata iti. varaṃ śāstravirodha iti. abuddhoktam abhidharmaśāstram ity abhiprāyaḥ. abhinnalakṣaṇavacanād iti. sarvāṇi tāni kliṣṭāny uktānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:12328: kliṣṭatvalakṣaṇam eṣāṃ vikṣiptādīnām avimuktāntānām. kliṣṭatvaṃ punaḥ kleśamahābhūmikaiḥ saṃprayogaḥ. saṃkṣiptapragṛhītādīnāṃ cābhinnalakṣaṇavacanān nārthaviśeṣa ukto bhavatīti saṃbandhaḥ. ādiśabdena mahadgatānuddhatavyupaśāntasamāhitabhāvitavimuktānāṃ [Tib. 286a] grahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12329: kuśalam eṣām abhinnaṃ. kiṃ punaḥ kuśalatvaṃ. kuśalaṃ mahābhūmikaiḥ saṃprayogaḥ. na vai nokta iti vistaraḥ. vai iti nipātaḥ. na nokta iti dvau pratiṣedhau ukta evety arthaḥ. ka uktaḥ. padānām arthaviśeṣaḥ. ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:12330: kliṣṭasāmānye 'pi vikṣiptādīnāṃ tulye kliṣṭatve teṣāṃ doṣāviśeṣasaṃdarśanād ity apy etat kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ vikṣepayogād vikṣiptaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12331: kliṣṭaṃ. kausīdyayogāl līnam auddhatyayogād uddhatam ity evamādidoṣe
T07yabhkvyu:12332: viśeṣasaṃdarśanād ukta evārthaviśeṣo bhavati. evaṃ kuśalasyāpi saṃkṣiptāder (Abhidh-k-vy 622) guṇaviśeṣasaṃdarśanād ity apy etat kuśalaṃ cittaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ pragṛhītam iti vistareṇokta evārthaviśeṣo bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:12333: sūtravirodhasyāparihārād iti. sūtre hi styānamiddhasahagataṃ saṃkṣiptam
T07yabhkvyu:12334: uktaṃ. styānayogena yat kliṣṭaṃ middhasaṃprayuktaṃ. tat saṃkṣiptaṃ na
T07yabhkvyu:12335: kuśalaṃ. styānasya kleśamahābhūmikatvāt. yadi ca sūtre iti vistaraḥ. yadi
T07yabhkvyu:12336: [Tib. 286b] yuṣmannītyā sūtre līnam evoddhataṃ bhagavatābhipretaṃ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12337: līnoddhatayoḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ noktaṃ syāt. katham ity āha. yasmin samaye cittaṃ līnaṃ kausīdyasaṃprayuktaṃ. līnābhiśaṃki līnam etad bhaviṣyatīty abhiśaṃkato līnābhiāśaṃki. akālas tasmin samaye
T07yabhkvyu:12338: praśrabdhisamādhyupekṣāsaṃbodhyaṃgānāṃ bhāvanāyā ity eṣa niyamo na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12339: evaṃ ca vaktavyaṃ syāt. akālas tasmin samaye
T07yabhkvyu:12340: dharmavicayavīryaprītisaṃbodhyaṃgānāṃ bhāvanāyā apīti. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. tad eva līnaṃ cittam uddhatam iti kṛtvā. tathā yasmin samaye uddhataṃ cittaṃ bhavaty auddhatyābhiśaṃki. akālas tasmin samaye
T07yabhkvyu:12341: dharmavicayavīryaprītisaṃbodhyaṃgānāṃ bhāvanāyā ity eṣa niyamo na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12342: evaṃ ca vaktavyaṃ syāt. akālas tasmin samaye
T07yabhkvyu:12343: praśrabdhisamādhyupekṣāsaṃbodhyaṃgānāṃ bhāvanāyā apīti. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. tad evoddhataṃ cittaṃ līnam iti kṛtvā. avibhāgena vā vaktavyaṃ syāt. yasmin samaye cittaṃ līnaṃ bhavati līnābhiśaṃki uddhataṃ vā bhavaty
T07yabhkvyu:12345: praśrabdhisamādhyupekṣādharmavicayavīryaprītisaṃbodhyaṃgānāṃ bhāvanāyā iti. smṛtisaṃbodhyaṃgasyāgrahaṇaṃ sarvatragatvāt smṛteḥ. ubhaye 'pi citte
T07yabhkvyu:12346: 'nukta siddhitaḥ. [Tib. 287a] smṛtiṃ khalv ahaṃ sarvatragatāṃ vadāmīti sūtre vacanāt. kathaṃ punar vaibhāṣikeṇa yad eva līnaṃ. tad evoddhatam ity
T07yabhkvyu:12347: abhīṣṭaṃ gamyate. līnaṃ cittaṃ kliṣṭaṃ kausīdyasaṃprayogāt. uddhataṃ cittaṃ kliṣṭam auddhatyasaṃprayogād iti vacanāt. kiṃ punar atra
T07yabhkvyu:12348: bodhyaṃgānāṃ vyagrā bhāvaneti. kiṃ kadācit praśrabdhyādibhāvanaiva na
T07yabhkvyu:12350: praśrabdhyādibhāvaneti vyagrā bhāvanā. manasikaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ bhāvaneṣṭā. na saṃmukhībhāva iti. manasikaraṇam ālaṃbanīkaraṇaṃ. līne citte akālaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12351: praśrabdhyādīnām ālaṃbanīkaraṇasyābhogakaraṇasyety arthaḥ. uddhate ca citte akālo dharmavicayādīnām iti. na tu saṃmukhībhāvo bhāvaneṣṭā. tasmin kāle na praśrabhdyādayaḥ saṃmukhīkartavyāḥ. dharmavicayādayas tu saṃmukhīkartavyāḥ. dharmavicayādayo vā na saṃmukhīkartavāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12352: praśrabdhyādayas tu kartavyā (Abhidh-k-vy 623) iti. kausīdyādhikam atreti vistaraḥ. yatra kausīdyam [Tib. 287b] adhikam auddhatyaṃ tu nyagbhāvena
T07yabhkvyu:12353: vartate. tal līnaṃ. yatra cauddhatyam adhikaṃ kausīdyaṃ tu nyagbhāvena.
T07yabhkvyu:12354: tad uddhatam. ity anayor viśeṣād avirodhaḥ sūtrasya pṛthagvacane. tayos tu sahabhāvād ekasmin kalāpe yugapad bhāvāt tad eva līnaṃ tad evoddhatam iti brūma iti. līnaṃ kliṣṭaṃ kausīdyasaṃyogāt. uddhataṃ kliṣṭam auddhatyasaṃyogād iti. ācārya āha. ābhiprāyikaṃ yāvat sūtre tu nāyam abhiprāya iti. kausīdyādhikaṃ līnam auddhatyādhikam uddhatam iti. yasmād
T07yabhkvyu:12355: āha. yasmin samaye līnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati vistareṇa na tv evaṃ viśinaṣṭi kausīdyādhikam anddhatyādhikam iti vā.
T07yabhkvyu:12356: yat tūktaṃ sarvam eva rāgasaṃyuktaṃ cittaṃ sarāgam iti. katham uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12357: tatra rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ dvābhyāṃ sarāgaṃ. tato 'nyat sāsravaṃ saṃyogasarāgam iti vacanāt. tatra rāgasaṃyuktatayāpi sarāgaṃ cittam atreṣṭavyam iti vacanāt. anāsravam api sarāgaṃ prāpnoti śaikṣam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12358: śaikṣasaṃtāne rāgasya sāvaśeṣatvāt. [Tib. 288a] rāgālaṃbanaṃ cet. atha mataṃ rāgasya yad ālaṃbanaṃ. tad rāgasaṃyuktaṃ sarāgaṃ ca bhavati. arhato
T07yabhkvyu:12359: 'pi sāsravaṃ cittaṃ parakīyasya rāgasyālaṃbanatvāt rāgasaṃyuktam iti kṛtvā sarāgam iti gṛhṇīyāt paracittavit paracittajñānaṃ vā. atha mataṃ na tad rāgeṇālaṃbyata iti. tata ucyate. kathaṃ vā tat sāsravam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12360: sāmānyakleśālaṃbanatvād iti cet. atha mataṃ sāmānyakleśānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12361: dṛṣṭivicikitsāvidyānām ālaṃbaṇaṃ tad ataḥ sāsravam iti. evam api samohaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12362: grḥṇīyāt. arhataḥ sāsravaṃ cittaṃ mohālaṃbanatvāt. moho 'pi sāmānyakleśaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12363: parakīyasya ca mohasyārhaccittam ālaṃbanībhavatīti. na ca paracittajñānaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12364: prāptyālaṃbanam iti. yasmāt paracittajñānaṃ cittacaittālaṃbanam iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12365: tasmān na rāgapraptisahitatvena rāgasaṃyuktatvāt sarāgam iti. nāpi taccitālaṃbanarāgālaṃbanam iti. tad iti yat tat parakīyaṃ cittaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12367: [tasyālaṃbanaḥ]. taccittālaṃbanas taccittālaṃbano rāgaḥ. ālaṃabanam asya paracittajñānasyeti tad bhavati taccittālaṃbanarāgālaṃbanaṃ. yasmād evaṃvidhaṃ rāgaṃ nālaṃbate paracittajñānaṃ viprakṛṣṭatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12368: ekaikadravyagocaraṃ hi paracittajñānaṃ. na ca parakīyacittajñānaṃ tasya cittasyālaṃbanaṃ gṛhṇāti. ākārālaṃbananirapekṣaṃ hi tad iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12369: raktam idaṃ eittaṃ jānātīti vacanāc ca. tasmād api na rāgasaṃyogāt sarāgaṃ cittam iti. asaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgam iti. satyām api rāgaprāptāv ity
T07yabhkvyu:12370: abhiprāyaḥ. tatra tat saṃdhāyoktam iti rāgādiprāptivigamaṃ. saṃdhāyoktaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12371: (Abhidh-k-vy 624) na saṃprayogam iti darśayaty anāvartikadharmi kāmabhave
T07yabhkvyu:12372: rūpabhave ārūpyabhave iti. traidhātukavairāgyasaṃdarśanād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12373: nanu coktam iti vistaraḥ. kvoktam. atra tu sūtra iti vistareṇa yāvad yadi hi rāgeṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgaṃ syād anyakleśasaṃprayuktam [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:12374: 289a] api vigatarāgaṃ syād ity atra. etenābhisaṃdhinā rāyaviprayuktatvād vigatarāgam anyakleśasaṃprayuktam apīty anena. yady evaṃ sadveṣaṃ samoham ity evamādi. na vaktavyaṃ syād ity ata āha. na tu tad vigatarāgam ityādi.
T07yabhkvyu:12375: na tu tad dveṣādisaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgam api sad vigatarāgam iti kṛtvā gṛhyate. kiṃ tarhi. sadveṣaṃ samoham ity evamādi dveṣādisaṃprayogitayā viśiṣṭatvāt. ādiśabdena cātra saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptam ity evamādisūtroktāni padāni gṛhyante.
T07yabhkvyu:12376: anyathā hīti vistaraḥ. yady asmin vastuni rūpādike raktam iti vijānīyāt tad rūpālaṃbanam api syāt. tathā ca sati na tat paracittajñānaṃ syād
T07yabhkvyu:12377: rūpālaṃbanatvāt. tadālaṃbanaṃ ca paracittaṃ gṛhṇataḥ svabhāvagrahaṇaṃ prāpnuyād iti. sālaṃbanaparacittagrahaṇe hīṣyamāṇe svātmā paracittajñānena
T07yabhkvyu:12378: gṛhyeta. asti hi saṃbhavo yat paracittavid yasya cittaṃ gṛhṇāti. asāv api tasya paracittavidaś cittam ālaṃbeta. tataś ca paracittajñānasya
T07yabhkvyu:12379: svālaṃbanaparijñānāt [Tib. 289b] svam evāsau paracittavic cittam ālambeta.
T07yabhkvyu:12380: na caitat prāpyaṃ. yat tenaiva cittena tad eva gṛhyate. sarvaṃ ceti vistaraḥ. dravyasya svalakṣaṇaṃ ca cittacaittāś ca pratyutpannāś ca parasaṃtatiś ca kāmarūpapratisaṃyuktāś cāpratisaṃyuktāś ca viṣayo 'syeti
T07yabhkvyu:12386: darśanamārge vartamānaḥ paracittajñānaṃ na saṃmukhīkarotīty ato darśananārgasaṃgṛhītaṃ nāsti. na hi darśanamārgo
T07yabhkvyu:12390: duḥkhajñānasaṃyuktaḥ. ānimittasamādhir nirodhajñānasaṃprayuktaḥ. na ca paracittajñānaṃ. [Tib. 290a] duḥkhajñānaṃ duḥkhanirodhajñānaṃ vā bhavaty
T07yabhkvyu:12391: ākārālambanabhedāt. atas tābhyāṃ viprayuktam ucyate. arthād uktaṃ bhavaty
T07yabhkvyu:12394: na kṣayānutpādajñānasvabhāvam ity arthaḥ. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12395: dravyasvalakṣaṇasaṃtīraṇaparimārgaṇāśayaṃ paracittajñānaṃ. na caiva kṣayajñānam anutpādajñānaṃ ceti tābhyām asaṃgṛhītaṃ. ānantaryamārgaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ ceti. sa hi prahāṇamārgo bhavati. paracittajñānaṃ ca vimuktiviśeṣamārga iti. pāramārthikayor api saṃvṛtibhajanād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12396: paramārthanimitte paramārthena vā dīvyataḥ pāramārthike. tayoḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12397: saṃvṛtibhajanāt. yasmād ete saṃvṛtiṃ bhajete. ataḥ śūnyānātmākārau na
T07yabhkvyu:12398: staḥ. kathaṃ punar ete saṃvṛtiṃ bhajete. kṣīṇā me jātiḥ. nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānātīti yathākramaṃ. katham ete anāsrave satī evamākāre.
T07yabhkvyu:12399: tadbalenānvvyavahārataḥ. anyena jñāneneti vākyaśeṣaḥ. yasmāt tatpṛṣṭhanirjāte saṃvṛtijñāne evamākāre pravartete. atas tanniṣyandena tayoḥ saṃvṛtibhajanam ity ucyate. na tu mukhyavṛttyā tayoḥ saṃvṛtibhajanam [Tib. 290b] ity abhiprāyaḥ. yataś caiva niṣyandenātmadṛṣṭiṃ bhajamāne iva te pravartete. atra tasmāc chūnyānātmākāravivarjitaiś caturdaśabhir evākāraiḥ saṃprayukte iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12400: (VII.12) apratisaṃyuktenety anāsraveṇa. anityam ity anityataḥ. ayaṃ hi tasipratyayaḥ svārthe prayuktaḥ. evaṃ sarvatrāyaṃ pratyayo jñātavyaḥ. atha vāntareṇāpi bhāvapratyayaṃ bhāvapradhāno nirdeśo bhavati. anityena rūpeṇa bhāvo 'nityata iti. evam anyatrāpi yojyaṃ. asty etat sthānam asty etad vastv iti. etāv api dvāv ākārāv anāsravau. asty etat sthānam ity asty etal
T07yabhkvyu:12401: lakṣaṇam ity arthaḥ. asty etad vastv ity ayaṃ hetur ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12402: yogavihitato vijānīyād iti. aviparītato vijānīyād ity arthaḥ. nāsyāyam artha iti vistaraḥ. asyeti vākyasya padadvayasya vā. asty etat sthānam
T07yabhkvyu:12403: asty etad vastv ity asty ayaṃ saṃbhavo 'sty ayaṃ yogo yad anityādito vijānīyād iti mataṃ cet. na. naitad asti. anyatrāvacanāt. anyatra vākye padadvayasyāvacanāt. darśanaprahātavyeneti. darśanaprakāreṇa. ātmata ātmīyataś ceti. satkāyadṛṣṭyā saṃprayuktena cittena. ucchedataḥ śāśvata iti. antagrāhadṛṣṭyā. ahetuto 'kriyāto 'pavādata iti mithyādṛṣṭyā. agrataḥ śreṣṭhato viśiṣṭataḥ paramata iti dṛṣṭiparāmarśena. śuddhito muktito nairyāṇikata iti śīlavrataparāmarśena. [Tib. 291a] kāṃkṣāto vimatito vicikitsāta iti vicikitsāta. rajyeteti rāgeṇa. dviṣyād iti dveṣeṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:12404: manyeteti mānena. muhyed iti mohena. ayogavihitatā vijānīyād iti. evam ātmādibhir viparītatā vijānīyād iti nigamayati. atrāpi vākye eṣa
T07yabhkvyu:12405: (Abhidh-k-vy 626) pāṭho 'bhaviṣyad iti. na caivam. ato gamyate nāyam
T07yabhkvyu:12407: (VII.13) sapta dravata iti. duḥkhākārāś catvāro dravyato bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:12408: samudayādyākārās tv ekaika iti sapta. ya eva hetvākāraḥ. sa eva samudayaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12409: prabhavaḥ pratyayaś ca paryāyamātraṃ nārthabhedaḥ. śakra indraḥ puraṃdara
T07yabhkvyu:12410: iti yathā. evaṃ nirodha eva śāntaḥ praṇīto niḥsaraṇam ity eka ākāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12411: mārga eva ca nyāyaḥ pratipan nairyāṇika ity eka ākāra iti. tad idam uktaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12412: bhavati. duḥkhākārāṃś caturaḥ pṛthag yoginaḥ sammukhīkuryuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12414: dravyataḥ ṣoḍaśeti vaibhāṣikā varṇayanti duḥkhākāravat samudayādyākārāṇāṃ sarveṣām api pṛthakpṛthak saṃmukhīkartavyatvāt. prajñāsvabhāvā hy ākārā iti bruvate.
T07yabhkvyu:12415: pratyayādhīnatvād iti vistaraḥ. na niyatabhavam anityaṃ pratyayādhīnatvāt pratyayapratibaddhajanmatvād ity arthaḥ. pīḍanātmakatvād [Tib. 291b] iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12416: bādhanātmakatvād ity arthaḥ. vipakṣeṇeti. pratipakṣeṇety arthaḥ. viruddhaḥ pakṣo vipakṣa iti kṛtvā. hetur bījadharmayogeneti. prakṛṣṭāvasthatāṃ hetor darśayaty ādibījavat. yogaśabdo 'tra nyāyarthaḥ. samudayaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12417: prādurbhāvayogeneti. saṃnikṛṣṭāvasthatāṃ hetor darśayati. yataḥ kṣaṇād anantaram utpadyate samudety asmād iti kṛtvā. prabhavaḥ prabaṃdhayogeneti.
T07yabhkvyu:12419: abhiniṣpādanārthena pratyaya iti. hetvādibhyo bahubhya utpadyata iti
T07yabhkvyu:12420: darśayati. tadyathā mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍādibhyo bahubhyo niṣpadyate ghaṭaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12421: tadvat. agninirvāpaṇād iti. rāgadveṣamohāgninirvāpaṇād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12422: nirupadravatvād iti. nirduḥkhatvād ity arthaḥ. sarvāpakṣālaviyuktatvād
T07yabhkvyu:12423: iti. sarvaduḥkhakāraṇavimuktatvāt. gamanārthena nirvāṇasya. yogayuktatvād upapattiyuktatvād upāyayuktatvād vā. samyakpratipādanārthena pratipad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12424: pratipadyate nirvāṇam anayeti pratipat. nairyāṇika iti. atyaṃtaṃ niryāṇāya prabhavatīti
T07yabhkvyu:12425: anātyantikatvād [Tib. 292a] anityam iti. pūrvaṃ prāgutpattyabhāvenānityam uktam. idānīṃ pradhvaṃsābhāveneti darśayati. abhinyāsabhūtatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12426: bhārabhūtatvād ity arthaḥ. duḥkhena bhārabhūtena hi sa pudgalo bhidyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12427: ākramyata ity arthaḥ. akāmakāritvād iti. kāmataḥ kartuṃ śīlam asyeti
T07yabhkvyu:12428: kāmakārī. na kāmakāry akāmakārī. tadbhāvāt anātmā. sūtre 'py ayam artha uktaḥ. rūpaṃ ced bhikṣava ātmābhaviṣyat. na rūpam ātmavyābādhāya
T07yabhkvyu:12429: saṃvarteta. labhyeta ca rūpe evaṃ bhavatv evaṃ mā bhūd iti kāmakāry ātmeti (Abhidh-k-vy 627) niruktiparigrahāt. hetur āgamanayogeneti. hi gatau hinoty asmād iti hetuḥ. asmād utpadyata ity arthaḥ. unmajjanayogeneti.
T07yabhkvyu:12431: pratisaraṇārthena pratyaya iti. janikriyāpratipradhānabhūta ity abhiprāyaḥ. asaṃbandhaḥ saṃbaṃdhoparamād iti. pūrvasya duḥkhasyoparamāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12435: paramakṣematvāt. nirvāṇapurāvirodhanārthena pratipad iti. yasmād anena nirvāṇapuraṃ na virodhyate na visaṃvādyate. kiṃ tarhi pratipadyata evety ataḥ pratipat. pratipadyate anayeti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:12436: chandamūlakā iti. chandahetukā ity arthaḥ. tṛṣṇāparyāya iha chaṃdaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12437: chandasamudayā iti. chandasamudgamā ity arthaḥ. chandajātīyā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12438: chandapratyayā ity arthaḥ. prabhavaśabdaḥ kevalaṃ paścāt paṭhitavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12439: ābhidhārmikair iti vākyādhyāhāraḥ. sūtrānusaraṇaṃ hi kartavyam ity
T07yabhkvyu:12440: abhiprāyaḥ. hetutaḥ samudayataḥ. pratyayataḥ prabhavataś ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:12441: kaḥ punar eṣāṃ [padānāṃ] chandānām [iva vā] viśeṣaḥ. asmīty abhedenātmabhāvacchanda iti. anavadhāryaikaṃ dravyaṃ samasteṣu
T07yabhkvyu:12443: traiyadhvikātmabhāvanālambanato vā ātmabhāvaprārthanā ātmabhāvacchanda iti prathamaḥ. syām ity abhedeneti punarbhavamātraprārthanā na viśeṣarūpāprārthaneti dvitīyaḥ. itthaṃ syām iti. idaṃprakāraḥ [Tib. 293a]
T07yabhkvyu:12444: syām iti bhedena punarbhavaccandas tṛtīyaḥ. pratisaṃdhibandhacchandaś caturtha iti. pratisaṃdhir eva baṃdhaḥ. pratisaṃdher vā baṃdhaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12446: karmābhisaṃskāracchando vā caturtha ity adhikṛtaṃ. karmaṇo vābhisaṃskāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12447: tatra chandaḥ. evaṃ caivaṃ ca dānaṃ dāsyāmīti. kathaṃ punas te chandā mūlādiśabdavācyā iti pratipādayann āha. tatra prathama iti vistaraḥ. ādiḥ kāraṇam ādau vā kāraṇam ādikāraṇaṃ. tadbhāvāt chandamūlakāḥ. hetvartho hi mūlaśabdaḥ. phalasyeva bījam iti. yathā phalasya bījam ādikāraṇaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12448: viprakṛṣṭakāraṇaṃ. tadvad ayam ādicchando duḥkhasya. tena tatsamudāgamād iti. tena dvitīyena chadena punarbhavasya samudāgamāt kṣaṇaparaṃparayā
T07yabhkvyu:12450: samudayaḥ. tadvat. tṛtīyacchanda itthaṃ syām iti. tajjātīyaduḥkhapratyaya
T07yabhkvyu:12452: 628) pratyayaḥ saṃbhavati tasya viśeṣarūpatvād viśeṣaphalarūpam eva phalam utpadyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. phalasyeva kṣetrodakapāṣyādikam iti. pāṣiḥ śuṣko gomayaḥ. ādiśabdena [Tib. 293b] vātātapādir gṛhyate. tato 'pi hi phalasaṃpad iti. vīryaṃ śītavīryatā uṣṇavīryateti. vipākaḥ uṣṇapariṇāmatā madhurapariṇāmateti. prabhāvaḥ sāmarthyaviśeṣaḥ. tadyathāmlatve tulye bījapūrakarasaḥ pittaṃ janayaty āmalakarasaṃ tu śamayatīti. tata eva tatsaṃbhavād iti. tata eva pratisaṃdhibaṃdhacchandāt tasya punarbhavalakṣaṇasya saṃbhavād utpādāt. phalasyeva puṣpāvasānaṃ. yathā puṣpāvasānaṃ phalasya prabhavaḥ. tadvat. atra caturthaccandaḥ sākṣāddhetuḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12453: punarbhavasya. pūrvakās trayaḥ pāraṃparyeṇa hetavaḥ. atha ceti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12454: tṛṣṇāvicaritānāṃ dvav paṃcakau gaṇau dvav catuṣkau catvāraś chandā yathākramaṃ bhavanti. prathamacchandaḥ paṃcākāraḥ. dvitīyo 'pi paṃcākāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12455: tṛtīyaś catuḥprakāraḥ. caturtho 'pi catuḥprakāraḥ. katham. asmīti bhikṣavaḥ satyātmadṛṣṭau satyām ittham asmīti bhavatīdaṃ prakāro 'smīti
T07yabhkvyu:12456: bhavati. tadyogāt tṛṣṇām utpādayatīty arthaḥ. evam asmīti yathā pūrvam eva nānyathety arthaḥ. anyathāsmīty anyena prakāreṇa
T07yabhkvyu:12457: varṇapratibhānādidarśanāt. sad asmīti bhavati. viparyayād asad asmīty ayam abhedena paṃcadhātmabhāvaccandaḥ prathamaḥ. bhaviṣyāmīty asya bhavatīti
T07yabhkvyu:12458: śāśvatarūpeṇa. na bhaviṣyāmīty ucchedarūpeṇa. itthaṃ bhaviṣyāmīti vistareṇa pūrvavad vyākhyānam. [Tib. 294a] ity ayam abhedena
T07yabhkvyu:12459: paṃcadhāpunarbhavacchando dvitīyaḥ. syām ity asya bhavati. itthaṃ syām evaṃ syām anyathā syām ity asya bhavatīty ayaṃ bhedena
T07yabhkvyu:12460: caturdhāpunarbhavacchaṃdas tṛtīyaḥ. api tu syām ity asya bhavaty apītthaṃ syām apy evaṃ syām apy anyathā syām ity asya caturdhāpratisaṃdhibaṃdhacchandas caturthaḥ. tatra prathamo duḥkhasyādikāraṇatvān mūlahetur iti vistareṇa pūrvavad yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12461: pratiniyatatvāt pratipad iti. niyatapratipādanaṃ pratipat. kathaṃ punaḥ pratiniyatā. anayaiva
T07yabhkvyu:12462: yathoktam iti vistaraḥ. nityasukhātmīyātmadṛṣṭicaritānām iti. nityaṃ sukham ātmīyaṃ ātmeti ca dṛṣṭicaritam eṣāṃ. ta ime nityasukhātmīyātmadṛṣṭicaritāḥ pudgalāḥ. teṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa yathākramam
T07yabhkvyu:12463: anityādyākārāḥ. nāsti hetur ity ahetudṛṣṭicaritānāṃ pratipakṣeṇa hetvākāraḥ. eko hetur īśvaraḥ pradhānaṃ cety ekahetudṛṣṭicaritānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12464: samudayākāraḥ. samudayo hetur naikahetur iti. pariṇamate bhāva iti
T07yabhkvyu:12465: pariṇāmadṛṣṭicaritānāṃ prabhavākāraḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy 629) ādibhavo 'yaṃ. na tu pūrvam avasthitaḥ pariṇamata iti. buddhipūrvakṛto 'yaṃ loka iti buddhipūrvakṛtadṛṣṭicaritānāṃ [Tib. 294b] pratyayākāraḥ. nedam īśvarabuddhikṛtaṃ jagat. kiṃ tarhi. taṃtaṃ pratītya tattad bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:12466: vīpsārtho hi pratiśabdaḥ. tasmād anekapratyayajanitaṃ jagad iti jñāpitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:12467: evaṃ tu yuktaṃ syād iti. sautrāntikamatam. ālambanagrahaṇaprakāra ākārā iti. nairuktā vidhir iti darśayaty ālambanaśabdād ākāraṃ gṛhītvā prakāraśabdāc ca kāraśabdaṃ. śeṣavarṇalope ca kṛte ākāra iti rupaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12468: bhavati. tad evaṃ sati prajñāpi sākārā bhavatīti siddhaṃ. sālambā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12469: ālambety ākārāntam etac chabdarūpaṃ. ghañantaṃ vā ālamba iti. sahālambena sahālambayā vā vartante sālambaḥ. sālambanā ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12472: ihādyaṃ. na śāstram iti vyācaṣṭe. śāstre hi dharmajñānam ādyaṃ paṭhitam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12478: iti. duḥkhajñānādīnām anvayajñānasvabhāvatvasambhavāt. na rūpārūpyadhātvoḥ saṃmukhīkriyata iti. yuktaṃ tāvad ārūpyadhātau dharmajñānaṃ na saṃmukhīkriyata iti. ārūpyāṇāṃ kāmāvacaraduḥkhādyanālaṃbanatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12479: rūpadhātau tu kasmān na saṃmukhīkriyate. kecid āhuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12483: tat saṃmukhīkaroti. kāmadhātūpapatteḥ sāvaśeṣatvād ity ato na rūpadhātau
T07yabhkvyu:12484: dharmajñānaṃ saṃmukhīkriyate. ācāryasaṃghabhadras tv āha. dharmajñānaṃ kāmedhātāv eva saṃmukhīkriyate. na rūpārūpya dhātvoḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12488: dauḥśīlyasamutthāpakakleśaprāptivibaṃdhakatvāt. prātipakṣikatvāt. tāni ca tatra na saṃtīti dharmajñānam kāmadhātv āśrayaṃ eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:12490: dharmasmṛtyupasthānanirdeśa (Abhidh-k-vy 630) uktaṃ. dharmāḥ kāyavedanācittebhyo 'nya iti. anyāni jñānāni catvāri smṛtyupasthānānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:12491: dharmānvayasaṃvṛtiduḥkhasamudayamārgakṣayānutpādajñānāni catuḥsmṛtyupasthānasvabhāvāni santi. duḥkhajñānam api hi kadācit
T07yabhkvyu:12492: kāyālaṃbanaṃ. kadācid yāvad dharmālambanaṃ. evaṃ samudayajñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12493: mārgajñānam api yad anāsravasaṃvarālambanaṃ kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ tad
T07yabhkvyu:12495: (VII.17) anyatrānvayajñānād iti. dharmajñānaṃ yady anāsravaṃ jñānam ālaṃbeta [Tib. 295b] dharmajñānapakṣam evālambeta. evam anvayajñānam anvayajñānapakṣam evālambeteti niyamaḥ. tatra dharmajñānasya mārgajñānabhūtasya dharmajñānāntaraṃ duḥkhajñānādīni cānutpādajñānāntāny ālambanaṃ saṃbhavanti. duḥkhasamudayajñānabhūtasya tu saṃvṛtijñānam
T07yabhkvyu:12496: ālaṃbanaṃ saṃbhavati. paracittajñānabhūtasya ca paracittajñānam ālaṃbanaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12497: saṃbhavatīti. nava jñānāni tasyālaṃbanam iti. evam anvayajñānam api
T07yabhkvyu:12498: yojyaṃ. mārgajñānasyāpi navaivānyatra saṃvṛtijñānāt. na hi mārgajñānaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12499: saṃvṛtijñānam ālambate. anāsravamārgālambananiyamāt. dve saṃvṛtiparacittajñāne iti. duḥkhasamudayasatyāṃtarbhūte. paracittajñānaṃ yad anāsravaṃ. tasya navānāsravāṇi jñānāny ālaṃbanaṃ. yat sāsravaṃ tasya
T07yabhkvyu:12500: saṃvṛtijñānaṃ prarcittajñānaṃ cālambanaṃ saṃbhavati. kṣayānutpādajñāne duḥkhajñānādisvabhāva iti daśāpi jñānāni tayor ālambanāni bhuvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:12503: iti. viprayuktāḥ prāptyādayaḥ. kuśalāvyākṛtabhedād iti. kuśalaṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ paramakṣematvāt. avyākṛtāv [Tib. 296a]
T07yabhkvyu:12506: saṃprayuktaviprayuktabhedāt. kāmarūpārūpyāvacarā api tata eva bhedāt ṣaṭ.
T07yabhkvyu:12507: dvāv anāsravāv iti. tata eva kāmarūpāvacarānāsravaḥ saṃprayuktā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12508: ārūpyāvacarāṃāṃ cittacaittānāṃ viprayuktāsaṃskṛtānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ paracittajñānāviṣayatvāt. avyākṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ muktveti.
T07yabhkvyu:12511: (VII.20) syād ekena jñānena sarvadharmān jānīyāt. na syād iti. kathaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12512: gamyate. sūtrāt. ihāsmākaṃ bho gautama upasthānaśālāyāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ saṃnipatitānām evaṃrūpāntarākathāsamudāhāro 'bhūt. śramaṇo gautamaḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 631) kilaivam āha. nāsti sa kaścic chramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā.
T07yabhkvyu:12513: yaḥ sakṛt sarvaṃ jānīyāt sarvaṃ paśyed iti. tathyam idaṃ bho gautama smarāmi bhavato 'ham evaṃ vaktum. api tu nāsti sa kaścic chramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā. yaḥ sakṛt sarvaṃ jñāsyati vā drakṣyati veti.
T07yabhkvyu:12514: viṣayiviṣayabhedād iti vistaraḥ. [Tib. 296b] viṣayiṇo viṣayasya ca bhedāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12515: yasmād yo viṣayī. na sa eva tasya viṣayo bhavati. svātamani vṛttivirodhāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12516: na hi saivāsidhārā tayaiva chidyate. tasmāt tena saṃvṛtijñānena svabhāvo na gṛhyate. nāpi tena caittāḥ sahabhuvo gṛhyante. ekālambanatvāt. yad eva hi tasya saṃvṛtijñānasyālambanaṃ. tad eva saṃprayuktānāṃ. yadi ca te
T07yabhkvyu:12517: saṃprayuktā gṛhyeran svabhāvālambanāḥ syuḥ. saṃvṛtijñānenaikālaṃbanāt. na caitad yuktaṃ. tasmān na te tena gṛhyante. atisaṃnikṛṣṭatvāc ca. na tena viprayuktāḥ sahabhuvo 'pi gṛhyante. cakṣuṣo 'ñjanāñjanaśalākādarśanavat.
T07yabhkvyu:12518: tac ceti saṃvṛtijñānaṃ. tasya vyavacchinnabhūmyālambanatvād iti. yasmād bhāvanāmayaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ vyavacchinnam eva bhūmim ālambate.
T07yabhkvyu:12519: kāmadhātuṃ vā prathamaṃ vā dhyānaṃ yāvad bhavāgraṃ vā. kiṃ kāraṇam.
T07yabhkvyu:12521: śāntādyudārādyākārā uttarādharagocarā iti vacanāt. yadi ca tat sarvabhuṃyālambanaṃ syāt. sarvato yugapad vairāgyaṃ syāt. prayogaviśeṣamārgayor api yathāsaṃbhavaṃ kācid eva bhūmir
T07yabhkvyu:12523: kāmadhātur ālambanaṃ. [Tib. 297a] na tasyetarau dhātū. yasyetarau dhātū.
T07yabhkvyu:12524: na tasya kāmadhātur ālambanaṃ. aśubhāpramāṇābhibhvāyatanādividūṣaṇe viśeṣamārgasaṃgṛhītasya kāmadhātur evālambanaṃ. netarau dhātū.
T07yabhkvyu:12526: iti. yasmāt kṣāntijñānaṃ na bhavati anyenāpi anāsraveṇa jñānena samanvāgato na bhavati rāgīti grahaṇaṃ. yasmād vītarāgaḥ paracittajñānenāpi samanvāgato bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:12528: iti. tad eva duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ cocyate duḥkhajñānaṃ ceti. nāmabhedāt
T07yabhkvyu:12529: dvitvopacāre. dharmajñānena duḥkhajñānena saṃvṛtijñānena ceti tribhiḥ samanvāgataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12533: kṣāntiṣu pūrvavad evāsamanvāgamāt duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣaṇe hy anvayam eva
T07yabhkvyu:12536: dharmānvayajñāne. pūrvam eva tābhyāṃ samanvāgatatvāt. evaṃ nirodhamārgadharmajñānakṣaṇayor nirodhamārgajñāne eva vardhete iti
T07yabhkvyu:12537: vaktavyaṃ. vītarāgas tu sarvatrādhikena paracittajñāneneti. duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntau yāvan mārge dharmajñānakṣaṇe paracittajñānenāpi
T07yabhkvyu:12538: samanvāgataḥ. taiś ca yathoktair jñānair iti veditavyaṃ. mārge 'nvayajñāne
T07yabhkvyu:12539: tu tair eva saptabhir avītarāgaḥ samanvāgataḥ. vītarāgas tv aṣṭābhiḥ. taiś ca paracittajñānena ceti. kṣayānutpādajñānābhyāṃ tv arhann eva samanvāgata iti subodhān na tadarthaṃ sūtritam ity avagantavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12541: iti. iha dvividhā bhāvanādhikṛtā. pratilaṃbhabhāvanā niṣevaṇabhāvanā.
T07yabhkvyu:12543: yathotpannāni bhāvyaṃta iti yāniyāny utpannāni tānitāni bhāvyaṃta iti. tadyathā duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntāv utpannāyāṃ tajjātīyā kṣāntir evānāgatā bhāvyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12544: tadākārāś catvāra iti. kṣāṃtyākārā anityādyāś catvāraḥ sabhāgatvāt. nānye.
T07yabhkvyu:12545: evaṃ duḥkhe dharmajñāna utpanne tad evānāgataṃ bhāvyate. tadākārāś catvāra eva bhāvanāṃ gacchanti. evaṃ duḥkhānvayajñānakṣāṃtyādiṣu yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12546: sabhāgajñānākārabhāvanaiveti. kasmāt [Tib. 298a] sabhāgajñānabhāvanā sabhāgākārabhāvanā ca darśanamārga eva bhavati. na bhāvanāmārga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12547: kṣāṃtīnām aparipraśnaḥ. bhāvanāmārge tāsām abhāvāt. tāsām api vā praśnaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12548: kartavyaḥ. tāsām api sabhāgabhāvanāt. na hi duḥkhakṣāntāv utpannāyāṃ samudayādiduḥkhakṣāntyākarā bhāvyante. udāharaṇamātrārthatvāt tu jñānaparipraśno na kṣāntiparipraśna iti. gotrāṇām apratilabdhatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12549: sabhāgahetunām apratilabdhatvād ity arthaḥ. kathaṃ kṛtvā. duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntāv utpannāyāṃ tadgotraṃ tadākārāṇāṃ ca caturṇāṃ gotrāṇi labdhāni bhavanti. na duḥkhadharmajñānādīnāṃ. kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇam
T07yabhkvyu:12550: anityādīnāṃ ākārāṇām ekaikasminn ākāre saṃmukhībhūte pariśiṣṭānām ākārāṇāṃ gotrāṇi pratilabhyaṃte. yatas te bhāvanāṃ gacchanti. tulyālambanatayā
T07yabhkvyu:12551: sabhāgatvāt. sarveṣāṃ gotrāṇi pratilabdhāni bhavanti. evaṃ duḥkhe dharmajñāna utpanne yāvan mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntāv utpannāyāṃ tadgotrāṇi tadākarāṇi ca caturṇāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 633) gotrāṇi labdhāni bhavantīti tad eva bhāvanāṃ gacchati nānyat. bhāvanāmārge tu punaḥ sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ sabhāgavisabhāgānāṃ tadākarāṇāṃ ca saṃmukhībhāvāt sarveṣāṃ hetavo labdhā
T07yabhkvyu:12552: bhavantīti. tadviśiṣṭā jñānākārā bhāvanāṃ gacchaṃty anāgatāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12553: sāṃvṛtaṃ cānvayatraya ity alabdhapūrvaṃ. na dharmajñāneṣv akṛtsnasatyābhisamayād iti. [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:12554: 298b] na hi tadānīṃ rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ duḥkaṃ parijñātaṃ samudayaḥ prahīṇas tannirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛta iti. mārgasya pūrvaṃ laukikena
T07yabhkvyu:12556: duḥkhasamudayanirodhā abhisamitāḥ. na tu saṃvṛtijñānena kadācin mārgo mārgādibhir ākārair abhisamitaḥ. tasmāt trayāṇām ekaikasya
T07yabhkvyu:12557: satyasyābhisamayānte bhāvanāṃ. gacchati. na mārgānvayajñāne. na tu mārgaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12558: śakyate kṛtsno bhāvayitum iti. saṃmukhīkartum ity arthaḥ. samudayo 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:12559: tadā na sarvaḥ prahīṇa iti. nirodhamārgadarśanabhāvanāprahātavyaḥ. duḥkhaṃ punaḥ sarvaṃ traidhātukaṃ parijñātaṃ tasya parijñeyatvād ity ataḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12562: ātmabhāvasaṃtatisāmānyaviśeṣo gotraṃ. tāni bahūni gotrāṇy asyeti bahugotro mārgaḥ. śrāvakagotrāt pratyekabuddhagotram anyat. tathā buddhagotraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12563: śrāvakagotram apy anyonyaṃ bhinnaṃ. mṛdvadhimātrādibhedāt. teṣāṃ kaścid eva darśanaheyapratipakṣo bhāvyate saṃmukhīkriyata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12564: na mārgaḥ. śakyate kṛtsno bhāvayituṃ. darśanamārgaparivāratvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12565: darśanamārgasya [Tib. 299a] parivāraḥ saṃvṛtijñānam. ataḥ satyatrayāṃte eva darśanamārgo bhāvyate. na mārgasatyaṃte tasya bhāvanāmārgatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12566: sādhyatvād ajñāpakam iti. sādhyam idaṃ darśanamārgaparivāra eva. na bhāvanāmārgaparivāro 'pīti. vayaṃ hi bhāvanāmārgaparivāro 'pi tad iti brūmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12567: satyālaṃbanaṃ viśiṣṭataram iti. darśanāvasthāyāṃ yal laukikaṃ pūrvam
T07yabhkvyu:12568: āsīta. tato viśiṣṭam eva ca laukikam ity abhiprāyaḥ. yas tatsaṃmukhībhāvasamarthāśrayalābha iti. tasya saṃvṛtijñānasya saṃmukhībhāve samarthāśrayasya yo lābhaḥ. eṣa eva tasya lābhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12569: nārthāntarabhūta iti. gotre 'bhilabdhe labdhaṃ gautrikam iti. gotraṃ tadutpādanasamartho hetuḥ. tatra bhavaṃ gautrikaṃ saṃvṛtijñānam. etad uktaṃ bhavati tatsaṃmukhībhāvasamarthāśrayalābhe tad api
T07yabhkvyu:12571: evaṃ necchaṃti vaibhāṣikāḥ. darśanamārgalabhyaṃ tat. tasya kathaṃ bhāvanāmārge saṃmukhībhāvo bhaviṣyatīti. darśanamārge cotpattyanavakāśo 'syāsti tad anutpattidharmakam iti varṇayaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:12572: evaṃ yāvac caturthadhyānabhūmika iti vistaraḥ. prathamadhyānabhūmikaś ced bhavati tribhūmikaṃ bhāvyate. prathamadhyānabhūmikam anāgamyabhūmikaṃ [Tib. 299b] kāmāvacaraṃ ca. dhyanāṃtarabhūmikaś cec caturbhūmikaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12573: bhāvyate. dhyānāntarabhūmikaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikādīni ca pūrvoktāni evaṃ dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaś cet paṃcabhūmikaṃ. dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ yāvat kāmāvacaraṃ. tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikaś cet ṣaṭbhūmikaṃ. tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ yāvat kāmāvacaraṃ. caturthadhyānabhūmikaś ced bhavati saptabhūmikaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12574: bhāvyate. caturthadhyānabhūmikaṃ. yāvat kāmāvacaraṃ ceti. ekasya parisaṃkhyānāt siddhaṃ bhavati śeṣaṃ catvārīti. nirodhe 'ntyam evāntyam eva ca nirodha ity ubhayāvadhāraṇāc cheṣaṃ catuḥsmṛtyupasthānam iti
T07yabhkvyu:12575: siddhaṃ bhavati. duḥkhe 'bhisamite yat saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate. tac catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni duḥkhasya kāyādisvabhāvatvāt. evaṃ samudaye 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:12576: vaktavyaṃ. tat satyākāram eveti. duḥkhe 'bhisamite yat saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate. tat pratyekam anityaduḥkhaśūyānātmākāraṃ. evaṃ samudaye nirodhe
T07yabhkvyu:12577: ca vaktavyaṃ. ālambanam asya tad eveti. tasyākārasya tadālambanatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12581: (VII.25, 26) dve jñāne pratyutpanne iti. anvayajñānaṃ mārgajñānaṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:12583: dharmajñānādīni. na saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate. labdhapūrvatvāt vakṣyati hi
T07yabhkvyu:12587: ekaprakāraprahāṇe yāvad aṣṭaprakāraprahāṇe. yāvan na vītarāgo bhavatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:12588: yāvan na prahīṇanavaprakāko bhavati. atrāntare prayogānantaryavimuktiviśeṣamārgeṣu bhāvyamāneṣu sapta jñānāni bhāvyante.
T07yabhkvyu:12589: dharmajñānādīni paracittajñānavarjitāni bhāvyante. laukikaś cet. yadi śāṃtādyudārādyākāro bhāvanāmārgaḥ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ pratyutpannaṃ. caturṇāṃ dharnajñānānām (Abhidh-k-vy 635) iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12590: duḥkhasasmudayanirodhamārgadharmajñānānām anyatamat. anvayajñānānāṃ kāmadhātvapratipakṣatvān nānvayajñānānām anyatamat. paṃcasu cābhijñāsv iti. āsravakṣayābhijñanam apāsya. [Tib. 300b] caturṇām anvayajñānānām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12592: nirodhamārgālaṃbanayos tridhātupratipakṣatvayogāt. saṃvṛtijñānaṃ na bhāvyate bhavāgrāpratipakṣatvād iti. saptabhūmivairāgye lokottare 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:12593: bhāvyamāne saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate. saṃvṛtijñānam api hi tasya kleśaprakārasya pratipakṣo bhavati. na kevalaṃ lokottaram iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12594: saṃvṛtijñānam api tatra bhāvyate tajjātīyam. akopyaprativedhe tu na tathā pratipakṣarūpaṃ bhūtaṃ saṃvṛtijñānam asti. ato 'tra na bhāvyate. tatra kṣayajñānaṃ saptamam iti. ānantaryamārgasthitatvāt kṣayajñānaṃ tatra
T07yabhkvyu:12595: bhāvyate. nānutpādajñānaṃ na hy ānantaryamārgasthito 'kopyadharmā bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:12596: akopyadharmaṇaś cānutpādajñānaṃ bhāvyata iti. bhavāgravairāgye vimuktimārgeṣv aṣṭāsu saptaiva jñānāni bhāvyanta iti. paracittajñānaṃ kathaṃ bhāvyate. ānantaryamārge pratiṣiddhaṃ paracittajñānaṃ na
T07yabhkvyu:12597: vimuktimārge. ataḥ ekaprakāre prahīṇe yāvad aṣṭaprakāre prahīṇe
T07yabhkvyu:12598: pūrvaparacittajñānaviśiṣṭaṃ paracittajñānaṃ bhāvyate. yat sa evaṃvidha
T07yabhkvyu:12599: āryapudgalas tato mārgād vyutthitaḥ saṃmukhīkuryāt. saṃtānaviśeṣād dhi paracittajñānaviśeṣa
T07yabhkvyu:12601: prayogamārge tu tayor iti. tayor eva sarāgavītarāgayoḥ saṃvṛtijñānasyāpi
T07yabhkvyu:12602: bhāvanā. vimuktimārge kim arthaṃ vivādaḥ. darśanamārgasādṛśyāt tatra tad
T07yabhkvyu:12603: ābhisamayāntikavad bhāvyeta ity eke. na cābhisamayo 'sti
T07yabhkvyu:12604: darśanamārgasādṛśyaṃ cety apara ity evaṃ vivādaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12606: dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānānāṃ. na saṃvṛtijñānasya darśanamārgasādṛśyād iti. kim atra darśanamārgeṇa sādṛśyaṃ. phalaprāptiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12607: yathā darśanamārgeṇa srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmiphalaṃ vā
T07yabhkvyu:12608: prāpyate. evam anenāpy ānantaryamārgeṇa śaikṣasya śaikṣendriyottāpanāyāṃ tīkṣṇendriyasaṃgṛhītāni saṃskṛtāni srotaāpattiphalādīni prāpyaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:12609: darśanamārge cānantaryamārgāvasthāyāṃ na saṃvṛtijñānabhāvanāsti evam ihāpi. ity evaṃ darśanamārgasādṛśyād ānantaryamārge na saṃvṛtijñānasya
T07yabhkvyu:12610: bhāvanā. tathaiveti. dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānānām. atrāpi saṃvṛtijñānaṃ na bhāvyate bhavāgrāpratipakṣatvāt. na paracittajñānaṃ sarvānantaryamārge pratiṣedhatvāt. (Abhidh-k-vy 636) [Tib. 301b] kiṃ punaḥ śeṣam iti vistaraḥ. kathaṃ kāmavairāgye navamo vimuktimārgaḥ śeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12613: saptabhūmijayābhijñākopyāptyākirṇabhāvite ānantaryapatheṣv iti vacanāt. tathā yo 'kopyatāṃ saṃcarati. tasyāpy ante vimuktimārge
T07yabhkvyu:12614: daśānāṃ bhāvaneti vacanāt. aṣṭau vimuktimārgāḥ śeṣā bhavanti. sarve ca vītarāgasyānāgāminaḥ prayogaviśeṣamārgāḥ śeṣās teṣāṃ bhāvanāyām avacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12616: kathaṃ punaḥ evam aviśeṣite viśeṣapratipattir labhyate. aśaikṣasyāvaśyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12618: ādiśabdena vyavakīrṇabhāvanādhyānādigrahaṇam. abhijñābhinirhāre vyavakīrṇabhāvanāyāṃ ca ye prayogavimuktiviśeṣamārgāḥ. teṣu yadi samayavimukto navajñānāni bhāvyante. anutpādajñānaṃ hitvā. yady akopyadharmā [Tib. 302a] daśa tad eva prakṣipya. aṣṭau nava ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:12620: tasyānantaryamārgeṣu pratiṣedhāt. dvayos tv abhijñāvimuktimārgayor iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12622: avyākṛte śrotracakṣurabhijñe iti vacanāt tadvimuktimārgāv avyākṛtau. na cāvyākṛtasya dharmasyānāgatabhāvanāsti. pṛthagjanasya tu kāmatridhyānavairāgya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12624: vimuktimārgaḥ. tatra maulākāśānantyāyatanapratilambhaḥ. na cārūpyadhātusaṃgṛhītaṃ paracittajñānam asti. rūpātītārthābhiniṣpādyatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12627: vigrahaḥ. ādiśabdena vimokṣābhibhvāyatanādiguṇagrahaṇam. apramāṇādīnāṃ guṇānām abhinirhāra iti. dhyānabhūmikagrahaṇaṃ sāmantakanirāsārthaṃ. [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:12628: 302b] tatra hi paracittajñānaṃ nāsti. abhijñātrayam ṛddhiviṣayābhijñā pūrvenivāsānusmṛtyabhijñā cetaḥparyāyābhijñā ca. teṣu ca kāmatridhyānavairāgyāntyavimuktimārgeṣu (Abhidh-k-vy 637) dhyānabhūmikeṣu
T07yabhkvyu:12631: dhyānabhūmikeṣv eva prayogavimuktiviśeṣamārgeṣu saṃvṛtijñānam anāgataṃ bhāvyate. yat tatsaṃgṛhītaṃ paracittajñānaṃ ca viśiṣṭam eva bhāvyate. yat tadguṇaviśeṣalābhī saṃmukhīkuryāt. anyatra nirvedhabhāgiyebhya ūṣmagatādibhyaḥ. teṣu hi nirvebhabhāgīyeṣu paracittajñānaṃ na bhāvyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12632: kiṃ kāraṇam ity āha. darśanamārgaparivāratvād iti. yathā darśanamārge paracittajnānaṃ na bhāvyate. tathā tatparivāre 'pi na bhāvyata ity
T07yabhkvyu:12633: abhiprāyaḥ. anyatreti vistaraḥ. pṛthagjanasyaivānyatrāpūrvamārgalābhe kāmatridhyānavairāgye 'ntyavimuktimārgān hitvā yaḥ prayogānantaryavimuktimārgalābhaḥ. tasminn anyatrāpūrvamārgalabhe saṃvṛtijñānam evānāgataṃ bhāvyate. na paracittajñānaṃ [Tib. 303a]
T07yabhkvyu:12634: tathābhijñātrayapramāṇādiguṇābhinirhāreṣu ya ānantaryamārgalābhaḥ. tasmiṃś cānyatrāpūrvamārgalābhe saṃvṛtijñānam evānāgataṃ bhāvyate. prayogamārgeṣu na paracittajñānaṃ tadapratipakṣatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12635: (VII.31, 32) atha kasmin mārga iti laukike lokottare vā. yadbhūmiko mārga iti. anāgamyādikaḥ sāsravo 'nāsravo vā. yāṃ ca bhūmiṃ prathamato labhata iti. vairāgyataḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvad bhavāgraṃ tadbhūmikam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12636: kathaṃ kṛtvā. yady anāgamyabhūmisaṃniśrayeṇa hi laukikena mārgeṇa kāmadhātuvairāgyāt prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ labhate anāgmyabhūmikaṃ sāmantakasvabhāvaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ ca maulasvabhāvaṃ. navame vimuktimārge saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate. evaṃ dvitīyadhyānasāmantakasaṃniśrayeṇa prathamadhyānavairāgyāt dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ labhate. tathaiva dvitīyadhyānasāmantakasaṃgṛhītaṃ mauladvitīyadhyānasaṃgṛhītaṃ ca bhāvyate. evaṃ yāvad yadi
T07yabhkvyu:12637: naivasaṃjñāsaṃjñāyatanasāmantakasaṃniśrayeṇākiṃcanyāyatanavairāgyād bhavāgraṃ labhata iti vistareṇa yojyaṃ. yadāpy anāsravānāgamyabhūmisaṃniśrayeṇa kāmadhātuvairāgyāt [Tib. 303b]
T07yabhkvyu:12638: prathamadhyānaṃ labhate. tadāpi tathaiva tatsaṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate. yadāpi maulaprathamadhyānabhūmikasaṃniśrayeṇa
T07yabhkvyu:12639: prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ labhate. tadāpi prathamadhyānaprathamaprakārapratipakṣabhūtaṃ yāvan navamapratipakṣabhūtaṃ dvitīyadhyānasāmantakasaṃgṛhītaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ labhate. sā hi prathamato
T07yabhkvyu:12640: bhūmis tadā labhyate. navame tu vimuktimārge mauladvitīyasaṃgṛhītam api saṃvṛtijñānam anāgataṃ bhāvyate. evam anāsravadhyānāntarabhūmisaṃniśrayeṇa yāvad anāsravākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmisaṃniśrayeṇa saṃvṛtijñānabhāvanā yojya.
T07yabhkvyu:12649: 'nāsravajñānaṃ. katham iti vṛttyā vyācaṣṭe. yadbhūmivairāgyāyāpi hi na
T07yabhkvyu:12650: kevalaṃ yadbhūmika ity apiśabdaḥ. dvividho 'pi mārgo bhavatīti. laukiko lokottaraś ca. prayogamārgādi
T07yabhkvyu:12651: ādiśabdenānantaryavimuktiviśeṣamārgagrahaṇaṃ. yāṃ ca bhūmiṃ labhate vairāgyata iti. uparibhūmikaṃ. tadbhūmikāny adhobhūmikāni vānāsravāṇi
T07yabhkvyu:12652: bhāvanāṃ gacchanti. tadyathā dvitīyam anāsravaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya tṛtīyadhyānavairāgyaṃ [Tib. 304a] karoti. yadbhūmiko mārgo dvitīyadhyānabhūmikas tadbhūmikam anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:12653: yasyāś ca bhūmervairāgyaṃ karoti tṛtīyāyā bhūmes tadbhūmikaṃ tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ navame vimuktimārge 'nāsravaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati. adhobhūmikaṃ ca prathamadhyānabhūmikam anāgamyabhūmikaṃ vānāsravaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati. adhobhūmikam api hi
T07yabhkvyu:12654: tatprayogamārgādikaṃ saṃbhavāmi tajjātīyam iti bhāvanāṃ gacchati. atha tu tṛtīyadhyānasāmantakaṃ niśritya dvitīyadhyānavairāgyaṃ karoti. tatrāṣṭāsv ānantaryamārgeṣu vimuktimārge ca tasya sāmantakasya sāsravatvāt tadbhūmikam anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ na bhāvanāṃ gacchati. abhāvāt. adhobhūmikaṃ tu tajjātīyaṃ dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ dhyānāntarabhūmikaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikam anāgamyabhūmikaṃ ca tajjātīyam anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12655: bhāvanāṃ gacchati. evam anyatrāpi yojyam eṣā dig iti. sāsravāś ca kṣayajñāna iti. anāsravāś ceti caśabdaḥ. yān guṇān arhadbhūtvā
T07yabhkvyu:12656: saṃmukhīkuryāt te sāsravās tasyām avasthāyāṃ. bhāvanāṃ gacchaṃti.
T07yabhkvyu:12658: ucchvasaṃtīva peḍāsādharmyeṇeti. [Tib. 304b] yā peḍā rajjvā nipīḍya
T07yabhkvyu:12659: baddhā. sā rajjūcchedād ucchvasatīva peḍocyate. ucchvastīva
T07yabhkvyu:12661: sādharmyeṇa. yathāsau rajjvā nipīḍya baddhā (Abhidh-k-vy 639) peḍā rajjūcchedād ucchvasatīva. evaṃ yathoktā aśubhādayo guṇā vajropamena samādhinā kleśaprāptirajjūcchedād aśailṣasaṃtāne vartsyanta ucchvasantīva.
T07yabhkvyu:12662: ucchvāsasya prāṇidharmatvād aupamikaṃ. kasmād ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:12663: svacittādhirājyaprāptasyeti sarvaṃ. sarveṣām rājñām adhiko rājādhirājaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12665: svacittaiśvaryam ity arthaḥ. tatprāptasyārhataḥ prāptibhiḥ prābhṛtasthānīyābhiḥ sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratyudgamanānte guṇā
T07yabhkvyu:12666: bhāvanāṃ gacchanti. ādhirājye prāptau kasyacid rājādhirājasya prābhṛtena vastrādinā viṣayāṇāṃ janapadānāṃ. yathā pratyudgamanaṃ. tadvat tad eva
T07yabhkvyu:12667: kleśaprāptirajjūcchede sati svaprāptilābhāt ucchvasantīva guṇā uttaptatarāṇāṃ teṣāṃ prāptir utpadyata ity arthaḥ. kāmadhātāv arhattvaprāptāv evāśubhādayo yathāsaṃbhavaṃ śrutacintābhāvanāmayās traidhātukā bhāvanāṃ gacchanti. rūpārūpyadhātvos tv arhattvaprāptau
T07yabhkvyu:12668: yathākramaṃ dvidhātukaikadhātukāḥ. [Tib. 305a] evaṃ bhūmito 'pi boddhavyaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopapannasyārhattvaprāptau tadbhūmikā eva ity avagaṃtavyaṃ. yat kiṃcil labhyata iti vistaraḥ. yad vihīnaṃ punar labhyate saṃmukhīkriyate saṃsārocitaṃ. na tad anāgataṃ bhāvyate. bhāvitotsṛṣṭatvāt
T07yabhkvyu:12669: saṃsāre. yad evātra dhyānāpramāṇādyanucitaṃ saṃsāre viśiṣṭām anāsravāṇuguṇaṃ. tat saṃmukhībhāve tajjātīyam evānāgataṃ viśiṣṭaṃ bhāvyata
T07yabhkvyu:12670: iyt ācāryo darśayati. ācāryasaṃghabhadro 'py etam evārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe.
T07yabhkvyu:12671: labdhapūrvaṃ na bhāvyate. yat pratilabdhavihīnaṃ punar labhyate na tad
T07yabhkvyu:12672: bhāvyaṃ. arthād gamyate yad alabdhapūrvaṃ labhyate tad bhāvyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12674: iti. tadāvedhasya balavattvād anāgato bhāvanāṃ gacchati.
T07yabhkvyu:12676: bhāvitapratiprasrabdhatvāt kṛtakṛtyadattaphalatvāc ca vegahīna iti tatsaṃmukhībhāvad anāgato na bhāvyata iti. yo 'nāgato yatnena janyate. sa bhāvyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. tad evaṃ sati yad uktaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ tāvad iti vistareṇa. tad āryasaṃtānapatitam eva gṛhyate saṃsārānucitatvād iti
T07yabhkvyu:12677: ācāryavasumitreṇātra likhitam. atra kila vaibhāṣikā āhuḥ. naitad evaṃ.
