T07yabhkvyu:12678: [Tib. 305b] kutaḥ. yasmād alabdham eva tad bhavati tyaktatvāt. tasmād bhāvitotsṛṣṭasyāpi punarlābhe bhavaty eva bhāvaneti. kathaṃ tad apūrvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12679: bhavati yāvatā labdhapūrvam iti. na hy evaṃvidhaṃ loke pūrvaṃ prasiddham
T07yabhkvyu:12680: iti. apare punar vyācakṣate. ekaṃ janmedam adhikṛyoktam na janmāntaraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12681: yad vihīnam asminn eva janmani punar labhyate. na tad bhāvyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12682: bhāvitotsṛṣṭatvāt. janmāntare tu yal labhyate. tad bhāvyate. na labhyate (Abhidh-k-vy 640) vismṛtabhāvanatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12683: (VII.33) caturvidhā hi bhāvaneti. pratilambha eva bhāvanā
T07yabhkvyu:12684: pratilambhabhāvana. anāgataprāptir eva bhāvanety arthaḥ. evaṃ niṣevaṇam eva pratipakṣa eva vinirdhāvanam eva bhāvāneti vaktavyaṃ. kiṃ niṣevaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12685: kiṃ ca yāvad vinirdhāvanam iti. niṣevaṇaṃ punaḥpunaḥsaṃmukhīkaraṇaṃ pratipakṣo mārgo yathoktaṃ sūtre. bhāvitakāyo bhāvitacitta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12686: bhāvitapratipakṣakāyacitta ity arthaḥ. kāyapratipakṣaḥ punaś caturdhyānavirāgyāya yo mārgaḥ. tathā hy uktaṃ bhāvitakāyo bhikṣur ity
T07yabhkvyu:12687: ucyate bhāvitacitto bhāvitaśīlaḥ. katḥaṃ bhāvitakāyo bhavati. kāyād vigatarāgo vigataspṛho vigatapipāso vigatapremā vigataniyaṃtiḥ. atha vā yo
T07yabhkvyu:12691: tad evam iti vistaraḥ. yasmāt pratilambhaniṣevaṇabhāvane kuśalasaṃskṛtānām
T07yabhkvyu:12692: ity aviśeṣeṇoktaṃ sāsravāṇām anāsravaṇāṃ ca. pratipakṣavinirdhāvanabhāvane ca sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇām ity aviśeṣeṇoktaṃ kliṣṭānām akliṣṭānāṃ ca. tasmād evam itthaṃ kuśalasāsravāṇāṃ catasro bhāvanā bhavanti. yeṣāṃ bhāvanā kuśalatvāt pratilambhaniṣevaṇabhāvane bhavataḥ. sāsravatvāc ca pratipakṣavinirdhāvanabhāvane bhavata iti. ye tarhi na kuśalasāsravāḥ ye saṃskṛtā ye 'nāsravā ye ca kliṣṭāvyākṛtāḥ. teṣāṃ kati bhāvanā ity āhānāsravāṇāṃ dve iti. pratilambhaniṣevaṇabhāvane. kliṣṭāvyākṛtānāṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:12693: kiṃ dve bhāvane bhavataḥ. pratipakṣavinirdhāvanabhāvane iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12694: indriyāṇāṃ pūrveti. cakṣurādīnāṃ saṃvarabhāvanety arthaḥ. kāyasyottareti.
T07yabhkvyu:12695: vibhāvanabhāvanā. tat punar bhāvanādvayam āgamena yathākramaṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:12696: ṣaḍ imānīndriyāṇīti vistaraḥ. sa punar indriyasaṃvaraḥ smṛti [Tib. 306b]
T07yabhkvyu:12698: nirdhāvanaṃ. te tv iti vistaraḥ. te tu saṃvaravibhāvanabhāvane
T07yabhkvyu:12699: pratipakṣanirdhāvanabhāvanāntarbhūte yathākramam ubhayam ubhayatrāntarbhūtam ity api na virudhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12701: sāsravāś ca kṣayajñāna iti vacanāt. daśa balānīti vistaraḥ. ete balādyā mahākaruṇāntā
T07yabhkvyu:12702: aṣṭādaśāveṇikā vaibhāṣikair vyavasthāpyaṃte. balādivyatiriktān kecid anyān
T07yabhkvyu:12704: nāsti tathāgatasya skhalitaṃ. nāsti ravitaṃ. nāsti dravatā. nāsti
T07yabhkvyu:12705: nānātvasaṃjñā. nāsty avyākṛtaṃ manaḥ. nāsty apratisaṃkhyāyopekṣā. nāsty atīteṣu pratihataṃ jñānadarśanaṃ. nāsty anāgateṣu pratihataṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12706: jñānadarśanaṃ. nāsti pratyutpanneṣu pratihataṃ jñānadarśanaṃ. sarvaṃ kāyakarma jñānānuparivarti. sarvaṃ vākkarma jñānānuparivarti. sarvaṃ manaskarma jñānānuparivarti. nāsti chaṃdahāniḥ. nāsti vīryahāniḥ. nāsti
T07yabhkvyu:12707: smṛtihāniḥ. nāsti samādhihāniḥ. [Tib. 307a] nāsti prajñāhāniḥ. nāsti vimuktijñanadarśanahānir iti. tatra ravitaṃ nāma sahasā kriyā. dravatā
T07yabhkvyu:12709: rāgadveṣamohato nānātvasaṃjñā. śeṣaṃ sugamaṃ. daśa balāni.
T07yabhkvyu:12714: cyutyupapattijñānabalaṃ. āsravakṣayajñānabalaṃ ca. sūtraṃ tu daśāyuṣmantas
T07yabhkvyu:12715: tathāgatabalāni. katamāni daśa. ihāyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ sthānaṃ ca sthānato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. asthānaṃ cāsthānataḥ. idaṃ prathamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ. yena balena samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha udāram ārṣabhasthānaṃ pratijānāti brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayati. parṣadi samyaksiṃhanādaṃ nadati. punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgato
T07yabhkvyu:12716: 'tītānāgatapratyutpannāni karmadharmasamādānāni [Tib. 307b] sthānato hetuto vastuto vipākataś ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ pūrvavat. yāvad vipākataś ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. idaṃ dvitīyaṃ tathāgatabalam. yena baleneti pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmantas
T07yabhkvyu:12717: tathāgato dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīnāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānavyavasthānaviśuddhiṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ indriyaparāparatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ pūrvavat. idaṃ caturthaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ. yena baleneti pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgato nānāvimuktikaṃ lokam
T07yabhkvyu:12718: anekavimuktikam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. yad āyuṣmaṃtas tathāgataḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12719: pūrvavat. idaṃ paṃcamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ. yena baleneti pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmaṃtas tathāgto nānādhātukaṃ anekadhātukam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ [Tib. 308a] pūrvavat. idaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ. yena baleneti pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ sarvatragāminīṃ pratipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 642) pūrvavat. idaṃ saptamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ. yena baleneti pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgato 'nekavidhaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12720: pūrvanivāsam anusmarati. tadyathaikām api jātiṃ dve tisraś catasraḥ paṃca ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau nava daśa viṃśatiṃ yāvad anekān api saṃvartavivartakalpān
T07yabhkvyu:12721: anusmarati. amī nāma te bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ. yatrāham āsa evaṃnāmā evaṃjātya evaṃgotra evamāhāra evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evaṃ dīrghāyur
T07yabhkvyu:12722: evaṃcirasthitikaḥ evamāyuṣparyantaḥ so 'haṃ tasmāt sthānāc cyuto
T07yabhkvyu:12723: 'mutropapannaḥ tasmād api cyuta ihopapannaḥ. iti sākāraṃ sanidānaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12724: soddeśam anekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmarati. yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12725: pūrvavat. idam aṣṭamāṃ tathāgatabalaṃ. yena baleneti pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgato divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāṃtamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati cyavanān apy upapadyamānān api suvarṇān durvarṇān durbalān hīnān praṇītān sugatim api gacchato durgatim api yathākarmopagān sattvān
T07yabhkvyu:12726: [Tib. 308b] yathābhūtaṃ prajānāty amī bhavantaḥ kāyaduścaritena smanvāgatā
T07yabhkvyu:12728: mithyādṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetuṃ tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipāte narakeṣūpapadyaṃte. amī punar bhavantaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12729: sattvāḥ kāyasucaritena samanvāgatāḥ vāṅmanaḥsucaritena samanvāgatāḥ āryāṇām anapavādakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ samyagdṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetuṃ tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt sugatan svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante.
T07yabhkvyu:12730: yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ pūrvavat. idaṃ navamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ . yena baleneti pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād
T07yabhkvyu:12731: anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya prativedayate kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti. yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ pūrvavat. idaṃ daśamaṃ tathagatabalaṃ. yena baleneti pūrvavat.
T07yabhkvyu:12732: (VII.34cd-36) sthānāsthāne daśa jñānānīti. sthānaṃ cāsthānaṃ sthānāsthānaṃ. tatra jñānam eva balaṃ jñānabalaṃ. tad daśajñānāni. [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:12733: 309a] daśajñānasvabhāvam ity arthaḥ. kathaṃ kṛtvā. sthānāsthānaṃ samāsena saṃskṛtaṃ cāsaṃskṛtaṃ ca tad api saṃskṛtam aṣṭadhā bhettavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12734: kāmarūpārūpyāvacarānāsravāṇāṃ saṃprayuktaviprayuktabhedāt. tathā saṃskṛtaṃ dvidhā bhettavyaṃ. kuśalāvyākṛtabhedāt. tatra saṃvṛtijñānabalasya daśāpi
T07yabhkvyu:12735: dharmā viṣayaḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy 643) daśasv api dharmeṣu tasya vṛttir ity
T07yabhkvyu:12736: arthaḥ. dharmajñānasya paṃca. kāmāvacarānāsravāś catvāraḥ kuśalaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12737: cāsaṃkṛtaṃ. anvayajñānasya sapta. rūpārūpyāvacarānāsravāḥ ṣaṭ kuśalaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12739: nirodhajñānasyaikaḥ kuśalam evāsaṃskṛtaṃ. mārgajñānasya dvāv anāsravau.
T07yabhkvyu:12741: kṣayānutpādajñānayor nava dharmā viṣayaḥ. avyākṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ muktvā.
T07yabhkvyu:12742: evaṃ kṛtvā sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ daśa jñānāni. kathaṃ punar daśā dharmāḥ sthānāsthānam ity uccyaṃte. saṃbhavaḥ sthānaṃ asaṃbhavo 'sthānam iti. atha vā asthānam anavakāśo yaḥ strī buddhatvaṃ kārayiṣyati. sthānam etad yat
T07yabhkvyu:12743: puruṣa iti. asthānam anavakāśo yaḥ strī brahmatvaṃ [Tib. 309b]
T07yabhkvyu:12744: kārayiṣyati. sthānam etat purusa iti. tathā sthānam etad yad duḥkhasya nirodha iti. evamādyākārapravṛttaṃ sthānāsthānajñānabalam avagaṃtavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12745: aṣṭau karmaphala iti. karmaṇaḥ sāsravasya tadvipākasya ca
T07yabhkvyu:12746: duḥkhasamudayasatyasaṃgṛhītatvāt. nirodhamārgajnāne na bhavata iti. ato
T07yabhkvyu:12748: dhyānādyakṣādhimokṣeṣv iti vistaraḥ. dhyānam ādir āsām iti dhyānādayo dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattayaḥ. dhyānāni catvāri. vimokṣā aṣṭau.
T07yabhkvyu:12749: samādhayas trayaḥ śūnyatādyāḥ. samāpattī dve. asaṃjñinirodhasamāpattī.
T07yabhkvyu:12751: dhyānādayaś cākṣāṇi cādhimokṣāś ceti dvandvaḥ. teṣu nava jñānāni
T07yabhkvyu:12752: nirodhajñānaṃ hitvā. kathaṃ kṛtvā. dhyānādīnāṃ sāsravānāsravasaṃprayuktaviprayuktabhedāt tadālaṃbanāni nava jñānāni saṃbhavanti. nirodhajñānaṃ tu na bhavati. [teṣāṃ san nirodhajñānaṃ tu na
T07yabhkvyu:12753: bhavati.] teṣāṃ saṃskṛtatvāt. indriyeṣv api śraddhādiṣu. [Tib. 310a] yat pradhānāpradhānajñānaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrendriyabhedena. tat
T07yabhkvyu:12754: parāparajñānabalaṃ. teṣv api sāsravānāsravabhedabhinneṣu nava jñānāni saṃbhavanti nirodhajñānaṃ hitvā. pradhānādiṣu rucayo nānādhimuktayaḥ. tāḥ punaḥ sāsravānāsravās traidhātukāś ca tadālambanatvāt nirodhajñānaṃ hitvā.
T07yabhkvyu:12755: evaṃ nānādhātujñānabalaṃ. tatra hi dhātuḥ pūrvābhyāsavāsanāsamudāgata āśayo dhātur ity ācāryasaṃghabhadraḥ. sa punas tu eva te cittacaittā
T07yabhkvyu:12756: viśiṣṭāḥ. teṣāṃ tathaiva sāsravānāsravabhedabhinnānāṃ nirodhajñanaṃ hitvā nava jñānāni bhavantīti pūrvavad yojyaṃ. pratipatsv iti vistaraḥ. bahvyo
T07yabhkvyu:12758: yāvad devagāminī. nirodhagāmini ca. tatra yā narakādigāminyaḥ pratipadaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12759: tā hetuḥ. pratipadyante tābhir iti kṛtvā. mārgo hi pratipady ucate. tena hi visaṃyogaḥ pratipadyate. nirodhas tu kathaṃ. sa cāpi pratipat.
T07yabhkvyu:12760: pratipadyate tam iti kṛtvā. pratipatphalaṃ vā pratipad ity ucyate. ata
T07yabhkvyu:12761: evāha. yadi saphalā pratipad gṛhyata iti. hetur hi sarvatragāmini pratipad
T07yabhkvyu:12764: tatra satkāyaḥ paṃcopādānaskaṃdhāḥ. samudaya utpāda ihābhipretaḥ. evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskaṃdhasya samudayo bhavatīti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12765: satkāyanirodho visaṃyogaḥ. tatra sarvatra gaṃtuṃ śīlam asyā iti
T07yabhkvyu:12766: sarvatragāminī cāsau pratipac ca sarvatragāminīpratipat. tat jñānaṃ tad
T07yabhkvyu:12767: eva ca balam iti. sarvatragāminīpratipajjñānabalaṃ. tad daśa jñānāni
T07yabhkvyu:12768: yojyāni. yadi nirodhajñānam evāsravakṣayajñānam iti. āsravāṇāṃ kṣaye nirodhe jñānam. āsravanirodhālambanaṃ jñānam ity arthaḥ. evaṃ sati ṣaḍ
T07yabhkvyu:12770: atha kṣīṇāsravasaṃtāna iti. āsravakṣaye sati yaj jñānaṃ. tad āsavakṣayajñānam ity arthaḥ. kṣīṇāsravasaṃtāne sarvāṇi jñānāni
T07yabhkvyu:12772: anyatra buddhānutpādād iti. jaṃbūdvīpād anyatra buddhānutpādad iti jaṃbūdvīpapuruṣāśrayāṇi daśa balāni buddhāśrayotpatter ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12773: tad eva daśavidhajñānam anyasya balaṃ nocyata iti. anyasyāpy etad asti na tu balaṃ vyāhatatvāt. [Tib. 311a] yat tv avyāhataṃ. tad balam āveṇika ity
T07yabhkvyu:12774: abhiprāyaḥ. pravrajanaprekṣapuruṣapratyākhyānam iti vistaraḥ. pravrajanaṃ pravrajyā prekṣyate pravrajanaprekṣaḥ. tasya pravrajanaprekṣasya puruṣasya
T07yabhkvyu:12776: anyasya vyāhanyate jñānam iti. āryaśāriputreṇa kila kasyacit
T07yabhkvyu:12777: pravrajyāprekṣasya puruṣasya mokṣabhāgīyaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ vyavalokayatā na dṛṣṭam iti pratyākhyāto na pravrājita ity arthaḥ. bhagavatā tu dṛṣṭaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12778: pravrājitaś ca. taṃ cādhikṛtya bhikṣubhiḥ prṣṭena bhagavatoktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12779: anenaivedaṃ karma kṛtaṃ. yad arhattvaṃ prāptā. na hi karmāṇi pṛthivīdhātau
T07yabhkvyu:12780: vipacyante. nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātau. api tūpātteṣv eva
T07yabhkvyu:12782: mokṣabījam ahaṃ hy asya svasūkṣmam upalakṣaye.
T07yabhkvyu:12787: iti. balasyeyaṃ saṃjñā nārāyaṇam iti. yasya ca tad balam. asāv api nārāyaṇa ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12788: bhadanta iti [Tib. 311b] dārṣṭāṃtikaḥ sthaviraḥ. anyathā hīti. yadi mānasavat kāyikabalaṃ neṣyate. anaṃtasya jñānabalasya sahiṣṇur na syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:12789: sahanaśīlo bhagavān na bhaved ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12790: saṃdhiṣv anya ity uktam asthisaṃdhiviśeṣopanyāsaḥ. nāgagraṃthir iti vistaraḥ. nāgagranthisaṃdhayo buddhāḥ. nāgapāśo nāgagraṃthiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12793: iti. hastyādīnāṃ hastigandhahastimahānagnapraskaṃdivarāṃgacāṇūranārāyaṇānāṃ saptakaṃ tasya balaṃ daśabhir adhikaṃ daśabhyo vādhikaṃ. katham ity āha. yad daśānāṃ prākṛtahastināṃ sānānyahastināṃ balaṃ. tad ekasya gandhahastino balaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12794: evaṃ yad daśānāṃ gandhahastināṃ balaṃ. tad ekasya mahānagnasya balaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12795: yāvad yad daśānāṃ cāṇūrāṇāṃ balaṃ. tad ekasya nārāyaṇasya balam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12796: daśottaravṛddhinagaḥ. daśottaravṛddhyārdhanārāyaṇabalam iti. āditas tathaiva prakramya yad daśānāṃ praskandināṃ balaṃ. tad ardhanārāyaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12798: yathā tu bahutaraṃ. tathā yujyata ity ācāryaḥ. pūrvakam eva pakṣaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12799: samarthayati. anyathā hy anantajñānabalasahiṣṇur na syād iti tad eva kāraṇaṃ. devadattahatahastipādāṃguṣṭhasaptaprākāraparikhākṣepaś
T07yabhkvyu:12801: mahābhūtaviśeṣa eveti. mahābhūtaviśeṣasvabhāvam evedaṃ balaṃ na bhautikam iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:12806: samyaksaṃbuddha udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānāti brāhmyaṃ cakraṃ pravartayati parṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ nadati. katamāni catvāri.
T07yabhkvyu:12807: samyaksaṃbuddhasya bata me sato ime dharmā (Abhidh-k-vy 646)
T07yabhkvyu:12808: anabhisaṃbuddhā ity atra māṃ kaścic chramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā saha dharmeṇa codayet. smārayet. tatrāhaṃ nimittam api na samanupaśyāmi. evaṃ cāhaṃ nimittam asamanupaṣyan kṣemaprāptaś ca viharāmy abhayaprāptaś ca vaiśāradyaprāptaś ca udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānāmi brāhmyaṃ cakraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12809: pravartayāmi. parṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ nadāmi. idaṃ prathamaṃ vaiśāradyaṃ. kṣīṇāsravasya bata me sata ime āsravā aprahīṇā ity atra māṃ kaścid iti pūrvavat. yāvat parṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ [Tib. 312b] nadāmi.
T07yabhkvyu:12810: idaṃ dvitīyaṃ vaiśāradyaṃ. ye vā punar mayā śrāvakāṇām āntarāyikā dharmā
T07yabhkvyu:12811: ākhyātāḥ. tān pratiṣevamāṇasya nālam antarāyāyety atra māṃ kaścid iti pūrvavat. idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vaiśāradyaṃ. yo vā punar mayā śrāvakāṇāṃ mārga
T07yabhkvyu:12812: ākhyātaḥ āryo nairyāṇiko nairvedhiko niryāti. tatkarasya samyagduḥkhakṣayāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai sa na niryāsyatīty atra māṃ kaścid iti pūrvavat. idaṃ caturthaṃ vaiśāradyam iti. yathā sthānāsthānajñānabalam iti vistaraḥ. yathā sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ daśa
T07yabhkvyu:12813: jñānāni sarvabhūmisaṃgṛhītaṃ ca. evaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bata me sata ity
T07yabhkvyu:12814: etad vaiśāradyaṃ. tathaiva daśadhā dharmāṇāṃ bhedaṃ kṛtvā yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12815: yathāsravakṣayajñānabalaṃ ṣaṭ daśa vā jñānāni daśabhūmisaṃgṛhītaṃ ca. evaṃ kṣīṇāsravasyeti dvitīyaṃ vaiśāradyam atrāpi tathaiva dharmāṇāṃ bhedaṃ kṛtvā ṣaṭ daśa vā jñānānīti yojyaṃ. yathā karmasvakajñānabalam aṣṭau
T07yabhkvyu:12816: jñānāni nirodhamārgajñāne hitvā sarvabhūmisaṃgṛhītaṃ ca. evaṃ ya vā punar mayā śrāvakāṇām āntarāyikā iti vistareṇa tṛtīyaṃ vaiśāradyam. atrāpi tathaiva dharmāṇāṃ bhedaṃ kṛtvā duḥkhasamudayasatyasaṃgṛhītā
T07yabhkvyu:12817: evāntarāyikāḥ. na nirodhamārgasatyasaṃgṛhītā [Tib. 313a] ity aṣṭau jñānānīti yojyaṃ. yathā sarvatragāminīpratipajjñānabalaṃ daśa jñānāni nava vā sarvabhūmisaṃgṛhītaṃ ca. evaṃ yo vā mayā śrāvakāṇāṃ niryāṇāya mārga ākhyāta ity etad vaiśāradyaṃ. atrāpi saphalasāsravānāsravamārgagrahaṇato daśa jñānāni. aphalatadgrahaṇato vā naveti yojyaṃ. nirbhayatā hi vaiśāradyam. ebhiś ca jñānair nirbhayo bhavatīti jñānāni vaiśāradyānīti
T07yabhkvyu:12819: ācārya āha. jñānakṛtaṃ tu vaiśāradyaṃ. na jñānam eveti. atha va ācāryavacanam evaitat sarvaṃ. nirbhayatā hi vaiśāradyaṃ. tathā hi tadbhayapratipakṣo dharmaś caitasikaḥ. bhayam api caitasiko dharma iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12820: ebhiś ca jñānair hetubhūtair nirbhayo bhavatīti. tat kathaṃ jñānam eva
T07yabhkvyu:12821: vaiśāradyaṃ. jñānakṛtaṃ tu vaiśāradyaṃ yujyate na jñānam eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:12822: (VII.38cd) yathāsūtram iti trīṇīmāni bhikṣavaḥ smṛtyupasthānāni. yāny
T07yabhkvyu:12823: āryaḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy 647) sevate. yāny āryaḥ sevamāno 'rhati gaṇam
T07yabhkvyu:12824: anuśāsayituṃ. katamāni trīni. iha bhikṣavaḥ śāstā śravakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati anukaṃpakaḥ kāruṇiko 'rthakāmo hitaiṣī karuṇāyamānaḥ. idaṃ vo hitāya idaṃ vo sukhāya idaṃ vo hitasukhāya. [Tib. 313b] tasya me śrāvakāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12825: śuśrūṣante. śrotram avadadhati. ājñācittam upasthāpayanti. pratipadyante dharmasyānudharman prati. na vyatikramya vartante śāstuḥ śāsane. tena tathāgatasya na nandī bhavati na saumanasyaṃ na cetasa utplāvitatvam.
T07yabhkvyu:12826: upekṣakas tatra tathāgato viharati smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan. idaṃ prathamaṃ smṛtyupasthānaṃ. yad āryaḥ sevate. yad āryaḥ sevamāno 'rhati gaṇam
T07yabhkvyu:12827: anuśāsayitum. punar aparaṃ śāstā dharmaṃ deśayati pūrvavat. tasya te śrāvakā na śuśrūṣante. na śrotram avadadhati. nājñācittam upasthāpayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:12828: na pratipadyante dharmasyānudharmaṃ. vyatikramya vartante śāstuḥ śāsane.
T07yabhkvyu:12829: tena tathāgatasya nāghāto bhavati nākṣāntir nāpratyayo na cetaso 'nabhirāddhiḥ. upekṣakas tatra tathāgato viharati smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan. idaṃ dvitīyaṃ smṛtyupasthānaṃ. yad āryaḥ sevate. yad āryaḥ sevamāno 'rhati
T07yabhkvyu:12830: gaṇam anuśāsayituṃ. punar aparaṃ bhikṣavaḥ yāvac chāsane tatra
T07yabhkvyu:12831: tathāgatasya na nandī bhavati na saumanasyaṃ na cetasa utplāvitatvaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12833: upekṣakas tatra tathāgato viharati smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan. idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ smṛtyupasthānaṃ. yad āryaḥ sevate. yad āryaḥ sevamāno 'rhati gaṇam anuśāsayitum iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12835: iti. ubhayasvabhāvam iti darśayati. smṛtaḥ saṃprajānann iti vacanāt. yadā śrāvakasyāpīti vistaraḥ. yadā śrāvakasyāpi hīnakleśasya śuśrūṣamāṇeṣu ca śiṣyeṣv aśuśrūṣamāṇeṣu ca ubhayeṣu ca śuśrūṣamāṇāśuśrūṣamāṇeṣu ca. nandī anunayo ma bhavati. āghāto vā dveṣo vā.
T07yabhkvyu:12836: kasmād ete āveṇikā asādhāraṇā buddhadharmā ucyaṃte. savāsanaprahāṇaḍ iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12837: savāsanānām ānamdyādīnāṃ prahāṇāt. kā punar iyaṃ vāsanā nāma śrāvakāṇāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12838: yo hi yatkleśacaritaḥ pūrvaṃ. tasya tatkṛtaḥ kāyavāgaceṣṭāvikārahetusāmarthyaviśeṣaś citte vāsanety ucyate. avyākṛtaś cittaviśeṣo vāsaneti bhadantānantavarmā. atha veti vistareṇācāryaḥ. yasya śrāvakā buddhasya bhagavataḥ śrāvakā bhavanti nānyasya. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12841: āścaryam adbhutaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 648) vyavasthāpyate. nānyasya śrāvakasyety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12842: (VII.39) anyathā hīti vistaraḥ. yadi saṃvṛtijñānasvabhāvā na syād adveṣasvabhāvā syāt karuṇāvat. na sarvasattvālaṃbanā sidhyet. na traidhātukasattvālaṃbanā sidhyed ity arthaḥ. yathā karuṇā na
T07yabhkvyu:12844: duḥkhitasattvālambanatvād evaṃ siddhaṃ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ. na ca triduḥkhatākārā sidhyed iti vartate karuṇāvat. yathā karuṇā duḥkhatākāraiva na triduḥkhatākārā
T07yabhkvyu:12848: kasmād iyam ityādi. saṃbhāreṇa mahāpuṇyajñānasaṃbhārasamudāgamād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12852: vīryadhyānapāramite tu dvidhā ubhayatravyāpārāt. na hi vinā vīryeṇa dānaṃ dīyate śīlaṃ samādīyate kṣāntir bhāvyata iti mahāpuṇyasaṃbhārabhāgīyaṃ vīryaṃ bhavati. tathā nāntareṇa vīryaṃ prajñā bhavatīti mahājñānasaṃbhārabhāgīyaṃ bhavati. tathā maitryādicaturvidhāpramāṇabhāvanāpakṣaṃ dhyānaṃ mahāpuṇyasaṃbhārabhāgīyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12854: samudāgamān nirvṛtter mahatīyaṃ karuṇeti mahākaruṇā. ākāreṇa
T07yabhkvyu:12855: triduḥkatākaraṇāt. yasmāt tisṛbhir api duḥkhatābhir ākārayati na
T07yabhkvyu:12857: yasmāt traidhātukopapannan sattvān ālambate na ca kāmadhātūpapannān eva karuṇāvat.
T07yabhkvyu:12859: [Tib. 315b] iti vacanāt. samatvena sarvasattveṣu samavṛttitvāt. yasmāt sarvasattveṣu traidhātukaparyāpanneṣu samaṃ vartate saṃskāraduḥkhatākāreṇa. ato 'pi mahākaruṇety ucyate. tato
T07yabhkvyu:12860: 'dhimātratarābhāvād iti. prajñāsvabhāvatayā tīkṣṇataratvāt. yathā hi tayā
T07yabhkvyu:12861: karuṇāyate. na tathā karuṇayeti. nānākaraṇaṃ viśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12863: mahākaruṇāyāś cāmohasvabhāvatvād ity arthaḥ. ekatriduḥkhatākāratvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12864: ekaduḥkhatākāratvāt karuṇāyāḥ. triduḥkhākāratvāc ca mahākaruṇāyaḥ. ity
T07yabhkvyu:12867: anāgamyadhyānāntarayoḥ prathamadhyānagrahaṇena grahaṇān na ṣaḍbhūmikety uktaṃ. mahākaruṇā tu caturthadhyānabhūmikaiva sarvasamādhikarmaṇyatvena tasyaiva tadutpādanasamarthatvāt. śrāvakādibuddhasaṃtānajatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12870: bhavāgravairāgyalabhyā mahākaruṇā. aparitrāṇaparitrāṇata iti. karuṇayā śrāvakādayaḥ karuṇāyanta eva kevalaṃ anuglāyaṃty evety arthaḥ. na saṃsārabhayāt paritrāyante. mahākaruṇayā tu karuṇāyamāno bhagavān mahataḥ saṃsārabhayāt paritrāyte. atulyatulyakaruṇāyanāt. karuṇayātulyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12871: karuṇāyate. duḥkhitānām eva karunāyanāt. mahākaruṇayā tu tulyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12873: (VII.40) pūrvapuṇyajñānasaṃbhārasaṃudāgamata iti. pūrveṣu janmasu puṇyasaṃbhāreṇa pūrvoktena jñānasaṃbhāreṇa ca samudāgamataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12875: āśrayaparivṛttir vā. arthacaryayā ceti. svargāpavargakāraṇam artho lokasya. tasya saṃpādanam arthacaryā. tulyā hi sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ mahākaruṇā parārthahetuḥ. yathākālam iti. sarvatrābhisaṃbadhyate. kathaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12876: cirālpajīvanād yathākālaṃ dīrghāyuṣi prajāyāṃ dīrgāyuṣo buddhā bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:12877: alpāyuṣy alpāyuṣaḥ. yathāsaṃbhavaṃ kṣatriyaguruke loke kṣatriyā bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:12878: brāhmaṇaguruke brāhmaṇāḥ. yathākālam eva ca kāśyapādigotrāḥ. [Tib. 316b]
T07yabhkvyu:12882: sarvaguṇajñānasaṃbhārābhyāsa iti. guṇāḥ paṃcapāramitāsvabhāvāḥ. jñānānāni ca prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvāni. teṣāṃ guṇajñānānāṃ saṃbhāraḥ. tasyābhyāsaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12884: nirantarābhyāso 'sāntaratayā. satkṛtyabhyāsas tīvrādaratayā. caturvidhā phalasaṃpad iti. dharmakāyapariniṣpattyā jñānādisaṃpadaś catasro
T07yabhkvyu:12885: bhavantīti tā api phalasaṃpada iti vyavasthāpyante. jñānasaṃpac caturvidheti vakṣyati. tathā prahāṇasaṃpat prabhāvasaṃpat rūpakāyasaṃpac ca caturvidheti vakṣyati. tad evāsāṃ vyākhyānaṃ bhaviṣyati.
T07yabhkvyu:12888: saṃsāraś ca. tayor duḥkhaṃ. (Abhidh-k-vy 650) tato 'tyantanirmokṣaḥ. saiva saṃpad iti. yānatrayasugatipratiṣṭhāpanasaṃpad [Tib. 317a] veti. yānatraye ca śrāvakayānādau. sugatau ca pratiṣṭhāpanaṃ. saiva saṃpad iti. iyaṃ vā caturvidhopakārasaṃpat. anupadiṣṭajñānam iti svayam abhisaṃbodhanārthena.
T07yabhkvyu:12890: iti. sarvaprakārāvabodhanārthena. ayatnajñānam itīcchāmātrāvabodhanārthena sarvakleśaprahāṇam iti traidhātukadarśanabhāvanāheyakleśocchitteḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12891: atyantaprahāṇam ity aparihāṇitaḥ. savāsanaprahāṇam iti. anubaṃdhābhāvataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12894: tatrāpūrvabāhyaviṣayotpādanaṃ nirmāṇam. aśmādīnāṃ suvarṇādibhāvāpādanaṃ pariṇāmaḥ. dīrghakālāvasthānam adhiṣṭhānam iti. āyuṣa utsarge 'dhiṣṭhāne
T07yabhkvyu:12895: ca vaśitvasaṃpad āyurutsargādhiṣṭhānavaśitvasaṃpad iti. āvṛteti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12896: āvṛtagamanaṃ cākāśagamanaṃ ca sudūrakṣipragamanaṃ ca. brāhmaṇād ity anavad
T07yabhkvyu:12897: ekaśeṣaḥ. alpe bahūnāṃ praveśaḥ. paramāṇau bahūnāṃ hastyādīnāṃ [Tib. 317b]
T07yabhkvyu:12898: praveśaḥ. sa cety āvṛtākāśāsudūrakṣipragamanālpabahupahupraveśaḥ. tayor vaśitvasaṃpad iti yojyaṃ. vividhā nānāprakārā nijāḥ svābhāvikāḥ. ke.
T07yabhkvyu:12899: āścaryadharmāḥ. teṣāṃ saṃpad iti yojyaṃ. dharmataiṣā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12900: yat teṣāṃ gacchatāṃ nimnasthalaṃ ca samībhavati. yad uccaṃ. tan
T07yabhkvyu:12901: nicībhavati. yan nīcaṃ. tad uccībhavati. aṃdhāś cakṣūṃṣi pratilabhaṃte.
T07yabhkvyu:12902: badhirāḥ śrotram. unmattāḥ smṛtim iti yathāsūtraṃ sarvam anusartavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12904: saṃpat. anuvyaṃjanasaṃpad iti. vṛttāṃgulitāmratuṃganakhatvādīnāṃ aśīter anuvyaṃjanānāṃ saṃpat. balasaṃpan nārāyaṇaṃ balaṃ. vajrasārāṇy asthīny asyeti vājrasārāsthi. vajrasārāsthiśarīram asyeti vajrasārāsthiśarīraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12905: tadbhāvaḥ. tasya saṃpad iti. vajrasārāsthiśarīratāsaṃpad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12906: etat sāmāsikaṃ sāṃkṣepikaṃ. ye kecit prasādajātāḥ satpuruṣā buddhaṃ bhagavantam astāviṣuḥ stuvanti stoṣyaṃti vā. sarve te etayaiva trividhayā
T07yabhkvyu:12907: saṃpadeti. yady anekā asaṃkhyeyāḥ kalpā asyety anekāsaṃkhyeyakalpaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12908: jīvitaṃ. tad yady adhitiṣṭheyur buddhā bhagavantaḥ. [Tib. 318a] evaṃ te sakalaṃ tanmāhātmyaṃ jñātuṃ vaktuṃ vaktuṃ ca samarthāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12909: tasyānantaprabhedatvenātibahutvād ity abjiprāyaḥ. evaṃ ca tāvad iti
T07yabhkvyu:12910: vistaraḥ. guṇāś ca jñānāni ca prabhāvaś (Abhidh-k-vy 651) copakāraś ceti dvaṃdvaḥ. anantāś ca te 'dbhutāś ceti punaḥ karmadhārayaḥ. eta eva mahāratnāni. teṣām ākarās tathāgatāḥ. atha ca punar bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ svaguṇadāridryeṇānumānabhūtena hatādhimokṣā hatarucayaḥ yāvad buddhaṃ nādriyaṃte buddhe nādaraṃ kurvantīty arthaḥ. śraddhāmātrakeṇāpīti.
T07yabhkvyu:12911: niradhigamenety arthaḥ. aniyatavipākānām iti. niyatavipākānām alaṃghanīyatvād ity abhiprāyaḥ. deveṣu bhasvā daivī.
T07yabhkvyu:12916: anuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetram ucyaṃte tathāgatā iti. kārān ity upakārān
T07yabhkvyu:12918: (VII.41) yathāyogam iti. yathāsaṃbhavaṃ. [Tib. 318b] kecid guṇāḥ śrāvakasādhāraṇā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ araṇāpraṇidhijñānādayaḥ. kecit pṛthagjanasādhāraṇāḥ abhijñādhyānārāpyādayaḥ. ādiśabdena śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitādayo gṛhyante.
T07yabhkvyu:12919: (VII.42) na kasyacit tadālaṃbano rāga utpadyate dveṣo māno veti. tenātmano
T07yabhkvyu:12920: darśanādiparihārāt. yathāyathā ca tenābhisamitaṃ bhavaty araṇāsamādher abhyutthitenāsya māṃ dṛṣṭvā rāga utpatsyate asya dveṣaḥ asya māna
T07yabhkvyu:12921: asyāprasāda utpatsyate iti. tathātathā vyutthito 'pi tasmāt samādher anuveṣṭate. paracittarakṣaṇopāyaviśeṣe tu tasyāraṇāsamādher
T07yabhkvyu:12922: utpattimātrasāmarthyād eva pareṣāṃ kleśo notpadyata ity artho gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12923: raṇayatīti kleśayatīty arthaḥ. sukhapratipadām agratvāc caturthadhyānasya
T07yabhkvyu:12924: tadbhūmikaivāraṇā. nānyadhyānabhūmikā. parihartuṃ na śaknotīti parihāṇi
T07yabhkvyu:12927: ke. rāgādayo bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ. avastukāḥ kleśā darśanaprahātavyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12931: iti. sarvam ālaṃbata iti sarvālaṃbanaṃ. sarvo vāsyālaṃbana iti
T07yabhkvyu:12932: sarvālambanaṃ. nāraṇāvat kleśamātrālambanaṃ. kiṃ tarhi. rūpādyālaṃbanam apīty arthaḥ. ārūpyas tu na sākṣāt praṇidhijñānena jñāyante. kim kāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12936: iti. praṇidhijñānaṃ cābhijñāvat bhavatīti. niṣyandacaritaviśeṣād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12937: tatra niṣyaṃdo mandamandatā. caritam ārūpyasamāpattivihāraḥ. tad evaṃ kāryeṇāsyānumānaṃ. kāraṇena ca kāryāsyeti paridīpitam. tataḥ pracyutānāṃ tatsamāpattilābhiṇāṃ ca tad ubhayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ. kārṣakanidarśanaṃ cātreti.
T07yabhkvyu:12938: yathā kārṣakaḥ phalena bījaṃ pratipadyate. bījena vā phalam iti. yathā vā kārṣako jānīte īdṛśe kṣetre īdṛśāphalaṃ dhānyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. dhānyaṃ vā dṛṣṭvā kṣetram anuminoti. īdṛśam asya kṣetram iti. evaṃ śāntamūrtiṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā anuminoti ārūpyāc cyuto 'yam. ārūpyeṣu copapatsyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12939: vaibhāṣikā iti vacanaṃ. pareṣām asty anenārūpyajñānam iti sūcayati. na hi buddānām asty aviṣaya ity abhiprāyaḥ. [Tib. 319b] praṇidhipūrvakam ity ābhogapūrvakaṃ. praṇidhāyābhujyety arthaḥ. yāvāṃs tatsamādhiviṣaya iti.
T07yabhkvyu:12940: yāvāṃ cchrāvakasya viṣayaḥ. tāvaj jānāti. pratyekabuddhasya ca yāvatsvaviṣaya ityādi.
T07yabhkvyu:12941: (VII.43-45) dharmapratisaṃvid iti. iha deśanādharmaḥ. anekārtho hi dharmaśabdaḥ. tadyathā dharmaṃ vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi. ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmiti, atra
T07yabhkvyu:12942: deśanādharmaḥ. dharmaḥ katamaḥ. āryāṣṭāṃgamārga ity atra
T07yabhkvyu:12943: pratipattidharmaḥ. tathā dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchetety atra phaladharmo
T07yabhkvyu:12944: nirvāṇam ityādi. avivartyam iti. aśakyaṃ vivartayituṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12947: yuktam arthasaṃbaṃdhaṃ. muktam asaktaṃ. yuktamuktam abhilapatīti yuktamuktābhilāpī. tadbhāvaḥ. tasyāṃ. yuktamuktābhilāpitāyāṃ. samādhau vaśī samādhivaśī. samādhivaśinaḥ saṃprakhyānam asaṃmoṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12953: navajñānasvabhāvā anyatra nirodhajñānāt. sarvadharmāś ced artho daśa
T07yabhkvyu:12954: jñānānīti. na hi so 'sti dharmaḥ. yo daśānāṃ jñānānāṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12955: nālambanībhavati. nirvāṇāṃ ced arthaḥ ṣaṭ jñānānīti. nirodhajñānasya
T07yabhkvyu:12957: nāmakāyādivāgālambanatvād iti. na hi duḥkhādijñānam anāsravaṃ duḥkhaikadeśaṃ samudayaikadeśaṃ vā svalakṣaṇākāreṇālambate. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:12959: iti. ūrdhvaṃ nāmakāyabhāvād iti. ārūpyadhātau dharmapratisaṃvin nāstīti.
T07yabhkvyu:12960: yatra ca nāmakāyāḥ. tatraiva padavyañjanakāyā iti [Tib. 320b] tulyavārttā.
T07yabhkvyu:12961: nāmakāyabhāvavacanena padavyañjanakāyābhāvasiddhiḥ. ūrdhvaṃ vitarkābhāvād iti. dvitīyadhyānādiṣu. vitarkya vicārya vācaṃ bhāṣata iti sūtraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12962: nāmādyālambanatvaṃ punar āsāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ samāpannasyāpi. vyutthitasyāpi tatpṛṣṭhalabdhair avivartyair jñānair nāmādyālambanatvaṃ. bhāṣaṇaṃ punas tatpṛṣṭhenaiva. strīpuruṣādyadhivacana iti. ādiśabdena
T07yabhkvyu:12963: kālakārakādisaṃgrahaḥ. adhivacanaṃ punaḥ paryāyaḥ. tad adhikṛtya vā
T07yabhkvyu:12964: vacanaṃ tadadhivacanaṃ. tasyāsaktatāyām iti. tasyādhivacanasya tasya padavyañjanasya vā. ata evāsāṃ kramasiddhir iti. yataḥ
T07yabhkvyu:12968: tasmād rūpam ity evaṃādīti. ādiśabdena vijānātīti vijñānaṃ. cinotīti cittam ity evamādi saṃgrahataḥ. uttarottarapratibhā pratibhānam iti
T07yabhkvyu:12969: vādanyāyena. yathākramam iti. dharmapratisaṃvido gaṇitaṃ pūrvaprayogaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12973: iti. [Tib. 321a] kiṃcic caturthaṃ dhyānam araṇātmakaṃ. kiṃcit
T07yabhkvyu:12974: praṇidhijñānātmakaṃ. kiṃcit tripratisaṃvidātmakaṃ. kiṃcit tadvyatiriktaṃ kevalaṃ prāntakoṭikam iti. tisraḥ pratisaṃvida iti. niruktipratisaṃvidaṃ muktvā tatra vitarkābhāvāt. savitarkavicāreṇa tadutthāpanaṃ. kathaṃ tarhy aviśeṣeṇaitad uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12976: iti. ete ucyante. niruktipratisaṃvidaḥ tadbalena lābho na tu sā
T07yabhkvyu:12979: iti. sarvabhūmyanukūlitam ity arthaḥ. pragatā antā koṭir asyeti. pragatā antaṃ prāntā. prāntā koṭir asyeti prāntakoṭikā. catuṣkoṭikavad iti. yathā catuṣkoṭikaś catuḥprakārapraśnaḥ. tadvat.
T07yabhkvyu:12983: iti. sūtraṃ cātra. iha bhikṣur anekavidham ṛddhiviṣayaṃ pratyanubhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:12984: eko bhūtvā bahudhā bhavati bahudhābhūtvā eko bhavatīti vistaragraṃtha ṛddhipādā ity atra likhito draṣṭavyaḥ. yāvad iyam ucyate
T07yabhkvyu:12985: ṛddhiviṣayajñānasākṣātkriyābhijñeti. iha bhikṣur divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa ubhayāṃ cchabdān śṛṇoti mānuṣān amānuṣān api ye vā dūre [Tib. 321b] ye vāntika iti. iyaṃ ucyate divyaśrotrajñānasākṣātkriyābhijñā. ikha bhikṣur divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāṃtamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyatīti bahuḥ sūtravad granthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12986: yāvad iyam ucyate divyacakṣurjñānasākṣātkriyābhijñā. iha bhikṣur anekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmaratīti bahuḥ sūtravad granthaḥ. yāvad iyam ucyate pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānasākṣātkriyābhijñā. iha bhikṣuḥ parasattvānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12987: parapudgalānāṃ vitarkitaṃ vicaritaṃ manasā mānasaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:12988: sarāgacittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. vigatarāgaṃ vigatarāgam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. sadveṣaṃ vigatadveṣaṃ samohaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12989: vigatamohaṃ vikṣiptaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ līnaṃ pragṛhītam uddhatam anuddhatam avyupaśāntaṃ vyupaśāntaṃ samāhitam asamāhitam abhāvitaṃ bhāvitam avimuktaṃ cittam avimuktaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. vimuktaṃ cittaṃ vimuktaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. iyam ucyate cetaḥparyāyajñānasākṣātkriyābhijñā. iha bhikṣur idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ. ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ. iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam [Tib. 322a] iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. tasyaivaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyataḥ kāmāsravāc cittaṃ vimucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:12990: bhavāsravād avidāsravāc cittaṃ vimucyate. vimuktasya vimukto 'smīti
T07yabhkvyu:12991: jñānadarśanaṃ bhavati. kṣīṇā me jātir yāvan nāparam asmād bhavaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12993: samādhiḥ. ṛddhiviṣayo nirmāṇaṃ gamanaṃ ca. ṛddhiviṣaye jñānaṃ. tasya sākṣātkriyā saṃmukhībhāvaḥ. ṛddhiviṣayajñānasakṣātkriyābhijñā. divyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:12994: śrotraṃ. tatra jñānaṃ. tasya sākṣātkriyā divyaśrotrajñānasākṣatkriyā.
T07yabhkvyu:12995: cetaḥparyāyo viśeṣaḥ. raktaṃ dviṣṭaṃ mūḍham iti vā kramo vā paryāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:12996: kadācid raktaṃ kadācid dviṣṭaṃ mūḍhaṃ ceti. tatra jñānaṃ. tasya
T07yabhkvyu:12997: sākṣātkriyā. pūrvenivāsaḥ skaṃdhega ivāluk. tasyānusmṛtiḥ tatra jñānaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:12998: tasya sākṣātkriyeti. (Abhidh-k-vy 655) cyutiś copapādaś ca cyutyupapādau.
T07yabhkvyu:12999: tayor jñānaṃ. tasya sākṣātkriyā. āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaḥ. tatra jñānaṃ. tasya sākṣātkriyābhijñeti pratyekam abhisaṃbaṃdhaḥ. śrāmaṇyaphalavad iti. yathā saṃskṛtaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalaṃ vimuktimārgasvabhāvaṃ. tadvat.
T07yabhkvyu:13001: iti. cetasi cetaḥparyāyair yābhijñā. [Tib. 322b] sā jñānapaṃcakasvabhāvety arthaḥ. anāsravasya paracittajñānasya dharmānvayamārgaparacittajñānatvasaṃbhavāt. sāsravasya ca saṃvṛtiparacittajñānasaṃbhavāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13005: dharmānvayakṣayānutpādajñānasaṃjñitatvāt. saṃvṛtijñānasya ca nirodhālambanatvasaṃbhavāt. āsravakṣaye sati yaj jñānaṃ. kṣīṇāsravasaṃtāne taj jñānam iti cet. daśa jñānāni. kṣīṇāsravasaṃtāne daśajñānasadbhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13006: evam āsravakṣaya ālambanabhūte yābhijñā. sā ced āsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyābhijñā. ṣaṭ jñānāni. tadvat. āsravakṣaye sati yābhijñā. sā ced daśa jñānāni. tadvad iti. sarvabhūmikāpy eṣeti.
T07yabhkvyu:13007: balam yadvad ity anenaiva vacanenāyam artho labhyate. yasmāc ca
T07yabhkvyu:13008: paṃcaiva dhyānacatuṣṭaya ity avadhāryate. tasmād apīyam ṣaṣṭhy abhijñā sarvabhūmiketi gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13009: tisras tāvan na santīti. ṛddhidivyaśrotradivyacakṣurabhijñā. kasmāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13010: rūpālaṃbanatvāt. na hy ārūpyāṇāṃ rūpam ālaṃbanam. vibhūtarūpasaṃjñātvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13011: rūpatīrthābhiniṣpādyatvād [Tib. 323a] iti. rūpatvadvāraniṣpādyatvāt rūpālaṃbanamārganiṣpādyatvād ity arthaḥ. īdṛśe rūpe īdṛśaṃ cittaṃ bhavatīti na cārūpyāṇāṃ rūpam ālaṃbanaṃ. pūrvenivāsānusmṛtir api nāsty
T07yabhkvyu:13013: 'vasthāntarāṇi smaranto niṣpādayanti. na cārūpyāṇāṃ kāmāvacarā dharmā
T07yabhkvyu:13016: iti. tāni cāvasthāntarāṇy ātmanaḥ kāmāvacarāṇy abhiniṣpādanakāle tasyālambanam ity etasmāt tadbhūmikā nāstīti. sthānagotrādyālambanatvāc
T07yabhkvyu:13017: ca. tasmād api cyuto 'mutropapannaḥ. tathā hi sūtra uktaṃ. amī nāma (Abhidh-k-vy 656) te sattvāḥ. yatrāham abhūvam evaṃnāmā evaṃgotra evaṃjātir evamāhāra evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evaṃdīrghāyur evaṃcirasthitika evamāyuṣparyantaḥ. yo 'haṃ tasmāc cyuto 'mutropapannaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13018: tasmād api cyuto ['mutropapannaḥ tasmāc cyuta] ihopapanna iti sākāraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13019: soddeśam anekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmaratīti. na cārūpyāḥ sthānagotrādyālambanāḥ [Tib. 323b] adhobhūmyālambanāś cety etasmād api kāraṇān nārūpyabhūmikāḥ. kathaṃ paracittajñānaṃ rūpatīrthābhiniṣpādyam ity ata āha. paracittaṃ hi jñātukāma iti vistaraḥ. ābhujata iti. ābhogaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13020: kurvataḥ. nimittaṃ udgṛhyeti. cittaprakāraṃ paricchidyety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13021: tatprātilomyeneti. tasyaiva cittasya pratīpaṃ samanantaraniruddhāny avasthāntarāṇi manasikaroti. vilaṃghyāpi smaraṇam iti. ekaṃ janma dve vā vilaṃghyāpi vyatikramyāpi smaraṇaṃ. śuddhāvāsānāṃ kathaṃ smaraṇam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13022: yady anubhūtapūrvasyaiva smaraṇaṃ. na hi śuddhāvāsānām ihāgamanam asty anāgāmitvāt. tena naiṣām ihānubhūtiḥ. nāpi tatra. pṛthagjanānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13023: tatrānupapatteḥ. śravaṇevānubhūtatvād iti. śrutaṃ hi tena bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13024: śuddhāvāsā nāma devā evaṃbhūtā iti. dvividho hy anubhavo darśanānubhavaḥ śravaṇānubhavaś ca. parasaṃtatyadhiṣṭhānenotpādanam iti. dhyānasaṃgṛhītaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13025: pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānaṃ. tena cārūpyāvacaraṃ cittaṃ na gṛhṇāti. kathaṃ ca punaḥ parasaṃtatyadhiṣṭhānenotpādanaṃ. samanaṃtaraniruddhān manovijñānāt parakīyān nimittam udgṛhyeti vistaraḥ. anyeṣām iti. ya ārūpyebhyo na
T07yabhkvyu:13027: ṛddhyādīnām iti. ṛddhidivyaśrotradivyacakṣurabhijñānāṃ [Tib. 324a] tisṛṇāṃ yathākramaṃ laghutvamanasikaraṇam ṛddheḥ prayogaḥ. śabdamanasikaraṇaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13029: katham etā labhyaṃta iti prāptim adhikṛtya praśnaḥ. saṃmukhībhāvas tu citānām anucitānāṃ ca prayogata eva. anucitāḥ prayogata iti. vaiśeṣikyo yā anutpāditapūrvāḥ. sarvāsāṃ tu prayogenotpādanam iti. yāś ca vairāgyāl
T07yabhkvyu:13030: labhyante. yāś ca prayogataḥ. tāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13031: anyatra śabdād iti uccheditvāc chabdo na nirmīyate. vakṣyati hi.
T07yabhkvyu:13035: kathaṃ tarhīti vistaraḥ. yadi cakṣurabhijñā rūpāyatanālambanā kathaṃ tarhi cyutyupapādajñānenāmī bata bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā
T07yabhkvyu:13036: ity evamādi. na vāṅmanaskarmasamanvāgamāś cakṣurvijñānena gṛhyante.
T07yabhkvyu:13037: ādiśabdena mithyādṛṣṭigrahaṇam. na tad iti. tad vāṅmanaskarmasamanvāgamādi tena cakṣurjñānena na jānāti. kena tarhīty āha. abhijñāparivārajñānaṃ tu tad iti. mānasaṃ tad ity arthaḥ. śeṣe iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13041: kathaṃ tarhi te caturdhyānabhūmike sidhyataḥ. na hi dvitīyādidhyānabhūmikaṃ cakṣurjñānaṃ śrotrajñānaṃ vāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:13042: cakṣuhśrotravijñānasaṃprayuktatvāt. tayoś ca dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣv abhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13043: vakṣyati hi kāyākṣiśrotravijñānaṃ vijñaptyutthāpakaṃ ca yat dvitīyādau tad ādyāptam
T07yabhkvyu:13044: iti. āśrayavaśeneti vistaraḥ. cakṣuḥśrotrāśrayavaśena tajjñānayor api
T07yabhkvyu:13046: prādhānika eṣa nirdeśo bāhuliko veti. pradhāne bhavaḥ prādhānikaḥ. evaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13047: bāhulikaḥ. kuśalā abhijñāḥ pradhānabhūtāḥ. atas tadapekṣayā nirdeśaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:13048: kriyate. kuśalā prajñābhijñeti. atha vā bāhulyenābhijñāḥ kuśalāḥ. ata evaṃ nirdeśa iti. mudgādibhāve 'pi māṣarāśivyapadeśavat.
T07yabhkvyu:13050: yāvad yathākramam iit. bhagavadviśeṣādayas tāvad āhuḥ. pūrvāntasaṃmohaṃ pūrvenivāsānusmṛtyā nivartayati. cyutyupapādābhijñaya [Tib. 325a]
T07yabhkvyu:13052: prajānāmīti. teṣāṃ vyākhyānakārāṇām abhiprāyaḥ. atītaḥ pratyutpanno 'nāgato 'dhvety adhvānukramaḥ. tasmād evam arthagatir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13053: ācāryasaṃghabhadras tu vyācaṣṭe. pūrvāntādau nivartanāt. pūrvenivāsābhijñā hi pūrvāntasaṃmohaṃ vyāvartayati. aparāntasaṃmohaṃ cyutyupapādābhijñā.
T07yabhkvyu:13054: madhyasaṃmoham āsravakṣayābhijñā. ity ataś ca tisṛṇām eva vidyātvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13055: pūrvayātmaparavipaddarśanāt saṃvegotpatteḥ. parayā pareṣām eva. tathā saṃvignasya bhūtārthāvagamāt tṛtīyayeti. kim atra pratipattavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13057: ācāryasyāpi tathaivābhiprāyo lakṣyate. tathā hi pūrvenivāsacyutyupapādāsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyās tisra ity uktvāha. etā hi pūrvāntāparāntamadhyasaṃmohaṃ vyāvartayanti yathākramam iti. kathaṃ punar gamyateti tisra evābhijñās tisro vidyā iti. yasmād evam āha. aśaikṣī
T07yabhkvyu:13058: [Tib. 325b] pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānasākṣātkriyā vidyā. aśaikṣī cyutyupapādajñānasākṣātkriyā vidyā. aśaikṣy āsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyā vidyeti vidyātrayavyavasthāpanānusūtrād eva. evaṃ hy āha. tripiṭo bhavati trividya iti. aśaikṣī vidyeti. anāsravatvād ity abhiprāyaḥ. naiva rttate pūrvenivāsacyutyupapadābhijñe na śaikṣyau nāśaikṣyau sāsravatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13060: ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ. cetaḥparyāyābhijñā ādeśanāprātihāryaṃ. īdṛśaṃ te cittam
T07yabhkvyu:13061: iti. āsravakṣayābhijñā anuśāsanaprātihāryaṃ. yathābhūtopadeśa ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13062: prātiśabdayor ādikarmabhṛśārthatvād iti. praśabda ādikarmārthaḥ. idam anena karma prārabdham iti. atiśabdaś ca bhṛśārthaḥ atigata iti. tad idam uktaṃ bhavati. vineyamanasām ādita ādau atibhṛśaṃ haraṃty ebhir iti
T07yabhkvyu:13063: prātihāryāṇi. pratihatamadhyasthānām iti. nairuktaṃ vidhim āśrityoktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13068: adhimokṣeṇa nirvṛttā ādhimokṣikī. yad dūraṃ. tad āsannam adhimucya tenāśv āgamanād ādhimokṣikīty
T07yabhkvyu:13070: iti. nādhyātmikaṃ nirmīyate. tannirmāṇe saty apūrvasattvaprādurbhāvaprasaṃgāt. svaparaśarīrasaṃbaddham iti. yat svātmā siṃhāyate nāgāyate vā. tat svaśarīrasambaddhaṃ. [Tib. 326a] yast svātmano bahir nirmīyate siṃho nāgo vā. tat paraśarīrasaṃbaddhaṃ. dvividhaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13071: tathaiveti. svaparaśarīrasaṃbadhaṃ. evaṃ rūpadhātāv iti. yathā kāmadhātūpapanno dvividhaṃ nirmāṇaṃ nirmiṇoti. kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:13072: tad api dvividhāṃ svaparaśarīrasaṃbaddham iti caturvidhaṃ. evaṃ rūpadhātūpapanno 'pi caturvidhaṃ nirmiṇotīti. aṣṭavidhaṃ samāsato nirmāṇaṃ. vastrābharaṇavan na (Abhidh-k-vy 659) samanvāgama iti. yathā ca vastrābharaṇaiḥ svaśarīrasaṃbaddhair apy asattvasaṃkhyātatvāt indriyādhiṣṭhānāsaṃbandhatvād vā na samanvāgamaḥ. tadvat.
T07yabhkvyu:13074: samanvāgamābhavād ity abhiprāyaḥ. na śabdāyatanam uccheditvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13075: abhighātajatvād ity apare. āgantukatvād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13076: (VII.55-58) dvitīyadhyānaphalaṃ trīṇīti. adharabhūmike ca dve svabhūmikaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13077: ceti. catvāri paṃca ca yojyānīti. tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikāni catvāri.
T07yabhkvyu:13078: adharabhūmikāni trīṇi svabhūmikaṃ ceti. caturthadhyānabhūmikāni paṃcādarabhūmikāni catvāri svabhūmikaṃ ceti. dvitīyādidhyānaphalam iti vistaraḥ. [Tib. 326b] dvitīyadhyānaphalaṃ nirmāṇam yan nirmātrā nirmitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13080: viśiṣyate. tad dvitīyadhyānaphalaṃ nirmāṇaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānabhūmiṃ gacchati. prathamadhyānaphalaṃ tu tāṃ na gacchati. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:13081: prathamadhyānabhūmim eveti gamanaviśeṣād viśiṣyate. evaṃ tṛtīyādidhyānaphalam yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13082: dhyānavan lābha iti mauladhyānānām iva vairāgyato nirmāṇacittānāṃ lābhaḥ. śuddhakād dhyānād anaṃtaraṃ nirmāṇacittam iti. nirmāṇacittasaṃmukhībhāve yad ādiṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13083: tac chuddhakād utpadyate. nirmāṇacittād veti dvitīyādipravāhe.
T07yabhkvyu:13084: nirmāṇacittād api śuddhakam iti. nirmāṇacittād vyutthāne nirmāṇacittaṃ ca
T07yabhkvyu:13087: bhāṣyate. ūrdhvaṃ dvitīyādiṣu vijñaptisamutthāpakasya savitarkasya savicārasya cittasyābhāvāt. tathā hy uktaṃ. vitarkya vicārya vācaṃ bhāṣata
T07yabhkvyu:13089: nirmāṇacittābhāvān nirmitābhāva iti. nimittābhāve naimittikasyāpy abhāva
T07yabhkvyu:13090: ity asantaṃ [Tib. 327a] katham enaṃ nirmitaṃ bhāṣayantīti abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13092: iti. nirmāṇacittena nirmitaṃ nirmāya tataś cādhiṣṭhāyāvasthānakāmatayā tiṣṭhatv etad iti. tata uttarakālam anyena vijñaptisamutthāpakena savitarkasavicārakeṇa cittena vācaṃ pravartayanti nirmātāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13093: pūrvābhiprāyaṃ hi saṃtatir anuvartate. pūrvaṃ hi tena cetasi vyavasthāpitaṃ nirmāṇaṃ nirmāsyāmi tad adhiṣṭhāsyāmi tad vācayiṣyāmīti.
T07yabhkvyu:13094: avasthādvaye 'dhiṣṭhānasaṃbhavāt pṛcchati. (Abhidh-k-vy 660) kiṃ jīvita evādhiṣṭhānam ityādi.
T07yabhkvyu:13097: iti. kadācid dhi devādayaḥ parānugrahārthaṃ parān nirmiṇvanti. kadācid viheṭhanārtham ityādi. tatkṛtaṃ ceti vistaraḥ. devādikṛtaṃ ca svaparasambaddhaṃ nirmāṇaṃ navāyatanikaṃ. kutaḥ. aśabdarūpyāyatanatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13098: yasmād aśabdāni cakṣurāyatanarūpāyatanādīni tatra santīti. śabdaḥ saṃtānābhāvān na nirmāyate. acittakatvāc ca na manodharmāyatane. acittako nirmita iti kathaṃ gamyate. śāstrāt. evaṃ hy āha. tannirmitaś cāturmahābhautiko vaktavyo [Tib. 327b] na cāturmahābhautiko vaktavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13099: āha. caturmahābhautiko vaktavyaḥ. upādāyarūpiko nopādāyarūpiko vaktavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13100: āha. upādāyarūpiko vaktavyaḥ. acittiko vaktavyaḥ. kasya cittavaśena vartata iti vaktavyaṃ. āha. nirmātus cittavaśena vartata iti. yadi tarhi navāyatanikaṃ nirmīyate. indriyanirmāṇāt kathaṃ nāpūrvasattvaprādurbhāvo
T07yabhkvyu:13101: bhavati. sattvasaṃkhyātāni hīndriyāṇīti. ata āha. indriyāvinirbhūtatvād
T07yabhkvyu:13102: iti. yasmāc cakṣurādibhir indriyaiḥ paṃcabhiḥ svaparaśarīrasambaddhaṃ nirmāṇaṃ rūparasaspraṣṭavyasvabhāvam avinirbhāgenāvasthitaṃ bhavan navāyatanikam ity ucyate. na tv indriyaṃ nirmīyata iti eṣa siddhāntaḥ. yat punas tad eva svaparaśarīrasambaddhaṃ nirmiṇoti tac caturāyatanikam eva
T07yabhkvyu:13104: (VII.60ab) yathā māṃdhātur āntarābhavikānāṃ ceti. karmajāyā ṛddher etad
T07yabhkvyu:13106: (VII.59) kim ete divye eveti. kim ayaṃ divyaśabdo mukhyavṛttiḥ. āhosvid aupacārika ity abhiprāyaḥ. yadi hy ete divi bhave divye ity artho gṛhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13107: mukhyavṛttir ayaṃ śabdo bhavati. atha tu divye iveti divye ity
T07yabhkvyu:13110: rūpadarśanamukhenābhinirhṛtatvān nityaṃ vijñānasahitam iti. sabhāgam eva.
T07yabhkvyu:13111: kāṇavibhrāntābhāvād iti. kāṇam abhyantaravikalaṃ. vibhrāntaṃ kekaraṃ sarvataś ca na paśyatīti. arthād uktaṃ bhavati. divyaṃ cakṣuḥ pṛṣṭhato 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:13112: paśyati. pārśvato 'pi paśyati na tv evam adivyaṃ cakṣur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13113: (VII.60, 61) divyaśrotrādikam api catuṣṭayam iti. ādiśabdena divyaṃ cakṣuḥ
T07yabhkvyu:13114: pūrvenivāsānusmṛtiḥ paracittajñānaṃ ca. etad api divyaśrotrādikaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13115: catuṣṭayam. (Abhidh-k-vy 661) upapattipratilabdham asti. divyaṃ cakṣuḥ keṣām upapattipratilaṃbhikaṃ. kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānām anāgāmināṃ ca
T07yabhkvyu:13116: rūpāvacarāṇāṃ. nārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ. tatra rūpābhāvat dṛṣṭir gamanaṃ nirmāṇaṃ ca nāsti. nāpi divyaṃ śrotraṃ cakṣuś cāsti. paracittajñānam api nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:13118: kāmarūpāvacarasattvavat tādṛśasyātmabhāvasyāsamudāgamāt. atha vā sarvā apy abhijñā na santi. kāmarūpāvacarasattvavat tādṛśasyātmabhāvasyāsamudāgamāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13119: na yathā bhāvanāphalaṃ kuśalam eveti. viparītadṛṣṭāntaḥ. anyagatisthā nityaṃ jānata iti. tābhyāṃ paracittapūrvenivāsānusmṛtibhyāṃ devādigatisthā
T07yabhkvyu:13122: iti. manuṣyāṇām etad yathoktam ṛddhyādikaṃ vairāgyalābhikaṃ tarkavidyauiadhakarmakṛtaṃ cāsti. na tūpapattikalābhikam asti. yat tarhi prakṛtijātismarā iti. prakṛtijātismaratvaṃ pūrvenivāsānusmṛtyā sā
T07yabhkvyu:13123: copapattau bhavatīti. katham. asāv utpattilābhikā na bhavatīty abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13124: āha. karmaviśeṣajāsau teṣām iti. teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ karmaviśeṣanirvṛttā.
T07yabhkvyu:13125: upapattilābhikaṃ hi nāma yad upapattikāla eva sarveṣāṃ nisargato labhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13126: na tu yat kasyacid evopapattikālād ūrdhvaṃ. yathā pakṣiṇām ākāśagamanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13127: tasmāt karmaviśeṣajāsau teṣāṃ. katham ity āha. trividhā hīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13128: bhāvanāphalaṃ yathoktam. upapattipratilabdhā devādīnāṃ. karmajā yathā teṣāṃ bodhisattvānām
T07yabhkvyu:13133: (VIII.1, 2) saptamād anantaram aṣṭamasya kośasthānasyopanyāse saṃbaṃdhaṃ darśayann āha. jñānādhikāreṇeti vistaraḥ. jñānādhikāreṇa daśānām jñānānām
T07yabhkvyu:13134: adhikāreṇa jñānamayānāṃ jñānasvabhāvānāṃ praṇidhijñānābhijñānādīnāṃ kṛto nirdeśaḥ anyasvabhāvānāṃ tu [Tib. 329a] samādhyādīnāṃ kartavyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13135: sarvaguṇāśrayatvād iti kāmam ārūpyā api guṇāśrayā bhavanti. na
T07yabhkvyu:13137: dvidhā dhyānānīti kāryadhyānāni kāraṇadhyānāni cety arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13139: iti. śubhānāṃ cittānām aikāgryaṃ. abhedeneti. sarveṣām api lakṣaṇānām.
T07yabhkvyu:13140: etal lakṣaṇam ata āha. samādhisvabhāvatvād iti. dhyānānām iti vākyaśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13141: atha vā abhedeneti samādhimātragrahaṇaṃ. bhedena paṃca skaṃdhās tu sānugam
T07yabhkvyu:13143: ekālambanatā ekālambanatvaṃ cittānāṃ. kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ caittānām apy ekālaṃbanatve ekālambanatvaṃ cittānām ity ucyate. na punar ekālambanatā
T07yabhkvyu:13144: cittacaittānām ity ucyate. prādhānyāt cittāny evaikālambanāni samādhir
T07yabhkvyu:13145: iti. avasthāviśeṣatvāc citragurvāvat. vaibhāṣika āha. na cittāny eva
T07yabhkvyu:13146: samādhiḥ. yena tu tāny ekāgrāni vartante samāhitāni. sa dharmaḥ samādhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13147: yathā vaiśeṣikanaye śuklaguṇayogāc chuklaḥ paṭaḥ. sa eva guṇo 'sya [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:13148: 329b] śauklam ity ucyate. tadvat. nanu ca kṣaṇikatvāt sarvaṃ cittam ekāgraṃ. kim idam ucyate yena tu tāny ekāgrāṇi vartante. sa dharmaḥ samādhir iti. dvitīyasya tasmād avikṣepa iti cet. yady etat syād
T07yabhkvyu:13150: ālambane] na vikṣepo 'sminn ālambana iti. saṃprayukte samādhivaiyarthyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13151: yat prathamaṃ cittaṃ samādhisaṃprayuktaṃ. tasmin saṃprayukte samādhivaiyarthyaṃ. tatra kāritraṃ samādhir na karoti dvitīye karotīti
T07yabhkvyu:13152: kṛtvā. kiṃ ca yata eva ca kāraṇāt samādhir ekāgratālakṣaṇo 'bhipretaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13153: tata eva ca kāraṇāt cittānām ekālaṃbanatvaṃ kiṃ neṣyate. kiṃ samādhinā arthāntarabhūtenety
T07yabhkvyu:13154: na. durbalatvāt samādheḥ. na mahābhūmikatvāt samādheḥ sadbhāvāt sarvasya cittasyaikāgryatāprasaṃgaḥ. yac cittaṃ durbalena samādhinā saṃprayujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13155: na tad ekāgraṃ bhavati. yat punar balavatā. tac cittam ekāgram iti. saty api mahābhūmikatve samādher na sarvacittānām ekāgratāprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13156: cittāny eveti vistaraḥ. cittāny evaikāgrāṇi samādhir nārthāṃtarabhūta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13157: tathā hy adhicittaṃ śikṣeti. adhicittaṃ śikṣā katamā. catvāri dhyānānīti sarvaṃ. tathā cittapariśuddhipradhānaṃ catvāry eva dhyānāni. ity uktāni.
T07yabhkvyu:13159: ṛddhipādāḥ samādhayaḥ ity atra. yathā hy adhiśīlam śikṣā śīlam eva. na tasmād anyā. adhiprajñāṃ ca śikṣā prajñaiva. na tasyā anyā. evam adhicittaṃ śikṣā cittam eva. na tasmād anyā. na cittavyatiriktasamādhir astīty arthaḥ. adhicittaṃ hi śikṣā
T07yabhkvyu:13160: samādhir iṣyate. yathā cāsminn eva sūtre śīlaparīśuddhipradhānaṃ vimuktipariśuddhipradhānaṃ ity ukte. na śīlapariśuddhiḥ śīlād anyā. evaṃ dṛṣṭipariśuddhiḥ vimuktipariśuddhiś ca. tathaiva cittapariśuddhir api na cittād anyā. cittapariśuddhir hi caturdhyānalakṣaṇasamadhir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13161: evaṃ tarhīti. yadi samādhisvabhāvāni dhyānāni sarvasamādhidhyānaprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13163: mahābhūmikatvāt. na. prakarṣayukta iti vistaraḥ. naitad evaṃ prakarṣayukte
T07yabhkvyu:13164: samādhau dhyānanāmavidhānat. bhāskaravat. tadyathā ya eva prakarṣeṇa bhāsaṃ karoti. sa eva bhāskaraḥ. [Tib. 330b] na khadyotakādiḥ. tadvat. sa hīti vistaraḥ. sa hy aṃgasamāyuktaḥ samādhiḥ śamathavipaśyanābhyāṃ yuganaddhābhyām ivāśvābhyāṃ ratho vahatīti yuganaddhavāhī. tadbhāvāt dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāra uktaḥ sūtre. sukhā ca pratipad iti. aṃgasamāyukta eva samādhiḥ. sukhā ca pratipad ity ukta iti vartate. sutarāṃ tena dhyāyanti sukhatvāt. kliṣṭaya kathaṃ dhyānatvam iti. yadi kuśalāṃgasamāyuktaḥ samādhir dhyānaṃ. kliṣṭasyāsvādanāsaṃprayuktasya kathaṃ dhyānatvayuktam (Abhidh-k-vy 665) iti vākyaśeṣaḥ. trividhaṃ dhyānam
T07yabhkvyu:13165: āsvādanāsaṃprayuktaṃ śuddhakam anāsravam iti vacanāt. mithyopanidhyānād iti. mithyānitīraṇād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13167: tatprasaṃgaḥ. na. tatpratirūpa eveti vistaraḥ. naitad evaṃ atiprasaṃga
T07yabhkvyu:13168: iti. tat pratirūpa eva hi nātibahuvilakṣaṇe kliṣṭe dhyānam iti saṃjñāsaṃniveśaḥ. pūtibījavat. yathā kiṃcid abījaṃ pāṣāṇādy atyantatajjātivilakṣaṇam na pūtibījam ity ucyate. kiṃ tarhi. bījajātīyam evopahataṃ yad bhavati. tasminn eva saṃjñāsaṃniveśaḥ pūtibījam iti. uktāni cākuśalāny api dhyānānīti. sa kāmarāgaparyavasthitaḥ [Tib. 331a]
T07yabhkvyu:13169: kāmarāgaparyavasthānam antarīkṛtvā dhyāyati pradhyāyatīti vistaraḥ. anena kāmarāgādiparyavasthānasyāpi dhyānatve sati na doṣa iti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:13170: dhūmāgnivad iti. yathā dhūmo 'treti dhūmavacanenāgnir apy ukto bhavati
T07yabhkvyu:13171: sāhacaryāt. na vināgninā dhūmo bhavatīti. anenaiva cāvinābhāvitvena dhūmasyābhyarhitatvaṃ. yatra hi dhūmaḥ. tatrāgniḥ. na tu yatrāgniḥ. tatra
T07yabhkvyu:13172: dhūmaḥ. tathā hy ayoguḍāṃgārādiṣv agnir eva gṛhyate. na dhūmaḥ. asmāc cābhyarhitatvād dhūmasya pūrvanipāto vāsudevārjunavat. anyathā hi dvaṃdve
T07yabhkvyu:13173: 'pīty agniśabdasya pūrvanipātaḥ syāt. kathaṃ punaḥ sāhacaryeṇa hi prītisukhavān vicāro vinā vitarkeṇa nāsti. yathā dhyānāntaravicāraḥ. na prītisukhavān ity avitarkaḥ. naivam ayaṃ vicāraḥ. viśeṣito hy ayaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13176: iti. prītisukhavatā vicāreṇa prītisukhena ca saṃprayuktaṃ prathamaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13177: dhyānam ity arthaḥ. yadi punar vitarkaprītisukhavad iti sūtraṃ kriyeta ko doṣaḥ syāt. na śakyam evaṃ kartuṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13178: pūrvapūrvāṃgavarjitam iti vakṣyati. vitarkavarjitaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam [Tib. 331b] iti dhyānāntaram api dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ prāpnoti. kiṃ ca catvāry aṃgāni prathamadhyānanirdeśāvasāne 'nenānukrameṇoktāni. savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīti. tatra vicāraprītisukhasamādhayaḥ prathame dhyāne bhavaṃti. ebhiś caturbhir aṃgair vitarkeṇa ca sarvaprathamoktena paṃcāṃgam ucyate. dvitīyaṃ punar ucyate. avitarkam avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam
T07yabhkvyu:13180: vicāralakṣaṇena varjitam iti. tṛtīyam apy evam ucyate. sa prīter virāgād
T07yabhkvyu:13181: upekṣako viharati vistareṇa yāvat sukhavihārīti. tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīti. prītilakṣaṇenāpareṇāṃgena varjitam iti. caturthaṃ punar evam ucyate. sa sukhasya ca prahāṇād vistareṇa yāvad aduḥkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīti. sukhenāpy aṃgena varjitaṃ samādhir evātra kevalam avaśiṣyata ity ata eva sūtraṃ kṛtaṃ vicāraprītisukhavad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13183: ārūpyadhātur asthāna upapattyā caturvidha iti vacanāt. anuparivartakarūpābhāvad iti. dhyānānāsravasaṃvarābhāvād
T07yabhkvyu:13186: iti. vivicyate aneneti vivekaḥ. yena mārgeṇeti. ānaṃtaryamārgeṇa vimuktimārgeṇāpi vā tad ekakāryatvāt. vairāgyagamanād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13189: iti. vibhūtā rūpasaṃjñāsyeti vibhūtarūpasaṃjñaḥ. vibhūtarūpasaṃjñā ity ākhyā eṣām iti vibhūtarūpasaṃjñākhyāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13190: sādhyaṃ tāvad etad iti. nikāyāntarīyāḥ. yadi hi syād hi syād iti
T07yabhkvyu:13191: vaibhāṣikāḥ. āpiṃgalavad iti. yathā īṣat piṃgala āpiṃgalaḥ. evam īṣad rūpā
T07yabhkvyu:13192: ārūpyā iti. kathaṃ tadabhāve tatsaṇvarau kāyavāksaṃvarau bhaviṣyataḥ. na cāsati bhūte ārūpyāvacare saṃvarabhautikam ārūpyāvacaraṃ yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13193: anāsravasaṃvaravac cet. tatraitat syāt. yathā na saṃty anāsravāṇi bhūtāni.
T07yabhkvyu:13194: asti cānāsravasaṃvaro bhautikaṃ rūpam. evam ihāpi nārūpyāvacarāṇi bhūtāni
T07yabhkvyu:13195: syuḥ. atha vārūpyāvacarasaṃvaraḥ syāt bhautikaṃ rūpam iti. tac ca na.
T07yabhkvyu:13196: sāsravabhūtasadbhāvāt sāsravāṇi [Tib. 332b] bhūtāni saṃti. tāny ārūpyeṣu bhaveyuḥ. anāsravāṇi tu bhūtāni na saṃti. ato 'nāsravasaṃvaro yatra jātaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13197: tatratyāni sāsravāṇy upādāya bhavatīty akalpaneyam asāmyāt. samāpattāv api tatpratiṣedha ukta iti. anenaivopapattirūpapratiṣedhena samāpattāv api
T07yabhkvyu:13198: rūpapratiṣedha ukto bhavati. nātra yatnāṃtaram anuṣṭheyaṃ. kathaṃ. yadi
T07yabhkvyu:13200: bhaviṣyati. na cāsati bhūte bhautikaṃ yujyate. anāsravasaṃvaravac cet. na.
T07yabhkvyu:13201: sāsravabhūtasadbhāvād iti. sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramād iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13202: samāpattāv api tatpratiṣedha ukta ity apare. tad evaṃ nārūpyasamāpattiṣu
T07yabhkvyu:13203: nārūpyopapattiṣu rūpam astīti darśitaṃ bhavati. parimāṇālpatvāc cet. atha
T07yabhkvyu:13204: mataṃ. paramāṇumātraṃ rūpam asti. atas ta īṣadrūpā iṣyanta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13205: udakajaṃtukeṣv apy aṇutvād adṛśyarūpeṣu prasaṃgaḥ ārūpyaprasaṃga ity
T07yabhkvyu:13206: arthaḥ. acchatāc cet. tatraitad syād rūpasyācchatvād ārūpyā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13207: antarābhavarūpāvacareṣv apu prasaṃgaḥ. antarābhavarūpāvacarā hi vajramayeṣv api parvateṣv acchatvād asajjamānā [Tib. 333a] gacchaṃti. teṣv
T07yabhkvyu:13208: ārūpyaprasaṃgaḥ. samāpattivat tadupapattiviśeṣād iti. yathaiva hy ākāśānantyādisamāpattayo viśiṣṭatamāḥ. evam upapattiviśeṣo 'pi tāsām abhyupagantavyo 'cchācchataratama iti. ataḥ samāpattivad upapattiviśeṣo
T07yabhkvyu:13209: 'py acchataratama iti. tad evārūpyaṃ syāt. yadi cārūpyopapattirūpasyādharabhūmikenendriyeṇācchataratvād agrahaṇam ity ārūpyā ucyaṃte. dhyānopapattirūpasyāpi ceti vistaraḥ. eṣa saṃbhavo dhyānopapattirūpasyāpi cādharabhūmikenendriyeṇāgrahaṇaṃ. kathaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13210: prathamadhyānabhūmikenendriyeṇa dvitīyabhūmikasyāgrahaṇaṃ. evaṃ yāvat tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikenendriyeṇa caturthadhyānabhūmikasya rūpasyāgrahaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13212: cādharabhūmikenendriyeṇāgrahaṇāt kas tatra viśeṣaḥ. ārūpyadhātau yad acchataratamābhyāṃ sāmānye 'pi ta evārūpyā iṣyaṃgte na rūpāvacarāḥ. tasmān na tatra rūpaṃ. atha mataṃ dvayor dhātvor anvarthā saṃjñā.
T07yabhkvyu:13214: nārūpyadhātor [Tib. 333b] anvarthā saṃjñā. kiṃ tarhi yādṛcchikī ti. kātra
T07yabhkvyu:13215: yuktiḥ. dvayor dhātvor anvarthā saṃjñā. nārūpyadhātor iti. yuktyā pratiṣidhya nārūpyadhātau rūpam astīti āgamaṃ parigṛhyāśaṃkitaṃ vāryate.
T07yabhkvyu:13216: tatra rūpaprasiddhyārtham āyurūṣmaṇor iti vistaraḥ. ārūpyeṣu rūpāstitvasiddhir iti ced ity etat padaṃ pratyekaṃ yojyaṃ. katham.
T07yabhkvyu:13217: āyurūṣmaṇoḥ saṃsṛṣṭavacanād rūpāstitvasiddhir iti cet. tatraitat syāt sūtra uktaṃ. yac cāyuṣman kauṣṭhila āyur yac coṣmakaṃ saṃsṛṣṭāv imau dharmau. na visaṃsṛṣṭāv iti vistaraḥ. atas tatrāyuṣi saty ūṣmaṇā
T07yabhkvyu:13218: bhavitavyaṃ. ūṣmā ca rūpam iti sidhyati. naḍakalāpīdvayavan nāmarūpayor (Abhidh-k-vy 668) anyonyaniśritavacanāt. ārūpyeṣu rūpāstitvasiddhir iti
T07yabhkvyu:13219: cet. sūtra uktaṃ. tadyathāyuṣman śāriputra dve naḍakalāpyāv ākāśe ucchrite
T07yabhkvyu:13220: syātāṃ. te anyonyaniśrite anyonyaṃ niśritya tiṣṭheyātām. tatra kaścid ekām
T07yabhkvyu:13221: apanayet. dvitīyā nipatet. dvitīyām apanayet. ekā nipatet. evam āyuṣman śāriputra nāmaṃ ca rūpaṃ cānyonyaniśritaṃ. anyonyaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhatīti
T07yabhkvyu:13222: vistaraḥ. vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam iti vacanāt. tasmād ārūpyeṣu rūpāstitvasiddhir iti cet. [Tib. 334a] pratītyasamutpādasūtra uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13223: ārūpyaprasiddhikṣaṇe vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam iti vacanāt tasmād ārūpyeṣu rūpam astīti sidhyati. anyatra rūpād iti vistaraḥ. sūtra uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13224: rūpopagaṃ bhikṣavo vijñānaṃ tiṣṭhati. iti rūpālambanarūpapratiṣṭhaṃ. yaḥ kaścid bhikṣava evaṃ vadet. ahaṃ anyatra rūpād vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyo vijñānasyāgatiṃ vā gatiṃ vā vadāmīti. tasya tad vāgvastv eva syād iti. asmād api cāgamād ārūpyeṣu rūpam astīti sidhyaty evaṃ cet. tan
T07yabhkvyu:13226: āhosvit sarvam iti. kāmarūpārūpyāvacaraṃ. ayam atrābhiprāyārthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13227: kāmāvacaram evāyuḥ saṃdhāyaivam uktam iti. tathā hy uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13228: āyur ūṣmātha vijñānaṃ yadā kāyaṃ jahaty amī.
T07yabhkvyu:13229: apaviddhas tadā śete yathā kāṣṭham acetana
T07yabhkvyu:13230: iti. na cārūpyadhātau kāyo 'sti. kuta eva kāyanidhanaṃ. rūpadhātau tu yady
T07yabhkvyu:13231: api kāyo 'sti. na tu kāyanidhanaṃ prajñāyata iti. yac ca nāmarūpayor
T07yabhkvyu:13232: anyonyāśritatvam uktaṃ. tad api kāmarūpāvacaram eva saṃdhāyoktam iti
T07yabhkvyu:13233: lakṣyate. dvayasaṃbhave hy anyonyāśritatvaṃ saṃbhavati. [Tib. 334b] yac ca vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam iti. vijñānaṃ pratyayo 'syeti vijñānāpratyayaṃ nāmarūpam ity evaṃ ṣaṣṭhībahuvrīhisamāse. kim atra sarvavijñānaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13234: kāmāvacarasaṃskārapratyayaṃ yāvad ārūpyāvacarasaṃskārapratyayaṃ nāmarūpasya pratyayaḥ. āhosvit sarvaṃ nāmarūpaṃ vijñānapratyayam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13235: vayaṃ brūmo vijñānapratyayaṃ māmarūpam ity evaṃ sarvasya nāmarūpasya vijñānaṃ pratyaya ity avadhāryate. na tu sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ nāmarūpasya pratyaya ity avadhāryate. kiṃcid vijñānaṃ nāmna eva pratyayo yad
T07yabhkvyu:13237: kāmarūpāvacarasaṃskārapratyayaṃ. tad idam uktaṃ bhavati. pratyaya eva vijñānam asya nāmarūpasya. na tv asyaiva samuditasya nāmarūpasya pratyaya
T07yabhkvyu:13238: iti. saṃbhavaṃ praty evam ucyate. tathā hy upapādukānāṃ vijñānapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam eva bhavati. na nāmarūpam aniṣpannaṣaḍāyatanāvasthā hi paṃca skaṃdhā nāmarūpam (Abhidh-k-vy 669) ity ākhyāyante. sūtraṃ caitam evārthaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13239: dyotayati. vijñānaṃ ced ānanda mātuḥ kukṣiṃ nāvakrāmed api tu tan
T07yabhkvyu:13240: nāmarūpaṃ kalalatvāya saṃmūrchet. na bhadanta. vijñānaṃ ced ānandāvakrāmya
T07yabhkvyu:13241: kṣipram evāpakrāmed api tu tan nāmarūpam itthavtāya prajñāyeta. [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:13242: 335a] no bhadanta. vijñānaṃ ced ānanda daharasya kumārasya kumārikāyā vā ucchidyeta vinaśyen na bhaved api tu tan nāmarūpaṃ vṛddhiṃ vipulatām āpadyeta. no bhadanta. tad anenāpi paryāyeṇa veditavyaṃ. yad vijñānasya pratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ. nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ca vijñānam iti vistaraḥ. kim atra sarvair etai rūpādibhir vinā tatpratiṣedha āgatigatipratiṣedhaḥ. tatra pūrvasmāl lokād aṃtarābhavasaṃtatyā ihopapattir āgatiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13243: aṃtarābhavasaṃtatyā punar asmāl lokāt paraloka upapattir gatiḥ. āhosvid ekenāpi rūpādīnām anyatamam eva. vayaṃ brūmaḥ. sarvair vinā tatpratiṣedha
T07yabhkvyu:13244: iti. aviśeṣavacanān na saṃpradhāryam iti cet. syād eṣā buddhir
T07yabhkvyu:13245: aviśeṣeṇedaṃ sūtravacanaṃ. yac cāyuṣman mahākauṣṭhila āyur iti vistareṇa
T07yabhkvyu:13246: yāvad rūpopagaṃ vijñānaṃ tiṣṭhatīty anena sūtravacanena viśeṣitaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ vāyuḥ saṃdhāyoktaṃ yāvat sarvair eva tair vinā rūpādibhis tatpratiṣedha iti. atrocyate. astiprasaṃgaḥ. bāhyasyāpi hy ūṣmaṇa āyuṣā vinābhāvo na prāpnotīty aviśeṣavacanāt. na hy evaṃ viśeṣitaṃ yac cāyuṣman kauṣṭhila āyur yac coṣmā ādhyātmika ityādi. [Tib. 335b]
T07yabhkvyu:13247: bāhyasyāpi ca rūpasya kāṣṭhakuḍyāder asattvasaṃkhyātasya vijñānāśritatvaṃ prāpnoty aviśeṣavacanāt. caturvijñānasthitivac ceti vistaraḥ. yathā catasṛṇāṃ vijñānasthitīnām aviśeṣavacanād ārūpyadhātau tava rūpāstitvam.
T07yabhkvyu:13248: evaṃ tavāhāracatuṣkavacanād rūpārūpyadhātau kavaḍīkārāhāraprasaṃgaḥ. evaṃ hi sūtraṃ paṭhyate. catvāra āhārā bhūtānāṃ sattvānāṃ sthitaye saṃbhavaiṣiṇāṃ cānugrahāye. katame catvāraḥ. kavaḍīkārāhāraḥ audārikaḥ sūkṣmaḥ. sparśo dvitīyaḥ. manaḥsaṃcetanā tṛtīyaḥ. vijñānam āhāraś caturtha
T07yabhkvyu:13249: iti. evam āhāracatuṣkavacanāt sattvānāṃ sthityārtham aviśeṣeṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:13250: kāmāvacarāṇām ity aviśeṣitatvāt tava rūpārūpyadhātvor api
T07yabhkvyu:13251: kavaḍīkārāhāraprasaṃgaḥ. atikramyeti vistaraḥ. tatra nikāyāntarīyasyaitat syāt. asty asyotsargasyāpavādhaḥ. atikramya devān kavaḍīkārāhārabhakṣān
T07yabhkvyu:13252: iti vacanāt. udāyisūtrādiṣu bhedāc ca kāyasyātikramya devān kavaḍīkārāhārabhakṣān anyatamasmin divye manomayakāya upapadyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13253: prītyāhāravacanāc ceti. bhavati bhikṣavaḥ sa samayo yad ayaṃ lokaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:13254: saṃvartate. saṃvartamāne loke yadbhūyasā sattvā [Tib. 336a] ābhāsvare
T07yabhkvyu:13255: (Abhidh-k-vy 670) devanikāye utpadyante. tatra bhavanti rūpiṇo manomayā avikalā ahīnendriyāḥ sarvāṃgapratyaṃgopetāḥ śubhā varṇasthāyinaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:13256: svayaṃprabhā vihāyasaṃgamāḥ prītibhakṣāḥ prītyahārā dīrghāyuṣo dīrgham adhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantīty evamādiṣu sūtreṣu vacanād aprasaṃgaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:13257: kavaḍīkārāhārasya. yady evam ārūpyeṣv api rūpasyāprasaṃgaḥ. kiṃ kāraṇam apavādāt. kathaṃ. rūpāṇāṃ niḥsaraṇam ārūpyā ity ekaṃ sūtram apavādaḥ. ye te śāntā vimokṣā atikramya rūpāṇy ārūpyā iti dvitīyam. arūpiṇaḥ santi sattvā iti tṛtīyaṃ. sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramād iti caturtham. sati hi rūpa iti. yady ārūpyasamāpattyupapattiṣu rūpaṃ syāt. sati hi rūpe svaṃ rūpam avaśyaṃ saṃjānīrann iti sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramād iti
T07yabhkvyu:13258: vacanaṃ noktaṃ syāt. uktaṃ tu. ato 'pi na tatra rūpam asti. audārikaṃ iti vistaraḥ. tatraitat syāt. [Tib. 336b] audārikam adhobhūmikaṃ rūpam
T07yabhkvyu:13259: abhisaṃdhāyoktaṃ. ye te śāntā vimokṣā iti vistareṇa. atra brūmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13260: kavaḍīkārāhāre 'pi tulyaṃ. kathaṃ. atikramya devān kavaḍīkārāhārabhakṣān
T07yabhkvyu:13261: ity audārikam adhobhūmikaṃ kavaḍīkārāhāram abhisaṃdhāyoktam na rūpāvacaraṃ kavaḍīkārāhāraṃ sūkṣmam iti. yadi cādhobhūmyaudārikarūpaniḥsaraṇād ārūpyā
T07yabhkvyu:13262: ity ucyante. dhyānānām api cādhobhūminiḥsaraṇatvād ārūpyatvaprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13265: ārūpyatvaprasaṃgaḥ. vedanādiniḥsaraṇaṃ ca kiṃ noktaṃ. yady adhobhūmikaudārikaniḥsaraṇāt saty api svabhūmikarūpe ārūpyā ity ucyante.
T07yabhkvyu:13266: vedanādiniḥsaraṇād ārūpyā avedanā iti kiṃ nocyante. satyām api svabhūmivedanāyāṃ. ādiśabdena yāvad avijñānā iti kiṃ nocyante. saty api svabhūmivijñāna iti. kiṃ kāraṇam. adhobhūmikavedanādiniḥsaraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13267: adhobhūmyaudarikavedanādiniḥsaraṇāt ity arthaḥ. rūpajātiṃ tu kṛtsnām
T07yabhkvyu:13268: atikrāntā. [Tib. 337a] yā kācid rūpajātiḥ audārikī vā sūkṣmā vā ādhyātmikī vā bāhyā vā. tāṃ sarvām atikrāntā ārūpyāḥ samāpattyupapattau. na vedanādijātiṃ na vedanāṃ sarvām atikrāntā ārūpyāḥ samāpattyupapattau.
T07yabhkvyu:13269: aduḥkhāsukhavedanāstitvāt. ādiśabdena yāvad vijñānaṃ vaktavyaṃ. ato rūpāṇāṃ niḥsaraṇam uktaṃ. na vedanādiniḥsaraṇaṃ. tasmād evaṃvādinām asmākaṃ na bhavaty ayaṃ prasaṃgaḥ. adhobhūmikavedanādiniḥsaraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13271: āha. yadi rūpāṇāṃ niḥsaraṇam ārūpyāḥ. yat tarhy uktaṃ sūtre nāhaṃ bhavena
T07yabhkvyu:13272: bhavasya niḥsaraṇaṃ vadāmīti. tat katham rūpabhavasyārūpyabhavena
T07yabhkvyu:13274: tasyāniḥsaraṇāt. tenaiva bhavena tasyaiva bhavasyāniḥsaraṇāt evam uktam.
T07yabhkvyu:13275: asarvānatyantaniḥsaraṇāc ca. asarvaniḥsaranaṃ. na hi rūpabhavena
T07yabhkvyu:13276: kāmabhavasya niḥsaraṇam iti. ārūpyabhavasyāpi tena niḥsaraṇaṃ bhavati. na cātyantaniḥsaraṇaṃ kāmabhavāt tena bhavati. punar āgamanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13277: tathārūpyabhavena [Tib. 337b] rūpabhavasya niḥsaraṇaṃ. na kāmabhavasya. na cātyantaniḥsaraṇaṃ rūpabhavānām ārūpyabhavena.
T07yabhkvyu:13280: ityādi. traya iti pulliṃganirdeśaḥ. ārūpyā ity abhisaṃbaṃdhanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13281: tathāprayogād iti. prayogakāle ākāśādīny ālambanāni bhavanti anyadā tv
T07yabhkvyu:13284: iti. caturtha ārūpyaḥ kasmān na saṃjñīty ucyate. nāpy asaṃjña iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13285: māṃdyāt. tuśabdena tasyākāro 'ntarnītarūpo veditavyaḥ. yena hi kāraṇena sa caturtha ārūpyo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam ity ucyate. tad eva kāraṇam ity
T07yabhkvyu:13286: ucyate. māndyād iti. prayogas tv asyaivaṃ sūcito bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13287: anvarthasaṃjñākaraṇāt. ata evāha. yady api tatrāpy evaṃ prayujyata ity
T07yabhkvyu:13288: ādi. saṃjñā gaṇḍaḥ gaṇḍavad gaṇḍaḥ. evaṃ yāvac chalyaḥ. asaṃjñakaḥ saṃmoham iti. saṃjñāyā abhāvo hi saṃmohakāraṇaṃ. ity arthaḥ. śīyateti saṃjñāsamucchedād ity abhiprāyaḥ. etac chāntaṃ etat praṇītaṃ. kiṃ. tad ity āha. yad uta naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam iti. saṃjñāmāndyam abhiprīyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13289: atra praśnayitavyam. kasmāt tu tais tad evaṃ gṛhyata iti. tair iti tatsamāpattibhiḥ. tad iti naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ. [Tib. 338a] evaṃ gṛhyata iti naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñeti gṛhyata ity arthaḥ. tad evaṃ paripraśne
T07yabhkvyu:13290: vigṛhītasyāvaśyam idaṃ vaktavyaṃ jāyate. mṛdatvāt saṃjñānāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13293: śakhās teṣāṃ nopanaśyanta ity abhiprāyaḥ. kathaṃ sapta trividhānīty āha.
T07yabhkvyu:13295: anāsravaṃ nāstīti saṃjñamāndyāt. yad āsvādayati. tasmād vyutthita iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13296: śuddhakāt. yenāsvādayati. tat samāpanna iti. āsvādanāsaṃprayuktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13297: (VIII.7, 8) yathānta caturaṅgasenā nāṃgebhyo 'rthāṃtarabhūtā. evaṃ paṃcāṃgadhyānaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 672) nārthāntaram iti svamataṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:13303: saṃskāropekṣātra gṛhyate. yā prītir anābhogalakṣaṇā. smṛtir
T07yabhkvyu:13308: (VIII.9) prathamadhyānikānīti. prathamadhyāne bhavāni. ata evocyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13309: yasmād dvitīyādiṣv adhyātmasaṃprasādādayo vardhante. kathaṃ. catuṣkoṭikaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13310: syāt prathame dhyāne na dvitīye. syād dvitīye na prathame. syād ubhayoḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13311: syān nobhayoḥ. evaṃ sarvāṇi dhyānāṃgāni parasparaṃ yojyāni. kathaṃ. yāny aṃgāni prathame dhyāne. tṛtīye 'pi tāni. catuṣkoṭikaṃ. prathamā koṭiḥ vitarkavicāraprītisukhāni. dvitīyā upekṣāsmṛtisaṃprajñānasukhāni. tṛtīyā
T07yabhkvyu:13312: samādhiḥ. caturthī koṭir uktanirmuktā dharmāḥ. yāny aṃgāni prathame
T07yabhkvyu:13313: dhyāne. caturthe 'pi tāni. catuṣkoṭikam. prathamā koṭir vitarkavicāraprītisukhāni. dvitīyā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā upekṣāpariśuddhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13314: smṛtipariśuddhiś ca. tṛtīyā samādhiḥ. caturthī uktanirmuktā dharmāḥ [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:13315: 339a] yāny aṃgāni dvitīye dhyāne. tṛtīye 'pi tāni. catuṣkoṭikaṃ. prathamā koṭir adhyātmasaṃprasādaprītisukhāni.
T07yabhkvyu:13317: uktanirmuktadharmāḥ. yāny aṃgāni dvitīye dhyāne. caturthe 'pi vā tāni.
T07yabhkvyu:13318: catuṣkoṭikaṃ. prathamā koṭir adhyātmasaṃprasādaprītisukhāni. dvitīyā tadaṃgāni samādhiṃ hitvā. tṛtīyā samādhiḥ. caturthī uktanirmuktā dharmāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13319: yāny aṃgāni tṛtīye dhyāne caturthe 'pi tāni. catuṣkoṭikaṃ. prathamā koṭīḥ samādhivarjyāni tadaṃgāni. dvitīyāpy evaṃ. tṛtīyā samādhiḥ. caturthī uktanirmuktā dharmāḥ. etac ca tad ekāvacaraṃ nāma.
T07yabhkvyu:13320: kasmāt tṛtīye dhyāne sukhaṃ dravyāntaram ucyata iti. katham ucyate. tāny etāny aṣṭādaśadhyānāṃgāni bhavantīti vistareṇoktvā punar āha. nāmata evaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13322: dravyato daśa caikaṃ ca dravyata etāny ekādaśa bhavanti. prathamadhyānikāni paṃca. dvitīye
T07yabhkvyu:13325: sukheṃdriyasaṃbhavāt. nāsty eva caitasikaṃ sukheṃdriyaṃ triṣv api hi
T07yabhkvyu:13326: dhyāneṣu. kiṃ tarhi. kāyikam [Tib. 339b] eva sukham aṃgavyavasthāpitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13327: samāhitāvasthāṃtarālasamudācārāt. dārṣṭāṃtikānāṃ kilaiṣa pakṣaḥ. teṣāṃ hi na dvibhūmikam eva sukhendriyaṃ. kāmaprathamadhyānabhūmikam iti. kiṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13328: tarhi. caturbhūmikam api sukhendriyaṃ bhavati. kāmāvacaraṃ yāvat tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ iti. ata eva ca vibhāṣāyāṃ bhadantena sautrāntikenoktam. ābhidhārmikāṇāṃ araghaṭṭeneva cakṣurvijñānādikam
T07yabhkvyu:13329: adhastād ūrdhvam ākṛṣyata iti. tad evam asyeṣṭaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13331: adhyāropita eṣa pāṭha iti. yo 'yaṃ caitasikam iti pāṭhaḥ. sukhaṃ ca kāyena
T07yabhkvyu:13332: pratisaṃvedayata iti svaśabdena vacanāc ceti. tṛtīyadhyānanirdeśa evam uktaṃ. sa prīter virāgād upekṣako viharati smṛtimān saṃprajānamān. sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayate. yat tad āryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān
T07yabhkvyu:13333: sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīti. yadi hi tac caitasikaṃ syāt kathaṃ tat kāyena pratisaṃvedyet. manaḥ kāyeneti. manaḥ samudāyenaivam uktvā. ko guṇa iti. sukhaṃ ca manasā pratisaṃvedayati.
T07yabhkvyu:13334: sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayata ity evaṃ vā vaktavyaṃ syād ity
T07yabhkvyu:13335: abhiprāyaḥ. caturthe dhyāne praśrabdhibhūyastve 'pi sukhāvacanāc ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:13336: caturthe dhyāne praśrabdhisukhaṃ bhūyo bhavati bahutaraṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13338: 'pi sukhasyāvacanaṃ. caturthe dhyāne sukhaṃ nocyate. tasya
T07yabhkvyu:13339: sukhasyāvacanāt. vedanāsukham eva tat tṛtīye dhyāne gamyate. na caturthe sukhā vedanāstīti tatra nocyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. sukhavedanānukūlā praśrabdhiḥ sukham iti cet. syān mataṃ. prathamadvitīyayor dhyānayoḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13340: sukhavedanānukūlā praśrabdhiḥ. taddvayoḥ sukham ity uktvā caturthe dhyāne
T07yabhkvyu:13341: praśrabdhiḥ sukhavedanānukūlā na bhavatīti noktā. yady evaṃ tṛtīye
T07yabhkvyu:13342: praśrabdhisukhāvacanaṃ kasmāt. tṛtīyadhyānapraśrabdhir api sukhavedanānukūlā bhavati. tatra praśrabdhisukhaṃ kasmān noktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13343: vedanāsukham eva hi tatra bhavadbhir vyavasthāpitaṃ. na praśrabdhiḥ sukhaṃ. dviḥsukhapāṭhāt. upekṣopahatatvād iti cet. syān mataṃ. tṛtīye dhyāna upekṣā karmaṇyatālakṣaṇā bhavati. tayopahatā praśrabdhir iti
T07yabhkvyu:13344: nocyate iti. na. upekṣayaiva (Abhidh-k-vy 674) tadvṛddheḥ. naitad evaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13345: upekṣayaiva tu tatra tṛtīye dhyāne praśrabdhisukhavṛddheḥ. na hy upaghātahetunaiva vṛddhir yujyata iti. katham upekṣayaiva tadvṛddhir ity ato bravīti. pūrvikābhyāṃ tadviśeṣād iti. pūrvikābhyāṃ hi prathamadvitīyadhyānapraśrabdhibhyāṃ. [Tib. 340b] tṛtīyadhyānapraśrabdhir
T07yabhkvyu:13346: viśiṣṭā. pūrvikābhyāṃ dhyānābhyāṃ tṛtīyasya viśiṣṭatvāt. yasmin samaya iti
T07yabhkvyu:13347: vistaraḥ. yasmin samaye āryaśrāvakaḥ pravivekajāṃ prītiṃ kāyena
T07yabhkvyu:13348: sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharati. paṃcāsya dharmās tasmin samaye prahīyante.
T07yabhkvyu:13349: paṃca dharmā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti. adhyātmasaṃprasādaḥ prītiḥ praśrabdhiḥ sukhaṃ [prajñā] samādhiś ceti. praśrabdhisukhayor ananyatve katham eṣāṃ paṃcatvaṃ syāt. arthāntaratve ca sati kāyikam eva sukhaṃ triṣv api dhyāneṣv iti siddhaṃ bhavati. samāpannasya kathaṃ kāyavijñānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13351: sukhavedanānukūlena vāyunā kāyaspharaṇāt kāyadhmāpanāt. kiṃ. kāyavijñānaṃ bhavaty eveti. bahirvikṣepāt samādhibhraṃśa iti cet. yadi manyeta kāyvijñānotpattyā bahirvikṣepād bāhyaviṣayavikṣepāt samādhibhraṃśa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13352: na. samādhijasyeti vistaraḥ. naitad evaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. kasmāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13353: samādhijasyāṃtaḥkāyasaṃbhūtasyābahirjabhūtasyety arthaḥ. kāyasukhasya kāyavijñānasaṃprayuktasya veditasukhasya samādhyanukūlatvān nāsmāt samādhibhraṃśa ity arthaḥ. na. [Tib. 341a] ata eveti. na kāyavijñānakāle vyutthitaḥ syāt. ata eva kāraṇāt samādhyanukūlatvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13354: tatsaṃmukhībhāvāntaraṃ hi punar upatiṣṭhate samādhir ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13355: kāmāvacareṇa kāyavijñānena rūpāvacarasya spraṣṭavyasyāgrahaṇād rūpāvacaram etat kāyavijñānaṃ na kāmāvacaram. ata eva tatsaṃprayogi sukhaṃ dhyānāṃgaṃ na sidhyati. praśrabdhijñānasyotpatter iti. rūpāvacarasyāḥ kāmāvacareṇa [kāyavijñānena] kāyendriyeṇa samadhibalādhānataḥ. tad dhi kāyendriyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13356: samāhitasya tām avasthāṃ gataṃ. yad ūrdhvabhūmikasya kāyavijñānasyāśrayo
T07yabhkvyu:13357: bhavatīti. anāsrave apīti. spraṣṭavyaṃ ca praśrabdhilakṣaṇaṃ tadālaṃbanaṃ ca kāyavijñānaṃ spraṣṭavyakāyavijñāne 'nāsrave api syātāṃ. kiṃ kāraṇam ity
T07yabhkvyu:13358: āha. mā bhūt kiṃcid aṃgaṃ sāsravaṃ kiṃcid anāsravam iti cet. yady evaṃ manyeta. kāyikapraśrabdhisaṃbodhyaṃgavacanād iṣṭe. yāpi kāyapraśrabdhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13359: tad api praśrabdhisaṃbodhyaṃgam abhijñāyai saṃbodhaye nirvāṇāya
T07yabhkvyu:13360: saṃvartate. yāpi (Abhidh-k-vy 675) cittapraśrabdhir yāvad eva spraṣṭavyāni saṃbodhyaṃgam abhijñāyai saṃbodhaye nirvāṇāya saṃvartata iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13362: bodhyaṃgānukūlatvād iti cet. athaivaṃ parihriyeta. yasmāt kāyikī praśrabdhir bodhyaṃgānukūlā. tasmād bodhyaṃgam ity upacaryate na tu
T07yabhkvyu:13363: bodhyaṃgam iti. anāsravatvam apy evaṃ. anāsravatvānukūlatvāt te spraṣṭavyakāyavijñāne anāsrave ity upacaryete. na tv anāsrave eveti. evam anayor anāsravatvaṃ. sāsravā dharmā iti vistaraḥ. sāsravā dharmāḥ katame.
T07yabhkvyu:13364: yāvad eva cakṣur yāvanti eva rūpāṇi yāvad eva cakṣurvijñānaṃ. yāvad yāvān eva kāyo yāvanty eva spraṣṭavyāni yāvad eva kāyavijñānam iti. asya sūtrasya virodha iti evaṃ cen manyeta. tan na.
T07yabhkvyu:13365: anyaspraṣṭavyakāyavijñānābhisaṃdhivacanāt. tat praśrabdhivyatiriktānāṃ spraṣṭavyānāṃ kāyavijñānavyatiriktānāṃ ca kayavijñānānām
T07yabhkvyu:13366: abhisaṃdhivacanāt. na cānāsrava iti vistaraḥ. nanv anāsrave 'nāsravavavyavasthāne kiṃcid aṃgaṃ sāsravaṃ kiṃcid anāsravaṃ syād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13367: yady eṣa doṣa iti manyeta. tatspraṣṭavyakāyavijñānasya sāsravatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13368: taditarasyānāsravatvāt. atrocyate. ayaugapadyāt ko doṣa iti. [Tib. 342a]
T07yabhkvyu:13369: yadā sāsravam aṃgaṃ samudācarati. na tadānāsravaṃ samudācarati.
T07yabhkvyu:13370: yadānāsravam aṃgaṃ. na tadā sāsravam ity adoṣa eṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13371: sukhaprītyasamavadhānāt. sukhasya kāyikasya prīteś ca mānasyāḥ asamavadhānād ayaugapadyāt. na paṃcāṃgaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ syād iti cet.
T07yabhkvyu:13372: yady evaṃ manyeta. na sa doṣaḥ. kasmāt. saṃbhavaṃ praty upadeśād
T07yabhkvyu:13373: vitarkavicāravat. yathā savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam iti
T07yabhkvyu:13374: paryāyeṇa vitarkavicārau bhavataḥ. evaṃ sukhaprītī api saṃbhavaṃ praty upadeśād adoṣa eṣa iti. sādhyam iti cet. vitarkavicārau paryāyeṇa bhavata
T07yabhkvyu:13375: iti sādhyam iti. āha. siddhaṃ. katham ity āha. vitarkavicārayor virodhād iti. yady audārikatā cittasya. sūkṣmatā nāsti. yadi sūkṣmatā. audārikatā
T07yabhkvyu:13376: nāstīti. virodhād vitarkavicārayor ayaugapadyaṃ. doṣavacanāc ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:13377: āpekṣikī caudārikasūkṣmatā bhūmiprakārabhedād ity ā bhavāgrād vitarkavicārau syātām ity ādi. keṣāṃcit pāṭho bhavati doṣāvacanāc ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:13378: asmavadhānena ca na kaścid doṣa ucyata ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13381: tṛtīyadhyānavyavasthānaṃ. tatra prītir api nāstīti. caturaṃgāpakarṣeṇa
T07yabhkvyu:13382: (Abhidh-k-vy 676) caturthadhyānavyavasthānaṃ. tatra sukham api nāstīti. na tu saṃjñādīnām aṃgatvam uktam iti. na hi saṃjñādīnāṃ dhyānāntareṣv apakarso 'stīti. kim arthaṃ paṃcānām evāṃgatvaṃ. yady ayam artho
T07yabhkvyu:13383: nābhipreta iti. yady upakaratvāt paṃcānām evāṃgatvaṃ. tan na.
T07yabhkvyu:13384: vitarkavicārābhyāṃ smṛtiprajñayor upakaratvāt. na hi. tathā vitarkavicārāv upakarau yathā smṛtiprajñe iṣṭe. sūpasthitasmṛter yathābhūtaṃprajānato layauddhatyādyabhāvataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13385: tasmād vicāryam etad iti. yogācārabhūmidarśanena vicāryam etad iti tatra kautūhalaṃ pātayaty ācāryaḥ. ayaṃ cātrārthasaṃkṣepo draṣṭavyaḥ. kiṃ punar adhikṛtya vitarkādaya evāṃgatvena vyavasthāpitāḥ satsv anyeṣu dharmeṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:13386: tāvadbhiḥ. pratipakṣānuśaṃsatadubhayāśrayāṃgaparisamāpteḥ. ārūpyeṣv aṃgavyavasthānaṃ nāsti. śamathaikarasatām upādāya. tad uktaṃ pratipakṣāṃgam upadāya. anuśaṃsāṅgam upādāya. tadubhayasaṃniśrayāṃgaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13387: copādāya. prathame tāvad dhyāne vitarko vicāraś ca pratipakṣāṃgaṃ. tabhyāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13390: cittaikāgratā tadubhayasaṃniśrayāṃgaṃ. saṃniśrayabalena vitarkādipravṛtter iti. tathā dvitīye dhyāne 'dhyātmasaṃprasādaḥ pratipakṣāṃgaṃ. tena
T07yabhkvyu:13391: vitarkavicārapratipakṣaṇāt. prītisukhe cittaikāgratā ca śeṣe aṃge pūrvavat. tṛtīye dhyāne upekṣāsmṛtisaṃprajanyaṃ ca pratipakṣāṃgaḥ. taiḥ
T07yabhkvyu:13392: prītipratipakṣaṇāt. sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ca śeṣe aṃge yathākramaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13393: pūrvavat. caturthe dhyāne upekṣāpariśuddhiḥ smṛtipariśuddhiś ca pratipakṣāṃgaṃ. tābhyāṃ dhyāneṣu sukhapratipakṣaṇāt. aduḥkhasukhā vedanā anuśaṃsāṃgaṃ. cittaikāgratā tadubhayasaṃniśrayāṃgam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13394: śraddhā prasāda iti. śraddhaiva prasādaḥ śraddhāprasādaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13395: katham asati dravyāntaratve caitasikatvam iti. vitarkādīnāṃ. avasthāviśeṣo
T07yabhkvyu:13396: 'pi hi nāma cetasaś caitasiko bhavati. cetasi bhavatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13398: vāksamutthāpikāvasthā cittasya vitarkaḥ. tadanyāvasthā vicāra iti
T07yabhkvyu:13401: na vai sukhaṃ dhyāneṣu saumanasyaṃ yujyata iti. tulyasukhavedanāsvābhāvye mānasatve 'pi sati. kasmāt saumanasyaṃ sukham iti nocyate. asti
T07yabhkvyu:13402: (Abhidh-k-vy 677) kāraṇaṃ. iyaṃ hi prītir anupaśāṃtā. tayā hi tat
T07yabhkvyu:13403: samāhitam api cittaṃ kṣipyata ivonnamyata iva sāmodaṃ sahāsaṃ viplutam iva
T07yabhkvyu:13404: vyavasthāpyate. tad yadopaśāṃtaṃ bhavati. tadā bhūmyantaraprāptā tajjātīyaiva vedanā sukham ity ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13405: (VIII.10) kleśāviviktatvād iti. tadbhūmikaiḥ kleśair aviviktatvād ity
T07yabhkvyu:13406: arthaḥ. kleśāvilatvād iti. kleśair aprasannatvād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13407: kliṣṭasukhasambhramitatvād iti. kliṣṭena sukhena saṃbhramitatvāt. smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ ca na bhavataḥ. kleśamalinatvād iti. tadbhūmikaiḥ kleśair malinatvāt. upekṣāyāḥ smṛteś ca pariśuddhir nāsti.
T07yabhkvyu:13408: kuśalamahābhūmikatvād anayor iti. praśrabdhyupekṣe kuśalamahābhūmike paṭhite.
T07yabhkvyu:13409: śraddhāpramādaḥ praśrabdhir upekṣā hrir apatrapā mūladvayam ahiṃsā ca vīryaṃ ca kuśalaṃ sadeti
T07yabhkvyu:13410: vacanāt. kiṃ punar ete pūrvasmin pakṣe kliṣṭeṣv api dhyāneṣu bhavataḥ. na ca bhavata ity āha. kasmād etan noktaṃ. anuktasiddhatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13411: kuśalamahābhūmikayoḥ praśrabdhyupekṣayor aparigrahād bhavata eva te ity
T07yabhkvyu:13414: [Tib. 344a] āśvāsapraśvāsau. dvitvapradarśanārthaṃ cātra dvivacananirdeśaḥ. vitarkavicāraprītisukhair akaṃpanīyatvād iti. yathā pūrvakāṇi trīṇi dhyānāni vitarkādibhiḥ. kaṃpyate prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13415: vitarkavicārābhyāṃ kaṃpyate. dvitīyaṃ prītyā. tṛtīyaṃ sukhena. naivam ebhiś caturthaṃ kaṃpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13416: yathā nivāte dīpo na kaṃpyate vāyunā. tadvad ity uktaṃ sūtra ity apara
T07yabhkvyu:13419: iti. ādyadhyānasaṃgṛhītaṃ. nirmāṇacittavad iti. yathādharabhūmikaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ tadbhūmikaṃ nirmāṇaṃ nirmātukāmā nirmātāraḥ
T07yabhkvyu:13420: saṃmukhīkurvanti. tadvat. na kuśalaṃ hīnatvād iti. tad dhi prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ kuśalaṃ dvitīyadhyānabhūmikān nihīnaṃ nikṛṣṭam. ato na saṃmukhīkurvanti. prayojanena hi te prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13421: saṃmukhīkurvanti. na bahumānena. savipākaṃ ca tat kuśalaṃ. na ca tadvipākena te 'rthina iti kuśalacittasaṃmukhīkaraṇe yatnaṃ na kurvanti.
T07yabhkvyu:13423: iti. vairāgyeṇopapattito veti. vāśabdo luptanirdeśaḥ. adhobhūmivairāgyād
T07yabhkvyu:13424: (Abhidh-k-vy 678) vā asamanvāgatas tena śuddhakaṃ pratilabhate dhyānaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13425: ārūpyaṃ vā. kāmavairāgyāt prathamaṃ śuddhakaṃ pratilabhate triprakāram anyatra nirvedhabhāgīyāt. evaṃ yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanavairāgyād [Tib. 344b]
T07yabhkvyu:13426: bhavāgraṃ pratilabhate. adhobhūmyupapattito vā. upariṣṭād adharāyāṃ bhūmāv
T07yabhkvyu:13427: upapadyamānas tal labhate. anyatra bhavāgrād iti. tasyādhobhūmivairāgyata eva lābhaḥ. prayogato nirvedhabhāgīyam iti. tasya vairāgyopapattikṛtaḥ sa
T07yabhkvyu:13428: lābho na bhavati. parihāṇito 'pi hānabhāgīyam iti. sthitibhāgīyāt parihīyamāṇo hānabhāgīyaṃ labhate. ata evocyata iti. yasmāt parihīṇo pi
T07yabhkvyu:13429: hānabhāgīyaṃ labhate. evaṃ parihāṇyā copapattyāpi ceti yojyaṃ. kathaṃ.
