T07yabhkvyu:13430: syāc chuddhakaṃ parihāṇyā labheta parihāṇyā vijahyāt. syāc chuddhakaṃ dhyānam upapattyā labheta upapattyā vijahyād iti. āha. syāt. katham ity āha. hānabhāgīyaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam iti. brahmalokaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13431: tribhūmikaṃ. viśeṣeṇa brahmaloke upapadyamāna iti vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13432: brahmalokavairāgyeṇa tyajyata iti. yasmāt prathamadhyānavairāgyeṇa hānabhāgīyaṃ dhyānaṃ kleśānuguṇyāt. tadbhūmikakleśam iva tyajati. ato brahmalokavairāgyeṇa tyajyata ity ucyate. evaṃ tāvat prathamasya praśnasya
T07yabhkvyu:13433: vivarjanaṃ. brahmalokavairāgyaparihāṇyā labhate. yadi brahmalokavairāgyaparihāṇyā parihīyate punas tad dhānabhāgīyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13435: tyajyate. yadā kāmadhātuvairāgyāt parihīyate. tadā śuddhakaṃ tyajyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13436: upariṣṭād brahmaloka upapadyamāno labhata iti. dvitīyādibhyo brahmaloka upapadyamāno hānabhāgīyaṃ tadbhūmikakleśavad eva labhate. tasmāt kāmadhātāv upapadyamāno vijahātīti. tasmād brahmalokāt kāmadhātāv
T07yabhkvyu:13439: akopyaprativedhe aśaikṣaṃ labhate. nāvaśyam. ānupūrvikenālābhād iti. yady ānupūrviko 'nāgamyasaṃniśrayeṇa niyāmam avakrāmati na labhate.
T07yabhkvyu:13440: (VIII.15, 16) svabhūmike śuddhānāsrave iti. vyutthānakāle pravāhe ca.
T07yabhkvyu:13441: dvitīyatṛtīyadhyānabhūmike ceti. miśrakāmiśrakānulomasamāpattau vyutkrāntakasamāpattau ca. sapta svabhūmike śuddhakānāsrave iti. pūrvavad vijñānākāśānaṃtyāyatanabhūmike ca. tathaiva pratilomasamāpattau. bhavāgraṃ śuddhakam evānāsravābhāvād iti. māṃdyād anāsravaṃ nāstīty uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13445: (Abhidh-k-vy 679) ākāśānaṃtyāyatanacaturthadhyānabhūmikāni catvārīti. teṣv eva kāleṣu. trīṇīty anāsravābhāvāt. evam anyadhyānārūpyād anaṃtaraṃ daśa dravyāṇi yojyānīti. tadyathā tṛtīyadhyānād anantaraṃ daśa. svabhūmike dve śuddhakānāsrave. caturthadhyānākāśānaṃtyāyatanabhūmikāni catvāri. tathaiva ca prathamadvitīyadhyānabhūmikāni catvārīti. caturthadhyānād anantaraṃ daśa. svabhūmike dve śuddhakānāsrave. ākāśavijñānānaṃtyāyatanabhūmikāni
T07yabhkvyu:13446: catvāri. dvitīyatṛtīyadhyānabhūmikāni catvārīti. ākāśānaṃtyāyatanād anantaraṃ daśa. svabhūmike dve. vijñānākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmikāni catvāri.
T07yabhkvyu:13447: tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikāni catvāry utpadyanta ity evaṃ daśa bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:13449: ūrdhvādharabhūmyālaṃbanatvād dhyānānam asti prasaṃga iti kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:13453: śeṣaṃ yathaivānāsravād iti. svabhūmike ca śuddhānāsrave utpadyete. ūrdhvād adhobhūmike ca [Tib. 346a] yāvat tṛtīyād iti. praṇidhāyeti vistaraḥ. yadi kaścid evaṃ buddhim utpādyārdharātre candrodaye candrāstamaye vā mayā
T07yabhkvyu:13454: praboddhavyam iti svapet. sa pūrvābhiprāyānuvartanāt saṃtatateḥ tasminn eva kāle prabudhyate. yathāsyaivaṃ praṇidhāya suptaḥ. tasyābhiprete kāle prabodho bhavati. tadvad etat. sarvathā notpadyata iti. nāpi svabhūmikaṃ nāpy adharabhūmikam utpadyata ity arthaḥ. samāpattikālaṃ praty etad uktam
T07yabhkvyu:13455: iti. śuddhakāt kliṣṭāc ca samanantaraṃ svabhūmikam eva kliṣṭam utpadyate nānyabhūmikam iti. kathaṃ. tathā śuddhāt kliṣṭaṃ vāpi svabhūmikaṃ. kliṣṭāt svaṃ śuddhakaṃ kliṣṭam ity evaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13457: maraṇabhave. upapattilābhikāc chuddhakād iti vistaraḥ. upapattidhyāneṣu yad upapattilābhikaṃ kuśalasamāhitaṃ. tad api śuddhakaṃ dhyānam ity ucyate. ata idam ucyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13458: cyutikāle tv iti vistareṇa. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. asamāhitatvān maraṇabhavasya. na hi tadānīṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13459: śuddhakaṃ samāpattidhyānam astīti. ataḥ sarvabhūmikaṃ kliṣṭam utpadyata
T07yabhkvyu:13460: iti. svabhūmikādharordhvabhūmikaṃ pratisaṃdhicittaṃ kliṣṭam asamāhitam utpadyata ity arthaḥ. nordhvabhūmikaṃ. kliṣṭasadbhāve sati tatropapattyasaṃbhavāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13463: ūrdhvabhūmyabhāvāt. tasmād anāsravam utpadyata iti nirvedhabhāgīyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13465: viśeṣagamanakāle. anyatra hānabhāgīyād iti. viśeṣabhāgīyād dhīyamānasya sthitibhāgīyāparityāge tasyaivotpattiyogāt. tad evaikaṃ iti. tad eva nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ pravāhayogena.
T07yabhkvyu:13466: (VIII.19) ākṛṣṭā ity anukrameṇeti. anulomānukrameṇa pratilomānukrameṇa ca.
T07yabhkvyu:13467: (VIII.20) vidhīyata iti kriyata ity arthaḥ. sthāpyata iti vā. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13470: iti. āryam anāsravaṃ. anāsravasyākiṃcanyāyatanasya sāṃmukhyāt saṃmukhībhāvāt. bhavāgre jātasyāsravaprahāṇaṃ bhavati. tuśabdo
T07yabhkvyu:13471: 'pavādārthaṃ dyotayati. svasyābhāvād iti. bhāvāgrikasyānāsravasya mārgasyābhāvād ity arthaḥ. tasya cābhyāsād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13473: (VIII.21) tṛṣṇāparicchinnatvād bhūmīnām iti. yā yasyāṃ bhūmau. tasyām eva bhūmāv anuśayanāt. tayā sā bhūmiḥ paricchinnā bhavati. anyathā hi tasyottaratvam eva na sidhyed ekabhūmisthānāntaravat. ata evauttarādharye 'pi sthānāntarāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ trayāṇām aṣṭānāṃ [Tib. 347a] caikabhūmitā
T07yabhkvyu:13477: iti. maulagrahaṇaṃ sāmantakanirāsārthaṃ. ārūpyasāmantakāni hy adharāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13479: ubhayakuśalagrahaṇārthaṃ ca. yadi hy ārūpyā ity evocyeta āsvādanāsaṃprayuktā maulā ārūpyā na sāsravādharagocarā iti saṃbhāvyeran.
T07yabhkvyu:13480: anāsravā evārūpyā evam iti gṛhyeran. ārūpyagrahaṇaṃ dhyānanirāsārthaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13481: dhyānāni hi maulāni api sāsravādharavastvālambanāni bhavanti.
T07yabhkvyu:13483: anāsravā hy adharā dharmā maulānāṃ kuśalānāṃ ārūpyānām ālambanāni saṃbhavanti. adharagrahaṇam
T07yabhkvyu:13484: ūrdhvabhūmikasāsravālambanasaṃbhavāt. anāsravaṃ tv ālambanam ity udgrāhya darśyati sarvānvayajñānapakṣa iti. sarva iti navabhūmika
T07yabhkvyu:13491: iti. dhyānārūpyāṇāṃ yo 'nāsravaḥ saṃbhavati. tena yathāsaṃbhavaṃ kleśāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:13494: apavādarūpeṇa sāmantakena śuddhakena kleśāḥ prahīyanta ity adhikṛtaṃ. kuta eva kliṣṭeneti. kliṣṭena kleśaprahāṇaṃ naiva saṃbhavatīty abhiprāyaḥ. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ śuddhakena kleśā na prahīyanta ity āha. vītarāgatvān nādha iti
T07yabhkvyu:13496: kuta eva kliṣṭena. tasyaiva tadapratipakṣatvān na svabhūmau. tasyaiva prathamadhyānasya yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasya. tadapratipakṣatvāt tasyāpratipakṣas tadapratipakṣaḥ. tadbhāvaḥ. tasmāt. tadapratipakṣatvān na svabhūmau kleśāḥ prahīyante. na hi bhavena bhavasya niḥsaraṇam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:13497: viśiṣṭataratvān nordhvam iti. nordhvabhūmikāḥ [Tib. 348a] kleśāḥ adharabhūmikena śuddhakena prahīyante. viśiṣṭataratvāt kleśānāṃ. na ca nyūnam āśritya viśiṣṭānāṃ prahāṇaṃ yujyate. ity anena śuddhakenāpi kleśā na prahīyante. kuta eva kliṣṭeneti siddham etat. śuddhakenāpīty apiśabdād anāsraveṇāpīti. saṃbhavatas tv etad uktaṃ. ata evocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13502: (VIII.22) yena tatpraveśa iti. yena sāmantakena teṣāṃ maulānāṃ dhyānārūpyāṇāṃ praveśaḥ. kiṃ tāny api trividhānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:13503: āsvādanāsaṃprayuktādibhedāt. tathaiva ca teṣu vedaneti. prathamayor dhyānayoḥ prītiḥ. tṛtīye sukhaṃ. caturtha upekṣety uktaṃ. kim evaṃ sāmantakeṣu. upekṣendriyasaṃprayuktāni ca yatnavāhyatvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13504: anābhisaṃskāravāhī mārgaḥ prītisukhābhyāṃ saṃprayujyate. tāni ca sāmantakāni yatnavāhyāni sābhisaṃskāravāhyānīty ata
T07yabhkvyu:13505: upekṣendriyasaṃprayuktāni. [Tib. 348b] punar adhobhūmyudvegānapagamāt prītisukhayor ayoga iti. ato 'py upekṣendriyasaṃprayuktāni.
T07yabhkvyu:13506: vairāgyapathatvāc ca. nāsvādanāsaṃprayuktānīti. yadi hy āsvādanāsaṃprayuktāni syur vairāgyamārgo na syāt. na hi tṛṣṇāsaṃprayukto
T07yabhkvyu:13507: mārgaḥ kleśaprahāṇāya (Abhidh-k-vy 682) bhavati. atha vāyam abhisaṃbandhaḥ. upekṣeṃdriyasaṃprayuktāni ca yatnavāhyatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13508: adhobhūmyudvegānapagamād vairāgyapathatvāc ceti dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ nāsvādanāsaṃprayuktānīti. pūrvavad vaktavyaṃ śeṣaṃ. yady api sāmantakacittena saṃdhibandha iti. aṣṭāsv api dhyānārūpyeṣu yasya yat sāmantake. tasya tena sāmantakacittena kliṣṭenāsamāhitena saṃdhibandha ity
T07yabhkvyu:13509: eṣa siddhāntaḥ iti. ata idam ucyate. yady api sāmantakacitteneti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13510: āsvādanāsaṃprayuktam apy anāgamyam iti. anāgamyasya paṭutvāt. yathā hi tad
T07yabhkvyu:13511: anāsravam api saṃbhavati. tathāsvādanāsaṃprayuktam apīty abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13513: (VIII.23) dhyānaviśeṣatvād iti. tad eva maulaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ vitarkāpaganmād viśiṣṭaṃ [sa] dhyānāntaram ity ucyate [Tib. 349a] ity
T07yabhkvyu:13514: arthaḥ. viśeṣābhāvād iti. yathā prathame dhyāne viśeṣo bhavati. kvacid
T07yabhkvyu:13515: vitarkavicārau. kvacid vicāra eveti. na tathā dvitīyādiṣv iti. ato dhyāneṣu na vyavasthāpyate dhyānāntaram. ata eva duḥkhā pratipad iti. ata eva hi saṃskāravāhitvāt. vitarkamātrapratiṣedhād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13517: (VIII.24, 25) tadālambanaḥ samādhir ānimitta iti. animitte bhava ānimittaḥ. daśākāra iti. anityaduḥkhākārau dvau. samudayākāraś catvāro mārgākāraś catvāra ity ete daśākārāḥ. anityaduḥkhataddhetubhya udvegād iti. anityād duḥkhāt taddhetoś ca. tasya duḥkhasya hetoś ca samudayād udvegāt. kiṃ. apraṇihitaḥ. akṛtasaṃskāra ity arthaḥ. mārgasya
T07yabhkvyu:13518: kolopamatayāvaśyatyājyatvāt. kola ucyate uḍupaḥ. sa upamāsyeti kolopamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13519: mārgaḥ. tadbhāvaḥ. tayā. kolopamatayā mārgasyāvaśyatyājyatvaṃ. tasmād apraṇihita ity adhikṛtaḥ. yathā hi kolam āśritya nadīm uttaran na kolaniṣṭho bhavati. tasyāvaśyatyājyatvāt. evaṃ mārgam āśritya na mārganiṣṭho bhavati. tasyāvaśyatyājyatvāt. tadākāra iti. taddaśākāro [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:13520: 349b] yathoktaḥ. tadatikramābhimukhatvād iti. tasya mārgasyātikrame 'bhimukhatvāt. anenāvaśyatyājyatvam asya darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:13521: anityaduḥkhataddhetvatikramābhimukha ity anuktam apy etad gamyata eva.
T07yabhkvyu:13522: śūnyatā-anātmatābhyāṃ tu nodvega iti. śūnyānātmākārābhyāṃ tu nodvego
T07yabhkvyu:13523: yogino bhavati. yady api hi duḥkhasatyaṃ śūnyānātmākārābhyām ākāryate. na tu tābhyāṃ tasmād duḥkhād udvegaḥ. kasmāt. nirvāṇasāmānyāt. nirvāṇam api śūnyānātmalakṣaṇaṃ. śūnyatā-anātmate hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇam
T07yabhkvyu:13524: (Abhidh-k-vy 683) iti. na ca tābhyāṃ tasmān nirvāṇād udvegaḥ. tasmān na tadākāro 'praṇihitasamādhir iti. laukikā ekādaśasv iti. kāmadhātāv anāgamye dhyānāntare dhyānārūpyeṣu ceti. yatra mārga iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13531: iti. yathāsaṃkhyena. śūnyatāśūnyatā [Tib. 350a] hi śūnyatākāreṇāśaikṣaṃ śūnyatāsamādhim ālambate nāyam ātmīyam iti. nānātmākāreṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:13532: āha. kim atra kāraṇaṃ yac chūnyatāśūnyatāsamādhiḥ śūnyatākāra eva. na punar anātmākāro 'pi śūnyatāvad iti. atrocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13535: anātmākārapravṛttaśūnyatāpṛṣṭheneti. atrocyate. tadutpattyānukūlyāt. sa eva hi śūnyatākārapravṛttaśūnyatāsamādhis tasya śūnyatāśūnyatāsamādher
T07yabhkvyu:13536: utpattāv ānukūlyenāvatiṣṭhate. nānātmākāraḥ. na hy evam anātmadarśanam udvejayati yathā śūnyadarśanaṃ. dṛṣṭeṣv api hy anātmato bhaveṣv abhiratir
T07yabhkvyu:13537: asti saṃsāre śūnyadarśanābhāvāt. tadyathādhvagasyāsaṃbaṃdhād adhvagadarśanād api prītiḥ. ekākinas tu tacchūnyatvād aprītir iti. tadvat.
T07yabhkvyu:13538: anityākāreṇeti. daśānām ākārāṇāṃ. na duḥkhata iti vistaraḥ. na duḥkhata ākārayaṃty anāsravasyātallakṣaṇatvāt. āryapratikūlatayā hi duḥkham iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13539: na hetusamudayaprabhavapratyayākārair anāsravasyātallakṣaṇatvād evānāsravasyāsamudayādilakṣaṇatvād ity arthaḥ. na mārgākārair [Tib. 350b]
T07yabhkvyu:13540: dūṣaṇīyatvād iti. so 'śaikṣaḥ samādhir dūṣayitavyo na ca mārgākārā dūṣaṇarūpā iti. ato na mārgākārais taṃ samādhim ālambate. nirodhākārais tu naiva sambandha iti. na taiś cintyate. pāriśeṣyād anityākāreṇaiva.
T07yabhkvyu:13541: asaṃkhyeyākṣayam ity apratisaṃkhyānirodham ity arthaḥ. aśaikṣasyānimittasya samādher apratisaṃkhyānirodham ālambate. śāntataḥ śānto 'yam iti. kathaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13542: tasyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ. aśaikṣād ānimittāt samādher vyutthitasya tadanantaraṃ ye sāsravāḥ kṣaṇā atikrāmanti anye cānāsravāḥ. yadi te notpannāḥ. syuḥ. aśaikṣā (Abhidh-k-vy 684) ānimittakṣaṇā utpannāḥ syuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13543: teṣāṃ sāsravāṇām anyānāsravāṇāṃ cotpattikāle teṣām aśaikṣāṇāṃ ānimittakṣaṇānām apratisaṃkhyānirodho labhyate. pratyayavaikalyāt. tam apratisaṃkhyānirodham ālambate śāntākāreṇa. anāsravasya
T07yabhkvyu:13544: pratisaṃkhyānirodhābhāvāt. na pratisaṃkhyānirodham ālambate. kasmāt punar anāsravasya pratisaṃkhyānirodho nāsti. apratikūlatvāt. yad dhi pratikūlam
T07yabhkvyu:13545: āryāṇāṃ. tat saṃyogasya visaṃyogāya yatas te yatante. visaṃyogaś ca pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ. ato 'nāsravasya na pratisaṃkhyanirodhaḥ. kiṃ cāśaikṣasyānimittasya samādheḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhābhāvāt. [Tib. 351a]
T07yabhkvyu:13546: apratisaṃkhyānirodhasya ca tatpratyarthikabhūtatvāt. tatprotsāhanenaiva tadvidūṣaṇam abhilaṣaṃs tadapratisaṃkhyānirodham evālambate.
T07yabhkvyu:13547: śatrūpagraheṇa hi loke māryopaghātaḥ kriyamāṇo dṛśyata iti. na nirodhapraṇītaniḥsaraṇākārair iti. nirodhaḥ sādhāraṇāḥ. na nirodha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13549: na nirodhākāreṇākāryate. anyathā hi śāntākāreṇa tadviśiṣṭena nālambitaḥ syāt. nirodhākāreṇa hy anityatānirodhenaiva dūṣita evāsāv apratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ syāt. taddūṣaṇena nāśaikṣa ānimittasamādhidūṣitaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:13550: syād ity abhiprāyaḥ. na praṇītākāreṇa. avyākṛtatvād
T07yabhkvyu:13551: apratisaṃkhyānirodhasya. kuśalaṃ hi praṇītaṃ nāvyākṛtam. ato na praṇītākāreṇālambate. avisaṃyogāc cāpratisaṃkhyānirodhasya. na niḥsaraṇākāreṇa tam ālambate. saṃkleśaviyogo hi saṃkleśaniḥsaraṇam iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13552: yasmān nāpratisaṃkhyānirodhena saṃsāraniḥsaraṇaṃ bhavati. tathā hi saty
T07yabhkvyu:13553: apy apratisaṃkhyānirodhe keṣāṃcit kuśalākuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ taiḥ saṃprayukta eva tatprāptyavicchedāt. āryamārgadveṣitvād [Tib. 351b] iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13556: akopyadharmaṇaḥ. tasya tīkṣṇendriyatvāt tadutpādane sāmarthyam asti.
T07yabhkvyu:13560: (VIII.27, 28) vistara iti. asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya vartate. asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā divyacakṣurabhijñājñānadarśanāya saṃvartate. asti samādhibhāvanāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā prajñāprabhedāya saṃvartate. asti samādhibhāvanā (Abhidh-k-vy 685) āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā āsravakṣayāya saṃvartata iti sūtraṃ. tatrāsevitā niṣevaṇabhāvanayā. bhāvitā
T07yabhkvyu:13562: āha. divyacakṣurabhijñājñānadarśanāya saṃvartata ity uktaṃ. na ca divyacakṣurabhijñāsamādhibhāvanā. atrocyate. ayaṃ phale hetūpacāraḥ. yasya hetoḥ samādhibhāvanāyā divyacakṣurabhijñāphalaṃ. tatra phale hetūpacāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13563: jñānadarśanāya samādhibhavaneti. yeṣāṃ punar ayaṃ pakṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13564: ṣaḍvidhā muktimārgadhīr iti dhyānasaṃgṛhītā eva mānasā vimuktimārgāḥ ṣaḍ abhijñā iti. teṣām acodyam evaitat. teṣāṃ vimuktimārgāṇāṃ samāhitatvāt. pūrvaka eva tu pakṣo abhidharmakośacintakānām ity avagantavyaṃ. divyacakṣuḥśrotravijñānayor
T07yabhkvyu:13567: 'nāgataṃ janma. tatra sukhavihāraḥ. tasmai nāvaśyam etat bhavati. kasmād ity āha. parihīṇānāṃ prathamadhyānāt. ūrdhvopapannānāṃ dvitīyādiṣu.
T07yabhkvyu:13569: jñānadarśanāyeti jñānāya darśanāya ceti samāsaḥ. tatra [Tib. 352a] jñānaṃ manovijñānasaṃprayuktā prajñā. amī bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā ity evamādivikalpād darśanaṃ cakṣurvijñānasaṃprayuktā prajñā
T07yabhkvyu:13572: anāsravāḥ vimokṣasukhavyutkrāntakasamāpattyāsravakṣayābhijñādayaḥ. atra tu samādhisaṃprayogāt prāyogikānāṃ [Tib. 352b] guṇānāṃ samādhibhāvanety upacāraḥ. prajñāprabhedāyeti. prajñāviśeṣakarṣāya. ātmopanāyikā kilaiṣā bhagavato dharmopadeśaneti. ātmana upanāyikā ātmano deśikety arthaḥ bodhisattvo hi karmāntapratyavekṣaṇāya niḥkrānto jambumūle prathamaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13573: dhyānam utpāditavān. bodhimūle ca devaputramāraṃ bhaṃktvā prathame yāme
T07yabhkvyu:13574: divyaṃ cakṣur utpāditavān. tena divyena cakṣuṣā sattvāṃś cyutyupapattisaṃkaṭasthān abhivīkṣya tatparitrāṇāya madhyame yāme
T07yabhkvyu:13575: dhyānavimokṣasamāpattiḥ saṃmukhīkṛtavān. te 'sya prāyogikā guṇāḥ prajñāprabhedāya jāyante. tatas tṛtīye yāme caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya
T07yabhkvyu:13576: niyāmam avakramya yāvad vajropamena samādhinā sarvasaṃyojanaprahāṇaṃ kṛtavān iti. yasmāc caivam ātmopanāyikā dharmadeśanā. ataś (Abhidh-k-vy
T07yabhkvyu:13581: yathāsaṃkhyam iti. vyāpādabahulānāṃ tatprahāṇāya maitrī. vihiṃsābahulānāṃ tatprahāṇāya karuṇā. aratibahulānāṃ tatprahāṇāya muditā.

T07yabhkvyu:13584: ubhayasvabhāvāt tv asau yujyata iti. alobhasvabhāvā cādveṣasvabhāvā ca
T07yabhkvyu:13585: yujyata ity arthaḥ. kiṃ kāraṇam. rāgadveṣayoḥ pratipakṣatvāt. atas tu naiko dharma ubhayasvabhāva iti grahītavyaṃ. kiṃ tarhi. alobhādveṣayor upekṣāśabdo vartata iti. sukhitā bata sattvā iti. saṃtv ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13586: duḥkhitā bata sattvā iti. duḥkhitā duḥkhād vimucyaṃtāṃ ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13587: tathā hi vyākhyāsyate. vyāpādādayaḥ kleśopakleśā dūrīkriyante. atas tatpratipakṣatvam uktaṃ. katham iti darśasyati. kāmadhātubhūmikāni anāgamyabhūmikāni ca maitryādīni trīṇi maulapramāṇasadṛśāni vidyante.
T07yabhkvyu:13588: prayogālambanākārasvabhāvasādṛśyāt maulaiḥ sadṛśyāni bhavanti. tair apramāṇais tribhis tān kleśān viṣkaṃbhya prahāṇamārgaiḥ. maitrī vihiṃsābahulānāṃ tatprahāṇāya. mādhyasthyād iti. apakṣapātivenāpy anunīto nāpi pratihata ity arthaḥ. aśraddhatām iti vistaraḥ. asukhavatāṃ. sukham astīty adhimokṣāt kathaṃ na viparītatvaṃ bhavati. saṃtv ity abhiprāyād
T07yabhkvyu:13589: iti. sukhitāḥ saṃtv ity abhiprāyāt. na viparītatvam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13590: āśayasyāviparītatvād veti. āśayaḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ sukhitā bata sattvā ity ete cittacaittāḥ saparivārāḥ. asyāśayasyāviparītatvān na viparītatvaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13591: [Tib. 353b] bhavati. kathaṃ punar āśayasyāviparītatvam ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:13592: adhimuktisaṃjñānād iti. adhimukteḥ saṃjñānam adhimuktisaṃjñānaṃ. tasmāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13593: yasmāt tām adhimuktiṃ tathaiva saṃjānīte. ādhimokṣiko 'yaṃ manaskāra iti paricchinatti. akuśalatvam iti. viparītagrahaṇataḥ. na. kuśalatvāt. naitad
T07yabhkvyu:13594: evaṃ. kasmāt. kuśalamūlatvāt. kathaṃ punaḥ kuśalamūlam ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:13596: duḥkhāpanayanākāratvāc ca karuṇā (Abhidh-k-vy 687) duḥkhopasaṃhārākārāyā vihiṃsāyāḥ pratipakṣo bhavati. muditā carateḥ pratipakṣaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:13597: saumanasyārūpatvāt. upekṣā ca mādhyasthyāt kāmarāgavyāpādayoḥ pratipakṣa iti. tadālaṃbanānām iti. kāmāvacarasattvālaṃbanānām ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13598: tadbhājanena bhājanagataṃ darśitam iti. sthānena sthānīyasattvaloko darśita ity arthaḥ. samāhitāsamāhitamaulaprayogagrahaṇād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13599: ṣaṭpaṃcadaśabhūmikatvāt trayāṇām api kāraṇam ucyate saṃbhavataḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13600: tatrāsamāhitaḥ kāmadhātuḥ. prayogāḥ sāmantakānīti saṃbhavato yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13602: sāmantakāny api prayogabhūtāni gṛhyante. kiṃ maulānīti.
T07yabhkvyu:13603: mauladhyānabhūmikatvād iti. maulaśuddhakadhyānabhūmikatvād ity arthaḥ. na hi śuddhakair mauladhyānaiḥ kleśāḥ prahīyanta ity uktaṃ prāk.
T07yabhkvyu:13604: adhimuktimanaskāratvān na taiḥ kleśāḥ prahīyante. tattvamanaskāreṇa hi kleśaprahāṇaṃ. sattvālambanatvāc ca na taiḥ prahāṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13605: dharmasāmānyalakṣaṇamanaskāreṇa hi kleśaprahāṇam iti siddhāntaḥ. kathaṃ tarhīty āha. tatprayogeṇa tv iti vistaraḥ. maitryādiprayogeṇa
T07yabhkvyu:13608: prahīṇadūrīkaraṇāc ceti. yasmād ānantaryamārgair laukikair lokottarair vā mārgair vyāpādādayaḥ kleśopakleśā dūrīkriyante. atas tatpratipakṣatvam uktaṃ. katham iti darśayati. kāmadhātubhūmikāny anāgamyabhūmikāni ca
T07yabhkvyu:13610: prayogālambanākārasvabhāvasādṛśyān maulaiḥ sadṛśāni bhavanti. tair apramāṇais tribhis tān kleśān viṣkaṃbhya prahāṇamārgair ānantaryamārgaiḥ prajahāti. balavatpratyayalābhe 'pīti. vyāpādādipratyayalābhe 'pi balavati sati taiḥ kleśair anādhṛṣyo bhavati. saṃmukhībhāvataḥ. adhimātra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13611: mitrapakṣe. paramamitre hi sukarā maitrī. spharatīti. vyāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:13612: pūrvapuṇyāphalasaṃdarśanād iti. pūrvapuṇyaphalasaṃdarśanāt samucchinnakuśalamūle 'pi pudgale śakyaṃ guṇagrāhiṇānena bhavituṃ puṇyam anena kṛtam āsīd yenāsya rūpādisaṃpad iti. pratyekabuddhe ca doṣagrāhiṇā
T07yabhkvyu:13613: nūnam anenāpuṇyaṃ kṛtam āsīd yenāsyaivaṃ rūpādivaikalyam iti. api eva duḥkhād vimucyerann ity adhimucyamānaḥ karuṇāyāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 688)
T07yabhkvyu:13614: prayujyate. apy evābhipramoderann ity adhimucyamāno muditāyāṃ prayujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13615: muditayā na samanvāgata iti. tṛtīyacaturthayoḥ saumanasyābhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13617: iti. yathāsūtraṃ. katham. aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ. katame 'ṣṭau. rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatīty ayaṃ prathamo vimokṣaḥ. adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi
T07yabhkvyu:13618: [Tib. 355a] paśyatīty ayaṃ dvitīyo vimokṣaḥ. śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena
T07yabhkvyu:13619: sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatīty ayaṃ tṛtīyo vimokṣaḥ. sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṃgamāt nānātvasaṃjñānām
T07yabhkvyu:13620: amanasikārād anantam ākāśam anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati. tadyathā devā ākāśānantyāyatanopagāḥ. ayaṃ caturtho vimokṣaḥ. punar aparaṃ sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ samatikramyānaṃtaṃ vijñānam anaṃtaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati.
T07yabhkvyu:13621: tadyathā devā vijñānānaṃtyāyatanopagāḥ. ayaṃ paṃcamo vimokṣaḥ. punar aparaṃ sarvaśo vijñānānaṃtyāyatanaṃ samatikramya nāsti kiṃcid ity ākiṃcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati. tadyathā devā ākiṃcanyāyatanopagāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13622: ayaṃ ṣaṣṭo vimokṣaḥ. punar aparaṃ sarvaśa ākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ samatikramya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati. tadyathā devā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāḥ. ayaṃ saptamo vimokṣaḥ. punar aparaṃ sarvaśo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samatikramya saṃjñānirodhaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya [Tib. 355b] viharati. ayam aṣṭamo vimokṣa iti. rūpī
T07yabhkvyu:13623: rūpāṇīti. svātmani rūpāṇi vibhāvya bahir api rūpāṇi paśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:13624: vinīlakādyālambanatvāt. aśubhāvan nayo veditavya iti. adhirāgasya varṇarāgādipratipakṣam ārabhya saṃbhavato vistareṇa yojyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13627: prathamadhyānabhūmiko vimokṣaḥ. prathamadhyānabhūmikasyāpi varṇarāgapratipakṣeṇa dvitīyadhyānabhūmiko vimokṣaḥ. etau ca dvau punar dūrībhāvapratipakṣau veditavyau.
T07yabhkvyu:13628: āha. dvitīyādidhyāneṣu varṇarāgo nāstīti kathaṃ gamyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13629: cakṣurvijñānābhāvāt. yo hi yasmād viṣayād viraktaḥ. niyatam asau tadgrāhakād api vijñānād viraktaḥ. dvitīyādiṣu ca dhyāneṣu cakṣurvijñānādi
T07yabhkvyu:13630: nāstīti. ato varṇavītarāgās ta iti siddhaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13633: anyadāpy asamāhitāḥ saṃtīti. ārūpyeṣu vipākajāṃś cittacaittān

T07yabhkvyu:13637: aṣṭama iti vākyaśeṣaḥ. saṃjñāveditavaimukhyād iti. saṃjñāvaimukhyād veditavaimukhyāc ca vimokṣaḥ. sarvasaṃskṛtād vā vaimukhyād vimokṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13638: samāpattyāvaraṇavimokṣaṇād vimokṣa iti. samāpattyāvaraṇavimokṣavaimukhyād vimokṣa iti. tatra samāpattyāvaraṇaṃ yasminn āvaraṇe cittākarmaṇyatā traidhātukavītarāgā api saṃtaḥ prathamam api maulaṃ dhyānaṃ notpādayanti.
T07yabhkvyu:13639: yathāyogam iti. dvayor vinīlakādyamanojñaṃ rūpaṃ ālambanaṃ. tṛtīyasya manojñam ālambanam iti. taddhetunirodhau ceti. tasya duḥkhasya [Tib. 356b]
T07yabhkvyu:13640: samudayanirodhau. sarvaś cānvayajñānapakṣa iti. ūrdhvādhaḥ svabhūmika ity
T07yabhkvyu:13641: arthaḥ. apratisaṃkhyānirodhaś ceti. apratisaṃkhyānirodhaś cārūpyāvimokṣāṇāṃ ālambanam iti
T07yabhkvyu:13644: āha. katamaḥ punar apratisaṃkhyānirodhas teṣām ālambanam. atrocyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13645: aśaikṣasyānimittasya samādher apratisaṃkhyānirodham ālambante. te ca sapta
T07yabhkvyu:13646: sāmantakāni hitvānyāsv ekādaśasu bhūmiṣu kāmadhātāv anāgamye dhyānāntareṣu dhyanārūpyeṣu cāṣṭāsv iti. sopasaṃkhyānaṃ śāstram iti śāstralakṣaṇaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati. ākāśaṃ caikasyeti. vaktavyaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13649: arthaḥ. tadabhāvaḥ kāyikavijñānābhāvāt. sukhamaṇḍeñjitatvāc ca. sukhasya
T07yabhkvyu:13650: maṇḍaḥ. sarvasukhasyoparisthaṃ sukham ity arthaḥ. teneñjitatvāt
T07yabhkvyu:13651: kampitatvāt. na tṛtīye dhyāne vimokṣo vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13652: [Tib. 357a] yadi tṛtīyadhyānabhūmiko varṇarāgo nāsti. kasmāc chubhaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 690) vimokṣam utpādayatīti. ata āha aśubhayā līnāṃ saṃtatiṃ pramodayituṃ jijñāsanārthaṃ veti. vimokṣādīnām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13654: dūribhāvapratipakṣatvāt. samāpattivaśitvārthaṃ ca. tac ca samāpattivaśitvam araṇādiguṇābhinirhārāya bhavati. āryāyāś ca rddheḥ. kiṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13656: vastupariṇāmādhiṣṭhānāyurutsargādīnīti. tatra vastupariṇāmaṃ. yad vastu yathādhimucyate. tathaiva tad bhavati. yathā suvarṇasya mṛtkaraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13657: tathādhimokṣād adhiṣṭhānaṃ sthirasya vastunaḥ. imaṃ tu kālam avatiṣṭhatām iti tathāyuṣā utsargaḥ. ādiśabdena sumeroḥ paramāṇau praveśa ity evam
T07yabhkvyu:13659: kasmāt tṛtīyāṣṭamayor eva sākṣātkaraṇam uktaṃ. nānyeṣām iti. kathaṃ tṛtīyasya sākṣātkaraṇam uktaṃ. śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena
T07yabhkvyu:13661: 357b] kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatīti. atra sākṣātkṛtveti pratyakṣīkṛtvety arthaḥ. upasaṃpadya viharatīti tāṃ samāpadya samāpattiṃ viharatīty arthaḥ. atrocyate. prathamadvitīyābhyāṃ vimokṣābhyāṃ tṛtīyasya
T07yabhkvyu:13662: vimokṣasya prādhānyāt. rūpivimokṣāvaraṇasākalyaprahāṇād āśrayaparivṛttitas tṛtīyasya sākṣātkaraṇam uktam. evam aṣṭamasyāpi prādhānyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13664: dhātubhūmiparyantāvasthitatvāc ceti. caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ rūpadhātubhūmiparyaṃtāvasthitaṃ. bhavāgram apy ārūpyadhātubhūmiparyantāvasthitaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13665: (VIII.35) evam adhimātrāṇīti. adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyaty adhimātrāṇi suvarṇadurvarṇānīti vistaraḥ yāvad idaṃ dvitīyam
T07yabhkvyu:13666: abhibhvāyatanam. adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñi evam eveti. katham. adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇānīti pūrvavad yāvad idaṃ tṛtīyam abhibhvāyatanaṃ. tathā adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśayti adhimātrāṇi suvarṇadurvarṇānīti pūrvavad yāvad idaṃ tṛtīyam
T07yabhkvyu:13667: abhibhvāyatanaṃ. tathā adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī paśyaty adhimātrāṇi suvarṇadurvarṇānīti pūrvavat yāvād idaṃ caturtham abhibhvāyatanam ity etāni catvārīti. arūpasaṃjñy eva punar nīlapītalohitāvadātāni [Tib. 358a]
T07yabhkvyu:13668: paśyatīti. katham. adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni
T07yabhkvyu:13669: nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni. tadyathā umakāpuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13670: vārāṇaseyaṃ vā vastraṃ nīlaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ nīlanidarśanaṃ nīlanirbhāsaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13671: (Abhidh-k-vy 691) tāni khalu rūpāṇy abhibhūya jānāty abhibhūya paśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:13672: evaṃsaṃjñī ca bhavatīdaṃ paṃcamaṃ abhibhvāyatanaṃ. adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati pītāni pītavarṇāni pītanidarśanāni pītanirbhāsāni.
T07yabhkvyu:13673: tadyathā karṇikārapuṣpaṃ vārāṇaseyaṃ vā vastraṃ pītam iti vistaraḥ. idaṃ ṣaṣṭham abhibhvāyatanaṃ. adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī rūpāṇi paśyati lohitāni lohitavarṇāni lohitanidarśanāni lohitanirbhāsāni. tadyathā baṃdhūkapuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vārāṇaseyaṃ vā vastraṃ lohitam iti vistaraḥ. idaṃ saptamam abhibhvāyatanaṃ. adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati avadātāny
T07yabhkvyu:13674: avadātavarṇāni avadātanidarśanāni avadātanirbhāsāni. tadyathā uśanastārakā saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇaseyaṃ vastram avadātam [Tib. 358b] iti vistaraḥ. idam aṣṭmam abhibhvāyatanam iti. mūrdhakāni catvārīmāni cātyārīty aṣṭau
T07yabhkvyu:13677: iti. yathā rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatīti prathamo vimokṣaḥ. ātmagataṃ rūpaṃ paśyan
T07yabhkvyu:13678: bahirgataṃ rūpaṃ paśyati. evam ādye abhibhvāyatane. tayor hy ekam
T07yabhkvyu:13679: ātmagataṃ rūpaṃ paśyan bahirgataṃ paśyati. tathā hy etat paṭhyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13680: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttānīti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13681: dvitīyam api tathaiva. ayaṃ tu viśeṣo bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyaty
T07yabhkvyu:13682: adhimātrāṇīti. kiṃ ca yathā prathamo vimokṣaḥ prathamadhyānabhūmikaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:13683: kāmāvacaravarṇarāgapratipakṣaḥ kāmāvacararūpāyatanālambanaś ca. tatheme prathame abhibhvāyatane
T07yabhkvyu:13685: iti. yathādhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatīty evaṃlakṣaṇo
T07yabhkvyu:13686: dvitīyo vimokṣaḥ. evaṃlakṣaṇe evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthe abhibhvāyatane. te api hy evaṃ paṭhyete. adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñībahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttānīti tṛtīyaḥ paṭhyate. adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyaty adhimātrāṇīti caturthaḥ paṭhyate. kiṃ ca yathā dvitīyo vimokṣaḥ dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaḥ prathamadhyānabhūmikavarṇarāgapratipakṣaḥ [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:13687: 359a] kāmāvacararūpālaṃbanaś ca. tathā tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ cābhibhvāyatanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13689: iti. yathā śubho vimokṣaś caturthadhyānabhūmikaḥ kāmāvacaramanojñarūpāyatanālambanaś ca. tathā
T07yabhkvyu:13690: nīlapītalohitāvadātābhibhvāyatanāni. kevalaṃ tv iha varṇacatuṣṭayaṃ vibhajya gṛhyate. śubhasya ca vimokṣasyālobhaḥ svabhāvaḥ. evam eṣām api.
T07yabhkvyu:13691: yathāyaṃ śubho vimokṣaḥ saparivāragrahaṇāt paṃcaskaṃdhasvabhāvaḥ. tathaiva tāny apīty avagantavyaṃ. tair vimokṣamātram (Abhidh-k-vy 692) iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13692: nālambanābhibhavanaṃ. kathaṃ cābhibhvāyatanair ālaṃbanābhibhavanam ity ata āha. yatheṣṭam adhimokṣād iti. yatheṣṭaṃ tair nīlapītādyadhimokṣāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13693: kṣaṇena nīlaṃ kṣaṇena pītam ityādi. amanojñasya vā vinīlakāder
T07yabhkvyu:13694: manojñādhimokṣāt. kleśānutpādāc ceti. śubhato 'pi ca sāṃkleśikaṃ vastv
T07yabhkvyu:13695: ākārayataḥ kleśānutpattes tair abhibhvāyatanair ālaṃbanābhibhavanaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13699: pṛthivī varṇasaṃsthānam ucyate lokasaṃjñayā āpas tejaś ca vāyuś ca dhātur eva tathāpi ceti
T07yabhkvyu:13701: vāyau spraṣṭavyāyatanam ity eka iti. ye vāyau rūpāyatanaṃ necchanti. ta
T07yabhkvyu:13702: āhuḥ. vāyau spraṣṭavyāyatnam ālambanam iti. vimokṣaprāveśikānīti. praveśā eva prāveśikāni. iti svārthavṛddhividhānāt. praveśe bhavāni vā.
T07yabhkvyu:13703: uttarottaraviśiṣṭatvād iti. yasmād vimokṣebhya uttarāṇy abhibhvāyatanāni
T07yabhkvyu:13704: viśiṣṭāni. abhibhvāyatanebhya uttarāṇi kṛtsnāyatanāni viśiṣṭānīti. tad uktaṃ bhavati. vimokṣān utpādyābhibhvāyatanāny utpādayati.
T07yabhkvyu:13705: abhibhvāyatanāny utpādya kṛtsnāyatanāny utpādayatīti. sthāpayitvā nirodhavimokṣam iti. tasyaikāntenāryasaṃtānikatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13708: śeṣam iti vistaraḥ. kiṃ punaḥ śeṣaṃ. prathamās trayo vimokṣāḥ abhibhvāyatanāny
T07yabhkvyu:13709: aṣṭau. kṛtsnāyatanāny aṣṭau. etan manuṣyāśrayam eva. kiṃ kāraṇam.
T07yabhkvyu:13711: (VIII.38) kathaṃ [Tib. 360a] rūpārūpyadhātvor ārūpyadhyānaviśeṣotpādanam iti. ārūpyadhātau rūpadhātau vā yasyāṃ bhūmāv upapannaḥ. tadūrdhvaṃ yad ārūpyaṃ dhyānaṃ ca. tat tato viśiṣyate ity ārūpyadhyānaviśeṣāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13712: tasyārūpyadhyānaviśeṣaya katham upadeśam antareṇa bhavatīti. yataḥ śeṣaṃ manuṣyāśrayam eva. upadeśasāmarthyenotpādanād ity uktam. ato 'nena
T07yabhkvyu:13713: saṃbandhena pṛṣṭaṃ. kathaṃ rūpārūpyadhātvor iti vistaraḥ. hetubālāc cāsannābhīkṣṇābhyāsād iti. āsannābhyāsād abhīkṣṇābhyāsāc ca. kathaṃ kṛtvā.
T07yabhkvyu:13714: kaścid ārūpyasamāpattiṃ samāpadya tataś ca parihāyānantaram eva rūpadhātāv upapadyate. ārūpyasamāpattilakṣaṇasya sabhāgahetor balīyastvāt tasya rūpadhātāv ārūpyasamāpattir utpatsyate. abhīkṣṇābhyāsād api. yadi kaścid ārūpyasamāpattim (Abhidh-k-vy 693) abhīkṣṇaṃ samāpadya tataś ca parihāya rūpadhātāv upapadyate. tasyārūpyasamāpattilakṣaṇasya sabhāgahetor balīyastvād rūpadhātāv ārūpyasamāpattir utpadyate. evaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpatter [Tib. 360b] api parihīṇasyākāśānantyāyatanopapannasya tathaiva tatsamāpattīnām utpādanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13715: evaṃ tadūrdhvopapannasya. karmabalāc ca. rūpadhātāv upapannasya aparaparyāyavedanīyasya karmaṇaḥ pratyupasthitavipākatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13716: tadvairāgyānukūlā saṃtatir avatiṣṭhate. na hy adhastād avītarāgeṇordhvam ārūpyadhātau śakyam upapattum iti. evam ārūpyeṣv ākāśānantyāyatanopapannasya karmabhalāt. ūrdhvabhūmikasya vijñānānantyāyatanabhūmikasyāparaparyāyavedanīyasya karmaṇaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:13717: pratyupasthitavipākatvāt. tadvairāgyānukūlā saṃtatir avatiṣṭhate. na hy adhastād avītarāgeṇordhvaṃ śakyam upapattum iti. etābhyāṃ ca hetukarmabalābhyāṃ. kathaṃ prathamādiṣu dhyāneṣu dvitīyādidhyānotpādanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13719: yojyaṃ. dharmatayāpi ceti. kathaṃ dharmatā nāma. kecit tāvat sautrāntikā
T07yabhkvyu:13720: āhuḥ. eṣām eva dharmāṇām udbhūtavṛttīnāṃ pūrvadhyānavāsanādhipatyāt tadutpattāv upadeśam antareṇa dhyānotpattāv ānuguṇyaṃ dharmatā prakṛtiḥ svabhāva ity arthaḥ. vaibhāṣikā api kecid āhuḥ. paurvajānmanikāt sabhāgahetoḥ niṣyandaphalaṃ dhyānotpādanaṃ. tadupadeśam antareṇānyato dharmateti. [Tib. 361a] kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām udbhūtavṛttitvād iti. tatra saṃvartanīkāle kuśalānāṃ karmapathānām ity arthaḥ. vṛttis teṣām eva
T07yabhkvyu:13721: dharmāṇāṃ yat kāritram. udbhūtā utkṛṣṭā vṛttir eṣām ity udbhūtavṛttayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13722: tadbhāvaḥ. tasmāt. etad uktaṃ bhavati. teṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ prakarṣeṇātmalābhāt
T07yabhkvyu:13723: tadutpattyānuguṇyenātmalābhāt tadupadeśam antareṇānyataḥ pūrvadhyānavāsanāyāṃ satyāṃ dhyānotpattir
T07yabhkvyu:13724: (VIII.39) ima īdṛśā dharmāṇāṃ prakārā iti. sāsravānāsravāṇāṃ dharmānāṃ dhātubhūmyālaṃbanākārādiprakārā yathāyogam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13725: dhātāras tasya vaktāraḥ pratipattāra eva ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:13726: tasyāgamādhigamātmakasya saddharmasya yathāsaṃkhyam āgamasya ye vaktāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13727: te 'sya dhātāraḥ. adhigamasya ca ye pratipattāraḥ. te 'sya dhātāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13728: adhigamasyaivam iti. varṣasahasram avasthānam iti. āgamasya tu bhūyāṃsaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13729: kālam iti. varṣasahasrād ūrdhvam apīty arthaḥ. eṣa eva pakṣo yukta iti paśyāmaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13733: kāśmīravaibhāṣikanītisiddha iti vistaraḥ. kaśmīre [Tib. 361b] bhavāḥ kāśmīrāḥ. vibhāṣayā dīvyanti vaibhāṣikā iti vyākhyātam etat. santi kāśmīrā na vaibhāṣikāḥ. ye vinayavidādayaḥ sautrāntikā bhadantādayaḥ. santi vaibhāṣikā na kāśmīrāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13734: ye bahirdeśakā vaibhāṣikā ity ubhayaviśeṣaṇaṃ. teṣāṃ nītyā yaḥ siddho
T07yabhkvyu:13735: 'bhidharmaḥ. sa prāyeṇeha mayā deśitaḥ. arthād uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13743: iti. saddharmasyāgamādhigamalakṣaṇasya nītau varṇane munayo buddhā bhagavanto buddhaputrāś cāryaśāradvatīputrādayaḥ pramāṇaṃ sarvākārasarvadharmāvabodhe āptā ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13748: sākṣāddraṣṭari sākṣī mārgāmārgajño bhagavān iti yo 'dhigatatattvo
T07yabhkvyu:13749: bhagavataḥ sākṣijanaḥ sahāyabhūtaḥ. tasmin parinirvāṇe kṣīṇe. [Tib. 362a]
