T07yabhkvyu:13765: evaṃ kaṇṭhagataṃ prāṇaṃ kaṇṭhagataprāṇam ivety arthaḥ. tad viditvā balakālaṃ ca malānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13766: dośāṇāṃ viditvā na pramādyaṃ mumukṣubhir iti bhāvasādhanam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13771: na pramādyaṃ mumukṣubhir iti vacanād ayam eva mokṣopāyaḥ. nāsty ato 'nyo mokṣopāyaḥ. tad atra moktukāmaiḥ pramādo na kartavya ity arthād uktam ācāryena. codakaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:13772: pṛcchati. kiṃ khalv ata iti vistaraḥ. atrocyate. nāstīti. kiṃ kāraṇam ity
T07yabhkvyu:13773: āha. vitathātmadṛṣṭiniviṣṭatvād iti. vitathāyām ātmadṛṣṭau niviṣṭāḥ
T07yabhkvyu:13774: kutīrthyā vitathātma [Tib. 362b] dṛṣṭiniviṣṭāḥ. tadbhāvaḥ. tasmāt. nāsty anyatra mokṣa iti. stotrakāreṇāpy eṣo 'rtha uktaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13775: sāhaṃkāre manasi na śamaṃ yāti janmaprabandho nāhaṃkāraś calati hṛdayād ātmadṛṣṭau ca satyāṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13776: anyaḥ śāstā jagati ca yato nāsti nairātmyavādī nānyas tasmād upaśamavidhes tvanmatād asti
T07yabhkvyu:13777: iti. sādhanaṃ cātra. nāsti kapilolūkādīnāṃ mokṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13778: vitathātmadṛṣṭiniviṣṭatvāt. adṛṣṭatattvapuruṣavat. ātmagrāhaprabhavāś ca kleśāḥ iti yathoktaṃ. yāni vā punar ihaikatyānāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ pṛthag
T07yabhkvyu:13779: loke dṛṣṭigatāni satkāyadṛṣṭimūlakāni tānīti vistaraḥ. ātmadṛṣṭau ca satyām ātmasnehādayaḥ kleśāḥ pravartante. skaṃdhasaṃtāna evedam ātmābhidhānam iti. ātmety abhidhānam ātmaprajñaptir ity arthaḥ. nānyasminn abhidheye skaṃdhasaṃtānavyatirikte kalpita ity arthaḥ. kasmād evam ity
T07yabhkvyu:13780: āha. pratyakṣānumānābhāvād iti. pratyakṣasyānumānasya cābhāvān na
T07yabhkvyu:13782: teṣāṃ pratyakṣam upalabdhir iti. [Tib. 363a] pratyakṣam ity upalabdhiviśeṣaṇaṃ. pratyakṣaṃ tadupalabdhiḥ pratyakṣata upalabdhir ity arthaḥ. atha vā pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam upalabdhir upalabhyate 'nayety
T07yabhkvyu:13783: upalabdhiḥ. asaty aṃtarāya iti. asaty upalabdhivighne 'tisaṃnikarṣātiviprakarṣādike teṣāṃ. ṣaṇṇāṃ viṣayāṇām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13784: rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyāyatanānāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 698) dharmāyatanasya ca vedanādilakṣaṇasya yogiviṣayasya cāgamavikalpātītasyeti. manasaś ca.
T07yabhkvyu:13785: kiṃ. pratyakṣam upalabdhiḥ. samanantaraniruddhaṃ hi mano 'nantarotpannena
T07yabhkvyu:13786: manovijñānena vijñāyate. raktaṃ vā dviṣṭaṃ vā sukhasaṃprayuktaṃ vā
T07yabhkvyu:13787: duḥkhasaṃprayuktaṃ vā ity evamādi svasaṃvedyatayety apare. tad etad dvividhaṃ pratyakṣaṃ grāhyagataṃ grāhakagataṃ ceti. anumānaṃ ceti vistaraḥ. yatra pratyakṣasyāpravṛttiḥ. tatrānumānatas tadupalabdhiḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13788: tadyathā paṃcānām iṃdriyāṇām iti. cakṣuriṃdriyādīnāṃ. sati kāraṇe kṣetrodakādike. kāraṇāntarasya bījalakṣaṇasyābhāve kāryasyāṃkurākhyasyābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ. bhāve ca tasya bījasya punarbhavo 'ṃkurasya dṛṣṭaḥ. tadyathāṃkurasyeti dṛṣṭāṃtopanyāsaḥ. evaṃ dṛṣṭāntam upanyasya dārṣṭāṃtikam upadarśayann āha. saty eva vābhāsaprāpta iti
T07yabhkvyu:13789: vistaraḥ. vidyamāna eva saṃmukhīprāpte viṣaye rūpādike manaskāre ca tajje kāraṇe. viṣayagrahaṇasya cakṣurādivijñānasyābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ. punaś ca bhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13790: keṣām iti [Tib. 363b] yathāsaṃkhyaṃ darśayati. andhabadhirādīnām abhāvaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13792: ādiśabdenopahatānupahataghrāṇendriyādīnāṃ grahaṇam. atas tatrāpi kāraṇāṃtarasya kasyāpi anirbhinnarūpasyābhāvo bhāvaś ca yathāsaṃkhyam eva
T07yabhkvyu:13793: niścīyate. kiṃ punas tad ity āha. yac ca tat kāraṇāntaram apekṣyate. tad
T07yabhkvyu:13794: indriyaṃ. cakṣurādikam ity abhiprāyaḥ. sādhanaṃ cātra. kāraṇāntarasahitaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:13795: svakāryajanakaḥ. paṃcavijñānakāyajanakasaṃmato viṣayamanaskāralakṣaṇo bhāvaḥ. kadācid eva svakāryanirvartakatvāt. kadācid eva svakāryanirvartakaṃ. tat kāraṇāṃtarasahitasvakāryajanakaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13797: bījalakṣaṇakāraṇāntarasahitasvakāryāntarajanakaṃ hi kṣetrodakaṃ kadācid eva svakāryanirvartakaṃ. bījasadbhāvāvasthāyām aṃkuranirvartakatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13798: bījasadbhāvāvasthāyāṃ ca svakāryajanakatvāt. tathā ca sa
T07yabhkvyu:13799: viṣayamanaskāralakṣaṇo bhāvaḥ. sa hy anaṃdhābadhirādyāvasthāyāṃ tasya paṃcavijñānakāyalakṣaṇasya svakāryasya janako bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13801: svakāryajanaka iti. tad indriyam iti. kathaṃ tad indriyam iti
T07yabhkvyu:13802: paricchidyate. kāraṇāṃtaram atrāstīty etāvad eva hi paricchidyate. na tu tad indriyam iti. [Tib. 364a] siddham evaitat.
T07yabhkvyu:13803: maharṣipraṇidhijñānaparicchinnatvād asty eva cakṣurādikaṃ indriyaṃ cakṣurvijñānādikāraṇam iti. sarveṣām avivādāc ca. na caivam ātmato 'stīti
T07yabhkvyu:13804: nāsty ātmeti nigamayati. uktaṃ hy evam arthataḥ sādhanaṃ. nāsty ātmā.
T07yabhkvyu:13805: pramāṇenānupalabhyamānatvāt. atyantābhāvavad iti. asty anumānam. ato
T07yabhkvyu:13806: (Abhidh-k-vy 699) siddho hetur iti cet. na. tasyābhidheyatvāt. yadi hi tad
T07yabhkvyu:13807: asti. tad ucyatāṃ. na vānmātreṇāsiddho 'yaṃ hetur iti pratyavasthātavyam
T07yabhkvyu:13809: yat tarhi vātsīputrīyā iti vistaraḥ. vātsīputrīyā aryasāṃmatīyāḥ. anena vitathātmadṛṣṭiniviṣṭalakṣaṇo hetur anaikāṃtika iti darśayati. na hi vātsīputrīyāṇāṃ mokṣo neṣyate. bauddhatvāt. atha vā prākpakṣavirodhasāpakṣālo 'yaṃ pakṣo nāsty ātmety anena darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:13810: svapakṣo hi vātsīputrīyo nikāya iti. vicāryaṃ tāvad etad iti. tannikāye prajñaptisatpudgala ity adoṣa eṣa ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13811: kiṃ vedaṃ dravyata iti kiṃ vā prajñaptita iti codita acārya āha. rūpādivad bhāvāntaraṃ ced dravyataḥ. yadi yathā rūpādiḥ śabdāder bhāvāntaram abhiprīyate. dravyataḥ pudgala ity upagato bhavati. [Tib. 364b]
T07yabhkvyu:13812: bhinnalakṣaṇaṃ rūpaṃ śabdād ityādi. kṣīrādivat samudāyaś cet prajñaptitaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13814: tṛṇakāṣṭheṣṭīkādibhyaḥ hastyaśvarathādibhyaś ca na bhāvāntaram iṣyate. kiṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13815: tarhi. teṣām eva samudāyamātram ity evaṃ cet. prajñaptitaḥ pudgala ity
T07yabhkvyu:13816: upagato bhavati. na hi rūpādibhyas ṭṛṇādibhyo hastyādibhyo vā
T07yabhkvyu:13817: kṣīragṛhaseneti vā kaścid bhāvo 'sti. kiṃ cātaḥ kaś cāto doṣa ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13818: yadi tāvad dravyata iti pakṣaḥ āśrīyate. sa pudgalo bhinnasvabhāvatvāt
T07yabhkvyu:13822: arūpaskandhādilakṣaṇatvāt pudgalasya. kāraṇaṃ cāsya vaktavyaṃ. yadi saṃskṛta ity abhiprāyaḥ. asaṃskṛto vā. atas tīrthikadṛṣṭiprasaṃgaḥ. ato
T07yabhkvyu:13825: varṣātapābhyāṃ kiṃ vyomnaś carmaṇy asti tayoḥ [Tib. 365a] phalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13826: carmopamaś cet so 'nityaḥ. khatulyaś ced asat phalam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13827: idam andhavaṃcanam anunmīlitārtham iti. andham ivāndhaṃ. kasmāt. yasmād anunmīlitārthaṃ avyaṃjitārtham ity arthaḥ. [ity ataḥ] skaṃdhān ālaṃbyeti gṛhītvety arthaḥ. yathā rūpādīn gṛhītvāpekṣya kṣīraprajñaptiḥ. na rūpādivyatiriktaṃ kṣīram astīti. yadi tathā pudgala iti prajñaptir asatpudgalaḥ prāpnotīty arthaḥ. skaṃdhān pratītyeti. yadi skaṃdhān pratītya prāpyeti. sa eva doṣaḥ. teṣv eva skaṃdheṣu pudgalaprajñaptiḥ prāpnotīty arthaḥ atha vā (Abhidh-k-vy 700) pudgalaprajñapteḥ skaṃdhāḥ pratyayo na pudgalaḥ. pudgalas tu tathaiva prajñaptisann iti. sa eva doṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13828: yathendhanam upādāyāgniḥ prajñapyata iti. dravyasan pudgalaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13829: nānyo nānanya iti. svam upādānam upādāya prajñapyamānatvāt. yo hi bhāvo
T07yabhkvyu:13830: nānyo nānanya iti svam upādāya prajñapyamānaḥ. sa dravyasaṃs tadyathāgnir
T07yabhkvyu:13831: iti vātsīputrīyābhiprāyaḥ. ata eva cāha. yadi hy anyaḥ syād iti vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:13832: lokavirodhaṃ svasiddhāntavirodhaṃ vā darśayati. śāśvataprasaṃgāt ti.
T07yabhkvyu:13834: apradīptaṃ kāṣṭhādikam indhanam iti vistaraḥ. anenāsiddhatāṃ dṛṣṭāntasya darśayati. anyatvam eva hy agnīndhanayor iṣyate. tena hi tad idhyate dahyate ceti. tenāgninā. tad indhanam idhyate. dīpyata ity arthaḥ. dahyate
T07yabhkvyu:13835: bhasmīkriyate. saṃtativikārāpādanāt. bhasmatāpādanād ity arthaḥ. idhyate dahyate ceti paryāyāv ity apare. tac cobhayam aṣṭadravyakam iti. indhanaṃ cāgniś caitad ubhayam apy aṣṭadravyakaṃ. cetvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri
T07yabhkvyu:13839: bhinnakālatvād iti. pūrvam indhanaṃ paścād agniḥ. bhinnakālayoś cānyatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bījāṃkurayoḥ. anityaś ca prāpnotīti. utpattimato rūpāder anityatvadarśanāt. tatraiva kāṣṭhādau pradīpta iti. tadubhayalakṣaṇe
T07yabhkvyu:13840: samudāye. tayor api siddham anyatvaṃ lakṣaṇabhedād iti. tayor apy agnīndhanayor evaṃlakṣaṇayoḥ siddham anyatvaṃ lakṣaṇabhedāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13841: pṛthivīdhātvādīnāṃ lakṣaṇānyatvāt. bhinnalakṣaṇānāṃ hy anyatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13842: rūpavedanādīnāṃ. upādayārthas tu vaktavya iti. ananyatvād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13843: na hi tat tasya kāraṇam iti. [Tib. 366a] na hi tad indhanaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13845: savyetaragoviṣāṇavat. nāpi tat prajñapter iti. agniprajñapteḥ. yady āśrayārtha iti. indhanam upādāya indhanam āśrityety arthaḥ. sahabhāvo
T07yabhkvyu:13847: āśrayasahabhūtāḥ prāpnuvantīti. āśrayabhūtāḥ sahabhūtāś ca prāpnuvaṃtīty
T07yabhkvyu:13848: arthaḥ. skaṃdhataḥ spaṣṭam anyatvaṃ pratijñāyate vātsīputrīyaiḥ. tadabhāva
T07yabhkvyu:13850: anyad apīti na kevalam auṣṇyam uṣṇam. anyad api tatpradīptāgnisaṃbandhaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13851: bhūmyādikam uṣṇaṃ sidhyati. ato yathā tasyānyatve na doṣaḥ. tathāsyapīti.
T07yabhkvyu:13852: tataś cāvaktavya iti. tatpakṣalopaḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 701) syāt. kāṣṭhādikam
T07yabhkvyu:13854: avaktavyam iti pudgalaḥ. anirbhinnatvān napuṃsakaliṃgatā. kiṃ te jātam iti
T07yabhkvyu:13855: yathā. na vaktavyaṃ prāpnotīti. paṃcavidhaṃ jñeyam iti kathaṃ tarhi vaktavyam ity āha. naiva hi tad atītādibhyaḥ paṃcamaṃ nāpaṃcamaṃ vaktavyam
T07yabhkvyu:13857: rūpasyāpīti vistaraḥ. rūpasyāpi prajñaptir vaktavyā. cakṣurādiṣu satsu tasyopalambhāt tāni cakṣurādīny upādāya rūpaṃ prajñapyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13858: prativibhāvayatīty upalakṣayati. [Tib. 366b] tadupādānatvāt. na tu vaktavyo rūpāṇi vā no veti. atallakṣaṇatvad avaktavyatvāc ca. evaṃ yāvad dharmo vā no veti.
T07yabhkvyu:13859: kṣīraṃ prativibhāvayaty udakaṃ ceti. udāharaṇadvayaṃ. tad evaṃ vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13860: cakṣurvijñeyāni ced rūpāṇi pratītya kṣīraṃ prativibhāvayati cakṣurvijñeyaṃ kṣīraṃ vaktavyaṃ. no tu vaktavyaṃ. rūpāṇi vā no veti sarvaṃ. tathaitad api vaktavyaṃ. cakṣurvijñeyāni ced rūpāṇi pratītyodakaṃ prativibhāvayati.
T07yabhkvyu:13861: cakṣurvijñeyam udakaṃ vaktavyaṃ. no tu vaktavyaṃ. rūpāṇi vā no veti
T07yabhkvyu:13862: sarvaṃ. mā bhūt kṣīrodakayoś catuṣṭvaprasaṃga iti. rūpāṇīti yady ucyet.
T07yabhkvyu:13863: yāvat spraṣṭavyānīti yady ucyeta kṣīrasyodakasya vā catuṣṭvaṃ prasajyet.
T07yabhkvyu:13864: catuḥprakāraṃ kṣīram udakaṃ vā prāpnotīty arthaḥ. śabda āgaṃtukatvān nātrādhikṛtaḥ. ato yathā rūpādīny eva samastāni samuditāni kṣīram ity udakam iti vā prajñapyate. tathā skandhā eva samastāḥ pudgala iti
T07yabhkvyu:13866: rūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇam iti rūpāṇy ualabhamānaḥ pudgalam upalabhata iti. ko 'nayoḥ pakṣayor viśeṣaḥ. [Tib. 367a] pūrvasmin pakṣe rūpāṇāṃ kāraṇatvam adhikriyate. dvitīye na tu kāraṇatvaṃ. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:13867: rūpāṇy upādāya pudgalopalabdhir iti. tatra rūpāṇaṃ yadi kāraṇatvam iṣyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13868: sa ca pudgalas tebhyo rūpebhyo 'nyo na vaktavya iti. idaṃ tarhi vaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:13869: prasajyate. rūpam apīti vistaraḥ. yathā rūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavanti sa ca tebhyo 'nyo na vaktavyaḥ. ālokacakṣurmanaskārā api rūpopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavanti. tad api rūpaṃ tebhya ālokādibhyo 'nyan na vaktavyaṃ bhavadbhiḥ. teṣāṃ tadupalabdhikāraṇatvāt. teṣām ālokādīnāṃ rūpopalabdhikāraṇatvāt. rūpād abhinnasvabhāvaḥ pudgalaḥ prāpnoti.
T07yabhkvyu:13872: kutaḥ. tata eva hetoḥ. idaṃ ca rūpam iti vistaraḥ. upalabdher ekatve rūpapudgalayoḥ paricchedo na prāpnotīti. athaivaṃ na paricchidyate. idaṃ rūpam ayaṃ pudgala iti. katham ubhayaṃ pratijñāyate. rūpam eva hi
T07yabhkvyu:13873: pratijñātavyaṃ syāt. tadupalabdhisadbhāvāt. evaṃ yāvad dharmebhyo
T07yabhkvyu:13874: vaktavyam iti. kathaṃ. yac cocyate. śrotravijñeyān śabdān pratītya
T07yabhkvyu:13875: pudgalaṃ prativibhāvayatīti ko 'sya vākyasyārthaḥ kiṃ tāvac chabdaḥ pudgalopalabdheḥ [Tib. 367b] kāraṇaṃ bhavanti. āhosvic chabdān upalabhamānaḥ pudgalam upalabhata iti. yadi tāvac chabdāḥ pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavanti. sa ca tebhyo 'nyo na vaktavyaḥ. evaṃ tarhi śabdo 'py
T07yabhkvyu:13877: atha śabdān upalabhamānaḥ pudgalam upalabhate. kiṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13878: tayaivopalabdhyopalabhate. āhosvid anyayā. yadi tayaiva śabdād
T07yabhkvyu:13879: abhinnasvabhāvaḥ pudgalaḥ prāpnoti. śabda eva vā tatprajñaptiḥ. ayaṃ ca śabdo 'yaṃ pudgala iti katham idaṃ paricchidyate. athaivaṃ na paricchidyate. katham idaṃ parijñāyate. śabdo 'py asti pudgalo 'py astīti.
T07yabhkvyu:13880: upalabdhivaśena hi tasyāstitvaṃ prajñāyate. anayā diśā yāvad dharmebhyo
T07yabhkvyu:13881: yojayitavyaṃ. nīlād iva pītam iti. yadā paricchedena nīlam upalabhyate. na tadā pītam upalabhyate. paścāt tūpalabhyata iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13882: anyayopalabdhyopalabhyate. tac ca nīlāt pītam anyad iti pratītaṃ. tathā ca pudgalo 'nyayopalabhyopalabhyata iti. rūpād anyaḥ prāpnoti. evaṃ kṣaṇād api kṣaṇāntaram anyad ity udāhāryam. evaṃ yāvad dharmebhyo vaktavyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13883: katham. athānyayā bhinnakālopalambhād anyaḥ śabdaḥ prāpnoti. yathā bherīśabdān mṛdāṃgaśabdaḥ. kṣaṇād iva ca kṣaṇāntaraṃ. yathāpūrvam uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13884: nīlād iva pītaṃ [Tib. 368a] kṣaṇād iva kṣaṇāntaram iti. bhinnalakṣaṇe viṣaye abhinnalakṣaṇe ca bhinnakālopalabdhyānyatvaṃ darśitam eva.
T07yabhkvyu:13886: āha rūpapudgalavad iti vistaraḥ. yathā rūpapudgalayor anyānanyatvam
T07yabhkvyu:13887: avaktavyam evaṃ tadupalabdhyor apy anyānanyatvam avaktavyam ity evaṃ yadi
T07yabhkvyu:13888: brūyāt. tena tarhi saṃskṛtam apy avaktavyaṃ bhavati tadupalabdhilakṣaṇaṃ saṃskṛtam apy etad avaktavyam iti. siddhāntabhedaḥ. yo 'yaṃ siddhāntaḥ pudgala evāvaktavya iti. ayaṃ bhidyate. saṃskṛtam apy avaktavyam iti
T07yabhkvyu:13889: kṛtvā. yadi cāyam iti vistaraḥ. yady evaṃ rūpāṇi no veti na vaktavyaḥ kiṃ tarhi etad bhagavatoktaṃ rūpam anātmeti. yāvad vijñānam anātmeti. evaṃ hi bruvato vaktavya eva pudgalo nāvaktavya iti darśitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13894: vaktavyam. eṣā hi dik. anena copanyāsena dharmiviśeṣaviparyayapratijñādoṣa
T07yabhkvyu:13895: udbhāvyata ity avagantavyaṃ. dvayaṃ pratītyeti. dvayaṃ pratītya na tu trayaṃ pratītyeti. ata idam utsūtram iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13896: cakṣur bhikṣo hetur iti vistaraḥ. hetur āsannaḥ pratyayaḥ. viprakṛṣṭas tu pratyaya eva. janako hetuḥ. pratyayas tv ālambanamātram ity apare.
T07yabhkvyu:13898: rūpād anyaḥ pudgala iti pakṣaprasaṃgaḥ. śrotravijñānavijñeyatvāc
T07yabhkvyu:13899: chabdavat. tathā śabdād anyaḥ pudgala iti pakṣaprasaṃgaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13900: cakṣurvijñānavijñeyatvād rūpavat. iti evam anyebhyo yojyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13901: rūpaśabdābhyām anyaḥ pudgala iti pakṣaprasaṃgaḥ. ghrāṇavijñeyatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13902: gandhavat. ity eṣā dig yojanaṃ pratīti. svakaṃ svakaṃ gocaraviṣayaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13903: pratyanubhavantīti vacanāt pudgalena pratyanubhavantīty uktaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13904: manaś caiṣāṃ pratisaraṇam iti. anuṣaṃgenedam uktaṃ. nedam udāharaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13905: tathāpi tu manaś caiṣām indriyāṇāṃ pratisaraṇam iti tadapekṣāṇīndriyāṇi vijñānotpattau [Tib. 369a] kāraṇaṃ bhavantīty arthaḥ. na vā pudgalo viṣaya
T07yabhkvyu:13906: iti. yadi sūtraṃ pramāṇīkriyate. tataḥ kim ity āha. na ced viṣayaḥ. yadi na kasyacid vijñānasya viṣaya na tarhi vijñeyaḥ. tataś ca paṃcavidhaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13908: yady evaṃ sūtre vacanān nānyad anyasya gocaraviṣayaṃ pratyanubhavatīti paṃcānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ pramāṇīkriyate. svaviṣayāvyabhicāraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13909: svaviṣayāvyabhicāre ca na cakṣurvijñānādibhir vijñeyaḥ pudgalaḥ. tad evaṃ sati manaindriyasyāpy avyabhicāraḥ prāpnoti. ṣaḍ imānīndriyāṇi nānāgocarāṇīti vistareṇa sūtre vacanāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13910: kukkurapakṣiśṛgālaśiśumārasarpamarkaṭāḥ ṣaṭprāṇakāḥ kenacid baddhā madhye granthiṃ kṛtvotsṛṣṭāḥ. te svakaṃ svakaṃ gocaraviṣayam ākāṃkṣante.
T07yabhkvyu:13911: grāmākāśāśmaśānodakāntavalmīkavanākāṃkṣaṇāt. evam eva ṣaḍ imānīndriyāṇi svakaṃ svakaṃ gocaraviṣayam ākāṃkṣante. ity evam upamātra kriyate. atha saty api sūtravacane manaindriyasya vyabhicāraḥ. evaṃ cakṣurādīnām apīndriyāṇāṃ vyabhicāraḥ. vyabhicāre ca cakṣurvijñānādibhir vijñeyaḥ pudgalo bhaviṣyatīti.
T07yabhkvyu:13912: atra [Tib. 369b] brūmaḥ. na tatreti vistaraḥ. tatra ṣaṭprāṇakopame sūtre
T07yabhkvyu:13913: nendriyam eva cakṣurādikam indriyaṃ kṛtvoktaṃ. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. cakṣurādīnāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13914: (Abhidh-k-vy 704) paṃcānām indriyāṇāṃ darśanādyākāṃkṣaṇāsaṃbhavāt. yasmād eṣāṃ darśanaśravaṇādyākāṃkṣaṇaṃ na saṃbhavati rūpasvabhāvatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13915: tadvijñānānāṃ ca. cakṣurādivijñānānāṃ ca darśanādyākāṃkṣāsaṃbhavāt. kasmād eṣāṃ darśanaśravaṇādyākāṃkṣaṇaṃ na saṃbhavati. avikalpakatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13916: tadādhipatyādhyāhṛtaṃ tu manovijñānam indriyam ity uktam indriyam iveti kṛtvā. katham jñāyate tadādhipatyādhyāhṛtaṃ tad iti. yadi hi cakṣurādidvāreṇa cakṣurvijñānādi notpannaṃ syāt. katham anyathā vikalpakaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13917: manovijñānam utpannaṃ syāt. ity ato jñāyate. tadādhipatyādhyāhṛtam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13918: tan manovijñānaṃ cakṣurādīndriyabhūtaṃ svakaṃ svakaṃ gocaraviṣayaṃ rūpādikam ākāṃkṣatīti. yac ca tat kevalam iti vistaraḥ. naiva tadanyeṣāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ viṣayam ākāṃkṣati yan mana-ādhipatyādhyāhṛtaṃ. kiṃ tarhi.
T07yabhkvyu:13919: svaviṣayam eva dharmāyatanam evālambata iti. ato nāsty eṣa doṣaḥ. yady evaṃ manaindriyasyāpy [Tib. 370a] avyabhicāraḥ prāpnotīti yad uktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13920: na pudgalaḥ. kim. abhijñeyaḥ parijñeyaś ceti. tasmād vijñeyo 'py asau pudgalo na bhavati. nanu cāsāv arthād abhijñeyaḥ parijñeyaś ca na bhavatīty uktaḥ. na tv artho vijñeyaḥ iti. ata āha. prajñāvijñānayoḥ samānaviṣayatvād iti. vijñeyam api hi cakṣurādikaṃ bhavati. na kevalam abhijñeyaṃ parijñeyaṃ ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:13921: anātmaneti. cakṣuṣā cakṣurvijñānenety arthaḥ. nītārthaṃ ca sūtraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13922: pratisaraṇam uktam iti. catvārīmāni bhikṣavaḥ pratisaraṇāni. katamāni
T07yabhkvyu:13923: catvāri. dharmaḥ pratisaraṇaṃ na pudgalaḥ. arthaḥ pratisaraṇaṃ na
T07yabhkvyu:13924: vyaṃjanaṃ. nītārthasūtraṃ pratisaraṇaṃ na neyārthaṃ. jñānaṃ pratisaraṇaṃ na vijñānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13925: prajñaptim anūpapatita iti. yatraiva prajñaptiḥ kṛtā ātmeti vyavahārārthaṃ tām evātmety abhiniviṣṭa ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13929: na vidyate so 'pi kaścid itīdaṃ vāpy udāharaṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:13930: yogy api nāsti yaḥ śūnyatām abhyasyātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:13931: ātmadṛṣṭir bhavati yāvaj jīvadṛṣṭir iti prathamā ādinavo nirviśeṣo bhavati. tīrthikair [Tib. 370b] iti dvitīyaḥ. unmārgapratipanno bhavatīti tṛtīyaḥ. śūnyatāyām (Abhidh-k-vy 705) asya cittaṃ na praskandati yāvan nādhimucyata iti caturthaḥ. āryadharmā asya na vyavadāyanta iti paṃcamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13932: na tarhi teṣāṃ buddhaḥ śāsteti. buddhavacanam eṣāṃ na pramāṇam ity abhiprāyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13933: na kilaitad buddhavacanam iti. kenāpy adhyāropitāny etāni sūtrāṇīty
T07yabhkvyu:13934: abhiprāyaḥ. sarvanikāyāntareṣv iti tāmraparṇīyanikāyādiṣu. na ca sūtraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:13935: bādhate na ca sūtrāntaraṃ bādhate. na ca sūtrāntaraṃ virodhayati. na dharmatāṃ bādhata iti
T07yabhkvyu:13936: sarvadharmā anātmāna iti. na caita ātmasvabhāvāḥ. na caiteṣv ātmā vidyata iti anātmānaḥ sarvadharmāḥ. dvayaṃ pratītyeti. cakṣū rūpāṇi yāvan mano dharmān iti. [na pudgalo na dharmā iti] .
T07yabhkvyu:13937: nātmā skaṃdhāyatanadhātava iti vacane yat kaścit pūrvaṃ no tu vaktavyaṃ rūpāṇi vā no vety uktam. apoḍham apāstaṃ tad bhavati ātmano 'nyatvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:13938: tasmāt sarva evānmātmany ātmagrāha iti. nāto 'nyo 'stīti darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:13939: yady evam iti vistaraḥ. yadīmān eva paṃcopādānaskandhān samanusmarantaḥ samanvasmārṣuḥ samanusmaranti samanusmariṣyanti vā na pudgalaṃ. kasmād āha rūpavān ahaṃ [Tib. 371a] babhūvātīte 'dhvanīti. aham iti vacanāt pudgala ucyate iti darśayati. evam anekavidhaṃ ye samanusmaranti. ta evam anusmarantīti vākyādhyāhāraḥ. apāṭha eva cātra śaraṇaṃ syād iti. aham iti pāṭhe hi sati satkāyadṛṣṭiparigrahaprasaṃgaḥ syād ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13940: viṃśatikoṭikā hi satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ paṭhyate. rūpam ātmeti samanupaśyati.
T07yabhkvyu:13941: rūpavantam ātmānam. ātmīyaṃ rūpaṃ. rūpe ātmety evaṃ yāvad vijñānaṃ vaktavyaṃ. rāśidhārādivad iti. rāśivad dhārāvac ca. ādiśabdena
T07yabhkvyu:13942: pānakādigrahaṇaṃ. ekasmin kṣaṇe samavahitānāṃ bahūnāṃ rāśiḥ. bahuṣu kṣaṇeṣu samavahitānāṃ dhārā. rāśidṛṣṭāntena bahuṣu dharmeṣu
T07yabhkvyu:13943: pudgalaprajñaptiṃ darśayati dhārādṛṣṭāntena bahutve sati rūpavedanādīnāṃ skaṃdhānāṃ pravāhe pudgalaprajñaptiṃ darśayati.
T07yabhkvyu:13944: katham idaṃ gamyata iti. buddhākhyāyāḥ saṃtater idaṃ sāmarthyaṃ. yad ābhogamātreṇāviparītam jñānam utpadyate yatreṣṭaṃ. na punaḥ pudgalasyeti.
T07yabhkvyu:13948: iti vistareṇokta upasaṃhāraḥ. tasmāt skaṃdhasaṃtāna eva buddhākhyā. na pudgala iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13949: bhāraṃ ca vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmīti vistaraḥ. [Tib. 371b] bhāraṃ ca vo
T07yabhkvyu:13950: bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi bhārādānaṃ ca bhāranikṣepaṇaṃ ca bhārahāraṃ ca. tac chṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta bhāṣiṣye. bhāraḥ katamaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13951: paṃcopādānaskaṃdhāḥ. bhārādānaṃ katamat. tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī. bhāranikṣepaṇaṃ katamat. yad asyā eva tṛsṇāyāḥ paunarbhavikyā nandīrāgasahagatāyāḥ tatratatrābhinandinyāḥ aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo
T07yabhkvyu:13952: 'staṃgamaḥ bhārahāraḥ katamaḥ. pudgala iti syād vacanīyaṃ. yo 'sāv āyuṣmān evaṃnāmā evaṃjanya evaṃgotraḥ evamāhāraḥ evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī
T07yabhkvyu:13953: evaṃdīrghāyur evaṃcirasthitika evamāyuṣmanta iti. bhāraṃ haratīti bhārahāraḥ. pudgala ity abhiprāyaḥ. chedam udāharaṇam. ata evāha. na hi bhāra eva bhārahāra iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13955: askaṃdhasaṃgrahaprasaṃgaḥ. na caivam iṣyate. tasmād bhārādānavan na
T07yabhkvyu:13956: skaṃdhebhyo 'rthāntarabhūtaḥ pudgalaḥ. ity artham eva ceti vistareṇa sarvam uktvā vaktavyaṃ mānyatheti. yadi dravyasan syāt pudgalaḥ bhārahāraḥ katamaḥ pudgala iti syād vacanīyam ity etāvad evoktaṃ syāt tatra sūtre.
T07yabhkvyu:13957: pareṇa sa na vibhaktvyaḥ syāt. yo 'sāv āyuṣmān iti vistareṇa yāvad āyuḥparyanta iti. [Tib. 372a] prajñaptisatpudgalapratipattyarthaṃ hy etat
T07yabhkvyu:13958: pareṇa viśeṣaṇam ity abhiprāyaḥ. sa eva tu prajñaptisan kuto vijñāyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13959: mānyathā vijñāyi nityo vāvaktavyo vā dravyasatpudgala iti. skaṃdhānām iti vistaraḥ. tatra ye upaghātāya saṃvartante duḥkhahetavaḥ skaṃdhāḥ. te bhāva iti kṛtvoktāḥ. uttare ye pīḍyante. te bhārahāra iti kṛtvoktā iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13960: upapādukatvād iti. upapadane sādhukāritvād ity arthaḥ. pudgalasya satyeṣv anantarbhāvād iti. yasmād yathāparikalpitasya pudgalasya satyeṣu duḥkhādisu nānantarbhāvaḥ. na hi pudgalo duḥkhaṃ yāvan mārga iti. ato na satyadarśanaprahātavyaiṣā pudgalāpavādika mithyādṛṣṭiḥ. yā hi dṛṣṭir
T07yabhkvyu:13961: yasmin satye vipratipannā. tatsatyadarśanāt tasyāḥ prahāṇaṃ bhavet. tathā duḥkhasamudayasatyayoḥ pudgalasyānantarbhāvān nāpi bhāvanāprahātavyā.
T07yabhkvyu:13962: bhāvanāprahātavyo hi kleśo bhāvanāprahātavyam (Abhidh-k-vy 707) eva vastu duḥkaṃ samudayaṃ vālaṃbata ity evaṃ tasyā bhāvanāprahātavyatvaṃ yujyate.
T07yabhkvyu:13963: na ca pudgalas tayor aṃtarbhūta ity ato bhāvanāprahātavyā sā na bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:13964: atha vā na kadācid api dṛṣṭir bhāvanāprahātavyeti nāsau bhāvanāprahātavyā.
T07yabhkvyu:13966: 'ṣṭadravyakatve 'py ekatila ekataṇḍula iti cocyate. tathā eko rāśir
T07yabhkvyu:13967: ekavacanam iti. tadvad ekaḥ pudgala iti. utpattimattvābhyupagamād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13968: utpadyata iti vacanād utpattimattvam asyābhyupagataṃ bhavati. tataś ca saṃskṛta iti vaktavyo
T07yabhkvyu:13969: skandhāntaropādānād iti. nāsya saṃskṛtatvam āpdyata iti abhiprāyaḥ. yathā hi yājñiko jāta iti vidyopādānād ucyate. na cāsau bhūtārthena jātaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13971: kārakas tu nopalabhyata iti vistaraḥ. karmaṇaḥ kārako nopalabhyate. kīdṛśo
T07yabhkvyu:13972: 'sāv iti. āha. ya imāṃś caihikāṃ skandhān nikṣipati tyajaty anyāṃś ca pāratrikān skaṃdhān pratisaṃdadhāti upasaṃgṛhṇāti. dravyasann avasthita iti. anyatra dharmasaṃketād iti pratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇāntenāha yad utāsmin satīti.
T07yabhkvyu:13973: upādatta iti phālguna na vadāmīti. ahaṃ ced evaṃ vadeyam upādatta iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13974: atra te kalpaḥ syād vacanāya ko nu bhadanta upādānam upādatta iti. tasmān nāsti skandhānāṃ kaścid upādātā nāpi nikṣipteti.
T07yabhkvyu:13975: tasyāpi tatheti. pratikṣaṇam apūrvotpattir evety arthaḥ. yadi pudgalaḥ. so
T07yabhkvyu:13977: śarīravidyāliṃgavac ceti. vidyā ca liṃgaṃ ca vidyāliṃgaṃ. śarīraṃ ca vidyāliṃgaṃ ca śarīravidyāliṃgaṃ. [Tib. 373a] tayor iva śarīravidyāliṃgavat.
T07yabhkvyu:13978: skandhapudgalayor anyatvam āpadyate. yathopādeyāyā vidyāyā liṃgāc ca śarīrasya anyatvaṃ. evam upādeyāt skandhāt pudgalasyānyatvam upādātṛtvād ity abhiprāyaḥ. jīrṇaṃ taṃ śarīrāntaram eva vyādhitaṃ ceti pratikṣaṇam anyatvam avasthānād ity abhiprāyāt. tatra yad uktaṃ jīrṇo jāto vyādhito
T07yabhkvyu:13979: jāta ity asiddho dṛṣṭānta iti darśayati. athāpi syād avasthitasya
T07yabhkvyu:13980: śarīrasyāvasthāntaranirvṛttāv avasthāntaraprādurbhāva iti. tac ca nāpratiṣiddho hi sāṃkhyeyaḥ pariṇāmavādaḥ pūrvasmin kośasthāne. katham. sa eva hi dharmī na saṃvidyate. yasyāvasthitasya dharmāntaravikalpaḥ parikalpeta. tad eva cedaṃ tathety apūrvikā vācoyuktir iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13981: bhūtāni catvāri rūpaṃ caikam iti. rūpaṃ katamat. catvāri mahābhūtānīty (Abhidh-k-vy 708)
T07yabhkvyu:13982: pākṣika eva doṣa iti ekasmin pakṣe ayaṃ doṣavāda ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13983: bhūtamātrikapakṣa iti sthavirabuddhadevapakṣe nāsmatpakṣa ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:13984: tathāpi tv iti. bhūtamātrikapakṣe 'pi bhūtebhyo rūpaṃ nānyat.
T07yabhkvyu:13985: bhūtamātrikapakṣe 'pi bhūtebhyo rūpavat skandhebhyo nānyaḥ pudgala ity
T07yabhkvyu:13986: upagataṃ bhavatīti svasiddhāntaḥ parityāgaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ. kasmād
T07yabhkvyu:13987: [Tib. 373b] bhagavatā sa jīvaḥ. tac charīram anyo veti na vyākṛtam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:13988: ayam eṣām abhiprāyaḥ. yadi skandheṣu pudgalopacāraḥ kasmāc charīram eva
T07yabhkvyu:13989: jīva iti noktam iti. pūrvakair eveti sthaviranāgasenādibhiḥ. bahuvollakā
T07yabhkvyu:13991: itarāha. yadi pudgalo nāvaktavyaḥ kasmān nokto nāsty eveti.
T07yabhkvyu:13992: sa ca taddeśanāyā akṣama iti. nairātmyadeśanāyā ayogya ity arthaḥ. pūrvam evaṃ saṃmūḍha iti. satkāyadṛṣṭisahagatena mohena. bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃmoham āpadyeteti ucchedadṛṣṭisahagataṃ dṛṣṭyantaram utpādayed ity
T07yabhkvyu:13993: abhiprāyaḥ. ata evāha. abhūn me ātmā sa me etarhi nāstīti. āha cātreti.
T07yabhkvyu:13995: vistaraḥ. dṛṣṭir eva daṃṣṭrā. tayāvabhedam apekṣya
T07yabhkvyu:13998: bhraṃśaṃ ca karmaṇām apekṣya kṛtavipraṇāśam apekṣya. pudgalāstitvam iva darśayanto 'nyathā
T07yabhkvyu:14000: iti. yathā vyāghrī nātiniṣṭhureṇa dantagrahaṇena svapotam apaharati
T07yabhkvyu:14001: nayati. māsya daṃṣṭrayā śarīraṃ kṣataṃ bhūd iti. nāpy atiśithilena dantagrahaṇena tam apaharati māsya bhraṃśapāto 'smin visaye bhūd iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14003: paṭhanti sthānāntarād apaharaty apanayatīty arthaḥ. tathārthadarśane kāraṇaṃ darśayann āha.
T07yabhkvyu:14013: prājñaptika iti prajñaptau bhavaḥ prājñaptikaḥ. saṃvṛtisann api pudgalo nāstīti kaścid gṛhṇīyād ity ato
T07yabhkvyu:14016: iti. yadi bhūtārthena pudgalo 'sti kim iti kṛtvā bhagavān asti pudgala iti na bravīti. na hi rūpam astīti vacane doṣo bhavati tasyāstitvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:14018: gṛhītvā bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ. kim ayaṃ caṭako jīvati na veti. tasyāyam abhiprāyaḥ yadi śramaṇo gautama ādiśej jīvatīti. sa tan nipīḍanena
T07yabhkvyu:14019: mārayitvā darśayet. yadi punar bhagavān evam ādiśen mṛta iti. sa taṃ jīvantam eva darśayet. kathaṃ nāmāyam ajña iti loko jānīyād iti
T07yabhkvyu:14020: tasyābhinveśaḥ. bhagavatā tu tasyāśayaṃ viditvā na vyākṛtaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14021: tvaccittapratibaddham evaitaj jīvati vā na veti cety evābhihitaṃ. tadvad
T07yabhkvyu:14023: tulyārtho hy eṣa catuṣka iti. śāśvato loko 'śāśvato loka ity anena
T07yabhkvyu:14024: catuṣkena antavān loko 'naṃtavān ity ayaṃ catuṣkas tulyārthaḥ. yady evaṃ kathaṃ caturdaśāvyākṛtavastūni bhavaṃti. śāśvato loka ity ekacatuṣkaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14025: antavān iti dvitīyaś catuṣkaḥ. bhavati tathāgata iti tṛtīyaś catuṣkaḥ. sa jīvas tac charīram anyo jīvo 'nyac charīram iti dvikaḥ. trayaś catuṣkāḥ ekaś ca dvika iti caturdaśāvyākṛtavastūnīti. paryāyarūpatvavyāvasthāne 'pi
T07yabhkvyu:14026: caturdaśatvaṃ bhavatīty adoṣaḥ. tvam evaitat pṛcchasīti. antavān iti yaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:14027: pṛṣṭavān. kathaṃ. kiṃ nu sarvo loko 'nena mārgeṇa niryāsyatīti anena
T07yabhkvyu:14028: antavān iti aśāśvata iti ca pṛṣṭaṃ bhavati. āhosvid ekadeśo lokasyety
T07yabhkvyu:14029: anenāntavāṃś cānantavāṃś ceti (Abhidh-k-vy 710) śāśvataś cāśāśvataś ceti
T07yabhkvyu:14031: jīvantaṃ pudgalam astīti vyākarotīti. tattvānyatvenāvaktavyaṃ santam eva
T07yabhkvyu:14033: śāśvatadoṣaprasaṃgād iti vātsiputrīyavacanaṃ. idaṃ tarhi kasmād
T07yabhkvyu:14034: vyākarotīti vistareṇācāryavacanaṃ. sārvajñam ity aṇ bhāvapratyayo yauvanam iti yathā. na vaktavyaṃ paśyati vā na veti. paśyati na paśyati na vaktavyam ity arthaḥ. śanaiḥśanair avaktavyaṃ kriyatām [Tib. 375a] iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14035: sarvajño vā bhagavān na veti na vaktavyam iti. śanaiḥśanairgrahaṇaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:14037: sthitirūpeṇety arthaḥ. dṛṣṭisthānam uktam iti. mithyādṛṣṭisthānam uktam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14038: ācārya āha. astīty api dṛṣṭisthānam uktam iti. satkāyadṛṣṭisthānam uktam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14039: uktottara eṣa pakṣa iti. kathaṃ ca na. pratikṣepāt. sūtra eva hi
T07yabhkvyu:14040: pratikṣiptaṃ bhagavateti vistareṇa yāvad apadṛṣṭāntā eta iti. kim idam upādāyety ārabhyaitad apareṣāṃ vyākhyānaṃ. svamatena tu yathā saṃsarati.
T07yabhkvyu:14041: tathā darśayann āha. yathā tu kṣaṇiko 'gnir iti vistaraḥ. kṣaṇiko 'gniḥ
T07yabhkvyu:14042: prasiddhaḥ. sa ca deśāṃtarotpattisaṃtatyā saṃcaratīty ucyate. tathā sattvākhyaskandhasamudāyas tṛṣṇopādānaḥ. tṛṣṇā upādānam asyeti
T07yabhkvyu:14044: sunetro nāma śāsteti. saptasūryodayasūtre 'yam eva bhagavān ṛṣiḥ sunetro nāma babhūveti.
T07yabhkvyu:14045: anyatvāt skaṃdhānam iti. kṣaṇikatve saty anyatvād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14046: ekasaṃtānatāṃ darśayatīti. yasmāt sunetro buddhasaṃtāna evāsīt. ataḥ sa evāham ity abhedopacāraḥ. [Tib. 375b] yathā sa evāgnir yaḥ pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭo
T07yabhkvyu:14047: dahann āgata iti. saṃtānavrṭtyā sa evety ucyate. tadvat. saiṣāṃ syāt satkāyadṛṣṭir iti. saiṣāṃ tathāgatānām ātmātmīyākārā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ syāt.
T07yabhkvyu:14048: dṛḍhatarātmātmīyasnehaparigāhitabaṃdhanānām iti. ātmadṛṣṭāv ātmīyadṛṣṭau ca satyām ātmasneha ātmīyasnehaś ca bhavati. ity ato rāgo bandhanam iti kṛtvā dṛḍhīkṛtabandhanānāṃ satāṃ mokṣo dūrībhavet. naiva bhaved ity
T07yabhkvyu:14050: ya ekeṣāṃ pudgalagrāha iti vātsīputrīyāṇām. ekeṣāṃ sarvanāstigrāha iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14051: madhyamakacittānām ity abhiprāyaḥ. smṛtiviṣayasaṃjñānvayāc cittaviśeṣād (Abhidh-k-vy 711) iti. smṛter viṣayo 'nubhūto 'rthaḥ. tatra saṃjñā sānvayo
T07yabhkvyu:14052: hetur asyeti smṛtiviṣayasaṃjñānvayaś cittaviśeṣaḥ. kiṃcid eva cittaṃ. na sarvam ity arthaḥ. tasmāt smaraṇaṃ bhavati pratyabhijñānaṃ vā.
T07yabhkvyu:14053: evam ubhayaviśeṣaṇe kṛte pṛcchati kīdṛśāc cittaviśeṣād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14054: āha. tadābhoga iti vistaraḥ. tasmin smartavya ābhogas tadābhogaḥ. yatra tena sadṛśāḥ saṃbaṃdhinaś ca saṃjñādayo ye te vidyante 'syeti
T07yabhkvyu:14057: ca vyākṣepataś cādir eṣām iti āśrayaviśeṣaśokavyākṣepādīni. tair anupahataprabhāvaś cittaviśeṣaḥ. sa evam anena darśito bhavati. tasmād īdṛśāc cittaviśeṣāt smṛtir bhavati. tad idam uktaṃ bhavati. tadābhogavataḥ yadi tatrābhogaḥ kriyate. sadṛśasaṃjñādimataḥ yatra sādṛśyāt smṛtir
T07yabhkvyu:14058: bhavati. sambandhisaṃjñādimataḥ yatrāntareṇāpi sādṛśyaṃ dhūmādidarśanāt smṛtir bhavati. praṇidhānanibaṃdhābhyāsādimataś ca yatra praṇidhānam atra kāle smartavyam abhyāso vāsya tatsmartavyādi. āśrayaviśeṣādibhir anupahataprabhāvatvād iti. vyādhilakṣaṇenāśrayaviśeṣeṇa śokena vyākṣepeṇānyatra kārye. ādiśabdagṛhītaiś ca karmavidyādibhiḥ. tādṛśo 'pīti
T07yabhkvyu:14060: atadanvaya iti. asmṛtiviṣayasaṃjñānvaya ity arthaḥ. bhāvayitum
T07yabhkvyu:14061: utpādayituṃ. anyādṛśa iti. atadābhogayāvatsaṃjñādimān anupahataprabhāvo vā. anyasya cittaviśeṣād
T07yabhkvyu:14062: na. asaṃbaṃdhād iti. devadattayajñadattacetasor akāryakāraṇabhāvenāsaṃbaṃdhād [Tib. 376b] ity arthaḥ. yathaikasāṃtānikayoś cetasoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvāt saṃbaṃdho. naivaṃ devadattayajñadattacetasoḥ saṃbandhaḥ. ity anena dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayor asāmyaṃ darśayati. tatra yadi pareṇaivaṃ sādhanam abhidhīyate. na devadattānubhavacittānubhūtam arthaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:14063: tatsmaraṇacittaṃ smarati. anyatvāt. yajñadattacittavad iti. tad asādhanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14065: atha devadattānubhavacittānusmaraṇacittayor anyatvapratijñāyām idaṃ dūṣaṇam udgrāhyet. tad adūṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭabādhāyāṃ dūṣaṇānupapatteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14067: tatsmaraṇacittaṃ smaratīti. na ca brūmo 'nyena cetasā dṛṣṭam anyat anyat
T07yabhkvyu:14068: smaratīti. na yatkiṃcid anyat (Abhidh-k-vy 712) smaratīty abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14069: darśanacittāt smṛticittam anyad evotpadyata iti. vidyamānakāraṇatvād vidyamānabījāṃkuravad ity arthaḥ. smaraṇād eva ca pratyabhijñānam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14070: smaraṇe sati pratyabhijñānaṃ. tad evedaṃ yan mayā dṛṣṭam iti smaraṇāt.
T07yabhkvyu:14071: yat tarhīti. yadi cittaviśeṣa eva smarati. yat tarhi caitraḥ smaratīti tat katham iti vākyādhyāhāraḥ. sa cāpi tasyeti vistaraḥ. sa cāpi caitrābhidhānaḥ. saṃskārasamūhasaṃtānas tasya gavākhyasya
T07yabhkvyu:14073: kāraṇabhāvaṃ cetasikṛtvā. kiṃ. svāmīty ucyate. na tu pudgalaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14074: kāryakāraṇabhāvāpekṣo 'yaṃ vyavahāraḥ. na pudgalāpekṣa ity abhiprāyaḥ. ata
T07yabhkvyu:14075: evāha. na tu kaścid iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14076: evaṃ ko vijānātīti vistaraḥ. asaty ātmani ka evaṃ vijānāti. vijānātīti ko 'rthaḥ. vijñānena viṣayaṃ gṛhṇāti. kiṃ tad grahaṇam anyad vijñānat.
T07yabhkvyu:14077: vijñānaṃ tarhi karoti. uktaḥ saḥ. yas tat karoti. vijñānahetur
T07yabhkvyu:14078: indriyārthamanaskārāḥ. cittaviśeṣa iti tan na vaktavyaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14079: indriyādihetvantarayogāt. ata eva cocyate yathāyogam ity eṣa viśeṣa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14080: yat tarhi caitro vijānātīty ucyate. tato hi caitrākhyāt saṃtānād
T07yabhkvyu:14081: bhavadṛṣṭocyate. asaty ātmani kasyedaṃ vijñānaṃ. kim arthaiṣā ṣaṣṭhī.
T07yabhkvyu:14082: svāmyarthā. yathā kasya kaḥ svāmīti vistareṇa yāvat kva ca punar vijñānaṃ viniyoktavyaṃ yata etasya svāmī mṛgyate. vijñātavye 'rthe. kim arthaṃ viniyoktavyaṃ. vijñānārtham. aho sūktāni sukhaidhitānāṃ. tad eva hi nāma tadarthaṃ viniyoktavyam iti. kathaṃ ca viniyoktavyaṃ. utpādanata āhosvit saṃpreṣaṇataḥ. vijñānagatyayogād utpādanataḥ. [Tib. 377b] hetur eva tarhi
T07yabhkvyu:14083: svāmīti vistareṇa yāvad yo hy eva heturvijñānasya tasyaivāsau. yaś cāpi sa
T07yabhkvyu:14084: caitrābhidhāna iti vistareṇa yāvan na tatrāpi hetubhāvaṃ vyatītyāsti svāmibhāva iti. ādiśabdena ko vedayate kasya vedanā. kaḥ saṃjānīte kasya
T07yabhkvyu:14086: yo 'py āha. bhāvasya bhavitrapekṣād iti vaiyākaraṇaḥ. tena bhavitavyam iti. vijñātrā bhavitavyaṃ pudgalenety abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14087: gacchatigamanābhidhānavad iti. yathā jvālā gacchati śabdo gacchatīti gacchatiśabdābhidhānaṃ. yathā jvālāyāḥ śabdasya vā gamanam. evaṃ devadatto gacchati devadattasya gamanam. anena dṛṣṭāntena vijānāti devadatta iti sidhyati.
T07yabhkvyu:14088: sādṛśyenātmalābhād iti. kāraṇasādṛśyena kāryātmalābhāt. akurvad api kiṃcid
T07yabhkvyu:14090: tadākārateti. nīlādiviṣayākāratety arthaḥ. vijñāne kāraṇabhāvād iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14091: (Abhidh-k-vy 713) vijñānaṃ vijñānāntarsya kāraṇam. ato vijñānāntaram utpādād vijānātīty ucyate. kāraṇe kartṛśabdaniveśād iti. kāraṇaṃ kartṛbhūtam iti kṛtvā. tadyathā nādasya kāraṇaṃ ghaṇṭeti ghaṇṭā rautīty
T07yabhkvyu:14093: [Tib. 378a] pradīpa iti. arciṣāṃ saṃtāne pradīpa iti upacaryate. eka iveti kṛtvā. sa deśāntareṣūtpadyamānaḥ
T07yabhkvyu:14094: pradīpadeśāntareṣūtpadyamānaḥ. taṃtaṃ deśaṃ gacchatīty ucyate. evaṃ cittānāṃ saṃtāne vijñānam ity upacaryate. ekam iveti kṛtvā. tat saṃtānarūpaṃ vijñānaṃ viṣayāntareṣūtpadyamānaṃ taṃtaṃ viṣayaṃ vijānātīty
T07yabhkvyu:14095: ucyate. saṃtānena vijñānotpattyā vijānātīty abhiprāyaḥ. yathā vā rūpaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:14096: bhavatīti vistaraḥ. yathā bhavitū rūpasya bhāvāj janitur jāteḥ sthātuḥ sthiter anarthāntaratvam. evaṃ vijñāne 'pi syāt. vijñātur vijñānasya bhāvād anarthāntaratvaṃ. vyatiriktasya bhāvasyānupalabdheḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14098: nātmana iti. yadi nātmano vijñānam utpadyate vijñānalakṣaṇasyāviśeṣāt tādṛśam eva vijñānam utpadyeta. yadi tv ātmanaḥ tasyābhiprāyaviśeṣād viśiṣṭaṃ jñānam utpadyetety abhiprāyaḥ. na ca kramaniyameneti. kasmāc ca na kramaniyamenotpadyate. aniyamenāpi hy utpadyate gobuddher anantaraṃ strībhuddhiḥ. strībuddher mahiṣabhuddhiḥ. kasmād gobuddhir evānantaraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:14099: notpadyate. aṃkurakāṇḍapattrādivad iti. aṃkurāt kāṇḍa evotpadyate [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:14100: 378b] na pattrādi. kāṇḍāt pattram evotpadyate na puṣpādy aṃkurādi vā.
T07yabhkvyu:14102: nikāmadhyānasamāhitānām iti. nikāmena paryāptena samāptena dhyānena
T07yabhkvyu:14103: samāhitānām. sadṛśakāyacittotpattau sadṛśasya kāyasya cittasya cotpattau.
T07yabhkvyu:14104: svayaṃvyutthānam iti. na paropakrameṇety abhiprāyaḥ. evam anena kasmān na nityaṃ sadṛśam evotpadyata ity yat pṛṣṭaṃ. tad visarjanaṃ. yat tu pṛṣṭaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:14105: na ca kramaniyameneti. tad darśayann āha. kramo 'pi hi cittānām niyatam
T07yabhkvyu:14106: eveti. abhīṣṭam evaitat. gotraviśeṣād iti bhāvanāviśeṣāt. strīcittād iti vistaraḥ. strīcittāt stryālambanāc cittād anantaraṃ tasyāḥ striyāḥ kāyas
T07yabhkvyu:14107: tatkāyaḥ. tatkāyasya vidūsāṇāyai yadi parivrājakasyānyasya vā sādhoś
T07yabhkvyu:14108: cittam utpannaṃ bhavati. tatpatiputrādicittaṃ vā. tasyāḥ patiputrādayaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14109: ādiśabdena duhitrādayo gṛhyante. tadālambanaṃ cittaṃ tatpatiputrādicittaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14110: tad vānyatarad yad idaṃ tasmāt strīcittād anantam utpannaṃ bhavati. punaś ca kālāntareṇa saṃtatipariṇāmena strīcittam utpadyate. tat paścād utpannaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:14113: kasmād ity [Tib. 379a] āha. tadgotratvād iti. tadkāyavidūsaṇācittaṃ tatpatiputrādicittaṃ vā gotraṃ bījam asyeti tadgotraṃ. cittaṃ tasya bhāvaḥ. tasmāt. tajjātīyatvād ity abhiprāyaḥ. anyathety atadgotraṃ. atha punaḥ paryāyeṇeti vistaraḥ. paryāyeṇāyugapat. strīcittāt tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittaṃ tatas tatpaticittaṃ tatas tatputracittaṃ tata eva ca
T07yabhkvyu:14114: tadduhitṛcittaṃ tata eva ca tadupakaraṇādicittaṃ utpannaṃ bhavati. tataḥ strīcittād anaṃtarotpannebhyaś cittebhyo yad bahutaraṃ pravāhataḥ paṭutaraṃ śaktitaḥ āsannataraṃ vāsyotpādyasya cittasya. tad eva cittam
T07yabhkvyu:14115: utpadyate. tadbhāvanāyā balīyastvāt tasya bahutarasya paṭutarasyāsannatarasya vā bhāvanāyā balavattaratvāt. anyatreti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14117: ca. tasmād anyatra tasmād ṛta ity arthaḥ. tad eva hy upapadyate yasya kāyo
T07yabhkvyu:14119: saiva balīyasīti. yā bahutarasya paṭutarasya āsannatarasya vābhihitā saiva
T07yabhkvyu:14120: balīyasi bhāvanā. kasmān nityaṃ na phalati na hi tac cittaṃ nivartate.
T07yabhkvyu:14122: sthiter anyathātvaṃ lakṣaṇam asyeti sthityanyathātvalakṣaṇaṃ. tadbhāvāt.
T07yabhkvyu:14123: tasya cānyathātvasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇasya. anyabhāvanāphalotpattau anyabhāvanāphalasya cittāntarasyotpattāv ānuguṇyān nityaṃ na phalati tad evety arthasaṃbandhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14126: varṇasaṃniveśādiprakārāḥ. teṣāṃ kāraṇam idam asya kāraṇaṃ yenaivaṃ varṇaḥ evaṃ saṃniveśaḥ evaṃ snigdhateti.
T07yabhkvyu:14131: sarvajñabalaṃ hi tat jñānaṃ sarvavidbalaṃ hi taj jñānaṃ. yena tat kāraṇaṃ jñāyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14132: (Abhidh-k-vy 715) evarūpiṇāṃ cittabhedānām iti. rūpakāraṇam api sarvathā
T07yabhkvyu:14133: jñātum aśakyaṃ kim arūpiṇām ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14134: ekīyas tīrthika iti vaiśeṣikaḥ. manaḥsaṃyogaviśeṣāpekṣatvād iti cet. syān mataṃ tulye 'py ātmaprabhavatve cittotpatter ātmā kadācit karhicin manaḥsaṃyogaviśeṣam apekṣate. ity ato na nityaṃ tādṛśam eva cittam utpadyate na ca kramaniyamenāṃkurakāṇḍapattrādivad iti. na.
T07yabhkvyu:14135: anyasaṃyogāsiddheḥ. [Tib. 380a] naitad evaṃ. kasmāt. tābhyām ātmamanobhyām anyasya saṃyogasyāsiddheḥ. na hi saṃyogo nāma bhāvaḥ kaścid asmākaṃ siddho 'sti. saṃyoginoś ceti vistaraḥ. abhyupagate 'pi saṃyoge saṃyoginoś ceti
T07yabhkvyu:14136: vistaraḥ. lokaprasiddhayoḥ kāṣṭhayor anyayor vā kayościt. paricchinnatvāt paricchinnadeśadṛṣṭatvād ity arthaḥ. lakṣaṇavyākhyānde ceti.
T07yabhkvyu:14138: paricchedaprasaṃgaḥ. paricchinnadeśatvaprasaṃgaḥ. yatrātmā. na tatra manaḥ. yatra manaḥ. na tatrātmeti. anenānumānāgamāpattito dharmiviśeṣaviparyayo 'sya pakṣasya saṃdarśito bhavati. manasā saṃyoga ātmana iti. ātmā dharmī. tasya viśeṣaḥ sarvagatvaṃ. tadviparyayo
T07yabhkvyu:14139: 'sarvagatatvam iti. tato manaḥsaṃcārād ātmanaḥ saṃcāraprasaṃgād iti. tato lakṣaṇād aprāptipūrvikā prāptiḥ saṃyoga iti manaḥsaṃcārād yaṃyaṃ śarīrapradeśaṃ manaḥ saṃcarati. tatastata ātmā saṃcaraty apaitīti
T07yabhkvyu:14140: prasajyate. tadyathā yaṃyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ puruṣaḥ saṃcarati. tatastata ātapo 'pasarpati. tathā ca sati niḥkriyatvam asya bādhitaṃ bhavatīti. sa eva pratijñādoṣaḥ. vināśasya vā. prasaṃga iti vartate. ātmana iti ca.
T07yabhkvyu:14141: yatrayatra manaḥ saṃcarati. tatratatrātmā vinaśyatīti. sa eva cātra
T07yabhkvyu:14143: cet. syān matam ātmanā pradeśena saṃyogo manasaḥ. ātmano vā pradeśena
T07yabhkvyu:14144: manasā saha saṃyogaḥ. yasmiṃ charīrapradeśe mano 'vasthitaṃ bhavati.
T07yabhkvyu:14146: saṃyujyate. tasṃād aprāptipūrvakatve 'pi saṃyogasyāprāptenaivātmapradeśena manaḥ saṃyujyata iti. tan na. tasyaiva tatpradeśatvāyogāt. na hy ātmano
T07yabhkvyu:14147: 'nyapradeśa vidyaṃte. na caivātmaivātmanaḥ pradeśo yujyate. astu vā saṃyoga iti vistaraḥ. abhyupetyāpi saṃyogaṃ tathāpi nirvikāratvād aviśiṣṭe manasi kathaṃ saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ. kathaṃ viśiṣṭaḥ saṃyogo bhavati. yate evam uktaṃ manaḥsaṃyogaviśeṣāpekṣatvād iti. buddhiviśeṣāpekṣatvād iti cet. sa evopari codyate kathaṃ buddhiviśeṣa iti. kasmān na nityam īdṛśam evotpadyate cittam aviśiṣṭe ātmanīti. kāraṇaviśeṣād dhi kāryaviśeṣa
T07yabhkvyu:14148: (Abhidh-k-vy 716) iṣyate śaṃkhapaṭahādiśabdavat. saṃskāraviśeṣāpekṣād ātmamanaḥsaṃyogād iti cet. syān mataṃ nityam aviśiṣṭe 'py ātmani manasi ca
T07yabhkvyu:14149: saṃskāraviśeṣāpekṣād ātmamanasoḥ saṃyogād buddhiviśeṣa iti. tad uktaṃ bhavati. saṃskāraviśeṣād bhāvanāviśeṣalakṣaṇād ātmamanaḥsaṃyogaviśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14150: tadviśeṣād buddhiviśeṣa iti. atra brūmaḥ. cittād evāstv iti vistaraḥ. ayam
T07yabhkvyu:14151: ihācāryasyābhiprāyaḥ. [sāntarbhavaś cittam astīty avivādaḥ] mama tava ca
T07yabhkvyu:14152: cittam astīty avivādaḥ. [Tib. 381a] saṃskāraviśeṣo 'py asti bhāvanāviśeṣalakṣaṇo yo 'sau vāsanā bījam iti vāsmābhir vyavasthāpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14153: bhāvāntaraṃ na veti tuviśeṣaḥ. tasmāc cittād eva saṃskāraviśeṣāpekṣād buddhiviśeṣo 'stu. kim ātmanā tatsaṃyogena vā kalpiteneti. na hi kiṃcid
T07yabhkvyu:14154: iti vistaraḥ. kuhakenaikatareṇa vaidyena kasmaicit glānāyauṣadhaṃ dadānena cintitaṃ. idam auṣadhaṃ sulabhaṃ. viditaṃ cāsya saparijanasya glānasya.
T07yabhkvyu:14155: etena cauṣadhenāsya glānasya glānopaśamo bhavet. tad evaṃ mām avadhūyānye
T07yabhkvyu:14156: 'pi kariṣyanti. tataś ca mamārthalābho na bhaviṣyati. iti cintayitvā tad
T07yabhkvyu:14157: abhimaṃtrya phūḥ svāhā phūḥ svāheti janasya darśitam. anena mantreṇedam auṣadhaṃ sidhyatīti. tatra yathā kuhakavaidyaphūḥsvāhānām
T07yabhkvyu:14158: auṣadhakāryasiddhau sāmarthyaṃ nāsti. auṣadhasyaiva tu sāmarthyam. evam ātmano buddhiviśeṣopattau nāsti sāmarthyaṃ. cittasyaiva sāmarthyam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14159: saty ātmani tayoḥ saṃbhava iti cet. syān mataṃ. saty ātmani tayoḥ
T07yabhkvyu:14160: saṃskāracittayoḥ saṃbhavaḥ. ity ato 'sty ātmeti. atra brūmo vāṅmātraṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14161: nātra kācid yuktir astīti. āśrayaḥ sa iti cet. syān matam. ātmāśrayas tayor iti. yathā kaḥ kasyāśraya iti. āśrayarūpeṇodāharaṇaṃ mṛgyate. tam asyāśrayārtham ayuktaṃ darśayann āha. na hi te [Tib. 381b] iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14162: te saṃskāracitte. citrabadarādivat. yathā kuḍye citram ādhāryaṃ badaraṃ ca
T07yabhkvyu:14163: kuṇḍe. ādiśabdena bhājane bhojanam ityādi. naiva te saṃskāracitte
T07yabhkvyu:14164: tatrātmany ādheye. dhārye. nāpi sa kuḍyakuṇḍādivad ādhāro yuktaḥ. nāpi sa ātmā kuḍyavat kuṇḍavac cādhāro yuktaḥ. ādiśabdena bhājanādigrahaṇaṃ. kiṃ karaṇam ity āha. pratighātiyutatvadoṣād iti pratighātitvadoṣād
T07yabhkvyu:14166: arthaḥ. yathā citrabadarayoḥ kuḍyakuṇḍayoś cādhāryādhārabhāve pratighātitvam yutatvaṃ ca dṛṣṭe. evam eteṣām api syāt. aniṣṭaṃ caitat.
T07yabhkvyu:14168: yathā na gandhādhibhyo 'nyā pṛthivī. tathā buddhyādibhyo 'nya ātmeti.
T07yabhkvyu:14169: (Abhidh-k-vy 717) ko hi satpuruṣo gaṃdhādibhyo 'nyāṃ pṛthivīṃ nidhārayati.
T07yabhkvyu:14170: na hi pṛthivī katamety ukte rūpagandharasasparśebhyo 'nyā darśayituṃ śakyate yathā rūpaṃ gandhādibhyo 'nyad iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14171: yadi na gaṃdhādibhyo 'nyā pṛthivī. katham ayaṃ vyapadeśaḥ pṛthivyāṃ gandhādaya iti. anyena hy anyasya vyapadeśo dṛṣṭaḥ. caitrasya kambala iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14172: ata ucyate. vyapadeśas tu iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14173: [Tib. 382a] viśeṣaṇārthaṃ ity abādibhyo viśeṣaṇārtham ity arthaḥ. katham iti pratipādyati. te hy eveti vistaraḥ. te hy evety evakāras
T07yabhkvyu:14175: pṛthivyākhyāḥ. yathā vijñāyeran. tathā viśeṣaṇārthaṃ vyapadeśa ity
T07yabhkvyu:14176: abhisaṃbandhaḥ. nānya iti. nābādyākhyāḥ. pṛthivyākhyebhyo 'nye vijñāyerann ity arthaḥ. kāṣṭhapratimāyāḥ śarīravyapadeśavad iti. yathā kāṣṭhapratimāyāḥ śarīram iti vyapadiśyate. anyābhyo
T07yabhkvyu:14177: mṛnmayādiviśeṣaṇārthaṃ. na ca kāṣṭhapratimāyāḥ śarīram anyat. evam ihāpi vyapadeśaḥ syāt. na ca gandhādibhyo 'nyā pṛthivīti.
T07yabhkvyu:14179: yo hi baliṣṭha iti. saṃskāraviśeṣaḥ. tenānyeṣāṃ saṃskāraviśeṣāṇāṃ pratibandhaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14180: sa eva baliṣṭhaḥ kasmān nityaṃ na phalatīty ācāryavacanaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14181: sa eva punar āha. yo 'sya nyāyo yaḥ saṃskārasya nyāyo vināśaḥ pratibandho
T07yabhkvyu:14183: so 'stu bhāvanāyā bījātmikāyāḥ. ātmā tu nirarthako niḥprayojanaḥ kalpyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14184: saṃskārārthā hi tatkalpanā syāt. tasya ca saṃskārasya yat kāryaṃ. tad bhāvanayaiva kriyata
T07yabhkvyu:14185: smṛtyādīnām iti vistaraḥ. syān mataṃ. smṛtisaṃskārecchādveṣādīnāṃ [Tib.
T07yabhkvyu:14186: 382b] guṇapadārthatvāt tasya ca guṇapadārthasyāvaśyadravyāśritatvād dravyāśrayaś ca guṇavān ity evaṃ lakṣaṇopadeśāt. na caiṣām anya āśrayaḥ pṛthvyādiko yujyate 'parapratyakṣatvādhibhiḥ. kāraṇaiḥ. ato ya eṣām
T07yabhkvyu:14187: āśrayaḥ. sa ātmā. tasmād asty ātmeti.
T07yabhkvyu:14188: na. asiddheḥ. naitad evaṃ. kasmāt. smṛtyādīnāṃ guṇapadārthatvāsiddheḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14189: vidyamānaṃ dravyam iti. yat svalakṣaṇato vidyamānaṃ. tad dravyaṃ. ṣaṭ dravyāṇi śrāmaṇyaphalānīti. rūpaskandhādīni paṃca skandhāni
T07yabhkvyu:14190: śrāmaṇyaphalāny asaṃskṛtaṃ ca ṣaṣṭham iti ṣaṭ dravyāṇi bhavanti. nāpy eṣām iti. smṛtyādinaṃ. parīkṣito hy āśrayārtha iti. yathā kaḥ kasyāśrayaḥ. na hi te citrabadarādivad ādhārya iti vistareṇa.
T07yabhkvyu:14192: ete prakārā iti. gaurādiprakārāḥ. skaṃdheṣv ayam ity ahaṃkarāḥ. na tv ahaṃkāra iti. na tv aham ity evam ākaraḥ pratyaya ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14193: idaṃ punas tad evāyātam iti. kimarthaiṣā ṣaṣṭhī. svāmyarthā. yathā kaḥ kasyo svāmī. yathā goś caitraḥ katham asau tasyāḥ svāmī. tadadhīno hi tasyāvāhadhohādiṣu [Tib. 383a] viniyogaḥ. kva ca punar ahaṃkāro viniyoktavyo yata etasya svāmi mṛgyate. ahaṃkartavye 'rthe. kimarthaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:14194: viniyoktayaḥ. ahaṃkārārtham. aho sūktāni sukhaidhitānāṃ. sa eva hi nāma tadarthaṃ viniyoktavya iti. kathaṃ ca viniyoktvyaḥ. utpādanataḥ āhosvit saṃpreṣaṇataḥ. ahaṃkāragatyayogād utpādanataḥ. hetur eva tarhi svāmi
T07yabhkvyu:14195: prāpnoti. phalam eva ca svaṃ. yasmād dhetor ādhipatyaṃ phale. phalena ca tadvān hetur iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14196: ya evāsya hetur ahaṃkārasya. tasyaivayam iti. puṣpito vṛkṣa iti dṛṣṭānto yatra siddhānte vṛkṣāvayavī
T07yabhkvyu:14197: vijātīyacaturmahābhūtakāyārambhānabhīṣṭe. yatra tu vṛkṣāvayavy asti. tatra dvitīyo dṛṣṭāntaḥ. phalitaṃ vanam iti. na hi vanaṃ nāma kiṃcid asti. yathā yasmin vane phalam utpannaṃ tat phalitam iti ucyate. yathā yasminn āśraye
T07yabhkvyu:14198: ṣaḍāyatanalakṣaṇe sukham utpannaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā. sa sukhito duḥkhito vā.
T07yabhkvyu:14199: tathoktam iti. yathā āśrayaḥ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ tathoktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14201: iti. atha paṃcaskandhakaṃ bhavān udāharatīty adhikṛtaṃ. sa eva karteti. sa eva paṃcaskandhalakṣaṇaḥ kartā. [Tib. 383b] nātmā. iti siddho naḥ pakṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14202: tatrāpi svātaṃtryaṃ nāstīti darśayann āha. trividhaṃ cedaṃ karmeti
T07yabhkvyu:14203: vistaraḥ. kāyasya cittaparataṃtrā vṛttiḥ cittapravartitvāt kāyakarmaṇaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14205: [manodharma]manaskārādiparataṃtratvāt. tasyāpy evaṃ tasya cittakāraṇasya svakāraṇaparataṃtrā vṛttir iti. nāsti kasyacid api svātaṃtryaṃ kāyasya cittasya cittakāraṇasyānyasya vā. pratyayaparataṃtrā hi sarve bhāvāḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14207: dvābhyām anye tu jāyanta iti vacanāt. ātmano 'pi ca nirapekṣasya buddhiviśeṣādyutpattāv
T07yabhkvyu:14208: akāraṇatvābhyupagamān na svātaṃtryaṃ sidhyati. tasmān naivaṃ lakṣaṇa iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14209: svataṃtraḥ karteti. evaṃ tarhi kartety āha. yat tu yasya pradhānakāraṇaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14210: tat (Abhidh-k-vy 719) tasya kartety ucyate. prādhānye tatpratītyotpatteḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14211: sa evam api kartā na yujyate. pradhānakāraṇabhāvenāpi na yujyata ity
T07yabhkvyu:14213: tasyākāraṇatvam upadarśayann āha. smṛtito hi chanda iti vistaraḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14214: pūrvasmartavye 'ṛthe smṛtir utpadyate. smṛteś chandaḥ kartukāmatā. chandād vitarkaś cetanāviśeṣo 'bhisaṃskāralakṣaṇaḥ. prajñāviśeṣo vā yogācāranayena. vaibhāṣikanayena tv abhirūpaṇavikalpalakṣaṇaḥ. [Tib. 384a]
T07yabhkvyu:14215: vitarkāt pratyatno vīryaṃ. prayatnād vāyuḥ. tato vāyoḥ karma
T07yabhkvyu:14217: vijñāne pratiṣedhād iti. yaivopalabdhiḥ. tad eva vijñānaṃ. vijñāne cātmanaḥ sāmarthyaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ. cittād evāstu saṃskāraviśeṣāpekṣāt. na hi kiṃcid ātmana upalabhyate samarthyam. auṣadhakāryasiddhāv iva kuhakavaidyaphūḥsvāhānām iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14218: yathā tathoktam iti tadvikāravikāritvād āśrayāś cakṣurādaya
T07yabhkvyu:14220: tadāśritād ity ātmāśritāt. uktottaraiṣā vācoyuktir iti. yathā kaḥ kasyāśrayaḥ. na hi te citrabadarādivad ādhārye. nāpi sa kuḍyakuṇḍādivad
T07yabhkvyu:14221: ādhāro yuktaḥ. pratighātitvayuktatvādidoṣān na vai sa evam āśrayaḥ. kathaṃ tarhīti vistaraḥ. tadāhitaṃ hi tad iti. tena bījenāhitaṃ tat sāmarthyam ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14223: yad guru yac cāsannam iti vistaraḥ. ekasmin saṃtāne catvāri karmāṇi. guru āsannam abhyastaṃ
T07yabhkvyu:14224: pūrvakṛtaṃ ca. eṣāṃ caturṇāṃ gurukarma pūrvakam iti tribhyas tat pūrvaṃ vipacyate. āsannābhyastapūrvakṛtānām [Tib. 384b] apy āsannaṃ pūrvam iti tat pūrvaṃ dvābhyāṃ vipacyate. abhyastapūrvakṛtayoś cābhyastaṃ pūrvam iti ekasmāt pūrvaṃ vipacyate. asatsv eteṣu pūrvajanmakṛtaṃ vipacyate
T07yabhkvyu:14225: aparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ. akliṣṭānām iti. kuśalānām anivṛtāvyākṛtanāṃ ca.
T07yabhkvyu:14226: viklittiviśeṣajād iti. bhūmyudakasambandhāt phalasya sūkṣmo vikāro
T07yabhkvyu:14227: viklittiḥ. tasyā viśeṣaḥ. sa evātiprakṛṣṭaḥ. tasmāj jāto vikāraviśeṣaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14228: tasmāt. phalāntaram utpadyate. kīdṛśād vikāraviśeṣād iti darśayann āha. yo hi tatra bhūtaprakāraṅkuraṃ nivartayati. sa tasya bījam iti. tasyāṃkurasya
T07yabhkvyu:14229: bījaṃ. nānyo bhūtaprakāraḥ. na pūrvabījāvastho bhūtaprakāra ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14230: bhavinyā tu saṃjñayeti. odanaṃ pacati saktuṃ pinaṣṭīti yathā bhāvinyā
T07yabhkvyu:14231: saṃjñayā vyapadeśaḥ. evaṃ pūrvako 'pi (Abhidh-k-vy 720) saṃtānaḥ aviklinnabījāvasthaḥ bījam ity ākhyāyate bhāvinyānayā saṃjñayeti. sādṛśyād
T07yabhkvyu:14232: veti. viklinnaviśeṣajena bhūtavikāraviśeṣeṇa sadṛśaḥ. sa pūrvakaḥ saṃtāna
T07yabhkvyu:14233: iti kṛtvā bījam ity ākhyāyate. evam ihāpīti vistaraḥ. yadi saddharmaśravaṇayoniśomanaskārapratyayaviśeṣāj jātaḥ kuśalasāsravaś cittavikāra utpadyate. asaddharmaśravaṇayoniśomanaskārapratyayaviśeṣāj jātaḥ akuśalo vā cittavikāra [Tib. 385a] utpadyate. tasmād tadvipākāntaram utpadyate. nānyatheti samānam etat. yathā na phalād eva phalāntaram utpadyate. kiṃ tarhi. vikāraviśeṣāt. evaṃ na vipākād eva vipākāntaram utpadyate. kiṃ tarhi. cittavikāraviśeṣād utpadyate iti. tulyam etat.
T07yabhkvyu:14234: phale raktaḥ kesara iti. phalābhyantare kesaraḥ. yatra bījapūrakarasa āmlo
T07yabhkvyu:14235: 'vatiṣṭhate. na ca sa tasmāt punar anya iti. na rasaraktaḥ kesaras tasmād uktāt kesarāt punar upajāyate. kiṃ tarhi. prākṛta evāraktaḥ kesaras
T07yabhkvyu:14236: upajāyata ity arthaḥ. idam atrodāharaṇaṃ. yathā lākṣārasaraktamātuluṃgapuṣpaphalād raktakesarān na raktaṃ kesarāntaraṃ
T07yabhkvyu:14237: punar bhavati. evaṃ karmajād vipakān na punar vipākāntaram iti. āha cātra.
T07yabhkvyu:14238: cittaṃ hy etad anantabījasahitaṃ saṃtānato vartate.
T07yabhkvyu:14239: tattad bījam upaiti puṣṭim udite sve pratyaye cetasi. |
T07yabhkvyu:14240: tat puṣṭaṃ drumalabdhavṛtti phaladaṃ kālena saṃpadyate.
T07yabhkvyu:14255: phalam ity etac catuṣṭayaṃ niyamena [Tib. 385b] yadṛcchayā.
T07yabhkvyu:14256: buddhād anyaḥ śrāvakādiḥ sarvathā sarvākāraṃ na prajānāti.
T07yabhkvyu:14257: arthād uktaṃ bhavati. buddha eva tat sarvaṃ sarvathā prajānātīti.
T07yabhkvyu:14258: ity etām iti vistaraḥ. itikaraṇaḥ samāptyarthaḥ. pradarśanārtho vā. etāṃ buddhānāṃ pravacanadharmatāṃ suvihitena hetor mārgeṇa hetumārgeṇa śuddhāṃ niravadyāṃ niśāmya dṛṣṭvā. aṃdhās tīrthyāḥ. yathābhūtadarśanavaikalyāt.
T07yabhkvyu:14259: kutsitā dṛṣṭiḥ kudṛṣṭiḥ. tasyāś ceṣṭitāni kudṛṣṭiceṣṭitāni. vividhāni kudṛṣṭiceṣṭitān eṣām iti vividhakudṛṣṭiceṣṭitāḥ svargāpavargahetāv
T07yabhkvyu:14260: apratipanna mithyāpratipannāś cety arthaḥ. teṣām evaṃvidhānāṃ tīrthyānāṃ
T07yabhkvyu:14261: kapilolūkādīnāṃ mataṃ darśanam apavidhya tyaktvā yāṃti saṃsārān nirvāṇam iti vākyādhyāhāraḥ. ke te sattvāḥ prajñācakṣuṣmanta āryaśrāvakāḥ. atha vā tām eva pravacanadharmatāṃ yānti pratipadyanta ity arthaḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14262: pravacanadharmatā punar atra nairātmyaṃ buddhānuśāsani vā. anya āhuḥ.
T07yabhkvyu:14264: yuktyupetatvāt. nirvāṇapravaṇatā ca nirvāṇadyotanāt. yathoktaṃ sarva ime
T07yabhkvyu:14267: ātmocchedāśaṃkāpagamād iti. tad evam anandhā eva yānti. nāndhāḥ. andhās tu bhramanty eva saṃsārārṇave nairātmyam apaśyantaḥ. tad darśayann āha imāṃ hīti vistaraḥ. iyaṃ nirātmatā. nirvāṇam eva puraṃ nirvāṇapuraṃ. tasyaikā vartinīti nirvāṇapuraikamārgo nānyo mārga ity arthaḥ. tathāgata evādityo gaṃbhīradharmābhiprakāśakatvād ādityabhūtas tathāgataḥ. tasya vacāṃsi tāny
T07yabhkvyu:14268: evāṃśavaḥ. tair bhāsvatī ālokavatī tathāgatādityavaco'ṃśubhāsvati. āryāṇāṃ sahasrair vāhitety āryasahasravāhitā. vivṛtām apīti. tām imāṃ nirvāṇapuraikavartinīṃ tathāgatādityavaco'ṃśubhāsvatīṃ vivṛtām api nirātmatāṃ. prajñācakṣuṣo viśadasyābhāvād avidyākośapaṭalaparyavanaddhanetratvād vā mandacakṣuḥ tīrthiko vātsīputrīyo 'pi vā nekṣate. trayaś ceha mārgaguṇa varṇyante. (Abhidh-k-vy
T07yabhkvyu:14270: gacchati. yātānuyātatā ca parimarditasthāṇukaṇṭakāditvāt. [Tib. 386b] yena sukhaṃ gacchati. tatsādharmyeṇeyaṃ nirātmatāvartinī draṣṭavyā. caturbhiś ca kāraṇair mārgo na vidyate. satvānutamaskatayā. prakāśito 'py ādityena
T07yabhkvyu:14272: mandacakṣuṣkatayeti. teṣām ihaikam eva kāraṇam asya mārgasyādarśana uktaṃ.
T07yabhkvyu:14273: yato draṣṭur doṣeṇaivāyaṃ mārgo na dṛśyate. na mārgadoṣeṇeti. yata eṣa mandacakṣur etaṃ na paśyatīty avagantavyam.
T07yabhkvyu:14275: iti. sarvam iti yathoktaṃ. dig eva diṅmātram evakārārtho mātraśabdaḥ. dik pramāṇam asyeti diṅmātram iti vā. mahato 'bhidharmaśāstrād alpam idam
T07yabhkvyu:14278: matimatām ity arthaḥ. tādarthye ṣaṣṭhi. kiṃvad ity āha.
T07yabhkvyu:14280: iti. yathā visaṃ svasāmarthyād vraṇadeśaṃ prāpya sarveṣv aṅgapratyaṅgeṣv atyantaṃ visarpatīti matvā kenacit tasya vraṇadeśaḥ kṛtaḥ. kathaṃ nāmedaṃ visarpatīti. evaṃ sumedhasaḥ svasāmarthyavisarpitvād viṣasthāniyāḥ. ity atas teṣāṃ sumedhasām udghaṭitajñānāṃ prājñānām idam upadiṣṭaṃ mayā.
T07yabhkvyu:14282: kāśmīravaibhāṣikanītisiddham arthataḥ pratipadyerann iti. apare punar vyācakṣate. iti diṅmātram
T07yabhkvyu:14283: iti idam eva nairātmyaprativedham adhikṛtyoktam iti.
T07yabhkvyu:14290: vyākhyāpadārkakiraṇaiḥ sphuṭitaṃ madīyaiḥ śāstrāmbujaṃ budhajanabhramarā bhajantāṃ ||
T07yabhkvyu:14292: sa imāṃ kṛtavān vyākhyāṃ vyākhyāsv anyāsv asaṃtuṣṭaḥ. ||
T07yabhkvyu:14295: ācāryayaśomitrakṛtāyāṃ sphuṭārthāyām abhidharmakośavyākhyāyām aṣṭamaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptam
